tika-vin08t:13: Yena viddhaṃsitā pāpā, yena nibbāpitā darā;
tika-vin08t:14: Yena lokā nissarisuṃ, yena cāhaṃ namāmi taṃ.
tika-vin08t:19: Vinayaṃ vinayaṃ sāraṃ, saṅgahaṃ saṅgahaṃ karaṃ;
tika-vin08t:20: Cariyaṃ cariyaṃ vande, paramaṃ paramaṃ sutaṃ.
tika-vin08t:30: Porāṇehi katā ṭīkā, kiñcāpi atthi sā pana;
tika-vin08t:35: Imaṃ pakaraṇaṃ sabbe, sammā dhārentu sādhavoti.
tika-vin08t:37_4: Ettha hi vatthuttayaṃ namassitvāti iminā ratanattayapaṇāmo vutto paṇāmetabbapaṇāmaatthadassanato.
tika-vin08t:37_5: Saraṇaṃ sabbapāṇinanti iminā paṇāmārahabhāvo paṇāmahetudassanato. Pāḷimuttavinicchayanti
tika-vin08t:37_6: abhidheyyo imassa pakaraṇassa atthabhāvato. Vippakiṇṇamanekatthāti karaṇahetu tenevakāraṇena
tika-vin08t:37_7: pakaraṇassa katattā. Samāharitvā ekattha, dassayissamanākulanti karaṇappakāro tenākārena
tika-vin08t:37_8: pakaraṇassa karaṇato. Pakaraṇābhidhānaṃ pana samāharitasaddassa sāmatthiyato dassitaṃ
tika-vin08t:37_9: samāharitvā dassaneneva imassa pakaraṇassa vinayasaṅgahaiti nāmassa labhanato.
tika-vin08t:38_0: Nimittaṃ pana ajjhattikabāhiravasena duvidhaṃ. Tattha ajjhattikaṃ nāma karuṇā, taṃ
tika-vin08t:38_1: dassanakiriyāya sāmatthiyato dassitaṃ tasmiṃ asati dassanakiriyāya abhāvato. Bāhiraṃ
tika-vin08t:38_2: nāma sotujanasamūho, taṃ yogāvacarabhikkhūnanti tassa karuṇārammaṇabhāvato. Payojanaṃ
tika-vin08t:38_3: pana duvidhaṃ paṇāmapayojanapakaraṇapayojanavasena. Tattha paṇāmapayojanaṃ nāma antarāyavisosanapasādajananādikaṃ,
tika-vin08t:38_4: taṃ saraṇaṃ sabbapāṇinanti imassa sāmatthiyato dassitaṃ hetumhi sati phalassa avinābhāvato.
tika-vin08t:38_5: Vuttañhi abhidhammaṭīkācariyena “guṇavisesavā hi paṇāmāraho hoti, paṇāmārahe ca kato
tika-vin08t:38_6: paṇāmo vuttappayojanasiddhikarova hotī”ti. Pakaraṇapayojanampi duvidhaṃ mukhyānusaṅgikavasena.
tika-vin08t:38_7: Tesu mukhyapayojanaṃ nāma byañjanānurūpaṃ atthassa paṭivijjhanaṃ pakāsanañca atthānurūpaṃ
tika-vin08t:38_8: byañjanassa uddisanaṃ uddesāpanañca, taṃ vinaye pāṭavatthāyāti iminā vuttaṃ. Anusaṅgikapayojanaṃ
tika-vin08t:38_9: nāma sīlādianupādāparinibbānanto attho, taṃ samāharitvā ekattha dassayissanti imassa
tika-vin08t:38_10: sāmatthiyena dassitaṃ ekattha samāharitvā dassane sati taduggahaparipucchādinā katapayogassa
tika-vin08t:39_0: Kimatthaṃ panettha ratanattayapaṇāmādayo ācariyena katā, nanu adhippetaganthārambhova
tika-vin08t:39_1: kātabboti? Vuccate – ettha ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇaṃ tabbihatantarāyo hutvā anāyāsena
tika-vin08t:39_3: taṃ viññūnaṃ tosāpanatthaṃ, taṃ pakaraṇassa uggahaṇatthaṃ, taṃ sabbasampattinipphādanatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t:39_4: Abhidheyyakathanaṃ viditābhidheyyassa ganthassa viññūnaṃ uggahadhāraṇādivasena paṭipajjanatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t:39_5: Karaṇahetukathanaṃ akāraṇe katassa vāyāmassa nipphalabhāvato tappaṭikkhepanatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t:39_6: Karaṇappakārakathanaṃ viditappakārassa ganthassa sotūnaṃ uggahaṇādīsu rucijananatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t:40_0: Ratanattayapaṇāmapayojanaṃ pana bahūhi pakārehi vitthārayanti ācariyā, taṃ tattha
tika-vin08t:40_1: tattha vuttanayeneva gahetabbaṃ. Idha pana ganthagarubhāvamocanatthaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyehi
tika-vin08t:45_0: Ayamettha samudāyattho, ayaṃ pana avayavattho – ahaṃ sabbapāṇīnaṃ saraṇaṃ saraṇībhūtaṃ
tika-vin08t:45_1: vatthuttayaṃ namassāmi, namassitvā yogāvacarabhikkhūnaṃ vinaye pāṭavatthāya anekatthavippakiṇṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:45_2: pāḷimuttavinicchayaṃ ekattha samāharitvā anākulaṃ katvā dassayissaṃ dassayissāmīti yojanā.
tika-vin08t:46_0: Tattha vasanti etthāti vatthu. Kiṃ taṃ? Buddhādiratanaṃ. Tañhi yasmā saraṇagatā sappurisā
tika-vin08t:46_1: saraṇagamanasamaṅgino hutvā buddhādiratanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā tasmiṃ ārammaṇe vasanti
tika-vin08t:46_2: āvasanti nivasanti, tasmā “vatthū”ti vuccati. Ārammaṇañhi ādhāro, ārammaṇikaṃ ādheyyoti.
tika-vin08t:46_3: Ito parānipi vatthusaddassa vacanatthādīni ācariyehi vuttāni, tānipi tattha tattha
tika-vin08t:46_4: vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. Idha pana ganthavitthārapariharaṇatthaṃ ettakameva vuttanti
tika-vin08t:46_5: veditabbanti. Tiṇṇaṃ samūhoti tayaṃ, tayo aṃsā avayavā assāti vā tayaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ?
tika-vin08t:46_6: Samudāyo. Vatthūnaṃ tayanti vatthuttayaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Buddhādiratanattayaṃ. Namassāmīti
tika-vin08t:46_7: namassitvā, anaminti namassitvā. Buddhādiratanañhi ārammaṇaṃ katvā cittassa uppajjanakāle
tika-vin08t:46_8: tvā-paccayo paccuppannakāliko hoti, tasmā paṭhamo viggaho kato, pāḷimuttavinicchayaṃ
tika-vin08t:46_9: ekattha dassanakāle atītakāliko, tasmā dutiyo viggaho. Teneva ca kāraṇena atthayojanāyapi
tika-vin08t:47_0: Sarati hiṃsatīti saraṇaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Buddhādiratanattayaṃ. Tañhi saraṇagatānaṃ sappurisānaṃ
tika-vin08t:47_1: bhayaṃ santāsaṃ dukkhaṃ duggativinipātaṃ saṃkilesaṃ sarati hiṃsati vināseti, tasmā
tika-vin08t:48: “Yasmiṃ, mahānāma, samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hotī”tiādi,
tika-vin08t:53_0: Yasmā pana “saraṇa”nti idaṃ padaṃ “nātha”nti padassa vevacanabhūtaṃ kitasuddhanāmapadaṃ
tika-vin08t:53_1: hoti, na kitamattapadaṃ, tasmā dhātvattho antonīto. “Sara hiṃsāya”nti hi vuttaṃ hiṃsatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:53_2: gahetvā sabbapāṇīnaṃ saraṇaṃ hiṃsakaṃ vatthuttayaṃ namassitvā viññāyamāne aniṭṭhappasaṅgato
tika-vin08t:53_3: sabbapāṇīnaṃ saraṇaṃ saraṇībhūtaṃ nāthabhūtaṃ vatthuttayaṃ namassitvāti viññāyamāneyeva
tika-vin08t:53_4: yujjati, teneva ca kāraṇena atthayojanāyampi tathā yojanā katā. Sabba-saddo niravasesatthavācakaṃ
tika-vin08t:53_5: sabbanāmapadaṃ. Saha avena yo vattatīti sabboti kate pana sakala-saddo viya samudāyavācakaṃ
tika-vin08t:53_6: samāsanāmapadaṃ hoti. Pāṇo etesaṃ atthīti pāṇino, pāṇoti cettha jīvitindriyaṃ adhippetaṃ.
tika-vin08t:53_7: Sabbe pāṇino sabbapāṇino, tesaṃ sabbapāṇīnaṃ. Ettāvatā vatthuttayassa sabbalokasaraṇabhāvaṃ,
tika-vin08t:53_8: tatoyeva ca namassanārahabhāvaṃ, namassanārahe ca katāyanamassanakiriyāya yathādhippetatthasiddhikarabhāvaṃ,
tika-vin08t:54_0: Evaṃ sahetukaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmaṃ dassetvā idāni pakaraṇārambhassa sanimittaṃ mukhyapayojanaṃ
tika-vin08t:54_1: dassetumāha “vinaye pāṭavatthāya, yogāvacarabhikkhūna”nti. Ettha ca vinaye pāṭavatthāyāti
tika-vin08t:54_2: mukhyapayojanadassanaṃ, taṃdassanena ca anusaṅgikapayojanampi vibhāvitameva hoti
tika-vin08t:54_3: kāraṇe siddhe kāriyassa sijjhanato. Yogāvacarabhikkhūnanti bāhiranimittadassanaṃ,
tika-vin08t:54_4: tasmiṃ dassite ajjhattikanimittampi dīpitameva hoti ārammaṇe ñāte ārammaṇikassa ñātabbato.
tika-vin08t:54_6: vividhā anekappakārā nayā ettha santīti attho. Atha vā visesā nayā etthāti vinayo,
tika-vin08t:54_7: daḷhīkammasithilakaraṇapayojanā anupaññattinayādayo visesā nayā ettha santīti attho.
tika-vin08t:54_8: Atha vā vinetīti vinayo. Kāyo vineti kāyavācāyo, iti kāyavācānaṃ vinayanato vinayo.
tika-vin08t:59_0: Ko so? Vinayapiṭakaṃ. Tasmiṃ vinaye. Paṭati viyattabhāvaṃ gacchatīti paṭu. Ko so?
tika-vin08t:59_1: Paṇḍito. Paṭuno bhāvo pāṭavaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Ñāṇaṃ. Asati kāraṇānurūpaṃ bhavatīti attho.
tika-vin08t:59_2: Ko so? Payojanaṃ. Pāṭavameva attho pāṭavattho, tassa pāṭavatthāya, vinayapiṭake kosallañāṇapayojanāyāti
tika-vin08t:59_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Yuñjanaṃ yogo, kammaṭṭhānamanasikāro. Avacarantīti avacarā, yoge avacarā
tika-vin08t:59_4: yogāvacarā, kammaṭṭhānikā bhikkhū. Saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhantīti bhikkhū, yogāvacarā
tika-vin08t:59_5: ca te bhikkhū cāti yogāvacarabhikkhū, tesaṃ yogāvacarabhikkhūnaṃ. Etena vinaye paṭubhāvo
tika-vin08t:59_6: nāma bhikkhūnaṃyeva attho hoti, na gahaṭṭhatāpasaparibbājakādīnaṃ. Bhikkhūsu ca kammaṭṭhāne
tika-vin08t:59_7: niyuttānaṃ lajjipesalabhikkhūnaṃyeva, na vissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhānānaṃ alajjibhikkhūnanti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin08t:60_0: Evaṃ pakaraṇārambhassa sanimittaṃ payojanaṃ dassetvā idāni sahetukaṃ abhidheyyaṃ
tika-vin08t:60_1: dassetuṃ “vippakiṇṇamanekattha, pāḷimuttavinicchaya”nti āha. Tattha vippakiṇṇaṃ anekatthāti
tika-vin08t:60_2: iminā pakaraṇārambhassa hetuṃ dasseti hetumantavisesanattā, imassa anekatthavippakiṇṇattāyeva
tika-vin08t:60_3: ācariyassa ārambho hoti, na avippakiṇṇe sati. Vakkhati hi “samāharitvā ekattha dassayissa”nti.
tika-vin08t:60_4: Pāḷimuttavinicchayanti iminā pakaraṇābhidheyyaṃ. Tattha kirati vikkhipatīti kiṇṇo,
tika-vin08t:60_5: pakārena kiṇṇo pakiṇṇo, vividhena pakiṇṇo vippakiṇṇo. Ko so? Pāḷimuttavinicchayo, taṃ vippakiṇṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t:61_0: Anekatthāti ettha saṅkhyāvācako sabbanāmiko eka-saddo, na eko aneke. Bahvatthavācako
tika-vin08t:61_1: anekasaddo. Ekantaekavacanantopi eka-saddo na-itinipātena yuttattā bahuvacananto
tika-vin08t:61_2: jātoti. Tattha anekattha bahūsūti attho, pārājikakaṇḍaṭṭhakathādīsu anekesu pakaraṇesūti
tika-vin08t:61_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Porāṇaṭīkāyaṃ pana anekatthāti anekesu sikkhāpadapadesesūti attho dassito,
tika-vin08t:61_4: evañca sati upari “samāharitvā ekatthā”ti vakkhamānattā “anekatthavippakiṇṇaṃ ekattha
tika-vin08t:61_5: samāharitvā”ti imesaṃ padānaṃ sahayogībhūtattā anekesu sikkhāpadapadesesu vippakiṇṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:61_6: ekasmiṃ sikkhāpadapadese samāharitvāti attho bhaveyya, so ca attho ayutto. Kasmā?
tika-vin08t:61_7: Anekesu pakaraṇesu vippakiṇṇaṃ ekasmiṃ pakaraṇe samāharitvāti attho amhehi vutto.
tika-vin08t:61_8: Atha pana “ekatthā”ti imassa “ekato”ti atthaṃ vikappetvā anekesu sikkhāpadapadesesu
tika-vin08t:61_9: vippakiṇṇaṃ ekato samāharitvāti atthaṃ gaṇheyya, so attho yutto bhaveyya.
tika-vin08t:62_0: Pakaṭṭhānaṃ āḷīti pāḷi, uttamānaṃ vacanānaṃ anukkamoti attho. Atha vā attatthaparatthādibhedaṃ
tika-vin08t:62_1: atthaṃ pāleti rakkhatīti pāḷi, laḷānamaviseso. Kā sā? Vinayatanti. Muccatīti mutto,
tika-vin08t:62_2: pāḷito mutto pāḷimutto. Chindiyate anenāti chayo, nīharitvā chayo nicchayo, visesena
tika-vin08t:62_3: nicchayo vinicchayo, khilamaddanākārena pavatto saddanayo atthanayo ca. Pāḷimutto
tika-vin08t:62_4: ca so vinicchayo cāti pāḷimuttavinicchayo, taṃ pāḷimuttavinicchayaṃ. Idañca “ānagarā
tika-vin08t:62_5: khadiravana”ntiādīsu viya yebhuyyanayavasena vuttaṃ katthaci pāḷivinicchayassapi
tika-vin08t:62_6: dissanato. Porāṇaṭīkāyaṃ pana pāḷivinicchayo ca pāḷimuttavinicchayo ca pāḷimuttavinicchayoti
tika-vin08t:62_7: evaṃ ekadesasarūpekasesavasena vā etaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbanti dutiyanayopi vutto,
tika-vin08t:62_8: evañca sati pāḷivinicchayapāḷimuttavinicchayehi aññassa vinicchayassa abhāvā kimetena
tika-vin08t:62_9: ganthagarukarena pāḷimuttaggahaṇena. Visesanañhi sambhavabyabhicāre ca sati sātthakaṃ
tika-vin08t:63_0: Evaṃ sahetukaṃ abhidheyyaṃ dassetvā idāni karaṇappakāraṃ dasseti “samāharitvā”tiādinā.
tika-vin08t:63_1: Duvidho hettha karaṇappakāro ekatthasamāharaṇaanākulakaraṇavasena. So duvidhopi tena
tika-vin08t:63_2: pakārena pakaraṇassa katattā “karaṇappakāro”ti vuccati. Tattha samāharissāmīti samāharitvā,
tika-vin08t:63_3: saṃ-saddo saṅkhepattho, tasmā saṅkhipiya āharissāmīti attho. Anāgatakālikavasena
tika-vin08t:63_4: paccamānena “dassayissa”nti padena samānakālattā anāgatakāliko idha tvā-paccayo vutto.
tika-vin08t:63_5: Ekatthāti ekasmiṃ idha vinayasaṅgahappakaraṇe. Ekatthāti vā ekato. Dassayissanti
tika-vin08t:63_6: dassayissāmi, ñāpayissāmīti attho. Ākulati byākulatīti ākulo, na ākulo anākulo, pubbāparabyākiṇṇavirahito
tika-vin08t:63_7: pāḷimuttavinicchayo. Anākulanti pana bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ, tasmā karadhātumayena katvāsaddena
tika-vin08t:64_0: Evaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmādikaṃ pubbakaraṇaṃ dassetvā idāni ye pāḷimuttavinicchaye dassetukāmo,
tika-vin08t:64_1: tesaṃ anukkamakaraṇatthaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapento “tatrāyaṃ mātikā”tiādimāha. Mātikāya hi
tika-vin08t:64_2: asati dassitavinicchayā vikiranti vidhaṃsenti yathā taṃ suttena asaṅgahitāni pupphāni.
tika-vin08t:64_3: Santiyā pana mātikāya dassitavinicchayā na vikiranti na vidhaṃsenti yathā taṃ suttena
tika-vin08t:64_4: saṅgahitāni pupphāni. Taṃ taṃ atthaṃ jānitukāmehi mātikānusārena gantvā icchiticchitavinicchayaṃ
tika-vin08t:64_5: patvā so so attho jānitabbo hoti, tasmā sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ mātikā ṭhapitā. Tattha
tika-vin08t:64_6: tatrāti tasmiṃ pāḷimuttavinicchaye. Ayanti ayaṃ mayā vakkhamānā. Mātā viyāti mātikā.
tika-vin08t:64_7: Yathā hi puttā mātito pabhavanti, evaṃ niddesapadāni uddesato pabhavanti, tasmā uddeso
tika-vin08t:65_2: samattā”tiādi. Iti-saddo idamattho vā nidassanattho vā parisamāpanattho vā. Tesu
tika-vin08t:65_3: idamatthe kā sā? Divāseyyā…pe… pakiṇṇakaṃ iti ayanti. Nidassanatthe kathaṃ sā? Divāseyyā…pe…
tika-vin08t:65_4: pakiṇṇakaṃ iti daṭṭhabbāti. Parisamāpanatthe sā kittakena parisamattā? Divāseyyā…pe…
tika-vin08t:65_5: pakiṇṇakaṃ iti ettakena parisamattāti attho. Imesaṃ pana divāseyyādipadānaṃ vākyaviggahaṃ
tika-vin08t:65_6: katvā atthe idha vuccamāne atipapañco bhavissati, sotūnañca dussallakkhaṇīyo, tasmā
tika-vin08t:65_7: tassa tassa niddesassa ādimhiyeva yathānurūpaṃ vakkhāma.
tika-vin08t:68_0: 1. Evaṃ pāḷimuttavinicchayakathānaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā idāni yathāṭhapitamātikānukkamena
tika-vin08t:68_1: niddisanto “tattha divāseyyāti divānipajjana”ntiādimāha. Tattha tatthāti tesu mātikāpadesu
tika-vin08t:68_3: Tattha divā-saddo ahavācako ākāranto nipāto. Vuttañhi abhidhānappadīpikāyaṃ “ānukūlyetu
tika-vin08t:68_4: saddhañca, nattaṃ doso divā tvahe”ti. Sayanaṃ seyyā, karajakāyagatarūpānaṃ uddhaṃ
tika-vin08t:68_5: anuggantvā dīghavasena vitthārato pavattanasaṅkhāto iriyāpathaviseso. Divākālasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:68_6: seyyā divāseyyā. Aruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā, etasmiṃ kāle sayanairiyāpathakaraṇanti.
tika-vin08t:69_0: Tatrāti tasmiṃ divāsayane ayaṃ vakkhamāno vinicchayo veditabboti yojanā. “Anujānāmi…pe…
tika-vin08t:69_1: vacanato”ti ayaṃ paṭhamapārājikasikkhāpadassa vinītavatthūsu āgato bhagavatā āhaccabhāsito
tika-vin08t:69_2: ñāpakapāṭho. Tattha divā paṭisallīyantenāti divā nipajjantena. Dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā
tika-vin08t:69_3: paṭisallīyitunti dvāraṃ pidahitvā nipajjituṃ. “Divā…pe… nipajjitabbanti ñāpyaṃ. Nanu
tika-vin08t:69_4: pāḷiyaṃ “ayaṃ nāma āpattī”ti na vuttā, atha kathamettha āpatti viññāyatīti codanaṃ
tika-vin08t:69_5: sandhāyāha “ettha ca kiñcāpī”tiādi. Tattha etthāti etasmiṃ divānipajjane. Ca-saddo
tika-vin08t:69_6: vākyārambhajotako, kiñcāpi-saddo nipātasamudāyo, yadipītyattho. Pāḷiyaṃ ayaṃ nāma
tika-vin08t:69_7: āpattīti kiñcāpi na vuttā, pana tathāpi asaṃvaritvā nipajjantassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin08t:69_8: yasmā vuttaṃ, tasmā ettha āpatti viññāyatīti yojanā. Evaṃ santepi asati bhagavato
tika-vin08t:69_9: vacane kathaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ siyāti āha “vivaritvā…pe… anuññātattā”ti. Etena
tika-vin08t:69_10: bhagavato anujānanampi taṃ akarontassa āpattikāraṇaṃ hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:70_1: vuttaṃ, sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “methunavatthusmiṃ uppanne”ti vuttaṃ, porāṇaṭīkāyampi
tika-vin08t:70_2: tameva gahetvā “uppanne methunavatthusmi”nti vuttaṃ, tadetaṃ vicāretabbaṃ methunalakkhaṇassa
tika-vin08t:70_3: abhāvā. Nanu sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ nāma buddhavisayo, atha kasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin08t:70_4: vuttanti āha “bhagavato”tiādi. Na kevalaṃ upālittherādīhi eva aṭṭhakathā ṭhapitā,
tika-vin08t:70_5: atha kho pāḷito ca atthato ca buddhena bhagavatā vutto. Na hi bhagavatā abyākataṃ
tika-vin08t:70_6: tantipadaṃ nāma atthi, sabbesaṃyeva attho kathito, tasmā sambuddheneva tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ
tika-vin08t:70_7: atthavaṇṇanakkamopi bhāsitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha tattha hi bhagavatā pavattitā pakiṇṇakadesanāyeva aṭṭhakathāti.
tika-vin08t:71_0: Kiṃ panettha etaṃ divā dvāraṃ asaṃvaritvā nipajjantassa dukkaṭāpattiāpajjanaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:71_1: vuttattā eva siddhaṃ, udāhu aññenapīti āha “atthāpattī”tiādi. Etaṃ dukkaṭāpattiāpajjanaṃ
tika-vin08t:71_2: na kevalaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā eva siddhaṃ, atha kho “atthāpatti divā āpajjati,
tika-vin08t:71_3: no ratti”nti iminā parivārapāṭhenapi siddhaṃ hotīti yojanā. Katarasmiṃ pana vatthusmiṃ
tika-vin08t:71_4: idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vuttanti? “Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu vesāliyaṃ mahāvane
tika-vin08t:71_5: kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ divā vihāragato dvāraṃ vivaritvā nipanno ahosi. Tassa aṅgamaṅgāni
tika-vin08t:71_6: vātupatthaddhāni ahesuṃ. Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā itthiyo gandhañca mālañca
tika-vin08t:71_7: ādāya vihāraṃ āgamiṃsu vihārapekkhikāyo. Atha kho tā itthiyo taṃ bhikkhuṃ passitvā
tika-vin08t:71_8: aṅgajāte abhinisīditvā yāvadatthaṃ katvā ‘purisusabho vatāya’nti vatvā gandhañca
tika-vin08t:71_9: mālañca āropetvā pakkamiṃsu. Bhikkhū kilinnaṃ passitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
tika-vin08t:71_10: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, ākārehi aṅgajātaṃ kammaniyaṃ hoti rāgena, vaccena, passāvena,
tika-vin08t:71_11: vātena, uccāliṅgapāṇakadaṭṭhena. Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahākārehi aṅgajātaṃ kammaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:71_12: hoti. Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṃ tassa bhikkhuno rāgena aṅgajātaṃ kammaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:71_13: assa, arahaṃ so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu, anāpatti bhikkhave tassa bhikkhuno. Anujānāmi
tika-vin08t:71_14: bhikkhave divā paṭisallīyantena dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā paṭisallīyitu”nti etasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ
tika-vin08t:72_1: saṃvaraṇavivaraṇavasena ito cito ca parivattanayoggadvārameva. Rukkhasūcikaṇṭakadvāranti
tika-vin08t:72_3: Yaṃ ubhosu passesu rukkhatthambhe nikhanitvā tattha vijjhitvā majjhe dve tisso rukkhasūciyo
tika-vin08t:72_4: pavesetvā karonti, taṃ rukkhasūcidvāraṃ nāma. Pavesananikkhamanakāle apanetvā thakanayoggaṃ
tika-vin08t:72_5: ekāya, bahūhi vā kaṇṭakasākhāhi kataṃ kaṇṭakadvāraṃ nāma. Gāmadvārassa pidhānatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:72_6: padarena vā kaṇṭakasākhādīhi vā katassa kavāṭassa udukkhalapāsakarahitatāya ekena
tika-vin08t:72_7: saṃvarituṃ vivarituñca asakkuṇeyyassa heṭṭhā ekaṃ cakkaṃ yojenti, yena parivattamānakakavāṭaṃ
tika-vin08t:72_8: sukhathakanakaṃ hoti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “cakkalakayuttadvāra”nti. Cakkameva hi
tika-vin08t:72_9: lātabbatthena saṃvaraṇavivaraṇatthāya gahetabbatthena cakkalakaṃ, tena yuttakavāṭampi
tika-vin08t:73_0: Mahādvāresu pana dve tīṇi cakkalakāni yojetīti āha “phalakesū”tiādi. Kiṭikāsūti veḷupesikādīhi
tika-vin08t:73_1: kaṇṭakasākhādīhi ca katathakanakesu. Saṃsaraṇakiṭikadvāranti cakkalakayantena saṃsaraṇakiṭikāyuttamahādvāraṃ.
tika-vin08t:73_2: Gopphetvāti āvuṇitvā, rajjūhi ganthetvā vā. Ekaṃ dussasāṇidvāramevāti ettha kilañjasāṇidvārampi
tika-vin08t:73_3: saṅgahaṃ gacchati. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “dussadvāraṃ sāṇidvārañca dussasāṇidvāraṃ.
tika-vin08t:73_4: Dussasāṇi kilañjasāṇītiādinā vuttaṃ sabbampi dussasāṇiyameva saṅgahetvā vuttaṃ, ekasadisattā
tika-vin08t:74_0: 3. Evaṃ dvāravisesaṃ dassetvā idāni yattakena dvāraṃ saṃvutaṃ hoti, taṃ pamāṇaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin08t:74_1: “kittakena”tyādimāha. Tattha sūcīti majjhe chiddaṃ katvā pavesitā. Ghaṭikāti upari
tika-vin08t:74_2: yojitā. Idāni yattha dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā nipajjituṃ na sakkā hoti, tattha kātabbavidhiṃ
tika-vin08t:74_3: dassetuṃ “sace bahūnaṃ vaḷañjanaṭṭhānaṃ hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bahūnaṃ avaḷañjanaṭṭhānepi
tika-vin08t:74_4: ekaṃ āpucchitvā nipajjituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Atha bhikkhū…pe… nisinnā hontīti idaṃ tattha
tika-vin08t:74_6: tasmā nipannepi ābhogaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Nipajjitvā niddāyante pana ābhogaṃ kātuṃ na
tika-vin08t:74_7: vaṭṭati. Asantapakkhe ṭhitattā raho nisajjāya viya dvārasaṃvaraṇaṃ nāma mātugāmānaṃ
tika-vin08t:75_0: Ettha ca taṃ yuttaṃ, evaṃ sabbatthapi yo yo theravādo vā aṭṭhakathāvādo vā pacchā
tika-vin08t:75_1: vuccati, so sova pamāṇanti gahetabbanti idaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanato atirekaṃ ācariyassa
tika-vin08t:75_2: vacanaṃ. Ito pubbāparavacanaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanameva. Tattha taṃ yuttanti “kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:75_3: pana…pe… na vattatī”ti yaṃ vacanaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyehi vuttaṃ, taṃ vacanaṃ yuttanti
tika-vin08t:75_4: attho. Evaṃ…pe… gahetabbanti yathā cettha kurundiyaṃ vuttavacanaṃ yuttaṃ, evaṃ sabbatthapi
tika-vin08t:75_5: vinicchaye yo yo theravādo vā aṭṭhakathāvādo vā pacchā vuccati, so sova pamāṇanti
tika-vin08t:75_6: gahetabbaṃ, pure vutto theravādo vā aṭṭhakathāvādo vā pamāṇanti na gahetabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:75_7: Idaṃ vacanaṃ aṭṭhāne vuttaṃ viya dissati. Kathaṃ? Yaṃ tāva vuttaṃ, taṃ yuttanti.
tika-vin08t:75_8: Taṃ imasmiṃ āpucchanaābhogakaraṇavinicchaye aññassa ayuttassa aṭṭhakathāvādassa vā
tika-vin08t:75_9: theravādassa vā abhāvā vattuṃ na sakkā. Na hi pubbavākye “bhikkhū evā”ti avadhāraṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:75_10: kataṃ, atha kho āsannavasena vā paṭṭhānavasena vā “bhikkhū cīvarakammaṃ”iccādikaṃyeva
tika-vin08t:75_11: vuttaṃ. Yampi vuttaṃ “evaṃ sabbatthapī”tyādi, tampi anokāsaṃ. Imasmiṃ vinicchaye
tika-vin08t:75_12: aññassa aṭṭhakathāvādassa vā ācariyavādassa vā avacanato pure pacchābhāvo ca na dissati,
tika-vin08t:75_13: ayaṃ “pamāṇa”nti gahetabbo, ayaṃ “na gahetabbo”ti vattabbabhāvo ca.
tika-vin08t:76_0: Upari pana “ko muccati, ko na muccatī”ti imassa pañhassa vissajjane mahāpaccarivādo
tika-vin08t:76_1: ca kurundivādo ca mahāaṭṭhakathāvādo cāti tayo aṭṭhakathāvādā āgatā, eko mahāpadumattheravādo,
tika-vin08t:76_2: tasmā tattheva yuttāyuttabhāvo ca pamāṇāpamāṇabhāvo ca gahetabbāgahetabbabhāvo ca
tika-vin08t:76_3: dissati, tasmā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne vattabbaṃ siyā, suvimalavipulapaññāveyyattiyasamannāgatena
tika-vin08t:76_4: pana ācariyāsabhena avattabbaṭṭhāne vuttaṃ na siyā, tasmā upari aṭṭhakathāvādasaṃsandanāvasāne
tika-vin08t:76_5: mahāpadumattherena vuttanti imassa vacanassa pacchato vuttaṃ siyā, taṃ pacchā lekhakehi
tika-vin08t:76_6: parivattetvā likhitaṃ bhaveyya, pārājikakaṇḍaṭṭhakathāyañca idaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:76_7: Ṭīkāyañca imasmiṃ ṭhāne na vuttaṃ, upariyeva vuttaṃ, “yo ca yakkhagahitako, yo ca
tika-vin08t:76_8: bandhitvā nipajjāpito”ti imassa aṭṭhakathāvādassa pacchimattā soyeva pamāṇato gahetabbo.
tika-vin08t:76_9: Tathā ca vakkhati “sabbattha yo yo aṭṭhakathāvādo vā theravādo vā pacchā vuccati,
tika-vin08t:76_10: so soyeva pamāṇato daṭṭhabbo”ti, tasmā idamettha vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:77_0: 4. Idāni dvāraṃ saṃvaraṇassa antarāye sati asaṃvaritvāpi nipajjituṃ vaṭṭatīti dassetuṃ
tika-vin08t:77_1: “atha dvārassa”tyādimāha. Nisseṇiṃ āropetvāti uparimatalaṃ āropetvā visaṅkharitvā
tika-vin08t:77_2: bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā, chaḍḍetvā vā nipajjituṃ vaṭṭati. Idaṃ ekābaddhatāya vuttaṃ. Dvepi
tika-vin08t:77_3: dvārāni jaggitabbānīti ettha sace ekasmiṃ dvāre kavāṭaṃ vā natthi, heṭṭhā vuttanayena
tika-vin08t:77_4: saṃvarituṃ vā na sakkā, itaraṃ dvāraṃ asaṃvaritvā nipajjituṃ vaṭṭati. Dvārapālassāti
tika-vin08t:77_5: dvārakoṭṭhake mahādvāre, nisseṇimūle vā ṭhatvā dvārajagganakassa. Pacchimānaṃ bhāroti
tika-vin08t:77_6: ekābaddhavasena āgacchante sandhāya vuttaṃ. Asaṃvutadvāre antogabbhe vāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:77_7: Bahi vāti gabbhato bahi. Nipajjanakālepi…pe… vaṭṭatiyevāti ettha dvārajagganakassa
tika-vin08t:77_8: tadadhīnattā tadā tassa tattha sannihitāsannihitabhāvaṃ anupadhāretvāpi ābhogaṃ kātuṃ
tika-vin08t:78_0: Yena kenaci parikkhitteti ettha parikkhepassa ubbedhato pamāṇaṃ sahaseyyappahonake
tika-vin08t:78_1: vuttasadisameva. Vuttañhi samantapāsādikāyaṃ “yañhi senāsanaṃ upari pañcahi chadanehi
tika-vin08t:78_2: aññena vā kenaci sabbameva paṭicchannaṃ, ayaṃ sabbacchannā nāma seyyā…pe… yaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:78_3: senāsanaṃ bhūmito paṭṭhāya yāva chadanaṃ āhacca pākārena vā aññena vā kenaci antamaso
tika-vin08t:78_4: vatthenapi parikkhittaṃ, ayaṃ sabbaparicchannā nāma seyyā. Chadanaṃ anāhacca sabbantimena
tika-vin08t:78_7: sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vimativinodaniyañca vuttaṃ. Mahāpariveṇanti mahantaṃ aṅgaṇaṃ. Tena
tika-vin08t:79_0: Aruṇe uggate vuṭṭhāti, anāpatti anāpattikhettabhūtāya rattiyā suddhacittena nipannattā.
tika-vin08t:79_1: Pabujjhitvā puna supati, āpattīti aruṇe uggate pabujjhitvā aruṇuggamanaṃ ñatvā vā
tika-vin08t:79_2: añatvā vā anuṭṭhahitvā sayitasantānena supati, uṭṭhahitvā kattabbassa dvārasaṃvaraṇādino
tika-vin08t:79_3: akatattā akiriyasamuṭṭhānā āpatti hoti anāpattikhette katanipajjanakiriyāya anaṅgattā.
tika-vin08t:79_4: Ayañhi āpatti īdise ṭhāne akiriyā, divā dvāraṃ asaṃvaritvā nipajjanakkhaṇe kiriyākiriyā
tika-vin08t:79_5: ca acittakā cāti veditabbā. Purāruṇā pabujjhitvāpi yāva aruṇuggamanā sayantassapi
tika-vin08t:80_0: Aruṇe uggate vuṭṭhahissāmīti…pe… āpattiyevāti ettha kadā assa āpattīti? Vuccate –
tika-vin08t:80_1: na tāva rattiyaṃ, “divā āpajjati, no ratti”nti vuttattā anādariyadukkaṭā na muccatīti
tika-vin08t:80_2: vuttadukkaṭaṃ pana divāsayanadukkaṭameva na hoti anādariyadukkaṭattā eva. “Aruṇuggamane
tika-vin08t:80_3: pana acittakaṃ akiriyasamuṭṭhānaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjatīti veditabba”nti vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:80_4: vuttaṃ, sāratthadīpaniyampi “yathāparicchedameva vuṭṭhātīti aruṇe uggateyeva uṭṭhahati.
tika-vin08t:80_5: Tassa āpattīti asuddhacitteneva nipannattā niddāyantassapi aruṇe uggate divāpaṭisallānamūlikā
tika-vin08t:80_6: āpatti. ‘Evaṃ nipajjanto anādariyadukkaṭāpi na muccatī’ti vuttattā asuddhacittena
tika-vin08t:80_7: nipajjanto aruṇuggamanato puretaraṃ uṭṭhahantopi anuṭṭhahantopi nipajjanakāleyeva
tika-vin08t:80_8: anādariyadukkaṭaṃ āpajjati, divāpaṭisallānamūlikaṃ pana dukkaṭaṃ aruṇeyeva āpajjatī”ti
tika-vin08t:80_9: vuttaṃ, tasmā evaṃ nipajjantassa dve dukkaṭāni āpajjantīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:81_0: Sace dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā aruṇe uggate uṭṭhahissāmīti nipajjati, dvāre ca aññehi aruṇuggamanakāle
tika-vin08t:81_1: vivaṭepi tassa anāpattiyeva dvārapidahanassa rattidivābhāgesu visesābhāvā. Āpattiāpajjanasseva
tika-vin08t:81_2: kālaviseso icchitabbo, na tapparihārassāti gahetabbaṃ. “Dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā rattiṃ
tika-vin08t:81_3: nipajjatī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Divā saṃvaritvā nipannassa kenaci vivaṭepi dvāre anāpattiyeva,
tika-vin08t:81_4: attanāpi anuṭṭhahitvāva sati paccaye vivaṭepi anāpattīti vadanti, idampi vimativinodaniyameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:82_0: Yathāparicchedameva vuṭṭhātīti aruṇe uggateyeva vuṭṭhāti, āpattiyevāti mūlāpattiṃ
tika-vin08t:82_1: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Anādariyaāpatti pana purāruṇā uṭṭhitassapi tassa hoteva “dukkaṭā
tika-vin08t:82_2: na muccatī”ti vuttattā. Dukkaṭā na muccatīti ca purāruṇā uṭṭhahitvā mūlāpattiyā muttopi
tika-vin08t:83_0: 5. Niddāvasena nipajjatīti niddābhibhūtatāya ekapassena nipajjati. “Niddāvasena nipajjatī”ti
tika-vin08t:83_1: vohāravasena vuttaṃ, pādānaṃ pana bhūmito amocitattā ayaṃ nipanno nāma hotīti teneva
tika-vin08t:83_2: anāpatti vuttā. Apassāya supantassāti kaṭiṭṭhito uddhaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭake appamattakaṃ
tika-vin08t:83_3: padesaṃ bhūmiṃ aphusāpetvā supantassa. Kaṭiṭṭhiṃ pana bhūmiṃ phusāpentassa sayanaṃ
tika-vin08t:83_4: nāma na hoti. Piṭṭhipasāraṇalakkhaṇā hi seyyā dīghā, vandanādīsupi tiriyaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭakānaṃ
tika-vin08t:83_5: pasāritattā nipajjanamevāti āpatti pariharitabbāva. Vandanāpi hi pādamūle nipajjatītiādīsu
tika-vin08t:83_6: nipajjanameva vuttā. Sahasā vuṭṭhātīti pakkhalitā patito viya sahasā vuṭṭhāti, tassapi
tika-vin08t:83_7: anāpatti patanakkhaṇe avisayattā, visaye jāte sahasā vuṭṭhitattā ca. Yassa pana visaññitāya
tika-vin08t:83_8: pacchāpi avisayo eva, tassa anāpattiyeva patanakkhaṇe viya. Tattheva sayati, na vuṭṭhātīti
tika-vin08t:83_9: iminā visayepi akaraṇaṃ dasseti, teneva tassa āpattīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:84_0: Idāni aṭṭhakathāvādasaṃsandanaṃ kātuṃ “ko muccati, ko na muccatī”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-vin08t:84_1: mahāpaccariyantiādīsu paccarīti uḷumpaṃ vuccati, tasmiṃ nisīditvā katattā tameva
tika-vin08t:84_2: nāmaṃ jātaṃ. Kurundivallivihāro nāma atthi, tattha katattā kurundīti nāmaṃ jātaṃ.
tika-vin08t:84_3: Mahāaṭṭhakathā nāma saṅgītittayamāruḷhā tepiṭakassa buddhavacanassa aṭṭhakathā. Yā
tika-vin08t:84_4: mahāmahindattherena tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ ābhatā, tambapaṇṇiyehi therehi pacchā sīhaḷabhāsāya
tika-vin08t:84_5: abhisaṅkhatā ca hoti. Ekabhaṅgenāti ekapassabhañjanena pāde bhūmito amocetvā ekapassena
tika-vin08t:84_6: sarīraṃ bhañjitvā nipannoti vuttaṃ hoti. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mahāpadumattherena
tika-vin08t:84_7: vuttanti sambandho. Tena mahāaṭṭhakathāya likhitamahāpadumattheravāde “aya”nti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:84_8: “Mucchitvā patitattā avisayattā āpatti na dissatī”ti therena vuttaṃ. Ācariyā pana
tika-vin08t:84_9: yathā yakkhagahitako bandhitvā nipajjāpito ca paravaso hoti, evaṃ aparavasattā mucchitvā
tika-vin08t:84_10: patito kañcikālaṃ jānitvā nipajjatīti anāpattiṃ na vadanti, visaññite pana sati anāpattiyeva.
tika-vin08t:85_0: Dve janātiādi mahāaṭṭhakathāyameva vacanaṃ, tadeva pacchā vuttattā pamāṇaṃ. Yakkhagahitaggahaṇeneva
tika-vin08t:85_1: cettha visaññibhūtopi saṅgahito, ekabhaṅgena nipanno pana anipannattā āpattito muccatiyevāti
tika-vin08t:85_2: gahetabbaṃ. Sāratthadīpaniyañca “yo ca yakkhagahitako, yo ca bandhitvā nipajjāpito”ti
tika-vin08t:85_3: imassa aṭṭhakathāvādassa pacchimattā soyeva pamāṇato gahetabbo, tathā ca vakkhati
tika-vin08t:85_4: “sabbattha yo yo aṭṭhakathāvādo vā pacchā vuccati, so soyeva pamāṇato gahetabbo”ti.
tika-vin08t:85_5: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne imassa aṭṭhakathāpāṭhassa ānītattā imasmiṃ vinayasaṅgahappakaraṇepi
tika-vin08t:85_6: imasmiṃyeva ṭhāne so pāṭho vattabboti no khanti. Ettha ca “rattiṃ dvāraṃ vivaritvā
tika-vin08t:85_7: nipanno aruṇe uggate uṭṭhāti, anāpattī”tiādivacanato aruṇuggamane saṃsayavinodanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:90: “Kismiṃ kāle ca dese ca, aruṇo samugacchati;
tika-vin08t:92: Tattha ko esa aruṇo nāmāti ettha esa aruṇo nāma sūriyassa pabhāviseso. Vuttañhetaṃ abhidhānappadīpikāyaṃ –
tika-vin08t:94_0: Taṭṭīkāyañca “sūrassa udayato pubbe uṭṭhitaraṃsi aruṇo nāma siyā”ti. Vimativinodanīnāmikāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:94_1: vinayaṭīkāyañca “aruṇoti cettha sūriyuggamanassa purecaro vaḍḍhanaghanaratto pabhāvisesoti
tika-vin08t:94_2: daṭṭhabbo”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā sūriyappabhāyeva aruṇo nāma, na aññoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kena
tika-vin08t:94_3: so aruṇo bhaveti ettha aruṇo vaṇṇo assāti aruṇo, kiñcirattavaṇṇasamannāgatoti attho.
tika-vin08t:94_4: Atha vā arati gacchati rattavaṇṇabhāvena pavattatīti aruṇo. Vuttañhetaṃ abhidhānappadīpikāṭīkāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:94_5: “aruṇavaṇṇatāya arati gacchatīti aruṇo”ti. Kīdiso tassa vaṇṇoti ettha abyattarattavaṇṇo
tika-vin08t:94_6: tassa vaṇṇo bhave. Vuttañhi abhidhānappadīpikāyaṃ “aruṇo kiñcirattothā”ti. Taṭṭīkāyañca
tika-vin08t:94_7: “kiñciratto abyattarattavaṇṇo aruṇo nāma yathā macchassa akkhī”ti. Vimativinodaniyañca
tika-vin08t:94_8: “vaḍḍhanaghanaratto pabhāviseso”ti, tasmā sūriyassa rattappabhāyeva aruṇo nāma, na
tika-vin08t:94_9: setappabhādayoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yadi evaṃ pātimokkhaṭṭhapanakkhandhakavaṇṇanāya vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:94_10: “pāḷiyaṃ pana nandimukhiyāti odātadisāmukhatāya tuṭṭhamukhiyā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ kathaṃ
tika-vin08t:94_11: yujjeyyāti, no na yujjeyya. Tattha hi aruṇuggatakāle aruṇobhāsena odātadisāmukhabhāvo
tika-vin08t:94_12: vutto, na aruṇobhāsassa odātabhāvo. Vuttañhetaṃ udānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “nandimukhiyāti
tika-vin08t:94_13: aruṇassa uggatattā eva aruṇobhāya sūriyālokūpajīvino satte nandāpanamukhiyā rattiyā
tika-vin08t:100_0: Imassa gāthāya atthavaṇṇanāyaṃ “tattha jighaññarattinti pacchimarattiṃ, rattipariyosāneti
tika-vin08t:100_1: attho. Uhateti aruṇe uggate. Yāti yā puratthimā disā rattavaṇṇatāya uttamarūpadharā
tika-vin08t:100_2: hutvā dissatī”ti. Evaṃ aruṇuggatasamaye puratthimadisāya rattavaṇṇatā vuttā, tasmā
tika-vin08t:100_3: tasmiṃ samaye aruṇassa uṭṭhitattā puratthimāya disāya rattabhāgo sūriyālokassa patthaṭattā
tika-vin08t:101_0: Saṇṭhānaṃ kīdisaṃ bhaveti ettha aruṇassa pāṭekkaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ nāma natthi rasmimattattā.
tika-vin08t:101_1: Yattakaṃ padesaṃ pharati, tattakaṃ tassa saṇṭhānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā puratthimadisāsaṇṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin08t:101_2: Vuttañhi jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “puratthimadisā rattavaṇṇatāya uttamarūpadharā hutvā dissatī”ti.
tika-vin08t:102_0: Kismiṃ kāle ca dese ca, aruṇo samugacchatīti ettha esa aruṇo sūriyuggamanassa pure
tika-vin08t:102_1: kāle puratthimadisāyaṃ uggacchati. Vuttañhetaṃ udānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “uddhaste aruṇeti
tika-vin08t:102_2: uggate aruṇe, aruṇo nāma puratthimadisāyaṃ sūriyodayato puretarameva uṭṭhitobhāso”ti.
tika-vin08t:103_0: Kiṃ paccakkhasiddho eso, udāhu anumānatoti ettha ayaṃ aruṇo nāma paccakkhasiddho
tika-vin08t:103_1: eva, na anumānasiddho. Kasmā viññāyatīti ce? Cakkhuviññāṇagocaravaṇṇāyatanabhāvato.
tika-vin08t:103_2: Akkhassa patīti paccakkhaṃ, cakkhurūpānaṃ abhimukhabhāvena āpāthagatattā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:103_3: hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”nti,
tika-vin08t:103_4: tasmā ayaṃ aruṇavaṇṇo cakkhunā disvā jānitabbato paccakkhasiddhoyeva hoti, na evaṃ
tika-vin08t:103_5: sati evaṃ bhaveyyāti anumānena punappunaṃ cintanena siddhoti. Imaṃ pañhavissajjanaṃ
tika-vin08t:103_6: sādhukaṃ manasi karitvā paṇḍitehi rattobhāsoyeva aruṇoti paccetabbo sallakkhetabboti.
tika-vin08t:104_0: Kasmā pana imasmiṃ ṭhāne aruṇakathā vuttāti? Imissā aruṇakathāya mahāvisayabhāvato.
tika-vin08t:104_1: Kathaṃ? Uposathikā upāsakā ca upāsikāyo ca aruṇuggamanaṃ tathato ajānantā anuggateyeva
tika-vin08t:104_2: aruṇe uggatasaññāya khādanīyaṃ vā khādanti, bhojanīyaṃ vā bhuñjanti, mālāgandhādīni
tika-vin08t:104_3: vā dhārenti, tato tesaṃ sīlaṃ bhijjati. Sāmaṇerā tatheva vikālabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā
tika-vin08t:104_4: sīlavināsaṃ pāpuṇanti. Nissayapaṭipannakā bhikkhū ācariyupajjhāyehi vinā bahisīme
tika-vin08t:104_5: carantā nissayappassambhanaṃ pāpuṇanti, antovasse bhikkhū upacārasīmato bahigacchantā
tika-vin08t:104_6: vassacchedaṃ, tecīvarikā bhikkhū abaddhasīmāyaṃ cīvarena vippavasantā nissaggiyapācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin08t:104_8: sayantā pācittiyaṃ, tathā yāvakālikaṃ bhuñjantā bhikkhū, pārivāsikādayo vattaṃ nikkhipantā
tika-vin08t:104_9: ratticchedaṃ. Evamādianekādīnavasambhavato lajjipesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tathato aruṇuggamanassa
tika-vin08t:105_0: Keci pana bhikkhū aḍḍharattisamaye ghaṭisuññattā aḍḍharattikālaṃ atikkamma aññadivaso
tika-vin08t:105_1: hoti, tasmā tasmiṃ kāle aruṇaṃ uṭṭhitaṃ nāma hotīti maññamānā aḍḍharattiṃ atikkamma
tika-vin08t:105_2: khādanīyabhojanīyādīni bhuñjanti, te pana buddhasamayaṃ ajānantā vedasamayameva manasi
tika-vin08t:105_3: karontā evaṃ karonti, tasmā tesaṃ taṃkaraṇaṃ pamāṇaṃ na hoti. Bahavo pana bhikkhū
tika-vin08t:105_4: aruṇassa paccakkhabhāvaṃ ajānantā anumānavasena cintituñca asakkontā anussavavaseneva
tika-vin08t:105_5: paravacanaṃ saddahantā amhākaṃ ācariyā aruṇuggamanavelāyaṃ uṭṭhāya gacchantā sūriyuggamanavelāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:105_6: dvisahassadaṇḍappamāṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇanti, tisahassadaṇḍappamāṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇantīti
tika-vin08t:105_7: ca vadanti. Imamhā vihārā asukaṃ nāma vihāraṃ asukaṃ nāma cetiyaṃ asukaṃ nāma gāmaṃ
tika-vin08t:105_8: pāpuṇantītiādīni ca vadantīti evaṃ anussavavacanaṃ vadanti, tampi appamāṇaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin08t:105_9: Addhānaṃ nāma balavantassa javasampannassa ca rassaṃ hoti, dubbalassa santassa ca
tika-vin08t:108_0: Tasmā addhānaṃ nāma sabbesaṃ ekasadisaṃ na hotīti aruṇuggamanassa lakkhaṇaṃ bhavituṃ
tika-vin08t:108_1: na sakkā, na ca te āyasmanto piṭakattayato kiñci sādhakabhūtaṃ vacanaṃ āharanti,
tika-vin08t:108_2: asakkhikaṃ aḍḍaṃ karonti viya yathājjhāsayameva vadantīti pamāṇaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin08t:114_0: Kaccāyanasārappakaraṇāgataṃ gāthaṃ vatvā atītarattiyā pacchimo yāmo ajja pariyāpanno,
tika-vin08t:114_1: tasmā pacchimayāmassa ādito paṭṭhāya aruṇaṃ uggacchatī”ti vadanti. Ayaṃ vādo sakāraṇasaññāpakattā
tika-vin08t:114_2: purimehi balavā hoti, evaṃ santepi ayuttoyeva. Kasmā? Ayañhi gāthā bāhirasaddasatthe
tika-vin08t:114_3: jaṅgadāsappakaraṇe vuttanayena ajja bhavā ajjatanīti vuttaajjavohārassa pavattanakālaṃ
tika-vin08t:114_4: dassetuṃ vuttā, na piṭakattaye vuttassa aruṇuggamanassa kālaṃ dassetuṃ, tasmā aññasādhyassa
tika-vin08t:115_0: Apare pana “pahāro yāmasaññito”ti abhidhānappadīpikāyaṃ vuttattā pahārayāmasaddānaṃ
tika-vin08t:115_1: ekatthattā tattheva “tiyāmā saṃvarī bhave”ti vuttattā rattiyā ca tiyāmabhāvato pāḷiyañca
tika-vin08t:115_2: “abhikkantā, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto pacchimo yāmo, uddhasto aruṇo”ti āgatattā idāni
tika-vin08t:115_3: rattiyā catūsu pahāresu tatiyappahārassa avasāne aruṇo uggato, tasmā avasesaekappahāramatto
tika-vin08t:115_4: kālo divasabhāgaṃ bhajatīti vadeyyuṃ, ayaṃ vādo tatiyavādatopi balavataro. Kasmā?
tika-vin08t:115_5: Ñāpakañāpyānaṃ anurūpabhāvato. Tathā hi “pahāro yāmasaññito”ti ayaṃ ñāpako pahārayāmānaṃ
tika-vin08t:115_6: ekatthabhāvassa anurūpo, “tiyāmā saṃvarībhave”ti ayaṃ rattiyā tiyāmabhāvassa, “pāḷiyañcā”tiādi
tika-vin08t:115_7: tatiyappahārassa avasāne aruṇuggamanassa, tathāpi ayuttoyeva hoti. Kasmā? “Avasesaekappahāramatto
tika-vin08t:115_8: kālo divasabhāgaṃ bhajatī”ti vacanassa viruddhattā. Majjhimadese hi dasaghaṭikāpamāṇassa
tika-vin08t:115_9: kālassa ekappahārattā sabbā ratti tiyāmāva hoti, na catuyāmā, idāni pana paccantavisayesu
tika-vin08t:115_10: sattaṭṭhaghaṭikāmattassa kālassa ekappahārakatattā catuppahārā bhavati, tasmā majjhimadesavohāraṃ
tika-vin08t:115_11: gahetvā abhidhānappadīpikāyañca “tiyāmā saṃvarī bhave”ti vuttaṃ, pāḷiyañca “nikkhanto
tika-vin08t:115_12: pacchimo yāmo, uddhasto aruṇo”ti, tasmā rattipariyosāneyeva aruṇo uggatoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t:115_13: Tathā hi vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ “tathā pārivāsikādīnampi aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā vattaṃ
tika-vin08t:115_14: nikkhipantānaṃ ratticchedo vutto, uggate aruṇe nikkhipitabbanti hi vutta”nti.
tika-vin08t:116_1: nikkhamitvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Evaṃ cīvaravippavāsādīsu ca sabbattha rattipariyosāne āgamanavasena
tika-vin08t:116_3: attho”ti. Na kevalaṃ majjhimadesesu rattiyāyeva tippahārabhāvo hoti, atha kho divasassapi.
tika-vin08t:116_4: Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ “sammāsambuddhassa abhidhammadesanāpariyosānañca tesaṃ
tika-vin08t:116_6: ettha pahāroti divasassa tatiyabhāgo vuccatī”ti, tasmā eko rattidivo chappahāro hotīti
tika-vin08t:116_7: viññāyati. Evaṃ majjhimadesavohārena tiyāmasaṅkhātassa tippahārassa avasāne sabbarattipariyosāne
tika-vin08t:116_8: uṭṭhitaṃ aruṇaṃ paccantadesavohārena tippahārassa avasāneti gahetvā ekappahārāvasesakāle
tika-vin08t:116_9: aruṇo uggatoti vuttattā ayampi vādo ayuttoyeva hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t:120_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ nissāya ekarattiyaṃ aruṇo catukkhattuṃ uṭṭhahati, tattha paṭhamaṃ setavaṇṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:120_1: hoti, dutiyaṃ nandiyāvaṭṭapupphavaṇṇaṃ hoti, tatiyaṃ tambavaṇṇaṃ hoti, catutthaṃ
tika-vin08t:120_2: gadrabhamukhavaṇṇaṃ hotī”ti vatvā rattobhāsato puretaraṃ atītarattikāleyeva vattanikkhipanādikammaṃ
tika-vin08t:120_3: karonti. Tesaṃ taṃ karaṇaṃ anisammakāritaṃ āpajjati. Ayañhi gāthā neva pāḷiyaṃ dissati,
tika-vin08t:120_4: na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ, na ṭīkāsu, kevalaṃ nissaye eva, nissayesu ca ekasmiṃyeva khuddasikkhānissaye
tika-vin08t:120_5: dissati, na aññanissayesu, tatthāpi neva pubbāparasambandho dissati, na hetuphalādibhāvo,
tika-vin08t:120_6: na ca liṅganiyamoti na nissayakārācariyena ṭhapitā bhaveyya, atha kho pacchā aññehi
tika-vin08t:120_7: lekhakehi vā attano icchānurūpaṃ likhitā bhaveyya, tasmā ayaṃ gāthā kuto ābhatā pāḷito
tika-vin08t:120_8: vā aṭṭhakathāto vā ṭīkāto vā vinayato vā suttantato vā abhidhammato vāti pabhavaṃ
tika-vin08t:120_9: apariyesitvā nissaye diṭṭhamattameva sārato gahetvā pāḷiyaṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu vuttavacanaṃ
tika-vin08t:121_0: Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi “tena kho pana samayena buddho bhagavā sītāsu hemantikāsu rattīsu antaraṭṭhakāsu
tika-vin08t:121_1: himapātasamaye rattiṃ ajjhokāse ekacīvaro nisīdi, na bhagavantaṃ sītaṃ ahosi. Nikkhante
tika-vin08t:121_2: paṭhame yāme sītaṃ bhagavantaṃ ahosi, dutiyaṃ bhagavā cīvaraṃ pārupi, na bhagavantaṃ
tika-vin08t:121_3: sītaṃ ahosi. Nikkhante majjhime yāme sītaṃ bhagavantaṃ ahosi, tatiyaṃ bhagavā cīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:121_4: pārupi, na bhagavantaṃ sītaṃ ahosi. Nikkhante pacchime yāme uddhaste aruṇe nandimukhiyā
tika-vin08t:121_5: rattiyā sītaṃ bhagavantaṃ ahosi, catutthaṃ bhagavā cīvaraṃ pārupi, na bhagavantaṃ
tika-vin08t:121_6: sītaṃ ahosī”ti. Ayaṃ mahāvagge cīvarakkhandhakāgatā vinayapāḷi. Pāḷiyaṃ nandimukhiyāti
tika-vin08t:121_7: tuṭṭhimukhiyā, pasannadisāmukhāyāti attho. Ayaṃ taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāya vimativinodanīpāṭho.
tika-vin08t:122_0: “Tena kho pana samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde.
tika-vin08t:122_1: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisinno hoti.
tika-vin08t:122_2: Atha kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāya rattiyā nikkhante paṭhame yāme uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ
tika-vin08t:122_3: uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – abhikkantā,
tika-vin08t:122_4: bhante ratti, nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo, ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho, uddisatu, bhante,
tika-vin08t:122_5: bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkhanti. Evaṃ vutte bhagavā tuṇhī ahosi. Dutiyampi kho āyasmā
tika-vin08t:122_6: ānando abhikkantāya rattiyā nikkhante majjhime yāme uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ
tika-vin08t:122_7: karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – abhikkantā, bhante,
tika-vin08t:122_8: ratti, nikkhanto majjhimo yāmo, ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho, uddisatu, bhante, bhagavā
tika-vin08t:122_9: bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkhanti. Dutiyampi bhagavā tuṇhī ahosi. Tatiyampi kho āyasmā ānando
tika-vin08t:122_10: abhikkantāya rattiyā nikkhante pacchime yāme uddhaste aruṇe nandimukhiyā rattiyā
tika-vin08t:122_11: uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ
tika-vin08t:122_12: etadavoca – abhikkantā, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto pacchimo yāmo, uddhastaṃ aruṇaṃ,
tika-vin08t:122_13: nandimukhī ratti, ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho, uddisatu bhante bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkhanti.
tika-vin08t:122_14: Aparisuddhā, ānanda, parisā”ti. Ayaṃ cūḷavagge pātimokkhaṭṭhapanakkhandhakāgatā aparāpi vinayapāḷi.
tika-vin08t:123_0: Nandimukhiyā rattiyāti aruṇuṭṭhitakāle pītimukhā viya ratti khāyati. Tenāha “nandimukhiyā”ti
tika-vin08t:123_2: aruṇeti uggate aruṇasīse. Nandimukhiyāti tuṭṭhimukhiyā. Ayaṃ taṃsaṃvaṇṇanābhūtasāratthadīpanīpāṭho.
tika-vin08t:123_3: Pāḷiyaṃ nandimukhiyāti odātadisāmukhitāya tuṭṭhamukhiyā. Ayaṃ taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāya vimativinodanīpāṭho.
tika-vin08t:124_0: “Tatiyampi kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāyarattiyā nikkhante pacchime yāme uddhaste
tika-vin08t:124_1: aruṇe nandimukhiyā rattiyā uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ
tika-vin08t:124_2: paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – abhikkantā, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto pacchimo yāmo,
tika-vin08t:124_3: uddhasto aruṇo, nandimukhī ratti, ciranisinnā āgantukā bhikkhū, paṭisammodatu, bhante,
tika-vin08t:124_4: bhagavā āgantuke bhikkhū”ti. Ayaṃ udānāgatā suttantapāḷi. Uddhaste aruṇeti uggate
tika-vin08t:124_5: aruṇe. Aruṇo nāma puratthimadisāyaṃ sūriyodayato puretarameva uṭṭhitobhāso. Nandimukhiyā
tika-vin08t:124_6: rattiyāti aruṇassa uggatattā eva aruṇobhāya sūriyālokūpajīvino satte nandāpanamukhiyā
tika-vin08t:124_7: rattiyā jātāya, vibhāyamānāyāti attho. Ayaṃ taṃsaṃvaṇṇanābhūtā udānaṭṭhakathā.
tika-vin08t:125_0: Iti ettakāsu vinayasuttantāgatāsu pāḷiyaṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu ekasmimpiṭhāne aruṇo catukkhattuṃ
tika-vin08t:125_1: uggatoti natthi, ekavārameva vutto. Catubbidhavaṇṇasamannāgatotipi natthi, ekavaṇṇo
tika-vin08t:125_2: eva vutto. Jātakaṭṭhakathāyampi rattavaṇṇo eva vutto, na setavaṇṇādiko. Nandimukhīti
tika-vin08t:125_3: ca satte nandāpanadisāmukhī ratti eva vuttā, na aruṇassa nandiyāvaṭṭapupphasadisavaṇṇatā.
tika-vin08t:125_5: viruddhattā pāḷiyaṭṭhakathādīhi asaṃsandanato dubbalasādhakattā ca ayampi vādo ayuttoyevāti
tika-vin08t:125_6: daṭṭhabbo, tasmā sammāsambuddhassa āṇaṃ anatikkantena lajjibhikkhunā yadi kenaci
tika-vin08t:126_0: Yadi pana pabbatādinā paṭicchannaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, yattakena kālena vivaṭaṭṭhāne rattobhāso
tika-vin08t:126_1: paññāyati, sūriyamaṇḍalassa dissanakālato ekaghaṭikāmattena vā dvighaṭikāmattena
tika-vin08t:126_2: vā tattakaṃ kālaṃ sallakkhetvā imasmiṃ kāle aruṇo uggato bhaveyyāti takketvā kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:126_3: saṃsayaṃ anicchantena tatopi kañcikālaṃ adhivāsetvā nissaṃsayakāle kattabbaṃ, ayaṃ
tika-vin08t:126_4: tattha sāmīci. Ayaṃ pana vādo yathāvuttappakaraṇavacanehi suṭṭhu saṃsandati yathā
tika-vin08t:126_5: gaṅgodakena yamunodakaṃ, tasmā paṇḍitehi punappunaṃ pubbāparaṃ āloḷentena manasi
tika-vin08t:126_6: kātabbo. Evaṃ manasi karitvā aruṇapaṭisaṃyuttesu ṭhānesu saṃsayo chinditabbo, saṃsayaṃ
tika-vin08t:126_7: chinditvā visāradena hutvā taṃ taṃ kammaṃ kātabbanti.
tika-vin08t:135_0: 6. Evaṃ divāseyyavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni parikkhāravinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “parikkhāroti
tika-vin08t:135_2: padaṃ ānetvā tattha tesu mātikāpadesu samabhiniviṭṭhassa “parikkhāro”ti padassa “samaṇaparikkhāro”ti
tika-vin08t:135_3: attho daṭṭhabboti yojanā, esa nayo ito parepi. Samaṇaparikkhāro vutto, na gihiparikkhāroti
tika-vin08t:135_4: adhippāyo. Parisamantato kariyateti parikkhāro, chattādiko. Tatrāti samaṇaparikkhāre.
tika-vin08t:135_5: Kappatīti kappiyo, na kappiyo akappiyo, kappiyo ca akappiyo ca kappiyākappiyo, samāhāradvandepi
tika-vin08t:135_6: pulliṅgamicchanti paṇḍitā. Kappiyākappiyo ca so parikkhāro ceti tathā, tassa vinicchayo
tika-vin08t:136_0: Keci tālapaṇṇacchattanti idaṃ upalakkhaṇamattaṃ. Sabbampi hi chattaṃ tathākariyamānaṃ
tika-vin08t:136_1: na vaṭṭati. Tenevāha vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ “sabbaparikkhāresu vaṇṇamaṭṭhavikāraṃ karontassa
tika-vin08t:136_2: dukkaṭanti dīpentena na vaṭṭatīti vuttanti veditabba”nti. Na vaṇṇamaṭṭhatthāyāti
tika-vin08t:136_3: iminā thirakaraṇatthaṃ ekavaṇṇasuttena vinandhiyamānaṃ yadi vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ hoti, tattha
tika-vin08t:136_4: na dosoti dasseti. Āraggenāti nikhādanamukhena. Yadi na vaṭṭati, tādisaṃ chattadaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin08t:136_5: labhitvā kiṃ kātabbanti āha “ghaṭakaṃ vā”tiādi. Suttakena vā daṇḍo veṭhetabboti yathā
tika-vin08t:136_6: lekhā na paññāyati, tathā veṭhetabbo. Daṇḍabundeti daṇḍamūle, chattadaṇḍassa heṭṭhimakoṭiyanti
tika-vin08t:136_7: attho. Chattamaṇḍalikanti chattassa anto khuddakamaṇḍalaṃ, chattapañjare maṇḍalākārena
tika-vin08t:136_8: baddhadaṇḍavalayaṃ vā. Ukkiritvāti ninnaṃ, unnataṃ vā katvā uṭṭhāpetvā. Sā vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:136_9: sā lekhā rajjukehi bandhantu vā mā vā, bandhituṃ yuttaṭṭhānattā vaṭṭati. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:137: “Chattaṃ paṇṇamayaṃ kiñci, bahi anto ca sabbaso;
tika-vin08t:138: Pañcavaṇṇena suttena, sibbituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:140: Ghaṭakaṃ vāḷarūpaṃ vā, lekhā daṇḍe na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:143: “Ghaṭakaṃ vāḷarūpaṃ vā, lekhā vā pana kevalā;
tika-vin08t:144: Chinditvā vāpi ghaṃsitvā, dhāretuṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:147_0: Tassa vaṇṇanāyampi chattaṃ paṇṇamayaṃ kiñcīti tālapaṇṇādipaṇṇacchadanaṃ yaṃ kiñci
tika-vin08t:147_1: chattaṃ. Bahīti upari. Antoti heṭṭhā. Sibbitunti rūpaṃ dassetvā sūcikammaṃ kātuṃ.
tika-vin08t:147_2: Paṇṇeti chadanapaṇṇe. Aḍḍhacandanti aḍḍhacandākāraṃ. Makaradantakanti makaradantākāraṃ,
tika-vin08t:147_3: yaṃ “girikūṭa”nti vuccati. Chindituṃ na vaṭṭatīti sambandho. Mukhavaṭṭiyā nāmetvā
tika-vin08t:147_4: baddhapaṇṇakoṭiyā vā matthakamaṇḍalakoṭiyā vā girikūṭādiṃ karonti, iminā taṃ paṭikkhittaṃ.
tika-vin08t:147_5: Daṇḍeti chattadaṇḍe. Ghaṭakanti ghaṭākāro. Vāḷarūpaṃ vāti byagghādivāḷānaṃ rūpakaṃ
tika-vin08t:147_6: vā. Lekhāti ukkiritvā vā chinditvā vā cittakammavasena vā katarāji. Pañcavaṇṇānaṃ
tika-vin08t:147_7: suttānaṃ antare nīlādiekavaṇṇena suttena thiratthaṃ chattaṃ anto ca bahi ca sibbituṃ
tika-vin08t:147_8: vā chattadaṇḍaggāhakasalākapañjaraṃ thiratthaṃ vinandhituṃ vā vaṭṭatīti yojanā. Pañcavaṇṇānaṃ
tika-vin08t:147_9: ekavaṇṇena thiratthanti iminā anekavaṇṇehi suttehi vaṇṇamaṭṭhatthāya sibbituñca vinandhituñca
tika-vin08t:147_10: na vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. Potthakesu pana “pañcavaṇṇenā”ti pāṭho dissati, tassa ekavaṇṇena
tika-vin08t:147_11: pañcavaṇṇena vā suttena thiratthaṃ sibbituṃ vinandhituṃ vā vaṭṭatīti yojanā kātabbā hoti.
tika-vin08t:148_0: Ettha ca heṭṭhā vuttena “pañcavaṇṇena suttena sibbituṃ na ca vaṭṭatī”ti pāṭhena ca
tika-vin08t:148_1: “keci tālapaṇṇacchattaṃ anto vā bahi vā pañcavaṇṇena suttena sibbetvā vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin08t:148_2: karonti, taṃ na vaṭṭati, ekavaṇṇe pana nīlena vā pītakena vā yena kenaci suttena
tika-vin08t:148_3: anto vā bahi vā sibbituṃ, chattadaṇḍaggāhakaṃ salākapañjaraṃ vā vinandhituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t:148_4: tañca kho thirakaraṇatthaṃ, na vaṇṇamaṭṭhatthāyā”ti aṭṭhakathāpāṭhena ca virujjhati,
tika-vin08t:149_0: Lekhā vā pana kevalāti yathāvuttappakārā sakalā lekhā vā. Chinditvāti ukkiritvā kataṃ
tika-vin08t:149_1: chinditvā. Ghaṃsitvāti cittakammādivasena kataṃ ghaṃsitvā. Daṇḍabundamhīti chattadaṇḍassa
tika-vin08t:149_2: pañjare gāhaṇatthāya phālitabundamhi, mūleti attho. Ayamettha nissandehe vuttanayo.
tika-vin08t:149_4: phullaahicchattakākāraṃ. Rajjukehi gāhāpetvā daṇḍe bandhanti, tasmiṃ bandhanaṭṭhāne
tika-vin08t:149_5: valayamiva ukkiritvāti valayaṃ viya upaṭṭhāpetvā. Bandhanatthāyāti vātena yathā na
tika-vin08t:149_6: calati, evaṃ rajjūhi daṇḍe pañjarassa bandhanatthāya. Ukkiritvā katā lekhā vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:149_7: yojanā. Yathā vātappahārena acalanatthaṃ chattamaṇḍalikaṃ rajjukehi gāhāpetvā daṇḍe
tika-vin08t:149_8: bandhanti, tasmiṃ bandhanaṭṭhāne valayamiva ukkiritvā lekhaṃ ṭhapenti, sā vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin08t:149_9: Sacepi na bandhati, bandhanārahaṭṭhānattā valayaṃ ukkiritvā vaṭṭatīti gaṇṭhipade
tika-vin08t:149_10: vattantīti āgataṃ, tasmā pakkharaṇesu āgatanayeneva chatte paṭipajjitabbanti.
tika-vin08t:150_0: 7. Cīvare pana nānāsuttakehīti nānāvaṇṇehi suttehi. Idañca tathā karontānaṃ vasena
tika-vin08t:150_1: vuttaṃ, ekavaṇṇasuttakenapi na vaṭṭatiyeva. “Pakatisūcikammameva vaṭṭatī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:150_2: Paṭṭamukheti dvinnaṃ paṭṭānaṃ saṅghaṭitaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Pariyanteti cīvarapariyante.
tika-vin08t:150_3: Anuvātaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Veṇīti varakasīsākārena sibbanaṃ. Saṅkhalikanti dviguṇasaṅkhalikākārena
tika-vin08t:150_4: sibbanaṃ, biḷālasaṅkhalikākārena sibbanaṃ vā. Veṇiṃ vā saṅkhalikaṃ vā karontīti karaṇakiriyāya
tika-vin08t:150_5: sambandho. Agghiyaṃ nāma cetiyasaṇṭhānaṃ, yaṃ “agghiyatthambho”ti vadanti. Gayā nāma
tika-vin08t:150_6: mūle tanukaṃ agge mahantaṃ katvā gadākārena sibbanaṃ. Muggaro nāma mūle ca agge ca
tika-vin08t:150_7: ekasadisaṃ katvā muggarākārena sibbanaṃ. Kakkaṭakkhīni ukkirantīti gaṇṭhikapaṭṭapāsakapaṭṭānaṃ
tika-vin08t:150_8: ante pāḷibaddhaṃ katvā kakkaṭakānaṃ akkhisaṇṭhānaṃ paṭṭhapenti, karontīti attho.
tika-vin08t:150_10: gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Kathaṃ pana tā piḷakā duviññeyyarūpā kātabbāti? Koṇehi nīhaṭasuttānaṃ
tika-vin08t:150_11: antesu ekavāraṃ gaṇṭhikakaraṇena vā puna nivattetvā sibbanena vā duviññeyyasabhāvaṃ
tika-vin08t:150_12: katvā suttakoṭiyo rassaṃ katvā chinditabbā. Dhammasirittherena pana “koṇasuttā ca
tika-vin08t:150_13: piḷakā, duviññeyyāva kappare”ti vuttaṃ, tathā ācariyabuddhadattattherenapi “suttā
tika-vin08t:150_14: ca piḷakā tattha, duviññeyyāva dīpitā”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā tesaṃ matena koṇasuttā ca
tika-vin08t:150_15: piḷakā ca koṇasuttapiḷakāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t:151_0: Vimativinodaniyampi koṇasuttapiḷakāti gaṇṭhikapāsakapaṭṭānaṃ koṇehi bahi niggatasuttānaṃ
tika-vin08t:151_1: piḷakākārena ṭhapitakoṭiyoti keci vadanti, te piḷake chinditvā duviññeyyā kātabbāti
tika-vin08t:151_2: tesaṃ adhippāyo. Keci pana “koṇasuttā ca piḷakā cāti dveyevā”ti vadanti, tesaṃ matena
tika-vin08t:151_3: gaṇṭhikapāsakapaṭṭānaṃ koṇato koṇaṃ nīhaṭasuttā koṇasuttā nāma. Samantato pana pariyantena
tika-vin08t:151_4: gatā caturassasuttā piḷakā nāma. Taṃ duvidhampi keci cīvarato visuṃ paññānatthāya
tika-vin08t:151_5: vikārayuttaṃ karonti, taṃ nisedhāya “duviññeyyarūpā vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ, na pana sabbathā
tika-vin08t:151_6: acakkhugocarabhāvena sibbanatthāya tathāsibbanassa asakkuṇeyyattā, yathā pakaticīvarato
tika-vin08t:151_7: vikāro na paññāyati, evaṃ sibbitabbanti adhippāyo. Rajanakammato pubbe paññāyamānopi
tika-vin08t:151_8: viseso cīvare ratte ekavaṇṇato na paññāyatīti āha “cīvare ratte”ti.
tika-vin08t:152_1: ghaṃsituṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Kaṇṇasuttakanti cīvarassa dīghato tiriyañca sibbitānaṃ
tika-vin08t:152_2: catūsu kaṇṇesu koṇesu ca nikkhantānaṃ suttasīsānametaṃ nāmaṃ, taṃ chinditvāva pārupitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:152_3: Tenāha “rajitakāle chinditabba”nti. Bhagavatā anuññātaṃ ekaṃ kaṇṇasuttampi atthi,
tika-vin08t:152_4: taṃ pana nāmena sadisampi ito aññamevāti dassetuṃ “yaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Lagganatthāyāti
tika-vin08t:153_0: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “pāsakaṃ katvā bandhitabbanti rajanakāle bandhitabbaṃ, sesakāle
tika-vin08t:153_1: mocetvā ṭhapetabba”nti vuttaṃ. Vinayasaṅgahappakaraṇassa porāṇaṭīkāyampi idameva
tika-vin08t:153_2: gahetvā vuttaṃ, taṃ pana cīvarakkhandhake “majjhena laggenti, ubhato galati, bhagavato
tika-vin08t:153_3: etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kaṇṇe bandhitunti. Kaṇṇo jīrati. Bhagavato
tika-vin08t:153_4: etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kaṇṇasuttaka”nti evaṃ anuññātacīvararajjuyaṃ
tika-vin08t:153_5: rajitvā pasāritacīvarassa olambakasuttaṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:154: Gaṇṭhiketi cīvarapārupanakāle pāsake laggāpanatthaṃ kate dantādimaye gaṇṭhike. Piḷakāti binduṃ binduṃ katvā uṭṭhāpetabbapiḷakā. Vuttañhetaṃ vinayavinicchayappakaraṇe –
tika-vin08t:156: Samaṃ satapadādīnaṃ, sibbituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:158: Veṇiṃ saṅkhalikaṃ vāpi, karoto hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin08t:162: Suttā ca piḷakā tattha, duviññeyyāva dīpitā.
tika-vin08t:166: Cīvare bhikkhunā kātuṃ, kārāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:172: Tathā kiliṭṭhakāle ca, dhovanatthaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:173: “Rajane pana gandhaṃ vā, telaṃ vā lākhameva vā;
tika-vin08t:174: Kiñci pakkhipituṃ tattha, bhikkhuno na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:176: Cīvaraṃ na ca ghaṭṭeyya, ghaṃsitabbaṃ na doṇiyā.
tika-vin08t:178: Rattaṃ paharituṃ kiñci, hattheheva ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:179: “Gaṇṭhike pana lekhā vā, piḷakā vā na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin08t:181_0: Vinayasāratthasandīpaniyampi samaṃ satapadādīnanti satapadādīhi sadisaṃ. Tulyatthe
tika-vin08t:181_1: karaṇavacanappasaṅge sāmivacanaṃ. Paṭṭassa pariyante vāti anuvātassa ubhayapariyante
tika-vin08t:181_2: vā. Paṭṭamukhepi vāti dvinnaṃ āyāmavitthārapaṭṭānaṃ saṅghaṭitaṭṭhāne, kaṇṇepi vā
tika-vin08t:181_3: ekasseva vā paṭṭassa ūnapūraṇatthaṃ ghaṭitaṭṭhānepi vā. Veṇīti kudrūsasīsākārena
tika-vin08t:182_0: Paṭṭampīti pattampi. Aṭṭhakoṇādiko vidhi pakāro etassāti aṭṭhakoṇādikavidhi, taṃ.
tika-vin08t:182_1: Aṭṭhakoṇādikanti vā gāthābandhavasena niggahitāgamo. “Aṭṭhakoṇādikaṃ vidhi”nti etaṃ
tika-vin08t:182_3: sambandho. Atha vā paṭṭanti ettha bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ, paṭṭeti attho. Imasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:182_4: pakkhe aṭṭhakoṇādikanti upayogavacanaṃ. Vidhinti etassa visesanaṃ. Idha vakkhamānacatukoṇasaṇṭhānato
tika-vin08t:182_5: aññaṃ aṭṭhakoṇādikaṃ nāma. Tatthāti tasmiṃ paṭṭadvaye. Agghiyagadārūpanti agghiyasaṇṭhānañceva
tika-vin08t:182_6: gadāsaṇṭhānañca sibbanaṃ. Muggaranti laguḷasaṇṭhānasibbanaṃ. Ādi-saddena cetiyādisaṇṭhānānaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t:183_0: Tatthāti paṭṭadvaye tasmiṃ ṭhāne. Kakkaṭakakkhīnīti kuḷīrakacchisadisāni sibbanavikārāni.
tika-vin08t:183_1: Uṭṭhāpentīti karonti. Tatthāti tasmiṃ gaṇṭhikapāsakapaṭṭake. Suttāti koṇato koṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:183_2: sibbitasuttā ceva caturasse sibbitasuttā ca. Piḷakāti tesameva suttānaṃ nivattetvā
tika-vin08t:183_3: sibbitakoṭiyo ca. Duviññeyyāvāti rajanakāle duviññeyyarūpā anoḷārikā dīpitā vaṭṭantīti.
tika-vin08t:183_4: Yathāha “koṇasuttapiḷakā ca cīvare ratte duviññeyyarūpā vaṭṭantī”ti.
tika-vin08t:184_0: Gaṇṭhikapaṭṭikā pāsapaṭṭikāti yojanā. Kaṇṇakoṇesu suttānīti cīvarakaṇṇe suttā ceva
tika-vin08t:184_1: pāsakapaṭṭānaṃ koṇesu suttāni ca acchindati. Ettha ca cīvare āyāmato vitthārato ca
tika-vin08t:184_2: sibbitvā anuvātato bahi nikkhamitasuttaṃ cīvaraṃ rajitvā sukkhāpanakāle rajjuyā vā
tika-vin08t:184_3: cīvaravaṃse vā bandhitvā olambituṃ anuvāte bandhasuttāni ca kaṇṇasuttāni nāma. Yathāha
tika-vin08t:184_4: “cīvarassa kaṇṇasuttakaṃ na ca vaṭṭati, rajitakāle chinditabbaṃ, yaṃ pana ‘anujānāmi
tika-vin08t:184_5: bhikkhave kaṇṇasuttaka’nti evaṃ anuññātaṃ, taṃ anuvāte pāsakaṃ katvā bandhitabbaṃ
tika-vin08t:185_0: Sūcikammavikāraṃ vāti cīvaramaṇḍanatthāya nānāsuttakehi satapadisadisaṃ sibbantā
tika-vin08t:185_1: āgantukapaṭṭaṃ ṭhapenti, evarūpaṃ sūcikammavikāraṃ vā. Aññaṃ vā pana kiñcipīti aññampi
tika-vin08t:185_2: yaṃ kiñci mālākammamigapakkhipadādikaṃ sibbanavikāraṃ. Kātunti sayaṃ kātuṃ. Kārāpetunti
tika-vin08t:186_0: Yo bhikkhu paraṃ uttamaṃ vaṇṇamaṭṭhamabhipatthayanto kañjikapiṭṭhakhaliallikādīsu
tika-vin08t:186_1: cīvaraṃ pakkhipati, tassa pana bhikkhuno dukkaṭā mokkho na vijjatīti yojanā. Kañjikanti
tika-vin08t:186_2: vāyanatantamakkhanaṃ kañjikasadisā sulākañjikaṃ. Piṭṭhanti taṇḍulapiṭṭhaṃ. Taṇḍulapiṭṭhehi
tika-vin08t:186_3: pakkā khali. Allikāti niyyāso. Ādi-saddena lākhādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Cīvarassa karaṇe karaṇakāle
tika-vin08t:187_0: Tatthāti yena kasāvena cīvaraṃ rajati, tasmiṃ rajane cīvarassa sugandhabhāvatthāya
tika-vin08t:187_1: gandhaṃ vā ujjalabhāvatthāya telaṃ vā vaṇṇatthāya lākhaṃ vā. Kiñcīti evarūpaṃ yaṃ
tika-vin08t:187_2: kiñci. Maṇināti pāsāṇena. Aññenapi ca kenacīti yena ujjalaṃ hoti, evarūpena muggarādinā
tika-vin08t:187_3: aññenapi kenaci vatthunā. Doṇiyāti rajanambaṇe na ghaṃsitabbaṃ hatthena gāhāpetvā
tika-vin08t:187_4: na gahetabbaṃ. Rattaṃ cīvaraṃ hatthehi kiñci thokaṃ paharituṃ vaṭṭatīti yojanā. Yattha
tika-vin08t:187_5: pakkarajanaṃ pakkhipanti, sā rajanadoṇī. Tattha aṃsabaddhakakāyabandhanādiṃ ghaṭṭetuṃ
tika-vin08t:188_0: Gaṇṭhiketi veḷudantavisāṇādimayagaṇṭhike. Lekhā vāti vaṭṭādibhedā lekhā vā. Piḷakāti
tika-vin08t:188_2: “Kappabinduvikāro vā na vaṭṭatīti yojanā”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā tatheva cīvare paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:189_0: 9. Patte vā thālake vātiādīsu thālaketi tambādimaye puggalike tividhepi kappiyathālake.
tika-vin08t:189_1: Na vaṭṭatīti maṇivaṇṇakaraṇapayogo na vaṭṭati, telavaṇṇapayogo pana vaṭṭati. Telavaṇṇoti
tika-vin08t:189_2: samaṇasāruppavaṇṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, maṇivaṇṇaṃ pana pattaṃ aññena kataṃ labhitvā
tika-vin08t:189_3: paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Pattamaṇḍaleti tipusīsādimaye pattaṭṭhapanakamaṇḍale.
tika-vin08t:189_4: “Na bhikkhave vicitrāni pattamaṇḍalāni dhāretabbāni rūpakākiṇṇāni bhittikammakatānī”ti
tika-vin08t:189_5: vuttattā “bhittikammaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, makaradantakaṃ
tika-vin08t:189_6: chinditu”nti vuttattā “makaradantakaṃ pana vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tenāhu porāṇā –
tika-vin08t:190: “Thālakassa ca pattassa, bahi antopi vā pana;
tika-vin08t:191: Āraggena katā lekhā, na ca vaṭṭati kācipi.
tika-vin08t:192: “Āropetvā bhamaṃ pattaṃ, majjitvā ce pacanti ca;
tika-vin08t:198_0: Vinayasāratthasandīpaniyampi āraggenāti ārakaṇṭakaggena, sūcimukhena vā. Kācipi lekhāti
tika-vin08t:198_1: vaṭṭakagomuttādisaṇṭhānā yā kācipi rāji. Bhamaṃ āropetvāti bhame allīyāpetvā. Pattamaṇḍalaketi
tika-vin08t:198_2: patte chavirakkhaṇatthāya tipusīsādīhi kate pattassa heṭṭhā ādhārādīnaṃ upari kātabbe
tika-vin08t:198_4: vicitrāni pattamaṇḍalāni dhāretabbāni rūpakākiṇṇāni bhittikammakatānī”ti. Tatthāti
tika-vin08t:198_5: tasmiṃ pattamaṇḍale. Assāti bhikkhussa. Makaradantakanti girikūṭanti vuttaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin08t:199_0: Dhamakaraṇa…pe… lekhā na vaṭṭatīti āraggena dinnalekhā na vaṭṭati, jātihiṅgulikādivaṇṇehi
tika-vin08t:199_1: katalekhā pana vaṭṭati. Chattamukhavaṭṭiyanti dhamakaraṇassa hatthena gahaṇatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:201: Kucchiyaṃ vā ṭhapetvā taṃ, lekhaṃ tu mukhavaṭṭiya”nti. –
tika-vin08t:202_0: Vuttaṃ. Taṭṭīkāyaṃ pana “mukhavaṭṭiyā yā lekhā parissāvanabandhanatthāya anuññātā,
tika-vin08t:202_1: taṃ lekhaṃ ṭhapetvā dhamakaraṇacchatte vā kucchiyaṃ vā kāci lekhā na vaṭṭatīti yojanā”ti
tika-vin08t:202_2: vuttaṃ, tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva dhamakaraṇe paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:203_0: 10. Kāyabandhane pana kakkaṭakkhīnīti kakkaṭakassa akkhisadisāni. Makaramukhanti
tika-vin08t:203_2: Ekameva vaṭṭatīti ettha ekarajjukaṃ dviguṇatiguṇaṃ katvā bandhituṃ na vaṭṭati, ekameva
tika-vin08t:203_3: pana satavārampi sarīraṃ parikkhipitvā bandhituṃ vaṭṭati. “Bahurajjuke ekato katvā
tika-vin08t:203_4: ekena nirantaraṃ veṭhetvā kataṃ bahurajjukanti na vattabbaṃ, taṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā
tika-vin08t:203_5: taṃ murajasaṅkhaṃ na gacchatīti veditabbaṃ. Murajañhi nānāvaṇṇehi suttehi murajavaṭṭisaṇṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:203_6: veṭhetvā karonti. Idaṃ pana murajaṃ maddavīṇasaṅkhātaṃ pāmaṅgasaṇṭhānañca dasāsu
tika-vin08t:203_7: vaṭṭati “kāyabandhanassa dasā jīranti. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, murajaṃ maddavīṇa”nti vuttattā.
tika-vin08t:204_0: Vidheti dasāpariyosāne thirabhāvāya dantavisāṇasuttādīhi kate vidhe. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:204_1: pana “kāyabandhanassa pāsante dasāmūle tassa thirabhāvatthaṃ kattabbe dantavisāṇādimaye
tika-vin08t:204_2: vidhe”ti vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhamaṅgalāni nāma saṅkho, cakkaṃ, puṇṇakumbho, gayā, sirīvaccho,
tika-vin08t:204_4: Paricchedalekhāmattanti dantādīhi katassa vidhassa ubhosu koṭīsu kātabbaparicchedarājimattaṃ.
tika-vin08t:205: “Suttaṃ vā diguṇaṃ katvā, koṭṭenti ca tahiṃ tahiṃ;
tika-vin08t:214: Vikārarūpaṃ yaṃ kiñci, na vaṭṭati dasāmukhe.
tika-vin08t:215: “Ujukaṃ macchakaṇṭaṃ vā, maṭṭhaṃ vā pana paṭṭikaṃ;
tika-vin08t:220: Rajjuyo ca na vaṭṭanti, purimā dvedasā siyuṃ.
tika-vin08t:222: Ekā dviticatasso vā, vaṭṭanti na tato paraṃ.
tika-vin08t:224: Tañca pāmaṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ, ekampi ca na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:232_0: Vinayasāratthasandīpaniyampi tahiṃ tahinti paṭṭikāya tattha tattha. Tanti tathākoṭṭitadiguṇasuttakāyabandhanaṃ.
tika-vin08t:232_1: Antesu daḷhatthāya dasāmukhe diguṇaṃ katvā koṭṭenti, vaṭṭatīti yojanā. Cittakampīti
tika-vin08t:232_3: kāyabandhane na vaṭṭatīti kā kathā. Uṭṭhāpetunti ukkirituṃ.
tika-vin08t:233_0: Ghaṭanti ghaṭasaṇṭhānaṃ. Deḍḍubhasīsaṃ vāti udakasappasīsaṃ mukhasaṇṭhānaṃ vā. Yaṃ
tika-vin08t:233_1: kiñci vikārarūpaṃ dasāmukhe na vaṭṭatīti yojanā. Ettha ca ubhayapassesu macchakaṇṭakayuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:233_2: macchassa piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ viya yassā paṭṭikāya vāyanaṃ hoti, idaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ macchakaṇṭakaṃ
tika-vin08t:233_3: nāma. Yassa khajjūripattasaṇṭhānamiva vāyanaṃ hoti, taṃ khajjūripattakākāraṃ nāma.
tika-vin08t:234_0: Pakativikārā paṭṭikā sūkarantaṃ nāma kuñcikākosasaṇṭhānaṃ. Tassa duvidhassa kāyabandhanassa.
tika-vin08t:234_1: Tattha rajjukā sūkarantānulomikā, dussapaṭṭaṃ paṭṭikānulomikaṃ. Ādi-saddena muddikakāyabandhanaṃ
tika-vin08t:234_2: gahitaṃ, tañca sūkarantānulomikaṃ. Yathāha “ekarajjukaṃ pana muddikakāyabandhanañca
tika-vin08t:234_3: sūkarantaṃ anulometī”ti. Tattha rajjukā nāma ekāvaṭṭā, bahurajjukassa akappiyabhāvaṃ
tika-vin08t:234_4: vakkhati. Muddikakāyabandhanaṃ nāma caturassaṃ akatvā sajjitanti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:235_0: Murajaṃ nāma murajavaṭṭisaṇṭhānaṃ veṭhetvā kataṃ. Veṭhetvāti nānāsuttehi veṭhetvā.
tika-vin08t:235_1: Sikkhābhājanavinicchaye pana “bahukā rajjuyo ekato katvā ekāya rajjuyā veṭhita”nti
tika-vin08t:235_2: vuttaṃ. Maddavīṇaṃ nāma pāmaṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ. Deḍḍubhakaṃ nāma udakasappasadisaṃ. Kalābukaṃ
tika-vin08t:235_3: nāma bahurajjukaṃ. Rajjuyoti ubhayakoṭiyaṃ ekato abandhā bahurajjuyo, tathābandhā
tika-vin08t:235_4: kalābukaṃ nāma hoti. Na vaṭṭantīti murajādīni imāni sabbāni kāyabandhanāni na vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin08t:235_5: Purimā dveti murajaṃ maddavīṇanāmañcāti dve. “Dasāsu siyu”nti vattabbe gāthābandhavasena
tika-vin08t:235_6: vaṇṇalopena “dasā siyu”nti vuttaṃ. Yathāha “murajaṃ maddavīṇanti idaṃ dasāsuyeva anuññāta”nti.
tika-vin08t:236_0: Pāmaṅgasaṇṭhānāti pāmaṅgadāmaṃ viya caturassasaṇṭhānā. Ekarajjumayanti nānāvaṭṭe
tika-vin08t:236_1: ekato vaṭṭetvā kataṃ rajjumayaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti “rajjukā dussapaṭṭādī”ti
tika-vin08t:236_2: ettha ekavaṭṭarajjukā gahitā. Idha pana nānāvaṭṭe ekato vaṭṭetvā katā ekāva rajju
tika-vin08t:236_3: gahitā. Tañcāti taṃ vā nayampi ekarajjukakāyabandhanaṃ pāmaṅgasaṇṭhānena ganthitaṃ.
tika-vin08t:236_4: Ekampi ca na vaṭṭatīti kevalampi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:237_0: Bahū rajjuke ekato katvāti yojanā. Vaṭṭati bandhitunti murajaṃ kalābukañca na hoti,
tika-vin08t:237_1: rajjukakāyabandhanameva hotīti adhippāyo. Ayaṃ pana vinicchayo “bahurajjuke ekato
tika-vin08t:237_2: katvā ekena nirantaraṃ veṭhetvā kataṃ bahurajjukanti na vattabbaṃ, taṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin08t:237_3: aṭṭhakathāgato idha vutto. Sikkhābhājanavinicchaye “bahurajjuyo ekato katvā ekāya
tika-vin08t:237_4: veṭhitaṃ murajaṃ nāmā”ti yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ iminā virujjhanato na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:238_0: Danta-saddena hatthidantā vuttā. Jatūti lākhā. Saṅkhamayanti saṅkhanābhimayaṃ. Vidhakā
tika-vin08t:238_1: matāti ettha vedhikātipi pāṭho, vidhapariyāyo. Kāyabandhanavidheti kāyabandhanassa
tika-vin08t:238_2: dasāya thirabhāvatthaṃ kaṭṭhadantādīhi kate vidhe. Vikāro aṭṭhamaṅgalādiko. Tattha
tika-vin08t:238_3: tatthāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne. Tu-saddena ghaṭākāropi vaṭṭatīti dīpetīti attho pakāsito,
tika-vin08t:239: 11. Añjaniyaṃ “ujukamevā”ti vuttattā caturassādisaṇṭhānāpi vaṅkagatikā na vaṭṭati. Sipāṭikāyāti vāsiādibhaṇḍapakkhipane. Vinayavinicchayappakaraṇe pana –
tika-vin08t:241: Na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhūnaṃ, añjanī janarañjanī.
tika-vin08t:243: Vaḷañjantassa bhikkhussa, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin08t:244: “Vaṭṭā vā caturassā vā, aṭṭhaṃsā vāpi añjanī;
tika-vin08t:249: Yaṃ kiñci pana sibbetvā, vaḷañjantassa vaṭṭatī”ti. –
tika-vin08t:251_0: Taṭṭīkāyampi mālā…pe… cittitāti mālākammalatākammehi ca migapakkhirūpādinānārūpehi
tika-vin08t:251_1: ca vicittitā. Janarañjanīti bālajanapalobhinī. Aṭṭhaṃsā vāpīti ettha api-saddena
tika-vin08t:251_2: soḷasaṃsādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Vaṇṇamaṭṭhāti mālākammādivaṇṇamaṭṭhā. Añjanīsalākāpi tathā
tika-vin08t:251_3: vaṇṇamaṭṭhā na vaṭṭatīti yojanā. Añjanīthavikāya ca nānāvaṇṇehi suttehi cittakammaṃ
tika-vin08t:251_4: na vaṭṭatīti pāṭho yujjati, “thavikāpi vā”ti pāṭho dissati, so na gahetabbo. “Pītādinā
tika-vin08t:251_5: yena kenaci ekavaṇṇena suttena pilotikādimayaṃ kiñcipi sipāṭikaṃ sibbetvā vaḷañjantassa
tika-vin08t:252_1: Bhamakārānaṃ dāruādilikhanasatthakanti keci. Vaṭṭamaṇikanti vaṭṭaṃ katvā uṭṭhāpetabbabubbuḷakaṃ.
tika-vin08t:252_2: Aññanti iminā piḷakādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Pipphaliketi yaṃ kiñci chedanake khuddakasatthe.
tika-vin08t:252_3: Maṇikanti ekavaṭṭamaṇi. Piḷakanti sāsapamattikāmuttarājisadisā bahuvaṭṭalekhā. Imasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:252_4: adhikāre avuttattā lekhaniyaṃ yaṃ kiñci vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:252_5: pana “kuñcikāya senāsanaparikkhārattā suvaṇṇarūpiyamayāpi vaṭṭatīti chāyā dissati.
tika-vin08t:252_6: ‘Kuñcikāya vaṇṇamaṭṭhakammaṃ na vaṭṭatī’ti vacanato aññe kappiyalohādimayāva kuñcikā
tika-vin08t:253_0: Valitakanti nakhacchedanakāle daḷhaggahaṇatthaṃ valiyuttameva karonti. Tasmā taṃ
tika-vin08t:253_1: vaṭṭatīti iminā aññampi vikāraṃ daḷhīkammādiatthāya karonti, na vaṇṇamaṭṭhatthāya,
tika-vin08t:253_2: taṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpitaṃ, tena ca kattaradaṇḍakoṭiyaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṅghaṭṭanena saddaniccharaṇatthāya
tika-vin08t:253_3: katavalayādikaṃ avuttampi yato upapannaṃ hoti. Ettha ca daḷhīkammādīti ādi-saddena
tika-vin08t:253_4: parissayavinodanādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti, tena kattarayaṭṭhikoṭiyaṃ katavalayānaṃ aññamaññasaṅghaṭṭanena
tika-vin08t:253_5: saddaniccharaṇaṃ dīghajātikādiparissayavinodanatthaṃ hoti, tasmā vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin08t:255: Ṭhapetuṃ pana yaṃ kiñci, na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin08t:257: Valitvā ca nakhacchedaṃ, karontīti hi vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin08t:258_0: Tassa vaṇṇanāyampi maṇikanti thūlabubbuḷaṃ. Pīḷakanti sukhumabubbuḷaṃ. Pipphaleti
tika-vin08t:258_2: uṭṭhāpetuṃ. Yaṃ kiñcīti sesavaṇṇamaṭṭhampi ca. Daṇḍaketi pipphalidaṇḍake. Yathāha
tika-vin08t:258_3: “pipphalikepi maṇikaṃ vā piḷakaṃ vā yaṃ kiñci ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati, daṇḍake pana paricchedalekhā
tika-vin08t:258_4: vaṭṭatī”ti. Paricchedalekhāmattanti āṇibandhanaṭṭhānaṃ patvā paricchindanatthaṃ ekāva
tika-vin08t:258_5: lekhā vaṭṭatīti. Valitvāti ubhayakoṭimukhaṃ katvā majjhe valiyo gāhetvā nakhacchedaṃ
tika-vin08t:258_6: yasmā karonti, tasmā vaṭṭatīti yojanāti āgatā.
tika-vin08t:259_0: Uttarāraṇiyaṃ maṇḍalanti uttarāraṇiyā pavesanatthaṃ āvāṭamaṇḍalaṃ hoti. Dantakaṭṭhacchedanavāsiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:259_1: ujukameva bandhitunti sambandho. Ettha ca ujukamevāti iminā vaṅkaṃ katvā bandhituṃ
tika-vin08t:259_2: na vaṭṭatīti dasseti, teneva añjaniyampi tathā dassitaṃ. Ubhosu passesu ekapasse
tika-vin08t:259_3: vāti vacanaseso, vāsidaṇḍassa ubhosu passesu daṇḍakoṭīnaṃ acalanatthaṃ bandhitunti
tika-vin08t:259_4: attho. Kappiyalohena caturassaṃ vā aṭṭhaṃsaṃ vā kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti yojanā.
tika-vin08t:260: 13. Āmaṇḍasāraketi āmalakaphalāni pisitvā tena kakkena katatelabhājane. Tattha kira pakkhittaṃ telaṃ sītaṃ hoti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ācariyena –
tika-vin08t:262: Mālākammādi yaṃ kiñci, vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:264: Dvīsu passesu lohena, bandhituṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:266: Vaṭṭalekhāva vaṭṭanti, ekā vā dvepi heṭṭhato.
tika-vin08t:269_0: Ṭīkāyampi araṇisahite bhantakiccakaro daṇḍo uttarāraṇī nāma. Vāpīti pi-saddena adharāraṇiṃ
tika-vin08t:269_1: saṅgaṇhāti. Udukkhaladaṇḍassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Añchanakayantadhanu dhanukaṃ nāma.
tika-vin08t:269_2: Musalamatthakapīḷanadaṇḍako pelladaṇḍako nāma. Saṇḍāseti aggisaṇḍāse. Dantakaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:269_3: chedanavāsiyā tathā yaṃ kiñci vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ na vaṭṭatīti sambandho. Dvīsu passesūti
tika-vin08t:269_4: vāsiyā ubhosu passesu. Lohenāti kappiyalohena. Bandhituṃ vaṭṭatīti ujukameva vā caturassaṃ
tika-vin08t:269_5: vā aṭṭhaṃsaṃ vā bandhituṃ vaṭṭati. Saṇḍāseti aggisaṇḍāseti nissandehe vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:269_6: panettha sūcisaṇḍāso dassito. Heṭṭhāti heṭṭhā ayopaṭṭavalaye. “Upari ahicchattakamakuḷamatta”nti
tika-vin08t:269_7: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Visāṇeti telāsiñcanakagavayamahiṃsādisiṅge. Nāḷiyaṃ vāpīti
tika-vin08t:269_8: veḷunāḷikādināḷiyaṃ. Api-saddena alābuṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Āmaṇḍasāraketi āmalakacuṇṇamayatelaghaṭe.
tika-vin08t:269_9: Telabhājanaketi vuttappakāreyeva telabhājane. Sabbaṃ vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ vaṭṭatīti pumitthirūparahitaṃ
tika-vin08t:270_0: Bhūmattharaṇeti kaṭasārādimaye parikammakatāya bhūmiyā attharitabbaattharaṇe. Pānīyaghaṭeti
tika-vin08t:270_1: iminā sabbabhājane saṅgaṇhāti. Sabbaṃ…pe… vaṭṭatīti yathāvuttesu mañcādīsu itthipurisarūpampi
tika-vin08t:270_2: vaṭṭati. Telabhājanesuyeva itthipurisarūpānaṃ paṭikkhipitattā telabhājanena saha
tika-vin08t:270_3: agaṇetvā visuṃ mañcādīnaṃ gahitattā cāti vadanti. Kiñcāpi vadanti, etesaṃ pana mañcādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:270_4: hatthena āmasitabbabhaṇḍattā itthirūpamettha na vaṭṭatīti gahetabbaṃ. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:270_5: pana “tālavaṇṭabījaniādīsu vaṇṇamaṭṭhakammaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi tāni kuñcikā
tika-vin08t:270_6: viya pariharaṇīyāni, atha kho uccāvacāni na dhāretabbānīti paṭikkhepābhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:270_7: Kevalañhi tāni “anujānāmi bhikkhave vidhūpanañca tālavaṇṭañcā”tiādinā vuttāni. Gaṇṭhipade
tika-vin08t:270_8: pana “telabhājanesu vaṇṇamaṭṭhakammaṃ vaṭṭati, senāsanaparikkhārattā vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:277_0: 14. Evaṃ samaṇaparikkhāresu kappiyākappiyaṃ kathetvā idāni senāsane kathetuṃ “senāsane
tika-vin08t:277_1: panā”tyādimāha. Ettha pana-saddo visesajotako. Tena sabbaratanamayampi vaṇṇamaṭṭhakammaṃ
tika-vin08t:277_2: vaṭṭati, kimaṅgaṃ pana aññavaṇṇamaṭṭhakammanti atthaṃ joteti. Yadi evaṃ kismiñci
tika-vin08t:277_3: paṭisedhetabbe santepi tathā vattabbaṃ siyāti āha “senāsane kiñci paṭisedhetabbaṃ
tika-vin08t:284_1: tasmā jātarūparajatamayā sabbepi senāsanaparikkhārā āmāsā. Bhikkhūnaṃ dhammavinayavaṇṇanaṭṭhāne
tika-vin08t:284_2: ratanamaṇḍape karonti phalikatthambhe ratanadāmapaṭimaṇḍite. Tattha sabbupakaraṇāni
tika-vin08t:284_3: bhikkhūnaṃ paṭijaggituṃ vaṭṭantī”ti āgataṃ. Tassā vaṇṇanāyaṃ pana vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:284_5: paribhogo sabbathā kappiyoti adhippāyo. Tenāha ‘tasmā’tiādi. ‘Bhikkhūnaṃ dhammavinayavaṇṇanaṭṭhāne’ti
tika-vin08t:284_6: vuttattā saṅghikameva suvaṇṇamayaṃ senāsanaṃ senāsanaparikkhārā ca vaṭṭanti, na puggalikānīti
tika-vin08t:285_2: kiñci cittakammakataṃ, sabbaṃ vaṭṭati. Pāsādassa dāsidāsaṃ khettaṃ vatthuṃ gomahiṃsaṃ
tika-vin08t:285_3: demāti vadanti, pāṭekkaṃ gahaṇakiccaṃ natthi, pāsāde paṭiggahite paṭiggahitameva
tika-vin08t:285_4: hoti. Gonakādīni saṅghikavihāre vā puggalikavihāre vā mañcapīṭhesu attharitvā paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin08t:285_5: na vaṭṭanti, dhammāsane pana gihivikatanīhārena labbhanti, tatrāpi nipajjituṃ na
tika-vin08t:285_6: vaṭṭatī”ti āgataṃ. Tassā vaṇṇanāyaṃ pana vimativinodaniyaṃ “suvaṇṇarajatādivicitrānīti
tika-vin08t:285_7: saṅghikasenāsanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, puggalikaṃ pana suvaṇṇādivicitraṃ bhikkhussa sampaṭicchitumeva
tika-vin08t:285_8: na vaṭṭati ‘na tvevāhaṃ bhikkhave kenaci pariyāyena jātarūparajataṃ sāditabba’nti
tika-vin08t:285_9: vuttattā, tenevettha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘saṅghikavihāre vā puggalikavihāre vā’ti na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:285_10: gonakādiakappiyabhaṇḍavisayeva evaṃ vuttaṃ, ekabhikkhussapi tesaṃ gahaṇe dosābhāvā”ti vaṇṇitaṃ.
tika-vin08t:286_0: Tasmiṃyeva khandhake aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sacepi rājarājamahāmattādayo ekappahāreneva mañcasataṃ
tika-vin08t:286_1: vā mañcasahassaṃ vā denti, sabbe kappiyamañcā sampaṭicchitabbā, sampaṭicchitvā vuḍḍhapaṭipāṭiyā
tika-vin08t:286_2: saṅghikaparibhogena paribhuñjathāti dātabbā, puggalikavasena na dātabbā”ti āgataṃ.
tika-vin08t:286_3: Tassā vaṇṇanāyaṃyeva vimativinodaniyaṃ “kappiyamañcā sampaṭicchitabbāti iminā suvaṇṇādivicittaṃ
tika-vin08t:286_4: akappiyamañcaṃ ‘saṅghassā’ti vuttepi sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti, ‘vihārassa
tika-vin08t:286_5: demā’ti vutte saṅghasseva vaṭṭati, na puggalassa khettādi viyāti daṭṭhabba”nti vaṇṇitaṃ,
tika-vin08t:286_6: tasmā bhagavato āṇaṃ sampaṭicchantehi lajjipesalabahussutasikkhākāmabhūtehi bhikkhūhi
tika-vin08t:287_0: Nanu ca senāsane viruddhasenāsanaṃ nāma paṭisedhetabbaṃ atthi, atha kasmā “senāsane
tika-vin08t:287_1: kiñci paṭisedhetabbaṃ natthī”ti vuttanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “aññatra viruddhasenāsanā”ti.
tika-vin08t:287_2: Tassattho – viruddhasenāsanā viruddhasenāsanaṃ aññatra ṭhapetvā aññaṃ vaṇṇamaṭṭhakammādikammaṃ
tika-vin08t:287_3: sandhāya senāsane kiñci paṭisedhetabbaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ, na tadabhāvoti. Yadi evaṃ
tika-vin08t:287_4: taṃ viruddhasenāsanaṃ ācariyena vattabbaṃ, katamaṃ viruddhasenāsanaṃ nāmāti pucchāyamāha
tika-vin08t:287_5: “viruddha…pe… vuccatī”ti. Tattha aññesanti sīmassāmikānaṃ. Rājavallabhehīti lajjipesalānaṃ
tika-vin08t:287_6: uposathādiantarāyakarā alajjino bhinnaladdhikā ca bhikkhū adhippetā tehi saha uposathādikaraṇāyogato.
tika-vin08t:287_7: Tena ca “sīmāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Tesaṃ lajjiparisāti tesaṃ sīmassāmikānaṃ anubalaṃ dātuṃ
tika-vin08t:287_8: samatthā lajjiparisā. Bhikkhūhi katanti yaṃ alajjīnaṃ senāsanabhedanādikaṃ lajjibhikkhūhi
tika-vin08t:287_9: kataṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ sukatameva alajjiniggahatthāya pavattetabbato.
tika-vin08t:288_0: Ettha ca siyā – “aññesaṃ sīmāyā”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, sīmā nāma bahuvidhā, katarasīmaṃ
tika-vin08t:288_1: sandhāyāti? Baddhasīmaṃ sandhāyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? “Mā amhākaṃ
tika-vin08t:288_4: vuttattā, uposathādivinayakammakhettabhūtāya eva sīmāya idha adhippetattā. Yadi evaṃ
tika-vin08t:288_6: vattabbanti? Na vattabbaṃ tāsaṃ abaddhasīmattā, na te tāsaṃ sāmikā, baddhasīmāyeva
tika-vin08t:288_7: bhikkhūnaṃ kiriyāya siddhattā tāsaṃyeva te sāmikā. Tena vuttaṃ “yaṃ pana sīmassāmikehi
tika-vin08t:288_8: bhikkhūhī”ti. Yaṃ pana vadanti “upacārasīmāpi taṃkhettabhūtā”ti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:288_9: tassā tadakkhettabhāvaṃ upari sīmāvinicchayakathādīsu kathayissāma. Apica gāmasīmāya
tika-vin08t:289_0: Chindāpeyya vā bhindāpeyya vā, anupavajjoti idaṃ sabbamattikāmayakuṭī viya sabbathā
tika-vin08t:289_1: anupayogārahaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana pañcavaṇṇasuttehi vinaddhachattādikaṃ, tattha
tika-vin08t:289_2: akappiyabhāgova chinditabbo, na tadavaseso, tassa kappiyattāti chindanto upavajjova
tika-vin08t:289_3: hoti. Teneva vuttaṃ “ghaṭakampi vāḷarūpampi chinditvā dhāretabba”ntiādi.
tika-vin08t:294_1: vinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “bhesajjā”tiādimāha. Tattha bhisakkassa idaṃ kammaṃ bhesajjaṃ.
tika-vin08t:294_2: Kiṃ taṃ? Tikicchanaṃ. Kariyate karaṇaṃ, bhesajjassa karaṇaṃ bhesajjakaraṇaṃ, vejjakammakaraṇanti
tika-vin08t:294_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Parisamantato tāyati rakkhatīti parittaṃ, ārakkhāti attho. Paṭisantharaṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:294_4: paṭisanthāro, attanā saddhiṃ aññesaṃ sambandhakaraṇanti attho. Tattha yo vinicchayo
tika-vin08t:294_5: mātikāyaṃ “bhesajjakaraṇampi ca parittaṃ, paṭisanthāro”ti mayā vutto, tasmiṃ samabhiniviṭṭhe
tika-vin08t:294_6: bhesajjakaraṇavinicchaye. Sahadhammo etesanti sahadhammikā, tesaṃ, ekassa satthuno
tika-vin08t:294_7: sāsane sahasikkhamānadhammānanti attho. Atha vā sahadhamme niyuttā sahadhammikā,
tika-vin08t:294_8: tesaṃ, sahadhammasaṅkhāte sikkhāpade sikkhamānabhāvena niyuttānanti attho. Vivaṭṭanissitasīlādiyuttabhāvena
tika-vin08t:294_9: samattā samasīlasaddhāpaññānaṃ. Etena dussīlānaṃ bhinnaladdhikānañca akātumpi labbhatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:295_0: Ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānato vāti attano vā tesaṃ vā ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānato. Na kariyitthāti
tika-vin08t:295_1: akatā, ayuttavasena akatapubbā viññatti akataviññatti. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “akataviññattiyāti
tika-vin08t:295_2: na viññattiyā. Sā hi ananuññātattā katāpi akatā viyāti akataviññatti, ‘vadeyyātha
tika-vin08t:295_3: bhante yenattho’ti evaṃ akataṭṭhāne viññatti akataviññattīti likhita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:295_4: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “gilānassa atthāya appavāritaṭṭhānato viññattiyā anuññātattā katāpi
tika-vin08t:295_5: akatā viyāti akataviññatti, ‘vada bhante paccayenā’ti evaṃ akatapavāraṇaṭṭhāne ca
tika-vin08t:296_0: 16. Paṭiyādiyatīti sampādeti. Akātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha dukkaṭanti vadanti, ayuttatāvasena
tika-vin08t:296_1: panettha akaraṇappaṭikkhepo vutto, na āpattivasenāti gahetabbaṃ. Sabbaṃ parikammaṃ
tika-vin08t:296_2: anāmasantenāti mātugāmasarīrādīnaṃ anāmāsattā vuttaṃ. Yāva ñātakā na passantīti yāva
tika-vin08t:296_3: tassa ñātakā na passanti. “Titthiyabhūtānaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ sahatthā dātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin08t:297_0: 17. Pitu bhaginī pitucchā. Mātu bhātā mātulo. Nappahontīti kātuṃ na sakkontīti ṭīkāsu
tika-vin08t:297_1: vuttaṃ. “Tesaṃyeva santakaṃ bhesajjaṃ gahetvā kevalaṃ yojetvā dātabba”nti vatvā “sace
tika-vin08t:297_2: pana nappahonti yācanti ca, detha no bhante, tumhākaṃ paṭidassāmā”ti vuttattā pana
tika-vin08t:297_3: tesaṃ bhesajjassa appahonakattā bhesajjameva yācantīti aṭṭhakathādhippāyo dissati,
tika-vin08t:297_4: vīmaṃsitabbo. Na yācantīti lajjāya na yācanti, gāravena vā. “Ābhogaṃ katvā”ti vuttattā
tika-vin08t:297_5: aññathā dentassa āpattiyeva. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “ābhogaṃ katvāti idaṃ kattabbakaraṇadassanavasena
tika-vin08t:297_6: vuttaṃ, ābhogaṃ pana akatvāpi dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti tīsu gaṇṭhipadesu likhita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:297_7: Porāṇaṭīkāyampi tadeva gahetvā likhitaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana taṃ vacanaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ.
tika-vin08t:297_8: Vuttañhi tattha keci pana “ābhogaṃ akatvāpi dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:297_9: bhesajjakaraṇassa, pāḷiyaṃ ‘anāpatti bhikkhu pārājikassa, āpatti dukkaṭassā’ti evaṃ
tika-vin08t:297_11: karontassa sutteneva āpattisiddhāti daṭṭhabbā. Teneva aṭṭhakathāyampi ‘tesaññeva
tika-vin08t:298_0: Ete dasa ñātake ṭhapetvāti tesaṃ puttanattādayopi tappaṭibaddhattā ñātakā evāti tepi
tika-vin08t:298_1: ettheva saṅgahitā. Tena aññesanti iminā aññātakānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tenevāha
tika-vin08t:298_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Bhesajjaṃ karontassāti yathāvuttavidhinā karontassa, “tāvakālikaṃ dassāmī”ti
tika-vin08t:298_4: ābhogaṃ akatvā dentassapi pana antarāpattidukkaṭaṃ vinā micchājīvanaṃ vā kuladūsanaṃ
tika-vin08t:298_5: vā na hotiyeva. Tenāha “vejjakammaṃ vā kuladūsakāpatti vā na hotī”ti. Ñātakānañhi
tika-vin08t:298_6: santakaṃ yācitvāpi gahetuṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā tattha kuladūsanādi na siyā. Sāratthadīpaniyampi
tika-vin08t:298_7: “mayhaṃ dassanti karissantīti paccāsāya karontassapi yācitvā gahetabbaṭṭhānatāya
tika-vin08t:298_8: ñātakesu vejjakammaṃ vā kuladūsakāpatti vā na hotīti vadantī”ti vuttaṃ. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:298_9: pana “vejjakammaṃ vā kuladūsakāpatti vā na hotīti vacanato yāva sattamo kulaparivaṭṭo,
tika-vin08t:298_10: tāva bhesajjaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti vadantī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ. Sabbapadesu vinicchayo
tika-vin08t:298_11: veditabboti “cūḷamātuyā”tiādīsu sabbapadesu cūḷamātuyā sāmikotiādinā yojetvā heṭṭhā
tika-vin08t:299_0: Upajjhāyassa āharāmāti idaṃ upajjhāyena mama ñātakānaṃ bhesajjaṃ āharathāti āṇattehi
tika-vin08t:299_1: kattabbavidhidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Iminā ca sāmaṇerādīnaṃ apaccāsāyapi parajanassa
tika-vin08t:299_2: bhesajjakaraṇaṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Vuttanayeneva pariyesitvāti iminā “bhikkhācāravattena
tika-vin08t:299_3: vā”tiādinā, “ñātisāmaṇerehi vā”tiādinā ca vuttamatthaṃ atidisati. Apaccāsīsantenāti
tika-vin08t:299_4: āgantukacorādīnaṃ karontenapi manussā nāma upakārakā hontīti attano tehi lābhaṃ apatthayantena,
tika-vin08t:299_5: paccāsāya karontassa pana vejjakammakuladūsanādinā doso hotīti adhippāyo. Evañhi
tika-vin08t:299_6: upakāre kate sāsanassa guṇaṃ ñatvā pasīdanti, saṅghassa vā upakārakā hontīti karaṇe
tika-vin08t:299_7: pana doso natthi. Keci pana “apaccāsīsantena āgantukādīnaṃ paṭikkhittapuggalānampi
tika-vin08t:299_8: dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ kattabbākattabbaṭṭhānavibhāgassa niratthakattappasaṅgato
tika-vin08t:299_9: apaccāsīsantena “sabbesampi dātuṃ kātuñca vaṭṭatī”ti ettakamattasseva vattabbato.
tika-vin08t:299_11: imissā antarāpattiyā muccanatthaṃ āgantukacorādīnaṃ anuññātānaṃ dāneneva tāya āpattiyā
tika-vin08t:300_0: 18. Teneva apaccāsīsantenapi akātabbaṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ “saddhaṃ kula”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:300_1: “Bhesajjaṃ ācikkhathā”ti vuttepi “aññamaññaṃ pana kathā kātabbā”ti idaṃ pariyāyattā
tika-vin08t:300_2: vaṭṭati. Evaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena idañcidañca gahetvā karontīti iminā pariyāyena kathentassapi
tika-vin08t:300_3: nevatthi dosoti ācariyā. Pucchantīti iminā diṭṭhadiṭṭharogīnaṃ pariyāyenapi vatvā
tika-vin08t:300_4: vicaraṇaṃ ayuttanti dasseti. Pucchitassapi pana paccāsīsantassa pariyāyakathāpi na
