tika-vin08t:300_5: vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Samullapesīti apaccāsīsanto eva aññamaññaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
tika-vin08t:300_6: Ācariyabhāgoti vinayācāraṃ akopetvā bhesajjācikkhaṇena vejjācariyabhāgo ayanti atthoti
tika-vin08t:301_1: īdisassa lābhassa uppatti nāma natthīti ‘ācariyabhāgo nāma aya’nti vuttaṃ. Vinaye
tika-vin08t:301_2: pakataññunā ācariyena labhitabbabhāgo ayanti vuttaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ. “Pupphapūjanatthāya
tika-vin08t:301_4: āharathā’tiādinā kappiyavohāravasenāti attho”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:301_6: nissaggiyamevāti āha ‘kappiyavasena gāhāpetvā’ti. ‘Amhākaṃ rūpiyaṃ na vaṭṭati, pupphapūjanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:301_7: pupphaṃ vaṭṭatī’tiādinā paṭikkhipitvā kappiyena kammena gāhāpetvāti attho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:301_8: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “kappiyavasenāti amhākaṃ pupphaṃ ānethātiādinā. ‘Pūjaṃ akāsī’ti
tika-vin08t:301_9: vuttattā sayaṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti vadantī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ. Ayamettha bhesajjakaraṇavinicchayakathālaṅkāro.
tika-vin08t:302_0: 19. Evaṃ bhesajjakaraṇavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni parittakaraṇavinicchayaṃ kathetumāha
tika-vin08t:302_1: “paritte panā”tiādi. Tattha yadi “parittaṃ karothā”ti vutte karonti, bhesajjakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:302_2: viya gihikammaṃ viya ca hotīti “na kātabba”nti vuttaṃ. “Parittaṃ bhaṇathā”ti vutte
tika-vin08t:302_3: pana dhammajjhesanattā anajjhiṭṭhenapi bhaṇitabbo dhammo, pageva ajjhiṭṭhenāti “kātabba”nti
tika-vin08t:302_4: vuttaṃ, cāletvā suttaṃ parimajjitvāti parittaṃ karontena kātabbavidhiṃ dasseti. Cāletvā
tika-vin08t:302_5: suttaṃ parimajjitvāti idaṃ vā “parittāṇaṃ ettha pavesemī”ti cittena evaṃ kate parittāṇā
tika-vin08t:302_6: ettha pavesitā nāma hotīti vuttaṃ. Vihārato…pe… dukkaṭanti idaṃ aññātake gahaṭṭhe
tika-vin08t:302_7: sandhāya vuttanti vadanti. Pādesu udakaṃ ākiritvāti idaṃ tasmiṃ dese cārittavasena
tika-vin08t:302_8: vuttaṃ. Tattha hi pāḷiyā nisinnānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pādesu rogavūpasamanādiatthāya udakaṃ
tika-vin08t:302_9: siñcitvā parittaṃ kātuṃ suttañca ṭhapetvā “parittaṃ bhaṇathā”ti vatvā gacchanti.
tika-vin08t:302_10: Evañhi kariyamāne yadi pāde apanenti, manussā taṃ “avamaṅgala”nti maññanti “rogo
tika-vin08t:303_0: Matasarīradassane viya kevale susānadassanepi idaṃ jātānaṃ sattānaṃ vayagamanaṭṭhānanti
tika-vin08t:303_1: maraṇasaññā uppajjatīti āha “sīvathikadassane…pe… maraṇassatiṃ paṭilabhissāmāti gantuṃ
tika-vin08t:303_3: vuttepi gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Etena asubhadassananti vacanamattena
tika-vin08t:303_4: lesakappaṃ katvā evaṃ gate matassa ñātakā pasīdissanti, dānaṃ dassanti, mayaṃ lābhaṃ
tika-vin08t:303_5: labhissāma, upaṭṭhākaṃ labhissāmāti asuddhacittena gantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Kammaṭṭhānasīsena
tika-vin08t:303_6: pana “maraṇassatiṃ labhissāmā”tiādinā suddhacittena pakkositepi apakkositepi gantuṃ
tika-vin08t:303_7: vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. Tālapaṇṇassa parittalekhanaṭṭhānattā parittasuttassa parittakaraṇasaññāṇattā
tika-vin08t:303_8: tāni disvā amanussā parittasaññāya apakkamantīti āha “tālapaṇṇaṃ pana parittasuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:303_9: vā hatthe vā pāde vā bandhitabba”nti.
tika-vin08t:304_0: Ettha ca ādito paṭṭhāya yāva “āṭānāṭiyaparittaṃ vā bhaṇitabba”nti ettakoyeva vinayaṭṭhakathābhato
tika-vin08t:304_1: pāḷimuttaparittakaraṇavinicchayo, na pana tato paraṃ vutto, tasmā “idha panā”tiādiko
tika-vin08t:304_2: kathāmaggo samantapāsādikāyaṃ natthi, tīsu ṭīkāsupi taṃsaṃvaṇṇanānayo natthi, tathāpi
tika-vin08t:304_3: so suttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatovāti taṃ dassetuṃ “idha pana āṭānāṭiyasuttassa parikammaṃ
tika-vin08t:304_4: veditabba”ntiādimāha. Tattha idhāti “āṭānāṭiyaparittaṃ vā bhaṇitabba”nti vacane.
tika-vin08t:304_5: Panāti visesatthe nipāto. Dīghanikāye pāthikavagge āgatassa āṭānāṭiyaparittassa parikammaṃ
tika-vin08t:304_6: evaṃ veditabbanti yojanā. Yadi paṭhamameva na vattabbaṃ, atha kiṃ kātabbanti āha
tika-vin08t:305_0: Piṭṭhaṃ vā maṃsaṃ vāti vā-saddo aniyamattho, tena macchakhaṇḍapūvakhajjakādayo saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin08t:305_2: labhanti. Haritūpalittanti allagomayalittaṃ. Idañhi porāṇakacārittaṃ bhūmivisuddhakaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t:305_3: Parisuddhaṃ…pe… nisīditabbanti iminā parittakārakassa bhikkhuno mettākaruṇāvasena
tika-vin08t:305_4: cittavisuddhipi icchitabbāti dasseti. Evañhi sati upari vakkhamānaubhayato rakkhāsaṃvidhānena
tika-vin08t:305_5: sameti. Ṭīkāyaṃ pana “sarīrasuddhipi icchitabbāti dassetī”ti vuttaṃ. Tadetaṃ vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:305_6: Na hi “kāyasuddhimattena amanussānaṃ piyo hotī”ti vuttaṃ, mettāvaseneva pana vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:305_7: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “mettāya, bhikkhave, cetovimuttiyā…pe… ekādasānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhā.
tika-vin08t:305_8: Katame ekādasa? Sukhaṃ supati, sukhaṃ paṭibujjhati, na pāpakaṃ supinaṃ passati, manussānaṃ
tika-vin08t:306_0: Parittakārako…pe… samparivāritenāti idaṃ parittakaraṇo bāhirato ārakkhāsaṃvidhānaṃ,
tika-vin08t:306_1: “metta…pe… vattabba”nti abbhantarato ārakkhāsaṃvidhānaṃ, evaṃ ubhayato rakkhāsaṃvidhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:306_2: hoti. Evañhi amanussā parittakārakassa antarāyaṃ kātuṃ na visahanti. Maṅgalakathā
tika-vin08t:306_3: vattabbāti amanussānaṃ tosanatthāya paṇṇākāraṃ katvā mahāmaṅgalakathā kathetabbā.
tika-vin08t:306_4: Evaṃ upari vakkhamānena “tuyhaṃ paṇṇākāratthāya mahāmaṅgalakathā vuttā”ti vacanena
tika-vin08t:306_5: sameti. Ṭīkāyaṃ pana “pubbupacāravasena vattabbā”ti vuttaṃ. Sabbasannipātoti tasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:306_6: vihāre tasmiṃ gāmakkhette sabbesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sannipāto ghosetabbo “cetiyaṅgaṇe sabbehi
tika-vin08t:306_7: sannipatitabba”nti. Anāgantuṃnāma na labhatīti amanusso buddhāṇābhayena rājāṇābhayena
tika-vin08t:306_8: anāgantuṃ na labhati catunnaṃ mahārājūnaṃ āṇāṭṭhāniyattā. Gahitakāpadesena amanussova
tika-vin08t:306_9: pucchito hotīti “amanussagahitako ‘tvaṃ ko nāmo’ti pucchitabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Mālāgandhādīsūti
tika-vin08t:306_10: mālāgandhādipūjāsu. Āsanapūjāyāti cetiye buddhāsanapūjāya. Piṇḍapāteti bhikkhusaṅghassa
tika-vin08t:306_11: piṇḍapātadāne. Evaṃ vatthuppadesena cetanā vuttā, tasmā pattidānaṃ sambhavati.
tika-vin08t:307_0: Devatānanti yakkhasenāpatīnaṃ. Vuttañhi āṭānāṭiyasutte “imesaṃ yakkhānaṃ mahāyakkhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:307_1: senāpatīnaṃ mahāsenāpatīnaṃ ujjhāpetabba”ntiādi. Āṭāti dabbimukhasakuṇā. Te āṭā nadanti
tika-vin08t:307_2: etthāti āṭānādaṃ, devanagaraṃ, āṭānāde kataṃ āṭānādiyaṃ, suttaṃ. Ṭīkāyaṃ “parittaṃ
tika-vin08t:307_3: bhaṇitabbanti etthāpi ‘mettacittaṃ purecārikaṃ katvā’ti ca ‘maṅgalakathā vattabbā’ti
tika-vin08t:307_4: ca ‘vihārassa upavane’ti ca evamādi sabbaṃ gihīnaṃ parittakaraṇe vuttaṃ parikammaṃ
tika-vin08t:307_5: kātabbamevā”ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ sati aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “etaṃ tāva gihīnaṃ parikamma”nti vatvā
tika-vin08t:307_6: “sace pana bhikkhū”tiādinā visesatthajotakena pana-saddena saha vuccamānaṃ “idaṃ
tika-vin08t:307_7: bhikkhūnaṃ parikamma”nti vacanaṃ niratthakaṃ viya hoti. Avisese hi sati bhedo kātabbo
tika-vin08t:307_8: na siyā. Bhikkhūnañca yathāvuttāva bāhirārakkhā dukkarā hoti, tasmā gihīnaṃ parittakaraṇe
tika-vin08t:307_9: vuttaparikamme asampajjamānepi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti no mati.
tika-vin08t:308_0: Idaṃ pana idha āgataṃ āṭānāṭiyasuttaparikammaṃ sutvā “idaṃ suttaṃ amanussānaṃ amanāpaṃ,
tika-vin08t:308_1: sajjhāyantassa parittaṃ karontassa amanussā antarāyaṃ kareyyu”nti maññamānā porāṇā
tika-vin08t:308_2: catūhi mahārājehi ārocitaṃ sabbaññubuddhena desitaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ dīghanikāye āgataṃ
tika-vin08t:308_3: āṭānāṭiyasuttaṃ pahāya mūlasuttato gāthāchakkameva gahetvā avasesaṃ sabbaṃ suttaṃ
tika-vin08t:308_4: ṭhapetvā aññagāthāyo pakkhipitvā “āṭānāṭiyaparitta”nti ṭhapesuṃ, tampi parittaṃ amūlabhūtattā
tika-vin08t:308_5: ekenākārena dhāretuṃ asakkontā keci saṃkhittena dhārenti, keci vitthārena, keci ekaccā
tika-vin08t:308_6: gāthāyo pakkhipanti, keci nikkhipanti, keci bhikkhū taṃmissakaparittampi maṅgalakaraṇakālādīsu
tika-vin08t:308_7: vattumavisahantā taṃ ṭhapetvā aññasuttāniyeva bhaṇanti, sabbametaṃ ayuttaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin08t:308_8: Kasmā? Cattāropi mahārājāno imaṃ āṭānāṭiyaṃ rakkhaṃ saṃvidahamānā buddhasāsane amanussānaṃ
tika-vin08t:308_9: pasādāya, catassannaṃ parisānaṃ aviheṭhanāya eva saṃvidahiṃsu, na aññena kāraṇena.
tika-vin08t:308_10: Vuttañhi tattha “tattha santi uḷārā yakkhānivāsino, ye imasmiṃ bhagavato pāvacane
tika-vin08t:308_11: appasannā, tesaṃ pasādāya uggaṇhātu bhante bhagavā āṭānāṭiyaṃ rakkhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t:308_12: bhikkhunīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ upāsikānaṃ guttiyā rakkhāya avihiṃsāya phāsuvihārāyā”ti.
tika-vin08t:309_0: Sammāsambuddhenapi imassa suttassa nigamane “uggaṇhātha bhikkhave āṭānāṭiyaṃ rakkhaṃ,
tika-vin08t:309_1: pariyāpuṇātha bhikkhave āṭānāṭiyaṃ rakkhaṃ, dhāretha bhikkhave āṭānāṭiyaṃ rakkhaṃ,
tika-vin08t:309_2: atthasaṃhitā bhikkhave āṭānāṭiyā rakkhā bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ upāsikānaṃ
tika-vin08t:309_3: guttiyā rakkhāya avihiṃsāya phāsuvihārāyā”ti bhikkhūnaṃ dhāraṇaṃ uyyojitaṃ ānisaṃsañca
tika-vin08t:309_4: pakāsitaṃ. Aṭṭhakathācariyehi ca “buddhabhāsite ekakkharampi ekapadampi apanetabbaṃ
tika-vin08t:309_5: nāma natthī”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā catūhi mahārājehi saṃvidahitaṃ sammāsambuddhena āhaccabhāsitaṃ
tika-vin08t:309_6: tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhaṃ pakatiāṭānāṭiyasuttameva dhāretuṃ sajjhāyituñca yuttaṃ, na
tika-vin08t:309_7: bhagavatā abhāsitaṃ tisso saṅgītiyo anāruḷhaṃ missakasuttanti. Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:309_8: āgataṃ idaṃ āṭānāṭiyaparittaparikammaṃ pana pakatisajjhāyanavācanādiṃ sandhāya aṭṭhakathācariyehi
tika-vin08t:309_9: na vuttaṃ, atha kho gahaṭṭhaṃ vā pabbajitaṃ vā amanussehi gahitakāle mocāpanatthāya
tika-vin08t:309_10: lokiyehi mantaṃ viya bhaṇanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vuttañhi tattha “amanussagahitako
tika-vin08t:310_0: Āṭānāṭiyā rakkhā ca nāma na sakalasuttaṃ, atha kho “vipassissa ca namatthū”ti padaṃ
tika-vin08t:310_1: ādiṃ katvā catunnaṃ mahārājūnaṃ vasena catukkhattuṃ āgataṃ “jinaṃ vandāma gotama”nti
tika-vin08t:310_2: padaṃ pariyosānaṃ katvā vuttasuttekadesoyeva. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? “Atha kho vessavaṇo
tika-vin08t:310_3: mahārājā bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā imaṃ āṭānāṭiyaṃ rakkhaṃ abhāsī”ti ārabhitvā
tika-vin08t:310_4: yathāvuttasuttekadesassa avasāne “ayaṃ kho mārisā āṭānāṭiyā rakkhā”ti niyyātitattā.
tika-vin08t:310_5: Tasmā yathā nāma byagghādayo attano bhakkhaṃ vilumpantānaṃ balavaduṭṭhacittā bhavanti,
tika-vin08t:310_6: evaṃ attanā gahitamanussaṃ mocāpentānaṃ amanussā paduṭṭhacittā honti. Iti tathā mocāpetuṃ
tika-vin08t:310_7: āraddhakāle bhikkhūnaṃ parissayavinodanatthaṃ imaṃ āṭānāṭiyaparittaparikammaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyehi
tika-vin08t:311_0: 20. Anāmaṭṭhapiṇḍapātoti ettha amasiyitthāti āmaṭṭho, na āmaṭṭho anāmaṭṭho. Piṇḍaṃ
tika-vin08t:311_1: piṇḍaṃ hutvā patatīti piṇḍapāto. Anāmaṭṭho ca so piṇḍapāto cāti tathā, aggahitaaggo,
tika-vin08t:311_2: aparibhutto piṇḍapātoti attho. Sacepi kahāpaṇagghanako hotīti iminā dāyakehi bahubyañjanena
tika-vin08t:311_3: sampādetvā sakkaccaṃ dinnabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Tena vuttaṃ “saddhādeyyavinipātanaṃ natthī”ti,
tika-vin08t:311_4: evaṃ sakkaccaṃ saddhāya dinnaṃ mahagghabhojanampi mātāpitūnaṃ datvā saddhādeyyavinipātanaṃ
tika-vin08t:311_5: nāma na hoti, pageva appagghabhojaneti adhippāyo. Mātādipañcakaṃyeva vatvā bhesajjakaraṇe
tika-vin08t:311_6: viya aparesampi dasannaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti avuttattā aññesaṃ ñātakānampi pesetvā dātuṃ
tika-vin08t:311_7: na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ, “vihāraṃ sampattassa pana yassa kassaci āgantukassa vā”iccādivakkhamānattā
tika-vin08t:311_8: vihāraṃ sampattānaṃ ñātakānampi āgantukasāmaññena dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti ca. Thālaketi saṅghike
tika-vin08t:311_9: kaṃsādimaye thālake. Pattopi ettha saṅgayhati. Na vaṭṭatīti iminā dukkaṭanti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:311_10: Dāmarikacorassāti rajjaṃ patthentassa pākaṭacorassa. Adīyamānepi “na dentī”ti kujjhantīti sambandho.
tika-vin08t:312_0: Āmisassa dhammassa ca alābhena attano parassa ca antare sambhavantassa chiddassa
tika-vin08t:312_1: vivarassa paṭisantharaṇaṃ pidahanaṃ paṭisanthāro. So pana dhammāmisavasena duvidho.
tika-vin08t:312_2: Tattha āmisapaṭisanthāraṃ sandhāya “kassa kātabbo, kassa na kātabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Āgantukassa
tika-vin08t:312_3: vā…pe… kātabboyevāti vuttamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “āgantukaṃ tāvā”tiādimāha. Khīṇaparibbayanti
tika-vin08t:312_4: iminā agatibhāvaṃ karuṇāṭṭhānatañca dasseti. Tena ca tabbidhurānaṃ samiddhānaṃ āgantukattepi
tika-vin08t:312_5: dātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ hoti. “Apaccāsīsantenā”ti vatvā paccāsīsanappakāraṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin08t:312_6: “manussā nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ananuññātānaṃ pana apaccāsīsantenapi dātuṃ na vaṭṭati
tika-vin08t:312_7: saddhādeyyavinipātattā, paccāsāya pana sati kuladūsanampi hoti. Ubbāsetvāti samantato
tika-vin08t:312_8: tiyojanaṃ vilumpante manusse palāpetvā. Varapotthakacittattharaṇanti anekappakāraṃ
tika-vin08t:317_0: 21. Evaṃ bhesajjādivinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni viññattivinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “viññattīti
tika-vin08t:317_1: yācanā”tiādimāha. Tattha viññāpanā viññatti, “iminā no attho”ti viññāpanā, yācanāti
tika-vin08t:317_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha “viññattīti yācanā”ti. Tatra viññattiyaṃ ayaṃ mayā vakkhamāno
tika-vin08t:317_3: vinicchayo veditabboti yojanā. Mūlacchejjāyāti parasantakabhāvato mocetvā attano
tika-vin08t:317_4: eva santakakaraṇavasena. Evaṃ yācato aññātakaviññattidukkaṭañceva dāsapaṭiggahadukkaṭañca
tika-vin08t:317_5: hoti “dāsidāsapaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hotī”ti vacanaṃ nissāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ paṭikkhittattā.
tika-vin08t:317_6: Ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānato pana dāsaṃ mūlacchejjāya yācantassa sādiyanavaseneva dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin08t:317_7: Sakakammanti pāṇavadhakammaṃ. Idañca pāṇātipātadosaparihārāya vuttaṃ, na viññattiparihārāya.
tika-vin08t:317_8: Aniyametvāpi na yācitabbāti sāmīcidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, suddhacittena pana hatthakammaṃ
tika-vin08t:317_9: yācantassa āpatti nāma natthi. Yadicchakaṃ kārāpetuṃ vaṭṭatīti “hatthakammaṃ yācāmi,
tika-vin08t:317_10: dethā”tiādinā ayācitvāpi vaṭṭati, sakiccapasutampi evaṃ kārāpentassa viññatti natthi
tika-vin08t:318_0: Sabbakappiyabhāvadīpanatthanti sabbaso kappiyabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Mūlaṃ dethāti vattuṃ
tika-vin08t:318_1: vaṭṭatīti “mūlaṃ dassāmā”ti paṭhamaṃ vuttattā viññatti vā “mūla”nti vacanassa kappiyākappiyavatthusāmaññavacanattā
tika-vin08t:318_2: akappiyavacanaṃ vā niṭṭhitabhatikiccānaṃ dāpanato akappiyavatthusādiyanaṃ vā na hotīti
tika-vin08t:318_3: katvā vuttaṃ. Mūlacchejjāya vāti idaṃ idha thambhādīnaṃ dāsidāsādibhāvābhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:319_0: 22. Na kevalañca…pe… cīvarādīni kārāpetukāmenātiādīsu cīvaraṃ kārāpetukāmassa aññātakaappavāritatantavāyehi
tika-vin08t:319_2: yathārahaṃ pācittiyadukkaṭāni hontīti veditabbaṃ. Akappiyakahāpaṇādi na dātabbanti
tika-vin08t:319_3: kappiyamukhena laddhampi tattha kammakaraṇatthāya imassa kahāpaṇaṃ dehīti vatvā “dātuṃ
tika-vin08t:319_4: vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Pubbe katakammassa dāpane kiñcāpi doso na dissati, tathāpi asāruppamevāti
tika-vin08t:319_5: vadanti. Katakammatthāyapi kappiyavohārena pariyāyato bhatiṃ dāpentassa natthi doso,
tika-vin08t:319_6: sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “akappiyakahāpaṇādi na dātabbanti kiñcāpi akappiyakahāpaṇādiṃ
tika-vin08t:319_7: asādiyantena kappiyavohārato dātuṃ vaṭṭati, tathāpi sāruppaṃ na hoti, manussā ca
tika-vin08t:319_8: etassa santakaṃ kiñci atthīti viheṭhetabbaṃ maññantīti akappiyakahāpaṇādidānaṃ paṭikkhitta”nti
tika-vin08t:319_9: vuttaṃ. Tatheva pācetvāti hatthakammavaseneva pācetvā. “Kiṃ bhante”ti ettakepi pucchite
tika-vin08t:319_10: yadatthāya paviṭṭho, taṃ kathetuṃ labhati pucchitapañhattā.
tika-vin08t:320_0: 23. Vattanti cārittaṃ, āpatti pana na hotīti adhippāyo. Kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā paṭiggahetabbānīti
tika-vin08t:320_1: sākhāya makkhikabījanena paṇṇādichede bījagāmakopanassa ceva tattha laggarajādiappaṭiggahitakassa
tika-vin08t:320_2: ca parihāratthāya vuttaṃ, tadubhayāsaṅkāya asati tathā akaraṇe doso natthi. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:320_3: pana “kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā paṭiggahetabbānīti sākhāya laggarajasmiṃ patte patitepi
tika-vin08t:320_4: sākhaṃ chinditvā khāditukāmatāyapi sati sukhaparibhogatthaṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Nadiyādīsu
tika-vin08t:320_5: udakassa apariggahitattā “āharāti vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Gehato…pe… neva vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:320_6: pariggahitudakattā viññattiyā dukkaṭaṃ hotīti adhippāyo. “Na āhaṭaṃ paribhuñjitu”nti
tika-vin08t:320_7: vacanato viññattiyā āpannaṃ dukkaṭaṃ desetvāpi taṃ vatthuṃ paribhuñjantassa paribhoge
tika-vin08t:320_8: paribhoge dukkaṭameva, pañcannampi sahadhammikānaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:321_0: “Alajjīhi pana bhikkhūhi vā sāmaṇerehi vā hatthakammaṃ na kāretabba”nti sāmaññato
tika-vin08t:321_1: vuttattā attano atthāya yaṃ kiñci hatthakammaṃ kāretuṃ na vaṭṭati. Yaṃ pana alajjī
tika-vin08t:321_2: nivāriyamānopi bījanādiṃ karoti, tattha doso natthi, cetiyakammādīni pana tehi kārāpetuṃ
tika-vin08t:321_3: vaṭṭatīti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “alajjīhi…pe… na kāretabbanti
tika-vin08t:321_4: idaṃ uttaribhaṅgādhikārattā ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, bāhiraparibhogesu pana
tika-vin08t:321_5: alajjīhipi hatthakammaṃ kāretuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha ca “alajjīhi sāmaṇerehī”ti
tika-vin08t:321_6: vuttattā “sañcicca āpattiṃ āpajjatī”ti alajjilakkhaṇaṃ ukkaṭṭhavasena upasampanne
tika-vin08t:321_7: paṭicca upalakkhaṇato vuttanti taṃlakkhaṇavirahitānaṃ sāmaṇerādīnaṃ liṅgatthenagotrabhupariyosānānaṃ
tika-vin08t:322_0: 24. Goṇaṃ pana…pe… āharāpentassa dukkaṭanti viññattikkhaṇe viññattipaccayā, paṭilābhakkhaṇe
tika-vin08t:322_1: goṇānaṃ sādiyanapaccayā ca dukkaṭaṃ. Goṇañhi attano atthāya aviññattiyā laddhampi
tika-vin08t:322_2: sādituṃ na vaṭṭati “hatthigavāssavaḷavapaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hotī”ti vuttattā. Tenevāha
tika-vin08t:322_3: “ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānatopi mūlacchejjāya yācituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti. Ettha ca viññattidukkaṭābhāvepi
tika-vin08t:322_4: akappiyavatthuyācanepi paṭiggahaṇepi dukkaṭameva. Rakkhitvāti corādiupaddavato rakkhitvā.
tika-vin08t:322_5: Jaggitvāti tiṇaannādīhi posetvā. Na sampaṭicchitabbanti attano atthāya gosādiyanassa
tika-vin08t:323_0: 25. Ñātakapavāritaṭṭhāne pana vaṭṭatīti sakaṭassa sampaṭicchitabbattā mūlacchejjavasena
tika-vin08t:323_1: yācituṃ vaṭṭati. Tāvakālikaṃ vaṭṭatīti ubhayatthāpi vaṭṭatīti atthoti vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:323_2: vuttaṃ. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “sakaṭaṃ dethāti…pe… na vaṭṭatīti mūlacchejjavasena
tika-vin08t:323_3: sakaṭaṃ dethāti vattuṃ na vaṭṭati. Tāvakālikaṃ vaṭṭatīti tāvakālikaṃ katvā sabbattha
tika-vin08t:323_4: yācituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Vāsiādīni puggalikānipi vaṭṭantīti āha “esa nayo vāsī”tiādi.
tika-vin08t:323_5: Valliādīsu ca parapariggahitesu esa nayoti yojetabbaṃ. Garubhaṇḍappahonakesuyevāti
tika-vin08t:323_6: idaṃ viññattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, adinnādāne pana tiṇasalākaṃ upādāya parapariggahitaṃ
tika-vin08t:323_7: theyyacittena gaṇhato avahāro eva, bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo. Valliādīsūti ettha ādi-saddena
tika-vin08t:323_8: pāḷiāgatānaṃ veḷumuñjapabbajatiṇamattikānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tattha ca yasmiṃ padese
tika-vin08t:323_9: haritālajātihiṅgulikādi appakampi mahagghaṃ hoti, tattha taṃ tālapakkappamāṇato ūnampi
tika-vin08t:324_0: 26. Sāti viññatti. Parikathādīsu “senāsanaṃ sambādha”ntiādinā pariyāyena kathanaṃ
tika-vin08t:324_1: parikathā nāma. Ujukameva akathetvā “bhikkhūnaṃ kiṃ pāsādo na vaṭṭatī”tiādinā adhippāyo
tika-vin08t:324_2: yathā vibhūto hoti, evaṃ kathanaṃ obhāso nāma. Senāsanādiatthaṃ bhūmiparikammādikaraṇavasena
tika-vin08t:324_3: paccayuppādāya nimittakaraṇaṃ nimittakammaṃ nāma. Tīsu paccayesu viññattiādayo dassitā,
tika-vin08t:324_4: gilānapaccaye pana kathanti āha “gilānapaccaye panā”tiādi. Tathā uppannaṃ pana bhesajjaṃ
tika-vin08t:324_5: roge vūpasante bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, na vaṭṭatīti? Tattha vinayadharā “bhagavatā rogasīsena
tika-vin08t:324_6: paribhogassa dvāraṃ dinnaṃ, tasmā arogakālepi bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, āpatti na hotī”ti
tika-vin08t:324_7: vadanti, suttantikā pana “kiñcāpi āpatti na hoti, ājīvaṃ pana kopeti, tasmā sallekhapaṭipattiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:324_8: ṭhitassa na vaṭṭati, sallekhaṃ kopetī”ti vadantīti.
tika-vin08t:329_0: 27. Evaṃ viññattivinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni kulasaṅgahavinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “kulasaṅgaho”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t:329_1: Tattha saṅgaṇhanaṃ saṅgaho, kulānaṃ saṅgaho kulasaṅgaho, paccayadāyakādīnaṃ gihīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:329_2: anuggahakaraṇaṃ. Anuggahattho hettha saṅgaha-saddo yathā “puttadārassa saṅgaho”ti.
tika-vin08t:330_0: 28. Tattha koṭṭananti sayaṃ chindanaṃ. Koṭṭāpananti “imaṃ chindā”ti aññesaṃ chedāpanaṃ.
tika-vin08t:330_1: Āḷiyā bandhananti yathā gacchamūle udakaṃ santiṭṭhati, tathā samantato bandhanaṃ.
tika-vin08t:330_2: Udakassāti akappiyaudakassa “kappiyaudakasiñcana”nti visuṃ vakkhamānattā, tañca ārāmādiatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:330_3: ropane akappiyavohāresupi kappiyavohāresupi kappiyaudakasiñcanādi vaṭṭatīti vakkhamānattā
tika-vin08t:330_4: idhāpi vibhāgaṃ katvā kappiyaudakasiñcanādi visuṃ dassitaṃ. Ettha ca katamaṃ akappiyaudakaṃ,
tika-vin08t:330_5: katamaṃ pana kappiyaudakanti? Sappāṇakaṃ akappiyaudakaṃ, appāṇakaṃ kappiyaudakanti.
tika-vin08t:330_6: Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce, “yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ tiṇaṃ vā mattikaṃ
tika-vin08t:330_7: vā siñceyya vā siñcāpeyya vā pācittiya”nti vacanato. Yathā koṭṭanakhaṇanādikāyikakiriyāpi
tika-vin08t:330_10: kappiyaudakasiñcanameva dasseti. Akappiyavohāre koṭṭanakhaṇanādivasena sayaṃ karaṇassapi
tika-vin08t:330_11: kathaṃ saṅgahoti? Akappiyanti vohariyatīti akappiyavohāroti akappiyabhūtaṃ karaṇakārāpanādi
tika-vin08t:330_12: sabbameva saṅgahitaṃ, na pana akappiyavacanamattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kappiyavohārepi
tika-vin08t:330_13: eseva nayo. Sukkhamātikāya ujukaraṇanti iminā purāṇapaṇṇādīnaṃ haraṇampi saṅgahitanti
tika-vin08t:330_14: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kudālādīni bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā ṭhānato hatthena gahetvā ṭhānameva pākaṭataranti “obhāso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:331_0: 29. Mahāpaccarivādaṃ patiṭṭhāpetukāmo pacchā vadati. Vanatthāyāti idaṃ keci “vatatthāyā”ti
tika-vin08t:331_1: paṭhanti, tesaṃ vatiatthāyāti attho. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyampi tatheva vuttaṃ, “ārāmaropā
tika-vin08t:331_2: vanaropā, ye narā setukārakā”ti vacanato pana taṃ vicāretabbaṃ. Akappiyavohārepi
tika-vin08t:331_3: ekaccaṃ vaṭṭatīti dassetuṃ “na kevalañca sesa”ntiādimāha. Yaṃ kiñci mātikanti sukkhamātikaṃ
tika-vin08t:331_4: vā asukkhamātikaṃ vā. Kappiyaudakaṃ siñcitunti iminā “kappiyaudakaṃ siñcathā”ti vattumpi
tika-vin08t:331_5: vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Sayaṃ ropetumpi vaṭṭatīti iminā “ropehī”ti vattumpi vaṭṭatītipi siddhaṃ.
tika-vin08t:332_1: dukkaṭaṃ. Akappiyavohārenāti “idaṃ khaṇa, idaṃ ropehī”ti akappiyavohārena. Dukkaṭamevāti
tika-vin08t:333_0: Sabbatthāti kulasaṅgahaparibhogaārāmādiatthāya ropite. Dukkaṭampīti na kevalaṃ pācittiyameva.
tika-vin08t:333_1: Kappiyenāti kappiyaudakena. Tesaṃyeva dvinnanti kulasaṅgahaparibhogānaṃ. Dukkaṭanti
tika-vin08t:333_2: kulasaṅgahatthāya sayaṃ siñcane, kappiyavohārena vā akappiyavohārena vā siñcāpane
tika-vin08t:333_3: dukkaṭaṃ, paribhogatthāya sayaṃ siñcane, akappiyavohārena siñcāpane ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin08t:333_4: Payogabahulatāyāti sayaṃ karaṇe, kāyapayogassa kārāpane vacīpayogassa bahuttena.
tika-vin08t:333_5: Āpattibahulatā veditabbāti ettha sayaṃ siñcane dhārāpacchedagaṇanāya āpattigaṇanā
tika-vin08t:333_6: veditabbā. Siñcāpane pana punappunaṃ āṇāpentassa vācāya vācāya āpatti, sakiṃ āṇattassa bahusiñcane ekāva.
tika-vin08t:334_0: Ocinane dukkaṭapācittiyānīti kulasaṅgahapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ, bhūtagāmapātabyatāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin08t:334_1: Aññatthāti vatthupūjādiatthāya ocinane. Sakiṃ āṇattoti akappiyavohārena āṇatto. Pācittiyamevāti
tika-vin08t:334_2: akappiyavohārena āṇattattā bhūtagāmasikkhāpadena pācittiyaṃ. Kappiyavacanena pana
tika-vin08t:335_0: 31. Ganthanena nibbattaṃ dāmaṃ ganthimaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. Na vaṭṭatīti kulasaṅgahatthāya,
tika-vin08t:335_1: vatthupūjādiatthāya vā vuttanayena karontassa kārāpentassa ca dukkaṭanti attho. Vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:335_2: vatthupūjādiatthāya vaṭṭati, kulasaṅgahatthāya pana kappiyavohārena kārāpentassapi
tika-vin08t:335_4: baddhakaṇṭakesu pupphāni vinivijjhitvā ṭhapentīti sambandho. Uparūpari vijjhitvā
tika-vin08t:335_6: vuttaṃ sabbameva sandhāya “taṃ atioḷārikamevā”ti vuttaṃ, sabbattha karaṇe, akappiyavohārena
tika-vin08t:335_7: kārāpane ca dukkaṭamevāti attho. Pupphavijjhanatthaṃ kaṇṭakampi bandhituṃ na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:335_8: imassa upalakkhaṇattā pupphadāmolambakādiatthāya rajjubandhanādipi na vaṭṭatīti keci
tika-vin08t:335_9: vadanti. Aññe pana “pupphavijjhanatthaṃ kaṇṭakanti visesitattā tadatthaṃ kaṇṭakameva
tika-vin08t:335_10: bandhituṃ na vaṭṭati, tañca aṭṭhakathāpamāṇenā”ti vadanti, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:335_11: Pupphapaṭicchakaṃ nāma dantādīhi kataṃ pupphādhānaṃ. Etampi nāgadantakampi sachiddameva
tika-vin08t:335_12: gahetabbaṃ. Asokapiṇḍiyāti asokasākhānaṃ, pupphānaṃ vā samūhe. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:335_13: pana “asokapiṇḍiyāti asokapupphamañjarikāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Dhammarajju nāma cetiyaṃ vā
tika-vin08t:335_14: bodhiṃ vā pupphappavesanatthaṃ āvijjhitvā bandharajju. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “dhammarajju
tika-vin08t:335_15: nāma cetiyādīni parikkhipitvā tesañca rajjuyā ca antarā pupphappavesanatthāya bandharajju.
tika-vin08t:335_16: Sithilavaṭṭitāya vā vaṭṭiyā abbhantare pupphappavesanatthāya evaṃ bandhātipi vadantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:336_0: Matthakadāmanti dhammāsanādimatthake palambakadāmaṃ. Tesaṃyevāti uppalādīnaṃ eva.
tika-vin08t:336_1: Vākena vāti pupphanāḷaṃ phāletvā pupphena ekābaddhaṭṭhitavākena daṇḍena ca ekābaddheneva.
tika-vin08t:336_2: Etena pupphaṃ bījagāmasaṅgahaṃ na gacchati pañcasu bījesu apaviṭṭhattā paṇṇaṃ viya,
tika-vin08t:336_3: tasmā kappiyaṃ akārāpetvāpi vikopane doso natthi. Yañca chinnassapi makuḷassa vikasanaṃ,
tika-vin08t:336_4: tampi atitaruṇassa abhāvā vuḍḍhilakkhaṇaṃ na hoti, pariṇatassa pana makuḷassa pattānaṃ
tika-vin08t:336_5: sinehe pariyādānaṃ gate visuṃbhāvo eva vikāso, teneva chinnamakuḷavikāso achinnamakuḷavikāsato
tika-vin08t:336_6: parihīno, milātaniyutto vā dissati. Yañca milātassa udakasaññoge amilānatāpajjanaṃ,
tika-vin08t:336_7: tampi tambulapaṇṇādīsu samānaṃ vuḍḍhilakkhaṇaṃ na hoti. Pāḷiaṭṭhakathāsu ca na katthaci
tika-vin08t:336_8: pupphānaṃ kappiyakaraṇaṃ āgataṃ, tasmā pupphaṃ sabbathā abījamevāti viññāyati, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:337_0: “Pasibbake viyā”ti vuttattā pupphaṃ pasibbake vā pasibbakasadisaṃ bandhe yattha katthaci
tika-vin08t:337_1: cīvare vā pakkhipituṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “khandhe ṭhapitakāsāvassāti
tika-vin08t:337_2: khandhe ṭhapitasaṅghāṭiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tañhi tathābandhituṃ sakkā bhaveyya. Iminā
tika-vin08t:337_3: ca aññampi tādisaṃ kāsāvaṃ vā vatthaṃ vā vuttanayena bandhitvā tattha pupphāni pakkhipituṃ
tika-vin08t:337_4: vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ. Aṃsabhaṇḍikapasibbake pakkhittasadisattā veṭhimaṃ nāma na jātaṃ,
tika-vin08t:337_5: tasmā sithilabandhassa antarantarā pakkhipitumpi vaṭṭatīti vadantī”ti vuttaṃ. Heṭṭhā
tika-vin08t:337_6: daṇḍakaṃ pana bandhituṃ na vaṭṭatīti rajjuādīhi bandhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, pupphasseva
tika-vin08t:338_0: Pupphapaṭe ca daṭṭhabbanti pupphapaṭaṃ karontassa dīghato pupphadāmassa haraṇapaccāharaṇavasena
tika-vin08t:338_1: pūraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tiriyato haraṇaṃ pana vāyimaṃ nāma hoti, na purimaṃ. “Purimaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:338_2: atikkāmetī”ti sāmaññato vuttattā purimaṃ pupphakoṭiṃ phusāpetvā vā aphusāpetvā vā
tika-vin08t:338_3: parikkhipanavasena atikkāmentassa āpattiyeva. Bandhituṃ vaṭṭatīti puppharahitāya
tika-vin08t:338_4: suttavākakoṭiyā bandhituṃ vaṭṭati. Ekavāraṃ haritvā parikkhipitvāti idaṃ pubbe vuttacetiyādiparikkhepaṃ
tika-vin08t:338_5: pupphapaṭakaraṇañca sandhāya vuttaṃ, tasmā cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā parikkhipantena ekavāraṃ
tika-vin08t:338_6: parikkhipitvā purimaṭṭhānaṃ sampatte aññassa dātabbaṃ, tenapi ekavāraṃ parikkhipitvā
tika-vin08t:338_7: tatheva kātabbaṃ. Pupphapaṭaṃ karontena ca haritvā aññassa dātabbaṃ, tenapi tatheva
tika-vin08t:338_8: kātabbaṃ. Sacepi dveyeva bhikkhū ubhosu passesu ṭhatvā pariyāyena haranti, vaṭṭatiyevāti vadanti.
tika-vin08t:339_0: Parehi pūritanti dīghato pasāritaṃ. Vāyitunti tiriyato harituṃ, taṃ pana ekavārampi
tika-vin08t:339_1: na labhati. Pupphāni ṭhapentenāti aganthitāni pākatikapupphāni aññamaññaṃ phusāpetvāpi
tika-vin08t:339_2: ṭhapentena. Pupphadāmaṃ pana pūjanatthāya bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapentena phusāpetvā vā aphusāpetvā
tika-vin08t:339_3: vā diguṇaṃ katvā ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin08t:340_0: 32. Ghaṭikadāmaolambakoti heṭṭhābhāge ghaṭikākārayutto, dārughaṭikākāro vā olambako.
tika-vin08t:340_3: vuttaṃ, ekekaṃ pana dāmaṃ nikkhantasuttakoṭiyāva bandhitvā olambituṃ vaṭṭati, pupphadāmadvayaṃ
tika-vin08t:340_4: saṅghaṭitukāmenapi nikkhantasuttakoṭiyāva suttakoṭiṃ saṅghaṭituṃ vaṭṭati. Aḍḍhacandākārena
tika-vin08t:340_6: pūretvā parikkhipanaṃ, teneva taṃ purime paviṭṭhaṃ, tasmā etampi aḍḍhacandākāraṃ
tika-vin08t:340_7: punappunaṃ haraṇapaccāharaṇavasena pūretuṃ na vaṭṭati. Ekavāraṃ pana aḍḍhacandākārakaraṇe
tika-vin08t:340_8: mālāguṇaṃ harituṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Pupphadāmakaraṇanti ettha suttakoṭiyaṃ gahetvāpi
tika-vin08t:340_9: ekato kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Suttamayaṃ geṇḍukaṃ nāma, geṇḍukakharapattadāmānaṃ
tika-vin08t:340_10: paṭikkhittattā celādīhi katadāmampi na vaṭṭati akappiyānulomattāti vadanti. Parasantakaṃ
tika-vin08t:340_11: deti, dukkaṭamevāti vissāsaggāhena parasantakaṃ gahetvā dentaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Thullaccayanti
tika-vin08t:341_0: 33. Tañca kho vatthupūjanatthāyāti mātāpitūnampi pupphaṃ dentena vatthupūjanatthāyeva
tika-vin08t:341_1: dātabbanti dasseti. “Maṇḍanatthāya pana sivaliṅgādipūjanatthāyā”ti ettakameva vuttattā
tika-vin08t:341_2: “imaṃ vikkiṇitvā jīvissantī”ti mātāpitūnaṃ vaṭṭati, sesañātakānaṃ tāvakālikameva
tika-vin08t:341_3: dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Kassacipīti ñātakassa vā aññātakassa vā kassacipi. Ñātisāmaṇerehevāti
tika-vin08t:341_4: tesaṃ gihiparikammamocanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Itareti aññātakā. Tehipi sāmaṇerehi ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ
tika-vin08t:341_5: vattasīsena haritabbaṃ. Sampattānaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ upaḍḍhabhāgaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti saṅghikassa
tika-vin08t:341_6: lābhassa upacārasīmaṭṭhasāmaṇerānampi santakattā tesampi upaḍḍhabhāgo labbhatevāti
tika-vin08t:341_7: katvā vuttaṃ. Cūḷakanti upaḍḍhabhāgatopi upaḍḍhaṃ. Catutthabhāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin08t:341_8: Sāmaṇerā…pe… ṭhapentīti idaṃ arakkhitaagopitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:341_9: pana “vassaggena abhājanīyaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti magge vā cetiyaṅgaṇe vā.
tika-vin08t:342_0: 34. Sāmaṇerehi dāpetuṃ na labhantīti idaṃ sāmaṇerehi gihikammaṃ kāritaṃ viya hotīti
tika-vin08t:342_1: vuttaṃ, na pana pupphadānaṃ hotīti sāmaṇerānampi na vaṭṭanato. Vuttañca “sayamevā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t:342_2: Na hi taṃ pupphadānaṃ nāma siyā. Yadi hi tathā āgatānaṃ tesaṃ dānaṃ pupphadānaṃ nāma
tika-vin08t:342_3: bhaveyya, sāmaṇerehipi dātuṃ na labbheyya. Sayamevāti sāmaṇerā sayameva. Yāgubhattādīni
tika-vin08t:342_4: ādāyāti idaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya yāgubhattādisampādanaṃ sandhāya vuttattā “na vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin08t:342_5: avisesena vuttaṃ. Avisesena vuttanti iminā sabbesampi na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:343_0: 35. Vuttanayenevāti “mātāpitūnaṃ tāva haritvāpi harāpetvāpi pakkositvāpi pakkosāpetvāpi
tika-vin08t:343_1: dātuṃ vaṭṭati, sesañātakānaṃ pakkosāpetvāva. Mātāpitūnañca harāpentena ñātisāmaṇereheva
tika-vin08t:343_2: harāpetabbaṃ. Itare pana yadi sayameva icchanti, vaṭṭatī”ti imaṃ pupphadāne vuttanayaṃ
tika-vin08t:343_3: phaladānepi atidisati, tasmā phalampi mātāpitūnaṃ haraṇaharāpanādinā dātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t:343_4: sesañātīnaṃ pakkosāpetvāva. Idāni “yo haritvā vā harāpetvā vā…pe… issaravatāya dadato
tika-vin08t:343_5: thullaccaya”nti imaṃ pupphadāne vuttanayaṃ phaladāne saṅkhipitvā dassento “kulasaṅgahatthāya
tika-vin08t:343_6: panā”tiādimāha. Khīṇaparibbayānanti āgantuke sandhāya vuttaṃ. Phalaparicchedenāti
tika-vin08t:343_7: “ettakāni phalāni dātabbānī”ti evaṃ phalaparicchedena vā. Rukkhaparicchedena vāti
tika-vin08t:343_8: “imehi rukkhehi dātabbānī”ti evaṃ rukkhaparicchedena vā. Paricchinnesupi pana rukkhesu
tika-vin08t:343_9: “idha phalāni sundarāni, ito gaṇhathā”ti vadantena kulasaṅgaho kato nāma hotīti āha
tika-vin08t:343_10: “evaṃ pana na vattabba”nti. Rukkhacchallīti rukkhattaco, sā “bhājanīyabhaṇḍa”nti
tika-vin08t:343_11: vuttā. Vuttanayenāti pupphaphalādīsu vuttanayena kulasaṅgaho hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:344_0: 36. Tesaṃ tesaṃ gihīnaṃ gāmantaradesantarādīsu sāsanapaṭisāsanaharaṇaṃ jaṅghapesaniyaṃ.
tika-vin08t:344_1: Tenāha “gihīnaṃ dūteyyaṃ sāsanaharaṇakamma”nti. Dūtassa kammaṃ dūteyyaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin08t:344_2: sāsanaṃ aggahetvāpi…pe… pade pade dukkaṭanti idaṃ “tassa sāsanaṃ ārocessāmī”ti iminā
tika-vin08t:344_3: adhippāyena gamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tassa pana sāsanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā sayameva kāruññe
tika-vin08t:344_4: ṭhito gantvā attano patirūpaṃ sāsanaṃ āroceti, anāpatti. Gihīnañca kappiyasāsanaṃ
tika-vin08t:344_5: harituṃ vaṭṭatīti sambandho. Imehi pana aṭṭhahi kuladūsakakammehīti pupphadānaṃ phaladānaṃ
tika-vin08t:344_6: cuṇṇadānaṃ mattikadānaṃ dantakaṭṭhadānaṃ veḷudānaṃ paṇṇadānaṃ jaṅghapesanikanti imehi
tika-vin08t:345_0: 37. Sekkhabhūmiyaṃ vāti iminā jhānabhūmimpi saṅgaṇhāti. Tiṇṇaṃ vivekānanti kāyacittaupadhivivekabhūtānaṃ
tika-vin08t:345_1: tiṇṇaṃ vivekānaṃ. Piṇḍāya caraṇassa bhojanapariyosānattā vuttaṃ “yāva bhojanapariyosāna”nti.
tika-vin08t:345_2: Bhutvā āgacchantassapi puna vuttanayeneva paṇidhāya cīvarasaṇṭhāpanādīni karontassa
tika-vin08t:350_0: 38. Evaṃ kulasaṅgahavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni macchamaṃsavinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “macchamaṃsesu
tika-vin08t:350_1: panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha thale ṭhapitamatte marati, kevaṭṭādīhi vā māriyatīti maccho.
tika-vin08t:350_2: Macchassa idanti macchaṃ, masiyate āmasiyateti maṃsaṃ, macchañca maṃsañca macchamaṃsāni,
tika-vin08t:350_3: tesu. Macchamaṃsesu pana vinicchayo evaṃ veditabboti yojanā. Macchaggahaṇenāti ettha
tika-vin08t:350_4: niddhāraṇaṃ na kātabbaṃ. Pana-saddo pakkhantarattho, divāseyyādīsu vinicchayato aparo
tika-vin08t:350_5: macchamaṃsesu vinicchayo veditabboti attho. Gayhate anenāti gahaṇaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Saddo,
tika-vin08t:350_6: macchaiti gahaṇaṃ macchaggahaṇaṃ, tena macchaggahaṇena, macchasaddenāti attho. Maṃsesu
tika-vin08t:350_7: pana…pe… akappiyānīti ettha manussamaṃsaṃ samānajātimaṃsato paṭikkhittaṃ. Hatthiassānaṃ
tika-vin08t:350_8: maṃsāni rājaṅgato, sunakhaahīnaṃ jegucchabhāvato, sesānaṃ vāḷamigattā bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t:351_0: Tikoṭiparisuddhanti diṭṭhasutaparisaṅkitasaṅkhātāhi tīhi koṭīhi tīhi ākārehi tīhi
tika-vin08t:351_1: kāraṇehi parisuddhaṃ, vimuttanti attho. Tattha adiṭṭhaasutāni cakkhuviññāṇasotaviññāṇānaṃ
tika-vin08t:351_2: anārammaṇabhāvato jānitabbāni. Aparisaṅkitaṃ pana kathaṃ jānitabbanti āha “aparisaṅkitaṃ
tika-vin08t:351_3: panā”tiādi, tīṇi parisaṅkitāni ñatvā tesaṃ paṭipakkhavasena aparisaṅkitaṃ jānitabbanti
tika-vin08t:351_4: attho. Idāni tāni tīṇi parisaṅkitāni ca evaṃ parisaṅkite sati bhikkhūhi kattabbavidhiñca
tika-vin08t:351_5: tena vidhinā aparisaṅkite sati kattabbabhāvañca vitthārato dassetuṃ “katha”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin08t:351_6: Tattha disvā parisaṅkitaṃ diṭṭhaparisaṅkitaṃ nāma. Sutvā parisaṅkitaṃ sutaparisaṅkitaṃ
tika-vin08t:351_7: nāma. Adisvā asutvā takkena anumānena parisaṅkitaṃ tadubhayavinimuttaparisaṅkitaṃ
tika-vin08t:351_8: nāma. Taṃ tividhampi parisaṅkitasāmaññena ekā koṭi hoti, tato vimuttaṃ aparisaṅkitaṃ
tika-vin08t:351_9: nāma. Evaṃ adiṭṭhaṃ asutaṃ aparisaṅkitaṃ macchamaṃsaṃ tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t:352_0: Jālaṃ macchabandhanaṃ. Vāgurā migabandhinī. Kappatīti yadi tesaṃ vacanena saṅkā nivattati,
tika-vin08t:352_1: vaṭṭati, na taṃ vacanaṃ lesakappaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Teneva vakkhati “yattha ca nibbematiko
tika-vin08t:352_2: hoti, taṃ sabbaṃ kappatī”ti. Pavattamaṃsanti āpaṇādīsu pavattaṃ vikkāyikaṃ vā matamaṃsaṃ
tika-vin08t:352_3: vā. Maṅgalādīnanti ādi-saddena āhunapāhunādike saṅgaṇhāti. Bhikkhūnaṃyeva atthāya
tika-vin08t:352_4: akatanti ettha aṭṭhānappayutto eva-saddo, bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya akatamevāti sambandhitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:352_5: tasmā bhikkhūnañca maṅgalādīnañcāti missetvā katampi na vattatīti veditabbaṃ. Keci
tika-vin08t:352_6: pana “yathāṭhitavasena avadhāraṇaṃ gahetvā vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ. Yattha
tika-vin08t:352_7: ca nibbematiko hotīti bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya katepi sabbena sabbaṃ parisaṅkitābhāvamāha.
tika-vin08t:353_0: 39. Tamevatthaṃ āvikātuṃ “sace panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Itaresaṃ vaṭṭatīti ajānantānaṃ
tika-vin08t:353_1: vaṭṭati, jānatovettha āpatti hotīti. Teyevāti ye uddissa kataṃ, teyeva. Uddissa katamaṃsaparibhogato
tika-vin08t:353_2: akappiyamaṃsaparibhoge visesaṃ dassetuṃ “akappiyamaṃsaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Purimasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:353_3: sacittakāpatti, itarasmiṃ acittakā. Tenāha “akappiyamaṃsaṃ ajānitvā bhuñjantassapi
tika-vin08t:353_4: āpattiyevā”ti. “Paribhogakāle pucchitvā paribhuñjissāmīti vā gahetvā pucchitvāva
tika-vin08t:353_5: paribhuñjitabba”nti vacanato akappiyamaṃsaṃ ajānitvā paṭiggaṇhantassa paṭiggahaṇe
tika-vin08t:353_6: anāpatti siddhā. Ajānitvā paribhuñjantasseva hi āpatti vuttā. Vattanti vadantīti
tika-vin08t:358_0: 40. Evaṃ macchamaṃsavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni anāmāsavinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “anāmāsa”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin08t:358_1: Tattha āmasiyateti āmāsaṃ, na āmāsaṃ anāmāsaṃ, aparāmasitabbanti attho. Pāripanthikāti
tika-vin08t:358_2: vikuppanikā, antarāyikāti vuttaṃ hoti. Nadīsotena vuyhamānaṃ mātaranti etaṃ ukkaṭṭhaparicchedadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:358_3: vuttaṃ. Aññāsu pana itthīsu kāruññādhippāyena mātari vuttanayena paṭipajjantassa
tika-vin08t:358_4: nevatthi dosoti vadanti. “Mātara”nti vuttattā aññāsu na vaṭṭatīti vadantāpi atthi.
tika-vin08t:358_5: Ettha gaṇhāhīti na vattabbāti gehassitapemena kāyappaṭibaddhena phusane dukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin08t:358_6: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kāruññena pana vatthādiṃ gahetuṃ asakkontiṃ “gaṇhāhī”ti vadantassapi
tika-vin08t:358_7: avasabhāvappattito udake nimujjantiṃ kāruññena sahasā anāmāsanti acintetvā kesādīsu
tika-vin08t:358_8: gahetvā mokkhādhippāyena ākaḍḍhatopi anāpattiyeva. Na hi mīyamānaṃ mātaraṃ upekkhituṃ
tika-vin08t:358_9: vaṭṭati. Aññātikāya itthiyāpi eseva nayo. Ukkaṭṭhāya mātuyāpi āmāso na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:358_10: dassanatthaṃ “mātara”nti vuttaṃ. Tassa kātabbaṃ pana aññāsampi itthīnaṃ karontassapi
tika-vin08t:359_1: tālapaṇṇehi kataṃ aṅgulimuddikaṃ. Tena tālapaṇṇādimayaṃ kaṭisuttakaṇṇapiḷandhanādi
tika-vin08t:359_2: sabbaṃ na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ. Parivattetvāti attano nivāsanapārupanabhāvato apanetvā,
tika-vin08t:359_3: cīvaratthāya pariṇāmetvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Cīvaratthāya pādamūle ṭhapetīti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ.
tika-vin08t:359_4: Paccattharaṇavitānādiatthampi vaṭṭatiyeva, pūjādiatthaṃ tāvakālikampi āmasituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:359_6: dantasūciādi cāti dve tayo. Sīsapasādhanaṃ sipāṭikopakaraṇatthāya ceva dantasūciṃ
tika-vin08t:359_7: sūciupakaraṇatthāya ca gahetabbanti yathākkamaṃ atthaṃ dasseti. Kesakalāpaṃ bandhitvā
tika-vin08t:359_8: tattha tiriyaṃ pavesanatthāya katā sūci eva sīsapasādhanakadantasūcīti ekameva katvā
tika-vin08t:359_9: sipāṭikāya pakkhipitvā pariharitabbasūciyeva tassa tassa kiccassa upakaraṇanti sipāṭikasūciupakaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin08t:360_0: Potthakarūpanti sudhādīhi kataṃ pārājikavatthubhūtānaṃ tiracchānagatitthīnaṃ saṇṭhānena
tika-vin08t:360_1: katampi anāmāsameva. Itthirūpāni dassetvā kataṃ vatthubhittiādiñca itthirūpaṃ anāmasitvā
tika-vin08t:360_2: vaḷañjetuṃ vaṭṭati. Evarūpe hi anāmāse kāyasaṃsaggarāge asati kāyappaṭibaddhena āmasato
tika-vin08t:360_3: doso natthi. Bhinditvāti ettha hatthena aggahetvāva kenaci daṇḍādinā bhinditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:360_4: Ettha ca anāmāsampi daṇḍapāsāṇādīhi bhedanassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā, pāḷiyampi
tika-vin08t:360_5: āpadāsu mokkhādhippāyassa āmasanepi anāpattiyā vuttattā ca sappiniādivāḷamigīhi gahitapāṇakānaṃ
tika-vin08t:360_6: mocanatthāya taṃ taṃ sappiniādivatthuṃ daṇḍādīhi paṭikkhipitvā gahetuṃ, mātuādiṃ
tika-vin08t:360_7: udake mīyamānaṃ vatthādīhi gahetuṃ, asakkontiṃ kesādīsu gahetvā kāruññena ukkhipituñca
tika-vin08t:360_8: vaṭṭatīti ayamattho gahetabbova. “Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘na tveva āmasitabbā’ti idaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:360_9: vacanaṃ amīyamānaṃ vatthuṃ sandhāya vuttanti ayaṃ amhākaṃ khantī”ti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:361_0: 41. Maggaṃ adhiṭṭhāyāti “maggo aya”nti maggasaññaṃ uppādetvāti attho. Paññapetvā
tika-vin08t:361_1: dentīti idaṃ sāmīcivasena vuttaṃ, tehi pana “āsanaṃ paññapetvāva nisīdathā”ti vutte
tika-vin08t:361_2: sayameva paññapetvā nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha jātakānīti acchinditvā bhūtagāmabhāveneva
tika-vin08t:361_3: ṭhitāni. “Kīḷantenā”ti vuttattā sati paccaye āmasantassa anāpatti, idañca gihisantakaṃ
tika-vin08t:361_4: sandhāya vuttaṃ, bhikkhusantakaṃ pana paribhogārahaṃ sabbathā āmasituṃ na vaṭṭati
tika-vin08t:361_6: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. “Yathāvuttaphalānaṃyeva cettha kīḷādhippāyena āmasanaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin08t:361_7: vuttattā pāsāṇasakkharādīni kīḷādhippāyenapi āmasituṃ vaṭṭati. Anupasampannānaṃ dassāmīti
tika-vin08t:361_8: idaṃ apaṭiggahetvā gahaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Attanopi atthāya paṭiggahetvā gahaṇe
tika-vin08t:362_0: 42. Muttāti hatthikumbhajātikā aṭṭhavidhā muttā. Tathā hi hatthikumbhaṃ, varāhadāṭhaṃ,
tika-vin08t:362_1: bhujagasīsaṃ, valāhakaṃ, veḷu, macchasiro, saṅkho, sippīti aṭṭha muttāyoniyo. Tattha
tika-vin08t:362_2: hatthikumbhajā pītavaṇṇā pabhāhīnā. Varāhadāṭhā varāhadāṭhāvaṇṇāva. Bhujagasīsajā
tika-vin08t:362_3: nīlādivaṇṇā suvisuddhā vaṭṭalā ca. Valāhakajā bhāsurā dubbibhāgā rattibhāge andhakāraṃ
tika-vin08t:362_4: vidhamentiyo tiṭṭhanti, devūpabhogā eva ca honti. Veḷujā karakaphalasamānavaṇṇā na
tika-vin08t:362_5: bhāsurā, te ca veḷū amanussagocareyeva padese jāyanti. Macchasirajā pāṭhīnapiṭṭhisamānavaṇṇā
tika-vin08t:362_6: vaṭṭalā laghavo ca tejavantā honti pabhāvihīnā ca, te ca macchā samuddamajjheyeva
tika-vin08t:362_7: jāyanti. Saṅkhajā saṅkhaudaracchavivaṇṇā kolaphalappamāṇāpi honti pabhāvihīnāva.
tika-vin08t:362_8: Sippijā pabhāvisesayuttā honti nānāsaṇṭhānā. Evaṃ jātito aṭṭhavidhāsu muttāsu yā
tika-vin08t:362_9: macchasaṅkhasippijā, tā sāmuddikā. Bhujagajāpi kāci sāmuddikā honti, itarā asāmuddikā.
tika-vin08t:362_10: Yasmā bahulaṃ sāmuddikāva muttā loke dissanti, tatthāpi sippijāva, itarā kadāci kāci,
tika-vin08t:363_0: Maṇīti veḷuriyādito añño jotirasādibhedo sabbo maṇi. Veḷuriyoti allaveḷuvaṇṇo maṇi,
tika-vin08t:363_2: atisiniddhā kāḷasilā. Maṇivohāraṃ agatā rattasetādivaṇṇā sumaṭṭhāpi silā anāmāsā
tika-vin08t:363_3: evāti vadanti. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “saṅkhoti sāmuddikasaṅkho. Silāti kāḷasilāpaṇḍusilāsetasilādibhedā
tika-vin08t:363_4: sabbāpi silā”ti vuttaṃ. Pavāḷaṃ samuddato jātanātirattamaṇi. Rajatanti kahāpaṇamāsādibhedaṃ
tika-vin08t:363_5: jatumāsādiṃ upādāya sabbaṃ vuttāvasesarūpiyaṃ gahitaṃ. Jātarūpanti suvaṇṇaṃ. Lohitaṅkoti
tika-vin08t:364_1: vūpasametabbassa yassa kassaci rogassa atthāya vaṭṭatiyeva. “Bhesajjatthañca aviddhāyeva
tika-vin08t:364_2: muttā vaṭṭatī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttā. Bhesajjatthāya pisitvā yojitānaṃ muttānaṃ
tika-vin08t:364_4: vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Yāva pana tā muttā ratanarūpena tiṭṭhanti, tāva āmasituṃ na vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin08t:364_5: Evaṃ aññampi ratanapāsāṇaṃ pisitvā bhesajje yojanatthāya gahetuṃ vaṭṭati eva. Jātarūparajataṃ
tika-vin08t:364_6: pana missetvā yojanabhesajjatthāyapi sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭati. Gahaṭṭhehi yojetvā
tika-vin08t:364_7: dinnampi yadi bhesajje suvaṇṇādirūpena tiṭṭhati, viyojetuñca sakkā, tādisaṃ bhesajjampi
tika-vin08t:364_8: na vaṭṭati. Taṃ abbohārikattagatañce vaṭṭati. “Jātiphalikaṃ upādāyā”ti vuttattā sūriyakantacandakantādikaṃ
tika-vin08t:364_9: jātipāsāṇaṃ maṇimhi eva saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ākaramuttoti ākarato muttamatto.
tika-vin08t:364_10: Bhaṇḍamūlatthaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭatīti imināva āmasitumpi vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Pacitvā
tika-vin08t:365_0: Dhamanasaṅkho ca dhotaviddho ca ratanamisso cāti yojetabbaṃ. Viddhotiādibhāvena katachiddo.
tika-vin08t:365_1: Ratanamissoti kañcanalatādivicitto muttādiratanakhacito ca. Etena dhamanasaṅkhato
tika-vin08t:365_2: añño ratanasammisso anāmāsoti dasseti. Silāyampi eseva nayo. Pānīyasaṅkhoti iminā
tika-vin08t:365_3: thālakādiākārena katasaṅkhamayabhājanāni bhikkhūnaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭantīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin08t:365_4: Sesanti ratanamissaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ. Muggavaṇṇaṃyeva ratanasammissaṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t:365_5: na aññanti āha “muggavaṇṇāvā”ti, muggavaṇṇā ratanasammissāva na vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:365_6: hoti. Sesāti ratanasammissaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā silā.
tika-vin08t:366_0: Bījato paṭṭhāyāti dhātupāsāṇato paṭṭhāya. Suvaṇṇacetiyanti dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ. Paṭikkhipīti
tika-vin08t:366_3: ca attano santakakaraṇe nissaggiyattā vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Suvaṇṇabubbuḷakanti suvaṇṇatārakaṃ.
tika-vin08t:366_5: vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ. Keḷāpayitunti āmasitvā ito cito ca sañcāretuṃ. Vuttanti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:366_6: vuttaṃ. Kacavarameva harituṃ vaṭṭatīti gopakā vā hontu aññe vā, hatthenapi puñchitvā
tika-vin08t:366_7: kacavaraṃ apanetuṃ vaṭṭati, “malampi pamajjituṃ vaṭṭatiyevā”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:366_8: vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “kacavarameva harituṃ vaṭṭatīti gopakā vā hontu aññe
tika-vin08t:366_9: vā, hatthenapi puñchitvā kacavaraṃ apanetuṃ vaṭṭati, malampi majjituṃ vaṭṭati evāti
tika-vin08t:366_10: vadanti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāya na sameti keḷāyanasadisattā”ti vuttaṃ. Kathaṃ na sameti?
tika-vin08t:366_11: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ cetiyagharagopakā rūpiyachaḍḍakaṭṭhāne ṭhitāti tesaṃyeva keḷāyanaṃ
tika-vin08t:366_12: anuññātaṃ, na aññesaṃ, tasmā “gopakā vā hontu aññe vā”ti vacanaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāya na sameti.
tika-vin08t:367_0: Kurundiyaṃ pana tampi paṭikkhittaṃ, suvaṇṇacetiye kacavarameva harituṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:367_1: ettakameva anuññātaṃ, tasmā sāvadhāraṇaṃ katvā vuttattā “hatthenapi puñchitvā”ti
tika-vin08t:367_2: ca “malampi pamajjituṃ vaṭṭati evā”ti ca vacanaṃ kurundaṭṭhakathāya na sameti, tasmā
tika-vin08t:367_3: vicāretabbametanti. Ārakūṭalohanti suvaṇṇavaṇṇo kittimalohaviseso. Tividhañhi kittimalohaṃ
tika-vin08t:367_4: – kaṃsalohaṃ vaṭṭalohaṃ ārakūṭalohanti. Tattha tiputambe missetvā kataṃ kaṃsalohaṃ
tika-vin08t:367_5: nāma, sīsatambe missetvā kataṃ vaṭṭalohaṃ, rasatutthehi rañjitaṃ tambaṃ ārakūṭalohaṃ
tika-vin08t:367_6: nāma. “Pakatirasatambe missetvā kataṃ ārakūṭa”nti ca sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ
tika-vin08t:367_7: pana “jātarūpagatika”nti vuttattā uggaṇhato nissaggiyampi hotīti keci vadanti, rūpiyesu
tika-vin08t:367_8: pana agaṇitattā nissaggiyaṃ na hoti, āmasane sampaṭicchane ca dukkaṭamevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:367_10: paribhogo sabbathā kappiyoti adhippāyo. Tenāha “tasmā”tiādi. “Bhikkhūnaṃ dhammavinayavaṇṇanaṭṭhāne”ti
tika-vin08t:367_11: vuttattā saṅghikameva suvaṇṇādimayaṃ senāsanaṃ senāsanaparikkhārā ca vaṭṭanti, na
tika-vin08t:367_12: puggalikānīti gahetabbaṃ. Paṭijaggituṃ vaṭṭantīti senāsanapaṭibandhato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:368_0: 43. Sāmikānaṃ pesetabbanti sāmikānaṃ sāsanaṃ pesetabbaṃ. Bhinditvāti paṭhamameva
tika-vin08t:368_1: anāmasitvā pāsāṇādinā kiñcimattaṃ bhedaṃ katvā pacchā kappiyabhaṇḍatthāya adhiṭṭhahitvā
tika-vin08t:368_2: hatthena gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Tenāha “kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ karissāmīti sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin08t:368_3: Etthāpi tañca viyojetvā āmasitabbaṃ. Phalakajālikādīnīti ettha saraparittāṇāya hatthena
tika-vin08t:368_4: gahetabbaṃ. Kiṭikāphalakaṃ akkhirakkhaṇatthāya ayalohādīhi jālākārena katvā sīsādīsu
tika-vin08t:368_5: paṭimuñcitabbaṃ jālikaṃ nāma. Ādi-saddena kavacādikaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Anāmāsānīti macchajālādiparūparodhaṃ
tika-vin08t:368_6: sandhāya vuttaṃ, na saraparittāṇaṃ tassa āvudhabhaṇḍattābhāvā. Tena vakkhati “parūparodhanivāraṇañhī”tiādi.
tika-vin08t:368_7: Āsanassāti cetiyassasamantā kataparibhaṇḍassa. Bandhissāmīti kākādīnaṃ adūsanatthāya bandhissāmi.
tika-vin08t:369_2: “kurundiyaṃ panā”tiādinā tato visesassa vattumāraddhattā ca bheriādīnaṃ vinaddhopakaraṇasamūho
tika-vin08t:369_4: avinaddhacammabherivīṇānaṃ pokkharaṃ. Āropitacammanti pubbe āropitaṃ hutvā pacchā
tika-vin08t:369_5: tato apanetvā visuṃ ṭhapitamukhacammamattaṃ, na sesopakaraṇasahitaṃ, taṃ pana saṅghātoti
tika-vin08t:369_6: ayaṃ viseso. Onahitunti bheripokkharādīni cammaṃ āropetvā cammavaddhiādīhi sabbehi
tika-vin08t:369_7: upakaraṇehi vinandhituṃ. Onahāpetunti tatheva aññehi vinandhāpetuṃ.
tika-vin08t:374_0: 44. Evaṃ anāmāsavinicchayakathaṃ kathetvā idāni adhiṭṭhānavikappanavinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ
tika-vin08t:374_1: “adhiṭṭhānavikappanesu panā”tiādimāha. Tattha adhiṭṭhiyate adhiṭṭhānaṃ, gahaṇaṃ sallakkhaṇanti
tika-vin08t:374_2: attho. Vikappiyate vikappanā, saṅkappanaṃ cintananti attho. Tattha “ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātunti
tika-vin08t:374_3: nāmaṃ vatvā adhiṭṭhātuṃ. Na vikappetunti nāmaṃ vatvā na vikappetuṃ. Esa nayo sabbattha.
tika-vin08t:374_4: Tasmā ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhahantena ‘imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī’tiādinā nāmaṃ vatvā adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:374_5: Vikappentena pana ‘imaṃ saṅghāṭi’ntiādinā tassa tassa cīvarassa nāmaṃ aggahetvāva
tika-vin08t:374_6: ‘imaṃ cīvaraṃ tuyhaṃ vikappemī’ti vikappetabbaṃ. Ticīvaraṃ vā hotu aññaṃ vā, yadi
tika-vin08t:374_7: taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā vikappeti, avikappitaṃ hoti, atirekacīvaraṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatī”ti
tika-vin08t:375_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātunti saṅghāṭiādināmena adhiṭṭhātuṃ. Na
tika-vin08t:375_1: vikappetunti iminā nāmena na vikappetuṃ, etena vikappitaticīvaro tecīvariko na hoti,
tika-vin08t:375_2: tassa tasmiṃ adhiṭṭhitaticīvare viya avippavāsādinā kātabbavidhi na kātabboti dasseti,
tika-vin08t:375_3: na pana vikappane doso”ti vuttaṃ. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātunti
tika-vin08t:375_4: ettha ticīvaraṃ ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhātabbayuttakaṃ, yaṃ vā ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena
tika-vin08t:375_5: adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetuṃ anujānāmi, tassa adhiṭṭhānakālaparicchedābhāvato sabbakālaṃ
tika-vin08t:375_6: icchantassa adhiṭṭhātuṃyeva anujānāmi, taṃ kālaparicchedaṃ katvā vikappetuṃ nānujānāmi,
tika-vin08t:375_7: sati pana paccaye yadā tadā vā paccuddharitvā vikappetuṃ vaṭṭatīti ‘anāpatti antodasāhaṃ
tika-vin08t:375_8: adhiṭṭheti vikappetī’ti vacanato siddhaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:376_0: Imesu pana tīsu ṭīkāvādesu tatiyavādo yuttataro viya dissati. Kasmā? Pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya
tika-vin08t:376_1: ca saṃsandanato. Kathaṃ? Pāḷiyañhi kataparicchedāsuyeva dvīsu vassikasāṭikakaṇḍupaṭicchādīsu
tika-vin08t:376_2: tato paraṃ vikappetunti vuttaṃ, tato aññesu na vikappetuṃ icceva, tasmā tesu asati
tika-vin08t:376_3: paccaye niccaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbameva hoti, na vikappetabbanti ayaṃ pāḷiyā adhippāyo dissati,
tika-vin08t:376_4: itarāsu pana dvīsu anuññātakāleyeva adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ, “tato paraṃ vikappetu”nti evaṃ
tika-vin08t:376_5: pāḷiyā saṃsandati, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ticīvaraṃ ticīvarasaṅkhepena pariharato adhiṭṭhātumeva
tika-vin08t:376_6: anujānāmi, na vikappetuṃ. Vassikasāṭikaṃ pana cātumāsato paraṃ vikappetumeva, na
tika-vin08t:376_7: adhiṭṭhātuṃ, evañca sati yo ticīvare ekena cīvarena vippavasitukāmo hoti, tassa cīvarādhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:376_8: paccuddharitvā vippavāsasukhatthaṃ vikappanāya okāso dinno hotīti.
tika-vin08t:377_0: Paṭhamavāde “na vikappetu”nti nāmaṃ vatvā “na vikappetu”nti attho vutto, evaṃ sante
tika-vin08t:377_1: “tato paraṃ vikappetu”nti ettha tato paraṃ nāmaṃ vatvā vikappetunti attho bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t:377_2: so ca attho vikappanādhikārena vutto, “nāmaṃ vatvā”ti ca visesane kattabbe sati “na
tika-vin08t:377_3: vikappetu”nti ca “tato paraṃ vikappetu”nti ca bhedavacanaṃ na siyā, sabbesupi cīvaresu
tika-vin08t:377_4: nāmaṃ avatvāva vikappetabbato, dutiyavāde ca “na vikappetu”nti iminā nāmena na vikappetunti
tika-vin08t:377_5: vuttaṃ, na anujānāmīti pāṭhaseso. Paṭhame ca “ticīvaraṃ vā hotu aññaṃ vā, yadi taṃ
tika-vin08t:377_6: taṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā vikappeti, avikappitaṃ hoti, atirekacīvaraṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatī”ti. Dutiye
tika-vin08t:377_7: ca “na pana vikappane doso”ti, tañca aññamaññaviruddhaṃ viya dissati, tasmā vicāretabbametaṃ.
tika-vin08t:378_0: Tato paraṃ vikappetunti cātumāsato paraṃ vikappetvā paribhuñjitunti tīsu gaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin08t:378_1: vuttaṃ. Keci pana “tato paraṃ vikappetvā yāva āgāmisaṃvacchare vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ,
tika-vin08t:378_2: tāva ṭhapetuṃ anuññāta”ntipi vadanti. “Tato paraṃ vikappetuṃ anujānāmīti ettāvatā
tika-vin08t:378_3: vassikasāṭikaṃ kaṇḍupaṭicchādiñca taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā vikappetuṃ anuññātanti evamattho
tika-vin08t:378_4: na gahetabbo. Tato paraṃ vassikasāṭikādināmasseva abhāvato, kasmā tato paraṃ vikappentenapi
tika-vin08t:378_5: nāmaṃ gahetvā na vikappetabbaṃ. Ubhinnampi tato paraṃ vikappetvā paribhogassa anuññātattā
tika-vin08t:378_6: tathāvikappitaṃ aññanāmena adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitabbanti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vutta”nti
tika-vin08t:378_7: sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyampi “tato paranti cātumāsato paraṃ vikappetvā
tika-vin08t:378_8: paribhuñjituṃ anuññātanti keci vadanti. Aññe pana ‘vikappetvā yāva āgāmivassānaṃ
tika-vin08t:378_9: tāva ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti vadanti. Apare pana ‘vikappane na doso, tathā vikappitaṃ
tika-vin08t:379_0: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “vassikasāṭikaṃ tato paraṃ vikappetuṃyeva, nādhiṭṭhātuṃ.
tika-vin08t:379_1: Vatthañhi katapariyositaṃ antocātumāse vassānadivasaṃ ādiṃ katvā antodasāhe adhiṭṭhātuṃ
tika-vin08t:379_2: anujānāmi, cātumāsato uddhaṃ attano santakaṃ katvā ṭhapetukāmena vikappetuṃ anujānāmīti
tika-vin08t:379_3: attho”ti vuttaṃ. Idhāpi pacchimavādo pasatthataroti dissati, kasmā? Suviññeyyattā,
tika-vin08t:379_4: purimesu pana ācariyānaṃ adhippāyoyeva duviññeyyo hoti nānāvādasseva kathitattā.
tika-vin08t:379_5: Muṭṭhipañcakanti muṭṭhiyā upalakkhitaṃ pañcakaṃ muṭṭhipañcakaṃ, catuhatthe minitvā
tika-vin08t:379_6: pañcamaṃ hatthamuṭṭhiṃ katvā minitabbanti adhippāyo. Keci pana “muṭṭhihatthānaṃ pañcakaṃ
tika-vin08t:379_7: muṭṭhipañcakaṃ. Pañcapi hatthā muṭṭhī katvāva minitabbā”ti vadanti. Muṭṭhittikanti
tika-vin08t:379_8: etthāpi eseva nayo. Dvihatthena antaravāsakena timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetuṃ sakkāti āha
tika-vin08t:379_10: ūnakaṃ. Tena ca tesu ticīvarādhiṭṭhānaṃ na ruhatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:380_0: Imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paccuddharāmīti imaṃ saṅghāṭiadhiṭṭhānaṃ ukkhipāmi, pariccajāmīti
tika-vin08t:380_1: attho. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “paccuddharāmīti ṭhapemi, pariccajāmīti vā attho”icceva
tika-vin08t:380_2: vuttaṃ. Kāyavikāraṃ karontenāti hatthena cīvaraṃ parāmasantena, cālentena vā. Vācāya
tika-vin08t:380_3: adhiṭṭhātabbāti ettha kāyenapi cāletvā vācampi bhinditvā kāyavācāhi adhiṭṭhānampi
tika-vin08t:380_5: duvidhaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ. Tattha “hatthapāso nāma aḍḍhateyyahattho vuccati. ‘Dvādasahattha’nti
tika-vin08t:380_6: keci vadanti, taṃ idha na sametī”ti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. “Idāni sammukhāparammukhābhedena
tika-vin08t:380_7: duvidhaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ “sace hatthapāsetiādi vuttaṃ. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:380_8: “hatthapāseti ca idaṃ dvādasahatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tasmā dvādasahatthabbhantare
tika-vin08t:380_9: ṭhitaṃ ‘ima’nti vatvā adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ, tato paraṃ ‘eta’nti vatvā adhiṭṭhātabbanti
tika-vin08t:380_10: keci vadanti, gaṇṭhipadesu panettha na kiñci vuttaṃ, pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca sabbattha
tika-vin08t:380_11: ‘hatthapāso’ti aḍḍhateyyahattho vuccati, tasmā idha visesavikappanāya kāraṇaṃ gavesitabba”nti
tika-vin08t:380_12: vuttaṃ. Evaṃ pāḷiyaṭṭhakathāsupi aḍḍhateyyahatthameva hatthapāso vutto, ṭīkācariyehi
tika-vin08t:380_13: ca tadeva sampaṭicchito, tasmā aḍḍhateyyahatthabbhantare ṭhitaṃ cīvaraṃ “ima”nti,
tika-vin08t:381_0: “Sāmantavihāreti idaṃ ṭhapitaṭṭhānasallakkhaṇayogge ṭhitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tato
tika-vin08t:381_1: dūre ṭhitampi ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhentena adhiṭṭhātabbameva. Tatthāpi cīvarassa
tika-vin08t:381_2: ṭhapitabhāvasallakkhaṇameva pamāṇaṃ. Na hi sakkā niccassa ṭhānaṃ sallakkhetuṃ, ekasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:381_3: vihāre ṭhapetvā tato aññasmiṃ ṭhapitanti adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Keci pana ‘tathāpi
tika-vin08t:381_4: adhiṭṭhite na doso’ti vadanti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāya na sameti, vīmaṃsitabba”nti vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:381_5: vuttaṃ. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “sāmantavihāro nāma yattha tadaheva gantvā nivattetuṃ
tika-vin08t:381_6: sakkā. Sāmantavihāreti idaṃ desanāsīsamattaṃ, tasmā ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā dūre
tika-vin08t:381_7: ṭhitampi adhiṭṭhātabbanti vadanti. Ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvāti ca idaṃ ṭhapitaṭṭhānasallakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:381_8: anucchavikanti katvā vuttaṃ, cīvarasallakkhaṇamevettha pamāṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyañca
tika-vin08t:381_10: ‘Ayaṃ saṅghāṭī’tiādīsu anadhiṭṭhitā vuttā. ‘Ticīvarena vippavaseyyā’ti ettha adhiṭṭhitā
tika-vin08t:381_11: vuttā. Sāmantavihāreti gocaragāmato vihāreti dhammasiritthero. Dūratarepi labbhatevāti
tika-vin08t:381_13: sallakkhetvā dūre ṭhitampi adhiṭṭhātabba’nti vuttaṃ. Sāmantavihāro nāma yattha tadaheva
tika-vin08t:381_14: gantvā nivattituṃ sakkā. Rattivippavāsaṃ rakkhantena tato dūre ṭhitaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ
tika-vin08t:381_15: na vaṭṭati, evaṃ kira mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanti. Keci ‘cīvaravaṃse ṭhapitaṃ añño
tika-vin08t:381_16: parivattetvā nāgadante ṭhapeti, taṃ ajānitvā adhiṭṭhahantassapi ruhati cīvarassa
tika-vin08t:381_17: sallakkhitattā’ti vadantī”ti, tasmā ācariyānaṃ matabhedaṃ saṃsanditvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:382_1: Teneva “imaṃ paccuddharāmī”ti parikkhāracoḷassa paccuddhāraṃ dasseti, etena ca tecīvarikadhutaṅgaṃ
tika-vin08t:382_2: pariharantena paṃsukūlādivasena laddhaṃ vatthaṃ dasāhabbhantare katvā rajitvā pārupitumasakkontena
tika-vin08t:382_4: hotīti dasseti, teneva “rajitakālato pana paṭṭhāya nikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati, dhutaṅgacoro
tika-vin08t:382_5: nāma hotī”ti visuddhimagge vuttaṃ. Puna adhiṭṭhātabbānīti idañca saṅghāṭiāditicīvaranāmena
tika-vin08t:382_6: adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitukāmassa vasena vuttaṃ, itarassa pana purimādhiṭṭhānameva
tika-vin08t:382_7: alanti veditabbaṃ. Puna adhiṭṭhātabbanti iminā kappabindupi dātabbanti dasseti. Adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ
tika-vin08t:382_8: natthīti iminā kappabindudānakiccampi natthīti dasseti, mahantataramevātiādi sabbādhiṭṭhānasādhāraṇalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t:382_9: Tattha puna adhiṭṭhātabbanti anadhiṭṭhitacīvarassa ekadesabhūtattā anadhiṭṭhitañce,
tika-vin08t:382_10: adhiṭṭhitassa appabhāvena ekadesabhūtaṃ adhiṭṭhitasaṅkhameva gacchati, tathā adhiṭṭhitañce,
tika-vin08t:382_11: anadhiṭṭhitassa ekadesabhūtaṃ anadhiṭṭhitasaṅkhaṃ gacchatīti lakkhaṇaṃ. Na kevalañcettha
tika-vin08t:382_12: dutiyapaṭṭameva, atha kho tatiyapaṭṭādikampi. Yathāha “anujānāmi bhikkhave…pe… utuddhaṭānaṃ
tika-vin08t:383_1: adhiṭṭhātunti parikkhāracoḷaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhātuṃ. Avasesā bhikkhūti vakkhamānakāle
tika-vin08t:383_2: nisinnā bhikkhū. Tasmā vaṭṭatīti yathā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ,
tika-vin08t:383_3: na vikappetu”nti vuttaṃ, evaṃ parikkhāracoḷampi vuttaṃ, na cassa ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo
tika-vin08t:383_4: vutto, na ca saṅkhāparicchedo, tasmā tīṇipi cīvarāni paccuddharitvā imāni cīvarāni
tika-vin08t:383_5: parikkhāracoḷāni adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti attho. Nidhānamukhametanti
tika-vin08t:383_7: attho. Kathaṃ ñāyatīti ce, tena kho pana samayena bhikkhūnaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti ticīvaraṃ,
tika-vin08t:383_8: attho ca hoti parissāvanehipi thavikāhipi. Etasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:383_9: parikkhāracoḷaka”nti anuññātattā bhikkhūnañca ekameva parissāvanaṃ, thavikā vā vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t:383_10: na dve vā tīṇi vāti paṭikkhepābhāvato vikappanūpagapacchimappamāṇāni, atirekappamāṇāni
tika-vin08t:383_11: vā parissāvanādīni parikkhārāni kappantīti siddhaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena
tika-vin08t:383_12: adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ, puna pariharituṃ asakkontena paccuddharitvā parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:383_13: na tveva āditova idaṃ vuttaṃ. Baddhasīmāya avippavāsasīmāsammutisambhavato cīvaravippavāse
tika-vin08t:383_14: nevatthi dosoti na tattha dupparihāroti āha “abaddhasīmāya dupparihāra”nti.
tika-vin08t:384_0: 45. Atirittappamāṇāya chedanakaṃ pācittiyanti āha “anatirittappamāṇā”ti. Tato paraṃ
tika-vin08t:384_1: paccuddharitvā vikappetabbāti vassikamāsato paraṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ paccuddharitvā vikappetabbā,
tika-vin08t:384_2: iminā catunnaṃ vassikamāsānaṃ upari adhiṭṭhānaṃ tiṭṭhatīti viññāyati, asato paccuddharāyogā,
tika-vin08t:384_4: adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahantī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ natthi, parivāraṭṭhakathāyañca
tika-vin08t:384_5: “atthāpatti hemante āpajjati, no gimhe”ti ettha na taṃ vuttaṃ, kattikapuṇṇamāsiyā
tika-vin08t:384_6: pacchime pāṭipadadivase vikappetvā ṭhapitaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ nivāsento hemante āpajjati.
tika-vin08t:384_7: Kurundiyaṃ pana “kattikapuṇṇamadivase apaccuddharitvā hemante āpajjatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:384_8: tampi suvuttaṃ. “Cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ, tato paraṃ vikappetu”nti hi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-vin08t:384_9: mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ nivāsanapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana apaccuddhārapaccayā,
tika-vin08t:384_10: tasmā kurundiyaṃ vuttanayenapi vassikasāṭikā vassānātikkamepi adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatīti
tika-vin08t:384_11: paññāyati. Adhiṭṭhānavijahanesu ca vassānamāsaābādhānaṃ vigame vijahanaṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi
tika-vin08t:384_12: na uddhaṭaṃ, tasmā samantapāsādikāyaṃ āgatanayena yāva paccuddhārā adhiṭṭhānaṃ tiṭṭhatīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:385_0: Nahānatthāya anuññātattā “vaṇṇabhedamattarattāpi cesā vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Dve pana
tika-vin08t:385_1: na vaṭṭantīti iminā saṅghāṭiādīsupi dutiyaadhiṭṭhānaṃ na ruhati, taṃ atirekacīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:385_2: hotīti dasseti. Mahāpaccariyaṃ cīvaravasena paribhogakiccassa abhāvaṃ sandhāya “anāpattī”ti
tika-vin08t:385_3: vuttā senāsanaparibhogatthāya dinnapaccattharaṇe viya. Yaṃ pana “paccattharaṇampi
tika-vin08t:385_4: adhiṭṭhātabba”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ senāsanatthāyevāti niyamitaṃ na hoti navasu cīvaresu
tika-vin08t:385_5: gahitattā, tasmā attano nāmena adhiṭṭhahitvā nidahitvā parikkhāracoḷaṃ viya yathā
tika-vin08t:385_6: tathā viniyujjitamevāti gahetabbaṃ, pāvārokojavoti imesampi paccattharaṇādinā lokepi
tika-vin08t:385_7: voharaṇato senāsanaparikkhāratthāya dinnapaccattharaṇato visuṃ gahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Sace
tika-vin08t:385_8: avasāne aparāvassikasāṭikā uppannā hoti, purimavassikasāṭikaṃ paccuddharitvā vikappetvā
tika-vin08t:386_0: Nisīdanamhi pamāṇayuttanti “dīghato sugatavidatthiyā dve vidatthiyo, vitthārato diyaḍḍhaṃ,
tika-vin08t:386_1: dasā vidatthī”tiiminā pamāṇena yuttaṃ, taṃ pana majjhimapurisahatthasaṅkhātena vaḍḍhakīhatthena
tika-vin08t:386_2: dīghato tihatthaṃ hoti, vitthārato chaḷaṅgulādhikadvihatthaṃ, dasā vidatthādhikahatthaṃ,
tika-vin08t:386_3: idāni manussānaṃ pakatihatthena dīghato vidatthādhikacatuhatthaṃ hoti, vitthārato
tika-vin08t:386_4: navaṅgulādhikatihatthaṃ, dasā chaḷaṅgulādhikadvihatthā, tato ūnaṃ vaṭṭati, na adhikaṃ
tika-vin08t:386_5: “taṃ atikkāmayato chedanakaṃ pācittiya”nti vuttattā. Kaṇḍupaṭicchādiyā pamāṇikāti
tika-vin08t:386_6: “dīghato catasso vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā, tiriyaṃ dve vidatthiyo”ti vuttattā
tika-vin08t:386_7: evaṃ vuttappamāṇayuttā, sā pana vaḍḍhakīhatthena dīghato chahatthā hoti, vitthārato
tika-vin08t:386_8: tihatthā, idāni pakatihatthena pana dīghato navahatthā hoti, tiriyato vidatthādhikacatuhatthāti
tika-vin08t:386_9: veditabbā. Vikappanūpagapacchimacīvarappamāṇaṃ parikkhāracoḷanti ettha pana vikappanūpagapacchimacīvarappamāṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:386_10: nāma sugataṅgulena dīghato aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ hoti, tiriyato caturaṅgulaṃ, vaḍḍhakīhatthena
tika-vin08t:386_11: dīghato ekahatthaṃ hoti, tiriyato vidatthippamāṇaṃ, idāni pakatihatthena pana dīghato
tika-vin08t:386_12: vidatthādhikahatthaṃ hoti, tiriyato chaḷaṅgulādhikavidatthippamāṇaṃ. Tenāha “tassa pamāṇa”ntiādi.
tika-vin08t:387_0: Bhesajjatthāyātiādīsu attano santakabhāvato mocetvā ṭhapitaṃ sandhāya “anadhiṭṭhitepi
tika-vin08t:387_1: natthi āpattī”ti vuttaṃ, “idaṃ bhesajjatthāya, idaṃ mātuyā”ti vibhajitvā sakasantakabhāvato
tika-vin08t:387_2: mocetvā ṭhapentena adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthīti adhippāyo. “Iminā bhesajjaṃ cetāpessāmi,
tika-vin08t:387_3: idaṃ mātuyā dassāmī”ti ṭhapentena pana adhiṭṭhātabbamevāti vadanti. Senāsanaparikkhāratthāya
tika-vin08t:387_4: dinnapaccattharaṇeti ettha anivāsetvā apārupitvā kevalaṃ mañcapīṭhesuyeva attharitvā
tika-vin08t:387_5: paribhuñjiyamānaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ attano santakampi anadhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti,
tika-vin08t:387_6: heṭṭhā pana paccattharaṇampi adhiṭṭhātabbamevāti avisesena vuttattā attano santakaṃ
tika-vin08t:387_7: adhiṭṭhātabbamevāti amhākaṃ khanti, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ. Tante ṭhitaṃyeva adhiṭṭhātabbanti
tika-vin08t:387_8: ettha pacchā vītaṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhitameva hoti, puna adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthi. Sace
tika-vin08t:387_9: pana paricchedaṃ dassetvā antarantarā vītaṃ hoti, puna adhiṭṭhātabbanti vadanti.
tika-vin08t:387_10: Eseva nayoti vikappanūpagappamāṇamatte vīte tante ṭhitaṃyeva adhiṭṭhātabbanti attho.
tika-vin08t:388_1: vuttaṃ, taṃ yuttaṃ aññassa dāne viya cīvare nirālayabhāveneva pariccattattā. Keci
tika-vin08t:388_2: pana ‘hīnāyāvattanenāti bhikkhuniyā gihibhāvūpagamanenevāti etamatthaṃ gahetvā bhikkhu
tika-vin08t:388_3: pana vibbhamantopi yāva sikkhaṃ na paccakkhāti, tāva bhikkhuyevāti adhiṭṭhānaṃ na
tika-vin08t:388_4: vijahatī’ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ ‘bhikkhuniyā hīnāyāvattanenā’ti visesetvā
tika-vin08t:388_5: avuttattā. Bhikkhuniyā hi gihibhāvūpagamanena adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ visuṃ vattabbaṃ
tika-vin08t:388_6: natthi tassā vibbhamaneneva assamaṇībhāvato. Sikkhāpaccakkhānenāti pana idaṃ sace
tika-vin08t:388_7: bhikkhuliṅge ṭhitova sikkhaṃ paccakkhāti, tassa kāyalaggampi cīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:388_8: vijahatīti dassanatthaṃ vutta”nti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:388_9: “hīnāyāvattanenāti idaṃ antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpajjitvā bhikkhupaṭiññāya ṭhitassa ceva
tika-vin08t:388_10: titthiyapakkantassa ca bhikkhuniyā ca bhikkhunibhāve nirapekkhatāya gihiliṅgatitthiyaliṅgaggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:388_11: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya gihibhāvūpagamanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti keci
tika-vin08t:388_12: vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ, tadāpi tassa upasampannattā cīvarassa ca tassa santakattā
tika-vin08t:388_13: vijahanato”ti vuttaṃ, iti imāni dve vacanāni aññamaññaviruddhāni hutvā dissanti.
tika-vin08t:389_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “hīnāyāvattanena sikkhāpaccakkhānenā”ti visuṃ vuttattā hīnāyāvattante
tika-vin08t:389_1: sati sikkhaṃ appaccakkhantepi cīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati, sikkhaṃ paccakkhante
tika-vin08t:389_2: sati hīnāya anāvattantepīti adhippāyo dissati, tasmā sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya kevalaṃ
tika-vin08t:389_3: gihibhāvaṃ upagacchantassa kiñcāpi bhikkhubhāvo atthi, cīvarassa ca tassa santakattā
tika-vin08t:389_5: siyā yathā taṃ liṅgaparivattanena. Gihibhāvaṃ anupagantvā ca kevalaṃ sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:389_6: karontassa kiñcāpi bhikkhuliṅgaṃ atthi, cīvarassa ca tassa santakattā vijahanaṃ,
tika-vin08t:389_8: siyā yathā taṃ paccuddharaṇe, tasmā bhikkhu vā hotu bhikkhunī vā, hīnāyāvattissāmīti
tika-vin08t:389_9: cittena gihiliṅgaggahaṇena cīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati. Sikkhāpaccakkhānena pana
tika-vin08t:389_10: bhikkhusseva cīvaraṃ bhikkhuniyā sikkhāpaccakkhānābhāvāti ayamamhākaṃ khanti. Antimavatthuajjhāpannakatitthiyapakkantakānaṃ
tika-vin08t:389_11: pana cīvarassa adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ anāgatattā tesañca hīnāyāvattānavohārābhāvā vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:390_0: Kaniṭṭhaṅgulinakhavasenāti heṭṭhimaparicchedaṃ dasseti. Orato paratoti ettha ca “orato
tika-vin08t:390_1: chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ bhindati, parato na bhindatī”ti vuttaṃ. Kathaṃ oraparabhāvo veditabboti?
tika-vin08t:390_2: Yathā nadīparicchinne padese manussānaṃ vasanadisābhāge tīraṃ orimaṃ nāma hoti, itaradisābhāge
tika-vin08t:390_3: tīraṃ pārimaṃ nāma, tathā bhikkhūnaṃ nivāsanapārupanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ cīvarassa majjhaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:390_4: yathāvuttavidatthiādippamāṇassa padesassa oraṃ nāma, cīvarapariyantaṭṭhānaṃ paraṃ
tika-vin08t:390_5: nāma, iti lokato vā yathā ca orato bhogaṃ parato antaṃ katvā cīvaraṃ ṭhapetabbanti
tika-vin08t:390_6: vutte bhikkhuno abhimukhaṭṭhānaṃ oraṃ nāma, itaraṭṭhānaṃ paraṃ nāma, evaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t:390_7: nivāsanapārupanaṭṭhānaṃ oraṃ nāma, itaraṃ paraṃ nāma. Evaṃ sāsanato vā oraparabhāvo
tika-vin08t:390_8: veditabbo. Teneva yo pana dubbalaṭṭhāne paṭhamaṃ aggaḷaṃ datvā pacchā dubbalaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:390_9: chinditvā apaneti, adhiṭṭhānaṃ na bhijjati. Maṇḍalaparivattanepi eseva nayoti sakalasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:390_10: cīvare adhiṭṭhānabhijjanābhijjanabhāvo dassito. Tena vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ “esa
tika-vin08t:390_11: nayoti iminā pamāṇayuttesu yattha katthaci chidde adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatītiādiatthaṃ saṅgaṇhātī”ti.
tika-vin08t:391_0: Khuddakaṃ cīvaranti muṭṭhipañcakādibhedappamāṇato anūnameva khuddakacīvaraṃ. Mahantaṃ
tika-vin08t:391_1: vā khuddakaṃ karotīti ettha tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ catūsu passesu yasmiṃ padese chiddaṃ
tika-vin08t:391_2: adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahati, tasmiṃ padese samantato chinditvā khuddakaṃ karontassa adhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:391_3: na vijahatīti adhippāyo. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana vuttaṃ “mahantaṃ vā khuddakaṃ vā
tika-vin08t:391_4: karotīti ettha atimahantaṃ cīvaraṃ muṭṭhipañcakādipacchimappamāṇayuttaṃ katvā samantato
tika-vin08t:391_5: chindanenapi vicchindanakāle chijjamānaṭṭhānaṃ chiddasaṅkhaṃ na gacchati, adhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:391_6: na vijahati evāti sijjhati, ‘ghaṭetvā chindati na bhijjatī’ti vacanena ca sameti.
tika-vin08t:391_7: Parikkhāracoḷaṃ pana vikappanūpagapacchimappamāṇato ūnaṃ katvā chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:391_8: vijahati adhiṭṭhānassa anissayattā, tāni puna baddhāni ghaṭitāni puna adhiṭṭhātabbamevāti
tika-vin08t:391_9: veditabbaṃ. Keci pana ‘vassikasāṭikacīvare dvidhā chinne yadipi ekekaṃ khaṇḍaṃ pacchimappamāṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:391_10: hoti, ekasmiṃyeva khaṇḍe adhiṭṭhānaṃ tiṭṭhati, na itarasmiṃ, dve pana na vaṭṭantī’ti
tika-vin08t:392_0: 47. Sammukhe pavattā sammukhāti paccattavacanaṃ, tañca vikappanāvisesanaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin08t:392_1: “sammukhe”ti bhummatthe nissakkavacanaṃ katvāpi atthaṃ vadanti, abhimukheti attho.
tika-vin08t:392_2: Atha vā sammukhena attano vācāya eva vikappanā sammukhāvikappanā. Parammukhena vikappanā
tika-vin08t:392_3: parammukhāvikappanāti karaṇatthenapi attho daṭṭhabbo. Ayameva pāḷiyā sameti. Sannihitāsannihitabhāvanti
tika-vin08t:392_4: āsannadūrabhāvaṃ. Ettāvatā nidhetuṃ vaṭṭatīti ettakeneva vikappanākiccassa niṭṭhitattā
tika-vin08t:392_5: atirekacīvaraṃ na hotīti dasāhātikkame nissaggiyaṃ na janetīti adhippāyo. Paribhuñjituṃ…pe…
tika-vin08t:392_6: na vaṭṭatīti sayaṃ apaccuddhāraṇaparibhuñjane pācittiyaṃ, adhiṭṭhahane paresaṃ vissajjane
tika-vin08t:392_7: ca dukkaṭañca sandhāya vuttaṃ. Paribhogādayopi vaṭṭantīti paribhogavissajjanaadhiṭṭhānāni
tika-vin08t:392_8: vaṭṭanti. Api-saddena nidhetumpi vaṭṭatīti attho. Etena paccuddhārepi kate cīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:392_9: adhiṭṭhātukāmena vikappitacīvarameva hoti, na atirekacīvaraṃ, taṃ pana ticīvarādināmena
tika-vin08t:392_10: adhiṭṭhātukāmena adhiṭṭhahitabbaṃ, itarena vikappitacīvarameva katvā paribhuñjitabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:393_0: Keci pana “yaṃ vikappitacīvaraṃ, taṃ yāva paribhogakālā apaccuddharāpetvā nidahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:393_1: paribhogakāle pana sampatte paccuddharāpetvā adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Yadi
tika-vin08t:393_2: hi tato pubbepi paccuddharāpeyya, paccuddhāreneva vikappanāya vigatattā atirekacīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:393_3: nāma hoti, dasāhātikkame patteva nissaggiyaṃ, tasmā yaṃ aparibhuñjitvā ṭhapetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:393_4: tadeva vikappetabbaṃ. Paccuddhāre ca kate antodasāheyeva adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Yañca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:393_5: ‘tato paraṃ paribhogādi vaṭṭatī’tiādi vuttaṃ, taṃ pāḷiyā virujjhatī”ti vadanti, taṃ
tika-vin08t:393_6: tesaṃ matimattameva. Pāḷiyañhi “antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti vikappetī”ti ca “sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:393_7: vikappetvā apaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjeyya pācittiya”nti ca “anāpatti so vā deti, tassa
tika-vin08t:393_8: vā vissāsanto paribhuñjatī”ti ca sāmaññato vuttattā, aṭṭhakathāyañca “imaṃ cīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:393_9: vā vikappanaṃ vā paccuddharāmī”tiādinā paccuddhāraṃ adassetvā “mayhaṃ santakaṃ paribhuñja
tika-vin08t:393_10: vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ karohī”ti evaṃ attano santakattaṃ amocetvāva paribhogādivasena
tika-vin08t:393_11: paccuddhārassa vuttattā, “tato pabhuti paribhogādayopi vaṭṭantī”ti adhiṭṭhānaṃ vināpi
tika-vin08t:393_12: visuṃ paribhogassa nidhānassa ca vuttattā vikappanānantarameva paccuddharāpetvā anadhiṭṭhahitvā
tika-vin08t:393_13: eva ca ticīvararahitaṃ vikappanārahaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjituñca nidahituñca idaṃ pāṭekkaṃ
tika-vin08t:393_14: vinayakammanti khāyati. Apica bahūnaṃ pattānaṃ vikappetuṃ paccuddharetuñca vuttattā
tika-vin08t:393_15: paccuddhāre tesaṃ atirekapattatā dassitāti sijjhati tesu ekasseva adhiṭṭhātabbato,
tika-vin08t:394_0: Mittoti daḷhamitto. Sandiṭṭhoti diṭṭhamatto, na daḷhamitto. Paññattikovido na hotīti
tika-vin08t:394_1: evaṃ vikappite anantarameva evaṃ paccuddharitabbanti vinayakammaṃ na jānāti. Tenāha
tika-vin08t:394_3: paccuddhāro kātabbo”ti. Vikappitavikappanā nāmesā vaṭṭatīti adhiṭṭhitaadhiṭṭhānaṃ viyāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:395_0: 48. Evaṃ cīvare adhiṭṭhānavikappanānayaṃ dassetvā idāni patte adhiṭṭhānavikappanānayaṃ
tika-vin08t:395_1: dassento “patte panā”tiādimāha. Tattha patati piṇḍapāto etthāti patto, jinasāsanabhāvo
tika-vin08t:395_2: bhikkhābhājanaviseso. Vuttañhi “pattaṃ pakkhe dale patto, bhājane so gate tisū”ti,
tika-vin08t:395_3: tasmiṃ patte. Panāti pakkhantaratthe nipāto. Nayoti adhiṭṭhānavikappanānayo. Cīvare
tika-vin08t:395_4: vuttaadhiṭṭhānavikappanānayato aññabhūto ayaṃ vakkhamāno patte adhiṭṭhānavikappanānayo
tika-vin08t:395_5: veditabboti yojanā. Pattaṃ adhiṭṭhahantena pamāṇayuttova adhiṭṭhātabbo, na appamāṇayuttoti
tika-vin08t:395_6: sambandho. Tena pamāṇato ūnādhike patte adhiṭṭhānaṃ na ruhati, tasmā tādisaṃ pattaṃ
tika-vin08t:395_7: bhājanaparibhogena paribhuñjitabbanti dasseti. Vakkhati hi “ete bhājanaparibhogena
tika-vin08t:396_0: Dve magadhanāḷiyoti ettha magadhanāḷi nāma yā māgadhikāya tulāya aḍḍhaterasapalaparimitaṃ
tika-vin08t:396_1: udakaṃ gaṇhāti. Sīhaḷadīpe pakatināḷito khuddakā hoti, damiḷanāḷito pana mahantā.
tika-vin08t:396_2: Vuttañhetaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ “magadhanāḷi nāma aḍḍhaterasapalā hotīti andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:396_3: vuttaṃ. Sīhaḷadīpe pakatināḷi mahantā, damiḷanāḷi khuddakā, magadhanāḷipamāṇayuttā,
tika-vin08t:396_4: tāya magadhanāḷiyā diyaḍḍhanāḷi ekā sīhaḷanāḷi hotīti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutta”nti.
tika-vin08t:396_5: Atha vā magadhanāḷi nāma yā pañca kuḍuvāni ekañca muṭṭhiṃ ekāya ca muṭṭhiyā tatiyabhāgaṃ
tika-vin08t:396_6: gaṇhāti. Vuttañhetaṃ sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “magadhanāḷi nāma chapasatā nāḷīti keci. ‘Aṭṭhapasatā’ti
tika-vin08t:396_7: apare. Tattha purimānaṃ matena tipasatāya nāḷiyā dve nāḷiyo ekā magadhanāḷi hoti.
tika-vin08t:396_8: Pacchimānaṃ catupasatāya nāḷiyā dve nāḷiyo ekā magadhanāḷi. Ācariyadhammapālattherena
tika-vin08t:396_9: pana pakatiyā catumuṭṭhikaṃ kuḍuvaṃ, catukuḍuvaṃ nāḷikaṃ, tāya nāḷiyā soḷasa nāḷiyo
tika-vin08t:396_10: doṇaṃ, taṃ pana magadhanāḷiyā dvādasa nāḷiyo hontīti vuttaṃ, tasmā tena nayena magadhanāḷi
tika-vin08t:396_11: nāma pañca kuḍuvāni ekañca muṭṭhiṃ ekāya muṭṭhiyā tatiyabhāgañca gaṇhātīti veditabba”nti.
tika-vin08t:401_0: Atha vā magadhanāḷi nāma yā catukuḍuvāya nāḷiyā catasso nāḷiyo gaṇhāti. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-vin08t:401_1: vimativinodaniyaṃ “damiḷanāḷīti purāṇakanāḷiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sā ca catumuṭṭhikehi
tika-vin08t:401_2: kuḍuvehi aṭṭhakuḍuvā, tāya nāḷiyā dve nāḷiyo magadhanāḷi gaṇhāti, purāṇā pana sīhaḷanāḷi
tika-vin08t:401_3: tisso nāḷiyo gaṇhātīti vadanti, tesaṃ matena magadhanāḷi idāni vattamānāya catukuḍuvāya
tika-vin08t:401_4: damiḷanāḷiyā catunāḷikā hoti, tato magadhanāḷito upaḍḍhañca purāṇadamiḷanāḷisaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin08t:401_5: patthaṃ nāma hoti, etena ca omako nāma patto patthodanaṃ gaṇhātīti pāḷivacanaṃ sameti. Lokiyehipi –
tika-vin08t:404_0: Evaṃ loke nāḷiyā magadhanāḷi diguṇāti dassitā. Evañca gayhamāne omakapattassa ca
tika-vin08t:404_1: yāpanamattodanagāhikā ca siddhā hoti. Na hi sakkā aṭṭhakuḍuvato ūnodanagāhinā pattena
tika-vin08t:404_2: athūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pariyesitvā yāpetuṃ. Teneva vuttaṃ verañjakaṇḍaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:404_3: ‘pattho nāma nāḷimattaṃ hoti, ekassa purisassa alaṃ yāpanāyā’ti”. Vuttampi hetaṃ
tika-vin08t:404_4: jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “patthodano nālamayaṃ duvinna”nti, “ekassa dinnaṃ dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:404_5: pahotī”ti ca, tasmā idha vuttanayānusārena gahetabbanti. Ālopassa ālopassa anurūpanti
tika-vin08t:404_7: mattā nāma odanacatutthabhāgo”ti. Odanagatikānīti odanassa gati gati yesaṃ tāni odanagatikāni.
tika-vin08t:404_8: Gatīti ca okāso odanassa antopavisanasīlattā odanassa okāsoyeva tesaṃ okāso hoti,
tika-vin08t:404_9: na aññaṃ attano okāsaṃ gavesantīti attho. Bhājanaparibhogenāti udakāharaṇādinā bhājanaparibhogena.
tika-vin08t:405_0: Evaṃ pamāṇato adhiṭṭhānūpagavikappanūpagapattaṃ dassetvā idāni pākato mūlato ca taṃ
tika-vin08t:405_1: dassetuṃ “pamāṇayuttānampī”tiādimāha. Tattha ayopatto pañcahi pākehi pattoti kammārapakkaṃyeva
tika-vin08t:405_3: ayopattassa atikakkhaḷattā kammārapākena saddhiṃ pañcavārapakkoyeva samaṇasāruppanīlavaṇṇo
tika-vin08t:405_4: hoti. Mattikāpatto dvīhi pākehi pakkoti etthāpi eseva nayo. Tassa pana mudukattā
tika-vin08t:405_5: kumbhakārakapākena saddhiṃ dvivārapakkopi samaṇasāruppanīlavaṇṇo hoti. Evaṃ katoyeva
tika-vin08t:405_6: hi patto adhiṭṭhānūpago vikappanūpago ca hoti, nākato. Tena vakkhati “pāke ca mūle
tika-vin08t:405_7: ca suniṭṭhiteyeva adhiṭṭhānūpago hoti. Yo adhiṭṭhānūpago, sveva vikappanūpago”ti.
tika-vin08t:405_8: So hatthaṃ āgatopi anāgatopi adhiṭṭhātabbo vikappetabboti etena dūre ṭhitampi adhiṭṭhātuṃ
tika-vin08t:405_9: vikappetuñca labhati, ṭhapitaṭṭhānasallakkhaṇameva pamāṇanti dasseti. Idāni tamevatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:405_10: vitthāretumāha “yadi hī”tiādi. Hi-saddo vitthārajotako. Tattha pacitvā ṭhapessāmīti
tika-vin08t:406_0: Idāni pattādhiṭṭhānaṃ dassetumāha “tattha dve pattassa adhiṭṭhānā”tiādi. Tattha sāmantavihāreti
tika-vin08t:406_1: idaṃ upalakkhaṇavasena vuttaṃ, tato dūre ṭhitampi adhiṭṭhātabbameva. Ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:407: Idāni adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ dassetuṃ “evaṃ appamattassa”tyādimāha. Tattha patte vā chiddaṃ hotīti mukhavaṭṭito heṭṭhā dvaṅgulamattokāsato paṭṭhāya yattha katthaci chiddaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t:414: 49. Evaṃ pattādhiṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā idāni pattavikappanaṃ dassetuṃ “vikappane panā”tiādimāha. Taṃ cīvaravikappane vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:415_0: 50. Evaṃ vikappanānayaṃ dassetvā idāni patte bhinne kattabbavidhiṃ dassetumāha “evaṃ
tika-vin08t:415_1: adhiṭṭhahitvā”iccādi. Tattha apattoti iminā adhiṭṭhānavijahanampi dasseti. Pañcabandhanepi
tika-vin08t:415_2: patte aparipuṇṇapāke patte viya adhiṭṭhānaṃ na ruhati. “Tipupaṭṭena vā”ti vuttattā
tika-vin08t:415_3: tambalohādikappiyalohehi ayopattassa chiddaṃ chādetuṃ vaṭṭati. Teneva “lohamaṇḍalakenā”ti
tika-vin08t:415_4: vuttaṃ. Suddhehi…pe… na vaṭṭatīti idaṃ uṇhabhojane pakkhitte vilīyamānattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:415_5: Phāṇitaṃ jhāpetvā pāsāṇacuṇṇena bandhituṃ vaṭṭatīti pāsāṇacuṇṇena saddhiṃ phāṇitaṃ
tika-vin08t:415_6: pacitvā tathāpakkena pāsāṇacuṇṇena bandhituṃ vaṭṭati. Aparibhogenāti ayuttaparibhogena.
tika-vin08t:415_7: “Anujānāmi bhikkhave ādhāraka”nti vuttattā mañcapīṭhādīsu yattha katthaci ādhārakaṃ
tika-vin08t:415_8: ṭhapetvā tattha pattaṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati ādhārakaṭṭhapanokāsassa aniyamitattāti vadanti.
tika-vin08t:420_0: 51. Evaṃ adhiṭṭhānavikappanavinicchayakathaṃ dassetvā idāni cīvarena vināvāsavinicchayakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:420_1: dassetuṃ “cīvarenavināvāso”tyādimāha. Tattha cīyatīti cīvaraṃ, cayaṃ sañcayaṃ karīyatīti
tika-vin08t:420_2: attho, ariyaddhajo vatthaviseso. Idha pana ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhahitvā dhāritaṃ
tika-vin08t:420_3: cīvarattayameva. Vināti vajjanatthe nipāto. Vasanaṃ vāso, vinā vāso vināvāso, cīvarena
tika-vin08t:420_5: vā aluttasamāsaṃ katvā evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā ca vakkhati “ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena…pe…
tika-vin08t:420_6: vippavāso”ti, “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmi, imaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ adhiṭṭhāmi, imaṃ antaravāsakaṃ
tika-vin08t:420_7: adhiṭṭhāmī”ti evaṃ nāmena adhiṭṭhitānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ ekekena vippavāsoti attho,
tika-vin08t:420_8: ekenapi vinā vasituṃ na vaṭṭati, vasantassa bhikkhuno saha aruṇuggamanā cīvaraṃ nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:420_9: hoti, pācittiyañca āpajjatīti sambandho. Vasitabbanti ettha vasanakiriyā catuiriyāpathasādhāraṇā,
tika-vin08t:420_10: tasmā kāyalaggaṃ vā hotu alaggaṃ vā, aḍḍhateyyaratanassa padesassa anto katvā tiṭṭhantopi
tika-vin08t:420_11: carantopi nisinnopi nipannopi hatthapāse katvā vasanto nāma hoti.
tika-vin08t:421_0: Evaṃ sāmaññato avippavāsalakkhaṇaṃ dassetvā idāni gāmādipannarasokāsavasena visesato
tika-vin08t:421_1: dassetumāha “gāmi”ccādi. Tattha gāmanivesanāni pākaṭāneva. Udosito nāma yānādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:421_2: bhaṇḍānaṃ sālā. Aṭṭo nāma paṭirājādipaṭibāhanatthaṃ iṭṭhakāhi kato bahalabhittiko
tika-vin08t:421_3: catupañcabhūmiko patissayaviseso. Māḷo nāma ekakūṭasaṅgahito caturassapāsādo. Pāsādo
tika-vin08t:421_4: nāma dīghapāsādo. Hammiyaṃ nāma muṇḍacchadanapāsādo, muṇḍacchadanapāsādoti ca candikaṅgaṇayutto
tika-vin08t:421_5: pāsādoti vuccati. Sattho nāma jaṅghasattho vā sakaṭasattho vā. Khettaṃ nāma pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇānaṃ
tika-vin08t:421_6: viruhanaṭṭhānaṃ. Dhaññakaraṇaṃ nāma khalamaṇḍalaṃ. Ārāmo nāma pupphārāmo phalārāmo.
tika-vin08t:421_7: Vihārādayo pākaṭā eva. Tattha nivesanādīni gāmato bahi sanniviṭṭhāni gahitānīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:421_8: Antogāme ṭhitānañhi gāmaggahaṇena gahitattā gāmaparihāroyevāti. Gāmaggahaṇena ca
