tika-vin08t:422_0: Parikhāya vā parikkhittoti iminā samantā nadītaḷākādiudakena parikkhittopi parikkhittoyevāti
tika-vin08t:422_1: dasseti. Taṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvāti gharassa upari ākāse aḍḍhateyyaratanappamāṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:422_2: atikkamitvā. Sabhāye vā vatthabbanti iminā sabhāsaddassa pariyāyo sabhāyasaddo napuṃsakaliṅgo
tika-vin08t:422_3: atthīti dasseti. Sabhāsaddo hi itthiliṅgo, sabhāyasaddo napuṃsakaliṅgoti. Dvāramūle
tika-vin08t:422_4: vāti nagarassa dvāramūle vā. Tesanti sabhāyanagaradvāramūlānaṃ. Tassā vīthiyā sabhāyadvārānaṃ
tika-vin08t:422_5: gahaṇeneva tattha sabbānipi gehāni, sā ca antaravīthi gahitāyeva hoti. Ettha ca dvāravīthigharesu
tika-vin08t:422_7: Sabhā pana yadi sabbesaṃ vasanatthāya papāsadisā katā, antarārāme viya yathāsukhaṃ
tika-vin08t:422_8: vasituṃ vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ. Atiharitvā ghare nikkhipatīti vīthiṃ muñcitvā ṭhite
tika-vin08t:422_9: aññasmiṃ ghare nikkhipati. Tenāha “vīthihatthapāso na rakkhatī”ti. Purato vā pacchato
tika-vin08t:422_10: vā hatthapāseti gharassa hatthapāsaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin08t:423_0: Evaṃ gāmavasena vippavāsāvippavāsaṃ dassetvā idāni nivesanavasena dassento “sace
tika-vin08t:423_1: ekakulassa santakaṃ nivesanaṃ hotī”tiādimāha. Tattha ovarako nāma gabbhassa abbhantare
tika-vin08t:423_2: añño gabbhoti vadanti, gabbhassa vā pariyāyavacanametaṃ. Idāni udositādivasena dassento
tika-vin08t:423_3: “udositi”ccādimāha. Tattha vuttanayenevāti “ekakulassa santako udosito hoti parikkhitto
tika-vin08t:423_4: cā”tiādinā nivesane vuttanayena. Eva-saddo visesanivatti attho. Tena viseso natthīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:424_0: Idāni yesu viseso atthi, te dassento “sace ekakulassa nāvā”tiādimāha. Tattha pariyādiyitvāti
tika-vin08t:424_2: Tattha antopaviṭṭhenāti gāmassa, nadiyā vā antopaviṭṭhena. “Satthenā”ti pāṭhaseso.
tika-vin08t:424_3: Nadīparihāro labbhatīti ettha “visuṃ nadīparihārassa avuttattā gāmādīhi aññattha
tika-vin08t:424_4: viya cīvarahatthapāsoyeva nadīparihāro”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Aññe pana “iminā
tika-vin08t:424_5: aṭṭhakathāvacanena nadīparihāropi visuṃ siddhoti nadīhatthapāso na vijahitabbo”ti
tika-vin08t:424_6: vadanti. Yathā pana ajjhokāse sattabbhantaravasena araññaparihāro labbhati, evaṃ
tika-vin08t:424_7: nadiyaṃ udakukkhepavasena nadīparihāro labbhatīti katvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ nadīparihāro
tika-vin08t:424_8: visuṃ avutto siyā sattabbhantaraudakukkhepasīmānaṃ araññanadīsu abaddhasīmāvasena
tika-vin08t:424_9: labbhamānattā. Evañca sati samuddajātassaresupi parihāro avuttasiddho hoti nadiyā
tika-vin08t:424_10: samānalakkhaṇattā, nadīhatthapāso na vijahitabboti pana atthe sati nadiyā ativitthārattā
tika-vin08t:424_11: bahusādhāraṇattā ca antonadiyaṃ cīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā nadīhatthapāse ṭhitena cīvarassa
tika-vin08t:424_12: pavattiṃ jānituṃ na sakkā bhaveyya. Esa nayo samuddajātassaresupi. Antoudakukkhepe
tika-vin08t:424_13: vā tassa hatthapāse vā ṭhitena pana sakkāti ayaṃ amhākaṃ attanomati, vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:424_14: Vihārasīmanti avippavāsasīmaṃ sandhāyāha. Ettha ca vihārassa nānākulasantakabhāvepi
tika-vin08t:424_16: tattha satthaparihāro na labbhatīti “vihāraṃ gantvā vasitabba”nti vuttaṃ. Satthasamīpeti
tika-vin08t:425_0: Yasmā “nānākulassa parikkhitte khette cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā khettadvāramūle vā tassa
tika-vin08t:425_1: hatthapāse vā vatthabba”nti vuttaṃ, tasmā dvāramūlato aññattha khettepi vasantena
tika-vin08t:426_0: Vihāro nāma saparikkhitto vā aparikkhitto vā sakalo āvāsoti vadanti. Yasmiṃ vihāreti
tika-vin08t:426_1: ettha pana ekagehameva vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “vihāro nāma upacārasīmā. Yasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:426_2: vihāreti tassa antopariveṇādiṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Ekakulādisantakatā cettha
tika-vin08t:427_0: Yaṃ majjhanhike kāle samantā chāyā pharatīti yadā mahāvīthiyaṃ ujukameva gacchantaṃ
tika-vin08t:427_1: sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ majjhanhikaṃ pāpuṇāti, tadā yaṃ okāsaṃ chāyā pharati, taṃ sandhāya
tika-vin08t:427_2: vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “chāyāya phuṭṭhokāsassāti ujukaṃ avikkhittaleḍḍupātabbhantaraṃ
tika-vin08t:427_3: sandhāya vadatī”ti vuttaṃ. Agamanapatheti tadaheva gantvā nivattetuṃ asakkuṇeyyake
tika-vin08t:427_4: samuddamajjhe ye dīpakā, tesūti yojanā. Itarasminti puratthimadisāya cīvare.
tika-vin08t:428_0: 52. Nadiṃ otaratīti hatthapāsaṃ muñcitvā otarati. Nāpajjatīti paribhogapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin08t:428_1: nāpajjati. Tenāha “so hī”tiādi. Aparibhogārahattāti iminā nissaggiyacīvaraṃ anissajjitvā
tika-vin08t:428_2: paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ acittakanti siddhaṃ. Ekaṃ pārupitvā ekaṃ aṃsakūṭe ṭhapetvā
tika-vin08t:428_3: gantabbanti idaṃ bahūnaṃ sañcaraṇaṭṭhāne evaṃ akatvā gamanaṃ na sāruppanti katvā
tika-vin08t:428_4: vuttaṃ, na āpattiaṅgattā. Bahigāme ṭhapetvāpi apārupitabbatāya vuttaṃ “vinayakammaṃ
tika-vin08t:428_5: kātabba”nti. Atha vā vihāre sabhāgaṃ bhikkhuṃ na passati, evaṃ sati āsanasālaṃ gantvā
tika-vin08t:428_6: vinayakammaṃ kātabbanti yojanā. Āsanasālaṃ gacchantena kiṃ tīhi cīvarehi gantabbanti
tika-vin08t:428_7: āha “santaruttarenā”ti naṭṭhacīvarassa santaruttarasādiyanato. Saṅghāṭi pana kiṃ
tika-vin08t:428_8: kātabbāti āha “saṅghāṭiṃ bahigāme ṭhapetvā”ti. Uttarāsaṅge ca bahigāme ṭhapitasaṅghāṭiyañca
tika-vin08t:428_9: paṭhamaṃ vinayakammaṃ katvā pacchā uttarāsaṅgaṃ nivāsetvā antaravāsake kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:428_10: Ettha ca bahigāme ṭhapitassapi vinayakammavacanato parammukhāpi ṭhitaṃ nissajjituṃ,
tika-vin08t:429_0: Daharānaṃ gamane saussāhattā “nissayo pana na paṭippassambhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Muhuttaṃ…pe…
tika-vin08t:429_1: paṭippassambhatīti saussāhatte gamanassa upacchinnattā vuttaṃ, tesaṃ pana purāruṇā
tika-vin08t:429_2: uṭṭhahitvā saussāhena gacchantānaṃ aruṇe antarā uṭṭhitepi na paṭippassambhati “yāva
tika-vin08t:429_3: aruṇuggamanā sayantī”ti vuttattā. Teneva “gāmaṃ pavisitvā…pe… na paṭippassambhatī”ti
tika-vin08t:429_4: vuttaṃ. Aññamaññassa vacanaṃ aggahetvātiādimhi saussāhattā gamanakkhaṇe paṭippassaddhi
tika-vin08t:429_5: na vuttā. Dhenubhayenāti taruṇavacchagāvīnaṃ ādhāvitvā siṅgena paharaṇabhayena. Nissayo
tika-vin08t:429_6: ca paṭippassambhatīti ettha dhenubhayādīhi ṭhitānaṃ yāva bhayavūpasamā ṭhātabbato
tika-vin08t:429_7: “antoaruṇeyeva gamissāmī”ti niyametuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā vuttaṃ. Yattha pana evaṃ niyametuṃ
tika-vin08t:429_8: sakkā, tattha antarā aruṇe uggatepi nissayo na paṭippassambhati bhesajjatthāya gāmaṃ
tika-vin08t:430_0: Antosīmāyaṃ gāmanti avippavāsasīmāsammutito pacchā patiṭṭhāpitagāmaṃ sandhāya vadati
tika-vin08t:430_1: gāmañca gāmūpacārañca ṭhapetvā sammannitabbato. Paviṭṭhānanti ācariyantevāsikānaṃ
tika-vin08t:430_2: visuṃ visuṃ gatānaṃ avippavāsasīmattā neva cīvarāni nissaggiyāni honti, saussāhatāya
tika-vin08t:430_3: na nissayo paṭippassambhati. Antarāmaggeti dhammaṃ sutvā āgacchantānaṃ antarāmagge.
tika-vin08t:435_0: 53. Evaṃ cīvaravippavāsavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni bhaṇḍapaṭisāmanavinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ
tika-vin08t:435_1: “bhaṇḍassa paṭisāmana”ntiādimāha. Tattha bhaḍitabbaṃ bhājetabbanti bhaṇḍaṃ, bhaḍitabbaṃ
tika-vin08t:435_2: icchitabbanti vā bhaṇḍaṃ, bhaṇḍanti paribhaṇḍanti sattā etenāti vā bhaṇḍaṃ, mūladhanaṃ,
tika-vin08t:437_0: Tassa bhaṇḍassa, paṭisāmiyate paṭisāmanaṃ, rakkhaṇaṃ gopananti attho. Tenāha “paresaṃ
tika-vin08t:437_1: bhaṇḍassa gopana”nti. Mātu kaṇṇapiḷandhanaṃ tālapaṇṇampīti pi-saddo sambhāvanattho.
tika-vin08t:437_2: Tena pageva aññātakānaṃ santakanti dasseti. Gihisantakanti iminā pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ
tika-vin08t:437_3: santakaṃ paṭisāmetuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. Bhaṇḍāgārikasīsenāti etena vissāsaggāhādinā
tika-vin08t:437_4: gahetvā paṭisāmentassa anāpattīti dasseti. Tena vakkhati “attano atthāya gahetvā
tika-vin08t:437_5: paṭisāmetabba”nti. Chandenapi bhayenapīti vaḍḍhakīādīsu chandena, rājavallabhādīsu
tika-vin08t:437_6: bhayena balakkārena pātetvā gatesu ca paṭisāmetuṃ vaṭṭatīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:438_0: Saṅgopanatthāya attano hatthe nikkhittassa bhaṇḍassa guttaṭṭhāne paṭisāmanapayogaṃ
tika-vin08t:438_1: vinā “nāhaṃ gaṇhāmī”tiādinā aññasmiṃ payoge akate rajjasaṅkhobhādikāle “na dāni tassa
tika-vin08t:438_2: dassāmi, na mayhaṃ dāni dassatī”ti ubhohipi sakasakaṭṭhāne nisīditvā dhuranikkhepe
tika-vin08t:438_3: katepi avahāro natthi. Keci panettha “pārājikameva paṭisāmanapayogassa katattā”ti
tika-vin08t:438_4: vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ, na sārato paccetabbaṃ. Paṭisāmanakāle hissa theyyacittaṃ
tika-vin08t:438_5: natthi, “na dāni tassa dassāmī”ti theyyacittuppattikkhaṇe ca sāmino dhuranikkhepacittappavattiyā
tika-vin08t:438_6: hetubhūto kāyavacīpayogo natthi, yena so āpattiṃ āpajjeyya. Na hi akiriyasamuṭṭhānā
tika-vin08t:438_7: ayaṃ āpattīti. Dāne saussāho, rakkhati tāvāti avahāraṃ sandhāya avuttattā “nāhaṃ
tika-vin08t:438_8: gaṇhāmī”tiādinā musāvādakaraṇe pācittiyameva hoti, na dukkaṭaṃ theyyacittābhāvena
tika-vin08t:439_0: Yadipi mukhena dassāmīti vadati…pe… pārājikanti ettha katarapayogena āpatti, na tāva
tika-vin08t:439_1: paṭhamena bhaṇḍapaṭisāmanapayogena tadā theyyacittabhāvā, nāpi “dassāmī”ti kathanapayogena
tika-vin08t:439_2: tadā theyyacitte vijjamānepi payogassa kappiyattāti? Vuccate – sāminā “dehī”ti bahuso
tika-vin08t:439_3: yāciyamānopi adatvā yena payogena attano adātukāmataṃ sāmikassa ñāpesi, yena ca so
tika-vin08t:439_4: adātukāmo ayaṃ vikkhipatīti ñatvā dhuraṃ nikkhipati, teneva payogenassa āpatti. Na
tika-vin08t:439_5: hettha upanikkhittabhaṇḍe pariyāyena mutti atthi. Adātukāmatāya hi “kadā te dinnaṃ,
tika-vin08t:439_6: kattha te dinna”ntiādipariyāyavacanenapi sāmikassa dhurenikkhipāpite āpattiyeva.
tika-vin08t:439_7: Teneva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “kiṃ tumhe bhaṇatha…pe… ubhinnaṃ dhuranikkhepena bhikkhuno
tika-vin08t:439_8: pārājika”nti. Parasantakassa parehi gaṇhāpane eva hi pariyāyato mutti, na sabbatthāti
tika-vin08t:439_9: gahetabbaṃ. Attano hatthe nikkhittattāti ettha attano hatthe sāminā dinnatāya bhaṇḍāgārikaṭṭhāne
tika-vin08t:439_10: ṭhitattā ca ṭhānācāvanepi natthi avahāro, theyyacittena pana gahaṇe dukkaṭato na
tika-vin08t:439_11: muccatīti veditabbaṃ. Eseva nayoti avahāro natthi, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ pana hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:440_1: na kevalaṃ gihīnaṃ eva, atha kho tāpasaparibbājakādīnampi santakaṃ paṭisāmetuṃ na
tika-vin08t:440_2: vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Naṭṭhepi gīvā na hoti, kasmā? Asampaṭicchāpitattāti attho. Dutiye
tika-vin08t:440_3: eseva nayoti gīvā na hoti, kasmā? Ajānitattā. Tatiye ca eseva nayoti gīvā na hoti,
tika-vin08t:440_4: kasmā? Paṭikkhipitattā. Ettha ca kāyena vā vācāya vā cittena vā paṭikkhittopi paṭikkhittoyeva nāma hoti.
tika-vin08t:441_0: Tasseva gīvā hoti, na sesabhikkhūnaṃ, kasmā? Tasseva bhaṇḍāgārikassa bhaṇḍāgāre issarabhāvato.
tika-vin08t:441_1: Bhaṇḍāgārikassa gīvā na hoti alasajātikasseva pamādena haritattā. Dutiye bhaṇḍāgārikassa
tika-vin08t:441_2: gīvā na hoti tassa anārocitattā. Naṭṭhe tassa gīvā tena ṭhapitattā. Tasseva gīvā,
tika-vin08t:441_3: na aññesaṃ tena bhaṇḍāgārikena sampaṭicchitattā ṭhapitattā ca. Natthi gīvā tena paṭikkhipitattā.
tika-vin08t:441_4: Naṭṭhaṃ sunaṭṭhameva bhaṇḍāgārikassa asampaṭicchāpanato. Naṭṭhe gīvā tena ṭhapitattā.
tika-vin08t:441_5: Sabbaṃ tassa gīvā tassa bhaṇḍāgārikassa pamādena haraṇato. Tattheva upacāre vijjamāneti
tika-vin08t:442_0: 55. Mayi ca mate saṅghassa ca senāsane vinaṭṭheti ettha kevalaṃ saṅghassa senāsanaṃ
tika-vin08t:442_1: mā vinassīti iminā adhippāyena vivaritumpi vaṭṭatiyevāti vadanti. “Taṃ māressāmī”ti
tika-vin08t:442_2: ettake vuttepi vivarituṃ vaṭṭati “gilānapakkhe ṭhitattā avisayo”ti vuttattā. Maraṇato
tika-vin08t:442_3: hi paraṃ gelaññaṃ avisayattañca natthi. “Dvāraṃ chinditvā harissāmā”ti ettake vuttepi
tika-vin08t:442_4: vivarituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Sahāyehi bhavitabbanti tehipi bhikkhācārādīhi pariyesitvā
tika-vin08t:442_5: attano santakampi kiñci kiñci dātabbanti vuttaṃ hoti. Ayañhi sāmīcīti bhaṇḍāgāre
tika-vin08t:442_6: vasantānaṃ idaṃ vattaṃ. Lolamahātheroti mando momūho ākiṇṇavihārī sadā kīḷāpasuto vā mahāthero.
tika-vin08t:443_0: 56. Itarehīti tasmiṃyeva gabbhe vasantehi bhikkhūhi. Vihārarakkhaṇavāre niyutto vihāravāriko,
tika-vin08t:443_1: vuḍḍhapaṭipāṭiyā attano vāre vihārarakkhaṇako. Nivāpanti bhattavetanaṃ. Corānaṃ paṭipathaṃ
tika-vin08t:443_2: gatesūti corānaṃ āgamanaṃ ñatvā “paṭhamataraṃyeva gantvā saddaṃ karissāmā”ti corānaṃ
tika-vin08t:443_3: abhimukhaṃ gatesu. “Corehi haṭabhaṇḍaṃ āharissāmā”ti tesaṃ anupathaṃ gatesupi eseva
tika-vin08t:443_4: nayo. Nibaddhaṃ katvāti “asukakule yāgubhattaṃ vihāravārikānaṃyevā”ti evaṃ niyamanaṃ
tika-vin08t:443_5: katvā. Dve tisso yāgusalākā ca cattāri pañca salākabhattāni ca labhamānovāti idaṃ
tika-vin08t:443_6: nidassanamattaṃ, tato ūnaṃ vā hotu adhikaṃ vā, attano ca veyyāvaccakarassa ca yāpanamattaṃ
tika-vin08t:443_7: labhanameva pamāṇanti gahetabbaṃ. Nissitake jaggāpentīti attano attano nissitake
tika-vin08t:443_8: bhikkhācariyāya posentā nissitakehi vihāraṃ jaggāpenti. Asahāyassāti sahāyarahitassa.
tika-vin08t:443_9: “Asahāyassa adutiyassā”ti pāṭho yutto. Pacchimaṃ purimasseva vevacanaṃ. Asahāyassa
tika-vin08t:443_10: vā attadutiyassa vāti imasmiṃ pana pāṭhe ekena ānītaṃ dvinnaṃ nappahotīti attadutiyassapi
tika-vin08t:443_11: vāro nivāritoti vadanti, taṃ “yassa sabhāgo bhikkhu bhattaṃ ānetvā dātā natthī”ti
tika-vin08t:443_12: iminā na sameti, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “attadutiyassāti appicchassa.
tika-vin08t:443_13: Attāsarīrameva dutiyo, na aññoti hi attadutiyo, tadubhayassapi atthassa vibhāvanaṃ
tika-vin08t:443_14: ‘yassā’tiādi. Etena sabbena ekekassa vāro na pāpetabboti dassetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:444_1: ṭhapenti. Taṃ gahetvāti taṃ ārāmikādīhi dīyamānaṃ bhāgaṃ gahetvā. Upajīvantena ṭhātabbanti
tika-vin08t:444_2: abbhokāsikarukkhamūlikenapi pākavattaṃ upanissāya jīvantena attano pattacīvararakkhaṇatthāya
tika-vin08t:444_3: vihāravāre sampatte ṭhātabbaṃ. Na gāhāpetabboti ettha yassa abbhokāsikassapi attano
tika-vin08t:444_4: adhikaparikkhāro ce ṭhapito atthi, cīvarādisaṅghikabhāgepi ālayo atthi, sopi gāhāpetabbo.
tika-vin08t:444_5: Paripucchanti pucchitapañhavissajjanaṃ, aṭṭhakathaṃ vā. Diguṇanti aññehi labbhamānato
tika-vin08t:449_0: 57. Evaṃ bhaṇḍapaṭisāmanavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni kayavikkayavinicchayaṃ kathento
tika-vin08t:449_1: “kayavikkayasamāpattī”tiādimāha. Tattha kayanaṃ kayo, parabhaṇḍassa gahaṇaṃ, vikkayanaṃ
tika-vin08t:449_2: vikkayo, sakabhaṇḍassa dānaṃ, kayo ca vikkayo ca kayavikkayaṃ. Samāpajjanaṃ samāpatti,
tika-vin08t:449_3: tassa duvidhassa kiriyassa karaṇaṃ. Tassarūpaṃ dasseti “iminā”tiādinā.
tika-vin08t:450_1: pana pitaraṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena viññattisaddhādeyyavinipātanañca na hoti “iminā
tika-vin08t:450_2: idaṃ dehī”ti vadantoti dasseti, kayavikkayaṃ pana āpajjati “iminā idaṃ dehī”ti vadantoti
tika-vin08t:450_3: dasseti. Iminā ca upari aññātakantyādinā ca sesañātakaṃ “imaṃ dehī”ti vadato viññatti
tika-vin08t:450_4: na hoti, “imaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti pana dadato saddhādeyyavinipātanaṃ, “iminā imaṃ dehī”ti
tika-vin08t:450_5: kayavikkayaṃ āpajjato nissaggiyanti ayampi attho dassito hoti migapadavalañjananyāyena.
tika-vin08t:450_6: Tasmāiccādikepi “mātāpitūhi saddhiṃ kayavikkayaṃ, sesañātakehi saddhiṃ dve āpattiyo,
tika-vin08t:450_7: aññātakehi saddhiṃ tisso āpattiyo”ti vattabbe teneva nyāyena ñātuṃ sakkāti katvā
tika-vin08t:450_8: na vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, aññathā abyāpitadoso siyā.
tika-vin08t:451_0: “Idaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā idaṃ karothā”ti vutte pubbāparasambandhāya kiriyāya vuttattā
tika-vin08t:451_1: “iminā idaṃ dehī”ti vuttasadisaṃ hoti. Idaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñja, idaṃ nāma karohī”ti vā,
tika-vin08t:451_2: “idaṃ bhattaṃ bhuttosi, idaṃ nāma karohi, idaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjissasi, idaṃ nāma karohī”ti
tika-vin08t:451_3: pana vutte asambandhāya kiriyāya vuttattā kayavikkayo na hoti. Vighāsādānaṃ bhattadāne
tika-vin08t:451_4: ca anapekkhattā saddhādeyyavinipātanaṃ na hoti, kārāpane hatthakammamattattā viññatti
tika-vin08t:451_5: na hoti, tasmā vaṭṭati. “Ettha cā”tiādinā asatipi nissaggiyavatthumhi pācittiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:452_0: Agghaṃ pucchituṃ vaṭṭati, ettāvatā kayavikkayo na hotīti attho. Gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:452_1: “iminā idaṃ dehī”ti avuttattā kayavikkayo na hoti, mūlassa atthitāya viññattipi na
tika-vin08t:452_2: hoti. Patto na gahetabbo parabhaṇḍassa mahagghatāya. Evaṃ sati kathaṃ kātabboti āha
tika-vin08t:452_3: “mama vatthu appagghanti ācikkhitabba”nti. Bhaṇḍaṃ agghāpetvā kāretabbataṃ āpajjati
tika-vin08t:452_4: theyyāvahārasambhavato, ūnamāsakaṃ ce agghati, dukkaṭaṃ. Māsakato paṭṭhāya yāva ūnapañcamāsakaṃ
tika-vin08t:452_5: ce agghati, thullaccayaṃ. Pañcamāsakaṃ ce agghati, pārājikanti vuttaṃ hoti. Deti,
tika-vin08t:452_6: vaṭṭati puññatthāya dinnattā adhikassa. Kappiyakārakassa pana…pe… vaṭṭati ubhato
tika-vin08t:452_7: kappiyabhaṇḍattā. Ekato ubhato vā ce akappiyabhaṇḍaṃ hoti, na vaṭṭati. “Mā gaṇhāhī”ti
tika-vin08t:453_0: Aññena appaṭiggahitena attho, kasmā? Sattāhakālikattā telassa. Paṭiggahitatelaṃ sattāhaparamaṃ
tika-vin08t:453_1: eva ṭhapetabbaṃ, tasmā tato paraṃ ṭhapitukāmassa appaṭiggahitatelena attho hoti.
tika-vin08t:453_2: Appaṭiggahitaṃ dūseyya, aniyamitakālaṃ appaṭiggahitatelaṃ nāḷiyaṃ avasiṭṭhapaṭiggahitatelaṃ
tika-vin08t:454_0: 58. Idaṃ pattacatukkaṃ veditabbanti akappiyapattacatukkaṃ vuttaṃ, pañcamo pana kappiyo.
tika-vin08t:454_1: Tena vakkhati “ayaṃ patto sabbakappiyo buddhānampi paribhogāraho”ti. Ayaṃ patto mahāakappiyo
tika-vin08t:454_2: nāma, kasmā? Rūpiyaṃ uggaṇhitvā ayabījaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā tena lohena pattassa kāritattā,
tika-vin08t:454_3: evaṃ bījato paṭṭhāya dūsitattā. Yathā ca tatiyapārājikavisaye thāvarapayogesu pāsasūlādīsu
tika-vin08t:454_4: mūlato paṭṭhāya kāritesu kismiñci daṇḍamatte vā vākamatte vā avasiṭṭhe sati na muccati,
tika-vin08t:454_5: sabbasmiṃ naṭṭheyeva muccati, evamidhāpi bījato paṭṭhāya katattā tasmiṃ patte kismiñci
tika-vin08t:454_6: patte avasiṭṭhepi kappiyo bhavituṃ na sakkā. Tathā ca vakkhati “sacepi taṃ vināsetvā
tika-vin08t:454_7: thālakaṃ kāreti, tampi akappiya”ntyādi. Evaṃ santepi dutiyapatte viya mūle ca mūlassāmikānaṃ,
tika-vin08t:454_8: patte ca pattassāmikānaṃ dinne kappiyo kātuṃ sakkā bhaveyya nu khoti āsaṅkāyamāha
tika-vin08t:454_9: “na sakkā kenaci upāyena kappiyo kātu”nti. Tassattho – dutiyapattaṃ rūpiyaṃ paṭiggaṇhitvā
tika-vin08t:454_10: gihīhi pariniṭṭhāpitameva kiṇāti, na bījato paṭṭhāya dūseti, tasmā dutiyapatto kappiyo
tika-vin08t:454_11: kātuṃ sakkā, idha pana bījato paṭṭhāya dūsitattā tena bhikkhunā taṃ pattaṃ puna ayapāsāṇabījaṃ
tika-vin08t:454_12: kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā, paṭiggahitarūpiyassa ca vaḷañjitattā puna sāmikānaṃ dātuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā
tika-vin08t:454_13: na sakkā kenaci upāyena kappiyo kātunti.
tika-vin08t:455_0: Idāni taṃ asakkuṇeyyattaṃ aññena pakārena vitthāretuṃ “sacepī”tiādimāha. Iminā kiñcipi
tika-vin08t:455_1: ayavatthumhi avasiṭṭhe sati akappiyova hotīti dasseti. Tena vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:455_2: “rūpiyaṃ uggaṇhitvāti idaṃ ukkaṭṭhavasena vuttaṃ, muttādidukkaṭavatthumpi uggaṇhitvā
tika-vin08t:455_3: kāritampi pañcannaṃ na vaṭṭati eva. Samuṭṭhāpetīti sayaṃ gantvā vā ‘imaṃ kahāpaṇādiṃ
tika-vin08t:455_4: kammakārānaṃ datvā bījaṃ samuṭṭhāpehī’ti aññaṃ āṇāpetvā vā samuṭṭhāpeti. Mahāakappiyoti
tika-vin08t:455_5: attanāva bījato paṭṭhāya dūsitattā aññassa mūlassāmikassa abhāvato vuttaṃ. So hi
tika-vin08t:455_6: corehi acchinnopi puna laddho jānantassa kassacīpi na vaṭṭati. Yadi hi vaṭṭeyya,
tika-vin08t:455_7: taḷākādīsu viya ‘acchinno vaṭṭatī’ti ācariyā vadeyyuṃ. Na sakkā kenaci upāyenāti
tika-vin08t:455_8: saṅghassa vissajjanena corādiacchindanenapi kappiyo kātuṃ na sakkā, idañca tena rūpena
tika-vin08t:455_9: ṭhitaṃ tammūlakena vatthamuttādirūpena ṭhitañca sandhāya vuttaṃ. Dukkaṭavatthumpi
tika-vin08t:455_10: hi tammūlakakappiyavatthu ca na sakkā kenaci tena rūpena kappiyaṃ kātuṃ. Yadi pana
tika-vin08t:455_11: so bhikkhu tena kappiyavatthunā, dukkaṭavatthunā vā puna rūpiyaṃ cetāpeyya, taṃ rūpiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:455_12: nissajjāpetvā aññesaṃ kappiyaṃ kātumpi sakkā bhaveyyāti daṭṭhabba”nti. Yaṃ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:455_13: papañcitaṃ, yañca tameva gahetvā porāṇaṭīkāyaṃ papañcitaṃ, taṃ vitthāretvā vuccamānaṃ
tika-vin08t:455_14: ativitthāritañca bhavissati, sotūnañca dubbiññeyyaṃ, tasmā ettakameva vadimha, atthikehi
tika-vin08t:455_15: pana tesu tesu pakaraṇesu oloketvā gahetabbanti.
tika-vin08t:456_0: Dutiyapatte pañcannampi sahadhammikānaṃ na kappatīti rūpiyassa paṭiggahitattā, kayavikkayassa
tika-vin08t:456_1: ca katattā. Sakkā pana kappiyo kātunti gihīhi pariniṭṭhāpitapattasseva kiṇitattā,
tika-vin08t:456_2: bījato paṭṭhāya adūsitattā, mūlamūlassāmikānañca pattapattassāmikānañca vijjamānattā.
tika-vin08t:456_3: Yathā pana sakkā hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “mūle”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t:457_0: Tatiyapatte sadisoyevāti “pañcannampi sahadhammikānaṃ na vaṭṭati, sakkā pana kappiyo
tika-vin08t:457_1: kātu”nti imaṃ nayaṃ niddisati. Nanu tatiyapatto kappiyavohārena gahito, atha kasmā
tika-vin08t:457_2: akappiyoti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “kappiyavohārena gahitopi dutiyapattasadisoyeva, mūlassa
tika-vin08t:457_3: sampaṭicchitattā akappiyo”ti. Dutiyacodanaṃ pana sayameva vadati. Ettha ca “dutiyapattasadisoyevā”ti
tika-vin08t:457_4: vuttattā mūle ca mūlassāmikānaṃ, patte ca pattassāmikānaṃ dinne kappiyo hoti, kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin08t:457_5: datvā gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbo. Mūlassa anissaṭṭhattāti yena uggahitamūlena
tika-vin08t:457_6: patto kīto, tassa mūlassa saṅghamajjhe anissaṭṭhattā. Etena rūpiyameva nissajjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:457_7: na tammūlakaṃ arūpiyanti dasseti. Yadi hi tena sampaṭicchitamūlaṃ saṅghamajjhe nissaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin08t:457_8: siyā, tena kappiyena kammena ārāmikādīhi gahetvā dinnapatto rūpiyapaṭiggāhakaṃ ṭhapetvā sesānaṃ vaṭṭeyya.
tika-vin08t:458_0: Catutthapatte dubbicāritattāti “ime kahāpaṇe datvā idaṃ dehī”ti gahitattā gihisantakānaṃ
tika-vin08t:458_1: kahāpaṇānaṃ duṭṭhuvicāritattā etassa vicāraṇakassa bhikkhuno eva na vaṭṭatīti attho.
tika-vin08t:458_2: Mūlassa asampaṭicchitattāti etena mūlassa gihisantakattaṃ dasseti, teneva pattassa
tika-vin08t:458_3: rūpiyasaṃvohārena anuppannatañca dasseti, tena ca tassa pattassa nissajjiyābhāvaṃ,
tika-vin08t:458_4: bhikkhussa ca pācittiyābhāvaṃ dīpeti, tena ca dubbicāritamattena dukkaṭamattabhāvaṃ
tika-vin08t:458_5: pakāseti. Nissajjīti idañca dānavasena vuttaṃ, na vinayakammavasena. Teneva ca “sappissa
tika-vin08t:459: Pañcamapatte sabbakappiyoti attano ca pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānañca buddhapaccekabuddhānañca kappiyo. Tenāha “buddhānampi paribhogāraho”ti.
tika-vin08t:464_1: kathento “rūpiyādipaṭiggaho”tiādimāha. Tattha saññāṇatthāya kataṃ rūpaṃ ettha atthīti
tika-vin08t:464_2: rūpiyaṃ, yaṃ kiñci vohārūpagaṃ dhanaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ “idha pana
tika-vin08t:464_3: yaṃ kiñci vohāragamanīyaṃ kahāpaṇādi adhippeta”nti. Paṭhamaṃ ādīyatītiādi, kiṃ taṃ?
tika-vin08t:464_4: Rūpiyaṃ, rūpiyaṃ ādi yesaṃ teti rūpiyādayo, dāsidāsakhettavatthuādayo, paṭiggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:464_5: paṭiggaho, sampaṭicchananti attho. Rūpiyādīnaṃ paṭiggaho rūpiyādipaṭiggaho. Jātasamaye
tika-vin08t:464_6: uppannaṃ rūpameva rūpaṃ assa bhavati, na vikāramāpajjatīti jātarūpaṃ, suvaṇṇaṃ. Dhavalasabhāvatāya
tika-vin08t:464_7: sattehi rañjiyateti rajataṃ, sajjhu. Jātarūpena kato māsako jātarūpamāsako. Rajatena
tika-vin08t:464_8: kato māsako rajatamāsakoti idaṃ catubbidhameva nissaggiyavatthu hoti, na lohamāsakādayoti
tika-vin08t:464_10: katopi lohamāsakoyevāti dasseti. Kiṃ idameva nissaggiyavatthu hoti, udāhu muttādayopīti
tika-vin08t:464_11: āha “muttā…pe… dukkaṭavatthū”ti. Imesaṃ dvinnaṃ vatthūnaṃ ko visesoti āha “tattha
tika-vin08t:464_12: nissaggiyavatthuṃ…pe… dukkaṭamevā”ti. Tattha nissaggiyavatthu attano atthāya nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:464_13: pācittiyaṃ, sesānaṃ atthāya dukkaṭaṃ, dukkaṭavatthu sabbesaṃ atthāya dukkaṭamevāti yojanā.
tika-vin08t:465_0: Idāni tesu vatthūsu kappiyākappiyavinicchayaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ āha “tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo”ti.
tika-vin08t:465_1: Tattha sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭati, kasmā? “Idaṃ saṅghassa dammī”ti akappiyavohārena
tika-vin08t:465_2: dinnattā. Datvā pakkamati, vaṭṭati, kasmā? Saṅghassa hatthe adatvā vaḍḍhakīādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:465_3: hatthe dinnattā. Evampi vaṭṭati gihīnaṃ hatthe ṭhapitattā. Paṭikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati
tika-vin08t:465_5: ṭhapethā”ti vuttattā. Paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi āpattīti “saṅghassa dammī”ti vuttattā
tika-vin08t:465_6: paṭiggahaṇe pācittiyaṃ, paribhoge dukkaṭaṃ. Sveva sāpattikoti dukkaṭāpattiṃ sandhāya
tika-vin08t:465_7: vadati. Vadati, vaṭṭati “tumhe paccaye paribhuñjathā”ti kappiyavohārena vuttattā.
tika-vin08t:465_8: Cīvaratthāya dinnaṃ cīvareyeva upanetabbaṃ, kasmā? Yathā dāyakā vadanti, tathā paṭipajjitabbattā.
tika-vin08t:465_10: Iminā avissajjiyaavebhaṅgiyabhāvaṃ dasseti. Evaṃ santepi āpadāsu kattabbavidhiṃ dassento
tika-vin08t:466_0: 60. Evaṃ nissaggiyavatthūsu kattabbavidhiṃ dassetvā idāni dukkaṭavatthūsu kattabbavidhiṃ
tika-vin08t:466_1: dassento “sace koci mayha”ntyādimāha. Ettha pana paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi āpattīti
tika-vin08t:466_2: dukkaṭameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Taḷākassapi khettasaṅgahitattā tassa paṭiggahaṇepi āpatti
tika-vin08t:466_3: vuttā. “Cattāro paccaye paribhuñjathāti detīti ettha ‘bhikkhusaṅghassa cattāro paccaye
tika-vin08t:466_4: paribhuñjituṃ taḷākaṃ dammī’ti vā ‘catupaccayaparibhogatthaṃ taḷākaṃ dammī’ti vā
tika-vin08t:466_5: vadati, vaṭṭatiyeva. ‘Ito taḷākato uppanne paccaye dammī’ti vutte pana vattabbameva
tika-vin08t:466_6: natthī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyampi tatheva vatvā “idañca saṅghassa
tika-vin08t:466_7: dīyamānaññeva sandhāya vuttaṃ, puggalassa pana evampi dinnaṃ taḷākakhettādi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:466_9: taḷākaṃ atthi, taṃ katha’nti hi ādinā sabbattha saṅghavaseneva vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:467_0: Kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapethāti vutteti sāmīcivasena vuttaṃ, avuttepi ṭhapentassa na doso
tika-vin08t:467_1: atthi. Tenāha “udakaṃ vāretuṃ labbhatī”ti. Yasmā parasantakaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ nāsetuṃ
tika-vin08t:467_2: na vaṭṭati, tasmā “na sassakāle”ti vuttaṃ. Sassakālepi tāsetvā muñcituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t:467_3: amuñcato pana bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Janapadassa sāmikoti imināva yo taṃ janapadaṃ vicāreti,
tika-vin08t:467_4: tenapi acchinditvā dinnaṃ vaṭṭatiyevāti vadanti. Puna detīti acchinditvā puna deti,
tika-vin08t:467_5: evampi vaṭṭatīti sambandho. Iminā yena kenaci issarena “pariccattamidaṃ bhikkhūhi
tika-vin08t:467_6: assāmika”nti saññāya attano gahetvā dinnaṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Udakavāhakanti udakamātikaṃ.
tika-vin08t:467_7: Kappiyavohārepi vinicchayaṃ vakkhāmīti pāṭhaseso. Udakavasenāti udakaparibhogatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t:467_8: Suddhacittānanti udakaparibhogatthameva. Idaṃ sahatthena ca akappiyavohārena ca karonte
tika-vin08t:467_9: sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Sassasampādanattha”nti evaṃ asuddhacittānampi pana sayaṃ akatvā
tika-vin08t:467_10: kappiyavohārena āṇāpetuṃ vaṭṭati eva. Kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti idaṃ sahatthādinā
tika-vin08t:467_11: katataḷākattā assāruppanti vuttaṃ. Ṭhapentassa pana taṃ paccayaṃ paribhuñjantassa
tika-vin08t:467_12: vā saṅghassa āpatti na paññāyati, aṭṭhakathāpamāṇena vā ettha āpatti gahetabbā. Alajjinā
tika-vin08t:467_13: kārāpite vattabbameva natthīti āha “lajjibhikkhunā”ti, mattikuddharaṇādīsu kārāpitesūti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:468_0: 61. Navasasseti akatapubbe kedāre. Kahāpaṇeti iminā dhaññuṭṭhāpane tasseva akappiyanti
tika-vin08t:468_1: dasseti. Aparicchinnabhāgeti “ettake bhūmibhāge ettako bhāgo dātabbo”ti evaṃ aparicchinnabhāge.
tika-vin08t:468_2: Dhaññuṭṭhāpane kasati, payogepi dukkaṭameva, na kahāpaṇuṭṭhāpane viya. “Kasatha vapathā”ti
tika-vin08t:468_3: vacanena sabbesampi akappiyaṃ siyāti āha “avatvā”ti. Ettako nāma bhāgoti ettha ettako
tika-vin08t:468_4: kahāpaṇoti idampi sandhāya vadati. Tathāvuttepi hi tadā kahāpaṇānaṃ avijjamānattā
tika-vin08t:468_5: āyatiṃ uppajjamānaṃ aññesaṃ vaṭṭati eva. Tenāha “tasseva taṃ akappiya”nti. Tassa
tika-vin08t:468_6: pana sabbapayogesu paribhoge ca dukkaṭaṃ. Keci pana dhaññaparibhoge eva āpatti, na
tika-vin08t:468_7: pubbabhāgeti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ, yena minanarakkhaṇādinā payogena pacchā dhaññaparibhoge
tika-vin08t:468_8: āpatti hoti tassa payogassa karaṇe anāpattiyā ayuttattā. Pariyāyakathāya pana sabbattha
tika-vin08t:468_9: anāpatti. Teneva “ettakehi vīhīhi idañcidañca āharathā”ti niyamavacane akappiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:468_10: vuttaṃ. Kahāpaṇavicāraṇepi eseva nayo. “Vatthu ca evarūpaṃ nāma saṃvijjati, kappiyakārako
tika-vin08t:468_11: natthīti vattabba”ntiādivacanañcettha sādhakaṃ. Rajjuyā vā daṇḍena vāti ettha “pādehipi
tika-vin08t:468_12: minituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Khale vā ṭhatvā rakkhatīti ettha pana thenetvā gaṇhante
tika-vin08t:468_13: disvā “mā gaṇhathā”ti nivārento rakkhati nāma, sace pana avicāretvā kevalaṃ tuṇhībhūtova
tika-vin08t:468_14: rakkhaṇatthāya olokento tiṭṭhati, vaṭṭati. “Sacepi tasmiṃ tuṇhībhūte corikāya haranti,
tika-vin08t:468_15: ‘mayaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa ārocessāmā’ti evaṃ vattumpi vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Nīharāpeti
tika-vin08t:468_16: paṭisāmetīti etthāpi “sace pariyāyena vadati, vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Apubbassa anuppāditattā
tika-vin08t:469_0: Sabbesaṃ akappiyaṃ, kasmā? Kahāpaṇānaṃ vicāritattāti ettha sāratthadīpaniyaṃ evaṃ
tika-vin08t:469_1: vicāraṇā katā – nanu ca dubbicāritamattena tassevetaṃ akappiyaṃ, na sabbesaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāre
tika-vin08t:469_2: catutthapatto viya. Vuttañhi tattha “yo pana rūpiyaṃ asampaṭicchitvā ‘therassa pattaṃ
tika-vin08t:469_3: kiṇitvā dehī’ti pahitakappiyakārakena saddhiṃ kammārakulaṃ gantvā pattaṃ disvā ‘ime
tika-vin08t:469_4: kahāpaṇe gahetvā imaṃ dehī’ti kahāpaṇe dāpetvā gahito, ayaṃ patto etasseva bhikkhuno
tika-vin08t:469_5: na vaṭṭati dubbicāritattā, aññesaṃ pana vaṭṭati mūlassa asampaṭicchitattā”ti, tasmā
tika-vin08t:469_6: yaṃ te āharanti, sabbesaṃ akappiyaṃ. Kasmā? Kahāpaṇānaṃ vicāritattāti idaṃ kasmā
tika-vin08t:469_7: vuttanti? Ettha keci vadanti “kahāpaṇe sādiyitvā vicāritaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vutta”nti,
tika-vin08t:469_8: saṅghikattā ca nissajjituṃ na sakkā, tasmā sabbesaṃ na kappatīti tesaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:469_9: Keci pana “asādiyitvāpi kahāpaṇānaṃ vicāritattā rūpiyasaṃvohāro kato hoti, saṅghikattā
tika-vin08t:469_10: ca nissajjituṃ na sakkā, tasmā sabbesaṃ na kappatī”ti vadanti. Gaṇṭhipadesu pana
tika-vin08t:469_11: tīsupi idaṃ vuttaṃ “catutthapatto gihisantakānaṃyeva kahāpaṇānaṃ vicāritattā aññesaṃ
tika-vin08t:469_12: kappati, idha pana saṅghikānaṃ vicāritattā sabbesaṃ na kappatī”ti. Sabbesampi vādo
tika-vin08t:471_0: 63. “Vanaṃ dammi, araññaṃ dammī”ti vutte pana vaṭṭatīti ettha nivāsaṭṭhānattā puggalassapi
tika-vin08t:471_1: suddhacittena gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sīmaṃ demāti vihārasīmādisādhāraṇavacanena vuttattā
tika-vin08t:471_2: “vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Pariyāyena kathitattāti “gaṇhāhī”ti avatvā “sīmā gatā”ti pariyāyena
tika-vin08t:471_3: kathitattā. Pakatibhūmikaraṇatthaṃ “heṭṭhā gahitaṃ paṃsu”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Dāsaṃ dammīti
tika-vin08t:471_4: ettha “manussaṃ dammīti vutte vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Veyyāvaccakarantiādinā vutte puggalassapi
tika-vin08t:471_5: dāsaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭati “anujānāmi bhikkhave ārāmika”nti visesetvā anuññātattā. Tañca
tika-vin08t:471_6: kho pilindavacchena gahitaparibhuttakkamena, na gahaṭṭhānaṃ dāsaparibhogakkamena.
tika-vin08t:471_7: Khettādayo pana sabbe saṅghasseva vaṭṭanti pāḷiyaṃ puggalikavasena gahetuṃ ananuññātattāti
tika-vin08t:471_8: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kukkuṭasūkare…pe… vaṭṭatīti ettha kukkuṭasūkaresu dīyamānesu “imehi amhākaṃ
tika-vin08t:471_9: attho natthi, sukhaṃ jīvantu, araññe vissajjethā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Vihārassa demāti
tika-vin08t:471_11: suttantesu āgatapaṭikkhepo bhagavatā āpattiyāpi hetubhāvena katoti bhagavato adhippāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:471_12: jānantehi saṅgītikārakamahātherehi khettapaṭiggahaṇādinissito ayaṃ sabbopi pāḷimuttavinicchayo vuttoti gahetabbo.
tika-vin08t:472_0: 64. Cīvaracetāpannanti cīvaramūlaṃ. Pahiṇeyyāti peseyya. Cetāpetvāti parivattetvā.
tika-vin08t:472_1: Acchādehīti vohāravacanametaṃ, itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dehīti ayaṃ panettha attho. Ābhatanti ānītaṃ.
tika-vin08t:473_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne sāratthadīpaniyaṃ evaṃ vicāraṇā katā – ettha ca yaṃ vuttaṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:473_1: “iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ cīvarena acchādehīti
tika-vin08t:473_2: idaṃ āgamanasuddhiṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Sace hi ‘idaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dehī’ti
tika-vin08t:473_3: peseyya, āgamanassa asuddhattā akappiyavatthuṃ ārabbha bhikkhunā kappiyakārakopi
tika-vin08t:473_4: niddisitabbo na bhaveyyā”ti, tattha āgamanassa suddhiyā vā asuddhiyā vā visesappayojanaṃ
tika-vin08t:473_5: na dissati. Satipi hi āgamanassa asuddhabhāve dūto attano kusalatāya kappiyavohārena
tika-vin08t:473_6: vadati, kappiyakārako na niddisitabboti idaṃ natthi, na ca dūtena kappiyavohāravasena
tika-vin08t:473_7: vutte dāyakena “idaṃ kathaṃ pesita”nti īdisī vicāraṇā upalabbhati, avicāretvā ca
tika-vin08t:473_8: taṃ na sakkā jānituṃ. Yadi pana āgamanassa asuddhattā kappiyakārako niddisitabbo
tika-vin08t:473_9: na bhaveyya, cīvarānaṃ atthāya dūtassa hatthe akappiyavatthumhi pesite sabbattha
tika-vin08t:473_10: dāyakena kathaṃ pesitanti pucchitvāva kappiyakārako niddisitabbo bhaveyya, tasmā
tika-vin08t:473_11: asatipi āgamanasuddhiyaṃ sace so dūto attano kusalatāya kappiyavohāravasena vadati,
tika-vin08t:473_12: dūtasseva vacanaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Yadi hi āgamanasuddhiyevettha pamāṇaṃ, mūlassāmikena
tika-vin08t:473_13: kappiyavohāravasena pesitassa dūtassa akappiyavohāravasena vadatopi kappiyakārako
tika-vin08t:473_14: niddisitabbo bhaveyya, tasmā sabbattha dūtavacanameva pamāṇanti gahetabbaṃ. Iminā
tika-vin08t:473_15: cīvaracetāpannenātiādinā pana imamatthaṃ dasseti “kappiyavasena ābhatampi cīvaramūlaṃ
tika-vin08t:473_16: īdisena dūtavacanena akappiyaṃ hoti, tasmā taṃ paṭikkhipitabba”nti. Tenevāha “tena
tika-vin08t:474_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana evaṃ vuttaṃ – yaṃ vuttaṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “iminā cīvaracetāpannena
tika-vin08t:474_1: cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ cīvarena acchādehīti idaṃ āgamanasuddhiṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin08t:474_2: vuttaṃ. Sace hi ‘idaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dehī’ti peseyya, āgamanassa asuddhattā
tika-vin08t:474_3: akappiyavatthuṃ ārabbha bhikkhunā kappiyakārakopi niddisitabbo na bhaveyyā”ti, taṃ
tika-vin08t:474_5: dehī”ti evaṃ āgamanasuddhiyā asati, sikkhāpade āgatanayena dūtavacane ca asuddhe
tika-vin08t:474_6: sabbathā paṭikkhepoyeva kātuṃ vaṭṭati, na pana “cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmā”ti
tika-vin08t:474_7: vattuṃ, tadanusārena veyyāvaccakarañca niddisituṃ āgamanadūtavacanānaṃ ubhinnaṃ asuddhattā,
tika-vin08t:474_8: pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayena pana āgamanasuddhiyā sati dūtavacane asuddhepi sikkhāpade āgatanayena
tika-vin08t:474_9: sabbaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tena ca yathā dūtavacanāsuddhiyampi āgamane
tika-vin08t:474_10: suddhe veyyāvaccakaraṃ niddisituṃ vaṭṭati, evaṃ āgamanāsuddhiyampi dūtavacane suddhe
tika-vin08t:474_11: vaṭṭati evāti ayamattho atthato siddhova hoti. Ubhayasuddhiyaṃ vattabbameva natthīti
tika-vin08t:475_0: Yaṃ panettha sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “āgamanassa suddhiyā vā asuddhiyā vā visesappayojanaṃ
tika-vin08t:475_1: na dissatī”tiādi vuttaṃ, taṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāvacanassa adhippāyaṃ asallakkhetvā vuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:475_2: yathāvuttanayena āgamanasuddhiādinā sappayojanattā. Yo panettha “mūlassāmikena kappiyavohāravasena,
tika-vin08t:475_3: pesitadūtassa akappiyavohārena vadatopi kappiyakārako niddisitabbo bhaveyyā”ti aniṭṭhappasaṅgo
tika-vin08t:475_4: vutto, so aniṭṭhappasaṅgo eva na hoti abhimatattā. Tathā hi sikkhāpade eva “paṭiggaṇhatu
tika-vin08t:475_5: āyasmā cīvaracetāpanna”nti akappiyavohārena vadato dūtassa kappiyena kammena veyyāvaccakaro
tika-vin08t:475_6: niddisitabbo vutto āgamanassa suddhattā, āgamanassapi asuddhiyaṃ pana kappiyenapi
tika-vin08t:475_7: kammena veyyāvaccakaro na niddisitabbovāti attheva āgamanassa suddhiasuddhiyā payojanaṃ.
tika-vin08t:475_8: Kathaṃ pana dūtavacanena āgamanasuddhi viññāyatīti? Nāyaṃ bhāro. Dūtena hi akappiyavohārena
tika-vin08t:475_9: vutte eva āgamanasuddhi gavesitabbā, na itarattha. Tattha ca tassa vacanakkamena
tika-vin08t:475_10: pucchitvā ca yuttiādīhi ca sakkā viññātuṃ. Idhāpi hi sikkhāpade “cīvaracetāpannaṃ
tika-vin08t:475_11: ābhata”nti dūtavacaneneva cīvaraṃ kiṇitvā dātuṃ pesitabhāvo viññāyati. Yadi hi sabbathā
tika-vin08t:475_12: āgamanasuddhi na viññāyati, paṭikkhepo eva kattabboti.
tika-vin08t:476_0: Suvaṇṇaṃ rajataṃ kahāpaṇo māsakoti imāni hi cattāri nissaggiyavatthūni, muttā maṇi
tika-vin08t:476_1: veḷuriyo saṅkho silā pavāḷaṃ lohitaṅko masāragallaṃ satta dhaññāni dāsidāsaṃ khettaṃ
tika-vin08t:476_2: vatthu pupphārāmaphalārāmādayoti imāni dukkaṭavatthūni ca attano vā cetiyasaṅghagaṇapuggalānaṃ
tika-vin08t:476_3: vā atthāya sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭanti, tasmā taṃ sādituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:476_4: “na kho mayaṃ āvuso cīvaracetāpannaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Cīvarañca kho mayaṃ
tika-vin08t:476_6: vuttaṃ. Kālena kappiyanti yuttapattakālena yadā no attho hoti, tadā kappiyaṃ cīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:476_7: paṭiggaṇhāmāti attho. Veyyāvaccakaroti kiccakaro, kappiyakārakoti attho. “Veyyāvaccakaro
tika-vin08t:476_8: niddisitabbo”ti idaṃ “atthi panāyasmato koci veyyāvaccakaro”ti kappiyavacanena vuttattā
tika-vin08t:476_9: anuññātaṃ. Sace pana dūto “ko imaṃ gaṇhāti, kassa vā demī”ti vadati, na niddisitabbo.
tika-vin08t:476_10: Ārāmiko vā upāsako vāti idaṃ sāruppatāya vuttaṃ, ṭhapetvā pana pañca sahadhammike
tika-vin08t:476_11: yo koci kappiyakārako vaṭṭati. Eso kho āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccakaroti idaṃ dūtena
tika-vin08t:476_12: “atthi panāyasmato koci veyyāvaccakaro”ti pucchitattā pucchāsabhāgena bhikkhussa
tika-vin08t:476_13: kappiyavacanadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Evameva hi bhikkhunā vattabbaṃ, na vattabbaṃ “tassa
tika-vin08t:476_14: dehī”tiādi. Teneva pāḷiyaṃ “na vattabbo tassa dehī”tiādimāha. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:476_15: “eso kho…pe… na vattabbo tassa dehītiādi akappiyavatthusādiyanaparimocanatthaṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:477_0: Āṇatto so mayāti yathā tumhākaṃ cīvarena atthe sati cīvaraṃ dassati, evaṃ vuttoti
tika-vin08t:477_1: attho. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “saññattotiādi evaṃ dūtena puna vutte eva codetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t:477_2: na itarathāti dassanatthaṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Ettha pana pāḷiyaṃ “saññatto so mayā”ti
tika-vin08t:477_3: āgatattā evaṃ vutto, purimavākye pana vinayasaṅgahappakaraṇe “āṇatto so mayā”ti pariyāyavacanena
tika-vin08t:477_4: parivattitvā ṭhapitattā tathā vutto, tena ca kappiyakārakassa saññāpitabhāve dūtena
tika-vin08t:477_5: bhikkhussa puna ārocite eva bhikkhunā kappiyakārako codetabbo hoti, na anārociteti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:478_0: Attho me āvuso cīvarenāti codanālakkhaṇanidassanametaṃ. Idaṃ vā hi vacanaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:478_1: tassa vā attho yāya kāyaci bhāsāya vattabbo. Dehi me cīvarantiādīni pana na vattabbākāradassanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:478_2: vuttāni. Etāni hi vacanāni, etesaṃ vā attho yāya kāyaci bhāsāya na vattabbo. “Evaṃ
tika-vin08t:478_3: vadanto ca paṭikkhittattā vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati, codanā pana hotiyevā”ti mahāgaṇṭhipade
tika-vin08t:478_4: majjhimagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “na vattabbo ‘dehi me cīvaraṃ…pe…
tika-vin08t:478_5: cetāpehi me cīvara’nti idaṃ dūtenābhatarūpiyaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ attanā niddiṭṭhakappiyakārakattāva
tika-vin08t:478_6: ‘dehi me cīvaraṃ…pe… cetāpehi me cīvara’nti vadanto rūpiyassa pakatattā tena rūpiyena
tika-vin08t:478_7: parivattetvā ‘dehi cetāpehī’ti rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjanto nāma hotīti taṃ dosaṃ
tika-vin08t:478_8: dūrato parivajjetuṃ vuttaṃ rūpiyapaṭiggāhakena saṅghamajjhe nissaṭṭharūpiye viya.
tika-vin08t:478_9: Vuttañhi tattha ‘na vattabbo imaṃ vā imaṃ vā āharā’ti, tasmā na idaṃ viññattidose
tika-vin08t:478_10: parivajjetuṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ ‘attho me āvuso cīvarenā’tipi avattabbatāppasaṅgato.
tika-vin08t:478_11: Teneva dūtaniddiṭṭhesu rūpiyasaṃvohārasaṅkābhāvato aññaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapetvāpi
tika-vin08t:478_12: āharāpetabba”nti vuttaṃ. Tatthāpi “dūtena ṭhapitarūpiyena cetāpetvā cīvaraṃ āharāpehī”ti
tika-vin08t:478_13: avatvā kevalaṃ “cīvaraṃ āharāpehī”ti evaṃ āharāpetabbanti adhippāyo gahetabboti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:479_0: Iccetaṃ kusalanti evaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ codento taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādetuṃ sakkoti attano
tika-vin08t:479_1: paṭilābhavasena, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ sādhu suṭṭhu sundaraṃ. Catukkhattuṃ pañcakkhattuṃ
tika-vin08t:479_2: chakkhattuparamaṃ tuṇhībhūtena uddissa ṭhātabbanti ṭhānalakkhaṇanidassanametaṃ. Chakkhattuparamanti
tika-vin08t:479_3: ca bhāvanapuṃsakavacanametaṃ. Chakkhattuparamanti etena cīvaraṃ uddissa tuṇhībhūteneva
tika-vin08t:479_4: ṭhātabbaṃ, na aññaṃ kiñci kātabbanti idaṃ ṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ. Teneva “na āsanetiādī”ti
tika-vin08t:482: Vacanato kiriyāvisesanameva sāsanavohārena bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ nāma jātaṃ;
tika-vin08t:485_1: sakammakampi bhūdhātukaradhātūhi sambandhitabbaṃ hotīti iminā ñāyena chakkhattuparamaṃ
tika-vin08t:485_2: ṭhānaṃ bhavitabbaṃ, chakkhattuparamaṃ ṭhānaṃ kātabbanti attho. Etena chakkhattuparamaṃ
tika-vin08t:485_3: evaṃ ṭhānaṃ bhavitabbaṃ, na tato adhikaṃ, chakkhattuparamaṃ eva ṭhānaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:485_4: na tato uddhanti imamatthaṃ dasseti. Na āsane nisīditabbanti “idha bhante nisīdathā”ti
tika-vin08t:485_5: vuttepi na nisīditabbaṃ. Na āmisaṃ paṭiggahetabbanti “yāgukhajjakādibhedaṃ kiñci
tika-vin08t:485_6: āmisaṃ gaṇhatha bhante”ti yāciyamānenapi na gaṇhitabbaṃ. Na dhammo bhāsitabboti “maṅgalaṃ
tika-vin08t:485_7: vā anumodanaṃ vā bhāsathā”ti yāciyamānenapi kiñci na bhāsitabbaṃ, kevalaṃ “kiṃkāraṇā
tika-vin08t:486_0: Ṭhānaṃ bhañjatīti āgatakāraṇaṃ bhañjati kopeti. Ṭhānanti ṭhitiyā ca kāraṇassa ca
tika-vin08t:486_1: nāmaṃ, tasmā āsane nisīdanena ṭhānaṃ kuppati, āgatakāraṇampi, āmisapaṭiggahaṇādīsu
tika-vin08t:486_2: pana āgatakāraṇameva bhañjati, na ṭhānaṃ. Tenāha “āgatakāraṇaṃ bhañjatī”ti. Keci
tika-vin08t:486_3: pana “āmisapaṭiggahaṇādinā ṭhānampi bhañjatī”ti vadanti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāya na sameti,
tika-vin08t:486_4: ṭīkāyampi nānāvāde dassetvā ṭhānabhañjanaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanena asaṃsandanato
tika-vin08t:486_5: ganthagarubhayena na vadimha. Idāni yā tisso codanā, cha ca ṭhānāni vuttāni, tattha
tika-vin08t:486_6: vuddhihāniṃ dassento “sace catukkhattuṃ codetī”tiādimāha. Yasmā ca ekacodanāvuddhiyā
tika-vin08t:486_7: dvinnaṃ ṭhānānaṃ hāni vuttā, tasmā codanā dviguṇaṃ ṭhānanti lakkhaṇaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t:486_8: Iti iminā lakkhaṇena tikkhattuṃ codetvā chakkhattuṃ ṭhātabbaṃ, dvikkhattuṃ codetvā
tika-vin08t:486_9: aṭṭhakkhattuṃ ṭhātabbaṃ, sakiṃ codetvā dasakkhattuṃ ṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:487_0: Tatra tatra ṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti idaṃ codakassa ṭhitaṭṭhānato apakkamma tatra tatra uddissa
tika-vin08t:487_1: ṭhānaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ko pana vādo nānādivasesūti nānādivasesu evaṃ karontassa
tika-vin08t:487_2: ko pana vādo, vattabbameva natthīti adhippāyo. “Sāmaṃ vā gantabbaṃ, dūto vā pāhetabboti
tika-vin08t:487_3: idaṃ sabhāvato codetuṃ anicchantenapi kātabbamevā”ti vadanti. Na taṃ tassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin08t:487_4: kiñci atthaṃ anubhotīti taṃ cīvaracetāpannaṃ assa bhikkhuno kiñci appamattakampi
tika-vin08t:487_5: kammaṃ na nipphādeti. Yuñjantāyasmanto sakanti āyasmanto attano santakaṃ dhanaṃ pāpuṇantu.
tika-vin08t:487_6: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “yatassa cīvaracetāpannantiādi yena attanā veyyāvaccakaro
tika-vin08t:487_7: niddiṭṭho, cīvarañca anipphāditaṃ, tassa kattabbadassanaṃ. Evaṃ bhikkhunā vatthusāmikānaṃ
tika-vin08t:487_8: vutte codetvā denti, vaṭṭati ‘sāmikā codetvā dentī’ti anāpattiyaṃ vuttattā. Teneva
tika-vin08t:487_9: so sayaṃ acodetvā upāsakādīhi pariyāyena vatvā codāpeti, tesu satakkhattumpi codetvā
tika-vin08t:487_10: cīvaraṃ dāpentesu tassa anāpatti siddhā hoti sikkhāpadassa anāṇattikattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:488_0: 65. Kenaci aniddiṭṭho attano mukheneva byāvaṭabhāvaṃ veyyāvaccakarattaṃ patto mukhavevaṭiko,
tika-vin08t:488_1: avicāretukāmatāyāti iminā vijjamānampi dātuṃ anicchantā ariyāpi vañcanādhippāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:488_2: vinā vohārato natthīti vadantīti dasseti. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “avicāretukāmatāyāti
tika-vin08t:488_3: imasmiṃ pakkhe ‘natthamhākaṃ kappiyakārako’ti idaṃ tādisaṃ karonto kappiyakārako
tika-vin08t:488_4: natthīti iminā adhippāyena vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Bhesajjakkhandhake meṇḍakaseṭṭhivatthumhi
tika-vin08t:488_5: vuttaṃ “santi bhikkhave”tiādivacanameva meṇḍakasikkhāpadaṃ nāma. Tattha hi meṇḍakena
tika-vin08t:488_6: nāma seṭṭhinā “santi hi bhante maggā kantārā appodakā appabhakkhā na sukarā apātheyyena
tika-vin08t:488_7: gantuṃ, sādhu bhante bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātheyyaṃ anujānātū”ti yācitena bhagavatā
tika-vin08t:488_8: “anujānāmi bhikkhave pātheyyaṃ pariyesituṃ. Taṇḍulo taṇḍulatthikena, muggo muggatthikena,
tika-vin08t:488_9: māso māsatthikena, loṇaṃ loṇatthikena, guḷo guḷatthikena, telaṃ telatthikena, sappi
tika-vin08t:488_10: sappitthikenā”ti vatvā idaṃ vuttaṃ “santi, bhikkhave, manussā saddhā pasannā, te
tika-vin08t:488_11: kappiyakārakānaṃ hatthe hiraññaṃ upanikkhipanti ‘iminā yaṃ ayyassa kappiyaṃ, taṃ
tika-vin08t:488_12: dethā’ti. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yaṃ tato kappiyaṃ, taṃ sādituṃ, na tvevāhaṃ, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:488_13: kenaci pariyāyena jātarūparajataṃ sāditabbaṃ pariyesitabbanti vadāmī”ti. “Kappiyakārakānaṃ
tika-vin08t:488_14: hatthe hiraññaṃ nikkhipantī”ti etthāpi bhikkhussa ārocanaṃ atthiyeva, aññathā aniddiṭṭhakappiyakārakapakkhaṃ
tika-vin08t:488_15: bhajatīti na codetabbo siyā, idaṃ pana dūtena niddiṭṭhakappiyakārake sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:488_16: na pana bhikkhunā niddiṭṭhe vā aniddiṭṭhe vā. Tenevāha “ettha codanāya parimāṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:488_17: natthī”tiādi. Yadi mūlaṃ sandhāya codeti, taṃ sāditameva siyāti āha “mūlaṃ asādiyantenā”ti.
tika-vin08t:489_0: Aññātakaappavāritesu viya paṭipajjitabbanti idaṃ attanā codanāṭṭhānañca na kātabbanti
tika-vin08t:489_1: dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Piṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāyāti iminā cīvaratthāyeva na hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:489_2: Eseva nayoti iminā vatthusāminā niddiṭṭhakappiyakārakesupi piṇḍapātādīnampi atthāya
tika-vin08t:489_3: dinne ca ṭhānacodanādisabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva kātabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:490_0: 66. Upanikkhittasādiyane panātiādīsu “idaṃ ayyassa hotū”ti evaṃ sammukhā vā “amukasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:490_1: nāma ṭhāne mama hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ atthi, taṃ tuyhaṃ hotū”ti evaṃ parammukhā vā ṭhitassa
tika-vin08t:490_2: kevalaṃ vācāya vā hatthamuddāya vā “tuyha”nti vatvā pariccattassa kāyavācāhi appaṭikkhipitvā
tika-vin08t:490_3: cittena sādiyanaṃ upanikkhittasādiyanaṃ nāma. Sādiyatīti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāveti
tika-vin08t:491_0: Idaṃ guttaṭṭhānanti ācikkhitabbanti paccayaparibhogaṃyeva sandhāya ācikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:491_1: “Idha nikkhipā”ti vutte “uggaṇhāpeyya vā”ti vuttalakkhaṇena nissaggiyaṃ hotīti āha
tika-vin08t:491_2: “idha nikkhipāhīti na vattabba”nti. Atha vā “idaṃ guttaṭṭhāna”nti ācikkhanto ṭhānassa
tika-vin08t:491_3: guttabhāvameva dasseti, na vatthuṃ parāmasati, tasmā ācikkhitabbaṃ. “Idha nikkhipāhī”ti
tika-vin08t:491_4: pana vadanto nikkhipitabbaṃ vatthuṃ nikkhipāhīti vatthuṃ parāmasati nāma, tasmā na
tika-vin08t:491_5: vattabbaṃ. Parato idaṃ gaṇhāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Kappiyañca akappiyañca nissāya
tika-vin08t:491_6: ṭhitaṃ hotīti yasmā tato uppannapaccayaparibhogo kappati, tasmā kappiyaṃ nissāya
tika-vin08t:491_7: ṭhitaṃ, yasmā pana dubbicāraṇāya tato uppannapaccayaparibhogo na kappati, tasmā akappiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:491_8: nissāya ṭhitanti veditabbaṃ. Atha vā idaṃ dhanaṃ yasmā “nayidaṃ kappatī”ti paṭikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin08t:491_9: tasmā kappiyaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ, yasmā pana sabbaso avissajjitaṃ, tasmā akappiyaṃ nissāya
tika-vin08t:491_10: ṭhitaṃ. Atha vā taṃ dhanaṃ yasmā pacchā suṭṭhuvicāraṇāya satiyā kappiyaṃ bhavissati,
tika-vin08t:491_11: dubbicāraṇāya satiyā akappiyaṃ bhavissati, tasmā kappiyañca akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitaṃ
tika-vin08t:491_12: hotīti. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “eko sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vātiādi rūpiye heṭṭhimakoṭiyā
tika-vin08t:491_13: pavattanākāraṃ dassetuṃ vutta”nti ca “na pana evaṃ paṭipajjitabbamevāti dassetuṃ,
tika-vin08t:491_14: ‘idha nikkhipāhī’ti vutte uggaṇhāpanaṃ hotīti āha ‘idha nikkhipāhī’ti na vattabba”nti
tika-vin08t:491_15: ca “kappiyañca…pe… hotīti yasmā asāditattā tato uppannapaccayā vaṭṭanti, tasmā kappiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:491_16: nissāya ṭhitaṃ, yasmā pana dubbicāraṇāya sati tato uppannaṃ na kappati, tasmā akappiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:492_0: 67. Saṅghamajjhe nissajjitabbanti yasmā rūpiyaṃ nāma akappiyaṃ, tasmā saṅghassa vā
tika-vin08t:492_1: gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā nissajjitabbanti na vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana taṃ paṭiggahitamattameva
tika-vin08t:492_2: hoti, na tena kiñci kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ cetāpitaṃ, tasmā upāyena paribhogadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:492_3: “saṅghamajjhe nissajjitabba”nti vuttaṃ. Na tena kiñci kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ cetāpitanti
tika-vin08t:492_4: iminā cetāpitañce, natthi paribhogūpāyo uggahetvā anissaṭṭharūpiyena cetāpitattā.
tika-vin08t:492_5: Īdisañhi saṅghamajjhe nissajjanaṃ katvāva chaḍḍetvā pācittiyaṃ desāpetabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:492_6: Keci pana “yasmā nissaggiyavatthuṃ paṭiggahetvāpi cetāpitaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ saṅghe
tika-vin08t:492_8: hoti, tasmā vināva upāyaṃ bhājetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, taṃ pattacatukkādikathāya
tika-vin08t:492_9: na sameti. Tattha hi rūpiyena parivattitapattassa aparibhogova dassito, na nissajjanavicāroti.
tika-vin08t:492_10: Kappiyaṃ ācikkhitabbanti pabbajitānaṃ sappi vā telaṃ vā vaṭṭati upāsakāti evaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:493_0: Ārāmikānaṃ vā pattabhāganti idaṃ gihīnaṃ hatthagatopi soyeva bhāgoti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:493_1: Sace pana tena aññaṃ parivattetvā ārāmikā denti, paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti majjhimagaṇṭhipade
tika-vin08t:493_2: cūḷagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ. Tato haritvāti aññesaṃ pattabhāgato haritvā. Kasiṇaparikammanti
tika-vin08t:493_3: ālokakasiṇaparikammaṃ. Mañcapīṭhādīni vāti ettha tato gahitamañcapīṭhādīni parivattetvā
tika-vin08t:493_4: aññaṃ ce gahitaṃ, vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Chāyāpīti bhojanasālādīnaṃ chāyāpi. Paricchedātikkantāti
tika-vin08t:493_5: gehaparicchedaṃ atikkantā, chāyāya gatagataṭṭhānaṃ gehaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo. Maggenapīti
tika-vin08t:493_6: ettha sace añño maggo natthi, maggaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Kītāyāti
tika-vin08t:493_7: tena vatthunā kītāya. Upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvā saṅgho paccaye paribhuñjatīti sace upāsako
tika-vin08t:493_8: “atibahu etaṃ hiraññaṃ, idaṃ bhante ajjeva na vināsetabba”nti vatvā sayaṃ upanikkhepaṃ
tika-vin08t:493_9: ṭhapeti, aññena vā ṭhapāpeti, evaṃ upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvā tato uppannapaccayaṃ paribhuñjanto
tika-vin08t:493_10: saṅgho paccaye paribhuñjati, tena vatthunā gahitattā “akappiya”nti vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:493_11: pana “upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvāti kappiyakārakehi vaḍḍhiyā payojanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:493_12: Akappiyanti tena vatthunā gahitattā vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:494_0: Sace so chaḍḍetīti yattha katthaci khipati, athāpi na chaḍḍeti, sayaṃ gahetvā gacchati,
tika-vin08t:494_1: na vāretabbo. No ce chaḍḍetīti atha neva gahetvā gacchati, na chaḍḍeti, “kiṃ mayhaṃ
tika-vin08t:494_2: iminā byāpārenā”ti yenakāmaṃ pakkamati, tato yathāvuttalakkhaṇo rūpiyachaḍḍako samannitabbo.
tika-vin08t:494_3: Yo na chandāgatintiādīsu lobhavasena taṃ vatthuṃ attano vā karonto attānaṃ vā ukkaṃsento
tika-vin08t:494_4: chandāgatiṃ nāma gacchati. Dosavasena “nevāyaṃ mātikaṃ jānāti, na vinaya”nti paraṃ
tika-vin08t:494_5: apasādento dosāgatiṃ nāma gacchati. Mohavasena pamuṭṭho pamuṭṭhassatibhāvaṃ āpajjanto
tika-vin08t:494_6: mohāgatiṃ nāma gacchati. Rūpiyapaṭiggāhakassa bhayena chaḍḍetuṃ avisahanto bhayāgatiṃ
tika-vin08t:494_7: nāma gacchati. Evaṃ akaronto na chandāgatiṃ gacchati, na dosāgatiṃ gacchati, na mohāgatiṃ
tika-vin08t:494_8: gacchati, na bhayāgatiṃ gacchati nāmāti veditabbo.
tika-vin08t:495_1: veditabbaṃ, tasmā patitaṭṭhāne ñātepi tassa gūthaṃ chaḍḍentassa viya nirapekkhabhāvoyevettha
tika-vin08t:495_3: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Theyyaparibhogo nāma anarahassa paribhogo. Bhagavatā hi attano sāsane
tika-vin08t:495_4: sīlavato paccayā anuññātā, na dussīlassa. Dāyakānampi sīlavato eva pariccāgo, na
tika-vin08t:495_5: dussīlassa attano kārānaṃ mahapphalabhāvassa paccāsīsanato. Iti satthārā ananuññātattā
tika-vin08t:495_6: dāyakehi ca apariccattattā dussīlassa paribhogo theyyaparibhogo. Iṇavasena paribhogo
tika-vin08t:495_7: iṇaparibhogo, paṭiggāhakato dakkhiṇāvisuddhiyā abhāvato iṇaṃ gahetvā paribhogo viyāti
tika-vin08t:495_8: attho. Tasmāti “sīlavato”tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ kāraṇabhāvena paccāmasati. Cīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:495_9: paribhoge paribhogeti kāyato mocetvā paribhoge paribhoge. Purebhatta…pe… pacchimayāmesu
tika-vin08t:495_10: paccavekkhitabbanti sambandho. Tathā asakkontena yathāvuttakālavisesavasena ekasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:495_11: divase catukkhattuṃ tikkhattuṃ dvikkhattuṃ sakiṃyeva vā paccavekkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:496_0: Sacassa appaccavekkhatova aruṇo uggacchati, iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti ettha hiyyo
tika-vin08t:496_1: yaṃ mayā cīvaraṃ paribhuttaṃ, taṃ yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāya…pe… hirikopinapaṭicchādanatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t:496_2: Hiyyo yo mayā piṇḍapāto paribhutto, so neva davāyātiādinā sace atītaparibhogapaccavekkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:496_3: na kareyya, iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti vadanti, taṃ vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Senāsanampi
tika-vin08t:496_4: paribhoge paribhogeti pavese pavese. Evaṃ pana asakkontena purebhattādīsu paccavekkhitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:496_5: taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva sakkā viññātunti idha visuṃ na vuttaṃ. Satipaccayatāti satiyā
tika-vin08t:496_6: paccayabhāvo. Paṭiggahaṇassa paribhogassa ca paccavekkhaṇasatiyā paccayabhāvo yujjati,
tika-vin08t:496_7: paccavekkhitvāva paṭiggahetabbaṃ paribhuñjitabbañcāti attho. Tenevāha “satiṃ katvā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t:496_8: Evaṃ santepīti yadipi dvīsupi ṭhānesu paccavekkhaṇā yuttā, evaṃ santepi. Apare panāhu
tika-vin08t:496_9: “satipaccayatāti sati bhesajjaparibhogassa paccayabhāve, paccayeti attho. Evaṃ santepīti
tika-vin08t:496_10: paccaye satipī”ti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ. Tathā hi paccayasannissitasīlaṃ paccavekkhaṇāya
tika-vin08t:497_0: Nanu ca “paribhoge karontassa anāpattī”ti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin08t:497_1: paccayasannissitasīlassa pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlassa ca ko visesoti? Vuccate – purimesu
tika-vin08t:497_2: tāva tīsu paccayesu viseso pākaṭoyeva, gilānapaccaye pana yathā vatiṃ katvā rukkhamūle
tika-vin08t:497_3: gopite tassa phalānipi rakkhitāneva honti, evameva paccavekkhaṇāya paccayasannissitasīle
tika-vin08t:497_4: rakkhite tappaṭibaddhaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlampi nipphannaṃ nāma hoti. Gilānapaccayaṃ
tika-vin08t:497_5: appaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjantassa sīlaṃ bhijjamānaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlameva bhijjati,
tika-vin08t:497_6: paccayasannissitasīlaṃ pana pacchābhattapurimayāmādīsu yāva aruṇuggamanā appaccavekkhantasseva
tika-vin08t:497_7: bhijjati. Purebhattañhi appaccavekkhitvāpi gilānapaccayaṃ paribhuñjantassa anāpatti,
tika-vin08t:498_1: vuttaṃ. Iṇaparibhogoti bhagavatā anuññātampi kattabbaṃ akatvā paribhuñjanato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:498_2: Tena ca paccayasannissitasīlaṃ vipajjatīti dasseti. Paribhoge paribhogeti kāyato
tika-vin08t:498_3: mocetvā mocetvā paribhoge. Pacchimayāmesu paccavekkhitabbanti yojanā. Iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne
tika-vin08t:498_4: tiṭṭhatīti ettha ‘hiyyo yaṃ mayā cīvaraṃ paribhutta’ntiādināpi atītapaccavekkhaṇā
tika-vin08t:498_5: vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Paribhoge paribhogeti udakapatanaṭṭhānato antopavesanesu nisīdanasayanesu
tika-vin08t:498_6: ca. Satipaccayatā vaṭṭatīti paccavekkhaṇasatiyā paccayattaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati. Paṭiggahaṇe
tika-vin08t:498_7: ca paribhoge ca paccavekkhaṇāsati avassaṃ laddhabbāti dasseti. Tenāha ‘satiṃ katvā’tiādi.
tika-vin08t:498_8: Keci pana ‘satipaccayatā paccaye sati bhesajjaparibhogassa kāraṇe satī’ti evampi
tika-vin08t:498_9: atthaṃ vadanti, tesampi paccaye satīti paccayasabbhāvasallakkhaṇe satīti evamattho
tika-vin08t:498_10: gahetabbo paccayasabbhāvamattena sīlassa asujjhanato. Paribhoge akarontasseva āpattīti
tika-vin08t:498_11: iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlassa bhedo dassito, na paccayasannissitasīlassa tassa atītapaccavekkhaṇāya
tika-vin08t:498_12: visujjhanato. Etasmiṃ pana sesapaccayesu ca iṇaparibhogādivacanena paccayasannissitasīlasseva
tika-vin08t:499_0: Etesu dvīsu pakaraṇesu “iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatī”ti ettha hiyyo yaṃ mayā cīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:499_1: paribhuttanti…pe… vadantīti āgataṃ. Imaṃ pana nayaṃ nissāya idāni ekacce paṇḍitā
tika-vin08t:499_2: “ajjapāto paribhuttaṃ sāyaṃ paccavekkhantena ajja yaṃ mayā cīvaraṃ paribhuttantiādinā
tika-vin08t:499_3: atītavasena paccavekkhaṇā kātabbā”ti vadanti. Keci “hiyyo paribhuttameva atītavasena
tika-vin08t:499_4: paccavekkhaṇā kātabbā, na ajja paribhuttaṃ, taṃ pana paccuppannavasena paccavekkhaṇāyevā”ti
tika-vin08t:499_5: vadanti. Tattha mūlavacane evaṃ vicāraṇā kātabbā. Kathaṃ? Idaṃ hiyyotyādivacanaṃ
tika-vin08t:499_6: suttaṃ vā suttānulomaṃ vā ācariyavādo vā attanomati vāti. Tattha na tāva suttaṃ hoti
tika-vin08t:499_7: “suttaṃ nāma sakale vinayapiṭake pāḷī”ti vuttattā imassa ca vacanassa na pāḷibhūtattā.
tika-vin08t:499_8: Na ca suttānulomaṃ “suttānulomaṃ nāma cattāro mahāpadesā”ti vuttattā imassa ca mahāpadesabhāvābhāvato.
tika-vin08t:499_9: Na ca ācariyavādo “ācariyavādo nāma dhammasaṅgāhakehi pañcahi arahantasatehi ṭhapitā
tika-vin08t:499_10: pāḷivinimuttā okkantavinicchayappavattā aṭṭhakathātantī”ti vacanato imassa ca aṭṭhakathāpāṭhabhāvābhāvato.
tika-vin08t:499_11: Na ca attanomati “attanomati nāma suttasuttānulomaācariyavāde muñcitvā anumānena
tika-vin08t:499_12: attano buddhiyā nayaggāhena upaṭṭhitākārakathanaṃ, apica suttantābhidhammavinayaṭṭhakathāsu
tika-vin08t:499_13: āgato sabbopi theravādo attanomati nāmā”ti vuttattā imassa ca aṭṭhakathāsu āgatattheravādabhāvābhāvato.
tika-vin08t:503_0: Vuttesu catubbidhavinayesu anantogadhattā idaṃ vacanaṃ vicāretabbaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:503_1: sāratthadīpaniyaṃ ṭīkācariyena “taṃ vīmaṃsitabba”nti. Atha vā “nayaggāhena upaṭṭhitākārakathana”nti
tika-vin08t:503_2: iminā lakkhaṇena tesaṃ tesaṃ ācariyānaṃ upaṭṭhitākāravasena kathanaṃ attanomati siyā,
tika-vin08t:503_3: evampi vicāretabbameva. “Attanomati ācariyavāde otāretabbā. Sace tattha otarati ceva
tika-vin08t:503_4: sameti ca, gahetabbā. Sace neva otarati na sameti, na gahetabbā. Ayañhi attanomati
tika-vin08t:503_5: nāma sabbadubbalā”ti vacanato imassa ca vacanassa aṭṭhakathāvacane anotaraṇato appavisanato.
tika-vin08t:503_6: Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sacassa appaccavekkhatova aruṇo uggacchati, iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatī”ti.
tika-vin08t:504_0: Aparo nayo – kiṃ idaṃ vacanaṃ pāḷivacanaṃ vā aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ vā ṭīkāvacanaṃ vā
tika-vin08t:504_1: ganthantaravacanaṃ vāti. Tattha na tāva pāḷivacanaṃ, na aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ, na ganthantaravacanaṃ,
tika-vin08t:504_2: atha kho ṭīkāvacananti. Hotu ṭīkāvacanaṃ, sakavacanaṃ vā paravacanaṃ vā adhippetavacanaṃ
tika-vin08t:504_3: vā anadhippetavacanaṃ vāti. Tattha na sakavacanaṃ hoti, atha kho paravacanaṃ. Tenāha
tika-vin08t:504_4: “vadantī”ti. Na ṭīkācariyena adhippetavacanaṃ hoti, atha kho anadhippetavacanaṃ.
tika-vin08t:504_5: Tenāha “taṃ vīmaṃsitabba”nti. Tehi pana ācariyehi atītaparibhogapaccavekkhaṇāti idaṃ
tika-vin08t:504_7: saddena yojetvā kataṃ bhaveyya. Atīte paribhogo atītaparibhogo, atītaparibhogassa
tika-vin08t:504_8: paccavekkhaṇā atītaparibhogapaccavekkhaṇāti evaṃ pana kate atītaparibhogassa paccuppannasamīpattā
tika-vin08t:504_9: paccuppannavācakena saddena kathanaṃ hoti yathā taṃ nagarato āgantvā nisinnaṃ purisaṃ
tika-vin08t:505_0: Vinayasuttantavisuddhimaggādīsu ca “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevatī”ti vattamānavacaneneva
tika-vin08t:505_1: pāṭho hoti, na atītavacanena, atītaparibhogoti ca imasmiṃyeva divase pacchābhattādikālaṃ
tika-vin08t:505_2: upādāya purebhattādīsu paribhogo icchitabbo, na hiyyo paribhogo. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti
tika-vin08t:505_3: ce? Aṭṭhakathāpamāṇena. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “piṇḍapāto ālope ālope, tathā asakkontena
tika-vin08t:505_5: iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatī”ti. Etena piṇḍapātaṃ ālope ālope paccavekkhanto bhojanakiriyāya
tika-vin08t:505_6: apariniṭṭhitattā mukhyato paccuppannapaccavekkhaṇā hoti, purebhattādīsu catūsu koṭṭhāsesu
tika-vin08t:505_7: paccavekkhanto bhojanakiriyāya pariniṭṭhitattā atītapaccavekkhaṇā hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:505_8: Sā pana paccuppannasamīpattā vattamānavacanena vidhīyati. Yadi hi hiyyo paribhuttāni
tika-vin08t:505_10: paccavekkhitabbāni siyuṃ, evañca sati yathāvuttaaṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ niratthakaṃ siyā,
tika-vin08t:514_0: Yasmā ca sabbāsavasuttādīsu bhagavatā desitakāle bhikkhukattukattā nāmayogattā vattamānapaṭhamapurisavasena
tika-vin08t:514_1: “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevatī”ti desitā, tadanukaraṇena bhikkhūnaṃ paccavekkhaṇakāle
tika-vin08t:514_5: tāni ca kiriyāpadāni paccuppannavasena vā paccuppannasamīpaatītavasena vā vattamānavibhattiyuttāni
tika-vin08t:514_6: honti, tasmā paccuppannaparibhuttānaṃ vā atītaparibhuttānaṃ vā paccayānaṃ paccavekkhaṇakāle
tika-vin08t:514_7: “paṭisevāmī”ti vacanaṃ bhagavato vacanassa anugatattā upapannamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:515_0: Anuvacanepi evaṃ vicāraṇā kātabbā – “ajja pāto paribhuttaṃ sāyaṃ paccavekkhantena
tika-vin08t:515_1: ajja yaṃ mayā cīvaraṃ paribhuttantiādinā atītavasena paccavekkhaṇā kātabbā”ti ye
tika-vin08t:515_2: vadanti, te evaṃ pucchitabbā – kiṃ bhavanto bhagavatā atītaparibhuttesu atītavasena
tika-vin08t:515_3: paccavekkhaṇā desitāti? Na desitā. Kathaṃ desitāti? “Paccavekkhatī”ti paccuppannavaseneva
tika-vin08t:515_4: desitāti. Kiṃ bhonto bhagavato kāle atītaparibhuttesu paccavekkhaṇā natthīti? Atthi.
tika-vin08t:515_5: Atha kasmā bhagavatā paccuppannavaseneva paccavekkhaṇā desitāti? Paccuppannasamīpavasena
tika-vin08t:515_6: vā sāmaññavasena vā desitāti. Evaṃ sante bhagavato anukaraṇena idānipi atītaparibhuttānaṃ
tika-vin08t:515_7: paccayānaṃ paccuppannavasena paccavekkhaṇā kātabbāti. Ye pana evaṃ vadanti “hiyyo
tika-vin08t:515_8: paribhuttānameva atītapaccavekkhaṇā kātabbā, na ajja paribhuttānaṃ, tesaṃ pana paccuppannapaccavekkhaṇāyevā”ti,
tika-vin08t:515_9: te evaṃ vattabbā – kiṃ bhonto yathā tumhe vadanti, evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ atthīti? Natthi.
tika-vin08t:515_10: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ atthīti? Natthi. Evaṃ sante sāṭṭhakathesu tepiṭakesu buddhavacanesu
tika-vin08t:515_11: asaṃvijjamānaṃ tumhākaṃ vacanaṃ kathaṃ paccetabbanti? Ācariyaparamparāvasena. Hotu
tika-vin08t:515_12: tumhākaṃ ācariyaladdhivasena kathanaṃ, kālo nāma tividho atīto anāgato paccuppannoti.
tika-vin08t:515_13: Tattha pariniṭṭhitakiriyā atīto nāma, abhimukhakiriyā anāgato nāma, āraddhaaniṭṭhitakiriyā
tika-vin08t:518_0: Tattha ajja vā hotu hiyyo vā tato pubbe vā, paribhuttapaccayo supariniṭṭhitabhuñjanakiriyattā
tika-vin08t:518_1: atīto nāma. Tattha hiyyo vā tato pubbe vā paribhuttapaccayo atikkantaaruṇuggamanattā
tika-vin08t:518_2: na paccavekkhaṇāraho, paccavekkhitopi appaccavekkhitoyeva hoti, iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne
tika-vin08t:518_3: tiṭṭhati. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sacassa appaccavekkhatova aruṇo uggacchati, iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne
tika-vin08t:518_4: tiṭṭhatī”ti. Ajjeva pana cīvarañca senāsanañca paribhoge paribhoge, piṇḍapātaṃ ālope
tika-vin08t:518_5: ālope, bhesajjaṃ paṭiggahaṇe paribhoge ca paccavekkhato apariniṭṭhitabhuñjanakiriyattā
tika-vin08t:518_6: paccuppannaparibhuttapaccavekkhaṇā nāma hoti. Pure paribhuttaṃ tato pacchā catūsu
tika-vin08t:518_8: nāma hoti. Ettakaṃ paccavekkhaṇāya khettaṃ, na tato pubbe pacchā vā. Yathāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:518_9: “sīlavato appaccavekkhitaparibhogo iṇaparibhogo nāma. Tasmā cīvaraṃ paribhoge paribhoge…pe…
tika-vin08t:518_10: bhesajjassa paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi satipaccayatā vaṭṭatī”ti, tasmā hiyyo paribhuttassa
tika-vin08t:518_11: iṇaparibhogattā taṃ anāmasitvā ajja paribhuttesu atītapaccuppannesu bhagavato vacanassa
tika-vin08t:519_0: Evaṃ paccayasannissitasīlassa suddhiṃ dassetvā idāni teneva pasaṅgena sabbāpi suddhiyo
tika-vin08t:519_1: dassetuṃ “catubbidhā hi suddhī”tiādimāha. Tattha sujjhati etāyāti suddhi, yathādhammaṃ
tika-vin08t:519_2: desanāva suddhi desanāsuddhi. Vuṭṭhānassapi cettha desanāya eva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t:519_3: Chinnamūlāpattīnaṃ pana abhikkhutāpaṭiññāyeva desanā. Adhiṭṭhānavisiṭṭho saṃvarova
tika-vin08t:519_4: suddhi saṃvarasuddhi. Dhammena samena paccayānaṃ pariyeṭṭhi eva suddhi pariyeṭṭhisuddhi.
tika-vin08t:519_5: Catūsu paccayesu vuttavidhinā paccavekkhaṇāva suddhi paccavekkhaṇasuddhi. Esa tāva
tika-vin08t:519_6: suddhīsu samāsanayo. Suddhimantesu sīlesu pana desanā suddhi etassāti desanāsuddhi.
tika-vin08t:519_7: Sesesupi eseva nayo. Na punevaṃ karissāmīti ettha evanti saṃvarabhedaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-vin08t:519_8: Pahāyāti vajjetvā, akatvāti attho. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “sujjhati desanādīhi, sodhīyatīti
tika-vin08t:519_9: vā suddhi, catubbidhasīlaṃ. Tenāha ‘desanāya sujjhanato’tiādi. Ettha desanāggahaṇena
tika-vin08t:519_10: vuṭṭhānampi chinnamūlānaṃ abhikkhutāpaṭiññāpi saṅgahitā. Chinnamūlāpattīnampi hi
tika-vin08t:519_11: pārājikāpattivuṭṭhānena heṭṭhāparirakkhitaṃ bhikkhusīlaṃ visuddhaṃ nāma hoti. Tena
tika-vin08t:520_0: Tattha desīyati uccārīyatīti desanā, disī uccāraṇeti dhātu, desīyati ñāpīyati etāyāti
tika-vin08t:520_1: vā desanā, disa pekkhaneti dhātu. Ubhayathāpi viratipadhānakusalacittasamuṭṭhito
tika-vin08t:520_2: desanāvacībhedasaddo. Saṃvaraṇaṃ saṃvaro, saṃ-pubba vara saṃvaraṇeti dhātu, satipadhāno
tika-vin08t:520_3: cittuppādo. Pariyesanā pariyeṭṭhi, pari-pubba isa pariyesaneti dhātu, vīriyapadhāno
tika-vin08t:520_4: cittuppādo. Paṭi punappunaṃ ogāhetvā ikkhanā paccavekkhaṇā, paṭi-pubba ava-pubba
tika-vin08t:520_5: ikkha dassanaṅkesūti dhātu, paññāpadhāno cittuppādo. Tesu desanāya vacībhedasaddabhāvato
tika-vin08t:520_6: vacībhedaṃ kātuṃ asakkontassa ca dutiyakaṃ alabhantassa ca na sampajjati, sesā pana
tika-vin08t:520_7: cittuppādamattabhāvato vacībhedaṃ kātuṃ asakkontassapi dutiyakaṃ alabhantassapi sampajjanti
tika-vin08t:520_8: eva, tasmā gilānādikālesu paccavekkhaṇāpāṭhaṃ paṭhitumasakkontenapi atthaṃ manasi
tika-vin08t:521_0: Dātabbaṭṭhena dāyaṃ, taṃ ādiyantīti dāyādā, ananuññātesu sabbena sabbaṃ paribhogābhāvato
tika-vin08t:521_1: anuññātesuyeva ca paribhogasabbhāvabhāvato bhikkhūhi paribhuñjitabbapaccayā bhagavato
tika-vin08t:521_2: santakā. Dhammadāyādasuttañcettha sādhakanti “dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavatha,
tika-vin08t:521_3: mā āmisadāyādā, atthi me tumhesu anukampā, kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-vin08t:521_4: no āmisadāyādā”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ dhammadāyādasuttañca ettha etasmiṃ atthe sādhakaṃ.
tika-vin08t:521_5: Avītarāgānaṃ taṇhāvasīkatāya paccayaparibhoge sāmibhāvo natthi, tadabhāvena vītarāgānaṃ
tika-vin08t:521_6: tattha sāmibhāvo yathāruci paribhogasabbhāvato. Tathā hi te paṭikūlampi appaṭikūlākārena
tika-vin08t:521_7: appaṭikūlampi paṭikūlākārena tadubhayampi vajjetvā ajjhupekkhaṇākārena paccaye paribhuñjanti,
tika-vin08t:521_8: dāyakānañca manorathaṃ paripūrenti. Tenāha “te hi taṇhāya dāsabyaṃ atītattā sāmino
tika-vin08t:521_9: hutvā paribhuñjantī”ti. Yo panāyaṃ sīlavato puthujjanassa paccavekkhitaparibhogo,
tika-vin08t:521_10: so iṇaparibhogassa paccanīkattā ānaṇyaparibhogo nāma hoti. Yathā pana iṇāyiko attano
tika-vin08t:521_11: ruciyā icchitaṃ desaṃ gantuṃ na labhati, evaṃ iṇaparibhogayutto lokato nissarituṃ
tika-vin08t:521_12: na labhatīti tappaṭipakkhattā sīlavato paccavekkhitaparibhogo ānaṇyaparibhogoti vuccati,
tika-vin08t:521_13: tasmā nippariyāyato catuparibhogavinimutto visuṃyevāyaṃ paribhogoti veditabbo, so
tika-vin08t:521_14: idha visuṃ na vutto, dāyajjaparibhogeyeva vā saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti. Sīlavāpi hi imāya
tika-vin08t:522_0: Sabbesanti ariyānaṃ puthujjanānañca. Kathaṃ puthujjanānaṃ ime paribhogā sambhavantīti?
tika-vin08t:522_1: Upacāravasena. Yo hi puthujjanassapi sallekhapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitassa paccayagedhaṃ
tika-vin08t:522_2: pahāya tattha anupalittena cittena paribhogo, so sāmiparibhogo viya hoti. Sīlavato
tika-vin08t:522_3: pana paccavekkhitaparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo viya hoti dāyakānaṃ manorathassāvirādhanato.
tika-vin08t:522_4: Tena vuttaṃ “dāyajjaparibhogeyeva vā saṅgahaṃ gacchatī”ti. Kalyāṇaputhujjanassa paribhoge
tika-vin08t:522_5: vattabbameva natthi tassa sekkhasaṅgahato. Sekkhasutta ñhetassa atthassa sādhakaṃ.
tika-vin08t:523_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “dātabbaṭṭhena dāyaṃ, taṃ ādiyantīti dāyādā. Sattannaṃ sekkhānanti
tika-vin08t:523_1: ettha kalyāṇaputhujjanāpi saṅgahitā tesaṃ ānaṇyaparibhogassa dāyajjaparibhoge saṅgahitattāti
tika-vin08t:523_2: veditabbaṃ. Dhammadāyādasuttanti “dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā”tiādinā
tika-vin08t:523_3: pavattaṃ suttaṃ. Tattha “mā me āmisadāyādāti evaṃ me-saddaṃ ānetvā attho veditabbo.
tika-vin08t:523_4: Evañhi yathāvuttatthasādhakaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha me mama āmisadāyādā catupaccayabhuñjakāti
tika-vin08t:523_5: bhagavato sambandhabhūtassa sambandhībhūtā paccayā vuttā, tasmā dāyakehi dinnāpi
tika-vin08t:523_6: paccayā bhagavatā anuññātattā bhagavato paccayāyeva hontīti etassa atthassa dhammadāyādasuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:524_0: Lajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogo nāma lajjissa santakaṃ gahetvā paribhogo. Alajjinā saddhinti
tika-vin08t:524_1: etthāpi eseva nayo. Ādito paṭṭhāya hi alajjī nāma natthīti iminā diṭṭhadiṭṭhesuyeva
tika-vin08t:524_2: āsaṅkā na kātabbāti dasseti. Attano bhārabhūtā saddhivihārikādayo. Tepi nivāretabbāti
tika-vin08t:524_3: yo passati, tena nivāretabbāti pāṭho. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “yopi attano bhārabhūtena
tika-vin08t:524_4: alajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogaṃ karoti, sopi nivāretabbo”ti pāṭho dissati, tathāpi atthato
tika-vin08t:524_5: ubhayathāpi yujjati. Attano saddhivihārikādayopi alajjibhāvato nivāretabbā. Alajjīhi
tika-vin08t:524_6: saddhivihārikādīhi ekasambhogaṃ karontā aññepi nivāretabbāva. Sace na oramati, ayampi
tika-vin08t:524_7: alajjīyeva hotīti ettha evaṃ nivārito so puggalo alajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogato oramati
tika-vin08t:524_8: viramati, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce oramati, ayampi alajjīyeva hoti, tena saddhiṃ paribhogaṃ
tika-vin08t:524_9: karonto sopi alajjīyeva hotīti attho. Tena vuttaṃ “evaṃ eko alajjī alajjisatampi
tika-vin08t:524_10: karotī”ti. Adhammiyoti anesanādīhi uppanno. Dhammiyoti bhikkhācariyādīhi uppanno.
tika-vin08t:524_11: Saṅghasseva detīti bhattaṃ aggahetvā attanā laddhasalākaṃyeva deti.
tika-vin08t:525_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “lajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogoti dhammāmisavasena missībhāvo.
tika-vin08t:525_1: Alajjinā saddhinti etthāpi eseva nayo. Ādito paṭṭhāya hi alajjī nāma natthīti iminā
tika-vin08t:525_2: diṭṭhadiṭṭhesu āsaṅkā nāma na kātabbā, diṭṭhasutādikāraṇe sati eva kātabbāti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:525_3: Attano bhārabhūtā saddhivihārikādayo. Sace na oramatīti agatigamanavasena dhammāmisaparibhogato
tika-vin08t:525_4: na oramati. Āpatti nāma natthīti idaṃ alajjīnaṃ dhammenuppannapaccayaṃ dhammakammañca
tika-vin08t:525_5: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tesampi hi kuladūsanādisamuppannaṃ paccayaṃ paribhuñjantānaṃ vaggakammādīni
tika-vin08t:525_7: vuttattā heṭṭhā lajjiparibhogālajjiparibhogā paccayavasena ekakammādivasena ca vuttā
tika-vin08t:525_8: evāti veditabbaṃ. Teneva duṭṭhadosasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ codakacuditakabhāve ṭhitā
tika-vin08t:525_9: dve alajjino dhammaparibhogampi sandhāya ‘ekasambhogaparibhogā hutvā jīvathā’ti vuttā
tika-vin08t:525_10: tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ dhammāmisāparibhoge virodhābhāvā. Lajjīnameva hi alajjinā saha tadubhayaparibhogo
tika-vin08t:526_0: Sace pana lajjī alajjiṃ paggaṇhāti…pe… antaradhāpetīti ettha kevalaṃ paggaṇhitukāmatāya
tika-vin08t:526_1: evaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, dhammassa pana sāsanassa sotūnañca anuggahatthāya vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:526_2: veditabbaṃ. Purimanayena “so āpattiyā kāretabbo”ti vuttattā imassa āpattiyevāti vadanti.
tika-vin08t:526_3: Uddesaggahaṇādinā dhammassa paribhogo dhammaparibhogo. Dhammānuggahena gaṇhantassa
tika-vin08t:526_4: āpattiyā abhāvepi thero tassa alajjibhāvaṃyeva sandhāya “pāpo kirāya”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin08t:527_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana imasmiṃ ṭhāne vitthārato vinicchitaṃ. Kathaṃ? Dhammaparibhogoti
tika-vin08t:527_1: “ekakammaṃ ekuddeso”tiādinā vuttasaṃvāso ceva nissayaggahaṇādiko sabbo nirāmisaparibhogo
tika-vin08t:527_2: ca veditabbo. “Na so āpattiyā kāretabbo”ti vuttattā lajjino alajjipaggahe āpattīti
tika-vin08t:527_3: veditabbaṃ. Itaropīti lajjīpi. Tassāpi attānaṃ paggaṇhantassa alajjino, iminā ca
tika-vin08t:527_4: lajjino vaṇṇabhaṇanādilābhaṃ paṭicca āmisagarukatāya vā gehassitapemena vā taṃ alajjiṃ
tika-vin08t:527_5: paggaṇhanto lajjī sāsanaṃ antaradhāpeti nāmāti dasseti. Evaṃ gahaṭṭhādīsu upatthambhito
tika-vin08t:527_6: alajjī balaṃ labhitvā pesale abhibhavitvā na cirasseva sāsanaṃ uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ karotīti.
tika-vin08t:528_0: Dhammaparibhogopi tattha vaṭṭatīti iminā āmisaparibhogato dhammaparibhogova garuko,
tika-vin08t:528_1: tasmā ativiya alajjīvivekena kātabboti dasseti. “Dhammānuggahena uggaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin08t:528_2: vuttattā alajjussannatāyasāsane osakkante, lajjīsu ca appahontesu alajjiṃ pakatattaṃ
tika-vin08t:528_3: gaṇapūrakaṃ gahetvā upasampadādikaraṇena ceva keci alajjino dhammāmisaparibhogena
tika-vin08t:528_4: saṅgahetvā sesālajjigaṇassa niggahena ca sāsanaṃ paggaṇhitumpi vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin08t:529_0: Keci pana “koṭiyaṃ ṭhito ganthoti vuttattā ganthapariyāpuṇanameva dhammaparibhogo,
tika-vin08t:529_1: na ekakammādi, tasmā alajjīhi saddhiṃ uposathādikaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, āpatti
tika-vin08t:529_2: natthī”ti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ, ekakammādīsu bahūsu dhammaparibhogesu alajjināpi
tika-vin08t:529_3: saddhiṃ kattabbāvatthāyattaṃ dhammaparibhogaṃ dassetuṃ idha nidassanavasena ganthasseva
tika-vin08t:529_4: samuddhaṭattā. Na hi ekakammādiko vidhi dhammaparibhogo na hotīti sakkā vattuṃ anāmisattā
tika-vin08t:529_5: dhammāmisesu apariyāpannassa ca kassaci abhāvā. Teneva aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ dhammapaṭisanthārakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:529_7: pabbajjāraho pabbājetabbo, upasampadāraho upasampādetabbo…pe… ayaṃ dhammapaṭisanthāro
tika-vin08t:529_8: nāmā”ti evaṃ saṅghakammādipi dhammakoṭṭhāse dassitaṃ. Tesu pana dhammakoṭṭhāsesu
tika-vin08t:529_9: yaṃ gaṇapūrakādivasena alajjino apekkhitvā uposathādi vā tesaṃ santikā dhammuggahaṇanissayaggahaṇādi
tika-vin08t:529_10: vā karīyati, taṃ dhammo ceva paribhogo cāti dhammaparibhogoti vuccati, etaṃ tathārūpapaccayaṃ
tika-vin08t:529_11: vinā kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, karontassa alajjiparibhogo ca hoti dukkaṭañca. Yaṃ pana alajjisataṃ
tika-vin08t:529_12: anapekkhitvā tajjanīyādiniggahakammaṃ vā parivāsādiupakārakammaṃ vā uggahaparipucchādānādi
tika-vin08t:529_13: vā karīyati, taṃ dhammo eva, no paribhogo, etaṃ anurūpānaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, āmisadāne
tika-vin08t:529_14: viya āpatti natthi. Nissayadānampi terasasammutidānādi ca vattapaṭipattisādiyanādiparibhogassapi hetuttā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:530_0: Yo pana mahāalajjī uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ karoti, tassa saddhivihārikādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:530_1: upasampadādi upakārakammampi uggahaparipucchādānādi ca kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, āpatti eva
tika-vin08t:530_2: hoti, niggahakammameva kātabbaṃ. Teneva alajjipaggahopi paṭikkhitto. Dhammāmisaparibhogavivajjanenapi
tika-vin08t:530_3: hi dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahova adhippeto, so ca pesalānaṃ phāsuvihārasaddhammaṭṭhitivinayānuggahādiatthāya
tika-vin08t:530_4: etadatthattā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā, tasmā yaṃ yaṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ upatthambhāya, pesalānaṃ
tika-vin08t:530_5: aphāsuvihārāya, saddhammaparihānādiatthāya hoti, taṃ sabbampi paribhogo vā hotu aparibhogo
tika-vin08t:530_6: vā kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, evaṃ karontā sāsanaṃ antaradhāpenti, āpattiñca āpajjanti, dhammāmisaparibhogesu
tika-vin08t:530_7: cettha alajjīhi ekakammādidhammaparibhogo eva pesalānaṃ aphāsuvihārāya saddhammaparihānādiatthāya
tika-vin08t:530_8: hoti, na tathā āmisaparibhogo. Na hi alajjīnaṃ paccayaparibhogamattena pesalānaṃ
tika-vin08t:530_9: aphāsuvihārādi hoti, yathāvuttadhammaparibhogena pana hoti. Tapparivajjanena ca phāsuvihārādayo.
tika-vin08t:530_10: Tathā hi katasikkhāpadavītikkamā alajjipuggalā uposathādīsu paviṭṭhā “tumhe kāyadvāre
tika-vin08t:530_11: ceva vacīdvāre ca vītikkamaṃ karothā”tiādinā bhikkhūhi vattabbā honti. Yathā vinayañca
tika-vin08t:530_12: atiṭṭhantā saṅghato bahikaraṇādivasena suṭṭhu niggahetabbā, tathā akatvā tehi saha
tika-vin08t:530_13: saṃvasantāpi alajjinova honti “ekopi alajjī alajjisatampi karotī”tiādivacanato. Yadi
tika-vin08t:530_14: hi te evaṃ aniggahitā siyuṃ, saṅghe kalahādiṃ vaḍḍhetvā uposathādisāmaggikammapaṭibāhanādinā
tika-vin08t:530_15: pesalānaṃ aphāsuṃ katvā kamena te devadattavajjiputtakādayo viya parisaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
tika-vin08t:530_16: attano vippaṭipattiṃ dhammato vinayato dīpentā saṅghabhedādimpi katvā na cirasseva
tika-vin08t:530_17: sāsanaṃ antaradhāpeyyuṃ. Tesu pana saṅghato bahikaraṇādivasena niggahitesu sabbopi
tika-vin08t:530_18: ayaṃ upaddavo na hoti. Vuttañhi “dussīlapuggale nissāya uposatho na tiṭṭhati, pavāraṇā
tika-vin08t:530_19: na tiṭṭhati, saṅghakammāni na pavattanti, sāmaggī na hoti…pe… dussīlesu pana niggahitesu
tika-vin08t:530_20: sabbopi ayaṃ upaddavo na hoti, tato pesalā bhikkhū phāsu viharantī”ti, tasmā ekakammādidhammaparibhogova
tika-vin08t:530_21: āmisaparibhogatopi ativiya alajjīvivekena kātabbo, āpattikaro ca saddhammaparihānihetuttāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:531_0: Apica “uposatho na tiṭṭhati, pavāraṇā na tiṭṭhati, saṅghakammāni na pavattantī”ti
tika-vin08t:531_1: evaṃ alajjīhi saddhiṃ saṅghakammākaraṇassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pakāsitattāpi cetaṃ sijjhati.
tika-vin08t:531_2: Tathā parivattaliṅgassa bhikkhuno bhikkhunupassayaṃ gacchantassa paṭipattikathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:531_3: “ārādhikā ca honti saṅgāhikā lajjiniyo, tā kopetvā aññattha na gantabbaṃ. Gacchati
tika-vin08t:531_4: ce, gāmantaranadīpārarattivippavāsagaṇamhā ohīyanāpattīhi na muccati…pe… alajjiniyo
tika-vin08t:531_5: honti, saṅgahaṃ pana karonti, tāpi pariccajitvā aññattha gantuṃ labhatī”ti evaṃ alajjinīsu
tika-vin08t:531_7: tatopi alajjisaṃvāsāpatti eva saddhammaparihāniyā hetubhūto garukatarāti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t:531_8: Na hi lahukāpattiṭṭhānaṃ vā anāpattiṭṭhānaṃ vā pariharituṃ garukāpattiṭṭhānavītikkamaṃ
tika-vin08t:531_9: ācariyā anujānanti. Tathā asaṃvāsapadassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sabbehipi lajjipuggalehi
tika-vin08t:531_10: samaṃ sikkhitabbabhāvato samasikkhātā nāma. Ettha yasmā sabbepi lajjino etesu kammādīsu
tika-vin08t:531_11: saha vasanti, na ekopi tato bahiddhā sandissati, tasmā tāni sabbānipi gahetvā eso
tika-vin08t:531_12: saṃvāso nāmā”ti evaṃ lajjīheva ekakammādisaṃvāso vaṭṭatīti pakāsito.
tika-vin08t:532_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā asaṃvāsikesu alajjī na gahitoti? Nāyaṃ virodho, ye gaṇapūrake katvā
tika-vin08t:532_1: kataṃ kammaṃ kuppati, tesaṃ pārājikādiapakatattānaññeva asaṃvāsikattena gahitattā.
tika-vin08t:532_2: Alajjino pana pakatattabhūtāpi santi, te ce gaṇapūrakā hutvā kammaṃ sādhenti, kevalaṃ
tika-vin08t:532_3: katvā agatigamanena karontānaṃ āpattikarā honti sabhāgāpattiāpannā viya aññamaññaṃ.
tika-vin08t:532_4: Yasmā alajjitañca lajjitañca puthujjanānaṃ cittakkhaṇapaṭibaddhaṃ, na sabbakālikaṃ.
tika-vin08t:532_5: Sañcicca hi vītikkamacitte uppanne alajjino “na puna īdisaṃ karissāmī”ti cittena lajjino honti.
tika-vin08t:533_0: Tesu ca ye pesalehi ovadiyamānāpi na oramanti, punappunaṃ karonti, te eva asaṃvasitabbā,
tika-vin08t:533_1: na itare lajjidhamme okkantattā, tasmāpi alajjino asaṃvāsikesu agaṇetvā tapparivajjanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:533_2: sodhetvāva uposathādikaraṇaṃ anaññātaṃ. Tathā hi “pārisuddhiṃ āyasmanto ārocetha,
tika-vin08t:533_3: pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmī”tiādinā aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathakaraṇassa ayuttatā
tika-vin08t:533_4: pakāsitā, “yassa siyā āpatti, so āvikareyya…pe… phāsu hotī”ti evaṃ alajjimpi lajjidhamme
tika-vin08t:533_5: patiṭṭhāpetvā uposathakaraṇappakāro ca vutto, “kaccittha parisuddhā…pe… parisuddhetthāyasmanto”ti
tika-vin08t:533_6: ca pārisuddhiuposathe “parisuddho ahaṃ, bhante, parisuddhoti maṃ dhārethā”ti ca evaṃ
tika-vin08t:533_7: uposathaṃ karontānaṃ parisuddhatā ca pakāsitā, vacanamattena anoramantānañca uposathapavāraṇaṭṭhapanavidhi
tika-vin08t:533_8: ca vutto, sabbathā lajjidhammaṃ anokkamantehi saṃvāsassa ayuttatāya nissayadānaggahaṇapaṭikkhepo,
tika-vin08t:533_10: asaṃvāsikattapāpanavidhi ca vutto, tasmā yathāvuttehi suttantanayehi, aṭṭhakathāvacanehi
tika-vin08t:533_11: ca pakatattehipi apakatattehipi sabbehi alajjīhi ekakammādisaṃvāso na vaṭṭati, karontānaṃ
tika-vin08t:533_12: āpatti eva dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahatthāyeva sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ paññattattāti
tika-vin08t:533_13: niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ. Teneva dutiyasaṅgītiyaṃ pakatattāpi alajjino vajjiputtakā
tika-vin08t:533_14: yasattherādīhi mahantena vāyāmena saṅghato viyojitā. Na hi tesu pārājikādiasaṃvāsikāpatti
tika-vin08t:533_15: atthi, tehi dīpitānaṃ dasannaṃ vatthūnaṃ lahukāpattivisayattāti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:539_1: kathetuṃ “dānavissāsaggāhehī”tiādimāha. Tattha dīyate dānaṃ, cīvarādivatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:539_2: katvā pavatto alobhappadhāno kāmāvacarakusalakiriyacittuppādo. Sasanaṃ sāso, sasu
tika-vin08t:539_3: hiṃsāyanti dhātu, hiṃsananti attho, vigato sāso etasmā gāhāti vissāso. Gahaṇaṃ gāho,
tika-vin08t:539_4: vissāsena gāho vissāsaggāho. Visesane cettha karaṇavacanaṃ, vissāsavasena gāho, na
tika-vin08t:539_5: theyyacittavasenāti attho. Lacchateti lābho, cīvarādivatthu, tassa lābhassa. Pariṇamiyate
tika-vin08t:539_6: pariṇāmanaṃ, aññesaṃ atthāya pariṇatassa attano, aññassa vā pariṇāmanaṃ, dāpananti
