tika-vin08t:539_7: attho. Dānavissāsaggāhehi lābhassa pariṇāmananti ettha uddese samabhiniviṭṭhassa
tika-vin08t:539_8: “dāna”nti padassa atthavinicchayo tāva paṭhamaṃ evaṃ veditabboti yojanā. Attano santakassa
tika-vin08t:539_9: cīvarādiparikkhārassa dānanti sambandho. Yassa kassacīti sampadānaniddeso, yassa
tika-vin08t:540_0: Yadidaṃ “dāna”nti vuttaṃ, tattha kiṃ lakkhaṇanti āha “tatridaṃ dānalakkhaṇa”nti.
tika-vin08t:540_1: “Idaṃ tuyhaṃ demī”ti vadatīti idaṃ tivaṅgasampannaṃ dānalakkhaṇaṃ hotīti yojanā.
tika-vin08t:540_2: Tattha idanti deyyadhammanidassanaṃ. Tuyhanti paṭiggāhakanidassanaṃ. Demīti dāyakanidassanaṃ.
tika-vin08t:540_3: Dadāmītiādīni pana pariyāyavacanāni. Vuttañhi “deyyadāyakapaṭiggāhakā viya dānassā”ti,
tika-vin08t:540_5: idaṃ pana ekadesalakkhaṇakathanameva, kiṃ evaṃ dīyamānaṃ sammukhāyeva dinnaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t:540_6: udāhu parammukhāpīti āha “sammukhāpi parammukhāpi dinnaṃyeva hotī”ti. Tuyhaṃ gaṇhāhītiādīsu
tika-vin08t:540_7: ayamattho – “gaṇhāhī”ti vutte “demī”ti vuttasadisaṃ hoti, tasmā mukhyato dinnattā
tika-vin08t:540_8: sudinnaṃ hoti, “gaṇhāmī”ti ca vutte mukhyato gahaṇaṃ hoti, tasmā suggahitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t:540_9: “Tuyhaṃ mayha”nti imāni pana paṭiggāhakapaṭibandhatākaraṇe vacanāni. Tava santakaṃ
tika-vin08t:540_10: karohītiādīni pana pariyāyato dānaggahaṇāni, tasmā dudinnaṃ duggahitañca hoti. Loke
tika-vin08t:540_11: hi apariccajitukāmāpi puna gaṇhitukāmāpi “tava santakaṃ hotū”ti niyyātenti yathā
tika-vin08t:540_12: taṃ kusarañño mātu rajjaniyyātanaṃ. Tenāha “neva dātā dātuṃ jānāti, na itaro gahetu”nti.
tika-vin08t:540_13: Sace panātiādīsu pana dāyakena paññattiyaṃ akovidatāya pariyāyavacane vuttepi paṭiggāhako
tika-vin08t:540_14: attano paññattiyaṃ kovidatāya mukhyavacanena gaṇhāti, tasmā “suggahita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:541_0: Sace pana ekotiādīsu pana dāyako mukhyavacanena deti, paṭiggāhakopi mukhyavacanena
tika-vin08t:541_1: paṭikkhipati, tasmā dāyakassa pubbe adhiṭṭhitampi cīvaraṃ dānavasena adhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:541_2: vijahati, pariccattattā attano asantakattā atirekacīvarampi na hoti, tasmā dasāhātikkamepi
tika-vin08t:541_3: āpatti na hoti. Paṭiggāhakassapi na paṭikkhipitattā attano santakaṃ na hoti, tasmā
tika-vin08t:541_4: atirekacīvaraṃ na hotīti dasāhātikkamepi āpatti natthi. Yassa pana ruccatīti ettha
tika-vin08t:541_5: pana imassa cīvarassa assāmikattā paṃsukūlaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā yassa ruccati, tena paṃsukūlabhāvena
tika-vin08t:541_6: gahetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ, paribhuñjantena pana dāyakena pubbaadhiṭṭhitampi dānavasena
tika-vin08t:541_7: adhiṭṭhānassa vijahitattā puna adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ itarena pubbe anadhiṭṭhitattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:542_0: Itthannāmassa dehītiādīsu pana āṇatyatthe pavattāya pañcamīvibhattiyā vuttattā āṇattena
tika-vin08t:542_1: paṭiggāhakassa dinnakāleyeva paṭiggāhakassa santakaṃ hoti, na tato pubbe, pubbe pana
tika-vin08t:542_2: āṇāpakasseva, tasmā “yo pahiṇati, tasseva santaka”nti vuttaṃ. Itthannāmassa dammīti
tika-vin08t:542_3: pana paccuppannatthe pavattāya vattamānavibhattiyā vuttattā tato paṭṭhāya paṭiggāhakasseva
tika-vin08t:542_4: santakaṃ hoti, tasmā “yassa pahīyati, tassa santaka”nti vuttaṃ. Tasmāti iminā āyasmatā
tika-vin08t:542_5: revatattherena āyasmato sāriputtassa cīvarapesanavatthusmiṃ bhagavatā desitesu adhiṭṭhānesu
tika-vin08t:543_0: Tattha dvādhiṭṭhitaṃ, svādhiṭṭhitanti ca na ticīvarādhiṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, atha
tika-vin08t:543_1: kho sāmike jīvante vissāsaggāhacīvarabhāvena ca sāmike mate matakacīvarabhāvena ca
tika-vin08t:543_2: gahaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tato pana dasāhe anatikkanteyeva ticīvarādhiṭṭhānaṃ vā parikkhāracoḷādhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:543_3: vā vikappanaṃ vā kātabbaṃ. Yo pahiṇatīti dāyakaṃ sandhāyāha, yassa pahīyatīti paṭiggāhakaṃ.
tika-vin08t:544_0: Pariccajitvā…pe… na labhati, āharāpento bhaṇḍagghena kāretabboti attho. Attanā…pe…
tika-vin08t:544_1: nissaggiyanti iminā parasantakabhūtattaṃ jānanto theyyapasayhavasena acchindanto
tika-vin08t:544_2: pārājiko hotīti dasseti. Porāṇaṭīkāyaṃ pana “sakasaññāya vinā gaṇhanto bhaṇḍaṃ agghāpetvā
tika-vin08t:544_3: āpattiyā kāretabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Sakasaññāya vināpi tāvakālikapaṃsukūlasaññādivasena
tika-vin08t:544_4: gaṇhanto āpattiyā na kāretabbo. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana pasayhākāraṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin08t:544_5: Tenāha “acchindato nissaggiya”nti. Sace pana…pe… vaṭṭatīti tuṭṭhadānaṃ āha, atha
tika-vin08t:544_6: panātiādinā kupitadānaṃ. Ubhayathāpi sayaṃ dinnattā vaṭṭati, gahaṇe āpatti natthīti attho.
tika-vin08t:545_0: Mama santike…pe… evaṃ pana dātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti vatthupariccāgalakkhaṇattā dānassa
tika-vin08t:545_1: evaṃ dadanto apariccajitvā dinnattā dānaṃ na hotīti na vaṭṭati, tato eva dukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin08t:545_2: hoti. Āharāpetuṃ pana vaṭṭatīti pubbe “akarontassa na demī”ti vuttattā yathāvuttaupajjhāyaggahaṇādīni
tika-vin08t:545_3: akaronte ācariyasseva santakaṃ hotīti katvā vuttaṃ. Karonte pana antevāsikassa santakaṃ
tika-vin08t:545_4: bhaveyya sabbaso apariccajitvā dinnattā. Sakasaññāya vijjamānattā “āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin08t:545_5: vuttaṃ siyā. Ṭīkāyaṃ pana “evaṃ dinnaṃ bhatisadisattā āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:545_6: Bhatisadise satipi kamme kate bhati laddhabbā hoti, tasmā āropetuṃ na vaṭṭeyya. Vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:545_7: pana “āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭatīti kamme akate bhatisadisattā vutta”nti vuttaṃ, tena kamme
tika-vin08t:545_8: kate āharāpetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ. Upajjhaṃ gaṇhissatīti sāmaṇerassa dānaṃ dīpeti,
tika-vin08t:545_9: tena ca sāmaṇerakāle datvā upasampannakāle acchindatopi pācittiyaṃ dīpeti. Ayaṃ tāva
tika-vin08t:545_10: dāne vinicchayoti iminā dānavinicchayādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vinicchayānaṃ ekaparicchedakatabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin08t:547_0: 70. Anuṭṭhānaseyyā nāma yāya seyyāya sayito yāva jīvitindriyupacchedaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin08t:547_1: tāva vuccati. Dadamānena ca matakadhanaṃ tāva ye tassa dhane issarā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā
tika-vin08t:547_2: vā, tesaṃ dātabbanti ettha ke gahaṭṭhā ke pabbajitā kena kāraṇena tassa dhane issarāti?
tika-vin08t:547_3: Gahaṭṭhā tāva gilānupaṭṭhākabhūtā tena kāraṇena gilānupaṭṭhākabhāgabhūte tassa dhane
tika-vin08t:547_4: issarā, yesañca vāṇijānaṃ hatthato kappiyakārakena pattādiparikkhāro gāhāpito, tesaṃ
tika-vin08t:547_5: yaṃ dātabbamūlaṃ, te ca tassa dhane issarā, yesañca mātāpitūnaṃ atthāya paricchinditvā
tika-vin08t:547_6: vatthāni ṭhapitāni, tepi tassa dhanassa issarā. Evamādinā yena yena kāraṇena yaṃ
tika-vin08t:547_7: yaṃ parikkhāradhanaṃ yehi yehi gahaṭṭhehi labhitabbaṃ hoti, tena tena kāraṇena te
tika-vin08t:547_8: te gahaṭṭhā tassa tassa dhanassa issarā.
tika-vin08t:548_0: Pabbajitā pana bāhirakā tatheva sati kāraṇe issarā. Pañcasu pana sahadhammikesu bhikkhū
tika-vin08t:548_1: sāmaṇerā ca matānaṃ bhikkhusāmaṇerānaṃ dhanaṃ vināpi kāraṇena dāyādabhāvena labhanti,
tika-vin08t:548_2: na itarā. Bhikkhunīsikkhamānasāmaṇerīnampi dhanaṃ tāyeva labhanti, na itare. Taṃ
tika-vin08t:548_3: pana matakadhanabhājanaṃ catupaccayabhājanavinicchaye āvi bhavissati, bahū pana vinayadharattherā
tika-vin08t:548_4: “ye tassa dhanassa issarā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā”ti pāṭhaṃ nissāya “matabhikkhussa
tika-vin08t:548_5: dhanaṃ gahaṭṭhabhūtā ñātakā labhantī”ti vinicchinanti, tampi vinicchayaṃ tassa ca
tika-vin08t:549_0: Anattamanassa santakanti “duṭṭhu kataṃ tayā mayā adinnaṃ mama santakaṃ gaṇhantenā”ti
tika-vin08t:549_1: vacībhedena vā cittuppādamattena vā domanassappattassa santakaṃ. Yo pana paṭhamaṃyeva
tika-vin08t:549_2: “suṭṭhu kataṃ tayā mama santakaṃ gaṇhantenā”ti vacībhedena vā cittuppādamattena vā
tika-vin08t:549_3: anumoditvā pacchā kenaci kāraṇena kupito, paccāharāpetuṃ na labhati. Yopi adātukāmo,
tika-vin08t:549_4: cittena pana adhivāseti, na kiñci vadatīti ettha tu porāṇaṭīkāyaṃ “cittena pana adhivāsetīti
tika-vin08t:549_5: vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ‘na kiñci vadatī’ti vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sati “cittenā”ti
tika-vin08t:549_6: idaṃ adhivāsanakiriyāya karaṇaṃ hoti. Adātukāmoti etthāpi tameva karaṇaṃ siyā, tato
tika-vin08t:549_7: “cittena adātukāmo, cittena adhivāsetī”tivacanaṃ ocityasamposakaṃ na bhaveyya. Taṃ
tika-vin08t:549_8: ṭhapetvā “adātukāmo”ti ettha kāyenāti vā vācāyāti vā aññaṃ karaṇampi na sambhavati,
tika-vin08t:549_9: tadasambhave sati visesatthavācako pana-saddopi niratthako. Na kiñci vadatīti ettha
tika-vin08t:549_10: tu vadanakiriyāya karaṇaṃ “vācāyā”ti padaṃ icchitabbaṃ, tathā ca sati aññaṃ adhivāsanakiriyāya
tika-vin08t:549_11: karaṇaṃ, aññaṃ vadanakiriyāya karaṇaṃ, aññā adhivāsanakiriyā, aññā vadanakiriyā,
tika-vin08t:549_12: tasmā “vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāvetu”nti vattuṃ na arahati, tasmā yopi cittena adātukāmo
tika-vin08t:549_13: hoti, pana tathāpi vācāya adhivāseti, na kiñci vadatīti yojanaṃ katvā pana “adhivāsetīti
tika-vin08t:549_14: vuttamevatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ na kiñci vadatīti vutta”nti vattumarahati. Ettha tu pana-saddo
tika-vin08t:549_16: avadanakiriyāya ca karaṇaṃ. Adhivāsanakiriyā ca avadanakiriyāyeva. “Adhivāsetī”ti
tika-vin08t:549_17: vutte avadanakiriyāya apākaṭabhāvato taṃ pakāsetuṃ “na kiñci vadatī”ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ
tika-vin08t:549_18: gayhamāne pubbāparavacanattho ocityasamposako siyā, tasmā ettakavivarehi vicāretvā gahetabboti.
tika-vin08t:551_0: 71. Lābhapariṇāmanavinicchaye tumhākaṃ sappiādīni ābhatānīti tumhākaṃ atthāya ābhatāni
tika-vin08t:551_1: sappiādīni. Pariṇatabhāvaṃ jānitvāpi vuttavidhinā viññāpentena tesaṃ santakameva
tika-vin08t:551_2: viññāpitaṃ nāma hotīti āha “mayhampi dethāti vadati, vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin08t:552_0: “Pupphampi āropetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti idaṃ pariṇataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, sace pana ekasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:552_1: cetiye pūjitaṃ pupphaṃ gahetvā aññasmiṃ cetiye pūjeti, vaṭṭatī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:552_2: vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana niyametvā “aññassa cetiyassa atthāya ropitamālāvacchato”ti
tika-vin08t:552_3: vuttattā na kevalaṃ pariṇatabhāvoyeva kathito, atha kho niyametvā ropitabhāvopi.
tika-vin08t:552_4: Pupphampīti pi-saddena kuto mālāvacchanti dasseti. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “ropitamālāvacchatoti
tika-vin08t:552_5: kenaci niyametvā ropitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, anocitaṃ milāyamānaṃ ocinitvā yattha katthaci
tika-vin08t:552_6: pūjetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Ṭhitaṃ disvāti sesakaṃ gahetvā ṭhitaṃ disvā. Imassa sunakhassa
tika-vin08t:552_7: mā dehi, etassa dehīti idaṃ pariṇateyeva, tiracchānagatassa pariccajitvā dinne pana
tika-vin08t:552_8: taṃ palāpetvā aññaṃ bhuñjāpetuṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā “kattha demātiādinā ekenākārena anāpatti
tika-vin08t:552_9: dassitā. Evaṃ pana apucchitepi ‘apariṇataṃ ida’nti jānantena attano ruciyā yattha
tika-vin08t:552_10: icchati, tattha dāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Yattha icchatha, tattha
tika-vin08t:552_11: dethāti etthāpi “tumhākaṃ ruciyā”ti vuttattā yattha icchati, tattha dāpetuṃ labhati.
tika-vin08t:553_0: Parivāre pana nava adhammikāni dānānīti saṅghassa pariṇataṃ aññasaṅghassa vā cetiyassa
tika-vin08t:553_1: vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti, cetiyassa pariṇataṃ aññacetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā puggalassa
tika-vin08t:553_2: vā pariṇāmeti, puggalassa pariṇataṃ aññapuggalassa vā saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmetīti
tika-vin08t:553_3: evaṃ vuttāni. Nava paṭiggahā paribhogā cāti etesaṃyeva dānānaṃ paṭiggahā ca paribhogā
tika-vin08t:553_4: ca. Tīṇi dhammikāni dānānīti saṅghassa ninnaṃ saṅghasseva deti, cetiyassa ninnaṃ
tika-vin08t:553_5: cetiyasseva deti, puggalassa ninnaṃ puggalasseva detīti imāni tīṇi. Paṭiggahapaṭibhogāpi
tika-vin08t:553_6: tesaṃyeva paṭiggahā ca paribhogā cāti āgataṃ.
tika-vin08t:558_1: kathetuṃ “pathavī”tyādimāha. Tattha pattharatīti pathavī, pa-pubba thara santharaṇeti
tika-vin08t:558_2: dhātu, ra-kārassa va-kāro, sasambhārapathavī. Tappabhedamāha “dve pathavī, jātā ca
tika-vin08t:558_3: pathavī ajātā ca pathavī”ti. Tāsaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha jātā nāma pathavī”tyādimāha.
tika-vin08t:558_4: Tattha suddhapaṃsukā…pe… yebhuyyenamattikāpathavī jātā nāma pathavī hoti. Na kevalaṃ
tika-vin08t:558_5: sāyeva, adaḍḍhā pathavīpi “jātā pathavī”ti vuccati. Na kevalaṃ imā dveyeva, yopi
tika-vin08t:558_6: paṃsupuñjo vā…pe… cātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭho, sopi “jātā pathavī”ti vuccatīti yojanā. Itaratrapi eseva nayo.
tika-vin08t:559_0: Tattha suddhā paṃsukāyeva ettha pathaviyā atthi, na pāsāṇādayoti suddhapaṃsukā. Tathā
tika-vin08t:559_1: suddhamattikā. Appā pāsāṇā etthāti appapāsāṇā. Itaresupi eseva nayo. Yebhuyyena paṃsukā
tika-vin08t:559_2: etthāti yebhuyyenapaṃsukā, aluttasamāsoyaṃ, tathā yebhuyyenamattikā. Tattha muṭṭhippamāṇato
tika-vin08t:559_3: upari pāsāṇā. Muṭṭhippamāṇā sakkharā. Kathalāti kapālakhaṇḍādi. Marumpāti kaṭasakkharā.
tika-vin08t:559_4: Vālukā vālukāyeva. Yebhuyyenapaṃsukāti ettha tīsu koṭṭhāsesu dve koṭṭhāsā paṃsu,
tika-vin08t:559_6: tathā tathā adaḍḍhā, sā pana visuṃ natthi, suddhapaṃsuādīsu aññatarāvāti veditabbā.
tika-vin08t:559_7: Yebhuyyenasakkharāti bahutarasakkharā. Hatthikucchiyaṃ kira ekaṃ pacchipūraṃ āharāpetvā
tika-vin08t:559_8: doṇiyaṃ dhovitvā pathaviyā yebhuyyenasakkharabhāvaṃ ñatvā sayaṃ bhikkhū pokkharaṇiṃ
tika-vin08t:559_9: khaṇiṃsūti. Yāni pana majjhe “appapaṃsuappamattikā”ti dve padāni, tāni yebhuyyenapāsāṇādipañcakameva
tika-vin08t:559_10: pavisanti. Tesaññeva hi dvinnaṃ pabhedavacanametaṃ, yadidaṃ suddhapāsāṇādiādi.
tika-vin08t:560_0: Ettha ca kiñcāpi yebhuyyenapaṃsuṃ appapaṃsuñca pathaviṃ vatvā upaḍḍhapaṃsukāpathavī
tika-vin08t:560_1: na vuttā, tathāpi paṇṇattivajjasikkhāpadesu sāvasesapaññattiyāpi sambhavato upaḍḍhapaṃsukāyapi
tika-vin08t:560_2: pathaviyā pācittiyamevāti gahetabbaṃ. Keci pana “sabbacchannādīsu upaḍḍhacchanne
tika-vin08t:560_3: dukkaṭassa vuttattā idhāpi dukkaṭaṃ yujjatī”ti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ pācittiyavatthukañca
tika-vin08t:560_4: anāpattivatthukañca duvidhaṃ pathaviṃ ṭhapetvā aññissā dukkaṭavatthukāya tatiyāya
tika-vin08t:560_5: pathaviyā abhāvato. Dveyeva hi pathaviyo vuttā “jātā ca pathavī ajātā ca pathavī”ti,
tika-vin08t:560_6: tasmā dvīsu aññatarāya pathaviyā bhavitabbaṃ. Vinayavinicchaye ca sampatte garukalahukesu
tika-vin08t:560_7: garukeyeva ṭhātabbattā na sakkā ettha anāpattiyā bhavituṃ. Sabbacchannādīsu pana
tika-vin08t:560_8: upaḍḍhe dukkaṭaṃ yuttaṃ tattha tādisassa dukkaṭavatthuno sambhavato. Vimativinodaniyampi
tika-vin08t:560_10: pācittiyamevāti gahetabbaṃ. Na hetaṃ dukkaṭavatthūti sakkā vattuṃ jātājātavinimuttāya
tika-vin08t:561_0: Khaṇantassa khaṇāpentassa vāti antamaso pādaṅguṭṭhakenapi sammajjanisalākāyapi sayaṃ
tika-vin08t:561_1: vā khaṇantassa aññena vā khaṇāpentassa. “Pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇā”ti vadati, vaṭṭatīti “imasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:561_2: okāse”ti aniyametvā vuttattā vaṭṭati. “Imaṃ valliṃ khaṇā”ti vuttepi pathavikhaṇanaṃ
tika-vin08t:561_3: sandhāya pavattavohārattā imināva sikkhāpadena pācittiyaṃ, na bhūtagāmasikkhāpadena,
tika-vin08t:561_4: ubhayampi sandhāya vutte pana dvepi pācittiyāni honti.
tika-vin08t:562_0: 73. Kuṭehīti ghaṭehi. Tanukakaddamoti udakamissakakaddamo, so ca udakagatikattā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:562_1: Udakapappaṭakoti udake antobhūmiyaṃ paviṭṭhe tassa uparibhāgaṃ chādetvā tanukapaṃsu
tika-vin08t:562_2: vā mattikā vā paṭalaṃ hutvā palavamānā uṭṭhāti, tasmiṃ udake sukkhepi taṃ paṭalaṃ
tika-vin08t:562_3: vātena calamānaṃ tiṭṭhati, taṃ udakapappaṭako nāma. Omakacātumāsanti ūnacātumāsaṃ.
tika-vin08t:562_4: Ovaṭṭhanti devena ovaṭṭhaṃ. Akatapabbhāreti avalañjanaṭṭhānadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:562_5: Tādise hi vammikassa sabbhāvoti. Mūsikukkuraṃ nāma mūsikāhi khaṇitvā bahi katapaṃsurāsi.
tika-vin08t:563_0: Eseva nayoti omakacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭhoyeva vaṭṭatīti attho. Ekadivasampi na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:563_1: ovaṭṭhacātumāsato ekadivasātikkantopi vikopetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Heṭṭhabhūmisambandhepi
tika-vin08t:563_2: ca gokaṇṭake bhūmito chinditvā chinditvā uggatattā accuggataṃ matthakato chindituṃ
tika-vin08t:563_3: gahetuñca vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Sakaṭṭhāne atiṭṭhamānaṃ katvā pādehi madditvā āloḷitakaddamampi gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:564_0: Acchadanantiādinā vuttattā ujukaṃ ākāsato patitavassodakena ovaṭṭhameva jātapathavī
tika-vin08t:564_1: hoti, na chadanādīsu patitvā tato pavattaudakena tintanti veditabbaṃ. Tatoti purāṇasenāsanato.
tika-vin08t:564_2: Iṭṭhakaṃ gaṇhāmītiādi suddhacittaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Udakenāti ujukaṃ ākāsatoyeva
tika-vin08t:564_3: patitaudakena. Sace pana aññattha paharitvā patitena udakena temitaṃ hoti, vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin08t:565_0: 74. Uccāletvāti ukkhipitvā. Tena apadesenāti tena lesena. Avisayattā anāpattīti ettha
tika-vin08t:565_1: sacepi nibbāpetuṃ sakkā hoti, paṭhamaṃ suddhacittena dinnattā dahatūti sallakkhetvāpi
tika-vin08t:570_0: 75. Evaṃ pathavivinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni bhūtagāmavinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “bhūtagāmo”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t:570_1: Tattha bhavanti ahuvuñcāti bhūtā, jāyanti vaḍḍhanti jātā vaḍḍhitā cāti attho. Gāmoti
tika-vin08t:570_2: rāsi, bhūtānaṃ gāmoti bhūtagāmo, bhūtā eva vā gāmo bhūtagāmo, patiṭṭhitaharitatiṇarukkhādīnametaṃ
tika-vin08t:570_4: imassa “jātā vaḍḍhitā”ti. Evaṃ bhūta-saddo paccuppannātītavisayo hoti. Tenāha vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:570_5: “bhavantīti vaḍḍhanti, ahuvunti babhuvū”ti. Idāni taṃ bhūtagāmaṃ dassento “bhūtagāmoti
tika-vin08t:570_6: pañcahi bījehi jātānaṃ rukkhalatādīnametaṃ adhivacana”nti āha. Latādīnanti ādi-saddena
tika-vin08t:571_0: Idāni tāni bījāni sarūpato dassento “tatrimāni pañca bījānī”tiādimāha. Tattha mūlameva
tika-vin08t:571_1: bījaṃ mūlabījaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi. Atha vā mūlaṃ bījaṃ etassāti mūlabījaṃ, mūlabījato
tika-vin08t:571_2: vā nibbattaṃ mūlabījaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi. Tattha paṭhamena viggahena bījagāmo eva labbhati,
tika-vin08t:571_3: dutiyatatiyehi bhūtagāmo. Idāni te bhūtagāme sarūpato dassento “tattha mūlabījaṃ
tika-vin08t:571_4: nāmā”tyādimāha. Tattha tesu pañcasu mūlabījādīsu haliddi…pe… bhaddamuttakaṃ mūlabījaṃ
tika-vin08t:571_5: nāma. Na kevalaṃ imāniyeva mūlabījāni, atha kho ito aññānipi yāni vā pana bhūtagāmajātāni
tika-vin08t:571_6: atthi santi, mūle jāyanti, mūle sañjāyanti, etaṃ bhūtagāmajātaṃ mūlabījaṃ nāma hotīti
tika-vin08t:571_7: yojanā. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “idāni taṃ bhūtagāmaṃ vibhajitvā
tika-vin08t:571_8: dassento ‘bhūtagāmo nāma pañca bījajātānī’tiādimāhā”ti. Tattha bhūtagāmo nāmāti bhūtagāmaṃ
tika-vin08t:571_9: uddharitvā yasmiṃ sati bhūtagāmo hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “pañca bījajātānīti āhā”ti aṭṭhakathāsu
tika-vin08t:571_10: vuttaṃ. Evaṃ santepi “yāni vā panaññānipi atthi, mūle jāyantī”tiādīni na samenti.
tika-vin08t:571_11: Na hi mūlabījādīni mūlādīsu jāyanti. Mūlādīsu jāyamānāni pana tāni bījajātāni, tasmā
tika-vin08t:571_12: evamatthavaṇṇanā veditabbā – bhūtagāmo nāmāti vibhajitabbapadaṃ. Pañcāti tassa vibhāgaparicchedo.
tika-vin08t:571_13: Bījajātānīti paricchinnadhammanidassanaṃ, yato bījehi jātāni bījajātāni, rukkhādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:571_14: etaṃ adhivacananti ca. Yathā “sālīnaṃ cepi odanaṃ bhuñjatī”tiādīsu sālitaṇḍulānaṃ
tika-vin08t:571_15: odano sāliodanoti vuccati, evaṃ bījato sambhūto bhūtagāmo “bīja”nti vuttoti veditabboti ca.
tika-vin08t:572_1: viruhaṇasamatthe sāraphale niruḷho bīja-saddo tadatthasaṃsiddhiyā mūlādīsupi kesuci
tika-vin08t:572_2: pavattatīti mūlādito nivattanatthaṃ ekena bījasaddena visesetvā vuttaṃ “bīja”nti
tika-vin08t:572_3: “rūparūpaṃ, dukkhadukkha”nti ca yathā. Niddese “yāni vā panaññānipi atthi, mūle jāyanti
tika-vin08t:572_4: mūle sañjāyantī”ti ettha bījato nibbattena bījaṃ dassitaṃ, tasmā evamettha attho
tika-vin08t:572_6: mūle gacchavallirukkhādīni jāyanti sañjāyanti, tāni, yamhi mūle jāyanti ceva sañjāyanti
tika-vin08t:572_7: ca, tañca pāḷiyaṃ vuttahaliddādi ca, sabbampi etaṃ mūlabījaṃ nāma, etena kāriyopacārena
tika-vin08t:572_8: kāraṇaṃ dassitanti dasseti. Esa nayo khandhabījādīsu. Yevāpanakakhandhabījesu panettha
tika-vin08t:572_11: bījabījānīti daṭṭhabbāni. Bhūtagāme bhūtagāmasaññī chindati vā chedāpeti vāti satthakāni
tika-vin08t:572_12: gahetvā sayaṃ vā chindati, aññena vā chedāpeti. Bhindati vā bhedāpeti vāti pāsāṇādīni
tika-vin08t:572_13: gahetvā sayaṃ vā bhindati, aññena vā bhedāpeti. Pacati vā pacāpeti vāti aggiṃ upasaṃharitvā
tika-vin08t:572_14: sayaṃ vā pacati, aññena vā pacāpeti, pācittiyaṃ hotīti sambandho. Tattha āpattibhedaṃ
tika-vin08t:573_0: 76. Sañcicca ukkhipituṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha “sañciccā”ti vuttattā sarīre laggabhāvaṃ
tika-vin08t:573_1: ñatvāpi uṭṭhahati, “taṃ uddharissāmī”ti saññāya abhāvato vaṭṭati. Anantakaggahaṇena
tika-vin08t:573_2: sāsapamattikā gahitā. Nāmañhetaṃ tassā sevālajātiyā. Mūlapaṇṇānaṃ abhāvena “asampuṇṇabhūtagāmo
tika-vin08t:573_3: nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Abhūtagāmamūlattāti ettha bhūtagāmo mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ etassāti bhūtagāmamūlo,
tika-vin08t:573_4: bhūtagāmassa vā mūlaṃ kāraṇanti bhūtagāmamūlaṃ. Bījagāmo hi nāma bhūtagāmato sambhavati,
tika-vin08t:573_5: bhūtagāmassa ca kāraṇaṃ hoti. Ayaṃ pana tādiso na hotīti “abhūtagāmamūlattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:574_0: Kiñcāpi hi tālanāḷikerādīnaṃ khāṇu uddhaṃ avaḍḍhanato bhūtagāmassa kāraṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin08t:574_2: nāma hotīti bījagāmena saṅgahaṃ gacchati. So bījagāmena saṅgahitoti avaḍḍhamānepi
tika-vin08t:575_0: “Aṅkure harite”ti vatvā tamevatthaṃ vibhāveti “nīlavaṇṇe jāte”ti, nīlapaṇṇassa vaṇṇasadise
tika-vin08t:575_1: paṇṇe jāteti attho, “nīlavaṇṇe jāte”ti vā pāṭho gahetabbo. Amūlakabhūtagāme saṅgahaṃ
tika-vin08t:575_2: gacchatīti idaṃ nāḷikerassa āveṇikaṃ katvā vadati. “Pānīyaghaṭādīnaṃ bahi sevālo
tika-vin08t:575_3: udake aṭṭhitattā bījagāmānulomattā ca dukkaṭavatthū”ti vadanti. Kaṇṇakampi abbohārikamevāti
tika-vin08t:576_0: 77. Seleyyakaṃ nāma silāya sambhūtā ekā gandhajāti. Pupphitakālato paṭṭhāyāti vikasitakālato
tika-vin08t:576_1: pabhuti. Ahicchattakaṃ gaṇhantoti vikasitaṃ gaṇhanto. Makuḷaṃ pana rukkhattacaṃ akopentenapi
tika-vin08t:576_2: gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati. “Rukkhattacaṃ vikopetīti vuttattā rukkhe jātaṃ yaṃ kiñci ahicchattakaṃ
tika-vin08t:576_3: rukkhattacaṃ avikopetvā matthakato chinditvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, tadayuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:576_4: “ahicchattakaṃ yāva makuḷaṃ hoti, tāva dukkaṭavatthū”ti vuttattā. Rukkhato muccitvāti
tika-vin08t:576_5: ettha “yadipi kiñcimattaṃ rukkhe allīnā hutvā tiṭṭhati, rukkhato gayhamānā pana rukkhacchaviṃ
tika-vin08t:576_6: na vikopeti, vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Allarukkhato na vaṭṭatīti etthāpi rukkhattacaṃ avikopetvā
tika-vin08t:576_7: matthakato tacchetvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ. Hatthakukkuccenāti hatthacāpallena.
tika-vin08t:576_8: Pānīyaṃ na vāsetabbanti idaṃ attano atthāya nāmitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kevalaṃ anupasampannassa
tika-vin08t:576_9: atthāya nāmite pana pacchā tato labhitvā na vāsetabbanti natthi. Vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:576_10: pana “pānīyaṃ na vāsetabbanti idaṃ attano pivanapānīyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, aññesaṃ
tika-vin08t:576_11: pana vaṭṭati anuggahitattā. Tenāha attanā khāditukāmenā”ti vuttaṃ. “Yesaṃ rukkhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:576_12: sākhā ruhatīti vuttattā yesaṃ sākhā na ruhati, tattha kappiyakaraṇakiccaṃ natthī”ti
tika-vin08t:576_13: vadanti. Vimativinodaniyampi “yesaṃ rukkhānaṃ sākhā ruhatīti mūlaṃ anotāretvā paṇṇamattaniggamanamattenāpi
tika-vin08t:576_14: vaḍḍhati, tattha kappiyampi akaronto chinnanāḷikeraveḷudaṇḍādayo kopetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin08t:576_15: vuttaṃ. “Caṅkamitaṭṭhānaṃ dassessāmī”ti vuttattā kevalaṃ caṅkamanādhippāyena vā maggagamanādhippāyena
tika-vin08t:576_16: vā akkamantassa, tiṇānaṃ upari nisīdanādhippāyena nisīdantassa ca doso natthi.
tika-vin08t:577_0: 78. Samaṇakappehīti samaṇānaṃ kappiyavohārehi. Kiñcāpi bījādīnaṃ agginā phuṭṭhamattena,
tika-vin08t:577_1: nakhādīhi vilikhanamattena ca aviruḷhidhammatā na hoti, tathāpi evaṃ kateyeva samaṇānaṃ
tika-vin08t:577_2: kappatīti aggiparijitādayo samaṇavohārā nāma jātā, tasmā tehi samaṇavohārehi karaṇabhūtehi
tika-vin08t:577_3: phalaṃ paribhuñjituṃ anujānāmīti adhippāyo. Abījanibbaṭṭabījānipi samaṇānaṃ kappantīti
tika-vin08t:577_4: paññattapaṇṇattibhāvato samaṇavohārāicceva saṅkhaṃ gatāni. Atha vā aggiparijitādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:577_5: pañcannaṃ kappiyabhāvatoyeva pañcahi samaṇakappiyabhāvasaṅkhātehi kāraṇehi phalaṃ
tika-vin08t:577_6: paribhuñjituṃ anujānāmīti evamettha adhippāyo veditabbo. Aggiparijitantiādīsu “paricita”ntipi
tika-vin08t:577_7: paṭhanti. Abījaṃ nāma taruṇaambaphalādi. Nibbaṭṭabījaṃ nāma ambapanasādi, yaṃ bījaṃ
tika-vin08t:577_8: nibbaṭṭetvā visuṃ katvā paribhuñjituṃ sakkā hoti. Nibbaṭṭetabbaṃ viyojetabbaṃ bījaṃ
tika-vin08t:577_9: yasmiṃ, taṃ panasādi nibbaṭṭabījaṃ nāma. “Kappiya”nti vatvāva kātabbanti yo kappiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:577_10: karoti, tena kattabbapakārasseva vuttattā bhikkhunā avuttepi kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:577_11: Puna “kappiyaṃ kāretabba”nti kārāpanassa paṭhamameva kathitattā bhikkhunā “kappiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:577_12: karohī”ti vutteyeva anupasampannena “kappiya”nti vatvā aggiparijitādi kātabbanti
tika-vin08t:577_13: gahetabbaṃ. “Kappiyanti vacanaṃ pana yāya kāyaci bhāsāya vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t:577_14: “Kappiyanti vatvāva kātabba”nti vacanato paṭhamaṃ “kappiya”nti vatvā pacchā aggiādinā
tika-vin08t:577_15: phusanādi kātabbanti veditabbaṃ. “Paṭhamaṃ aggimhi nikkhipitvā, nakhādinā vā vijjhitvā
tika-vin08t:577_16: taṃ anuddharitvāva kappiyanti vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”tipi vadanti.
tika-vin08t:578_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “kappiyanti vatvāvāti pubbakālakiriyāvasena vuttepi vacanakkhaṇeva
tika-vin08t:578_1: aggisatthādinā bījagāme vaṇaṃ kātabbanti vacanato pana pubbe kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, tañca
tika-vin08t:578_2: dvidhā akatvā chedanabhedanameva dassetabbaṃ. Karontena ca bhikkhunā ‘kappiyaṃ karohī’ti
tika-vin08t:578_3: yāya kāyaci bhāsāya vutteyeva kātabbaṃ. Bījagāmaparimocanatthaṃ puna kappiyaṃ kāretabbanti
tika-vin08t:579_0: Ekasmiṃ bīje vātiādīsu “ekaṃyeva kāremīti adhippāye satipi ekābaddhattā sabbaṃ katameva
tika-vin08t:579_1: hotī”ti vadanti. Dāruṃ vijjhatīti ettha “jānitvāpi vijjhati vā vijjhāpeti vā, vaṭṭatiyevā”ti
tika-vin08t:579_2: vadanti. Bhattasitthe vijjhatīti etthāpi eseva nayo. “Taṃ vijjhati, na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:579_3: rajjuādīnaṃ bhājanagatikattā”ti vadanti. Marīcapakkādīhi ca missetvāti ettha bhattasitthasambandhavasena
tika-vin08t:579_4: ekābaddhatā veditabbā, na phalānaṃyeva aññamaññasambandhavasena. “Kaṭāhepi kātuṃ
tika-vin08t:579_5: vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā kaṭāhato nīhaṭāya miñjāya vā bīje vā yattha katthaci vijjhituṃ
tika-vin08t:579_6: vaṭṭati eva. Bhindāpetvā kappiyaṃ kārāpetabbanti bījato muttassa kaṭāhassa bhājanagatikattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:584_0: 79. Evaṃ bhūtagāmavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni sahaseyyavinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “duvidhaṃ
tika-vin08t:584_1: sahaseyyaka”ntiādimāha. Tattha dve vidhā pakārā yassa sahaseyyakassa taṃ duvidhaṃ,
tika-vin08t:584_2: saha sayanaṃ, saha vā sayati etthāti sahaseyyā, sahaseyyā eva sahaseyyakaṃ sakatthe
tika-vin08t:584_5: dirattaggahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ. Tirattañhi sahavāse labbhamāne diratte vattabbameva
tika-vin08t:584_6: natthīti dirattaggahaṇaṃ visuṃ na payojeti. Tenevāha “uttaridirattatirattanti bhagavā
tika-vin08t:584_7: sāmaṇerānaṃ saṅgahakaraṇatthāya tirattaparihāraṃ adāsī”ti. Nirantaraṃ tirattaggahaṇatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:584_8: vā dirattaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Kevalañhi “tiratta”nti vutte aññattha vāsena antarikampi
tika-vin08t:584_9: tirattaṃ gaṇheyya. Dirattavisiṭṭhaṃ pana tirattaṃ vuccamānaṃ tena anantarikameva
tika-vin08t:584_11: tissova rattiyo sayitvā catutthadivasādīsu sayantasseva āpatti, na ekantarikādivasena
tika-vin08t:584_12: sayantassāti dassanatthampīti daṭṭhabba”nti vuttaṃ. Sahaseyyaṃ ekato seyyaṃ. Seyyanti
tika-vin08t:584_13: cettha kāyappasāraṇasaṅkhātaṃ sayanampi vuccati, yasmiṃ senāsane sayanti, tampi,
tika-vin08t:584_14: tasmā seyyaṃ kappeyyāti ettha senāsanasaṅkhātaṃ seyyaṃ pavisitvā kāyappasāraṇasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin08t:584_15: seyyaṃ kappeyya sampādeyyāti attho. Diyaḍḍhahatthubbedhenāti ettha diyaḍḍhahattho
tika-vin08t:585_0: Ekūpacāroti vaḷañjanadvārassa ekattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “ekūpacāro
tika-vin08t:585_1: ekena maggena pavisitvā abbhokāsaṃ anokkamitvā sabbattha anuparigamanayoggo, etaṃ
tika-vin08t:585_2: bahudvārampi ekūpacārova. Yattha pana kuṭṭādīhi rundhitvā visuṃ dvāraṃ yojenti, nānūpacāro
tika-vin08t:585_3: hoti. Sace pana rundhati eva, visuṃ dvāraṃ na yojenti, etampi ekūpacārameva mattikādīhi
tika-vin08t:585_4: pihitadvāro viya gabbhoti gahetabbaṃ. Aññathā gabbhe pavisitvā pamukhādīsu nipannānupasampannehi
tika-vin08t:585_5: sahaseyyāparimuttiyā gabbhadvāraṃ mattikādīhi pidahāpetvā uṭṭhite aruṇe vivarāpentassapi
tika-vin08t:585_6: anāpatti bhaveyyā”ti vuttaṃ. Catusālaṃ ekūpacāraṃ hotīti sambandho. Tesaṃ payoge
tika-vin08t:585_7: payoge bhikkhussa āpattīti ettha keci “anuṭṭhahanena akiriyasamuṭṭhānā āpatti vuttā,
tika-vin08t:585_8: tasmiṃ khaṇe niddāyantassa kiriyābhāvā. Idañhi sikkhāpadaṃ siyā kiriyāya, siyā akiriyāya
tika-vin08t:585_9: samuṭṭhāti. Kiriyāya samuṭṭhānatā cassa tabbahulavasena vuttā”ti vadanti. “Yathā
tika-vin08t:585_10: cetaṃ, evaṃ divāsayanampi. Anuṭṭhahanena, hi dvārāsaṃvaraṇena cetaṃ akiriyasamuṭṭhānampi
tika-vin08t:585_11: hotī”ti vadanti, idañca yuttaṃ viya dissati, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:586_0: 80. Uparimatalena saddhiṃ asambaddhabhittikassāti idaṃ sambaddhabhittike vattabbameva
tika-vin08t:586_1: natthīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Uparimatale sayitassa saṅkā eva natthīti “heṭṭhāpāsāde”tiādi
tika-vin08t:586_2: vuttaṃ. Nānūpacāreti yattha bahi nisseṇiṃ katvā uparimatalaṃ ārohanti, tādisaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin08t:586_4: vuttaṃ. Sabhāsaṅkhepenāti sabhākārena. Aḍḍhakuṭṭake senāsaneti ettha “aḍḍhakuṭṭakaṃ
tika-vin08t:586_5: nāma yattha upaḍḍhaṃ muñcitvā tīsu passesu bhittiyo baddhā honti, yattha vā ekasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:586_6: passe bhittiṃ uṭṭhāpetvā ubhosu passesu upaḍḍhaṃ upaḍḍhaṃ katvā bhittiyo uṭṭhāpenti,
tika-vin08t:586_7: tādisaṃ senāsana”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ, gaṇṭhipade pana “aḍḍhakuṭṭaketi
tika-vin08t:586_8: chadanaṃ aḍḍhena asampattakuṭṭake”ti vuttaṃ, tampi no na yuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:586_9: pana “sabhāsaṅkhepenāti vuttasseva aḍḍhakuṭṭaketi iminā saṇṭhānaṃ dasseti. Yattha
tika-vin08t:586_10: tīsu, dvīsu vā passesu bhittiyo baddhā, chadanaṃ vā asampattā aḍḍhabhitti, idaṃ aḍḍhakuṭṭakaṃ
tika-vin08t:586_11: nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Vāḷasaṅghāṭo nāma parikkhepassa anto thambhādīnaṃ upari vāḷarūpehi katasaṅghāṭo.
tika-vin08t:587_0: Parikkhepassa bahi gateti ettha yattha yasmiṃ passe parikkhepo natthi, tatthāpi parikkhepārahapadesato
tika-vin08t:587_1: bahi gate anāpattiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “parikkhepassa bahi gateti
tika-vin08t:587_2: ettha yasmiṃ passe parikkhepo natthi, tattha sace bhūmito vatthu uccaṃ hoti, ubhato
tika-vin08t:587_3: uccavatthuto heṭṭhā bhūmiyaṃ nibbakosabbhantarepi anāpatti eva tattha senāsanavohārābhāvato.
tika-vin08t:587_4: Atha vatthu nīcaṃ bhūmisamameva senāsanassa heṭṭhimatale tiṭṭhati, tattha parikkheparahitadisāya
tika-vin08t:587_5: nibbakosabbhantare sabbattha āpatti hoti, paricchedābhāvato parikkhepassa bahi eva
tika-vin08t:587_6: anāpattīti daṭṭhabba”nti vuttaṃ. Aparicchinnagabbhūpacāreti ettha majjhe vivaṭaṅgaṇavantāsu
tika-vin08t:587_7: mahācatusālāsu yathā ākāsaṅgaṇaṃ anotaritvā pamukheneva gantvā sabbagabbhe pavisituṃ
tika-vin08t:587_8: na sakkā hoti, evaṃ ekekagabbhassa dvīsu passesu kuṭṭaṃ nīharitvā kataṃ paricchinnagabbhūpacāraṃ
tika-vin08t:587_9: nāma, idaṃ pana tādisaṃ na hotīti “aparicchinnagabbhūpacāre”ti vuttaṃ. Sabbagabbhepi
tika-vin08t:587_10: pavisantīti gabbhūpacārassa aparicchinnattā ākāsaṅgaṇaṃ anotaritvāpi pamukheneva
tika-vin08t:587_11: gantvā taṃ taṃ gabbhaṃ pavisanti. Atha kuto tassa parikkhepoyeva sabbaparicchinnattāti
tika-vin08t:587_12: vuttanti āha “gabbhaparikkhepoyeva hissa parikkhepo”ti, idañca samantā gabbhabhittiyo
tika-vin08t:587_13: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Catusālavasena hi sanniviṭṭhe senāsane gabbhapamukhaṃ visuṃ aparikkhittampi
tika-vin08t:587_14: samantā ṭhitaṃ gabbhabhittīnaṃ vasena parikkhittaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin08t:588_0: 81. Ekadisāya ujukameva dīghaṃ katvā sannivesito pāsādo ekasālasanniveso. Dvīsu tīsu
tika-vin08t:588_1: catūsu vā disāsu siṅghāṭakasaṇṭhānādivasena katā dvisālādisannivesā veditabbā. Sālappabhedadīpanameva
tika-vin08t:588_2: cettha purimato visesoti. Aṭṭha pācittiyānīti upaḍḍhacchannaṃ upaḍḍhaparicchannaṃ
tika-vin08t:588_3: senāsanaṃ dukkaṭavatthussa ādiṃ katvā pāḷiyaṃ dassitattā tato adhikaṃ sabbacchannaupaḍḍhaparicchannādikampi
tika-vin08t:588_4: sabbaṃ pāḷiyaṃ avuttampi pācittiyasseva vatthubhāvena dassitaṃ sikkhāpadassa paṇṇattivajjattā,
tika-vin08t:588_5: garuke ṭhātabbato cāti veditabbaṃ. “Satta pācittiyānī”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttapācittiyadvayaṃ
tika-vin08t:588_6: sāmaññato ekattena gahetvā vuttaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ “tatiyāya rattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā
tika-vin08t:588_7: puna sayatī”ti idaṃ ukkaṭṭhavasena vuttaṃ, anikkhamitvā purāruṇā uṭṭhahitvā antochadane
tika-vin08t:588_8: nisinnassāpi puna divase sahaseyyena anāpatti eva. Ettha catubhāgo cūḷakaṃ, dvebhāgā
tika-vin08t:588_9: upaḍḍhaṃ, tīsu bhāgesu dve bhāgā yebhuyyanti iminā lakkhaṇena cūḷakacchannaparicchannādīni
tika-vin08t:588_11: ayameva vinicchayo”ti āha. “Matitthiyā pārājikavatthubhūtāyapi anupādinnapakkhe ṭhitattā
tika-vin08t:588_12: sahaseyyāpattiṃ na janetī”ti vadanti. “Atthaṅgate sūriye mātugāme nipanne nipajjati,
tika-vin08t:588_13: āpatti pācittiyassā”ti vacanato divā tassa sayantassa sahaseyyāpatti na hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:593_0: 82. Evaṃ sahaseyyavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni saṅghike vihāre seyyāsu kattabbavinicchayaṃ
tika-vin08t:593_1: kathetuṃ “vihāre saṅghike seyya”ntyādimāha. Tattha samaggaṃ kammaṃ samupagacchatīti
tika-vin08t:593_2: saṅgho, ayameva vacanattho sabbasaṅghasādhāraṇo. Saṅghassa dinno saṅghiko, viharati
tika-vin08t:593_3: etthāti vihāro, tasmiṃ. Sayanti etthāti seyyā, taṃ. Asantharīti santharitvāna. Pakkamanaṃ
tika-vin08t:593_4: pakkamo, gamananti attho. “Vihāre saṅghike seyyaṃ, santharitvāna pakkamo”ti imassa
tika-vin08t:593_5: uddesapāṭhassa saṅghike vihāre…pe… pakkamananti attho daṭṭhabboti yojanā. Tatrāti
tika-vin08t:593_6: tasmiṃ pakkamane ayaṃ īdiso mayā vuccamāno vinicchayo veditabboti attho. Katamo so
tika-vin08t:593_7: vinicchayoti āha “saṅghike…pe… pācittiya”nti. Aparikkhittassa upacāro nāma senāsanato
tika-vin08t:593_8: dve leḍḍupātā. Pācittiyanti paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmentassa dukkaṭaṃ, dutiyātikkame
tika-vin08t:593_9: pācittiyaṃ. Kathaṃ viññāyaticcāha “yo pana bhikkhu…pe… vacanato”ti.
tika-vin08t:594_0: Tattha saṅghiko vihāro pākaṭo, seyyā apākaṭā, sā katividhāiccāha “seyyā nāma…pe…
tika-vin08t:594_1: dasavidhā”ti. Tatthāpi katamā bhisi, katamā cimilikādayoti āha “tattha bhisīti…pe…
tika-vin08t:594_2: esa nayo paṇṇasanthāre”ti. Tattha mañce attharitabbāti mañcakabhisi, evaṃ itaratra,
tika-vin08t:594_3: vaṇṇānurakkhaṇatthaṃ katāti paṭakhaṇḍādīhi sibbitvā katā. Bhūmiyaṃ attharitabbāti
tika-vin08t:594_4: cimilikāya sati tassā upari, asati suddhabhūmiyaṃ attharitabbā. Sīhadhammādīnaṃ pariharaṇe
tika-vin08t:594_5: eva paṭikkhepoti iminā mañcapīṭhādīsu attharitvā puna saṃharitvā ṭhapanādivasena
tika-vin08t:594_6: attano atthāya pariharaṇameva na vaṭṭati, bhūmattharaṇādivasena paribhogo pana attano
tika-vin08t:594_7: pariharaṇaṃ na hotīti dasseti. Khandhake hi “antopi mañce paññattāni honti, bahipi
tika-vin08t:594_8: mañce paññattāni hontī”ti evaṃ attano atthāya mañcādīsu paññapetvā pariharaṇavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin08t:594_9: “na, bhikkhave, mahācammāni dhāretabbāni sīhacammaṃ byagghacammaṃ dīpicammaṃ, yo
tika-vin08t:594_10: dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti paṭikkhepo kato, tasmā vuttanayenevettha adhippāyo
tika-vin08t:594_11: daṭṭhabbo. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “yadi evaṃ ‘pariharaṇeyeva paṭikkhepo’ti idaṃ kasmā
tika-vin08t:594_12: vuttanti codanaṃ katvā ‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ pāsādaparibhoga’nti vacanato
tika-vin08t:594_13: puggalikepi senāsane senāsanaparibhogavasena niyamitaṃ suvaṇṇaghaṭādikaṃ paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin08t:594_14: vaṭṭamānampi kevalaṃ attano santakaṃ katvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati. Evamidaṃ bhūmattharaṇavasena
tika-vin08t:594_15: paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭamānampi attano santakaṃ katvā taṃ taṃ vihāraṃ haritvā paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin08t:594_16: na vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ pariharaṇeyeva paṭikkhepo veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:595_0: Pāvāro kojavoti paccattharaṇatthāyeva ṭhapitā uggatalomā attharaṇavisesā. Ettakameva
tika-vin08t:595_1: vuttanti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ. “Idaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu tathāvuttabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:595_2: aññampi tādisaṃ mañcapīṭhesu attharitabbaṃ attharaṇamevā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:595_3: Mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “paccattharaṇaṃ nāma pāvāro kojavo”ti niyametvā vuttaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin08t:595_4: gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ iminā na sameti, “vīmaṃsitvā gahetabba”nti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:595_5: vuttaṃ. Vīmaṃsite pana evamadhippāyo paññāyati – mātikāṭṭhakathāpi aṭṭhakathāyeva,
tika-vin08t:595_6: tasmā mahāaṭṭhakathādīsu vuttanayena “pāvāro kojavo”ti niyametvā vuttaṃ, evaṃ niyamane
tika-vin08t:595_7: satipi yathā “laddhātapatto rājakumāro”ti ātapattassa laddhabhāveyeva niyametvā vuttepi
tika-vin08t:595_9: honti, evaṃ “pāvāro kojavo”ti niyametvā vuttepi nidassananayavasena tehi mañcapīṭhesu
tika-vin08t:595_10: attharitabbabhāvasāmaññena samānā aññe attharaṇāpi vuttāyeva honti, tasmā gaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin08t:595_11: vuttavacanaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanassa paṭilomaṃ na hoti, anulomamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:596_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne “yena vihāro kārito, so vihārassāmiko”ti pāṭhaṃ nissāya ekacce
tika-vin08t:596_1: vinayadharā “saṅghikavihārassa vā puggalikavihārassa vā vihāradāyakoyeva sāmiko,
tika-vin08t:596_2: soyeva issaro, tassa ruciyā eva vasituṃ labhati, na saṅghagaṇapuggalānaṃ ruciyā”ti
tika-vin08t:596_3: vinicchayaṃ karonti, so vīmaṃsitabbo, kathaṃ ayaṃ pāṭho kimatthaṃ sādheti issaratthaṃ
tika-vin08t:596_4: vā āpucchitabbatthaṃ vāti? Evaṃ vīmaṃsite “bhikkhumhi sati bhikkhu āpucchitabbo”tiādivacanato
tika-vin08t:597_0: Atha siyā “āpucchitabbatthe siddhe issarattho siddhoyeva hoti. Issarabhāvatoyeva
tika-vin08t:597_1: hi so āpucchitabbo”ti. Tatthevaṃ vattabbaṃ – “āpucchantena ca bhikkhumhi sati bhikkhu
tika-vin08t:597_2: āpucchitabbo, tasmiṃ asati sāmaṇero, tasmiṃ asati ārāmiko”tiādivacanato āyasmantānaṃ
tika-vin08t:597_3: matena bhikkhupi sāmaṇeropi ārāmikopi vihārakārakopi tassa kule yo koci puggalopi
tika-vin08t:597_4: issaroti āpajjeyya, evaṃ viññāyamānepi bhikkhumhi vā sāmaṇere vā ārāmike vā sati
tika-vin08t:597_5: teyeva issarā, na vihārakārako. Tesu ekasmimpi asatiyeva vihārakārako issaro siyāti.
tika-vin08t:597_6: Imasmiṃ pana adhikāre saṅghikaṃ senāsanaṃ rakkhaṇatthāya āpucchitabbaṃyeva vadati,
tika-vin08t:597_7: na issarabhāvato āpucchitabbaṃ. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “anāpucchaṃ vā gaccheyyāti
tika-vin08t:598_0: Athāpi evaṃ vadeyya “na sakalassa vākyapāṭhassa adhippāyatthaṃ sandhāya amhehi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:598_1: atha kho ‘vihārassāmiko’ti etassa padatthaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kathaṃ? Saṃ etassa
tika-vin08t:598_2: atthīti sāmiko, vihārassa sāmiko vihārassāmiko. ‘Ko vihārassāmiko nāmā’ti vutte ‘yena
tika-vin08t:598_3: vihāro kārito, so vihārassāmiko nāmā’ti vattabbo, tasmā vihārakārako dāyako vihārassāmiko
tika-vin08t:598_4: nāmāti viññāyati, evaṃ viññāyamāne sati sāmiko nāma sassa dhanassa issaro, tassa
tika-vin08t:598_5: ruciyā eva aññe labhanti, tasmā vihārassāmikabhūtassa dāyakassa ruciyā eva bhikkhū
tika-vin08t:598_6: vasituṃ labhanti, na saṅghagaṇapuggalānaṃ ruciyāti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti.
tika-vin08t:598_7: Te evaṃ vattabbā – mā āyasmanto evaṃ avacuttha, yathā nāma “ghaṭikāro brahmā”ti vutto
tika-vin08t:598_8: so brahmā idāni ghaṭaṃ na karoti, purimattabhāve pana karoti, tasmā “ghaṭaṃ karotī”ti
tika-vin08t:598_9: vacanatthena “ghaṭikāro”ti nāmaṃ labhati. Iti pubbe laddhanāmattā pubbavohāravasena
tika-vin08t:598_10: brahmabhūtopi “ghaṭikāro”icceva vuccati, evaṃ so vihārakārako bhikkhūnaṃ pariccattakālato
tika-vin08t:598_11: paṭṭhāya vihārassāmiko na hoti vatthupariccāgalakkhaṇattā dānassa, pubbe pana apariccattakāle
tika-vin08t:598_12: vihārassa kārakattā vihārassāmiko nāma hoti, so evaṃ pubbe laddhanāmattā pubbavohāravasena
tika-vin08t:598_13: “vihārassāmiko”ti vuccati, na, pariccattassa vihārassa issarabhāvato. Teneva sammāsambuddhena
tika-vin08t:598_14: “vihāradāyakānaṃ ruciyā bhikkhū vasantū”ti avatvā senāsanapaññāpako anuññātoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t:598_15: Tathā hi vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ “tesaṃ gehānīti ettha bhikkhūnaṃ vāsatthāya katampi
tika-vin08t:598_16: yāva na denti, tāva tesaṃ santakaṃyeva bhavissatīti daṭṭhabba”nti, tena dinnakālato
tika-vin08t:598_17: paṭṭhāya tesaṃ santakāni na hontīti dasseti. Ayaṃ pana kathā pāṭhassa sammukhībhūtattā
tika-vin08t:598_18: imasmiṃ ṭhāne kathitā. Vihāravinicchayo pana catupaccayabhājanavinicchaye āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin08t:598_19: Yo kocīti ñātako vā aññātako vā yo koci. Yena mañcaṃ pīṭhaṃ vā vinanti, taṃ mañcapīṭhakavānaṃ.
tika-vin08t:599_0: 83. Siluccayaleṇanti siluccaye leṇaṃ, pabbataguhāti attho. “Senāsanaṃ upacikāhi khāyita”nti
tika-vin08t:599_1: imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattattā vatthuanurūpavasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ upacikāsaṅkāya abhāvena
tika-vin08t:599_2: anāpatti vuttā. Vattakkhandhake gamikavattaṃ paññāpentena “senāsanaṃ āpucchitabba”nti
tika-vin08t:599_3: vuttattā kevalaṃ itikattabbatāmattadassanatthaṃ “āpucchanaṃ pana vatta”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:599_4: na pana vattabhede dukkaṭanti dassanatthaṃ, teneva andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “senāsanaṃ
tika-vin08t:599_5: āpucchitabba”nti ettha “yaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ vā pāsāṇatthambhesu vā katasenāsanaṃ
tika-vin08t:599_6: yattha upacikā nārohanti, taṃ anāpucchantassapi anāpattī”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:599_7: gaṇṭhipade “tādise senāsane anāpucchā gacchantassa pācittiyaṃ natthi, gamikavatte
tika-vin08t:599_8: senāsanaṃ anāpucchā gacchanto vattabhedo hoti, tasmā dukkaṭaṃ āpajjatī”ti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:600_0: Pacchimassa ābhogena mutti natthīti tassa pacchato gacchantassa aññassa abhāvato
tika-vin08t:600_1: vuttaṃ. Ekaṃ vā pesetvā āpucchitabbanti ettha gamanacittassa uppannaṭṭhānato anāpucchitvā
tika-vin08t:600_2: gacchante dutiyapāduddhāre pācittiyaṃ. Maṇḍape vāti sākhāmaṇḍape vā padaramaṇḍape
tika-vin08t:600_3: vā. Rukkhamūleti yassa kassaci rukkhassa heṭṭhā. Palujjatīti vinassati.
tika-vin08t:601_0: 84. Majjhe saṃkhittaṃ paṇavasaṇṭhānaṃ katvā baddhanti erakapattādīhi veṇiṃ katvā
tika-vin08t:601_1: tāya veṇiyā ubhosu passesu vitthataṭṭhāne bahuṃ veṭhetvā tato paṭṭhāya yāva majjhaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin08t:601_2: tāva antoākaḍḍhanavasena veṭhetvā majjhe saṃkhipitvā tattha tattha bandhitvā kataṃ.
tika-vin08t:601_3: Yattha kākā vā kulalā vā na ūhadantīti yattha dhuvanivāsena kulāvake katvā vasamānā
tika-vin08t:601_4: ete kākakulalā, aññe vā sakuṇā taṃ senāsanaṃ na ūhadanti, tādise rukkhamūle nikkhipituṃ anujānāmīti attho.
tika-vin08t:602_0: 85. Navavāyimoti adhunā suttena vītakacchena paliveṭhitamañco. Onaddhoti kappiyacammena
tika-vin08t:602_1: onaddho, sova onaddhako sakatthe ka-paccayavasena. Tena hi vassena sīghaṃ na nassati.
tika-vin08t:602_2: Ukkaṭṭhaabbhokāsikoti idaṃ tassa sukhapaṭipattidassanamattaṃ, ukkaṭṭhassāpi pana
tika-vin08t:602_3: cīvarakuṭi vaṭṭateva. Kāyānugatikattāti bhikkhuno tattheva nisinnabhāvaṃ dīpeti,
tika-vin08t:602_4: tena ca vassabhayena sayaṃ aññattha gacchantassa āpattiṃ dasseti. Abbhokāsikānaṃ
tika-vin08t:602_5: atemanatthāya niyametvā dāyakehi dinnampi attānaṃ rakkhantena rakkhitabbameva. “Yasmā
tika-vin08t:602_6: pana dāyakehi dānakāleyeva satasahassagghanakampi kambalaṃ ‘pādapuñchaniṃ katvā paribhuñjathā’ti
tika-vin08t:602_7: dinnaṃ tatheva paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā idampi mañcapīṭhādisenāsanaṃ ‘ajjhokāsepi
tika-vin08t:602_8: yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjathā’ti dāyakehi dinnaṃ ce, sabbasmimpi kāle ajjhokāse nikkhipituṃ
tika-vin08t:602_9: vaṭṭatīti vadantī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Pesetvā gantabbanti ettha “yo bhikkhu
tika-vin08t:602_10: imaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgantvā vasati, tassa dethā”ti vatvā pesetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:603_0: Valāhakānaṃ anuṭṭhitabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvāti iminā gimhānepi meghe uṭṭhite abbhokāse
tika-vin08t:603_1: nikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. Tatra tatrāti cetiyaṅgaṇādike tasmiṃ tasmiṃ abbhokāse
tika-vin08t:603_2: niyametvā nikkhittā. Majjhato paṭṭhāya pādaṭṭhānābhimukhāti yattha samantato sammajjitvā
tika-vin08t:603_3: aṅgaṇamajjhe sabbadā kacavarassa saṅkaḍḍhanena majjhe vālikā sañcitā hoti, tattha
tika-vin08t:603_5: vā vālikā haritabbāti attho. “Yattha vā pana koṇesu vālikā sañcitā, tattha tato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin08t:603_6: aparadisābhimukhā haritabbā”ti keci atthaṃ vadanti. Keci pana “sammaṭṭhaṭṭhānassa
tika-vin08t:603_7: padavalañjena avikopanatthāya sayaṃ asammaṭṭhaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano pādābhimukhaṃ
tika-vin08t:603_8: vālikā haritabbāti vutta”nti vadanti. Tattha “majjhato paṭṭhāyā”ti vacanassa payojanaṃ
tika-vin08t:603_9: na dissati. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “pādaṭṭhānābhimukhāti nisīdantānaṃ pādaṭṭhānābhimukhanti
tika-vin08t:603_10: keci, sammajjantassa pādaṭṭhānābhimukhanti apare, bahivālikāya agamananimittaṃ pādaṭṭhānābhimukhā
tika-vin08t:603_11: haritabbāti vuttanti eke”ti vuttaṃ. Kacavaraṃ hatthehi gahetvā bahi chaḍḍetabbanti
tika-vin08t:603_12: iminā “kacavaraṃ chaḍḍessāmī”ti vālikā na chaḍḍetabbāti dīpeti.
tika-vin08t:604: 86. Kappaṃ labhitvāti “gacchā”ti vuttavacanena kappaṃ labhitvā. Therassa hi āṇattiyā gacchantassa anāpatti. Purimanayenevāti “nisīditvā sayaṃ gacchanto”tiādinā pubbe vuttanayeneva.
tika-vin08t:605_0: Aññattha gacchatīti taṃ maggaṃ atikkamitvā aññattha gacchati. Leḍḍupātupacārato bahi
tika-vin08t:605_1: ṭhitattā “pāduddhārena kāretabbo”ti vuttaṃ, aññattha gacchantassa paṭhamapāduddhāre
tika-vin08t:605_2: dukkaṭaṃ, dutiyapāduddhāre pācittiyanti attho. Pākatikaṃ akatvāti apaṭisāmetvā. Antarasannipāteti
tika-vin08t:606_0: 87. Āvāsikānaṃyeva palibodhoti ettha āgantukesu āgantvā kiñci avatvā tattha nisinnesupi
tika-vin08t:606_1: nisīditvā “āvāsikāyeva uddharissantī”ti gatesupi āvāsikānameva palibodho. Mahāpaccarivāde
tika-vin08t:606_2: pana “idaṃ amhāka”nti vatvāpi avatvāpi nisinnānamevāti adhippāyo. Mahāaṭṭhakathāvāde
tika-vin08t:606_3: “āpattī”ti pācittiyameva vuttaṃ. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana santharāpane pācittiyena bhavitabbanti
tika-vin08t:606_4: anāṇattiyā paññattattā dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ. Ussārakoti sarabhāṇako. So hi uddhaṃuddhaṃ
tika-vin08t:606_5: pāḷipāṭhaṃ sāreti pavattetīti “ussārako”ti vuccati. “Idaṃ ussārakassa, idaṃ dhammakathikassā”ti
tika-vin08t:606_6: visuṃ paññattattā anāṇattiyā paññattepi pācittiyeneva bhavitabbanti adhippāyena “tasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:606_7: āgantvā nisinne tassa palibodho”ti vuttaṃ. Keci pana vadanti “anāṇattiyā paññattepi
tika-vin08t:606_8: dhammakathikassa anuṭṭhāpanīyattā pācittiyena bhavitabbaṃ, āgantukassa pana pacchā
tika-vin08t:607_0: 88. Pādapuñchanī nāma rajjukehi vā pilotikāya vā pādapuñchanatthaṃ katā. Phalakapīṭhaṃ
tika-vin08t:607_1: nāma phalakamayaṃ pīṭhaṃ. Atha vā phalakañceva dārumayapīṭhañca. Dārumayapīṭhanti
tika-vin08t:607_2: ca phalakamayameva pīṭhaṃ veditabbaṃ. Pādakaṭhalikanti adhotapādaṭṭhāpanakaṃ. Ajjhokāse
tika-vin08t:607_3: rajanaṃ pacitvā …pe… paṭisāmetabbanti ettha theve asati rajanakamme niṭṭhite paṭisāmetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:607_4: “Bhikkhu vā sāmaṇero vā ārāmiko vā lajjī hotīti vuttattā alajjiṃ āpucchitvā gantuṃ
tika-vin08t:607_5: na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Otāpento…pe… gacchatīti ettha “kiñcāpi ‘ettakaṃ dūraṃ gantabba’nti
tika-vin08t:607_6: paricchedo natthi, tathāpi leḍḍupātaṃ atikkamma nātidūraṃ gantabba”nti vadanti.
tika-vin08t:613_0: 89. Evaṃ saṅghikasenāsanesu kattabbavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni catukālikavinicchayaṃ
tika-vin08t:613_1: kathetuṃ “kālikānipi cattārī”tiādimāha. Tattha karaṇaṃ kāro, kiriyā. Kāro eva kālo
tika-vin08t:613_2: ra-kārassa la-kāro yathā “mahāsālo”ti. Kāloti cettha paccuppannādikiriyā. Vuttañhi –
tika-vin08t:616_0: Ettha pana tassa tassa kiriyāsaṅkhātassa kālassa pabhedabhūto purebhattaekaahorattasattāhajīvikapariyantasaṅkhāto
tika-vin08t:616_1: kālaviseso adhippeto. Kāle tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kālavisese paribhuñjitabbānīti kālikāni.
tika-vin08t:616_2: Pi-saddo samuccayattho, tena kappiyā catubhūmiyoti samucceti. Cattārīti saṅkhyāniddeso,
tika-vin08t:616_3: tena kālikāni nāma cattāri eva honti, na tīṇi na pañcāti dasseti, idaṃ mātikāpadassa
tika-vin08t:616_4: atthavivaraṇaṃ. Tattha uddese yaṃ mātikāyaṃ “kālikānipi cattārī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ, ettha
tika-vin08t:616_5: etasmiṃ mātikāpade cattāri kālikāni veditabbānīti yojanā. Katamāni tānīti āha “yāvakālika”ntiādi.
tika-vin08t:616_6: Yāvakālikaṃ…pe… yāvajīvikaṃ iti imāni vatthūni cattāri kālikāni nāmāti attho.
tika-vin08t:617_0: Idāni tesaṃ vatthuñca visesanañca nāmalābhahetuñca dassento “tattha purebhatta”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin08t:617_1: Tattha tesu catūsu kālikesu yaṃ kiñci khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ yāvakālikaṃ, aṭṭhavidhapānaṃ
tika-vin08t:617_2: yāmakālikaṃ, sappiādipañcavidhabhesajjaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ, sabbampi paṭiggahitaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ
tika-vin08t:617_3: iti vuccatīti sambandho. Yaṃ kiñci khādanīyabhojanīyanti ettha atibyāpitaṃ pariharituṃ
tika-vin08t:617_5: na aññaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyantyattho. Yāva…pe… paribhuñjitabbatoti nāmalābhahetuṃ,
tika-vin08t:617_6: etena yāva kālo assāti yāvakālikanti vacanatthaṃ dasseti. Aṭṭhavidhaṃ pānanti ettha
tika-vin08t:617_7: abyāpitaṃ pariharitumāha “saddhiṃ anulomapānehī”ti. Yāva…pe… tabbatoti nāmalābhahetuṃ,
tika-vin08t:617_8: etena yāmo kālo assāti yāmakālikanti vacanatthaṃ dasseti. Sattāhaṃ nidhetabbatoti
tika-vin08t:617_9: nāmalābhahetuṃ, etena sattāho kālo assāti sattāhakālikanti vacanatthaṃ dasseti. Sabbampi
tika-vin08t:617_10: paṭiggahitanti ettha atibyāpitaṃ pariharituṃ “ṭhapetvā udaka”ntyāha. Yāva…pe… paribhuñjitabbatoti
tika-vin08t:617_11: nāmalābhahetuṃ, tena yāvajīvaṃ kālo assāti yāvajīvikanti vacanatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin08t:618_0: Etthāha – “yo pana bhikkhu adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āhareyya aññatra udakadantaponā,
tika-vin08t:618_1: pācittiya”nti vacanato nanu udakaṃ appaṭiggahitabbaṃ, atha kasmā “ṭhapetvā udakaṃ
tika-vin08t:618_2: avasesaṃ sabbampi paṭiggahita”nti vuttanti? Saccaṃ, parisuddhaudakaṃ appaṭiggahitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:618_3: kaddamādisahitaṃ pana paṭiggahetabbaṃ hoti, tasmā paṭiggahitesu antogadhabhāvato
tika-vin08t:618_4: “ṭhapetvā udaka”nti vuttanti. Evamapi “sabbampi paṭiggahita”nti imināva siddhaṃ paṭiggahetabbassa
tika-vin08t:618_5: udakassapi gahaṇatoti? Saccaṃ, tathāpi udakabhāvena sāmaññato “sabbampi paṭiggahita”nti
tika-vin08t:618_6: ettake vutte ekaccassa udakassa paṭiggahetabbabhāvato udakampi yāvajīvikaṃ nāmāti
tika-vin08t:618_7: ñāyeyya, na pana udakaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ suddhassa paṭiggahetabbābhāvato, tasmā idaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:618_8: hoti – ekaccassa udakassa paṭiggahetabbabhāve satipi suddhassa appaṭiggahitabbattā
tika-vin08t:618_9: taṃ udakaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbampi paṭiggahitaṃ yāvajīvikanti vuccatīti.
tika-vin08t:619_0: 90. Mūlakamūlādīni upadesatoyeva veditabbāni, tāni pariyāyato vuccamānānipi na sakkā
tika-vin08t:619_1: viññātuṃ. Pariyāyantarena hi vuccamāne taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ ajānantānaṃ sammohoyeva siyā,
tika-vin08t:619_2: tasmā tattha na kiñci vakkhāma. Khādanīye khādanīyatthanti pūvādikhādanīye vijjamānaṃ
tika-vin08t:619_3: khādanīyakiccaṃ khādanīyehi kātabbaṃ jighacchāharaṇasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ payojanaṃ neva
tika-vin08t:619_4: pharanti na nipphādenti. Ekasmiṃ dese āhārakiccaṃ sādhentaṃ vā asādhentaṃ vā aparasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:619_5: dese uṭṭhitabhūmirasādibhedena āhārajighacchāharaṇakiccaṃ asādhentampi vā sambhaveyyāti
tika-vin08t:619_6: āha “tesu tesu janapadesū”tiādi. Keci pana “ekasmiṃ janapade āhārakiccaṃ sādhentaṃ
tika-vin08t:619_7: sesajanapadesupi vikāle na kappati evāti dassanatthaṃ idaṃ vutta”ntipi vadanti. Pakatiāhāravasenāti
tika-vin08t:619_8: aññehi yāvakālikehi ayojitaṃ attano pakatiyāva āhārakiccakaraṇavasena. Sammohoyeva
tika-vin08t:619_9: hotīti anekatthānaṃ nāmānaṃ appasiddhānañca sambhavato sammoho eva siyā. Tenevettha
tika-vin08t:619_10: mayampi mūlakamūlādīnaṃ pariyāyantaradassane ādaraṃ na karimha upadesatova gahetabbato.
tika-vin08t:624: Sabbakappiyānīti mūlatacapattādīnaṃ vasena sabbaso kappiyāni, tesampi nāmavasena na sakkā pariyantaṃ dassetunti sambandho.
tika-vin08t:625: Acchivādīnaṃ aparipakkāneva phalāni yāvajīvikānīti dassetuṃ “aparipakkānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:626_0: Harītakādīnaṃ aṭṭhīnīti ettha miñjaṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitāni kapālāni yāvajīvikānīti
tika-vin08t:626_1: ācariyā. Miñjampi yāvajīvikanti eke. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “harītakādīnaṃ aṭṭhīnīti
tika-vin08t:626_2: ettha ‘miñjaṃ yāvakālika’nti keci vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ avuttattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:627_0: Hiṅgūti hiṅgurukkhato paggharitaniyyāso. Hiṅgujatuādayopi hiṅguvikatiyo eva. Tattha
tika-vin08t:627_1: hiṅgujatu nāma hiṅgurukkhassa daṇḍapattāni pacitvā kataniyyāso. Hiṅgusipāṭikaṃ nāma
tika-vin08t:627_2: hiṅgupattāni pacitvā kataniyyāso. “Aññena missetvā kato”tipi vadanti. Takanti aggakoṭiyā
tika-vin08t:627_3: nikkhantasileso. Takapattīti pattato nikkhantasileso. Takapaṇṇīti palāse bhajjitvā
tika-vin08t:628_0: 91. Yāmakālikesu panāti ettha kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyapadehi yāvakālikameva
tika-vin08t:628_1: saṅgahitaṃ, na yāmakālikaṃ, tathāpi “anāpatti yāmakālikaṃ yāme nidahitvā bhuñjatī”ti
tika-vin08t:628_2: idha ceva “yāmakālikena bhikkhave sattāhakālikaṃ…pe… yāvajīvikaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin08t:628_3: yāme kappati, yāmātikkante na kappatī”ti aññattha ca vuttattā “yāmakālika”ntivacanasāmatthiyato
tika-vin08t:628_4: ca bhagavato adhippāyaññūhi aṭṭhakathācariyehi yāmakālikaṃ sannidhikārakaṃ pācittiyavatthumeva
tika-vin08t:630_0: 92. Sattāhakālike pañca bhesajjānīti bhesajjakiccaṃ karontu vā mā vā, evaṃladdhavohārāni
tika-vin08t:630_1: pañca. “Gosappī”tiādinā loke pākaṭaṃ dassetvā “yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappatī”ti iminā aññesampi
tika-vin08t:630_2: rohitamigādīnaṃ sappiṃ gahetvā dasseti. Yesañhi khīraṃ atthi, sappimpi tesaṃ atthiyeva,
tika-vin08t:630_3: taṃ pana sulabhaṃ vā dullabhaṃ vā asammohatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ navanītampi. “Yesaṃ
tika-vin08t:630_4: maṃsaṃ kappatī”ti ca idaṃ nissaggiyavatthudassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na pana yesaṃ maṃsaṃ
tika-vin08t:630_5: na kappati, tesaṃ sappiādi na kappatīti dassanatthaṃ. Manussakhīrādīnipi hi no na kappanti.
tika-vin08t:631_0: 93. Yāva kālo nātikkamati, tāva paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti ettha kāloti bhikkhūnaṃ bhojanakālo
tika-vin08t:631_1: adhippeto, so ca sabbantimena paricchedena ṭhitamajjhanhiko. Ṭhitamajjhanhikopi hi
tika-vin08t:631_2: kālasaṅgahaṃ gacchati, tato paṭṭhāya pana khādituṃ vā bhuñjituṃ vā na sakkā, sahasā
tika-vin08t:631_3: pivituṃ sakkā bhaveyya, kukkuccakena pana na kattabbaṃ. Kālaparicchedajānanatthañca
tika-vin08t:631_4: kālatthambho yojetabbo. Kālantare vā bhattakiccaṃ kātabbaṃ. Paṭiggahaṇeti gahaṇameva
tika-vin08t:631_5: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Paṭiggahitameva hi taṃ, sannihitaṃ na kappatīti puna paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ
tika-vin08t:631_6: natthi, teneva “ajjhoharitukāmatāya gaṇhantassa paṭiggahaṇe”ti vuttaṃ. Mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:632_0: Yanti yaṃ pattaṃ. Sandissatīti yāguyā upari sandissati. Telavaṇṇe patte satipi nisnehabhāve
tika-vin08t:632_1: aṅguliyā ghaṃsantassa vaṇṇavaseneva lekhā paññāyati, tasmā tattha anāpattīti dassanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:632_2: “sā abbohārikā”ti vuttaṃ. Sayaṃ paṭiggahetvā apariccattameva hi dutiyadivase na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:632_3: ettha paṭiggahaṇe anapekkhavissajjanena, anupasampannassa nirapekkhadānena vā vijahitapaṭiggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:632_5: vuttaṃ, tasmā yaṃ parassa pariccajitvā adinnampi sace paṭiggahaṇe nirapekkhavissajjanena
tika-vin08t:632_6: vijahitapaṭiggahaṇaṃ hoti, tampi dutiyadivase vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ. Yadi evaṃ “patto
tika-vin08t:632_7: duddhoto hotī”tiādīsu kasmā āpatti vuttāti? “Paṭiggahaṇaṃ avissajjetvāva sayaṃ vā
tika-vin08t:632_8: aññena vā tucchaṃ katvā na sammā dhovitvā niṭṭhāpite patte laggampi avijahitapaṭiggahaṇameva
tika-vin08t:632_9: hotīti tattha āpattī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Keci pana “sāmaṇerānaṃ pariccajantīti
tika-vin08t:632_10: imasmiṃ adhikāre ṭhatvā ‘apariccattamevā’ti vuttattā anupasampannassa pariccattameva
tika-vin08t:632_11: vaṭṭati, apariccattaṃ na vaṭṭatīti āpannaṃ, tasmā nirālayabhāvena paṭiggahaṇe vijahitepi
tika-vin08t:632_12: anupasampannassa apariccattaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Taṃ yuttaṃ viya na dissati.
tika-vin08t:632_13: Yadaggena hi paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati, tadaggena sannidhimpi na karoti vijahitapaṭiggahaṇassa
tika-vin08t:632_14: appaṭiggahitasadisattā. Paṭiggahetvā nidahiteyeva ca sannidhipaccayā āpatti vuttā.
tika-vin08t:633_1: apariccattañca yāvakālikādivatthumeva sandhāya vadati, na pana taggatapaṭiggahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t:633_2: Na hi vatthuṃ apariccajitvā tatthagatapaṭiggahaṇaṃ pariccajituṃ sakkā, na ca tādisaṃ
tika-vin08t:633_3: vacanaṃ atthi, yadi bhaveyya, ‘sace patto duddhoto hoti…pe… bhuñjantassa pācittiya’nti
tika-vin08t:633_4: vacanaṃ virujjheyya. Na hi dhovanena āmisaṃ apanetuṃ vāyamantassa paṭiggahaṇe apekkhā
tika-vin08t:633_5: vattati. Yena punadivase bhuñjato pācittiyaṃ janeyya, patte pana vattamānā apekkhā
tika-vin08t:633_6: taggatike āmisepi vattati eva nāmāti āmise anapekkhatā ettha na labbhati, tato āmise
tika-vin08t:633_7: avijahitapaṭiggahaṇaṃ punadivase pācittiyaṃ janetīti idaṃ vuttaṃ. Atha mataṃ ‘yadaggenettha
tika-vin08t:633_8: āmisānapekkhatā na labbhati, tadaggena paṭiggahaṇānapekkhatāpi na labbhatī’ti. Tathā
tika-vin08t:633_9: sati yattha āmisāpekkhā atthi, tattha paṭiggahaṇāpekkhāpi na vigacchatīti āpannaṃ,
tika-vin08t:633_10: evañca paṭiggahaṇe anapekkhavissajjanaṃ visuṃ na vattabbaṃ siyā, aṭṭhakathāyañcetampi
tika-vin08t:633_11: paṭiggahaṇavijahanaṃ kāraṇattena abhimataṃ siyā. Idaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ katvā visuṃ vattabbaṃ
tika-vin08t:633_12: cīvarāpekkhāya vattamānāyapi paccuddhārena adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ viya. Etasmiñca upāye
tika-vin08t:633_13: sati gaṇṭhikāhatapattesu avaṭṭanatā nāma na siyāti vuttovāyamattho, tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:633_14: sāratthadīpaniyaṃ ‘yaṃ parassa pariccajitvā adinnampi sace paṭiggahaṇe nirapekkhavissajjanena
tika-vin08t:633_15: vijahitapaṭiggahaṇaṃ hoti, tampi dutiyadivase vaṭṭatī’tiādi, taṃ na sārato paccetabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:634_0: Pāḷiyaṃ “sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ āhāratthāya paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassā”tiādinā
tika-vin08t:634_1: sannihitesu sattāhakālikayāvajīvikesu purebhattampi āhāratthāya ajjhoharaṇepi dukkaṭassa
tika-vin08t:634_2: vuttattā yāmakālikepi ajjhohāre visuṃ dukkaṭena bhavitabbanti āha “āhāratthāya ajjhoharato
tika-vin08t:634_3: dukkaṭena saddhiṃ pācittiya”nti. Pakatiāmiseti odanādikappiyāmise. Dveti purebhattaṃ
tika-vin08t:634_4: paṭiggahitaṃ yāmakālikaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisena mukhena bhuñjato sannidhipaccayā ekaṃ,
tika-vin08t:634_5: yāvakālikasaṃsaṭṭhatāya yāvakālikattabhajanena anatirittapaccayā ekanti dve pācittiyāni.
tika-vin08t:634_6: Vikappadvayeti sāmisanirāmisapakkhadvaye. Thullaccayaṃ dukkaṭañca vaḍḍhatīti manussamaṃse
tika-vin08t:635_0: Paṭiggahaṇapaccayā tāva dukkaṭanti ettha sannihitattā purebhattampi dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin08t:635_1: Sati paccaye pana sannihitampi sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikañca bhesajjatthāya gaṇhantassa
tika-vin08t:636_0: 94. Uggahitakaṃ katvā nikkhittanti apaṭiggahitaṃ sayameva gahetvā nikkhittaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:636_1: “uggahitakanti paribhogatthāya sayaṃ gahita”nti vuttaṃ. Sayaṃ karotīti pacitvā karoti.
tika-vin08t:636_3: navanītaṃ pacitvā kataṃ. Nirāmisamevāti tadahupurebhattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:637_0: 95. Ajja sayaṃkataṃ nirāmisameva bhuñjantassa kasmā sāmaṃpāko na hotīti āha “navanītaṃ
tika-vin08t:637_1: tāpentassā”tiādi. Pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitakehīti khīradadhīni sandhāya vuttaṃ. Uggahitakehi
tika-vin08t:637_2: kataṃ abbhañjanādīsu upanetabbanti yojanā. Ubhayesampīti pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitakhīradadhīhi
tika-vin08t:637_3: ca purebhattaṃ uggahitakehi ca katānaṃ. Esa nayoti nissaggiyaṃ na hotīti attho. Akappiyamaṃsasappimhīti
tika-vin08t:637_4: hatthiādīnaṃ sappimhi. Kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ vatvāti “sajātikānaṃ sappibhāvato”ti kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ
tika-vin08t:637_5: vatvā. Sappinayena veditabbanti nirāmisameva sattāhaṃ vaṭṭatīti attho. Etthāti navanīte.
tika-vin08t:637_6: Dhotaṃ vaṭṭatīti adhotañce, savatthukapaṭiggahitaṃ hoti, tasmā dhotaṃ paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin08t:638_0: Mahāsīvattherassa pana vatthuno viyojitattā dadhiguḷikādīhi yuttatāmattena savatthukapaṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin08t:638_1: nāma na hoti, tasmā takkato uddhaṭamattameva paṭiggahetvā dhovitvā, pacitvā vā nirāmisameva
tika-vin08t:638_2: katvā bhuñjiṃsūti adhippāyo, na pana dadhiguḷikādīhi saha vikāle bhuñjiṃsūti. Tenāha
tika-vin08t:638_3: “tasmā navanītaṃ paribhuñjantena…pe… savatthukapaṭiggahaṃ nāma na hotī”ti. Tattha
tika-vin08t:638_4: adhotaṃ paṭiggahetvāpi taṃ navanītaṃ paribhuñjantena dadhiādīni apanetvā paribhuñjitabbanti
tika-vin08t:638_5: attho. Keci pana “takkato uddhaṭamattameva khādiṃsū”ti vacanassa adhippāyaṃ ajānantā
tika-vin08t:638_6: “takkato uddhaṭamattaṃ adhotampi dadhiguḷikādisahitaṃ vikāle paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin08t:638_7: vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Na hi dadhiguḷikādiāmisena saṃsaṭṭharasaṃ navanītaṃ paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin08t:638_8: vaṭṭatīti sakkā vattuṃ. Navanītaṃ paribhuñjantenāti adhovitvā paṭiggahitanavanītaṃ
tika-vin08t:638_9: paribhuñjantena. Dadhi eva dadhigataṃ yathā “gūthagataṃ muttagata”nti. “Khayaṃ gamissatī”ti
tika-vin08t:638_10: vacanato khīraṃ pakkhipitvā pakkasappiādipi vikāle kappatīti veditabbaṃ. Khayaṃ gamissatīti
tika-vin08t:638_11: nirāmisaṃ hoti, tasmā vikālepi vaṭṭatīti attho. Ettāvatāti navanīte laggamattena
tika-vin08t:638_12: visuṃ dadhiādivohāraṃ aladdhena appamattena dadhiādināti attho, etena visuṃ paṭiggahitadadhiādīhi
tika-vin08t:638_13: saha pakkaṃ savatthukapaṭiggahitasaṅkhameva gacchatīti dasseti. Tasmimpīti nirāmisabhūtepi.
tika-vin08t:638_14: Kukkuccakānaṃ pana ayaṃ adhippāyo – paṭiggahaṇe tāva dadhiādīhi asambhinnarasattā
tika-vin08t:638_15: bhattena sahitaguḷapiṇḍādi viya savatthukapaṭiggahitaṃ nāma hoti. Taṃ pana pacantena
tika-vin08t:638_16: dhovitvāva pacitabbaṃ. Itarathā pacanakkhaṇe paccamānadadhiguḷikādīhi sambhinnarasatāya
tika-vin08t:638_17: sāmaṃpakkaṃ jātaṃ, tesu khīṇesupi sāmaṃpakkameva hoti, tasmā nirāmisameva pacitabbanti.
tika-vin08t:639_0: Ettha cāyaṃ vicāraṇā – savatthukapaṭiggahitattābhāve āmisena saha bhikkhunā pakkassa
tika-vin08t:639_1: sayaṃpākadoso vā parisaṅkīyati, yāvakālikatā vā. Tattha na tāva sayaṃpākadoso ettha
tika-vin08t:639_2: sambhavati sattāhakālikattā. Yañhi tattha dadhiādi āmisagataṃ, taṃ parikkhīṇanti.
tika-vin08t:639_3: Atha paṭiggahitadadhiguḷikādinā saha attanā pakkattā savatthukapakkaṃ viya bhaveyyāti
tika-vin08t:639_4: parisaṅkīyati, tadā “āmisena saha paṭiggahitattā”ti kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ, na pana “pakkattā”ti,
tika-vin08t:639_5: tathā ca upaḍḍhattherānaṃ matameva aṅgīkataṃ siyā. Tattha ca sāmaṇerādīhi pakkampi
tika-vin08t:639_6: yāvakālikameva siyā paṭiggahitakhīrādiṃ pacitvā anupasampannehi katasappiādi viya,
tika-vin08t:639_7: na ca taṃ yuttaṃ bhikkhācārena laddhanavanītādīnaṃ takkādiāmisasaṃsaṭṭhasambhavena
tika-vin08t:639_8: aparibhuñjitabbattāppasaṅgato. Na hi gahaṭṭhā dhovitvā, sodhetvā vā patte ākirantīti niyamo atthi.
tika-vin08t:640_0: Aṭṭhakathāyañca “yathā tattha patitataṇḍulakaṇādayo na paccanti, evaṃ…pe… puna pacitvā
tika-vin08t:640_1: deti, purimanayeneva sattāhaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti iminā vacanenapetaṃ virujjhati, tasmā idha
tika-vin08t:640_2: kukkuccakānaṃ kukkuccuppattiyā nimittameva na dissati. Yathā cettha, evaṃ “lajjī
tika-vin08t:640_3: sāmaṇero yathā tattha taṇḍulakaṇādayo na paccanti, evaṃ aggimhi vilīyāpetvā…pe… detī”ti
tika-vin08t:640_4: vacanassāpi nimittaṃ na dissati. Yadi hi etaṃ yāvakālikasaṃsaggaparihārāya vuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:640_5: siyā. Attanāpi tathā kātabbaṃ bhaveyya. Gahaṭṭhehi dinnasappiādīsu ca āmisasaṃsaggasaṅkā
tika-vin08t:640_6: na vigaccheyya. Na hi gahaṭṭhā evaṃ vilīyāpetvā parissāvetvā kaṇataṇḍulādiṃ apanetvā
tika-vin08t:640_7: puna pacanti. Apica bhesajjehi saddhiṃ khīrādiṃ pakkhipitvā yathā khīrādi khayaṃ
tika-vin08t:640_8: gacchati, evaṃ parehi pakkabhesajjatelādipi yāvakālikameva siyā, na ca tampi yuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:640_9: dadhiādikhayakaraṇatthaṃ “puna pacitvā detī”ti vuttattā, tasmā mahāsīvattheravāde
tika-vin08t:640_10: kukkuccaṃ akatvā adhotampi navanītaṃ tadahupi punadivasādīsupi pacituṃ, taṇḍulādimissaṃ
tika-vin08t:640_11: sappiādiṃ attanāpi aggimhi vilīyāpetvā puna takkādikhayatthaṃ pacituñca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:641_0: Tattha vijjamānassāpi paccamānakkhaṇe sambhinnarasassa yāvakālikassa abbohārikattena
tika-vin08t:641_2: Teneva “ettāvatā hi savatthukapaṭiggahitaṃ nāma na hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Visuṃ paṭiggahitena
tika-vin08t:641_3: pana khīrādinā āmisena navanītādiṃ missetvā bhikkhunā vā aññehi vā pakkatelādibhesajjaṃ
tika-vin08t:641_5: Yaṃ pana purepaṭiggahitabhesajjehi saddhiṃ appaṭiggahitaṃ khīrādiṃ pakkhipitvā pakkatelādikaṃ
tika-vin08t:641_6: anupasampanneheva pakkampi savatthukapaṭiggahitampi sannidhipi na hoti tattha pakkhittakhīrādimissāpi
tika-vin08t:641_7: tasmiṃ khaṇe sambhinnarasatāya purepaṭiggahitattāpattito, sace pana appaṭiggahiteheva,
tika-vin08t:641_8: aññehi vā pakkatelādīsupi āmisaraso paññāyati, taṃ yāvakālikaṃva hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:641_9: Ayaṃ kathāmaggo vimativinodaniyaṃ āgato. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “kukkuccāyanti kukkuccakāti
tika-vin08t:641_10: iminā attanopi tattha kukkuccasabbhāvampi dīpeti. Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘nibbaṭṭitasappi
tika-vin08t:641_11: vā navanītaṃ vā pacituṃ vaṭṭatī’ti vutta”nti ettakameva āgato.
tika-vin08t:642_0: Uggahetvāti sayameva gahetvā. Tāni paṭiggahetvāti tāni khīradadhīni paṭiggahetvā.
tika-vin08t:642_1: Gahitanti taṇḍulādivigamatthaṃ puna pacitvā gahitanti attho. Paṭiggahetvā ca ṭhapitabhesajjehīti
tika-vin08t:642_2: atirekasattāhapaṭiggahitehi yāvajīvikabhesajjehi, etena tehi yuttampi sappiādi atirekasattāhapaṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin08t:642_3: na hotīti dasseti. Vaddalisamayeti vassakālasamaye, anātapakāleti attho. Vuttanayena
tika-vin08t:642_4: yathā taṇḍulādīni na paccanti, tathā lajjīyeva sampādetvā detīti lajjisāmaṇeraggahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t:642_5: Apica alajjinā ajjhoharitabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci abhisaṅkharāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati, tasmāpi evamāha.
tika-vin08t:643_0: 96. Tile paṭiggahetvā katatelanti attanā bhajjādīni akatvā katatelaṃ. Teneva “sāmisampi
tika-vin08t:643_1: vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Nibbaṭṭītattāti yāvakālikato vivecitattā, etena elāabhāvato yāvakālikattābhāvaṃ,
tika-vin08t:643_2: bhikkhuno savatthukapaṭiggahaṇena yāvakālikattupagamanañca dasseti. Ubhayampīti attanā aññehi ca kataṃ.
tika-vin08t:644: Yāva aruṇuggamanā tiṭṭhati, nissaggiyanti sattame divase katatelaṃ sace yāva aruṇuggamanā tiṭṭhati, nissaggiyaṃ.
tika-vin08t:645_0: Acchavasanti dukkaṭavatthuno vasāya anuññātattā taṃsadisānaṃ dukkaṭavatthūnaṃyeva
tika-vin08t:645_1: akappiyamaṃsasattānaṃ vasā anuññātā, na thullaccayavatthu manussānaṃ vasāti āha “ṭhapetvā
tika-vin08t:645_2: manussavasa”nti. Saṃsaṭṭhanti parissāvitaṃ. Tiṇṇaṃ dukkaṭānanti ajjhohāre ajjhohāre
tika-vin08t:645_3: tīṇi dukkaṭāni sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi paribhogatthāya vikāle paṭiggahaṇapacanaparissāvanādīsu
tika-vin08t:645_4: pubbapayogesu pāḷiyaṃ, aṭṭhakathāyañca āpatti na vuttā, tathāpi ettha āpattiyā eva
tika-vin08t:645_5: bhavitabbaṃ paṭikkhittassa karaṇato āhāratthāya vikāle yāmakālikādīnaṃ paṭiggahaṇe
tika-vin08t:645_6: viya. “Kāle paṭiggahitaṃ vikāle anupasampannenāpi nipakkaṃ saṃsaṭṭhañca paribhuñjantassa
tika-vin08t:646_0: Yasmā khīrādīni pakkhipitvā pakkabhesajjatele kasaṭaṃ āmisagatikaṃ, tena saha telaṃ
tika-vin08t:646_1: paṭiggahetuṃ, pacituṃ vā bhikkhuno na vaṭṭati, tasmā vuttaṃ “pakkatelakasaṭe viya
tika-vin08t:646_2: kukkuccāyatī”ti. “Sace vasāya saha pakkattā na vaṭṭati, idaṃ kasmā vaṭṭatī”ti pucchantā
tika-vin08t:646_3: “bhante…pe… vaṭṭatī”ti āhaṃsu, thero atikukkuccakatāya “etampi āvuso na vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin08t:646_4: āha, roganiggahatthāya eva vasāya anuññātattaṃ sallakkhetvā pacchā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchi.
tika-vin08t:647_0: 97. “Madhukarīhi madhumakkhikāhīti idaṃ khuddakabhamarānaṃ dvinnaṃ eva visesana”nti
tika-vin08t:647_1: keci vadanti. Aññe pana “daṇḍakesu madhukārikā madhukarimakkhikā nāma, tāhi saha
tika-vin08t:647_2: tisso madhumakkhikajātiyo”ti vadanti. Bhamaramakkhikāti mahāpaṭalakārikā. Silesasadisanti
tika-vin08t:647_3: sukkhatāya vā pakkatāya vā ghanībhūtaṃ. Itaranti tanukamadhu. Madhupaṭalanti madhurahitaṃ
tika-vin08t:647_4: kevalaṃ madhupaṭalaṃ. “Sace madhusahitaṃ paṭalaṃ paṭiggahetvā nikkhipanti. Paṭalassa
tika-vin08t:647_5: bhājanaṭṭhāniyattā madhuno vasena sattāhātikkame nissaggiyaṃ hotī”ti vadanti, “madhumakkhitaṃ
tika-vin08t:648_0: 98. “Phāṇitaṃ nāma ucchumhā nibbatta”nti pāḷiyaṃ avisesena vuttattā, aṭṭhakathāyañca
tika-vin08t:648_2: ucchurasopi nikkasaṭo sattāhakālikoti veditabbaṃ. Kenaci pana “madhumhi cattāro kālikā
tika-vin08t:648_3: yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbā, ucchumhi cā”ti vatvā “samakkhikaṇḍaṃ selakaṃ madhu yāvakālikaṃ,
tika-vin08t:648_4: anelakaṃ udakasambhinnaṃ yāmakālikaṃ, asambhinnaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ, madhusitthaṃ parisuddhaṃ
tika-vin08t:648_5: yāvajīvikaṃ, tathā ucchuraso sakasaṭo yāvakāliko, nikkasaṭo udakasambhinno yāmakāliko,
tika-vin08t:648_6: asambhinno sattāhakāliko, suddhakasaṭaṃ yāvajīvika”nti ca vatvā uttaripi bahudhā
tika-vin08t:648_7: papañcitaṃ. Tattha “udakasambhinnaṃ madhu vā ucchuraso vā sakasaṭo yāvakāliko, nikkasaṭo
tika-vin08t:648_8: udakasambhinno yāmakāliko”ti idaṃ neva pāḷiyaṃ, na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dissati, “yāvakālikaṃ
tika-vin08t:648_9: samānaṃ garutarampi muddikājātirasaṃ attanā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ lahukaṃ yāmakālikabhāvaṃ upanentaṃ
tika-vin08t:648_10: udakaṃ lahutaraṃ sattāhakālikaṃ attanā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ garutaraṃ yāmakālikabhāvaṃ upanetī”ti
tika-vin08t:648_11: ettha kāraṇaṃ soyeva pucchitabbo. Sabbattha pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca udakasambhinnena
tika-vin08t:648_12: garutarassāpi lahubhāvopagamanaṃyeva dassitaṃ. Pāḷiyampi hi “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:648_13: gilānassa guḷaṃ, agilānassa guḷodaka”nti vadantena agilānena paribhuñjituṃ ayuttopi
tika-vin08t:649_0: Yampi ca “ucchu ce, yāvakāliko, ucchuraso ce, yāmakāliko, phāṇitaṃ ce, sattāhakālikaṃ,
tika-vin08t:649_1: taco ce, yāvajīviko”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ dassetvā “ucchuraso udakasambhinno yāmakāliko”ti
tika-vin08t:649_2: aññena kenaci vuttaṃ, tampi tathāvidhassa aṭṭhakathāvacanassa samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya
tika-vin08t:649_3: abhāvato na sārato paccetabbaṃ, tatoyeva ca “ucchuraso udakasambhinnopi asambhinnopi
tika-vin08t:649_4: sattāhakālikoyevā”ti keci ācariyā vadanti. Bhesajjakkhandhake ca “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:649_5: ucchurasa”nti ettha tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu avisesena vuttaṃ “ucchuraso sattāhakāliko”ti.
tika-vin08t:649_6: Sayaṃkataṃ nirāmisameva vaṭṭatīti ettha aparissāvitaṃ paṭiggahitampi karaṇasamaye
tika-vin08t:649_7: parissāvetvā, kasaṭaṃ apanetvā ca attanā katanti veditabbaṃ, ayaṃ sāratthadīpanīpāṭho.
tika-vin08t:650_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana ucchurasaṃ upādāyāti nikkasaṭarasassāpi sattāhakālikattaṃ
tika-vin08t:650_1: dasseti “ucchumhā nibbatta”nti pāḷiyaṃ sāmaññato vuttattā. Yaṃ pana suttantaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:650_2: “ucchu ce, yāvakāliko, ucchuraso ce, yāmakāliko, phāṇitaṃ ce, sattāhakālikaṃ, taco
tika-vin08t:650_3: ce, yāvajīviko”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ ambaphalarasādimissatāya yāmakālikattaṃ sandhāya vuttanti
tika-vin08t:650_4: gahetabbaṃ, avinayavacanattā taṃ appamāṇanti. Teneva “purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitena aparissāvitaucchurasenā”tiādi
tika-vin08t:650_5: vuttaṃ. Nirāmisameva vaṭṭati tattha paviṭṭhayāvakālikassa abbohārikattāti idaṃ guḷe
tika-vin08t:650_6: kate tattha vijjamānampi kasaṭaṃ pākena sukkhatāya yāvajīvikattaṃ bhajatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:650_7: Tassa yāvakālikatte hi sāmaṃpākena purebhattepi anajjhoharaṇīyaṃ siyāti. “Savatthukapaṭiggahitattā”ti
tika-vin08t:650_8: idaṃ ucchurase cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ hutvā ṭhitakasaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tena ca “aparissāvitena
tika-vin08t:650_9: appaṭiggahitena anupasampannehi kataṃ sattāhaṃ vaṭṭatīti dassetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:651_0: Jhāmaucchuphāṇitanti aggimhi ucchuṃ tāpetvā kataṃ. Koṭṭitaucchuphāṇitanti khuddānukhuddakaṃ
tika-vin08t:651_1: chinditvā koṭṭetvā nippīḷetvā pakkaṃ. Taṃ tattha vijjamānampi kasaṭaṃ pakkakāle yāvakālikattaṃ
tika-vin08t:651_2: vijahatīti āha “taṃ yutta”nti. Sītodakena katanti madhukapupphāni sītodakena madditvā
tika-vin08t:651_3: parissāvetvā pacitvā kataṃ. “Aparissāvetvā kata”nti keci, tattha kāraṇaṃ na dissati.
tika-vin08t:651_4: Khīraṃ pakkhipitvā kataṃ madhukaphāṇitaṃ yāvakālikanti ettha khīraṃ pakkhipitvā pakkatelaṃ
tika-vin08t:651_5: kasmā vikāle vaṭṭatīti ce? Tele pakkhittaṃ khīraṃ telameva hoti, aññaṃ pana khīraṃ
tika-vin08t:651_6: pakkhipitvā kataṃ khīrabhāvaṃ gaṇhātīti idamettha kāraṇaṃ. Yadi evaṃ khaṇḍasakkharampi
tika-vin08t:651_7: khīraṃ pakkhipitvā karonti, taṃ kasmā vaṭṭatīti āha “khaṇḍasakkharaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t:652_1: dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ. Āhārakiccaṃ karontāni etāni kasmā evaṃ paribhuñjitabbānīti codanāparihārāya
tika-vin08t:652_2: bhesajjodissaṃ dassentena tappasaṅgena sabbānipi odissakāni ekato dassetuṃ “sattavidhañhī”tiādi
tika-vin08t:652_3: vuttaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ. Vinayasaṅgahappakaraṇe pana taṃ na vuttaṃ, “pacchābhattato
tika-vin08t:652_4: paṭṭhāya sati paccayeti vuttattā paṭiggahitabhesajjāni dutiyadivasato paṭṭhāya purebhattampi
tika-vin08t:652_5: sati paccayeva paribhuñjitabbāni, na āhāratthāya bhesajjatthāya paṭiggahitattā”ti
tika-vin08t:652_6: vadanti. Dvāravātapānakavāṭesūti mahādvārassa vātapānānañca kavāṭaphalakesu. Kasāve
tika-vin08t:652_7: pakkhittāni tāni attano sabhāvaṃ pariccajantīti “kasāve…pe… makkhetabbānī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:652_8: ghuṇapāṇakādiparihāratthaṃ makkhetabbānīti attho. Adhiṭṭhetīti “idāni mayhaṃ ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ
tika-vin08t:652_9: na bhavissati, bāhiraparibhogatthāya bhavissatī”ti cittaṃ uppādetīti attho. Tenevāha
tika-vin08t:652_10: “sappiñca telañca vasañca muddhani telaṃ vā abbhañjanaṃ vā”tiādi, evaṃ paribhoge
tika-vin08t:652_11: anapekkhatāya paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahatīti adhippāyo. Evaṃ aññesupi kālikesu anajjhoharitukāmatāya
tika-vin08t:652_12: suddhacittena bāhiraparibhogatthāya niyamepi paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahatīti idampi visuṃ
tika-vin08t:653_0: Aññena bhikkhunā vattabboti ettha suddhacittena dinnattā sayampi āharāpetvā paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin08t:653_1: vaṭṭatiyeva. Dvinnampi anāpattīti yathā aññassa santakaṃ ekena paṭiggahitaṃ sattāhātikkamepi
tika-vin08t:653_2: nissaggiyaṃ na hoti parasantakabhāvato, evamidampi avibhattattā ubhayasādhāraṇampi
tika-vin08t:653_3: vinibbhogābhāvato nissaggiyaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo. Paribhuñjituṃ pana na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:653_4: bhikkhunā paṭiggahitattā sattāhātikkame yassa kassaci bhikkhuno paribhuñjituṃ na
tika-vin08t:653_5: vaṭṭati paṭiggahitasappiādīnaṃ paribhogassa sattāheneva paricchinnattā. “Tāni paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin08t:654_0: “Āvuso imaṃ telaṃ sattāhamattaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti iminā yena paṭiggahitaṃ,
tika-vin08t:654_1: tena antosattāheyeva parassa vissajjitabhāvaṃ dasseti. Kassa āpattīti “paṭhamaṃ tāva
tika-vin08t:654_2: ubhinnaṃ sādhāraṇattā anāpatti vuttā, idāni pana ekena itarassa vissaṭṭhabhāvato
tika-vin08t:654_3: ubhayasādhāraṇatā natthīti vibhattasadisaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ, tasmā ettha paṭiggahitassa
tika-vin08t:654_4: sattāhātikkame ekassa āpattiyā bhavitabba”nti maññamāno “kiṃ paṭiggahaṇapaccayā paṭiggāhakassa
tika-vin08t:654_5: āpatti, udāhu yassa santakaṃ jātaṃ, tassā”ti pucchati. Nissaṭṭhabhāvatoyeva ca idha
tika-vin08t:654_6: “avibhattabhāvato”ti kāraṇaṃ avatvā “yena pariggahitaṃ, tena vissajjitattā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:654_7: idañca vissaṭṭhābhāvato ubhayasādhāraṇataṃ pahāya ekassa santakaṃ hontampi yena paṭiggahitaṃ,
tika-vin08t:654_8: tato aññassa santakaṃ jātaṃ, tasmā parasantakapaṭiggahaṇe viya paṭiggāhakassa paṭiggahaṇapaccayā
tika-vin08t:654_9: natthi āpattīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na pana “yena paṭiggahitaṃ, tena vissajjitattā”ti
tika-vin08t:654_10: vacanato avissajjite sati avibhattepi sattāhātikkame āpattīti dassanatthaṃ avissajjite
tika-vin08t:654_11: avibhattabhāvatoyeva anāpattiyā siddhattā. Sace pana itaro yena paṭiggahitaṃ, tasseva
tika-vin08t:654_12: antosattāhe attano bhāgampi vissajjeti, sattāhātikkame siyā āpatti yena paṭiggahitaṃ,
tika-vin08t:654_13: tasseva santakabhāvamāpannattā. “Itarassa appaṭiggahitattā”ti iminā tassa santakabhāvepi
tika-vin08t:654_14: aññehi paṭiggahitasakasantake viya tena appaṭiggahitabhāvato anāpattīti dīpeti, imaṃ
tika-vin08t:654_15: pana adhippāyaṃ ajānitvā ito aññathā gaṇṭhipadakārādīhi papañcitaṃ, na taṃ sārato
tika-vin08t:655_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana – sace dvinnaṃ…pe… na vaṭṭatīti ettha pāṭho gaḷito, evaṃ panettha
tika-vin08t:655_1: pāṭho veditabbo – sace dvinnaṃ santakaṃ ekena paṭiggahitaṃ avibhattaṃ hoti, sattāhātikkame
tika-vin08t:655_2: dvinnampi anāpatti, paribhuñjituṃ pana na vaṭṭatīti. Aññathā pana saddappayogopi
tika-vin08t:655_3: na saṅgahaṃ gacchati, “gaṇṭhipadepi ca ayameva pāṭho dassito”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:655_4: vuttaṃ. “Dvinnampi anāpattī”ti avibhattattā vuttaṃ. “Paribhuñjituṃ pana na vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin08t:655_5: idaṃ “sattāhaparamaṃ sannidhikārakaṃ paribhuñjitabba”nti vacanato vuttaṃ. “Yena paṭiggahitaṃ,
tika-vin08t:655_6: tena vissajjitattā”ti iminā upasampannassa dānampi sandhāya “vissajjetī”ti idaṃ vuttanti
tika-vin08t:655_7: dasseti. Upasampannassa nirapekkhadinnavatthumhi paṭiggahaṇassa avigatattepi sakasantakatā
tika-vin08t:655_8: vigatāva hoti, tena nissaggiyaṃ na hoti. “Attanāva paṭiggahitattaṃ sakasantakattañcā”ti
tika-vin08t:655_9: imehi dvīhi kāraṇeheva nissaggiyaṃ hoti, na ekena. Anupasampannassa nirapekkhadāne
tika-vin08t:655_10: pana tadubhayampi vijahati, paribhogopettha vaṭṭati, na sāpekkhadāne dānalakkhaṇābhāvato.
tika-vin08t:655_11: “Vissajjatī”ti etasmiñca pāḷipade kassaci adatvā anapekkhatāya chaḍḍanampi saṅgahitanti
tika-vin08t:655_13: Paṭiggahaṇe hi vijahite puna paṭiggahetvā paribhogo sayameva vaṭṭissati, tabbijahanañca
tika-vin08t:655_14: vatthuno sakasantakatāpariccāgena hotīti. Etena ca vatthumhi ajjhoharaṇāpekkhāya
tika-vin08t:655_15: sati paṭiggahaṇavissajjanaṃ nāma visuṃ na labbhatīti sijjhati. Itarathā hi “paṭiggahaṇe
tika-vin08t:655_16: anapekkhova paṭiggahaṇaṃ vissajjetvā puna paṭiggahetvā bhuñjatī”ti vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-vin08t:655_17: “appaṭiggahitattā”ti iminā ekassa santakaṃ aññena paṭiggahitampi nissaggiyaṃ hotīti
tika-vin08t:655_18: dasseti. Evanti “puna gahessāmī”ti apekkhaṃ akatvā suddhacittena paricattataṃ parāmasati.
tika-vin08t:655_20: adhippāyo. Paribhoge anāpattidassanatthanti ettha pana nissaṭṭhapaṭilābhassa kāyikaparibhogādīsu
tika-vin08t:655_21: yā dukkaṭāpatti vuttā, tāya anāpattidassanatthanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:656_0: 100. Evaṃ catukālikapaccayaṃ dassetvā idāni tesu visesalakkhaṇaṃ dassento “imesu
tika-vin08t:656_1: panā”tiādimāha. Tattha akappiyabhūmiyaṃ sahaseyyāpahonake gehe vuttaṃ saṅghikaṃ vā
tika-vin08t:656_2: puggalikaṃ vā bhikkhussa, bhikkhuniyā vā santakaṃ yāvakālikaṃ yāmakālikañca ekarattampi
tika-vin08t:656_3: ṭhapitaṃ antovutthaṃ nāma hoti, tattha pakkañca antopakkaṃ nāma hoti. Sattāhakālikaṃ
tika-vin08t:656_4: pana yāvajīvikañca vaṭṭati. Paṭiggahetvā ekarattaṃ vītināmitaṃ pana yaṃ kiñci yāvakālikaṃ
tika-vin08t:656_5: vā yāmakālikaṃ vā ajjhoharitukāmatāya gaṇhantassa pariggahaṇe tāva dukkaṭaṃ, ajjhoharato
tika-vin08t:656_6: pana ekamekasmiṃ ajjhohāre sannidhipaccayā pācittiyaṃ hotīti attho. Idāni aññampi
tika-vin08t:656_7: visesalakkhaṇaṃ dassento “yāvakālikaṃ panā”tiādimāha. Tattha sambhinnarasānīti saṃsaṭṭharasāni.
tika-vin08t:656_8: Dīghakālāni vatthūni rassakālena saṃsaṭṭhāni rassakālameva anuvattantīti āha “yāvakālikaṃ
tika-vin08t:656_9: pana…pe… tīṇipi yāmakālikādīnī”ti. Itaresupi eseva nayo. Tasmātiādīsu tadahupurebhattameva
tika-vin08t:656_10: vaṭṭati, na tadahupacchābhattaṃ, na rattiyaṃ, na dutiyadivasādīsūti attho.
tika-vin08t:657_0: Kasmāti ce? Tadahupaṭiggahitena yāvakālikena saṃsaṭṭhattāti. Ettha ca “yāvakālikena
tika-vin08t:657_1: saṃsaṭṭhattā”ti ettakameva avatvā “tadahupaṭiggahitenā”ti visesanassa vuttattā purepaṭiggahitayāvakālikena
tika-vin08t:657_2: saṃsaṭṭhe sati tadahupurebhattampi na vaṭṭati, anajjhoharaṇīyaṃ hotīti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t:657_3: “Sambhinnarasa”nti iminā sacepi saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, asambhinnarasaṃ sesakālikattayaṃ attano
tika-vin08t:657_4: attano kāle vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Yāmakālikenāti ettha “tadahupaṭiggahitenā”ti tatiyantavisesanapadaṃ
tika-vin08t:657_5: ajjhāharitabbaṃ, pubbavākyato vā anuvattetabbaṃ. Tassa phalaṃ vuttanayameva.
tika-vin08t:658_0: Potthakesu pana “yāmakālikena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ pana itaradvayaṃ tadahupaṭiggahita”nti dissati,
tika-vin08t:658_1: taṃ na sundaraṃ. Yattha natthi, tameva sundaraṃ, kasmā? Dutiyantañhi visesanapadaṃ
tika-vin08t:658_2: itaradvayaṃ viseseti. Tato tadahupaṭiggahitameva sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikañca yāmakālikena
tika-vin08t:658_3: saṃsaṭṭhe sati yāva aruṇuggamanā vaṭṭati, na purepaṭiggahitānīti attho bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t:658_4: so na yutto. Kasmā? Sattāhakālikayāvajīvikānaṃ asannidhijanakattā, “dīghakālikāni
tika-vin08t:658_5: rassakālikaṃ anuvattantī”ti iminā lakkhaṇena viruddhattā ca, tasmā tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin08t:658_6: vā hotu purepaṭiggahitaṃ vā, sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikañca tadahupaṭiggahitena yāmakālikena
tika-vin08t:658_7: saṃsaṭṭhattā yāva aruṇuggamanā vaṭṭatīti attho yutto, evañca upari vakkhamānena “sattāhakālikena
tika-vin08t:658_8: pana tadahupaṭiggahitena saddhiṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ vā purepaṭiggahitaṃ
