tika-vin08t:658_9: vā yāvajīvikaṃ sattāhaṃ kappatī”ti vacanena samaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-vin08t:659_0: Apica “yāmakālikena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ pana itaradvayaṃ tadahu yāva aruṇuggamanā vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin08t:659_1: pubbapāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ, taṃ lekhakehi aññesu pāṭhesu “tadahupaṭiggahita”nti vijjamānaṃ
tika-vin08t:659_2: disvā, idha tadahupadato paṭiggahitapadaṃ gaḷitanti maññamānehi pakkhipitvā likhitaṃ
tika-vin08t:659_3: bhaveyya, “tadahū”ti idaṃ pana “yāva aruṇuggamanā”ti padaṃ viseseti, tena yāva tadahuaruṇuggamanā
tika-vin08t:659_4: vaṭṭati, na dutiyāhādiaruṇuggamanāti atthaṃ dasseti. Teneva uparipāṭhepi “sattāhakālikena
tika-vin08t:659_5: pana tadahupaṭiggahitenā”ti rassakālikatthapadena tulyādhikaraṇaṃ visesanapadaṃ tameva
tika-vin08t:659_6: viseseti, na dīghakālikatthaṃ yāvajīvikapadaṃ, tasmā “tadahupaṭiggahitena sattāhakālikena
tika-vin08t:659_7: saṃsaṭṭhaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ vā purepaṭiggahitaṃ vā yāvajīvikaṃ sattāhaṃ kappatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:660_1: vā purepaṭiggahitaṃ vā yāvajīvikaṃ chāhaṃ vaṭṭati, tīhapaṭiggahitena sattāhakālikena
tika-vin08t:660_2: saṃsaṭṭhaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ vā purepaṭiggahitaṃ vā yāvajīvikaṃ pañcāhaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t:660_3: catūhapaṭiggahitena sattāhakālikena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ vā purepaṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin08t:660_4: vā yāvajīvikaṃ caturāhaṃ vaṭṭati, pañcāhapaṭiggahitena sattāhakālikena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin08t:660_5: tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ vā purepaṭiggahitaṃ vā yāvajīvikaṃ tīhaṃ vaṭṭati, chāhapaṭiggahitena
tika-vin08t:660_6: sattāhakālikena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ vā purepaṭiggahitaṃ vā yāvajīvikaṃ
tika-vin08t:660_7: dvīhaṃ vaṭṭati, sattāhapaṭiggahitena sattāhakālikena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin08t:660_8: vā purepaṭiggahitaṃ vā yāvajīvikaṃ tadaheva vaṭṭatī”ti evaṃ sattāhakālikasseva atītadivasaṃ
tika-vin08t:660_9: parihāpetvā sesadivasavasena yojetabbaṃ, na yāvajīvikassa. Na hi yāvajīvikassa hāpetabbo
tika-vin08t:660_10: atītadivaso nāma atthi sati paccaye yāvajīvaṃ paribhuñjitabbato. Tenāha “sattāhakālikampi
tika-vin08t:660_11: attanā saddhiṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ attano sabhāvaññeva upanetī”ti. Kesuci potthakesu
tika-vin08t:660_12: “yāmakālikena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ pana itaradvayaṃ tadahupaṭiggahita”nti likhitaṃ pāṭhaṃ nissāya
tika-vin08t:660_14: pāṭhaṃ paṭikkhipanti. Kesuci “purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ vā”ti likhanti, taṃ sabbaṃ
tika-vin08t:660_15: yathāvuttanayaṃ amanasikarontā vibbhantacittā evaṃ karontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:661_0: Imesu catūsu kālikesu yāvakālikaṃ majjhanhikakālātikkame, yāmakālikaṃ pacchimayāmātikkame,
tika-vin08t:661_1: sattāhakālikaṃ sattāhātikkame paribhuñjantassa āpattīti vuttaṃ. Katarasikkhāpadena
tika-vin08t:661_2: āpatti hotīti pucchāyamāha “kālayāma”iccādi. Tassattho – yāvakālikaṃ kālātikkame
tika-vin08t:661_3: paribhuñjantassa “yo pana bhikkhu vikāle khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā
tika-vin08t:661_4: bhuñjeyya vā, pācittiya”nti iminā vikālebhojanasikkhāpadena āpatti hoti. Yāmakālikaṃ
tika-vin08t:661_5: yāmātikkame paribhuñjantassa “yo pana bhikkhu sannidhikārakaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ
tika-vin08t:661_6: vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, pācittiya”nti iminā sannidhisikkhāpadena āpatti hoti.
tika-vin08t:661_7: Sattāhakālikaṃ sattāhātikkame paribhuñjantassa “yāni kho pana tāni gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t:661_8: paṭisāyanīyāni bhesajjāni, seyyathidaṃ, sappi navanītaṃ telaṃ madhu phāṇitaṃ, tāni
tika-vin08t:661_9: paṭiggahetvā sattāhaparamaṃ sannidhikārakaṃ paribhuñjitabbāni, taṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:662_0: Imāni cattāri kālikāni ekato saṃsaṭṭhāni sambhinnarasāni purimapurimakālikassa kālavasena
tika-vin08t:662_1: paribhuñjitabbānīti vuttaṃ. Asambhinnarasāni ce honti, kathaṃ paribhuñjitabbānīti
tika-vin08t:667_0: 101. Evaṃ catukālikavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni kappiyakuṭivinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “kappiyā
tika-vin08t:667_1: catubhūmiyo”tiādimāha. Tattha kappantīti kappiyā, kappa sāmatthiyeti dhātu. Bhavanti
tika-vin08t:667_2: etāsu antovutthaantopakkānīti bhūmiyo, catasso bhūmiyo catubhūmiyo, catasso kappiyakuṭiyoti
tika-vin08t:667_3: attho. Katamā tāti āha “ussāvanantikā…pe… veditabbā”ti. Kathaṃ viññāyaticcāha “anujānāmi…pe…
tika-vin08t:667_4: vacanato”ti. Idaṃ bhesajjakkhandhakapāḷiṃ sandhāyāha. Tattha uddhaṃ sāvanā ussāvanā,
tika-vin08t:667_5: ussāvanā anto yassā kappiyabhūmiyāti ussāvanantikā. Gāvo nisīdanti etthāti gonisādikā,
tika-vin08t:667_6: go-saddūpapada ni-pubbasada visaraṇagatyāvasānesūti dhātu. Gahapatīhi dinnāti gahapati,
tika-vin08t:667_8: viggaho kātabbo. Tatthāti kappiyakuṭivinicchaye. Taṃ pana avatvāpīti andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:667_9: vuttanayaṃ avatvāpi. Pi-saddena tathāvacanampi anujānāti. Aṭṭhakathāsu vuttanayena
tika-vin08t:667_10: vutteti sesaaṭṭhakathāsu vuttanayena “kappiyakuṭiṃ karomā”ti vā “kappiyakuṭī”ti vā
tika-vin08t:667_12: Cayanti adhiṭṭhānaṃ uccavatthuṃ. Yato paṭṭhāyāti yato iṭṭhakato silato mattikāpiṇḍato
tika-vin08t:667_13: vā paṭṭhāya. Paṭhamiṭṭhakādīnaṃ heṭṭhā na vaṭṭantīti paṭhamiṭṭhakādīnaṃ heṭṭhābhūmiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:667_14: patiṭṭhāpiyamānā iṭṭhakādayo bhūmigatikattā “kappiyakuṭiṃ karomā”ti vatvā patiṭṭhāpetuṃ
tika-vin08t:667_15: na vaṭṭanti. Yadi evaṃ bhūmiyaṃ nikhaṇitvā ṭhapiyamānā thambhā kasmā tathā vatvā
tika-vin08t:668: Saṅghasantakamevāti vāsatthāya kataṃ saṅghikasenāsanaṃ sandhāya vadati. Bhikkhusantakanti vāsatthāya eva kataṃ bhikkhussa puggalikasenāsanaṃ.
tika-vin08t:670_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana evaṃ vuttaṃ – taṃ pana avatvāpīti pi-saddena tathāvacanampi
tika-vin08t:670_2: andhakaṭṭhakathāya saha sabbaṭṭhakathānaṃ samānaṃ. Cayanti adhiṭṭhānaṃ uccavatthuṃ.
tika-vin08t:670_3: Yato paṭṭhāyāti yato iṭṭhakādito paṭṭhāya cayaṃ ādiṃ katvā bhittiṃ uṭṭhāpetukāmāti
tika-vin08t:670_4: attho. “Thambhā pana upari uggacchanti, tasmā vaṭṭantī”ti etena iṭṭhakapāsāṇā heṭṭhā
tika-vin08t:670_5: patiṭṭhāpiyamānāpi yadi cayato, bhūmito vā ekaṅgulamattampi uggatā tiṭṭhanti, vaṭṭantīti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t:671_0: Ārāmoti upacārasīmāparicchinno sakalo vihāro. Senāsanānīti vihārassa anto tiṇakuṭiādikāni
tika-vin08t:671_1: saṅghassa nivāsagehāni. Vihāragonisādikā nāmāti senāsanagonisādikā nāma. Senāsanāni
tika-vin08t:671_3: iminā tato ūnaparikkhitto yebhuyyena aparikkhitto nāma, tasmā aparikkhittasaṅkhameva
tika-vin08t:671_4: gacchatīti dasseti. Etthāti upaḍḍhādiparikkhitte. Kappiyakuṭi laddhuṃ vaṭṭatīti gonisādikāya
tika-vin08t:671_5: abhāvena sesakappiyakuṭīsu tīsu yā kāci kappiyakuṭi kātabbāti attho.
tika-vin08t:672_0: Tesaṃ gehānīti ettha bhikkhūnaṃ vāsatthāya katampi yāva na denti, tāva tesaṃ santakaṃyeva
tika-vin08t:672_1: bhavissatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vihāraṃ ṭhapetvāti upasampannānaṃ vāsatthāya kataṃ gehaṃ
tika-vin08t:672_2: ṭhapetvāti attho. Gehanti nivāsagehaṃ. Tadaññaṃ pana uposathāgārādi sabbaṃ anivāsagehaṃ
tika-vin08t:672_3: catukappiyabhūmivimuttā pañcamī kappiyabhūmi. Saṅghasantakepi hi etādise gehe suṭṭhu
tika-vin08t:672_4: parikkhittārāmaṭṭhepi abbhokāse viya antovutthādidoso natthi. Yena kenaci channe
tika-vin08t:672_5: paricchanne ca sahaseyyappahonake bhikkhussa, saṅghassa vā nivāsagehe antovutthādidoso,
tika-vin08t:672_6: na aññattha. Tenāha “yaṃ panā”tiādi. Tattha “saṅghikaṃ vā puggalikaṃ vā”ti idaṃ kiñcāpi
tika-vin08t:672_7: bhikkhubhikkhunīnaṃ sāmaññato vuttaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pana saṅghikaṃ puggalikañca bhikkhunīnaṃ,
tika-vin08t:672_8: tāsaṃ saṅghikaṃ puggalikañca bhikkhūnaṃ gihisantakaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:673: Mukhasannidhīti antosannihitadoso hi mukhappavesananimittaṃ āpattiṃ karoti, nāññathā, tasmā “mukhasannidhī”ti vuttoti.
tika-vin08t:674_0: Tattha tattha khaṇḍā hontīti upaḍḍhato adhikaṃ khaṇḍā honti. Sabbasmiṃ chadane vinaṭṭheti
tika-vin08t:674_1: tiṇapaṇṇādivassaparittāyake chadane vinaṭṭhe. Gopānasīnaṃ pana upari vallīhi baddhadaṇḍesu
tika-vin08t:674_2: ṭhitesupi jahitavatthukā honti eva. Pakkhapāsakamaṇḍalanti ekasmiṃ passe tiṇṇaṃ gopānasīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:675_1: dinne kappiyaṃ hoti, sāpekkhadānañcettha vaṭṭati, paṭiggahaṇaṃ viya na hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:675_2: Antopakkasāmaṃpakkesu pana “na, bhikkhave, antovutthaṃ antopakkaṃ sāmaṃpakkaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:675_3: yo paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anto ce, bhikkhave, vutthaṃ antopakkaṃ sāmaṃpakkaṃ,
tika-vin08t:675_4: tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti tiṇṇaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ. Anto ce, bhikkhave, vutthaṃ antopakkaṃ
tika-vin08t:675_5: aññehi pakkaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ. Anto ce, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:675_6: vutthaṃ bahipakkaṃ sāmaṃpakkaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ. Bahi
tika-vin08t:675_7: ce, bhikkhave, vutthaṃ antopakkaṃ sāmaṃpakkaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dvinnaṃ
tika-vin08t:675_8: dukkaṭānaṃ. Anto ce, bhikkhave, vutthaṃ bahipakkaṃ aññehi pakkaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya,
tika-vin08t:675_9: āpatti dukkaṭassa. Bahi ce, bhikkhave, vutthaṃ antopakkaṃ aññehi pakkaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya,
tika-vin08t:675_10: āpatti dukkaṭassa. Bahi ce, bhikkhave, vutthaṃ bahipakkaṃ sāmaṃpakkaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya,
tika-vin08t:675_11: āpatti dukkaṭassa. Bahi ce, bhikkhave, vutthaṃ bahipakkaṃ aññehi pakkaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya,
tika-vin08t:675_12: anāpattī”ti vacanato ekaṃ tirāpattikaṃ, tīṇi durāpattikāni, tīṇi ekāpattikāni, ekaṃ
tika-vin08t:675_13: anāpattikanti aṭṭha honti. Tattha antovutthanti akappiyakuṭiyaṃ vutthaṃ. Antopakkepi
tika-vin08t:675_14: eseva nayo. Sāmaṃpakkanti yaṃ kiñci āmisaṃ bhikkhussa pacituṃ na vaṭṭati. Tattha
tika-vin08t:680_0: 104. Evaṃ kappiyabhūmivinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni paṭiggahaṇavinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ
tika-vin08t:680_1: “khādanīyādipaṭiggāho”tiādimāha. Tattha khādiyateti khādanīyaṃ, ṭhapetvā pañca bhojanāni
tika-vin08t:680_2: sabbassa ajjhoharitabbassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Ādisaddena bhojanīyaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Paṭiggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:680_3: sampaṭicchanaṃ paṭiggāho, khādanīyādīnaṃ paṭiggāho khādanīyādipaṭiggāho. Tenāha “ajjhoharitabbassa
tika-vin08t:680_4: yassa kassaci khādanīyassa vā bhojanīyassa vā paṭiggahaṇa”nti. Pañcasu aṅgesu uccāraṇamattanti
tika-vin08t:680_5: ukkhipanamattaṃ, iminā paṭiggahitabbabhārassa pamāṇaṃ dasseti. Teneva tādisena purisena
tika-vin08t:680_6: anukkhipanīyavatthusmiṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ na ruhatīti dīpeti. “Hatthapāso”ti iminā āsannabhāvaṃ.
tika-vin08t:680_7: Teneva ca dūre ṭhatvā abhiharantassa paṭiggahaṇaṃ na ruhatīti dīpeti. Abhihāroti
tika-vin08t:680_8: pariṇāmitabhāvo, tena ca tatraṭṭhakādīsu na ruhatīti dīpeti. “Devo vā”tiādinā dāyakato
tika-vin08t:681_0: Idāni tesu pañcasu aṅgesu hatthapāsassa durājānatāya taṃ dassetumāha “tatthi”ccādi.
tika-vin08t:681_1: Tattha aḍḍhateyyahattho hatthapāso nāmāti yojanā. “Tassa orimantenā”ti iminā ākāse
tika-vin08t:681_2: ujuṃ ṭhatvā parena ukkhittaṃ gaṇhantassāpi āsannaṅgabhūtapādatalato paṭṭhāya hatthapāso
tika-vin08t:681_3: paricchinditabbo, na sīsato paṭṭhāyāti dasseti. Tattha “orimantenā”ti imassa heṭṭhimantenāti attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin08t:682_0: Ettha ca pavāraṇasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sace pana bhikkhu nisinno hoti, āsannassa
tika-vin08t:682_1: pacchimantato paṭṭhāyā”tiādinā paṭiggāhakānaṃ āsannaṅgassa pārimantato paṭṭhāya paricchedassa
tika-vin08t:682_2: dassitattā idhāpi ākāse ṭhitassa paṭiggāhakassa āsannaṅgabhūtapādatalassa pārimantabhūtato
tika-vin08t:682_3: paṇhipariyantassa heṭṭhimatalato paṭṭhāya, dāyakassa pana orimantabhūtato pādaṅgulassa
tika-vin08t:682_4: heṭṭhimapariyantato paṭṭhāya hatthapāso paricchinditabboti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Imināva nayena
tika-vin08t:682_5: bhūmiyaṃ nipajjitvā ussīsake nisinnassa hatthato paṭiggaṇhantassāpi āsannasīsaṅgassa
tika-vin08t:682_6: pārimantabhūtato gīvantato paṭṭhāyeva hatthapāso minitabbo, na pādatalato paṭṭhāya.
tika-vin08t:682_7: Evaṃ nipajjitvā dānepi yathānurūpaṃ veditabbaṃ. “Yaṃ āsannataraṃ aṅga”nti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:682_8: Akallakoti gilāno sahatthā paribhuñjituṃ asakkonto mukhena paṭiggaṇhāti. Vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:682_9: pana “akallakoti gilāno gahetuṃ vā”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ, etena akallakoti gilāno
tika-vin08t:682_10: vā atha vā gahetuṃ akallako asamatthoti attho dassito. Tenāha “sacepi natthukaraṇiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:682_11: dīyamānaṃ nāsāpuṭena akallako vā mukhena paṭiggaṇhātī”ti.
tika-vin08t:684_0: Tañce paṭiggaṇhāti, sabbaṃ paṭiggahitamevāti veṇukoṭiyaṃ bandhitvā ṭhapitattā. Sace
tika-vin08t:684_1: bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitameva ghaṭaṃ dāyakena hatthapāse ṭhatvā “ghaṭaṃ dassāmī”ti dinnaṃ veṇukoṭiyā
tika-vin08t:684_2: gahaṇavasena paṭiggaṇhāti, ubhayakoṭibaddhaṃ sabbampi paṭiggahitameva hoti. Bhikkhussa
tika-vin08t:684_3: hatthe apīḷetvā pakatiyā pīḷiyamānaṃ ucchurasaṃ sandhāya “gaṇhathā”ti vuttattā “abhihāro
tika-vin08t:684_4: na paññāyatī”ti vuttaṃ, hatthapāse ṭhitassa pana bhikkhussa atthāya pīḷiyamānaṃ ucchuto
tika-vin08t:684_5: paggharantaṃ rasaṃ gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati. Doṇikāya sayaṃ paggharantaṃ ucchurasaṃ majjhe
tika-vin08t:684_6: āvaritvā vissajjitampi gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati. Paṭiggahaṇasaññāyāti “mañcādinā paṭiggahessāmī”ti
tika-vin08t:684_7: uppāditasaññāya, iminā “paṭiggaṇhāmī”ti vācāya vattabbakiccaṃ natthīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:685_0: Yattha katthaci aṭṭhakathāsu, padesesu vā. Asaṃhārime phalaketi thāmamajjhimena asaṃhāriye.
tika-vin08t:685_1: “Tintiṇikādipaṇṇesūti vacanato sākhāsu paṭiggahaṇaṃ ruhatīti daṭṭhabba”nti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:685_2: vuttaṃ. Porāṇaṭīkāyampi tatheva vuttaṃ, tadetaṃ vicāretabbaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyañhi “bhūmiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:685_3: atthatesu sukhumesu tintiṇikādipaṇṇesu paṭiggahaṇaṃ na ruhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ tintiṇikādipaṇṇānaṃ
tika-vin08t:685_4: sukhumattā tattha ṭhapitaāmisassa asaṇṭhahanato bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapitasadisattā “na ruhatī”ti
tika-vin08t:685_5: vuttaṃ, tintiṇikādisākhāsu ṭhapitepi evameva siyā, tasmā “sākhāsu paṭiggahaṇaṃ ruhatī”ti
tika-vin08t:685_6: vacanaṃ ayuttaṃ viya dissati. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “na ruhatī”ti kiriyāpadassa “kasmā”ti
tika-vin08t:685_7: hetupariyesane sati na aññaṃ pariyesitabbaṃ, “sukhumesū”ti vuttaṃ visesanapadaṃyeva
tika-vin08t:685_8: hetumantavisesanaṃ bhavati, tasmā tintiṇikapaṇṇādīsu paṭiggahaṇaṃ na ruhati, kasmā?
tika-vin08t:685_9: Tesaṃ sukhumattā. Aññesu pana paduminīpaṇṇādīsu ruhati, kasmā? Tesaṃ oḷārikattāti
tika-vin08t:685_10: hetuphalasambandho icchitabboti dissati, tasmā “tadetaṃ vicāretabba”nti vuttaṃ. Tathā
tika-vin08t:685_11: hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “na hi tāni sandhāretuṃ samatthānīti mahantesu pana paduminīpaṇṇādīsu ruhatī”ti.
tika-vin08t:686_0: 106. Puñchitvā paṭiggahetvāti puñchitepi rajanacuṇṇāsaṅkāya sati paṭiggahaṇatthāya
tika-vin08t:686_1: vuttaṃ, nāsati. Taṃ panāti patitarajaṃ appaṭiggahetvā upari gahitapiṇḍapātaṃ. Anāpattīti
tika-vin08t:686_3: vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana taṃ “aññassa dassāmī”ti cittuppādamattena parasantakaṃ
tika-vin08t:686_4: na hoti, tasmā tassa adatvāpi paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. “Anupasampannassa
tika-vin08t:686_5: dassāmī”tiādipi vinayadukkaṭassa parihārāya vuttaṃ, tathā akatvā gahitepi paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin08t:686_6: paribhuñjato anāpattiyeva. Bhikkhussa detīti aññassa bhikkhussa deti. Kañjikanti
tika-vin08t:686_7: khīrarasādiṃ yaṃ kiñci dravaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Hatthato mocetvā puna gaṇhāti, uggahitakaṃ
tika-vin08t:686_8: hotīti āha “hatthato amocentenevā”ti. Āluḷentānanti āloḷentānaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho.
tika-vin08t:686_9: Āharitvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapitattā abhihāro natthīti āha “patto paṭiggahetabbo”ti.
tika-vin08t:687_0: 107. Paṭhamataraṃ uḷuṅkato thevā patte patantīti ettha “yathā paṭhamataraṃ patitatheve
tika-vin08t:687_1: doso natthi, tathā ākiritvā apanentānaṃ pacchā patitathevepi abhihaṭattā nevatthi
tika-vin08t:687_2: doso”ti vadanti. Carukenāti khuddakabhājanena. “Abhihaṭattāti dīyamānakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin08t:687_3: vuttaṃ. Datvā apanayanakāle pana chārikā vā bindūni vā patanti, puna paṭiggahetabbaṃ
tika-vin08t:687_4: abhihārassa vigatattā”ti vadanti, taṃ yathā na patati, tathā apanessāmīti paṭiharante
tika-vin08t:687_5: yujjati, pakatisaññāya apanente abhihāro na chijjati, supatitaṃ. Paṭiggahitameva
tika-vin08t:687_6: hi taṃ hoti. Mukhavaṭṭiyāpi gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti abhihariyamānassa pattassa mukhavaṭṭiyā
tika-vin08t:687_7: uparibhāge hatthaṃ pasāretvā phusituṃ vaṭṭati. Pādena pelletvāti pādena “paṭiggahessāmī”ti
tika-vin08t:687_8: saññāya akkamitvā. Kecīti abhayagirivāsino. Vacanamattamevāti paṭibaddhaṃ paṭibaddhapaṭibaddhanti
tika-vin08t:687_9: saddamattameva nānaṃ, kāyapaṭibaddhameva hoti, tasmā tesaṃ vacanaṃ na gahetabbanti
tika-vin08t:687_10: adhippāyo. Esa nayoti “paṭibaddhapaṭibaddhampi kāyapaṭibaddhamevā”ti ayaṃ nayo. Tathā
tika-vin08t:687_11: ca tattha kāyapaṭibaddhe tappaṭibaddhe ca thullaccayameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:688_0: Tena āharāpetunti yassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gataṃ, taṃ “idha naṃ ānehī”ti āṇāpetvā
tika-vin08t:688_1: tena āharāpetuṃ itarassa vaṭṭatīti attho. Tasmāti yasmā mūlaṭṭhasseva paribhogo anuññāto,
tika-vin08t:688_2: tasmā. Taṃ divasaṃ hatthena gahetvā dutiyadivase paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa uggahitakapaṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin08t:688_4: Appaṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa adinnamukhadvārāpatti hotīti āha “paṭiggahetvā pana
tika-vin08t:688_5: paribhuñjitabba”nti. “Na tato paranti tadaheva sāmaṃ appaṭiggahitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:688_6: tadaheva paṭiggahitaṃ pana punadivasādīsu appaṭiggahetvāpi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t:689_0: 108. Khīyantīti khayaṃ gacchanti, tesaṃ cuṇṇehi thullaccayaappaṭiggahaṇāpattiyo na
tika-vin08t:689_1: hontīti adhippāyo. Satthakenāti paṭiggahitasatthakena. Navasamuṭṭhitanti eteneva
tika-vin08t:689_2: ucchuādīsu abhinavalaggattā abbohārikaṃ na hotīti dasseti. Eseva nayoti sannidhidosādiṃ
tika-vin08t:689_3: sandhāya vadati. Tenāha “na hī”tiādi. Kasmā panettha uggahitapaccayā, sannidhipaccayā
tika-vin08t:689_4: vā doso na siyāti āha “na hi taṃ paribhogatthāya pariharantī”ti. Iminā ca bāhiraparibhogatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:689_5: sāmaṃ gahetvā vā anupasampannena dinnaṃ vā pariharituṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti, tasmā pattasammakkhanādiatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:689_6: sāmaṃ gahetvā pariharitatelādiṃ sace paribhuñjitukāmo hoti, paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa
tika-vin08t:689_7: anāpatti. Abbhantaraparibhogatthaṃ pana sāmaṃ gahitaṃ paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa
tika-vin08t:689_9: hoti. Abbhantaraparibhogatthameva anupasampannena dinnaṃ gahetvā pariharantassa siṅgīloṇakappo
tika-vin08t:689_10: viya sannidhipaccayā āpatti hoti. Keci pana “thāmamajjhimassa purisassa uccāraṇamattaṃ
tika-vin08t:689_12: sace anupasampannehi dinnaṃ gaṇhāti, paṭiggahitamevā”ti vadanti. Evaṃ sati idha bāhiraparibhogatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:689_13: anupasampannena dinnaṃ gahetvā pariharantassa sannidhipaccayā āpatti vattabbā siyā.
tika-vin08t:689_14: “Na hi taṃ paribhogatthāya pariharantī”ti ca na vattabbaṃ, tasmā bāhiraparibhogatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:689_15: gahitaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ nāma na hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:690_0: Yadi evaṃ pañcasu paṭiggahaṇaṅgesu “paribhogatthāyā”ti visesanaṃ vattabbanti? Na
tika-vin08t:690_1: vattabbaṃ. Paṭiggahaṇañhi paribhogatthameva hotīti “paribhogatthāyā”ti visuṃ avatvā
tika-vin08t:690_2: “tañce bhikkhu kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā paṭiggaṇhātī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ. Apare
tika-vin08t:690_3: pana “satipi paṭiggahaṇe ‘na hi taṃ paribhogatthāya pariharantī’ti idha aparibhogatthāya
tika-vin08t:690_4: pariharaṇe anāpatti vuttā”ti vadanti. Tena ca paṭiggahaṇaṅgesu pañcasu samiddhesu
tika-vin08t:690_5: ajjhoharitukāmatāya gahitameva paṭiggahitaṃ nāma hoti ajjhoharitabbesuyeva paṭiggahaṇassa
tika-vin08t:690_6: anuññātattāti dasseti. Tathā bāhiraparibhogatthāya gahetvā ṭhapitatelādiṃ ajjhoharitukāmatāya
tika-vin08t:690_7: sati paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Udukkhalamusalādīni khīyantīti
tika-vin08t:690_8: ettha udukkhalamusalānaṃ khayena pisitakoṭṭitabhesajjesu sace āgantukavaṇṇo paññāyati,
tika-vin08t:690_9: na vaṭṭati. Suddhaṃ udakaṃ hotīti rukkhasākhādīhi gaḷitvā patanaudakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:691_0: 109. Patto vāssa paṭiggahetabboti etthāpi pattagataṃ chupitvā dentassa hatthe laggena
tika-vin08t:691_2: veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ sāmaṇerassa patte patati…pe… paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahatīti ettha punappunaṃ
tika-vin08t:691_3: gaṇhantassa attano patte pakkhittameva attano santakanti sanniṭṭhānakaraṇato hatthagataṃ
tika-vin08t:691_4: paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahati. Paricchinditvā dinnaṃ pana gaṇhantassa gahaṇasamayeyeva
tika-vin08t:691_5: attano santakanti sanniṭṭhānassa katattā hatthagataṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati. Kesañci
tika-vin08t:691_6: atthāya bhattaṃ pakkhipatīti ettha anupasampannassa atthāya pakkhipantepi āgantvā
tika-vin08t:691_7: gaṇhissatīti sayameva pakkhipitvā ṭhapanato paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahati. Anupasampannassa
tika-vin08t:691_8: hatthe pakkhittaṃ pana anupasampanneneva ṭhapitaṃ nāma hotīti paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati
tika-vin08t:691_9: pariccattabhāvato. Tena vuttaṃ “sāmaṇera…pe… pariccattattā”ti. Kesañcītiādīsu anupasampannānaṃ
tika-vin08t:691_10: atthāya katthaci ṭhapiyamānampi hatthato muttamatte eva paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahati,
tika-vin08t:691_11: atha kho bhājane patitameva paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati. Bhājanañca bhikkhunā punadivasatthāya
tika-vin08t:691_12: apekkhitamevāti taggatampi āmisaṃ duddhotapattagataṃ viya paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahatīti
tika-vin08t:691_13: saṅkāya “sāmaṇerassa hatthe pakkhipitabba”nti vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Īdisesu hi yutti
tika-vin08t:692_0: 110. Pattagatā yāgūti iminā pattamukhavaṭṭiyā phuṭṭhepi kuṭe yāgu paṭiggahitā, uggahitā
tika-vin08t:692_1: vā na hoti bhikkhuno anicchāya phuṭṭhattāti dasseti. Āropetīti hatthaṃ phusāpeti.
tika-vin08t:692_2: Paṭiggahaṇūpagaṃ bhāraṃ nāma thāmamajjhimassa purisassa ukkhepārahaṃ. Kiñcāpi avissajjetvāva
tika-vin08t:692_3: aññena hatthena pidahantassa doso natthi, tathāpi na pidahitabbanti aṭṭhakathāpamāṇeneva
tika-vin08t:692_4: gahetabbaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “na pidahitabbanti hatthato muttaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:692_5: hatthagataṃ pana itarena hatthena pidahato, hatthato muttampi vā aphusitvā upari
tika-vin08t:693: 111. Paṭiggaṇhātīti chāyatthāya upari dhāriyamānā mahāsākhā yena kenaci chijjeyya, tattha laggarajaṃ mukhe pāteyya vāti kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā paṭiggaṇhāti.
tika-vin08t:694_0: Macchikavāraṇatthanti ettha “sacepi sākhāya laggarajaṃ patte patati, sukhena paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin08t:694_1: sakkāti sākhāya paṭiggahitattā abbhantaraparibhogatthamevidha paṭiggahaṇanti mūlapaṭiggahaṇameva
tika-vin08t:694_2: vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Apare pana “macchikavāraṇatthanti vacanamattaṃ gahetvā bāhiraparibhogatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:694_3: gahita”nti vadanti. Kuṇḍaketi mahāghaṭe. Tasmimpīti cāṭighaṭepi. Anupasampannaṃ gāhāpetvāti
tika-vin08t:695_0: Therassa pattaṃ dutiyattherassāti “therassa pattaṃ mayhaṃ dethā”ti tena attano pariccajāpetvā
tika-vin08t:695_1: dutiyattherassa deti. Tuyhaṃ yāguṃ mayhaṃ dehīti ettha evaṃ vatvā sāmaṇerassa pattaṃ
tika-vin08t:695_2: gahetvā attanopi pattaṃ tassa deti. Ettha panāti “paṇḍito sāmaṇero”tiādipattaparivattanakathāyaṃ.
tika-vin08t:695_3: Kāraṇaṃ upaparikkhitabbanti yathā mātuādīnaṃ telādīni haranto tathārūpe kicce anupasampannena
tika-vin08t:695_4: aparivattetvāva paribhuñjituṃ labhati, evamidha pattaparivattanaṃ akatvā paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin08t:695_5: kasmā na labhatīti kāraṇaṃ vīmaṃsitabbanti attho. Ettha pana “sāmaṇerehi gahitataṇḍulesu
tika-vin08t:695_6: parikkhīṇesu avassaṃ amhākaṃ sāmaṇerā saṅgahaṃ karontīti cittuppatti sambhavati,
tika-vin08t:695_7: tasmā taṃ parivattetvāva paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Mātāpitūnaṃ atthāya pana chāyatthāya vā
tika-vin08t:695_8: gahaṇe paribhogāsā natthi, tasmā taṃ vaṭṭatī”ti kāraṇaṃ vadanti. Teneva ācariyabuddhadattattherenapi vuttaṃ –
tika-vin08t:700_0: Idamevettha yuttataraṃ avassaṃ tathāvidhavitakkuppattiyā sambhavato. Na hi sakkā
tika-vin08t:700_1: ettha vitakkaṃ sodhetunti. Mātādīnaṃ atthāya haraṇe pana nāvassaṃ tathāvidhavitakkuppattīti
tika-vin08t:700_2: sakkā vitakkaṃ sodhetuṃ. Yattha hi vitakkaṃ sodhetuṃ sakkā, tattha nevatthi doso.
tika-vin08t:700_3: Teneva vakkhati “sace pana sakkoti vitakkaṃ sodhetuṃ, tato laddhaṃ khāditumpi vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin08t:700_4: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “ettha panāti pattaparivattane. Kāraṇanti ettha yathā sāmaṇerā
tika-vin08t:700_5: ito amhākampi dentīti vitakko uppajjati, na tathā aññatthāti kāraṇaṃ vadanti, tañca
tika-vin08t:700_6: yuttaṃ. Yassa pana tādiso vitakko natthi, tena aparivattetvāpi bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:701_0: 112. Niccāletunti cāletvā pāsāṇasakkharādiapanayanaṃ kātuṃ. Uddhanaṃ āropetabbanti
tika-vin08t:701_1: anaggikaṃ uddhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Uddhane paccamānassa āluḷane upari apakkataṇḍulā
tika-vin08t:702_0: 113. Ādhārake patto ṭhapitoti appaṭiggahitāmiso patto puna paṭiggahaṇatthāya ṭhapito.
tika-vin08t:702_1: Cāletīti vinā kāraṇaṃ cāleti, satipi kāraṇe bhikkhūnaṃ paribhogārahaṃ cāletuṃ na
tika-vin08t:702_2: vaṭṭati. Kiñcāpi “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, amanussikābādhe āmakamaṃsaṃ āmakalohita”nti
tika-vin08t:702_3: tādise ābādhe attano atthāya āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇaṃ anuññātaṃ, “āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇā
tika-vin08t:702_4: paṭivirato hotī”ti ca sāmaññato paṭikkhittaṃ, tathāpi attano, aññassa vā bhikkhuno
tika-vin08t:702_5: atthāya aggahitattā “sīhavighāsādiṃ…pe… vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Sakkoti vitakkaṃ sodhetunti
tika-vin08t:702_6: “mayhampi detī”ti vitakkassa anuppannabhāvaṃ sallakkhetuṃ sakkoti, “sāmaṇerassa dassāmī”ti
tika-vin08t:702_7: suddhacittena mayā gahitanti vā sallakkhetuṃ sakkoti. Sace pana mūlepi paṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin08t:702_8: hotīti ettha “gahetvā gate mayhampi dadeyyunti saññāya sace paṭiggahitaṃ hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t:703_0: 114. Koṭṭhāse karotīti “bhikkhū sāmaṇerā ca attano attano abhirucitaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ gaṇhantū”ti
tika-vin08t:703_1: sabbesaṃ samake koṭṭhāse karoti. Gahitāvasesanti sāmaṇerehi gahitakoṭṭhāsato avasesaṃ.
tika-vin08t:703_2: Gaṇhitvāti “mayhaṃ idaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti gahetvā. Idha gahitāvasesaṃ nāma tena gaṇhitvā puna ṭhapitaṃ.
tika-vin08t:704_0: Paṭiggahetvāti tadahu paṭiggahetvā. Teneva “yāvakālikena yāvajīvikasaṃsagge doso
tika-vin08t:704_1: natthī”ti vuttaṃ. Sace pana purimadivase paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitā hoti, sāmisena mukhena
tika-vin08t:704_2: tassā vaṭṭiyā dhūmaṃ pivituṃ na vaṭṭati. Samuddodakenāti appaṭiggahitasamuddodakena.
tika-vin08t:705_0: Himakarakā nāma kadāci vassodakena saha patanakā pāsāṇalekhā viya ghanībhūtā udakavisesā,
tika-vin08t:705_1: tesu paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi. Tenāha “udakagatikā evā”ti. Yasmā katakaṭṭhi udakaṃ
tika-vin08t:705_2: pasādetvā visuṃ tiṭṭhati, tasmā “abbohārika”nti vuttaṃ. Iminā appaṭiggahitāpattīhi
tika-vin08t:705_3: abbohārikaṃ, vikālabhojanāpattīhipi abbohārikanti dasseti. Laggatīti sukkhe mukhe
tika-vin08t:705_4: ca hatthe ca mattikāvaṇṇaṃ dassentaṃ laggati. Bahalanti hatthamukhesu alagganakampi paṭiggahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:706_0: Vāsamattanti reṇukhīrābhāvaṃ dasseti. Pānīyaṃ gahetvāti attanoyeva atthāya gahetvā.
tika-vin08t:706_1: Sace pana pītāvasesakaṃ tattheva ākirissāmīti gaṇhāti, puna paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi.
tika-vin08t:706_2: Ākirati, paṭiggahetabbanti puppharasassa paññāyanato vuttaṃ. Vikkhambhetvāti viyūhitvā, apanetvāti attho.
tika-vin08t:707_1: attano paresañca sarīrasannissitaṃ sabbaṃ vaṭṭati, akappiyamaṃsānulomatāya thullaccayādiṃ
tika-vin08t:707_2: na janetīti adhippāyo. Patatīti attano sarīrato chijjitvā patati. “Rukkhato chinditvā”ti
tika-vin08t:707_3: vuttattā mattikatthāya pathaviṃ khaṇituṃ, aññampi yaṃ kiñci mūlapaṇṇādivisabhesajjaṃ
tika-vin08t:707_4: chinditvā chārikaṃ akatvāpi appaṭiggahitampi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:712_0: 116. Evaṃ paṭiggahaṇavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni pavāraṇāvinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “paṭikkhepapavāraṇā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t:712_1: Tattha paṭikkhipanaṃ paṭikkhepo, asampaṭicchananti attho. Pavāriyate pavāraṇā, paṭisedhanantyattho.
tika-vin08t:712_2: Paṭikkhepasaṅkhātā pavāraṇā paṭikkhepapavāraṇā. Atha vā paṭikkhepavasena pavāraṇā
tika-vin08t:712_3: paṭikkhepapavāraṇā. Pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhuñjantassa aññasmiṃ bhojane
tika-vin08t:713_0: 117. Yaṃ asnātīti yaṃ bhuñjati. Ambilapāyāsādīsūti ādi-saddena khīrapāyāsādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin08t:713_1: Tattha ambilapāyāsaggahaṇena takkādiambilasaṃyuttā ghanayāgu vuttā. Khīrapāyāsaggahaṇena
tika-vin08t:713_2: khīrasaṃyuttā yāgu saṅgayhati. Pavāraṇaṃ janetīti anatirittabhojanāpattinibandhanaṃ
tika-vin08t:713_3: paṭikkhepaṃ sādheti. Katopi paṭikkhepo anatirittabhojanāpattinibandhano na hoti,
tika-vin08t:714_1: hotīti pavāraṇaṃ janetiyevāti vutta”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Taṃ parato tattheva
tika-vin08t:714_2: “bhattamissakaṃ yāguṃ āharitvā”ti ettha vuttakāraṇena na sameti. Vuttañhi tattha
tika-vin08t:714_3: – heṭṭhā ayāguke nimantane udakakañjikakhīrādīhi saddhiṃ madditaṃ bhattameva sandhāya
tika-vin08t:714_4: “yāguṃ gaṇhathā”ti vuttattā pavāraṇā hoti. “Bhattamissakaṃ yāguṃ āharitvā”ti ettha
tika-vin08t:714_5: pana visuṃ yāguyā vijjamānattā pavāraṇā na hotīti. Tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva khīrādīhi
tika-vin08t:714_6: saddhiṃ madditaṃ bhattameva sandhāya “yāguṃ gaṇhathā”ti vuttattā yāguyāva tattha
tika-vin08t:714_7: abhāvato pavāraṇā hotīti evamettha kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ. Evañhi sati parato “yenāpucchito,
tika-vin08t:714_8: tassa atthitāyā”ti aṭṭhakathāya vuttakāraṇenapi saṃsandati, aññathā gaṇṭhipadesuyeva
tika-vin08t:714_9: pubbāparavirodho āpajjati, aṭṭhakathāya ca na sametīti. Sace…pe… paññāyatīti iminā
tika-vin08t:714_10: vuttappamāṇassa macchamaṃsakhaṇḍassa nahāruno vā sabbhāvamattaṃ dasseti. Tāhīti puthukāhi.
tika-vin08t:715_0: Sālivīhiyavehi katasattūti yebhuyyanayena vuttaṃ, satta dhaññāni pana bhajjitvā katopi
tika-vin08t:715_2: sattuyo piṇḍetvā kato apakko sattuguḷo. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “sattumodakoti sattuṃ
tika-vin08t:715_3: temetvā kato apakko, sattuṃ pana pisitvā piṭṭhaṃ katvā temetvā pūvaṃ katvā pacanti,
tika-vin08t:716_1: sāsapamattampi…pe… na pavāretī”ti vuttaṃ. “Akappiyamaṃsaṃ paṭikkhipati, na pavāretī”ti
tika-vin08t:716_2: vacanato sace saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ attano apāpuṇantaṃ jānitvā vā ajānitvā vā paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin08t:716_3: na pavāreti paṭikkhipitabbasseva paṭikkhittattā, alajjisantakaṃ paṭikkhipantopi na
tika-vin08t:716_4: pavāreti. Avatthutāyāti anatirittāpattisādhikāya pavāraṇāya avatthubhāvato. Etena
tika-vin08t:716_5: paṭikkhipitabbasseva paṭikkhittabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Yañhi paṭikkhipitabbaṃ hoti, tassa
tika-vin08t:716_6: paṭikkhepo āpattiyā aṅgaṃ na hotīti taṃ pavāraṇāya avatthūti vuccati.
tika-vin08t:717: 118. Āsannataraṃ aṅganti hatthapāsato bahi ṭhatvā onamitvā dentassa sīsaṃ āsannataraṃ hoti, tassa orimantena paricchinditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:718_0: Upanāmetīti iminā kāyābhihāraṃ dasseti. Apanāmetvāti abhimukhaṃ haritvā. Idaṃ bhattaṃ
tika-vin08t:718_1: gaṇhāti vadatīti kiñci apanāmetvā vadati. Kevalaṃ vācābhihārassa anadhippetattā gaṇhathāti
tika-vin08t:718_2: gahetuṃ āraddhaṃ. Hatthapāsato bahi ṭhitassa satipi dātukāmatābhihāre paṭikkhipantassa
tika-vin08t:718_3: dūrabhāveneva pavāraṇāya abhāvato therassapi dūrabhāvamattaṃ gahetvā pavāraṇāya abhāvaṃ
tika-vin08t:718_4: dassento “therassa dūrabhāvato”tiādimāha, na pana therassa abhihārasambhavato. Sacepi
tika-vin08t:718_5: gahetvā gato hatthapāse ṭhito hoti, kiñci pana avatvā ādhāraṭṭhāne ṭhitattā abhihāro
tika-vin08t:718_6: nāma na hotīti “dūtassa ca anabhiharaṇato”ti vuttaṃ. “Gahetvā āgatena ‘bhattaṃ gaṇhathā’ti
tika-vin08t:718_7: vutte abhihāro nāma hotīti ‘sace pana gahetvā āgato bhikkhu…pe… pavāraṇā hotī’ti
tika-vin08t:718_8: vutta”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Keci pana “pattaṃ kiñcipi upanāmetvā ‘imaṃ
tika-vin08t:718_9: bhattaṃ gaṇhathā’ti vuttanti gahetabba”nti vadanti, taṃ yuttaṃ viya dissati vācābhihārassa
tika-vin08t:719_0: Parivesanāyāti bhattagge. Abhihaṭāva hotīti parivesakeneva abhihaṭā hoti. Tato dātukāmatāya
tika-vin08t:719_1: gaṇhantaṃ paṭikkhipantassa pavāraṇā hotīti ettha aggaṇhantampi paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā
tika-vin08t:719_2: hotiyeva. Kasmā? Dātukāmatāya abhihaṭattā, “tasmā sā abhihaṭāva hotī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:719_3: Teneva tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu “dātukāmābhihāre sati kevalaṃ ‘dassāmī’ti gahaṇameva abhihāro
tika-vin08t:719_4: na hoti, ‘dassāmī’ti gaṇhantepi agaṇhantepi dātukāmatābhihārova abhihāro hoti, tasmā
tika-vin08t:719_5: gahaṇasamaye vā aggahaṇasamaye vā taṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Idāni
tika-vin08t:719_6: tassa asati dātukāmatābhihāre gahaṇasamayepi paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā na hotīti dassetuṃ
tika-vin08t:719_7: “sace panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kaṭacchunā anukkhittampi pubbe eva abhihaṭattā pavāraṇā
tika-vin08t:719_8: hotīti “abhihaṭāva hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Uddhaṭamatteti bhājanato viyojitamatte. Dvinnaṃ
tika-vin08t:719_9: samabhārepīti parivesakassa ca aññassa ca bhattapacchibhāraggahaṇe sambhūtepīti attho.
tika-vin08t:720_0: 119. Rasaṃ gaṇhathāti ettha kevalaṃ maṃsarasassa apavāraṇājanakassa nāmena vuttattā
tika-vin08t:720_1: paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā na hoti. Maccharasantiādīsu maccho ca rasañcāti atthasambhavato,
tika-vin08t:720_2: vatthunopi tādisattā pavāraṇā hoti. “Idaṃ gaṇhathā”tipi avatvā tuṇhībhūtena abhihaṭaṃ
tika-vin08t:721_0: Karambakoti missakādhivacanametaṃ. Yañhi bahūhi missetvā karonti, so “karambako”ti
tika-vin08t:721_1: vuccati, so sacepi maṃsena missetvā kato hoti, “karambakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti apavāraṇārahassa
tika-vin08t:721_2: nāmena vuttattā paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā na hoti. “Maṃsakarambakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vutte
tika-vin08t:721_3: pana “maṃsamissakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vuttaṃ hoti, tasmā pavāraṇāva hoti.
tika-vin08t:722_1: acittakattā imassa sikkhāpadassa pavāraṇā hotī”ti vadanti. “Heṭṭhā ayāguke nimantane
tika-vin08t:722_2: udakakañjikakhīrādīhi saddhiṃ madditaṃ bhattameva sandhāya ‘yāguṃ gaṇhathā’ti vuttattā
tika-vin08t:722_3: pavāraṇā hoti, ‘bhattamissakaṃ yāguṃ āharitvā’ti ettha pana visuṃ yāguyā vijjamānattā
tika-vin08t:722_4: pavāraṇā na hotī”ti vadanti. Ayamettha adhippāyoti “yenāpucchito”tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:722_5: sandhāya vadati. Kāraṇaṃ panettha duddasanti ettha eke tāva vadanti “yasmā yāgumissakaṃ
tika-vin08t:722_6: nāma bhattameva na hoti, khīrādikampi hotiyeva, tasmā karambake viya pavāraṇāya na
tika-vin08t:722_7: bhavitabbaṃ, evañca sati ‘yāgu bahutarā vā hoti samasamā vā, na pavāreti, yāgu mandā,
tika-vin08t:722_8: bhattaṃ bahutaraṃ, pavāretī’ti ettha kāraṇaṃ duddasa”nti. Keci pana vadanti “yāgumissakaṃ
tika-vin08t:722_9: nāma bhattaṃ, tasmā taṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇāya eva bhavitabbaṃ, evañca sati ‘idha
tika-vin08t:722_10: pavāraṇā hoti, na hotī’ti ettha kāraṇaṃ duddasa”nti.
tika-vin08t:723_0: Yathā cettha kāraṇaṃ duddasaṃ, evaṃ parato “missakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti etthāpi kāraṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:723_1: duddasamevāti veditabbaṃ. Na hi pavāraṇappahonakassa appabahubhāvo pavāraṇāya bhāvābhāvanimittaṃ,
tika-vin08t:723_2: kiñcarahi pavāraṇājanakassa nāma gahaṇamevettha pamāṇaṃ, tasmā “idañca karambakena
tika-vin08t:723_3: na samānetabba”ntiādinā yampi kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, tampi pubbe vuttena saṃsandiyamānaṃ
tika-vin08t:723_4: na sameti. Yadi hi missakanti bhattamissakeyeva ruḷhaṃ siyā, evaṃ sati yathā “bhattamissakaṃ
tika-vin08t:723_5: gaṇhathā”ti vutte bhattaṃ bahutaraṃ vā samaṃ vā appataraṃ vā hoti, pavāretiyeva,
tika-vin08t:723_6: evaṃ “missakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vuttepi appatarepi bhatte pavāraṇāya bhavitabbaṃ “missaka”nti
tika-vin08t:723_7: bhattamissakeyeva ruḷhattā. Tathā hi “missakanti bhattamissakeyeva ruḷhavohārattā
tika-vin08t:723_8: idaṃ pana bhattamissakamevāti vutta”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Atha missakanti
tika-vin08t:723_9: bhattamissake ruḷhaṃ na hoti, missakabhattaṃ pana sandhāya “missakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin08t:723_10: vuttanti. Evampi yathā ayāguke nimantane khīrādīhi sammadditaṃ bhattameva sandhāya
tika-vin08t:723_11: “yāguṃ gaṇhathā”ti vutte pavāraṇā hoti, evamidhāpi missakabhattameva sandhāya “missakaṃ
tika-vin08t:723_12: gaṇhathā”ti vutte bhattaṃ appaṃ vā hotu, bahu vā, pavāraṇā eva siyā, tasmā missakanti
tika-vin08t:723_13: bhattamissake ruḷhaṃ vā hotu, missakaṃ sandhāya bhāsitaṃ vā, ubhayathāpi pubbenāparaṃ
tika-vin08t:723_14: na sametīti kimettha kāraṇacintāya. Īdisesu pana ṭhānesu aṭṭhakathāpamāṇeneva gantabbanti
tika-vin08t:724_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “uddissakatanti maññamānoti ettha vatthuno kappiyattā ‘pavāritova
tika-vin08t:724_1: hotī’ti vuttaṃ. Tañce uddissakatameva hoti, paṭikkhepo natthi. Ayametthādhippāyoti
tika-vin08t:724_2: ‘yenāpucchito’tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ sandhāya vadati. Kāraṇaṃ panettha duddasanti
tika-vin08t:724_3: bhattassa bahutarabhāve pavāraṇāya sambhavakāraṇaṃ duddasaṃ, aññathā karambakepi
tika-vin08t:724_4: macchādibahubhāve pavāraṇā bhaveyyāti adhippāyo. Yathā cettha kāraṇaṃ duddasaṃ, evaṃ
tika-vin08t:724_5: parato ‘missakaṃ gaṇhathā’ti etthāpi kāraṇaṃ duddasamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yañca ‘idaṃ
tika-vin08t:724_6: pana bhattamissakamevā’tiādi kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, tampi ‘appataraṃ na pavāretī’ti vacanena
tika-vin08t:725_0: “Visuṃ katvā detīti bhattassa upari ṭhitaṃ rasādiṃ visuṃ gahetvā detī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin08t:725_1: vuttaṃ. Kehici pana “yathā bhattasitthaṃ na patati, tathā gāḷhaṃ hatthena pīḷetvā
tika-vin08t:725_2: parissāvetvā detī”ti vuttaṃ. Tatthāpi kāraṇaṃ na dissati. Yathā hi bhattamissakaṃ
tika-vin08t:725_3: yāguṃ āharitvā “yāguṃ gaṇhathā”ti vatvā yāgumissakaṃ bhattampi dentaṃ paṭikkhipato
tika-vin08t:725_4: pavāraṇā na hoti, evamidhāpi bahukhīrarasādīsu bhattesu “khīraṃ gaṇhathā”tiādīni
tika-vin08t:725_5: vatvā dinnāni khīrādīni vā detu khīrādimissakaṃ bhattaṃ vā, ubhayathāpi pavāraṇāya
tika-vin08t:725_6: na bhavitabbaṃ, tasmā “visuṃ katvā detī”ti tenākārena dentaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na
tika-vin08t:725_7: pana bhattamissakaṃ katvā dīyamānaṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hotīti dassanatthanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:725_8: Yadi pana bhattamissakaṃ katvā dīyamāne pavāraṇā hotīti adhippāyena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:725_9: “visuṃ katvā detī”ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ sati aṭṭhakathāyevettha pamāṇanti gahetabbaṃ, na
tika-vin08t:725_10: pana kāraṇantaraṃ gavesitabbaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “visuṃ katvā detīti ‘rasaṃ
tika-vin08t:725_11: gaṇhathā’tiādinā vācāya visuṃ katvā detīti attho gahetabbo, na pana kāyena rasādiṃ
tika-vin08t:725_12: viyojetvāti tathā aviyojitepi paṭikkhipato pavāraṇāya asambhavato apavāraṇāpahonakassa
tika-vin08t:725_13: nāmena vuttattā bhattamissakayāguṃ āharitvā ‘yāguṃ gaṇhathā’ti vuttaṭṭhānādīsu viya,
tika-vin08t:725_14: aññathā ettha yathā pubbāparaṃ na virujjhati, tathā adhippāyo gahetabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:726_0: Nāvā vā setu vātiādimhi nāvādiabhiruhanādikkhaṇe kiñci ṭhatvāpi abhiruhanādikātabbattepi
tika-vin08t:726_1: gamanatapparatāya ṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti, janasammaddena pana anokāsādibhāvena ṭhātuṃ
tika-vin08t:726_2: na vaṭṭati. Acāletvāti vuttaṭṭhānato aññasmiṃ pīṭhappadese vā uddhaṃ vā apelletvā,
tika-vin08t:726_3: tasmiṃ eva pana ṭhāne parivattetuṃ labhati. Tenāha “yena passenā”tiādi. Sace ukkuṭikaṃ
tika-vin08t:726_4: nisinno pāde amuñcitvāpi bhūmiyaṃ nisīdati, iriyāpathaṃ vikopento nāma hotīti ukkuṭikāsanaṃ
tika-vin08t:726_5: avikopetvā sukhena nisīdituṃ “tassa pana heṭṭhā…pe… nisīdanakaṃ dātabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:726_6: “Āsanaṃ acāletvāti pīṭhe phuṭṭhokāsato ānisadamaṃsaṃ amocetvā anuṭṭhahitvāti vuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:726_7: hoti. Adinnādāne viya ṭhānācāvanaṃ na gahetabba”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:727_0: 121. Akappiyakatanti ettha akappiyakatasseva anatirittabhāvato kappiyaṃ akārāpetvā
tika-vin08t:727_1: tasmiṃ patte pakkhittaṃ mūlaphalādiyeva atirittaṃ na hoti, akappiyabhojanaṃ vā kuladūsanādinā
tika-vin08t:727_2: uppannaṃ. Sesaṃ pana pattapariyāpannaṃ atirittameva hoti, paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t:727_3: taṃ pana mūlaphalādiṃ paribhuñjitukāmena tato nīharitvā kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā aññasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:728_0: 122. So puna kātuṃ na labhatīti tasmiṃyeva bhājane kariyamānaṃ paṭhamaṃ katena saddhiṃ
tika-vin08t:728_1: kataṃ hotīti puna soyeva kātuṃ na labhati, añño labhati. Aññasmiṃ pana bhājane tena
tika-vin08t:728_2: vā aññena vā kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tenāha “yena akataṃ, tena kātabbaṃ, yañca akataṃ, taṃ
tika-vin08t:728_3: kātabba”nti. Tenāpīti ettha pi-saddo na kevalaṃ aññenevāti imamatthaṃ dīpeti. Evaṃ
tika-vin08t:729: Pesetvāti anupasampannassa hatthe pesetvā. Imassa vinayakammabhāvato “anupasampannassa hatthe ṭhitaṃ na kātabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:730_0: Sace pana āmisasaṃsaṭṭhānīti ettha sace mukhagatenāpi anatirittena āmisena saṃsaṭṭhāni
tika-vin08t:730_1: honti, pācittiyamevāti veditabbaṃ, tasmā pavāritena bhojanaṃ atirittaṃ kārāpetvā
tika-vin08t:730_2: bhuñjantenapi yathā akatena missaṃ na hoti, evaṃ mukhañca hatthañca suddhaṃ katvā
tika-vin08t:730_3: bhuñjitabbaṃ. Kiñcāpi apavāritassa purebhattaṃ yāmakālikādīni āhāratthāya paribhuñjatopi
tika-vin08t:730_4: anāpatti, pavāritassa pana pavāraṇamūlakaṃ dukkaṭaṃ hotiyevāti “yāmakālikaṃ…pe… ajjhohāre
tika-vin08t:735_0: 123. Evaṃ paṭikkhepapavāraṇāvinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni pabbajjāvinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ
tika-vin08t:735_1: “pabbajjāti ettha panā”tyādimāha. Tattha paṭhamaṃ vajitabbāti pabbajjā, upasampadāto
tika-vin08t:735_2: paṭhamaṃ upagacchitabbāti attho. Pa-pubba vaja gatimhīti dhātu. Kulaputtanti ācārakulaputtaṃ
tika-vin08t:735_3: sandhāya vadati. Ye puggalā paṭikkhittā, te vajjetvāti sambandho. Pabbajjādosavirahitoti
tika-vin08t:735_4: pabbajjāya antarāyakarehi pañcābādhādidosehi virahito. Nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇanti ettha
tika-vin08t:735_6: hoti, na pabbājetabboti iminā sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ dassitaṃ, tasmā yattha katthaci sarīrāvayavesu
tika-vin08t:735_7: nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇaṃ vaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitaṃ ce, na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ. Evañca sati
tika-vin08t:735_8: nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇampi avaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitaṃ ce, sabbattha vaṭṭatīti āpannaṃ, tañca
tika-vin08t:735_9: na sāmaññato adhippetanti padesaviseseyeva niyametvā dassento ‘sace panā’tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t:735_10: Sace hi avisesena nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇaṃ avaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitaṃ vaṭṭeyya, ‘nivāsanapārupanehi
tika-vin08t:735_11: pakatipaṭicchannaṭṭhāne’ti padesaniyamaṃ na kareyya, tasmā nivāsanapārupanehi pakatipaṭicchannaṭṭhānato
tika-vin08t:735_12: aññattha nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇaṃ avaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitampi na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ. Nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇato
tika-vin08t:735_13: khuddakataraṃ pana avaḍḍhanakapakkhe vā vaḍḍhanakapakkhe vā ṭhitaṃ hotu, vaṭṭati
tika-vin08t:735_14: nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇato khuddakatarassa vaḍḍhanakapakkhe avaḍḍhanakapakkhe vā ṭhitassa
tika-vin08t:736_1: hoti, vaṭṭatīti vuttattā appaṭicchannaṭṭhāne tādisampi na vaṭṭati, paṭicchannaṭṭhānepi
tika-vin08t:736_2: ca vaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitaṃ na vaṭṭatīti siddhameva hoti. Pākaṭaṭṭhānepi pana nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇato
tika-vin08t:736_3: ūnataraṃ avaḍḍhanakaṃ vaṭṭatīti ye gaṇheyyuṃ, tesaṃ taṃ gahaṇaṃ paṭisedhetuṃ ‘mukhe
tika-vin08t:736_4: panā’tiādi vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Godhā…pe… na vaṭṭatīti iminā tādisopi rogo kuṭṭheyeva
tika-vin08t:736_5: antogadhoti dasseti. Gaṇḍepi iminā nayena vinicchayo veditabbo. Tattha pana mukhādīsu
tika-vin08t:736_6: kolaṭṭhimattato khuddakataropi gaṇḍo na vaṭṭatīti visuṃ na dassito. “Appaṭicchannaṭṭhāne
tika-vin08t:736_7: avaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitepi na vaṭṭatī”ti ettakameva hi tattha vuttaṃ, tathāpi kuṭṭhe
tika-vin08t:736_8: vuttanayena mukhādīsu kolaṭṭhippamāṇato khuddakataropi gaṇḍo na vaṭṭatīti viññāyati,
tika-vin08t:736_9: tasmā avaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitepīti ettha pi-saddo avuttasampiṇḍanattho, tena kolaṭṭhimattato
tika-vin08t:736_10: khuddakataropi na vaṭṭatīti ayamattho dassitoyevāti amhākaṃ khanti. Pakativaṇṇe jāteti
tika-vin08t:737_1: kāretvāti attho. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “sacchaviṃ kāretvāti vijjamānachaviṃ kāretvāti
tika-vin08t:737_2: attho, sañchavinti vā pāṭho, sañjātachaanti attho. Gaṇḍādīsu vūpasantesupi taṃ ṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:738_1: “paṭicchannaṭṭhāne avaḍḍhanakaṃ vaṭṭati, aññattha na kiñci vaṭṭatī”ti vuttanayaṃ
tika-vin08t:738_2: dasseti. Sosabyādhīti khayarogo. Yakkhummādoti kadāci āgantvā bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā hatthamukhādikaṃ
tika-vin08t:739_0: 124. Mahāmattoti mahatiyā issariyamattāya samannāgato. “Na dānāhaṃ devassa bhaṭo”ti
tika-vin08t:739_1: āpucchatīti raññā eva dinnaṃ ṭhānantaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yo pana rājakammikehi amaccādīhi
tika-vin08t:739_2: ṭhapito, amaccādīnaṃ eva vā bhaṭo hoti, tena taṃ taṃ amaccādimpi āpucchituṃ vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin08t:740: 125. “Dhajabandho”ti vuttattā apākaṭacoro pabbājetabboti viññāyati. Tena vakkhati “ye pana ambalabujādicorakā”tiādi. Evaṃ jānantīti “sīlavā jāto”ti jānanti.
tika-vin08t:741_0: 126. Bhinditvāti andubandhanaṃ bhinditvā. Chinditvāti saṅkhalikabandhanaṃ chinditvā.
tika-vin08t:741_1: Muñcitvāti rajjubandhanaṃ muñcitvā. Vivaritvāti gāmabandhanādīsu gāmadvārādīni vivaritvā.
tika-vin08t:741_2: Apassamānānaṃ vā palāyatīti purisaguttiyaṃ purisānaṃ gopakānaṃ apassamānānaṃ palāyati.
tika-vin08t:743: 130. Palātopīti iṇassāmikānaṃ āgamanaṃ ñatvā bhayena palātopi iṇāyiko. Gīvā hoti iṇāyikabhāvaṃ ñatvā anādarena iṇamuttake bhikkhubhāve pavesitattā.
tika-vin08t:744_0: Upaḍḍhupaḍḍhanti thokaṃ thokaṃ. Dātabbamevāti iṇāyikena dhanaṃ sampajjatu vā, mā
tika-vin08t:744_1: vā, dāne saussāheneva bhavitabbaṃ, aññehi ca bhikkhūhi “mā dhuraṃ nikkhipāhī”ti vatvā
tika-vin08t:744_2: sahāyakehi bhavitabbanti dasseti. Dhuranikkhepena hissa bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbatā siyāti.
tika-vin08t:745_0: 131. Dāsacārittaṃ āropetvā kītoti iminā dāsabhāvaparimocanatthāya kītaṃ nivatteti.
tika-vin08t:745_1: Tādiso hi dhanakkītopi adāso eva. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “desacārittanti sāvanapaṇṇāropanādikaṃ
tika-vin08t:745_2: taṃ taṃ desacāritta”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha tattha cārittavasenāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ janapade
tika-vin08t:746_0: Sace sayameva paṇṇaṃ āropenti, na vaṭṭatīti tā bhujissitthiyo “mayampi vaṇṇadāsiyo
tika-vin08t:746_1: homā”ti attano rakkhaṇatthāya sayameva rājūnaṃ dāsipaṇṇe attano nāmaṃ likhāpenti,
tika-vin08t:746_2: tāsaṃ puttāpi rājadāsāva honti, tasmā te pabbājetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Tehi adinnā na pabbājetabbāti
tika-vin08t:746_3: yattakā tesaṃ sāmino, tesu ekena adinnepi na pabbājetabbā. Bhujisse katvā pana pabbājetuṃ
tika-vin08t:746_4: vaṭṭatīti yassa vihārassa te ārāmikā dinnā, tasmiṃ vihāre saṅghaṃ ñāpetvā phātikammena
tika-vin08t:746_5: dhanādiṃ katvā bhujisse katvā pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭati. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “devadāsiputte
tika-vin08t:746_6: vaṭṭatīti likhitaṃ. ‘Ārāmikañce pabbājetukāmo, aññamekaṃ datvā pabbājetabba’nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:746_7: Mahāpaccarivādassa ayamidha adhippāyo, ‘bhikkhusaṅghassa ārāmike demā’ti dinnattā
tika-vin08t:746_8: na te tesaṃ dāsā, ‘ārāmiko ca neva dāso na bhujisso’ti vattabbato na dāsoti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin08t:746_9: Takkāsiñcanaṃ sīhaḷadīpe cārittaṃ, te ca pabbājetabbā saṅghassārāmikattā. Nissāmikaṃ
tika-vin08t:746_10: dāsaṃ attanāpi bhujissaṃ kātuṃ labhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:747_0: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “takkaṃ sīse āsittakasadisāva hontīti yathā adāse karontā
tika-vin08t:747_1: takkena sīsaṃ dhovitvā adāsaṃ karonti, evaṃ ārāmikavacanena dinnattā adāsāva teti
tika-vin08t:747_2: adhippāyo. ‘Takkāsiñcanaṃ pana sīhaḷadīpe cāritta’nti vadanti. Neva pabbājetabboti
tika-vin08t:747_3: vuttanti kappiyavacanena dinnepi saṅghassa ārāmikadāsattā evaṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:747_4: Vimativinodaniyampi “takkaṃ sīse āsittakasadisāva hontīti kesuci janapadesu adāse
tika-vin08t:747_5: karontā takkaṃ sīse āsiñcanti, tena kira te adāsā honti, evamidampi ārāmikavacanena
tika-vin08t:747_6: dinnampīti adhippāyo. Tathā dinnepi saṅghassa ārāmikadāso evāti ‘neva pabbājetabbo’ti
tika-vin08t:747_7: vuttaṃ. ‘Tāvakāliko nāma’ti vuttattā kālaparicchedaṃ katvā vā pacchāpi gahetukāmatāya
tika-vin08t:747_8: vā dinnaṃ sabbaṃ tāvakālikamevāti gahetabbaṃ. Nissāmikadāso nāma yassa sāmikulaṃ
tika-vin08t:747_9: aññātikaṃ maraṇena parikkhīṇaṃ, na koci tassa dāyādo, so pana samānajātikehi vā nivāsagāmavāsīhi
tika-vin08t:747_10: vā issarehi vā bhujisso katova pabbājetabbo. Devadāsāpi dāsā eva. Te hi katthaci
tika-vin08t:747_11: dese rājadāsā honti, katthaci vihāradāsā vā, tasmā pabbājetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:748_0: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “nissāmikadāso nāma yassa sāmikā saputtadārā matā honti, na
tika-vin08t:748_1: koci tassa pariggāhako, sopi pabbājetuṃ na vaṭṭati, taṃ pana attanāpi bhujissaṃ kātuṃ
tika-vin08t:748_2: vaṭṭati. Ye vā pana tasmiṃ raṭṭhe sāmino, tehipi kārāpetuṃ vaṭṭati, ‘devadāsiputtaṃ
tika-vin08t:748_3: pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. ‘Dāsassa pabbajitvā attano sāmike
tika-vin08t:748_4: disvā palāyantassa āpatti natthī’ti vadantī”ti vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “dāsampi
tika-vin08t:748_5: pabbājetvā sāmike disvā paṭicchādanatthaṃ apanento padavārena adinnādānāpattiyā kāretabbo,
tika-vin08t:749_0: 132. Hatthacchinnakādivatthūsu kaṇṇamūleti sakalassa kaṇṇassa chedaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-vin08t:749_1: Kaṇṇasakkhalikāyāti kaṇṇacūḷikāya. Yassa pana kaṇṇāvaṭṭeti heṭṭhā kuṇḍalādiṭhapanachiddaṃ
tika-vin08t:749_3: Tato hi uddhaṃ na vicchindituṃ sakkā hoti. Sandhetunti avirūpasaṇṭhānaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin08t:750_0: Khujjasarīroti vaṅkasarīro. Brahmuno viya ujukaṃ gattaṃ sarīraṃ yassa so brahmujugatto,
tika-vin08t:750_1: bhagavā. Avaseso sattoti iminā lakkhaṇena rahitasatto. Etena ṭhapetvā mahāpurisaṃ
tika-vin08t:750_2: cakkavattiñca itare sattā khujjapakkhikāti dasseti. Yebhuyyena hi sattā khandhe kaṭiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:750_3: jāṇūsūti tīsu ṭhānesu namanti, te kaṭiyaṃ namantā pacchato namanti, dvīsu ṭhānesu
tika-vin08t:750_4: namantā purato namanti, dīghasarīrā pana ekena passena vaṅkā honti, eke mukhaṃ unnāmetvā
tika-vin08t:750_5: nakkhattāni gaṇayantā viya caranti, eke appamaṃsalohitā sūlasadisā honti, eke purato
tika-vin08t:750_6: pabbhārā honti, pavedhamānā gacchanti. Parivaṭumoti samantato vaṭṭakāyo. Etena evarūpā
tika-vin08t:751_1: piṇḍitamaṃsataṃ dassetuṃ āmeḍitaṃ kataṃ. Tenāha “tālaphalapiṇḍisadisenā”ti. Tālaphalānaṃ
tika-vin08t:751_2: mañjarī piṇḍi nāma. Anupubbatanukena sīsenāti cetiyathūpikā viya kamena kisena sīsena.
tika-vin08t:751_3: Mahāveḷupabbaṃ viya ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā avisamathūlena sīsena samannāgato
tika-vin08t:751_4: nāḷisīso nāma. Kappasīsoti gajamatthakaṃ viya dvidhā bhinnasīso. “Kaṇṇikakeso vā”ti
tika-vin08t:751_5: imassa vivaraṇaṃ “pāṇakehī”tiādi. Makkaṭasseva nalāṭepi kesānaṃ uṭṭhitabhāvaṃ sandhāyāha “sīsalomehī”tiādi.
tika-vin08t:752_1: Kekaroti tiriyaṃ passanako. Udakatārakāti olokentānaṃ udake paṭibimbikacchāyā. Udakabubbuḷanti
tika-vin08t:752_2: keci. Akkhitārakāti abhimukhe ṭhitānaṃ chāyā. Akkhibhaṇḍakātipi vadanti. Atipiṅgalakkhi
tika-vin08t:752_3: majjārakkhi. Madhupiṅgalanti madhuvaṇṇapiṅgalaṃ. Nippakhumakkhīti ettha pakhuma-saddo
tika-vin08t:752_4: akkhidalalomesu niruḷho, tadabhāvā nippakhumakkhi. Akkhipākenāti akkhidalapariyantesu
tika-vin08t:753_0: Cipiṭanāsikoti anunnatanāsiko. Paṭaṅgamaṇḍūko nāma mahāmukhamaṇḍūko. Bhinnamukhoti
tika-vin08t:753_1: upakkamukhapariyosāno, sabbadā vivaṭamukho vā. Vaṅkamukhoti ekapasse apakkamma ṭhitaheṭṭhimahanukaṭṭhiko.
tika-vin08t:753_2: Oṭṭhacchinnakoti ubhosu oṭṭhesu yattha katthaci jātiyā vā pacchā vā satthādinā apanītamaṃsena
tika-vin08t:754_0: Bhinnagaloti avanatagalo. Bhinnauroti atininnauramajjho. Evaṃ bhinnapiṭṭhīti. Sabbañcetanti
tika-vin08t:754_1: “kacchugatto”tiādiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ettha ca vinicchayo kuṭṭhādīsu vutto evāti āha “vinicchayo”tiādi.
tika-vin08t:755_0: Vātaṇḍikoti aṇḍakesu vuddhirogena samannāgato, aṇḍavātarogena uddhutabījaṇḍakosena
tika-vin08t:755_1: samannāgato vā. Yassa nivāsanena paṭicchannampi uṇṇataṃ pakāsati, sova na pabbājetabbo.
tika-vin08t:755_2: Vikaṭoti tiriyaṃ gamanapādehi samannāgato, yassa caṅkamato jāṇukā bahi nigacchanti.
tika-vin08t:755_3: Saṅghaṭṭoti gacchato parivattanapādehi samannāgato, yassa caṅkamato jāṇukā anto pavisanti.
tika-vin08t:755_4: Mahājaṅghoti thūlajaṅgho. Mahāpādoti mahantena pādatalena yutto. Pādavemajjheti piṭṭhipādavemajjhe.
tika-vin08t:755_5: Etena aggapādo ca paṇhi ca sadisāvāti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:756_0: 134. Majjhe saṃkuṭitapādattāti kuṇṭhapādatāya kāraṇaṃ dasseti, agge saṃkuṭitapādattāti
tika-vin08t:756_2: “Pādassa bāhirantenā”ti ca “abbhantarantenā”ti ca idaṃ pādatalassa ubhohi pariyantehi
tika-vin08t:757_0: Mammananti khalitavacanaṃ, yo ekamevakkharaṃ catupañcakkhattuṃ vadati, tassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
tika-vin08t:757_1: ṭhānakaraṇavisuddhiyā abhāvena aphuṭṭhakkharavacanaṃ. Vacanānukaraṇena hi so “mammano”ti
tika-vin08t:757_2: vutto. Yo ca karaṇasampannopi ekamevakkharaṃ hikkārabahuso vadati, sopi idheva saṅgayhati.
tika-vin08t:757_3: Yo vā pana taṃ niggahetvāpi anāmeḍitakkharameva sithilaṃ siliṭṭhavacanaṃ vattuṃ samattho,
tika-vin08t:757_4: so pabbājetabbo. Āpattito na muccantīti ñatvā karontāva na muccanti. Jīvitantarāyādiāpadāsu
tika-vin08t:758_0: 135. Abhabbapuggalakathāsu “yo kāḷapakkhe itthī hoti, juṇhapakkhe puriso, ayaṃ pakkhapaṇḍako”ti
tika-vin08t:758_1: keci vadanti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “kāḷapakkhe paṇḍako hoti, juṇhapakkhe panassa pariḷāho
tika-vin08t:758_2: vūpasammatī”ti apaṇḍakapakkhe pariḷāhavūpasamasseva vuttattā paṇḍakapakkhe ussannapariḷāhatā
tika-vin08t:758_3: paṇḍakabhāvāpattīti viññāyatīti vīmaṃsitvā yuttataraṃ gahetabbaṃ. Itthibhāvo pumbhāvo
tika-vin08t:758_4: vā natthi etassāti abhāvako. “Tasmiṃyevassa pakkhe pabbajjā vāritāti ettha apaṇḍakapakkhe
tika-vin08t:758_5: pabbājetvā paṇḍakapakkhe nāsetabbo”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Keci pana “apaṇḍakapakkhe
tika-vin08t:758_6: pabbajito sace kilesakkhayaṃ pāpuṇāti, na nāsetabbo”ti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ.
tika-vin08t:758_7: Paṇḍakassa hi kilesakkhayāsambhavato, khīṇakilesassa ca paṇḍakabhāvānāpattito. Ahetukapaṭisandhikathāyañhi
tika-vin08t:758_8: avisesena paṇḍakassa ahetukapaṭisandhitā vuttā, āsittausūyapakkhapaṇḍakānañca paṭisandhito
tika-vin08t:758_9: paṭṭhāyeva paṇḍakabhāvo, na pavattiyaṃyevāti vadanti. Teneva ahetukapaṭisandhiniddese
tika-vin08t:758_10: jaccandhabadhirādayo viya paṇḍako jātisaddena visesetvā na niddiṭṭho. Catutthapārājikasaṃvaṇṇanāyañca
tika-vin08t:758_12: ahetukapaṭisandhikā, tesaṃ saggo avārito, maggo pana vāritoti avisesato vuttanti
tika-vin08t:759_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana paṇḍakavatthusmiṃ āsittausūyapakkhapaṇḍakā tayopi purisabhāvaliṅgādiyuttā
tika-vin08t:759_1: ahetukapaṭisandhikā, te ca kilesapariyuṭṭhānassa balavatāya napuṃsakapaṇḍakasadisattā
tika-vin08t:759_2: “paṇḍakā”ti vuttā, tesu āsittausūyapaṇḍakānaṃ dvinnaṃ kilesapariyuṭṭhānaṃ yonisomanasikārādīhi
tika-vin08t:759_3: vītikkamato nivāretumpi sakkā, tena te pabbājetabbāti vuttā. Pakkhapaṇḍakassa pana
tika-vin08t:759_4: kāḷapakkhe ummādo viya kilesapariḷāho avattharanto āgacchati, vītikkamaṃ patvā eva
tika-vin08t:759_5: ca nivattati, tasmā tasmiṃ pakkhe so na pabbājetabboti vutto, tadetaṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin08t:759_6: “yassa paresa”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha āsittassāti mukhe āsittassa attanopi asucimuccanena
tika-vin08t:759_7: pariḷāho vūpasammati. Usūyāya uppannāyāti usūyāya vasena attano sevetukāmatārāge
tika-vin08t:760_0: “Bījāni apanītānī”ti vuttattā bījesu ṭhitesu nimittamatte apanīte paṇḍako na hoti.
tika-vin08t:760_1: Bhikkhunopi anābādhapaccayā tadapanayane thullaccayameva, na paṇḍakattaṃ. Bījesu
tika-vin08t:760_2: pana apanītesu aṅgajātampi rāgena kammaniyaṃ na hoti, pumabhāvo vigacchati, massuādipurisaliṅgampi
tika-vin08t:760_3: upasampadāpi vigacchati, kilesapariḷāhopi dunnivāravītikkamo hoti napuṃsakapaṇḍakassa
tika-vin08t:760_4: viya, tasmā īdiso upasampannopi nāsetabboti vadanti. Yadi evaṃ kasmā bījuddharaṇe
tika-vin08t:760_5: pārājikaṃ na paññattanti? Ettha tāva keci vadanti “paññattamevetaṃ bhagavatā ‘paṇḍako
tika-vin08t:760_6: bhikkhave anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo’ti vuttattā”ti.
tika-vin08t:760_7: Keci pana “yasmā bījuddharaṇakkhaṇe paṇḍako na hoti, tasmā tasmiṃ khaṇe pārājikaṃ
tika-vin08t:760_8: na paññattaṃ. Yasmā pana so uddhaṭabījo bhikkhu aparena samayena vuttanayena paṇḍakattaṃ
tika-vin08t:760_9: āpajjati, abhāvako hoti, upasampadāya avatthu, tato eva cassa upasampadā vigacchati,
tika-vin08t:760_10: tasmā esa paṇḍakattupagamanakālato paṭṭhāya jātiyā napuṃsakapaṇḍakena saddhiṃ yojetvā
tika-vin08t:760_11: ‘upasampanno nāsetabbo’ti abhabboti vutto, na tato pubbe. Ayañca kiñcāpi sahetuko,
tika-vin08t:760_12: bhāvakkhayena panassa ahetukasadisatāya maggopi na uppajjatī”ti vadanti. Apare pana
tika-vin08t:760_14: vuttaṃ, upasampannassa pana pacchā upakkamena upasampadāpi na vigacchatī”ti, taṃ
tika-vin08t:760_15: na yuttaṃ. Yadaggena hi pabbajjato pubbe upakkamena abhabbo hoti, tadaggena pacchāpi
tika-vin08t:761_0: Itthattādi bhāvo natthi etassāti abhāvako. Pabbajjā na vāritāti ettha pabbajjāggahaṇeneva
tika-vin08t:761_1: upasampadāpi gahitā. Tenāha “yassa cettha pabbajjā vāritā”tiādi. Tasmiṃ yevassa pakkhe
tika-vin08t:761_2: pabbajjā vāritāti ettha pana apaṇḍakapakkhepi pabbajjāmattameva labhati, upasampadā
tika-vin08t:761_3: pana tadāpi na vaṭṭati, paṇḍakapakkhe pana āgato liṅganāsanāya nāsetabboti veditabbanti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:762_1: bāhiratthasamāsoyaṃ, purimapade ca vibhattialopoti dasseti. Byañjananti cettha purisanimittaṃ
tika-vin08t:762_2: itthinimittañca adhippetaṃ. Atha ubhatobyañjanakassa ekameva indriyaṃ hoti, udāhu
tika-vin08t:762_3: dveti? Ekameva hoti, na dve. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? “Yassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin08t:762_4: tassa purisindriyaṃ uppajjatīti, no. Yassa vā pana purisindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa
tika-vin08t:762_5: itthindriyaṃ uppajjatīti, no”ti ekasmiṃ santāne indriyabhūtabhāvadvayassa uppattiyā
tika-vin08t:762_6: abhidhamme paṭisedhitattā, tañca kho itthiubhatobyañjanakassa itthindriyaṃ, purisaubhatobyañjanakassa
tika-vin08t:762_7: purisindriyanti. Yadi evaṃ dutiyabyañjanassa abhāvo āpajjati indriyañhi byañjanassa
tika-vin08t:762_8: kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, tañca tassa natthīti? Vuccate – na tassa indriyaṃ dutiyabyañjanakāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t:762_9: Kasmā? Sadā abhāvato. Itthiubhatobyañjanakassa hi yadā itthiyā rāgacittaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin08t:762_10: tadā purisabyañjanaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, itthibyañjanaṃ paṭicchannaṃ guḷhaṃ hoti, tathā
tika-vin08t:762_11: itarassa itaraṃ. Yadi ca tesaṃ indriyaṃ dutiyabyañjanakāraṇaṃ bhaveyya, sadāpi byañjanadvayaṃ
tika-vin08t:762_12: tiṭṭheyya, na pana tiṭṭhati, tasmā veditabbametaṃ “na tassa taṃ byañjanakāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin08t:762_13: kammasahāyaṃ pana rāgacittamevettha kāraṇa”nti. Yasmā cassa ekameva indriyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t:762_14: tasmā itthiubhatobyañjanako sayampi gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti, parampi gaṇhāpeti. Purisaubhatobyañjanako
tika-vin08t:762_15: paraṃ gaṇhāpeti, sayaṃ pana na gaṇhātīti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ āgataṃ.
tika-vin08t:763_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana – itthiubhatobyañjanakoti itthindriyayutto, itaro pana purisindriyayutto.
tika-vin08t:763_1: Ekassa hi bhāvadvayaṃ saha na uppajjati yamake paṭikkhittattā. Dutiyabyañjanaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:763_2: kammasahāyena akusalacitteneva bhāvarahitaṃ uppajjati. Pakatitthipurisānampi kammameva
tika-vin08t:763_3: byañjanaliṅgānaṃ kāraṇaṃ, na bhāvo tassa kenaci paccayena paccayattassa paṭṭhāne
tika-vin08t:763_4: avuttattā. Kevalaṃ bhāvasahitānaṃyeva byañjanaliṅgānaṃ pavattadassanatthaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu
tika-vin08t:763_6: Idha pana akusalabalena indriyaṃ vināpi byañjanaṃ uppajjatīti veditabbaṃ. Ubhinnampi
tika-vin08t:763_7: ce tesaṃ ubhatobyañjanakānaṃ. Yadā itthiyā rāgo uppajjati, tadā purisabyañjanaṃ pākaṭaṃ
tika-vin08t:763_8: hoti, itaraṃ paṭicchannaṃ. Yadā purise rāgo uppajjati, tadā itthibyañjanaṃ pākaṭaṃ
tika-vin08t:764_0: 137. Theyyāya saṃvāso etassāti theyyasaṃvāsako. So ca na saṃvāsamattasseva thenako
tika-vin08t:764_1: idhādhippeto, atha kho liṅgassa tadubhayassa ca thenakopīti āha “tayo theyyasaṃvāsakā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t:764_2: Na yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanaṃ sādiyatīti yathāvuḍḍhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vā sāmaṇerānaṃ vā vandanaṃ
tika-vin08t:764_3: na sādiyati. Yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanaṃ sādiyatīti attanā musāvādaṃ katvā dassitavassānurūpaṃ
tika-vin08t:764_4: yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanaṃ sādiyati. Bhikkhuvassagaṇanādikoti iminā na ekakammādikova
tika-vin08t:765_0: 138. Rāja…pe… bhayenāti ettha bhaya-saddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo “rājabhayena dubbhikkhabhayenā”tiādinā.
tika-vin08t:765_1: Saṃvāsaṃ nādhivāseti, yāva so suddhamānasoti rājabhayādīhi gahitaliṅgatāya so suddhamānaso
tika-vin08t:765_2: yāva saṃvāsaṃ nādhivāsetīti attho. Yo hi rājabhayādiṃ vinā kevalaṃ bhikkhū vañcetvā
tika-vin08t:765_3: tehi saddhiṃ saṃvasitukāmatāya liṅgaṃ gaṇhāti, so asuddhacittatāya liṅgaggahaṇeneva
tika-vin08t:765_4: theyyasaṃvāsako nāma hoti. Ayaṃ pana tādisena asuddhacittena bhikkhū vañcetukāmatāya
tika-vin08t:765_5: abhāvato yāva saṃvāsaṃ nādhivāseti, tāva theyyasaṃvāsako nāma na hoti. Teneva “rājabhayādīhi
tika-vin08t:765_6: gahitaliṅgānaṃ ‘gihī maṃ samaṇoti jānantū’ti vañcanacitte satipi bhikkhūnaṃ vañcetukāmatāya
tika-vin08t:765_7: abhāvā doso na jāto”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Keci pana “vūpasantabhayatā idha
tika-vin08t:765_8: suddhacittatā”ti vadanti, evañca sati so vūpasantabhayo yāva saṃvāsaṃ nādhivāseti,
tika-vin08t:765_9: tāva theyyasaṃvāsako na hotīti ayamattho viññāyati. Imasmiñca atthe viññāyamāne avūpasantabhayassa
tika-vin08t:765_10: saṃvāsasādiyanepi theyyasaṃvāsako na hotīti āpajjeyya, na ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ avūpasantabhayassa
tika-vin08t:765_12: ca iminā avūpasantabhayenapi saṃvāsaṃ asādiyanteneva bhavitabbanti dīpeti. Teneva
tika-vin08t:765_13: tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ “yasmā vihāraṃ āgantvā saṅghikaṃ gaṇhantassa saṃvāsaṃ
tika-vin08t:765_14: pariharituṃ dukkaraṃ, tasmā ‘sabbapāsaṇḍiyabhattāni bhuñjanto’ti idaṃ vutta”nti.
tika-vin08t:766_0: Sabbapāsaṇḍiyabhattānīti sabbasāmayikānaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ katvā vīthicatukkādīsu ṭhapetvā
tika-vin08t:766_1: dātabbabhattāni. Kāyaparihāriyānīti kāyena pariharitabbāni. Abbhuggacchantīti abhimukhaṃ
tika-vin08t:766_3: ādāya vihāraṃ gacchatīti cīvarāni nivāsanapārupanavasena ādāya, pattañca aṃsakūṭe
tika-vin08t:767_0: Nāpi sayaṃ jānātīti “yo evaṃ pabbajati, so theyyasaṃvāsako nāma hotī”ti vā “evaṃ
tika-vin08t:767_1: kātuṃ na labhatī”ti vā “evaṃ pabbajito samaṇo nāma na hotī”ti vā na jānāti. Yo evaṃ
tika-vin08t:767_2: pabbajati, so theyyasaṃvāsako nāma hotīti idaṃ pana nidassanamattaṃ. Anupasampannakāleyevāti
tika-vin08t:767_3: iminā upasampannakāle sutvā sacepi nāroceti, theyyasaṃvāsako na hotīti dīpeti.
tika-vin08t:768_0: Sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya…pe… theyyasaṃvāsako na hotīti idaṃ bhikkhūhi dinnaliṅgassa
tika-vin08t:768_1: apariccattattā na liṅgatthenako hoti, liṅgānurūpassa saṃvāsassa sāditattā nāpi saṃvāsatthenako
tika-vin08t:768_2: hotīti vuttaṃ. Eko bhikkhu kāsāye saussāhova odātaṃ nivāsetvāti etthāpi idameva kāraṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:768_3: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Parato “sāmaṇero saliṅge ṭhito”tiādinā sāmaṇerassa vuttavidhānesupi atheyyasaṃvāsapakkhe
tika-vin08t:768_4: ayameva nayo. “Bhikkhuniyāpi eseva nayo”ti vuttamevatthaṃ “sāpi gihibhāvaṃ patthayamānā”tiādinā vibhāveti.
tika-vin08t:769_0: Sace koci vuḍḍhapabbajitoti sāmaṇeraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Mahāpeḷādīsūti etena gihisantakaṃ
tika-vin08t:769_1: dassitaṃ. Sāmaṇerapaṭipāṭiyā…pe… theyyasaṃvāsako na hotīti ettha kiñcāpi theyyasaṃvāsako
tika-vin08t:769_2: na hoti, pārājikaṃ pana āpajjatiyeva. Sesamettha uttānamevāti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:770_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana – theyyāya liṅgaggahaṇamattampi idha saṃvāso evāti āha “tayo
tika-vin08t:770_1: theyyasaṃvāsakā”ti. Na yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandananti bhikkhūnaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ vā vandanaṃ
tika-vin08t:770_2: na sādiyati. Yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandananti attanā musāvādena dassitavassakkamena bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t:770_3: vandanaṃ sādiyati. Daharasāmaṇero pana vuḍḍhasāmaṇerānaṃ, daharabhikkhū ca vuḍḍhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:770_4: vandanaṃ sādiyantopi theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti. Imasmiṃ attheti saṃvāsatthenakatthe.
tika-vin08t:770_5: Bhikkhuvassānīti idaṃ saṃvāsatthenake vuttapāṭhavasena vuttaṃ, sayameva pana pabbajitvā
tika-vin08t:770_6: sāmaṇeravassāni gaṇentopi ubhayatthenako eva. Na kevalañca purisova, itthīpi bhikkhūnīsu
tika-vin08t:770_7: evaṃ paṭipajjati, theyyasaṃvāsikāva. Ādikammikāpi cettha na muccanti. Upasampannesu
tika-vin08t:770_8: eva paññattāpattiṃ paṭicca ādikammikā vuttā, tenevettha ādikammikopi na mutto.
tika-vin08t:771_0: Rāja…pe… bhayenāti ettha bhaya-saddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo. Yāva so suddhamānasoti “iminā
tika-vin08t:771_1: liṅgena bhikkhū vañcetvā tehi saṃvasissāmī”ti asuddhacittābhāvena suddhacitto. Tena
tika-vin08t:771_2: hi asuddhacittena liṅge gahitamatte pacchā bhikkhūhi saha saṃvasatu vā mā vā, liṅgatthenako
tika-vin08t:771_3: hoti. Pacchā saṃvasantopi abhabbo hutvā saṃvasati, tasmā ubhayatthenakopi liṅgatthenake
tika-vin08t:771_4: eva pavisatīti veditabbaṃ. Yo pana rājādibhayena suddhacittova liṅgaṃ gahetvā vicaranto
tika-vin08t:771_5: pacchā “bhikkhuvassāni gaṇetvā jīvassāmī”ti asuddhacittaṃ uppādeti, so cittuppādamattena
tika-vin08t:771_6: theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti suddhacittena gahitaliṅgattā. Sace pana so bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ
tika-vin08t:771_7: gantvā sāmaṇeravassagaṇanādiṃ karoti, tadā saṃvāsatthenako, ubhayatthenako vā hotīti
tika-vin08t:771_8: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana parato “saha dhuranikkhepena ayampi theyyasaṃvāsakovā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:771_9: taṃ bhikkhūhi saṅgamma saṃvāsādhivāsanavasena dhuranikkhepaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tena
tika-vin08t:771_10: vuttaṃ “saṃvāsaṃ nādhivāseti, yāvā”ti, tassa tāva theyyasaṃvāsako nāma na vuccatīti
tika-vin08t:771_11: sambandho daṭṭhabbo. Ettha ca corādibhayaṃ vināpi kīḷādhippāyena liṅgaṃ gahetvā bhikkhūnampi
tika-vin08t:771_12: santike pabbajitālayaṃ dassetvā vandanādiṃ asādiyantopi “sobhati nu kho me pabbajitaliṅga”ntiādinā
tika-vin08t:771_13: suddhacittena gaṇhantopi theyyasaṃvāsako na hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:772_0: Sabbapāsaṇḍiyabhattānīti sabbasāmayikānaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ katvā paññattāni bhattāni. Idañca
tika-vin08t:772_2: vuttaṃ. Saṃvāsaṃ pana asādiyitvā abhikkhukavihārādīsu vihārabhattādīni bhuñjantopi
tika-vin08t:772_3: theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti eva. Kammantānuṭṭhānenāti kasiādikammākaraṇena. Pattacīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:773_0: Yo evaṃ pabbajati, so theyyasaṃvāsako nāma hotīti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ. “Theyyasaṃvāsako”ti
tika-vin08t:773_1: pana nāmaṃ ajānantopi “evaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vā “karonto samaṇo nāma na hotī”ti
tika-vin08t:773_2: vā “yadi ārocessāmi, chaḍḍayissanti ma”nti vā “yena kenaci pabbajjā me na ruhatī”ti
tika-vin08t:773_3: jānāti, theyyasaṃvāsako hoti. Yo pana paṭhamaṃ “pabbajjā evaṃ me gahitā”ti saññī
tika-vin08t:773_4: kevalaṃ antarā attano setavatthanivāsanādivippakāraṃ pakāsetuṃ lajjanto na katheti,
tika-vin08t:773_5: so theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti. Anupasampannakāleyevāti ettha avadhāraṇena upasampannakāle
tika-vin08t:773_6: theyyasaṃvāsakalakkhaṇaṃ ñatvā vañcanāyapi nāroceti, theyyasaṃvāsako na hotīti dīpeti.
tika-vin08t:773_7: So hi suddhacittena gahitaliṅgattā liṅgatthenako na hoti, laddhūpasampadattā tadanuguṇasseva
tika-vin08t:773_8: saṃvāsassa sāditattā saṃvāsatthenakopi na hoti. Anupasampanno pana liṅgatthenako
tika-vin08t:773_9: hoti, saṃvāsārahassa liṅgassa gahitattā saṃvāsasādiyanamattena saṃvāsatthenako hoti.
tika-vin08t:774_0: Saliṅge ṭhitoti saliṅgabhāve ṭhito. Theyyasaṃvāsako na hotīti bhikkhūhi dinnaliṅgassa
tika-vin08t:774_1: apariccattattā liṅgatthenako na hoti. Bhikkhupaṭiññāya apariccattattā saṃvāsatthenako
tika-vin08t:774_2: na hoti. Yaṃ pana mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “liṅgānurūpassa saṃvāsassa sāditattā nāpi saṃvāsatthenako”ti
tika-vin08t:774_3: kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, tampi idameva kāraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Itarathā sāmaṇerassāpi bhikkhuvassagaṇanādīsu
tika-vin08t:774_4: liṅgānurūpasaṃvāso eva sāditoti saṃvāsatthenakatā na siyā bhikkhūhi dinnaliṅgassa
tika-vin08t:774_5: ubhinnampi sādhāraṇattā. Yathā cettha bhikkhu, evaṃ sāmaṇeropi pārājikaṃ samāpanno
tika-vin08t:774_6: sāmaṇerapaṭiññāya apariccattattā saṃvāsatthenako na hotīti veditabbo. Sobhatīti sampaṭicchitvāti
tika-vin08t:775_0: Sace koci vuḍḍhapabbajitoti sāmaṇeraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Mahāpeḷādīsūti vilīvādimayesu
tika-vin08t:775_1: gharadvāresu ṭhapitesu bhattabhājanavisesesu. Etena vihāre bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ vassagaṇanādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:776_0: 139. Titthiyapakkantakakathāyaṃ tesaṃ liṅge ādinnamatte titthiyapakkantako hotīti
tika-vin08t:776_1: “titthiyo bhavissāmī”ti gatassa liṅgaggahaṇeneva tesaṃ laddhipi gahitāyeva hotīti
tika-vin08t:776_2: katvā vuttaṃ. Kenaci pana “tesaṃ liṅge ādinnamatte laddhiyā gahitāyapi aggahitāyapi
tika-vin08t:776_3: titthiyapakkantako hotī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Na hi “titthiyo bhavissāmī”ti
tika-vin08t:776_4: gatassa liṅgasampaṭicchanato aññaṃ laddhiggahaṇaṃ nāma atthi. Liṅgasampaṭicchaneneva
tika-vin08t:776_5: hi so gahitaladdhiko hoti. Teneva “vīmaṃsanatthaṃ kusacīrādīni…pe… yāva na sampaṭicchati,
tika-vin08t:776_6: tāva taṃ laddhi rakkhati, sampaṭicchitamatte titthiyapakkantako hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Naggova
tika-vin08t:776_7: ājīvakānaṃ upassayaṃ gacchati, padavāre padavāre dukkaṭanti “ājīvako bhavissa”nti
tika-vin08t:776_8: asuddhacittena gamanapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ. Naggena hutvā gamanapaccayāpi padavāre
tika-vin08t:777_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana – titthiyapakkantakādikathāsu tesaṃ liṅge ādinnamatteti vīmaṃsādiadhippāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:777_1: vinā “titthiyo bhavissāmī”ti sanniṭṭhānavasena liṅge kāyena dhāritamatte. Sayamevāti
tika-vin08t:777_2: titthiyānaṃ santikaṃ agantvā sayameva saṅghārāmepi kusacīrādīni nivāseti. Ājīvako
tika-vin08t:777_3: bhavissanti…pe… gacchatīti ājīvakānaṃ santike tesaṃ pabbajanavidhinā “ājīvako bhavissāmī”ti
tika-vin08t:777_4: gacchati. Tassa hi titthiyabhāvūpagamanaṃ pati sanniṭṭhāne vijjamānepi “gantvā bhavissāmī”ti
tika-vin08t:777_5: parikappitattā padavāre dukkaṭameva vuttaṃ. Dukkaṭanti pāḷiyā avuttepi methunādīsu
tika-vin08t:777_6: vuttapubbapayogadukkaṭānulomato vuttaṃ. Etena ca sanniṭṭhānavasena liṅge sampaṭicchite
tika-vin08t:777_7: pārājikaṃ, tato purimapayoge thullaccayañca vattabbameva. Thullaccayakkhaṇe nivattantopi
tika-vin08t:777_8: āpattiṃ desāpetvā muccati evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathā cettha, evaṃ saṅghabhedepi lohituppādepi
tika-vin08t:777_9: bhikkhūnaṃ pubbapayogādīsu dukkaṭathullaccayapārājikāhi muccanasīmā ca veditabbā.
tika-vin08t:777_10: Sāsanaviruddhatāyettha ādikammikānampi anāpatti na vuttā. Pabbajjāyapi abhabbatādassanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:777_11: panete aññe ca pārājikakaṇḍe visuṃ sikkhāpadena pārājikādiṃ adassetvā idha abhabbesu
tika-vin08t:778_0: Taṃ laddhīti titthiyavese seṭṭhabhāvaggahaṇameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tesañhi titthiyānaṃ
tika-vin08t:778_1: sassatādiggāhaṃ gaṇhantopi liṅge asampaṭicchite titthiyapakkantako na hoti, taṃ laddhiṃ
tika-vin08t:778_2: aggahetvāpi “etesaṃ vatacariyā sundarā”ti liṅgaṃ sampaṭicchanto titthiyapakkantako
tika-vin08t:778_3: hoti eva. Laddhiyā abhāvenāti bhikkhubhāve sālayatāya titthiyabhāvūpagamanaladdhiyā
tika-vin08t:778_4: abhāvena. Etena ca āpadāsu kusacīrādiṃ pārupantassapi naggassa viya anāpattīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:778_5: Upasampannabhikkhunā kathitoti ettha saṅghabhedakopi upasampannabhikkhunāva kathito,
tika-vin08t:779_0: 140. Tiracchānakathāyaṃ “yo koci amanussajātiyo, sabbova imasmiṃ atthe tiracchānagatoti
tika-vin08t:779_1: veditabbo”ti etena eso manussajātiyo eva bhagavato sāsane pabbajituṃ vā upasampajjituṃ
tika-vin08t:779_2: vā labhati, na tato aññeti dīpeti. Tenāha bhagavā “tumhe khottha nāgā aviruḷhidhammā
tika-vin08t:780_1: tikkhavisadā honti lokuttaraguṇā viyāti āha “manussitthibhūtā janikā mātā”ti. Yathā
tika-vin08t:780_2: manussānaññeva kusalapavatti tikkhavisadā, evaṃ akusalapavattipīti āha “sayampi manussajātikenevā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t:780_3: Atha vā yathā samānajātiyassa vikopane kammaṃ garutaraṃ, na tathā vijātiyassāti āha
tika-vin08t:780_5: loke dissati, so ca kho pariyāyatoti nippariyāyasiddhataṃ dassetuṃ “janikā mātā”ti
tika-vin08t:780_6: vuttaṃ. Yathā manussattabhāve ṭhitasseva kusaladhammānaṃ tikkhavisadasūrabhāvāpatti
tika-vin08t:780_7: yathā taṃ tiṇṇampi bodhisattānaṃ bodhittayanibbattiyaṃ, evaṃ manussattabhāve ṭhitasseva
tika-vin08t:780_9: Ānantariyenāti ettha cutianantaraṃ niraye paṭisandhiphalaṃ anantaraṃ nāma, tasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:780_10: anantare janakattena niyuttaṃ ānantariyaṃ, tena. Atha vā cutianantaraṃ phalaṃ anantaraṃ
tika-vin08t:780_11: nāma, tasmiṃ anantare niyuttaṃ, tannibbattanena anantarakaraṇasīlaṃ, anantarappayojanaṃ
tika-vin08t:780_12: vā ānantariyaṃ, tena ānantariyena mātughātakakammena. Pitughātakepi “yena manussabhūto
tika-vin08t:780_13: janako pitā sayampi manussajātikeneva satā sañcicca jīvitā voropito, ayaṃ ānantariyena
tika-vin08t:780_14: pitughātakakammena pitughātako”tiādinā sabbaṃ veditabbanti āha “pitughātakepi eseva nayo”ti.
tika-vin08t:781_0: Parivattitaliṅgampi mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā jīvitā voropentassa ānantariyakammaṃ hotiyeva.
tika-vin08t:781_1: Satipi hi liṅgaparivatte so eva ekakammanibbatto bhavaṅgappabandho jīvitappabandho,
tika-vin08t:781_2: na aññoti. Yo pana sayaṃ manusso tiracchānabhūtaṃ pitaraṃ vā mātaraṃ vā, sayaṃ vā
tika-vin08t:781_3: tiracchānabhūto manussabhūtaṃ, tiracchānoyeva vā tiracchānabhūtaṃ jīvitā voropeti,
tika-vin08t:781_4: tassa kammaṃ ānantariyaṃ na hoti, bhāriyaṃ pana hoti, ānantariyaṃ āhacceva tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin08t:781_5: Eḷakacatukkaṃ saṅgāmacatukkaṃ coracatukkañcettha kathetabbaṃ. “Eḷakaṃ māremī”ti abhisandhināpi
tika-vin08t:781_6: hi eḷakaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ manusso manussabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā mārento ānantariyaṃ
tika-vin08t:781_7: phusati maraṇādhippāyeneva ānantariyavatthuno vikopitattā. Eḷakābhisandhinā, pana
tika-vin08t:781_8: mātāpitiabhisandhinā vā eḷakaṃ mārento ānantariyaṃ na phusati ānantariyavatthuno
tika-vin08t:781_9: abhāvato. Mātāpitiabhisandhinā mātāpitaro mārento phussateva. Esa nayo itarasmimpi
tika-vin08t:781_10: catukkadvaye. Yathā ca mātāpitūsu, evaṃ arahantesu etāni catukkāni veditabbāni. Sabbattha
tika-vin08t:781_11: hi purimaṃ abhisandhicittaṃ appamāṇaṃ, vadhakacittaṃ, pana tadārammaṇajīvitindriyañca
tika-vin08t:781_12: pamāṇaṃ. Katānantariyakammo ca “tassa kammassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhessāmī”ti sakalacakkavāḷaṃ
tika-vin08t:781_13: mahācetiyappamāṇehi kañcanathūpehi pūretvāpi sakalacakkavāḷaṃ pūretvā nisinnassa
tika-vin08t:781_14: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvāpi buddhassa bhagavato saṅghāṭikaṇṇaṃ amuñcanto vicaritvāpi
tika-vin08t:781_15: kāyassa bhedā nirayameva upapajjati, pabbajjañca na labhati. Pitughātake vesiyā puttoti
tika-vin08t:781_16: upalakkhaṇamattaṃ, kulitthiyā aticāriniyā puttopi attano pitaraṃ ajānitvā ghāntentopi pitughātakova hoti.
tika-vin08t:782: Arahantaghātakakamme avasesanti anāgāmiādikaṃ. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana tatiyapārājikavaṇṇanāto gahetabbo.
tika-vin08t:783_1: dūsitaṃ cittaṃ idha duṭṭhacittaṃ nāma. Lohitaṃ uppādetīti ettha tathāgatassa abhejjakāyatāya
tika-vin08t:783_2: parūpakkamena cammacchedaṃ katvā lohitapaggharaṇaṃ nāma natthi, sarīrassa pana antoyeva
tika-vin08t:783_3: ekasmiṃ ṭhāne lohitaṃ samosarati, āghātena pakuppamānaṃ sañcitaṃ hoti. Devadattena
tika-vin08t:783_4: paviddhasilato bhijjitvā gatā sakkhalikāpi tathāgatassa pādantaṃ pahari, pharasunā
tika-vin08t:783_5: pahaṭo viya pādo antolohitoyeva ahosi. Jīvako pana tathāgatassa ruciyā satthakena
tika-vin08t:783_6: cammaṃ chinditvā tamhā ṭhānā duṭṭhalohitaṃ nīharitvā phāsumakāsi, tenassa puññakammameva
tika-vin08t:784_0: Atha ye parinibbute tathāgate cetiyaṃ bhindanti, bodhiṃ chindanti, dhātumhi upakkamanti,
tika-vin08t:784_1: tesaṃ kiṃ hotīti? Bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ hoti ānantariyasadisaṃ. Sadhātukaṃ pana thūpaṃ
tika-vin08t:784_2: vā paṭimaṃ vā bādhamānaṃ bodhisākhaṃ chindituṃ vaṭṭati. Sacepi tattha nilīnā sakuṇā
tika-vin08t:784_3: cetiye vaccaṃ pātenti, chindituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Paribhogacetiyato hi sarīracetiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:784_4: garutaraṃ. Cetiyavatthuṃ bhinditvā gacchante bodhimūlepi chinditvā harituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:784_5: Yā pana bodhisākhā bodhigharaṃ bādhati, taṃ geharakkhaṇatthaṃ chindituṃ na labhati.
tika-vin08t:784_6: Bodhiatthāya hi gehaṃ, na gehatthāya bodhi. Āsanagharepi eseva nayo. Yasmiṃ pana
tika-vin08t:784_7: āsanaghare dhātu nihitā hoti, tassa rakkhaṇatthāya taṃ sākhaṃ chindituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:784_8: Bodhijagganatthaṃ ojoharaṇasākhaṃ vā pūtiṭṭhānaṃ vā chindituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva, satthu
tika-vin08t:785_0: Saṅghabhede catunnaṃ kammānanti apalokanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ. Ayaṃ saṅghabhedakoti
tika-vin08t:785_1: pakatattaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Pubbe eva pārājikaṃ samāpanno vā vatthādidosena
tika-vin08t:785_2: vipannupasampado vā saṅghaṃ bhindantopi ānantariyaṃ na phusati, saṅgho pana bhinnova
tika-vin08t:785_3: hoti, pabbajjā cassa na vāritāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:786_0: Bhikkhunīdūsane icchamānanti odātavatthavasanaṃ icchamānaṃ. Tenevāha “gihibhāve sampaṭicchitamatteyevā”ti.
tika-vin08t:786_1: Neva pabbajjā atthīti yojanā. Yo ca paṭikkhitte abhabbe ca puggale ñatvā pabbājeti,
tika-vin08t:786_2: upasampādeti vā, dukkaṭaṃ. Ajānantassa sabbattha anāpattīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:787_0: 142. Gabbhamāsehi saddhiṃ vīsati vassāni assāti gabbhavīso. Hāyanavaḍḍhananti gabbhamāsesu
tika-vin08t:787_1: adhikesu uttari hāyanaṃ, ūnesu vaḍḍhananti veditabbaṃ. Ekūnavīsativassanti dvādasa
tika-vin08t:787_2: māse mātukucchismiṃ vasitvā mahāpavāraṇāya jātakālato paṭṭhāya ekūnavīsativassaṃ.
tika-vin08t:787_4: “cattāro māsā parihāyantī”ti vuttaṃ. Vassaṃ ukkaḍḍhantīti vassaṃ uddhaṃ kaḍḍhanti,
tika-vin08t:787_5: tatiyasaṃvacchare ekamāsassa adhikattā māsapariccajanavasena vassaṃ uddhaṃ kaḍḍhantīti
tika-vin08t:787_6: attho, tasmā tatiyo saṃvaccharo terasamāsiko hoti. Saṃvaccharassa pana dvādasamāsikattā
tika-vin08t:787_7: aṭṭhārasasu vassesu adhikamāse visuṃ gahetvā “cha māsā vaḍḍhantī”ti vuttaṃ. Tatoti
tika-vin08t:787_8: chamāsato. Nikkaṅkhā hutvāti adhikamāsehi saddhiṃ paripuṇṇavīsativassattā nibbematikā
tika-vin08t:787_9: hutvā. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu “aṭṭhārasannaṃyeva vassānaṃ adhikamāse
tika-vin08t:787_10: gahetvā gaṇitattā sesavassadvayassapi adhikadivasāni honti, tāni adhikadivasāni sandhāya
tika-vin08t:787_11: ‘nikkaṅkhā hutvā’ti vutta”nti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Na hi dvīsu vassesu adhikadivasāni
tika-vin08t:787_12: nāma visuṃ upalabbhanti tatiye vasse vassukkaḍḍhanavasena adhikamāse pariccatteyeva
tika-vin08t:787_13: atirekamāsasambhavato, tasmā dvīsu vassesu atirekadivasāni visuṃ na sambhavanti.
tika-vin08t:788_0: “Te dve māse gahetvā vīsati vassāni paripuṇṇāni hontī”ti kasmā vuttaṃ, ekūnavīsativassamhi
tika-vin08t:788_1: ca puna aparasmiṃ vasse pakkhitte vīsati vassāni paripuṇṇāni hontīti āha “ettha pana…pe…
tika-vin08t:788_2: vutta”nti. Anekatthattā nipātānaṃ pana-saddo hisaddattho, ettha hīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t:788_3: Idañhi vuttassevatthassa samatthanavasena vuttaṃ. Iminā ca imaṃ dīpeti – yaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:788_5: tattha gabbhamāsepi gahetvā dvīhi māsehi aparipuṇṇavīsativassaṃ sandhāya “ekūnavīsativassa”nti
tika-vin08t:788_6: vuttaṃ, tasmā adhikamāsesu dvīsu gahitesu eva vīsati vassāni paripuṇṇāni nāma hontīti.
tika-vin08t:788_7: Tasmāti yasmā gabbhamāsāpi gaṇanūpagā honti, tasmā. Ekavīsativasso hotīti jātadivasato
tika-vin08t:788_8: paṭṭhāya vīsativasso samāno gabbhamāsehi saddhiṃ ekavīsativasso hoti. Aññaṃ upasampādetīti
tika-vin08t:788_9: upajjhāyo, kammavācācariyo vā hutvā upasampādetīti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ āgataṃ.
tika-vin08t:789_0: Gabbhe sayitakālena saddhiṃ vīsatimaṃ vassaṃ paripuṇṇamassāti gabbhavīso. Nikkhamanīyapuṇṇamāsīti
tika-vin08t:789_1: sāvaṇamāsassa puṇṇamiyā āsāḷhīpuṇṇamiyā anantarapuṇṇamī. Pāṭipadadivaseti pacchimikāya
tika-vin08t:789_2: vassūpanāyikāya, dvādasa māse mātukucchismiṃ vasitvā mahāpavāraṇāya jātaṃ upasampādentīti
tika-vin08t:789_3: attho. “Tiṃsarattidivo māso, dvādasamāsiko saṃvaccharo”ti vacanato “cattāro māsā
tika-vin08t:789_4: parihāyantī”ti vuttaṃ. Vassaṃ ukkaḍḍhantīti vassaṃ uddhaṃ kaḍḍhanti, “ekamāsaṃ adhikamāso”ti
tika-vin08t:789_5: chaḍḍetvā vassaṃ upagacchantīti attho, tasmā tatiyo tatiyo saṃvaccharo terasamāsiko
tika-vin08t:789_6: hoti. Te dve māse gahetvāti nikkhamanīyapuṇṇamāsato yāva jātadivasabhūtā mahāpavāraṇā,
tika-vin08t:789_7: tāva ye dve māsā anāgatā, tesaṃ atthāya adhikamāsato laddhe dve māse gahetvā. Tenāha
tika-vin08t:789_8: “yo pavāretvā vīsativasso bhavissatī”tiādi. “Nikkaṅkhā hutvā”ti idaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ
tika-vin08t:789_9: vassānaṃ eva adhikamāse gahetvā tato vīsatiyā vassesupi cātuddasīnaṃ atthāya catunnaṃ
tika-vin08t:789_10: māsānaṃ parihāpanena sabbathā paripuṇṇavīsativassataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:790_0: Pavāretvā vīsativasso bhavissatīti mahāpavāraṇādivase atikkante gabbhavassena saha
tika-vin08t:790_1: vīsativasso bhavissatīti attho. Tasmāti yasmā gabbhamāsāpi gaṇanūpagā honti, tasmā.
tika-vin08t:790_2: Ekavīsativassoti jātiyā vīsativassaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Aññaṃ upasampādetīti upajjhāyo,
tika-vin08t:790_3: ācariyo vā hutvā upasampādeti. Sopīti upasampādentopi anupasampannoti vimativinodaniyaṃ āgataṃ.
tika-vin08t:791_0: Ettha siyā – aṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu “aṭṭhārasasu vassesu cha māsā vaḍḍhantī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:791_1: idāni pana “ekūnavīsatiyā vassesu satta māsā adhikā”ti vadanti, kathamettha viññātabbanti?
tika-vin08t:791_2: Vuccate – aṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu sāsanavohārena lokiyagatiṃ anupagamma tīsu tīsu saṃvaccharesu
tika-vin08t:791_3: māsachaḍḍanaṃ gahetvā “aṭṭhārasasu vassesu cha māsā vaḍḍhantī”ti vuttaṃ, idāni pana
tika-vin08t:791_4: vedavohārena candasūriyagatisaṅkhātaṃ tithiṃ gahetvā gaṇento “ekūnavīsatiyā vassesu
tika-vin08t:791_5: satta māsā adhikā”ti vadantīti, taṃ vassūpanāyikakathāyaṃ āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin08t:792: 143. Mātā vā matā hotīti sambandho. Soyevāti pabbajjāpekkho eva.
tika-vin08t:793_0: 144. “Ekasīmāyañca aññepi bhikkhū atthīti iminā ekasīmāyaṃ bhikkhumhi asati bhaṇḍukammārocanakiccaṃ
tika-vin08t:793_1: natthīti dasseti. Khaṇḍasīmāya vā ṭhatvā nadīsamuddādīni vā gantvā pabbājetabboti
tika-vin08t:793_2: etena sabbe sīmaṭṭhakabhikkhū āpucchitabbā, anāpucchā pabbājetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
