tika-vin08t:794_1: ettha kiñcāpi sāmaṇerānaṃ āmisabhāgassa samakameva dīyamānattā visuṃ sāmaṇerabhāgo
tika-vin08t:794_2: nāma natthi, heṭṭhā gacchantaṃ pana bhattaṃ kadāci mandaṃ bhaveyya, tasmā upari aggahetvā
tika-vin08t:794_3: sāmaṇerapāḷiyāva gahetvā dātabboti adhippāyo. Niyatapabbajjasseva cāyaṃ bhāgo dīyati.
tika-vin08t:794_4: Teneva “apakkaṃ patta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Aññe vā bhikkhū dātukāmā hontīti sambandho.
tika-vin08t:795_0: 146. Sayaṃ pabbājetabboti kesacchedanādīni sayaṃ karontena pabbājetabbo. Kesacchedanaṃ
tika-vin08t:795_1: kāsāyacchādanaṃ saraṇadānanti hi imāni tīṇi karonto “pabbājetī”ti vuccati, tesu ekaṃ
tika-vin08t:795_2: dve vāpi karonto tathā voharīyatiyeva, tasmā etaṃ pabbājehīti kesacchedanaṃ kāsāyacchādanañca
tika-vin08t:795_3: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Upajjhāyaṃ uddissa pabbājetīti etthāpi eseva nayo. Khaṇḍasīmaṃ netvāti
tika-vin08t:795_4: bhaṇḍukammārocanapariharaṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tena sabhikkhuke vihāre aññampi “etassa
tika-vin08t:795_5: kese chindā”ti vattuṃ na vaṭṭati. Pabbājetvāti kesacchedanaṃ sandhāya vadati. Bhikkhuto
tika-vin08t:795_6: añño pabbājetuṃ na labhatīti saraṇadānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tenevāha “sāmaṇero panā”tiādīti
tika-vin08t:795_7: sāratthadīpaniyaṃ (sārattha ṭī. mahāvagga 3.34) āgataṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana –
tika-vin08t:795_9: pabbajanaṃ nāma, tesu pacchimadvayaṃ bhikkhūhi eva kātabbaṃ, kāretabbaṃ vā. Pabbājehīti
tika-vin08t:795_10: idaṃ tividhampi sandhāya vuttaṃ. Khaṇḍasīmaṃ netvāti bhaṇḍukammārocanapariharaṇatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t:795_11: Bhikkhūnañhi anārocetvā ekasīmāya “etassa kese chindā”ti aññaṃ āṇāpetumpi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:795_12: Pabbājetvāti kesādicchedanameva sandhāya vuttaṃ “kāsāyāni acchādetvā”ti visuṃ vuttattā.
tika-vin08t:795_13: Pabbājetuṃ na labhatīti saraṇadānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Anupasampannena bhikkhuāṇattiyā
tika-vin08t:796_0: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyampi (vajira ṭī. mahāvagga 34) – khaṇḍasīmaṃ netvāti bhaṇḍukammārocanapariharaṇatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:796_1: vuttaṃ, tena sabhikkhuke vihāre aññampi “etassa kese chindā”ti vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:796_3: Upajjhāyo ce kesamassuoropanādīni akatvā pabbajjatthaṃ saraṇāni deti, na ruhati pabbajjā.
tika-vin08t:796_4: Kammavācāya sāvetvā upasampādeti, ruhati upasampadā. Apattacīvarānaṃ upasampadāsiddhidassanato,
tika-vin08t:796_5: kammavipattiyā abhāvato cetaṃ yujjatevāti eke. Hoti cettha –
tika-vin08t:799: Bhikkhunā hi sahatthena vā āṇattiyā vā dinnameva kāsāvaṃ vaṭṭati, adinnaṃ na vaṭṭatīti pana santesveva kāsāvesu, nāsantesu asambhavatoti tesaṃ adhippāyoti āgato.
tika-vin08t:800: Bhabbarūpoti bhabbasabhāvo. Tamevatthaṃ pariyāyantarena vibhāveti “sahetuko”ti. Ñātoti pākaṭo. Yasassīti parivārasampattiyā samannāgato.
tika-vin08t:801_1: sambandho. Tattha kesā nāmete vaṇṇatopi paṭikūlā, saṇṭhānatopi gandhatopi āsayatopi
tika-vin08t:801_2: okāsatopi paṭikūlā. Manuññepi hi yāgupatte vā bhattapatte vā kesavaṇṇaṃ kiñci disvā
tika-vin08t:801_3: “kesamissakamidaṃ, haratha na”nti jigucchanti, evaṃ kesā vaṇṇato paṭikūlā. Rattiṃ
tika-vin08t:801_4: bhuñjantāpi kesasaṇṭhānaṃ akkavākaṃ vā makacivākaṃ vā chupitvā tatheva jigucchanti,
tika-vin08t:801_6: gandho paramajeguccho hoti. Tato jegucchataro aggimhi pakkhittānaṃ. Kesā hi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato
tika-vin08t:801_7: appaṭikūlāpi siyuṃ, gandhena pana paṭikūlāyeva. Yathā hi daharassa kumārakassa vaccaṃ
tika-vin08t:801_8: vaṇṇato haliddivaṇṇaṃ, saṇṭhānato haliddipiṇḍisaṇṭhānaṃ. Saṅkaraṭṭhāne chaḍḍitañca
tika-vin08t:801_9: uddhumātakakāḷasunakhasarīraṃ vaṇṇato tālapakkavaṇṇaṃ, saṇṭhānato vaṭṭetvā vissaṭṭhamudiṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin08t:801_10: dāṭhāpissa sumanamakuḷasadisā, taṃ ubhayampi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato siyā appaṭikūlaṃ, gandhena
tika-vin08t:801_11: pana paṭikūlameva, evaṃ kesāpi siyuṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato appaṭikūlā, gandhena pana paṭikūlāyevāti.
tika-vin08t:802_0: Yathā pana asuciṭṭhāne gāmanissandena jātāni sūpeyyapaṇṇāni nāgarikamanussānaṃ jegucchāni
tika-vin08t:802_2: paramajegucchāti. Evaṃ āsayatopi paṭikūlā. Ime ca kesā nāma gūtharāsimhi uṭṭhitakaṇṇakā
tika-vin08t:802_3: viya ekatiṃsakoṭṭhāsarāsimhi jātā, te susānasaṅkāraṭṭhānādīsu jātasākaṃ viya, parikhādīsu
tika-vin08t:802_4: jātakamalakuvalayādipupphaṃ viya ca asuciṭṭhāne jātattā paramajegucchāti evaṃ okāsato
tika-vin08t:802_5: paṭikūlātiādinā nayena tacapañcakassa vaṇṇādivasena paṭikūlabhāvaṃ pakāsentenāti attho.
tika-vin08t:803_0: Nijjīvanissattabhāvaṃ vā pākaṭaṃ karontenāti ime kesā nāma sīsakaṭāhapaliveṭhanacamme
tika-vin08t:803_1: jātā, tattha yathā vammikamatthake jātesu kuṇṭhatiṇesu na vammikamatthako jānāti
tika-vin08t:803_2: “mayi kuṇṭhatiṇāni jātānī”ti, nāpi kuṇṭhatiṇāni jānanti “mayaṃ vammikamatthake jātānī”ti.
tika-vin08t:803_3: Evameva na sīsakaṭāhapaliveṭhanacammaṃ jānāti “mayi kesā jātā”ti, nāpi kesā jānanti
tika-vin08t:803_5: dhammā. Iti “kesā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto
tika-vin08t:803_6: thaddho pathavīdhātū”tiādinā nayena nijjīvanissattabhāvaṃ pakāsentena. Pubbeti purimabuddhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:803_7: santike. Madditasaṅkhāroti nāmarūpavavatthānena ceva paccayapariggahavasena ca ñāṇena
tika-vin08t:803_9: pūraṇena bhāvitabhāvano. Adinnaṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha “pabbajjā na ruhatīti vadantī”ti
tika-vin08t:804_1: nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātū”tiādinayaṃ
tika-vin08t:804_2: saṅgaṇhāti, sabbaṃ visuddhimagge āgatanayena gahetabbaṃ. Pubbeti pubbabuddhuppādesu.
tika-vin08t:805_0: Kāsāyāni tikkhattuṃ vā…pe… paṭiggāhāpetabboti ettha “sabbadukkhanissaraṇatthāya imaṃ
tika-vin08t:805_1: kāsāvaṃ gahetvā”ti vā “taṃ kāsāvaṃ datvā”ti vā vatvā “pabbājetha maṃ, bhante, anukampaṃ
tika-vin08t:805_2: upādāyā”ti evaṃ yācanapubbakaṃ cīvaraṃ paṭicchāpeti. Athāpītiādi tikkhattuṃ paṭiggāhāpanato
tika-vin08t:805_3: paraṃ kattabbavidhidassanaṃ, athāpīti tato parampīti attho. Keci pana “cīvaraṃ appaṭiggāhāpetvā
tika-vin08t:805_4: pabbājanappakārabhedadassanatthaṃ ‘athāpī’ti vuttaṃ. Athāpīti atha vāti attho”ti
tika-vin08t:805_5: vadanti. Adinnaṃ na vaṭṭatīti iminā pabbajjā na ruhatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:806_0: 147. Pāde vandāpetvāti pādābhimukhaṃ namāpetvā. Dūre vandantopi hi pāde vandatīti
tika-vin08t:806_1: vuccatīti. Upajjhāyena vāti ettha yassa santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhāti, ayaṃ upajjhāyo.
tika-vin08t:806_2: Yaṃ ābhisamācārikesu vinayanatthāya ācariyaṃ katvā niyyātenti, ayaṃ ācariyo. Sace
tika-vin08t:806_3: pana upajjhāyo sayameva sabbaṃ sikkhāpeti, aññampi na niyyāteti, upajjhāyovassa ācariyopi
tika-vin08t:806_4: hoti. Yathā upasampadākāle sayameva kammavācaṃ vācento upajjhāyova kammavācācariyopi hotīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:807_1: ettha uraādīni ṭhānāni, saṃvutādīni karaṇānīti veditabbāni. Anunāsikantaṃ katvā dānakāle
tika-vin08t:807_2: antarāvicchedaṃ akatvā dātabbānīti dassetuṃ “ekasambandhānī”ti vuttaṃ. Vicchinditvāti
tika-vin08t:808_2: pūretabbaṃ. Tattha ca kattabbassa akaraṇe, akattabbassa ca karaṇe daṇḍakammāraho
tika-vin08t:808_3: hotīti dīpetīti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Anunāsikantaṃ katvā dānakāle antarāvicchedo
tika-vin08t:808_4: na kātabboti āha “ekasambandhānī”ti. Ābhisamācārikesu vinetabboti iminā sekhiyavattākkhandhakavattesu,
tika-vin08t:808_5: aññesu ca sukkavissaṭṭhiādilokavajjasikkhāpadesu ca sāmaṇerehi vattitabbaṃ, tattha
tika-vin08t:808_6: avattamāno alajjī daṇḍakammāraho ca hotīti dassetīti vimativinodaniyaṃ.
tika-vin08t:809_0: Urādīni ṭhānāni nāma, saṃvutādīni karaṇāni nāma. Anunāsikantaṃ katvā ekasambandhaṃ
tika-vin08t:809_1: katvā dānakāle antarā aṭṭhatvā vattabbaṃ, vicchinditvā dānakālepi yathāvuttaṭṭhāne
tika-vin08t:809_2: eva vicchedo, aññatra na vaṭṭatīti likhitaṃ, anunāsikante dīyamāne khalitvā “buddhaṃ
tika-vin08t:809_3: saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti ma-kārena missībhūte khette otiṇṇattā vaṭṭatīti upatissatthero.
tika-vin08t:809_4: Missaṃ katvā vattuṃ vaṭṭati, vacanakāle pana anunāsikaṭṭhāne vicchedaṃ akatvā vattabbanti
tika-vin08t:809_5: dhammasiritthero. “Evaṃ kammavācāyampī”ti vuttaṃ. Ubhatosuddhiyāva vaṭṭatīti ettha
tika-vin08t:809_6: mahāthero patitadantādikāraṇatāya acaturassaṃ katvā vadati, byattasāmaṇero samīpe
tika-vin08t:809_7: ṭhito pabbajjāpekkhaṃ byattaṃ vadāpeti, mahātherena avuttaṃ vadāpetīti na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:809_8: Kammavācāya itaro bhikkhu ce vadati, vaṭṭatīti. Saṅgho hi kammaṃ karoti, na puggaloti.
tika-vin08t:809_9: Na, nānāsīmapavattakammavācāsāmaññanayena paṭikkhipitabbattā. Atha therena caturassaṃ
tika-vin08t:809_10: vuttaṃ pabbajjāpekkhaṃ vattuṃ asakkontaṃ sāmaṇero sayaṃ vatvā vadāpeti, ubhatosuddhi
tika-vin08t:809_11: eva hoti therena vuttasseva vuttattā. “Buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchanto asādhāraṇe buddhaguṇaṃ,
tika-vin08t:809_12: dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchanto nibbānaṃ, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchanto sekkhadhammaṃ asekkhadhammañca
tika-vin08t:809_13: saraṇaṃ gacchatī”ti aggahitaggahaṇavasena yojanā kātabbā. Aññathā saraṇattayasaṅkaradoso.
tika-vin08t:809_16: Tattha cārittassa akaraṇe, vārittassa karaṇe daṇḍakammāraho hotī”ti dīpetīti vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ āgato.
tika-vin08t:810_0: Anujānāmi bhikkhave sāmaṇerānaṃ dasa sikkhāpadānītiādīsu sikkhitabbāni padāni sikkhāpadāni,
tika-vin08t:810_1: sikkhākoṭṭhāsāti attho. Sikkhāya vā padāni sikkhāpadāni, adhisīlaadhicittaadhipaññāsikkhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:810_2: adhigamupāyoti attho. Atthato pana kāmāvacarakusalacittasampayuttā viratiyo, taṃsampayuttadhammā
tika-vin08t:810_3: panettha taggahaṇeneva gahetabbā. Pāṇoti paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ, tassa atipātanaṃ
tika-vin08t:810_4: pabandhavasena pavattituṃ adatvā satthādīhi atikkamma abhibhavitvā pātanaṃ pāṇātipāto,
tika-vin08t:810_5: pāṇavadhoti attho. So pana atthato pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā
tika-vin08t:810_6: vadhakacetanāva, tasmā pāṇātipātā veramaṇi, verahetutāya verasaṅkhātaṃ pāṇātipātādipāpadhammaṃ
tika-vin08t:810_7: maṇati nīharatīti virati “veramaṇī”ti vuccati. Viramati etāyāti vā “viramatī”ti vattabbe
tika-vin08t:810_8: niruttinayena “veramaṇī”ti samādānavirati vuttā. Esa nayo sesesupi.
tika-vin08t:811_0: Adinnassa ādānaṃ adinnādānaṃ, theyyacetanā. Abramhacariyanti aseṭṭhacariyaṃ, maggenamaggapaṭipattisamuṭṭhāpikā
tika-vin08t:811_1: methunacetanā. Musāti abhūtavatthu, tassa vādo abhūtaṃ ñatvāva bhūtato viññāpanacetanā
tika-vin08t:811_2: musāvādo. Piṭṭhapūvādinibbattā surā ceva pupphāsavādibhedaṃ merayañca surāmerayaṃ.
tika-vin08t:811_3: Tadeva madanīyaṭṭhena majjañceva pamādakāraṇaṭṭhena pamādaṭṭhānañca, taṃ yāya cetanāya
tika-vin08t:812_0: Aruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya yāva majjhanhikā, ayaṃ ariyānaṃ bhojanassa kālo nāma, tadañño
tika-vin08t:812_1: vikālo. Bhuñjitabbaṭṭhena bhojananti idha sabbaṃ yāvakālikaṃ vuccati, tassa ajjhoharaṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:812_2: idha uttarapadalopena bhojananti adhippetaṃ. Vikāle bhojanaṃ ajjhoharaṇaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ,
tika-vin08t:812_3: vikāle vāyāvakālikassa bhojanaṃ ajjhoharaṇaṃ vikālabhojanantipi attho gahetabbo,
tika-vin08t:813_0: Sāsanassa ananulomattā visūkaṃ paṭāṇībhūtaṃ dassanaṃ “visūkadassanaṃ, naccagītādidassanasavanānañceva
tika-vin08t:813_1: vaṭṭakayuddhajūtakīḷādisabbakīḷānañca nāmaṃ. Dassananti cettha pañcannampi viññāṇānaṃ
tika-vin08t:813_2: yathāsakaṃ visayassa ālocanasabhāvatāya dassanasaddena saṅgahetabbattā savanampi
tika-vin08t:813_3: saṅgahitaṃ. Naccagītavāditasaddehi cettha attano naccanagāyanādīnipi saṅgahitānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:814_0: Mālāti baddhamabaddhaṃ vā pupphaṃ, antamaso suttādimayampi alaṅkāratthāya piḷandhiyamānaṃ
tika-vin08t:814_1: mālātveva vuccati. Gandhanti vāsacuṇṇādivilepanato aññaṃ yaṃ kiñci gandhajātaṃ. Vilepananti
tika-vin08t:814_2: pisitvā gahitaṃ chavirāgakaraṇañceva gandhajātañca. Dhāraṇaṃ nāma piḷandhanaṃ. Maṇḍanaṃ
tika-vin08t:814_3: nāma ūnaṭṭhānapūraṇaṃ. Gandhavasena, chavirāgavasena vā sādiyanaṃ vibhūsanaṃ nāma,
tika-vin08t:814_4: mālādīsu vā dhāraṇādīni yathākkamaṃ yojetabbāni. Tesaṃ dhāraṇādīnaṃ ṭhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ vītikkamacetanā.
tika-vin08t:815_0: Uccāti ucca-saddena samānattho nipāto. Uccāsayanaṃ vuccati pamāṇātikkantaṃ āsandādi.
tika-vin08t:815_1: Mahāsayanaṃ akappiyattharaṇehi atthataṃ salohitavitānañca. Etesu hi āsanaṃ sayanañca
tika-vin08t:815_3: ettha rajatasaddena dārumāsakādi sabbaṃ rūpiyaṃ saṅgahitaṃ. Muttāmaṇiādayopettha
tika-vin08t:815_4: dhaññakkhettavatthādayo ca saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā. Paṭiggahaṇa-saddena pana paṭiggāhāpanasādiyanānipi saṅgahitāni.
tika-vin08t:816_0: 149. Senāsanaggāho ca paṭippassambhantīti iminā vassacchedaṃ dasseti. Upasampannānampi
tika-vin08t:816_2: paṭippassambhati, saṅghalābhampi te na labhantīti veditabbaṃ. Purimikāya puna saraṇāni
tika-vin08t:816_3: gahitānīti saraṇagahaṇena saha tadahevassa vassūpagamanampi dasseti. Pacchimikāya
tika-vin08t:816_5: vā vassāvāsikañca cīvaramāsesu saṅghe uppannakālacīvarañca purimikāya upagantvā avipannasīlo
tika-vin08t:816_6: sāmaṇero labhati eva. Sace pacchimikāya gahitānīti pacchimikāya vassūpagamanañca
tika-vin08t:816_7: chinnavassatañca dasseti. Tassa hi kālacīvaralābho na pāpuṇāti, tasmā “apaloketvā
tika-vin08t:816_8: lābho dātabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Vassāvāsikalābho pana yadi senāsanassāmikā dāyakā senāsanaguttatthāya
tika-vin08t:816_9: pacchimikāya upagantvā vattaṃ katvā attano senāsane vasantassapi vassāvāsikaṃ dātabbanti
tika-vin08t:816_10: vadanti, anapaloketvāpi dātabbova. Yaṃ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “pacchimikāya vassāvāsikaṃ
tika-vin08t:816_11: lacchatīti pacchimikāya puna vassaṃ upagatattā lacchatī”ti vuttaṃ, tampi vassāvāsike
tika-vin08t:816_12: dāyakānaṃ imaṃ adhippāyaṃ nissāya vuttañce, sundaraṃ, saṅghikaṃ, kālacīvarampi sandhāya
tika-vin08t:817_0: Na ajānitvāti “surā”ti ajānitvā pivato pāṇātipātāveramaṇiādisabbasīlabhedaṃ saraṇabhedañca
tika-vin08t:817_1: na āpajjati. Akusalaṃ pana surāpānāveramaṇisīlabhedo ca hoti mālādidhāraṇādīsu viyāti
tika-vin08t:817_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Itarānīti vikālabhojanāveramaṇiādīni. Tānipi hi sañcicca vītikkamantassa
tika-vin08t:817_3: taṃ taṃ bhijjati eva, itarītaresaṃ pana abhijjanena nāsanaṅgāni na honti. Teneva
tika-vin08t:818_0: Accayaṃ desāpetabboti “accayo maṃ bhante accāgamā”tiādinā saṅghamajjhe desāpetvā
tika-vin08t:818_1: saraṇasīlaṃ dātabbanti adhippāyo pārājikattā tesaṃ. Tenāha “liṅganāsanāya nāsetabbo”ti.
tika-vin08t:818_2: Ayameva hi nāsanā idhādhippetāti liṅganāsanākāraṇehi pāṇātipātādīhi avaṇṇabhāsanādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:818_3: saha patitattā vuttaṃ. Nanu ca kaṇṭakasāmaṇeropi micchādiṭṭhiko eva, tassa ca heṭṭhā
tika-vin08t:818_4: daṇḍakammanāsanāva vuttā, idha pana micchādiṭṭhikassa liṅganāsanā vuccati, ko imesaṃ
tika-vin08t:818_5: bhedoti codanaṃ manasi nidhāyāha “sassatucchedānañhi aññataradiṭṭhiko”ti. Ettha cāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:818_6: adhippāyo – yo hi “attā issaro”ti vā “nicco dhuvo”tiādinā vā “attā ucchijjissati
tika-vin08t:818_7: vinassissatī”tiādinā vā titthiyaparikappitaṃ yaṃ kiñci sassatucchedadiṭṭhiṃ daḷhaṃ
tika-vin08t:818_8: gahetvā voharati, tassa sā pārājikaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, so ca liṅganāsanāya nāsetabbo. Yo
tika-vin08t:818_9: pana īdisaṃ diṭṭhiṃ aggahetvā sāsanikova hutvā kevalaṃ buddhavacanādhippāyaṃ viparītato
tika-vin08t:818_10: gahetvā bhikkhūhi ovadiyamānopi appaṭinissajjitvā voharati, tassa sā diṭṭhi pārājikaṃ
tika-vin08t:818_11: na hoti, so pana kaṇṭakanāsanāya eva nāsetabboti vimativinodaniyaṃ. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne
tika-vin08t:818_12: sāratthadīpaniyaṃ dasasikkhāpadato paṭṭhāya vitthārato vaṇṇanā āgatā, sā porāṇaṭīkāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:818_13: sabbaso potthakaṃ āruḷhā, tasmā idha na vitthārayimha.
tika-vin08t:819_0: 150. “Attano pariveṇanti idaṃ puggalikaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:819_1: Ayaṃ panettha gaṇṭhipadakārānaṃ adhippāyo – vassaggena pattasenāsananti iminā tassa
tika-vin08t:819_2: vassaggena pattaṃ saṅghikasenāsanaṃ vuttaṃ. Attano pariveṇanti imināpi tasseva puggalikasenāsanaṃ
tika-vin08t:819_3: vuttanti. Ayaṃ panettha amhākaṃ khanti – yattha vā vasatīti iminā saṅghikaṃ vā hotu
tika-vin08t:819_4: puggalikaṃ vā, tassa nibaddhavasanakasenāsanaṃ vuttaṃ. Yattha vā paṭikkamatīti iminā
tika-vin08t:819_5: pana yaṃ ācariyupajjhāyassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ upaṭṭhānādinimittaṃ nibaddhaṃ pavisati,
tika-vin08t:819_6: taṃ ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ pavisanaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ “ubhayenapi
tika-vin08t:819_7: attano pariveṇañca vassaggena pattasenāsanañca vutta”nti āha. Tattha attano pariveṇanti
tika-vin08t:819_8: iminā ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ nivāsanaṭṭhānaṃ dassitaṃ, vassaggena pattasenāsananti iminā
tika-vin08t:819_9: pana tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ, tasmā tadubhayampi saṅghikaṃ vā hotu puggalikaṃ vā, āvaraṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:819_10: kātabbamevāti. Mukhadvārikanti mukhadvārena bhuñjitabbaṃ. Daṇḍakammaṃ katvāti daṇḍakammaṃ
tika-vin08t:819_11: yojetvā. Daṇḍenti vinenti etenāti daṇḍo, soyeva kattabbattā kammanti daṇḍakammaṃ,
tika-vin08t:819_12: āvaraṇādi. Daṇḍakammamassa karothāti assa daṇḍakammaṃ yojetha āṇāpetha. Daṇḍakammanti
tika-vin08t:819_13: vā niggahakammaṃ, tasmā niggahamassa karothāti vuttaṃ hoti. Esa nayo sabbattha īdisesu ṭhānesu.
tika-vin08t:820_0: Senāsanaggāho ca paṭippassambhantīti iminā chinnavasso hotīti dīpeti. Sace ākiṇṇadosova
tika-vin08t:820_1: hoti, āyatiṃ saṃvare na tiṭṭhati, nikkaḍḍhitabboti ettha sace yāvatatiyaṃ vuccamāno
tika-vin08t:820_2: na oramati, saṅghaṃ apaloketvā nāsetabbo, puna pabbajjaṃ yācamānopi apaloketvā pabbājetabboti
tika-vin08t:820_3: vadanti. Pacchimikāya vassāvāsikaṃ lacchatīti pacchimikāya puna vassaṃ upagatattā
tika-vin08t:820_4: lacchati. Apaloketvā lābho dātabboti chinnavassatāya vuttaṃ. Itarāni pañca sikkhāpadānīti
tika-vin08t:820_5: vikālabhojanādīni pañca. Accayaṃ desāpetabboti “accayo maṃ bhante accāgamā”tiādinā
tika-vin08t:825_0: Evaṃ pabbajjāvinicchayaṃ kathetvā tadanantaraṃ upasampadāvinicchayo kathetabbo, evaṃ
tika-vin08t:825_1: santepi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ upasampadāvinicchayakathā pāḷivaṇṇanāvaseneva āgatā, no pāḷimuttakavinicchayavasena,
tika-vin08t:825_2: imassa pana pakaraṇassa pāḷimuttakavinicchayakathābhūtattā tamakathetvā nissayavinicchayo
tika-vin08t:825_3: eva ācariyena kathito, mayaṃ pana upasampadāvinicchayassa atisukhumattā atigambhīrattā
tika-vin08t:825_4: sudullabhattā sāsanānuggahatthaṃ ācariyena avuttampi samantapāsādikato nīharitvā
tika-vin08t:825_5: vimativinodanīādippakaraṇesu āgatavinicchayena alaṅkaritvā taṃ vinicchayaṃ kathayissāma.
tika-vin08t:826_0: Tena kho pana samayenāti yena samayena bhagavatā “na bhikkhave anupajjhāyako”tiādisikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin08t:826_1: apaññattaṃ hoti, tena samayena. Anupajjhāyakanti upajjhaṃ agāhāpetvā sabbena sabbaṃ
tika-vin08t:826_2: upajjhāyavirahitaṃ, evaṃ upasampannā neva dhammato na āmisato saṅgahaṃ labhanti,
tika-vin08t:826_3: te parihāyantiyeva, na vaḍḍhanti. Na bhikkhave anupajjhāyakoti upajjhaṃ agāhāpetvā
tika-vin08t:826_4: nirupajjhāyako na upasampādetabbo, yo upasampādeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassāti sikkhāpadapaññattito
tika-vin08t:826_5: paṭṭhāya evaṃ upasampādentassa āpatti hoti, kammaṃ pana na kuppati. Keci “kuppatī”ti
tika-vin08t:826_6: vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. “Saṅghena upajjhāyenā”tiādīsupi ubhatobyañjanakupajjhāyapariyosānesu eseva nayo.
tika-vin08t:827_0: Apattakā hatthesu piṇḍāya carantīti yo hatthesu piṇḍo labbhati, tadatthāya caranti.
tika-vin08t:827_1: Seyyathāpi titthiyāti yathā ājīvakanāmakā titthiyā. Sūpabyañjanehi missetvā hatthesu
tika-vin08t:827_2: ṭhapitapiṇḍameva hi te bhuñjanti. Āpatti dukkaṭassāti evaṃ upasampādentasseva āpatti
tika-vin08t:827_3: hoti, kammaṃ pana na kuppati, acīvarakādivatthūsupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin08t:828_0: Yācitakenāti “yāva upasampadaṃ karoma, tāva dethā”ti yācitvā gahitena, tāvakālikenāti
tika-vin08t:828_1: attho. Īdisena hi pattena vā cīvarena vā pattacīvarena vā upasampādentasseva āpatti
tika-vin08t:828_2: hoti, kammaṃ pana na kuppati, tasmā paripuṇṇapattacīvarova upasampādetabbo. Sace
tika-vin08t:828_3: tassa natthi, ācariyupajjhāyā cassa dātukāmā honti, aññe vā bhikkhū, nirapekkhehi
tika-vin08t:829_0: Gottenapi anussāvetunti “mahākassapassa upasampadāpekkho”ti evaṃ gottaṃ vatvā anussāvetuṃ
tika-vin08t:829_1: anujānāmīti attho. Dve ekānussāvaneti dve ekato anussāvane, ekena ekassa, aññena
tika-vin08t:829_2: itarassāti evaṃ dvīhi vā ācariyehi ekena vā ekakkhaṇe kammavācaṃ anussāventehi upasampādetuṃ
tika-vin08t:829_3: anujānāmīti attho. Dve tayo ekānussāvane kātuṃ, tañca kho ekena upajjhāyenāti dve
tika-vin08t:829_4: vā tayo vā jane purimanayeneva ekato anussāvane kātuṃ anujānāmi, tañca kho anussāvanakiriyaṃ
tika-vin08t:829_5: ekena upajjhāyena anujānāmīti attho. Tasmā ekena ācariyena dve vā tayo vā anussāvetabbā.
tika-vin08t:829_6: Dvīhi vā tīhi vā ācariyehi visuṃ visuṃ ekena ekassāti evaṃ ekappahāreneva dve tisso
tika-vin08t:829_7: vā kammavācā kātabbā. Sace pana nānācariyā nānupajjhāyā honti, tissatthero sumanattherassa
tika-vin08t:829_8: saddhivihārikaṃ, sumanatthero tissattherassa saddhivihārikaṃ anussāveti, aññamaññañca
tika-vin08t:829_9: gaṇapūrakā honti, vaṭṭati. Sace nānupajjhāyā honti, eko ācariyo hoti, “na tveva nānupajjhāyenā”ti
tika-vin08t:829_10: paṭikkhittattā na vaṭṭati. Idaṃ sandhāya hi esa paṭikkhepo.
tika-vin08t:830_0: Paṭhamaṃ upajjhaṃ gāhāpetabboti ettha vajjāvajjaṃ upanijjhāyatīti upajjhā, taṃ upajjhaṃ
tika-vin08t:830_1: “upajjhāyo me, bhante, hohī”ti evaṃ vadāpetvā gāhāpetabbo. Vitthāyantīti vitthaddhagattā
tika-vin08t:830_2: honti. Yaṃ jātanti yaṃ tava sarīre jātaṃ nibbattaṃ vijjamānaṃ, taṃ saṅghamajjhe pucchante
tika-vin08t:830_3: santaṃ atthīti vattabbantiādi. Ullumpatu manti uddharatu maṃ.
tika-vin08t:831_0: Tāvadevāti upasampannasamanantarameva. Chāyā metabbāti ekaporisā vā dviporisā vāti
tika-vin08t:831_1: chāyā metabbā. Utuppamāṇaṃ ācikkhitabbanti “vassāno hemanto gimho”ti utuppamāṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:831_2: ācikkhitabbaṃ. Ettha ca utuyeva utuppamāṇaṃ. Sace vassānādayo aparipuṇṇā honti, yattakehi
tika-vin08t:831_3: divasehi yassa yo utu aparipuṇṇo, te divase sallakkhetvā so divasabhāgo ācikkhitabbo.
tika-vin08t:831_4: Atha vā “ayaṃ nāma utu, so ca kho paripuṇṇo aparipuṇṇo vā”ti evaṃ utuppamāṇaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:831_5: “pubbaṇho vā sāyanho vā”ti evaṃ divasabhāgo ācikkhitabbo. Saṅgītīti idameva sabbaṃ
tika-vin08t:831_6: ekato katvā “tvaṃ kiṃ labhasi, kā te chāyā, kiṃ utuppamāṇaṃ, ko divasabhāgo”ti puṭṭho
tika-vin08t:831_7: “idaṃ nāma labhāmi vassaṃ vā hemantaṃ vā gimhaṃ vā, ayaṃ me chāyā, idaṃ utuppamāṇaṃ,
tika-vin08t:832_0: Ohāyāti chaḍḍetvā. Dutiyaṃ dātunti upasampadamāḷakato pariveṇaṃ gacchantassa dutiyakaṃ
tika-vin08t:832_1: dātuṃ anujānāmi, cattāri ca akaraṇīyāni ācikkhitunti attho. Paṇḍupalāsoti paṇḍuvaṇṇo
tika-vin08t:832_2: patto. Bandhanā pavuttoti vaṇṭato patito. Abhabbo haritatthāyāti puna harito bhavituṃ
tika-vin08t:832_3: abhabbo. Puthusilāti mahāsilā. Ayaṃ samantapāsādikato nīharitvā ābhato upasampadāvinicchayo.
tika-vin08t:833_1: idheva paññāpiyamānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kammaṃ pana na kuppatīti idaṃ
tika-vin08t:833_3: vā vibbhantassa vā purāṇaupajjhāyassa, aññassa vā yassa kassaci avijjamānassapi nāmena
tika-vin08t:833_4: sabbattha upajjhāyakittanassa katattā vuttaṃ. Yadi hi upajjhāyakittanaṃ na kareyya,
tika-vin08t:833_5: “puggalaṃ na parāmasatī”ti vuttakammavipatti eva siyā. Teneva pāḷiyaṃ “anupajjhāyaka”nti
tika-vin08t:833_6: vuttaṃ, aṭṭhakathāyampi assa “upajjhāyaṃ akittetvā”ti avatvā “upajjhāyaṃ agāhāpetvā
tika-vin08t:833_7: sabbena sabbaṃ upajjhāyavirahitaṃ” icceva attho vutto. Pāḷiyaṃ saṅghena upajjhāyenāti
tika-vin08t:833_8: “ayaṃ itthannāmo saṅghassa upasampadāpekkho, itthannāmo saṅghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācati
tika-vin08t:833_9: saṅghena upajjhāyenā”ti evaṃ kammavācāya saṅghameva upajjhāyaṃ kittetvāti attho.
tika-vin08t:833_10: Evaṃ gaṇena upajjhāyenāti etthāpi “ayaṃ itthannāmo gaṇassa upasampadāpekkho”tiādinā
tika-vin08t:833_11: yojanā veditabbā. Evaṃ vuttepi kammaṃ na kuppati eva dukkaṭasseva vuttattā, aññathā
tika-vin08t:833_12: “so ca puggalo anupasampanno”ti vadeyya. Tenāha “saṅghenā”tiādi. Tattha paṇḍakādiupajjhāyehi
tika-vin08t:833_13: kariyamānesu kammesu paṇḍakādike vināva yadi pañcavaggādigaṇo pūrati, kammaṃ na kuppati,
tika-vin08t:834_1: sāvitattā kammakopaṃ avatvā dukkaṭameva vuttaṃ. Itarathā sāvanāya hāpanato kammakopo
tika-vin08t:834_2: eva siyā. Keci pana “paṭhamaṃ anuññātakammavācāyaṃ upasampannā viya idānipi ‘paripuṇṇassa
tika-vin08t:834_3: pattacīvara’nti avatvā kammavācāya upasampannāpi sūpasampannā evā”ti vadanti, taṃ
tika-vin08t:834_4: na yuttaṃ. Anuññātakālato paṭṭhāya hi aparāmasanaṃ sāvanāya hāpanavipatti eva hoti
tika-vin08t:834_5: “itthannāmo saṅghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācatī”ti padassa hāpane viya. Tampi hi pacchā anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin08t:834_6: “saṅghaṃ, bhante, upasampadaṃ yācāmī”tiādivākyena ayācetvā tampi upasampādento “ayaṃ
tika-vin08t:834_7: itthannāmo saṅghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācatī”ti vatvāva yadi kammavācaṃ karoti, kammaṃ sukatameva
tika-vin08t:834_8: hoti. No ce, vipannaṃ. Sabbapacchā hi anuññātakammavācato kiñcipi parihāpetuṃ na
tika-vin08t:834_9: vaṭṭati, sāvanāya hāpanameva hoti, aññe vā bhikkhū dātukāmā hontīti sambandho, ayamettha
tika-vin08t:834_10: vimativinodaniyā ābhato vinicchayo. Sāratthadīpanīvinicchayo pana idheva antogadhā
tika-vin08t:835_0: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “keci kuppatīti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabba”nti yaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:835_1: taṃ “pañcavaggakaraṇīyañce, bhikkhave, kammaṃ, bhikkhunipañcamo kammaṃ kareyya, akammaṃ
tika-vin08t:835_2: na ca karaṇīya”ntiādinā nayena vuttattā paṇḍakānaṃ gaṇapūraṇabhāve eva kammaṃ kuppati,
tika-vin08t:835_3: na sabbanti katvā suvuttaṃ, itarathā “paṇḍakupajjhāyena kammaṃ kareyya, akammaṃ na
tika-vin08t:835_4: ca karaṇīya”ntiādikāya pāḷiyā bhavitabbaṃ siyā. Yathā aparipuṇṇapattacīvarassa upasampādanakāle
tika-vin08t:835_5: kammavācāyaṃ “paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara”nti asantaṃ vatthuṃ kittetvā upasampadāya
tika-vin08t:835_6: katāya tasmiṃ asantepi upasampadā ruhati, evaṃ “ayaṃ buddharakkhito āyasmato dhammarakkhitassa
tika-vin08t:835_7: upasampadāpekkho”ti avatthuṃ paṇḍakupajjhāyādiṃ, asantaṃ vā vatthuṃ kittetvā katāyapi
tika-vin08t:835_8: gaṇapūrakānamatthitāya upasampadā ruhateva. “Na, bhikkhave, paṇḍakupajjhāyena upasampādetabbo,
tika-vin08t:835_9: yo upasampādeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa, so ca puggalo anupasampanno”tiādivacanassa abhāvā
tika-vin08t:835_10: ayamattho siddhova hoti. Na hi buddhā vattabbayuttaṃ na vadanti. Tena vuttaṃ “yo
tika-vin08t:835_11: pana bhikkhu jānaṃ ūnavīsativassaṃ …pe… so ca puggalo anupasampanno”tiādi. Tathā
tika-vin08t:835_12: “byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo”ti vacanato theyyasaṃvāsakādiācariyehi
tika-vin08t:835_13: anussāvanāya katāya upasampadā na ruhati tesaṃ abhikkhuttāti vacanampi na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:836_0: Kiñca bhiyyo – “imāni cattāri kammāni pañcahākārehi vipajjantī”tiādinā nayena kammānaṃ
tika-vin08t:836_1: sampattivipattiyā kathiyamānāya “sattahi ākārehi kammāni vipajjanti vatthuto vā ñattito
tika-vin08t:836_2: vā anussāvanato vā sīmato vā parisato vā upajjhāyato vā ācariyato vā”ti akathitattā
tika-vin08t:836_3: na gahetabbaṃ. “Parisato vā”ti vacanena ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ vā saṅgaho katoti ce?
tika-vin08t:836_4: Na, “dvādasahi ākārehi parisato kammāni vipajjantī”ti etassa vibhaṅge tesamanāmaṭṭhattā,
tika-vin08t:836_5: ayamattho yasmā tattha tattha sarūpena vuttapāḷivaseneva sakkā jānituṃ, tasmā nayamukhaṃ
tika-vin08t:837_0: Tatridaṃ vicāretabbaṃ – anupajjhāyakaṃ upasampādentā te bhikkhū yathāvuttanayena
tika-vin08t:837_1: abhūtaṃ vatthuṃ kittayiṃsu, udāhu musāvādabhayā tāneva padāni na sāvesunti. Kiñcettha
tika-vin08t:837_2: – yadi tāva upajjhāyābhāvato na sāvesuṃ, “puggalaṃ na parāmasatī”ti vuttavipattippasaṅgo
tika-vin08t:837_3: hoti, atha sāvesuṃ, musāvādo nesaṃ bhavatīti? Vuccate – sāvesuṃyeva yathāvuttavipattippasaṅgabhayā,
tika-vin08t:837_4: “kammaṃ pana na kuppatī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā ca. Na, musāvādassa asambhavato,
tika-vin08t:837_5: musāvādenapi kammasambhavato ca. Na hi sakkā musāvādena kammavipattisampattiṃ kātunti.
tika-vin08t:837_6: Tasmā “anupajjhāyakaṃ upasampādentī”ti vacanassa ca ubhayadosavinimutto attho pariyesitabbo.
tika-vin08t:838_0: Ayañcettha yutti – yathā pubbe pabbajjupasampadupajjhāyesu vijjamānesupi upajjhāyaggahaṇakkamena
tika-vin08t:838_1: aggahitattā “tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū anupajjhāyaka”ntiādi vuttaṃ, tathā idhāpi
tika-vin08t:838_2: upajjhāyassa vijjamānasseva sato aggahitattā “anupajjhāyakaṃ upasampādentī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:838_3: Kammavācācariyena pana “gahito tena upajjhāyo”ti saññāya upajjhāyaṃ kittetvā kammavācaṃ
tika-vin08t:838_4: sāvetabbaṃ. Kenaci vā kāraṇena kāyasāmaggiṃ adentassa upajjhāyassa chandaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin08t:838_5: kammavācaṃ sāveti, upajjhāyo vā upasampadāpekkhassa upajjhaṃ datvā pacchā upasampanne
tika-vin08t:838_6: tasmiṃ tādise vatthusmiṃ samanuyuñjiyamāno vā asamanuyuñjiyamāno vā upajjhāyadānato
tika-vin08t:838_7: pubbe eva sāmaṇero paṭijānāti, sikkhāpaccakkhātako vā antimavatthuajjhāpannako vā
tika-vin08t:838_8: paṭijānāti, chandahārakādayo viya upajjhāyo vā aññasīmāgato hoti. Kammavācā ruhatīti
tika-vin08t:838_9: vatvā “anujānāmi bhikkhave paccantimesu janapadesu vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena upasampada”nti
tika-vin08t:838_10: vuttattā. Keci “vinayadharapañcamena upajjhāyena sannihiteneva bhavitabba”nti vadantīti
tika-vin08t:838_11: porāṇagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. So ca pāṭho appamāṇo majjhimesu janapadesu tassa vacanassābhāvato.
tika-vin08t:838_12: Asannihitepi upajjhāye kammavācā ruhatīti āpajjatīti ce? Na. Kasmā? Kammasampattiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:838_13: “puggalaṃ parāmasatī”ti vuttapāṭhova no pamāṇaṃ. Na hi tattha asannihito upajjhāyasaṅkhāto
tika-vin08t:838_14: puggalo parāmasanaṃ arahati, tasmā tattha saṅghaparāmasanaṃ viya puggalaparāmasanaṃ
tika-vin08t:838_15: veditabbaṃ. Saṅghena gaṇena upajjhāyena upasampādenti tesaṃ atthato puggalattā, paṇḍakādiupajjhāyena
tika-vin08t:839_1: kevalaṃ atthasampattiṃ anapekkhitvā santapadanīhārena vā “paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara”nti
tika-vin08t:839_2: kammavācaṃ sāveti. Yathā etarahi matavippavuttamātāpitikopi “anuññātosi mātāpitūhī”ti
tika-vin08t:839_3: puṭṭho “āma bhante”ti vadati, kiṃ bahunā? Ayaṃ panettha sāro – “tasmiṃ samaye cattāri
tika-vin08t:839_4: kammāni pañcahākārehi vipajjantī”ti lakkhaṇassa na tāva paññattattā anupajjhāyakādiṃ
tika-vin08t:839_5: upasampādenti. Vajjanīyapuggalānaṃ avuttattā paṇḍakupajjhāyādiṃ upasampādenti, terasantarāyapucchāya
tika-vin08t:839_6: adassanattā apattacīvarakaṃ upasampādenti, “anujānāmi bhikkhave ñatticatutthena kammena
tika-vin08t:839_7: upasampādetu”nti evaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ anuññātāya kammavācāya “paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara”nti
tika-vin08t:839_8: avacanamettha sādhakanti veditabbaṃ. Tañhi vacanaṃ anukkamenānuññātanti.
tika-vin08t:840_0: Idaṃ tāva sabbathā hotu, “mūgaṃ pabbājenti badhiraṃ pabbājentī”ti idaṃ kathaṃ sambhavitumarahati
tika-vin08t:840_1: ādito paṭṭhāya “anujānāmi bhikkhave imehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajja”ntiādinā anuññātattāti?
tika-vin08t:840_2: Vuccate – “evañca pana, bhikkhave, pabbājetabboti, evaṃ vadehīti vattabbo…pe… tatiyampi
tika-vin08t:840_3: saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti ettha “evaṃ vadehīti vattabbo”ti imassa vacanassa micchā
tika-vin08t:840_4: atthaṃ gahetvā mūgaṃ pabbājesuṃ. “Evaṃ vadehī”ti taṃ pabbajjāpekkhaṃ āṇāpetvā sayaṃ
tika-vin08t:840_5: upajjhāyena vattabbo “tatiyampi saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti, so pabbajjāpekkhā tathā
tika-vin08t:840_6: āṇatto upajjhāyavacanassa anu anu vadatu vā mā vā, tattha tattha bhagavā “kāyena
tika-vin08t:840_7: viññāpeti, vācāya viññāpeti, kāyena vācāya viññāpeti, gahito hoti upajjhāyo. Dinno
tika-vin08t:840_8: hoti chando, dinnā hoti pārisuddhi, dinnā hoti pavāraṇā”ti vadati. Tadanumānena vā
tika-vin08t:840_9: kāyena tena pabbajjāpekkhena viññattaṃ hoti saraṇagamananti vā lokepi kāyena viññāpento
tika-vin08t:840_10: evaṃ vadatīti vuccati, taṃ pariyāyaṃ gahetvā mūgaṃ pabbājentīti veditabbaṃ. Porāṇagaṇṭhipade
tika-vin08t:840_11: “mūgaṃ kathaṃ pabbājentīti pucchaṃ katvā tassa kāyapasādasambhavato kāyena pahāraṃ
tika-vin08t:840_12: datvā hatthamuddāya viññāpetvā pabbājesu”nti vuttaṃ. Kiṃ bahunā?
tika-vin08t:841_0: Ayaṃ panettha sāro – yathā pubbe pabbajjādhikāre vattamāne pabbajjābhilāpaṃ upacchinditvā
tika-vin08t:841_1: “paṇḍako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo”tiādinā nayena upasampadavaseneva
tika-vin08t:841_2: abhilāpo kato. Theyyasaṃvāsakapade asambhavato kiñcāpi so na kato, pabbajjāva tattha
tika-vin08t:841_3: katā, sabbattha pana upasampadābhilāpena adhippetā tadanubhāvato upasampadāya, pabbajjāya
tika-vin08t:841_4: vāritāya upasampadā vāritā hotīti katvā, tathā idha upasampadādhikāre vattamāne upasampadābhilāpaṃ
tika-vin08t:841_5: upacchinditvā upasampadameva sandhāya pabbajjābhilāpo katoti veditabbo. Kāmaṃ so
tika-vin08t:841_6: na kattabbo, mūgapade asambhavato tassa vasena ādito paṭṭhāya upasampadābhilāpova
tika-vin08t:841_7: kattabbo viya dissati, tathāpi tasseva mūgapadassa vasena ādito paṭṭhāya pabbajjābhilāpova
tika-vin08t:841_8: kato micchāgahaṇanivāraṇatthaṃ. Kathaṃ? “Mūgo, bhikkhave, apatto osāraṇaṃ, tañce
tika-vin08t:841_9: saṅgho osāreti, sosārito”ti vacanato hi mūgo upasampanno hotīti siddhaṃ, so kevalaṃ
tika-vin08t:841_10: upasampannova hoti, na pana pabbajito tassa pabbajjāya asambhavatoti micchāgāho hoti,
tika-vin08t:841_11: taṃ parivajjāpetvā yo upasampanno, so pabbajitova hoti. Pabbajito pana atthi koci
tika-vin08t:841_12: upasampanno, atthi koci anupasampannoti imaṃ sammāgāhaṃ uppādeti bhagavāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:842_0: Apica tesaṃ hatthacchinnādīnaṃ pabbajitānaṃ supabbajitabhāvadīpanatthaṃ, pabbajjābhāvasaṅkānivāraṇatthañcettha
tika-vin08t:842_1: pabbajjābhilāpo kato. Kathaṃ? “Na, bhikkhave, hatthacchinno pabbājetabbo”tiādinā
tika-vin08t:842_2: paṭikkhepena, “pabbajitā supabbajitā”ti vuttaṭṭhānābhāvena ca tesaṃ pabbajjābhāvasaṅkā
tika-vin08t:842_3: bhaveyya, yathā pasaṅkā bhave, tathā pasaṅkaṃ ṭhapeyya. Khandhake upasampadaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin08t:842_4: “hatthacchinno, bhikkhave, apatto osāraṇaṃ, tañce saṅgho osāreti, sosārito”tiādinā
tika-vin08t:842_5: nayena bhagavā nivāreti. Teneva nayena pabbajitā panete sabbepi supabbajitā evāti
tika-vin08t:842_6: dīpeti. Aññathā sabbepete upasampannāva honti, na pabbajitāti ayamaniṭṭhappasaṅgo
tika-vin08t:842_7: āpajjati. Kathaṃ? “Hatthacchinno, bhikkhave, na pabbājetabbo, pabbajito nāsetabbo”ti
tika-vin08t:842_8: vā “na, bhikkhave, hatthacchinno pabbājetabbo, yo pabbājeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa,
tika-vin08t:842_9: so ca apabbajito”ti vā tantiyā ṭhapitāya campeyyakkhandhake “sosārito”ti vuttattā
tika-vin08t:842_10: kevalaṃ “ime hatthacchinnādayo upasampannāva honti, na pabbajitā”ti vā “upasampannāpi
tika-vin08t:842_11: ce pabbajitā, nāsetabbā”ti vā aniṭṭhakoṭṭhāso āpajjatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:843_0: Idaṃ panettha vicāretabbaṃ – “so ca apabbajito”ti vacanābhāvato mūgassa pabbajjāsiddhipasaṅgato
tika-vin08t:843_1: pabbajjāpi ekatosuddhiyā hotīti ayamaniṭṭhakoṭṭhāso kathaṃ nāpajjatīti? Pabbajjābhilāpena
tika-vin08t:843_2: upasampadā idhādhippetāti sammāgāhena nāpajjatīti, aññathā yathābyañjanaṃ atthe gahite
tika-vin08t:843_3: yathāpaññattadukkaṭābhāvasaṅkhāto aparo aniṭṭhakoṭṭhāso āpajjati. Kathaṃ? “Na, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:843_4: mūgo pabbājetabbo, yo pabbājeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttadukkaṭaṃ pabbajjāpariyosāne
tika-vin08t:843_5: hoti, na tassāvippakatāya. Pubbapayogadukkaṭameva hi paṭhamaṃ āpajjati, tasmā mūgassa
tika-vin08t:843_6: pabbajjāpariyosānasseva abhāvato imassa dukkaṭassa okāso ca na sabbakālaṃ sambhaveyya,
tika-vin08t:843_7: upasampadāvasena pana atthe gahite sambhavati kammanibbattito. Teneva pāḷiyaṃ “na,
tika-vin08t:843_8: bhikkhave, paṇḍako upasampādetabbo, yo upasampādeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti dukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin08t:843_9: na paññattaṃ. Apaññattattā pubbapayogadukkaṭameva cettha sambhavati, netaraṃ. Ettāvatā
tika-vin08t:843_10: siddhametaṃ pabbajjābhilāpena upasampadāva tattha adhippetā, na pabbajjāti. Etthāha
tika-vin08t:843_11: sāmaṇerapabbajjā na kāyapayogato hotīti kathaṃ paññāyatīti? Vuccate – kāyena viññāpetītiādittikā dassanatoti āgato.
tika-vin08t:844_0: “Gottenapi anussāvetu”nti vacanato yena vohārena voharati, tena vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ,
tika-vin08t:844_1: tasmā “ko nāmo te upajjhāyo”ti puṭṭhenapi gottameva nāmaṃ katvā vattabbanti siddhaṃ
tika-vin08t:844_2: hoti, tasmā catubbidhesu nāmesu yena kenaci nāmena anussāvanā kātabbāti vadanti.
tika-vin08t:844_3: Ekassa bahūni nāmāni honti, tattha ekaṃ nāmaṃ ñattiyā, ekaṃ anussāvanāya kātuṃ na
tika-vin08t:844_4: vaṭṭati, atthato byañjanato ca abhinnāhi anussāvanāhi bhavitabbanti. Kiñcāpi “itthannāmo
tika-vin08t:844_5: itthannāmassa āyasmato”ti pāḷiyaṃ “āyasmato”ti padaṃ pacchā vuttaṃ, kammavācāpāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:844_6: pana “ayaṃ buddharakkhito āyasmato dhammarakkhitassā”ti paṭhamaṃ likhanti, taṃ uppaṭipāṭiyā
tika-vin08t:844_7: vuttanti na paccetabbaṃ. Pāḷiyañhi “itthannāmo itthannāmassā”ti atthamattaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-vin08t:844_8: tasmā pāḷiyaṃ avuttopi “ayaṃ buddharakkhito āyasmato dhammarakkhitassā”ti kammavācāpāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:844_9: payogo dassito. “Na me diṭṭho ito pubbe iccāyasmā sāriputto”ti ca “āyasmā sāriputto
tika-vin08t:844_10: atthakusalo”ti ca paṭhamaṃ “āyasmā”ti payogassa dassanatoti vadanti. Katthaci “āyasmato
tika-vin08t:844_11: buddharakkhitassā”ti vatvā katthaci kevalaṃ “buddharakkhitassā”ti sāveti, sāvanaṃ
tika-vin08t:844_12: hāpetīti na vuccati nāmassa ahāpitattāti eke. Sace katthaci “āyasmato buddharakkhitassā”ti
tika-vin08t:844_13: vatvā katthaci “buddharakkhitassāyasmato”ti sāveti, pāṭhānurūpattā khettameva otiṇṇantipi
tika-vin08t:844_14: eke. Byañjanabhedappasaṅgato anussāvanānaṃ taṃ na vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Sace pana sabbaṭṭhānepi
tika-vin08t:845_0: Ekānussāvaneti ettha ekato anussāvanaṃ etesanti ekānussāvanāti asamānādhikaraṇavisayo
tika-vin08t:845_1: bāhiratthasamāsoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenevāha “dve ekato anussāvane”ti. Tattha ekatoti
tika-vin08t:845_2: ekakkhaṇeti attho, vibhattialopena cāyaṃ niddeso. Purimanayeneva ekato anussāvane
tika-vin08t:845_3: kātunti “ekena ekassa, aññena itarassā”tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena dvīhi vā tīhi vā
tika-vin08t:845_4: ācariyehi ekena vā ekato anussāvane kātuṃ. Vajjāvajjaṃ upanijjhāyatīti upajjhāti
tika-vin08t:845_5: iminā upajjhāyasaddasamānattho upajjhāsaddopīti atthaṃ dassetīti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ.
tika-vin08t:846_0: Gottenāpīti “āyasmato pippalissa upasampadāpekkho”ti evaṃ nāmaṃ avatvā gottanāmenapīti
tika-vin08t:846_1: attho, tena “ko nāmo te upajjhāyo”ti puṭṭhena gottanāmena “āyasmā kassapo”ti vattabbanti
tika-vin08t:846_2: siddhaṃ hoti. Tasmā aññampi yaṃ kiñci tassa nāmaṃ pasiddhaṃ, tasmiṃ vā khaṇe sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:846_3: nāmaṃ paññāpitaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ gahetvāpi anussāvanā kātabbā. Yathā upajjhāyassa, evaṃ
tika-vin08t:846_4: upasampadāpekkhassāpi gottādināmena taṅkhaṇikanāmena ca anussāvanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t:846_5: tasmimpi khaṇe “ayaṃ tisso”ti vā “nāgo”ti vā nāmaṃ karontehi anusāsakasammutito paṭhamameva
tika-vin08t:846_6: kātabbaṃ. Evaṃ akatvāpi antarāyikadhammānusāsanapucchanakālesu “kinnāmosi, ahaṃ bhante
tika-vin08t:846_7: nāgo nāma, ko nāmo te upajjhāyo, upajjhāyo me bhante tisso nāmā”tiādinā viññāpentena
tika-vin08t:846_8: ubhinnampi citte “mametaṃ nāma”nti yathā saññaṃ uppajjati, evaṃ viññāpetabbaṃ. Sace
tika-vin08t:846_9: pana tasmiṃ khaṇe pakatināmena vatvā pacchā “tisso nāmā”ti apubbanāmena anussāveti, na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:847_0: Tattha ca kiñcāpi upajjhāyasseva nāmaṃ aggahetvā yena kenaci nāmena “tissassa upasampadāpekkho”tiādināpi
tika-vin08t:847_1: puggale parāmaṭṭhe kammaṃ sukatameva hoti anupajjhāyakādīnaṃ upasampadākammaṃ viya
tika-vin08t:847_2: upajjhāyassa abhāvepi abhabbattepi kammavācāya puggale parāmaṭṭhe kammassa sijjhanato.
tika-vin08t:847_3: Upasampadāpekkhassa pana yathāsakaṃ nāmaṃ vinā aññena nāmena anussāvite kammaṃ kuppati,
tika-vin08t:847_4: so anupasampannova hoti. Tattha ṭhito añño anupasampanno viya gahitanāmassa vatthupuggalassa
tika-vin08t:847_5: tattha abhāvā, etassa ca nāmassa anussāvanāya avuttattā. Tasmā upasampadāpekkhassa
tika-vin08t:847_6: pakatināmaṃ parivattetvā apubbena nāgādināmena anussāvitukāmena paṭikacceva “tvaṃ
tika-vin08t:847_8: ca yathā pākaṭaṃ hoti, tathā pakāsetvāva nāgādināmena anussāvetabbaṃ. Ekassa bahūni
tika-vin08t:847_9: nāmāni honti, tesu ekaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:848_0: Yaṃ pana upasampadāpekkhaupajjhāyānaṃ ekattha gahitaṃ nāmaṃ tadeva ñattiyā, sabbattha
tika-vin08t:848_1: anussāvanāsu ca gahetabbaṃ. Gahitato hi aññasmiṃ gahite byañjanaṃ bhinnaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin08t:848_2: kammaṃ vipajjati. Atthato hi byañjanato ca abhinnā eva ñatti anussāvanā ca vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin08t:848_3: Upajjhāyanāmassa pana purato “āyasmato tissassā”tiādinā āyasmantapadaṃ sabbattha
tika-vin08t:848_4: yojetvāpi anussāveti. Tathā ayojitepi doso natthi.
tika-vin08t:849_0: Pāḷiyaṃ pana kiñcāpi “itthannāmassa āyasmato”ti pacchato “āyasmato”ti padaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:849_2: dassanato puratova payogo yuttataro, tañca ekattha yojetvā aññattha ayojitepi ekattha
tika-vin08t:849_3: purato yojetvā aññattha pacchato yojanepi sāvanāya hāpanaṃ nāma na hoti nāmassa ahāpitattā.
tika-vin08t:849_4: Teneva pāḷiyampi “itthannāmassa āyasmato”ti ekattha yojetvā “itthannāmena upajjhāyenā”tiādīsu
tika-vin08t:849_5: “āyasmato”ti na yojitanti vadanti. Tañca kiñcāpi evaṃ, tathāpi sabbaṭṭhānepi ekeneva
tika-vin08t:849_6: pakārena yojetvā eva vā ayojetvā vā anussāvanaṃ pasatthataranti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:850_0: Ekato saheva ekasmiṃ khaṇe anussāvanaṃ etesanti ekānussāvanā, upasampadāpekkhā, ete
tika-vin08t:850_1: ekānussāvane kātuṃ. Tenāha “ekatoanusāvane”ti. Idañca ekaṃ padaṃ vibhattialopena
tika-vin08t:850_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ekena vāti dvinnampi ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekāya eva kammavācāya anussāvane ekena
tika-vin08t:850_3: ācariyenāti attho. “Ayaṃ buddharakkhito ca ayaṃ dhammarakkhito ca āyasmato saṅgharakkhitassa
tika-vin08t:850_4: upasampadāpekkho”tiādinā nayena ekena ācariyena dvinnamekasmiṃ khaṇe anussāvananayo
tika-vin08t:850_5: daṭṭhabbo, imināva nayena tiṇṇampi ekena ācariyena ekakkhaṇe anussāvanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:851_0: Purimanayeneva ekato anussāvane kātunti “ekena ekassa, aññena itarassā”tiādinā pubbe
tika-vin08t:851_1: vuttanayena dvinnaṃ dvīhi vā tiṇṇaṃ tīhi vā ācariyehi, ekena vā ācariyena tayopi
tika-vin08t:851_2: ekatoanussāvane kātunti attho. “Tañca kho ekena upajjhāyena, na tveva nānupajjhāyenā”ti
tika-vin08t:851_3: idaṃ ekena ācariyena dvīhi vā tīhi vā upajjhāyehi dve vā tayo vā upasampadāpekkhe
tika-vin08t:851_4: ekakkhaṇe ekāya anussāvanāya ekānussāvane kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti paṭikkhepapadaṃ, na
tika-vin08t:851_5: pana nānācariyehi nānupajjhāyehi tayo ekānussāvane kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti āha “sace pana
tika-vin08t:851_6: nānācariyā nānupajjhāyā…pe… vaṭṭatī”ti. Yañcettha “tissatthero sumanattherassa saddhivihārikaṃ,
tika-vin08t:851_7: sumanatthero tissattherassa saddhivihārika”nti evaṃ upajjhāyehi aññamaññaṃ saddhivihārikānaṃ
tika-vin08t:851_8: anussāvanakaraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ upalakkhaṇamattaṃ. Tasmā sace tissatthero sumanattherassa
tika-vin08t:851_9: saddhivihārikaṃ, sumanatthero nandattherassa saddhivihārikaṃ anussāveti, aññamaññañca
tika-vin08t:851_10: gaṇapūrakā honti, vaṭṭati eva. Sace pana upajjhāyo sayameva attano saddhivihārikaṃ
tika-vin08t:851_11: anussāveti, ettha vattabbameva natthi, kammaṃ sukatameva hoti, anupajjhāyakassapi
tika-vin08t:851_12: yena kenaci anussāvite upasampadā hoti, kimaṅgaṃ pana saupajjhāyakassa upajjhāyeneva
tika-vin08t:851_13: anussāvaneti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Teneva navaṭṭanapakkhaṃ dassetuṃ “sace panā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t:852_0: Upajjhāti upajjhāyasaddasamānattho ākāranto upajjhāsaddoti dasseti. Upajjhāya-saddo
tika-vin08t:852_1: eva vā upajjhā, upayogapaccattavacanesu ya-kāra lopaṃ katvā evaṃ vutto karaṇavacanādīsu
tika-vin08t:852_2: upajjhāsaddassa payogābhāvāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ attanāva attānaṃ sammannitabbanti
tika-vin08t:852_3: attanāva kattubhūtena karaṇabhūtena attānameva kammabhūtaṃ pati sammannanakiccaṃ
tika-vin08t:852_4: kātabbaṃ, attānanti vā paccatte upayogavacanaṃ, attanāva attā sammannitabboti attho.
tika-vin08t:852_5: Na kevalañca ettheva, aññatrāpi terasasammutiādīsu imināva lakkhaṇena attanāva attā
tika-vin08t:852_6: sammannitabbova. Apica sayaṃ kammārahattā attānaṃ muñcitvā catuvaggādiko gaṇo sabbattha icchitabbo.
tika-vin08t:853_0: Saccakāloti “nigūhissāmī”ti vañcanaṃ pahāya saccasseva te icchitabbakālo. Bhūtakāloti
tika-vin08t:853_1: vañcanāya abhāvepi manussattādivatthuno bhūtatāya avassaṃ icchitabbakālo, itarathā
tika-vin08t:853_2: kammakopādiantarāyo hotīti adhippāyo. Maṅkūti adhomukho. Uddharatūti anupasampannabhāvato
tika-vin08t:854_0: Sabbakammavācāsu atthakosallatthaṃ panettha upasampadakammavācāya evamattho daṭṭhabbo
tika-vin08t:854_1: – suṇātūti savanāṇattiyaṃ paṭhamapurisekavacanaṃ. Tañca kiñcāpi yo so saṅgho savanakiriyāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:854_2: niyojīyati, tassa sammukhattā “suṇāhī”ti majjhimapurisavacanena vattabbaṃ, tathāpi
tika-vin08t:854_4: viya “adhivāsetu me bhavaṃ gotamo, etassa sugata kālo, yaṃ bhagavā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin08t:854_5: paññapeyya, pakkamatāyasmā, suṇantu me āyasmanto”tiādīsu. Tasmā idha paṭhamapurisappayogo
tika-vin08t:854_6: kato. Atha vā gāravavasenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Garuṭṭhāniyesu hi gāravavasena majjhimapurisapayoguppattiyampi
tika-vin08t:854_7: paṭhamapurisappayogaṃ payujjanti “desetu sugato dhamma”ntiādīsu viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:854_8: Keci pana “bhante āvusoti pade apekkhitvā idha paṭhamapurisappayogo”ti vadanti, taṃ
tika-vin08t:854_9: na sundaraṃ “ācariyo me, bhante, hohi, iṅghāvuso upāli, imaṃ pabbajitaṃ anuyuñjāhī”tiādīsu
tika-vin08t:855_0: Meti yo sāveti, tassa attaniddese sāmivacanaṃ. Bhanteti ālapanatthe vuḍḍhesu sagāravavacanaṃ,
tika-vin08t:855_1: “āvuso”ti padaṃ pana navakesu. Tadubhayampi nipāto “tumhe bhante tumhe āvuso”ti bahūsupi
tika-vin08t:855_2: samānarūpattā. Saṅghoti avisesato catuvaggādike pakatattapuggalasamūhe vattati. Idha
tika-vin08t:855_3: pana paccantimesu janapadesu pañcavaggato paṭṭhāya, majjhimesu janapadesu dasavaggato
tika-vin08t:855_4: paṭṭhāya saṅghoti gahetabbo. Tatrāyaṃ piṇḍattho – bhante, saṅgho mama vacanaṃ suṇātūti.
tika-vin08t:855_5: Idañca navakatarena vattabbavacanaṃ. Sace pana anussāvako sabbehi bhikkhūhi vuḍḍhataro
tika-vin08t:855_6: hoti, “suṇātu me, āvuso saṅgho”ti vattabbaṃ. Sopi ce “bhante”ti vadeyya, navakataro
tika-vin08t:855_7: vā “āvuso”ti, kammakopo natthi. Keci pana “ekattha ‘āvuso’ti vatvā aññattha ‘bhante’ti
tika-vin08t:855_8: vuttepi natthi doso ubhayenapi ālapanassa sijjhanato”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t:856_0: Idāni yamatthaṃ ñāpetukāmo “suṇātū”ti saṅghaṃ savane niyojeti, taṃ ñāpento “ayaṃ
tika-vin08t:856_1: itthannāmo”tiādimāha. Tattha ayanti upasampadāpekkhassa hatthapāse sannihitabhāvadassanaṃ,
tika-vin08t:856_2: tena ca hatthapāse ṭhitasseva upasampadā ruhatīti sijjhati hatthapāsato bahi ṭhitassa
tika-vin08t:856_3: “aya”nti na vattabbato. Teneva anusāsakasammutiyaṃ so hatthapāsato bahi ṭhitattā
tika-vin08t:856_4: “aya”nti na vutto, tasmā upasampadāpekkho anupasampanno hatthapāse ṭhapetabbo. Ayaṃ
tika-vin08t:856_5: itthannāmoti ayaṃ-saddo ca avassaṃ payujjitabbo, so ca imasmiṃ paṭhamanāmapayoge
tika-vin08t:856_6: evāti gahetabbaṃ. “Itthannāmo”ti idaṃ aniyamato tassa nāmadassanaṃ, ubhayenapi ayaṃ
tika-vin08t:856_8: upasampadaṃ me saṅgho apekkhamānoti attho. Tassa ca upajjhāyataṃ samaṅgibhāvena dassetuṃ
tika-vin08t:856_9: “itthannāmassa āyasmato”ti vuttaṃ. Etena “ayaṃ buddharakkhito āyasmato dhammarakkhitassa
tika-vin08t:856_10: saddhivihārikabhūto upasampadāpekkho”ti evamādinā nayena nāmayojanāya saha attho
tika-vin08t:856_11: dassito. Ettha ca “āyasmato”ti padaṃ avatvāpi “ayaṃ buddharakkhito dhammarakkhitassa
tika-vin08t:856_12: upasampadāpekkho”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Teneva pāḷiyaṃ “itthannāmena upajjhāyenā”ti ettha
tika-vin08t:856_13: “āyasmato”ti padaṃ na vuttaṃ. Yañcettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
tika-vin08t:857_0: Nanu cettha upajjhāyopi upasampadāpekkho viya hatthapāse ṭhito eva icchitabbo, atha
tika-vin08t:857_1: kasmā “ayaṃ itthannāmo imassa itthannāmassa upasampadāpekkho”ti evaṃ upajjhāyassa
tika-vin08t:857_2: nāmaparāmasanepi idaṃ-saddappayogo na katoti? Nāyaṃ virodho upajjhāyassa abhāvepi
tika-vin08t:857_3: kammakopābhāvato. Kevalañhi kammanibbattiyā santapadavasena avijjamānassapi upajjhāyassa
tika-vin08t:857_4: nāmakittanaṃ anupajjhāyassa upasampadādīsupi karīyati, tasmā upajjhāyassa asannihitāyapi
tika-vin08t:858_0: Parisuddho antarāyikehi dhammehīti abhabbattādikehi upasampadāya avatthukarehi ceva
tika-vin08t:858_1: pañcābādhahatthacchinnādīhi āpattikarehi ca antarāyikasabhāvehi parimutto. Evaṃ vutte
tika-vin08t:858_2: eva āpattimattakarehi pañcābādhādīhi aparimuttassapi upasampadā ruhati, nāññathā.
tika-vin08t:858_3: Paripuṇṇassa pattacīvaranti paripuṇṇamassa upasampadāpekkhassa pattacīvaraṃ. Evaṃ
tika-vin08t:858_4: vutte eva apattacīvarassapi upasampadā ruhati, nāññathā. Upasampadaṃ yācatīti “saṅghaṃ,
tika-vin08t:858_5: bhante, upasampadaṃ yācāmī”tiādinā yācāpitabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Evaṃ tena saṅghe
tika-vin08t:858_6: ayācitepi “itthannāmo saṅghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācatī”ti vutte eva kammaṃ avipannaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t:858_7: nāññathā. Upajjhāyenāti upajjhāyena karaṇabhūtena, itthannāmaṃ upajjhāyaṃ katvā kammabhūtaṃ
tika-vin08t:858_8: upasampadaṃ dātuṃ nipphādetuṃ kattubhūtaṃ saṅghaṃ yācatīti attho. Yācadhātuno pana
tika-vin08t:859_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallanti ettha patto kālo imassa kammassāti pattakālaṃ, apalokanādicatubbidhaṃ
tika-vin08t:859_1: saṅghagaṇakammaṃ, tadeva sakatthe ya-paccayena “pattakalla”nti vuccati. Idha pana
tika-vin08t:859_2: ñatticatutthaupasampadākammaṃ adhippetaṃ, taṃ kātuṃ saṅghassa pattakallaṃ jātaṃ.
tika-vin08t:859_3: Yadīti anumatigahaṇavasena kammassa pattakallataṃ ñāpeti, yo hi koci tattha apattakallataṃ
tika-vin08t:859_4: maññissati, so vakkhati. Imameva hi atthaṃ sandhāya anussāvanāsu “yassāyasmato khamati…pe…
tika-vin08t:859_5: so bhāseyyā”ti vuttaṃ. Tadetaṃ pattakallaṃ vatthusampadā, antarāyikehi dhammehi cassa
tika-vin08t:859_6: parisuddhatā, sīmāsampadā, parisāsampadā, pubbakiccaniṭṭhānanti imehi pañcahi aṅgehi saṅgahitaṃ.
tika-vin08t:860_0: Tattha vatthusampadā nāma yathāvuttehi ekādasaabhabbapuggalehi ceva antimavatthuajjhāpannehi
tika-vin08t:860_1: ca añño paripuṇṇavīsativasso anupasampannabhūto manussapuriso. Etasmiñhi puggale
tika-vin08t:860_2: sati eva idaṃ saṅghassa upasampadākammaṃ pattakallaṃ nāma hoti, nāsati, katañca kuppameva hoti.
tika-vin08t:861_0: Antarāyikehi dhammehi cassa parisuddhatā nāma yathāvuttasseva upasampadāvatthubhūtassa
tika-vin08t:861_1: puggalassa ye ime bhagavatā paṭikkhittā pañcābādhaphuṭṭhatādayo mātāpitūhi ananuññātatāpaayosānā
tika-vin08t:861_2: ceva hatthacchinnādayo ca dosadhammā kārakasaṅghassa āpattādiantarāyahetutāya “antarāyikā”ti
tika-vin08t:861_3: vuccanti, tehi antarāyikehi dosadhammehi parimuttatā, imissā ca sati eva idaṃ kammaṃ
tika-vin08t:861_4: pattakallaṃ nāma hoti, nāsati, kataṃ pana kammaṃ sukatameva hoti ṭhapetvā ūnavīsativassaṃ puggalaṃ.
tika-vin08t:862_0: Sīmāsampadā pana uposathakkhandhake vakkhamānanayena sabbadosarahitāya baddhābaddhavaseneva
tika-vin08t:862_1: duvidhāya sīmāya vasena veditabbā. Tādisāya hi sīmāya sati eva idaṃ kammaṃ pattakallaṃ
tika-vin08t:862_2: nāma hoti, nāsati, katañca kammaṃ vipajjati.
tika-vin08t:863_0: Parisāsampadā pana ye ime upasampadākammassa sabbantimena paricchedena kammappattā
tika-vin08t:863_1: dasahi vā pañcahi vā anūnāpārājikaṃ anāpannā anukkhittā ca samānasaṃvāsakā bhikkhū,
tika-vin08t:863_2: tesaṃ ekasīmāya hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā ṭhānaṃ, chandārahānañca chandassa ānayanaṃ,
tika-vin08t:863_5: saṅghassa hatthapāse abhāvo cāti imehi catūhi aṅgehi saṅgahitā. Evarūpāya ca parisāsampadāya
tika-vin08t:863_6: sati eva idaṃ pattakallaṃ nāma hoti, nāsati. Tattha purimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ aṅgānaṃ aññatarassapi
tika-vin08t:863_7: abhāve kataṃ kammaṃ vipajjati, na pacchimassa.
tika-vin08t:864_0: Pubbakiccaniṭṭhānaṃ nāma yānimāni “paṭhamaṃ upajjhaṃ gāhāpetabbo”tiādinā pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:864_1: vuttāni “upajjhāgāhāpanaṃ, pattacīvarācikkhaṇaṃ, tato taṃ hatthapāsato bahi pesetvā
tika-vin08t:864_2: anusāsakasammutikammakaraṇaṃ, sammatena ca gantvā anusāsanaṃ, tena ca paṭhamataraṃ
tika-vin08t:864_3: āgantvā saṅghassa ñattiṃ ñāpetvā upasampadāpekkhaṃ ‘āgacchāhī’ti hatthapāse eva abbhānaṃ,
tika-vin08t:864_4: tena bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vandāpetvā upasampadāyācāpanaṃ, tato antarāyikadhammapucchakasammutikammakaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin08t:864_5: sammatena ca pucchana”nti imāni aṭṭha pubbakiccāni, tesaṃ sabbesaṃ yāthāvato karaṇena
tika-vin08t:864_6: niṭṭhānaṃ. Etasmiñca pubbakiccaniṭṭhāpane sati eva idaṃ saṅghassa upasampadākammaṃ
tika-vin08t:864_7: pattakallaṃ nāma hoti, nāsati. Etesu pana pubbakammesu akatesupi kataṃ kammaṃ yathāvuttesu
tika-vin08t:864_8: vatthusampattiādīsu vijjamānesu akuppameva hoti. Tadevamettha pattakallaṃ imehi pañcahi
tika-vin08t:864_9: aṅgehi saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ. Imināva nayena heṭṭhā vuttesu, vakkhamānesu ca sabbesu
tika-vin08t:865_0: Itthannāmaṃ upasampādeyyāti upasampadānipphādanena taṃsamaṅgiṃ kareyya karotūti patthanāyaṃ,
tika-vin08t:865_1: vidhimhi vā idaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathā hi “devadattaṃ sukhāpeyyā”ti vutte sukhamassa
tika-vin08t:865_2: nipphādetvā taṃ sukhasamaṅginaṃ kareyyāti attho hoti, evamidhāpi upasampadamassa
tika-vin08t:865_3: nipphādetvā taṃ upasampadāsamaṅginaṃ kareyyāti attho. Payojakabyāpāre cetaṃ. Yathā
tika-vin08t:865_4: sukhayantaṃ kiñci suddhakattāraṃ koci hetukattā sukhahetunipphādanena sukhāpeyyāti
tika-vin08t:865_5: vuccati, evamidhāpi upasampajjantaṃ suddhakattāraṃ puggalaṃ hetukattubhūto saṅgho
tika-vin08t:865_6: upasampadāhetunipphādanena upasampādeyyāti vutto. Etena ca sukhaṃ viya sukhadāyakena
tika-vin08t:865_7: saṅghena puggalassa dīyamānā tathāpavattaparamatthadhamme upādāya ariyajanapaññattā
tika-vin08t:865_8: upasampadā nāma sammutisaccatā atthīti samatthitaṃ hoti. Ettha ca “itthannāmo saṅghaṃ
tika-vin08t:865_9: upasampadaṃ yācatī”ti vuttattā parivāsādīsu viya yācanānuguṇaṃ “itthannāmassa upasampadaṃ
tika-vin08t:865_10: dadeyyā”ti avatvā “itthannāmaṃ upasampādeyyā”ti vuttattā idaṃ upasampadākammaṃ dāne
tika-vin08t:865_11: asaṅgahetvā kammalakkhaṇe eva saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Iminā nayena “itthannāmaṃ
tika-vin08t:865_12: upasampādeti, upasampanno saṅghenā”ti etthāpi attho veditabbo. Kevalañhi tattha vattamānakālaatītakālavasena,
tika-vin08t:866_0: Esā ñattīti “saṅgho ñāpetabbo”ti vuttañāpanā esā. Idañca anussāvanānampi sabbhāvasūcanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:866_1: vuccati. Avassañcetaṃ vattabbameva. Ñattikamme eva taṃ na vattabbaṃ. Tattha pana
tika-vin08t:866_2: yya-kāre vuttamatte eva ñattikammaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Khamatīti ruccati.
tika-vin08t:866_3: Upasampadāti saṅghena dīyamānā nipphādiyamānā upasampadā, yassa khamati, so tuṇhassāti
tika-vin08t:866_4: yojanā. Tuṇhīti ca akathanatthe nipāto, akathanako assa bhaveyyāti attho. Khamati
tika-vin08t:866_5: saṅghassa itthannāmassa upasampadāti pakatena sambandho. Tattha kāraṇamāha “tasmā
tika-vin08t:866_6: tuṇhī”ti. Tattha “āsī”ti seso. Yasmā “yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyyā”ti tikkhattuṃ
tika-vin08t:866_7: vuccamānopi saṅgho tuṇhī niravo ahosi, tasmā khamati saṅghassāti attho. Evanti iminā
tika-vin08t:866_8: pakārena. Tuṇhībhāvenevetaṃ saṅghassa ruccanabhāvaṃ dhārayāmi, bujjhāmi jānāmīti
tika-vin08t:866_9: attho. Iti-saddo parisamāpanatthe kato, so ca kammavācāya anaṅgaṃ, tasmā anussāvakena
tika-vin08t:866_10: “dhārayāmī”ti ettha mi-kārapariyosānameva vatvā niṭṭhapetabbaṃ, iti-saddo na payujjitabboti
tika-vin08t:867_0: Ekaporisā vātiādi sattānaṃ sarīrachāyaṃ pādehi minitvā jānanappakāradassanaṃ. Chasattapadaparimitā
tika-vin08t:867_1: hi chāyā “porisā”ti vuccati, idañca utuppamāṇācikkhaṇādi ca āgantukehi saddhiṃ vīmaṃsitvā
tika-vin08t:867_2: vuḍḍhanavabhāvaṃ ñatvā vandanavandāpanādikaraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Eti āgacchati, gacchati
tika-vin08t:867_3: cāti utu, sova pamīyate anena saṃvaccharanti pamāṇanti āha “utuyeva utuppamāṇa”nti.
tika-vin08t:867_4: Aparipuṇṇāti upasampadādivasena aparipuṇṇā. Yadi utuvemajjhe upasampādito, tadā tasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:867_6: divasehi yassa yo utu aparipuṇṇo, te divase”ti. Tattha yassa taṅkhaṇaṃ laddhūpasampadassa
tika-vin08t:867_7: puggalassa sambandhī yo utu yattakehi divasehi aparipuṇṇo, te divaseti yojanā.
tika-vin08t:868_0: Chāyādikameva sabbaṃ saṅgahetvā gāyitabbato kathetabbato saṅgītīti āha “idamevā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t:868_1: Tattha ekato katvā ācikkhitabbaṃ. Tvaṃ kiṃ labhasīti tvaṃ upasampādanakāle kataravassaṃ,
tika-vin08t:868_2: katarautuñca labhasi, katarasmiṃ te upasampadā laddhāti attho. Vassanti vassānautu,
tika-vin08t:868_3: idañca saṃvaccharācikkhaṇaṃ vinā vuttampi na viññāyatīti iminā utuācikkhaṇeneva sāsanavassesu
tika-vin08t:868_4: vā kaliyugavassādīsu vā sahassime vā satime vā asukautuṃ labhāmīti dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:868_5: Chāyāti idaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatapaṭipāṭiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, vattabbakammato pana kaliyugavassādīsu
tika-vin08t:868_6: sabbadesapasiddhesu asukavasse asukautumhi asukamāse asukakaṇhe vā sukke vā pakkhe
tika-vin08t:868_7: asuke tithivāravisesayutte pubbaṇhādidivasabhāge ettake chāyāpamāṇe, nāḍikāpamāṇe
tika-vin08t:868_8: vā mayā upasampadā laddhāti vadeyyāsīti evaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ. Idaṃ suṭṭhu uggahetvā
tika-vin08t:868_9: āgantukehi vuḍḍhapaṭipāṭiṃ ñatvā paṭipajjāhīti vattabbaṃ. Iti ettako kathāmaggo vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:868_10: āgato. Vajirabuddhiṭīkānayo pana ekacco idheva saṅgahaṃ gato, ekacco asanniṭṭhānavinicchayattā
tika-vin08t:868_11: saṃsayahetuko hoti, tasmā idha na gahitoti.
tika-vin08t:872_0: 151. Evaṃ upasampadāvinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni nissayavinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “nissayoti
tika-vin08t:872_1: ettha panā”tiādimāha. Tattha nissayanaṃ nissayo, sevanaṃ bhajanantyattho. Nipubbasi
tika-vin08t:872_2: sevāyanti dhātu bhāvasādhano, na “nissāya naṃ vasatīti nissayo”ti idha viya avuttakammasādhano.
tika-vin08t:872_3: Tattha hi sevitabbo puggalo labbhati, idha pana sevanakiriyāti. Idāni taṃ nissayaṃ
tika-vin08t:872_4: pucchāpubbaṅgamāya vissajjanāya vitthārato ṭhapetuṃ “kena dātabbo”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-vin08t:872_5: kena dātabbo, kena na dātabboti nissayadāyakaṃ kattāraṃ pucchati, kassa dātabbo,
tika-vin08t:872_6: kassa na dātabboti nissayapaṭiggāhakaṃ sampadānaṃ, kathaṃ gahito hoti, kathaṃ paṭippassambhatīti
tika-vin08t:872_7: kāraṇaṃ, nissāya kena vasitabbaṃ, kena na vasitabbanti nissayapaṭipannakaṃ. Tato
tika-vin08t:872_8: pucchānukkamena vissajjetuṃ “tattha”tyādimāha. Na kevalaṃ ettheva, atha kho nissayamuccanaṅgepi “byattenā”ti āgato.
tika-vin08t:873_0: Tattha ettha ca ko visesoti āha “ettha ca ‘byatto’ti iminā parisupaṭṭhāpako bahussuto
tika-vin08t:873_2: Tattha abhivinayeti sakale vinayapiṭake. Vinetunti sikkhāpetuṃ. Dve vibhaṅgā paguṇā
tika-vin08t:873_3: vācuggatā kātabbāti idaṃ paripucchāvasena uggaṇhanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti vadanti. Ekassa
tika-vin08t:873_4: pamuṭṭhaṃ, itaresaṃ paguṇaṃ bhaveyyāti āha “tīhi janehi saddhiṃ parivattanakkhamā
tika-vin08t:873_5: kātabbā”ti. Abhidhammeti nāmarūpaparicchede. Heṭṭhimā vā tayo vaggāti mahāvaggato
tika-vin08t:873_6: heṭṭhā sagāthāvaggo nidānavaggo khandhavaggoti ime tayo vaggā. “Dhammapadampi saha
tika-vin08t:873_7: vatthunā uggahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttattā jātakabhāṇakena sāṭṭhakathaṃ
tika-vin08t:873_8: jātakaṃ uggahetvāpi dhammapadaṃ saha vatthunā uggahetabbameva.
tika-vin08t:874_0: Pañcahi bhikkhave aṅgehi samannāgatenātiādīsu na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabboti upajjhāyena
tika-vin08t:874_1: hutvā sāmaṇero na upaṭṭhāpetabbo. Asekkhena sīlakkhandhenāti asekkhassa sīlakkhandhopi
tika-vin08t:874_2: asekkho sīlakkhandho nāma. Asekkhassa ayanti hi asekkho, sīlakkhandho. Evaṃ sabbattha.
tika-vin08t:874_3: Evañca katvā vimuttiñāṇadassanasaṅkhātassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇassapi vasena apekkhitvā
tika-vin08t:874_4: uppannā ayaṃ kathā. Asekkhasīlanti ca na aggaphalasīlameva adhippetaṃ, atha kho yaṃ
tika-vin08t:874_5: kiñci asekkhasantāne pavattasīlaṃ lokiyalokuttaramissakassa sīlassa idhādhippetattā.
tika-vin08t:874_6: Samādhikkhandhādīsupi vimuttikkhandhapariyosānesu ayameva nayo, tasmā yathā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā
tika-vin08t:874_7: lokiyamissakā kathitā, evaṃ vimuttikkhandhopīti tadaṅgavimuttiādayopi veditabbā,
tika-vin08t:874_8: na paṭippassaddhivimutti eva. Vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ pana lokiyameva. Teneva saṃyuttanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:874_10: kathitā, vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ hoti, taṃ lokiyamevā”ti.
tika-vin08t:875_0: Assaddhotiādīsu tīsu vatthūsu saddhā etassa natthīti assaddho. Natthi etassa hirīti
tika-vin08t:875_1: ahiriko, akusalasamāpattiyā ajigucchamānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Na ottappatīti anottappī,
tika-vin08t:875_2: akusalasamāpattiyā na bhāyatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Kucchitaṃ sīdatīti kusīto, hīnavīriyassetaṃ
tika-vin08t:875_3: adhivacanaṃ. Āraddhaṃ vīriyaṃ etassāti āraddhavīriyo, sammappadhānayuttassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin08t:875_4: Muṭṭhā sati etassāti muṭṭhassatī, naṭṭhassatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Upaṭṭhitā sati etassāti
tika-vin08t:876_0: Adhisīle sīlavipanno ca ajjhācāre ācāravipanno ca āpajjitvā avuṭṭhito adhippeto.
tika-vin08t:876_1: Sassatucchedasaṅkhātaṃ antaṃ gaṇhāti, gāhayatīti vā antaggāhikā, micchādiṭṭhi. Purimāni
tika-vin08t:876_2: dve padānīti “na paṭibalo hoti antevāsiṃ vā saddhivihāriṃ vā gilānaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ vā
tika-vin08t:876_3: upaṭṭhāpetuṃ vā, anabhirataṃ vūpakāsetuṃ vā vūpakāsāpetuṃ vā”ti imāni dve padāni.
tika-vin08t:877_0: Abhi visiṭṭho uttamo samācāro abhisamācāro, abhisamācārova ābhisamācārikoti ca sikkhitabbato
tika-vin08t:877_1: sikkhāti ca ābhisamācārikasikkhā. Abhisamācāraṃ vā ārabbha paññattā sikkhā ābhisamācārikasikkhā,
tika-vin08t:877_5: vuttaṃ, tasmā sekkhapaṇṇattiyanti ettha sikkhitabbato sekkhā, bhagavatā paññattattā
tika-vin08t:877_7: vuttāti gahetabbaṃ. Teneva gaṇṭhipadepi vuttaṃ “sekkhapaṇṇattiyanti pārājikamādiṃ
tika-vin08t:878_0: Upajjhāyācariyakathāyaṃ na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabboti upajjhāyena hutvā na pabbājetabbo.
tika-vin08t:878_1: Asekkhassa ayanti asekkho, lokiyalokuttaro sīlakkhandho. Antaggāhikāyāti sassatucchedakoṭṭhāsaggāhikāya.
tika-vin08t:878_2: Pacchimāni dveti appassuto hoti, duppañño hotīti imāni dve aṅgāni. Pacchimāni tīṇīti
tika-vin08t:878_3: na paṭibalo uppannaṃ kukkuccaṃ dhammato vinodetuṃ, āpattiṃ na jānāti, āpattivuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:878_4: na jānātīti imāni tīṇi. Kukkuccassa hi pāḷiaṭṭhakathānayasaṅkhātadhammato vinodetuṃ
tika-vin08t:878_5: appaṭibalatā nāma abyattattā eva hotīti sāpi āpattiaṅgameva vuttā.
tika-vin08t:879_0: Abhi visiṭṭho uttamo samācāro abhisamācāro, vattappaṭipattisīlaṃ, taṃ ārabbha paññattā
tika-vin08t:879_1: khandhakasikkhāpadasaṅkhātā sikkhā ābhisamācārikā. Sikkhāpadampi hi tadatthaparipūraṇatthikehi
tika-vin08t:879_2: uggahaṇādivasena sikkhitabbato sikkhāti vuccati. Maggabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtā kāraṇabhūtā
tika-vin08t:879_5: ābhisamācārika”nti vuttaṃ, tasmā sekkhapaṇṇattiyanti ettha sikkhitabbato sekkhā,
tika-vin08t:879_6: bhagavatāva paññattattā paññatti. Sabbāpi ubhatovibhaṅgapariyāpannā sikkhāpadapaṇṇatti
tika-vin08t:879_9: sanibbānaṃ nāmaṃ, bhūtopādāyabhedaṃ rūpañca paricchinditvā jānanapaññā, tappakāsako
tika-vin08t:879_10: ca gantho nāmarūpaparicchedo nāma. Iminā abhidhammatthakusalena bhavitabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:880_0: 153. Āyasmato nissāya vacchāmīti ettha āyasmatoti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ, āyasmantaṃ
tika-vin08t:880_1: nissāya vasissāmīti attho. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ “byatto…pe… vuttalakkhaṇoyevā”ti,
tika-vin08t:880_4: yathāvuttavattaṃ kātabbaṃ. Tattha yena sikkhāpadāni dinnāni, ayaṃ pabbajjācariyo.
tika-vin08t:880_5: Yena upasampadakammavācā vuttā, ayaṃ upasampadācariyo. Yo uddesaṃ vā paripucchaṃ
tika-vin08t:880_6: vā deti, ayaṃ dhammācariyoti veditabbaṃ. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
tika-vin08t:881_0: 154. Nissayapaṭippassaddhikathāyaṃ disaṃ gatoti puna āgantukāmo, anāgantukāmo vā
tika-vin08t:881_1: hutvā vāsatthāya kañci disaṃ gato. Bhikkhussa sabhāgatanti pesalabhāvaṃ. Oloketvāti
tika-vin08t:881_2: upaparikkhitvā. Vibbhante…pe… tattha gantabbanti ettha “sace kenaci karaṇīyena tadaheva
tika-vin08t:881_3: gantuṃ asakkonto ‘katipāhena gamissāmī’ti gamane saussāho hoti, rakkhatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t:881_4: Mā idha paṭikkamīti mā idha pavisi. Tatreva vasitabbanti tattheva nissayaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin08t:881_5: vasitabbaṃ. Taṃyeva vihāraṃ…pe… vasituṃ vaṭṭatīti ettha upajjhāyena pariccattattā
tika-vin08t:881_6: upajjhāyasamodhānaparihāro natthi, tasmā upajjhāyasamodhānagatassapi ācariyassa santike
tika-vin08t:882_0: Ācariyamhā nissayapaṭippassaddhīsu ācariyo pakkanto vā hotīti ettha “pakkantoti disaṃ
tika-vin08t:882_1: gato”tiādinā upajjhāyassa pakkamane yo vinicchayo vutto, so tattha vuttanayeneva
tika-vin08t:882_2: idhāpi sakkā viññātunti taṃ avatvā “koci ācariyo āpucchitvā pakkamatī”tiādinā aññoyeva
tika-vin08t:882_3: nayo āraddho. Ayañca nayo upajjhāyapakkamanepi veditabboyeva. Īdisesu hi ṭhānesu
tika-vin08t:882_4: ekatthavuttalakkhaṇaṃ aññatthāpi daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sace dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā nivattati,
tika-vin08t:882_5: paṭippassaddho hotīti ettha ettāvatā disāpakkanto nāma hotīti antevāsike anikkhittadhurepi
tika-vin08t:882_6: nissayo paṭippassambhati. Ācariyupajjhāyā dve leḍḍupāte atikkamma aññasmiṃ vihāre
tika-vin08t:882_7: vasantīti bahiupacārasīmāyaṃ antevāsikasaddhivihārikānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānato dve leḍḍupāte
tika-vin08t:882_8: atikkamma aññasmiṃ senāsane vasanti, antoupacārasīmāyaṃ pana dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvāpi
tika-vin08t:882_9: vasato nissayo na paṭippassambhati. “Sacepi ācariyo muñcitukāmova hutvā nissayapaṇāmanāya
tika-vin08t:882_10: paṇāmetī”tiādi sabbaṃ upajjhāyassa āṇattiyampi veditabbanti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:883_0: 153. Sāhūti sādhu sundaraṃ. Lahūti agaru, subharatāti attho. Opāyikanti upāyapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:883_1: evaṃ paṭipajjanaṃ nittharaṇupāyoti attho. Patirūpanti sāmīcikammamidanti attho. Pāsādikenāti
tika-vin08t:883_2: pasādāvahena, kāyavacīpayogena sampādehīti attho. Kāyenāti etadatthaviññāpakaṃ hatthamuddādiṃ
tika-vin08t:883_3: dassento kāyena viññāpeti. “Sādhū”ti sampaṭicchanaṃ sandhāyāti upajjhāyena “sāhū”tiādīsu
tika-vin08t:883_5: vuttanti adhippāyo. Āyācanadānamattenāti saddhivihārikassa paṭhamaṃ āyācanamattena,
tika-vin08t:883_6: tato upajjhāyassa ca “sāhū”tiādinā vacanamattenāti attho. Ācariyassa santike nissayaggahaṇe
tika-vin08t:883_7: āyasmato nissāya vacchāmīti āyasmantaṃ nissāya vasissāmīti attho.
tika-vin08t:884_0: 154. Nissayapaṭippassaddhikathāyaṃ yo vā ekasambhogaparibhogo, tassa santike nissayo
tika-vin08t:884_1: gahetabboti iminā lajjīsu eva nissayaggahaṇaṃ niyojeti alajjīsu paṭikkhittattā. Ettha
tika-vin08t:884_2: ca paribhogasaddena ekakammādiko saṃvāso gahito paccayaparibhogassa sambhogasaddena
tika-vin08t:884_3: gahitattā. Etena ca sambhogasaṃvāsānaṃ alajjīhi saddhiṃ na kattabbataṃ dasseti. Parihāro
tika-vin08t:884_4: natthīti āpattiparihāro natthi. Tādisoti yattha nissayo gahitapubbo, yo ca ekasambhogaparibhogo,
tika-vin08t:884_5: tādiso. Tathā vuttanti “lahuṃ āgamissatī”ti vuttañceti attho. Cattāri pañca divasānīti
tika-vin08t:884_6: idaṃ upalakkhaṇamattaṃ. Yadi ekāhadvīhena sabhāgatā paññāyati, ñātadivase gahetabbova.
tika-vin08t:884_7: Athāpi catupañcāhenapi na paññāyati, yattakehi divasehi paññāyati, tattakāni atikkāmetabbāni.
tika-vin08t:884_8: Sabhāgataṃ olokemīti pana leso na kātabbo. Daharā suṇantīti ettha asutvāpi “āgamissati,
tika-vin08t:884_9: kenaci antarāyena cirāyantī”ti saññāya satipi labbhateva parihāro. Tenāha “idhevāhaṃ
tika-vin08t:884_10: vasissāmīti pahiṇati, parihāro natthī”ti. Ekadivasampi parihāro natthīti gamane nirussāhaṃ
tika-vin08t:884_11: sandhāya vuttaṃ, saussāhassa pana senāsanapaṭisāmanādivasena katipāhe gatepi na doso.
tika-vin08t:885_0: Tatreva vasitabbanti tatra sabhāgaṭṭhāne eva nissayaṃ gahetvā vasitabbaṃ. Taṃyeva
tika-vin08t:885_1: vihāraṃ…pe… vasituṃ vaṭṭatīti iminā upajjhāye saṅgaṇhanteyeva taṃsamodhāne nissayapaṭippassaddhi
tika-vin08t:885_2: vuttā, tasmiṃ pana kodhena vā gaṇanirapekkhatāya vā asaṅgaṇhante aññesu gahito nissayo
tika-vin08t:886_0: Ācariyamhā nissayapaṭippassaddhiyaṃ vutto “koci ācariyo”tiādiko nayo upajjhāyapakkamanādīsupi
tika-vin08t:886_1: netvā tattha ca vutto idhāpi netvā yathārahaṃ yojetabbo. Dve leḍḍupāte atikkamma
tika-vin08t:886_2: aññasmiṃ vihāre vasantīti upacārasīmato bahi aññasmiṃ vihāre antevāsikādīnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānato
tika-vin08t:886_3: dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā vasanti. Tena bahiupacārepi antevāsikādīnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānato
tika-vin08t:886_4: dvinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ antare āsanne padese vasati, nissayo na paṭippassambhatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:886_5: Antoupacārasīmāyaṃ pana dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā vasato nissayo na paṭippassambhatevāti
tika-vin08t:891_0: 156. Evaṃ nissayavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni sīmāvinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “sīmāti ettha”tyādimāha.
tika-vin08t:891_1: Tattha sīmāti sinīyate samaggena saṅghena kammavācāya bandhīyateti sīmā. Si bandhaneti
tika-vin08t:891_2: dhātu, ma-paccayo, kiyādigaṇoyaṃ. Vibhāgavantānaṃ sabhāvavibhāvanaṃ vibhāgena vinā
tika-vin08t:891_3: na hotīti āha “sīmā nāmesā…pe… hotī”ti. Tattha baddhasīmaṃ tāva dassetuṃ “tattha ekādasa”tyādimāha.
tika-vin08t:892_0: Vīsativaggakaraṇīyaparamattā saṅghakammassa heṭṭhimantato yattha kammārahena saddhiṃ
tika-vin08t:892_1: ekavīsati bhikkhū nisīdituṃ sakkonti, tattake padese sīmaṃ bandhituṃ vaṭṭati, na
tika-vin08t:892_2: tato oranti āha “atikhuddakā nāma yattha ekavīsati bhikkhū nisīdituṃ na sakkontī”ti.
tika-vin08t:892_3: Puratthimāya disāyāti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ, tassaṃ pana disāyaṃ nimitte asati yattha
tika-vin08t:892_4: atthi, tato paṭṭhāya paṭhamaṃ “puratthimāya anudisāya, dakkhiṇāya disāyā”tiādinā
tika-vin08t:892_5: samantā vijjamānaṭṭhānesu nimittāni kittetvā puna “puratthimāya anudisāyā”ti paṭhamakittitaṃ
tika-vin08t:892_6: paṭikittetuṃ vaṭṭati tīhi nimittehi siṅghāṭakasaṇṭhānāyapi sīmāya sammannitabbato.
tika-vin08t:892_7: Tikkhattuṃ sīmamaṇḍalaṃ sambandhantenāti vinayadharena sayaṃ ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne ṭhatvā
tika-vin08t:892_8: kevalaṃ nimittakittanavacaneneva sīmamaṇḍalaṃ samantā nimittena nimittaṃ bandhantenāti
tika-vin08t:892_9: attho. Taṃtaṃnimittaṭṭhānaṃ agantvāpi hi kittetuṃ vaṭṭati. Tiyojanaparamāyapi sīmāya
tika-vin08t:892_10: samantato tikkhattuṃ anuparigamanassa ekadivasena dukkarattā vinayadharena sayaṃ
tika-vin08t:892_11: adiṭṭhampi pubbe bhikkhūhi yathāvavatthitaṃ nimittaṃ “pāsāṇo bhante”tiādinā kenaci
tika-vin08t:892_12: vuttānusārena sallakkhetvā “eso pāsāṇo nimitta”ntiādinā kittetumpi vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin08t:893_0: Saṃsaṭṭhaviṭapāti iminā aññamaññassa āsannataṃ dīpeti. Baddhā hotīti pacchimadisābhāge
tika-vin08t:893_1: sīmaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ekaratanamattā suviññeyyatarā hotīti katvā vuttaṃ “pacchimakoṭiyā
tika-vin08t:893_2: hatthamattā sīmantarikā ṭhapetabbā”ti. Ekaṅgulimattāpi sīmantarikā vaṭṭatiyeva. Tattakenapi
tika-vin08t:893_3: hi sīmā asambhinnāva hoti. Dvinnaṃ sīmānaṃ nimittaṃ hotīti nimittassa sīmato bāhirattā
tika-vin08t:893_4: sīmasambhedo na hotīti vuttaṃ. Sīmasaṅkaraṃ karotīti vaḍḍhitvā sīmappadesaṃ paviṭṭhe
tika-vin08t:893_5: dvinnaṃ sīmānaṃ gataṭṭhānassa duviññeyyattā vuttaṃ, na, pana tattha kammaṃ kātuṃ
tika-vin08t:893_6: na vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ. Na hi sīmā tattakena asīmā hoti, dve pana sīmā pacchā
tika-vin08t:893_7: vaḍḍhitarukkhena ajjhotthaṭattā ekābaddhā honti, tasmā ekattha ṭhatvā kammaṃ karontehi
tika-vin08t:893_8: itaraṃ sodhetvā kātabbaṃ. Tassā padesanti yattha ṭhatvā bhikkhūhi kammaṃ kātuṃ sakkā
tika-vin08t:893_9: hoti, tādisaṃ padesaṃ, yattha pana ṭhitehi kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā hoti, tādisaṃ padesaṃ
tika-vin08t:893_10: antokaritvā bandhantā sīmāya sīmaṃ saṃbhindanti nāma. Na kammavācaṃ vaggaṃ karontīti
tika-vin08t:893_11: kammavācaṃ na bhindanti, kammaṃ na kopentīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:894_0: 158. Suddhapaṃsupabbatoti na kenaci kato sayaṃjātova vutto. Tathā sesāpi. Itaropīti
tika-vin08t:894_1: suddhapaṃsupabbatādiko pabbatopi. Hatthippamāṇoti ettha bhūmito uggatapadesena hatthippamāṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:894_2: gahetabbaṃ. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana vajirabuddhiṭīkāyañca “hatthippamāṇo nāma pabbato
tika-vin08t:894_3: heṭṭhimakoṭiyā aḍḍhaṭṭhamaratanubbedho”ti vuttaṃ. Catūhi vā tīhi vāti sīmabhūmiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:894_4: catūsu, tīsu vā disāsu ṭhitehi, ekissā eva pana disāya ṭhitehi tato bahūhipi sammannituṃ
tika-vin08t:894_5: na vaṭṭati, dvīhi pana dvīsu disāsu ṭhitehipi na vaṭṭati. Tasmāti yasmā ekena na
tika-vin08t:894_6: vaṭṭati, tasmā. Taṃ bahiddhā katvāti kittitanimittassa asīmattā antosīmāya karaṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:895_0: Dvattiṃsapalaguḷapiṇḍappamāṇatā saṇṭhānato gahetabbā, na tulagaṇanāvasena, bhārato
tika-vin08t:895_1: palaparimāṇañca magadhatulāya gahetabbaṃ, sā ca lokiyatulāya dviguṇāti vadanti. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:895_2: pana “dvattiṃsapalaguḷapiṇḍappamāṇatā tulatāya gahetabbā, na tulagaṇanāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:895_3: Atimahantopīti bhūmito hatthippamāṇaṃ anugantvā heṭṭhābhūmiyaṃ otiṇṇaghanato anekayojanappamāṇopi.
tika-vin08t:895_4: Sace hi tato hatthippamāṇaṃ kūṭaṃ uggacchati, pabbatasaṅkhameva gacchati. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:895_5: – sace ekābaddho hoti, na kātabboti ettha catūsu disāsu catunnaṃ pabbatakūṭānaṃ heṭṭhā
tika-vin08t:895_6: piṭṭhipāsāṇasadise pāsāṇe ṭhitattā ekābaddhabhāve satipi pathavito uddhaṃ tesaṃ sambandhe
tika-vin08t:895_7: asati heṭṭhā pathavīgatasambandhamatte abbohārikaṃ katvā kittetuṃ vaṭṭati. Teneva
tika-vin08t:895_8: “piṭṭhipāsāṇo atimahantopi pāsāṇasaṅkhyameva gacchatī”ti vuttaṃ. Pathavito heṭṭhā
tika-vin08t:895_9: tassa mahantabhāve gayhamāne pabbatameva hotīti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Cinitvā katapaṃsupuñje
tika-vin08t:895_10: tiṇagumbarukkhā ce jāyanti, pabbato hotīti dhammasiritthero, nevāti upatissattheroti
tika-vin08t:895_11: vuttaṃ. Pāsāṇoti sudhāmayapāsāṇopi vaṭṭatīti vadanti, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ iṭṭhakāya paṭikkhittattā.
tika-vin08t:895_12: Sopīti khāṇuko viya uṭṭhitapāsāṇopi. Catupañcarukkhanimittamattampīti ekaccesu nimittasaddo natthīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:896_0: Antosārānanti tasmiṃ khaṇe taruṇatāya sāre avijjamānepi pariṇāmena bhavissamānasārepi
tika-vin08t:896_1: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tādisānañhi sūcidaṇḍakappamāṇapariṇāhānaṃ catupañcamattānampi vanaṃ
tika-vin08t:896_2: vaṭṭati. Antosāramissakānanti antosārehi rukkhehi sammissānaṃ. Etena tacasārarukkhamissakānampi
tika-vin08t:896_3: vanaṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Catupañcarukkhamattampīti sārarukkhe sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:896_4: pana “ettha tayo ce sārarukkhā honti, dve asārā, sārarukkhānaṃ bahuttaṃ icchitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:896_5: Susānampi idha vanamevāti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati sayaṃjātattāti vuttaṃ. Keci pana ‘catūsu
tika-vin08t:896_6: dve antosārā ce, vaṭṭati, antosārā adhikā, samā vā, vaṭṭati, tasmā bahūsupi dve ce
tika-vin08t:896_7: antosārā atthi, vaṭṭatī’ti vadantī”ti vuttaṃ. Vanamajjhe vihāraṃ karontīti rukkhaghaṭāya
tika-vin08t:896_8: antare rukkhe acchinditvā vatiādīhi vihāraparicchedaṃ katvāva antorukkhantaresu eva
tika-vin08t:896_9: pariveṇapaṇṇasālādīnaṃ karaṇavasena yathā antovihārampi vanameva hoti, evaṃ vihāraṃ
tika-vin08t:896_10: karontīti attho. Yadi hi sabbaṃ rukkhaṃ chinditvā vihāraṃ kareyyuṃ, vihārassa avanattā
tika-vin08t:896_11: taṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitavanaṃ ekattha kittetabbaṃ siyā, idha pana antopi vanattā “vanaṃ
tika-vin08t:896_12: na kittetabba”nti vuttaṃ. Sace hi taṃ kittenti, “nimittassa upari vihāro hotī”tiādinā
tika-vin08t:896_13: anantare vuttadoso āpajjati. Ekadesanti vanekadesaṃ, rukkhavirahitaṭṭhāne katavihārassa
tika-vin08t:897_1: pana avebhaṅgiyavinicchaye “yo koci aṭṭhaṅgulasūcidaṇḍamattopi veḷu…pe… garubhaṇḍa”nti
tika-vin08t:897_2: vuttattā tanutaro veḷudaṇḍoti ca sūcidaṇḍoti ca gahetabbaṃ. Vaṃsanaḷakasarāvādīsūti
tika-vin08t:897_3: veḷupabbe vā naḷapabbe vā kapallakādimattikabhājanesu vāti attho. Taṅkhaṇampīti taruṇapotake
tika-vin08t:897_4: amilāyitvā viruhanajātike sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ye pana pariṇatā samūlaṃ uddharitvā ropitāpi
tika-vin08t:897_5: chinnasākhā viya milāyitvā cirena navamūlaṅkuruppattiyā jīvanti, miyantiyeva vā,
tika-vin08t:897_6: tādise kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Etanti navamūlasākhāniggamanaṃ. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:897_7: “sūcidaṇḍakappamāṇoti sīhaḷadīpe lekhanidaṇḍappamāṇoti vadanti, so ca kaniṭṭhaṅguliparimāṇoti
tika-vin08t:898_0: Majjheti sīmāya mahādisānaṃ anto. Koṇanti sīmāya catūsu koṇesu dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ maggānaṃ
tika-vin08t:898_1: sambandhaṭṭhānaṃ. Parabhāge kittetuṃ vaṭṭatīti tesaṃ catunnaṃ koṇānaṃ bahi nikkhamitvā
tika-vin08t:898_2: ṭhitesu aṭṭhasu maggesu ekissā disāya ekaṃ, aññissā disāya cāparanti evaṃ cattāropi
tika-vin08t:898_3: maggā catūsu disāsu kittetuṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo. Evaṃ pana kittitamattena kathaṃ
tika-vin08t:898_4: ekābaddhatā vigacchatīti viññāyati. Parato gataṭṭhānepi ete eva te cattāro maggā.
tika-vin08t:898_5: “Cattāro maggā catūsu disāsu gacchantī”ti hi vuttaṃ, tasmā ettha kāraṇaṃ vicinitabbanti
tika-vin08t:898_6: vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Vicinanto pana evaṃ kāraṇaṃ paññāyati – pubbavākyepi “vihāraṃ
tika-vin08t:898_7: parikkhipitvā cattāro maggā”ti, paravākyepi “vihāramajjhena nibbijjhitvā gatamaggopī”ti
tika-vin08t:898_8: vihārameva sandhāya vutto, tasmā idhāpi “koṇaṃ nibbijjhitvā gataṃ panā”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:898_9: vuttattā ete maggā vihārassa koṇameva nibbijjhiṃsu, na aññamaññaṃ missiṃsu, tasmā
tika-vin08t:898_10: ekābaddhabhāvābhāvā catunnaṃ maggānaṃ catūsu ṭhānesu kittetuṃ vaṭṭatīti. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:898_11: pana “parabhāge kittetuṃ vaṭṭatīti bahi nikkhamitvā ṭhitesu aṭṭhasu maggesu ekissā
tika-vin08t:898_12: disāya ekaṃ, aparāya ekanti evaṃ catūsu ṭhānesu kittetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:898_13: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “parabhāgeti ettha etehi baddhaṭṭhānato gatattā vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t:898_14: tathā dīghamaggepi gahitaṭṭhānato gataṭṭhānassa aññattāti vadantī”ti vuttaṃ. Tampi
tika-vin08t:899_0: Uttarantiyā bhikkhuniyāti idañca pāḷiyaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ nadīpāragamane nadīlakkhaṇassa
tika-vin08t:899_1: āgatattā vuttaṃ, bhikkhūnaṃ antaravāsakatemanamattampi vaṭṭatiyeva. Sāratthadīpaniyampi
tika-vin08t:899_3: pāḷiyaṃ āgatattā teneva nayena dassanatthaṃ kataṃ. Sīmaṃ bandhantānaṃ nimittaṃ hotīti
tika-vin08t:899_4: ayaṃ vuttalakkhaṇā nadī samuddaṃ vā pavisatu taḷākaṃ vā, pabhavato paṭṭhāya nimittaṃ
tika-vin08t:899_5: hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “antaravāsako temiyatīti vuttattā tattakappamāṇaudakeyeva
tika-vin08t:899_6: kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti keci. ‘Temiyatī’ti iminā heṭṭhimakoṭiyā nadīlakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ, evarūpāya
tika-vin08t:899_7: nadiyā yasmiṃ ṭhāne cattāro māse appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā udakaṃ ajjhottharitvā pavattati,
tika-vin08t:899_8: tasmiṃ ṭhāne appodakepi ṭhatvā kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti eke”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:900_0: Nadīcatukkepi eseva nayoti iminā ekattha kittetvā aññattha parato gataṭṭhānepi kittetuṃ
tika-vin08t:900_1: na vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Teneva ca “asammissā nadiyo pana catassopi kittetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin08t:900_2: asammissaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Ajjhottharitvā āvaraṇaṃ pavattatiyevāti āvaraṇaṃ ajjhottharitvā
tika-vin08t:900_3: sandatiyeva. Apavattamānāti asandamānudakā. Āvaraṇañhi patvā nadiyā yattake padese
tika-vin08t:900_4: udakaṃ asandamānaṃ santiṭṭhati, tattha nadīnimittaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, upari sandamānaṭṭhāneyeva
tika-vin08t:900_5: vaṭṭati. Asandamānaṭṭhāne pana udakanimittaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Ṭhitameva hi udakaṃ udakanimitte
tika-vin08t:900_6: vaṭṭati, na sandamānaṃ. Tenevāha “pavattanaṭṭhāne nadīnimittaṃ, apavattanaṭṭhāne
tika-vin08t:900_7: udakanimittaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. “Pavattanaṭṭhāne nadīnimittanti vuttattā setuto parato
tika-vin08t:900_8: tattakaṃ udakaṃ yadi pavattati, nadī evāti vadanti. Jātassarādīsu ṭhitodakaṃ jātassarādipadesena
tika-vin08t:900_9: antarikampi nimittaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati nadīpārasīmāya nimittaṃ viya. Sace so padeso kālantarena
tika-vin08t:900_10: gāmakhettabhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti, tattha aññaṃ sīmaṃ sammannituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:900_11: vuttaṃ. Mūleti ādikāle. Nadiṃ bhinditvāti yathā udakaṃ anicchantehi kassakehi mahoghe
tika-vin08t:900_12: nivaṭṭetuṃ na sakkā, evaṃ kūlaṃ bhinditvā. Nadiṃ bhinditvāti vā mātikāmukhadvārena
tika-vin08t:901: Ukkhepimanti dīgharajjunā kūṭehi ussiñcanīyaṃ. Ukkhepimanti vā kūpato viya ukkhipitvā gahetabbaṃ. Ukkhepimanti vā uddharitvā gahetabbakaṃ.
tika-vin08t:902_0: Asammissehīti sabbadisāsu ṭhitapabbatehi eva vā pāsāṇādīsu aññatarehi vā nimittantarābyavahitehi.
tika-vin08t:902_1: Sammissehīti ekattha pabbato, aññattha pāsāṇoti evaṃ ṭhitehi aṭṭhahi. Nimittānaṃ
tika-vin08t:902_2: satenāpīti iminā ekissāyeva disāya bahūnipi nimittāni “puratthimāya disāya kiṃ nimittaṃ,
tika-vin08t:902_3: pabbato, bhante. Puna puratthimāya disāya kiṃ nimittaṃ, pāsāṇo, bhante”tiādinā kittetuṃ
tika-vin08t:902_4: vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Siṅghāṭakasaṇṭhānāti tikoṇā. Siṅghāṭakasaṇṭhānāti vā tikoṇaracchāsaṇṭhānā.
tika-vin08t:902_5: Caturassāti samacaturassā. Mudiṅgasaṇṭhānā pana āyatacaturassā, ekakoṭiyaṃ saṅkocitā,
tika-vin08t:902_6: tadaññāya vitthiṇṇā vā hoti. Mudiṅgasaṇṭhānāti vā mudiṅgabherī viya majjhe vitthatā
tika-vin08t:903_0: 159. Evaṃ baddhasīmāya nimittasampattiyuttataṃ dassetvā idāni parisasampattiyuttataṃ
tika-vin08t:903_2: sabbaheṭṭhimena gaṇanaparicchedena, appataro ce gaṇo hotīti adhippāyo. Imassa pana
tika-vin08t:903_4: samaggā hutvā aññamaññassa hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā sannipatitā. Iminā “catuvaggakaraṇīye
