tika-vin08t:1120_12: dhammajjhesako atthi, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce, ekaṃ byattaṃ paṭibalaṃ bhikkhuṃ saṅghena
tika-vin08t:1120_13: sammannāpetvā tena dhammajjhesakena pātimokkhuddesakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ
tika-vin08t:1120_14: karitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo – saṅgho, bhante,
tika-vin08t:1120_15: theraṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ ajjhesati, uddisatu thero pātimokkhaṃ. Dutiyampi, bhante,
tika-vin08t:1120_16: saṅgho…pe… tatiyampi, bhante, saṅgho…pe… uddisatu thero pātimokkhanti tikkhattuṃ
tika-vin08t:1123: Aṭṭhakathācariyehi vuttāni cattāri pubbakaraṇāni, kiṃ tāni katānī”ti pucchite dhammajjhesakena “āma, bhante”ti vutte puna pātimokkhuddesakena –
tika-vin08t:1126: Aṭṭhakathācariyehi vuttāni pañca pubbakiccāni, kiṃ tāni katānī”ti pucchite dhammajjhesakena “āma bhante”ti vutte puna pātimokkhuddesakena –
tika-vin08t:1129: Vajjanīyā ca puggalā tasmiṃ na honti;
tika-vin08t:1131_0: Aṭṭhakathācariyehi vuttāni cattāri pattakallaṅgāni, kiṃ tāni samānītānī”ti pucchite
tika-vin08t:1131_2: sammā niṭṭhāpetvā pattakallaṅge samānīte saṅghassa anumatiyā pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmā”ti
tika-vin08t:1131_3: vatvā “sādhu sādhū”ti bhikkhusaṅghena sampaṭicchite “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho”tiādinā
tika-vin08t:1132_0: Ettha ca “dhammajjhesakena…pe… evamassa vacanīyo”ti vuttaṃ, so dhammajjhesakena vacanīyabhāvo
tika-vin08t:1132_1: kathaṃ veditabboti? “Na, bhikkhave, saṅghamajjhe anajjhiṭṭhena pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1132_2: yo uddiseyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanatoti. “Saṅghena sammannāpetvā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1132_3: taṃ kathanti? “Ajjhesanā cettha saṅghena sammatadhammajjhesakāyattā vā saṅghattherāyattā
tika-vin08t:1132_4: vā”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā. “Saṅgho, bhante, theraṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ ajjhesati,
tika-vin08t:1132_5: uddisatu, bhante, thero pātimokkha”nti ayaṃ ajjhesanākāro kuto labbhatīti? Pāḷito.
tika-vin08t:1132_6: Pāḷiyañhi “te theraṃ ajjhesanti, uddisatu, bhante, thero pātimokkha”nti āgato.
tika-vin08t:1133_0: Sace pana dhammajjhesako vuḍḍhataro, pātimokkhuddesako navako, “saṅgho, āvuso, āyasmantaṃ
tika-vin08t:1133_1: pātimokkhuddesaṃ ajjhesati, uddisatu āyasmā pātimokkha”nti vattabbaṃ. Taṃ kuto labbhati?
tika-vin08t:1133_2: Pāḷitoyeva. Pāḷiyañhi “eteneva upāyena yāva saṅghanavakaṃ ajjhesanti uddisatu āyasmā
tika-vin08t:1133_3: pātimokkha”nti āgato. Tato “pātimokkhuddesakena sammajjanī…pe… pucchite dhammajjhesakena
tika-vin08t:1133_4: ‘āma, bhante’ti vutte”ti idaṃ kuto labbhatīti? Pāḷito aṭṭhakathāto ca. Nidānapāḷiyampi
tika-vin08t:1133_5: hi “kiṃ saṅghassa pubbakicca”nti āgataṃ, aṭṭhakathāyampi “kiṃ saṅghassa pubbakiccanti
tika-vin08t:1133_6: saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyyāti…pe… evaṃ dvīhi nāmehi navavidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1134_0: Nanu cetaṃ antonidāneyeva āgataṃ, atha kasmā pātimokkhuddesakena pubbabhāge vattabbanti?
tika-vin08t:1134_1: Saccaṃ, tathāpi tadanulomato jānitabbato vattabbaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyañhi imā gāthāyo sammajjanādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1134_3: Atha ca pana idāni bhaṇanti, evaṃ sante kimatthaṃ bhaṇantīti cintāyaṃ antonidāne
tika-vin08t:1134_5: bhaṇantīti jānitabbaṃ. Vuttañhi “evaṃ vuttaṃ catubbidhaṃ pubbakaraṇaṃ katvāva uposatho
tika-vin08t:1134_6: kātabbo”ti, tasmā pāḷiaṭṭhakathānulomato iminā anukkamena kate sati dhammajjhesako
tika-vin08t:1134_7: paññāyati, tassa ajjhesanākāro paññāyati, pātimokkhuddesako paññāyati, tassa pubbakaraṇādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1134_8: niṭṭhabhāvapucchanaṃ paññāyati, dhammajjhesakassa vissajjanaṃ paññāyati, tāni niṭṭhāpetvā
tika-vin08t:1134_9: pātimokkhuddesakassa pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ paṭiññā paññāyati, evaṃ imesaṃ gāthāvākyānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1134_10: vacane payojanaṃ paññāyatīti katvā paṇḍitehi vinayaññūhi cirapaṭicchanno ayaṃ kathāmaggo
tika-vin08t:1137: Punappunaṃ cintayitvā, yuttaṃ ce dhārayantu taṃ;
tika-vin08t:1143_0: 179. Evaṃ uposathapavāraṇāvinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni vassūpanāyikavinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ
tika-vin08t:1143_1: “vassūpanāyikāti ettha”tyādimāha. Tattha vasanaṃ vassaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Vasanakiriyā bhāvatthe
tika-vin08t:1143_2: ṇya-paccayavasena. Upanayanaṃ upanayo. Ko so? Upagamanakiriyā, vassassa upanayo vassūpanayo,
tika-vin08t:1143_3: so etissā paññattiyā atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti vassūpanāyikā. Kā sā? Vassūpanāyikapaññatti.
tika-vin08t:1143_4: Atha vā upanayati etāyāti upanāyikā majjhe dīghavasena. Vassassa upanāyikā vassūpanāyikā,
tika-vin08t:1143_5: sā eva pure bhavā purimā bhavatthe ima-paccayavasena, sā eva purimikā sakatthe ka-paccayavasena,
tika-vin08t:1143_6: tasmiṃ pare itthiliṅge a-kārassa i-kārādeso. Pacchā bhavā pacchimā, sāva pacchimikā.
tika-vin08t:1144_0: Assatiyā pana vassaṃ na upetīti “imasmiṃ vihāre imaṃ temāsaṃ vassaṃ upemī”ti vacībhedaṃ
tika-vin08t:1144_1: katvā na upeti. “Na, bhikkhave, asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabbaṃ, yo upagaccheyya,
tika-vin08t:1144_2: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacībhedaṃ katvā vassūpagamanaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhepo, na ālayakaraṇavasena
tika-vin08t:1144_3: upagamanaṃ sandhāyāti vadanti. Pāḷiyaṃ pana avisesena vuttattā aṭṭhakathāyañca dutiyapārājikasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1144_4: “vassaṃ upagacchantena hi nālakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannenapi pañcannaṃ chadanānaṃ aññatarena
tika-vin08t:1144_5: channeyeva sadvārabandhe senāsane upagantabbaṃ, tasmā vassakāle sace senāsanaṃ labhati,
tika-vin08t:1144_6: iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce labhati, hatthakammaṃ pariyesitvāpi kātabbaṃ. Hatthakammaṃ
tika-vin08t:1144_7: alabhantena sāmampi kātabbaṃ, na tveva asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabba”nti daḷhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1144_8: katvā vuttattā asenāsanikassa nāvādiṃ vinā aññattha ālayamattena upagantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:1144_9: amhākaṃ khanti. Nāvāsatthavajesuyeva hi “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, nāvāya vassaṃ upagantu”ntiādinā
tika-vin08t:1144_10: sati, asati vā senāsane vassūpagamanassa visuṃ anuññātattā “na, bhikkhave, asenāsanikena
tika-vin08t:1144_11: vassaṃ upagantabba”nti ayaṃ paṭikkhepo. Tattha na labhatīti asati senāsane ālayavasenapi
tika-vin08t:1144_12: nāvādīsu upagamanaṃ vuttaṃ. Catūsu hi senāsanesu vihārasenāsanaṃ idhādhippetaṃ, na itarattayaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1145_0: Ṭaṅkitamañcādibhedā kuṭīti ettha ṭaṅkitamañco nāma dīghe mañcapāde majjhe vijjhitvā
tika-vin08t:1145_1: aṭaniyo pavesetvā kato mañco, tassa idaṃ upari, idaṃ heṭṭhāti natthi. Parivattetvā
tika-vin08t:1145_2: atthatopi tādisova hoti, taṃ susāne devaṭṭhāne ca ṭhapenti, catunnaṃ pāsāṇānaṃ upari
tika-vin08t:1146_0: “Idha vassaṃ upemī”ti tikkhattuṃ vattabbanti satthassa avihārattā “imasmiṃ vihāre”ti
tika-vin08t:1146_1: avatvā “idha vassaṃ upemī”ti ettakameva vattabbaṃ. Satthe pana vassaṃ upagantuṃ na
tika-vin08t:1146_2: vaṭṭatīti kuṭikādīnaṃ abhāvena “idha vassaṃ upemī”ti vacībhedaṃ katvā upagantuṃ na
tika-vin08t:1146_3: vaṭṭati, ālayakaraṇamatteneva vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo. Vippakiratīti visuṃ visuṃ gacchati.
tika-vin08t:1146_4: Tīsu ṭhānesu natthi vassacchede āpattīti tehi saddhiṃ gacchantasseva natthi āpatti,
tika-vin08t:1146_5: tehi viyujjitvā gamane pana āpattiyeva, pavāretuñca na labhati.
tika-vin08t:1147_0: Pavisanadvāraṃ yojetvāti sakavāṭabaddhameva yojetvā. Purimikāya…pe… na pakkamitabbāti
tika-vin08t:1147_1: iminā āsāḷhīpuṇṇamāya anantare pāṭipadadivase purimavassaṃ upagantvā vassānautuno
tika-vin08t:1147_2: catūsu māsesu sabbapacchimamāsaṃ ṭhapetvā purimaṃ temāsaṃ vasitabbaṃ. Sāvaṇapuṇṇamiyā
tika-vin08t:1147_3: anantare pāṭipadadivase pacchimavassaṃ upagantvā sabbapaṭhamamāsaṃ ṭhapetvā pacchimaṃ
tika-vin08t:1147_4: temāsaṃ vasitabbaṃ. Evaṃ avasitvā purimikāya vassaṃ upagatena bhikkhunā mahāpavāraṇāya
tika-vin08t:1147_5: anto aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā pacchimikāya upagatena cātumāsinipavāraṇāya anto aruṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:1147_6: anuṭṭhāpetvā antarā cārikaṃ pakkameyya, upacārasīmātikkameyeva tassa bhikkhuno dukkaṭāpatti
tika-vin08t:1147_7: hotīti dasseti. Imamatthaṃ pāḷiyā samatthetuṃ “na bhikkhave…pe… vacanato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1147_8: Yadi evaṃ vassaṃ upagantvā sati karaṇīye pakkamantassa sabbathāpi āpattiyeva siyāti
tika-vin08t:1147_9: codanaṃ sandhāyāha “vassaṃ upagantvā panā”tiādi. Evaṃ sante tadaheva sattāhakaraṇīyena
tika-vin08t:1147_10: pakkamantasseva anāpatti siyā, na dvīhatīhaṃ vasitvā pakkamantassāti āha “ko pana vādo”tiādi.
tika-vin08t:1148_1: Tattha “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sattannaṃ sattāhakaraṇīyena pahite gantuṃ, na tveva
tika-vin08t:1148_2: appahite, bhikkhussa bhikkhuniyā sikkhamānāya sāmaṇerassa sāmaṇeriyā upāsakassa upāsikāyā”ti
tika-vin08t:1148_3: ekaṃ, “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sattannaṃ sattāhakaraṇīyena appahitepi gantuṃ, pageva
tika-vin08t:1148_4: pahite, bhikkhussa bhikkhuniyā sikkhamānāya sāmaṇerassa sāmaṇeriyā mātuyā ca pitussa
tika-vin08t:1148_5: cā”ti ekaṃ, “sace pana bhikkhuno bhātā vā añño vā ñātako gilāno hotī”ti ekaṃ, “ekasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:1148_6: vihāre bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ vasanto bhikkhubhattiko”ti ekaṃ, “sace bhikkhussa…pe… anabhirati
tika-vin08t:1148_7: vā kukkuccaṃ vā diṭṭhigataṃ vā uppannaṃ hotī”ti ekaṃ, “koci bhikkhu garudhammaṃ ajjhāpanno
tika-vin08t:1148_8: hoti parivāsāraho”ti ekaṃ, “bhikkhuniyāpi mānattārahāyā”ti ekaṃ, “sāmaṇero upasampajjitukāmo…pe…
tika-vin08t:1148_9: sikkhamānā vā…pe… sāmaṇerī vā”ti ekaṃ, “bhikkhussa bhikkhuniyā vā saṅgho kammaṃ kattukāmo
tika-vin08t:1148_10: tajjanīyaṃ vā”ti ekaṃ, “sacepi kataṃyeva hoti kamma”nti ekaṃ, “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:1148_11: saṅghakaraṇīyena gantu”nti ekanti ekādasa ṭhānāni honti. Tattha paṭhamatatiyacatutthavasena
tika-vin08t:1148_12: tīsu ṭhānesu pahite eva gantabbaṃ, no appahite. Sesesu aṭṭhasu appahitepi gantabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1148_13: pageva pahite. Vuttañhi vimativinodaniyaṃ “gantabbanti saṅghakaraṇīyena appahitepi
tika-vin08t:1148_14: gantabba”nti. Ettha ca anupāsakehipi sāsanabhāvaṃ ñātukāmehi pahite tesaṃ pasādavaḍḍhisampattehipi
tika-vin08t:1148_15: sattāhakaraṇīyena gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti gahetabbaṃ. Bhikkhubhattikoti bhikkhunissitako.
tika-vin08t:1148_16: So pana yasmā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ vasati, tasmā vuttaṃ “bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ vasanto”ti.
tika-vin08t:1149_0: 181. Apicetthāti apica etthāti chedo, ettha etasmiṃ sattāhakaraṇīyavinicchaye apica
tika-vin08t:1149_1: aparo ayaṃ īdiso pāḷimuttakanayo vassūpanāyikakkhandhakapāḷito mutto nayo veditabboti
tika-vin08t:1149_3: hi vimativinodaniyaṃ “ratticchedavinicchayoti sattāhakaraṇīyena gantvā bahiddhā aruṇuṭṭhāpanasaṅkhātassa
tika-vin08t:1149_5: aruṇuṭṭhāpanaṃ ratticchedo”ti. Animantitena gantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha animantitattā
tika-vin08t:1149_6: sattāhakiccaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā gacchantassapi vassacchedo ceva dukkaṭañca hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1149_7: Yathāvuttañhi ratticchedakāraṇaṃ vinā tirovihāre vasitvā āgamissāmīti gacchato vassacchedaṃ
tika-vin08t:1149_8: vadanti. Gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti antoupacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhiteneva sattāhakaraṇīyanimittaṃ sallakkhetvā
tika-vin08t:1149_9: iminā nimittena gantvā “sattāhabbhantare āgacchissāmī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:1149_10: Purimakkhaṇe ābhogaṃ katvā gamanakkhaṇe visaritvā gatepi doso natthi, “sakaraṇīyo
tika-vin08t:1149_11: pakkamatī”ti vuttattā sabbathā ābhogaṃ akatvā gatassa vassacchedoti vadanti. Yo pana
tika-vin08t:1149_13: sattāhabbhantare āgacchati, tassa āpattiyeva, vassacchedo natthi sattāhassa sannivattattāti
tika-vin08t:1150_0: Bhaṇḍakanti cīvarabhaṇḍaṃ. Pahiṇantīti cīvaradhovanādikammena pahiṇanti. Sampāpuṇituṃ
tika-vin08t:1150_1: na sakkoti, vaṭṭatīti ettha “ajjeva āgamissāmī”ti sāmantavihāraṃ gantvā puna āgacchantassa
tika-vin08t:1150_2: antarāmagge sace aruṇuggamanaṃ hoti, vassacchedopi na hoti, ratticchedadukkaṭañca
tika-vin08t:1150_3: natthīti vadanti, tadaheva āgamane saussāhattā vassacchedo vā āpatti vā na hotīti
tika-vin08t:1150_4: adhippāyo. Ācariyaṃ passissāmīti pana gantuṃ labhatīti “agilānampi ācariyaṃ, upajjhāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1150_5: vā passissāmī”ti sattāhakaraṇīyena gantuṃ labhati, nissayācariyaṃ dhammācariyañca,
tika-vin08t:1150_6: pageva upasampadācariyaupajjhāye. Sace naṃ ācariyo “ajja mā gacchā”ti vadati, vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:1150_7: evaṃ sattāhakaraṇīyena āgatānaṃ antosattāheyeva puna āgacchantaṃ sace ācariyo, upajjhāyo
tika-vin08t:1150_8: vā “ajja mā gacchā”ti vadati, vaṭṭati, sattāhātikkamepi anāpattīti adhippāyo. Vassacchedo
tika-vin08t:1150_9: pana hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ sattāhassa bahiddhā vītināmitattā.
tika-vin08t:1151_0: Sace dūraṃ gato sattāhavārena aruṇo uṭṭhāpetabboti iminā vassacchedakāraṇe sati sattāhakaraṇīyena
tika-vin08t:1151_1: gantumpi vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. Ettha cha divasāni bahiddhā vītināmetvā sattame divase
tika-vin08t:1151_2: purāruṇā eva antoupacārasīmāyaṃ pavisitvā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā punadivase sattāhaṃ adhiṭṭhāya
tika-vin08t:1151_3: gantabbanti adhippāyo. Keci pana “sattame divase āgantvā aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā tadaheva
tika-vin08t:1151_4: divasabhāgepi gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ “aruṇo uṭṭhāpetabbo”ti
tika-vin08t:1151_5: vuttattā. Sattame divase tattha aruṇuṭṭhāpanameva hi sandhāya pāḷiyaṃ “sattāhaṃ sannivatto
tika-vin08t:1151_6: kātabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā gacchanto ca anto appavisitvā bahiddhāva sattāhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1151_7: vītināmento ca samucchinnavasso eva bhavissati aruṇassa bahi eva uṭṭhāpitattā. Itarathā
tika-vin08t:1151_8: “aruṇo uṭṭhāpetabbo”ti vacanaṃ niratthakaṃ siyā. “Sattāhavārena antovihāre pavisitvā
tika-vin08t:1151_9: aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā gantabba”nti vattabbato aññesu ca ṭhānesu aruṇuṭṭhāpanameva vuccati.
tika-vin08t:1151_10: Vakkhati hi cīvarakkhandhake “ekasmiṃ vihāre vasanto itarasmiṃ sattāhavārena aruṇameva uṭṭhāpetī”ti.
tika-vin08t:1152_0: Athāpi yaṃ te vadeyyuṃ “sattame divase yadā kadāci paviṭṭhena taṃdivasanissito atītāruṇo
tika-vin08t:1152_1: uṭṭhāpito nāma hotīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutta”nti, taṃ saddagatiyāpi
tika-vin08t:1152_2: na sameti. Na hi uṭṭhite aruṇe pacchā paviṭṭho tassa payojako uṭṭhāpako bhavitumarahati.
tika-vin08t:1152_3: Yadi bhaveyya, “vassaṃ upagantvā pana aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā tadaheva sattāhakaraṇīyena
tika-vin08t:1152_4: pakkamantassā”pīti ettha “aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā”ti vacanaṃ virujjheyya. Tenapi taṃdivasanissitassa
tika-vin08t:1152_5: aruṇassa uṭṭhāpitattā āraññakassapi bhikkhuno sāyanhasamaye aṅgayuttaṃ araññaṃ gantvā
tika-vin08t:1152_6: tadā eva nivattantassa aruṇo uṭṭhāpito dhutaṅgañca visodhitaṃ siyā, na cetaṃ yuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:1152_7: aruṇuggamanakāle eva aruṇuṭṭhāpanassa vuttattā. Vuttañhi “kālasseva pana nikkhamitvā
tika-vin08t:1152_8: aṅgayutte ṭhāne aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetabbaṃ. Sace aruṇuṭṭhānavelāyaṃ tesaṃ ābādho vaḍḍhati,
tika-vin08t:1152_9: tesaṃ eva kiccaṃ kātabbaṃ, na dhutaṅgavisuddhikena bhavitabba”nti. Tathā pārivāsikādīnampi
tika-vin08t:1152_10: aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā vattaṃ nikkhipantānaṃ ratticchedo vutto. “Uggate aruṇe nikkhipitabba”nti
tika-vin08t:1152_11: hi vuttaṃ. Sahaseyyasikkhāpadepi anupasampannehi saha nivutthabhāvaparimocanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1152_12: “purāruṇā nikkhamitvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Evaṃ cīvaravippavāsādīsu ca sabbattha rattipariyosāne
tika-vin08t:1152_13: āgāmiaruṇavaseneva aruṇuṭṭhānaṃ dassitaṃ, na atītāruṇavasena, tasmā vuttanayenevettha
tika-vin08t:1153_0: Yaṃ pana vassaṃ upagatassa tadaheva aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā sakaraṇīyassa pakkamanavacanaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1153_1: taṃ vassaṃ upagatakālato paṭṭhāya yadā kadāci nimitte sati gamanassa anuññātattā
tika-vin08t:1153_2: yuttaṃ, na pana sattāhavārena gatassa aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā tadahevagamanaṃ “aruṇo
tika-vin08t:1153_3: uṭṭhāpetabbo”ti vuttattā. Yathā vā “sattāhānāgatāya pavāraṇāya sakaraṇīyo pakkamati,
tika-vin08t:1153_4: āgaccheyya vā so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu taṃ āvāsaṃ na vā āgaccheyyā”tiādinā pacchimasattāhe
tika-vin08t:1153_5: anāgamane anuññātepi aññasattāhesu taṃ na vaṭṭati. Evaṃ paṭhamasattāhe aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā
tika-vin08t:1153_6: gamane anuññātepi tato paresu sattāhesu āgatassa aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā gamanaṃ na vaṭṭati
tika-vin08t:1154_0: Sace pavāritakāle vassāvāsikaṃ dentītiādinā vassāvāsikacīvarampi kathinacīvaraṃ viya
tika-vin08t:1154_2: gahetabba”nti pana vuttattā sattāhakaraṇīyena gantvā sattāhabbhantare āgatā labhanti.
tika-vin08t:1154_3: Kathinānisaṃsacīvaraṃ pana saṅghaṃ anāpucchā te na labhanti. Vakkhati hi “sattāhakaraṇīyena
tika-vin08t:1154_4: gatāpi bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṃ labhantūti vā evarūpaṃ adhammikavattaṃ na kātabba”nti. Idha
tika-vin08t:1155_0: Vāḷehi ubbāḷhā honti, gaṇhantipi paripātentipīti ettha gaṇhantīti gahetvā khādanti.
tika-vin08t:1155_1: Paripātentīti palāpenti, anubandhantīti attho. Imesu “gāḷehi ubbāḷhā hontī”tiādīsu
tika-vin08t:1155_2: saṅghabhedapariyantesu vatthūsu kevalaṃ anāpatti hoti, pavāretuṃ pana na labhatīti
tika-vin08t:1155_3: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sace panātiādīsu yasmā nānāsīmāyaṃ dvīsu āvāsesu vassaṃ upagacchantassa
tika-vin08t:1155_4: “dutiye vasissāmī”ti upacārato nikkhantamatte paṭhamo senāsanaggāho paṭippassambhati,
tika-vin08t:1155_5: tasmā pāḷiyaṃ “tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno purimikā ca na paññāyatī”ti paṭhamaṃ senāsanaggāhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1155_6: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Dutiyasenāsanaggāhe pana purimikā paññāyateva, tattheva temāsaṃ
tika-vin08t:1155_7: vasanto purimavassaṃvuttho eva hoti. Tato vā pana dutiyadivasādīsu “paṭhamasenāsane
tika-vin08t:1155_8: vasissāmī”ti upacārātikkame purimikāpi na paññāyatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1156_0: Paṭissavassa visaṃvādanapaccayā hontampi dukkaṭaṃ satiyeva paṭissave hotīti āha “tassa
tika-vin08t:1156_1: tassa paṭissavassa visaṃvāde dukkaṭa”nti. Tenevāha “tañca kho…pe… visaṃvādanapaccayā”ti.
tika-vin08t:1156_2: Pāḷiyaṃ “so sattāhānāgatāya pavāraṇāya sakaraṇīyo pakkamatī”ti vuttattā pavāraṇādivasepi
tika-vin08t:1156_3: sattāhakaraṇīyaṃ vinā gantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne “navamito paṭṭhāya
tika-vin08t:1156_4: gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ kacci uposathadivasato upanidhāya navamī icchitabbā,
tika-vin08t:1156_6: upanidhāya icchitabbā, na lokiyatithivasena. Bhaddapadamāsassa hi kāḷapakkhauposathadivasaṃ
tika-vin08t:1156_7: mariyādaṃ katvā tadanantarapāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya gaṇiyamāne sati yo divaso navamo
tika-vin08t:1156_8: hoti, tato paṭṭhāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tithipekkhāya pana itthiliṅgavohāro, tato navamito
tika-vin08t:1157_0: Sattāhaṃ anāgatāya assāti sattāhānāgatā. Kā sā? Pavāraṇā. Assayujamāsassa sukkapakkhanavamiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1157_1: sattāhakaraṇīyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya gacchanto bhikkhu antovassassa sattāhamattāvasiṭṭhattā
tika-vin08t:1157_2: sattamaaruṇe uggatamatte vutthavasso hoti, dasamiyaṃ chāhamattaṃ, ekādasamiyaṃ pañcāhamattaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1157_3: dvādasiyaṃ caturāhamattaṃ, terasiyaṃ tīhamattaṃ, cuddasiyaṃ dvīhamattaṃ, pannarasiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1157_4: ekāhamattaṃ avasiṭṭhaṃ hoti, tasmā pavāraṇādivasassa pariyosānabhūtaaruṇasmiṃ uggate
tika-vin08t:1157_5: vutthavasso hoti, tasmā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kukkuccavinodanatthaṃ bhagavā dhammassāmī
tika-vin08t:1157_6: “so sattāhānāgatāya pavāraṇāya sakaraṇīyo pakkamati, āgaccheyya vā so, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:1157_7: bhikkhu taṃ āvāsaṃ na vā āgaccheyya, tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno purimikā ca paññāyati,
tika-vin08t:1157_8: paṭissave ca anāpattī”ti āha. Sattāhānāgatāya komudiyā cātumāsiniyāti etthāpi eseva
tika-vin08t:1157_9: nayo. Tattha komudiyā cātumāsiniyāti pacchimakattikapuṇṇamāyaṃ. Sā hi kumudānaṃ atthitāya
tika-vin08t:1157_10: komudī, catunnaṃ vassikamāsānaṃ pariyosānattā cātumāsinīti vuccati. Tadā hi kumudāni
tika-vin08t:1157_11: supupphitāni honti, tasmā kumudā ettha pupphantīti komudīti vuccati, kumudavatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t:1158_1: kattabbaṃ katikavattaṃ katvā. Kasāvaparibhaṇḍanti kasāvehi bhūmiparikammaṃ. Vattanti katikavattaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1159_0: Evarūpaṃ adhammikavattaṃ na kātabbanti nānāverajjakā hi bhikkhū sannipatanti, tattha
tika-vin08t:1159_1: keci dubbalā appathāmā evarūpaṃ vattaṃ anupāletuṃ na sakkonti, tasmā idha āgatañca
tika-vin08t:1159_2: catutthapārājikavaṇṇanāyaṃ āgataṃ āvāsaṃ vā maṇḍapaṃ vā sīmaṃ vā yaṃ kiñci ṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1159_3: paricchinditvā “yo imamhā āvāsā paṭhamaṃ pakkamissati, taṃ ‘arahā’ti jānissāmā”ti
tika-vin08t:1159_4: katāya katikāya yo “maṃ ‘arahā’ti jānantū”ti tamhā ṭhānā paṭhamaṃ pakkamati, pārājiko
tika-vin08t:1159_5: hoti. Yo pana ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ vā kiccena mātāpitūnaṃ vā kenacideva karaṇīyena
tika-vin08t:1159_6: bhikkhācāravattaṃ vā uddesaparipucchādīnaṃ atthāya aññena vā tādisena karaṇīyena
tika-vin08t:1159_7: taṃ ṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā gacchati, anāpatti. Sacepissa evaṃ gatassa pacchā icchācāro
tika-vin08t:1159_8: uppajjati “na dānāhaṃ tattha gamissāmi, evaṃ maṃ arahāti sambhāvessantī”ti, anāpattiyeva.
tika-vin08t:1160_0: Yopi kenacideva karaṇīyena taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā sajjhāyamanasikārādivasena aññavihito
tika-vin08t:1160_1: vā hutvā corādīhi vā anubaddho meghaṃ vā uṭṭhitaṃ disvā anovassakaṃ pavisitukāmo
tika-vin08t:1160_2: taṃ ṭhānaṃ atikkamati, anāpatti, yānena vā iddhiyā vā gacchantopi pārājikaṃ nāpajjati,
tika-vin08t:1160_3: padagamaneneva āpajjati. Tampi yehi saha katikā katā, tehi saddhiṃ apubbaṃ acarimaṃ
tika-vin08t:1160_4: gacchanto nāpajjati. Evaṃ gacchantā hi sabbepi aññamaññaṃ rakkhanti. Sacepi maṇḍaparukkhamūlādīsu
tika-vin08t:1160_5: kiñci ṭhānaṃ paricchindanti “yo ettha nisīdati vā caṅkamati vā, taṃ ‘arahā’ti jānissāma”,
tika-vin08t:1160_6: pupphāni vā ṭhapetvā, “yo imāni gahetvā pūjaṃ karissati, taṃ ‘arahā’ti jānissāmā”tiādinā
tika-vin08t:1160_7: nayena katikā katā hoti, tatrāpi icchācāravasena tathā karontassa pārājikameva. Sacepi
tika-vin08t:1160_8: upāsakena antarāmagge vihāro vā kato hoti, cīvarādīni vā ṭhapitāni honti “ye arahanto,
tika-vin08t:1160_9: te imasmiṃ vihāre vasantu, cīvarādīni vā gaṇhantū”ti, tatrāpi icchācāravasena vasantassa
tika-vin08t:1160_10: vā tāni vā gaṇhantassa pārājikameva, etaṃ pana adhammikakatikavattaṃ, tasmā na kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1160_11: aññaṃ vā evarūpaṃ “imasmiṃ temāsabbhantare sabbeva āraññakā hontu piṇḍapātikadhutaṅgādiavasesadhutaṅgadharā
tika-vin08t:1160_12: vā, atha vā sabbeva khīṇāsavā hontū”ti evamādi. Nānāverajjakā hi bhikkhū sannipatanti.
tika-vin08t:1160_13: Tattha keci dubbalā appathāmā evarūpaṃ vattaṃ anupāletuṃ na sakkonti, tasmā evarūpampi
tika-vin08t:1160_14: vattaṃ na kātabbaṃ. “Imaṃ temāsaṃ sabbeheva na uddisitabbaṃ, na paripucchitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1160_15: na pabbājetabbaṃ, mūgabbataṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ, bahisīmaṭṭhassapi saṅghalābho dātabbo”ti
tika-vin08t:1161_1: bhabbe ācārakulaputte upaparikkhitvā pabbājetha. Bhasse mattaṃ jānitvāti vacane pamāṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:1161_2: ñatvā. Dasakathāvatthu nāma appicchākathā santuṭṭhikathā pavivekakathā asaṃsaggakathā
tika-vin08t:1161_3: vīriyārambhakathā sīlakathā samādhikathā paññākathā vimuttikathā vimuttiñāṇadassanakathāti.
tika-vin08t:1162_0: Viggahasaṃvattanikaṃ vacanaṃ viggāhikaṃ. Caturārakkhaṃ ahāpentāti buddhānussati mettā
tika-vin08t:1162_1: asubhaṃ maraṇānussatīti imaṃ caturārakkhaṃ ahāpentā. Dantakaṭṭhakhādanavattaṃ ācikkhitabbanti
tika-vin08t:1162_2: ettha idaṃ dantakaṭṭhakhādanavattaṃ – yo devasikaṃ saṅghamajjhe osarati, tena sāmaṇerādīhi
tika-vin08t:1162_3: āharitvā bhikkhūnaṃ yathāsukhaṃ bhuñjanatthāya dantakaṭṭhamāḷake nikkhittesu dantakaṭṭhesu
tika-vin08t:1162_4: divase divase ekameva dantakaṭṭhaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Yo pana devasikaṃ na osarati, padhānaghare
tika-vin08t:1162_5: vasitvā dhammassavane vā uposathagge vā dissati, tena pamāṇaṃ sallakkhetvā cattāri
tika-vin08t:1162_6: pañca dantakaṭṭhāni attano vasanaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā khāditabbāni. Tesu khīṇesu sace
tika-vin08t:1162_7: punapi dantakaṭṭhamāḷake bahūni hontiyeva, punapi āharitvā khāditabbāni. Yadi pana
tika-vin08t:1162_8: pamāṇaṃ asallakkhetvā āharati, tesu akhīṇesuyeva māḷake khīyati, tato keci therā
tika-vin08t:1162_9: “yehi gahitāni, te paṭiharantū”ti vadeyyuṃ, keci “khādantu, puna sāmaṇerā āharissantī”ti,
tika-vin08t:1162_10: tasmā vivādaparihāratthaṃ pamāṇaṃ sallakkhetabbaṃ, gahaṇe pana doso natthi. Maggaṃ
tika-vin08t:1162_11: gacchantenapi ekaṃ vā dve vā thavikāya pakkhipitvā gantabbanti. Bhikkhācāravattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1163_0: Antogāme…pe… na kathetabbāti ettha catūsu paccayesu cīvare ca piṇḍapāte ca viññattipi
tika-vin08t:1163_1: na vaṭṭati nimittobhāsaparikathāpi. Senāsane viññattimeva na vaṭṭati, sesāni tīṇi
tika-vin08t:1163_2: vaṭṭanti. Gilānapaccaye sabbampi vaṭṭati. Evaṃ santepi ājīvaṃ sodhentehi bhikkhūhi
tika-vin08t:1163_3: suṭṭhu rakkhitabbāti. Iminā ājīvapārisuddhisīlaṃ dassitaṃ. Rakkhitindriyehi bhavitabbanti
tika-vin08t:1163_5: Paccayasannissitasīlaṃ pana tīhipi sāmatthiyato dassitaṃ. Iti catupārisuddhisīlapaṭisaṃyuttā
tika-vin08t:1164_0: Imasmiṃ vassūpanāyikavisaye tesu tesu nagaresu tasmiṃ tasmiṃ rājakāle apariyantā
tika-vin08t:1164_1: vivādakathā hoti. Kathaṃ? Vassūpanāyikakkhandhake “tena kho pana samayena rājā māgadho
tika-vin08t:1164_2: seniyo bimbisāro vassaṃ ukkaḍḍhitukāmo bhikkhūnaṃ santike dūtaṃ pāhesi ‘yadi panāyyā
tika-vin08t:1164_3: āgame juṇhe vassaṃ upagaccheyyu’nti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ, ‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:1164_4: rājūnaṃ anuvattitu”’nti vacanaṃ nissāya bhagavatā adhimāsaṃ paññattanti maññamānā
tika-vin08t:1164_5: vedasamayena saṃsanditvā gayhamānā anekavihitaṃ vivādaṃ karonti. Vedasamaye kira
tika-vin08t:1164_6: dve adhimāsāni yācādhimāsañca pattādhimāsañca. Tattha kaliyugagaṇane ekūnavīsatigaṇanena
tika-vin08t:1164_7: bhājite dvepañcaṭṭhadasaterasasoḷasaṭṭhārasavasena sattadhā seso hoti, tesaṃ vasena
tika-vin08t:1164_8: cammādhimāsa pañcādhimāsa pasvādhimāsa dasādhimāsa terasādhimāsa soḷasādhimāsa aṭṭhārasādhimāsāti
tika-vin08t:1164_9: voharanti. Aṭṭhārasādhimāsaṃ pana avasānādhimāsantipi voharanti. Tesu pasusoḷasāni
tika-vin08t:1164_11: ākaḍḍhitabbato yācādhimāsanti voharanti, sesāni pana pañcamatteyeva adhimāsapatanakaliyuge
tika-vin08t:1164_12: māsassa ākaḍḍhitabbato pattādhimāsanti. Tatretaṃ yācādhimāsalakkhaṇaṃ – tathato ajānantā
tika-vin08t:1164_13: pāḷiyā saṃsanditvā bimbisāraraññā bhagavato yācitādhimāsattā yācādhimāsaṃ nāma bhavati,
tika-vin08t:1164_14: tasmā dvīsu eva yācādhimāsesu divasena saha māso ākaḍḍhitabbo, na itaresūti vadanti,
tika-vin08t:1164_15: aññe pana pañcasu pattādhimāsesu eva saha divasena māso ākaḍḍhitabbo, na yācādhimāsesūti.
tika-vin08t:1165_0: Apare pana – “dvemā, bhikkhave, vassūpanāyikā purimikā pacchimikāti, aparajjugatāya
tika-vin08t:1165_1: āsāḷhiyā purimikā upagantabbā, māsagatāya āsāḷhiyā pacchimikā upagantabbā”ti tasmiṃyeva
tika-vin08t:1165_2: vassūpanāyikakkhandhake āgatāya pāḷiyā atthaṃ ayoniso gahetvā tithinakkhattayoge
tika-vin08t:1165_3: eva vassūpagamanaṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ, tasmā āsāḷhipuṇṇamāya anantarabhūto pāṭipadadivaso
tika-vin08t:1165_4: puṇṇātithiyā ca yutto hotu, pubbāsāḷhauttarāsāḷhasaṅkhātesu dvīsu nakkhattesu ekekena
tika-vin08t:1165_5: yutto ca, evaṃbhūto kālo yadi vinā divasena māsakaḍḍhane sampajjati, tathā ca sati
tika-vin08t:1165_6: māsamattākaḍḍhanameva kātabbaṃ, yadi na sampajjati, saha divasena māsākaḍḍhanaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1165_7: ayaṃ piṭakena ca vedena ca anulomo vinicchayoti vadanti.
tika-vin08t:1166_0: Tatrāpyeke vadanti – “mā iti cando vuccati tassa gatiyā divasassa minitabbato, so
tika-vin08t:1166_1: ettha sabbakalāpāripūriyā puṇṇoti puṇṇamā”tiādinā vinayatthamañjūsādīsu āgamanato
tika-vin08t:1166_2: puṇṇātithiyogopi puṇṇamiyā eva icchitabbo, na pāṭipade, tathā nakkhattayogopi āsāḷhisukkapakkhassa
tika-vin08t:1166_3: pannarase uposathe “uttarāsāḷhanakkhatte, evaṃ dhātu patiṭṭhitā”ti mahāvaṃse vacanatoti.
tika-vin08t:1166_4: Tattha purimā vadanti – evaṃ sante uposathadivaseyeva candaggāho ca sūriyaggāho ca
tika-vin08t:1166_5: bhaveyya, idāni pana kāḷapakkhapāṭipadādīsuyeva candaggāho, sukkapakkhapāṭipadādīsuyeva
tika-vin08t:1166_6: sūriyaggāho paññāyati, tasmā pāṭipadeyeva tithinakkhattayogo icchitabboti. Pacchimāpi
tika-vin08t:1166_7: vadanti – tumhādisānaṃ vādīnaṃ vacanena pubbe ākaḍḍhitabbadivasānaṃ anākaḍḍhitattā
tika-vin08t:1166_8: divasapuñjabhāvena evaṃ hoti, saccato pana uposathadivaseyeva candaggāho sūriyaggāho
tika-vin08t:1166_9: ca icchitabboti. Hotu, yathā icchatha, tathā vadatha, evaṃ bhūtapubbo sāṭṭhakathe
tika-vin08t:1166_10: tepiṭake buddhavacane atthīti? Atthi. Gandhārajātake hi uposathadivase candaggāho
tika-vin08t:1166_11: dvikkhattuṃ āgato. Tañhi jātakaṃ tīsu piṭakesu suttapariyāpannaṃ, pañcasu nikāyesu
tika-vin08t:1166_12: khuddakanikāyapariyāpannaṃ, navasu sāsanaṅgesu jātakapariyāpannanti. Evaṃ vutte purimakā
tika-vin08t:1167_0: Athekacce “piṭakattaye adhikamāsāyeva santi, na adhikadivasā sāratthadīpaniyaṃ ‘yaṃ
tika-vin08t:1167_1: pana vuttaṃ tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu aṭṭhārasannaṃyeva vassānaṃ adhikamāse gahetvā gaṇitattā
tika-vin08t:1167_2: sesavassadvayassapi adhikāni divasāni honteva, tāni adhikadivasāni sandhāya nikkaṅkhā
tika-vin08t:1167_3: hutvāti vuttanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Na hi dvīsu vassesu adhikadivasā nāma visuṃ
tika-vin08t:1167_4: upalabbhanti tatiye vasse vassukkaḍḍhanavasena adhikamāse pariccatteyeva adhikamāsasambhavato,
tika-vin08t:1167_5: tasmā dvīsu vassesu atirekadivasā nāma visuṃ na sambhavantī’ti vacanato”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t:1167_6: Athaññe vadanti – piṭakattaye adhikadivasāti āgatā atthi vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ “avasesānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1167_7: dvinnaṃ vassānaṃ adhikadivasāni honteva, tasmā nikkaṅkhā hutvā upasampādentī”ti vacanatoti.
tika-vin08t:1167_8: Ito parampi vividhena ākārena kathenti. Suddhavedikāpi evaṃ vadanti, vinayadharā
tika-vin08t:1167_9: bhikkhū vinayasamayavasena vadanti. Amhākaṃ pana vedasamaye hatthagatagaṇanavaseneva
tika-vin08t:1168_0: Idha pana adhippetavinicchayameva kathayāma. Paṭhamadutiyavādesu na bimbisārarājā
tika-vin08t:1168_1: bhagavantaṃ adhimāsapaññāpanaṃ yācati, na ca bhagavā paññapeti, na “tasmiṃ vasse
tika-vin08t:1168_2: idaṃ nāma adhimāsaṃ hotī”ti vā “māsamattaṃ vā sahadivasaṃ vā ākaḍḍhitabba”nti vā
tika-vin08t:1168_3: pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu ca atthi, rājā pana upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya vedasamaye
tika-vin08t:1168_4: vassukkaḍḍhanasambhavato bhikkhūnaṃ paṭhamaāsāḷhamāse vassaṃ anupagantvā dutiyaāsāḷhamāse
tika-vin08t:1168_5: upagamanatthaṃ “yadi panāyyā āgame juṇhe vassaṃ upagaccheyyu”nti dūtaṃ pāhesi. Yadi
tika-vin08t:1168_6: pana upagaccheyyuṃ, sādhu vatāti sambandhitabbaṃ. Bhikkhū pana rañño pahitasāsanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1168_7: bhagavato ārocesuṃ. Bhagavā pana vassukkaḍḍhane bhikkhūnaṃ guṇaparihāniyā abhāvato
tika-vin08t:1168_8: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, rājūnaṃ anuvattitu”nti avoca. Tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi
tika-vin08t:1168_9: bhikkhave rājūnaṃ anuvattitunti ettha vassukkaḍḍhanabhikkhūnaṃ kāci parihāni nāma
tika-vin08t:1168_11: tasmā yācādhimāso vā hotu pattādhimāso vā, yasmiṃ yasmiṃ kāle anuvattanena bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1168_12: sīlādiguṇampi parihāni natthi, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle anuvattitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1169_0: Kathaṃ pana anuvattitabbaṃ, kathaṃ na anuvattitabbaṃ? Yadi anuvattante pubbe upavutthadivasato
tika-vin08t:1169_1: idāni upavasitabbauposathadivaso cātuddaso vā pannaraso vā hoti, tathā sati anuvattitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1169_2: Yadi pana terasamo vā soḷasamo vā hoti, na anuvattitabbaṃ. Anuvattanto hi anuposathe
tika-vin08t:1169_3: uposathakato hoti, tato “na, bhikkhave, anuposathe uposatho kātabbo, yo kareyya,
tika-vin08t:1169_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttadukkaṭaṃ āpajjati, tasmā sīlaguṇaparihānisambhavato na
tika-vin08t:1169_5: anuvattitabbaṃ. Vuttañhi vimativinodaniyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, rājūnaṃ anuvattitunti
tika-vin08t:1169_6: vacanato panettha lokiyānaṃ tithiṃ anuvattantehipi attano uposathakkamena cātuddasiṃ
tika-vin08t:1169_7: pannarasiṃ vā, pannarasiṃ cātuddasiṃ vā karonteheva anuvattitabbaṃ, na pana soḷasamadivasaṃ
tika-vin08t:1170_1: bhikkhave, vassūpanāyikā purimikā pacchimikā”ti bhagavā avoca. Tato tāsaṃ dvinnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1170_2: vassūpanāyikānaṃ upagamanakālaṃ dassetuṃ “aparajjugatāya āsāḷhiyā purimikā upagantabbā,
tika-vin08t:1170_3: māsagatāya āsāḷhiyā pacchimikā upagantabbā”ti vuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ piṇḍattho – āsāḷhipuṇṇamiyā
tika-vin08t:1170_4: anantare pāṭipadadivase purimikā upagantabbā, sāvaṇapuṇṇamiyā anantare pāṭipadadivase
tika-vin08t:1170_5: pacchimikā upagantabbāti. Tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tasmā āsāḷhipuṇṇamāya anantare
tika-vin08t:1170_6: pāṭipadadivase, āsāḷhipuṇṇamito vā aparāya puṇṇamāya anantare pāṭipadadivaseyeva
tika-vin08t:1170_7: vihāraṃ paṭijaggitvā pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā sabbaṃ cetiyavandanādisāmīcikammaṃ
tika-vin08t:1170_8: niṭṭhāpetvā ‘imasmiṃ vihāre imaṃ temāsaṃ vassaṃ upemī’ti sakiṃ vā dvattikkhattuṃ
tika-vin08t:1170_9: vā vācaṃ nicchāretvā vassaṃ upagantabba”nti, sāratthadīpaniyampi “aparajjūti āsāḷhito
tika-vin08t:1170_10: aparaṃ dinaṃ, pāṭipadanti attho”ti, vimativinodaniyampi “aparasmiṃ divaseti dutiye
tika-vin08t:1170_11: pāṭipadadivase”ti evaṃ pāḷiaṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu pāṭipadadivaseyeva vassūpagamanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1170_12: na vuttaṃ “amukatithiyoge”ti vā “amukanakkhattayoge”ti vā, tasmā pāṭipadadivase pāto
tika-vin08t:1170_13: aruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya sakaladivasaṃ sakalaratti yāva dutiyaaruṇuggamanā yathārucite
tika-vin08t:1170_14: kāle vassaṃ upagantabbanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tato eva vassūpanāyikakāle puṇṇātithiyā yogo,
tika-vin08t:1170_15: uttarāsāḷhanakkhattena yogo hotūti vadantānaṃ vacanaṃ vinayaviruddhaṃ hoti, taṃ vacanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1170_16: gahetvā puṇṇātithiyogaṃ uttarāsāḷhanakkhattayogañca āgametvā vassaṃ upagantvāpi tathāgatena
tika-vin08t:1171_0: Evaṃ pāḷiaṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu ca puṇṇātithiyoge eva vassaṃ upagantabbaṃ, na ekāya tithiyā
tika-vin08t:1171_1: yutteti vā uttarāsāḷhanakkhattayogeyeva, na sāvaṇanakkhattayogeti vā anāgatameva
tika-vin08t:1171_2: chāyaṃ gahetvā tathāgatena paññattaṃ viya potthakesu likhitvā kehici ṭhapitattā sakalaṃ
tika-vin08t:1171_3: vinayapiṭakaṃ apassantā vedasāmayikā taṃ vacanaṃ saddahitvā vassūpagamanakāle puṇṇātithiuttarāsāḷhayogameva
tika-vin08t:1171_4: gavesantā māsadivasena saha ākaḍḍhitabbakālepi māsamattameva ākaḍḍhanti, māsamattameva
tika-vin08t:1171_5: ākaḍḍhitabbakālepi saha divasena ākaḍḍhanti, tasmā evaṃvādino bhikkhū “apaññattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1171_6: tathāgatena paññattaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpetī”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjanti, tasmā bhagavati
tika-vin08t:1171_7: gāravasahitā lajjino paṇḍitā evaṃ na gaṇhantīti. Tithinakkhattayogo pana uposathadivaseyeva
tika-vin08t:1171_8: bahudhā piṭakattaye āgato, porāṇavedaganthesu ca pasaṃsito, kadāci pana vohārakālo
tika-vin08t:1171_9: tithiyā nakkhattena ca visamo hoti, tasmā taṃ sametuṃ adhimāsapatanakāle māsampi
tika-vin08t:1171_10: divasampi ākaḍḍhanti, tasmā aññasmiṃ kāle visamepi ākaḍḍhanakāle samāpetabbaṃ. Evaṃ
tika-vin08t:1172_0: Pañcamachaṭṭhavādesu adhimāsoti aṭṭhārasavassato adhikamāsaṃ gahetvā vutto, tasmā
tika-vin08t:1172_1: “adhiko māso adhimāso”ti kammadhārayasamāsattā pulliṅgaṃ katvā vutto. Pubbe pana
tika-vin08t:1172_2: māsapuñjato adhikaghaṭiyo gahetvā vutto, tasmā “māsato adhikaṃ adhimāsa”nti abyayībhāvasamāsattā
tika-vin08t:1172_3: napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Idha pana “porāṇakattherā ekūnavīsativassaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ
tika-vin08t:1172_4: nikkhamanīyapuṇṇamāsiṃ atikkamma pāṭipadadivase upasampādenti, taṃ kasmāti? Vuccate
tika-vin08t:1172_5: – ekasmiṃ vasse cha cātuddasikauposathadivasā honti, iti vīsatiyā vassesu cattāro
tika-vin08t:1172_6: māsā parihāyanti, rājāno tatiye tatiye vasse vassaṃ upakaḍḍhanti, iti aṭṭhārasasu
tika-vin08t:1172_7: vassesu cha māsā vaḍḍhanti, tato uposathavasena parihīne cattāro māse apanetvā dve
tika-vin08t:1172_8: māsā avasesā honti, te dve māse gahetvā vīsati vassāni paripuṇṇāni hontīti nikkaṅkhā
tika-vin08t:1172_9: hutvā nikkhamanīyapuṇṇamāsiṃ atikkamma pāṭipade upasampādentī”ti aṭṭhakathāvacane
tika-vin08t:1172_10: “nikkaṅkhā hutvāti adhikamāsehi saddhiṃ paripuṇṇavīsativassattā nibbematikā hutvā”ti
tika-vin08t:1173_0: Tatra nanu ca “tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu aṭṭhārasannaṃ…pe… vutta”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ kathanti
tika-vin08t:1173_1: codanaṃ sandhāya “yaṃ pana vuttaṃ…pe… taṃ na gahetabba”nti kiñcāpi vuttaṃ, tathāpi
tika-vin08t:1173_2: taṃ gaṇṭhipadesu vuttavacanaṃ na gahetabbanti attho, kasmā na gahetabbanti āha “na
tika-vin08t:1173_3: hī”tiādi. Hi yasmā na upalabbhanti, tasmā na gahetabbanti yojanā. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti
tika-vin08t:1173_4: āha “tatiye”tiādi. Pariccatteyeva sambhavato, apariccatte asambhavato na upalabbhantīti
tika-vin08t:1174_0: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana gaṇṭhipadesu vuttameva gahetvā vadati. Etāni vacanāni sāmaṇerānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1174_2: tasmā imāni āharitvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchituṃ na sakkonti. Bhikkhū pana bahūnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1174_3: sannipāte kiñci pāṭhaṃ āharitvā kathetuṃ samattho sobhatīti katvā īdisaṃ pāṭhaṃ āharanti.
tika-vin08t:1174_4: Sutasannicayapaṇḍitā pana icchitatthassa asādhakattā evarūpaṃ na āharanti. Suddhavedikānampi
tika-vin08t:1174_5: vacane vinayadharā vinayameva jānanti, na bāhirasamayaṃ. Ayaṃ pana kathā bāhirasamaye
tika-vin08t:1174_6: pavattā, tasmā vinayadharānaṃ avisayoti maññantā vadanti.
tika-vin08t:1175_0: Vinayadharā pana ekacce vinayameva jānanti, ekacce sakalaṃ piṭakattayaṃ jānanti,
tika-vin08t:1175_1: ekacce sabāhirasamayaṃ piṭakattayaṃ jānanti, tasmā kathetuṃ samatthabhāvoyeva pamāṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1175_2: Vedikānampi vacanaṃ vedappakaraṇāgatameva pamāṇaṃ. Na yaṃ kiñci hatthagatagaṇanamattaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1175_3: tasmā yadā pathavissaro rājā sadivasaṃ māsaṃ ākaḍḍhitukāmo “jeṭṭhamāsakāḷapakkhauposathaṃ
tika-vin08t:1175_4: pannarasiyaṃ karontū”ti yācissati, tadā “sakiṃ pakkhassa cātuddase vā pannarase vā”ti
tika-vin08t:1175_5: vacanato pannarasiyaṃ uposathakaraṇe doso natthi, yadā suddhamāsameva ākaḍḍhitukāmo
tika-vin08t:1175_6: “cātuddasiyaṃ karontū”ti yācissati, evaṃ sati pakatiyāpi jeṭṭhamāsakāḷapakkhuposatho
tika-vin08t:1175_7: cātuddasoyevāti katvā doso natthi, ubhayathāpi uposatho sukatoyeva hoti, tasmā anuvattitabbo.
tika-vin08t:1175_8: Tato paraṃ paṭhamāsāḷhamāsassa juṇhapakkhepi kāḷapakkhepi dutiyāsāḷhamāsassa juṇhapakkhepi
tika-vin08t:1175_9: pannarasīuposathaṃ katvā pāṭipadadivase tithiyogaṃ vā nakkhattayogaṃ vā anoloketvā
tika-vin08t:1175_10: pāto aruṇuggamanānantarato paṭṭhāya yāva puna aruṇuggamanā sakaladivasarattiyaṃ yathājjhāsayaṃ
tika-vin08t:1175_11: vassaṃ upagacchanto sūpagatova hoti, natthi koci dosoti daṭṭhabbo. Bhavatvevaṃ, pātova
tika-vin08t:1175_12: vassaṃ upagacchanto atthīti? Atthi. Vuttañhetaṃ senāsanakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ “sace
tika-vin08t:1175_13: pātova gāhite senāsane añño vitakkacāriko bhikkhu āgantvā senāsanaṃ yācati, ‘gahitaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1175_14: bhante, senāsanaṃ, vassūpagato saṅgho, ramaṇīyo vihāro, rukkhamūlādīsu yattha icchatha,
tika-vin08t:1184_0: 183. Evaṃ vassūpanāyikavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni upajjhāyavattādivattakathaṃ kathetuṃ
tika-vin08t:1184_1: “vattanti etthā”tiādimāha. Tattha vattetabbaṃ pavattetabbanti vattaṃ, saddhivihārikādīhi
tika-vin08t:1184_2: upajjhāyādīsu pavattetabbaṃ ābhisamācārikasīlaṃ. Taṃ katividhanti āha “vattaṃ nāmetaṃ…pe…
tika-vin08t:1184_3: bahuvidha”nti. Vaccakuṭivattanti ettha iti-saddo ādyattho. Tena saddhivihārikavattaantevāsikavattaanumodanavattāni
tika-vin08t:1184_4: saṅgayhanti. Vuttañhi tattha tattha aṭṭhakathāsu “cuddasa khandhakavattānī”ti. Vattakkhandhake
tika-vin08t:1184_5: ca pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva, tattha pana āgantukavattato paṭṭhāya āgataṃ, idha upajjhāyavattato.
tika-vin08t:1184_6: Ito aññānipi pañcasattati sekhiyavattāni dveasīti mahāvattāni ca vattameva. Tesu
tika-vin08t:1184_7: pana sekhiyavattāni mahāvibhaṅge āgatāni, mahāvattāni kammakkhandhakapārivāsikakkhandhakesu,
tika-vin08t:1184_8: tasmā idha cuddasa khandhakavattāniyeva dassitāni. Tesu upajjhāyavattaṃ paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin08t:1185_0: Tattha ko upajjhāyo, kenaṭṭhena upajjhāyo, kathaṃ gahito upajjhāyo, kena vattitabbaṃ
tika-vin08t:1185_1: upajjhāyavattaṃ, katamaṃ taṃ vattanti? Tattha ko upajjhāyoti “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:1185_2: byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena dasavassena vā atirekadasavassena vā upasampādetu”ntiādivacanato
tika-vin08t:1185_3: byattibalasampanno upasampadato paṭṭhāya dasavasso vā atirekadasavasso vā bhikkhu
tika-vin08t:1185_4: upajjhāyo. Kenaṭṭhena upajjhāyoti vajjāvajjaṃ upanijjhāyatīti upajjhāyo, saddhivihārikānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1185_5: khuddakaṃ vajjaṃ vā mahantaṃ vajjaṃ vā bhuso cintetīti attho. Kathaṃ gahito hoti
tika-vin08t:1185_6: upajjhāyoti saddhivihārikena ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ
tika-vin08t:1185_7: paggahetvā “upajjhāyo me, bhante, hohī”ti tikkhattuṃ vutte sace upajjhāyo “sāhū”ti
tika-vin08t:1185_8: vā “lahū”ti vā “opāyika”nti vā “patirūpa”nti vā “pāsādikena sampādehī”ti vā imesu
tika-vin08t:1185_9: pañcasu padesu yassa kassaci padassa vasena kāyena vā vācāya vā kāyavācāhi vā “gahito
tika-vin08t:1185_10: tayā upajjhāyo”ti upajjhāyaggahaṇaṃ viññāpeti, gahito hoti upajjhāyo. Tattha sāhūti
tika-vin08t:1185_11: sādhu. Lahūti agaru, subharatāti attho. Opāyikanti upāyapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ, evaṃ paṭipajjanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1185_12: nittharaṇupāyoti attho. Patirūpanti sāmīcikammamidanti attho. Pāsādikenāti pasādāvahena
tika-vin08t:1186_0: Kena vattitabbaṃ upajjhāyavattanti gahitaupajjhāyena saddhivihārikena vattitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1186_1: Katamaṃ taṃ vattanti idaṃ āgatameva, tattha kālasseva uṭṭhāya upāhanā omuñcitvāti
tika-vin08t:1186_2: sacassa paccūsakāle caṅkamanatthāya vā dhotapādapariharaṇatthāya vā paṭimukkā upāhanā
tika-vin08t:1186_3: pādagatā honti, tā kālasseva uṭṭhāya apanetvā. Tādisameva mukhadhovanodakaṃ dātabbanti
tika-vin08t:1186_4: utumpi sarīrasabhāve ca ekākāre tādisameva dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1187_0: Saguṇaṃ katvāti uttarāsaṅgaṃ saṅghāṭiñcāti dve cīvarāni ekato katvā tā dvepi saṅghāṭiyo
tika-vin08t:1187_1: dātabbā. Sabbañhi cīvaraṃ saṅghaṭitattā saṅghāṭīti vuccati. Tena vuttaṃ “saṅghāṭiyo
tika-vin08t:1187_2: dātabbā”ti. Padavītihārehīti ettha padaṃ vītiharati etthāti padavītihāro, padavītihāraṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1187_3: Dutavilambitaṃ akatvā samagamanena dvinnaṃ padānaṃ antare muṭṭhiratanamattaṃ. Padānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1187_4: vā vītiharaṇaṃ abhimukhaṃ haritvā nikkhepo padavītihāroti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t:1187_5: Na upajjhāyassa bhaṇamānassa antarantarā kathā opātetabbāti antaraghare vā aññatra
tika-vin08t:1187_6: vā bhaṇamānassa aniṭṭhite tassa vacane aññā kathā na samuṭṭhāpetabbā. Ito paṭṭhāyāti
tika-vin08t:1187_7: “na upajjhāyassa bhaṇamānassā”ti ettha na-kārato paṭṭhāya. Tena nātidūretiādīsu na-kārapaṭisiddhesu
tika-vin08t:1187_8: āpatti natthīti dasseti. Sabbattha dukkaṭāpattīti āpadāummattakhittacittavedanāṭṭatādīhi
tika-vin08t:1187_9: vinā paṇṇattiṃ ajānitvāpi vadantassa gilānassa ca dukkaṭameva. Āpadāsu hi antarantarā
tika-vin08t:1187_10: kathā vattuṃ vaṭṭati, evamaññesu na-kārapaṭisiddhesu īdisesu, itaresu pana gilānopi
tika-vin08t:1187_11: na muccati. Sabbattha dukkaṭāpatti veditabbāti “īdisesu gilānopi na muccatī”ti dassanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1187_12: vuttaṃ. Aññampi hi yathāvuttaṃ upajjhāyavattaṃ anādariyena akarontassa agilānassa
tika-vin08t:1187_13: vattabhede sabbattha dukkaṭameva, teneva vakkhati “agilānena hi saddhivihārikena
tika-vin08t:1187_14: saṭṭhivassenapi sabbaṃ upajjhāyavattaṃ kātabbaṃ, anādariyena akarontassa vattabhede
tika-vin08t:1187_15: dukkaṭaṃ. Na-kārapaṭisaṃyuttesu pana padesu gilānassapi paṭikkhittakiriyaṃ karontassa
tika-vin08t:1187_17: āsannavācaṃ bhaṇamāno. Āpattiyā āsannavācanti ca āpattijanakameva vacanaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin08t:1187_18: vadati. Yāya hi vācāya āpattiṃ āpajjati, sā vācā āpattiyā āsannāti vuccati.
tika-vin08t:1188_0: Cīvarena pattaṃ veṭhetvāti ettha “uttarāsaṅgassa ekena kaṇṇena veṭhetvā”ti gaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin08t:1188_1: vuttaṃ. Heṭṭhāpīṭhaṃ vā parāmasitvāti idaṃ pubbe tattha ṭhapitapattādinā asaṅghaṭṭanatthāya
tika-vin08t:1188_2: vuttaṃ. Cakkhunā oloketvāpi aññesaṃ abhāvaṃ ñatvāpi ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati eva. Caturaṅgulaṃ
tika-vin08t:1188_3: kaṇṇaṃ ussāretvāti kaṇṇaṃ caturaṅgulappamāṇaṃ atirekaṃ katvā evaṃ cīvaraṃ saṅgharitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1188_4: Obhoge kāyabandhanaṃ kātabbanti kāyabandhanaṃ saṅgharitvā cīvarabhoge pakkhipitvā
tika-vin08t:1188_5: ṭhapetabbaṃ. Sace piṇḍapāto hotīti ettha yo gāmeyeva vā antaraghare vā paṭikkamane
tika-vin08t:1188_6: vā bhuñjitvā āgacchati, piṇḍaṃ vā na labhati, tassa piṇḍapāto na hoti, gāme abhuttassa
tika-vin08t:1188_7: pana laddhabhikkhassa vā hoti, tasmā “sace piṇḍapāto hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha gāmeti
tika-vin08t:1188_8: gāmapariyāpanne tādise kismiñci padese. Antaraghareti antogehe. Paṭikkamaneti āsanasālāyaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1188_9: Sacepi tassa na hoti, bhuñjitukāmo ca hoti, udakaṃ datvā attanā laddhatopi piṇḍapāto
tika-vin08t:1188_10: upanetabbo. Tikkhattuṃ pānīyena pucchitabboti sambandho, ādimhi majjhe anteti evaṃ
tika-vin08t:1188_11: tikkhattuṃ pucchitabboti attho. Upakaṭṭhoti āsanno. Dhotavālikāyāti udakena gataṭṭhāne
tika-vin08t:1189_0: Niddhūmeti jantāghare jalamānaaggidhūmarahite. Jantāgharañhi nāma himapātabahukesu
tika-vin08t:1189_1: desesu tappaccayarogapīḷādinivāraṇatthaṃ sarīrasedatāpanaṭṭhānaṃ. Tattha kira andhakārapaṭicchannatāya
tika-vin08t:1189_2: bahūpi ekato pavisitvā cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā aggitāpaparihārāya mattikāya mukhaṃ limpitvā
tika-vin08t:1189_3: sarīraṃ yāvadatthaṃ sedetvā cuṇṇādīhi ubbaṭṭetvā nahāyanti. Teneva pāḷiyaṃ “cuṇṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:1189_4: sannetabba”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Sace ussahatīti sace pahoti. Vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāveti “kenaci
tika-vin08t:1189_5: gelaññena anabhibhūto hotī”ti. Apaṭighaṃsantenāti bhūmiyaṃ apaṭighaṃsantena. Kavāṭapīṭhanti
tika-vin08t:1189_6: kavāṭapīṭhañca piṭṭhasaṅghātañca acchupantena. Santānakanti yaṃ kiñci kīṭakulāvakamakkaṭakasuttādi.
tika-vin08t:1189_7: Ullokā paṭhamaṃ ohāretabbanti ullokato paṭhamaṃ ullokaṃ ādiṃ katvā avaharitabbanti
tika-vin08t:1189_8: attho. Ullokanti ca uddhaṃ olokanaṭṭhānaṃ, uparibhāganti attho. Ālokasandhikaṇṇabhāgāti
tika-vin08t:1189_9: ālokasandhibhāgā ca kaṇṇabhāgā ca, abbhantarabāhiravātapānakavāṭakāni ca gabbhassa
tika-vin08t:1190_0: Aññattha netabboti yattha vihārato sāsane anabhirati uppannā, tato aññattha kalyāṇamittādisampattiyuttaṭṭhāne
tika-vin08t:1190_1: netabbo. Na ca acchinne theve pakkamitabbanti rajitacīvarato yāva appamattakampi
tika-vin08t:1190_2: rajanaṃ gaḷati, na tāva pakkamitabbaṃ. Na upajjhāyaṃ anāpucchā ekaccassa patto dātabbotiādi
tika-vin08t:1190_3: sabbaṃ upajjhāyassa visabhāgapuggalānaṃ vasena kathitaṃ. Ettha ca visabhāgapuggalānanti
tika-vin08t:1190_4: lajjino vā alajjino vā upajjhāyassa avaḍḍhikāme sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sace pana upajjhāyo
tika-vin08t:1190_5: alajjī ovādampi na gaṇhāti, lajjino ca etassa visabhāgā honti, tattha upajjhāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1190_6: vihāya lajjīheva saddhiṃ āmisādiparibhogo kātabbo. Upajjhāyādibhāvo hettha nappamāṇanti
tika-vin08t:1190_7: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pariveṇaṃ gantvāti upajjhāyassa pariveṇaṃ gantvā. Susānanti idaṃ upalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1190_8: Upacārasīmato bahi gantukāmena anāpucchā gantuṃ na vaṭṭati. Vuṭṭhānamassa āgametabbanti
tika-vin08t:1193_0: 184. Ācariyavattakathāyaṃ ko ācariyo, kenaṭṭhena ācariyo, katividho ācariyo, kathaṃ
tika-vin08t:1193_1: gahito ācariyo, kena vattitabbaṃ ācariyavattaṃ, katamaṃ taṃ vattanti? Tattha ko ācariyoti
tika-vin08t:1193_2: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dasavassaṃ nissāya vatthuṃ dasavassena nissayaṃ dātu”ntiādivacanato
tika-vin08t:1193_3: byattibalasampanno dasavasso vā atirekadasavasso vā bhikkhu ācariyo. Kenaṭṭhena ācariyoti
tika-vin08t:1193_4: antevāsikena ābhuso caritabboti ācariyo, upaṭṭhātabboti attho. Katividho ācariyoti
tika-vin08t:1193_6: nissayaṃ gahetvā taṃ nissāya vatthabbo nissayācariyo. Pabbajitakāle sikkhitabbasikkhāpako
tika-vin08t:1193_8: dhammācariyo nāma. Kathaṃ gahito hoti ācariyoti antevāsikena ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ
tika-vin08t:1193_9: karitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā “ācariyo me, bhante, hohi, āyasmato
tika-vin08t:1193_10: nissāya vacchāmī”ti tikkhattuṃ vutte ācariyo “sāhū”ti vā “lahū”ti vā “opāyika”nti
tika-vin08t:1193_11: vā “patirūpa”nti vā “pāsādikena sampādehī”ti vā kāyena viññāpeti, vācāya viññāpeti,
tika-vin08t:1194_0: Kena vattitabbaṃ ācariyavattanti antevāsikena vattitabbaṃ ācariyavattaṃ. Byattena
tika-vin08t:1194_1: bhikkhunā pañca vassāni nissāya vatthabbaṃ, abyattena yāvajīvaṃ. Ettha sacāyaṃ bhikkhu
tika-vin08t:1194_2: vuḍḍhataraṃ ācariyaṃ na labhati, upasampadāya saṭṭhivasso vā sattativasso vā hoti,
tika-vin08t:1194_3: navakatarassapi byattassa santike ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā “ācariyo
tika-vin08t:1194_4: me, āvuso, hohi, āyasmato nissāya vacchāmī”ti evaṃ tikkhattuṃ vatvā nissayo gahetabbo.
tika-vin08t:1194_5: Gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchantenapi ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā “gāmappavesanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1194_6: āpucchāmi ācariyā”ti vattabbaṃ. Esa nayo sabbaāpucchanesu. Katamaṃ taṃ vattanti ettha
tika-vin08t:1194_7: upajjhāyavattato aññaṃ natthīti āha “idameva ca…pe… ācariyavattanti vuccatī”ti. Nanu
tika-vin08t:1194_8: upajjhācariyā bhinnapadatthā, atha kasmā idameva “ācariyavatta”nti vuccatīti āha
tika-vin08t:1194_9: “ācariyassa kattabbattā”ti. Yathā ekopi bhikkhu mātubhātābhūtattā “mātulo”ti ca dhamme
tika-vin08t:1194_10: sikkhāpakattā “ācariyo”ti ca vuccati, evaṃ ekameva vattaṃ upajjhāyassa kattabbattā
tika-vin08t:1194_11: “upajjhāyavatta”nti ca ācariyassa kattabbattā “ācariyavatta”nti ca vuccatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:1194_12: Evaṃ santepi nāme bhinne attho bhinno siyāti āha “nāmamattameva hettha nāna”nti.
tika-vin08t:1194_13: Yathā “indo sakko”tiādīsu nāmamattameva bhinnaṃ, na attho, evametthāpīti daṭṭhabboti.
tika-vin08t:1195_0: Idāni tasmiṃ vatte saddhivihārikaantevāsikānaṃ vasena labbhamānaṃ kañci visesaṃ dassento
tika-vin08t:1195_1: “tattha yāva cīvararajana”ntyādimāha. Tato upajjhāyācariyānaṃ vasena visesaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin08t:1195_2: “upajjhāye”tyādimāha. Tesu vattaṃ sādiyantesu āpatti, asādiyantesu anāpatti, tesu
tika-vin08t:1195_3: ajānantesu, ekassa bhārakaraṇepi anāpattīti ayamettha piṇḍattho. Idāni antevāsikavisesavasena
tika-vin08t:1198_0: Saddhivihārikavatte ko saddhivihāriko, kenaṭṭhena saddhivihāriko, kena vattitabbaṃ
tika-vin08t:1198_1: saddhivihārikavattaṃ, katamaṃ taṃ vattanti? Tattha ko saddhivihārikoti upasampanno
tika-vin08t:1198_2: vā hotu sāmaṇero vā, yo upajjhaṃ gaṇhāti, so saddhivihāriko nāma. Kenaṭṭhena saddhivihārikoti
tika-vin08t:1198_3: upajjhāyena saddhiṃ vihāro etassa atthīti saddhivihārikoti atthena. Kena vattitabbaṃ
tika-vin08t:1198_4: saddhivihārikavattanti upajjhāyena vattitabbaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ vattakkhandhake “tena
tika-vin08t:1198_5: hi, bhikkhave, upajjhāyānaṃ saddhivihārikesu vattaṃ paññapessāmi, yathā upajjhāyehi
tika-vin08t:1198_6: saddhivihārikesu vattitabba”nti. Katamaṃ taṃ vattanti idāni pakaraṇāgataṃ. Imasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:1198_8: dvepi ekato vuttā, tathāpi vattakkhandhake visuṃ visuṃ āgatattā visuṃ visuṃyeva kathayāma.
tika-vin08t:1199_0: Saṅgahetabbo anuggahetabboti uddesādīhissa saṅgaho ca anuggaho ca kātabbo. Tattha
tika-vin08t:1199_1: uddesoti pāḷivacanaṃ. Paripucchāti pāḷiyā atthavaṇṇanā. Ovādoti anotiṇṇe vatthusmiṃ
tika-vin08t:1199_2: “idaṃ karohi, idaṃ mā karitthā”ti vacanaṃ. Anusāsanīti otiṇṇe vatthusmiṃ. Apica otiṇṇe
tika-vin08t:1199_3: vā anotiṇṇe vā paṭhamaṃ vacanaṃ ovādo, punappunaṃ vacanaṃ anusāsanīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1199_4: Sace upajjhāyassa patto hotīti sace atirekapatto hoti. Esa nayo sabbattha. Parikkhāroti
tika-vin08t:1199_5: aññopi samaṇaparikkhāro. Idha ussukkaṃ nāma dhammiyena nayena uppajjamānaupāyapariyesanaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1199_6: Ito paraṃ dantakaṭṭhadānaṃ ādiṃ katvā ācamanakumbhiyā udakasiñcanapariyosānaṃ vattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1199_7: gilānasseva saddhivihārikassa kātabbaṃ. Anabhirativūpakāsanādi pana agilānassapi
tika-vin08t:1199_8: kattabbameva. Cīvaraṃ rajantenāti “evaṃ rajeyyāsī”ti upajjhāyato upāyaṃ sutvā rajantena.
tika-vin08t:1199_9: Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Saṅgahetabbo anuggahetabbotiādīsu anādariyaṃ paṭicca
tika-vin08t:1199_10: dhammāmisehi asaṅgaṇhantānaṃ ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ dukkaṭaṃ vattabhedattā. Teneva parivārepi
tika-vin08t:1202_0: Antevāsikavatte ko antevāsiko, kenaṭṭhena antevāsiko, katividhā antevāsikā, kena
tika-vin08t:1202_1: vattitabbaṃ antevāsikavattaṃ, katamaṃ taṃ vattanti? Tattha ko antevāsikoti upasampanno
tika-vin08t:1202_2: vā hotu sāmaṇero vā, yo ācariyassa santike nissayaṃ gaṇhāti, yo vā ācariyassa ovādaṃ
tika-vin08t:1202_3: gahetvā pabbajati, yo vā tenānussāvito hutvā upasampajjati, yo vā tassa santike dhammaṃ
tika-vin08t:1202_4: pariyāpuṇāti, so sabbo antevāsikoti veditabbo. Tattha paṭhamo nissayantevāsiko nāma,
tika-vin08t:1202_5: dutiyo pabbajjantevāsiko nāma, tatiyo upasampadantevāsiko nāma, catuttho dhammantevāsiko
tika-vin08t:1202_6: nāma. Aññattha pana sippantevāsikopi āgato, so idha nādhippeto. Kenaṭṭhena antevāsikoti
tika-vin08t:1202_7: ante vasatīti antevāsiko aluttasamāsavasena. Katividhā antevāsikāti yathāvuttanayena
tika-vin08t:1203_0: Kena vattitabbaṃ antevāsikavattanti catubbidhehi ācariyehi antevāsikesu vattitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1203_1: Yathāha vattakkhandhake “tena hi, bhikkhave, ācariyānaṃ antevāsikesu vattaṃ paññapessāmi,
tika-vin08t:1203_2: yathā ācariyehi antevāsikesu vattitabba”nti. Katamaṃ taṃ vattanti yaṃ bhagavatā vattakkhandhake
tika-vin08t:1203_3: vuttaṃ, idha ca saṅkhepena dassitaṃ, taṃ vattanti. Idha pana attho saddhivihārikavatte
tika-vin08t:1203_4: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – etesu pabbajjantevāsiko ca upasampadantevāsiko
tika-vin08t:1203_5: ca ācariyassa yāvajīvaṃ bhāro, nissayantevāsiko ca dhammantevāsiko ca yāva samīpe
tika-vin08t:1203_6: vasanti, tāvadeva, tasmā ācariyehipi tesu sammā vattitabbaṃ. Ācariyantevāsikesu hi
tika-vin08t:1203_7: yo yo na sammā vattati, tassa tassa āpatti veditabbā.
tika-vin08t:1206_0: 185. Āgantukavatte āgacchatīti āgantuko, tena vattitabbanti āgantukavattaṃ. “Idāni
tika-vin08t:1206_1: ārāmaṃ pavisissāmī”ti iminā upacārasīmāsamīpaṃ dasseti, tasmā upacārasīmāsamīpaṃ
tika-vin08t:1206_2: patvā upāhanāomuñcanādi sabbaṃ kātabbaṃ. Gahetvāti upāhanadaṇḍakena gahetvā. Upāhanapuñchanacoḷakaṃ
tika-vin08t:1206_3: pucchitvā upāhanā puñchitabbāti “katarasmiṃ ṭhāne upāhanapuñchanacoḷaka”nti āvāsike
tika-vin08t:1206_4: bhikkhū pucchitvā. Pattharitabbanti sukkhāpanatthāya ātape pattharitabbaṃ. Sace navako
tika-vin08t:1206_5: hoti, abhivādāpetabboti tassa vasse pucchite yadi daharo hoti, sayameva vandissati,
tika-vin08t:1206_6: tadā iminā vandāpito hoti. Nilloketabboti oloketabbo. Bahi ṭhitenāti bahi nikkhamantassa
tika-vin08t:1206_7: ahino vā amanussassa vā maggaṃ ṭhatvā ṭhitena nilloketabbo. Sesaṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1209_0: 186. Āvāsikavatte āvasatīti āvāsiko, tena vattitabbanti āvāsikavattaṃ. Tattha āvāsikena
tika-vin08t:1209_1: bhikkhunā āgantukaṃ bhikkhuṃ vuḍḍhataraṃ disvā āsanaṃ paññapetabbantiādi pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1209_2: āgatañca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatañca gahetabbaṃ, gahetvā vuttattā pākaṭameva, upāhanapuñchanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1209_3: pana attano rucivasena kātabbaṃ. Teneva hettha “sace ussahatī”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā upāhanā
tika-vin08t:1209_4: apuñchantassapi anāpatti. Senāsanaṃ paññapetabbanti ettha “kattha mayhaṃ senāsanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1209_5: pāpuṇātī”ti pucchitena senāsanaṃ paññapetabbaṃ, “etaṃ senāsanaṃ tumhākaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti
tika-vin08t:1209_6: evaṃ ācikkhitabbanti attho. Papphoṭetvā pattharituṃ pana vaṭṭatiyeva. Etena mañcapīṭhādiṃ
tika-vin08t:1209_7: papphoṭetvā pattharitvā upari paccattharaṇaṃ datvā dānampi senāsanapaññāpanamevāti
tika-vin08t:1209_8: dasseti. Mahāāvāsepi attano santikaṃ sampattassa āgantukassa vattaṃ akātuṃ na labbhati.
tika-vin08t:1212_0: 187. Gamikavatte gantuṃ bhabboti gamiko, tena vattitabbanti gamikavattaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1212_1: anuttānapadavaṇṇanā – dārubhaṇḍanti senāsanakkhandhake vuttaṃ mañcapīṭhādi. Mattikābhaṇḍampi
tika-vin08t:1212_2: rajanabhājanādi sabbaṃ tattha vuttappabhedameva. Taṃ sabbaṃ aggisālāyaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:1212_3: vā guttaṭṭhāne paṭisāmetvā gantabbaṃ, anovassake pabbhārepi ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Senāsanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1212_4: āpucchitvā pakkamitabbanti ettha yaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ vā pāsāṇatthambhesu vā katasenāsanaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1212_5: yattha upacikā nārohanti, taṃ anāpucchantassapi anāpatti. Catūsu pāsāṇesūtiādi upacikānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1212_6: uppattiṭṭhāne paṇṇasālādisenāsane kattabbākāradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Appeva nāma aṅgānipi
tika-vin08t:1212_7: seseyyunti ayaṃ ajjhokāse ṭhapitamhi ānisaṃso. Ovassakagehe pana tiṇesu ca mattikāpiṇḍesu
tika-vin08t:1212_8: ca upari patantesu mañcapīṭhānaṃ aṅgānipi vinassanti.
tika-vin08t:1215_0: 188. Vattakkhandhake imasmiṃ ṭhāne anumodanavattaṃ āgataṃ, tato bhattaggavattaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1215_2: cuddasa mahāvattāni nāmā”ti anukkamo vutto, idha pana vinayasaṅgahappakaraṇe gamikavattato
tika-vin08t:1215_3: bhattaggavattaṃ āgataṃ, anumodanavattaṃ pana visuṃ avatvā bhattaggavatteyeva antogadhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1215_4: katvā pacchā vuttaṃ bhattaggaṃ gantvā bhatte bhutteyeva anumodanākaraṇato, pāḷiyañca
tika-vin08t:1215_5: aññesu vattesu viya “tena hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā anumodanavattaṃ paññāpessāmī”ti
tika-vin08t:1215_6: visuṃ vattabhāvena anāgatattā bhattaggavatteyeva antogadhanti ācariyassa adhippāyo
tika-vin08t:1215_7: siyā. Imassa ca vinayālaṅkārapakaraṇassa tassā vaṇṇanābhūtattā saṃvaṇṇetabbakkameneva
tika-vin08t:1216_0: Bhuñjitabbanti bhattaṃ. Ajati gacchati pavattati etthāti aggaṃ. “Ādikoṭṭhāsakoṭīsu,
tika-vin08t:1216_1: puratoggaṃ vare tīsū”ti abhidhānappadīpikāyaṃ āgatepi “rājagganti rājārahaṃ, salākagganti
tika-vin08t:1216_2: salākaggahaṇaṭṭhāna”ntiādīsu aññatthesupi pavattanato bhattassa aggaṃ bhattaggaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1216_3: bhattaparivisanaṭṭhānaṃ, bhattagge vattitabbaṃ vattaṃ bhattaggavattanti viggaho.
tika-vin08t:1216_4: Tattha ārāme kālo ārocito hotīti “kālo bhante, niṭṭhitaṃ bhatta”nti ārocito hoti.
tika-vin08t:1216_5: Timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādentenāti dve jāṇumaṇḍalāni nābhimaṇḍalañca paṭicchādentena. Parimaṇḍalaṃ
tika-vin08t:1216_6: nivāsetvāti samantato maṇḍalaṃ nivāsetvā. Uddhaṃ nābhimaṇḍalaṃ, adho jāṇumaṇḍalaṃ
tika-vin08t:1216_7: paṭicchādentena jāṇumaṇḍalassa heṭṭhā jaṅghaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya aṭṭhaṅgulamattaṃ nivāsanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1216_8: otāretvā nivāsetabbaṃ, tato paraṃ otārentassa dukkaṭanti vuttaṃ, yathānisinnassa
tika-vin08t:1216_9: jāṇumaṇḍalato heṭṭhā caturaṅgulamattaṃ paṭicchannaṃ hotīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1216_10: Kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvāti tassa nivāsanassa upari kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā “na, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:1216_11: akāyabandhanena gāmo pavisitabbo, yo paviseyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttattā. Saguṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:1216_12: katvāti idaṃ upajjhāyavatte vuttameva. “Gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvāti pāsake gaṇṭhikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1216_13: pavesetvā antogāmo vā hotu vihāro vā, manussānaṃ parivisanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantena cīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:1216_14: pārupitvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā gamanameva vaṭṭatī”ti mahāaṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1216_15: Ettha ca manussānaṃ parivisanaṭṭhānanti yattha antovihārepi manussā saputtadārā āvasitvā
tika-vin08t:1217_0: Suppaṭicchannenāti na sasīsaṃ pārutena, atha kho gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvā anuvātantena
tika-vin08t:1217_1: gīvaṃ paṭicchādetvā ubho kaṇṇe samaṃ katvā paṭisaṃharitvā yāva maṇibandhā paṭicchādentena.
tika-vin08t:1217_2: Susaṃvutenāti hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā akīḷāpentena, suvinītenāti attho. Okkhittacakkhunāti
tika-vin08t:1217_3: heṭṭhākhittacakkhunā. Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca tahaṃ tahaṃ olokento bhiyyo taṃ taṃ disābhāgaṃ
tika-vin08t:1217_4: pāsādaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ vīthiṃ olokento gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Ekasmiṃ pana ṭhāne
tika-vin08t:1217_5: ṭhatvā hatthiassādiparissayābhāvaṃ oloketuṃ vaṭṭati. Appasaddenāti ettha kittāvatā
tika-vin08t:1217_6: appasaddo hoti? Dvādasahatthe gehe ādimhi saṅghatthero majjhe dutiyatthero ante tatiyattheroti
tika-vin08t:1217_7: evaṃ nisinnesu saṅghatthero dutiyena saddhiṃ manteti, dutiyatthero tassa saddañceva
tika-vin08t:1217_8: suṇāti, kathañca vavatthapeti, tatiyatthero pana saddameva suṇāti, kathaṃ na vavatthapeti,
tika-vin08t:1217_9: ettāvatā appasaddo hoti. Sace pana tatiyatthero kathaṃ vavatthapeti, mahāsaddo nāma hoti.
tika-vin08t:1218_0: Na ukkhittakāyāti na ukkhepena, itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ, ekato vā ubhato
tika-vin08t:1218_1: vā ukkhittacīvaro hutvāti attho. Antoindakhīlato paṭṭhāya na evaṃ gantabbaṃ. Nisinnakāle
tika-vin08t:1218_2: pana dhamakaraṇaṃ nīharantenapi cīvaraṃ anukkhipitvāva nīharitabbaṃ. Na ujjagghikāyāti
tika-vin08t:1218_3: na mahāhasitaṃ hasanto, vuttanayenevettha karaṇavacanaṃ. Na kāyappacālakanti kāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1218_4: acāletvā kāyaṃ paggahetvā niccalaṃ katvā ujukena kāyena samena iriyāpathena. Na bāhuppacālakanti
tika-vin08t:1218_5: bāhuṃ acāletvā bāhuṃ paggahetvā niccalaṃ katvā. Na sīsappacālakanti sīsaṃ acāletvā
tika-vin08t:1218_6: sīsaṃ paggahetvā niccalaṃ ujuṃ ṭhapetvā. Na khambhakatoti khambhakato nāma kaṭiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1218_7: hatthaṃ ṭhapetvā katakhambho. Na ukkuṭikāyāti ettha ukkuṭikā vuccati paṇhiyo ukkhipitvā
tika-vin08t:1218_8: aggapādehi vā aggapāde ukkhipitvā paṇhehiyeva vā bhūmiṃ phusantassa gamanaṃ. Karaṇavacanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1218_9: panettha vuttalakkhaṇameva. Na oguṇṭhitenāti sasīsaṃ pārutena. Na pallatthikāyāti
tika-vin08t:1218_10: na dussapallatthikāya. Ettha āyogapallatthikāpi dussapallatthikā eva. Na there bhikkhū
tika-vin08t:1218_11: anupakhajjāti there bhikkhū atiallīyitvā na nisīditabbaṃ. Na saṅghāṭiṃ ottharitvāti
tika-vin08t:1219_0: Sakkaccanti satiṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā. Pattasaññīti patte saññaṃ katvā. Samasūpako nāma
tika-vin08t:1219_1: yattha bhattassa catutthabhāgappamāṇo sūpo hoti. Samatitthikanti samapuṇṇaṃ samabharitaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1219_2: Thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassāti ettha thūpīkato nāma pattassa
tika-vin08t:1219_3: antomukhavaṭṭilekhaṃ atikkamitvā kato, patte pakkhitto bharito pūritoti attho. Evaṃ
tika-vin08t:1219_4: kataṃ aggahetvā antomukhavaṭṭilekhāsamappamāṇo gahetabbo. “Yaṃ kañci yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1219_5: vā phalāphalaṃ vā āmisajātikaṃ samatitthikameva gahetabbaṃ, tañca kho adhiṭṭhānupagena
tika-vin08t:1219_6: pattena, itarena pana thūpīkatampi vaṭṭati. Yāmakālikasattāhakālikayāvajīvikāni pana
tika-vin08t:1219_7: adhiṭṭhānupagapatte thūpīkatānipi vaṭṭanti. Yaṃ pana dvīsu pattesu bhattaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin08t:1219_8: ekasmiṃ pūretvā vihāraṃ pesetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Yaṃ patte pakkhipiyamānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1219_9: pūvaucchukhaṇḍaphalāphalādi heṭṭhā orohati, taṃ thūpīkataṃ nāma na hoti. Pūvavaṭaṃsakaṃ
tika-vin08t:1219_11: pana ṭhapetvā dinnaṃ thūpīkataṃ na hoti. Bhattassa upari thālakaṃ vā pattaṃ vā ṭhapetvā
tika-vin08t:1219_12: pūretvā gaṇhāti, thūpīkataṃ nāma na hoti. Kurundiyampi vuttaṃ “thālake vā patte vā
tika-vin08t:1219_13: pakkhipitvā taṃ pattamatthake ṭhapetvā denti, pāṭekkabhājanaṃ vaṭṭati. Idha anāpattiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1219_14: gilāno na āgato, tasmā gilānassapi thūpīkataṃ na vaṭṭati, sabbattha pana paṭiggahetumeva
tika-vin08t:1219_15: na vaṭṭati, paṭiggahitaṃ pana bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin08t:1220_0: “Sakkacca”nti ca “pattasaññī”ti ca ubhayaṃ vuttanayameva. Sapadānanti tattha tattha
tika-vin08t:1220_1: odhiṃ akatvā anupaṭipāṭiyā. Samasūpake vattabbaṃ vuttameva. Thūpakatoti matthakato,
tika-vin08t:1220_2: vemajjhatoti attho. Na sūpaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vātiādi pākaṭameva. Viññattiyaṃ vattabbaṃ
tika-vin08t:1220_3: natthi. Ujjhānasaññīsikkhāpadepi gilāno na muñcati. Nātimahanto kabaḷoti mayūraṇḍaṃ
tika-vin08t:1220_4: atimahantaṃ, kukkuṭaṇḍaṃ atikhuddakaṃ, tesaṃ vemajjhappamāṇo. Parimaṇḍalaṃ ālopoti
tika-vin08t:1220_5: nātidīgho ālopo. Anāhaṭeti anāharite, mukhadvāraṃ asampāpiteti attho. Sabbo hatthoti
tika-vin08t:1220_6: ettha hatthasaddo tadekadesesu aṅgulīsu daṭṭhabbo “hatthamuddo”tiādīsu viya samudāye
tika-vin08t:1220_7: pavattavohārassa avayave pavattanato. Ekaṅgulimpi mukhe pakkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati. Na
tika-vin08t:1220_8: sakabaḷenāti ettha dhammaṃ kathento harītakaṃ vā laṭṭhimadhukaṃ vā mukhe pakkhipitvā
tika-vin08t:1220_9: katheti, yattakena vacanaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti, tattake mukhamhi sante kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:1221_0: Piṇḍukkhepakanti piṇḍaṃ ukkhipitvā ukkhipitvā. Kabaḷāvacchedakanti kabaḷaṃ avachinditvā
tika-vin08t:1221_1: avachinditvā. Avagaṇḍakārakanti makkaṭo viya gaṇḍe katvā katvā. Hatthaniddhunakanti
tika-vin08t:1221_2: hatthaṃ niddhunitvā niddhunitvā. Sitthāvakārakanti sitthāni avakiritvā avakiritvā.
tika-vin08t:1221_4: evaṃ saddaṃ katvā katvā. Surusurukārakanti “surusurū”ti evaṃ saddaṃ katvā katvā.
tika-vin08t:1221_5: Hatthanillehakanti hatthaṃ nillehitvā nillehitvā. Bhuñjantena hi aṅgulimattampi nillehituṃ
tika-vin08t:1221_6: na vaṭṭati, ghanayāguphāṇitapāyāsādike pana aṅgulīhi gahetvā aṅguliyo mukhe pavesetvā
tika-vin08t:1221_7: bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Pattanillehakaoṭṭhanillehakesupi eseva nayo, tasmā aṅguliyāpi
tika-vin08t:1221_8: patto na nillehitabbo, ekaoṭṭhopi jivhāya na nillehitabbo, oṭṭhamaṃsehi eva pana
tika-vin08t:1222_0: Na sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakoti etaṃ paṭikūlavasena paṭikkhittaṃ, tasmā saṅghikampi
tika-vin08t:1222_1: puggalikampi gihisantakampi attano santakampi saṅkhampi sarāvampi āmisamakkhitaṃ
tika-vin08t:1222_2: na gahetabbameva, gaṇhantassa dukkaṭaṃ. Sace pana hatthassa ekadeso āmisamakkhito
tika-vin08t:1222_3: na hoti, tena padesena gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Na sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare
tika-vin08t:1222_4: chaḍḍetabbanti ettha uddharitvā vāti sitthāni ekato uddharitvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne rāsiṃ
tika-vin08t:1222_5: katvā udakaṃ chaḍḍeti. Bhinditvā vā udakagatikāni katvā chaḍḍeti, paṭiggahena sampaṭicchanto
tika-vin08t:1222_6: naṃ paṭiggahe chaḍḍeti, bahi nīharitvā vā chaḍḍeti, evaṃ chaḍḍentassa anāpatti. Na
tika-vin08t:1222_7: tāva therena udakanti idaṃ hatthadhovanaudakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Antarā pipāsitena,
tika-vin08t:1222_8: pana gale vilaggāmisena vā pānīyaṃ pivitvā na dhovitabbāti.
tika-vin08t:1225_0: Anumodanavatte anu punappunaṃ modiyate pamodiyateti anumodanā. Kā sā? Dhammakathā.
tika-vin08t:1225_1: Anumodanāya kattabbaṃ vattaṃ anumodanavattaṃ. Pañcame nisinneti anumodanatthāya nisinne.
tika-vin08t:1225_2: Upanisinnakathā nāma bahūsu sannipatitesu parikathākathanaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin08t:1228_0: 189. Piṇḍacārikavatte piṇḍitabbo saṅgharitabboti piṇḍo, piṇḍapāto. Piṇḍāya caraṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:1228_1: sīlamassāti piṇḍacārī, so eva piṇḍacāriko sakatthe kapaccayavasena. Piṇḍacārikena
tika-vin08t:1228_2: vattitabbaṃ vattaṃ piṇḍacārikavattaṃ. Tatrāyamanuttānapadavaṇṇanā – nivesanaṃ nāma
tika-vin08t:1228_3: itthikumārikādīnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ. Yasmā pavisananikkhamanadvāraṃ asallakkhetvā sahasā
tika-vin08t:1228_4: pavisanto visabhāgārammaṇaṃ vā passeyya, parissayo vā bhaveyya, tasmā “nivesanaṃ…pe…
tika-vin08t:1228_5: pavisitabba”nti vuttaṃ. Atidūre tiṭṭhanto apassanto vā bhaveyya, “aññassa gehe tiṭṭhatī”ti
tika-vin08t:1228_6: vā maññeyya. Accāsanne tiṭṭhanto apassitabbaṃ vā passeyya, asuṇitabbaṃ vā suṇeyya,
tika-vin08t:1228_7: tena manussānaṃ agāravo vā appasādo vā bhaveyya, tasmā “nātidūre nāccāsanne ṭhātabba”nti
tika-vin08t:1228_8: vuttaṃ. Aticiraṃ tiṭṭhanto adātukāmānaṃ manopadoso bhaveyya, aññattha bhikkhā ca
tika-vin08t:1228_9: parikkhayeyya, atilahukaṃ nivattanto dātukāmānaṃ puññahāni ca bhaveyya, bhikkhuno
tika-vin08t:1228_10: ca bhikkhāya asampajjanaṃ, tasmā “nāticiraṃ ṭhātabbaṃ, nātilahukaṃ nivattitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1228_11: ṭhitena sallakkhetabba”nti vuttaṃ. Sallakkhaṇākāraṃ dasseti “sace kammaṃ vā nikkhipatī”tiādinā.
tika-vin08t:1228_12: Tattha kammaṃ vā nikkhipatīti kappāsaṃ vā suppaṃ vā musalaṃ vā yañca gahetvā kammaṃ
tika-vin08t:1228_13: karonti, ṭhitā vā nisinnā vā honti, taṃ nikkhipati. Parāmasatīti gaṇhāti. Ṭhapeti
tika-vin08t:1228_14: vāti “tiṭṭhatha bhante”ti vadantī ṭhapeti nāma. Avakkārapātīti atirekapiṇḍapātaṃ
tika-vin08t:1228_15: apanetvā ṭhapanatthāya ekā samuggapāti. Ettha ca samuggapāti nāma samuggapuṭasadisā
tika-vin08t:1231: 190. Āraññikavatte na ramanti janā etthāti araññaṃ. Vuttañhi –
tika-vin08t:1234_0: Araññe vasatīti āraññiko, tena vattitabbaṃ vattaṃ āraññikavattaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ visesapadānamattho
tika-vin08t:1234_1: – kālasseva uṭṭhāyāti araññasenāsanassa gāmato dūrattā vuttaṃ, teneva kāraṇena “pattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1234_2: gahetvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā gacchanto parissamo hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Pattaṃ thavikāya pakkhipitvā
tika-vin08t:1234_3: aṃse laggetvā cīvaraṃ khandhe karitvā araññamaggo na dussodhano hoti, tasmā kaṇṭakasarīsapādiparissayavimocanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1234_4: upāhanā ārohitvā. Araññaṃ nāma yasmā corādīnaṃ vicaraṭṭhānaṃ hoti, tasmā “dārubhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin08t:1234_5: mattikābhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā dvāravātapānaṃ thaketvā vasanaṭṭhānato nikkhamitabba”nti
tika-vin08t:1234_6: vuttaṃ. Ito parāni bhattaggavattapiṇḍacārikavattesu vuttasadisāneva. Gāmato nikkhamitvā
tika-vin08t:1234_7: sace bahigāme udakaṃ natthi, antogāmeyeva bhattakiccaṃ katvā, atha bahigāme atthi,
tika-vin08t:1234_8: bhattakiccaṃ katvā pattaṃ dhovitvā vodakaṃ katvā thavikāya pakkhipitvā cīvaraṃ saṅgharitvā
tika-vin08t:1235_0: Bhājanaṃ alabhantenātiādi araññasenāsanassa dullabhadabbasambhārattā vuttaṃ, aggi
tika-vin08t:1235_2: ca icchitabbattā. Bahūnaṃ pana vasanaṭṭhāne tādisāni sulabhāni hontīti āha “gaṇavāsino
tika-vin08t:1235_3: pana tena vināpi vaṭṭatī”ti. Kattaradaṇḍo nāma parissayavinodano hoti, tasmā araññe
tika-vin08t:1235_4: viharantena avassaṃ icchitabboti vuttaṃ “kattaradaṇḍo upaṭṭhāpetabbo”ti. Nakkhattāneva
tika-vin08t:1235_5: nakkhattapadāni. Corādīsu āgantvā “ajja, bhante, kena nakkhattena cando yutto”ti
tika-vin08t:1235_6: pucchitesu “na jānāmā”ti vutte kujjhanti, tasmā vuttaṃ “nakkhattapadāni uggahetabbāni
tika-vin08t:1235_7: sakalāni vā ekadesāni vā”ti, tathā disāmūḷhesu “katamāyaṃ, bhante, disā”ti pucchitesu,
tika-vin08t:1238_0: 191. Senāsanavatte sayanti etthāti senaṃ, sayananti attho. Āvasanti etthāti āsanaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1238_1: Senañca āsanañca senāsanaṃ. Senāsanesu kattabbaṃ vattaṃ senāsanavattaṃ. Idha pana
tika-vin08t:1238_2: yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ upajjhāyavattakathāyaṃ vuttameva. Tattha pana upajjhāyena vutthavihāro
tika-vin08t:1238_3: vutto, idha pana attanā vutthavihāroti ayameva viseso. Na vuḍḍhaṃ anāpucchāti ettha
tika-vin08t:1238_4: tassa ovarake tadupacāre ca āpucchitabbanti vadanti. Bhojanasālādīsupi evameva paṭipajjitabbanti
tika-vin08t:1241_0: 192. Jantāgharavatte jāyatīti jaṃ, kiṃ taṃ? Sarīraṃ. Jaṃ tāyati rakkhatīti jantā,
tika-vin08t:1241_1: kā sā? Tikicchā. Gayhateti gharaṃ, kiṃ taṃ? Nivesanaṃ, jantāya sarīratikicchāya kataṃ
tika-vin08t:1241_2: gharaṃ jantāgharaṃ, jantāghare kattabbaṃ vattaṃ jantāgharavattaṃ. Tattha paribhaṇḍanti
tika-vin08t:1244_0: 193. Vaccakuṭivatte vaccayate ūhadayateti vaccaṃ, karīsaṃ. Kuṭīyati chindīyati ātapo
tika-vin08t:1244_1: etāyāti kuṭi, vaccatthāya katā kuṭi vaccakuṭi, vaccakuṭiyā vattitabbaṃ vattaṃ vaccakuṭivattaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1244_2: idha ca vattakkhandhake ācamanavattaṃ paṭhamaṃ āgataṃ, pacchā vaccakuṭivattaṃ. Imasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:1244_3: pana pakaraṇe paṭhamaṃ vaccaṃ katvā pacchā ācamatīti adhippāyena vaccakuṭivattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1244_4: paṭhamaṃ āgataṃ, tasmā tadanukkamena kathayissāma. Dantakaṭṭhaṃ khādantenāti ayaṃ
tika-vin08t:1244_5: vaccakuṭiyāpi sabbattheva paṭikkhepo. Nibaddhagamanatthāyāti attanā nibaddhagamanatthāya.
tika-vin08t:1244_6: Puggalikaṭṭhānaṃ vāti attano vihāraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
tika-vin08t:1251_0: 194. Evaṃ upajjhāyādivattasaṅkhātāni cuddasa khandhakavattāni kathetvā idāni catunnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1251_1: paccayānaṃ bhājanaṃ kathento “catupaccayabhājana”ntiādimāha. Tattha catūti saṅkhyāsabbanāmapadaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1251_2: Paṭicca eti sītapaṭighātādikaṃ phalaṃ etasmāti paccayo, cīvarādi, paccayo ca paccayo
tika-vin08t:1251_3: ca paccayā, cattāro paccayā catupaccayaṃ, bhājīyate vibhājīyate bhājanaṃ. Catupaccayassa
tika-vin08t:1251_4: bhājanaṃ catupaccayabhājanaṃ. Tenāha “cīvarādīnaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ bhājana”nti.
tika-vin08t:1251_5: Tattha tasmiṃ catupaccayabhājane samabhiniviṭṭhe cīvarabhājane tāva paṭhamaṃ cīvarapaṭiggāhako…pe…
tika-vin08t:1251_6: veditabbo. Kasmā? Saṅghikacīvarassa dukkarabhājanattāti sambandho. Tattha āgatāgataṃ
tika-vin08t:1251_7: cīvaraṃ paṭiggaṇhāti, paṭiggahaṇamattamevassa bhāroti cīvarapaṭiggāhako. Cīvarapaṭiggāhakena
tika-vin08t:1251_8: paṭiggahitaṃ cīvaraṃ nidahati, nidahanamattamevassa bhāroti cīvaranidahako. Bhaṇḍāgāre
tika-vin08t:1251_9: niyutto bhaṇḍāgāriko. Cīvarādikassa bhaṇḍassa ṭhapanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ agāraṃ bhaṇḍāgāraṃ.
tika-vin08t:1251_10: Cīvaraṃ bhājeti bhāgaṃ karotīti cīvarabhājako. Cīvarassa bhājanaṃ vibhāgakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:1252_0: Tattha “cīvarapaṭiggāhako veditabbo”ti vutto, so kuto labbhateti āha “pañcahaṅgehi…pe…
tika-vin08t:1252_1: sammannitabbo”ti. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti āha “anujānāmi…pe… vacanato”ti. Chandanaṃ chando,
tika-vin08t:1252_2: icchanaṃ pihananti attho. Gamanaṃ karaṇaṃ gati, kiriyā. Gāreyhā gati agati, chandena
tika-vin08t:1252_3: agati chandāgati. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Kathaṃ chandāgatiṃ gacchatīti āha “tattha
tika-vin08t:1252_4: pacchā āgatānampī”tiādi. Evamitaresupi. Pañcamaṅgaṃ pana satisampajaññayuttābhāvaṃ
tika-vin08t:1252_5: dasseti. Sukkapakkhepi ito paṭipakkhavasena veditabbo. Tenāha “tasmā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t:1253_0: Imāya kammavācāya vā apalokanena vāti idaṃ imassa sammutikammassa lahukakammattā
tika-vin08t:1253_1: vuttaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ parivāraṭṭhakathāyaṃ “avasesā terasa sammutiyo senāsanaggāhamatakacīvaradānādisammutiyo
tika-vin08t:1253_2: cāti etāni lahukakammāni apaloketvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭantī”ti. Antovihāre sabbasaṅghamajjhepi
tika-vin08t:1253_3: khaṇḍasīmāyampi sammannituṃ vaṭṭatīti ettha antovihāreti baddhasīmavihāraṃ sandhāya
tika-vin08t:1253_4: vuttaṃ. Na hi abaddhasīmavihāre apalokanādicatubbidhakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati dubbisodhanattā.
tika-vin08t:1254_1: majjheyeva sammannitabbā. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne imaṃ pana bhaṇḍāgāraṃ khaṇḍasīmaṃ gantvā
tika-vin08t:1254_2: khaṇḍasīmāyaṃ nisinnehi sammannituṃ na vaṭṭati, vihāramajjheyeva “suṇātu me, bhante,
tika-vin08t:1254_3: saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmaṃ vihāraṃ bhaṇḍāgāraṃ sammanneyyā”tiādinā
tika-vin08t:1254_4: nayena “kammavācāya vā apalokanena vā sammannitabba”nti vacanaṃ nissāya ñattidutiyakammaṃ
tika-vin08t:1254_5: upacārasīmāyaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti gahetvā kathinadānakammampi abaddhasīmābhūte vihāre
tika-vin08t:1254_6: upacārasīmāyaṃ karonti, ekacce ñattikammampi tatheva gahetvā abaddhasīmavihāre upacārasīmāmatteyeva
tika-vin08t:1254_7: uposathapavāraṇaṃ karonti, tadayuttaṃ, kāraṇaṃ panettha kathinavinicchayakathāyaṃ āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin08t:1255_0: 198. Tulābhūtoti tulāsadiso. Idanti sāmaṇerānaṃ upaḍḍhapaṭivīsadānaṃ. Imaṃ kira pāṭhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1255_1: amanasikarontā idāni kālacīvarampi sāmaṇerānaṃ upaḍḍhapaṭivīsaṃ denti. Phātikammanti
tika-vin08t:1255_3: ūnatā na hoti, tattakaṃ katvāti attho. Sabbesanti tatruppādavassāvāsikaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1255_4: sabbesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sāmaṇerānañca. Bhaṇḍāgāracīvarepīti akālacīvaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1255_5: Ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontīti mahāsaddaṃ karonti. Etanti ukkuṭṭhiyā katāya samabhāgadānaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1255_6: Virajjhitvā karontīti kattabbakālesu akatvā yathārucitakkhaṇe karonti. Samapaṭivīso
tika-vin08t:1255_7: dātabboti karissāmāti yācantānaṃ paṭiññāmattenapi samako koṭṭhāso dātabbo.
tika-vin08t:1256_0: Atirekabhāgenāti dasa bhikkhū honti, sāṭakāpi daseva, tesu eko dvādasa agghati, sesā
tika-vin08t:1256_1: dasagghanakā. Sabbesu dasagghanakavasena kuse pātite yassa bhikkhuno dvādasagghanako
tika-vin08t:1256_2: kuso pātito, so “ettakena mama cīvaraṃ pahotī”ti tena atirekabhāgena gantukāmo hoti.
tika-vin08t:1256_3: Ettha ca ettakena mama cīvaraṃ pahotīti dvādasagghanakena mama cīvaraṃ paripuṇṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:1256_4: hoti, na tato ūnenāti sabbaṃ gahetukāmoti attho. Bhikkhū “atirekaṃ āvuso saṅghassa
tika-vin08t:1256_5: santaka”nti vadanti, taṃ sutvā bhagavā “saṅghike ca gaṇasantake ca appakaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-vin08t:1256_6: sabbattha saṃyamo kātabbo, gaṇhantenapi kukkuccāyitabba”nti dassetuṃ “anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t:1256_7: bhikkhave, anukkhepe dinne”ti āha. Tattha anukkhepo nāma yaṃ kiñci anukkhipitabbaṃ
tika-vin08t:1256_8: anuppadātabbaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ, yattakaṃ tassa paṭivīse adhikaṃ, tattake agghanake
tika-vin08t:1256_9: yasmiṃ kismiñci kappiyabhaṇḍe dinneti atthoti imamatthaṃ saṅkhepena dassetuṃ “sace
tika-vin08t:1257_0: Vikalake tosetvāti ettha cīvaravikalakaṃ puggalavikalakanti dve vikalakā. Tattha
tika-vin08t:1257_1: cīvaravikalakaṃ nāma sabbesaṃ pañca pañca vatthāni pattāni, sesānipi atthi, ekekaṃ
tika-vin08t:1257_2: pana na pāpuṇāti, chinditvā dātabbāni. Chindantehi ca aḍḍhamaṇḍalādīnaṃ vā upāhanathavikādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1257_3: vā pahonakāni khaṇḍāni katvā dātabbāni, heṭṭhimaparicchedena caturaṅgulavitthārampi
tika-vin08t:1257_4: anuvātappahonakāyāmaṃ khaṇḍaṃ katvā dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Aparibhogaṃ pana na kātabbanti
tika-vin08t:1257_5: evamettha cīvarassa appahonakabhāvo cīvaravikalakaṃ. Chinditvā dinne panetaṃ tositaṃ
tika-vin08t:1257_6: hoti. Atha kusapāto kātabbo, sacepi ekassa bhikkhuno koṭṭhāse ekaṃ vā dve vā vatthāni
tika-vin08t:1257_7: nappahonti, tattha aññaṃ sāmaṇakaṃ parikkhāraṃ ṭhapetvā yo tena tussati, tassa taṃ
tika-vin08t:1257_8: bhāgaṃ datvā pacchā kusapāto kātabbo. Idampi cīvaravikalakanti andhaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1258_0: Puggalavikalakaṃ nāma dasa dasa bhikkhū gaṇetvā vaggaṃ karontānaṃ eko vaggo na pūrati,
tika-vin08t:1258_1: aṭṭha vā nava vā honti, tesaṃ aṭṭha vā nava vā koṭṭhāsā “tumhe ime gahetvā visuṃ
tika-vin08t:1258_2: bhājethā”ti dātabbā. Evamayaṃ puggalānaṃ appahonakabhāvo puggalavikalakaṃ nāma. Visuṃ
tika-vin08t:1258_3: dinne pana taṃ tositaṃ hoti, evaṃ tosetvā kusapāto kātabboti. Atha vā vikalake tosetvāti
tika-vin08t:1258_4: yo cīvaravibhāgo ūnako, taṃ aññena parikkhārena samaṃ katvā kusapāto kātabboti imamatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1259_0: 199. Ito paraṃ tesu tesu vatthūsu āgatavasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttesu vinicchayesu
tika-vin08t:1259_1: santesupi tesaṃ vinicchayānaṃ aṭṭhamātikāvinicchayato avimuttattā aṭṭhamātikāvinicchayesveva
tika-vin08t:1259_2: pakkhipitvā dassetuṃ “idāni aṭṭhimā, bhikkhave”tiādimāha. Yā tā aṭṭha mātikā bhagavatā
tika-vin08t:1259_3: vuttā, tāsaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ mātikānaṃ vasena vinicchayo idāni veditabboti yojanā. Parikkhepārahaṭṭhānena
tika-vin08t:1259_4: paricchinnāti iminā aparikkhittassa vihārassa dhuvasannipātaṭṭhānādito paṭhamaleḍḍupātassa
tika-vin08t:1259_5: anto upacārasīmāti dasseti. Idāni dutiyaleḍḍupātassa antopi upacārasīmāyevāti dassetuṃ
tika-vin08t:1259_7: sante tiyojane ṭhitā lābhaṃ gaṇhissantī”tiādinā ime lābhaggahaṇādayo upacārasīmāvaseneva
tika-vin08t:1259_8: hoti, na avippavāsasīmāvasenāti dasseti, tena ca imāni lābhaggahaṇādīniyeva upacārasīmāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1259_9: kattabbāni, na apalokanakammādīni cattāri kammāni, tāni pana avippavāsasīmādīsuyeva
tika-vin08t:1259_10: kattabbānīti pakāseti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “bhikkhunīnaṃ ārāmappavesanasenāsanapucchanādi
tika-vin08t:1260_0: Lābhatthāya ṭhapitā sīmā lābhasīmā. Loke gāmasīmādayo viya lābhasīmā nāma visuṃ pasiddhā
tika-vin08t:1260_1: natthi, kenāyaṃ anuññātāti āha “neva sammāsambuddhenā”tiādi. Etena nāyaṃ sāsanavohārasiddhā,
tika-vin08t:1260_2: lokavohārasiddhā evāti dasseti. Janapadaparicchedoti idaṃ lokapasiddhasīmāsaddatthavasena
tika-vin08t:1260_3: vuttaṃ, paricchedabbhantarampi sabbaṃ janapadasīmāti gahetabbaṃ. Janapado eva janapadasīmā,
tika-vin08t:1260_5: yāva udakapariyantā khaṇḍasīmattā vuttaṃ. Upacārasīmādīsu pana abaddhasīmāsu heṭṭhāpathaviyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1260_6: sabbattha ṭhitānaṃ na pāpuṇāti, kūpādipavesārahaṭṭhāne ṭhitānaññeva pāpuṇātīti heṭṭhā
tika-vin08t:1260_7: sīmakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva taṃtaṃsīmaṭṭhabhāvo veditabbo. Cakkavāḷasīmāya dinnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1260_10: dinnaṃ gāmaṭṭhānaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Kasmā? “Ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin08t:1261_0: 200-1. Buddhādhivutthoti buddhena bhagavatā adhivuttho. Ekasminti ekasmiṃ vihāre.
tika-vin08t:1261_1: Pākavattanti nibaddhadānaṃ. Vattatīti pavattati. Tehi vattabbanti yesaṃ sammukhe
tika-vin08t:1262_0: 202. Dutiyabhāge pana therāsanaṃ āruḷheti yāva saṅghanavakaṃ ekavāraṃ sabbesaṃ bhāgaṃ
tika-vin08t:1262_1: datvā cīvare aparikkhīṇe puna sabbesaṃ dātuṃ dutiyabhāge therassa dinneti attho.
tika-vin08t:1262_2: Pubbe vuttanayenāti “tuyheva bhikkhu tāni cīvarānī”ti bhagavatā vuttanayena. Paṃsukūlikānampi
tika-vin08t:1262_3: vaṭṭatīti “tuyhaṃ demā”ti avatvā, ‘bhikkhūnaṃ dema, therānaṃ demā”ti vuttattā “paṃsukūlikānampi
tika-vin08t:1262_4: vaṭṭatī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana paṃsukūlikānampi vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:1262_5: ettha “tuyhaṃ demā”ti avuttattāti kāraṇaṃ vadanti. Yadi evaṃ “saṅghassa demā”ti vuttepi
tika-vin08t:1262_6: vaṭṭeyya, “bhikkhūnaṃ dema, therānaṃ dema, saṅghassa demā”ti vacanato bhedo na dissati,
tika-vin08t:1262_7: vīmaṃsitabbamettha kāraṇanti. Pārupituṃ vaṭṭatīti paṃsukūlikānaṃ vaṭṭati. Sāmikehi
tika-vin08t:1263_0: 203. Upaḍḍhaṃ dātabbanti yaṃ ubhatosaṅghassa dinnaṃ, tato upaḍḍhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ upaḍḍhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1263_1: bhikkhunīnaṃ dātabbaṃ. Sacepi eko bhikkhu hoti, ekā vā bhikkhunī, antamaso anupasampannassapi
tika-vin08t:1263_2: upaḍḍhameva dātabbaṃ. “Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhikkhunīnañca dammī”ti vutte pana na
tika-vin08t:1263_3: majjhe bhinditvā dātabbanti ettha yasmā bhikkhunipakkhe saṅghassa paccekaṃ aparāmaṭṭhattā
tika-vin08t:1263_4: bhikkhunīnaṃ gaṇanāya bhāgo dātabboti dāyakassa adhippāyoti sijjhati, tathā dānañca
tika-vin08t:1263_5: bhikkhūpi gaṇetvā dinne eva yujjati. Itarathā hi “kittakaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dātabbaṃ, kittakaṃ
tika-vin08t:1263_7: vuttavacanasadisamevāti āha “bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca gaṇetvā dātabba”nti. Tenāha
