tika-vin08t:1263_9: tuyhañcā”ti vutte pana puggalo visuṃ na labhatīti idaṃ aṭṭhakathāpamāṇeneva gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1263_10: na hettha visesakāraṇaṃ upalabbhati. Tathā hi “ubhatosaṅghassa ca tuyhañca dammī”ti
tika-vin08t:1263_11: vutte sāmaññavisesavacanehi saṅgahitattā yathā puggalo visuṃ labhati, evamidhāpi
tika-vin08t:1263_13: puggalapaṭivīsenāti viññāyati, tasmā aṭṭhakathāvacanamevettha pamāṇaṃ. Pāpuṇanaṭṭhānato
tika-vin08t:1263_14: ekameva labhatīti attano vassaggena pattaṭṭhānato ekameva koṭṭhāsaṃ labhati. Tattha
tika-vin08t:1264_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana bhikkhusaṅghasaddena bhikkhūnaññeva gahitattā, puggalassa
tika-vin08t:1264_1: pana “tuyhañcā”ti visuṃ gahitattā ca tatthassa aggahitattā daṭṭhabbā, “bhikkhūnañca
tika-vin08t:1264_2: bhikkhunīnañca tuyhañcā”ti vuttaṭṭhānasadisattāti adhippāyo. Puggalappadhāno hettha
tika-vin08t:1264_3: saṅgha-saddo daṭṭhabbo. Keci pana “bhikkhusaṅghaggahaṇena gahitattā”ti pāṭhaṃ likhanti,
tika-vin08t:1264_4: taṃ na sundaraṃ tassa visuṃ lābhaggahaṇe kāraṇavacanattā. Tathā hi “visuṃ saṅghaggahaṇena
tika-vin08t:1264_5: gahitattā”ti visuṃ puggalassapi bhāgaggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Yathā cettha puggalassa
tika-vin08t:1264_6: aggahaṇaṃ, evaṃ upari “bhikkhusaṅghassa ca tuyhañcā”tiādīsupi visuṃ saṅghādisaddehi
tika-vin08t:1264_7: puggalassa aggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yadi hi gahaṇaṃ siyā, saṅghatopi visumpīti bhāgadvayaṃ
tika-vin08t:1264_8: labheyya ubhayattha gahitattāti vuttaṃ. Pūjetabbantiādi gihikammaṃ na hotīti dassanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1264_9: vuttaṃ. Bhikkhusaṅghassa harāti idaṃ piṇḍapātaharaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tenāha “bhuñjituṃ
tika-vin08t:1264_10: vaṭṭatī”ti. “Bhikkhusaṅghassa harā”ti vuttepi haritabbanti īdisaṃ gihiveyyāvaccaṃ
tika-vin08t:1265_0: 204. Antohemanteti iminā anatthate kathine vassānaṃ pacchime māse dinnaṃ purimavassaṃvutthānaññeva
tika-vin08t:1265_1: pāpuṇāti, tato paraṃ hemante dinnaṃ pacchimavassaṃvutthānampi vutthavassattā pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin08t:1265_2: hemantato pana paraṃ piṭṭhisamaye “vassaṃvutthasaṅghassā”ti evaṃ paricchinditvā dinnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1265_3: anantare vasse vā tato paresu vā yattha katthaci tasmiṃ bhikkhubhāve vutthavassānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1265_4: sabbesaṃ pāpuṇāti. Ye pana sabbathā avutthavassā, tesaṃ na pāpuṇātīti dasseti. Lakkhaṇaññū
tika-vin08t:1265_5: vadantīti vinayalakkhaṇaññuno ācariyā vadanti. Lakkhaṇaññū vadantīti idaṃ sanniṭṭhānavacanaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1265_6: aṭṭhakathāsu anāgatattā pana evaṃ vuttaṃ. Bahiupacārasīmāyaṃ…pe… sabbesaṃ pāpuṇātīti
tika-vin08t:1265_7: yattha katthaci vutthavassānaṃ sabbesaṃ pāpuṇātīti adhippāyo. Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi
tika-vin08t:1265_8: “sace pana bahiupacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhito ‘vassaṃvutthasaṅghassa dammī’ti vadati, yattha
tika-vin08t:1265_9: katthaci vutthavassānaṃ sabbesaṃ sampattānaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti vuttaṃ. Gaṇṭhipadesu pana
tika-vin08t:1265_10: “vassāvāsassa ananurūpe padese ṭhatvā vuttattā vassaṃvutthānañca avutthānañca sabbesaṃ
tika-vin08t:1265_11: pāpuṇātī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Na hi “vassaṃvutthasaṅghassa dammī”ti vutte
tika-vin08t:1265_12: avutthavassānaṃ pāpuṇāti. Sabbesampīti tasmiṃ bhikkhubhāve vutthavassānaṃ sabbesampīti
tika-vin08t:1265_14: etthāpi eseva nayo. Evaṃ vadatīti vassaṃvutthasaṅghassa dammīti vadati. Atītavassanti anantarātītavassaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1266_0: 205. Idāni “ādissa detī”ti padaṃ vibhajanto “ādissa detīti etthā”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-vin08t:1266_1: yāguyā vā…pe… bhesajje vā ādisitvā paricchinditvā dento dāyako ādissa deti nāmāti
tika-vin08t:1267_0: 206. Idāni “puggalassa detī”ti padaṃ vibhajanto āha “puggalassa deti etthā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t:1267_1: Saṅghato ca gaṇato ca vinimuttassa attano kulūpakādipuggalassa dento dāyako puggalassa
tika-vin08t:1267_2: deti nāma. Taṃ pana puggalikadānaṃ parammukhā vā hoti sammukhā vā. Tattha parammukhā
tika-vin08t:1267_3: dento “idaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dammī”ti nāmaṃ uddharitvā deti, sammukhā dento
tika-vin08t:1267_4: ca bhikkhuno pādamūle cīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā “idaṃ, bhante, tumhākaṃ dammī”ti vatvā deti,
tika-vin08t:1267_5: tadubhayathāpi dento puggalassa deti nāmāti attho. Na kevalaṃ ekasseva dento puggalassa
tika-vin08t:1267_6: deti nāma, atha kho antevāsikādīhi saddhiṃ dentopi puggalassa deti nāmāti dassetuṃ
tika-vin08t:1267_7: “sace panā”tiādimāha. Tattha uddesaṃ gahetuṃ āgatoti tassa santike uddesaṃ aggahitapubbassapi
tika-vin08t:1267_8: uddesaṃ gaṇhissāmīti āgatakālato paṭṭhāya antevāsikabhāvūpagamanato vuttaṃ. Gahetvā
tika-vin08t:1267_9: gacchantoti pariniṭṭhitauddeso hutvā gacchanto. Vattaṃ katvā uddesaparipucchādīni
tika-vin08t:1267_10: gahetvā vicarantānanti idaṃ “uddesantevāsikāna”nti imasseva visesanaṃ. Tena uddesakāle
tika-vin08t:1267_11: āgantvā uddesaṃ gahetvā gantvā aññattha nivasante anibaddhacārike nivatteti.
tika-vin08t:1268_0: Evaṃ cīvarakkhandhake āgataaṭṭhamātikāvasena cīvaravibhajanaṃ dassetvā idāni tasmiṃyeva
tika-vin08t:1268_1: cīvarakkhandhake majjhe āgatesu vatthūsu āgatanayaṃ nivattetvā dassento “sace koci
tika-vin08t:1268_2: bhikkhū”tiādimāha. Tattha kiṃ kātabbanti pucchāya tasseva tāni cīvarānīti vissajjanā,
tika-vin08t:1268_3: sesāni ñāpakādivasena vuttāni. Pañca māseti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. Vaḍḍhiṃ
tika-vin08t:1268_4: payojetvā ṭhapitaupanikkhepatoti vassāvāsikatthāya veyyāvaccakarehi vaḍḍhiṃ payojetvā
tika-vin08t:1268_6: “idaṃ idha vassaṃvutthasaṅghassa demāti vā vassāvāsikaṃ demāti vā vatvā dinnaṃ taṃ
tika-vin08t:1268_7: anatthatakathinassapi pañca māse pāpuṇātī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ vassāvāsikalābhavasena uppanne
tika-vin08t:1268_8: labbhamānavisesaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha idhāti abhilāpamattamevetaṃ, idha-saddaṃ
tika-vin08t:1268_9: vinā “vassaṃvutthasaṅghassa demā”ti vuttepi so eva nayo. Anatthatakathinassapi pañca
tika-vin08t:1268_10: māse pāpuṇātīti vassāvāsikalābhavasena uppannattā anatthatakathinassapi vutthavassassa
tika-vin08t:1268_11: pañca māse pāpuṇāti, tato paraṃ pana uppannavassāvāsikaṃ pucchitabbaṃ “kiṃ atītavasse
tika-vin08t:1268_12: idaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ, udāhu anāgatavasse”ti. Tattha tato paranti pañcamāsato paraṃ,
tika-vin08t:1269_0: Ṭhitikā pana na tiṭṭhatīti ettha aṭṭhitāya ṭhitikāya puna aññasmiṃ cīvare uppanne
tika-vin08t:1269_1: sace eko bhikkhu āgacchati, majjhe chinditvā dvīhipi gahetabbaṃ. Ṭhitāya pana ṭhitikāya
tika-vin08t:1269_2: puna aññasmiṃ cīvare uppanne sace navakataro āgacchati, ṭhitikā heṭṭhā gacchati.
tika-vin08t:1269_3: Sace vuḍḍhataro āgacchati, ṭhitikā uddhaṃ ārohati. Atha añño natthi, puna attano
tika-vin08t:1269_4: pāpetvā gahetabbaṃ. Duggahitānīti aggahitāni, saṅghikāneva hontīti attho. “Pātite
tika-vin08t:1269_5: kuse”ti ekakoṭṭhāse kusadaṇḍake pātitamatte sacepi bhikkhusahassaṃ hoti, gahitameva
tika-vin08t:1269_6: nāma cīvaraṃ. “Nākāmā bhāgo dātabbo”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ, tattha gahitameva nāmāti
tika-vin08t:1269_7: “imassa idaṃ patta”nti kiñcāpi na viditaṃ, te pana bhāgā atthato tesaṃ pattāyevāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:1270_0: Sattāhavārena aruṇameva uṭṭhāpetīti idaṃ nānāsīmavihāresu kattabbanayena ekasmimpi
tika-vin08t:1270_1: vihāre dvīsu senāsanesu nivutthabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, aruṇuṭṭhāpaneneva tattha
tika-vin08t:1270_2: vuttho hoti, na pana vassacchedaparihārāya. Antoupacārasīmāya hi yattha katthaci
tika-vin08t:1270_3: aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpento attanā gahitasenāsanaṃ appaviṭṭhopi vutthavasso eva hoti. Gahitasenāsane
tika-vin08t:1270_4: pana nivuttho nāma na hoti, tattha aruṇuṭṭhāpane sati hoti. Tenāha “purimasmiṃ bahutaraṃ
tika-vin08t:1270_5: nivasati nāmā”ti. Etena ca itarasmiṃ sattāhavārenapi aruṇuṭṭhāpane sati eva appataraṃ
tika-vin08t:1270_6: nivasati nāma hoti, nāsatīti dīpitaṃ hoti. Idanti ekādhippāyadānaṃ. Nānālābhehītiādīsu
tika-vin08t:1270_7: nānā visuṃ visuṃ lābho etesūti nānālābhā, dve vihārā, tehi nānālābhehi. Nānā visuṃ
tika-vin08t:1270_8: visuṃ pākārādīhi paricchinno upacāro etesanti nānūpacārā, tehi nānūpacārehi. Ekasīmavihārehīti
tika-vin08t:1270_9: ekasīmāyaṃ dvīhi vihārehīti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Nānālābhehīti visuṃ visuṃ nibaddhavassāvāsikalābhehi.
tika-vin08t:1270_10: Nānūpacārehīti nānāparikkhepanānādvārehi. Ekasīmavihārehīti dvinnaṃ vihārānaṃ ekena
tika-vin08t:1270_11: pākārena parikkhittattā ekāya upacārasīmāya antogatehi dvīhi vihārehīti vimativinodaniyaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1270_12: Senāsanaggāho paṭippassambhatīti paṭhamaṃ gahito paṭippassambhati. Tatthāti yattha
tika-vin08t:1271_0: 207. Bhikkhussa kālakateti ettha kālakata-saddo bhāvasādhanoti āha “kālakiriyāyā”ti.
tika-vin08t:1272_0: 208. Sacepi sahassaṃ agghati, gilānupaṭṭhākānaññeva dātabbanti sambandho. Aññanti
tika-vin08t:1272_1: ticīvarapattato aññaṃ. Appagghanti atijiṇṇādibhāvena nihīnaṃ. Tatoti avasesaparikkhārato.
tika-vin08t:1272_2: Sabbanti pattaṃ cīvarañca. Tattha tattha saṅghassevāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vihāre saṅghasseva.
tika-vin08t:1272_3: Bhikkhuno kālakataṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya “idhā”ti vattabbe “tatthā”ti vuttattā vicchāvacanattā
tika-vin08t:1272_4: ca parikkhārassa ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ vuttanti viññāyati. Pāḷiyaṃ avissajjikaṃ avebhaṅgikanti
tika-vin08t:1272_5: āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa saṅghasseva santakaṃ hutvā kassaci avissajjikaṃ avebhaṅgikañca
tika-vin08t:1272_6: bhavituṃ anujānāmīti attho. “Sante patirūpe gāhake”ti vuttattā gāhake asati adatvā
tika-vin08t:1272_7: bhājitepi subhājitamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dakkhiṇodakaṃ pamāṇanti ettha sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1272_8: tāva “yattha pana dakkhiṇodakaṃ pamāṇanti bhikkhū yasmiṃ raṭṭhe dakkhiṇodakapaṭiggahaṇamattenapi
tika-vin08t:1272_9: deyyadhammassa sāmino hontīti adhippāyo”ti vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “dakkhiṇodakaṃ
tika-vin08t:1272_10: pamāṇanti ettakāni cīvarāni dassāmīti paṭhamaṃ udakaṃ pātetvā pacchā denti, taṃ yehi
tika-vin08t:1272_11: gahitaṃ, te bhāginova hontīti adhippāyo”ti vuttaṃ. Parasamuddeti jambudīpe. Tambapaṇṇidīpañhi
tika-vin08t:1273_0: “Matakacīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātī”ti ettha maggaṃ gacchanto tassa kālakiriyaṃ sutvā avihāraṭṭhāne
tika-vin08t:1273_1: ce dvādasahatthabbhantare aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhāvaṃ ñatvā “idaṃ cīvaraṃ mayhaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti
tika-vin08t:1273_2: adhiṭṭhāti, svādhiṭṭhitaṃ. Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu bahubhaṇḍo bahuparikkhāro
tika-vin08t:1273_3: kālakato hoti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ, “bhikkhussa, bhikkhave, kālakate saṅgho
tika-vin08t:1273_4: sāmī pattacīvare. Apica gilānupaṭṭhākā bahupakārā, anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ticīvarañca
tika-vin08t:1273_5: pattañca gilānupaṭṭhākānaṃ dātuṃ. Yaṃ tattha lahubhaṇḍaṃ lahuparikkhāraṃ, taṃ sammukhībhūtena
tika-vin08t:1273_6: saṅghena bhājetuṃ. Yaṃ tattha garubhaṇḍaṃ garuparikkhāraṃ, taṃ āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa
tika-vin08t:1273_7: saṅghassa avissajjikaṃ avebhaṅgika”nti iminā pāṭhena bhagavā sabbaññū bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1274_1: Tesu ticīvarapattaṃ gilānupaṭṭhākassa bhāgo hoti, avasesalahubhaṇḍaṃ sammukhībhūtasaṅghassa,
tika-vin08t:1274_2: pañcavīsatividha garubhaṇḍaṃ cātuddisasaṅghassa. Iminā ito tividhabhaṇḍato aññaṃ
tika-vin08t:1274_3: bhikkhubhaṇḍaṃ nāma natthi, imehi tividhehi puggalehi añño dāyādo nāma natthīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:1274_4: Idāni pana vinayadharā “bhikkhūnaṃ akappiyabhaṇḍaṃ gihibhūtā ñātakā labhantī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin08t:1274_5: taṃ kasmāti ce? “Ye tassa dhane issarā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā, tesaṃ dātabba”nti
tika-vin08t:1274_6: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatattāti. Saccaṃ āgato, so pana pāṭho vissāsaggāhavisaye āgato, na
tika-vin08t:1274_7: dāyajjagahaṇaṭṭhāne. “Gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā”icceva āgato, na “ñātakā aññātakā
tika-vin08t:1274_8: vā”ti, tasmā ñātakā vā hontu aññātakā vā, ye taṃ gilānaṃ upaṭṭhahanti, te gilānupaṭṭhākabhāgabhūtassa
tika-vin08t:1274_9: dhanassa issarā gahaṭṭhapabbajitā, antamaso mātugāmāpi. Te sandhāya “tesaṃ dātabba”nti
tika-vin08t:1274_10: vuttaṃ, na pana ye gilānaṃ nupaṭṭhahanti, te sandhāya. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “gilānupaṭṭhāko
tika-vin08t:1274_11: nāma gihī vā hotu pabbajito vā, antamaso mātugāmopi, sabbe bhāgaṃ labhantī”ti.
tika-vin08t:1275_0: Atha vā yo bhikkhu attano jīvamānakāleyeva sabbaṃ attano parikkhāraṃ nissajjitvā
tika-vin08t:1275_1: kassaci ñātakassa vā aññātakassa vā gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā adāsi, koci ca
tika-vin08t:1275_2: ñātako vā aññātako vā gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā vissāsaṃ aggahesi, tādise sandhāya
tika-vin08t:1275_3: “ye tassa dhanassa issarā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā, tesaṃ dātabba”nti vuttaṃ, na
tika-vin08t:1275_4: pana atādise ñātake. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sace pana so jīvamānoyeva sabbaṃ attano
tika-vin08t:1275_5: parikkhāraṃ nissajjitvā kassaci adāsi, koci vā vissāsaṃ aggahesi, yassa dinnaṃ, yena
tika-vin08t:1275_6: ca gahitaṃ, tasseva hoti, tassa ruciyā eva gilānupaṭṭhākā labhantī”ti. Evaṃ hotu,
tika-vin08t:1275_7: kappiyabhaṇḍe pana kathanti? Tampi “gihiñātakānaṃ dātabba”nti pāḷiyaṃ vā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1275_8: vā ṭīkāsu vā natthi, tasmā vicāretabbametaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1278_1: Tattha senāsanakkhandhake senāsanabhājaneyeva paṭhamaṃ āgatepi catupaccayabhājanavinicchayattā
tika-vin08t:1278_2: paccayānukkamena piṇḍapātabhājanaṃ paṭhamaṃ dasseti. Piṇḍapātabhājane pana saṅghabhattādīsu
tika-vin08t:1278_3: ayaṃ vinicchayoti sambandho. Kathaṃ etāni saṅghabhattādīni bhagavatā anuññātānīti
tika-vin08t:1278_4: āha “anujānāmi…pe… anuññātesū”ti. Saṅghassa atthāya ābhataṃ bhattaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1278_5: yathā “āgantukassa ābhataṃ bhattaṃ āgantukabhatta”nti. Saṅghato uddissa uddisitvā
tika-vin08t:1278_6: dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ uddesabhattaṃ. Nimantetvā dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ nimantanabhattaṃ. Salākaṃ
tika-vin08t:1278_7: pātetvā gāhetabbaṃ bhattaṃ salākabhattaṃ. Pakkhe pakkhadivase dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ pakkhabhattaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1278_8: Uposathe uposathadivase dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ uposathabhattaṃ. Pāṭipade uposathadivasato
tika-vin08t:1278_9: dutiyadivase dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ pāṭipadabhattanti viggaho. Ṭhitikā nāma natthīti saṅghattherato
tika-vin08t:1279_0: Attano vihāradvāreti vihārassa dvārakoṭṭhakasamīpaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Bhojanasālāyāti
tika-vin08t:1279_1: bhattuddesaṭṭhānabhūtāya bhojanasālāyaṃ. Vassaggenāti vassakoṭṭhāsena. Dinnaṃ panāti
tika-vin08t:1279_2: vatvā yathā so dāyako vadati, taṃ vidhiṃ dassetuṃ “saṅghato bhante”tiādimāha. Antaraghareti
tika-vin08t:1279_3: antogehe. Antoupacāragatānanti ettha gāmadvāravīthicatukkesu dvādasahatthabbhantaraṃ upacāro nāma.
tika-vin08t:1280_0: Antaragharassa upacāre pana labbhamānavisesaṃ dassetuṃ “gharūpacāro cetthā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t:1280_1: Ekavaḷañjanti ekena dvārena vaḷañjitabbaṃ. Nānānivesanesūti nānākulassa nānūpacāresu
tika-vin08t:1280_2: nivesanesu. Lajjī pesalo agatigamanaṃ vajjetvā medhāvī ca upaparikkhitvā uddisatīti
tika-vin08t:1280_3: āha “pesalo lajjī medhāvī icchitabbo”ti. Nisinnassapi niddāyantassapīti anādare sāmivacanaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1280_4: vuḍḍhatare niddāyante navakassa gāhitaṃ suggāhitanti attho. Ticīvaraparivāraṃ vāti
tika-vin08t:1280_5: ettha “udakamattalābhī viya aññopi uddesabhattaṃ alabhitvā vatthādianekappakārakaṃ
tika-vin08t:1280_6: labhati ce, tasseva ta”nti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Attano rucivasena yaṃ kiñci vatvā
tika-vin08t:1280_7: āharituṃ vissajjitattā vissaṭṭhadūto nāma. Yaṃ icchatīti “uddesabhattaṃ dethā”tiādīni
tika-vin08t:1281_0: “Ekā kūṭaṭṭhitikā nāma hotī”ti vatvā tameva ṭhitikaṃ vibhāvento “rañño vā hī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t:1281_1: Aññehi uddesabhattādīhi amissetvā visuṃyeva ṭhitikāya gahetabbattā “ekacārikabhattānī”ti
tika-vin08t:1281_2: vuttaṃ. Theyyāya harantīti pattahārakā haranti. Gīvā hotīti āṇāpakassa gīvā hoti.
tika-vin08t:1281_3: Sabbaṃ pattassāmikassa hotīti cīvarādikampi sabbaṃ pattassāmikasseva hoti, “mayā
tika-vin08t:1281_4: bhattameva sandhāya vuttaṃ, na cīvarādi”nti vatvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti attho. Manussānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1281_5: vacanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti vuttā gacchantīti manussānaṃ vacanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti tena
tika-vin08t:1281_6: bhikkhunā vuttā gacchanti. Akatabhāgo nāmāti āgantukabhāgo nāma, adinnapubbabhāgoti
tika-vin08t:1281_7: attho. Sabbo saṅgho paribhūñjatūti vutteti ettha “paṭhamameva ‘sabbasaṅghikabhattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1281_8: dethā’ti vatvā pacchā ‘sabbo saṅgho paribhuñjatū’ti avuttepi bhājetvā paribhuñjitabba”nti
tika-vin08t:1281_9: gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Kiṃ āharīyatīti avatvāti “katarabhattaṃ tayā āharīyatī”ti dāyakaṃ
tika-vin08t:1284_0: 210. “Ettake bhikkhū saṅghato uddisitvā dethā”tiādīni avatvā “ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1284_1: bhattaṃ dethā”ti vatvā dinnaṃ saṅghikaṃ nimantanaṃ nāma. Piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:1284_2: bhikkhāpariyāyena vuttattā vaṭṭati. Paṭipāṭiyāti laddhapaṭipāṭiyā. Vicchinditvāti
tika-vin08t:1284_3: “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti padaṃ avatvā. Tenevāha “bhattanti avadantenā”ti. Ālopasaṅkhepenāti
tika-vin08t:1284_4: ekekapiṇḍavasena. Ayañca nayo nimantaneyeva, na uddesabhatte. Tassa hi ekassa pahonakappamāṇaṃyeva
tika-vin08t:1284_5: bhājetabbaṃ, tasmā uddesabhatte ālopaṭṭhitikā nāma natthi.
tika-vin08t:1285_0: Āruḷhāyeva mātikaṃ. Saṅghato aṭṭha bhikkhūti ettha ye mātikaṃ āruḷhā, te aṭṭha bhikkhūti
tika-vin08t:1285_2: ṭhitikāvasena āruḷhe bhattuddesakena vā sayaṃ vā saṅghato uddisāpetvā gahetvā gantabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1285_3: na attanā rucite gahetvāti adhippāyo. Mātikaṃ āropetvāti “saṅghato gaṇhāmī”tiādinā
tika-vin08t:1285_4: vuttamātikābhedaṃ dāyakassa viññāpetvāti attho. “Ekavāranti yāva tasmiṃ āvāse vasanti
tika-vin08t:1285_5: bhikkhū, sabbe labhantī”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo – ekavāranti
tika-vin08t:1285_6: na ekadivasaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, yattakā pana bhikkhū tasmiṃ āvāse vasanti, te sabbe.
tika-vin08t:1285_7: Ekasmiṃ divase gahitabhikkhū aññadā aggahetvā yāva ekavāraṃ sabbe bhikkhū bhojitā
tika-vin08t:1285_8: hontīti jānāti ce, ye jānanti, te gahetvā gantabbanti. Paṭibaddhakālato paṭṭhāyāti
tika-vin08t:1288_1: Bahūni salākabhattānīti tiṃsaṃ vā cattārīsaṃ vā bhattāni. Sace hontīti ajjhāharitvā
tika-vin08t:1288_2: yojetabbaṃ. Sallakkhetvāti tāni bhattāni pamāṇavasena sallakkhetvā. Niggahena datvāti
tika-vin08t:1288_3: dūraṃ gantuṃ anicchantassa niggahena sampaṭicchāpetvā. Puna vihāraṃ āgantvāti ettha
tika-vin08t:1288_4: vihāraṃ anāgantvā bhattaṃ gahetvā pacchā vihāre attano pāpetvā bhuñjitumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:1288_5: Ekagehavasenāti vīthiyampi ekapasse gharapāḷiyā vasena. Uddisitvāpīti “asukakule
tika-vin08t:1289_0: 212. Vāragāmeti atidūrattā vārena gantabbagāme. Saṭṭhito vā paṇṇāsato vāti daṇḍakammatthāya
tika-vin08t:1289_1: udakaghaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vihāravāroti sabbabhikkhūsu bhikkhāya gatesu vihārarakkhaṇavāro.
tika-vin08t:1289_3: Dūrattā niggahetvāpi vārena gahetabbo gāmo vāragāmo. Vihāravāre niyuttā vihāravārikā,
tika-vin08t:1289_4: vārena vihārarakkhaṇakā. Aññathattanti pasādaññathattaṃ. Phātikammameva bhavantīti
tika-vin08t:1289_5: vihārarakkhaṇatthāya saṅghena dātabbā atirekalābhā honti. Ekasseva pāpuṇantīti divase
tika-vin08t:1289_6: divase ekekasseva pāpitānīti attho. Saṅghanavakena laddhakāleti divase divase ekekassa
tika-vin08t:1289_7: pāpitāni dve tīṇi ekacārikabhattāni teneva niyāmena attano pāpuṇanaṭṭhāne saṅghanavakena laddhakāle.
tika-vin08t:1290_0: Yassa kassaci sammukhībhūtassa pāpetvāti ettha “yebhuyyena ce bhikkhū bahisīmagatā
tika-vin08t:1290_1: honti, sammukhībhūtassa yassa kassaci pāpetabbaṃ sabhāgattā ekena laddhaṃ sabbesaṃ
tika-vin08t:1290_2: hoti, tasmimpi asati attano pāpetvā dātabba”nti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Rasasalākanti
tika-vin08t:1290_3: ucchurasasalākaṃ. Salākavasena pana gāhitattā na sāditabbāti idaṃ asāruppavasena
tika-vin08t:1290_4: vuttaṃ, na dhutaṅgabhedavasena. “Saṅghato nirāmisasalākā…pe… vaṭṭatiyevā”ti hi visuddhimagge
tika-vin08t:1290_5: vuttaṃ. Sāratthadīpaniyampi – saṅghato nirāmisasalākāpi vihāre pakkabhattampi vaṭṭatiyevāti
tika-vin08t:1290_6: sādhāraṇaṃ katvā visuddhimagge vuttattā, “evaṃ gāhite sāditabbaṃ, evaṃ na sāditabba”nti
tika-vin08t:1290_7: visesetvā avuttattā ca “bhesajjādisalākāyo cettha kiñcāpi piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin08t:1290_8: salākavasena pana gāhitattā na sāditabbā”ti ettha adhippāyo vīmaṃsitabbo. Yadi hi
tika-vin08t:1290_9: bhesajjādisalākā salākavasena gāhitā na sāditabbā siyā, “saṅghato nirāmisasalākā
tika-vin08t:1290_11: ca “atirekalābhaṃ paṭikkhipāmī”ti salākavasena gāhetabbaṃ bhattameva paṭikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1290_12: na bhesajjaṃ. Saṅghabhattādīni hi cuddasa bhattāniyeva tena na sāditabbānīti vuttāni.
tika-vin08t:1290_13: Khandhakabhāṇakānaṃ vā matena idha evaṃ vuttanti gahetabbanti vuttaṃ. Aggato dātabbā
tika-vin08t:1290_14: bhikkhā aggabhikkhā. Aggabhikkhāmattanti ekakaṭacchubhikkhāmattaṃ. Laddhā vā aladdhā
tika-vin08t:1290_15: vā svepi gaṇheyyāsīti laddhepi appamattatāya vuttaṃ. Tenāha “yāvadatthaṃ labhati…pe…
tika-vin08t:1290_16: alabhitvā sve gaṇheyyāsīti vattabbo”ti. Aggabhikkhamattanti hi ettha matta-saddo
tika-vin08t:1291_0: Salākabhattaṃ nāma vihāreyeva uddisīyati vihārameva sandhāya dīyamānattāti āha “vihāre
tika-vin08t:1291_1: apāpitaṃ panā”tiādi. Tatra āsanasālāyāti tasmiṃ gāme āsanasālāya. Vihāraṃ ānetvā
tika-vin08t:1291_2: gāhetabbanti tathā vatvā tasmiṃ divase dinnabhattaṃ vihārameva ānetvā ṭhitikāya gāhetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1291_3: Tatthāti tasmiṃ disābhāge. Taṃ gahetvāti taṃ vāragāmasalākaṃ attanā gahetvā. Tenāti
tika-vin08t:1291_4: yo attano pattavāragāme salākaṃ disāgamikassa adāsi, tena. Anatikkamanteyeva tasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:1291_5: tassa salākā gāhetabbāti yasmā upacārasīmaṭṭhasseva salākā pāpuṇāti, tasmā tasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:1291_6: disaṃgamike upacārasīmaṃ anatikkanteyeva tassa disaṃgamikassa pattasalākā attano pāpetvā gāhetabbā.
tika-vin08t:1292_0: Devasikaṃ pāpetabbāti upacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhitassa yassa kassaci vassaggena pāpetabbā.
tika-vin08t:1292_1: Evaṃ etesu anāgatesu āsannavihāre bhikkhūnaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, itarathā saṅghikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1292_2: hoti. Anāgatadivaseti ettha kathaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āgatānāgatabhāvo viññāyatīti
tika-vin08t:1292_3: ce? Yasmā tato tato āgatā bhikkhū tasmiṃ gāme āsanasālāya sannipatanti, tasmā tesaṃ
tika-vin08t:1292_4: āgatānāgatabhāvo sakkā viññātuṃ. Amhākaṃ gocaragāmeti salākabhattadāyakānaṃ gāme.
tika-vin08t:1292_5: Bhuñjituṃ āgacchantīti “mahāthero ekakova vihāre ohīno avassaṃ sabbasalākā attano
tika-vin08t:1295_0: 213. Abhilakkhitesu catūsu pakkhadivasesu dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ. Abhilakkhitesūti
tika-vin08t:1295_2: lakkhitabbesu sallakkhetabbesu upalakkhetabbesūti vuttaṃ hoti. Sve pakkhoti ajjapakkhikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1295_3: na gāhetabbanti aṭṭhamiyā bhuñjitabbaṃ, sattamiyā bhuñjanatthāya na gāhetabbaṃ, dāyakehi
tika-vin08t:1295_4: niyamitadivaseneva gāhetabbanti attho. Tenāha “sace panā”tiādi. Sve lūkhanti ajja
tika-vin08t:1295_5: āvāhamaṅgalādikaraṇato atipaṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ karīyati, sve tathā na bhavissati, ajjeva
tika-vin08t:1295_6: bhikkhū bhojessāmāti adhippāyo. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana aññathā vuttaṃ. Pakkhikabhattato
tika-vin08t:1295_7: uposathikabhattassa bhedaṃ dassento āha “uposathaṅgāni samādiyitvā”tiādi. Uposathe
tika-vin08t:1298_0: 214. Nibandhāpitanti “asukavihāre āgantukā bhuñjantū”ti niyamitaṃ. Gamiko āgantukabhattampīti
tika-vin08t:1298_1: gāmantarato āgantvā avūpasantena gamikacittena vasitvā puna aññattha gacchantaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin08t:1298_2: vuttaṃ, āvāsikassa pana gantukāmassa gamikabhattameva labbhati. “Lesaṃ oḍḍetvā”ti
tika-vin08t:1298_3: vuttattā lesābhāvena yāva gamanaparibandho vigacchati, tāva bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti ñāpitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1301: 216. Tathā paṭiggahitattāti bhikkhānāmena paṭiggahitattā. Pattaṃ pūretvā thaketvā dinnanti “guḷakabhattaṃ demā”ti dinnaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin08t:1304_0: 217. Ito paraṃ paccayānukkamena senāsanabhājanakathāya vattabbāyapi tassā mahāvisayattā,
tika-vin08t:1304_2: ca tadanantaraṃ taṃ dassetumāha “gilānapaccayabhājanīyaṃ panā”tiādi. Tattha rājarājamahāmattāti
tika-vin08t:1304_4: Ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvātiādi heṭṭhā vuttanayattā ca pākaṭattā ca suviññeyyameva. Upacārasīmaṃ…pe…
tika-vin08t:1304_5: bhājetabbanti idaṃ saṅghaṃ uddissa dinnattā vuttaṃ. Kumbhaṃ pana āvajjetvāti kumbhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1304_6: disāmukhaṃ katvā. Sace thinaṃ sappi hotīti kakkhaḷaṃ sappi hoti. Thokaṃ thokampi
tika-vin08t:1304_7: pāpetuṃ vaṭṭatīti evaṃ kate ṭhitikāpi tiṭṭhati. Siṅgiveramaricādibhesajjampi avasesapattathālakādisamaṇaparikkhāropīti
tika-vin08t:1304_8: iminā na kevalaṃ bhesajjameva gilānapaccayo hoti, atha kho avasesaparikkhāropi gilānapaccaye
tika-vin08t:1307_1: utukāle senāsanaggāho ca vassāvāse senāsanaggāho cāti kālavasena senāsanaggāho nāma
tika-vin08t:1307_2: duvidho hotīti yojanā. Tattha utukāleti hemantagimhānautukāle. Vassāvāseti vassānakāle.
tika-vin08t:1307_3: Bhikkhuṃ uṭṭhāpetvā senāsanaṃ dātabbaṃ, akālo nāma natthi dāyakehi “āgatānāgatassa
tika-vin08t:1307_4: cātuddisassa saṅghassa dammī”ti dinnasaṅghikasenāsanattā. Ekekaṃ pariveṇanti ekekassa
tika-vin08t:1307_5: bhikkhussa ekekaṃ pariveṇaṃ. Tatthāti tasmiṃ laddhapariveṇe. Dīghasālāti caṅkamanasālā.
tika-vin08t:1307_6: Maṇḍalamāḷoti upaṭṭhānasālā. Anudahatīti pīḷeti. Adātuṃ na labhatīti iminā sañcicca
tika-vin08t:1307_7: adentassa paṭibāhane pavisanato dukkaṭanti dīpeti. Jambudīpe panāti ariyadese bhikkhū
tika-vin08t:1307_8: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Te kira tathā paññāpenti.
tika-vin08t:1308_0: 219. Na gocaragāmo ghaṭṭetabboti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāveti “na tattha manussā vattabbā”tiādinā.
tika-vin08t:1308_1: Vitakkaṃ chinditvāti “iminā nīhārena gacchantaṃ disvā nivāretvā paccaye dassantī”ti
tika-vin08t:1308_2: evarūpaṃ vitakkaṃ anuppādetvā. Tesu ce ekoti tesu manussesu eko paṇḍitapuriso. Bhaṇḍapaṭicchādananti
tika-vin08t:1308_3: paṭicchādanabhaṇḍaṃ, sarīrapaṭicchādanaṃ cīvaranti attho. Suddhacittattāva anavajjanti
tika-vin08t:1308_4: idaṃ pucchitakkhaṇe kāraṇācikkhaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ na hoti asuddhacittassapi pucchitapañhavissajjane
tika-vin08t:1308_5: dosābhāvā. Evaṃ pana gate maṃ pucchissantīti saññāya agamanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1309_1: cetiyassa hammiyavedikāya ghaṭākārassa upari caturassavedikāya. Kattha pucchitabbanti
tika-vin08t:1309_2: pucchāya yato pakatiyā labbhati, tattha pucchitabbanti vissajjanā. Kasmā pucchitabbantiādi
tika-vin08t:1309_3: yato pakatiyā labbhati, tatthāpi pucchanassa kāraṇasandassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Paṭikkammāti
tika-vin08t:1309_4: vihārato apasakkitvā. Tamatthaṃ dassento “yojanadviyojanantare hotī”ti āha. Upanikkhepanti
tika-vin08t:1309_5: khettaṃ vā nāḷikerādiārāmaṃ vā kahāpaṇādīni vā ārāmikānaṃ niyyātetvā “ito uppannā
tika-vin08t:1309_6: vaḍḍhi vassāvāsikatthāya hotū”ti dinnaṃ. Vattaṃ katvāti tasmiṃ senāsane kattabbavattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1309_7: katvā. Iti saddhādeyyeti evaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena saddhāya dātabbe vassāvāsikalābhavisayeti attho.
tika-vin08t:1310_0: Vatthu panāti tatruppāde uppannarūpiyaṃ, tañca “tato catupaccayaṃ paribhuñjathā”ti
tika-vin08t:1310_3: saṅghassa hitāya. Puggalavaseneva kātabbanti parato vakkhamānanayena bhikkhū cīvarena
tika-vin08t:1310_4: kilamanti, ettakaṃ nāma taṇḍulabhāgaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cīvaraṃ kātuṃ ruccatītiādinā puggalaparāmāsavaseneva
tika-vin08t:1310_5: kātabbaṃ, “saṅgho cīvarena kilamatī”tiādinā pana saṅghaparāmāsavasena na kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1310_7: cā”ti vuttaṃ. Ca-kāro cettha panasaddatthe vattati, na samuccayattheti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1310_8: Puggalavaseneva kappiyabhaṇḍavasena ca apalokanappakāraṃ dassetuṃ “taṃ pana evaṃ
tika-vin08t:1311_0: Cīvarapaccayaṃ sallakkhetvāti saddhādeyyatatruppādavasena tasmiṃ vassāvāse labbhamānacīvarasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin08t:1311_2: mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Kasmā evaṃ vuttanti āha “evañhī”tiādi, senāsanaggāhāpakassa
tika-vin08t:1311_3: attanāva attano gahaṇaṃ asāruppaṃ, tasmā ubho aññamaññaṃ gāhessantīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:1311_4: Sammatasenāsanaggāhāpakassa āṇattiyā aññena gahitopi gāho ruhatiyevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1311_5: Aṭṭhapi soḷasapi jane sammannituṃ vaṭṭatīti visuṃ visuṃ sammannituṃ vaṭṭati, udāhu
tika-vin08t:1311_6: ekatoti? Ekatopi vaṭṭati. Ekakammavācāya sabbepi ekato sammannituṃ vaṭṭati. Niggahakammameva
tika-vin08t:1311_7: hi saṅgho saṅghassa na karoti. Sammutidānaṃ pana bahūnampi ekato kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Teneva
tika-vin08t:1311_8: sattasatikakkhandhake ubbāhikasammutiyaṃ aṭṭhapi janā ekato sammatāti. Āsanagharanti
tika-vin08t:1311_9: paṭimāgharaṃ. Maggoti upacārasīmabbhantaragate gāmābhimukhamagge katasālā vuccati,
tika-vin08t:1311_10: evaṃ pokkharaṇirukkhamūlādīsupi. Rukkhamūlādayo channā kavāṭabaddhāva senāsanaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1312_0: 220. Mahālābhapariveṇakathāyaṃ labhantīti tatra vāsino bhikkhū labhanti. Vijaṭetvāti
tika-vin08t:1312_1: ekekassa pahonakappamāṇena viyojetvā. Āvāsesūti senāsanesu. Pakkhipitvāti ettha pakkhipanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1312_2: nāma tesu vasantānaṃ ito uppannavassāvāsikadānaṃ. Pavisitabbanti aññehi bhikkhūhi
tika-vin08t:1312_3: tasmiṃ mahālābhe pariveṇe vasitvā cetiye vattaṃ katvāva lābho gahetabboti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:1313_0: 221. Paccayaṃ vissajjetīti cīvarapaccayaṃ nādhivāseti. Ayampīti tena vissajjitapaccayopi.
tika-vin08t:1313_1: Pādamūle ṭhapetvā sāṭakaṃ dentīti paccayadāyakā denti. Etena gahaṭṭhehi pādamūle
tika-vin08t:1313_2: ṭhapetvā dinnampi paṃsukūlikānampi vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Atha vassāvāsikaṃ demāti vadantīti
tika-vin08t:1313_3: ettha “paṃsukūlikānaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti ajjhāharitvā yojetabbaṃ. Vassaṃ vutthabhikkhūnanti
tika-vin08t:1313_4: paṃsukūlikato aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ. Upanibandhitvā gāhetabbanti “imasmiṃ rukkhe vā
tika-vin08t:1313_5: maṇḍape vā vasitvā cetiye vattaṃ katvā gaṇhathā”ti evaṃ upanibandhitvā gāhetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1314_0: Pāṭipadaaruṇatotiādi vassūpanāyikadivasaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Antarāmuttakaṃ pana pāṭipadaṃ
tika-vin08t:1314_1: atikkamitvāpi gāhetuṃ vaṭṭati. “Kattha nu kho vasissāmi, kattha vasantassa phāsu
tika-vin08t:1314_2: bhavissati, kattha vā paccaye labhissāmī”ti evaṃ uppannena vitakkena caratīti vitakkacāriko.
tika-vin08t:1314_3: Idāni yaṃ dāyakā pacchimavassaṃvutthānaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ deti, tattha paṭipajjanavidhiṃ
tika-vin08t:1314_4: dassetuṃ “pacchimavassūpanāyikadivase panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Āgantuko ce bhikkhūti
tika-vin08t:1314_5: cīvare gāhite pacchā āgato āgantuko bhikkhu. Pattaṭṭhāneti vassaggena āgantukabhikkhuno
tika-vin08t:1314_6: pattaṭṭhāne. Paṭhamavassūpagatāti āgantukassa āgamanato puretarameva pacchimikāya
tika-vin08t:1314_7: vassūpanāyikāya vassūpagatā. Laddhaṃ laddhanti punappunaṃ dāyakānaṃ santikā āgatāgatasāṭakaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1315_0: Sādiyantāpi hi teneva vassāvāsikassa sāminoti chinnavassattā vuttaṃ. Paṭhamameva
tika-vin08t:1315_1: katikāya katattā “neva adātuṃ labhantī”ti vuttaṃ, dātabbaṃ vārentānaṃ gīvā hotīti
tika-vin08t:1315_2: adhippāyo. Tesameva dātabbanti vassūpagatesu aladdhavassāvāsikānaṃ ekaccānameva dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1315_3: Bhatiniviṭṭhanti bhatiṃ katvā viya niviṭṭhaṃ pariyiṭṭhaṃ. Bhatiniviṭṭhanti vā pānīyupaṭṭhānādibhatiṃ
tika-vin08t:1315_4: katvā laddhaṃ. Saṅghikaṃ panātiādi kesañci vādadassanaṃ. Tattha saṅghikaṃ pana apalokanakammaṃ
tika-vin08t:1315_5: katvā gāhitanti tatruppādaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tattha apalokanakammaṃ katvā gāhitanti
tika-vin08t:1315_6: “chinnavassāvāsikañca idāni uppajjanakavassāvāsikañca imesaṃ dātuṃ ruccatī”ti anantare
tika-vin08t:1315_7: vuttanayena apalokanaṃ katvā gāhitaṃ saṅghena dinnattā vibbhantopi labhateva, pageva
tika-vin08t:1315_8: chinnavasso. Paccayavasena gāhitaṃ pana temāsaṃ vasitvā gahetuṃ attanā dāyakehi ca
tika-vin08t:1315_9: anumatattā bhatiniviṭṭhampi chinnavassopi vibbhantopi na labhatīti keci ācariyā vadanti.
tika-vin08t:1315_10: Idañca pacchā vuttattā pamāṇaṃ, teneva vassūpanāyikadivase evaṃ dāyakehi dinnaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1315_11: gahitabhikkhuno vassacchedaṃ akatvā vāsova heṭṭhā vihito, na pānīyupaṭṭhānādibhatikaraṇamattaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1315_12: Yadi hi taṃ bhatiniviṭṭhameva siyā, bhatikaraṇameva vidhātabbaṃ, tasmā vassaggena
tika-vin08t:1316_0: “Idha, bhikkhave, vassaṃvuttho bhikkhu vibbhamati, saṅghasseva ta”nti vacanato “vataṭṭhāne…pe…
tika-vin08t:1316_1: saṅghikaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Saṅghikaṃ hotīti etena vutthavassānampi vassāvāsikabhāgo
tika-vin08t:1316_2: saṅghikato amocito tesaṃ vibbhamena saṅghiko hotīti dasseti. Manusseti dāyakamanusse.
tika-vin08t:1316_3: Labhatīti “mama pattabhāvaṃ etassa dethā”ti dāyake sampaṭicchāpenteneva saṅghikato
tika-vin08t:1316_4: viyojitaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ. Varabhāgaṃ sāmaṇerassāti tassa paṭhamagāhattā, therena pubbe
tika-vin08t:1316_5: paṭhamabhāgassa gahitattā, idāni gayhamānassa dutiyabhāgattā ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1317_1: pubbe vuttasenāsanaggāhadvayato aññopīti attho. Nanu ca “ayaṃ senāsanaggāho nāma
tika-vin08t:1317_2: duvidho hoti utukāle ca vassāvāse cā”ti vutto, atha kasmā “ayamaparopī”tyādi vuttoti
tika-vin08t:1317_3: codanaṃ sandhāyāha “divasavasena hī”tiādi. Aparajjugatāya āsāḷhiyāti paṭhamavassūpanāyikadivasabhūtaṃ
tika-vin08t:1317_4: āsāḷhipuṇṇamiyā pāṭipadaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, māsagatāya āsāḷhiyāti dutiyavassūpanāyikadivasabhūtasāvaṇapuṇṇamiyā
tika-vin08t:1318_0: 223. Utukāle paṭibāhituṃ na labhatīti hemantagimhesu aññe sampattabhikkhū paṭibāhituṃ
tika-vin08t:1318_1: na labhati. Navakammanti navakammasammuti. Akatanti aparisaṅkhataṃ. Vippakatanti
tika-vin08t:1318_2: aniṭṭhitaṃ. Ekaṃ mañcaṭṭhānaṃ datvāti ekaṃ mañcaṭṭhānaṃ puggalikaṃ datvā. Tibhāganti
tika-vin08t:1318_3: tatiyabhāgaṃ. Evaṃ vissajjanampi thāvarena thāvaraṃ parivattanaṭṭhāneyeva pavisati,
tika-vin08t:1318_4: na itarathā sabbasenāsanavissajjanato. Sace saddhivihārikādīnaṃ dātukāmo hotīti sace
tika-vin08t:1318_5: so saṅghassa bhaṇḍaṭhapanaṭṭhānaṃ vā aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vā dātuṃ na
tika-vin08t:1318_6: icchati, attano saddhivihārikādīnaññeva dātukāmo hoti, tādisassa “tuyhaṃ puggalikameva
tika-vin08t:1318_7: katvā jaggāhī”ti na sabbaṃ dātabbanti adhippāyo. Tatthassa kattabbavidhiṃ dassento
tika-vin08t:1318_8: āha “kamma”ntiādi. Evañhītiādimhi cayānurūpaṃ tatiyabhāge vā upaḍḍhabhāge vā gahite
tika-vin08t:1318_9: taṃ bhāgaṃ dātuṃ labhatīti attho. Yenāti tesu dvīsu tīsu bhikkhūsu yena. So sāmīti
tika-vin08t:1318_10: tassā bhūmiyā vihārakaraṇe sova sāmī, taṃ paṭibāhitvā itarena na kātabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:1319_0: 224. Akataṭṭhāneti senāsanato bahi cayādīnaṃ akataṭṭhāne. Cayaṃ vā pamukhaṃ vāti
tika-vin08t:1319_1: saṅghikasenāsanaṃ nissāya tato bahi bandhitvā ekaṃ senāsanaṃ vā. Bahikuṭṭeti kuṭṭato
tika-vin08t:1319_2: bahi, attano kataṭṭhāneti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin08t:1322_1: vā apalokanakammena vā sammatena appamattakavissajjakasammutiladdhena. Avibhattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1322_2: saṅghikabhaṇḍanti pucchitabbakiccaṃ natthīti ettha avibhattaṃ saṅghikabhaṇḍanti kukkuccuppattiākāradassanaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1322_3: evaṃ kukkuccaṃ katvā pucchitabbakiccaṃ natthi, apucchitvāva dātabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:1322_4: Kasmāti ce? Ettakassa saṅghikabhaṇḍassa vissajjanatthāyeva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā
tika-vin08t:1322_5: katasammutikammattā. Guḷapiṇḍe…pe… dātabboti ettha guḷapiṇḍaṃ tālapakkappamāṇanti
tika-vin08t:1322_6: veditabbaṃ. Piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassapīti idaṃ upalakkhaṇamattaṃ. Aññena kāraṇena bahisīmagatassapi
tika-vin08t:1322_8: ṭhitassāti anādare sāmivacanaṃ, antoupacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhitasseva gāhetuṃ vaṭṭati, na
tika-vin08t:1322_9: bahiupacārasīmaṃ pattassāti attho. Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “bahiupacārasīmāya ṭhitānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1322_10: gāhethāti vadanti, na gāhetabba”nti. Antogāmaṭṭhānampīti ettha pi-saddo avuttasampiṇḍanattho,
tika-vin08t:1322_11: antogāmaṭṭhānampi bahigāmaṭṭhānampi gāhetuṃ vaṭṭatīti attho. Sambhāvanattho vā, tena
tika-vin08t:1328: Idāni catupaccayantogadhattā vihārassa catupaccayabhājanakathānantaraṃ vihāravinicchayakathā ārabhīyate. Tatridaṃ vuccati –
tika-vin08t:1337_0: Tattha ko vihāroti catūsu paccayesu senāsanasaṅkhāto catūsu senāsanesu vihārasenāsanasaṅkhāto
tika-vin08t:1337_1: bhikkhūnaṃ nivāsabhūto patissayaviseso. Kenaṭṭhena vihāroti viharanti etthāti vihāro,
tika-vin08t:1337_2: iriyāpathadibbabrahmaariyasaṅkhātehi catūhi vihārehi ariyā ettha viharantītyattho.
tika-vin08t:1337_4: samantapāsādikāyaṃ “cātuddisaṃ saṅghaṃ uddissa bhikkhūnaṃ dinnaṃ vihāraṃ vā pariveṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:1337_5: vā āvāsaṃ vā mahantampi khuddakampi abhiyuñjato abhiyogo na ruhati, acchinditvā gaṇhitumpi
tika-vin08t:1337_6: na sakkoti. Kasmā? Sabbesaṃ dhuranikkhepābhāvato. Na hettha sabbe cātuddisā bhikkhū
tika-vin08t:1337_7: dhuranikkhepaṃ karontīti. Dīghabhāṇakādibhedassa pana gaṇassa, ekapuggalassa vā santakaṃ
tika-vin08t:1337_8: abhiyuñjitvā gaṇhanto sakkoti te dhuraṃ nikkhipāpetuṃ, tasmā tattha ārāme vuttanayeneva
tika-vin08t:1337_9: vinicchayo veditabbo”ti. Iminā dāyakasantako vihāro nāma natthīti dīpeti.
tika-vin08t:1338_0: Kena so dātabboti khattiyena vā brāhmaṇena vā yena kenaci so vihāro dātabbo. Kassa
tika-vin08t:1338_1: dātabboti saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā dātabbo. Kathaṃ dātabboti yadi saṅghassa
tika-vin08t:1338_2: deti, “imaṃ vihāraṃ āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa saṅghassa dammī”ti, yadi gaṇassa,
tika-vin08t:1338_3: “imaṃ vihāraṃ āyasmantānaṃ dammī”ti, yadi puggalassa, “imaṃ vihāraṃ āyasmato dammī”ti
tika-vin08t:1338_4: dātabbo. Ko tassa issaroti yadi saṅghassa deti, saṅgho tassa vihārassa issaro. Yadi
tika-vin08t:1338_5: gaṇassa deti, gaṇo tassa issaro. Yadi puggalassa deti, puggalo tassa issaroti. Tathā
tika-vin08t:1338_6: hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “dīghabhāṇakādikassa pana gaṇassa ekapuggalassa vā santaka”nti.
tika-vin08t:1339_0: Kena so gāhitoti senāsanaggāhāpakena so vihāro gāhito. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t:1339_1: bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgataṃ senāsanaggāhāpakaṃ sammannituṃ, yo na chandāgatiṃ
tika-vin08t:1339_2: gaccheyya, na dosāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na mohāgatiṃ gaccheyya, evañca, bhikkhave, sammannitabbo,
tika-vin08t:1339_3: paṭhamaṃ bhikkhu yācitabbo, yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo –
tika-vin08t:1340: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ senāsanaggāhāpakaṃ sammanneyya, esā ñatti.
tika-vin08t:1341_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ senāsanaggāhāpakaṃ sammannati.
tika-vin08t:1341_1: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno senāsanaggāhāpakassa sammuti, so tuṇhassa.
tika-vin08t:1342: “Sammato saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu senāsanaggāhāpako, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti.
tika-vin08t:1343_0: Kassa so gāhitoti bhikkhūnaṃ so vihāro gāhito. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t:1343_1: bhikkhave, paṭhamaṃ bhikkhū gaṇetuṃ, bhikkhū gaṇetvā seyyā gaṇetuṃ, seyyā gaṇetvā
tika-vin08t:1343_2: seyyaggena gāhetu”nti. Anuṭṭhāpaniyā katīti cattāro anuṭṭhāpanīyā vuḍḍhataro gilāno
tika-vin08t:1343_3: bhaṇḍāgāriko saṅghato laddhasenāsanoti. Vuttañhetaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ “vuḍḍho hi
tika-vin08t:1343_4: attano vuḍḍhatāya anuṭṭhāpanīyo, gilāno gilānatāya, saṅgho pana bhaṇḍāgārikassa vā
tika-vin08t:1343_6: dhuvavāsatthāya vihāraṃ sallakkhetvā sammannitvā deti, tasmā yassa saṅghena dinno,
tika-vin08t:1344_0: Katihaṅgehi yuttassa dhuvavāsāya dīyateti ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena dvīhi aṅgehi yuttassa
tika-vin08t:1344_1: dhuvavāsatthāya vihāro dīyate. Katamehi dvīhi? Bahūpakāratāya guṇavisiṭṭhatāya ceti.
tika-vin08t:1344_2: Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? “Bahūpakāratanti bhaṇḍāgārikatādibahuupakārabhāvaṃ, na kevalaṃ
tika-vin08t:1344_3: idamevāti āha ‘guṇavisiṭṭhatañcā’ti. Tena bahūpakārattepi guṇavisiṭṭhattābhāve guṇavisiṭṭhattepi
tika-vin08t:1344_4: bahūpakārattābhāve dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti dassetī”ti vinayatthamañjūsāyaṃ vacanato. Omakaparicchedena
tika-vin08t:1344_5: ekena aṅgena yuttassapi. Katamena ekena aṅgena? Bahūpakāratāya vā guṇavisiṭṭhatāya
tika-vin08t:1344_6: vā. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? “Bahūpakārataṃ guṇavisiṭṭhatañca sallakkhentoti bhaṇḍāgārikassa
tika-vin08t:1344_7: bahūpakārataṃ, dhammakathikādīnaṃ guṇavisiṭṭhatañca sallakkhento”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vacanato.
tika-vin08t:1345_0: Senāsanaggāho pana duvidho utukāle ca vassāvāse cāti kālavasena. Atha vā tayo senāsanaggāhā
tika-vin08t:1345_1: purimako pacchimako antarāmuttakoti. Tesaṃ viseso heṭṭhā vuttova. “Utukāle senāsanaggāho
tika-vin08t:1345_2: antarāmuttako ca taṅkhaṇapaṭisallāno cāti dubbidho. Vassāvāse senāsanaggāho purimako
tika-vin08t:1345_3: ca pacchimako cāti dubbidhoti cattāro senāsanaggāhā”ti ācariyā vadanti, taṃ vacanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1345_4: pāḷiyampi aṭṭhakathāyampi na āgataṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “tayome, bhikkhave, senāsanaggāhā
tika-vin08t:1345_5: purimako pacchimako antarāmuttako”icceva āgato, aṭṭhakathāyampi “tīsu senāsanaggāhesu
tika-vin08t:1345_6: purimako ca pacchimako cāti ime dve gāhā thāvarā, antarāmuttake ayaṃ vinicchayo”ti āgato.
tika-vin08t:1346_0: Idāni pana ekacce ācariyā “imasmiṃ kāle sabbe vihārā saṅghikāva, puggalikavihāro
tika-vin08t:1346_1: nāma natthi. Kasmā? Vihāradāyakānaṃ vihāradānakāle kulūpakā ‘imaṃ vihāraṃ āgatānāgatassa
tika-vin08t:1346_2: cātuddisassa saṅghassa demā’ti vacībhedaṃ kārāpenti, tasmā navavihārāpi saṅghikā
tika-vin08t:1346_3: eva. Ekaccesu vihāresu evaṃ avatvā dentesupi ‘tasmiṃ jīvante puggaliko hoti, mate
tika-vin08t:1346_4: saṅghikoyevā’ti vuttattā porāṇakavihārāpi saṅghikāva hontī”ti vadanti. Tatrevaṃ vicāretabbo
tika-vin08t:1346_5: – vacībhedaṃ kārāpetvā dinnavihāresupi dāyakā saṅghaṃ uddissa karontā nāma appakā,
tika-vin08t:1346_6: “imaṃ nāma bhikkhuṃ imaṃ nāma theraṃ vasāpessāmī”ti cintetvā puttadāramittāmaccādīhi
tika-vin08t:1346_7: sammantetvā patiṭṭhāpenti, patiṭṭhānakāle avadantāpi dānakāle yebhuyyena vadanti.
tika-vin08t:1346_8: Atha pana kulūpakā dānakāle sikkhāpetvā vadāpenti, evaṃ vadantāpi dāyakā appakā saṅghaṃ
tika-vin08t:1346_9: uddissa denti, bahutarā attano kulūpakameva uddissa denti. Evaṃ sante kulūpakānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1346_10: vacanaṃ navasu adhammikadānesu “puggalassa pariṇataṃ saṅghassa pariṇāmetī”ti vuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:1346_11: ekaṃ adhammikadānaṃ āpajjati. “Tasmiṃ jīvante puggaliko, mate saṅghiko”ti ayaṃ pāṭho
tika-vin08t:1346_12: mūlapuggalikavisaye na āgato, mūlasaṅghikavihāraṃ jaggāpetuṃ puggalikakārāpanaṭṭhāne
tika-vin08t:1346_13: āgato, tasmā navavihārāpi puggalaṃ uddissa dinnā santiyeva. Porāṇakavihārāpi mūle
tika-vin08t:1346_14: puggalikavasena dinnā saddhivihārikādīnaṃ puggalikavaseneva dīyamānāpi tasmiṃ jīvanteyeva
tika-vin08t:1346_15: vissāsavasena gayhamānāpi puggalikā hontiyeva, tasmā sabbaso puggalikavihārassa abhāvavādo vicāretabbova.
tika-vin08t:1347_0: Aññe pana ācariyā “imasmiṃ kāle saṅghikavihārā nāma na santi, sabbe puggalikāva.
tika-vin08t:1347_1: Kasmā? Navavihārāpi patiṭṭhāpanakāle dānakāle ca kulūpakabhikkhuṃyeva uddissa katattā
tika-vin08t:1347_2: puggalikāva, porāṇakavihārāpi sissānusissehi vā aññehi vā puggalehi eva pariggahitattā,
tika-vin08t:1347_3: na kadāci saṅghena pariggahitattā puggalikāva honti, na saṅghikā”ti vadanti. Tatrāpyevaṃ
tika-vin08t:1347_4: vicāretabbaṃ – navavihārepi patiṭṭhānakālepi dānakālepi ekacce saṅghaṃ uddissa karonti,
tika-vin08t:1347_5: ekacce puggalaṃ. Pubbeva puggalaṃ uddissa katepi atthakāmānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1347_6: sutvā puggalikadānato saṅghikadānameva mahapphalataranti saddahitvā saṅghike karontāpi
tika-vin08t:1347_7: dāyakā santi, puggalikavasena paṭiggahite porāṇakavihārepi keci bhikkhū maraṇakāle
tika-vin08t:1347_8: saṅghassa niyyātenti. Keci kassaci adatvā maranti, tadā so vihāro saṅghiko hoti.
tika-vin08t:1347_10: sāsanaṃ yāva tiṭṭhati, tāva mama vihāre vasitvā saṅgho cattāro paccaye paribhuñjatū”ti
tika-vin08t:1347_11: paṇidhāya cirakālaṃ saṅghassa paccayuppādakaraṃ gāmakhettādikaṃ “amhākaṃ vihārassa
tika-vin08t:1347_12: demā”ti denti, vihārassāti ca vihāre vasanakasaṅghassa uddissa denti, na kulūpakabhūtassa
tika-vin08t:1347_13: ekapuggalassa eva, tasmā yebhuyyena saṅghikā dissanti, pāsāṇesu akkharaṃ likhitvāpi
tika-vin08t:1348_0: Apare pana ācariyā “imasmiṃ kāle vihāradāyakasantakāva, tasmā dāyakāyeva vicāretuṃ
tika-vin08t:1348_1: issarā, na saṅgho, na puggalo. Vihāradāyake asantepi tassa puttadhītunattapanattādayo
tika-vin08t:1348_2: yāva kulaparamparā tassa vihārassa issarāva honti. Kasmāti ce? ‘Yena vihāro kārito,
tika-vin08t:1348_3: so vihārasāmiko’ti āgatattā ca ‘tassa vā kule yo koci āpucchitabbo’ti ca vacanato
tika-vin08t:1348_4: vihārassāmibhūto dāyako vā tassa vaṃse uppanno vā vicāretuṃ issaro. ‘Pacchinne kulavaṃse
tika-vin08t:1348_5: yo tassa janapadassa sāmiko, so acchinditvā puna deti cittalapabbate bhikkhunā nīhaṭaṃ
tika-vin08t:1348_6: udakavāhakaṃ aḷanāgarājamahesī viya, evampi vaṭṭatī’ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vacanato vihāradāyakassa
tika-vin08t:1348_7: kulavaṃse pacchinnepi tassa janapadassa issaro rājā vā rājamahāmatto vā yo koci issaro
tika-vin08t:1348_8: vā vihāraṃ vicāretuṃ yathājjhāsayaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, tampi aññe paṇḍitā nānujānanti.
tika-vin08t:1349_0: Kathaṃ? “Yena vihāro kārito, so vihārasāmiko”ti vacanaṃ pubbavohāravasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1349_1: na idāni issaravasena yathā jetavanaṃ, pattassāmikotyādi. Yathā hi jetassa rājakumārassa
tika-vin08t:1349_2: vanaṃ uyyānaṃ jetavananti viggahe kate yadipi anāthapiṇḍikena kiṇitvā vihārapatiṭṭhāpanakālato
tika-vin08t:1349_3: paṭṭhāya rājakumāro tassa uyyānassa issaro na hoti, tathāpi anāthapiṇḍikena kiṇitakālato
tika-vin08t:1349_4: pubbe issarabhūtapubbattā pubbavohāravasena sabbadāpi jetavanantveva voharīyati.
tika-vin08t:1349_5: Yathā ca pattassa sāmiko pattassāmikoti viggahe kate yadipi dāyakehi kiṇitvā bhikkhussa
tika-vin08t:1349_6: dinnakālato paṭṭhāya kammāro pattassa issaro na hoti, tathāpi dāyakena kiṇitakālato
tika-vin08t:1349_7: pubbe issarabhūtapubbattā pubbavohāravasena pattassāmikotveva voharīyati, evaṃ yadipi
tika-vin08t:1349_8: bhikkhussa dinnakālato paṭṭhāya dāyako vihārassa issaro na hoti vatthupariccāgalakkhaṇattā
tika-vin08t:1349_9: dānassa, tathāpi dānakālato pubbe issarabhūtapubbattā pubbavohāravasena vihārassāmikotveva
tika-vin08t:1349_10: voharīyati, na mukhyato issarabhāvatoti viññāyati, tasmā saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā
tika-vin08t:1349_11: puggalassa vā dinnakālato paṭṭhāya saṅghādayo paṭiggāhakā eva vicāretuṃ issarā, na dāyako.
tika-vin08t:1350_0: Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? Santesupi anāthapiṇḍikādīsu vihāradāyakesu “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:1350_1: pañcahaṅgehi samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ senāsanaggāhāpakaṃ sammannitu”ntiādinā saṅghena
tika-vin08t:1350_2: sammataṃ senāsanaggāhāpakaṃ anujānitvā, “anujānāmi, bhikkhave…pe… seyyaggena gāhetu”ntiādinā
tika-vin08t:1350_3: senāsanaggāhāpakasseva vicāretuṃ issarabhāvassa vacanato ca “dve bhikkhū saṅghikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1350_4: bhūmiṃ gahetvā sodhetvā saṅghikaṃ senāsanaṃ karonti, yena sā bhūmi paṭhamaṃ gahitā,
tika-vin08t:1350_5: so sāmī”ti ca “ubhopi puggalikaṃ karonti, soyeva sāmī”ti ca “yo pana saṅghikaṃ vallimattampi
tika-vin08t:1350_6: aggahetvā āharimena upakaraṇena saṅghikāya bhūmiyā puggalikavihāraṃ kāreti, upaḍḍhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1350_7: saṅghikaṃ upaḍḍhaṃ puggalika”nti ca saṅghapuggalānaṃyeva sāmibhāvassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1351_0: “Tassa vā kule yo koci āpucchitabbo”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanampi tesaṃ vihārassa issarabhāvadīpakaṃ
tika-vin08t:1351_1: na hoti, atha kho gamiko bhikkhu disaṃ gantukāmo vihāre āpucchitabbabhikkhusāmaṇeraārāmikesu
tika-vin08t:1351_2: asantesu te āpucchitvā gantabbabhāvameva dīpeti. Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “imaṃ
tika-vin08t:1351_3: pana dasavidhampi seyyaṃ saṅghike vihāre santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā pakkamantena
tika-vin08t:1351_4: āpucchitvā pakkamitabbaṃ, āpucchantena ca bhikkhumhi sati bhikkhu āpucchitabbo…pe…
tika-vin08t:1351_5: tasmiṃ asati ārāmiko, tasmimpi asati yena vihāro kārito, so vihārassāmiko, tassa
tika-vin08t:1351_6: vā kule yo koci āpucchitabbo”ti. Evaṃ ārāmikassapi āpucchitabbato olokanatthāya vattasīseneva
tika-vin08t:1351_7: āpucchitabbo, na tesaṃ saṅghikasenāsanassa issarabhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1352_1: khettavatthutaḷākādīnaṃ akappiyattā bhikkhūhi pariccattānaṃ kappiyakaraṇatthāya rājādīhi
tika-vin08t:1352_2: gahetvā puna tesaṃyeva bhikkhūnaṃ dānameva dīpeti, na tesaṃ rājādīnaṃ tehi bhikkhūhi
tika-vin08t:1352_4: siyuṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ parivāre “nava adhammikāni dānāni saṅghassa pariṇataṃ aññasaṅghassa
tika-vin08t:1352_5: vā cetiyassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti, cetiyassa pariṇataṃ aññacetiyassa vā saṅghassa
tika-vin08t:1352_6: vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti, puggalassa pariṇataṃ aññapuggalassa vā saṅghassa vā
tika-vin08t:1352_7: cetiyassa vā pariṇāmetī”ti. Aṭṭhakathāyañca “nava adhammikāni dānānīti…pe… evaṃ vuttāni.
tika-vin08t:1352_8: Nava paṭiggahaparibhogāti etesaṃyeva dānānaṃ paṭiggahā ca paribhogā cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1352_9: Tasmā yadi rājādayo issarāti gahetvā aññassa deyyuṃ, tampi dānaṃ adhammikadānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t:1352_10: taṃ dānaṃ paṭiggahā ca adhammikapaṭiggahā honti, taṃ dānaṃ paribhuñjantā ca adhammikaparibhogā hontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1353_0: Athāpi evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “vihāradānaṃ saṅghassa, aggaṃ buddhena vaṇṇitantiādīsu ‘saṅghassā’ti
tika-vin08t:1353_1: ayaṃ saddo ‘dāna’nti ettha sāmisambandho na hoti, atha kho sampadānameva, ‘dāyakassā’ti
tika-vin08t:1353_2: pana sāmisambandho ajjhāharitabbo, tasmā sāmibhūto dāyakova issaro, na sampadānabhūto
tika-vin08t:1353_3: saṅgho”ti. Te evaṃ vattabbā – “vihāradānaṃ saṅghassā”ti idaṃ dānasamaye pavattavasena
tika-vin08t:1353_4: vuttaṃ, na dinnasamaye pavattavasena. Dānakāle hi dāyako attano vatthubhūtaṃ vihāraṃ
tika-vin08t:1353_5: saṅghassa pariccajitvā deti, tasmā tasmiṃ samaye dāyako sāmī hoti, saṅgho sampadānaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1353_6: dinnakāle pana saṅghova sāmī hoti vihārassa paṭiggahitattā, na dāyako pariccattattā,
tika-vin08t:1353_7: tasmā saṅgho vicāretuṃ issaro. Tenāha bhagavā “pariccattaṃ taṃ, bhikkhave, dāyakehī”ti.
tika-vin08t:1353_8: Idaṃ pana saddalakkhaṇagarukā saddahissantīti vuttaṃ, atthato pana cīvarādīnaṃ catunnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1353_9: paccayānaṃ dānakāleyeva dāyakasantakabhāvo dinnakālato paṭṭhāya paṭiggāhakasantakabhāvo
tika-vin08t:1353_10: sabbesaṃ pākaṭo, tasmā idampi vacanaṃ dāyakasantakabhāvasādhakaṃ na hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1354_0: Evaṃ hotu, tathāpi “sace bhikkhūhi pariccattabhāvaṃ ñatvā sāmiko vā tassa puttadhītaro
tika-vin08t:1354_1: vā añño vā koci vaṃse uppanno puna kappiyavohārena deti, vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1354_2: vuttattā vihārassāmikabhūtadāyakassa vā tassa puttadhītādīnaṃ vaṃse uppannānaṃ vā
tika-vin08t:1354_3: dātuṃ issarabhāvo siddhoyevāti. Na siddho. Kasmāti ce? Nanu vuttaṃ “bhikkhūhi pariccattabhāvaṃ
tika-vin08t:1354_4: ñatvā”ti, tasmā akappiyattā bhikkhūhi pariccattameva kappiyakaraṇatthāya dāyakādīhi
tika-vin08t:1354_5: puna kappiyavohārena deti, vaṭṭati. Yathā appaṭiggahitattā bhikkhūhi aparibhuttameva
tika-vin08t:1354_7: na paribhuttaṃ, yathā ca bījagāmapariyāpannaṃyeva bhikkhusantakaṃ bījagāmabhūtagāmabhāvato
tika-vin08t:1354_8: parimocanatthaṃ kappiyakārakādayo kappiyaṃ karonti, na apariyāpannaṃ, evaṃ akappiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1354_9: bhikkhūhi pariccattaṃyeva taḷākādikaṃ kappiyakaraṇatthaṃ dāyakādayo puna denti, na
tika-vin08t:1354_10: apariccattaṃ, tasmā idampi vacanaṃ kappiyakaraṇattaṃyeva sādheti, na issarattanti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t:1355_0: Tathāpi evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “jātibhūmiyaṃ jātibhūmikā upāsakā āyasmantaṃ dhammikattheraṃ
tika-vin08t:1355_1: sattahi jātibhūmikavihārehi pabbājayiṃsūti vacanato dāyako vihārassa issaroti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t:1355_2: Issarattāyeva hi te theraṃ pabbājetuṃ sakkā, no anissarā”ti, na kho panevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1355_3: Kasmā? “Jātibhūmikā upāsakā”icceva hi vuttaṃ, na “vihāradāyakā”ti, tasmā tasmiṃ dese
tika-vin08t:1355_4: vasantā bahavo upāsakā āyasmantaṃ dhammikattheraṃ ayuttacārittā sakalasattavihārato
tika-vin08t:1355_5: pabbājayiṃsu, na attano vihāradāyakabhāvena issarattā, tasmā idampi udāharaṇaṃ na
tika-vin08t:1355_6: issarabhāvadīpakaṃ, atha kho aparādhānurūpakaraṇabhāvadīpakanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ
tika-vin08t:1355_7: yadā dāyako vihāraṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā deti, tassa muñcacetanaṃ patvā dinnakālato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin08t:1355_8: so vā tassa vaṃse uppanno vā janapadassāmikarājādayo vā issarā bhavituṃ vā vicāretuṃ
tika-vin08t:1355_9: vā na labhanti, paṭiggāhakabhūto saṅgho vā gaṇo vā puggalo vā soyeva issaro bhavituṃ
tika-vin08t:1356_0: Tattha dāyakādīnaṃ issaro bhavituṃ alabhanabhāvo kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? “Vatthupariccāgalakkhaṇattā
tika-vin08t:1356_1: dānassa, pathavādivatthupariccāgena ca puna gahaṇassa ayuttattā”ti vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1356_2: vacanato “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yaṃ dīyamānaṃ patati, taṃ sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ,
tika-vin08t:1356_3: pariccattaṃ taṃ, bhikkhave, dāyakehī”ti bhagavatā vuttattā ca “pariccattaṃ taṃ, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:1356_4: dāyakehīti vacanena panettha parasantakābhāvo dīpito”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā ca
tika-vin08t:1356_5: viññāyati. Saṅghādīnaṃ issaro bhavituṃ labhanabhāvo kathaṃ ñātabboti ce? Saṅghiko
tika-vin08t:1356_6: nāma vihāro saṅghassa dinno hoti pariccatto, “puggalike puggalikasaññī aññassa puggalike
tika-vin08t:1356_7: āpatti dukkaṭassa, attano puggalike anāpattī”ti pācittiyapāḷiyaṃ āgamanato ca “antamaso
tika-vin08t:1356_8: caturaṅgulapādakaṃ gāmadārakehi paṃsvāgārakesu kīḷantehi katampi saṅghassa dinnato
tika-vin08t:1356_9: paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍaṃ hotī”ti samantapāsādikāyaṃ vacanato ca “abhiyogepi cettha cātuddisaṃ
tika-vin08t:1356_10: saṅghaṃ uddissa bhikkhūnaṃ dinnaṃ vihāraṃ vā pariveṇaṃ vā āvāsaṃ vā mahantampi khuddakampi
tika-vin08t:1356_11: abhiyuñjato abhiyogo na ruhati, acchinditvā gaṇhitumpi na sakkoti. Kasmā? Sabbesaṃ
tika-vin08t:1356_12: dhuranikkhepābhāvato. Na hettha sabbe cātuddisā bhikkhū dhuranikkhepaṃ karontīti.
tika-vin08t:1356_13: Dīghabhāṇakādibhedassa pana gaṇassa ekapuggalassa vā santakaṃ abhiyuñjitvā gaṇhanto
tika-vin08t:1356_14: sakkoti te dhuraṃ nikkhipāpetu”nti dutiyapārājikavaṇṇanāyaṃ vacanato ca viññāyati.
tika-vin08t:1357_0: Kathaṃ dāyakādīnaṃ vicāretuṃ alabhanabhāvo viññāyatīti ce? Santesupi veḷuvanavihārādidāyakesu
tika-vin08t:1357_1: tesaṃ vicāraṇaṃ ananujānitvā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin08t:1357_3: ca bhaṇḍanakārakesu kosambakabhikkhūsu sāvatthiṃ āgatesu anāthapiṇḍikena ca visākhāya
tika-vin08t:1357_4: mahāupāsikāya ca “kathāhaṃ, bhante, tesu bhikkhūsu paṭipajjāmī”ti evaṃ jetavanavihāradāyakapubbārāmavihāradāyakabhūtesu
tika-vin08t:1357_5: ārocitesupi tesaṃ senāsanavicāraṇaṃ avatvā āyasmatā sāriputtattherena “kathaṃ nu
tika-vin08t:1357_6: kho, bhante, tesu bhikkhūsu senāsane paṭipajjitabba”nti ārocite “tena hi, sāriputta,
tika-vin08t:1357_7: vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ dātabba”nti vatvā “sace pana, bhante, vivittaṃ na hoti, kathaṃ
tika-vin08t:1357_8: paṭipajjitabba”nti vutte “tena hi vivittaṃ katvāpi dātabbaṃ, na tvevāhaṃ, sāriputta,
tika-vin08t:1357_9: kenaci pariyāyena vuḍḍhatarassa bhikkhuno senāsanaṃ paṭibāhitabbanti vadāmi, yo paṭibāheyya,
tika-vin08t:1357_10: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti therasseva senāsanassa vicāraṇassa anuññātattā ca viññāyati.
tika-vin08t:1358_0: Kathaṃ pana saṅghādīnaṃ senāsanaṃ vicāretuṃ labhanabhāvo viññāyatīti? “Evañca, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:1358_1: sammannitabbo – paṭhamaṃ bhikkhu yācitabbo, yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo –
tika-vin08t:1359: Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho…pe… sammato saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu senāsanaggāhāpako, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmīti.
tika-vin08t:1360_0: Evaṃ saṅghena senāsanaggāhāpakaṃ sammannāpetvā puna tena saṅghasammatena senāsanaggāhāpakena
tika-vin08t:1360_1: senāsanaggāhakavidhānaṃ anujānituṃ anujānāmi, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṃ bhikkhū gaṇetuṃ,
tika-vin08t:1360_2: bhikkhū gaṇetvā seyyā gaṇetuṃ, seyyā gaṇetvā seyyaggena gāhetu”nti vacanato saṅghikasenāsanassa
tika-vin08t:1361_0: “Dīghabhāṇakādibhedassa pana gaṇassa ekapuggalassa vā dinnavihārādiṃ acchinditvā
tika-vin08t:1361_1: gaṇhante dhuranikkhepasambhavā pārājika”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgamanato ca “attano puggalike
tika-vin08t:1361_2: anāpattī”ti pāḷiyaṃ āgamanato ca “yasmiṃ pana vissāso ruhati, tassa santakaṃ attano
tika-vin08t:1361_3: puggalikamiva hotīti mahāpaccariādīsu vutta”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vacanato ca gaṇassa
tika-vin08t:1361_4: dinno gaṇasantakavihāro gaṇeneva vicārīyate, no dāyakādīhi. Puggalassa dinno puggalikavihāropi
tika-vin08t:1361_5: paṭiggāhakapuggaleneva vicārīyate, no dāyakādīhīti viññāyati. Evaṃ vinayapāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1361_6: aṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu ca vihārassa saṅghikagaṇasantakapuggalikavasena tividhasseva vacanato
tika-vin08t:1361_7: ca tesaṃyeva saṅghagaṇapuggalānaṃ vihāravicāraṇassa anuññātattā ca dāyakasantakassa
tika-vin08t:1361_8: vihārassa visuṃ avuttattā ca dāyakānaṃ vihāravicāraṇassa ananuññātattā ca saṅghādayo
tika-vin08t:1361_9: eva vihārassa issarā honti, teyeva ca vicāretuṃ labhantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1362_0: Evaṃ hotu, tesu paṭiggāhakabhūtesu saṅghagaṇapuggalesu so vihāro kassa santako hoti,
tika-vin08t:1362_1: kena ca vicāretabboti? Vuccate – saṅghikavihāre tāva “āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa
tika-vin08t:1362_2: saṅghassa dammī”ti dinnattā paṭiggāhakesu kālakatesupi tadañño cātuddisasaṅgho ca
tika-vin08t:1362_3: anāgatasaṅgho ca issaro, tassa santako, tena vicāretabbo. Gaṇasantake pana tasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:1362_4: gaṇe yāva ekopi atthi, tāva gaṇasantakova, tena avasiṭṭhena bhikkhunā vicāretabbo.
tika-vin08t:1362_5: Sabbesu kālakatesu yadi sakalagaṇo vā taṃgaṇapariyāpannaavasiṭṭhapuggalo vā jīvamānakāleyeva
tika-vin08t:1362_6: yassa kassaci dinno, yena ca vissāsaggāhavasena gahito, so issaro. Sacepi sakalagaṇo
tika-vin08t:1362_7: jīvamānakāleyeva aññagaṇassa vā saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā deti, te aññagaṇasaṅghapuggalā
tika-vin08t:1362_8: issarā honti. Puggalikavihāre pana so vihārassāmiko attano jīvamānakāleyeva saṅghassa
tika-vin08t:1362_9: vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā deti, te issarā honti. Yo vā pana tassa jīvamānasseva
tika-vin08t:1362_10: vissāsaggāhavasena gaṇhāti, sova issaro hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t:1363_0: Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? Saṅghike vihārassa garubhaṇḍattā avissajjiyaṃ avebhaṅgikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1363_1: hoti, na kassaci dātabbaṃ. Gaṇasantakapuggalikesu pana tesaṃ sāmikattā dānavissāsaggāhā
tika-vin08t:1363_2: ruhanti, “tasmā so jīvamānoyeva sabbaṃ attano parikkhāraṃ nissajjitvā kassaci adāsi,
tika-vin08t:1363_3: koci vā vissāsaṃ aggahesi. Yassa dinnaṃ, yena ca gahitaṃ, tasseva hotī”ti ca “dvinnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1363_4: santakaṃ hoti avibhattaṃ, ekasmiṃ kālakate itaro sāmī, bahūnampi santake eseva nayo”ti
tika-vin08t:1364_0: Evaṃ pana vissajjetvā adinnaṃ “mamaccayena asukassa hotū”ti dānaṃ accayadānattā na
tika-vin08t:1364_1: ruhati. Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sace hi pañcasu sahadhammikesu yo koci kālaṃ karonto
tika-vin08t:1364_2: ‘mamaccayena mayhaṃ parikkhāro upajjhāyassa hotu, ācariyassa hotu, saddhivihārikassa
tika-vin08t:1364_3: hotu, antevāsikassa hotu, mātu hotu, pitu hotu, aññassa vā kassaci hotū’ti vadati,
tika-vin08t:1364_4: tesaṃ na hoti, saṅghasseva hoti. Na hi pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ accayadānaṃ ruhati,
tika-vin08t:1364_5: gihīnaṃ pana ruhatī”ti. Ettha ca ekacce pana vinayadharā “gihīnanti padaṃ sampadānanti
tika-vin08t:1364_6: gahetvā bhikkhūnaṃ santakaṃ accayadānavasena gihīnaṃ dadante ruhati, pañcannaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:1364_7: sahadhammikānaṃ dento na ruhatī”ti vadanti. Evaṃ sante mātāpitūnaṃ dadantopi ruheyya
tika-vin08t:1364_8: tesaṃ gihibhūtattā. “Atha ca pana ‘mātu hotu, pitu hotu, aññassa vā kassaci hotū’ti
tika-vin08t:1364_9: vadati, tesaṃ na hotī”ti vacanato na ruhatīti viññāyati, tasmā “gihīnaṃ panā”ti idaṃ
tika-vin08t:1364_10: na sampadānavacanaṃ, atha kho sāmivacanamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tena gihīnaṃ pana santakaṃ
tika-vin08t:1365_0: Kiñca bhiyyo – “sace hi pañcasu sahadhammikesu yo koci kālaṃ karonto mamaccayena
tika-vin08t:1365_1: mayhaṃ parikkhāro”ti ārabhitvā “na hi pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ accayadānaṃ ruhati,
tika-vin08t:1365_2: gihīnaṃ pana ruhatī”ti vuttattā sāmyatthe chaṭṭhībahuvacanaṃ samatthitaṃ bhavati.
tika-vin08t:1365_3: Yadi evaṃ “gihīna”nti padassa asampadānatte sati katamaṃ sampadānaṃ hotīti? “Yassa
tika-vin08t:1365_4: kassacī”ti padaṃ. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “mātu hotu, pitu hotu, aññassa vā kassaci
tika-vin08t:1365_5: hotū”ti. Ayamattho ajjukavatthunā dīpetabbo. Evaṃ jīvamānakāleyeva datvā matesu vinicchayo
tika-vin08t:1365_6: amhehi ñāto, kassaci adatvā matesu vinicchayo kathaṃ ñātabboti? Tatthāpi saṅghike
tika-vin08t:1365_7: tāva heṭṭhā vuttanayena saṅghova issaro, gaṇasantake pana ekaccesu avasesā issarā,
tika-vin08t:1365_8: sabbesu matesu saṅghova issaro. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sabbesu matesu saṅghikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1365_9: hotī”ti. Puggalike pana vihārassa garubhaṇḍattā avissajjiyaṃ avebhaṅgikaṃ saṅghikameva hoti.
tika-vin08t:1366_0: Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? “Bhikkhussa, bhikkhave, kālakate saṅgho sāmī pattacīvare,
tika-vin08t:1366_1: apica gilānupaṭṭhākā bahūpakārā, anujānāmi, bhikkhave, saṅghena ticīvarañca pattañca
tika-vin08t:1366_2: gilānupaṭṭhākānaṃ dātuṃ. Yaṃ tattha lahubhaṇḍaṃ lahuparikkhāraṃ, taṃ sammukhībhūtena
tika-vin08t:1366_3: saṅghena bhājetuṃ. Yaṃ tattha garubhaṇḍaṃ garuparikkhāraṃ, taṃ āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa
tika-vin08t:1366_4: saṅghassa avissajjiyaṃ avebhaṅgika”nti tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena
tika-vin08t:1366_5: vuttattā viññāyati. Evampi “garubhaṇḍaṃ garuparikkhāraṃ”icceva bhagavatā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1366_6: na “vihāra”nti, tasmā kathaṃ vihārassa garubhaṇḍabhāvoti viññāyatīti? “Vihāro vihāravatthu,
tika-vin08t:1372_0: Iti dāyako vihāraṃ katvā kulūpakabhikkhussa deti, tassa muñcacetanuppattito pubbakāle
tika-vin08t:1372_1: dāyako vihārassāmiko hoti, dātuṃ vā vicāretuṃ vā issaro, muñcacetanuppattito paṭṭhāya
tika-vin08t:1372_2: paṭiggāhakabhikkhu sāmiko hoti, paribhuñjituṃ vā aññesaṃ dātuṃ vā issaro. So puggalo
tika-vin08t:1372_3: attano jīvamānakkhaṇeyeva saddhivihārikādīnaṃ nissajjitvā deti, tadā te saddhivihārikādayo
tika-vin08t:1372_4: sāmikā honti, paribhuñjituṃ vā aññassa vā dātuṃ issarā. Yadi pana kassaci adatvāva
tika-vin08t:1372_5: kālaṃ karoti, tadā saṅghova tassa vihārassa sāmiko hoti, na dāyako vā puggalo vā,
tika-vin08t:1372_6: saṅghānumatiyā eva puggalo paribhuñjituṃ labhati, na attano issaravatāyāti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t:1373_0: Evaṃ mūlatoyeva saṅghassa dinnattā saṅghikabhūtavihāro vā mūle gaṇapuggalānaṃ dinnattā
tika-vin08t:1373_1: gaṇasantakapuggalikabhūtopi tesaṃ gaṇapuggalānaṃ aññassa nissajjanavasena adatvā
tika-vin08t:1373_2: kālakatattā pacchā saṅghikabhāvaṃ pattavihāro vā saṅghena vicāretabbo hoti. Saṅghenapi
tika-vin08t:1373_3: bhagavato anumatiyā senāsanaggāhāpakaṃ sammannitvā gāhāpetabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ senāsanakkhandhake
tika-vin08t:1373_4: “atha kho bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi ‘kena nu kho senāsanaṃ gāhetabba’nti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1373_5: ārocesuṃ – ‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ senāsanaggāhāpakaṃ sammannitu’nti”ādi.
tika-vin08t:1374_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne “senāsanaggāho nāma vassakālavasena senāsanaggāho, utukālavasena senāsanaggāho,
tika-vin08t:1374_1: dhuvavāsavasena senāsanaggāhoti tividho hoti. Tesu vassakālavasena senāsanaggāho
tika-vin08t:1374_2: purimavassavasena senāsanaggāho, pacchimavassavasena senāsanaggāhoti duvidho. Utukālavasena
tika-vin08t:1374_4: duvidho”ti ācariyā vadanti, etaṃ pāḷiyā ca aṭṭhakathāya ca asamentaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin08t:1374_5: Pāḷiyañhi “atha kho bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi ‘kati nu kho senāsanaggāho’ti. Bhagavato
tika-vin08t:1374_6: etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – tayome, bhikkhave, senāsanaggāhā purimako pacchimako antarāmuttako.
tika-vin08t:1374_7: Aparajjugatāya āsāḷhiyā purimako gāhetabbo, māsagatāya āsāḷhiyā pacchimako gāhetabbo,
tika-vin08t:1374_8: aparajjugatāya pavāraṇāya āyatiṃ vassāvāsatthāya antarāmuttako gāhetabbo. Ime kho,
tika-vin08t:1374_9: bhikkhave, tayo senāsanaggāhā”ti evaṃ āgato, aṭṭhakathāyampi “tīsu senāsanaggāhesu
tika-vin08t:1374_10: purimako ca pacchimako cāti ime dve gāhā thāvarā. Antarāmuttake ayaṃ vinicchayo…pe…
tika-vin08t:1374_11: ayaṃ tāva antovasse vassūpanāyikādivasena pāḷiyaṃ āgatasenāsanaggāhakathā, ayaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:1374_12: senāsanaggāho nāma duvidho hoti utukāle ca vassāvāse cā”ti evaṃ āgato, tasmā saṅghena
tika-vin08t:1375_0: Senāsanaggāho nāma utukāle senāsanaggāho, vassāvāse senāsanaggāhoti duvidho. Tattha
tika-vin08t:1375_1: utukālo nāma hemantautugimhautuvasena aṭṭha māsā, tasmiṃ kāle bhikkhū aniyatāvāsā
tika-vin08t:1375_2: honti, tasmā ye yadā āgacchanti, tesaṃ tadā bhikkhū uṭṭhāpetvā senāsanaṃ dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1375_3: akālo nāma natthi. Ayaṃ utukāle senāsanaggāho nāma. Vassāvāse senāsanaggāho pana
tika-vin08t:1375_4: “purimako pacchimako antarāmuttako”ti pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayena tividho hoti. Antarāmuttakopi
tika-vin08t:1375_5: hi āyatiṃ vassāvāsatthāya gāhitattā vassāvāse senāsanaggāhameva pavisati, na utukāle
tika-vin08t:1375_6: senāsanaggāho. Vuttañhi bhagavatā “aparajjugatāya pavāraṇāya āyatiṃ vassāvāsatthāya
tika-vin08t:1375_7: antarāmuttako gāhetabbo”ti. Taṅkhaṇapaṭisallānavasena senāsanaggāhoti ca neva pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1375_8: na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ visuṃ āgato, utukāle senāsanaggāhoyeva tadaṅgasenāsanaggāhotipi
tika-vin08t:1375_9: taṅkhaṇapaṭisallānavasena senāsanaggāhotipi vadanti, tasmā utukālavasena senāsanaggāhopi
tika-vin08t:1375_10: “antarāmuttakavasena senāsanaggāho taṅkhaṇapaṭisallānavasena senāsanaggāhoti dubbidho”ti na vattabbo.
tika-vin08t:1376_0: Athāpi vadanti “yathāvuttesu pañcasu senāsanaggāhesu cattāro senāsanaggāhā pañcaṅgasamannāgatena
tika-vin08t:1376_2: bhikkhūnaṃ yathāvinayaṃ vicāretabbā honti, te pana vicāraṇā yāvajjakālā thāvarā hutvā
tika-vin08t:1376_3: na tiṭṭhanti, dhuvavāsavasena vicāraṇameva yāvajjakālā thāvaraṃ hutvā tiṭṭhatī”ti,
tika-vin08t:1376_4: tampi tathā na sakkā vattuṃ. Kasmā? Senāsanaggāhāpakabhede “dhuvavāsavasena senāsanaggāho”ti
tika-vin08t:1376_5: pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca natthi. Dhuvavāsavasena vicāraṇañca sammutiladdhena senāsanaggāhāpakena
tika-vin08t:1376_6: vicāretabbaṃ na hoti, atha kho samaggena saṅghena apalokanakammavasena duvaṅgasamannāgatassa
tika-vin08t:1376_7: bhikkhussa anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ katvā dānameva, tasmā samaggo saṅgho bahūpakāratāguṇavisiṭṭhatāsaṅkhātehi
tika-vin08t:1376_8: dvīhi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ apalokanakammavasena sammannitvā tassa phāsukaṃ
tika-vin08t:1376_9: āvāsaṃ dhuvavāsavasena anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ katvā deti, taṃ yāvajjakālā thāvaraṃ hutvā
tika-vin08t:1377_0: Samaggo saṅghova dhuvavāsavasena deti, na senāsanaggāhāpakoti ayamattho kathaṃ ñātabboti
tika-vin08t:1377_1: ce? “Saṅgho pana bhaṇḍāgārikassa vā dhammakathikavinayadharādīnaṃ vā gaṇavācakaācariyassa
tika-vin08t:1377_2: vā bahūpakārataṃ guṇavisiṭṭhatañca sallakkhento dhuvavāsatthāya vihāraṃ sammannitvā
tika-vin08t:1377_3: detī”ti “saṅgho pana bahussutassa uddesaparipucchādīhi bahūpakārassa bhāranitthārakassa
tika-vin08t:1377_4: phāsukaṃ āvāsaṃ anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ katvā detī”ti ca “saṅgho pana bhaṇḍāgārikassa vā dhammakathikavinayadharagaṇavācakācariyānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1377_5: vā bahūpakārataṃ guṇavisiṭṭhatañca sallakkhetvā dhuvavāsatthāya vihāraṃ sallakkhetvā
tika-vin08t:1377_6: sammannitvā detī”ti ca “bahussutassa saṅghabhāranitthārakassa bhikkhuno anuṭṭhāpanīyasenāsanampī”ti
tika-vin08t:1377_7: ca “apalokanakammaṃ nāma sīmaṭṭhakaṃ saṅghaṃ sodhetvā chandārahānaṃ chandaṃ āharitvā
tika-vin08t:1377_8: samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā kattabbaṃ kamma”nti ca aṭṭhakathāsu
tika-vin08t:1378_0: Kathaṃ pana apalokanakammena dātabbabhāvo viññāyatīti? “Bahussutassa saṅghabhāranitthārakassa
tika-vin08t:1378_1: bhikkhuno anuṭṭhāpanīyasenāsanampi saṅghakiccaṃ karontānaṃ kappiyakārakādīnaṃ bhattavetanampi
tika-vin08t:1378_2: apalokanakammena dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti parivāraṭṭhakathāyaṃ kammavagge āgatattā viññāyati.
tika-vin08t:1378_3: Kathaṃ pana duvaṅgasamannāgatassa bhikkhunoyeva dātabbabhāvo viññāyatīti? “Bahūpakāratanti
tika-vin08t:1378_5: Tena bahūpakārattepi guṇavisiṭṭhattābhāve, guṇavisiṭṭhattepi bahūpakārattābhāve dātuṃ
tika-vin08t:1378_6: na vaṭṭatīti dassetī”ti vinayatthamañjūsāyaṃ vuttattā viññāyati.
tika-vin08t:1379_0: Kasmā pana senāsanaggāhāpakena vicāretabbo senāsanaggāho yāvajjakālā na tiṭṭhatīti?
tika-vin08t:1379_2: nānācariyakulasambhavānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ekasambhogaparibhogassa dukkarattā ca imehi
tika-vin08t:1379_3: dvīhi kāraṇehi na tiṭṭhati. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi
tika-vin08t:1379_4: samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ senāsanaggāhāpakaṃ sammannituṃ, yo na chandāgatiṃ gaccheyya,
tika-vin08t:1379_5: na dosāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na mohāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na bhayāgatiṃ gaccheyya, gahitāgahitañca
tika-vin08t:1379_6: jāneyyā”ti. Aṭṭhakathāyampi “evarūpena hi sabhāgapuggalena ekavihāre vā ekapariveṇe
tika-vin08t:1379_7: vā vasantena attho natthī”ti vuttaṃ. Kasmā pana dhuvavāsatthāya dānavicāro yāvajjakālā
tika-vin08t:1379_8: tiṭṭhatīti? Pañcaṅgasamannāgatābhāvepi sīmaṭṭhakassa samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā
tika-vin08t:1379_9: kattabbattā. Vuttañhi “apalokanakammaṃ nāma sīmaṭṭhakaṃ saṅghaṃ sodhetvā chandārahānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1379_10: chandaṃ āharitvā samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā kattabbaṃ kamma”nti.
tika-vin08t:1380_0: Utukāle saṅghikasenāsane vasantena āgato bhikkhu na paṭibāhetabbo aññatra anuṭṭhāpanīyā.
tika-vin08t:1380_1: Vuttañhi bhagavatā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vassānaṃ temāsaṃ paṭibāhituṃ, utukālaṃ
tika-vin08t:1380_2: pana na paṭibāhitu”nti. “Aññatra anuṭṭhāpanīyā”ti vuttaṃ, katame anuṭṭhāpanīyāti?
tika-vin08t:1380_3: Cattāro anuṭṭhāpanīyā vuḍḍhataro, bhaṇḍāgāriko, gilāno, saṅghato laddhasenāsano ca.
tika-vin08t:1380_4: Tattha vuḍḍhataro bhikkhu tasmiṃ vihāre antosīmaṭṭhakabhikkhūsu attanā vuḍḍhatarassa
tika-vin08t:1380_5: aññassa abhāvā yathāvuḍḍhaṃ kenaci anuṭṭhāpanīyo. Bhaṇḍāgāriko saṅghena sammannitvā
tika-vin08t:1380_6: bhaṇḍāgārassa dinnatāya saṅghassa bhaṇḍaṃ rakkhanto gopento vasati, tasmā so bhaṇḍāgāriko
tika-vin08t:1380_7: kenaci anuṭṭhāpanīyo. Gilāno gelaññābhibhūto attano laddhasenāsane vasanto kenaci
tika-vin08t:1380_8: anuṭṭhāpanīyo. Saṅghato laddhasenāsano samaggena saṅghena dinnasenāsanattā kenaci
tika-vin08t:1380_9: anuṭṭhāpanīyo. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “cattāro hi na vuṭṭhāpetabbā vuḍḍhataro, bhaṇḍāgāriko,
tika-vin08t:1380_10: gilāno, saṅghato laddhasenāsanoti. Tattha vuḍḍhataro attano vuḍḍhatāya navakatarena
tika-vin08t:1380_11: na vuṭṭhāpetabbo, bhaṇḍāgāriko saṅghena sammannitvā bhaṇḍāgārassa dinnatāya, gilāno
tika-vin08t:1380_12: attano gilānatāya, saṅgho pana bahussutassa uddesaparipucchādīhi bahūpakārassa bhāranitthārakassa
tika-vin08t:1380_13: phāsukaṃ āvāsaṃ anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ katvā deti, tasmā so upakārakatāya ca saṅghato laddhatāya
tika-vin08t:1380_14: ca na vuṭṭhāpetabbo”ti. Ṭhapetvā ime cattāro avasesā vuṭṭhāpanīyāva honti.
tika-vin08t:1381_0: Aparasmiṃ bhikkhumhi āgate vuṭṭhāpetvā senāsanaṃ dāpetabbaṃ. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1381_1: “utukāle tāva keci āgantukā bhikkhū purebhattaṃ āgacchanti, keci pacchābhattaṃ paṭhamayāmaṃ
tika-vin08t:1381_2: vā majjhimayāmaṃ vā pacchimayāmaṃ vā, ye yadā āgacchanti, tesaṃ tadāva bhikkhū uṭṭhāpetvā
tika-vin08t:1381_3: senāsanaṃ dātabbaṃ, akālo nāma natthī”ti. Etarahi pana saddhā pasannā manussā vihāraṃ
tika-vin08t:1381_4: katvā appekacce paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “saṅghe dinnaṃ mahapphala”nti ñatvā cātuddisaṃ
tika-vin08t:1381_5: saṅghaṃ ārabbha “imaṃ vihāraṃ āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa saṅghassa demā”ti vatvā
tika-vin08t:1381_6: denti, appekacce attanā pasannaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha vihāraṃ katvāpi dānakāle tena uyyojitā
tika-vin08t:1381_7: hutvā cātuddisaṃ saṅghaṃ ārabbha vuttanayena denti, appekacce karaṇakālepi dānakālepi
tika-vin08t:1381_8: attano kulūpakabhikkhumeva ārabbha pariccajanti, tathāpi dakkhiṇodakapātanakāle tena
tika-vin08t:1381_9: sikkhāpitā yathāvuttapāṭhaṃ vacībhedaṃ karonti, cittena pana kulūpakasseva denti,
tika-vin08t:1382_0: Imesu tīsu dānesu paṭhamaṃ pubbakālepi dānakālepi saṅghaṃ uddissa pavattattā sabbasaṅghikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1382_1: hoti. Dutiyaṃ pubbakāle puggalaṃ uddissa pavattamānampi dānakāle saṅghaṃ uddissa
tika-vin08t:1382_2: pavattattā saṅghikameva. Tatiyaṃ pana pubbakālepi dānakālepi kulūpakapuggalameva
tika-vin08t:1382_3: uddissa pavattati, na saṅghaṃ, kevalaṃ bhikkhunā vuttānusāreneva vacībhedaṃ karonti.
tika-vin08t:1382_4: Evaṃ sante “kiṃ ayaṃ vihāro cittavasena puggaliko hoti, vacībhedavasena saṅghiko”ti
tika-vin08t:1384: Manasā ce pasannena, bhāsati vā karoti vā;
tika-vin08t:1386: Vacanato cittavasena puggaliko hotī”ti. Aññe “yathā dāyakā vadanti, tathā paṭipajjitabbanti vacanato vacībhedavasena saṅghiko hotī”ti.
tika-vin08t:1387_0: Tatrāyaṃ vicāraṇā – idaṃ dānaṃ pubbe puggalassa pariṇataṃ pacchā saṅghassa pariṇāmitaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1387_1: tasmā “saṅghiko”ti vutte navasu adhammikadānesu “puggalassa pariṇataṃ saṅghassa pariṇāmetī”ti
tika-vin08t:1387_2: vuttaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ adhammikadānaṃ hoti, tassa dānassa paṭiggahāpi paribhogāpi adhammikapaṭiggahā
tika-vin08t:1387_3: adhammikaparibhogā honti. “Puggaliko”ti vutte tīsu dhammikadānesu “puggalassa dinnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1387_4: puggalasseva detī”ti vuttaṃ tatiyadhammikadānaṃ hoti, tassa paṭiggahāpi paribhogāpi
tika-vin08t:1387_5: dhammikapaṭiggahā dhammikaparibhogā honti, tasmā puggalikapakkhaṃ bhajati. Appekacce
tika-vin08t:1387_6: suttantikādigaṇe pasīditvā vihāraṃ kāretvā gaṇassa denti “imaṃ vihāraṃ āyasmantānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1387_7: dammī”ti. Appekacce puggale pasīditvā vihāraṃ katvā puggalassa denti “imaṃ vihāraṃ
tika-vin08t:1387_8: āyasmato dammī”ti. Ete pana gaṇasantakapuggalikā vihārā dānakālato paṭṭhāya paṭiggāhakasantakāva
tika-vin08t:1387_9: honti, na dāyakasantakā. Tesu gaṇasantako tāva ekaccesu matesu avasesānaṃ santako,
tika-vin08t:1387_10: tesu dharamānesuyeva kassaci denti, tassa santako. Kassaci adatvā sabbesu matesu
tika-vin08t:1387_11: saṅghiko hoti. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “dvinnaṃ santakaṃ hoti avibhattaṃ, ekasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:1387_12: kālakate itaro sāmī, bahūnaṃ santakepi eseva nayo. Sabbesu matesu saṅghikaṃva hotī”ti.
tika-vin08t:1388_0: Puggalikavihāropi yadi so paṭiggāhakapuggalo attano jīvamānakāleyeva saddhivihārikādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1388_1: deti, koci vā tassa vissāsena taṃ vihāraṃ aggahesi, tassa santako hoti. Kassaci adatvā
tika-vin08t:1388_2: kālakate saṅghiko hoti. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “so jīvamānoyeva sabbaṃ attano parikkhāraṃ
tika-vin08t:1388_3: nissajjitvā kassaci adāsi, koci vā vissāsaṃ aggahesi. Yassa dinno, yena ca gahito,
tika-vin08t:1388_4: tasseva hotī”ti. Pāḷiyañca “bhikkhussa, bhikkhave, kālakate saṅgho sāmī pattacīvare,
tika-vin08t:1388_5: apica gilānupaṭṭhākā bahūpakārā. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, saṅghena ticīvarañca pattañca
tika-vin08t:1388_6: gilānupaṭṭhākānaṃ dātuṃ, yaṃ tattha lahubhaṇḍaṃ lahuparikkhāraṃ, taṃ sammukhībhūtena
tika-vin08t:1388_7: saṅghena bhājetuṃ, yaṃ tattha garubhaṇḍaṃ garuparikkhāraṃ, taṃ āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa
tika-vin08t:1388_8: saṅghassa avissajjiyaṃ avebhaṅgika”nti vuttaṃ, tasmā iminā nayena vinicchayo kātabbo.
tika-vin08t:1389_0: Saṅghike pana pāḷiyaṃ āgatānaṃ “purimako pacchimako antarāmuttako cā”ti vuttānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1389_1: tiṇṇaṃ senāsanaggāhānañca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatānaṃ “utukāle ca vassāvāse cā”ti vuttānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1389_2: dvinnaṃ senāsanaggāhānañca etarahi asampajjanato anuṭṭhāpanīyapāḷiyaṃ āgatassa attano
tika-vin08t:1389_3: sabhāvena anuṭṭhāpanīyassa dhuvavāsatthāya saṅghena dinnatāya anuṭṭhāpanīyassa vaseneva
tika-vin08t:1389_4: vinicchayo hoti. Vuḍḍhataragilānā hi attano sabhāvena anuṭṭhāpanīyā honti. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-vin08t:1389_5: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vuḍḍhataro attano vuḍḍhatāya navakatarena na vuṭṭhāpetabbo, gilāno
tika-vin08t:1389_6: attano gilānatāyā”ti. Bhaṇḍāgārikadhammakathikādayo dhuvavāsatthāya saṅghena dinnatāya
tika-vin08t:1389_7: anuṭṭhāpanīyā honti. Vuttañhi “saṅgho pana bhaṇḍāgārikassa vā dhammakathikavinayadharādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1389_8: vā…pe… dhuvavāsatthāya vihāraṃ sammannitvā deti, tasmā yassa saṅghena dinno, sopi
tika-vin08t:1389_9: anuṭṭhāpanīyo”ti. So evaṃ veditabbo – etarahi saṅghikavihāresu saṅghattheresu yathākammaṅgatesu
tika-vin08t:1389_10: tasmiṃ vihāre yo bhikkhu vuḍḍhataro, sopi “ayaṃ vihāro mayā vasitabbo”ti vadati.
tika-vin08t:1389_11: Yo tattha byatto paṭibalo, sopi tatheva vadati. Yena so vihāro kārito, sopi “mayā
tika-vin08t:1389_12: pasīditapuggalo āropetabbo”ti vadati. Saṅghopi “mayameva issarā, tasmā amhehi icchitapuggalo
tika-vin08t:1389_13: āropetabbo”ti vadati. Evaṃdvidhā vā tidhā vā catudhā vā bhinnesu mahantaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t:1390_0: Tesu vuḍḍhataro “na tvevāhaṃ, bhikkhave, kenaci pariyāyena vuḍḍhatarassa āsanaṃ paṭibāhitabbanti
tika-vin08t:1390_1: vadāmi, yo paṭibāheyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti pāḷipāṭhañca, “vuḍḍhataro attano vuḍḍhatāya
tika-vin08t:1390_2: navakatarena na vuṭṭhāpetabbo”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanañca gahetvā “ahameva ettha vuḍḍhataro,
tika-vin08t:1390_3: mayā vuḍḍhataro añño natthi, tasmā ahameva imasmiṃ vihāre vasitumanucchaviko”ti saññī
tika-vin08t:1390_6: dasavassena vā atirekadasavassena vā upasampādetuṃ, nissayaṃ dātu”ntiādipāḷivacanañca
tika-vin08t:1390_7: gahetvā “ahameva ettha byatto paṭibalo, na mayā añño byattataro atthi, tasmā ahameva
tika-vin08t:1390_8: imassa vihārassa anucchaviko”ti saññī. Vihārakārakopi “yena vihāro kārito, so vihārasāmikoti
tika-vin08t:1390_9: vinayapāṭho atthi, mayā ca bahuṃ dhanaṃ cajitvā ayaṃ vihāro kārito, tasmā mayā pasannapuggalo
tika-vin08t:1390_10: āropetabbo, na añño”ti saññī. Saṅghopi “saṅghiko nāma vihāro saṅghassa dinno hoti
tika-vin08t:1390_12: kīḷantehi katampi saṅghassa dinnakālato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍaṃ hotī”tiādiaṭṭhakathāvacanañca
tika-vin08t:1390_13: gahetvā “ayaṃ vihāro saṅghiko saṅghasantako, tasmā amhehi abhirucitapuggalova āropetabbo, na añño”ti saññī.
tika-vin08t:1391_0: Tattha vuḍḍhatarassa vacanepi “na tvevāhaṃ, bhikkhave”tyādivacanaṃ tesu tesu āsanasālādīsu
tika-vin08t:1391_1: aggāsanassa vuḍḍhatarārahattā bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā nisinnopi bhikkhu vuḍḍhatare āgate
tika-vin08t:1391_2: vuṭṭhāya āsanaṃ dātabbaṃ sandhāya bhagavatā vuttaṃ, na dhuvavāsaṃ sandhāya. “Vuḍḍhataro
tika-vin08t:1391_3: attano vuḍḍhatāya”tyādivacanañca yathāvuḍḍhaṃ senāsane dīyamāne vuḍḍhatare āgate
tika-vin08t:1391_4: navakataro vuṭṭhāpetabbo, vuṭṭhāpetvā vuḍḍhatarassa senāsanaṃ dātabbaṃ, vuḍḍhataro
tika-vin08t:1391_5: pana navakatarena na vuṭṭhāpetabbo. Kasmā? “Attano vuḍḍhataratāyā”ti utukāle yathāvuḍḍhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1391_6: senāsanadānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na dhuvavāsatthāya dānaṃ sandhāya, tasmā idampi vacanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1392_1: saṅghikavihārassa issarabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, atha kho tassa bhikkhussa bahūpakārataṃ
tika-vin08t:1392_2: guṇavisiṭṭhatañca sallakkhetvā saṅghena phāsukaṃ āvāsaṃ anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ katvā dinne
tika-vin08t:1392_3: so bhikkhu kenaci tamhā vihārā anuṭṭhāpanīyo hoti, imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t:1392_4: bhikkhave”tyādivacanañca nissayācariyānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ pakāsetuṃ bhagavatā vuttaṃ, na
tika-vin08t:1392_5: saṅghikavihārassa issarattaṃ, tasmā idampi vacanaṃ upaparikkhitabbaṃ, na sīghaṃ anujānitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1393_0: Dāyakavacanaṃ pana nānujānitabbaṃ paṭibāhitabbaṃ. Kasmā? “Yena vihāro kārito”tyādipāṭhassa
tika-vin08t:1393_1: amukhyavohārattā. Yathā hi puthujjanakāle rūpādīsu sañjanassa bhūtapubbattā bhūtapubbagatiyā
tika-vin08t:1393_2: arahāpi “satto”ti, evaṃ dānakālato pubbe tassa vihārassa sāmibhūtapubbattā dāyako
tika-vin08t:1393_3: “vihārasāmiko”ti vuccati, na issarattā. Na hi sakale vinayapiṭake aṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu
tika-vin08t:1393_4: ca “vissajjetvā dinnassa vihārassa dāyako issaro”ti vā “dāyakena vicāretabbo”ti vā
tika-vin08t:1394_0: Saṅghassa vacanepi “saṅghiko nāma vihāro”tyādivacanaṃ saṅghasantakabhāvaṃ saṅghena
tika-vin08t:1394_1: vicāretabbabhāvaṃ dīpeti, saṅgho pana vicārento pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ senāsanaggāhāpakaṃ
tika-vin08t:1394_2: sammannitvā tena yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vicāretabbo vā hoti, samaggena saṅghena duvaṅgasamannāgatassa
tika-vin08t:1394_3: bhikkhuno apalokanakammena dhuvavāsatthāya dātabbo vā. Tesu pañcaṅgasamannāgatassa
tika-vin08t:1394_4: bhikkhuno dullabhattā senāsanaggāhāpakasammutiyā abhāve sati duvaṅgasamannāgato bhikkhu
tika-vin08t:1394_5: pariyesitabbo. Evaṃ pana apariyesitvā bhaṇḍāgārikatādibahaūpakāratāyuttassa bahussutatādiguṇavisiṭṭhatāvirahassa
tika-vin08t:1394_6: bhikkhuno āmisagarukatādivasena saṅghena vihāro dātabbo na hoti, tasmā saṅghavacanampi
tika-vin08t:1395_0: Atha tīṇipi vacanāni saṃsandetabbāni. Tattha saṅghassa issarattā saṅgho pucchitabbo
tika-vin08t:1395_1: “ko puggalo tumhehi abhirucito”ti, pucchitvā “eso”ti vutte “kasmā abhirucito”ti pucchitvā
tika-vin08t:1395_2: “eso puggalo amhe cīvarādipaccayehi anuggahetā, amhākaṃ ñātisālohito, upajjhāyo,
tika-vin08t:1395_3: ācariyo, saddhivihāriko, antevāsiko, samānupajjhāyako, samānācariyako, piyasahāyo,
tika-vin08t:1395_4: lābhī, yasassī, tasmā amhehi abhirucito”ti vutte “na ettāvatā dhuvavāsatthāya vihāro
tika-vin08t:1395_5: dātabbo”ti paṭikkhipitabbo. Atha “eso puggalo sabbehi amhehi vuḍḍhataro aggāsanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1395_6: aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍaṃ arahati, dhuvavāsatthāya vihāro pana tassa dātabboti aṭṭhakathācariyehi
tika-vin08t:1395_7: na vutto”ti vatvā paṭikkhipitabbo. Atha “dhammakathiko, vinayadharo, gaṇavācakaācariyo”ti
tika-vin08t:1395_8: vutte “eso dhuvavāsatthāya dinnavihārassa anucchaviko, etassa dātabbo”ti anumoditabbo.
tika-vin08t:1395_9: Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? “Saṅgho pana bhaṇḍāgārikassa vā dhammakathikavinayadharādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1395_10: vā gaṇavācakaācariyassa vā bahūpakārataṃ guṇavisiṭṭhatañca sallakkhento dhuvavāsatthāya
tika-vin08t:1396_0: Idha pana sādhakapāṭhe “bhaṇḍāgārikassa vā”ti vijjamāne kasmā sādhyavacane bhaṇḍāgāriko
