tika-vin08t:1396_1: na vuttoti? Etarahi bhaṇḍāgārassa abhāvā. Yadi kesuci vihāresu bhaṇḍāgāraṃ sammanneyya,
tika-vin08t:1396_2: so bhaṇḍāgāravihāre nisinno saṅghassa pattacīvararakkhaṇādikaṃ upakāraṃ kareyya,
tika-vin08t:1396_3: tassa bahūpakārataṃ sallakkhento saṅgho bhaṇḍāgārikassa phāsukaṃ āvāsaṃ etarahipi
tika-vin08t:1396_4: dhuvavāsatthāya dadeyya, so tassa visuṃ dhuvavāsavihāroti. Ettha sādhakapāṭhe “dhammakathikavinayadharādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1396_5: vā”tiādisaddena bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito byatto
tika-vin08t:1396_6: medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmoti vuttaguṇavante saṅgaṇhāti. Athāpi “eso puggalo
tika-vin08t:1396_7: bahussuto uddesaparipucchādīhi bhikkhūnaṃ bahūpakāro saṅghabhāranitthārako”ti vadati,
tika-vin08t:1396_8: “sādhu esopi phāsukāvāsassa araho, anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ katvā dhuvavāsatthāya vihāro etassapi
tika-vin08t:1396_9: dātabbo”ti vatvā anumoditabbo. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? “Saṅgho pana bahussutassa uddesaparipucchādīhi
tika-vin08t:1396_10: bahūpakārassa bhāranitthārakassa phāsukaṃ āvāsaṃ anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ katvā detī”ti vacanato viññāyati.
tika-vin08t:1397_0: Athāpi “ayaṃ puggalo dhammakathiko vinayadharo gaṇavācakācariyo saṅghassa bahūpakāro
tika-vin08t:1397_1: visiṭṭhaguṇayutto”ti vadati, “sādhu etassapi puggalassa dhuvavāsatthāya vihāraṃ sallakkhetvā
tika-vin08t:1397_2: sammannitvāva dātabbo”ti vatvā anumoditabbo. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? “Saṅgho pana
tika-vin08t:1397_3: bhaṇḍāgārikassa vā dhammakathikavinayadharādīnaṃ vā gaṇavācakācariyassa vā bahūpakārataṃ
tika-vin08t:1397_4: guṇavisiṭṭhatañca sallakkhetvā dhuvavāsatthāya vihāraṃ sammannitvā detī”ti vacanato viññāyati.
tika-vin08t:1398_0: Athāpi “eso puggalo bahussuto saṅghabhāranitthārako”ti vadati, “sādhu etassapi anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1398_1: katvā dātabbo”ti vatvā anumoditabbo. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? “Bahussutassa saṅghabhāranitthārakassa
tika-vin08t:1398_2: bhikkhuno anuṭṭhāpanīyasenāsanampī”ti parivāraṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā viññāyati. Tato
tika-vin08t:1398_3: “evaṃ duvaṅgasampanno puggalo antosīmaṭṭho vā bahisīmaṭṭho vā”ti pucchitvā “antosīmaṭṭho”ti
tika-vin08t:1398_4: vutte “sādhu suṭṭhu tassa dātabbo”ti sampaṭicchitabbaṃ. “Bahisīmaṭṭho”ti vutte “na
tika-vin08t:1398_5: dātabbo”ti paṭikkhipitabbaṃ. Kasmāti ce? “Na, bhikkhave, nissīme ṭhitassa senāsanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1398_6: gāhetabbaṃ, yo gāheyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanatoti.
tika-vin08t:1399_0: Atha “duvaṅgasamannāgate antosīmaṭṭhe asati ekaṅgasamannāgato antosīmaṭṭho atthī”ti
tika-vin08t:1399_1: pucchitvā “atthī”ti vutte “sādhu suṭṭhu etassa dātabbo”ti sampaṭicchitabbaṃ. Kathaṃ
tika-vin08t:1399_2: viññāyatīti ce? “Bahūpakārataṃ guṇavisiṭṭhatañca sallakkhentoti bhaṇḍāgārikassa bahūpakārataṃ
tika-vin08t:1399_4: āgatattā viññāyati. “Antosīmaṭṭho ekaṅgasamannāgatopi natthi, bahisīmaṭṭhova atthī”ti
tika-vin08t:1399_5: vutte “āgantvā antosīme ṭhitassa dātabbo”ti vattabbo. Kasmāti ce? “Asampattānampi
tika-vin08t:1399_6: upacārasīmaṃ paviṭṭhānaṃ antevāsikādīsu gaṇhantesu dātabbamevā”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vacanato viññāyati.
tika-vin08t:1400_0: Sace pana ekaṅgayuttabhāvena vā duvaṅgayuttabhāvena vā samānā dve tayo bhikkhū antosīmāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1400_1: vijjamānā bhaveyyuṃ, kassa dātabboti? Vaḍḍhatarassāti. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? “Na
tika-vin08t:1400_2: ca, bhikkhave, saṅghikaṃ yathāvuḍḍhaṃ paṭibāhitabbaṃ, yo paṭibāheyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin08t:1400_3: vacanatoti. Sace pana antosīmāyaṃ ekaṅgayutto vā duvaṅgayutto vā bhikkhu natthi,
tika-vin08t:1400_4: sabbeva āvāsikā bālā abyattā, evaṃ sati kassa dātabboti? Yo taṃ vihāraṃ āgacchati
tika-vin08t:1400_5: āgantuko bhikkhu, so ce lajjī hoti pesalo bahussuto sikkhākāmo, so tehi āvāsikehi
tika-vin08t:1400_6: bhikkhūhi aññattha agamanatthaṃ saṅgahaṃ katvā so āvāso dātabbo.
tika-vin08t:1401_0: Ayamattho kathaṃ jānitabboti ce? “Idha pana, bhikkhave, aññatarasmiṃ āvāse sambahulā
tika-vin08t:1401_1: bhikkhū viharanti bālā abyattā, te na jānanti uposathaṃ vā uposathakammaṃ vā pātimokkhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1401_2: vā pātimokkhuddesaṃ vā. Tattha añño bhikkhu āgacchati bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo
tika-vin08t:1401_3: vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito byatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo, tehi,
tika-vin08t:1401_4: bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi so bhikkhu saṅgahetabbo anuggahetabbo upalāpetabbo upaṭṭhāpetabbo
tika-vin08t:1401_5: cuṇṇena mattikāya dantakaṭṭhena mukhodakena. No ce saṅgaṇheyyuṃ anuggaṇheyyuṃ upalāpeyyuṃ
tika-vin08t:1401_6: upaṭṭhāpeyyuṃ cuṇṇena mattikāya dantakaṭṭhena mukhodakena, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti sammāsambuddhena
tika-vin08t:1401_7: paññattattā, aṭṭhakathāyañca “saṅgahetabboti ‘sādhu, bhante, āgatattha, idha bhikkhā
tika-vin08t:1401_8: sulabhā sūpabyañjanaṃ atthi, vasatha anukkaṇṭhamānā’ti evaṃ piyavacanena saṅgahetabbo,
tika-vin08t:1401_10: upalāpetabbo. Atha vā catūhi paccayehi saṅgahetabbo ceva anuggahetabbo ca, piyavacanena
tika-vin08t:1401_11: upalāpetabbo, kaṇṇasukhaṃ ālapitabboti attho, cuṇṇādīhi upaṭṭhāpetabbo. Āpatti dukkaṭassāti
tika-vin08t:1401_12: sace sakalopi saṅgho na karoti, sabbesaṃ dukkaṭaṃ. Idha neva therā, na daharā muccanti,
tika-vin08t:1401_13: sabbehi vārena upaṭṭhātabbo, attano vāre anupaṭṭhahantassa āpatti. Tena pana mahātherānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1401_14: pariveṇasammajjanadantakaṭṭhadānādīni na sāditabbāni. Evampi sati mahātherehi sāyaṃpātaṃ
tika-vin08t:1401_15: upaṭṭhānaṃ āgantabbaṃ. Tena pana tesaṃ āgamanaṃ ñatvā paṭhamataraṃ mahātherānaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1401_16: gantabbaṃ. Sacassa saddhiṃcarā bhikkhū upaṭṭhākā atthi, ‘mayhaṃ upaṭṭhākā atthi,
tika-vin08t:1401_17: tumhe appossukkā viharathā’ti vattabbaṃ. Athāpissa saddhiṃ carā natthi, tasmiṃyeva
tika-vin08t:1401_18: pana vihāre eko vā dve vā vattasampannā vadanti ‘mayhaṃ therassa kattabbaṃ karissāma,
tika-vin08t:1401_19: avasesā phāsu viharantū’ti, sabbesaṃ anāpattī”ti vuttattā. Evaṃ tādisaṃ bahisīmato
tika-vin08t:1401_21: phāsukaṃ āvāsaṃ anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ katvā dātabboti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t:1402_0: Nanu ca “na, bhikkhave, nissīme ṭhitassa senāsanaṃ gāhetabbaṃ, yo gāheyya, āpatti
tika-vin08t:1402_1: dukkaṭassā”ti bhagavatā vuttaṃ, atha kasmā nissīmato āgatassa dhuvavāsatthāya vihāro
tika-vin08t:1402_2: dātabboti? Vuccate – “nissīme ṭhitassā”ti idaṃ anādare sāmivacanaṃ, tasmā nissīme
tika-vin08t:1402_3: ṭhitaṃyeva senāsanaṃ na gāhetabbanti attho daṭṭhabbo, na nissīme ṭhitassa tassa bhikkhussa
tika-vin08t:1402_4: antosīmaṃ paviṭṭhassapi senāsanaṃ na gāhetabbanti attho, tasmā pubbe bahisīmāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1402_5: ṭhitepi idāni antosīmaṃ paviṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya catupaccayabhāgo labbhati. Vuttañhi
tika-vin08t:1402_6: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “asukavihāre kira bahuṃ cīvaraṃ uppannanti sutvā yojanantarikavihāratopi
tika-vin08t:1402_7: bhikkhū āgacchanti, sampattasampattānaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya dātabba”nti. Antosīmaṭṭhesu
tika-vin08t:1402_8: pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ asakkontesu yattha pātimokkhuddesako atthi, so āvāso gantabbo
tika-vin08t:1402_9: hoti. Antovassepi pātimokkhuddesakena vinā vassaṃ vasituṃ na labhati. Yattha pātimokkhuddesako
tika-vin08t:1402_10: atthi, tattha gantvā vassaṃ vasitabbaṃ, tasmā bahisīmato āgatopi lajjīpesalabahussutasikkhākāmabhikkhu
tika-vin08t:1403_0: “Idha pana, bhikkhave, aññatarasmiṃ āvāse tadahuposathe sambahulā bhikkhū viharanti
tika-vin08t:1403_1: bālā abyattā, te na jānanti uposathaṃ vā uposathakammaṃ vā pātimokkhaṃ vā pātimokkhuddesaṃ
tika-vin08t:1403_2: vā. Tehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi eko bhikkhu sāmantā āvāsā sajjukaṃ pāhetabbo ‘gacchāvuso
tika-vin08t:1403_3: saṃkhittena vā vitthārena vā pātimokkhaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā āgacchā’ti. Evañcetaṃ labhetha,
tika-vin08t:1403_4: iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce labhetha, tehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi sabbeheva yattha jānanti
tika-vin08t:1403_5: uposathaṃ vā uposathakammaṃ vā pātimokkhaṃ vā pātimokkhuddesaṃ vā, so āvāso gantabbo.
tika-vin08t:1403_6: No ce gaccheyyuṃ, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Idha pana, bhikkhave, aññatarasmiṃ āvāse sambahulā
tika-vin08t:1403_7: bhikkhū vassaṃ vasanti bālā abyattā, te na jānanti uposathaṃ vā uposathakammaṃ vā
tika-vin08t:1403_8: pātimokkhaṃ vā pātimokkhuddesaṃ vā. Tehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi eko bhikkhu sāmantā
tika-vin08t:1403_9: āvāsā sajjukaṃ pāhetabbo ‘gacchāvuso saṃkhittena vā vitthārena vā pātimokkhaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā
tika-vin08t:1403_10: āgacchā’ti. Evañcetaṃ labhetha, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce labhetha, eko bhikkhu sattāhakālikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1403_11: pāhetabbo ‘gacchāvuso saṃkhittena vā vitthārena vā pātimokkhaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā āgacchā’ti.
tika-vin08t:1403_12: Evañcetaṃ labhetha, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce labhetha, na, bhikkhave, tehi bhikkhūhi
tika-vin08t:1403_13: tasmiṃ āvāse vassaṃ vasitabbaṃ, vaseyyuṃ ce, āpatti dukkaṭassāti”.
tika-vin08t:1404_0: Evaṃ bahisīmato āgatassapi saṅghassa upakāraṃ kātuṃ sakkontassa visiṭṭhaguṇayuttassa
tika-vin08t:1404_1: dātabbabhāvo viññāyati, tasmā “amhākaṃ gaṇo na hoti, amhākaṃ vaṃso paveṇī na hoti,
tika-vin08t:1404_2: amhākaṃ sandiṭṭhasambhatto na hotī”tiādīni vatvā na paṭikkhipitabbo. Gaṇādibhāvo
tika-vin08t:1404_3: hi appamāṇaṃ, yathāvuttabahūpakāratādibhāvoyeva pamāṇaṃ. Sāmaggikaraṇato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin08t:1404_4: hi samānagaṇo hoti. Tathā hi ukkhittānuvattakānaṃ laddhinānāsaṃvāsakānampi laddhivissajjanena
tika-vin08t:1404_6: saṃvāso bhagavatā anuññāto. Alajjiṃ pana bahussutampi saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:1404_7: So hi alajjīparisaṃ vaḍḍhāpeti, lajjīparisaṃ hāpeti. Bhaṇḍanakārakaṃ pana vihāratopi
tika-vin08t:1404_9: labhati. So hi pakkhaṃ labhitvā saṅghampi bhindeyya. Alajjīādayo pana attano vasanaṭṭhānatoyeva
tika-vin08t:1404_10: nikkaḍḍhitabbā, sakalasaṅghārāmato nikkaḍḍhituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1405_0: Vuḍḍhāpacāyanādisāmaggirasarahitaṃ visabhāgapuggalampi saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ na labhati.
tika-vin08t:1405_1: Vuttañhi “evarūpena hi visabhāgapuggalena ekavihāre vā ekapariveṇe vā vasantena attho
tika-vin08t:1405_2: natthi, tasmā sabbatthevassa nivāso vārito”ti, tasmā āvāsiko vā hotu āgantuko vā,
tika-vin08t:1405_3: sagaṇo vā hotu aññagaṇo vā, bahussutasīlavantabhūto bhikkhu saṅgahetabbo. Vuttañhi bhagavatā –
tika-vin08t:1409: Ayaṃ antosīmaṭṭhena saṅghena bahūpakāratāguṇavisiṭṭhatāsaṅkhātehi guṇehi yuttassa saṅghabhāranitthārakassa bhikkhuno phāsukaṃ āvāsaṃ anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ katvā dāne vinicchayo.
tika-vin08t:1410_0: Yadā pana saṅghatthero jarādubbalatāya vā rogapīḷitatāya vā vivekajjhāsayatāya vā
tika-vin08t:1410_1: gaṇaṃ apariharitukāmo aññassa dātukāmo, attano accayena vā kalahavivādābhāvamicchanto
tika-vin08t:1410_2: saddhivihārikādīnaṃ niyyātetukāmo hoti, tadā na attano issaravatāya dātabbaṃ, ayaṃ
tika-vin08t:1410_3: vihāro saṅghiko, tasmā saṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ācikkhitvā bahūpakāratāguṇavisiṭṭhatāyuttapuggalo
tika-vin08t:1410_4: vicināpetabbo. Tato saṅgho cattāri agatigamanāni anupagantvā bhagavato ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ
tika-vin08t:1410_5: lajjīpesalabahussutasikkhākāmabhūtaṃ puggalaṃ vicinitvā “ayaṃ bhikkhu imassa vihārassa
tika-vin08t:1410_6: anucchaviko”ti āroceti. Mahātherassapi tameva ruccati, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce ruccati,
tika-vin08t:1410_7: attano bhārabhūtaṃ vuttappakāraaṅgaviyuttaṃ puggalaṃ dātukāmo hoti. Evaṃ sante saṅgho
tika-vin08t:1410_8: chandādiagatiṃ na gacchati, puggalova gacchati, tasmā saṅghasseva anumatiyā vihāro dātabbo.
tika-vin08t:1411_0: Sace pana saṅgho yaṃ kañci āmisaṃ labhitvā yathāvuttaguṇaviyuttassa bhikkhuno dātukāmo
tika-vin08t:1411_1: hoti, puggalo pana bhagavato ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ vuttappakāraaṅgayuttabhūtasseva bhikkhussa
tika-vin08t:1411_2: dātukāmo, tadā puggalopi saṅghapariyāpannoyevāti katvā dhammakammakārakassa puggalasseva
tika-vin08t:1411_3: anumatiyā vihāro dātabbo, na saṅghānumatiyā. Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sace saṅgho
tika-vin08t:1411_4: kiñci labhitvā āmisagarukatāya na nivāreti, eko bhikkhu nivāreti, sova bhikkhu issaro.
tika-vin08t:1411_5: Saṅghikesu hi kammesu yo dhammakammaṃ karoti, sova issaro”ti. Vuttañhi –
tika-vin08t:1420_0: Yadā pana theropi kiñci avatvā yathākammaṅgato, saṅghopi na kassaci vicāreti, evaṃ
tika-vin08t:1420_1: saṅghikavihāre abhikkhuke suññe vattamāne tasmiṃ dese yena kenaci sāsanassa vuddhimicchantena
tika-vin08t:1420_2: ācariyena antosīmaṭṭhakā bhikkhū evaṃ samussāhetabbā “mā tumhe āyasmanto evaṃ akattha,
tika-vin08t:1420_3: antosīmaṭṭhakesu bhikkhūsu bahūpakāratādiyuttaṃ puggalaṃ vicinatha, vicinitvā labhantā
tika-vin08t:1420_4: tassa puggalassa samaggena saṅghena dhuvavāsatthāya vihāraṃ anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ katvā
tika-vin08t:1420_5: detha, no ce antosīmaṭṭhakesu bhikkhūsu alattha, atha bahisīmaṭṭhakesu bhikkhūsu
tika-vin08t:1420_6: vicinatha. Bahisīmaṭṭhakesu bhikkhūsu vicinitvā yathāvuttaaṅgayuttapuggale labbhamāne
tika-vin08t:1420_7: taṃ puggalaṃ antosīmaṃ pavesetvā antosīmaṭṭhakassa saṅghassa anumatiyā dhuvavāsatthāya
tika-vin08t:1420_8: vihāraṃ sammannitvā anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ katvā detha. Evaṃ karontā hi tumhe āyasmanto
tika-vin08t:1420_10: puggalaṃ upanissāya assutapubbaṃ dhammaṃ suṇissatha, sutapubbaṃ dhammaṃ pariyodāpissatha,
tika-vin08t:1420_11: kaṅkhaṃ vinodissatha, diṭṭhiṃ ujuṃ karissatha, cittaṃ pasādessatha. Yassa lajjino
tika-vin08t:1420_12: pesalassa bahussutassa sikkhākāmassa bhikkhuno bhikkhaṃ anusikkhamānā saddhāya vaḍḍhissanti,
tika-vin08t:1420_13: sīlena vaḍḍhissanti, sutena vaḍḍhissanti, cāgena vaḍḍhissanti, paññāya vaḍḍhissantī”ti.
tika-vin08t:1420_15: kalyāṇamitto, yaṃ nissāya assutaṃ suṇāti, sutaṃ pariyodapeti, kaṅkhaṃ vitarati, diṭṭhiṃ
tika-vin08t:1420_16: ujuṃ karoti, cittaṃ pasādeti. Yassa vā anusikkhamāno saddhāya vaḍḍhati, sīlena vaḍḍhati,
tika-vin08t:1420_17: sutena vaḍḍhati, cāgena vaḍḍhati, paññāya vaḍḍhati, ayaṃ vuccati upanissayagocaro”ti.
tika-vin08t:1420_18: Evaṃ samussāhetvā dhammakathaṃ katvā antosīmaṭṭhakasaṅgheneva dhuvavāsavihāro dāpetabboti.
tika-vin08t:1426_0: 226. Evaṃ catupaccayabhājanavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni kathinavinicchayaṃ kathetumāha
tika-vin08t:1426_1: “kathinanti ettha panā”tiādi. Tattha kathinanti katamaṃ kathinaṃ? Samūhapaññatti.
tika-vin08t:1426_2: Na hi paramatthato kathinaṃ nāma eko dhammo atthi, purimavassaṃvutthā bhikkhū, anūnapañcavaggasaṅgho,
tika-vin08t:1426_3: cīvaramāso, dhammena samena uppannacīvarantiādīsu yesu nāmarūpesu samuppajjamānesu
tika-vin08t:1426_5: Ayamattho kathaṃ jānitabboti? “Tesaññeva dhammānaṃ saṅgaho samavāyo nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ
tika-vin08t:1426_6: nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanaṃ abhilāpo, yadidaṃ kathina”nti parivārapāḷiyaṃ āgatattā
tika-vin08t:1426_7: ca, “tesaññeva dhammānanti yesu rūpādidhammesu sati kathinaṃ nāma hoti, tesaṃ samodhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1426_8: missībhāvo. Nāmaṃ nāmakammantiādinā pana ‘kathina’nti idaṃ bahūsu dhammesu nāmamattaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1426_9: na paramatthato eko dhammo atthīti dassetī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatattā ca, “yesu rūpādidhammesūti
tika-vin08t:1426_10: purimavassaṃvutthā bhikkhū, pañcahi anūno saṅgho, cīvaramāso, dhammena samena samuppannaṃ
tika-vin08t:1426_11: cīvaranti evamādīsu yesu rūpārūpadhammesu. Satīti santesu. Missībhāvoti saṃsaggatā
tika-vin08t:1426_12: samūhapaññattimattaṃ. Tenāha na paramatthato eko dhammo atthīti dassetī”ti vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1427_2: thiranti attho”ti, tathā vimativinodaniyaṃ vajirabuddhiṭīkāyañca. Atha vā kenaṭṭhena
tika-vin08t:1427_3: kathinanti? Saṅgaṇhanaṭṭhena. Kathaṃ saṅgaṇhātīti? Pañcānisaṃse aññattha gantuṃ adatvā
tika-vin08t:1427_4: saṅgaṇhāti saṅkhipitvā gaṇhāti. Vuttañhi vinayatthamañjūsāyaṃ “pañcānisaṃse aññattha
tika-vin08t:1428_0: Kathina-saddo kāya dhātuyā kena paccayena sijjhatīti? Ṭīkācariyā dhātupaccaye acintetvā
tika-vin08t:1428_1: anipphannapāṭipadikavaseneva vaṇṇenti, tasmā ayaṃ saddo ruḷhīsuddhanāmabhūto anipphannapāṭipadikasaddoti
tika-vin08t:1428_2: vuccati. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? Tīsupi vinayaṭīkāsu “thiranti attho” icceva vaṇṇitattā.
tika-vin08t:1428_3: Pañcānisaṃse antokaraṇasamatthatāyāti pana thiratā cassa hetupadameva. Atha vā kathina-saddo
tika-vin08t:1428_4: kathadhātuyā inapaccayena sijjhati. Kathaṃ? Katha saṅgahaṇetimassa laddhadhātusaññādissa
tika-vin08t:1428_5: pañcānisaṃse aññattha gantuṃ adatvā saṅgaṇhātīti atthe “ina sabbatthā”ti yogavibhāgena
tika-vin08t:1428_6: vā “supato cā”ti ettha ca-saddena vā inapaccayaṃ katvā parakkharaṃ netvā kathinasaddato
tika-vin08t:1428_7: syuppattādimhi kate rūpaṃ. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? “Saṅgaṇhanaṭṭhenā”ti vuttaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇīṭīkāpāṭhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1428_8: nissāya viññāyati. Atha vā kaṭha kicchajīvaneti dhātuto inapaccayaṃ katvā sijjhati.
tika-vin08t:1428_9: Ayamattho “kaṭha kicchajīvane, muddhajadutiyanto dhātu, ino”ti abhidhānappadīpikāṭīkāyaṃ vuttattā viññāyati.
tika-vin08t:1429_0: Bahū pana paṇḍitā imaṃ pāṭhaṃyeva gahetvā “kathina-saddo muddhajadutiyantoyeva hoti,
tika-vin08t:1429_1: na dantajo”ti vadanti ceva likhanti ca, na panevaṃ ekantato vattabbaṃ. Kasmā? Abhidhānappadīpikāṭīkāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1429_2: kakkhaḷapariyāyaṃ guṇasaddabhūtaṃ kaṭhinasaddaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na sāsanavohārato
tika-vin08t:1429_3: nāmasaddabhūtaṃ. Tenevāha “pañcakaṃ kakkhaḷe”ti. Anekesu pana pāḷiaṭṭhakathādipotthakesu
tika-vin08t:1429_4: jinasāsanavohārato nāmasaddabhūto kathina-saddo dantajoyeva yebhuyyena paññāyati,
tika-vin08t:1429_5: teneva ca kāraṇena abhidhānappadīpikāṭīkāyampi vaṇṇavipariyāye kathinantipi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1429_6: Atha vā kattha silāghāyanti dhātuto inapaccayaṃ katvā sasaṃyogatthakāraṃ nisaṃyogaṃ
tika-vin08t:1429_7: katvā sijjhati. Ayamattho silāghādisuttassa vuttiyaṃ “silāgha katthane”ti vacanato,
tika-vin08t:1429_8: saddanītiyañca “katthanaṃ pasaṃsana”nti vaṇṇitattā ca viññāyati. Idañca vacanaṃ “idañhi
tika-vin08t:1429_9: kathinavattaṃ nāma buddhappasattha”nti aṭṭhakathāvacanena sameti. Ācariyā pana “kaṭhadhātu
tika-vin08t:1429_10: inapaccayo”ti vikappetvā “kaṭha samatthane”ti atthaṃ vadanti, taṃ ṭīkāsu “thiranti
tika-vin08t:1429_11: attho”ti vacanaṃ anapekkhitvā “pañcānisaṃse antokaraṇasamatthatāyā”ti hetumeva atthabhāvena
tika-vin08t:1429_12: gahetvā vuttaṃ siyā, taṃ pana thirabhāvassa hetuyeva.
tika-vin08t:1430_0: Kathaṃ viggaho kātabboti? Ayaṃ kathina-saddo catūsu padesu nāmapadaṃ, pañcasu nāmesu
tika-vin08t:1430_1: suddhanāmaṃ, catūsu suddhanāmesu ruḷhīsuddhanāmaṃ, dvīsu pāṭipadikasaddesu anipphannapāṭipadikasaddo,
tika-vin08t:1433_0: Ayamattho “kathinanti…pe… thiranti attho”ti ṭīkāsu vacanato viññāyati. Atha vā pañcānisaṃse
tika-vin08t:1433_1: aññattha gantuṃ adatvā kathati saṅgaṇhātīti kathinaṃ, ayaṃ vacanattho yathāvuttavinayatthamañjūsāpāṭhavasena
tika-vin08t:1433_2: viññāyati. Atha vā kaṭhati kicchena jīvatīti kathino, rukkho, tassa esoti kathino,
tika-vin08t:1433_3: thirabhāvo, so etassa atthīti kathinaṃ, paññattijātaṃ ṭha-kārassa tha-kāraṃ katvā
tika-vin08t:1433_4: kathinanti vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ nayo “kaṭha kicchajīvane”ti dhātvatthasaṃvaṇṇanāya ca “pañcānisaṃse
tika-vin08t:1433_5: antokaraṇasamatthatāya thiranti attho”ti ṭīkāvacanena ca sametīti daṭṭhabbo. Atha
tika-vin08t:1433_6: vā kathīyate silāghate pasaṃsīyate buddhādīhīti kathinaṃ, ayaṃ nayo “kattha silāghāya”nti
tika-vin08t:1433_7: dhātvatthasaṃvaṇṇanāya ca “idañhi kathinavattaṃ nāma buddhappasattha”nti aṭṭhakathāvacanena
tika-vin08t:1434_0: Ettha pana saṅkheparucittā ācariyassa saddalakkhaṇaṃ avicāretvā atthameva pucchaṃ
tika-vin08t:1434_1: katvā vissajjetuṃ “kathinaṃ attharituṃ ke labhanti, ke na labhantī”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-vin08t:1434_2: ke labhantīti ke sādhentīti attho. Pañca janā labhantīti pañca janā sādhenti. Kathinadussassa
tika-vin08t:1434_3: hi dāyakā pacchimakoṭiyā cattāro honti, eko paṭiggāhakoti. “Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1434_4: catuvaggo bhikkhusaṅgho ṭhapetvā tīṇi kammāni upasampadaṃ pavāraṇaṃ abbhāna”nti campeyyakkhandhake
tika-vin08t:1434_5: vuttattā na pañcavaggakaraṇīyanti gahetabbaṃ. Paṭhamappavāraṇāya pavāritāti idaṃ
tika-vin08t:1434_6: vassacchedaṃ akatvā vassaṃvutthabhāvasandassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ antarāyena apavāritānampi
tika-vin08t:1434_8: vā pacchimikāya upagatā vā na labhantī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ. Aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthavassāpi
tika-vin08t:1434_9: na labhantīti nānāsīmāya aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthavassā imasmiṃ vihāre kathinatthāraṃ
tika-vin08t:1434_10: na labhantīti attho. Sabbeti chinnavassādayo, anupagatāpi tattheva saṅgahitā. Ānisaṃsanti
tika-vin08t:1434_11: kathinānisaṃsacīvaraṃ. Ekaṃ atthatacīvaraṃyeva hi kathinacīvaraṃ nāma hoti, avasesāni
tika-vin08t:1434_12: cīvarāni vā sāṭakā vā kathinānisaṃsāyeva nāma. Vakkhati hi “avasesakathinānisaṃse
tika-vin08t:1434_13: balavavatthāni vassāvāsikaṭhitikāya dātabbānī”ti. itaresanti purimikāya upagatānaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1435_0: So ce pacchimikāya upasampajjati, gaṇapūrako ceva hoti, ānisaṃsañca labhatīti iminā
tika-vin08t:1435_1: sāmaṇerānaṃ vassūpagamanaṃ anuññātaṃ hoti. So hi purimikāya vassūpagatattā ānisaṃsaṃ
tika-vin08t:1435_2: labhati, pacchimikāya pana upasampajjitattā gaṇapūrako hotīti. Sace purimikāya upagatā
tika-vin08t:1435_4: vinayavinicchaye āgatattā sayaṃ ce aṭṭhadhammakusalo, sayameva attharitabbaṃ. No
tika-vin08t:1435_5: ce, aññe aṭṭhadhammakusale pariyesitvā netabbā, evaṃ akatvā kathinaṃ attharituṃ na
tika-vin08t:1435_6: vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Kathinaṃ attharāpetvāti sakāritavacanena tehi bāhirato āgatattherehi
tika-vin08t:1435_7: sayaṃ kathinaṃ na attharitabbaṃ, sabbapubbakiccādikaṃ saṃvidahitvā te purimikāya
tika-vin08t:1435_8: vassūpagatā antosīmaṭṭhabhikkhūyeva attharāpetabbāti dasseti, aññathā añño kathinaṃ
tika-vin08t:1435_9: attharati, añño ānisaṃsaṃ labhatīti āpajjati, na panevaṃ yujjati. Vakkhati hi “ānisaṃso
tika-vin08t:1435_10: pana itaresaṃyeva hotī”ti. Dānañca bhuñjitvāti khādanīyabhojanīyabhūtaṃ annapānādidānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1435_11: bhuñjitvā. Na hi te vatthudānaṃ labhanti.
tika-vin08t:1436_0: Kathinacīvaraṃ demāti dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti ettha “saṅghassa kathinacīvaraṃ demā”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1436_1: Evañhi sati “idaṃ saṅghassa kathinadussaṃ uppanna”nti kammavācāya sameti. Atha ca
tika-vin08t:1436_2: pana pubbe kataparicayattā “saṅghassā”ti avuttepi sampadānaṃ pākaṭanti katvā avuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:1436_3: siyāti. Ettheke ācariyā vadanti “saṅghassāti avuttepi kāle dinnaṃ saṅghikaṃ hotī”ti,
tika-vin08t:1436_4: tatrevaṃ vattabbaṃ “na kāle dinnaṃ sabbaṃ saṅghikaṃ hotī”ti. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce?
tika-vin08t:1436_5: “Yañca kālepi saṅghassa vā idaṃ akālacīvaranti, puggalassa vā idaṃ tuyhaṃ dammītiādinā
tika-vin08t:1436_6: nayena dinnaṃ, etaṃ akālacīvaraṃ nāmā”ti kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ āgatattā puggalikampi
tika-vin08t:1436_7: hotīti viññāyati, tasmā parammukhāpi nāmaṃ vatvā sammukhāpi pādamūle ṭhapetvā dinnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1436_8: puggalikameva hoti, na saṅghikaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “puggalassa detīti ‘imaṃ
tika-vin08t:1436_9: cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dammī’ti evaṃ parammukhā vā, pādamūle ṭhapetvā ‘imaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin08t:1436_10: tumhākaṃ dammī’ti evaṃ sammukhā vā detī”ti. Evaṃ puggalike sati taṃ cīvaraṃ saṅghassa
tika-vin08t:1436_11: bhājetabbaṃ hoti vā na hoti vāti? So puggalo attano saddhivihārikaantevāsikabhūtassa
tika-vin08t:1436_12: saṅghassa vā aññassa sahadhammikasaṅghassa vā bhājetukāmo bhājeyya, abhājetukāmo
tika-vin08t:1436_13: “bhājetū”ti na kenaci vacanīyo. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? “Na hi puggalassa ādissa dinnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1436_14: kenaci bhājanīyaṃ hotī”ti ṭīkāsu āgamanato viññāyati. Atheke ācariyā evaṃ vadanti
tika-vin08t:1436_15: “kathinassa ekaṃ mūlaṃ saṅghoti vuttattā puggalaṃ uddissa dinnepi saṅghāyattaṃ saṅghikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1436_16: hoti. Yathā kiṃ ‘sīmāya dammi, senāsanassa dammī’ti vuttepi taṃ dānaṃ saṅghikaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t:1436_17: yathā ca ‘kathinacīvaraṃ dammī’ti vutte saṅghikaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin08t:1437_0: Tatrevaṃ vicāretabbaṃ – “kathinassa ekaṃ mūlaṃ saṅgho”ti vacanaṃ kathinassa mūlaṃ
tika-vin08t:1437_1: kathinassa kāraṇaṃ dasseti. Yathā hi mūle vijjamāne rukkho tiṭṭhati, avijjamāne na
tika-vin08t:1437_2: tiṭṭhati, tasmā mūlaṃ rukkhassa kāraṇaṃ hoti, patiṭṭhaṃ hoti, evaṃ saṅghe vijjamāne
tika-vin08t:1437_3: kathinaṃ hoti, no avijjamāne, tasmā saṅgho kathinassa mūlaṃ kathinassa kāraṇaṃ nāma
tika-vin08t:1437_4: hoti. Kathaṃ saṅghe vijjamāne kathinaṃ hoti? Sabbantimena paricchedena catuvaggabhūtena
tika-vin08t:1437_5: saṅghena atthārārahassa bhikkhuno ñattidutiyakammavācāya kathinacīvare dinneyeva
tika-vin08t:1437_6: tena cīvarena atthataṃ kathinaṃ nāma hoti, no adinne, tasmā catuvaggasaṅghe alabbhamāne
tika-vin08t:1437_7: sahassakkhattuṃ “kathinaṃ dammī”ti vuttepi kathinaṃ nāma na hoti, tasmā upacārasīmāya
tika-vin08t:1437_8: paricchinne vihāre eko vā dve vā tayo vā cattāro vā bhikkhū viharanti, tattha kathinacīvare
tika-vin08t:1437_9: uppanne aññato pariyesitvā catuvaggasaṅgho eko paṭiggāhakoti pañcannaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1437_10: pūraṇe sati kathinaṃ attharituṃ labhati, nāsati, evaṃ saṅghe vijjamāneyeva kathinaṃ
tika-vin08t:1437_11: nāma hoti, no avijjamāne, tasmā saṅghassa kathinassa mūlabhūtataṃ kāraṇabhūtataṃ
tika-vin08t:1437_12: sandhāya “kathinassa ekaṃ mūlaṃ saṅgho”ti vuttaṃ. “Kathina”nti vutte saṅghikaṃyeva
tika-vin08t:1437_13: hoti, no puggalikanti adhippāyo etasmiṃ pāṭhe na labbhati. Yathā kiṃ “kiccādhikaraṇassa
tika-vin08t:1437_15: kiccādhikaraṇaṃ catuvaggādike saṅghe vijjamāneyeva hoti, no avijjamāne, tasmā saṅghassa
tika-vin08t:1437_16: kiccādhikaraṇassa mūlabhūtataṃ kāraṇabhūtataṃ sandhāya “kiccādhikaraṇassa ekaṃ mūlaṃ
tika-vin08t:1438_0: Yadipi vuttaṃ “yathā ‘sīmāya dammi, senāsanassa dammī’tiādīsu taṃ dānaṃ saṅghāyattameva
tika-vin08t:1438_1: hoti, tathā ‘kathina dammī’ti vutte puggalaṃ uddissa dinnepi saṅghāyattameva saṅghikameva
tika-vin08t:1438_2: hotī”ti, tathāpi evaṃ vicāraṇā kātabbā – “sīmāya dammi, senāsanassa dammī”tiādīsu
tika-vin08t:1438_3: sīmā ca senāsanañca dānapaṭiggāhakā na honti, tasmā sīmaṭṭhassa ca senāsanaṭṭhassa
tika-vin08t:1438_4: ca saṅghassa āyattaṃ hoti, puggalo pana dānapaṭiggāhakova, tasmā “imaṃ kathinacīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:1438_5: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dammī”ti parammukhā vā tassa bhikkhuno pādamūle ṭhapetvā
tika-vin08t:1438_6: sammukhā vā dinnaṃ kathaṃ saṅghāyattaṃ saṅghasantakaṃ bhaveyya, evaṃ saṅghassa apariṇataṃ
tika-vin08t:1438_7: puggalikacīvaraṃ saṅghassa pariṇāmeyya, navasu adhammikadānesu ekaṃ bhaveyya, tassa
tika-vin08t:1438_8: cīvarassa paṭiggahopi navasu adhammikapaṭiggahesu eko bhaveyya, tassa cīvarassa paribhogopi
tika-vin08t:1438_9: navasu adhammikaparibhogesu eko bhaveyya. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? Nava adhammikāni
tika-vin08t:1438_10: dānānīti saṅghassa pariṇataṃ aññasaṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti,
tika-vin08t:1438_11: cetiyassa pariṇataṃ aññacetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti, puggalassa
tika-vin08t:1438_12: pariṇataṃ aññapuggalassa vā saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti, “nava adhammikā
tika-vin08t:1438_13: paribhogā”ti āgataṃ parivārapāḷiñca “nava paṭiggahaparibhogāti etesaṃyeva dānānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1438_14: paṭiggahā ca paribhogā cā”ti āgataṃ aṭṭhakathañca oloketvā viññāyatīti.
tika-vin08t:1439_0: Athāpi evaṃ vadanti – dāyako saṅghattherassa vā ganthadhutaṅgavasena abhiññātassa
tika-vin08t:1439_1: vā bhattuddesakassa vā pahiṇati “amhākaṃ bhattaggahaṇatthāya aṭṭha bhikkhū gahetvā
tika-vin08t:1439_2: āgacchathā”ti, sacepi ñātiupaṭṭhākehi pesitaṃ hoti, ime tayo janā pucchituṃ na labhanti.
tika-vin08t:1439_3: Āruḷhāyeva mātikaṃ, saṅghato aṭṭha bhikkhū uddisāpetvā attanavamehi gantabbaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin08t:1439_4: Bhikkhusaṅghassa hi ete bhikkhū nissāya lābho uppajjatīti. Ganthadhutaṅgādīhi pana
tika-vin08t:1439_5: anabhiññāto āvāsikabhikkhu pucchituṃ labhati, tasmā tena “kiṃ saṅghato gaṇhāmi, udāhu
tika-vin08t:1439_6: ye jānāmi, tehi saddhiṃ āgacchāmī”ti mātikaṃ āropetvā yathā dāyakā vadanti, tathā
tika-vin08t:1439_7: paṭipajjitabbanti, īdisesu ṭhānesu “saṅghassa lābho puggalaṃ upanissāya uppajjatī”ti
tika-vin08t:1439_8: vacanaṃ upanidhāya “saṅghassa lābho puggalaṃ nissāya uppajjati, puggalassa pattalābho
tika-vin08t:1439_9: saṅghaṃ āmasitvā dento saṅghāyatto hotī”ti viññāyatīti.
tika-vin08t:1440_0: Imasmimpi vacane evaṃ vicāraṇā kātabbā – tasmiṃ tu nimantane na puggalaṃyeva nimanteti,
tika-vin08t:1440_1: atha kho sasaṅghaṃ puggalaṃ nimanteti. Tattha tu “saṅgha”nti avatvā “aṭṭha bhikkhū”ti
tika-vin08t:1440_2: vuttattā “kiṃ saṅghato gaṇhāmi, udāhu ye jānāmi, tehi saddhiṃ āgacchāmī”ti anabhiññāto
tika-vin08t:1440_3: puggalo pucchituṃ labhati. Saṅghattherassa pana saṅghaṃ pariharitvā vasitattā “aṭṭha
tika-vin08t:1440_4: bhikkhū”ti vutte saṅghaṃ ṭhapetvā aññesaṃ gahaṇakāraṇaṃ natthi, ganthadhutaṅgavasena
tika-vin08t:1440_5: abhiññātapuggalopi saṅghassa puññanissitattā “aṭṭha bhikkhū”ti vutte saṅghatoyeva
tika-vin08t:1440_6: gaṇhāti, bhattuddesakassapi devasikaṃ saṅghasseva bhattavicāraṇattā “aṭṭha bhikkhū”ti
tika-vin08t:1440_7: vutte saṅghaṃ ṭhapetvā aññesaṃ gahaṇakāraṇaṃ natthi. Evaṃ “aṭṭha bhikkhū gahetvā
tika-vin08t:1440_8: āgacchathā”ti saha saṅghena nimantitattā “ime tayo janā pucchituṃ na labhantī”ti
tika-vin08t:1440_9: vuttaṃ, na “tvaṃ āgacchāhī”ti puggalasseva nimantane satipi saṅghaṃ gahetvā āgantabbatoti.
tika-vin08t:1440_10: Evaṃ “aṭṭha bhikkhū gahetvā āgacchathā”ti sasaṅghasseva puggalassa nimantitattā saṅgho
tika-vin08t:1440_11: gahetabbo hoti, na “tumhe āgacchathā”ti puggalasseva nimantitattā, tasmā “puggalassa
tika-vin08t:1440_12: lābho saṅghāyatto”ti na sakkā vattuṃ, aṭṭhakathādīsu pakaraṇesupi “puggalaṃ nissāya
tika-vin08t:1440_13: saṅghassa lābho uppajjati” icceva vutto, na “puggalassa lābho saṅghāyatto”ti. Cīvaralābhakhettabhūtāsu
tika-vin08t:1440_14: aṭṭhasu mātikāsu ca “saṅghassa detī”ti ca visuṃ, “puggalassa detī”ti ca visuṃ āgataṃ.
tika-vin08t:1440_15: Puggalassa detīti “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dammī”ti evaṃ parammukhā vā, pādamūle
tika-vin08t:1440_16: ṭhapetvā “imaṃ bhante tumhākaṃ dammī”ti evaṃ sammukhā vā detīti.
tika-vin08t:1441_0: Idāni pana cīvaraṃ dātukāmā upāsakā vā upāsikāyo vā sayaṃ anāgantvā puttadāsādayo
tika-vin08t:1441_1: āṇāpentāpi “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa therassa dethā”ti vatvā puggalasseva dāpenti,
tika-vin08t:1441_2: sāmaṃ gantvā dadantāpi pādamūle ṭhapetvā vā hatthe ṭhapetvā vā hatthena phusāpetvā
tika-vin08t:1441_3: vā dadanti “imaṃ, bhante, cīvaraṃ tumhe uddissa ettakaṃ dhanaṃ pariccajitvā kataṃ,
tika-vin08t:1441_4: evañca evañca hatthakammaṃ katvā sampāditaṃ, tasmā tumhe nivāsatha pārupatha paribhuñjathā”tiādīni
tika-vin08t:1441_5: vadanti, tassa puggalassa paribhogakaraṇameva icchanti, na saṅghassa dānaṃ. Keci
tika-vin08t:1441_6: atuṭṭhakathampi kathenti. Evaṃ puggalameva uddissa dinnacīvarassa saṅghena āyattakāraṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:1441_7: natthi. “Sace pana ‘idaṃ tumhākañca tumhākaṃ antevāsikānañca dammī’ti evaṃ vadati,
tika-vin08t:1441_8: therassa ca antevāsikānañca pāpuṇātī”ti āgamanato evaṃ vatvā dente pana ācariyantevāsikānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1441_9: pāpuṇāti, anantevāsikassa pana na pāpuṇāti. “Uddesaṃ gahetuṃ āgato gahetvā gacchanto
tika-vin08t:1441_10: ca atthi, tassapi pāpuṇātī”ti āgamanato bahisīmaṭṭhassa dhammantevāsikassapi pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin08t:1441_11: “Tumhehi saddhiṃ nibaddhacārikabhikkhūnaṃ dammīti vutte uddesantevāsikānaṃ vattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1441_12: katvā uddesaparipucchādīni gahetvā vicarantānaṃ sabbesaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti āgamanato evaṃ
tika-vin08t:1441_13: vatvā dente dhammantevāsikānaṃ vattapaṭipattikārakānañca antevāsikānaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin08t:1441_14: Evaṃ dāyakānaṃ vacanānurūpameva dānassa pavattanato “yathā dāyakā vadanti, tathā
tika-vin08t:1442_0: Evaṃ idāni dāyakā yebhuyyena puggalasseva denti, satesu sahassesu ekoyeva paṇḍito
tika-vin08t:1442_1: bahussuto dāyako saṅghassa dadeyya, puggalikacīvarañca saṅghikabhavanatthāya akariyamānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1442_2: na ñattiyā kammavācāya ca arahaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? Ñattikammavācāvirodhato.
tika-vin08t:1442_3: Kathaṃ virodhoti ce? Ñattiyā kammavācāya ca “idaṃ saṅghassa kathinadussaṃ uppanna”nti
tika-vin08t:1442_4: kathinacīvarassa saṅghikabhāvo vutto, idāni pana taṃ cīvaraṃ “puggalassa dinnaṃ puggalika”nti
tika-vin08t:1442_5: vacanatthānurūpato puggalikaṃ hoti, evampi virodho. “Saṅgho imaṃ kathinadussaṃ itthannāmassa
tika-vin08t:1442_6: bhikkhuno dadeyya kathinaṃ attharitu”nti ettha ca saṅghoti dhātuyā kattā hoti, bhikkhunoti
tika-vin08t:1442_7: sampadānaṃ, idha pana saṅghassa tasmiṃ kathinacīvare anissarabhāvato saṅgho kattā
tika-vin08t:1442_8: na hoti, bhikkhu paṭiggāhalakkhaṇābhāvato sampadānaṃ na hoti, evampi virodho. Dāyakena
tika-vin08t:1442_9: pana saṅghassa pariccattattā saṅghikabhūtaṃ kathinacīvaraṃ yasmiṃ kāle saṅgho kathinaṃ
tika-vin08t:1442_10: attharituṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatassa bhikkhuno deti, tasmiṃ kāle ñattidutiyakammavācaṃ
tika-vin08t:1442_11: idāni manussā “ñattī”ti voharanti, tañca cīvaraṃ “ñattiladdhacīvara”nti, taṃ cīvaradāyakañca
tika-vin08t:1442_12: “ñattiladdhadāyako”ti, tasmā saṅghikacīvarameva ñattiladdhaṃ hoti, no puggalikacīvaraṃ.
tika-vin08t:1442_13: Ñattiladdhakālato pana paṭṭhāya taṃ cīvaraṃ puggalikaṃ hoti. Kasmā? Atthārakapuggalassa cīvarabhāvatoti.
tika-vin08t:1443_0: Athāpi vadanti “dinnanti pāṭhañca ‘sādhentī’ti pāṭhañca ‘ānisaṃsaṃ labhantī’ti pāṭhañca
tika-vin08t:1443_1: upanidhāya ayamattho viññāyatī”ti, tatthāyamācariyānamadhippāyo – “dinnaṃ idaṃ saṅghenā”ti
tika-vin08t:1443_2: ettha dā-dhātuyā saṅghenāti kattā, idanti kammaṃ, imassa kathinacīvarassa saṅghikattā
tika-vin08t:1443_3: saṅghena dinnaṃ hoti, tena viññāyati “kathina”nti vutte saṅghikaṃ hotīti. “Kathinatthāraṃ
tika-vin08t:1443_4: ke labhantīti ettha ke labhantīti ke sādhentīti attho. Pañca janā sādhentī”ti vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1443_5: vuttaṃ. Tattha pañca janāti saṅgho vutto, imināpi viññāyati “kathinanti vutte saṅghikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1443_6: hotī”ti. Ānisaṃsaṃ labhantīti ettha ca saṅghikattā sabbe sīmaṭṭhakabhikkhū ānisaṃsaṃ
tika-vin08t:1443_7: labhanti, imināpi viññāyati “kathinanti vutte saṅghikaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin08t:1444_0: Tatrāpyevaṃ vicāraṇā kātabbā – pubbedāyakā cattāropi paccaye yebhuyyena saṅghasseva
tika-vin08t:1444_1: denti, tasmā saṅghassa catupaccayabhājanakathā ativitthārā hoti. Appakato pana puggalassa
tika-vin08t:1444_2: denti, tasmā saṅghassa dinnaṃ kathinacīvaraṃ saṅghena atthārakassa puggalassa dinnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1444_3: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sādhentīti ca kathinadussassa dāyakā cattāro, paṭiggāhako ekoti
tika-vin08t:1444_4: pañca janā kathinadānakammaṃ sādhentīti vuttaṃ. Ānisaṃsaṃ labhantīti idañca atthārakassa
tika-vin08t:1444_5: ca anumodanānañca bhikkhūnaṃ ānisaṃsalābhameva vuttaṃ, na etehi pāṭhehi “kathina”nti
tika-vin08t:1444_6: vutte saṅghikaṃ hotīti attho viññātabbo hotīti daṭṭhabbo. Saṅghassa uppannacīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:1444_7: saṅghena atthārakassa dinnabhāvo kathaṃ viññāyatīti? “Idaṃ saṅghassa kathinadussaṃ
tika-vin08t:1444_8: uppannaṃ, saṅgho imaṃ kathinadussaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno deti kathinaṃ attharitu”nti
tika-vin08t:1444_9: vuttaṃ pāḷipāṭhañca “saṅgho ajja kathinadussaṃ labhitvā punadivase deti, ayaṃ nicayasannidhī”ti
tika-vin08t:1444_10: vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāpāṭhañca disvā viññāyatīti. Saṅghasantakabhūtaṃ cīvarameva dānakiriyāya
tika-vin08t:1444_11: kammaṃ, saṅgho kattā, puggalo sampadānaṃ bhavituṃ arahabhāvo ca yathāvuttapāḷipāṭhameva
tika-vin08t:1445_0: Evaṃ sante puggalassa dinnaṃ puggalikacīvaraṃ saṅghikaṃ kātuṃ kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti?
tika-vin08t:1445_1: Sace so paṭiggāhakapuggalo dāyakānaṃ evaṃ vadati “upāsaka dānaṃ nāma puggalassa dinnato
tika-vin08t:1445_2: saṅghassa dinnaṃ mahapphalataraṃ hoti, tasmā saṅghassa dehi, saṅghassa datvā puna
tika-vin08t:1445_3: saṅghena atthārārahassa bhikkhuno kammavācāya datvā tena puggalena yathāvinayaṃ atthateyeva
tika-vin08t:1445_4: kathinaṃ nāma hoti, na puggalassa datvā puggalena sāmaṃyeva atthate, tasmā saṅghassa
tika-vin08t:1445_5: dehī”ti uyyojetvā saṅghassa dāpitepi taṃ cīvaraṃ saṅghikaṃ hoti kathinatthārārahaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1445_6: Yadi pana dāyako appassutatāya “nāhaṃ, bhante, kiñci jānāmi, imaṃ cīvaraṃ tumhākameva
tika-vin08t:1445_7: dammī”ti vakkhati, evaṃ sati puggalikavaseneva sampaṭicchitvā tena puggalena taṃ
tika-vin08t:1446_0: Yadi evaṃ samaṇeneva samaṇassa dinnaṃ cīvaraṃ kathaṃ kathinatthārārahaṃ bhaveyyāti?
tika-vin08t:1446_1: No na bhaveyya. Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kathinaṃ kena dinnaṃ vaṭṭati? Yena kenaci
tika-vin08t:1446_2: devena vā manussena vā pañcannaṃ vā sahadhammikānaṃ aññatarena dinnaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin08t:1446_3: Atha kasmā paramparabhūtehi ācariyehi ñattiladdhacīvarato avasesāni cīvarāni saṅghassa
tika-vin08t:1446_4: bhājetvā eva paribhuñjitānīti? Vuccate – ekacce bhikkhū ācariyaparamparāgataanausāreneva
tika-vin08t:1446_5: paṭipajjanti, keci bahūnaṃ kiriyaṃ disvā diṭṭhānugativasena paṭipajjanti, bahussutāpi
tika-vin08t:1446_6: keci therā aruccantāpi paveṇibhedabhayena paṭipajjanti, apare rucivasena atthañca
tika-vin08t:1446_7: adhippāyañca pariṇāmetvā gaṇhanti, pakaraṇamevānugatabhikkhū pana yathāpakaraṇāgatameva
tika-vin08t:1446_8: atthaṃ gahetvā saṅghikañca puggalikañca amissaṃ katvā, kālacīvarañca akālacīvarañca
tika-vin08t:1446_9: amissaṃ katvā gaṇhanti. Bhikkhunivibhaṅge “thūlanandā bhikkhunī akālacīvaraṃ ‘kālacīvara’nti
tika-vin08t:1446_10: adhiṭṭhahitvā bhājāpessati, atha bhagavā nissaggiyapācittiyāpattiṃ paññapesī”ti āgataṃ,
tika-vin08t:1446_12: oloketvā saṃsanditvā pakaraṇamevānugantabbaṃ, na aññesaṃ kiriyaṃ saddahitabbaṃ, na
tika-vin08t:1446_13: ca anugantabbaṃ. Bhagavato hi dharamānakāle vā tato pacchā vā pubbe dāyakā yebhuyyena
tika-vin08t:1446_14: cattāro paccaye saṅghasseva denti, tasmā saṅghikasenāsanassa saṅghikacīvarassa ca
tika-vin08t:1446_15: bāhullato pubbācariyā saṅghassa bhājetvā eva paribhuñjiṃsu.
tika-vin08t:1447_0: Idāni pana dāyakā yebhuyyena cattāro paccaye puggalasseva denti, tasmā senāsanampi
tika-vin08t:1447_1: abhinavabhūtaṃ puggalikameva bahulaṃ hoti, cīvarampi puggalikameva bahulaṃ. Daliddāpi
tika-vin08t:1447_2: suttakantanakālato paṭṭhāya “imaṃ cīvaraṃ kathinakāle itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dassāmī”ti
tika-vin08t:1447_3: cintetvā ca tatheva vatvā ca sabbakiccāni karonti, mahaddhanā ca sāṭakassa kīṇitakālato
tika-vin08t:1447_4: paṭṭhāya tatheva cintetvā kathetvā karonti, dānakāle ca “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa
tika-vin08t:1447_5: dehī”ti puttadāsādayo vā pesenti, sāmaṃ vā gantvā cīvaraṃ tassa bhikkhussa pādamūle
tika-vin08t:1447_6: vā hatthe vā ṭhapetvā “imaṃ cīvaraṃ tuyhaṃ dammī”ti vatvā vā cintetvā vā denti, satesu
tika-vin08t:1447_7: vā sahassesu vā eko paṇḍitapuriso “puggalassa dinnadānato saṅghassa dinnaṃ mahapphala”nti
tika-vin08t:1447_8: ñatvā “imaṃ kathinacīvaraṃ saṅghassa dammī”ti vatvā vā cintetvā vā deti, tassa sā
tika-vin08t:1447_9: dakkhiṇā saṅghagatā hoti. Sace pana dāyako puggalassa dātukāmo hoti, puggalo pana
tika-vin08t:1447_11: saṅghikadānassa mahapphalabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā “imaṃ tava cīvaraṃ saṅghassa dehī”ti uyyojeti,
tika-vin08t:1447_12: dāyakopi tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā “imaṃ kathinacīvaraṃ saṅghassa dammī”ti vatvā
tika-vin08t:1447_13: vā cintetvā vā deti, evampi sā dakkhiṇā saṅghagatā hoti.
tika-vin08t:1448_0: Yadi pana bhikkhunā uyyojitopi duppañño dāyako tassa vacanaṃ anādiyitvā puggalasseva
tika-vin08t:1448_1: deti, tassa sā dakkhiṇā puggalagatā hoti. Atha pana so puggalo sayaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
tika-vin08t:1448_2: puna saṅghassa pariccajati, evampi taṃ cīvaraṃ saṅghikaṃ hoti, taṃ saṅghikavasena
tika-vin08t:1448_3: bhājetabbaṃ. Yadi pana dāyakopi puggalasseva deti, puggalopi sampaṭicchitvā na pariccajati,
tika-vin08t:1448_4: evaṃ sante taṃ cīvaraṃ puggalikaṃ hoti, na kathinakālamattena vā kathinavacanamattena
tika-vin08t:1448_5: vā saṅghikaṃ hoti. Idāni pana iminā nayena puggalikacīvaraṃyeva bahulaṃ hoti. Evaṃ
tika-vin08t:1448_6: santepi ācariyaparamparā paveṇiṃ abhinditukāmā saṅghikaṃ viya katvā bhājetvā paribhuñjiṃsu.
tika-vin08t:1448_7: Yadi mukhyato saṅghikaṃ siyā, saṅghena dinnato paraṃ ekasūcimattampi puggalo adhikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1449_0: Ekacce therā saṅghikanti pana vadanti, bhājanakāle pana issaravatāya yathāruci vicārenti,
tika-vin08t:1449_1: ekacce bhikkhū mukhyasaṅghikanti maññamānā abhājetukāmampi puggalaṃ abhibhavitvā
tika-vin08t:1449_2: bhājāpenti, tassa puggalassa mātā pitā ñātakā upāsakādayo “amhākaṃ puttassa dema,
tika-vin08t:1449_3: amhākaṃ ñātakabhikkhussa dema, amhākaṃ kulūpakassa demā”ti, aññepi saddhā pasannā
tika-vin08t:1449_4: dāyakā “itthannāmassa puggalassa demā”ti vicāretvā parammukhāpi “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa
tika-vin08t:1449_5: dammī”ti vatvā sammukhāpi pādamūle vā hatthe vā ṭhapetvā denti, evarūpaṃ cīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:1449_6: puggalikaṃ hoti, saṅghaṃ āmasitvā avuttattā saṅghāyattaṃ na hoti, “kathinaṃ dassāmī”ti
tika-vin08t:1449_7: vā “kathinaṃ dātuṃ gato”ti vā “kathinacīvara”nti vā pubbāparakālesu vacanaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:1449_8: mukhyakathinabhūtassa saṅghikacīvarassa kāle dinnattā tadupacārato vohāramattaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t:1449_9: Yathā kiṃ? “Uposathika”nti vuttaṃ bhattaṃ cuddasasu saṅghikabhattesu antogadhaṃ mukhyasaṅghikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1449_10: hoti, samādinnauposathā dāyakā sāyaṃ bhuñjitabbabhattabhāgaṃ saṅghassa denti, taṃ
tika-vin08t:1449_11: saṅgho salākabhattaṃ viya ṭhitikaṃ katvā bhuñjati, iti saṅghassa dinnattā saṅghikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1449_12: hoti. Idāni pana dāyakā attano attano kulūpakassa vā ñātibhikkhussa vā uposathadivasesu
tika-vin08t:1449_13: bhattaṃ denti, taṃ saṅghassa adinnattā saṅghikaṃ na hoti. Evaṃ santepi uposathadivase
tika-vin08t:1450_0: Evaṃ imasmiṃ kāle yebhuyyena puggalasseva dinnattā puggalikabhūtaṃ cīvaraṃ ñattikammavācārahaṃ
tika-vin08t:1450_1: na hoti, saṅghikameva ñattikammavācārahaṃ hoti, tadeva ca pañcānisaṃsakāraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t:1450_2: tasmā paṇḍitena puggalena “upāsakā saṅghe detha, saṅghe dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ hotī”tiādinā
tika-vin08t:1450_3: niyojetvā dāpetabbaṃ, sayaṃ vā sampaṭicchitvā saṅghassa pariccajitabbaṃ. Evaṃ pariccajitattā
tika-vin08t:1450_4: saṅghikabhūtaṃ cīvaraṃ ñattikammavācārahañca hoti pañcānisaṃsanipphādakañca. Evaṃ
tika-vin08t:1450_5: niyojanañca “saṅghe gotami dehi, saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi saṅgho
tika-vin08t:1450_6: cā”ti bhagavatā vuttavacanaṃ anugataṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1451_0: Parikammaṃ karontānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāgubhattañca dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti idaṃ pucchitattā doso
tika-vin08t:1451_1: natthīti katvā vuttaṃ, apucchite pana evaṃ kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Khalimakkhitasāṭakoti
tika-vin08t:1451_2: ahatavatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Suṭṭhu dhovitvātiādinā sapubbakaraṇaṃ atthāraṃ dasseti.
tika-vin08t:1451_5: sajjetvā bahūhi bhikkhūhi saddhinti idaṃ pana sibbanassa upakaraṇanidassanaṃ. Tadahevāti
tika-vin08t:1451_6: idaṃ pana karaṇasannidhimocanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Dāyakassa hatthato sāṭakaṃ laddhadivaseyeva
tika-vin08t:1451_7: saṅghena atthārakassa bhikkhuno dātabbaṃ, evaṃ adente nicayasannidhi hoti. Atthārakenapi
tika-vin08t:1451_8: saṅghato laddhadivaseyeva kathinaṃ attharitabbaṃ, evaṃ akaronte karaṇasannidhi hoti.
tika-vin08t:1452_0: Aññāni ca bahūni ānisaṃsavatthāni detīti iminā attharitabbasāṭakoyeva kathinasāṭako
tika-vin08t:1452_1: nāma, tato aññe sāṭakā bahavopi kathinānisaṃsāyeva nāmāti dasseti. Etena ca “kathinānisaṃso”ti
tika-vin08t:1452_2: vatthāniyeva vuttāni na agghoti dīpeti. Yadi aggho vutto siyā, evaṃ sati “bahvānisaṃsāni
tika-vin08t:1452_3: kathinavatthāni detī”ti vattabbaṃ, evaṃ pana avatvā “bahūni kathinānisaṃsavatthāni
tika-vin08t:1452_4: detī”ti vuttaṃ, tena ñāyati “na aggho vutto”ti, tasmā bahvānisaṃsabhāvo agghavasena
tika-vin08t:1452_5: na gahetabbo, atha kho vatthavaseneva gahetabboti. Itaroti añño dāyako. Tathā tathā
tika-vin08t:1452_6: ovaditvā saññāpetabboti “upāsaka dānaṃ nāma saṅghassa dinnakālato paṭṭhāya mahapphalaṃ
tika-vin08t:1452_7: hoti mahānisaṃsaṃ, atthāro pana bhikkhūnaṃ upakāratthāya bhagavatā anuññāto, tasmā
tika-vin08t:1452_8: ñattiladdhampi aladdhampi mahapphalamevā”ti vā “upāsaka ayampi dāyako saṅghasseva
tika-vin08t:1452_9: deti, tvampi saṅghasseva desi, bhagavatā ca –
tika-vin08t:1457: Vuttaṃ, tasmā saṅghassa dinnakālato paṭṭhāya mahapphalamevā”ti vā itiādīni vatvā saññāpetabbo.
tika-vin08t:1458: Yassa saṅgho kathinacīvaraṃ deti, tena bhikkhunā kathinaṃ attharitabbanti yojanā. Yo jiṇṇacīvaro hoti bhikkhu, tassa dātabbanti sambandho. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne idāni bhikkhū –
tika-vin08t:1462_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ āharitvā kathinadānakammavācāya paṭhamaṃ kathinacīvarassa paṭiggahaṇañca
tika-vin08t:1462_1: sappāyapucchanañca karonti, tadayuttaṃ viya dissati. Kasmāti ce? “Aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgato
tika-vin08t:1462_2: puggalo bhabbo kathinaṃ attharituṃ…pe… pubbakaraṇaṃ jānāti, paccuddhāraṃ jānāti,
tika-vin08t:1462_3: adhiṭṭhānaṃ jānāti, atthāraṃ jānāti, mātikaṃ jānāti, palibodhaṃ jānāti, uddhāraṃ
tika-vin08t:1466_0: Vinayavinicchayappakaraṇe ca āgatesu aṭṭhasu aṅgesu anāgatattā ca “pubbakaraṇaṃ sattahi
tika-vin08t:1466_1: dhammehi saṅgahitaṃ dhovanena vicāraṇena chedanena bandhanena sibbanena rajanena
tika-vin08t:1469: Vinayavinicchayappakaraṇe ca vuttesu sattasu pubbakaraṇesu anāgatattā ca.
tika-vin08t:1470_0: Na kevalañca pakaraṇesu anāgatameva, atha kho yuttipi na dissati. Kathaṃ? Paṭiggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:1470_1: nāma “yo pana bhikkhu adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āhāreyya aññatra udakadantaponā,
tika-vin08t:1470_2: pācittiya”nti yāvakālikādīsu ajjhoharitabbesu catūsu kālikavatthūsu bhagavatā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1470_3: na cīvare, taṃ pana pādamūle ṭhapetvā dinnampi parammukhā dinnampi labbhateva. Vuttañhi
tika-vin08t:1470_4: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dammīti evaṃ parammukhā vā pādamūle ṭhapetvā
tika-vin08t:1470_5: ‘imaṃ tumhāka’nti evaṃ sammukhā vā detī”ti, tasmā paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi, dāyakena
tika-vin08t:1470_6: cīvare dinne saṅghassa cittena sampaṭicchanamattameva pamāṇaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t:1471_0: Sappāyapucchanañca evaṃ karonti – ekena bhikkhunā “bhonto saṅghā saṅghassa kathine
tika-vin08t:1471_1: sampatte kassa puggalassa sappāyārahaṃ hotī”ti pucchite eko bhikkhu nāmaṃ vatvā “itthannāmassa
tika-vin08t:1471_2: therassa sappāyārahaṃ hotī”ti vadati, sappāyaiti ca nivāsanapārupanatthaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin08t:1471_3: vadanti. Etasmiṃ vacane saddato ca atthato ca adhippāyato ca yutti gavesitabbā hoti.
tika-vin08t:1471_4: Kathaṃ? Saddato vaggabhede satiyeva bahuvacanaṃ kattabbaṃ, na abhede, evaṃ saddato.
tika-vin08t:1471_5: Sappāyaitivacanañca anurūpattheyeva vattabbaṃ, na nivāsanapārupanatthe, evaṃ atthato.
tika-vin08t:1471_6: Idañca cīvaraṃ saṅgho kathinaṃ attharituṃ puggalassa deti, na nivāsanapārupanatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1471_7: Vuttañhi pāḷiyaṃ “saṅgho imaṃ kathinadussaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno deti kathinaṃ
tika-vin08t:1471_8: attharitu”nti, tasmā yutti gavesitabbā hoti. “Paṭiggahaṇañca sappāya”ntiādigāthāpi
tika-vin08t:1471_9: katthaci pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāṭīkādīsu ca na dissati, tasmā idha vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1472_0: Sace bahū jiṇṇacīvarā, vuḍḍhassa dātabbanti idaṃ kathinacīvarassa saṅghikattā “na
tika-vin08t:1472_1: ca, bhikkhave, saṅghikaṃ yathāvuḍḍhaṃ paṭibāhitabbaṃ, yo paṭibāheyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin08t:1472_2: iminā pāḷinayena vuttaṃ. Eteneva nayena sabbesu balavacīvaresu santesupi vuḍḍhasseva
tika-vin08t:1472_3: dātabbanti siddhaṃ. Vuḍḍhesu…pe… dātabbanti karaṇasannidhimocanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenevāha
tika-vin08t:1472_4: “sace vuḍḍho”tyādi. Navakatarenapi hi karaṇasannidhiṃ mocetvā kathine atthate anumodanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1472_5: karontassa saṅghassa pañcānisaṃsalābho hotīti. Apicātiādinā saṅghena kattabbavattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1472_6: dasseti. Vacanakkamo pana evaṃ kātabbo – kathinadussaṃ labhitvā saṅghe sīmāya sannipatite
tika-vin08t:1472_7: ekena bhikkhunā “bhante, saṅghassa idaṃ kathinadussaṃ uppannaṃ, saṅgho imaṃ kathinadussaṃ
tika-vin08t:1472_8: kathannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyya kathinaṃ attharitu”nti vutte aññena “yo jiṇṇacīvaro,
tika-vin08t:1472_9: tassā”ti vattabbaṃ, tato purimena “bahū jiṇṇacīvarā”ti vā “natthi idha jiṇṇacīvarā”ti
tika-vin08t:1472_10: vā vutte aparena “tena hi vuḍḍhassā”ti vattabbaṃ, puna purimena “ko ettha vuḍḍho”ti
tika-vin08t:1472_11: vutte itarena “itthannāmo bhikkhū”ti vattabbaṃ, puna purimena “so bhikkhu tadaheva
tika-vin08t:1472_12: cīvaraṃ katvā attharituṃ sakkotī”ti vutte itarena “so sakkotī”ti vā “saṅgho mahātherassa
tika-vin08t:1472_13: saṅgahaṃ karissatī”ti vā vattabbaṃ, puna purimena “so mahāthero aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgato”ti
tika-vin08t:1472_14: vutte itarena “āma samannāgato”ti vattabbaṃ, tato “sādhu suṭṭhu tassa dātabba”nti
tika-vin08t:1472_15: vutte byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñātabbo.
tika-vin08t:1473_0: Ettha ca “bhante, saṅghassā”tiādivacanaṃ “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, idaṃ saṅghassa
tika-vin08t:1473_1: kathinadussaṃ uppannaṃ, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho imaṃ kathinadussaṃ itthannāmassa
tika-vin08t:1473_2: bhikkhuno dadeyya kathinaṃ attharitu”nti imāya ñattipāḷiyā sameti. “Yo jiṇṇacīvaro,
tika-vin08t:1473_3: tassā”tiādi “saṅghena kassā”tiādi “saṅghena kassa dātabbaṃ, yo jiṇṇacīvaro hotī”tiādinā
tika-vin08t:1473_5: samannāgato puggalo bhabbo kathinaṃ attharitu”ntiādikāya parivārapāḷiyā sametīti
tika-vin08t:1473_6: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yassa pana dīyati, tassa ñattidutiyakammavācāya dātabbanti sambandho.
tika-vin08t:1473_7: Iminā imassa kathinadānakammassa garukattā na apalokanamattena dātabbanti imamatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1473_8: pakāseti. Garukalahukānaṃ bhedo kammākammavinicchayakathāyaṃ āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin08t:1474_0: Evaṃ dinne pana kathine paccuddharitabbā adhiṭṭhātabbā vācā bhinditabbāti sambandho.
tika-vin08t:1474_1: Sace taṃ kathinadussaṃ niṭṭhitaparikammameva hotīti iminā kathinadussaṃ nāma na kevalaṃ
tika-vin08t:1474_2: pakatisāṭakameva hoti, atha kho pariniṭṭhitasattavidhapubbakiccacīvarampi hotīti
tika-vin08t:1474_3: dasseti, tasmā niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ dinne sattavidhapubbakiccakaraṇena attho natthi,
tika-vin08t:1474_4: kevalaṃ paccuddharaṇādīniyeva kātabbāni. Sace pana kiñci apariniṭṭhitaṃ hoti, antamaso
tika-vin08t:1474_5: kappabindumattampi, taṃ niṭṭhāpetvāyeva paccuddharaṇādīni kātabbāni. Gaṇṭhikapaṭṭapāsakapaṭṭāni
tika-vin08t:1474_6: pana sibbanantogadhāni, tānipi niṭṭhāpetvāyeva kātabbāni. Aniṭṭhāpento aniṭṭhitasibbanakiccameva
tika-vin08t:1474_7: hoti. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tattha katanti sūcikammapariyosānena kataṃ, sūcikammapariyosānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1474_8: nāma yaṃ kiñci sūciyā kattabbaṃ. Pāsakapaṭṭagaṇṭhikapaṭṭapariyosānaṃ katvā sūciyā
tika-vin08t:1474_9: paṭisāmana”nti. Idañhi kathinavattaṃ nāma buddhappasatthanti “atthatakathinānaṃ vo
tika-vin08t:1478_0: Vuttāni sattavidhapubbakaraṇāni katvā pariyosāpitaṃ kathinacīvaraṃ gahetvā. Atthārakena
tika-vin08t:1478_1: bhikkhunā paccuddharitabbā adhiṭṭhātabbā vācā bhinditabbāti sambandho. Saṅghāṭiyā
tika-vin08t:1478_2: kathinaṃ attharitukāmo bhikkhu pubbe ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhitaṃ porāṇikaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ
tika-vin08t:1478_3: “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paccuddharāmī”ti vatvā paccuddharitabbā, tato anadhiṭṭhitaṃ navaṃ
tika-vin08t:1478_4: saṅghāṭiṃ “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti vatvā adhiṭṭhātabbā, tato attharaṇakāle tameva
tika-vin08t:1478_5: adhiṭṭhitasaṅghāṭiṃ “imāya saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmī”ti vācā bhinditabbāti attho.
tika-vin08t:1478_6: Esa nayo itaresu. Etena kathinatthāraṇaṃ nāma vacībhedakaraṇameva hoti, na kiñci
tika-vin08t:1478_7: kāyavikārakaraṇanti imamatthaṃ dīpeti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ vinayatthamañjūsāyaṃ “attharitabbanti
tika-vin08t:1478_8: attharaṇaṃ kātabbaṃ, tañca kho tathāvacībhedakaraṇamevāti daṭṭhabba”nti.
tika-vin08t:1479_0: Tattha paccuddhāro tividho “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paccuddharāmī”ti saṅghāṭiyā paccuddhāro,
tika-vin08t:1479_3: tīhi dhammehi saṅgahito saṅghāṭiyā uttarāsaṅgena antaravāsakenā”ti. Adhiṭṭhānaṃ tividhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1479_4: “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti saṅghāṭiyā adhiṭṭhānaṃ, “imaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti
tika-vin08t:1479_5: uttarāsaṅgassa adhiṭṭhānaṃ, “imaṃ antaravāsakaṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti antaravāsakassa adhiṭṭhānanti.
tika-vin08t:1479_6: Vuttañhetaṃ parivāre “adhiṭṭhānaṃ tīhi dhammehi saṅgahitaṃ saṅghāṭiyā uttarāsaṅgena antaravāsakenā”ti.
tika-vin08t:1480_0: Atha vā adhiṭṭhānaṃ duvidhaṃ kāyena adhiṭṭhānaṃ, vācāya adhiṭṭhānanti. Tattha porāṇikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1480_1: saṅghāṭiṃ “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paccuddharāmī”ti paccuddharitvā navaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ hatthena
tika-vin08t:1480_2: gahetvā “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti cittena ābhogaṃ katvā kāyavikārakaraṇena kāyena
tika-vin08t:1480_3: vā adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ, vacībhedaṃ katvā vācāya vā adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1480_4: “tattha yasmā dve cīvarassa adhiṭṭhānāni kāyena vā adhiṭṭheti, vācāya vā adhiṭṭhetīti
tika-vin08t:1480_5: vuttaṃ, tasmā…pe… adhiṭṭhātabbā”ti. Atha vā adhiṭṭhānaṃ duvidhaṃ sammukhādhiṭṭhānaparammukhādhiṭṭhānavasena.
tika-vin08t:1480_6: Tattha yadi cīvaraṃ hatthapāse ṭhitaṃ hoti, “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti vacībhedaṃ
tika-vin08t:1480_7: katvā adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ, atha antogabbhe vā sāmantavihāre vā hoti, ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā
tika-vin08t:1480_8: “etaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti vacībhedaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1480_9: “tatra duvidhaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ sace hatthapāse hotī”tiādi, vinayatthamañjūsāyañca “duvidhanti
tika-vin08t:1481_0: Atthāro katividho? Atthāro ekavidho. Vacībhedakaraṇeneva hi atthāro sampajjati, na
tika-vin08t:1481_2: kātabbaṃ, tañca kho tathāvacībhedakaraṇamevāti daṭṭhabba”nti vinayatthamañjūsāvacanena
tika-vin08t:1481_3: ca viññāyati. Atha vā atthāro tividho vatthuppabhedena. Tattha yadi saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ
tika-vin08t:1481_4: attharitukāmo hoti, porāṇikā saṅghāṭi paccuddharitabbā, navā saṅghāṭi adhiṭṭhātabbā,
tika-vin08t:1481_5: “imāya saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmī”ti vācā bhinditabbā. Atha uttarāsaṅgena kathinaṃ
tika-vin08t:1481_6: attharitukāmo hoti, porāṇako uttarāsaṅgo paccuddharitabbo, navo uttarāsaṅgo adhiṭṭhātabbo,
tika-vin08t:1481_7: “iminā uttarāsaṅgena kathinaṃ attharāmī”ti vācā bhinditabbā. Atha antaravāsakena
tika-vin08t:1481_8: kathinaṃ attharitukāmo hoti, porāṇako antaravāsako paccuddharitabbo, navo antaravāsako
tika-vin08t:1481_9: adhiṭṭhātabbo, “iminā antaravāsakena kathinaṃ attharāmī”ti vācā bhinditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-vin08t:1482_0: Ettha siyā – kiṃ pana “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paccuddharāmī”ti visesaṃ katvāva paccuddharitabbā,
tika-vin08t:1482_2: adhiṭṭhitaṃ cīvaraṃ “imaṃ paccuddharāmī”ti sāmaññato paccuddharitabbaṃ, na “imaṃ
tika-vin08t:1482_3: saṅghāṭiṃ paccuddharāmī”ti visesato paccuddharitabbaṃ. Kasmā? Pubbe aladdhanāmattā.
tika-vin08t:1482_4: Ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhitaṃ pana cīvaraṃ visesatoyeva paccuddharitabbaṃ, na sāmaññato.
tika-vin08t:1482_5: Kasmā? Paṭiladdhavisesanāmattā. Idha pana kathinādhikāre pubbeva ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena
tika-vin08t:1482_6: adhiṭṭhitattā visesatoyeva paccuddharitabbanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ parivāre kathinādhikāre
tika-vin08t:1482_7: “paccuddhāro tīhi dhammehi saṅgahito saṅghāṭiyā uttarāsaṅgena antaravāsakenā”ti.
tika-vin08t:1482_8: Kiṃ pana niccatecīvarikoyeva kathinaṃ attharituṃ labhati, udāhu avatthātecīvarikopīti?
tika-vin08t:1482_11: sabbakālameva dhāreti. Vinayatecīvariko pana yadā ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhahitvā
tika-vin08t:1482_12: dhāretukāmo hoti, tadā tathā adhiṭṭhahitvā dhāreti. Yadā pana parikkhāracoḷādhiṭṭhānena
tika-vin08t:1482_13: adhiṭṭhahitvā dhāretukāmo hoti, tadā tathā adhiṭṭhahitvā dhāreti, tasmā ticīvarādhiṭṭhānassa
tika-vin08t:1482_14: dupparihārattā sabbadā dhāretuṃ asakkonto hutvā parikkhāracoḷavasena dhārentopi taṃ
tika-vin08t:1482_15: paccuddharitvā āsanne kāle ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhahantopi kathinaṃ attharituṃ
tika-vin08t:1483_0: Kacci nu bho kathinadānakammavācābhaṇanasīmāyameva kathinaṃ attharitabbaṃ, udāhu
tika-vin08t:1483_2: anto ṭhitā, evaṃ sati tasmiṃyeva sīmamaṇḍale attharaṇaṃ kātabbaṃ. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti
tika-vin08t:1483_3: ce? “Pariniṭṭhitapubbakaraṇameva ce dāyako saṅghassa deti, sampaṭicchitvā kammavācāya
tika-vin08t:1483_4: dātabbaṃ. Tena ca tasmiṃyeva sīmamaṇḍale adhiṭṭhahitvā attharitvā saṅgho anumodāpetabbo”ti
tika-vin08t:1483_5: vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ āgatattā viññāyatīti. Yadi evaṃ “tasmiṃyeva sīmamaṇḍale”icceva
tika-vin08t:1483_6: ṭīkāyaṃ vuttattā “yasmiṃ kismiñci sīmamaṇḍale kammavācaṃ bhaṇitvā tasmiṃyeva sīmamaṇḍale
tika-vin08t:1483_8: anto ṭhitā”ti visesaṃ katvā vattabbanti? Na na vattabbaṃ. Kammavācābhaṇanasīmā hi
tika-vin08t:1483_9: baddhasīmābhūtā, kathinatthārasīmā pana upacārasīmābhūtā, upacārasīmā ca nāma baddhasīmaṃ
tika-vin08t:1483_10: avattharitvāpi gacchati, tasmā sā sīmā baddhasīmā ca hoti upacārasīmā cāti tasmiṃyeva
tika-vin08t:1483_11: sīmamaṇḍale kathinadānakammavācaṃ bhaṇitvā tattheva attharaṇaṃ kātabbaṃ, na yasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:1483_12: kismiñci sīmamaṇḍale kammavācaṃ bhaṇitvā tattheva attharaṇaṃ kattabbanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1483_14: tampi vattabbameva. Tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vassūpanāyikakhettabhūtāya eva upacārasīmāya
tika-vin08t:1483_15: kathinatthāraṃ kātuṃ labhati, na aññaupacārasīmāya. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “aññasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:1483_16: vihāre vutthavassāpi na labhantīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vutta”nti.
tika-vin08t:1484_0: Yathicchasi, tathā bhavatu, api tu khalu “kammavācābhaṇanasīmā baddhasīmābhūtā, kathinatthārasīmā
tika-vin08t:1484_1: upacārasīmābhūtā”ti tumhehi vuttaṃ, tathābhūtabhāvo kathaṃ jānitabboti? Vuccate –
tika-vin08t:1484_2: kathinatthārasīmāyaṃ tāva upacārasīmābhūtabhāvo “sace pana ekasīmāya bahū vihārā
tika-vin08t:1484_3: honti, sabbe bhikkhū sannipātetvā ekattha kathinaṃ attharitabba”nti imissā aṭṭhakathāya
tika-vin08t:1484_4: atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetuṃ “ekasīmāyāti ekaupacārasīmāyāti attho yujjatī”ti vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1484_5: āgatattā viññāyati. Kammavācābhaṇanasīmāya baddhasīmābhūtabhāvo pana “te ca kho hatthapāsaṃ
tika-vin08t:1484_6: avijahitvā ekasīmāyaṃ ṭhitā. Sīmā ca nāmesā baddhasīmā abaddhasīmāti duvidhā hotī”ti
tika-vin08t:1484_7: kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ āgatattā ca “sīmā ca nāmesā katamā, yattha hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā
tika-vin08t:1484_8: ṭhitā kammappattā nāma hontīti anuyogaṃ sandhāya sīmaṃ dassento vibhāgavantānaṃ sabhāvavibhāvanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1485_0: Tattha katividhā baddhasīmā, katividhā abaddhasīmāti? Tividhā baddhasīmā khaṇḍasīmāsamānasaṃvāsasīmāavippavāsasīmāvasena.
tika-vin08t:1485_2: Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? “Evaṃ ekādasa vipattisīmāyo atikkamitvā tividhasampattiyuttā
tika-vin08t:1485_3: nimittena nimittaṃ sambandhitvā sammatā sīmā baddhasīmāti veditabbā. Khaṇḍasīmā samānasaṃvāsasīmā
tika-vin08t:1485_4: avippavāsasīmāti tassāyeva bhedo. Abaddhasīmā pana gāmasīmā sattabbhantarasīmā udakukkhepasīmāti
tika-vin08t:1485_5: tividhā”ti kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ āgatattā viññāyati. Evaṃ tīsu baddhasīmāsu, tīsu abaddhasīmāsūti
tika-vin08t:1485_7: suddhāya upacārasīmāya kammavācāya abhaṇitabbabhāvo viññāyati. Antoupacārasīmāya
tika-vin08t:1485_8: baddhasīmāya sati taṃ baddhasīmaṃ avattharitvāpi upacārasīmāya gamanato sā baddhasīmā
tika-vin08t:1485_9: kammavācābhaṇanārahā ca hoti kathinatthārārahā cāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1486_0: Nanu ca pannarasavidhā sīmā aṭṭhakathāsu āgatā, atha kasmā chaḷeva vuttāti? Saccaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1486_1: tāsu pana pannarasasu sīmāsu upacārasīmā saṅghalābhavibhajanādiṭṭhānameva hoti, lābhasīmā
tika-vin08t:1486_2: tatruppādagahaṇaṭṭhānameva hotīti imā dve sīmāyo saṅghakammakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ na honti,
tika-vin08t:1486_3: nigamasīmā nagarasīmā janapadasīmā raṭṭhasīmā rajjasīmā dīpasīmā cakkavāḷasīmāti
tika-vin08t:1486_4: imā pana sīmāyo gāmasīmāya samānagatikā gāmasīmāyameva antogadhāti na visuṃ vuttāti
tika-vin08t:1486_5: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha ca upacārasīmāya baddhasīmaṃ avattharitvā gatabhāvo kathaṃ jānitabboti?
tika-vin08t:1486_7: paricchinnā”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā parikkhepaparikkhepārahaṭṭhānānaṃ anto baddhasīmāya
tika-vin08t:1486_8: vijjamānāya taṃ avattharitvā upacārasīmā gatā. Tathā hi “imissā upacārasīmāya ‘saṅghassa
tika-vin08t:1486_9: dammī’ti dinnaṃ pana khaṇḍasīmasīmantarikāsu ṭhitānampi pāpuṇātī”ti vuttaṃ. Tena
tika-vin08t:1486_10: ñāyati “upacārasīmāya anto ṭhitā baddhasīmā upacārasīmāpi nāma hotī”ti. Hotu, evaṃ
tika-vin08t:1486_11: sati antoupacārasīmāyaṃ baddhasīmāya sati tattheva kathinadānakammavācaṃ vācāpetvā
tika-vin08t:1486_12: tattheva kathinaṃ attharitabbaṃ bhaveyya, antoupacārasīmāyaṃ baddhasīmāya avijjamānāya
tika-vin08t:1486_13: kathaṃ karissantīti? Antoupacārasīmāyaṃ baddhasīmāya avijjamānāya bahiupacārasīmāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1486_14: vijjamānabaddhasīmaṃ vā udakukkhepalabhanaṭṭhānaṃ vā gantvā kammavācaṃ vācāpetvā
tika-vin08t:1486_15: puna vihāraṃ āgantvā vassūpanāyikakhettabhūtāya upacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhatvā kathinaṃ attharitabbanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1487_0: Nanu ca bho evaṃ sante aññissā sīmāya ñatti, aññissā atthāro hoti, evaṃ sante “pariniṭṭhitapubbakaraṇameva
tika-vin08t:1487_1: ce dāyako saṅghassa deti, sampaṭicchitvā kammavācāya dātabbaṃ. Tena ca tasmiṃyeva
tika-vin08t:1487_2: sīmamaṇḍale adhiṭṭhahitvā attharitvā saṅgho anumodāpetabbo”ti vuttena vajirabuddhiṭīkāvacanena
tika-vin08t:1487_4: upacārasīmābhūtā”ti. Tasmā vajirabuddhiṭīkāvacanena na virujjhati. Tattha pubbe yebhuyyena
tika-vin08t:1487_5: baddhasīmavihārattā samaggaṃ saṅghaṃ sannipātetvā kammavācaṃ vācāpetvā upacārasīmabaddhasīmabhūte
tika-vin08t:1487_6: tasmiṃyeva vihāre attharaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Baddhasīmavihāre ahontepi antoupacārasīmāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1487_7: baddhasīmāya vijjamānāya tattheva sīmamaṇḍale kammavācaṃ vācāpetvā tattheva attharitabbabhāvo
tika-vin08t:1487_8: amhehipi vuttoyeva. Yadi pana na ceva baddhasīmavihāro hoti, na ca antoupacārasīmāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1487_9: baddhasīmā atthi, evarūpe vihāre kammavācaṃ vācāpetuṃ na labhati, aññaṃ baddhasīmaṃ
tika-vin08t:1487_10: vā udakukkhepaṃ vā gantvā kammavācaṃ vācāpetvā attano vihāraṃ āgantvā vassūpanāyikakhettabhūtāya
tika-vin08t:1487_11: upacārasīmāya ṭhatvā kathinaṃ attharitabbaṃ. Evameva paramparabhūtā bahavo ācariyavarā
tika-vin08t:1488_0: Apare pana ācariyā “baddhasīmavirahāya suddhaupacārasīmāya sati tassaṃyeva upacārasīmāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1488_1: ñattikammavācāpi vācetabbā, kathinaṃ attharitabbaṃ, na aññissā sīmāya ñatti, aññissā
tika-vin08t:1488_2: attharaṇaṃ kātabba”nti vadanti. Ayaṃ pana nesamadhippāyo – “kathinatthatasīmāyanti
tika-vin08t:1488_3: upacārasīmaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ kathinatthāraṭṭhānabhūtāya sīmāya
tika-vin08t:1488_4: upacārasīmābhāvo vutto, tassaṃyeva ṭīkāyaṃ pubbe niddiṭṭhapāṭhe “tasmiṃyeva sīmamaṇḍale
tika-vin08t:1488_5: adhiṭṭhahitvā attharitvā saṅgho anumodāpetabbo”ti kammavācābhaṇanasīmāyameva attharitabbabhāvo
tika-vin08t:1488_6: ca vutto, tasmā aññissā sīmāya ñatti, aññissā attharaṇaṃ na kātabbaṃ, tassaṃyeva
tika-vin08t:1488_7: upacārasīmāyaṃ kammavācaṃ sāvetvā tasmiṃyeva atthāro kātabbo, upacārasīmato bahi
tika-vin08t:1489_0: Tatrevaṃ vicāraṇā kātabbā – idaṃ bhāsantaresu “ñattī”ti kathitaṃ kathinadānakammaṃ
tika-vin08t:1489_1: catūsu saṅghakammesu ñattidutiyakammaṃ hoti, ñattidutiyakammassa navasu ṭhānesu kathinadānaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1489_2: garukalahukesu garukaṃ, yadi “upacārasīmāyaṃ cattāri saṅghakammāni kātabbānī”ti pakaraṇesu
tika-vin08t:1489_3: āgataṃ abhavissā, evaṃ sante tesaṃ ācariyānaṃ vacanānurūpato upacārasīmāyaṃ kathinadānañattikammavācaṃ
tika-vin08t:1489_4: vācetabbaṃ abhavissā, na pana pakaraṇesu “upacārasīmāyaṃ cattāri saṅghakammāni kātabbānī”ti
tika-vin08t:1489_5: āgataṃ, atha kho “saṅghalābhavibhajanaṃ, āgantukavattaṃ katvā ārāmappavisanaṃ, gamikassa
tika-vin08t:1489_7: aruṇuṭṭhāpanaṃ, bhikkhunīnaṃ ārāmappavisanaāpucchanaṃ iccevamādīni eva upacārasīmāya
tika-vin08t:1489_8: kattabbānī”ti āgataṃ, tasmā kathinadānañattidutiyakammavācā kevalāyaṃ upacārasīmāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1489_9: na vācetabbāti siddhā. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? “Avippavāsasīmā nāma tiyojanāpi hoti,
tika-vin08t:1489_10: evaṃ sante tiyojane ṭhitā lābhaṃ gaṇhissanti, tiyojane ṭhatvā āgantukavattaṃ pūretvā
tika-vin08t:1489_11: ārāmaṃ pavisitabbaṃ bhavissati, gamiko tiyojanaṃ gantvā senāsanaṃ āpucchissati, nissayapaṭipannassa
tika-vin08t:1489_12: bhikkhuno tiyojanātikkame nissayo paṭippassambhissati, pārivāsikena tiyojanaṃ atikkamitvā
tika-vin08t:1489_13: aruṇaṃ uṭṭhapetabbaṃ bhavissati, bhikkhuniyā tiyojane ṭhatvā ārāmappavisanaṃ āpucchitabbaṃ
tika-vin08t:1489_14: bhavissati, sabbampetaṃ upacārasīmāya paricchedavaseneva kātuṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā upacārasīmāyameva
tika-vin08t:1490_0: Athevaṃ vadeyyuṃ – “upacārasīmā ñattidutiyakammavācāya ṭhānaṃ na hotī”ti tumhehi
tika-vin08t:1490_1: vuttaṃ, atha ca pana katapubbaṃ atthi. Tathā hi cīvarapaṭiggāhakasammuticīvaranidahakasammuticīvarabhājakasammutīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1490_2: “suṇātu me…pe… dhārayāmīti imāya kammavācāya vā apalokanena vā antovihāre sabbasaṅghamajjhepi
tika-vin08t:1490_3: khaṇḍasīmāyapi sammannituṃ vaṭṭatiyevā”ti upacārasīmāyaṃ ñattidutiyakammavācāya nipphādetabbabhāvo
tika-vin08t:1490_4: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgato. Bhaṇḍāgārassa pana “imaṃ pana bhaṇḍāgāraṃ khaṇḍasīmaṃ gantvā
tika-vin08t:1490_5: khaṇḍasīmāya nisinnehi sammannituṃ na vaṭṭati, vihāramajjheyeva ‘suṇātu me, bhante,
tika-vin08t:1490_6: saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmaṃ vihāraṃ bhaṇḍāgāraṃ sammanneyyā’tiādinā
tika-vin08t:1490_7: nayena kammavācāya vā apalokanena vā sammannitabba”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ upacārasīmāyameva
tika-vin08t:1491_0: Te evaṃ vattabbā – sacepi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgataṃ “antovihāre”ti pāṭho “vihāramajjhe”ti
tika-vin08t:1491_1: pāṭho ca upacārasīmaṃ sandhāya vuttoti maññamānā tumhe āyasmanto evaṃ avacuttha,
tika-vin08t:1491_2: te pana pāṭhā upacārasīmaṃ sandhāya aṭṭhakathācariyehi na vuttā, atha kho avippavāsasīmāsaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin08t:1491_3: mahāsīmaṃ sandhāya vuttā. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? Khaṇḍasīmāya vakkhamānattā. Khaṇḍasīmāya
tika-vin08t:1491_4: hi mahāsīmā eva paṭiyogī hoti. Upacārasīmāti ayamattho kathaṃ jānitabboti ce? “Imaṃ
tika-vin08t:1491_5: pana samānasaṃvāsakasīmaṃ sammannantehi pabbajjūpasampadādīnaṃ saṅghakammānaṃ sukhakaraṇatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1491_6: paṭhamaṃ khaṇḍasīmā sammannitabbā…pe… evaṃ baddhāsu pana sīmāsu khaṇḍasīmāya ṭhitā
tika-vin08t:1491_7: bhikkhū mahāsīmāya kammaṃ karontānaṃ na kopenti, mahāsīmāya vā ṭhitā khaṇḍasīmāya
tika-vin08t:1491_8: kammaṃ karontānaṃ. Sīmantarikāya pana ṭhitā ubhinnampi na kopentī”ti vuttaaṭṭhakathāpāṭhavasena
tika-vin08t:1491_9: jānitabboti. Atha vā tehi āyasmantehi ābhatabhaṇḍāgārasammutipāṭhavasenapi ayamattho
tika-vin08t:1491_10: viññāyati. Kathaṃ? Cīvarapaṭiggāhakādipuggalasammutiyo pana antovihāre sabbasaṅghamajjhepi
tika-vin08t:1491_11: khaṇḍasīmāyampi sammannituṃ vaṭṭati, bhaṇḍāgārasaṅkhātavihārasammuti pana vihāramajjheyevāti
tika-vin08t:1492_0: Tatrevaṃ visesakāraṇaṃ paññāyati – “aññissā sīmāya vatthu aññissā kammavācā”ti vattabbadosaparihāratthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1492_1: vuttaṃ. Puggalasammutiyo hi puggalassa vatthuttā yadi mahāsīmabhūte antovihāre kattukāmā
tika-vin08t:1492_2: honti, sabbasaṅghamajjhe taṃ vatthubhūtaṃ puggalaṃ hatthapāse katvā kareyyuṃ. Yadi
tika-vin08t:1492_3: khaṇḍasīmāya kattukāmā, taṃ vatthubhūtaṃ puggalaṃ khaṇḍasīmaṃ ānetvā tattha sannipatitakammappattasaṅghassa
tika-vin08t:1492_4: hatthapāse katvā kareyyuṃ. Ubhayathāpi yathāvuttadoso natthi, bhaṇḍāgārasammuti pana
tika-vin08t:1492_5: bhaṇḍāgārassa vihārattā khaṇḍasīmaṃ ānetuṃ na sakkā, tasmā yadi taṃ sammutiṃ khaṇḍasīmāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1492_6: ṭhatvā kareyyuṃ, vatthu mahāsīmāyaṃ hoti, kammavācā khaṇḍasīmāyanti yathāvuttadoso
tika-vin08t:1492_7: hoti, tasmiñca dose sati vatthuvipannattā kammaṃ vipajjati, tasmā mahāsīmabhūtavihāramajjheyeva
tika-vin08t:1492_8: sā sammuti kātabbāti aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ mati, na upacārasīmāya ñattidutiyakammaṃ kātabbanti.
tika-vin08t:1493_0: Athāpi evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “vihārasaddena avippavāsasīmabhūtā mahāsīmāva vuttā, na upacārasīmā”ti
tika-vin08t:1493_1: idaṃ vacanaṃ kathaṃ paccetabbanti? Imināyeva aṭṭhakathāvacanena. Yadi hi upacārasīmā
tika-vin08t:1493_2: vuttā bhaveyya, upacārasīmā nāma baddhasīmaṃ avattharitvāpi pavattā āvāsesu vā bhikkhūsu
tika-vin08t:1493_3: vā vaḍḍhantesu aniyamavasena vaḍḍhati, tasmā khaṇḍasīmaṃ avattharitvā pavattanato
tika-vin08t:1493_4: vihārena saha khaṇḍasīmā ekasīmāyeva hoti, evaṃ sati vihāre ṭhitaṃ bhaṇḍāgāraṃ khaṇḍasīmāya
tika-vin08t:1493_5: ṭhatvā sammannituṃ sakkā bhaveyya, na pana sakkā “khaṇḍasīmāya nisinnehi sammannituṃ
tika-vin08t:1493_6: na vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ paṭisiddhattā. Tena ñāyati “imasmiṃ ṭhāne vihārasaddena
tika-vin08t:1493_7: avippavāsasīmabhūtā mahāsīmā vuttā, na upacārasīmā”ti. Upacārasīmāya aniyamavasena
tika-vin08t:1493_8: vaḍḍhanabhāvo kathaṃ jānitabboti? “Upacārasīmā parikkhittassa vihārassa parikkhepena,
tika-vin08t:1493_9: aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānena paricchinnā hoti. Apica bhikkhūnaṃ dhuvasannipātaṭṭhānato
tika-vin08t:1493_10: vā pariyante ṭhitabhojanasālato vā nibaddhavasanakaāvāsato vā thāmamajjhimassa purisassa
tika-vin08t:1493_11: dvinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ anto upacārasīmā veditabbā, sā pana āvāsesu vaḍḍhantesu vaḍḍhati,
tika-vin08t:1493_12: parihāyantesu parihāyati. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana ‘bhikkhūsupi vaḍḍhantesu vaḍḍhatī’ti
tika-vin08t:1493_13: vuttaṃ, tasmā sace vihāre sannipatitabhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekābaddhā hutvā yojanasatampi
tika-vin08t:1493_14: pūretvā nisīdanti, yojanasatampi upacārasīmāva hoti, sabbesaṃ lābho pāpuṇātī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vacanatoti.
tika-vin08t:1494_0: Yadi evaṃ upacārasīmāya kathinatthatabhāvo kasmā vuttoti? Kathinattharaṇaṃ nāma na
tika-vin08t:1494_1: saṅghakammaṃ, puggalakammameva hoti, tasmā vassūpanāyikakhettabhūtāya upacārasīmāya
tika-vin08t:1494_2: kātabbā hoti. Ñattikammavācā pana saṅghakammabhūtā, tasmā upacārasīmāya kātuṃ na
tika-vin08t:1494_3: vaṭṭati, suvisodhitaparisāya baddhābaddhasīmāyameva vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nanu ca
tika-vin08t:1494_4: bho “kathinaṃ attharituṃ ke labhanti, ke na labhanti? Gaṇanavasena tāva pacchimakoṭiyā
tika-vin08t:1494_5: pañca janā labhanti, uddhaṃ satasahassampi, pañcannaṃ heṭṭhā na labhantī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1494_6: vuttaṃ, atha kasmā “kathinattharaṇaṃ nāma na saṅghakammaṃ, puggalakammameva hotī”ti
tika-vin08t:1494_7: vuttanti? “Na saṅgho kathinaṃ attharati, na gaṇo kathinaṃ attharati, puggalo kathinaṃ
tika-vin08t:1494_8: attharatī”ti parivāre vuttattā ca apalokanakammādīnaṃ catunnaṃ saṅghakammānaṃ ṭhānesu
tika-vin08t:1494_9: apaviṭṭhattā ca. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana kathinatthārassa upacārabhūtaṃ kathinadānakammavācābhaṇanakālaṃ
tika-vin08t:1494_10: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tasmiñhi kāle kathinadāyakā cattāro, paṭiggāhako ekoti pacchimakoṭiyā
tika-vin08t:1494_11: pañca honti, tato heṭṭhā na labhatīti. Ñattikammavācāya saṅghakammabhāvo kathaṃ jānitabboti?
tika-vin08t:1494_12: “Catunnaṃ saṅghakammānaṃ ñattidutiyakammassa navasu ṭhānesu kathinadāna”nti āgatattā,
tika-vin08t:1494_13: “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, idaṃ saṅghassa kathinadussaṃ uppanna”ntiādinā vuttattā cāti.
tika-vin08t:1495_0: Apare pana ācariyā “bhāsantaresu ñattīti vuttā kathinadānakammavācā atthārakiriyāya
tika-vin08t:1495_1: pavisati, atthārakiriyā ca upacārasīmāyaṃ kātabbā, tasmā kathinadānakammavācāpi upacārasīmāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1495_2: kātabbāyevā”ti vadanti, tesaṃ ayamadhippāyo – mahāvaggapāḷiyaṃ “evañca pana, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:1495_3: kathinaṃ attharitabba”nti ārabhitvā “byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo…pe…
tika-vin08t:1495_4: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, atthataṃ hoti kathina”nti kathinadānañattikammavācāto paṭṭhāya
tika-vin08t:1495_5: yāva anumodanā pāṭho āgato, parivārapāḷiyañca “kathinatthāro jānitabbo”ti uddesassa
tika-vin08t:1495_6: niddese “sace saṅghassa kathinadussaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, saṅghena kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1495_7: atthārakena kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ, anumodakena kathaṃ paṭipajjitabba”nti pucchaṃ
tika-vin08t:1495_8: nīharitvā “saṅghena ñattidutiyena kammena kathinatthārakassa bhikkhuno dātabbaṃ…pe…
tika-vin08t:1495_9: anumodāmā”ti ñattito paṭṭhāya yāva anumodanā pāṭho āgato, tasmā ñattito paṭṭhāya
tika-vin08t:1495_10: yāva anumodanā sabbo vidhi kathinatthārakiriyāyaṃ pavisati, tato kathinatthārakiriyāya
tika-vin08t:1495_11: upacārasīmāyaṃ kattabbāya sati ñattisaṅkhātakathinadānakammavācāpi upacārasīmāyaṃ kattabbāyevāti.
tika-vin08t:1496_0: Tatrevaṃ vicāraṇā kātabbā – atthārakiriyāya visuṃ anāgatāya sati “sabbo vidhi atthārakiriyāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1496_1: pavisatī”ti vattabbaṃ bhaveyya, atha ca pana mahāvaggapāḷiyañca parivārapāḷiyañca
tika-vin08t:1496_2: atthārakiriyā visuṃ āgatāyeva, tasmā ñattisaṅkhātā kathinadānakammavācā atthārakiriyāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1496_3: na pavisati, kevalaṃ atthārakiriyāya upacārabhūtattā pana tato paṭṭhāya anukkamena
tika-vin08t:1496_4: vuttaṃ. Yathā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sīmaṃ sammannitu”nti sīmāsammutiṃ anujānitvā
tika-vin08t:1496_5: “evañca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbā”ti sīmāsammutividhiṃ dassento “paṭhamaṃ nimittā
tika-vin08t:1496_6: kittetabbā…pe… evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti nimittakittanena saha sīmāsammutikammavācā desitā,
tika-vin08t:1496_7: tattha nimittakittanaṃ sīmāsammutikammaṃ na hoti, kammavācāyeva sīmāsammutikammaṃ
tika-vin08t:1496_8: hoti, tathāpi sīmāsammutikammavācāya upacārabhāvato saha nimittakittanena sīmāsammutikammavācā
tika-vin08t:1496_9: desitā. Yathā ca upasampadākammavidhiṃ desento “paṭhamaṃ upajjhaṃ gāhāpetabbo…pe…
tika-vin08t:1496_10: evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti upajjhāyagāhāpanādinā saha upasampadākammaṃ desitaṃ, tattha
tika-vin08t:1496_11: upajjhāyagāhāpanādi upasampadākammaṃ na hoti, ñatticatutthakammavācāyeva upasampadākammaṃ
tika-vin08t:1496_12: hoti, tathāpi upasampadākammassa samīpe bhūtattā upajjhāyagāhāpanādinā saha ñatticatutthakammavācā
tika-vin08t:1496_13: desitā, evamettha kathinadānakammavācā atthārakiriyā na hoti, tathāpi atthārakiriyāya
tika-vin08t:1496_15: tasmā kathinadānakammavācā atthārakiriyāyaṃ na pavisatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1497_0: Atha vā ñattidutiyakammavācā ca atthāro cāti ime dve dhammā atulyakiriyā atulyakattāro
tika-vin08t:1497_1: atulyakammā atulyakālā ca honti, tena viññāyati “bhāsantaresu ñattīti vuttā ñattidutiyakammavācā
tika-vin08t:1497_2: atthārakiriyāyaṃ na pavisatī”ti. Tattha kathaṃ atulyakiriyā honti? Kammavācā dānakiriyā
tika-vin08t:1497_3: hoti, atthāro pannarasadhammānaṃ kāraṇabhūtā atthārakiriyā, evaṃ atulyakiriyā. Kathaṃ
tika-vin08t:1497_4: atulyakattāroti? Kammavācāya kattā saṅgho hoti, atthārassa kattā puggalo, evaṃ atulyakattāro
tika-vin08t:1497_5: honti. Kathaṃ atulyakammā honti? Kammavācāya kammaṃ kathinadussaṃ hoti, atthārassa
tika-vin08t:1497_6: kammaṃ kathinasaṅkhātā samūhapaññatti, evaṃ atulyakammā honti. Kathaṃ atulyakālā
tika-vin08t:1497_7: honti? Kathinadānakammavācā pubbakaraṇapaccuddhāraadhiṭṭhānānaṃ pubbe hoti, atthāro
tika-vin08t:1497_8: tesaṃ pacchā, evaṃ atulyakālā hontīti. Atha vā atthāro “imāya saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ
tika-vin08t:1497_9: attharāmī”tiādinā vacībhedasaṅkhātena ekena dhammena saṅgahito, na ñattianussāvanādinā
tika-vin08t:1497_10: anekehi dhammehi saṅgahito. Vuttañhetaṃ parivāre “atthāro ekena dhammena saṅgahito
tika-vin08t:1497_11: vacībhedenā”ti. Imināpi kāraṇena jānitabbaṃ “na ñatti atthāre paviṭṭhā”ti.
tika-vin08t:1498_0: Aññe pana ācariyā evaṃ vadanti – “kathinatthāraṃ ke labhanti, ke na labhantīti? Gaṇanavasena
tika-vin08t:1498_1: tāva pacchimakoṭiyā pañca janā labhanti, uddhaṃ satasahassampi, pañcannaṃ heṭṭhā
tika-vin08t:1498_2: na labhantī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatattā “heṭṭhimantato pañca bhikkhū kathinatthāraṃ
tika-vin08t:1498_3: labhanti, tato appakatarā na labhantī”ti viññāyati. “Pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:1498_4: pacchimakoṭiyā cattāro kathinadussassa dāyakā, eko paṭiggāhakoti pañcannaṃ janānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1498_5: vaṭṭatī”ti kaṅkhāvitaraṇīṭīkāyaṃ āgatattā tasmiṃ vākye “vaṭṭatī”ti kiriyāya kattā
tika-vin08t:1498_6: “so kathinatthāro”ti vuccati, tasmā atthāroti iminā “imāya saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmī”ti
tika-vin08t:1498_7: vuttaattharaṇakiriyā na adhippetā, catūhi bhikkhūhi atthārakassa bhikkhuno ñattiyā
tika-vin08t:1498_8: dānaṃ adhippetanti viññāyati. “Kathinatthāraṃ ke labhanti…pe… uddhaṃ satasahassanti
tika-vin08t:1498_9: idaṃ atthārakassa bhikkhuno saṅghassa kathinadussadānakammaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vinayavinicchayaṭīkāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1498_10: vuttaṃ. Tasmimpi pāṭhe ñattiyā dinnaṃyeva sandhāya “pañca janā atthāraṃ labhantī”ti
tika-vin08t:1498_11: idaṃ vacanaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyehi vuttaṃ, “imāya saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmī”tiādi
tika-vin08t:1498_12: puggalassa attharaṇaṃ sandhāya na vuttanti ṭīkācariyassa adhippāyo. Evaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇīṭīkā-vinayavinicchayaṭīkākārakehi
tika-vin08t:1498_13: ācariyehi “ñattidutiyakammaṃ atthāro nāmā”ti vinicchitattā upacārasīmāyaṃ kathinadānañattikammavācākaraṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:1499_0: Tatrevaṃ vicāraṇā kātabbā – “ñattidutiyakammaṃyeva atthāro nāmā”ti ṭīkācariyā na
tika-vin08t:1499_1: vadeyyuṃ. Vadeyyuṃ ce, aṭṭhakathāya viruddho siyā. Kathaṃ viruddhoti ce? “Chinnavassā
tika-vin08t:1499_2: vā pacchimikāya upagatā vā na labhanti, aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthavassāpi na labhantīti
tika-vin08t:1499_3: mahāpaccariyaṃ vutta”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatattā “te chinnavassādayo kathinatthāraṃ
tika-vin08t:1499_4: na labhantī”ti viññāyati. Yadi ñattidutiyakammaṃ atthāro nāma siyā, evaṃ sati te
tika-vin08t:1499_5: bhikkhū ñattidutiyakammepi gaṇapūrakabhāvena appaviṭṭhā siyuṃ. Atha ca pana “purimikāya
tika-vin08t:1499_6: upagatānaṃ pana sabbe gaṇapūrakā hontī”ti aṭṭhakathāya vuttattā te ñattidutiyakamme
tika-vin08t:1499_7: paviṭṭhāva honti, tasmā aṭṭhakathācariyo pañcānisaṃsahetubhūtaṃ “imāya saṅghāṭiyā
tika-vin08t:1499_8: kathinaṃ attharāmī”tiādikaṃ vacībhedaṃyeva “atthāro”ti vadati, na ñattidutiyakammaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1499_9: tasmā te chinnavassādayo pañcānisaṃsahetubhūtaṃ kathinatthāraṃ na labhanti, ñattidutiyakamme
tika-vin08t:1499_10: pana catuvaggasaṅghapūrakabhāvaṃ labhantīti viññāyati. Punapi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1499_11: “sace purimikāya upagatā cattāro vā honti tayo vā dve vā eko vā, itare gaṇapūrake
tika-vin08t:1499_12: katvā kathinaṃ attharitabba”nti. Evaṃ alabbhamānakathinatthāreyeva chinnavassādayo
tika-vin08t:1499_13: gaṇapūrake katvā ñattidutiyakammavācāya kathinadussaṃ dāpetvā purimikāya upagatehi
tika-vin08t:1499_14: kathinassa attharitabbabhāvato “ñattidutiyakammaṃyeva atthāro nāmāti ṭīkācariyā na
tika-vin08t:1500_0: Nanu ca bho imasmimpi aṭṭhakathāvacane “itare gaṇapūrake katvā kathinaṃ attharitabba”nti
tika-vin08t:1500_2: Na, pubbāparavirodhato. Pubbe hi chinnavassādīnaṃ kathinaṃ attharituṃ alabbhamānabhāvo
tika-vin08t:1500_3: vutto, idha “ñattidutiyakammaṃ atthāro”ti vutte tesampi labbhamānabhāvo vutto bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t:1500_4: na aṭṭhakathācariyā pubbāparaviruddhaṃ katheyyuṃ, tasmā “katvā”ti padaṃ “attharitabba”nti
tika-vin08t:1500_5: padena sambajjhantena samānakālavisesanaṃ akatvā pubbakālavisesanameva katvā sambandhitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1500_6: evaṃ sati pubbavacanenāparavacanaṃ gaṅgodakena yamunodakaṃ viya saṃsandati, pacchāpi
tika-vin08t:1500_7: ca “kammavācaṃ sāvetvā kathinaṃ attharāpetvā dānañca bhuñjitvā gamissantī”ti visuṃ
tika-vin08t:1500_8: kammavācāsāvanaṃ visuṃ kathinattharaṇaṃ pubbāparānukkamato vuttaṃ, tasmā ñattidutiyakammaṃ
tika-vin08t:1500_9: atthāro nāma na hoti, kevalaṃ atthārassa kāraṇameva upacārameva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1500_10: Kiñca bhiyyo – “na saṅgho kathinaṃ attharati, na gaṇo kathinaṃ attharati, puggalo
tika-vin08t:1501_0: Yadi evaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇīṭīkā-vinayavinicchayaṭīkāsu āgatapāṭhānaṃ adhippāyo kathaṃ
tika-vin08t:1501_1: bhāsitabbo bhaveyya. Nanu kaṅkhāvitaraṇīṭīkāyaṃ “vaṭṭatī”ti imissā kiriyāya kattā
tika-vin08t:1501_3: padaṃ “sandhāyā”ti kiriyāya kammaṃ, kathinatthāro…pe… idaṃ “vutta”nti kiriyāya kammaṃ
tika-vin08t:1501_4: hoti. Evaṃ ṭīkāsu nītatthato āgatapāṭhesu santesu “ñattidutiyakammaṃyeva atthāro
tika-vin08t:1501_5: nāmāti ṭīkācariyā na vadeyyu”nti na vattabbanti? Yenākārena aṭṭhakathāvacanena ṭīkāvacanañca
tika-vin08t:1501_6: pubbāparaaṭṭhakathāvacanañca aviruddhaṃ bhaveyya, tenākārena ṭīkāpāṭhānaṃ adhippāyo
tika-vin08t:1501_7: gahetabbo. Kathaṃ? Kaṅkhāvitaraṇīaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “so sabbantimena paricchedena pañcannaṃ
tika-vin08t:1501_8: janānaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āgato, tasmiṃ aṭṭhakathāvacane codakena codetabbassa atthitāya
tika-vin08t:1501_9: taṃ pariharituṃ “pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatīti pacchimakoṭiyā cattāro kathinadussassa
tika-vin08t:1501_10: dāyakā, eko paṭiggāhakoti pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti pāṭho ṭīkācariyena vutto,
tika-vin08t:1501_11: kathaṃ codetabbaṃ atthīti? Bho aṭṭhakathācariya “so sabbantimena paricchedena pañcannaṃ
tika-vin08t:1501_12: janānaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vutto, evaṃ sati pañcannaṃ kathinatthārakānaṃ eva so kathinatthāro
tika-vin08t:1501_13: vaṭṭati, na ekadviticatupuggalānanti attho āpajjati, evaṃ sati “na saṅgho kathinaṃ
tika-vin08t:1501_14: attharati, na gaṇo kathinaṃ attharati, puggalo kathinaṃ attharatī”ti āgatapāḷiyā
tika-vin08t:1501_15: virujjhanato āgamavirodho āpajjati, taṃ codanaṃ pariharanto “pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:1501_16: pacchimakoṭiyā cattāro kathinadussassa dāyakā, eko paṭiggāhakoti pañcannaṃ janānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1501_17: vaṭṭatī”ti pāṭho ṭīkācariyena vutto. Tatthāyamadhippāyo – bho codakācariya aṭṭhakathācariyena
tika-vin08t:1501_18: kathinatthārakāle pañcannaṃ atthārakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasena “so sabbantimena paricchedena
tika-vin08t:1501_19: pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti pāṭho na vutto, atha kho saṅghena atthārakassa kathinadussadānakāle
tika-vin08t:1501_20: pacchimakoṭiyā cattāro kathinadussassa dāyakā, eko paṭiggāhakoti pañcannaṃ dāyakapaṭiggāhakapuggalānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1501_21: atthitāya so pacchā kattabbo atthāro vaṭṭati, kāraṇasampattiyā phalasampatti hoti,
tika-vin08t:1502_0: Vinayavinicchayaṭīkāyampi “kathinatthāraṃ ke labhanti, ke na labhantīti? Gaṇanavasena
