tika-vin08t:1502_1: tāva pacchimakoṭiyā pañca janā labhanti, uddhaṃ satasahassampi, pañcannaṃ heṭṭhā
tika-vin08t:1502_2: na labhantī”ti aṭṭhakathāvacane parehi pucchitabbassa atthitāya taṃ pucchaṃ vissajjetuṃ
tika-vin08t:1502_3: “idaṃ atthārakassa bhikkhuno saṅghassa kathinadussadānakammaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti
tika-vin08t:1502_4: pāṭho ṭīkācariyena vutto. Kathaṃ pucchitabbanti ce? Bho aṭṭhakathācariya “heṭṭhimakoṭiyā
tika-vin08t:1502_5: pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ kiṃ pañcānisaṃsassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ “imāya
tika-vin08t:1502_6: saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmī”tiādiatthārakiriyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, udāhu atthārassa
tika-vin08t:1502_7: kāraṇabhūtaṃ kathinadussadānakammanti. Kathaṃ vissajjanāti? Bho bhadramukha “heṭṭhimakoṭiyā
tika-vin08t:1502_8: pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ pañcānisaṃsassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ “imāya saṅghāṭiyā
tika-vin08t:1502_9: kathinaṃ attharāmī”tiādikaṃ atthārakiriyaṃ sandhāya aṭṭhakathācariyena na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1502_10: atha kho atthārassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ kathinadānakammaṃ sandhāya vuttanti. Tatrāyamadhippāyo
tika-vin08t:1502_11: – saṅghena atthārakassa dinnadussena eva kathinatthāro sambhavati, na ṭhitikāya laddhacīvarena
tika-vin08t:1502_12: vā puggalikacīvarena vā sambhavati, tañca kathinadussadānakammaṃ cattāro kathinadussadāyakā,
tika-vin08t:1502_13: eko paṭiggāhakoti pañcasu bhikkhūsu vijjamānesuyeva sampajjati, na tato ūnesūti pacchimakoṭiyā
tika-vin08t:1502_14: pañcannaṃ vaṭṭati, kāraṇasiddhiyā phalasiddhi hoti, teneva ca kāraṇena “kathinadussadānakammaṃ
tika-vin08t:1502_15: vutta”nti mukhyavasena avatvā “sandhāya vutta”nti upacāravasenāha. Evaṃ vutteyeva
tika-vin08t:1502_16: aṭṭhakathāvacanassa pubbāparavirodho natthi, aṭṭhakathāvacanena ca ṭīkāvacanaṃ viruddhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1502_17: na hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ, “apalokanādisaṅghakammakaraṇatthaṃ baddhasīmā bhagavatā anuññātā”ti
tika-vin08t:1503_0: “Imāya saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmī”tiādikā pana atthārakiriyā apalokanādīsu catūsu
tika-vin08t:1503_1: saṅghakammesu appaviṭṭhā, adhiṭṭhānādayo viya pañcānisaṃsalābhakāraṇabhūtā puggalakiriyāva
tika-vin08t:1503_2: hotīti vassūpanāyikakhettabhūtāya antoupacārasīmāya kātabbā, tasmā antoupacārasīmāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1503_3: baddhasīmāya avijjamānāya bahiupacārasīmāyaṃ baddhasīmaṃ vā udakukkhepasattabbhantaralabhamānaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1503_4: vā gantvā ñattidutiyakammena kathinadussaṃ dāpetvā puna vihāraṃ āgantvā antoupacārasīmāyameva
tika-vin08t:1503_5: kathinattharaṇaṃ pubbācariyehi kataṃ, taṃ sukatameva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ aggahetvā
tika-vin08t:1503_6: suddhaupacārasīmāyameva ñattidutiyakammaṃ kātabbanti gayhamāne sati tesaṃ āyasmantānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1503_8: vā uposathapavāraṇādiñattikammaṃ vā sīmāsammannanādiñattidutiyakammaṃ vā upasampadādiñatticatutthakammaṃ
tika-vin08t:1503_9: vā upacārasīmāyameva kareyyuṃ, evaṃ karontā bhagavato sāsane mahantaṃ jaṭaṃ mahantaṃ
tika-vin08t:1503_10: gumbaṃ mahantaṃ visamaṃ kareyyuṃ, tasmā tamakaraṇatthaṃ yuttito ca āgamato ca anekāni
tika-vin08t:1505: Mayā kataṃ vinicchayaṃ, sammā cintentu sādhavo.
tika-vin08t:1506: Punappunaṃ vicintetvā, yuttaṃ ce hoti gaṇhantu;
tika-vin08t:1507: No ce yuttaṃ mā gaṇhantu, sammāsambuddhasāvakāti.
tika-vin08t:1508_0: Ito parānipi kāraṇasādhakāni āharanti ācariyā, tesaṃ paṭivacanena ativitthāro bhavissati,
tika-vin08t:1508_1: upacārasīmāya catunnaṃ saṅghakammānaṃ kataṭṭhānabhāvo pubbe vuttova, tasmā taṃ vacanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1509_0: “Imāya saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmī”ti vācā bhinditabbāti kiṃ ettakena vacībhedena
tika-vin08t:1509_1: kathinaṃ atthataṃ hoti, udāhu añño koci kāyavikāro kātabbo? Na kātabbo. Ettakeneva
tika-vin08t:1509_2: hi vacībhedena atthataṃ hoti, kathinaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ parivāre “atthāro ekena dhammena
tika-vin08t:1510_0: Evaṃ kathinatthāraṃ dassetvā anumodāpanaanumodane dassento “tena kathinatthārakenā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t:1510_1: Tattha yena bhikkhunā “imāya saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmī”tiādinā vacībhedena kathinaṃ
tika-vin08t:1510_2: atthataṃ, tena “kathinassa atthārā pannarasa dhammā jāyantī”ti parivāre āgatattā
tika-vin08t:1510_3: kathinatthārena saheva pañca ānisaṃsā āgatā, atha kasmā saṅghaṃ anumodāpetīti? Kiñcāpi
tika-vin08t:1510_4: atthārakassa bhikkhuno pañca ānisaṃsā āgatā, saṅghassa pana anāgatā, tasmā saṅghassa
tika-vin08t:1510_5: ca āgamanatthaṃ saṅghaṃ anumodāpeti, saṅgho ca anumodanaṃ karoti, evaṃ kate ubhinnampi
tika-vin08t:1510_6: ānisaṃsā āgatā honti. Vuttañhetaṃ parivāre “dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ
tika-vin08t:1510_7: atthārakassa ca anumodakassa cā”ti. Ettha ca kathinatthārakabhikkhuto vuḍḍhataro
tika-vin08t:1510_8: bhikkhu tasmiṃ saṅghe atthi, idha vuttanayena atthārakena “bhante”ti vattabbaṃ, anumodakena
tika-vin08t:1510_9: “āvuso”ti. Yadi pana kathinatthārako bhikkhu sabbesaṃ vuḍḍhataro hoti, tena “āvuso”ti
tika-vin08t:1510_10: vattabbaṃ, itarehi “bhante”ti, evaṃ sesanayadvayepi. Evaṃ sabbesaṃ atthataṃ hoti
tika-vin08t:1510_11: kathinanti. Imesu pana saṅghapuggalesu ye tasmiṃ vihāre purimikāya vassaṃ upagantvā
tika-vin08t:1510_12: paṭhamapavāraṇāya pavāritā, teyeva anumodituṃ labhanti, chinnavassā vā pacchimikāya
tika-vin08t:1510_13: upagatā vā aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthavassā vā na labhanti, ananumodantāpi ānisaṃsaṃ na labhanti.
tika-vin08t:1511_0: Evaṃ kathinatthāraṃ dassetvā idāni cīvaravibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “evaṃ atthate pana kathine”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t:1511_1: Tattha sace kathinacīvarena saddhiṃ ābhataṃ ānisaṃsanti iminā ekaṃ atthatacīvarameva
tika-vin08t:1511_2: kathinacīvaraṃ nāma, tato aññaṃ tena saddhiṃ ābhataṃ sabbaṃ cīvaraṃ kathinānisaṃsacīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:1511_3: nāmāti dasseti. Vakkhati hi “avasesakathinānisaṃse balavavatthānī”tiādi. Tena ñāyati
tika-vin08t:1511_4: “vatthameva idha ānisaṃso nāma, na aggho, kathinasāṭakena saddhiṃ ābhatānaṃ aññasāṭakānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1511_5: bahulavasena attharitabbaṃ, na kathinasāṭakassa mahagghavasenā”ti. Bhikkhusaṅgho
tika-vin08t:1511_6: anissaro, atthatakathino bhikkhuyeva issaro. Kasmā? Dāyakehi vicāritattā. Bhikkhusaṅgho
tika-vin08t:1511_7: issaro, kasmā? Dāyakehi avicāritattā, mūlakathinassa ca saṅghe dinnattā. Avasesakathinānisaṃseti
tika-vin08t:1511_9: ahataṃ vā ahatakappaṃ vā dātuṃ vaṭṭati, ānisaṃsacīvaraṃ pana yathāsatti yathābalaṃ
tika-vin08t:1511_10: purāṇaṃ vā abhinavaṃ vā dubbalaṃ vā balavaṃ vā dātuṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā tesu dubbalavatthe
tika-vin08t:1511_11: ṭhitikāya dinne laddhabhikkhussa upakārakaṃ na hoti, tasmā upakāraṇayoggāni balavavatthāni
tika-vin08t:1511_12: dātabbānīti adhippāyo. Vassāvāsikaṭhitikāya dātabbānīti yattakā bhikkhū vassāvāsikacīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:1511_13: labhiṃsu, te ṭhapetvā tesaṃ heṭṭhato paṭṭhāya yathākkamaṃ dātabbāni. Therāsanato
tika-vin08t:1511_14: paṭṭhāyāti yattakā bhikkhū tissaṃ kathinatthatasīmāyaṃ santi, tesu jeṭṭhakabhikkhuto
tika-vin08t:1511_15: paṭṭhāya dātabbāni. Āsanaggahaṇaṃ pana yathāvuḍḍhaṃ nisinne sandhāya kataṃ. Etena
tika-vin08t:1511_16: vassāvāsikakathinānisaṃsānaṃ samānagatikataṃ dīpeti. Garubhaṇḍaṃ na bhājetabbanti
tika-vin08t:1511_17: kathinasāṭakena saddhiṃ ābhatesu mañcapīṭhādikaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ na bhājetabbaṃ, saṅghikavaseneva
tika-vin08t:1511_18: paribhuñjitabbanti attho. Tattha garubhaṇḍavinicchayo anantarakathāyaṃ āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin08t:1512_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne vattabbaṃ atthi. Kathaṃ? Idāni bhikkhū kathinānisaṃsacīvaraṃ kusapātaṃ
tika-vin08t:1512_1: katvā vibhajanti, taṃ yuttaṃ viya na dissatīti. Kasmāti ce? “Avasesakathinānisaṃse
tika-vin08t:1512_2: balavavatthāni vassāvāsikaṭhitikāya dātabbāni, ṭhitikāya abhāve therāsanato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin08t:1512_3: dātabbānī”ti vacanatoti. Evaṃ sante kattha kusapāto kātabboti? Bhaṇḍāgāre ṭhapitacīvareti.
tika-vin08t:1512_4: Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? “Ussannaṃ hotīti bahu rāsikataṃ hoti, bhaṇḍāgāraṃ na gaṇhāti.
tika-vin08t:1512_5: Sammukhībhūtenāti antoupacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhitena. Bhājetunti kālaṃ ghosāpetvā paṭipāṭiyā
tika-vin08t:1512_6: bhājetuṃ…pe… evaṃ ṭhapitesu cīvarapaṭivīsesu kuso pātetabbo”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā,
tika-vin08t:1512_7: tasmā imissaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva bhājetabbanti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin08t:1513_0: Ekacce pana bhikkhū ekekassa ekekasmiṃ cīvare appahonte cīvaraṃ parivattetvā akappiyavatthuṃ
tika-vin08t:1513_1: gahetvā bhājenti, taṃ atioḷārikameva. Aññepi ekaccānaṃ cīvarānaṃ mahagghatāya ekaccānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1513_2: appagghatāya samagghaṃ kātuṃ na sakkāti tatheva karonti, tampi oḷārikameva. Tattha
tika-vin08t:1513_3: hi akappiyavatthunā parivattanepi tassa vicāraṇepi bhāgaggahaṇepi āpattiyeva hoti.
tika-vin08t:1513_4: Eke “kathinaṃ nāma dubbicāraṇīya”nti vatvā attharaṇaṃ na karonti, puggalikavaseneva
tika-vin08t:1513_5: yathājjhāsayaṃ vicārenti, taṃ pana yadi dāyakehi puggalasseva dinnaṃ, puggalena ca
tika-vin08t:1513_6: saṅghassa apariccajitaṃ, evaṃ sati attano santakattā yuttaṃ viya dissati. Yadi pana
tika-vin08t:1513_7: saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā dinnaṃ, puggalassa dinnepi saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā pariccajitaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1513_8: evaṃ sante saṅghagaṇānaṃ santakattā ayuttaṃ bhaveyya. Apare pana kathinavasena paṭiggahite
tika-vin08t:1513_9: vicāretuṃ dukkaranti maññamānā “na mayaṃ kathinavasena paṭiggaṇhāma, vassāvāsikabhāveneva
tika-vin08t:1513_10: paṭiggaṇhāmā”ti vatvā yathāruci vicārenti, tampi ayuttaṃ. Vassāvāsikampi hi saṅghassa
tika-vin08t:1513_11: dinnaṃ saṅghikaṃ hotiyeva, puggalassa dinnaṃ puggalikaṃ. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? “Sace
tika-vin08t:1513_12: pana tesaṃ senāsane paṃsukūliko vasati, āgatañca taṃ disvā ‘tumhākaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1513_13: demā’ti vadanti, tena saṅghassa ācikkhitabbaṃ. Sace tāni kulāni saṅghassa dātuṃ na
tika-vin08t:1513_14: icchanti, ‘tumhākaṃyeva demā’ti vadanti, sabhāgo bhikkhu ‘vattaṃ katvā gaṇhāhī’ti
tika-vin08t:1513_15: vattabbo, paṃsukūlikassa panetaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā.
tika-vin08t:1514_0: Vassāvāsikaṃ duvidhaṃ saddhādeyyatatruppādavasena. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “iti saddhādeyye
tika-vin08t:1514_1: dāyakamanussā pucchitabbā, tatruppāde pana kappiyakārakā pucchitabbā”ti. Saddhādeyyavassāvāsikampi
tika-vin08t:1514_3: na evaṃ kātabbaṃ. Manussā hi attano āvāsapaṭijagganatthāya paccayaṃ denti, tasmā
tika-vin08t:1514_4: aññehi bhikkhūhi tattha pavisitabba”nti, “yesaṃ pana senāsanaṃ natthi, kevalaṃ paccayameva
tika-vin08t:1514_5: denti, tesaṃ paccayaṃ avassāvāsike senāsane gāhetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ca. Tatruppādavassāvāsikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1514_6: nāma kappiyakārakānaṃ hatthe kappiyavatthupaabhuñjanatthāya dinnavatthuto nibbattaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1514_8: dinnavatthuto yaṃ yaṃ kappiyaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ paribhuñjituṃ anuññāta”nti. Evaṃ vassāvāsikacīvarampi
tika-vin08t:1514_9: pubbe yebhuyyena saṅghasseva denti, tasmā “kathinacīvaraṃ demā”ti vutte kathinacīvarabhāvena
tika-vin08t:1514_11: Kasmā? “Yathā dāyakā vadanti, tathā paṭipajjitabba”nti vacanato.
tika-vin08t:1515_0: Kiñci avatvā hatthe vā pādamūle vā ṭhapetvā gate kiṃ kātabbanti? Tattha sace “idaṃ
tika-vin08t:1515_1: vatthu cetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā parapuggalassa vā atthāya pariṇata”nti jāneyya,
tika-vin08t:1515_2: tesaṃ atthāya paṭiggahetabbaṃ. Atha “mamatthāya pariṇata”nti jāneyya, attano atthāya
tika-vin08t:1515_3: paṭiggahetabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ parivāre “nava adhammikadānānī”tiādi. Atha na kiñci
tika-vin08t:1515_4: jāneyya, attano hatthe vā pādamūle vā kiñci avatvā ṭhapitaṃ tasseva puggalikaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t:1515_5: Na hi cetiyādīnaṃ atthāya pariṇataṃ kiñci avatvā bhikkhussa hatthe vā pādamūle vā
tika-vin08t:1515_6: ṭhapetīti. Vuttañhetaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ “puggalassa detīti ‘imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa
tika-vin08t:1515_7: dammī’ti evaṃ parammukhā vā pādamūle ṭhapetvā ‘imaṃ, bhante, tumhākaṃ dammī’ti evaṃ
tika-vin08t:1516_0: “Imissaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva bhājetabba”nti vuttaṃ, kathaṃ bhājetabbanti?
tika-vin08t:1516_2: ye bhikkhū imasmiṃ vasse vassāvāsikaṃ na labhiṃsu, tesaṃ heṭṭhato paṭṭhāya ekekaṃ
tika-vin08t:1516_3: cīvaraṃ vā sāṭakaṃ vā dātabbaṃ. Atha cīvarānaṃ vā sāṭakānaṃ vā avasiṭṭhesu santesu
tika-vin08t:1516_4: puna therāsanato paṭṭhāya dutiyabhāgo dātabbo. Tato cīvaresu vā sāṭakesu vā khīṇesu
tika-vin08t:1516_5: ye labhanti, tesu pacchimassa vassādīni sallakkhetabbāni. Na kevalaṃ tasmiṃ kathinatthatadivase
tika-vin08t:1516_6: dinnadussāni eva kathinānisaṃsāni nāma honti, atha kho yāva kathinassa ubbhārā saṅghaṃ
tika-vin08t:1516_7: uddissa dinnacīvarānipi saṅghikena tatruppādena ārāmikehi ābhatacīvarānipi kathinānisaṃsāniyeva
tika-vin08t:1516_8: honti. Tasmā tādisesu cīvaresu uppajjamānesu yathāvuttasallakkhitavassassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin08t:1516_9: heṭṭhato paṭṭhāya punappunaṃ gāhetabbaṃ. “Ṭhitikāya abhāve therāsanato paṭṭhāya dātabbānī”ti
tika-vin08t:1516_10: vacanato tasmiṃ vasse vassāvāsikacīvarānaṃ anuppajjanato vā uppajjamānesupi ṭhitikāya
tika-vin08t:1516_11: agāhāpanato vā vassāvāsikaṭhitikāya abhāve sati laddhabbakathinānisaṃse tassaṃ upacārasīmāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1516_12: sabbe bhikkhū paṭipāṭiyā nisīdāpetvā therāsanato paṭṭhāya ṭhitikaṃ katvā ekekassa
tika-vin08t:1516_13: bhikkhuno ekekaṃ cīvaraṃ vā sāṭakaṃ vā dātabbaṃ. Saṅghanavakassa dānakālepi mahātherā
tika-vin08t:1516_14: āgacchanti, “bhante, vīsativassānaṃ dīyati, tumhākaṃ ṭhitikā atikkantā”ti na vattabbā,
tika-vin08t:1516_15: ṭhitikaṃ ṭhapetvā tesaṃ datvā pacchā ṭhitikāya dātabbaṃ. Dutiyabhāge pana therāsanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1516_16: āruḷhe pacchā āgatānaṃ paṭhamabhāgo na pāpuṇāti, dutiyabhāgato vassaggena dātabbo.
tika-vin08t:1517_0: Nanu ca bho ekaccāni kathinānisaṃsacīvarāni mahagghāni, ekaccāni appagghāni honti,
tika-vin08t:1517_1: kathaṃ ekekassa ekekasmiṃ dinne agghasamattaṃ bhaveyyāti? Vuccate – bhaṇḍāgāracīvarabhājane
tika-vin08t:1517_2: agghasamattaṃ icchitabbaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ cīvarakkhandhake “tena kho pana samayena
tika-vin08t:1517_3: saṅghassa bhaṇḍāgāre cīvaraṃ ussannaṃ hoti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t:1517_4: bhikkhave, sammukhībhūtena saṅghena bhājetuṃ…pe… atha kho cīvarabhājakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1517_5: etadahosi ‘kathaṃ nu kho cīvaraṃ bhājetabba’nti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ –
tika-vin08t:1517_6: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṃ uccinitvā tulayitvā vaṇṇāvaṇṇaṃ katvā bhikkhū gaṇetvā
tika-vin08t:1517_8: thūlaṃ, idaṃ saṇhaṃ, idaṃ ghanaṃ, idaṃ tanukaṃ, idaṃ paribhuttaṃ, idaṃ aparibhuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1517_9: idaṃ dīghato ettakaṃ, puthulato ettaka’nti evaṃ vatthāni vicinitvā. Tulayitvāti ‘idaṃ
tika-vin08t:1517_10: ettakaṃ agghati, idaṃ ettaka’nti evaṃ agghaparicchedaṃ katvā. Vaṇṇāvaṇṇaṃ katvāti
tika-vin08t:1517_11: sace sabbesaṃ ekekameva dasadasaagghanakaṃ pāpuṇāti, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin08t:1517_12: yaṃ nava vā aṭṭha vā agghati, taṃ aññena ekaagghanakena ca dviagghanakena ca saddhiṃ
tika-vin08t:1517_13: bandhitvā etena upāyena same paṭivīse ṭhapetvāti attho. Bhikkhū gaṇetvā vaggaṃ bandhitvāti
tika-vin08t:1517_14: sace ekekassa dīyamāne divaso na pahoti, dasa dasa bhikkhū gaṇetvā dasa dasa cīvarapaṭivīse
tika-vin08t:1517_15: ekavaggaṃ bandhitvā ekaṃ bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā evaṃ cīvarapaṭivīsaṃ ṭhapetuṃ anujānāmīti
tika-vin08t:1517_16: attho. Evaṃ ṭhapitesu cīvarapaṭivīsesu kuso pātetabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Tena ñāyati “bhaṇḍāgāracīvarabhājane
tika-vin08t:1518_0: Imasmiṃ pana kathinānisaṃsacīvarabhājane agghasamattaṃ na icchitabbaṃ, kusapāto ca
tika-vin08t:1518_1: na kātabbo. Tathā hi vuttaṃ kathinakkhandhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “evaṃ atthate pana kathine
tika-vin08t:1518_2: sace kathinacīvarena saddhiṃ ābhataṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dāyakā ‘yena amhākaṃ kathinaṃ gahitaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1518_3: tasseva demā’ti denti, bhikkhusaṅgho anissaro. Atha avicāretvāva datvā gacchanti,
tika-vin08t:1518_4: bhikkhusaṅgho issaro, tasmā sace kathinatthārakassa sesacīvarānipi dubbalāni honti,
tika-vin08t:1518_5: saṅghena apaloketvā tesampi atthāya vatthāni dātabbāni, kammavācā pana ekāyeva vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:1518_6: Avasesakathinānisaṃse balavavatthāni vassāvāsikaṭhitikāya dātabbāni. Ṭhitikāya abhāve
tika-vin08t:1518_7: therāsanato paṭṭhāya dātabbāni”icceva vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ “agghaparicchedaṃ katvā”ti
tika-vin08t:1518_8: vā “kusapāto kātabbo”ti vā. Tena ñāyati “kathinānisaṃsacīvarāni vassāvāsikaṭhitikāya
tika-vin08t:1518_9: vā vuḍḍhatarato vā paṭṭhāyeva dātabbāni, neva agghasamattaṃ kātabbaṃ, na kuso pātetabbo”ti.
tika-vin08t:1519_0: Idāni pana vassāvāsikabhāvena adinnattā vassāvāsikaṭhitikāya akatattā ca kathinatthatacīvarato
tika-vin08t:1519_1: ca kathinatthārakassa avasesacīvaratthāya dinnavatthato ca avasesakathinānisaṃse
tika-vin08t:1519_2: balavavatthāni vuḍḍhatarato paṭṭhāya ekassa bhikkhussa ekaṃ vatthaṃ dātabbaṃ, tesu
tika-vin08t:1519_3: pana varaṃ varaṃ vuḍḍhassa dātabbaṃ. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? “Pacchimavassūpanāyikadivase
tika-vin08t:1519_4: pana sace kālaṃ ghosetvā sannipatite saṅghe koci dasahatthaṃ vatthaṃ āharitvā vassāvāsikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1519_5: deti, āgantuko sace bhikkhusaṅghatthero hoti, tassa dātabbaṃ. Navako ce hoti, sammatena
tika-vin08t:1519_6: bhikkhunā saṅghatthero vattabbo ‘sace, bhante, icchatha, paṭhamabhāgaṃ muñcitvā idaṃ
tika-vin08t:1519_7: vatthaṃ gaṇhathā’ti. Amuñcantassa na dātabbaṃ. Sace pana pubbe gāhitaṃ muñcitvā gaṇhāti,
tika-vin08t:1519_8: dātabbaṃ. Eteneva upāyena dutiyattherato paṭṭhāya parivattetvā pattaṭṭhāne āgantukassa
tika-vin08t:1519_9: dātabbaṃ. Sace paṭhamavassūpagatā dve tīṇi cattāri pañca vā vatthāni alatthuṃ, laddhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1519_10: laddhaṃ eteneva upāyena vissajjāpetvā yāva āgantukassa samakaṃ hoti, tāva dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1519_11: Tena pana samake laddhe avasiṭṭho anubhāgo therāsane dātabbo”ti senāsanakkhandhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1519_12: vacanato taṃsaṃvaṇṇanābhūtāyaṃ vimativinodaniyañca “āgantuko sace bhikkhūti cīvare
tika-vin08t:1519_13: gāhite pacchā āgato āgantuko bhikkhu. Pattaṭṭhāneti vassaggena pattaṭṭhāne. Paṭhamavassūpagatāti
tika-vin08t:1519_14: āgantukassa āgamanato puretarameva pacchimikāya vassūpanāyikāya vassūpagatā. Laddhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1519_15: laddhanti dāyakānaṃ santikā āgatāgatasāṭaka”nti vacanato, vajirabuddhiṭīkāyañca “paṭhamabhāgaṃ
tika-vin08t:1519_16: muñcitvāti idaṃ ce paṭhamagāhitavatthuto mahagghaṃ hotīti likhita”nti vacanato ca
tika-vin08t:1519_17: viññāyati. Evaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ṭīkāsu ca vassāvāsikadāne pacchā ābhataṃ mahagghavatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1519_18: mahātherato paṭṭhāya parivattetvā tehi anicchitaṃyeva vassaggena pattassa pacchā
tika-vin08t:1519_19: āgatassa bhikkhuno dātabbabhāvassa vuttattā varaṃ varaṃ vuḍḍhassa dātabbanti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t:1520_0: “Sace paṭhamavassūpagatā dve tīṇi cattāri pañca vā vatthāni alatthu”nti vatthagaṇanāya
tika-vin08t:1520_1: eva vuttattā, agghagaṇanāya avuttattā ca kathinānisaṃsavatthassa ca vassāvāsikagatikabhāvassa
tika-vin08t:1520_2: vacanato kathinānisaṃsavatthāni vatthagaṇanāvaseneva bhājetabbāni, na agghasamabhāvenāti
tika-vin08t:1520_3: ca daṭṭhabbāni, teneva ca kāraṇena “yo bahūni kathinānisaṃsavatthāni deti, tassa
tika-vin08t:1520_4: santakeneva attharitabba”nti vuttaṃ. Bahūni hi kathinānisaṃsavatthāni vibhajanakāle
tika-vin08t:1523: Cintayitvā punappunaṃ, yuttaṃ ce dhārayantu taṃ;
tika-vin08t:1525_0: “Yo ca tattha cīvaruppādo, so nesaṃ bhavissatī”ti cīvarasseva atthatakathinānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1525_1: santakabhāvassa bhagavatā vuttattā cīvarato aññāni saṅghaṃ uddissa dinnāni piṇḍapātādīni
tika-vin08t:1525_2: vatthūni upacārasīmaṃ paviṭṭhassa āgatāgatassa saṅghassa santakaṃ honti. Tathā hi
tika-vin08t:1525_3: vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kathinaṃ attharāpetvā dānañca bhuñjitvā gamissanti, ānisaṃso
tika-vin08t:1525_4: pana itaresaṃyeva hotī”ti. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sāmaṇerānaṃ upaḍḍhapaṭivīsaṃ dātu”nti
tika-vin08t:1525_5: pāṭhaṃ upanissāya kathinānisaṃsacīvarampi sāmaṇerānaṃ upaḍḍhapaṭivīsaṃyeva denti,
tika-vin08t:1525_6: na panevaṃ kātabbaṃ. Bhaṇḍāgāre ṭhapitañhi akālacīvarameva sāmaṇerānaṃ upaḍḍhapaṭivīsaṃ
tika-vin08t:1525_7: katvā dātabbaṃ. Vassāvāsikakathinānisaṃsādikālacīvaraṃ pana samakameva dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1525_9: sāmaṇerā attissarā bhikkhusaṅghassa kattabbakammaṃ na karonti, uddesaparipucchāsu
tika-vin08t:1525_10: yuttā ācariyupajjhāyānaṃyeva vattapaṭipattiṃ karonti, aññesaṃ na karonti, etesaṃyeva
tika-vin08t:1525_11: upaḍḍhabhāgo dātabbo. Ye pana purebhattañca pacchābhattañca bhikkhusaṅghasseva kattabbakiccaṃ
tika-vin08t:1525_12: karonti, tesaṃ samako dātabbo. Idañca piṭṭhisamaye uppannena bhaṇḍāgāre ṭhapitena
tika-vin08t:1525_13: akālacīvareneva kathitaṃ, kālacīvaraṃ pana samakameva dātabba”nti.
tika-vin08t:1526_0: Kacci nu kho sāmaṇerā vassaṃ upagatā, yena ānisaṃsaṃ labheyyunti? Āma upagatāti.
tika-vin08t:1526_1: Kathaṃ viññāyatīti? “Atha cattāro bhikkhū upagatā, eko paripuṇṇavasso sāmaṇero, so
tika-vin08t:1526_2: ce pacchimikāya upasampajjati, gaṇapūrako ceva hoti, ānisaṃsañca labhatī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1526_4: labhati, vassiko ca hoti, ānisaṃsañca labhatīti sāmaṇerānaṃ vassūpagamanaṃ anuññātaṃ
tika-vin08t:1526_5: hoti. Sāmaṇerā kathinānisaṃsaṃ labhantīti vadantī”ti vacanatoti.
tika-vin08t:1527_0: Tatruppādesu kathinānisaṃsesu yadi ārāmikā taṇḍulādīhi vatthāni cetāpenti, vatthehipi
tika-vin08t:1527_1: taṇḍulādīni cetāpenti, tattha kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti? Vibhajanakāle vijjamānavatthuvasena
tika-vin08t:1527_2: kātabbaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ “tatruppādena taṇḍulādinā vatthūsu
tika-vin08t:1527_3: cetāpitesu atthatakathinānameva tāni vatthāni pāpuṇanti. Vatthehi pana taṇḍulādīsu
tika-vin08t:1527_4: cetāpitesu sabbesaṃ tāni pāpuṇantīti vutta”nti. “Sace pana ekasīmāyaṃ bahū vihārā
tika-vin08t:1527_5: hontī”ti ettha katarasīmā adhippetāti? Upacārasīmā. Upacārasīmāyaṃyeva hi saṅghalābhavibhajanādikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1528_0: Evaṃ kathinatthāraṃ dassetvā saṅghe rucitāya mātikāpalibodhaubbhāre adassetvāva ante
tika-vin08t:1528_1: ānisaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ “atthatakathinānaṃ vo bhikkhave”tiādimāha. Tattha aṭṭhavidhā mātikā
tika-vin08t:1528_2: pakkamanantikā, niṭṭhānantikā, sanniṭṭhānantikā, nāsanantikā, savanantikā, āsāvacchedikā,
tika-vin08t:1528_3: sīmātikkantikā, sahubbhārāti. Tattha atthatakathino bhikkhu katapariyositaṃ cīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:1528_4: ādāya “imaṃ vihāraṃ na paccessāmī”ti pakkamati, tassa bhikkhuno upacārasīmātikkameneva
tika-vin08t:1528_5: kathinubbhāro bhavati, pañcānisaṃsāni alabhaneyyo hoti. Ayaṃ kathinubbhāro pakkamanamevassa
tika-vin08t:1529_0: Atthatakathino bhikkhu aniṭṭhitameva attano bhāgabhūtaṃ cīvaraṃ ādāya aññaṃ vihāraṃ
tika-vin08t:1529_1: gato, tassa bahiupacārasīmagatassa evaṃ hoti “imasmiṃyeva vihāre imaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressāmi,
tika-vin08t:1529_2: na purāṇavihāraṃ paccessāmī”ti, so bahisīmāyameva taṃ cīvaraṃ kāreti, tassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin08t:1529_3: tasmiṃ cīvare niṭṭhite kathinubbhāro hoti. Ayaṃ kathinubbhāro cīvaraniṭṭhānamevassa
tika-vin08t:1530_0: Bhikkhu atthatakathino akatacīvaramādāya pakkamati, tassa bahiupacārasīmagatassa
tika-vin08t:1530_1: evaṃ hoti “imaṃ cīvaraṃ neva kāressāmi, porāṇavihārañca na paccessāmī”ti, tassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin08t:1530_2: tena sanniṭṭhānena kathinubbhāro hoti. Ayaṃ kathinubbhāro sanniṭṭhānamevassa antoti
tika-vin08t:1531_0: Atthatakathino bhikkhu akatameva cīvaraṃ ādāya pakkamati, bahisīmagatassa tassa evaṃ
tika-vin08t:1531_1: hoti “idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressāmi, na ca porāṇavihāraṃ paccessāmī”ti, tassa cīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:1531_2: kurumānaṃ corādīhi nassati, agyādīhi vinassati, kathinubbhāro hoti. Ayaṃ kathinubbhāro
tika-vin08t:1532_0: Atthatakathino bhikkhu akatacīvaramādāya “imaṃ vihāraṃ paccessāmī”ti cintetvā pakkamati,
tika-vin08t:1532_1: tassa bahisīmagatassa evaṃ hoti “idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressāmī”ti, so katacīvaro suṇāti
tika-vin08t:1532_2: “vihāre kira saṅghena kathinaṃ ubbhata”nti, tena savanamattenassa kathinaṃ ubbhataṃ
tika-vin08t:1532_3: hoti. Ayaṃ kathinabbhāro savanamevassa antoti savanantiko nāma.
tika-vin08t:1533_0: Atthatakathino bhikkhu aññattha paccāsācīvarakāraṇā pakkamati, tassa bahisīmagatassa
tika-vin08t:1533_1: evaṃ hoti “idha bahisīmāyameva cīvarapaccāsaṃ payirupāsāmi, na vihāraṃ paccessāmī”ti,
tika-vin08t:1533_2: so tattheva taṃ cīvarapaccāsaṃ payirupāsati, so taṃ cīvarapaccāsaṃ alabhamāno cīvarāsā
tika-vin08t:1533_3: pacchijjati, teneva tassa bhikkhuno kathinubbhāro bhavati. Ayaṃ kathinubbhāro āsāvacchedasahitattā āsāvacchediko nāma.
tika-vin08t:1534_0: Atthatakathino bhikkhu akatacīvaraṃ ādāya “imaṃ vihāraṃ paccessāmī”ti cintetvā pakkamati,
tika-vin08t:1534_1: so bahisīmagato taṃ cīvaraṃ kāreti, so katacīvaro “vihāraṃ paccessāmī”ti cintento
tika-vin08t:1534_2: bahiupacārasīmāyameva kathinubbhārakālaṃ vītināmeti, tassa kathinubbhāro bhavati.
tika-vin08t:1534_3: Ayaṃ kathinubbhāro cīvarakālassa antimadivasasaṅkhātāya sīmāya atikkantattā sīmātikkantiko nāma.
tika-vin08t:1535_0: Atthatakathino bhikkhu cīvaraṃ ādāya “imaṃ vihāraṃ paccessāmī”ti cintetvā pakkamati,
tika-vin08t:1535_1: so katacīvaro “vihāraṃ paccessāmī”ti cintento paccāgantvā vihāre kathinubbhāraṃ pappoti,
tika-vin08t:1535_2: tassa bhikkhuno vihāre bhikkhūhi saha kathinubbhāro bhavati. Ayaṃ kathinubbhāro vihāre
tika-vin08t:1535_3: bhikkhūhi saha katattā sahubbhāro nāma. Ayaṃ aṭṭhavidho kathinubbhāro aṭṭha mātikā
tika-vin08t:1535_4: nāma. Vuttañhetaṃ kathinakkhandhakapāḷiyaṃ “aṭṭhimā, bhikkhave, mātikā kathinassa
tika-vin08t:1535_5: ubbhārāya pakkamanantikā niṭṭhānantikā sanniṭṭhānantikā nāsanantikā savanantikā āsāvacchedikā
tika-vin08t:1535_6: sīmātikkantikā sahubbhārāti. Bhikkhu atthatakathino katacīvaramādāya pakkamati ‘na
tika-vin08t:1535_7: paccessa’nti, tassa bhikkhuno pakkamanantiko kathinubbhāro”tiādi, vinayavinicchayappakaraṇe ca –
tika-vin08t:1537: Savanamāsā ca sīmā ca, sahubbhāroti aṭṭhimā”ti. ;
tika-vin08t:1538_0: Palibodho duvidho āvāsapalibodho, cīvarapalibodhoti. Tattha “yasmiṃ vihāre kathinaṃ
tika-vin08t:1538_1: atthataṃ hoti, tasmiṃ vasissāmī”ti aññattha gacchantopi “puna taṃ vihāraṃ āgacchissāmī”ti
tika-vin08t:1538_2: sāpekkho hoti. Ayaṃ āvāsapalibodho nāma. Tassa bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ akataṃ vā hoti apariyositaṃ
tika-vin08t:1538_3: vā, “aññato cīvaraṃ lacchāmī”ti āsā vā anupacchinnā hoti. Ayaṃ cīvarapalibodho nāma.
tika-vin08t:1538_4: Vuttañhetaṃ kathinakkhandhake “katame ca, bhikkhave, dve kathinassa palibodhā? Āvāsapalibodho
tika-vin08t:1538_5: ca cīvarapalibodho ca. Kathañca, bhikkhave, āvāsapalibodho hoti? Idha, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:1538_6: bhikkhu vasati vā tasmiṃ āvāse, sāpekkho vā pakkamati ‘paccessa’nti, evaṃ kho, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:1538_7: āvāsapalibodho hoti. Kathañca, bhikkhave, cīvarapalibodho hoti? Idha, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:1538_8: bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ akataṃ vā hoti vippakataṃ vā, cīvarāsā vā anupacchinnā, evaṃ kho,
tika-vin08t:1539_1: bhikkhūnaṃ vasena vuttā satta kathinubbhārā ca bahiupacārasīmaṃ gantvā nivattetvā
tika-vin08t:1539_2: kathinatthatavihāre antarubbhāraṃ patvā bhikkhūhi saha antarubbhārassa katattā sahubbhārasaṅkhāto
tika-vin08t:1539_3: eko kathinubbhāro cāti ime aṭṭha kathinubbhārā aṭṭhamātikāya paviṭṭhattā aṭṭhamātikāubbhāro
tika-vin08t:1539_4: nāma. Bahisīmaṃ agantvā tasmiṃyeva vihāre nisīditvā kathinubbhāraṃ ñattidutiyakammavācāya
tika-vin08t:1539_5: kathinubbhāro aṭṭhamātikāya appaviṭṭho hutvā kālaparicchedaṃ appatvā antarāyeva katattā antarubbhāro nāma.
tika-vin08t:1540_0: Antarubbhārasahubbhārā ñattidutiyakammavācāyeva katā, evaṃ sante ko tesaṃ visesoti?
tika-vin08t:1540_1: Antarubbhāro bahisīmaṃ agantvā antosīmāyameva ṭhitehi bhikkhūhi kato. Sahubbhāro
tika-vin08t:1540_2: bahisīmaṃ gatena bhikkhunā paccāgantvā taṃ antarubbhāraṃ patvā tehi antosīmaṭṭhehi
tika-vin08t:1540_3: bhikkhūhi saha katoti ayametesaṃ viseso. Pakkamanantikādayo satta kathinubbhārā na
tika-vin08t:1540_4: kammavācāya katā, kevalaṃ dvinnaṃ palibodhānaṃ upacchedena pañcahi ānisaṃsehi vigatattā
tika-vin08t:1540_5: kathinubbhārā nāma honti. Vuttañhetaṃ ācariyabuddhadattattherena vinayavinicchaye –
tika-vin08t:1543_0: Taṭṭīkāyampi “aṭṭhannaṃ mātikānanti bahisīmagatānaṃ vasena vuttā. Pakkamanantikādayo
tika-vin08t:1543_1: satta mātikā bahisīmaṃ gantvā antarubbhāraṃ sampattassa vasena vuttā, sahubbhāro
tika-vin08t:1543_2: imāsaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ mātikānaṃ vasena ca. Antarubbhāratopi vāti bahisīmaṃ agantvā tattheva
tika-vin08t:1543_3: vasitvā kathinubbhārakammena ubbhatakathinānaṃ vasena labbhanato antarubbhāroti mahesinā
tika-vin08t:1543_4: kathinassa ubbhārā duve vuttāti yojanā. Bahisīmaṃ gantvā āgatassa vasena saubbhāro,
tika-vin08t:1543_5: bahisīmaṃ agatānaṃ vasena antarubbhāroti ekoyeva ubbhāro dvidhā vutto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1544_0: Kasmā pana antarubbhāravasena kammavācāya kathinaṃ ubbhatanti? Mahādānaṃ dātukāmehi
tika-vin08t:1544_1: upāsakehi āgatassa saṅghassa akālacīvaraṃ dātukāmehi yācitattā. Vuttañhi bhikkhunīvibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1544_2: “tena kho pana samayena aññatarena upāsakena saṅghaṃ uddissa vihāro kārāpito hoti,
tika-vin08t:1544_3: so tassa vihārassa mahe ubhatosaṅghassa akālacīvaraṃ dātukāmo hoti. Tena kho pana
tika-vin08t:1544_4: samayena ubhatosaṅghassa kathinaṃ atthataṃ hoti. Atha kho so upāsako saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
tika-vin08t:1544_5: kathinuddhāraṃ yācī”tiādi. Kathaṃ pana kammavācā kātabbāti? “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin08t:1544_6: yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho kathinaṃ uddhareyya, esā ñatti. Suṇātu me, bhante,
tika-vin08t:1544_7: saṅgho, saṅgho kathinaṃ uddharati. Yassāyasmato khamati kathinassa uddhāro, so tuṇhassa.
tika-vin08t:1544_8: Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya. Ubbhataṃ saṅghena kathinaṃ, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā
tika-vin08t:1544_9: tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti evaṃ kātabbāti. Vuttañhi bhikkhunīvibhaṅge “anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t:1544_10: bhikkhave, kathinaṃ uddharituṃ, evañca pana, bhikkhave, kathinaṃ uddharitabbaṃ. Byattena
tika-vin08t:1544_11: bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo – suṇātu me…pe… dhārayāmī”ti.
tika-vin08t:1545_0: Etena ca kathinubbhārena pubbe kataṃ kathinadussadānañattidutiyakammavācaṃ ubbhatanti
tika-vin08t:1545_1: vadanti, na pana kathinadussadānañattidutiyakammaṃ ubbhataṃ, atha kho atthārakammamevāti
tika-vin08t:1545_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yadi hi kathinadussadānañattidutiyakammaṃ ubbhataṃ bhaveyya, tāya kammavācāya
tika-vin08t:1545_3: kathinadussadānassa sijjhanato imāya kathinubbhārakammavācāya taṃ pubbe dinnadussaṃ
tika-vin08t:1545_4: puna āharāpetabbaṃ siyā, na pañcānisaṃsavigamanaṃ. Yasmā pana imāya kathinubbhārakammavācāya
tika-vin08t:1545_5: pañcānisaṃsavigamanameva hoti, na pubbe dinnakathinadussassa puna āharāpanaṃ. Tena
tika-vin08t:1545_8: pacchā saṅghassa uppannaṃ cīvaraṃ akālacīvaraṃ hoti, saṅgho pañcānisaṃse na labhati,
tika-vin08t:1545_9: cīvaraṃ sabbasaṅghikaṃ hutvā āgatāgatassa saṅghassa bhājanīyaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1545_10: Ayamattho kathinadussadānañattidutiyakammavācāya ca kathinubbhārakammavācāya ca atthañca
tika-vin08t:1545_11: adhippāyañca suṭṭhu vinicchinitvā pubbāparaṃ saṃsanditvā paccetabboti.
tika-vin08t:1546_0: Ettha siyā – kathinubbhāraṃ yācantānaṃ sabbesaṃ kathinubbhāro dātabbo, udāhu ekaccānanti,
tika-vin08t:1546_1: kiñcettha – yadi tāva sabbesaṃ dātabbo, kathinubbhārakammena pañcānisaṃsavigamanato
tika-vin08t:1546_2: saṅghassa lābhantarāyo bhaveyya, atha ekaccānaṃ mukholokanaṃ viya siyāti? Yadi kathinatthāramūlakalābhato
tika-vin08t:1546_3: kathinubbhāramūlakalābho mahanto bhaveyya, tesaṃ yācantānaṃ kathinubbhāro dātabbo.
tika-vin08t:1546_4: Yadi appako, na dātabbo. Yadi samo, kulappasādatthāya dātabboti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:1546_5: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kīdiso kathinuddhāro dātabbo, kīdiso na dātabboti? Yassa atthāramūlako
tika-vin08t:1546_6: ānisaṃso mahā, ubbhāramūlako appo, evarūpo na dātabbo. Yassa pana atthāramūlako ānisaṃso
tika-vin08t:1546_7: appo, ubbhāramūlako mahā, evarūpo dātabbo. Samānisaṃsopi saddhāparipālanatthaṃ dātabbovā”ti.
tika-vin08t:1546_8: Imināpi viññāyati “pañcānisaṃsānaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ atthārakammameva uddharīyati, na
tika-vin08t:1547_0: Ānisaṃsakathāyaṃ pañcāti idāni vuccamānā anāmantacārādayo pañca kiriyā. Kappissantīti
tika-vin08t:1547_1: kappā bhavissanti, anāpattikāraṇā bhavissantīti attho. Anāmantacāroti anāmantetvā
tika-vin08t:1547_2: caraṇaṃ. Yo hi dāyakehi bhattena nimantito hutvā sabhatto samāno vihāre santaṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin08t:1547_3: anāmantetvā kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjati, tassa bhikkhuno cārittasikkhāpadena pācittiyāpatti
tika-vin08t:1547_4: hoti, sā āpatti atthatakathinassa na hotīti attho. Tattha cārittasikkhāpadaṃ nāma
tika-vin08t:1547_5: “yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā purebhattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1547_6: vā pacchābhattaṃ vā kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjeyya aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1547_7: samayo cīvaradānasamayo cīvarakārasamayo, ayaṃ tattha samayo”ti acelakavagge pañcamasikkhāpadaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1547_8: Cīvaravippavāsoti tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññatarena vā sabbena vā vinā hatthapāse akatvā
tika-vin08t:1547_9: aruṇuṭṭhāpanaṃ, evaṃ karotopi dutiyakathinasikkhāpadena āpatti na hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:1547_10: Tattha ca dutiyakathinasikkhāpadaṃ nāma “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ pana bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:1547_11: kathine ekarattampi ce bhikkhu ticīvarena vippavaseyya aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā,
tika-vin08t:1548_0: Gaṇabhojananti etena gaṇabhojanasikkhāpadena anāpatti vuttāti sambandho. Tattha gaṇabhojanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1548_1: nāma “amhākaṃ bhattaṃ dethā”ti bhikkhūnaṃ viññattiyā vā “amhākaṃ bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin08t:1548_2: dāyakānaṃ nimantanena vā akappiyavohārena cattāro vā atirekā vā bhikkhū ekato paṭiggaṇhitvā
tika-vin08t:1548_3: ekato bhuñjanaṃ. Gaṇabhojanasikkhāpadaṃ nāma “gaṇabhojane aññatra samayā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1548_4: Tatthāyaṃ samayo gilānasamayo cīvaradānasamayo cīvarakārasamayo addhānagamanasamayo
tika-vin08t:1548_5: nāvābhiruhanasamayo mahāsamayo samaṇabhattasamayo, ayaṃ tattha samayo”ti āgataṃ bhojanavagge
tika-vin08t:1548_7: āpatti na hotīti adhippāyo. Tattha paṭhamakathinasikkhāpadaṃ nāma “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:1548_8: pana bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabbaṃ, taṃ
tika-vin08t:1548_9: atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti āgataṃ nissaggiyesu paṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ. Kathinatthatasīmāyāti
tika-vin08t:1548_10: upacārasīmaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Matakacīvaranti matassa cīvaraṃ. Tatruppādenāti saṅghasantakena
tika-vin08t:1548_11: ārāmuyyānakhettavatthuādinā. Yaṃ saṅghikaṃ cīvaraṃ uppajjati, taṃ tesaṃ bhavissatīti
tika-vin08t:1548_12: iminā cīvarameva kathinatthārakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santakaṃ hoti, tato aññaṃ piṇḍapātabhesajjādikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1555: 227. Evaṃ kathinavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni garubhaṇḍādivinicchayaṃ dassetuṃ “garubhaṇḍānīti etthā”tiādimāha. Tattha garūti –
tika-vin08t:1557: Garu tīsu mahante ca, dujjarālahukesu cā”ti. –
tika-vin08t:1558_0: Vuttesu anekatthesu alahukavācako. Bhaṇḍa-saddo “bhājanādiparikkhāre, bhaṇḍaṃ mūladhanepi
tika-vin08t:1558_1: cā”ti ettha bhājanādiparikkhārattho hoti. Vacanattho pana garanti uggacchanti uggatā
tika-vin08t:1558_2: pākaṭā hontīti garūni, bhaḍitabbāni icchitabbānīti bhaṇḍāni, garūni ca tāni bhaṇḍāni
tika-vin08t:1558_3: cāti garubhaṇḍāni, ārāmādīni vatthūni. Iti ādinā nayena senāsanakkhandhake bhagavatā
tika-vin08t:1558_4: dassitāni imāni pañca vatthūni garubhaṇḍāni nāmāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1559_0: Mañcesu masārakoti mañcapāde vijjhitvā tattha aṭaniyo pavesetvā kato. Bundikābaddhoti
tika-vin08t:1559_1: aṭanīhi mañcapāde ḍaṃsāpetvā pallaṅkasaṅkhepena kato. Kuḷīrapādakoti assameṇḍakādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1559_2: pādasadisehi pādehi kato. Yo vā pana koci vaṅkapādako, ayaṃ vuccati “kuḷīrapādako”ti.
tika-vin08t:1559_3: Āhaccapādakoti ayaṃ pana “āhaccapādako nāma mañco aṅge vijjhitvā kato hotī”ti evaṃ
tika-vin08t:1559_4: parato pāḷiyaṃyeva vutto, tasmā aṭaniyo vijjhitvā tattha pādasikhaṃ pavesetvā upari
tika-vin08t:1559_5: āṇiṃ datvā katamañco āhaccapādakoti veditabbo. Pīṭhepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin08t:1560_0: Uṇṇabhisiādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ aññatarāti uṇṇabhisi coḷabhisi vākabhisi tiṇabhisi paṇṇabhisīti
tika-vin08t:1560_1: imesaṃ pañcannaṃ bhisīnaṃ aññatarā. Pañca bhisiyoti pañcahi uṇṇādīhi pūritabhisiyo.
tika-vin08t:1560_2: Tūlagaṇanāya hi etāsaṃ gaṇanā. Tattha uṇṇaggahaṇena na kevalaṃ eḷakalomameva gahitaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1560_3: ṭhapetvā pana manussalomaṃ yaṃ kiñci kappiyākappiyamaṃsajātīnaṃ pakkhicatuppadānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1560_4: lomaṃ, sabbaṃ idha uṇṇaggahaṇeneva gahitaṃ, tasmā channaṃ cīvarānaṃ, channaṃ anulomacīvarānañca
tika-vin08t:1560_5: aññatarena bhisicchaviṃ katvā taṃ sabbaṃ pakkhipitvā bhisiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Eḷakalomāni
tika-vin08t:1560_6: pana apakkhipitvā kambalameva catugguṇaṃ vā pañcaguṇaṃ vā pakkhipitvā katāpi uṇṇabhisisaṅkhameva
tika-vin08t:1560_7: gacchati. Coḷabhisiādīsu yaṃ kiñci navacoḷaṃ vā purāṇacoḷaṃ vā saṃharitvā vā anto
tika-vin08t:1560_8: pakkhipitvā vā katā coḷabhisi, yaṃ kiñci vākaṃ pakkhipitvā katā vākabhisi, yaṃ kiñci
tika-vin08t:1560_9: tiṇaṃ pakkhipitvā katā tiṇabhisi, aññatra suddhatamālapattaṃ yaṃ kiñci paṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā
tika-vin08t:1560_10: katā paṇṇabhisīti veditabbā. Tamālapattaṃ pana aññena missameva vaṭṭati, suddhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1560_11: na vaṭṭati. Bhisiyā pamāṇaniyamo natthi, mañcabhisi pīṭhabhisi bhūmattharaṇabhisi
tika-vin08t:1560_12: caṅkamanabhisi pādapuñchanabhisīti etāsaṃ anurūpato sallakkhetvā attano rucivasena
tika-vin08t:1560_13: pamāṇaṃ kātabbaṃ. Yaṃ panetaṃ uṇṇādipañcavidhatūlampi bhisiyaṃ vaṭṭati, taṃ masūrakepi
tika-vin08t:1560_14: vaṭṭatīti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha masūraketi cammamayabhisiyaṃ. Etena masūrakaṃ
tika-vin08t:1561_0: Bimbohane tīṇi tūlāni rukkhatūlaṃ latātūlaṃ poṭakītūlanti. Tattha rukkhatūlanti simbalirukkhādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1561_1: yesaṃ kesañci rukkhānaṃ tūlaṃ. Latātūlanti khīravalliādīnaṃ yāsaṃ kāsañci latānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1561_2: tūlaṃ. Poṭakītūlanti poṭakītiṇādīnaṃ yesaṃ kesañci tiṇajātikānaṃ antamaso ucchunaḷādīnampi
tika-vin08t:1561_3: tūlaṃ. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “poṭakītūlanti erakatiṇatūla”nti vuttaṃ, etehi tīhi
tika-vin08t:1561_4: sabbabhūtagāmā saṅgahitā honti. Rukkhavallitiṇajātiyo hi muñcitvā añño bhūtagāmo
tika-vin08t:1561_5: nāma natthi, tasmā yassa kassaci bhūtagāmassa tūlaṃ bimbohane vaṭṭati, bhisiṃ pana
tika-vin08t:1561_6: pāpuṇitvā sabbampetaṃ “akappiyatūla”nti vuccati na kevalañca bimbohane etaṃ tūlameva,
tika-vin08t:1561_7: haṃsamorādīnaṃ sabbasakuṇānaṃ, sīhādīnaṃ sabbacatuppadānañca lomampi vaṭṭati. Piyaṅgupupphabakuḷapupphādi
tika-vin08t:1561_8: pana yaṃ kiñci pupphaṃ na vaṭṭati. Tamālapattaṃ suddhameva na vaṭṭati, missakaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:1561_9: vaṭṭati, bhisīnaṃ anuññātaṃ pañcavidhaṃ uṇṇāditūlampi vaṭṭati. Addhakāyikāni pana
tika-vin08t:1561_10: bimbohanāni na vaṭṭanti. Addhakāyikānīti upaḍḍhakāyappamāṇāni, yesu kaṭito paṭṭhāya
tika-vin08t:1561_11: yāva sīsaṃ upadahanti ṭhapenti. Sīsappamāṇaṃ pana vaṭṭati, sīsappamāṇaṃ nāma yassa
tika-vin08t:1561_12: vitthārato tīsu kaṇṇesu dvinnaṃ kaṇṇānaṃ antaraṃ miniyamānaṃ vidatthi ceva caturaṅgulañca
tika-vin08t:1561_13: hoti, majjhaṭṭhānaṃ muṭṭhiratanaṃ hoti, dīghato pana diyaḍḍharatanaṃ vā dviratanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1561_14: vāti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ, ayaṃ sīsappamāṇassa ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo, ito uddhaṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t:1561_15: heṭṭhā pana vaṭṭatīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha “tīsu kaṇṇesu dvinnaṃ kaṇṇāna”nti
tika-vin08t:1561_16: pāṭhaṃ upanidhāya bimbohanassa ubhosu antesu ṭhapetabbacoḷakaṃ tikoṇameva karonti
tika-vin08t:1562_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “sīsappamāṇaṃ nāma yattha gīvāya saha sakalaṃ sīsaṃ ṭhapetuṃ
tika-vin08t:1562_1: sakkā, tassa ca muṭṭhiratanaṃ vitthārappamāṇanti dassento ‘vitthārato’tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t:1562_2: Idañca bimbohanassa ubhosu antesu ṭhapetabbacoḷappamāṇadassanaṃ, tassa vasena bimbohanassa
tika-vin08t:1562_3: vitthārappamāṇaṃ paricchijjati, taṃ vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā katvā sibbitaṃ yathā
tika-vin08t:1562_4: koṭito koṭi vitthārato puthulaṭṭhānaṃ muṭṭhiratanappamāṇaṃ hoti, evaṃ sibbitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1562_5: ito adhikaṃ na vaṭṭati. Taṃ pana antesu ṭhapitacoḷaṃ koṭiyā koṭiṃ āhacca diguṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:1562_6: kataṃ tikaṇṇaṃ hoti, tesu tīsu kaṇṇesu dvinnaṃ kaṇṇānaṃ antaraṃ vidatthicaturaṅgulaṃ
tika-vin08t:1562_7: hoti, majjhaṭṭhānaṃ koṭito koṭiṃ āhacca muṭṭhiratanaṃ hoti, idamassa ukkaṭṭhappamāṇa”nti
tika-vin08t:1562_8: vuttattā bimbohanassa ubhosu antesu ṭhapetabbacoḷakaṃ pakatiyāyeva tikaṇṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin08t:1562_9: atha kho koṭiyā koṭiṃ āhacca diguṇakatakāleyeva hoti, tasmā taṃ coḷakaṃ vaṭṭaṃ vā
tika-vin08t:1562_10: hotu caturassaṃ vā, diguṇaṃ katvā miniyamānaṃ tikaṇṇameva hoti, dvinnañca kaṇṇānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1562_11: antaraṃ caturaṅgulādhikavidatthimattaṃ hoti, tassa ca coḷakassa majjhaṭṭhānaṃ muṭṭhiratanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1562_12: hoti, tasseva coḷakassa pamāṇena bimbohanassa majjhaṭṭhānampi muṭṭhiratanaṃ hotīti viññāyatīti.
tika-vin08t:1563_1: uṇṇamayattharaṇaṃ bhisiyaṃ pakkhipitvā sayituṃ vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Masūraketi cammamayabhisiyaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1563_2: cammamayaṃ pana bimbohanaṃ tūlapuṇṇampi na vaṭṭatī”ti ca vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1563_3: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “sīsappamāṇanti yattha galavāṭakato paṭṭhāya sabbasīsaṃ upadahanti,
tika-vin08t:1563_4: taṃ sīsappamāṇaṃ hoti, tañca ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato tiriyaṃ muṭṭhiratanaṃ hotīti dassetuṃ
tika-vin08t:1563_5: ‘yattha vitthārato tīsu kaṇṇesū’tiādimāha. Majjhaṭṭhānaṃ muṭṭhiratanaṃ hotīti bimbohanassa
tika-vin08t:1563_6: majjhaṭṭhānaṃ tiriyato muṭṭhiratanappamāṇaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Arañjaroti bahuudakagaṇhanakā
tika-vin08t:1563_7: mahācāṭi. Jalaṃ gaṇhituṃ alanti arañjaro, vaṭṭacāṭi viya hutvā thokaṃ dīghamukho
tika-vin08t:1563_8: majjhe paricchedaṃ dassetvā katoti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyanti ajjhāhārasambandho.
tika-vin08t:1564_0: Dvisaṅgahāni dve hontīti dve paṭhamadutiyaavissajjiyāni “ārāmo ārāmavatthū”ti ca
tika-vin08t:1564_1: “vihāro vihāravatthū”ti ca vuttadvedvevatthusaṅgahāni honti. Tatiyaṃ avissajjiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1564_2: “mañco pīṭhaṃ bhisi bimbohana”nti vuttacatuvatthusaṅgahaṃ hoti. Catutthaṃ avissajjiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1564_3: “lohakumbhī lohabhāṇakaṃ lohavārako lohakaṭāhaṃ vāsi pharasu kuṭhārī kudālo nikhādana”nti
tika-vin08t:1564_4: vuttanavakoṭṭhāsavantaṃ hoti. Pañcamaṃ avissajjiyaṃ “valli veḷu muñjaṃ pabbajaṃ tiṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:1564_5: mattikā dārubhaṇḍaṃ mattikābhaṇḍa”nti vuttaaṭṭhabhedanaṃ aṭṭhapabhedavantaṃ hotīti
tika-vin08t:1565_1: gāmakāvāsavatthusmiṃ avissajjiyaṃ kīṭāgirivatthusmiṃ avebhaṅgiya”nti vattabbaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin08t:1565_2: Dvinnampi vatthūnaṃ senāsanakkhandhake āgatattā. Senāsanakkhandhaketi ayaṃ sāmaññādhāro.
tika-vin08t:1565_3: Gāmakāvāsavatthusmiṃ kīṭāgirivatthusminti visesādhāro. Ayamattho pāḷiṃ oloketvā paccetabbo.
tika-vin08t:1565_4: Teneva hi samantapāsādikāyaṃ “senāsanakkhandhake”ti avatvā “idha”icceva vuttaṃ, idhāti
tika-vin08t:1565_5: iminā gāmakāvāsavatthuṃ dasseti, kīṭāgirivatthu pana sarūpato dassitameva. Sāmaññādhāro
tika-vin08t:1565_6: pana taṃsaṃvaṇṇanābhāvato avuttopi sijjhatīti na vuttoti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t:1566_0: 228. Thāvarena ca thāvaraṃ, garubhaṇḍena ca garubhaṇḍanti ettha pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu
tika-vin08t:1566_1: purimadvayaṃ thāvaraṃ, pacchimattayaṃ garubhaṇḍanti veditabbaṃ. Samakameva detīti
tika-vin08t:1566_2: ettha ūnakaṃ dentampi vihāravatthusāmantaṃ gahetvā dūrataraṃ dukkhagopaṃ vissajjetuṃ
tika-vin08t:1566_3: vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vakkhati hi “bhikkhūnañce mahagghataraṃ…pe… sampaṭicchituṃ
tika-vin08t:1566_4: vaṭṭatī”ti. Jānāpetvāti bhikkhusaṅghassa jānāpetvā, apaloketvāti attho. Nanu tumhākaṃ
tika-vin08t:1566_5: bahutaraṃ rukkhāti vattabbanti idaṃ sāmikesu attano bhaṇḍassa mahagghataṃ ajānitvā
tika-vin08t:1566_6: dentesu taṃ ñatvā theyyacittena gaṇhato avahāro hotīti vuttaṃ. Vihārena vihāro parivattetabboti
tika-vin08t:1566_7: savatthukena aññesaṃ bhūmiyaṃ katapāsādādinā, avatthukena vā savatthukaṃ parivattetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1566_8: avatthukaṃ pana avatthukeneva parivattetabbaṃ kevalaṃ pāsādassa bhūmito athāvarattā.
tika-vin08t:1567_1: vuttepi sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti. ‘Vihārassa demā’ti vutte saṅghassa vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t:1567_2: na puggalassa khettādi viyāti daṭṭhabba”nti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1567_3: pana “kappiyamañcā sampaṭicchitabbāti ‘saṅghassa demā’ti dinnaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1567_4: Sace pana ‘vihārassa demā’ti vadanti, suvaṇṇarajatamayādiakappiyamañcepi sampaṭicchituṃ
tika-vin08t:1567_5: vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Na kevalaṃ…pe… parivattetuṃ vaṭṭantīti iminā athāvarena thāvarampi
tika-vin08t:1567_6: athāvarampi parivattetuṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Thāvarena athāvarameva hi parivattetuṃ
tika-vin08t:1567_7: na vaṭṭati. “Akappiyaṃ vā mahagghaṃ kappiyaṃ vāti ettha akappiyaṃ nāma suvaṇṇamayamañcādi
tika-vin08t:1567_8: akappiyabhisibimbohanāni ca. Mahagghaṃ kappiyaṃ nāma dantamayamañcādi, pāvārādikappiyaattharaṇādīni
tika-vin08t:1567_9: cā”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ, vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “akappiyaṃ vāti āsandiādi,
tika-vin08t:1567_10: pamāṇātikkantaṃ bimbohanādi ca. Mahagghaṃ kappiyaṃ vāti suvaṇṇādivicittaṃ kappiyavohārena dinna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1568_1: sampaṭicchitumpi pariharitumpi vaṭṭati puggalānaṃ pariharitabbasseva bhājetabbattāti
tika-vin08t:1568_2: vadanti, taṃ upari “kaṃsalohavaṭṭalohabhājanavikati saṅghikaparibhogena vā gihivikaṭā
tika-vin08t:1568_3: vā vaṭṭatī”tiādikena mahāpaccarivacanena virujjhati. Imassa hi “vaṭṭalohakaṃsalohānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1568_4: yena kenaci kato sīhaḷadīpe pādaggaṇhanako bhājetabbo”ti vuttassa mahāaṭṭhakathāvacanassa
tika-vin08t:1568_5: paṭikkhepāya taṃ mahāpaccarivacanaṃ pacchā dassitaṃ, tasmā vaṭṭalohakaṃsalohamayaṃ
tika-vin08t:1568_6: yaṃ kiñci pādaggaṇhanakavārakampi upādāya abhājanīyameva, gihīhi dīyamānampi puggalassa
tika-vin08t:1568_7: sampaṭicchitumpi na vaṭṭati. Pārihāriyaṃ na vaṭṭatīti pattādiparikkhāraṃ viya sayameva
tika-vin08t:1568_8: paṭisāmetvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati. Gihisantakaṃ viya ārāmikādayo ce sayameva gopetvā
tika-vin08t:1568_9: viniyogakāle ānetvā paṭidenti, paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, “paṭisāmetvā bhikkhūnaṃ dethā”ti vattumpi vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin08t:1569_0: Paṇṇasūci nāma lekhanīti vadanti. Attanā laddhānipītiādinā paṭiggahaṇe doso natthi,
tika-vin08t:1569_1: pariharitvā paribhogova āpattikaroti dasseti. Yathā cettha, evaṃ upari bhājanīyavāsiādīsu attano santakesupi.
tika-vin08t:1570: Anāmāsampīti suvaṇṇādimayampi, sabbaṃ taṃ āmasitvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:1571: Upakkhareti upakaraṇe. Sikharaṃ nāma yena paribbhamantā chindanti. Pattabandhako nāma pattassa gaṇṭhiādikārako. “Paṭimānaṃ suvaṇṇādipattakārako”tipi vadanti.
tika-vin08t:1572_0: “Aḍḍhabāhūti kapparato paṭṭhāya yāva aṃsakūṭa”nti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. “Aḍḍhabāhu
tika-vin08t:1572_1: nāma vidatthicaturaṅgulantipi vadantī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyampi
tika-vin08t:1572_2: “aḍḍhabāhūti kapparato paṭṭhāya yāva aṃsakūṭanti likhita”nti vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1572_3: pana “aḍḍhabāhuppamāṇā nāma aḍḍhabāhumattā, aḍḍhabyāmamattātipi vadantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1573_2: vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhaṅgulappamāṇoti dīghato aṭṭhaṅgulappamāṇo. Rittapotthakopīti alikhitapotthakopi,
tika-vin08t:1574_0: Āsandikoti caturassapīṭhaṃ vuccati “uccakampi āsandika”nti vacanato. Ekatobhāgena
tika-vin08t:1574_1: dīghapīṭhameva hi aṭṭhaṅgulapādakaṃ vaṭṭati, caturassāsandiko pana pamāṇātikkantopi
tika-vin08t:1574_2: vaṭṭatīti veditabbo. Sattaṅgo nāma tīsu disāsu apassayaṃ katvā katamañco, ayampi
tika-vin08t:1574_3: pamāṇātikkantopi vaṭṭati. Bhaddapīṭhanti vettamayaṃ pīṭhaṃ vuccati. Pīṭhikāti pilotikabandhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1574_4: pīṭhameva. Eḷakapādapīṭhaṃ nāma dārupaṭikāya uparipāde ṭhapetvā bhojanaphalakaṃ viya
tika-vin08t:1574_5: katapīṭhaṃ vuccati. Āmaṇḍakavaṇṭakapīṭhaṃ nāma āmalakākārena yojitabahaupādapīṭhaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1574_6: Imāni tāva pāḷiyaṃ āgatapīṭhāni. Dārumayaṃ pana sabbampi pīṭhaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:1575_0: “Ghaṭṭanaphalakaṃ nāma yattha ṭhapetvā rajitacīvaraṃ hatthena ghaṭṭenti. Ghaṭṭanamuggaro
tika-vin08t:1575_1: nāma anuvātādighaṭṭanatthaṃ katoti vadantī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1575_2: “ghaṭṭanaphalakaṃ ghaṭṭanamuggaroti idaṃ rajitacīvaraṃ ekasmiṃ maṭṭhe daṇḍamuggare
tika-vin08t:1575_3: veṭhetvā ekassa maṭṭhaphalakassa upari ṭhapetvā upari aparena maṭṭhaphalakena nikkujjitvā
tika-vin08t:1575_4: eko upari akkamitvā tiṭṭhati, dve janā upariphalakaṃ dvīsu koṭīsu gahetvā aparāparaṃ
tika-vin08t:1575_5: ākaḍḍhanavikaḍḍhanaṃ karonti, etaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Hatthe ṭhapāpetvā hatthena paharaṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:1575_6: pana niṭṭhitarajanassa cīvarassa allakāle kātabbaṃ, idaṃ pana phalakamuggarehi ghaṭṭanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1575_8: pokkharaṇīsadisakatapānīyabhājanaṃ. Rajanadoṇīti yattha pakkarajanaṃ ākiritvā ṭhapentī”ti
tika-vin08t:1575_10: kataṃ. Pānīyabhājanantipi vadanti. Rajanadoṇīti ekadārunāva kataṃ rajanabhājanaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1576_0: “Bhūmattharaṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti akappiyacammaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Paccattharaṇagatikanti
tika-vin08t:1576_1: iminā mañcapīṭhepi attharituṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. Pāvārādipaccattharaṇampi garubhaṇḍanti
tika-vin08t:1576_2: eke. Noti apare, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabba”nti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1576_3: pana “daṇḍamuggaro nāma ‘yena rajitacīvaraṃ pothenti, tampi garubhaṇḍamevā’ti vuttattā,
tika-vin08t:1576_4: ‘paccattharaṇagatika’nti vuttattā ca api-saddena pāvārādipaccattharaṇaṃ sabbaṃ garubhaṇḍamevāti
tika-vin08t:1576_5: vadanti. Eteneva suttena aññathā atthaṃ vatvā pāvārādipaccattharaṇaṃ na garubhaṇḍaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1576_6: bhājanīyameva, senāsanatthāya dinnapaccattharaṇameva garubhaṇḍanti vadanti. Upaparikkhitabba”nti
tika-vin08t:1576_7: vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “bhūmattharaṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti akappiyacammaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin08t:1576_8: vuttaṃ. Tattha bhūmattharaṇasaṅkhepena sayitumpi vaṭṭatiyeva. Paccattharaṇagatikanti
tika-vin08t:1576_9: iminā mañcādīsu attharitabbaṃ mahācammaṃ eḷakacammaṃ nāmāti dassetī”ti vuttaṃ. Chattamuṭṭhipaṇṇanti
tika-vin08t:1576_10: tālapaṇṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Pattakaṭāhanti pattapacanakaṭāhaṃ. Gaṇṭhikāti cīvaragaṇṭhikā.
tika-vin08t:1577_0: Idāni vinayatthamañjūsāyaṃ āgatanayo vuccate – ārāmo nāma pupphārāmo vā phalārāmo
tika-vin08t:1577_1: vā. Ārāmavatthu nāma tesaṃyeva ārāmānaṃ atthāya paricchinditvā ṭhapitokāso. Tesu
tika-vin08t:1577_2: vā ārāmesu vinaṭṭhesu tesaṃ porāṇakabhūmibhāgo. Vihāro nāma yaṃ kiñci pāsādādisenāsanaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1577_3: Vihāravatthu nāma tassa patiṭṭhānokāso. Mañco nāma masārako bundikābaddho kuḷīrapādako
tika-vin08t:1577_4: āhaccapādakoti imesaṃ pubbe vuttānaṃ catunnaṃ mañcānaṃ aññataro. Pīṭhaṃ nāma masārakādīnaṃyeva
tika-vin08t:1577_5: catunnaṃ pīṭhānaṃ aññataraṃ. Bhisi nāma uṇṇabhisiādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ bhisīnaṃ aññataraṃ.
tika-vin08t:1577_6: Bimbohanaṃ nāma rukkhatūlalatātūlapoṭakītūlānaṃ aññatarena puṇṇaṃ. Lohakumbhī nāma
tika-vin08t:1577_7: kāḷalohena vā tambalohena vā yena kenaci katakumbhī. Lohabhāṇakādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin08t:1577_8: Ettha pana bhāṇakanti arañjaro vuccati. Vārakoti ghaṭo. Kaṭāhaṃ kaṭāhameva. Vāsiādīsu
tika-vin08t:1578_0: Tattha thāvarena thāvaranti vihāravihāravatthunā ārāmaārāmavatthuṃ vihāravihāravatthuṃ.
tika-vin08t:1578_1: Itarenāti athāvarena, pacchimarāsittayenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Akappiyenāti suvaṇṇamayamañcādinā
tika-vin08t:1578_2: ceva akappiyabhisibimbohanehi ca. Mahagghakappiyenāti dantamayamañcādinā ceva pāvārādinā
tika-vin08t:1578_3: ca. Itaranti athāvaraṃ. Kappiyaparivattanena parivattetunti yathā akappiyaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin08t:1578_4: evaṃ parivattetuṃ…pe… evaṃ tāva thāvarena thāvaraparivattanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Itarena
tika-vin08t:1578_5: itaraparivattane pana mañcapīṭhaṃ mahantaṃ vā hotu, khuddakaṃ vā, antamaso caturaṅgulapādakaṃ
tika-vin08t:1578_6: gāmadārakehi paṃsvāgārakesu kīḷantehi katampi saṅghassa dinnakālato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin08t:1578_7: hoti…pe… satagghanakena vā sahassagghanakena vā mañcena aññaṃ mañcasatampi labhati,
tika-vin08t:1578_8: parivattetvā gahetabbaṃ. Na kevalaṃ mañcena mañcoyeva, ārāmaārāmavatthuvihāravihāravatthupīṭhabhisibimbohanānipi
tika-vin08t:1579_1: Tīṇi hi kittimalohāni kaṃsalohaṃ vaṭṭalohaṃ hārakūṭanti. Tattha tiputambe missetvā
tika-vin08t:1579_2: kataṃ kaṃsalohaṃ. Sīsatambe missetvā kataṃ vaṭṭalohaṃ. Rasatambe missetvā kataṃ hārakūṭaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1579_3: Tena vuttaṃ “kaṃsalohaṃ vaṭṭalohañca kittimaloha”nti. Tato atirekanti tato atirekagaṇhanako.
tika-vin08t:1579_4: Sārakoti majjhe makuḷaṃ dassetvā mukhavaṭṭivitthataṃ katvā piṭṭhito nāmetvā kātabbaṃ
tika-vin08t:1579_5: ekaṃ bhājanaṃ. Sarāvantipi vadanti. Ādi-saddena kañcanakādīnaṃ gihiupakaraṇānaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1579_6: Tāni hi khuddakānipi garubhaṇḍāneva gihiupakaraṇattā. Pi-saddena pageva mahantānīti
tika-vin08t:1579_7: dasseti, imāni pana bhājanīyāni bhikkhupakaraṇattāti adhippāyo. Yathā ca etāni, evaṃ
tika-vin08t:1579_8: kuṇḍikāpi bhājanīyā. Vakkhati hi “yathā ca mattikābhaṇḍe, evaṃ lohabhaṇḍepi kuṇḍikā
tika-vin08t:1579_10: datvā paribhogena. Gihivikaṭāti gihīhi vikatā paññattā, attano vā santakakaraṇena
tika-vin08t:1579_11: virūpaṃ katā. Puggalikaparibhogena na vaṭṭatīti āgantukānaṃ adatvā attano santakaṃ
tika-vin08t:1579_12: viya gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati. Pipphalikoti kattari. Ārakaṇṭakaṃ sūcivedhakaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1579_13: Tāḷaṃ yantaṃ. Kattarayaṭṭhivedhako kattarayaṭṭhivalayaṃ. Yathā tathā ghanakataṃ lohanti
tika-vin08t:1579_14: lohavaṭṭi lohaguḷo lohapiṇḍi lohacakkalikanti evaṃ ghanakataṃ lohaṃ. Khīrapāsāṇamayānīti
tika-vin08t:1580_0: Gihivikaṭānipi na vaṭṭanti anāmāsattā. Pi-saddena pageva saṅghikaparibhogena vā puggalikaparibhogena
tika-vin08t:1580_1: vāti dasseti. Senāsanaparibhogo pana sabbakappiyo, tasmā jātarūpādimayā sabbāpi senāsanaparikkhārā
tika-vin08t:1581_0: Sesāti tato mahattarī vāsi. Yā panāti yā kuṭhārī pana. Kudālo antamaso caturaṅgulamattopi
tika-vin08t:1581_1: garubhaṇḍameva. Nikhādanaṃ caturassamukhaṃ vā hotu doṇimukhaṃ vā vaṅkaṃ vā ujukaṃ
tika-vin08t:1581_2: vā, antamaso sammuñjanīdaṇḍavedhanampi, daṇḍabandhañce, garubhaṇḍameva. Tenāha “kudālo
tika-vin08t:1581_3: daṇḍabandhanikhādanaṃ vā agarubhaṇḍaṃ nāma natthī”ti. Sipāṭikā nāma khurakoso, sikharaṃ
tika-vin08t:1581_4: pana daṇḍabandhanikhādanaṃ anulometīti āha “sikharampi nikhādaneneva saṅgahita”nti.
tika-vin08t:1581_5: Sace pana vāsi adaṇḍakaṃ phalamattaṃ, bhājanīyaṃ. Upakkhareti vāsiādibhaṇḍe.
tika-vin08t:1582_2: imāni cettha tīṇi pipphalikaṃ anulomantīti āha “ayaṃ pana viseso”tiādi. Itarānīti mahākattariādīni.
tika-vin08t:1583_0: Aḍḍhabāhuppamāṇāti kapparato paṭṭhāya yāva aṃsakūṭappamāṇā, vidatthicaturaṅgulappamāṇāti
tika-vin08t:1583_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Tatthajātakāti saṅghikabhūmiyaṃ jātā, ārakkhasaṃvidhānena rakkhitattā
tika-vin08t:1583_2: rakkhitā ca sā mañjūsādīsu pakkhittaṃ viya yathā taṃ na nassati, evaṃ gopanato gopitā
tika-vin08t:1583_3: cāti rakkhitagopitā. Tatthajātakāpi pana arakkhitā garubhaṇḍameva na hoti. Saṅghakamme
tika-vin08t:1583_4: ca cetiyakamme ca kateti iminā saṅghasantakena cetiyasantakaṃ rakkhituṃ parivattituñca
tika-vin08t:1583_5: vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. Suttaṃ panāti vaṭṭitañceva avaṭṭitañca suttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1584_0: Aṭṭhaṅgulasūcidaṇḍamattoti antamaso dīghaso aṭṭhaṅgulamatto pariṇāhato sīhaḷa-paṇṇasūcidaṇḍamatto.
tika-vin08t:1584_1: Etthāti veḷubhaṇḍe. Daḍḍhaṃ gehaṃ yesaṃ teti daḍḍhagehā. Na vāretabbāti “mā gaṇhitvā
tika-vin08t:1584_2: gacchathā”ti na nisedhetabbā. Desantaragatena sampattavihāre saṅghikāvāse ṭhapetabbā.
tika-vin08t:1585_0: Avasesañca chadanatiṇanti muñjapabbajehi avasesaṃ yaṃ kiñci chadanatiṇaṃ. Aṭṭhaṅgulappamāṇopīti
tika-vin08t:1585_1: vitthārato aṭṭhaṅgulappamāṇo. Likhitapotthako pana garubhaṇḍaṃ na hoti. Kappiyacammānīti
tika-vin08t:1585_2: migādīnaṃ cammāni. Sabbaṃ cakkayuttayānanti rathasakaṭādikaṃ sabbaṃ cakkayuttayānaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1585_3: Visaṅkhatacakkaṃ pana yānaṃ bhājanīyaṃ. Anuññātavāsi nāma yā sipāṭikāya pakkhipitvā
tika-vin08t:1585_4: pariharituṃ sakkāti vuttā. Muṭṭhipaṇṇaṃ tālapattaṃ. Tañhi muṭṭhinā gahetvā pariharantīti
tika-vin08t:1585_6: araṇīyugaḷaṃ, uttarāraṇī adharāraṇīti araṇīdvayanti attho. Phātikammaṃ katvāti antamaso
tika-vin08t:1585_7: taṃagghanakavālikāyapi thāvaraṃ vaḍḍhikammaṃ katvā. Kuṇḍikāti ayakuṇḍikā ceva tambalohakuṇḍikā
tika-vin08t:1585_8: ca. Bhājanīyakoṭṭhāsameva bhajatīti bhājanīyapakkhameva sevati, na tu garubhaṇḍanti
tika-vin08t:1590_0: 230. Evaṃ garubhaṇḍavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni codanādivinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “codanādivinicchayoti
tika-vin08t:1590_1: ettha panā”tiādimāha. Tattha codīyate codanā, dosāropananti attho. Ādi-saddena sāraṇādayo
tika-vin08t:1590_2: saṅgaṇhāti. Vuttañhetaṃ kammakkhandhake “codetvā kataṃ hoti, sāretvā kataṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t:1590_3: āpattiṃ ropetvā kataṃ hotī”ti. “Codetuṃ pana ko labhati, ko na labhatī”ti idaṃ anuddhaṃsanādhippāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1590_4: vināpi codanālakkhaṇaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Sīlasampannoti idaṃ dussīlassa vacanaṃ appamāṇanti
tika-vin08t:1590_5: adhippāyena vuttaṃ. Bhikkhunīnaṃ pana bhikkhuṃ codetuṃ anissarattā ‘bhikkhunimevā’ti
tika-vin08t:1590_6: vuttaṃ. Satipi bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūsu anissarabhāve tāhi katacodanāpi codanārahattā
tika-vin08t:1590_7: codanāyevāti adhippāyena “pañcapi sahadhammikā labhantī”ti vuttaṃ. Bhikkhussa sutvā
tika-vin08t:1590_8: codetītiādinā codako yesaṃ sutvā codeti, tesampi vacanaṃ pamāṇamevāti sampaṭicchitattā
tika-vin08t:1590_9: tesaṃ codanāpi ruhatevāti dassetuṃ “thero suttaṃ nidassesī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1590_11: ‘codetuṃ pana ko labhati, ko na labhatī’tiādi āraddhaṃ. ‘Bhikkhussa sutvā codetī’tiādisuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:1590_12: yasmā ye codakassa aññesaṃ vipattiṃ pakāsenti, tepi tasmiṃ khaṇe codakabhāve ṭhatvāva
tika-vin08t:1590_13: pakāsenti, tesañca vacanaṃ gahetvā itaropi yasmā codetuñca asampaṭicchantaṃ tehi
tika-vin08t:1590_14: titthiyasāvakapariyosānehi paṭhamacodakehi sampaṭicchāpetuñca labhati, tasmā idha
tika-vin08t:1591_0: Garukānaṃ dvinnanti pārājikasaṅghādisesānaṃ. Avasesānanti thullaccayādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ
tika-vin08t:1591_1: āpattīnaṃ. Micchādiṭṭhi nāma “natthi dinna”ntiādinayappavattā dasavatthukā diṭṭhi.
tika-vin08t:1591_2: “Antavā loko anantavā loko”tiādikā antaṃ gaṇhāpakadiṭṭhi antaggāhikā nāma. Ājīvahetu
tika-vin08t:1591_3: paññattānaṃ channanti ājīvahetupi āpajjitabbānaṃ uttarimanussadhamme pārājikaṃ, sañcaritte
tika-vin08t:1591_4: saṅghādiseso, “yo te vihāre vasati, so arahā”ti pariyāyena thullaccayaṃ, bhikkhussa
tika-vin08t:1591_6: sūpodanaviññattiyā dukkaṭanti imesaṃ parivāre vuttānaṃ channaṃ. Na hetā āpattiyo
tika-vin08t:1591_7: ājīvahetu eva paññattā sañcarittādīnaṃ aññathāpi āpajjitabbato. Ājīvahetupi etāsaṃ
tika-vin08t:1591_8: āpajjanaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vuttaṃ, ājīvahetupi paññattānanti attho. Diṭṭhivipattiājīvavipattīhi
tika-vin08t:1592_0: “Kasmā maṃ na vandasī”ti pucchite “assamaṇosi, asakyaputtiyosī”ti avandanakāraṇassa
tika-vin08t:1592_1: vuttattā antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpanno na vanditabboti vadanti. Codetukāmatāya eva avanditvā
tika-vin08t:1592_2: attanā vattabbassa vuttamatthaṃ ṭhapetvā avandiyabhāve taṃ kāraṇaṃ na hotīti cūḷagaṇṭhipade
tika-vin08t:1592_3: majjhimagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ. Antimavatthuajjhāpannassa avandiyesu avuttattā tena
tika-vin08t:1592_4: saddhiṃ sayantassa sahaseyyāpattiyā abhāvato, tassa ca paṭiggahaṇassa ruhanato tadeva
tika-vin08t:1592_5: yuttataranti viññāyati. Kiñcāpi yāva so bhikkhubhāvaṃ paṭijānāti, tāva vanditabbo,
tika-vin08t:1592_6: yadā pana “assamaṇomhī”ti paṭijānāti, tadā na vanditabboti ayamettha viseso veditabbo.
tika-vin08t:1592_7: Antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannassa hi bhikkhubhāvaṃ paṭijānantasseva bhikkhubhāvo, na tato
tika-vin08t:1592_8: paraṃ. Bhikkhubhāvaṃ appaṭijānanto hi anupasampannapakkhaṃ bhajati. Yasmā āmisaṃ
tika-vin08t:1592_9: dento attano icchitaṭṭhāneyeva deti, tasmā paṭipāṭiyā nisinnānaṃ yāgubhattādīni dentena
tika-vin08t:1592_10: ekassa codetukāmatāya adinnepi codanā nāma na hotīti āha “na tāva tā codanā hotī”ti.
tika-vin08t:1593_0: 231. Codetabboti cudito, cudito eva cuditako, aparādhavanto puggalo. Codetīti codako,
tika-vin08t:1593_1: aparādhapakāsako. Cuditako ca codako ca cuditakacodakā. Ubbāhikāyāti ubbahanti viyojenti
tika-vin08t:1593_2: etāya alajjīnaṃ tajjaniṃ vā kalahaṃ vāti ubbāhikā, saṅghasammuti, tāya. Vinicchinanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1593_3: nāma tāya sammatabhikkhūhi vinicchinanameva. Alajjussannāya hi parisāya samathakkhandhake
tika-vin08t:1593_4: āgatehi dasahaṅgehi samannāgatā dve tayo bhikkhū tattheva vuttāya ñattidutiyakammavācāya
tika-vin08t:1594_0: “Tehi ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi tasmiṃ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne anantāni ceva bhassāni
tika-vin08t:1594_1: jāyanti, na cekassa bhāsitassa attho viññāyati. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, evarūpaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:1594_2: ubbāhikāya vūpasametuṃ. Dasahaṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu ubbāhikāya sammannitabbo,
tika-vin08t:1594_3: sīlavā hoti, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu
tika-vin08t:1594_4: bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu, bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo,
tika-vin08t:1594_5: ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:1594_6: parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ abhivadanti, tathārūpassa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā
tika-vin08t:1594_7: vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā, ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni
tika-vin08t:1594_8: vitthārena svāgatāni honti suvibhattāni suppavattīni suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso,
tika-vin08t:1594_9: vinaye kho pana cheko hoti asaṃhīro, paṭibalo hoti ubho atthapaccatthike assāsetuṃ
tika-vin08t:1594_10: saññāpetuṃ nijjhāpetuṃ pekkhetuṃ passituṃ pasādetuṃ, adhikaraṇasamuppādavūpasamakusalo
tika-vin08t:1594_11: hoti, adhikaraṇaṃ jānāti, adhikaraṇasamudayaṃ jānāti, adhikaraṇanirodhaṃ jānāti,
tika-vin08t:1594_12: adhikaraṇanirodhagāminipaṭipadaṃ jānāti. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi dasahaṅgehi
tika-vin08t:1595: “Evañca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbo. Paṭhamaṃ bhikkhu yācitabbo, yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo –
tika-vin08t:1596_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, amhākaṃ imasmiṃ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne anantāni ceva
tika-vin08t:1596_1: bhassāni jāyanti, na cekassa bhāsitassa attho viññāyati. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1596_2: saṅgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca bhikkhuṃ sammanneyya ubbāhikāya imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:1597_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, amhākaṃ imasmiṃ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne anantāni ceva
tika-vin08t:1597_1: bhassāni jāyanti, na cekassa bhāsitassa attho viññāyati. Saṅgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca
tika-vin08t:1597_2: bhikkhuṃ sammannati ubbāhikāya imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ. Yassāyasmato khamati
tika-vin08t:1597_3: itthannāmassa ca itthannāmassa ca bhikkhuno sammuti ubbāhikāya imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ,
tika-vin08t:1597_4: so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
tika-vin08t:1598: “Sammato saṅghena itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca bhikkhu ubbāhikāya imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti.
tika-vin08t:1599: Tehi ca sammatehi visuṃ vā nisīditvā tassā eva vā parisāya “aññehi na kiñci kathetabba”nti sāvetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchitabbaṃ. Tumhākanti cuditakacodake sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1600_0: “Kimhīti kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ. Kimhi nampi na jānāsīti kimhi nanti vacanampi na jānāsi.
tika-vin08t:1600_1: Nāssa anuyogo dātabboti nāssa pucchā paṭipucchā dātabbā”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1600_2: vimativinodaniyaṃ pana – kimhīti kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ, kataravipattiyanti attho. Kimhi
tika-vin08t:1600_3: naṃ nāmāti idaṃ “katarāya vipattiyā etaṃ codesī”ti yāya kāyaci viññāyamānāya bhāsāya
tika-vin08t:1600_5: maṃ pucchatī”ti viññātuṃ asakkontassa pucchā, na pana “kimhī”tiādipadatthamattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1600_6: ajānantassa. Na hi anuvijjako codakaṃ bālaṃ aparicitabhāsāya “kimhi na”nti pucchati.
tika-vin08t:1600_7: Kimhi nampi na jānāsīti idampi vacanamattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ na hoti. “Kataravipattiyā”ti
tika-vin08t:1600_8: vutte “asukāya vipattiyā”ti vattumpi “na jānāsī”ti vacanassa adhippāyameva sandhāya
tika-vin08t:1600_9: vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. Teneva vakkhati “nāssa anuyogo dātabbo”ti.
tika-vin08t:1601_0: “Tassa nayo dātabbo”ti tassāti bālassa lajjissa. “Tassa nayo dātabbo”ti vatvā ca
tika-vin08t:1601_1: “kimhi naṃ codesīti sīlavipattiyā”tiādi adhippāyappakāsanameva nayadānaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1601_2: na pana kimhi-naṃ-padānaṃpariyāyamattadassanaṃ. Na hi bālo “kataravipattiyaṃ naṃ
tika-vin08t:1601_3: codesī”ti imassa vacanassa atthe ñātepi vipattippabhedaṃ, attanā codiyamānaṃ vipattisarūpañca
tika-vin08t:1601_4: jānituṃ sakkoti, tasmā teneva ajānanena alajjī apasādetabbo. Kimhi nanti idampi upalakkhaṇamattaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1601_5: Aññena vā yena kenaci ākārena aviññutaṃ pakāsetvā vissajjetabbova. “Dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1601_7: hi-kāro ettha āgamo daṭṭhabbo, āgamissatīti attho. Diṭṭhasantānenāti diṭṭhaniyāmena.
tika-vin08t:1601_8: Alajjissa paṭiññāya eva kātabbanti vacanapaṭivacanakkameneva dose āvibhūtepi alajjissa
tika-vin08t:1601_9: “asuddho aha”nti dosasampaṭicchanapaṭiññāya eva āpattiyā kātabbanti attho. Keci pana
tika-vin08t:1601_10: “alajjissa etaṃ natthīti suddhapaṭiññāya eva anāpattiyā kātabbanti ayamettha attho
tika-vin08t:1601_11: saṅgahito”ti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ anuvijjakasseva niratthakattāpattito, codakeneva
tika-vin08t:1601_12: alajjipaṭiññāya ṭhātabbato. Dosopagamapaṭiññā eva hi idha paṭiññāti adhippetā, teneva
tika-vin08t:1601_13: vakkhati “etampi natthi, etampi natthīti paṭiññaṃ na detī”tiādi.
tika-vin08t:1602_0: Tadatthadīpanatthanti alajjissa dose āvibhūtepi tassa dosopagamapaṭiññāya eva kātabbatādīpanatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1602_1: Vivādavatthusaṅkhāte atthe paccatthikā atthapaccatthikā. Saññaṃ datvāti tesaṃ kathāpacchedatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1602_2: abhimukhakaraṇatthañca saddaṃ katvā. Vinicchinituṃ ananucchavikoti asuddhoti saññāya
tika-vin08t:1602_3: codakapakkhe paviṭṭhattā anuvijjakabhāvato bahibhūtattā anuvijjituṃ asakkuṇeyyattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1602_4: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sandehe eva hi sati anuvijjituṃ sakkā, asuddhaladdhiyā pana sati
tika-vin08t:1602_5: cuditakena vuttaṃ sabbaṃ asaccatopi paṭibhāti, kathaṃ tattha anuvijjanā siyāti.
tika-vin08t:1603_0: Tathā nāsitakova bhavissatīti iminā vinicchayampi adatvā saṅghato viyojanaṃ nāma
tika-vin08t:1603_1: liṅganāsanā viya ayampi eko nāsanappakāroti dasseti. Ekasambhogaparibhogāti idaṃ
tika-vin08t:1603_2: attano santikā tesaṃ vimocanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na pana tesaṃ aññamaññasambhoge yojanatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1604_0: Viraddhaṃ hotīti sañcicca āpattiṃ āpanno hoti. Ādito paṭṭhāya alajjī nāma natthīti
tika-vin08t:1604_1: idaṃ “pakkhānaṃ anurakkhaṇatthāya paṭiññaṃ na detī”ti imassa alajjīlakkhaṇasambhavassa
tika-vin08t:1604_2: karaṇavacanaṃ. Paṭicchāditakālato paṭṭhāya alajjī nāma eva, purimo lajjibhāvo na
tika-vin08t:1604_3: rakkhatīti attho. Paṭiññaṃ na detīti “sace mayā katadosaṃ vakkhāmi, mayhaṃ anuvattakā
tika-vin08t:1604_4: bhijjissantī”ti paṭiññaṃ na deti. Ṭhāne na tiṭṭhatīti lajjiṭṭhāne na tiṭṭhati, kāyavācāsu
tika-vin08t:1604_5: vītikkamo hoti evāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “vinicchayo na dātabbo”ti, pubbe pakkhikānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1604_6: paṭiññāya vūpasamitassapi adhikaraṇassa duvūpasantatāya ayampi tathā nāsitakova bhavissatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:1605_0: 232. Adinnādānavatthuṃ vinicchinantena pañcavīsati avahārā sādhukaṃ sallakkhetabbāti
tika-vin08t:1605_1: ettha pañcavīsati avahārā nāma pañca pañcakāni, tattha pañca pañcakāni nāma nānābhaṇḍapañcakaṃ
tika-vin08t:1605_3: Tathā hi vuttaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ “te pana avahārā pañca pañcakāni samodhānetvā sādhukaṃ
tika-vin08t:1605_5: “ādiyeyya, hareyya, avahareyya, iriyāpathaṃ vikopeyya, ṭhānā cāveyyā”ti imesaṃ padānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1605_6: vasena labbhanti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ porāṇehi –
tika-vin08t:1610_0: Tattha nānābhaṇḍapañcakaṃ saviññāṇakaaviññāṇakavasena daṭṭhabbaṃ, itaraṃ saviññāṇakavaseneva.
tika-vin08t:1610_1: Kathaṃ? Ādiyeyyāti ārāmaṃ abhiyuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Sāmikassa vimatiṃ uppādeti,
tika-vin08t:1610_2: āpatti thullaccayassa. Sāmiko “na mayhaṃ bhavissatī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipati, āpatti
tika-vin08t:1610_3: pārājikassa. Hareyyāti aññassa bhaṇḍaṃ haranto sīse bhāraṃ theyyacitto āmasati, dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1610_4: Phandāpeti, thullaccayaṃ. Khandhaṃ oropeti, pārājikaṃ. Avahareyyāti upanikkhittaṃ
tika-vin08t:1610_5: bhaṇḍaṃ “dehi me bhaṇḍa”nti vuccamāno “nāhaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti bhaṇati, dukkaṭaṃ. Sāmikassa
tika-vin08t:1610_6: vimatiṃ uppādeti, thullaccayaṃ. Sāmiko “na mayhaṃ bhavissatī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipati,
tika-vin08t:1610_7: pārājikaṃ. Iriyāpathaṃ vikopeyyāti “sahabhaṇḍahārakaṃ nessāmī”ti paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmeti,
tika-vin08t:1610_8: thullaccayaṃ. Dutiyaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmeti, pārājikaṃ. Ṭhānā cāveyyāti thalaṭṭhaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin08t:1610_9: theyyacitto āmasati, dukkaṭaṃ. Phandāpeti, thullaccayaṃ. Ṭhānā cāveti, pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1610_10: Evaṃ tāva nānābhaṇḍapañcakaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sassāmikassa pana dāsassa vā tiracchānagatassa
tika-vin08t:1610_11: vā yathāvuttena abhiyogādinā nayena ādiyanaharaṇa avaharaṇa iriyāpathavikopana ṭhānācāvanavasena
tika-vin08t:1613: Katamaṃ sāhatthikapañcakaṃ? Sāhatthiko āṇattiko nissaggiyo atthasādhako dhuranikkhepoti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
tika-vin08t:1616_0: Tattha sāhatthiko nāma parassa bhaṇḍaṃ sahatthā avaharati. Āṇattiko nāma “asukassa
tika-vin08t:1616_1: bhaṇḍaṃ avaharā”ti aññaṃ āṇāpeti. Nissaggiyo nāma suṅkaghātaparikappitokāsānaṃ anto
tika-vin08t:1616_2: ṭhatvā bahi pātanaṃ. Atthasādhako nāma “asukassa bhaṇḍaṃ yadā sakkosi, tadā taṃ avaharā”ti
tika-vin08t:1616_3: āṇāpeti. Tattha sace paro anantarāyiko hutvā taṃ avaharati, āṇāpakassa āṇattikkhaṇeyeva
tika-vin08t:1616_4: pārājikaṃ. Parassa vā pana telakumbhiyā pādagghanakaṃ telaṃ avassaṃ pivanakāni upāhanādīni
tika-vin08t:1616_5: pakkhipati, hatthato muttamatteyeva pārājikaṃ. Dhuranikkhepo pana ārāmābhiyogaupanikkhittabhaṇḍavasena
tika-vin08t:1616_6: veditabbo. Tāvakālikabhaṇḍadeyyāni adentassapi eseva nayoti idaṃ sāhatthikapañcakaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1617: Katamaṃ pubbapayogapañcakaṃ? Pubbapayogo sahapayogo saṃvidāvahāro saṅketakammaṃ nimittakammanti. Tena vuttaṃ –
tika-vin08t:1620_0: Tattha āṇattivasena pubbapayogo veditabbo. Ṭhānācāvanavasena, khilādīni saṅkāmetvā
tika-vin08t:1620_1: khettādiggahaṇavasena ca sahapayogo veditabbo. Saṃvidāvahāro nāma “asukaṃ nāma bhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin08t:1620_2: avaharissāmā”ti saṃvidahitvā sammantayitvā avaharaṇaṃ. Evaṃ saṃvidahitvā gatesu hi
tika-vin08t:1620_3: ekenapi tasmiṃ bhaṇḍe ṭhānā cāvite sabbesaṃ avahāro hoti. Saṅketakammaṃ nāma sañjānanakammaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1620_4: Sace hi purebhattādīsu yaṃ kiñci kālaṃ paricchinditvā “asukasmiṃ kāle itthannāmaṃ
tika-vin08t:1620_5: bhaṇḍaṃ avaharā”ti vutto saṅketato apacchā apure taṃ avaharati, saṅketakārakassa
tika-vin08t:1620_6: saṅketakaraṇakkhaṇeyeva avahāro. Nimittakammaṃ nāma saññuppādanatthaṃ akkhinikhaṇanādinimittakaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1620_7: Sace hi evaṃ katanimittato apacchā apure “yaṃ avaharā”ti vutto, taṃ avaharati, nimittakārakassa
tika-vin08t:1621: Katamaṃ theyyāvahārapañcakaṃ? Theyyāvahāro pasayhāvahāro parikappāvahāro paṭicchannāvahāro kusāvahāroti. Tena vuttaṃ –
tika-vin08t:1624_0: Tattha yo sandhicchedādīni katvā adissamāno avaharati, kūṭatulākūṭamānakūṭakahāpaṇādīhi
tika-vin08t:1624_1: vā vañcetvā gaṇhāti, tassevaṃ gaṇhato avahāro theyyāvahāroti veditabbo. Yo pana pasayha
tika-vin08t:1624_2: balakkārena paresaṃ santakaṃ gaṇhāti gāmaghātakādayo viya, attano pattabalito vā
tika-vin08t:1624_3: vuttanayeneva adhikaṃ gaṇhāti rājabhaṭādayo viya, tassevaṃ gaṇhato avahāro pasayhāvahāroti
tika-vin08t:1624_4: veditabbo. Parikappetvā gahaṇaṃ pana parikappāvahāro nāma.
tika-vin08t:1625_0: So bhaṇḍokāsassa vasena duvidho. Tatrāyaṃ bhaṇḍaparikappo – sāṭakatthiko antogabbhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1625_1: pavisitvā “sace sāṭako bhavissati, gaṇhissāmi. Sace suttaṃ, na gaṇhissāmī”ti parikappetvā
tika-vin08t:1625_2: andhakāre pasibbakaṃ gaṇhāti. Tatra ce sāṭako hoti, uddhāreyeva pārājikaṃ. Suttañce
tika-vin08t:1625_3: hoti, rakkhati. Bahi nīharitvā muñcitvā “sutta”nti ñatvā puna āharitvā ṭhapeti, rakkhatiyeva.
tika-vin08t:1625_4: “Sutta”nti ñatvāpi yaṃ laddhaṃ, taṃ gahetabbanti gacchati, padavārena kāretabbo.
tika-vin08t:1625_5: Bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā gaṇhāti, uddhāre pārājikaṃ. “Coro coro”ti anubandho chaḍḍetvā palāyati,
tika-vin08t:1625_6: rakkhati. Sāmikā disvā gaṇhanti, rakkhatiyeva. Añño ce gaṇhāti, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Sāmikesu
tika-vin08t:1625_7: nivattantesu sayaṃ disvā paṃsukūlasaññāya “pagevetaṃ mayā gahitaṃ, mama dāni santaka”nti
tika-vin08t:1625_8: gaṇhantassapi bhaṇḍadeyyameva. Tattha yvāyaṃ “sace sāṭako bhavissati, gaṇhissāmī”tiādinā
tika-vin08t:1625_9: nayena pavatto parikappo, ayaṃ bhaṇḍaparikappo nāma. Okāsaparikappo pana evaṃ veditabbo
tika-vin08t:1625_10: – ekacco pana parapariveṇādīni paviṭṭho kiñci lobhaneyyabhaṇḍaṃ disvā gabbhadvārapamukhaheṭṭhā
tika-vin08t:1625_11: pāsādadvārakoṭṭhakarukkhamūlādivasena paricchedaṃ katvā “sace maṃ etthantare passissanti,
tika-vin08t:1625_12: daṭṭhukāmatāya gahetvā vicaranto viya dassāmi. No ce passissanti, harissāmī”ti parikappeti,
tika-vin08t:1625_13: tassa taṃ ādāya parikappitaparicchedaṃ atikkantamatte avahāro hoti. Iti yvāyaṃ vuttanayeneva
tika-vin08t:1625_14: pavatto parikappo, ayaṃ okāsaparikappo nāma. Evamimesaṃ dvinnaṃ parikappānaṃ vasena
tika-vin08t:1626_0: Paṭicchādetvā pana avaharaṇaṃ paṭicchannāvahāro. So evaṃ veditabbo – yo bhikkhu uyyānādīsu
tika-vin08t:1626_1: paresaṃ omuñcitvā ṭhapitaṃ aṅgulimuddikādiṃ disvā “pacchā gaṇhissāmī”ti paṃsunā vā
tika-vin08t:1626_2: paṇṇena vā paṭicchādeti, tassa ettāvatā uddhāro natthīti na tāva avahāro hoti. Yadā
tika-vin08t:1626_3: pana sāmikā vicinantā apassitvā “sve jānissāmā”ti sālayāva gatā honti, athassa taṃ
tika-vin08t:1626_4: uddharato uddhāre avahāro. “Paṭicchannakāleyeva etaṃ mama santaka”nti sakasaññāya
tika-vin08t:1626_5: vā “gatādāni te, chaḍḍitabhaṇḍaṃ ida”nti paṃsukūlasaññāya vā gaṇhantassa pana bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1626_6: Tesu dutiyatatiyadivase āgantvā vicinitvā adisvā dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā gatesupi gahitaṃ
tika-vin08t:1626_7: bhaṇḍadeyyameva. Pacchā ñatvā codiyamānassa adadato sāmikānaṃ dhuranikkhepe avahāro
tika-vin08t:1626_8: hoti. Kasmā? Yasmā tassa payogena tehi na diṭṭhaṃ. Yo pana tathārūpaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ yathāṭhāne
tika-vin08t:1626_9: ṭhitaṃyeva appaṭicchādetvā theyyacitto pādena akkamitvā kaddame vā vālikāya vā paveseti,
tika-vin08t:1627_0: Kusaṃ saṅkāmetvā pana avaharaṇaṃ kusāvahāro nāma. Sopi evaṃ veditabbo – yo bhikkhu
tika-vin08t:1627_1: vilīvamayaṃ vā tālapaṇṇamayaṃ vā katasaññāṇaṃ yaṃ kiñci kusaṃ pātetvā cīvare bhājiyamāne
tika-vin08t:1627_2: attano koṭṭhāsassa samīpe ṭhitaṃ samagghataraṃ vā mahagghataraṃ vā samasamaṃ vā agghena
tika-vin08t:1627_3: parassa koṭṭhāsaṃ haritukāmo attano koṭṭhāse patitaṃ kusaṃ parassa koṭṭhāse pātetukāmatāya
tika-vin08t:1627_4: uddharati, rakkhati tāva. Parassa koṭṭhāse pātite rakkhateva. Yadā pana tasmiṃ patite
tika-vin08t:1627_5: parassa koṭṭhāsato parassa kusaṃ uddharati, uddhaṭamatte avahāro. Sace paṭhamataraṃ
tika-vin08t:1627_6: parassa koṭṭhāsato kusaṃ uddharati, attano koṭṭhāse pātetukāmatāya uddhāre rakkhati,
tika-vin08t:1627_7: pātanepi rakkhati. Attano koṭṭhāsato pana attano kusaṃ uddharato uddhāreyeva rakkhati,
tika-vin08t:1627_8: taṃ uddharitvā parakoṭṭhāse pātentassa hatthato muttamatte avahāro hoti, ayaṃ kusāvahāro.
tika-vin08t:1627_9: Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana samantapāsādikato gahetabbo.
tika-vin08t:1629: Sāmīcīti vattaṃ, āpatti pana natthīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:1630_0: Mahājanasammaddoti mahājanasaṅkhobho. Bhaṭṭhe janakāyeti apagate janakāye. “Idañca
tika-vin08t:1630_1: kāsāvaṃ attano santakaṃ katvā etasseva bhikkhuno dehī”ti kiṃ kāraṇā evamāha? Cīvarassāmikena
tika-vin08t:1630_2: dhuranikkhepo kato, tasmā tassa adinnaṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Avahārakopi vippaṭisārassa
tika-vin08t:1630_3: uppannakālato paṭṭhāya cīvarassāmikaṃ pariyesanto vicarati “dassāmī”ti, cīvarassāmikena
tika-vin08t:1630_4: ca “mameta”nti vutte etenapi avahārakena ālayo pariccatto, tasmā evamāha. Yadi evaṃ
tika-vin08t:1630_5: cīvarassāmikoyeva “attano santakaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti kasmā na vuttoti? Ubhinnaṃ kukkuccavinodanatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1630_6: Kathaṃ? Avahārakassa “mayā sahatthena na dinnaṃ, bhaṇḍadeyyameta”nti kukkuccaṃ uppajjeyya,
tika-vin08t:1630_7: itarassa “mayā paṭhamaṃ dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā pacchā adinnaṃ gahita”nti kukkuccaṃ uppajjeyyāti.
tika-vin08t:1632: Dāruatthaṃ pharatīti dārūhi kattabbakiccaṃ sādheti. Mayi santetiādi sabbaṃ raññā pasādena vuttaṃ, therena pana “ananucchavikaṃ kata”nti na maññitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1633_0: Ekadivasaṃ dantakaṭṭhacchedanādinā yā ayaṃ agghahāni vuttā, sā bhaṇḍassāminā kiṇitvā
tika-vin08t:1633_1: gahitameva sandhāya vuttā. Sabbaṃ panetaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyappamāṇena gahetabbaṃ. Pāsāṇañca
tika-vin08t:1634: “Dhāreyya atthaṃ vicakkhaṇo”ti imasseva vivaraṇaṃ “āpattiṃ vā anāpattiṃ vā”tiādi. “Sikkhāpadaṃ samaṃ tenā”ti ito pubbe ekā gāthā –
tika-vin08t:1637_0: Tāya saddhiṃ ghaṭetvā adutiyena parājitakilesena jinena dutiyaṃ yaṃ idaṃ pārājikapadaṃ
tika-vin08t:1637_1: pakāsitaṃ, idha tena samaṃ anekanayavokiṇṇaṃ gambhīratthavinicchayaṃ aññaṃ kiñci
tika-vin08t:1637_2: sikkhāpadaṃ na vijjatīti yojanā. Tattha parājitakilesenāti santāne puna anuppattidhammatāpādane
tika-vin08t:1637_3: catūhi maggañāṇehi saha vāsanāya samucchinnasabbakilesena. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:1637_4: “parājitakilesenāti vijitakilesena, nikilesenāti attho”ti vuttaṃ. Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane.
tika-vin08t:1638_0: Tenāti tena dutiyapārājikasikkhāpadena. Attho nāma pāḷiattho. Vinicchayo nāma pāḷimuttavinicchayo.
tika-vin08t:1638_1: Attho ca vinicchayo ca atthavinicchayā, te gambhīrā yasminti gambhīratthavinicchayaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1638_2: Vatthumhi otiṇṇeti codanāvasena vā attanāva attano vītikkamārocanavasena vā saṅghamajjhe
tika-vin08t:1638_3: adinnādānavatthusmiṃ otiṇṇe. Etthāti otiṇṇe vatthusmiṃ. Vinicchayoti āpattānāpattiniyamanaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1638_4: Avatvāvāti “tvaṃ pārājikaṃ āpanno”ti avatvāva. Kappiyepi ca vatthusminti attanā gahetuṃ
tika-vin08t:1638_5: kappiye mātupituādisantakepi vatthusmiṃ. Lahuvattinoti theyyacittuppādena lahuparivattino.
tika-vin08t:1639_1: tassa paresaṃ ārocanaṃ uttarimanussadhammārocanaṃ. Taṃ vinicchinantena cha ṭhānāni
tika-vin08t:1639_2: sodhetabbānīti yojanā. Tattha kiṃ te adhigatanti adhigamapucchā. Kinti te adhigatanti
tika-vin08t:1639_3: upāyapucchā. Kadā te adhigatanti kālapucchā. Kattha te adhigatanti okāsapucchā. Katame
tika-vin08t:1639_4: te kilesā pahīnāti pahīnakilesapucchā. Katamesaṃ tvaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhīti paṭiladdhadhammapucchā.
tika-vin08t:1639_5: Idāni tameva chaṭṭhānavisodhanaṃ vitthāretumāha “sace hī”tiādi. Tattha ettāvatāti
tika-vin08t:1639_6: ettakena byākaraṇavacanamattena na sakkāro kātabbo. Byākaraṇañhi ekassa ayāthāvatopi
tika-vin08t:1639_7: hotīti. Imesu chasu ṭhānesu sodhanatthaṃ evaṃ vattabboti yathā nāma jātarūpapatirūpakampi
tika-vin08t:1639_8: jātarūpaṃ viya khāyatīti jātarūpaṃ nighaṃsanatāpanachedanehi sodhetabbaṃ, evameva
tika-vin08t:1639_9: idāneva vuttesu chasu ṭhānesu pakkhipitvā sodhanatthaṃ vattabbo. Vimokkhādīsūti ādi-saddena
tika-vin08t:1639_11: satisammosābhāvato. Sesapucchāsupi “pākaṭo hotī”ti pade eseva nayo.
tika-vin08t:1640_0: Sabbesañhi attanā adhigatamaggena pahīnā kilesā pākaṭā hontīti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena
tika-vin08t:1640_1: vuttaṃ. Kassaci hi attanā adhigatamaggavajjhakilesesu sandeho uppajjatiyeva mahānāmassa
tika-vin08t:1640_2: sakkassa viya. So hi sakadāgāmī samānopi “tassa mayhaṃ, bhante, evaṃ hoti – ko su
tika-vin08t:1640_3: nāma me dhammo ajjhattaṃ appahīno, yena me ekadā lobhadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya
tika-vin08t:1640_4: tiṭṭhanti, dosadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti, mohadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya
tika-vin08t:1640_5: tiṭṭhantī”ti bhagavantaṃ pucchi. Ayaṃ kira rājā sakadāgāmimaggena lobhadosamohā niravasesā
tika-vin08t:1641_0: Yāya paṭipadāya yassa ariyamaggo āgacchati, sā pubbabhāgapaṭipatti āgamanapaṭipadā.
tika-vin08t:1641_1: Sodhetabbāti suddhā, udāhu na suddhāti vicāraṇavasena sodhetabbā. “Na sujjhatīti
tika-vin08t:1641_2: tattha tattha pamādapaṭipattisambhavato. Apanetabboti attano paṭiññāya apanetabbo”ti
tika-vin08t:1641_3: sāratthadīpaniyaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “na sujjhatīti pucchiyamāno paṭipattikkamaṃ
tika-vin08t:1641_4: ullaṅghitvā kathesi. Apanetabboti tayā vuttakkamenāyaṃ dhammo na sakkā adhigantunti
tika-vin08t:1641_5: adhigatamānato apanetabbo”ti vuttaṃ. “Sujjhatī”ti vatvā sujjhanākāraṃ dassetuṃ “dīgharatta”ntiādi
tika-vin08t:1641_6: vuttaṃ. Paññāyatīti etthāpi “yadī”ti padaṃ ānetvā yadi so bhikkhu tāya paṭipadāya
tika-vin08t:1641_7: paññāyatīti sambandho. Catūsu paccayesu alaggattā “ākāse pāṇisamena cetasā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1641_8: Vuttasadisaṃ byākaraṇaṃ hotīti yojanā. Tattha vuttasadisanti tassa bhikkhuno byākaraṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:1641_9: imasmiṃ sutte vuttena sadisaṃ, samanti attho. Khīṇāsavassa paṭipattisadisā paṭipatti
tika-vin08t:1641_10: hotīti dīgharattaṃ suvikkhambhitakilesattā, idañca arahattaṃ paṭijānantassa vasena
tika-vin08t:1641_11: vuttaṃ. Tenāha “khīṇāsavassa nāmā”tiādi. Khīṇāsavassa nāma…pe… na hotīti pahīnavipallāsattā,
tika-vin08t:1641_12: jīvitanikantiyā ca abhāvato na hoti, puthujjanassa pana appahīnavipallāsattā jīvitanikantisabbhāvato
tika-vin08t:1641_13: ca appamattakenapi hoti, evaṃ suvikkhambhitakilesassa vattanasekkhadhammapaṭijānanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1641_14: iminā bhayuppādanena, ambilādidassane kheḷuppādādinā ca na sakkā vīmaṃsituṃ, tasmā
