tika-vin08t:1642_0: Ayaṃ bhikkhu sampannaveyyākaraṇoti idaṃ na kevalaṃ abhāyanakameva sandhāya vuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:1642_1: ekaccassa sūrajātikassa puthujjanassapi abhāyanato, rajjanīyārammaṇānaṃ badarasāḷavādiambilamaddanādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1642_2: upayojanepi kheḷuppādāditaṇhuppattirahitaṃ sabbathā suvisodhitameva sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1643_1: pana “nīharitvāti pāḷito uddharitvā”ti. Tathā hi “pañcahupāli, aṅgehi samannāgatena
tika-vin08t:1643_2: bhikkhunā nānuyuñjitabbaṃ. Katamehi pañcahi? Suttaṃ na jānāti, suttānulomaṃ na jānātī”tiādipāḷito
tika-vin08t:1643_3: suttaṃ suttānulomañca nīhariṃsu, “anāpatti evaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ uggaho paripucchāti
tika-vin08t:1643_4: bhaṇatī”ti evamādito ācariyavādaṃ, “āyasmā upāli evamāha ‘anāpatti āvuso supinantenā”ti
tika-vin08t:1643_5: evamādito attanomatiṃ nīhariṃsu. Sā ca therassa attanomati suttena saṅgahitattā suttaṃ
tika-vin08t:1643_6: jātaṃ, evamaññāpi suttādīhi saṅgahitāva gahetabbā, netarāti veditabbaṃ. Atha vā nīharitvāti
tika-vin08t:1643_7: vibhajitvā, sāṭṭhakathaṃ sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ suttādīsu catūsu padesesu pakkhipitvā
tika-vin08t:1643_8: catudhā vibhajitvā vinayaṃ pakāsesuṃ tabbinimuttassa abhāvāti adhippāyo. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyampi
tika-vin08t:1643_9: “nīharitvāti ettha sāsanato nīharitvāti attho…pe… tāya hi attanomatiyā thero etadaggaṭṭhapanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1643_10: labhati. Apica vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā ‘anupasampannena paññattena vā apaññattena vā
tika-vin08t:1643_11: vuccamāno…pe… anādariyaṃ karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassā’ti. Tattha hi paññattaṃ nāma suttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1643_12: sesattayaṃ apaññattaṃ nāma. Tenāyaṃ ‘catubbidhañhi vinayaṃ, mahātherā’ti gāthā suvuttā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1644_0: Vuttanti milindapañhe nāgasenattherena vuttaṃ. Pajjate anena atthoti padaṃ, bhagavatā
tika-vin08t:1644_1: kaṇṭhādivaṇṇuppattiṭṭhānaṃ āhacca visesetvā bhāsitaṃ padaṃ āhaccapadaṃ, bhagavatoyeva
tika-vin08t:1644_2: vacanaṃ. Tenāha “āhaccapadanti suttaṃ adhippeta”nti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1644_4: vacanaṃ āhaccapada”nti vuttaṃ. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “aṭṭha vaṇṇaṭṭhānāni āhacca
tika-vin08t:1644_5: vuttena padanikāyenāti attho, udāhaṭena kaṇṭhokkantena padasamūhenāti adhippāyo”ti
tika-vin08t:1644_6: vuttaṃ. “Idaṃ kappati, idaṃ na kappatī”ti evaṃ avisesetvā “yaṃ bhikkhave mayā ‘idaṃ
tika-vin08t:1644_7: na kappatī’ti appaṭikkhittaṃ, tañce akappiyaṃ anulometi, kappiyaṃ paṭibāhati, taṃ
tika-vin08t:1644_8: vo na kappatī”tiādinā vuttasāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ idha rasoti adhippetanti āha “rasoti
tika-vin08t:1644_10: attho. Rasoti vā lakkhaṇaṃ paṭivatthukaṃ anuddharitvā lakkhaṇānulomena vuttattā.
tika-vin08t:1644_11: Rasenāti tassa āhaccabhāsitassa rasena, tato uddhaṭena vinicchayenāti attho. Suttachāyā
tika-vin08t:1644_12: viya hi suttānulomanti. Dhammasaṅgāhakapabhutiācariyaparamparato ānītā aṭṭhakathātanti
tika-vin08t:1644_14: “ācariyavaṃso”ti vutto pāḷiyaṃ vuttānaṃ ācariyānaṃ paramparāya ābhatova pamāṇanti
tika-vin08t:1645: Vinayapiṭake pāḷīti idha adhikāravasena vuttaṃ, sesapiṭakesupi suttādicatunayā yathānurūpaṃ labbhanteva.
tika-vin08t:1646_0: “Mahāpadesāti mahāokāsā. Mahantāni vinayassa patiṭṭhāpanaṭṭhānāni, yesu patiṭṭhāpito
tika-vin08t:1646_1: vinayo vinicchinīyati asandehato, mahantāni vā kāraṇāni mahāpadesā, mahantāni vinayavinicchayakāraṇānīti
tika-vin08t:1646_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Atthato pana ‘yaṃ bhikkhave’tiādinā vuttāsādhippāyā pāḷiyeva mahāpadesāti
tika-vin08t:1646_3: vadanti. Tenevāha ‘ye bhagavatā evaṃ vuttā’tiādi. Ime ca mahāpadesā khandhake āgatā,
tika-vin08t:1646_4: tasmā tesaṃ vinicchayakathā tattheva āvi bhavissatīti idha na vuccatī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1646_5: vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “mahāpadesāti mahāokāsā mahāvisayā, te atthato ‘yaṃ
tika-vin08t:1646_6: bhikkhavetiādipāḷivasena akappiyānulomato kappiyānulomato ca puggalehi nayato tathā
tika-vin08t:1646_7: tathā gayhamānā atthanayā eva. Te hi bhagavatā sarūpato avuttesupi paṭikkhittānulomesu
tika-vin08t:1646_8: anuññātānulomesu ca sesesu kiccesu nivattipavattihetutāya mahāgocarāti ‘mahāpadesā’ti
tika-vin08t:1646_9: vuttā, na pana ‘yaṃ bhikkhave mayā idaṃ na kappatī’tiādinā vuttā sādhippāyā pāḷiyeva
tika-vin08t:1646_10: tassā sutte paviṭṭhattā. ‘Suttānulomampi sutte otāretabbaṃ…pe… suttameva balavatara’nti
tika-vin08t:1646_11: hi vuttaṃ. Na hesā sādhippāyā pāḷi sutte otāretabbā, na gahetabbā vā hoti. Yenāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1646_12: suttānulomaṃ siyā, tasmā imaṃ pāḷiadhippāyaṃ nissāya puggalehi gahitā yathāvuttaatthāva
tika-vin08t:1646_13: suttānulomaṃ, taṃpakāsakattā pana ayaṃ pāḷipi suttānulomanti gahetabbaṃ. Tenāha ‘ye
tika-vin08t:1646_14: bhagavatā evaṃ vuttā’tiādi. ‘Yaṃ bhikkhave’tiādipāḷinayena hi puggalehi gahitabbā
tika-vin08t:1646_15: ye akappiyānulomādayo atthā vuttā, te mahāpadesāti attho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1647_0: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyampi “parivāraṭṭhakathāyaṃ idha ca kiñcāpi ‘suttānulomaṃ nāma cattāro
tika-vin08t:1647_1: mahāpadesā’ti vuttaṃ, atha kho mahāpadesanayasiddhaṃ paṭikkhittāpaṭikkhittaṃ anuññātānanuññātaṃ
tika-vin08t:1647_2: kappiyākappiyanti atthato vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha yasmā ‘ṭhānaṃ okāso padesoti kāraṇavevacanāni
tika-vin08t:1647_4: ca ‘asandiṭṭhi ca pana padeso’ti ca lokato, tasmā mahāpadesāti mahākāraṇānīti attho.
tika-vin08t:1647_5: Kāraṇaṃ nāma ñāpako hetu idhādhippetaṃ, mahantabhāvo pana tesaṃ mahāvisayattā mahābhūtānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1647_6: viya. Te duvidhā vinayamahāpadesā suttantikamahāpadesā cāti. Tattha vinayamahāpadesā
tika-vin08t:1647_7: vinaye yogaṃ gacchanti, itare ubhayatthāpi, teneva parivāre anuyogavatte ‘dhammaṃ
tika-vin08t:1647_8: na jānāti, dhammānulomaṃ na jānātī’ti” vuttaṃ. Tattha dhammanti ṭhapetvā vinayapiṭakaṃ
tika-vin08t:1647_9: avasesaṃ piṭakadvayaṃ, dhammānulomanti suttantike cattāro mahāpadesetiādi.
tika-vin08t:1648_0: Yadi sāpi tattha tattha bhagavatā pavattitā pakiṇṇakadesanāva aṭṭhakathā, sā pana
tika-vin08t:1648_1: dhammasaṅgāhakehi paṭhamaṃ tīṇi piṭakāni saṅgāyitvā tassa atthavaṇṇanānurūpeneva
tika-vin08t:1648_2: vācanāmaggaṃ āropitattā “ācariyavādo”ti vuccati “ācariyā vadanti saṃvaṇṇenti pāḷiṃ
tika-vin08t:1648_3: etenā”ti katvā. Tenāha “ācariyavādo nāma…pe… aṭṭhakathātantī”ti. Tisso hi saṅgītiyo
tika-vin08t:1648_4: āruḷhoyeva buddhavacanassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanābhūto kathāmaggo mahāmahindattherena tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ
tika-vin08t:1648_5: ābhato, pacchā tambapaṇṇiyehi mahātherehi sīhaḷabhāsāya ṭhapito nikāyantaraladdhisaṅkarapariharaṇatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1648_6: Bhagavato pakiṇṇakadesanābhūtā ca suttānulomabhūtā ca aṭṭhakathā yasmā dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi
tika-vin08t:1648_7: pāḷivaṇṇanākkamena saṅgahetvā vuttā, tasmā ācariyavādoti vuttā. Etena ca aṭṭhakathā
tika-vin08t:1648_8: suttasuttānulomesu atthato saṅgayhatīti veditabbaṃ. Yathā ca esā, evaṃ attanomatipi
tika-vin08t:1648_9: pamāṇabhūtā. Na hi bhagavato vacanaṃ vacanānulomañca anissāya aggasāvakādayopi attano
tika-vin08t:1648_10: ñāṇabalena suttābhidhammavinayesu kiñci sammutiparamatthabhūtaṃ atthaṃ vattuṃ sakkonti,
tika-vin08t:1648_11: tasmā sabbampi vacanaṃ sutte suttānulome ca saṅgayhati. Visuṃ pana aṭṭhakathādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1648_12: saṅgahitattā tadavasesaṃ suttasuttānulomato gahetvā catudhā vinayo niddiṭṭho.
tika-vin08t:1649_0: Kiñcāpi attanomati suttādīhi saṃsanditvāva parikappīyati, tathāpi sā na suttādīsu
tika-vin08t:1649_2: suttādīniyeva anugatabuddhiyā. Nayaggāhenāti suttādito labbhamānanayaggahaṇena. Attanomatiṃ
tika-vin08t:1649_3: sāmaññato paṭhamaṃ dassetvā idāni tameva visesetvā dassento “apicā”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-vin08t:1649_5: veditabbā. Theravādoti mahāsumattherādīnaṃ gāho. Idāni tattha paṭipajjitabbākāraṃ
tika-vin08t:1649_6: dassento āha “taṃ panā”tiādi. Tattha atthenāti attanā nayato gahitena atthena. Pāḷinti
tika-vin08t:1649_7: attano gāhassa nissayabhūtaṃ sāṭṭhakathaṃ pāḷiṃ. Pāḷiyāti tappaṭikkhepatthaṃ parenābhatāya
tika-vin08t:1649_8: sāṭṭhakathāya pāḷiyā, attanā gahitaṃ atthaṃ nissāya, pāḷiñca saṃsanditvāti attho.
tika-vin08t:1649_9: Ācariyavādeti attanā parena ca samuddhaṭaaṭṭhakathāya. Otāretabbāti ñāṇena anuppavesetabbā.
tika-vin08t:1649_10: Otarati ceva sameti cāti attanā uddhaṭehi saṃsandanavasena otarati, parena uddhaṭena
tika-vin08t:1649_11: sameti. Sabbadubbalāti asabbaññupuggalassa dosavāsanāya yāthāvato atthasampaṭipattiabhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1650_0: Pamādapāṭhavasena ācariyavādassa suttānulomena asaṃsandanāpi siyāti āha “itaro na
tika-vin08t:1650_1: gahetabbo”ti. Samentameva gahetabbanti ye suttena saṃsandanti, evarūpāva atthā mahāpadesato
tika-vin08t:1650_2: uddharitabbāti dasseti tathā tathā uddhaṭaatthānaṃyeva suttānulomattā. Tenāha “suttānulomato
tika-vin08t:1650_3: hi suttameva balavatara”nti. Atha vā suttānulomassa suttekadesattepi sutte viya “idaṃ
tika-vin08t:1650_4: kappati, idaṃ na kappatī”ti paricchinditvā āhaccabhāsitaṃ kiñci natthīti āha “suttā…pe…
tika-vin08t:1650_5: balavatara”nti. Appaṭivattiyanti appaṭibāhiyaṃ. Kārakasaṅghasadisanti pamāṇattā saṅgītikārakasaṅghasadisaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1650_6: “Buddhānaṃ ṭhitakālasadisa”nti iminā buddhānaṃyeva kathitadhammabhāvaṃ dasseti, dharamānabuddhasadisanti
tika-vin08t:1650_7: vuttaṃ hoti. Sutte hi paṭibāhite buddhova paṭibāhito hoti. “Sakavādī suttaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin08t:1650_8: kathetīti sakavādī attano suttaṃ gahetvā voharati. Paravādī suttānulomanti aññanikāyavādī
tika-vin08t:1650_9: attano nikāye suttānulomaṃ gahetvā kathetī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1651_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “sakavādī suttaṃ gahetvā kathetītiādīsu yo yathābhūtamatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1651_1: gahetvā kathanasīlo, so sakavādī. Suttanti saṅgītittayāruḷhaṃ pāḷivacanaṃ. Paravādīti
tika-vin08t:1651_2: mahāvihāravāsī vā hotu aññanikāyavāsī vā, yo viparītato atthaṃ gahetvā kathanasīlo,
tika-vin08t:1651_3: sova idha ‘paravādī’ti vutto. Suttānulomanti saṅgītittayāruḷhaṃ vā anāruḷhaṃ vā yaṃ
tika-vin08t:1651_4: kiñci vipallāsato vā vañcanāya vā ‘saṅgītittayāgatamida’nti dassiyamānaṃ suttānulomaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1651_5: Keci ‘aññanikāye suttānuloma’nti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ sakavādīparavādīnaṃ ubhinnampi
tika-vin08t:1651_6: saṅgītittayāruḷhasuttādīnameva gahetabbato. Tathā hi vakkhati ‘tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1651_7: pāḷiāgataṃ paññāyati, gahetabba’ntiādi. Na hi sakavādī aññanikāyasuttādiṃ pamāṇato
tika-vin08t:1651_8: gaṇhāti. Yena tesu suttādīsu dassitesu tattha ṭhātabbaṃ bhaveyya, vakkhati ca ‘paro
tika-vin08t:1651_9: tassa akappiyabhāvasādhakaṃ suttato bahuṃ kāraṇañca vinicchayañca dasseti…pe… sādhūti
tika-vin08t:1651_10: sampaṭicchitvā akappiyeyeva ṭhātabba’nti, tasmā paravādināpi saṅgītittaye anāruḷhampi
tika-vin08t:1651_11: anāruḷhamicceva dassīyati, kevalaṃ tassa tassa suttādino saṅgītittaye anāgatassa
tika-vin08t:1651_12: kūṭatā, āgatassa ca byañjanacchāyāya aññathā adhippāyayojanā ca visesā, tattha ca
tika-vin08t:1651_13: yaṃ kūṭaṃ, taṃ apanīyati. Yaṃ aññathā yojitaṃ, taṃ tassa viparītatādassanatthaṃ tadaññena
tika-vin08t:1651_14: suttādinā saṃsandanā karīyati. Yo pana paravādinā gahito adhippāyo suttantādinā saṃsandati,
tika-vin08t:1651_15: so sakavādināpi attano gāhaṃ vissajjetvā gahetabboti ubhinnampi saṅgītittayāgatameva
tika-vin08t:1651_16: suttaṃ pamāṇanti veditabbaṃ. Teneva kathāvatthupakaraṇe ‘sakavāde pañca suttasatāni
tika-vin08t:1652_0: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “paravādīti amhākaṃ samayavijānanako aññanikāyikoti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1652_1: Paravādī suttānulomanti kathaṃ? ‘Aññatra udakadantaponā’ti suttaṃ sakavādissa, tadanulomato
tika-vin08t:1652_2: nāḷikeraphalassa udakampi udakameva hotīti paravādī ca.
tika-vin08t:1655_0: Evaṃ paravādinā vutte sakavādī dhaññaphalassa gatikattā, āhāratthassa ca pharaṇato
tika-vin08t:1655_1: ‘yāvakālikameva ta’nti vadanto paṭikkhipatī”ti. Khepaṃ vā garahaṃ vā akatvāti “kiṃ
tika-vin08t:1655_2: iminā”ti khepaṃ paṭikkhepaṃ chaḍḍanaṃ vā “kimesa bālo vadati, kimesa bālo jānātī”ti
tika-vin08t:1655_3: garahaṃ nindaṃ vā akatvā. Suttānulomanti attanā avuttaṃ aññanikāye suttānulomaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1655_4: “Sutte otāretabbanti sakavādinā sutte otāretabba”nti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1655_5: pana “sutte otāretabbanti yassa suttassa anulomanato idaṃ suttānulomaṃ akāsi, tasmiṃ,
tika-vin08t:1655_6: tadanurūpe vā aññatarasmiṃ sutte attanā gahitaṃ suttānulomaṃ atthato saṃsandanavasena
tika-vin08t:1655_7: otāretabbaṃ. ‘Iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇena imasmiṃ sutte saṃsandatī’ti saṃsandetvā
tika-vin08t:1655_8: dassetabbanti attho”ti vuttaṃ. Suttasmiṃyeva ṭhātabbanti attano sutteyeva ṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1655_9: Ayanti sakavādī. Paroti paravādī. Ācariyavādo sutte otāretabboti yassa suttassa saṃvaṇṇanāvasena
tika-vin08t:1655_10: ayaṃ ācariyavādo pavatto, tasmiṃ, tādise ca aññasmiṃ sutte pubbāparaatthasaṃsandanavasena
tika-vin08t:1655_11: otāretabbaṃ. Gārayhācariyavādoti pamādalikhito, bhinnaladdhikehi ca ṭhapito, esa nayo sabbattha.
tika-vin08t:1656_0: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana – paro ācariyavādanti “suṅkaṃ pariharatīti ettha upacāraṃ
tika-vin08t:1656_1: okkamitvā kiñcāpi pariharati, avahāro evā”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanato “tathā karonto pārājikamāpajjatī”ti
tika-vin08t:1656_2: paravādinā vutte sakavādī “suṅkaṃ pariharati, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti suttaṃ tattheva
tika-vin08t:1656_3: āgatamahāaṭṭhakathāvacanena saddhiṃ dassetvā paṭisedheti. Tathā karontassa dukkaṭamevāti.
tika-vin08t:1656_4: Paro attanomatinti ettha “purebhattaṃ parasantakaṃ avaharāti purebhattameva harissāmīti
tika-vin08t:1656_5: vāyamantassa pacchābhattaṃ hoti, purebhattapayogova so, tasmā mūlaṭṭho na muccatīti
tika-vin08t:1656_6: tumhākaṃ theravādattā mūlaṭṭhassa pārājikamevā”ti paravādinā vutte sakavādī “taṃ
tika-vin08t:1656_7: saṅketaṃ pure vā pacchā vā taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharati, mūlaṭṭhassa anāpattī”ti suttaṃ
tika-vin08t:1657_1: suttaṃ paṭṭhāne likhitaṃ dassetvā “ariyamaggassa na nibbānamevārammaṇa”nti paravādinā
tika-vin08t:1657_2: vutte sakavādī ārammaṇattikādisuttānulomena otaratīti paṭikkhipati. Suttānulome otarantaṃyeva
tika-vin08t:1657_3: hi suttaṃ nāma, netaraṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “pāḷiāgataṃ paññāyatī”ti ettakenapi siddhe “tisso
tika-vin08t:1657_4: saṅgītiyo āruḷhaṃ pāḷiāgataṃ paññāyatī”tiādi. Tādisañhi pamādalekhanti ācariyo. “Appamādo
tika-vin08t:1657_5: amatapadaṃ, pamādo maccuno pada”nti vacanato dinnabhojane bhuñjitvā parissayāni parivajjitvā
tika-vin08t:1657_6: satiṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā viharanto nicco hotīti. Evarūpassa atthassa āruḷhampi suttaṃ
tika-vin08t:1657_7: na gahetabbaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “no ce tathā paññāyatī”ti siddhepi “no ce tathā paññāyati,
tika-vin08t:1657_8: na otarati na sametīti. Bāhirakasuttaṃ vā”ti vuttattā attano suttampi atthena asamentaṃ
tika-vin08t:1657_9: na gahetabbaṃ. Paro ācariyavādantiādīsu dvīsu nayesu pamādalekhavasena tattha tattha
tika-vin08t:1658_0: Athāyaṃ ācariyavādaṃ gahetvā katheti, paro suttanti paravādinā “mūlabījaṃ nāma haliddi
tika-vin08t:1658_1: siṅgiveraṃ vacā…pe… bīje bījasaññī chindati vā chedāpeti vā bhindati vā…pe… āpatti
tika-vin08t:1658_2: pācittiyassā”ti tumhākaṃ pāṭhattā “haliddigaṇṭhiṃ chindantassa pācittiya”nti vutte
tika-vin08t:1658_3: sakavādī “yāni vā panaññāni atthi mūle jāyanti, mūle sañjāyantī”tiādiṃ dassetvā tassa
tika-vin08t:1658_4: aṭṭhakathāsaṅkhātena ācariyavādena paṭikkhipati. Na hi gaṇṭhimhi gaṇṭhi jāyatīti.
tika-vin08t:1658_5: Paro suttānulomanti paravādinā “anāpatti evaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ uggaho”ti vacanassānulomato
tika-vin08t:1658_6: “amhākaṃ porāṇabhikkhū ekapāsāde gabbhaṃ thaketvā anupasampannena sayituṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:1658_7: tathā katvā āgatā, tasmā amhākaṃ vaṭṭatīti tumhesu eva ekaccesu vadantesu “tumhākaṃ
tika-vin08t:1658_8: na kiñci vattuṃ sakkā”ti vutte sakavādī “suttaṃ suttānulomañca uggahitakānaṃyeva
tika-vin08t:1658_9: ācariyānaṃ uggaho pamāṇa”ntiādiaṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ dassetvā paṭisedheti. Paro attanomatinti
tika-vin08t:1658_10: “dvāraṃ vivaritvā anāpucchā sayitesu ke muccantī”ti ettha pana dvepi janā muccanti
tika-vin08t:1658_11: – yo ca yakkhagahitako, yo ca bandhitvā nipajjāpitoti tumhākaṃ theravādattā aññe
tika-vin08t:1658_12: sabbepi yathā tathā vā nipannādayopi muccantīti paṭisedheti.
tika-vin08t:1659_0: Atha panāyaṃ attanomatiṃ gahetvā katheti, paro suttanti “āpattiṃ āpajjantī”ti paravādinā
tika-vin08t:1659_1: vutte sakavādī “divā kilantarūpo mañce nisinno pāde bhūmito amocetvāva niddāvasena
tika-vin08t:1659_2: nipajjati, tassa anāpattī”tiādiaṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ dassetvā ekabhaṅgena nipannādayopi
tika-vin08t:1660_0: Athāyaṃ attanomatiṃ gahetvā katheti, paro suttānulomanti “domanassampāhaṃ devānaminda
tika-vin08t:1660_1: duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbampi asevitabbampītiādivacanehi saṃsandanato sadārapose
tika-vin08t:1660_2: doso tumhākaṃ natthi, tena vuttaṃ ‘puttadārassa saṅgaho”ti paravādinā vutte “kiñcāpi
tika-vin08t:1660_3: sakavādī bahussuto na hoti, atha kho rāgasahiteneva akusalena bhavitabba”nti paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin08t:1660_4: Sesesupi iminā nayena aññathāpi anurūpato yojetabbaṃ, idaṃ sabbaṃ upatissattherādayo
tika-vin08t:1660_5: āhu. Dhammasiritthero pana “ettha paroti vutto aññanikāyiko, so pana attano suttādīniyeva
tika-vin08t:1660_6: āharati, tāni sakavādī attano suttādimhi otāretvā sace sameti, gaṇhāti. No ce, paṭikkhipatī”ti vadatīti āgataṃ.
tika-vin08t:1661_0: Nanu ca “suttānulomato suttameva balavatara”nti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ, idha pana “suttaṃ
tika-vin08t:1661_1: suttānulome otāretabba”ntiādi kasmā vuttanti? Nāyaṃ virodho, “suttānulomato suttameva
tika-vin08t:1661_2: balavatara”nti idañhi sakamateyeva suttaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tattha hi sakamatipariyāpannameva
tika-vin08t:1661_3: suttādiṃ sandhāya “attanomati sabbadubbalā, attanomatito ācariyavādo balavataro,
tika-vin08t:1661_4: ācariyavādato suttānulomaṃ balavataraṃ, suttānulomato suttameva balavatara”nti ca
tika-vin08t:1661_5: vuttaṃ. Idha pana paravādinā ānītaṃ aññanikāye suttaṃ sandhāya “suttānulome suttaṃ
tika-vin08t:1661_6: otāretabba”ntiādi vuttaṃ, tasmā paravādinā ānītaṃ suttādi attano suttānulomaācariyavādaattanomatīsu
tika-vin08t:1661_7: otāretvā samentaṃyeva gahetabbaṃ, itaraṃ na gahetabbanti ayaṃ nayo idha vuccatīti
tika-vin08t:1661_8: na koci pubbāparavirodhoti ayaṃ sāratthadīpaniyāgato nayo. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:1661_9: “yaṃ kiñci kūṭasuttaṃ bāhirakasuttādivacanaṃ na gahetabbanti dassetuṃ suttaṃ suttānulome
tika-vin08t:1662_0: Bāhirakasuttanti tisso saṅgītiyo anāruḷhaguḷhavessantarādīni ca mahāsaṅghikanikāyavāsīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1662_1: suttāni. Vedallādīnanti ādi-saddena guḷhaummaggādiggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Itaraṃ gārayhasuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:1662_2: na gahetabbaṃ. “Attanomatiyameva ṭhātabba”nti iminā aññanikāyato ānītasuttatopi sakanikāye
tika-vin08t:1662_3: attanomatiyeva balavatarāti dasseti. “Sakavādī suttaṃ gahetvā katheti, paravādī suttamevā”ti
tika-vin08t:1662_4: evamādinā samānajātikānaṃ vasena vāro na vutto. Suttassa sutteyeva otāraṇaṃ bhinnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1662_5: viya hutvā na paññāyati, vuttanayeneva ca sakkā yojetunti.
tika-vin08t:1663_0: Idāni sakavādīparavādīnaṃ kappiyākappiyādibhāvaṃ sandhāya vivāde uppanne tattha paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ
tika-vin08t:1663_1: dassento āha “atha panāyaṃ kappiyanti gahetvā kathetī”tiādi. Atha vā evaṃ suttasuttānulomādimukhena
tika-vin08t:1663_2: sāmaññato vivādaṃ dassetvā idāni visesato vivādavatthuṃ tabbinicchayamukhena suttādiñca
tika-vin08t:1663_3: dassetuṃ “atha panāyaṃ kappiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sutte ca suttānulome ca otāretabbanti
tika-vin08t:1663_4: sakavādinā attanoyeva sutte ca suttānulome ca otāretabbaṃ. Paro kāraṇaṃ na vindatīti
tika-vin08t:1663_5: paravādī kāraṇaṃ na labhati. Suttato bahuṃ kāraṇañca vinicchayañca dassetīti paravādī
tika-vin08t:1663_6: attano suttato bahuṃ kāraṇañca vinicchayañca āharitvā dasseti, “sādhūti sampaṭicchitvā
tika-vin08t:1663_7: akappiyeyeva ṭhātabba”nti iminā attano nikāye suttādīni alabhantena sakavādinā paravādīvacaneyeva
tika-vin08t:1663_8: ṭhātabbanti vadati. Sutte ca suttānulome cāti ettha ca-kāro vikappanattho, tena ācariyavādādīnampi
tika-vin08t:1663_9: saṅgaho. Tenāha “kāraṇañca vinicchayañca dassetī”ti. Tattha kāraṇanti suttādinayaṃ
tika-vin08t:1663_10: nissāya attanomatiyā uddhaṭaṃ hetuṃ. Vinicchayanti aṭṭhakathāvinicchayaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1664_0: Dvinnampi kāraṇacchāyā dissatīti sakavādīparavādīnaṃ ubhinnampi kappiyākappiyabhāvasādhakaṃ
tika-vin08t:1664_1: kāraṇapatirūpakacchāyā dissati. Tattha kāraṇacchāyāti suttādīsu “kappiya”nti gāhassa,
tika-vin08t:1664_2: “akappiya”nti gāhassa ca nimittabhūtena kicchena paṭipādanīyaṃ avibhūtakāraṇaṃ kāraṇacchāyā,
tika-vin08t:1664_3: kāraṇapatirūpakanti attho. Yadi dvinnampi kāraṇacchāyā dissati, kasmā akappiyeyeva
tika-vin08t:1664_4: ṭhātabbanti āha “vinayañhi patvā”tiādi. “Vinayaṃ patvā”ti vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ
tika-vin08t:1664_5: katvā dassento āha “kappiyākappiyavicāraṇaṃ āgammā”ti. Rundhitabbantiādīsu dubbiññeyyavinicchaye
tika-vin08t:1664_7: gāḷhaṃ kātabbaṃ, aparāparappavattaṃ kappiyaggahaṇaṃ sotaṃ pacchinditabbaṃ, garukabhāvasaṅkhate
tika-vin08t:1664_8: akappiyeyeva ṭhātabbanti attho. Atha vā rundhitabbanti kappiyasaññāya vītikkamakāraṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:1664_9: rundhitabbaṃ, taṃnivāraṇacittaṃ daḷhataraṃ kātabbaṃ. Sotaṃ pacchinditabbanti tattha
tika-vin08t:1665_0: Bahūhi suttavinicchayakāraṇehīti bahūhi suttehi ceva tato ānītavinicchayakāraṇehi
tika-vin08t:1665_1: ca. Atha vā suttena aṭṭhakathāvinicchayena ca laddhakāraṇehi. Attano gahaṇaṃ na vissajjetabbanti
tika-vin08t:1665_2: sakavādinā attano “akappiya”nti gahaṇaṃ na vissajjetabbanti attho.
tika-vin08t:1666_0: Idāni vuttamevatthaṃ nigamento “eva”ntiādimāha. Tattha yoti sakavādīparavādīsu yo
tika-vin08t:1666_1: koci. Keci pana “sakavādīsuyeva yo koci idhādhippeto”ti vadanti, evaṃ sante “atha
tika-vin08t:1666_2: panāyaṃ kappiyanti gahetvā kathetī”tiādīsu sabbattha ubhopi sakavādinoyeva siyuṃ
tika-vin08t:1666_3: heṭṭhā vuttasseva nigamanavasena “eva”ntiādinā vuttattā, tasmā taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1666_4: Atirekakāraṇaṃ labhatīti ettha suttādīsu purimaṃ purimaṃ atirekakāraṇaṃ nāma, yo
tika-vin08t:1666_5: vā suttādīsu catūsu bahutaraṃ kāraṇaṃ labhati, so atirekakāraṇaṃ labhati nāma.
tika-vin08t:1667_0: Suṭṭhu pavatti etassāti, suṭṭhu pavattati sīlenāti vā suppavatti. Tenāha “suppavattīti
tika-vin08t:1667_1: suṭṭhu pavatta”nti. Vācāya uggataṃ vācuggataṃ, vacasā suggahitanti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha
tika-vin08t:1667_2: vā vācuggatanti vācāya uggataṃ, tattha nirantaraṃ ṭhitanti attho. Suttatoti imassa
tika-vin08t:1667_3: vivaraṇaṃ “pāḷito”ti. Ettha ca “suttaṃ nāma sakalaṃ vinayapiṭaka”nti vuttattā puna
tika-vin08t:1667_5: imassa vivaraṇaṃ “paripucchato ca aṭṭhakathāto cā”ti. Pāḷiṃ anugantvā atthassa byañjanato
tika-vin08t:1667_6: pakāsanato “anubyañjana”nti hi paripucchā aṭṭhakathā ca vuccati. Ettha ca aṭṭhakathāya
tika-vin08t:1667_7: visuṃ gahitattā “paripucchā”ti theravādo vutto. Atha vā paripucchāti ācariyassa santikā
tika-vin08t:1667_8: pāḷiyā atthasavanaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāti pāḷimuttakavinicchayo. Tadubhayampi pāḷiṃ anugantvā
tika-vin08t:1668_0: Vinayeti vinayācāre. Teneva vakkhati “vinayaṃ ajahanto avokkamanto”tiādi. Tattha
tika-vin08t:1668_1: patiṭṭhānaṃ nāma sañcicca āpattiyā anāpajjanādinā hotīti āha “lajjibhāvena patiṭṭhito”ti,
tika-vin08t:1668_2: tena lajjī hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Vinayadharassa lakkhaṇe vattabbe kiṃ iminā lajjibhāvenāti
tika-vin08t:1668_3: āha “alajjī hī”tiādi. Tattha bahussutopīti iminā paṭhamalakkhaṇasamannāgamaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin08t:1668_4: Lābhagarukatāyāti iminā vinaye ṭhitatāya abhāve paṭhamalakkhaṇayogā kiccakaro na
tika-vin08t:1668_5: hoti, atha kho akiccakaro anatthakaro evāti dasseti. Saṅghabhedassa pubbabhāge pavattakalahassetaṃ
tika-vin08t:1668_6: adhivacanaṃ saṅgharājīti. Kukkuccakoti aṇumattesupi vajjesu bhayadassanavasena kukkuccaṃ
tika-vin08t:1668_7: uppādento. Tantiṃ avisaṃvādetvāti pāḷiṃ aññathā akatvā. Avokkamantoti anatikkamanto.
tika-vin08t:1669_0: Vitthunatīti atthaṃ adisvā nitthunati, vitthambhati vā. Vipphandatīti kampati. Santiṭṭhituṃ
tika-vin08t:1669_1: na sakkotīti ekasmiṃyeva atthe patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti. Tenāha “yaṃ yaṃ parena vuccati,
tika-vin08t:1669_2: taṃ taṃ anujānātī”ti. Sakavādaṃ chaḍḍetvā paravādaṃ gaṇhātīti “ucchumhi kasaṭaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1669_3: raso sattāhakāliko, tadubhayavinimutto ca ucchu nāma visuṃ natthi, tasmā ucchupi
tika-vin08t:1669_4: vikāle vaṭṭatī”ti paravādinā vutte tampi gaṇhāti. Ekekalomanti palitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1669_5: Yamhīti yasmiṃ puggale. Parikkhayaṃ pariyādānanti atthato ekaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1670_0: Ācariyaparamparāti ācariyānaṃ vinicchayaparamparā. Teneva vakkhati “attanomatiṃ pahāya…pe…
tika-vin08t:1670_1: yathā ācariyo ca ācariyācariyo ca pāḷiñca paripucchañca vadanti, tathā ñātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin08t:1670_2: Na hi ācariyānaṃ nāmamattato paramparajānane payojanaṃ atthi. Pubbāparānusandhitoti
tika-vin08t:1670_3: pubbavacanassa aparavacanena saha atthasambandhajānanato. Atthatoti saddatthapiṇḍatthaadhippetatthādito.
tika-vin08t:1670_5: therapaṭipāṭinti attho. Dve tayo parivaṭṭāti dve tayo paramparā.
tika-vin08t:1671_0: Imehi ca pana tīhi lakkhaṇehīti ettha paṭhamena lakkhaṇena vinayassa suṭṭhu uggahitabhāvo
tika-vin08t:1671_1: vutto, dutiyena tattha lajjibhāvena ceva acalatāya ca suppatiṭṭhitatā, tatiyena pāḷiaṭṭhakathāsu
tika-vin08t:1671_2: sarūpena anāgatānampi tadanulomato ācariyehi dinnanayato vinicchinituṃ samatthatā.
tika-vin08t:1671_3: Otiṇṇe vatthusminti codanāvasena vītikkamavatthusmiṃ saṅghamajjhe otiṇṇe. Codakena
tika-vin08t:1671_4: ca cuditakena ca vutte vattabbeti evaṃ otiṇṇavatthuṃ nissāya codakena “diṭṭhaṃ suta”ntiādinā,
tika-vin08t:1671_5: cuditakena “atthī”tiādinā ca yaṃ vattabbaṃ, tasmiṃ vattabbe vutteti attho. Vatthu
tika-vin08t:1671_6: oloketabbanti tassa tassa sikkhāpadassa vatthu oloketabbaṃ. “Tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā…pe…
tika-vin08t:1671_7: yo āgaccheyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti hidaṃ nissaggiye aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadassa
tika-vin08t:1672_1: vuttaṃ. Tikadukkaṭanti “anupasampanne upasampannasaññī ujjhāyati khīyati, āpatti
tika-vin08t:1672_2: dukkaṭassā”tiādinā āgataṃ tikadukkaṭaṃ. Aññataraṃ vā āpattinti “kāle vikālasaññī,
tika-vin08t:1672_3: āpatti dukkaṭassa, kāle vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassā”tiādikaṃ dukadukkaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1673_0: Antarāpattinti ettha tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade āgatavatthuvītikkamaṃ vinā aññasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:1673_1: vatthuvītikkame nidānato pabhuti vinītavatthupariyosānā antarantarā vuttā āpatti.
tika-vin08t:1673_2: Idha pana “vatthuṃ oloketī”ti visuṃ gahitattā tadavasesā antarāpattīti gahitā. Paṭilātaṃ
tika-vin08t:1673_3: ukkhipatīti idampi visibbanasikkhāpade āgataṃ, tattha ḍayhamānaṃ alātaṃ aggikapālādito
tika-vin08t:1673_4: bahi patitaṃ avijjhātameva paṭiukkhipati, puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetīti attho. Vijjhātaṃ
tika-vin08t:1674_0: Anāpattinti ettha antarantarā vuttā anāpattipi atthi, “anāpatti, bhikkhave, iddhimassa
tika-vin08t:1674_1: iddhivisaye”tiādi viya sāpi saṅgayhati. Sikkhāpadantaresūti vinītavatthuṃ antokatvā
tika-vin08t:1675_0: Pārājikāpattīti na vattabbanti idaṃ āpannapuggalena lajjidhamme ṭhatvā yathābhūtaṃ
tika-vin08t:1675_1: āvikaraṇepi dubbinicchayaṃ adinnādānādiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana methunādīsu vijānanaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1675_2: taṃ vattabbameva. Tenāha “methunadhammavītikkamo hī”tiādi. Yo pana alajjitāya paṭiññaṃ
tika-vin08t:1675_3: adatvā vikkhepaṃ karoti, tassa āpatti na sakkā oḷārikāpi vinicchinituṃ. Yāva so yathābhūtaṃ
tika-vin08t:1675_4: nāvikaroti, saṅghassa ca āpattisandeho na vigacchati, tāva nāsitakova bhavissati.
tika-vin08t:1675_5: Sukhumāti attanopi duviññeyyasabhāvassa lahuparivattino cittassa sīghaparivattitāya
tika-vin08t:1675_6: vuttaṃ. Sukhumāti vā cittaparivattiyā sukhumatāya sukhumā. Tenāha “cittalahukā”ti,
tika-vin08t:1675_7: cittaṃ viya lahukāti attho. Atha vā cittaṃ lahu sīghaparivatti etesanti cittalahukā.
tika-vin08t:1675_8: Teti te vītikkame. Taṃvatthukanti te adinnādānamanaussaviggahavītikkamā vatthu adhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1676_0: Yaṃ ācariyo bhaṇati, taṃ karohītiādi sabbaṃ lajjīpesalaṃ kukkuccakameva sandhāya
tika-vin08t:1676_1: vuttaṃ. Yo yāthāvato pakāsetvā suddhimeva gavesati, tenapi. Pārājikosīti na vattabboti
tika-vin08t:1676_3: sodhetvāti yaṃvatthukaṃ kukkuccaṃ uppannaṃ, taṃ amanasikaritvā avasesasīlāni sodhetvā”ti
tika-vin08t:1676_4: sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ, vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “sīlāni sodhetvāti yasmiṃ vītikkame
tika-vin08t:1676_5: pārājikāsaṅkā vattati, tattha pārājikābhāvapakkhaṃ gahetvā desanāvuṭṭhānagāminīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1676_6: āpattīnaṃ sodhanavasena sīlāni sodhetvā”ti. Pākaṭabhāvato sukhavalañjatāya ca “dvattiṃsākāraṃ
tika-vin08t:1676_7: tāva manasi karohī”ti vuttaṃ, upalakkhaṇavasena vā. Aññasmiṃ kammaṭṭhāne kataparicayena
tika-vin08t:1676_8: tameva manasi kātabbaṃ. Yaṃ kiñci vā abhirucitaṃ manasi kātuṃ vaṭṭateva. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1676_9: ghaṭayatīti antarantarā khaṇḍaṃ adassetvā cittena saddhiṃ ārammaṇabhāvena cirakālaṃ
tika-vin08t:1676_10: ghaṭayati. Saṅkhārā pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahantīti vipassanākammaṭṭhāniko ce, tassa
tika-vin08t:1677_0: Sace katapārājikavītikkamo bhaveyya, tassa satipi asaritukāmatāya vippaṭisāravatthuvasena
tika-vin08t:1677_1: punappunaṃ taṃ upaṭṭhahatīti cittekaggataṃ na vindati. Tena vuttaṃ “kammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1677_2: na ghaṭayatī”tiādi. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ na ghaṭayatīti cittakkhobhādibahulassa suddhasīlassapi
tika-vin08t:1677_3: cittaṃ na samādhiyati, taṃ idha pārājikamūlanti na gahetabbaṃ. Katapāpamūlakena vippaṭisārenevettha
tika-vin08t:1677_4: cittassa asamādhiyanaṃ sandhāya “kammaṭṭhānaṃ na ghaṭayatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tenāha “vippaṭisāragginā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t:1677_5: Attanāti cittena karaṇabhūtena puggalo kattā jānāti, paccatte vā karaṇavacanaṃ, attā
tika-vin08t:1677_6: sayaṃ jānātīti attho. Aññā ca devatā jānantīti ārakkhadevatāhi aññā paracittaviduniyo devatā jānanti.
tika-vin08t:1678_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne paṇḍitehi vicāretabbaṃ kāraṇaṃ atthi. Kathaṃ? Idāni ekacce vinayadharā
tika-vin08t:1678_1: paṭhamapārājikavisaye vatthumhi otiṇṇe itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena
tika-vin08t:1678_2: vā codiyamāne cuditakaṃ bhikkhuṃ pucchitvā paṭiññāya adīyamānāya taṃ bhikkhuṃ susāne
tika-vin08t:1678_3: ekakameva sayāpenti, evaṃ sayāpiyamāno so bhikkhu sace bhayasantāsavirahito sabbarattiṃ
tika-vin08t:1678_4: tasmiṃ susāne sayituṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā sakkoti, taṃ “parisuddho eso”ti vinicchinanti.
tika-vin08t:1678_5: Sace pana bhayasantāsappatto sabbarattiṃ sayituṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā na sakkoti, taṃ
tika-vin08t:1678_6: “asuddho”ti vinicchinanti, taṃ ayuttaṃ viya dissati. Kasmāti ce? Aṭṭhakathāya viruddhoti,
tika-vin08t:1678_7: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dutiyatatiyapārājikavisaye eva tathārūpo vicāro vutto, na paṭhamacatautthapārājikavisaye.
tika-vin08t:1678_8: Vuttañhi tattha “methunadhammavītikkamo hi uttarimanussadhammavītikkamo ca oḷāriko,
tika-vin08t:1678_9: adinnādānamanussaviggahavītikkamā pana sukhumā cittalahukā, te sukhumeneva āpajjati,
tika-vin08t:1678_10: sukhumena rakkhati, tasmā visesena taṃvatthukaṃ kukkuccaṃ pucchiyamāno”ti. Ṭīkāyañca
tika-vin08t:1678_11: vuttaṃ “taṃvatthukanti te adinnādānamanussaviggahavītikkamā vatthu adhiṭṭhānaṃ kāraṇametassāti
tika-vin08t:1679_0: Tatthāpi aññe paṇḍitepi vinicchināpetvā tesampi pārājikacchāyādissaneyeva tathā vinicchayo
tika-vin08t:1679_1: kātabbo, na suddhabhāvadissane. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “āpattīti avatvā ‘sacassa
tika-vin08t:1679_2: ācariyo dharati…pe… atha daharassapi pārājikacchāyāva upaṭṭhāti, tenapi ‘pārājikosī’ti
tika-vin08t:1679_3: na vattabbo. Dullabho hi buddhuppādo, tato dullabhatarā pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca,
tika-vin08t:1679_4: evaṃ pana vattabba”nti, idamekaṃ. Nisīdāpiyamānopi vivittokāseyeva nisīdāpetabbo,
tika-vin08t:1679_5: na susāne. Vuttañhi tattha “vivittaṃ okāsaṃ sammajjitvā divāvihāraṃ nisīditvā”tiādi,
tika-vin08t:1679_6: idamekaṃ. Vivittokāse nisīdāpiyamānopi divāyeva nisīdāpetabbo, na rattiṃ. Tathā hi
tika-vin08t:1679_7: vuttaṃ “divasaṃ atikkantampi na jānāti, so divasātikkame upaṭṭhānaṃ āgato evaṃ vattabbo”ti, idamekaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1680_0: Īdisaṃ vidhānaṃ sayaṃ ārocite eva vidhātabbaṃ, na parehi codiyamāne. Tathā hi vuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:1680_1: “evaṃ katavītikkamena bhikkhunā sayameva āgantvā ārocite paṭipajjitabba”nti. Atha
tika-vin08t:1680_2: kasmā idāni evaṃ karontīti? Gihīnaṃ asakkhikaaṭṭakaraṇe udake nimujjāpanaṃ viya maññamānā
tika-vin08t:1680_3: evaṃ karonti. Tampi māyākusalā manussā vividhehi upāyehi vitathaṃ karonti, tasmā
tika-vin08t:1680_4: saccampi hoti, asaccampi hoti. Teneva ca kāraṇena mahosadhapaṇḍitādayo bodhisattā
tika-vin08t:1680_5: asakkhikampi aṭṭaṃ udakanimujjāpanādinā na vinicchinanti, ubhinnaṃ vacanaṃ parisaṃ
tika-vin08t:1680_6: gāhāpetvā tesaṃ vacanañca kiriyañca pariggahetvā saccañca vitathañca ñatvāva vinicchinanti.
tika-vin08t:1680_7: Sāsane pana bhikkhū sūrajātikāpi santi, bhīrukajātikāpi santi. Susānañca nāma pakatimanussānampi
tika-vin08t:1680_8: bhayasantāsakaraṃ hoti, rattikāle pana ativiya bhayānakaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti, evaṃbhūte
tika-vin08t:1680_9: susāne rattiyaṃ eko asahāyo hutvā nipajjāpiyamāno bhīrukajātiko bhikkhu parisuddhasīlopi
tika-vin08t:1680_10: samāno kiṃ na bhāyeyya, kathaṃ sabbarattiṃ sayituṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā sakkuṇeyya, tathārūpaṃ
tika-vin08t:1681_0: Alajjī pana sūrajātiko attano vajjaṃ paṭicchādetukāmo bhāyantopi abhāyanto viya hutvā
tika-vin08t:1681_1: “sace vikāraṃ dassessāmi, anatthaṃ me karissantī”ti anatthabhayena adhivāsetvā sayituṃ
tika-vin08t:1681_2: vā nisīdituṃ vā sakkuṇeyya, evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ “parisuddho”ti vadanto kathaṃ suvinicchito
tika-vin08t:1682_0: Athāpi vadeyyuṃ – yathā udake nimujjāpitamanussānaṃ asaccavādīnaṃ devatānubhāvena
tika-vin08t:1682_1: kumbhīlādayo āgantvā gaṇhantā viya upaṭṭhahanti, tasmā asaccavādino sīghaṃ plavanti,
tika-vin08t:1682_2: saccavādīnaṃ pana na upaṭṭhahanti, tasmā te sukhena nisīdituṃ sakkonti, evaṃ tesampi
tika-vin08t:1682_3: bhikkhūnaṃ aparisuddhasīlānaṃ devatānubhāvena sīhabyagghādayo āgatā viya paññāyanti,
tika-vin08t:1682_4: tasmā te sabbarattiṃ sayituṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā na sakkonti. Parisuddhasīlānaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:1682_5: tathā na paññāyanti, tasmā te sabbarattiṃ devatāhi rakkhitā hutvā bhayasantāsarahitā
tika-vin08t:1682_6: susāne sayituṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā sakkonti, evaṃ devatā sakkhiṃ katvā vinicchitattā
tika-vin08t:1682_7: suvinicchitameva hotīti, tampi tathā na sakkā vattuṃ. Kasmā? Aṭṭhakathāṭīkādīsu tathā
tika-vin08t:1682_8: avuttattā. Aṭṭhakathāyañhi “vivittaṃ okāsaṃ sammajjitvā divāvihāraṃ nisīditvā sīlāni
tika-vin08t:1682_9: sodhetvā ‘dvattiṃsākāraṃ tāva manasikarohī’ti vattabbo. Sace tassa arogaṃ sīlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1682_10: ghaṭayati, saṅkhārā pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti, upacārappanāppattaṃ viya cittaṃ ekaggaṃ
tika-vin08t:1682_11: hoti, divasaṃ atikkantampi na jānāti…pe… yassa pana sīlaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti, tassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1682_12: na ghaṭayati, patodābhitunnaṃ viya cittaṃ kampati, vippaṭisāragginā ḍayhati, tattapāsāṇe
tika-vin08t:1682_13: nisinno viya taṅkhaṇaññeva vuṭṭhātī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1683_0: Ṭīkāyampi “kammaṭṭhānaṃ ghaṭayatīti antarantarā khaṇḍaṃ adassetvā cittena saddhiṃ
tika-vin08t:1683_1: ārammaṇabhāvena cirakālaṃ ghaṭayati. Saṅkhārā pākaṭā upaṭṭhahantīti vipassanākammaṭṭhāniko
tika-vin08t:1683_2: ce, tassa saṅkhārā pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti. Sace katapārājikavītikkamo bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t:1683_3: tassa satipi asaritukāmatāya vippaṭisāravatthuvasena punappunaṃ taṃ upaṭṭhahatīti
tika-vin08t:1684_1: khaṇḍaṃ adassetvā pabandhavasena cittena saṅghaṭayati. Saṅkhārāti vipassanākammaṭṭhānavasena
tika-vin08t:1684_2: vuttaṃ. Sāpattikassa hi paguṇampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ na suṭṭhu upaṭṭhāti. Pageva pārājikassa.
tika-vin08t:1684_3: Tassa hi vippaṭisāraninnatāya cittaṃ ekaggaṃ na hoti. Ekassa pana vitakkavikkhepādibahulassa
tika-vin08t:1684_4: suddhasīlassapi cittaṃ na samādhiyati, taṃ idha pārājikamūlanti na gahetabbaṃ. Katapāpamūlakena
tika-vin08t:1684_5: vippaṭisārenevettha cittassa asamādhiyanaṃ sandhāya ‘kammaṭṭhānaṃ na ghaṭayatī’tiādi
tika-vin08t:1684_6: vutta”nti ettakameva vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ “devatānubhāvenā”tiādi, tasmā yadi buddhasāsane
tika-vin08t:1684_7: sagāravo sikkhākāmo bhikkhu dutiyatatiyapārājikavisaye attano kañci vītikkamaṃ disvā
tika-vin08t:1684_8: “pārājikaṃ āpanno nu kho ahaṃ, na nu kho”ti saṃsayapakkhando vinayadharaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
tika-vin08t:1684_9: taṃ vītikkamaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ācikkhitvā puccheyya, tato vinayadharena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1684_10: vuttanayeneva “sabbaṃ pubbavidhānaṃ katvā vivittaṃ okāsaṃ sammajjitvā divāvihāraṃ
tika-vin08t:1684_11: nisīditvā sīlāni sodhetvā dvattiṃsākāre tāva manasikarohī”ti ettakameva vattabbo,
tika-vin08t:1684_12: na vattabbo “susāne seyyaṃ kappehī”tiādi. Āgatakālepi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatanayeneva
tika-vin08t:1684_13: pucchitvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatanayenevassa suddhāsuddhabhāvo vattabboti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1685_0: Evaṃ hotu, evaṃ sante idāni paṭhamapārājikavisaye codentānaṃ kathaṃ vinicchayo kātabboti?
tika-vin08t:1685_1: Codakena vatthusmiṃ ārocite cuditako pucchitabbo “santametaṃ, no”ti evaṃ vatthuṃ
tika-vin08t:1685_2: upaparikkhitvā bhūtena vatthunā codetvā sāretvā ñattisampadāya anussāvanasampadāya
tika-vin08t:1685_3: taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ. Evampi alajjī nāma “etampi natthi, etampi natthī”ti
tika-vin08t:1685_4: vadeyya, paṭiññaṃ na dadeyya, atha kiṃ kātabbanti? Evampi alajjissa paṭiññāya eva
tika-vin08t:1685_5: āpattiyā kāretabbaṃ yathā taṃ tipiṭakacūḷābhayattherenāti. Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1685_6: “evaṃ lajjinā codiyamāno alajjī bahūsupi vatthūsu uppannesu paṭiññaṃ na deti, so
tika-vin08t:1685_7: ‘neva suddho’ti vattabbo, na ‘asuddho’ti, jīvamatako nāma āmakapūtiko nāma cesa.
tika-vin08t:1685_8: Sace panassa aññampi tādisaṃ vatthu uppajjati, na vinicchitabbaṃ, tathā nāsitakova bhavissatī”tiādi.
tika-vin08t:1686_0: 235. Evaṃ vinayadharalakkhaṇañca chaṭṭhānaolokanañca viditvā idāni…pe… vinicchayo
tika-vin08t:1686_1: veditabboti yojanā. Kimatthanti āha “yā sā…pe… jānanattha”nti. Yā sā pubbe vuttappabhedā
tika-vin08t:1686_2: codanā atthi, tassāyeva sampattivipattijānanatthaṃ ādimajjhapaayosānādīnaṃ vasena
tika-vin08t:1686_3: vinicchayo veditabbo, na avuttacodanāpabhedajānanatthanti attho. Seyyathidanti pucchanatthe
tika-vin08t:1687_0: Codanāya kati mūlāni, kati vatthūni, kati bhūmiyoti ettha “katihākārehī”tipi vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1687_1: Vuttañhetaṃ parivāre codanākaṇḍe “codanāya kati mūlāni, kati vatthūni, kati bhūmiyo,
tika-vin08t:1687_2: katihākārehi codetī”ti. Mettacitto vakkhāmi, no dosantaroti etassapi parato “codanāya
tika-vin08t:1687_3: imā pañca bhūmiyo. Katamehi dvīhākārehi codeti, kāyena vā codeti, vācāya vā codeti,
tika-vin08t:1687_4: imehi dvīhākārehi codetī”ti vattabbaṃ. Kasmā? Codanākaṇḍe tathā vijjamānatoti. Pannarasasu
tika-vin08t:1687_6: paccupaṭṭhitatā, bahussutatā, ubhayapātimokkhasvāgatatā, kālena vacanatā, bhūtena
tika-vin08t:1687_7: vacanatā, saṇhena vacanatā, atthasañhitena vacanatā, mettacitto hutvā vacanatā, kāruññatā,
tika-vin08t:1687_8: hitesitā, anukampatā, āpattivuṭṭhānatā, vinayapurekkhāratāti. Vuttañhetaṃ upālipañcake
tika-vin08t:1687_9: “codakenupāli bhikkhunā paraṃ codetukāmena evaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ – parisuddhakāyasamācāro
tika-vin08t:1687_10: nu khomhi…pe… parisuddhavacīsamācāro nu khomhi…pe… mettaṃ nu kho me cittaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ
tika-vin08t:1687_11: sabrahmacārīsu…pe… bahussuto nu khomhi sutadharo sutasannicayo…pe… ubhayāni kho me
tika-vin08t:1687_12: pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni…pe… kālena vakkhāmi, no akālena, bhūtena vakkhāmi,
tika-vin08t:1687_13: no abhūtena, saṇhena vakkhāmi, no pharusena, atthasañhitena vakkhāmi, no anatthasañhitena,
tika-vin08t:1687_14: mettacitto vakkhāmi, no dosantaro…pe… kāruññatā, hitesitā, anukampatā, āpattivuṭṭhānatā,
tika-vin08t:1688_0: Tattha kāruññatāti kāruṇikabhāvo. Iminā karuṇā ca karuṇāpubbabhāgo ca dassito. Hitesitāti
tika-vin08t:1688_1: hitagavesanatā. Anukampatāti tena hitena saṃyojanatā. Āpattivuṭṭhānatāti āpattito
tika-vin08t:1688_2: vuṭṭhāpetvā suddhante patiṭṭhāpanatā. Vatthuṃ codetvā sāretvā paṭiññaṃ āropetvā yathāpaṭiññāya
tika-vin08t:1688_3: kammakaraṇaṃ vinayapurekkhāratā nāma. Amūlakampi samūlakampi “mūla”nti gahetvā vadantīti
tika-vin08t:1688_4: āha “dve mūlānī”ti. Kālena vakkhāmītiādīsu eko ekaṃ okāsaṃ kāretvā codento kālena
tika-vin08t:1688_6: upaṭṭhākehi parivāritakkhaṇe vā codento akālena vadati nāma. Tacchena vatthunā codento
tika-vin08t:1688_7: bhūtena vadati nāma. Tucchena codento abhūtena vadati nāma. “Ambho mahallaka parisāvacara
tika-vin08t:1688_8: paṃsukūlika dhammakathika patirūpaṃ tava ida”nti vadanto pharusena vadati nāma. “Bhante,
tika-vin08t:1688_9: mahallakā parisāvacarā paṃsukūlikā dhammakathikā patirūpaṃ tumhākaṃ ida”nti vadanto
tika-vin08t:1688_10: saṇhena vadati nāma. Kāraṇanissitaṃ katvā vadanto atthasañhitena vadati nāma. Mettacitto
tika-vin08t:1688_11: vakkhāmi, no dosantaroti mettacittaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā vakkhāmi, na duṭṭhacitto hutvā.
tika-vin08t:1688_12: Sacce ca akuppe cāti vacīsacce ca akuppatāya ca. Cuditakena hi saccañca vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1688_13: kopo ca na kātabbo, attanā ca na kucchitabbaṃ, paro ca na ghaṭṭetabboti attho.
tika-vin08t:1689_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne “saṅghena otiṇṇānotiṇṇaṃ jānitabbaṃ – anuvijjakena yena dhammena yena
tika-vin08t:1689_1: vinayena yena satthusāsanena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati, tathā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabba”nti
tika-vin08t:1689_2: vattabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ codanākaṇḍe “codakena kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ? Cuditakena kathaṃ
tika-vin08t:1689_3: paṭipajjitabbaṃ? Saṅghena kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ? Anuvijjakena kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ?
tika-vin08t:1689_4: Codakena kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti? Codakena pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya paro codetabbo.
tika-vin08t:1689_5: Kālena vakkhāmi no akālena, bhūtena vakkhāmi no abhūtena, saṇhena vakkhāmi no pharusena,
tika-vin08t:1689_6: atthasañhitena vakkhāmi no anatthasañhitena, mettacitto vakkhāmi no dosantaroti.
tika-vin08t:1689_7: Codakena evaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Cuditakena kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti? Cuditakena dvīsu
tika-vin08t:1689_8: dhammesu patiṭṭhātabbaṃ sacce ca akuppe ca. Cuditakena evaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Saṅghena
tika-vin08t:1689_9: kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti? Saṅghena otiṇṇānotiṇṇaṃ jānitabbaṃ. Saṅghena evaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1689_10: Anuvijjakena kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti? Anuvijjakena yena dhammena yena vinayena yena
tika-vin08t:1689_11: satthusāsanena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati, tathā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1690_0: Aṭṭhakathāyampi “codanāya ko ādītiādipucchānaṃ vissajjane sacce akuppe cāti ettha
tika-vin08t:1690_1: sacce patiṭṭhātabbaṃ akuppe ca, yaṃ kataṃ vā akataṃ vā, tadeva vattabbaṃ, na codake
tika-vin08t:1690_2: vā anuvijjake vā saṅghe vā kopo uppādetabbo. Otiṇṇānotiṇṇaṃ jānitabbanti otiṇṇañca
tika-vin08t:1690_3: anotiṇṇañca vacanaṃ jānitabbaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ jānanavidhi – ettakā codakassa pubbakathā,
tika-vin08t:1690_4: ettakā pacchimakathā, ettakā cuditakassa pubbakathā, ettakā pacchimakathāti jānitabbā.
tika-vin08t:1690_5: Codakassa pamāṇaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ, cuditakassa pamāṇaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ, anuvijjakassa pamāṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:1690_6: gaṇhitabbaṃ. Anuvijjako appamattakampi ahāpento ‘āvuso, samannāharitvā ujuṃ katvā
tika-vin08t:1690_7: āharā’ti vattabbo, saṅghena evaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Yena dhammena yena vinayena yena
tika-vin08t:1690_8: satthusāsanena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammatīti ettha dhammoti bhūtaṃ vatthu. Vinayoti
tika-vin08t:1690_9: codanā ceva sāraṇā ca. Satthusāsananti ñattisampadā ceva anussāvanasampadā ca. Etena
tika-vin08t:1690_10: hi dhammena ca vinayena ca satthusāsanena ca adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati, tasmā anuvijjakena
tika-vin08t:1690_11: bhūtena vatthunā codetvā āpattiṃ sāretvā ñattisampadāya ceva anussāvanasampadāya
tika-vin08t:1690_12: ca taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ, anuvijjakena evaṃ paṭipajjitabba”nti āgataṃ, tasmā
tika-vin08t:1691_0: Evaṃ ekadesena codanākaṇḍanayaṃ dassetvā idāni ekadeseneva mahāsaṅgāmanayaṃ dassento
tika-vin08t:1691_1: “anuvijjakena codako pucchitabbo”tiādimāha. Tattha yaṃ kho tvaṃ, āvuso, imaṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin08t:1691_2: codesi, kimhi naṃ codesīti codanāsāmaññato vuttaṃ, pāḷiyaṃ pana pavāraṇaṭṭhapanavasena
tika-vin08t:1691_3: codanaṃ sandhāya “yaṃ kho tvaṃ, āvuso, imassa bhikkhuno pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapesī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1692_0: Evaṃ ekadesena mahāsaṅgāmanayaṃ dassetvā idāni ekadeseneva cūḷasaṅgāmanayaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin08t:1692_2: vuccati adhikaraṇavinicchayatthāya saṅghasannipāto. Tatra hi attapaccatthikā ceva
tika-vin08t:1692_3: sāsanapaccatthikā ca uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ dīpentā samosaranti vesālikā
tika-vin08t:1692_4: vajjiputtakā viya. Yo bhikkhu tesaṃ paccatthikānaṃ laddhiṃ madditvā sakavādadīpanatthāya
tika-vin08t:1692_5: tattha avacarati, ajjhogāhetvā vinicchayaṃ pavatteti, so saṅgāmāvacaro nāma yasatthero
tika-vin08t:1692_6: viya, tena saṅgāmāvacarena bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamantena nīcacittena saṅgho upasaṅkamitabbo.
tika-vin08t:1692_7: Nīcacittenāti mānaddhajaṃ nipātetvā nihatamānacittena. Rajoharaṇasamenāti pādapuñchanasamena,
tika-vin08t:1692_8: yathā rajoharaṇassa saṃkiliṭṭhe vā asaṃkiliṭṭhe vā pāde puñchiyamāne neva rāgo na
tika-vin08t:1692_9: doso, evaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu arajjantena adussantenāti attho. Yathāpatirūpe āsaneti yathāpatirūpaṃ
tika-vin08t:1692_10: āsanaṃ ñatvā attano pāpuṇanaṭṭhāne therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ piṭṭhiṃ adassetvā nisīditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1693_0: Anānākathikenāti nānāvidhaṃ taṃ taṃ anatthakathaṃ akathentena. Atiracchānakathikenāti
tika-vin08t:1693_1: diṭṭhasutamutampi rājakathādikaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ akathentena. Sāmaṃ vā dhammo bhāsitabboti
tika-vin08t:1693_3: vā kathā dhammo nāma. Evarūpo dhammo sayaṃ vā bhāsitabbo, paro vā ajjhesitabbo. Yo
tika-vin08t:1693_4: bhikkhu tathārūpiṃ kathaṃ kathetuṃ pahoti, so vattabbo “āvuso, saṅghamajjhamhi pañhe
tika-vin08t:1693_5: uppanne tvaṃ katheyyāsī”ti. Ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvo nātimaññitabboti ariyā tuṇhī nisīdantā
tika-vin08t:1693_6: na bālaputhujjanā viya nisīdanti, aññataraṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva nisīdanti. Iti
tika-vin08t:1693_7: kammaṭṭhānamanasikāravasena tuṇhībhāvo ariyo tuṇhībhāvo nāma, so nātimaññitabbo,
tika-vin08t:1693_8: “kiṃ kammaṭṭhānānuyogenā”ti nāvajānitabbo, attano patirūpaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva
tika-vin08t:1694_0: Na upajjhāyo pucchitabboti “ko nāma tuyhaṃ upajjhāyo”ti na pucchitabbo. Esa nayo
tika-vin08t:1694_1: sabbattha. Na jātīti “khattiyajātiyo tvaṃ brāhmaṇajātiyo”ti evaṃ jāti na pucchitabbā.
tika-vin08t:1694_2: Na āgamoti “dīghabhāṇako tvaṃ majjhimabhāṇako”ti evaṃ āgamo na pucchitabbo. Kulapadesopi
tika-vin08t:1694_3: khattiyakulādivaseneva veditabbo. Atrassa pemaṃ vā doso vāti tatra puggale etesaṃ
tika-vin08t:1694_4: kāraṇānaṃ aññataravasena pemaṃ vā bhaveyya doso vā.
tika-vin08t:1695_0: No parisakappikenāti parisakappakena parisānuvidhāyakena na bhavitabbaṃ, yaṃ parisāya
tika-vin08t:1695_1: ruccati, tadeva cetetvā kappetvā na kathetabbanti attho. Na hatthamuddā dassetabbāti
tika-vin08t:1695_2: kathetabbe ca akathetabbe ca saññājananatthaṃ hatthavikāro na kātabbo.
tika-vin08t:1696_0: Atthaṃ anuvidhiyantenāti vinicchayapaṭivedhameva sallakkhentena, “idaṃ suttaṃ upalabbhati,
tika-vin08t:1696_1: imasmiṃ vinicchaye idaṃ vakkhāmī”ti evaṃ paritulayantena nisīditabbanti attho. Na
tika-vin08t:1696_2: ca āsanā vuṭṭhātabbanti na āsanā vuṭṭhāya sannipātamaṇḍale vicaritabbaṃ. Vinayadhare
tika-vin08t:1696_3: hi uṭṭhite sabbā parisā vuṭṭhahanti, tasmā na vuṭṭhātabbaṃ. Na vītihātabbanti na
tika-vin08t:1696_4: vinicchayo hāpetabbo. Na kummaggo sevitabboti na āpatti dīpetabbā. Asāhasikena bhavitabbanti
tika-vin08t:1696_5: na sahasā kārinā bhavitabbaṃ, na sahasā duruttavacanaṃ kathetabbanti attho. Vacanakkhamenāti
tika-vin08t:1696_6: duruttavācaṃ khamanasīlena. Hitaparisakkināti hitesinā hitagavesinā karuṇā ca karuṇāpubbabhāgo
tika-vin08t:1696_7: ca upaṭṭhāpetabboti ayaṃ padadvayepi adhippāyo. Anasuruttenāti na asuruttena, asuruttaṃ
tika-vin08t:1696_8: vuccati viggāhikakathāsaṅkhātaṃ asundaravacanaṃ, taṃ na kathetabbanti attho. Attā
tika-vin08t:1696_9: pariggahetabboti “vinicchinituṃ vūpasametuṃ sakkhissāmi nu kho, no”ti evaṃ attā pariggahetabbo,
tika-vin08t:1696_10: attano pamāṇaṃ jānitabbanti attho. Paro pariggahetabboti “lajjiyā nu kho ayaṃ parisā
tika-vin08t:1696_11: sakkā saññāpetuṃ, udāhu no”ti evaṃ paro pariggahetabbo. Codako pariggahetabboti “dhammacodako
tika-vin08t:1696_12: nu kho, no”ti evaṃ pariggahetabbo. Cuditako pariggahetabboti “dhammacuditako nu kho,
tika-vin08t:1696_13: no”ti evaṃ pariggahetabbo. Adhammacodako pariggahetabboti tassa pamāṇaṃ jānitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1697_0: Vuttaṃ ahāpentenāti codakacuditakehi vuttavacanaṃ ahāpentena. Avuttaṃ apakāsentenāti
tika-vin08t:1697_1: anosaṭaṃ vatthuṃ apakāsentena. Mando hāsetabboti mando momūḷho paggaṇhitabbo, “nanu
tika-vin08t:1697_2: tvaṃ kulaputto”ti uttejetvā anuyogavattaṃ kathāpetvā tassa anuyogo gaṇhitabbo. Bhīru
tika-vin08t:1697_3: assāsetabboti yassa saṅghamajjhaṃ vā gaṇamajjhaṃ vā anosaṭapubbattā sārajjaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin08t:1697_4: tādiso “mā bhāyi, vissattho kathayāhi, mayaṃ te upatthambhā bhavissāmā”ti vatvāpi
tika-vin08t:1697_5: anuyogavattaṃ kathāpetabbo. Caṇḍo nisedhetabboti apasāretabbo tajjetabbo. Asuci vibhāvetabboti
tika-vin08t:1697_6: alajjiṃ pakāsetvā āpattiṃ desāpetabbo. Ujumaddavenāti yo bhikkhu uju sīlavā kāyavaṅkādirahito,
tika-vin08t:1697_7: so maddaveneva upacaritabbo. Dhammesu ca puggalesu cāti ettha yo dhammagaruko hoti,
tika-vin08t:1697_8: na puggalagaruko, ayameva dhammesu ca puggalesu ca majjhattoti veditabbo. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin08t:1703_0: 236. Evaṃ codanādivinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni garukāpattivuṭṭhānavinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ
tika-vin08t:1703_1: “garukāpattivuṭṭhāna”ntiādimāha. Tattha garu alahukaṃ paṭikaraṇaṃ etissā āpattiyāti
tika-vin08t:1703_2: garukā, āpajjitabbāti āpatti, garukā ca sā āpatti cāti garukāpatti, vuṭṭhahate vuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1703_3: garukāpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṃ garukāpatti vuṭṭhānaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Saṅghādisesāpattito parisuddhabhāvo.
tika-vin08t:1703_4: Tenāha “parivāsamānattādīhi vinayakammehi garukāpattito vuṭṭhāna”nti. Kiñcāpi catubbidho
tika-vin08t:1703_5: parivāso, appaṭicchannaparivāso pana idha nādhippetoti āha “tividho parivāso”ti.
tika-vin08t:1703_6: Tathā hi vuttaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ “tattha catubbidho parivāso – appaṭicchannaparivāso
tika-vin08t:1703_7: paṭicchannaparivāso suddhantaparivāso samodhānaparivāsoti. Tesu ‘yo so, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:1703_8: aññopi aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati pabbajjaṃ, ākaṅkhati upasampadaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1703_9: tassa cattāro māse parivāso dātabbo’ti evaṃ mahākhandhake vutto titthiyaparivāso
tika-vin08t:1703_10: appaṭicchannaparivāso nāma. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ vuttameva. Ayaṃ pana idha anadhippeto”ti.
tika-vin08t:1703_11: Ito paraṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva suviññeyyoti tasmā dubbiññeyyaṭṭhāneyeva vaṇṇayissāma.
tika-vin08t:1704_0: 237. Evaṃ yo yo āpanno hoti, tassa tassa nāmaṃ gahetvā kammavācā kātabbāti etena
tika-vin08t:1704_1: pāḷiyaṃ sabbasādhāraṇavasena “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhū”ti
tika-vin08t:1704_2: ca “yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno”ti ca āgatepi kammavācābhaṇanakāle
tika-vin08t:1704_3: tathā abhaṇitvā “ayaṃ buddharakkhito bhikkhū”ti ca “imassa buddharakkhitassa bhikkhuno”ti
tika-vin08t:1704_4: ca evaṃ sakasakanāmaṃ uddharitvāva kammavācā kātabbāti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:1705_0: Māḷakasīmāyameva vattaṃ samādātabbaṃ, na tato bahi. Kasmā? “Aññattha kammavācā aññattha
tika-vin08t:1705_2: sannipatitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ekassapi anārocane sati ratticchedasambhavato ca. Parivāsaṃ
tika-vin08t:1705_3: samādiyāmi, vattaṃ samādiyāmīti imesu dvīsu padesu ekekena vā ubhohi padehi vā samādātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1705_4: Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? “Ekapadenapi cettha nikkhitto hoti parivāso, dvīhi pana sunikkhittoyeva,
tika-vin08t:1705_5: samādānepi eseva nayo”ti vakkhamānattā. Samādiyitvā tattheva saṅghassa ārocetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1705_6: na tattha anārocetvā aññattha gantabbaṃ. Kasmā? Vuṭṭhitāya parisāya puna sannipātetuṃ
tika-vin08t:1705_7: dukkarattā, ekassapi bhikkhuno anārocetvā aruṇuṭṭhāpane sati ratticchedakarattā.
tika-vin08t:1706_0: Ārocentena evaṃ ārocetabbanti sambandho. “Ahaṃ bhante…pe… saṅgho dhāretū”ti ettakameva
tika-vin08t:1706_1: vatvā yācane viya “dutiyampi tatiyampī”ti avuttattā accāyikakaraṇe sati ekavāraṃ
tika-vin08t:1706_2: ārocitepi upapannamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vediyāmahaṃ bhante, vediyatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretūti
tika-vin08t:1706_3: ettha “vediyāmīti cittena sampaṭicchitvā sukhaṃ anubhavāmi, na tappaccayā ahaṃ dukkhitoti
tika-vin08t:1706_4: adhippāyo”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Ettha ca “sukhaṃ vedemi vedana”ntiādīsu viya
tika-vin08t:1706_5: pi-saddo anubhavanattho hoti. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “vediyāmīti jānemi, cittena
tika-vin08t:1706_6: sampaṭicchitvā sukhaṃ anubhavāmi, na tappaccayā ahaṃ dukkhitoti adhippāyoti likhita”nti
tika-vin08t:1706_7: vuttaṃ. Ettha pana “dīpaṅkaro lokavidū”tiādīsu viya ñāṇattho anubhavanattho ca. Vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1706_8: pana “vediyāmahanti jānāpemahaṃ, ārocemīti attho, anubhavāmītipissa atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin08t:1706_9: Purimaṃ pana pasaṃsanti ārocanavacanattā”ti. Ettha tu –
tika-vin08t:1708: Paṭivedemi te brahme, na naṃ vāretumussahe”ti. –
tika-vin08t:1710_0: Ārocetvā…pe… nikkhipitabbanti dukkaṭaparimocanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Keci pana “tadaheva
tika-vin08t:1710_1: puna vattaṃ samādiyitvā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetukāmassa ratticchedaparihāratthampī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t:1710_2: Yassa māḷake nārocitaṃ, tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ. Yassa ārocitaṃ, tassa puna
tika-vin08t:1710_3: ārocanakiccaṃ natthi, kevalaṃ nikkhipitabbameva. “Sabhāgā bhikkhū vasantī”ti vuttattā
tika-vin08t:1710_4: visabhāgānaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne vattaṃ asamādiyitvā bahi eva kātumpi vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1710_5: Dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvāti idaṃ vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ sajjhāyādisaddasavanūpacāravijahanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1710_6: vuttaṃ, mahāmaggato okkammāti idaṃ maggapaṭipannānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ savanūpacārātikkamanatthaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1710_7: gumbena vātiādi dassanūpacāravijahanatthaṃ. Sopi kenaci kammena purearuṇe eva gacchatīti
tika-vin08t:1710_8: iminā ārocanāya katāya sabbesu bhikkhūsu bahivihāraṃ gatesupi ūnegaṇecaraṇadoso vā
tika-vin08t:1710_9: vippavāsadoso vā na hoti ārocanatthattā sahavāsassāti dasseti. Tenāha “ayañcā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t:1710_11: parihāro”ti vuttaṃ, tattha nikkhittavattassāti vattaṃ nikkhipitvā parivasantassāti
tika-vin08t:1710_12: attho. Ayaṃ panettha therassa adhippāyo – vattaṃ nikkhipitvā parivasantassa upacāragatānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1710_13: sabbesaṃ ārocanakiccaṃ natthi, diṭṭharūpānaṃ sutasaddānaṃ ārocetabbaṃ, adiṭṭhaasutānampi
tika-vin08t:1710_14: antodvādasahatthagatānaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Idaṃ vattaṃ nikkhipitvā parivasantassa lakkhaṇanti.
tika-vin08t:1711_1: “siyuṃ nu kho tividharatticchedakāraṇayuttāni kānici divasāni, evaṃ sati aparipuṇṇaparivāsadivasattā
tika-vin08t:1711_2: na mānattāraho bhaveyya, asati ca mānattārahabhāve mānattaṃ dinnampi adinnaṃyeva
tika-vin08t:1711_3: bhaveyya, evañca sati āpannāpattito vuṭṭhānaṃ na bhaveyyā”ti imassa vinayakukkuccassa
tika-vin08t:1711_4: vinodanatthāya. Ekena vā dvīhi vā tīhi vā divasehi adhikatarāni divasāni parivasitvā
tika-vin08t:1711_5: nanu cāyaṃ parivutthaparivāso, tasmānena mānattameva yācitabbaṃ, atha kasmā vattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1711_6: samādiyitvā mānattaṃ yācitabbanti āhāti codanaṃ manasi karontena vuttaṃ “ayañhi vatte
tika-vin08t:1711_7: samādinne”tiādi. Hi yasmā ayaṃ bhikkhu vatte samādinne eva mānattāraho hoti, na asamādinne,
tika-vin08t:1711_8: iti tasmā vattaṃ samādiyitvā mānattaṃ yācitabbanti sambandho. Nanu ca kammavācāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1711_9: “so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ mānattaṃ yācati”icceva vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ “samādinnavatto”ti,
tika-vin08t:1711_10: atha kasmā “vatte samādinne eva mānattāraho hotī”ti vuttanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “nikkhittavattena
tika-vin08t:1711_11: parivutthattā”ti. Yasmā ayaṃ bhikkhu nikkhittavattena hutvā parivuttho hoti, no anikkhittavattena,
tika-vin08t:1711_12: tasmā nikkhittavattena hutvā parivutthattā ayaṃ bhikkhu vatte samādinne eva mānattāraho
tika-vin08t:1711_13: hoti, no asamādinneti yojanā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “anikkhittavattassa pana puna samādānakiccaṃ
tika-vin08t:1711_14: natthi. So hi paṭicchannadivasātikkameneva mānattāraho hoti, tasmā tassa mānattaṃ dātabbamevā”ti.
tika-vin08t:1712_0: Catūhi pañcahi vā bhikkhūhi saddhinti ūnegaṇecaraṇadosā vimuccanatthaṃ. Parikkhittassa
tika-vin08t:1712_1: vihārassa parikkhepatotiādi kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ natthi, atha kho aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1712_2: vacanena tathā eva paṭipajjitabbanti ca vuttaṃ. “Atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvāti dvādasahatthe
tika-vin08t:1712_3: upacāre sallakkhetvā, anikkhittavattānaṃ upacārasīmāya āgatabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā sahavāsādikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1712_4: veditabbanti ca vuttaṃ. ‘Nikkhipantena ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ payojanaṃ atthī’ti
tika-vin08t:1712_5: ca vuttaṃ, na pana taṃ payojanaṃ dassita”nti vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ vuttaṃ, vattabhedadukkaṭā
tika-vin08t:1713_0: 239. Abbhānaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti katampi akatameva hotīti attho. “Tenāpi vattaṃ samādiyitvā
tika-vin08t:1713_1: ārocetvā abbhānaṃ yācitabba”nti vuttattā abbhānayācanatthaṃ mānattassa samādiyanakālepi
tika-vin08t:1713_2: ārocetabbameva. Pubbe mānattacāritakāle ārocitamevāti anārocetvā abbhānaṃ na yācitabbanti
tika-vin08t:1713_3: viññāyati. Evaṃ mānattayācanakālepi parivāsaṃ samādiyitvā ārocetabbamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1714_0: 240. Ciṇṇamānatto bhikkhu abbhetabboti ciṇṇamānattassa ca abbhānārahassa ca ninnānākaraṇattā
tika-vin08t:1714_1: vuttaṃ. Aññathā “abbhānāraho abbhetabbo”ti vattabbaṃ siyā. Ukkhepanīyakammakatopi
tika-vin08t:1714_2: attano laddhiggahaṇavasena sabhāgabhikkhumhi sati tassa anārocāpetuṃ na labhati.
tika-vin08t:1715_0: “Anantarāyikassa pana antarāyikasaññāya chādayato acchannāvā”ti pāṭho. Averibhāvena
tika-vin08t:1715_1: sabhāgo averisabhāgo. “Sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ āpannassa pana santike āvi kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin08t:1715_2: pasaṅgato idheva pakāsitaṃ. Lahukesu paṭikkhepo natthi. Tattha ñattiyā āvi katvā
tika-vin08t:1715_3: uposathaṃ kātuṃ anuññātattā lahukasabhāgaṃ āvi kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti. Sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ
tika-vin08t:1715_4: pana ñattiyā ārocanaṃ na vaṭṭatīti kira. “Tassa santike taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissatīti
tika-vin08t:1715_5: vuttattā lahukassevāyaṃ samanuññātā. Na hi sakkā suddhassa ekassa santike saṅghādisesassa
tika-vin08t:1715_6: paṭikaraṇaṃ kātu”nti likhitaṃ. Lahukesupi sabhāgaṃ āvi kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti. Tasmā
tika-vin08t:1715_7: eva hi ñattiyā āvikaraṇaṃ anuññātaṃ, itarathā taṃ niratthakaṃ siyā. Aññamaññārocanassa
tika-vin08t:1715_8: vaṭṭati, tato na vaṭṭatīti dīpanatthameva ñattiyā āvikaraṇamanuññātaṃ, teneva idha
tika-vin08t:1715_9: “sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ āpannassā”tiādi vuttaṃ, ayamattho “ettāvatā te dve nirāpattikā
tika-vin08t:1715_10: honti, tesaṃ santike sesehi sabhāgāpattiyo desetabbā”ti vacanena kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyampi
tika-vin08t:1715_11: pakāsitova. Saṅghādisesaṃ pana ñattiyā ārocetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tassā ñattiyā
tika-vin08t:1715_12: ayamattho – yadā suddhaṃ bhikkhuṃ passissati, tassa santike aññamaññārocanavasena
tika-vin08t:1715_13: paṭikarissati, evaṃ paṭikate “na ca, bhikkhave, sāpattikena pātimokkhaṃ sotabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1715_14: yo suṇeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttāpattito mokkho hoti, tasmā “garukaṃ vā hotu
tika-vin08t:1715_15: lahukaṃ vā, ñattiyā āvi kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Ubhosu nayesu yuttataraṃ gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1715_16: “Nāmañceva āpatti cāti tena tena vītikkamenāpannāpatti āpatti. Nāmanti tassā āpattiyā
tika-vin08t:1715_17: nāma”nti likhitaṃ. Ārocetvā nikkhipitabbanti ettha ārocanaṃ vattabhedadukkaṭapariharaṇappayojananti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1716_0: “Satiyeva antarāye antarāyikasaññī chādeti, acchannā hoti. Antarāyikassa pana antarāyikasaññāya
tika-vin08t:1716_1: vā anantarāyikasaññāya vā chādayato acchannāvā”tipi pāṭho. Averīti hitakāmo. Uddhaste
tika-vin08t:1716_2: aruṇeti uṭṭhite aruṇe. Suddhassa santiketi sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ anāpannassa santike.
tika-vin08t:1716_3: Vatthunti asucimocanādivītikkamaṃ. Sukkavissaṭṭhīti vatthu ceva gottañcāti “sukkavissaṭṭhī”ti
tika-vin08t:1716_4: idaṃ asucimocanalakkhaṇassa vītikkamassa pakāsanato vatthu ceva hoti, sajātiyasādhāraṇavijātiyavinivattasabhāvāya
tika-vin08t:1716_5: sukkavissaṭṭhiyā eva pakāsanato gottañca hotīti attho. Gaṃ tāyatīti hi gottaṃ. Saṅghādisesoti
tika-vin08t:1716_6: nāmañceva āpatti cāti saṅghādisesoti tena tena vītikkamena āpannassa āpattinikāyassa
tika-vin08t:1716_7: nāmapakāsanato nāmañceva hoti, āpattisabhāvato āpatti ca.
tika-vin08t:1717_0: Suddhassāti sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ anāpannassa, tato vuṭṭhitassa vā. Aññasminti suddhantaparivāsavasena
tika-vin08t:1717_1: āpattivuṭṭhānato aññasmiṃ āpattivuṭṭhāne. Paṭicchādiyitthāti paṭicchannā. Kā sā?
tika-vin08t:1717_2: Āpatti. Divasādīhi paricchinditvā vasanaṃ parivāso. Ko so? Vinayakammakaraṇaṃ. Paṭicchannāya
tika-vin08t:1720_0: 242. Sujjhanaṃ suddho, ko so? Āpattivigamo. Amati osānabhāvaṃ gacchatīti anto, suddho
tika-vin08t:1720_1: anto yassa parivāsassāti suddhanto, suddhanto ca so parivāso cāti suddhantaparivāso,
tika-vin08t:1720_2: suddhakālaṃ pariyantaṃ katvā asuddhakālappamāṇena paricchinditvā kataparivāso.
tika-vin08t:1723_0: 243. Samodhīyate samodhānaṃ, nānākālikā nānāvatthukā āpattiyo agghādivasena samodhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1723_1: ekīkaraṇaṃ, samodhānetvā kato parivāso samodhānaparivāsoti viggaho. Kammavācāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1723_2: “paṭikassito saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1723_3: mūlāyapaṭikassanā, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti ettha gatyatthadhātuyā
tika-vin08t:1723_4: kammani ca nayanatthadhātuyā kammani ca tadatthasampadāne ca vibhattipariṇāme cāti
tika-vin08t:1723_5: imesu catūsu ṭhānesu āyādesassa vuttattā, paṭipubbakasadhātuyā ca nayanatthattā “mūlāyā”ti
tika-vin08t:1723_6: idaṃ “paṭikassito”ti ettha kammaṃ, tasmā “paṭikassito…pe… mūlāya” iti ettakameva
tika-vin08t:1723_8: idaṃ adhikanti vā vadeyyuṃ makkheyyuṃ vā, na panetaṃ vattabbaṃ. Navapāṭhesuyeva ayaṃ
tika-vin08t:1723_9: pāṭho saddalakkhaṇayutto vā ayutto vāti cintetabbo, na pana pāḷiyaṭṭhakathādito āgatesu
tika-vin08t:1723_10: porāṇapāṭhesu. Tesu pana kathaṃ yojiyamāno ayaṃ pāṭho saddayuttiyā ca atthayuttiyā
tika-vin08t:1723_11: ca samannāgato bhaveyyāti yojanākāroyeva cintetabbo. Ayañca pāṭho porāṇapāḷipāṭhova,
tika-vin08t:1724_0: Kathaṃ panetassa porāṇapāṭhabhāvo jānitabboti? Pakaraṇe āgatattā. Vuttañhi vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1724_1: “pāḷiyaṃ paṭikassito saṅghena udāyi bhikkhu antarā ekissā āpattiyā…pe… mūlāyapaṭikassanāti
tika-vin08t:1724_2: idaṃ karaṇavasena vipariṇāmetvā mūlāyapaṭikassanāya paṭikassitoti yojetabba”nti.
tika-vin08t:1724_3: Atha vā “mūlāya paṭikassanā mūlāyapaṭikassanā”ti aluttasamāsavasena uttarapadena
tika-vin08t:1724_4: samāsaṃ katvā saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1724_5: hetu paṭikassito. Sā mūlāyapaṭikassanā khamati saṅghassāti yojetabbaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:1724_6: tattheva “atha vā mūlāyapaṭikassanā khamati saṅghassāti uttarapadena saha paccattavaseneva
tika-vin08t:1725_0: Taṃ dentena paṭhamaṃ mūlāya paṭikassitvā pacchāparivāso dātabboti ettha taṃ odhānasamodhānaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin08t:1725_1: dentena paṭhamaṃ taṃ bhikkhuṃ mūlāya paṭikassitvā mūladivase ākaḍḍhitvā tassa antarāpattiyā
tika-vin08t:1725_2: samodhānaparivāso dātabboti attho. Yathā kiṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ “udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā
tika-vin08t:1725_3: ekissā āpattiyā…pe… mūlāya paṭikassitvāti ettha antarā ekissā āpattiyā hetubhūtāya
tika-vin08t:1725_4: udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ mūlāya paṭikassitvā mūladivase ākaḍḍhitvā tassā antarāpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin08t:1725_5: detūti yojanā”ti vuttaṃ. Mahāsumattheravāde āvikārāpetvā vissajjetabboti tassa atekicchabhāvaṃ
tika-vin08t:1725_6: teneva saṅghassa pākaṭaṃ kāretvā lajjīgaṇato viyojanavasena vissajjetabboti attho.
tika-vin08t:1728_0: 244. Agghena agghavasena arahavasena samodhānaṃ agghasamodhānaṃ, āpannāsu sambahulāsu
tika-vin08t:1728_1: āpattīsu yā āpattiyo ciratarappaṭicchannāyo, tāsaṃ agghena samodhāya tāsaṃ rattiparicchedavasena
tika-vin08t:1728_2: avasesānaṃ ūnatarappaṭicchannānaṃ āpattīnaṃ parivāso dīyati, ayaṃ vuccati agghasamodhāno.
tika-vin08t:1728_3: Sataṃ āpattiyoti kāyasaṃsaggādivasena ekadivase āpannā sataṃ āpattiyo. Dasasatanti
tika-vin08t:1728_4: sahassaāpattiyo. Rattisataṃ chādayitvānāti yojetabbaṃ. “Agghasamodhāno nāma sabhāgavatthukāyo
tika-vin08t:1728_5: sambahulā āpattiyo āpannassa bahurattiṃ paṭicchāditāpattiyaṃ nikkhipitvā dātabbo,
tika-vin08t:1728_6: itaro nānāvatthukānaṃ vasenāti ayametesaṃ viseso”ti vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1730_0: 246. Liṅgaparivattanakakathāyaṃ yadi kassaci bhikkhuno itthiliṅgaṃ pātu bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t:1730_1: kiṃ tena puna upajjhā gahetabbā, puna upasampadā kātabbā, kiṃ bhikkhūpasampadāto
tika-vin08t:1730_2: paṭṭhāya vassagaṇanā kātabbā, udāhu ito paṭṭhāyāti pucchāya sati taṃ pariharitumāha
tika-vin08t:1730_3: “sace”tiādi. Evaṃ sante sā bhikkhunī bhikkhūnaṃ majjheyeva vasitabbaṃ bhaveyyāti
tika-vin08t:1730_4: codanaṃ sandhāyāha “appatirūpa”ntiādi. Evaṃ sante bhikkhubhūtakāle āpajjitāpattiyo
tika-vin08t:1730_5: kathaṃ kātabbāti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “yā desanāgāminiyo vā”tiādi. Tattha bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1730_6: bhikkhunīhi sādhāraṇāti sañcarittādayo. Asādhāraṇāti sukkavissaṭṭhiādayo. Hotu bhagavato
tika-vin08t:1730_7: anuññātavasena liṅge parivatte asādhāraṇāpattīhi vuṭṭhitabhāvo, puna pakatiliṅge
tika-vin08t:1730_8: uppanne puna āpatti siyāti āsaṅkaṃ pariharituṃ “puna pakatiliṅge”tiādi vuttaṃ. Idāni
tika-vin08t:1730_10: ṭīkāsu vuttanayeneva daṭṭhabbo, idha pana garukāpattivuṭṭhānakathābhūtattā sāyeva kathā vuccate.
tika-vin08t:1731_0: 247. Tattha bhikkhunīhi sādhāraṇāya paṭicchannāya āpattiyāti sañcarittādiāpattiyā,
tika-vin08t:1731_1: hetvatthe cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Parivasantassāti anādare sāmivacanaṃ. Pakkhamānattameva
tika-vin08t:1731_2: dātabbaṃ, na puna parivāso dātabbo bhikkhunibhāve aparivāsārahattāti adhippāyo. Mānattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1731_3: carantassāti anādareyeva sāmivacanaṃ, chārattamānatte āciṇṇeyeva parivattati, puna
tika-vin08t:1731_4: pakkhamānattameva dātabbanti. Tena vakkhati “sace ciṇṇamānattassā”tiādi. Akusalavipāke
tika-vin08t:1731_5: parikkhīṇeti purisindriyassa antaradhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Itthindriyapatiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1731_6: pana kusalavipākameva. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ubhayampi akusalena antaradhāyati,
tika-vin08t:1731_7: kusalena paṭilabbhatī”ti. Chārattaṃ mānattameva dātabbaṃ, na parivāso dātabbo, na
tika-vin08t:1732_0: “Ayaṃ pana viseso”ti vatvā taṃ visesaṃ dassetumāha “sace”tiādi. Parivāsadānaṃ natthi,
tika-vin08t:1732_1: chārattaṃ mānattameva dātabbaṃ. Kasmā? Bhikkhunikāle paṭicchannattā. Bhikkhukāle
tika-vin08t:1732_2: channāyeva hi āpatti parivāsārahā hoti, no bhikkhunikāleti ayametāsaṃ viseso. Pakkhamānattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1732_3: carantiyāti anādare sāmivacanaṃ, pakkhamānatte āciṇṇeyevāti attho. Tathā hi vakkhati
tika-vin08t:1734_0: Idāni saṅghādisesāpatti yasmā sāvasesagarukāpatti hoti satekicchā, tasmā yathā nāma
tika-vin08t:1734_1: rogāturo puggalo kiñci attano hitasukhakāraṇaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, tamenaṃ kāruṇiko
tika-vin08t:1734_2: tikicchako karuṇāsañcodito tikicchaṃ katvā gelaññato vuṭṭhāpetvā hitasukhaṃ janeti,
tika-vin08t:1734_4: sodhetuṃ na sakkoti, tamenaṃ mahākāruṇiko bhagavā mahākaruṇāya sañcoditamānaso anekehi
tika-vin08t:1734_5: nayehi āpattito vuṭṭhānaṃ katvā saggamokkhasukhe patiṭṭhapeti, bhagavato adhippāyaññuno
tika-vin08t:1734_6: aṭṭhakathācariyāpi anekehi kāraṇehi bhagavato vacanassa atthaṃ pakāsetvā visuddhakāmānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1734_7: nayaṃ denti, tathā ṭīkācariyādayopi. Evaṃ dinne pana naye yoniso manasi kātuṃ sakkontā
tika-vin08t:1734_8: paṇḍitā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjanti, asakkontā aññathā atthaṃ gahetvā na yathānusiṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1734_9: paṭipajjanti, tesaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ anugacchantā sissādayopi tatheva karonti, tasmā
tika-vin08t:1734_10: bhagavato vacanañca pubbenāparaṃ saṃsanditvā aṭṭhakathāṭīkādivacanañca sammā tulayitvā
tika-vin08t:1734_11: tathato bhagavato adhippāyaṃ ñatvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjantehi garukāpattito vuṭṭhahanatthaṃ yogo karaṇīyo.
tika-vin08t:1735_0: Tasmā yadā bhikkhū āgacchanti vinayadharassa santikaṃ “garukāpattivuṭṭhānaṃ karissāmā”ti,
tika-vin08t:1735_1: tadā vinayadharena “tvaṃ katarāpattiṃ āpanno”ti pucchitabbo. “Saṅghādisesaṃ āpanno”ti
tika-vin08t:1735_2: vutte “katarasaṅghādisesa”nti pucchitvā “imaṃ nāmā”ti vutte sukkavissaṭṭhiyaṃ mocetukāmacetanā,
tika-vin08t:1735_3: upakkamo, muccananti tīṇi aṅgāni. Kāyasaṃsagge manussitthī, itthisaññitā, kāyasaṃsaggarāgo,
tika-vin08t:1735_4: tena rāgena vāyāmo, hatthaggāhādisamāpajjananti pañca aṅgāni. Duṭṭhullavācāyaṃ manussitthī,
tika-vin08t:1735_5: itthisaññitā, duṭṭhullavācassādarāgo, tena rāgena obhāsanaṃ, taṅkhaṇavijānananti
tika-vin08t:1735_6: pañca aṅgāni. Attakāme manussitthī, itthisaññitā, attakāmapāricariyāya rāgo, tena
tika-vin08t:1735_7: rāgena vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ, taṅkhaṇavijānananti pañca aṅgāni. Sañcaritte yesu sañcarittaṃ
tika-vin08t:1735_9: pañca aṅgāni. Kuṭikāre ullittādīnaṃ aññataratā, heṭṭhimapamāṇasambhavo, adesitavatthukatā,
tika-vin08t:1735_10: pamāṇātikkantatā, attuddesikatā, vāsāgāratā, lepaghaṭanāti satta pamāṇayuttādīsu
tika-vin08t:1735_11: chadhā aṅgāni. Vihārakāre tāniyeva cha aṅgāni. Duṭṭhadose yaṃ codeti, tassa upasampannoti
tika-vin08t:1735_12: saṅkhyupagamanaṃ, tasmiṃ suddhasaññitā, yena pārājikena codeti, tassa diṭṭhādivasena
tika-vin08t:1735_13: amūlakatā, cāvanādhippāyena sammukhācodanā, tassa taṅkhaṇavijānananti pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin08t:1735_14: Aññabhāgiye aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kañcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādiyanatā, purimāni
tika-vin08t:1735_15: pañcāti cha aṅgāni. Saṅghabhede bhedāya parakkamanaṃ, dhammakammena samanubhāsanaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1735_16: kammavācāpariyosānaṃ, appaṭinissajjananti cattāri aṅgāni. Bhedānuvattake aṅgesu yathā
tika-vin08t:1735_17: tattha parakkamanaṃ, evaṃ idha anuvattananti cattāri aṅgāni. Dubbace aṅgesu yathā
tika-vin08t:1735_18: tattha parakkamanaṃ, evaṃ idha avacanīyakaraṇatāti cattāri aṅgāni. Kuladūsake aṅgesu
tika-vin08t:1735_19: yathā tattha parakkamanaṃ, evaṃ idha chandādīhi pāpananti cattāri aṅgāni. Iti imāni
tika-vin08t:1735_20: aṅgāni sodhetvā sace aṅgapāripūrī hoti, “saṅghādiseso”ti vattabbo. No ce, “nāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1735_21: saṅghādiseso, thullaccayādīsu aññatarāpattī”ti vatvā “nāyaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminī, desanāgāminī
tika-vin08t:1735_22: ayaṃ āpatti, tasmā patirūpassa bhikkhussa santike desehī”ti vatvā desāpetabbo.
tika-vin08t:1736_0: Atha pana anāpatticchāyā paññāyati, “anāpattī”ti vatvā uyyojetabbā. Sace pana saṅghādisesacchāyā
tika-vin08t:1736_1: paññāyati, “tvaṃ imaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā chādesi, na chādesī”ti pucchitvā “na chādemī”ti
tika-vin08t:1736_2: vutte “tena hi tvaṃ na parivāsāraho, mānattārahova hotī”ti vattabbo. “Chādemī”ti
tika-vin08t:1736_3: pana vutte “dasasu ākāresu aññatarakāraṇena chādesi, udāhu aññakāraṇenā”ti pucchitvā
tika-vin08t:1736_4: “dasasu aññatarakāraṇenā”ti vutte “evampi mānattāraho hoti, na parivāsāraho”ti vattabbo.
tika-vin08t:1736_5: Atha “aññakāraṇenā”ti vadati, evaṃ santepi “tvaṃ āpattiāpannabhāvaṃ jānanto paṭicchādesi,
tika-vin08t:1736_6: udāhu ajānanto”ti pucchitvā “ajānanto paṭicchādemī”ti vutte ca “āpattiāpannabhāvaṃ
tika-vin08t:1736_7: saranto paṭicchādesi, udāhu visaritvā paṭicchādesī”ti pucchitvā “visaritvā paṭicchādemī”ti
tika-vin08t:1736_8: vutte ca “āpattiāpannabhāve vematiko hutvā paṭicchādesi, udāhu nibbematiko hutvā”ti
tika-vin08t:1736_9: pucchitvā “vematiko hutvā”ti vutte ca “na tvaṃ parivāsāraho, mānattārahova hotī”ti vattabbo.
tika-vin08t:1737_0: Atha “jānanto paṭicchādemī”ti vutte ca “saranto paṭicchādemī”ti vutte ca “nibbematiko
tika-vin08t:1737_1: hutvā paṭicchādemī”ti vutte ca “tvaṃ parivāsāraho”ti vattabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ samuccayakkhandhake
tika-vin08t:1737_2: “so evaṃ vadati ‘yāyaṃ, āvuso, āpatti jānapaṭicchannā, dhammikaṃ tassā āpattiyā parivāsadānaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1737_3: dhammattā ruhati. Yā ca khvāyaṃ, āvuso, āpatti ajānappaṭicchannā, adhammikaṃ tassā
tika-vin08t:1737_4: āpattiyā parivāsadānaṃ, adhammattā na ruhati. Ekissā, āvuso, āpattiyā bhikkhu mānattāraho”’ti
tika-vin08t:1737_5: ca, “so evaṃ vadati ‘yāyaṃ āpatti saramānapaṭicchannā, dhammikaṃ tassā āpattiyā parivāsadānaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1737_6: dhammattā ruhati. Yā ca khvāyaṃ āpatti asaramānapaṭicchannā, adhammikaṃ tassā āpattiyā
tika-vin08t:1737_7: parivāsadānaṃ, adhammattā na ruhati. Ekissā, āvuso, āpattiyā bhikkhu mānattāraho”’ti
tika-vin08t:1737_8: ca, “so evaṃ vadati ‘yāyaṃ, āvuso, āpatti nibbematikapaṭicchannā, dhammikaṃ tassā
tika-vin08t:1737_9: āpattiyā parivāsadānaṃ, dhammattā ruhati. Yā ca khvāyaṃ, āvuso, āpatti vematikapaṭicchannā,
tika-vin08t:1737_10: adhammikaṃ tassā āpattiyā parivāsadānaṃ, adhammattā na ruhati. Ekissā, āvuso, āpattiyā
tika-vin08t:1738_0: Evaṃ parivāsārahabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā “ayaṃ bhikkhu parivāsāraho, tīsu parivāsesu kataraparivāsāraho”ti
tika-vin08t:1738_1: cintetvā “bhikkhu tvaṃ kati āpattiyo chādesī”ti pucchitvā “ekaṃ āpatti”nti vā “dve
tika-vin08t:1738_2: tīṇi tatuttari vā āpattiyo chādemī”ti vā vutte “katīhaṃ tvaṃ āpattiṃ paṭicchādesī”ti
tika-vin08t:1738_3: pucchitvā “ekāhamevāhaṃ paṭicchādemī”ti vā “dvīhaṃ tīhaṃ tatuttari vā paṭicchādemī”ti
tika-vin08t:1738_4: vā vutte “yāvatīhaṃ paṭicchādesi, tāvatīhaṃ tvaṃ paṭivasissasī”ti vattabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-vin08t:1738_5: bhagavatā “yāvatīhaṃ jānaṃ paṭicchādeti, tāvatīhaṃ tena bhikkhunā akāmā parivatthabba”nti.
tika-vin08t:1738_6: Tato “ayaṃ bhikkhu āpattipariyantaṃ jānāti, tasmā paṭicchannaparivāsāraho”ti ñatvā
tika-vin08t:1739_0: Ettha ca āpattipariyantapucchanaṃ kammavācākaraṇatthameva hoti, rattipariyantapucchanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1739_1: pana tadatthañceva suddhantaparivāsassa ananurūpabhāvadassanatthañca hoti. Vuttañhi
tika-vin08t:1739_2: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “so duvidho cūḷasuddhanto mahāsuddhantoti, duvidhopi cesa rattiparicchedaṃ
tika-vin08t:1739_3: sakalaṃ vā ekaccaṃ vā ajānantassa ca asarantassa ca tattha vematikassa ca dātabbo.
tika-vin08t:1739_4: Āpattipariyantaṃ pana ‘ahaṃ ettakā āpattiyo āpanno’ti jānātu vā, mā vā, akāraṇameta”nti.
tika-vin08t:1739_5: Tato tassa bhikkhuno nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ jānitabbaṃ. Duvidhañhi nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ anikkhittavattena
tika-vin08t:1740_0: Tattha appabhikkhuke vihāre sabhāgabhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne upacārasīmāparicchinno
tika-vin08t:1740_1: antovihāro anikkhittavattena nisīditabbaṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Upacārasīmaṃ atikkamma mahāmaggato
tika-vin08t:1740_2: okkamma gumbavatipaṭicchannaṭṭhānaṃ nikkhittavattena nisīditabbaṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Vuttañhi
tika-vin08t:1740_3: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sace appabhikkhuko vihāro hoti, sabhāgā bhikkhū vasanti, vattaṃ anikkhipitvā
tika-vin08t:1740_4: vihāreyeva rattipariggaho kātabbo. Atha na sakkā sodhetuṃ, vuttanayeneva vattaṃ nikkhipitvā
tika-vin08t:1740_5: paccūsasamaye ekena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ mānattavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva upacārasīmaṃ
tika-vin08t:1740_6: atikkamitvā mahāmaggā okkamma paṭicchannaṭṭhāne nisīditvā antoaruṇeyeva vuttanayeneva
tika-vin08t:1740_7: vattaṃ samādiyitvā tassa bhikkhuno parivāso ārocetabbo”ti. “Mānattavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayenevā”ti
tika-vin08t:1740_8: ca “sace appabhikkhuko vihāro hoti, sabhāgā bhikkhū vasanti, vattaṃ anikkhipitvā
tika-vin08t:1740_9: antovihāreyeva rattiyo gaṇetabbā. Atha na sakkā sodhetuṃ, vuttanayeneva vattaṃ nikkhipitvā
tika-vin08t:1740_10: paccūsasamaye catūhi pañcahi vā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ parikkhittassa vihārassa parikkhepato,
tika-vin08t:1740_11: aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā mahāmaggato okkamma
tika-vin08t:1740_12: gumbena vā vatiyā vā paṭicchannaṭṭhāne nisīditabba”nti idaṃ vacanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1741_0: Tattha appabhikkhuko vihāro hotīti idaṃ bahubhikkhuke vihāre aññe bhikkhū gacchanti,
tika-vin08t:1741_1: aññe bhikkhū āgacchanti, tasmā ratticchedavattabhedakāraṇāni sodhetuṃ dukkarattā
tika-vin08t:1741_2: vuttaṃ. Vakkhati hi “atha na sakkā sodhetu”nti. Sabhāgā bhikkhū vasantīti idaṃ visabhāgānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1741_3: verībhikkhūnaṃ santike vattaṃ ārocento pakāsetukāmo hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ. Vuttañhi
tika-vin08t:1741_4: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tasmā averisabhāgassa santike ārocetabbā. Yo pana visabhāgo hoti sutvā
tika-vin08t:1741_5: pakāsetukāmo, evarūpassa upajjhāyassapi santike nārocetabbā”ti, tasmā visabhāgānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1741_6: vasanaṭṭhāne vattaṃ asamādiyitvā bahiyeva kātumpi vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vihāreyevāti
tika-vin08t:1741_7: antoupacārasīmāyameva. Vakkhati hi “atha na sakkā…pe… upacārasīmaṃ atikkamitvā”ti.
tika-vin08t:1741_8: Rattipariggaho kātabboti rattigaṇanā kātabbā. Vuttañhi mānattavaṇṇanāyaṃ “rattiyo
tika-vin08t:1741_9: gaṇetabbā”ti. Atha na sakkā sodhetunti bahubhikkhukattā vā vihārassa visabhāgānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1741_10: vasanaṭṭhānattā vā ratticchedavattābhedakāraṇānipi sodhetuṃ na sakkā. Vattaṃ nikkhipitvāti
tika-vin08t:1741_11: parivāsavattaṃ nikkhipitvā. Paccūsasamayeti pacchimayāmakāle aruṇodayato puretarameva.
tika-vin08t:1741_12: Tathā hi vakkhati “antoaruṇeyeva vuttanayena vattaṃ samādiyitvā tassa bhikkhuno parivāso
tika-vin08t:1741_13: ārocetabbo”ti. Ekena bhikkhunā saddhinti vippavāsaratticchedavimuccanatthaṃ vinā
tika-vin08t:1741_15: vuttaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “na, bhikkhave, pārivāsikena bhikkhunā sabhikkhukā āvāsā
tika-vin08t:1741_16: abhikkhuko anāvāso gantabbo aññatra pakatattena aññatra antarāyā”ti.
tika-vin08t:1742_1: parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā”ti vuttanayena. Yadi evaṃ visamamidaṃ
tika-vin08t:1742_2: nayadassanaṃ, parikkhepaparikkhepārahaṭṭhāne eva hi upacārasīmā hoti, kasmā tattha
tika-vin08t:1742_3: upacārasīmato dveleḍḍupātātikkamo vutto, idha pana upacārasīmātikkamo evāti? Saccaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1742_4: tathāpi vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ sajjhāyādisaddasavanasabbhāvato suvidūrātikkamo vutto,
tika-vin08t:1742_5: idha pana upacārasīmato atikkamamattopi atikkamoyevāti katvā vutto. Buddhamataññuno
tika-vin08t:1742_6: hi aṭṭhakathācariyā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ “parikkhittassa vihārassa
tika-vin08t:1742_7: parikkhepatotiādi kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ natthi, atha kho aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ vacanena tathā
tika-vin08t:1743_0: Mānattavaṇṇanāyaṃ catūhi pañcahi vā bhikkhūhi saddhinti idaṃ pana ūnegaṇecaraṇaratticchedavimuccanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1743_1: vuttaṃ. Dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvātiādi aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ savanūpacāradassanūpacāravijahanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1743_2: vuttaṃ. Tenevāha ṭīkācariyo “dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvāti idaṃ vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ sajjhāyādisaddasavanūpacāravijahanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1743_3: vuttaṃ, ‘mahāmaggato okkammāti idaṃ maggapaṭipannānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ savanūpacāravijahanatthaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1743_4: gumbena vātiādi dassanūpacāravijahanattha”nti. Tasmā yathāvuttaṃ duvidhaṃ ṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1743_5: parivasantamānattacārikabhikkhūhi nisīditabbaṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Tesu ca yadi antovihāreyeva
tika-vin08t:1743_6: nisīditvā parivasati, upacārasīmagatānaṃ sabbesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocetabbaṃ hoti. Atha
tika-vin08t:1743_7: bahiupacārasīmāyaṃ, diṭṭharūpānaṃ sutasaddānaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Adiṭṭhaasutānampi antodvādasahatthagatānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1743_8: ārocetabbameva. Vuttañhi vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ “vattaṃ nikkhipitvā vasantassa upacārasīmagatānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1743_9: sabbesaṃ ārocanakiccaṃ natthi, diṭṭharūpānaṃ sutasaddānaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Adiṭṭhaassutānampi
tika-vin08t:1743_10: antodvādasahatthagatānaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Idaṃ vattaṃ nikkhipitvā vasantassa lakkhaṇanti
tika-vin08t:1743_11: vutta”nti. Idañca vattaṃ anikkhipitvā vasantassa antovihāreyeva rattipariggahassa
tika-vin08t:1743_12: ca nikkhipitvā vasantassa upacārasīmaṃ atikkamitvā vattasamādānassa ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1743_13: vuttattā vuttaṃ. Upacāro pana antosīmāya ṭhitānaṃ sakalaupacārasīmā hoti, bahiupacārasīmāya
tika-vin08t:1743_14: ṭhitānaṃ dvādasahatthamattaṃ. Teneva hi uddesabhattādisaṅghalābho yadi antosīmāya
tika-vin08t:1743_15: uppajjati, sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghassa hoti. Yadi bahisīmāyaṃ, dvādasahatthabbhantare pattabhikkhūnaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1743_16: tasmā upacāravasenapi esa attho viññāyati. Tathā hi vuttaṃ vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ “atthibhāvaṃ
tika-vin08t:1743_17: sallakkhetvāti dvādasahatthe upacāre sallakkhetvā anikkhittavattānaṃ upacārasīmāya
tika-vin08t:1743_18: āgatabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā sahavāsādikaṃ veditabbanti ca vutta”nti.
tika-vin08t:1744_0: Evaṃ anikkhittavattānaṃ hutvā parivasantānaṃ antovihāreyeva vasanassa, nikkhittavattānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1744_1: hutvā parivasantānaṃ vihārato bahi dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā vasanassa ca aṭṭhakathādīsu
tika-vin08t:1744_2: pakaraṇesu āgatattā tathāgatanayo pakaraṇāgatanayo hoti. Idāni pana ācariyā anikkhittavattassa
tika-vin08t:1744_3: ca ratticchedavattabhedadose pariharituṃ atidukkarattā, nikkhittavattassa ca devasikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1744_4: paccūsasamaye bahisīmagamanassa dukkhattā, vāḷasarīsapādiparisayassa ca āsaṅkitabbabhāvato
tika-vin08t:1745_0: Ekacce ācariyā bahiupacārasīmāyaṃ patirūpaṭṭhāne pakatattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasanasālaṃ
tika-vin08t:1745_1: kārāpetvā pārivāsikabhikkhūnaṃ nipajjanamañcaṃ sabbato channaparicchinnaṃ sadvārabandhanaṃ
