tika-vin08t:1745_2: suguttaṃ kārāpetvā taṃ padesaṃ vatiyā parikkhipāpetvā sāyanhasamaye tattha gantvā
tika-vin08t:1745_3: upaṭṭhākasāmaṇerādayo nivattāpetvā purimayāme vā majjhimayāme vā samantato saddachijjanakāle
tika-vin08t:1745_4: pakatattabhikkhū sālāyaṃ nipajjāpetvā pārivāsikabhikkhū vattaṃ samādāpetvā ārocāpetvā
tika-vin08t:1745_5: attano attano mañcakesu nipajjāpetvā pacchimayāmakāle uṭṭhāpetvā aruṇe uṭṭhite ārocāpetvā
tika-vin08t:1745_6: vattaṃ nikkhipāpenti. Esa nayo pakaraṇesu anāgatattā ācariyānaṃ matena katattā ācariyanayo
tika-vin08t:1745_7: nāma. Esa nayopi yathārutato pakaraṇesu anāgatopi pakaraṇānulomavasena ratticchedavattabhedadose
tika-vin08t:1745_8: pariharitvā lajjipesalehi bahussutehi sikkhākāmehi vinaye pakataññūhi vicārito samāno
tika-vin08t:1745_9: sundaro pasatthova hoti, tasmā “anulomanayo”tipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:1746_0: Nanu ca anikkhittavattānaṃyeva antovihāre vasanaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, atha kasmā
tika-vin08t:1746_1: nikkhittavattāpi samānā vasantīti? Saccaṃ, tattha pana appabhikkhukattā sabhāgabhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1746_2: vasanaṭṭhānattā ca ratticchedavattabhedadose ca pariharituṃ sakkuṇeyyabhāvato sakalarattindivampi
tika-vin08t:1746_3: vattaṃ anikkhipitvā vasanaṃ vuttaṃ, idha pana tathā asakkuṇeyyabhāvato divā vattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1746_4: nikkhipitvā rattiyaṃ samādiyanto āgantukānaṃ anāgamanakālabhāvato, saddachijjanakālabhāvato
tika-vin08t:1746_5: ca ratticchedādidose pariharituṃ sakkuṇeyyattā tadanulomoyeva hotīti mantvā ācariyā
tika-vin08t:1747_0: Evaṃ hotu, bahiupacārasīmāya vasantānaṃ paṭicchannaṭṭhāne nisīdanameva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1747_1: vuttaṃ, na pakatattasālākaraṇamañcakaraṇādīni, atha kasmā etāni karontīti? Saccaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1747_2: tathāpi pakatattasālākaraṇaṃ pārivāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pakatattehi bhikkhūhi vippavāsaratticchedavattabhedadosapariharaṇatthaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1747_3: taṃ “tayo kho, upāli, pārivāsikassa bhikkhuno ratticchedā sahavāso, vippavāso, anārocanā”ti
tika-vin08t:1747_5: taṃ “na, bhikkhave, pārivāsikena bhikkhunā pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchanne
tika-vin08t:1747_6: āvāse vatthabbaṃ, na ekacchanne anāvāse vatthabbaṃ, na ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse
tika-vin08t:1747_7: vā vatthabba”nti vuttapāṭhañca yathāvuttapāṭhañca anulometi. Ādi-saddena sāyanhasamaye
tika-vin08t:1747_8: gamanādīni saṅgaṇhāti. Tesu aṭṭhakathāyaṃ paccūsasamaye gamane eva vuttepi sāyanhasamaye
tika-vin08t:1747_9: gamanaṃ rattigamanassa bahuparissayattā parissayavinodanatthaṃ, taṃ “antarāyato parimuccanatthāya
tika-vin08t:1747_10: gantabbamevā”ti vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāpāṭhaṃ anulometi. Upaṭṭhākasāmaṇerādīnaṃ nivattāpanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1747_11: anupasampannena sahaseyyasaṅkānivattanatthaṃ, taṃ “yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannena
tika-vin08t:1747_12: sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiya”nti vuttaṃ mātikāpāṭhaṃ anulometi. Purimayāme vā majjhimayāme
tika-vin08t:1747_13: vā samantato saddachijjanakāle pakatattabhikkhū sālāyaṃ nipajjāpetvā pārivāsikabhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1748_0: Nanu ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ antoaruṇeyeva vattasamādāpanaṃ vuttaṃ, atha kasmā “purimayāmamajjhimayāmesū”ti
tika-vin08t:1748_1: vuttanti? Nāyaṃ doso, hiyyoaruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya hi yāva ajjaaruṇuggamanā eko rattindivo
tika-vin08t:1748_2: ajjaaruṇassa anto nāma, ajjaaruṇato paṭṭhāya pacchākālo aruṇassa bahi nāma, tasmā
tika-vin08t:1748_3: purimamajjhimayāmesu katavattasamādānampi aruṇodayato pure katattā antoaruṇe kataṃyeva
tika-vin08t:1748_4: hoti. Vattaṃ asamādiyitvā nipajjane ca sati niddāvasena aruṇuggamanakālaṃ ajānitvā
tika-vin08t:1748_5: vattasamādānaṃ atikkantaṃ bhaveyya, tasmā puretarameva samādānaṃ katvā nipajjanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1748_6: ñāyāgataṃ hoti, “antoaruṇeyeva vuttanayeneva vattaṃ samādiyitvā”ti vuttaaṭṭhakathāpāṭhañca anulometi.
tika-vin08t:1749_0: Evaṃ hotu, evaṃ santepi kasmā “ārocāpetvā”ti vuttaṃ, nanu māḷakasīmāyaṃ samādinnakāleyeva
tika-vin08t:1749_1: vattamārocitanti? Saccaṃ ārocitaṃ, ayaṃ pana bhikkhu divā vattaṃ nikkhipitvā nisinno,
tika-vin08t:1749_2: idāni samādinno, tasmā māḷakasīmāya ārocitampi puna ārocetabbaṃ hoti. Idampi “antoaruṇeyeva
tika-vin08t:1749_3: vuttanayeneva vattaṃ samādiyitvā tassa bhikkhuno parivāso ārocetabbo”ti pāṭhaṃ anulometi.
tika-vin08t:1749_4: Atha “attano attano mañcakesu nipajjāpetvā”ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu aññamaññassa mañcesu
tika-vin08t:1749_5: nipajjamānāpi pakatattasālato nibbodakapatanaṭṭhānato bahi nipajjamānā sahavāsaratticchedadosato
tika-vin08t:1749_6: muttāyevāti? Na panevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi pārivāsiko pakatattabhikkhūheva ekacchanne
tika-vin08t:1749_7: nipanno sahavāsaratticchedappatto hoti, atha kho aññamaññampi hotiyeva. Vuttañcetaṃ
tika-vin08t:1749_8: samantapāsādikāyaṃ “sace hi dve pārivāsikā ekato vaseyyuṃ, te aññamaññassa ajjhācāraṃ
tika-vin08t:1749_9: ñatvā agāravā vā vippaṭisārino vā hutvā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ vā āpattiṃ āpajjeyyuṃ vibbhameyyuṃ
tika-vin08t:1749_10: vā, tasmā nesaṃ sahaseyyā sabbappakārena paṭikkhittā”ti. “Pacchimayāmakāle uṭṭhāpetvā
tika-vin08t:1749_11: aruṇe uṭṭhite ārocāpetvā vattaṃ nikkhipāpentī”ti ettha aruṇe anuṭṭhiteyeva vattanikkhipane
tika-vin08t:1749_12: kariyamāne ratticchedo hoti, sā ratti gaṇanūpagā na hoti, tasmā paṭhamaparicchede
tika-vin08t:1749_13: vuttaṃ aruṇakathāvinicchayaṃ oloketvā aruṇuggamanabhāvo suṭṭhu jānitabbo.
tika-vin08t:1750_0: “Ārocāpetvā vattaṃ nikkhipāpetabba”nti vuttaṃ. Kasmā ārocāpeti, nanu samādinnakāleyeva
tika-vin08t:1750_1: ārocitanti? Saccaṃ, tathāpi pārivāsikavattasamādānakāle ārocitesu bhikkhūsu ekacce
tika-vin08t:1750_2: nikkhipanakāle gacchanti, aññe āgacchanti, evaṃ parisasaṅkamanampi siyā, tathā ca
tika-vin08t:1750_3: sati abhinavāgatānaṃ sabbhāvā ārocetabbaṃ hoti, asati pana abhinavāgatabhikkhumhi
tika-vin08t:1750_4: ārocanakiccaṃ natthi. Evaṃ santepi ārocane dosābhāvato puna ārocanaṃ ñāyāgataṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t:1750_5: mānattacaraṇakāle pana samādāne ārocitepi nikkhipane avassaṃ ārocetabbameva. Kasmā?
tika-vin08t:1750_6: Divasantarabhāvato. “Devasikaṃ ārocetabba”nti hi vuttaṃ. Evaṃ santepi sāyaṃ samādānakāle
tika-vin08t:1750_7: ārocessati, tasmā nikkhipane ārocanakiccaṃ natthīti ce? Na, sāyaṃ samādānakāle ete
tika-vin08t:1750_8: bhikkhū āgacchissantipi, na āgacchissantipi, anāgatānaṃ kathaṃ ārocetuṃ labhissati,
tika-vin08t:1750_9: anārocane ca sati ratticchedo siyā, tasmā tasmiṃ divase aruṇe uṭṭhite vattanikkhipanato
tika-vin08t:1750_10: pureyeva ārocetabbanti no mati, suṭṭhutaraṃ upadhāretvā gahetabbaṃ. Evaṃ pakaraṇāgatanayena
tika-vin08t:1750_11: vā pakaraṇānulomaācariyanayena vā sammāsambuddhassa āṇaṃ patiṭṭhāpentena vinayakovidena
tika-vin08t:1750_12: bahussutena lajjīpesalabhūtena vinayadharena visuddhikāmānaṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1751_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne lajjībhikkhūnaṃ parivāsādikathāya kusalatthaṃ nānāvādanayo vuccate
tika-vin08t:1751_1: – keci bhikkhū “pakatattasālaṃ kurumānena tassā sālāya majjhe thambhaṃ nimittaṃ katvā
tika-vin08t:1751_2: tato dvādasahatthamattaṃ padesaṃ sallakkhetvā yathā paññatte pārivāsikānaṃ mañce
tika-vin08t:1751_3: nipannassa bhikkhussa gīvā tassa padesassa upari hoti, tathā paññāpetabbo. Evaṃ kate
tika-vin08t:1751_4: sukataṃ hotī”ti vadanti karonti ca. Ekacce “mañce nipannassa bhikkhussa kaṭi tassa
tika-vin08t:1751_5: padesassa upari hoti, yathā paññāpetabbo, evaṃ kate sukataṃ hotī”ti vadanti karonti
tika-vin08t:1751_6: ca, taṃ vacanaṃ neva pāḷiyaṃ, na aṭṭhakathāṭīkādīsu vijjati, kevalaṃ tesaṃ parikappameva.
tika-vin08t:1751_7: Ayaṃ pana nesaṃ adhippāyo siyā – “dvādasahatthaṃ pana upacāraṃ muñcitvā nisīdituṃ
tika-vin08t:1751_8: vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttavacanañca “atha dvādasahatthaṃ upacāraṃ okkamitvā ajānantasseva
tika-vin08t:1751_9: gacchati, ratticchedo hoti eva, vattabhedo pana natthī”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanañca “adiṭṭhaassutānampi
tika-vin08t:1751_11: ārocetabbaṃ, ‘idaṃ vattaṃ nikkhipitvā vasantassa lakkhaṇa’nti vutta”nti vuttavajirabuddhiṭīkāvacanañca
tika-vin08t:1751_13: upacārasīmāya āgatabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā sahavāsādikaṃ veditabba”nti vuttaṃ vajirabuddhiṭīkāvacanañca
tika-vin08t:1751_14: passitvā ayoniso atthaṃ gahetvā sabbattha dvādasahatthameva pamāṇaṃ, tato ūnampi
tika-vin08t:1751_15: adhikampi na vaṭṭati, tasmā yathāvuttanayena majjhe thambhato dvādasahatthamatte
tika-vin08t:1751_16: padese nipannassa bhikkhussa gīvā vā kaṭi vā hotu, evaṃ sante dvādasahatthappadese
tika-vin08t:1751_17: pārivāsikabhikkhu hoti, tato sahavāsato vā vippavāsato vā ratticchedavattabhedadosā na hontīti.
tika-vin08t:1752_0: Tatrevaṃ yuttāyuttavicāraṇā kātabbā. Yathāvuttapāṭhesu paṭhamapāṭhassa ayamadhippāyo
tika-vin08t:1752_1: – pakatattabhikkhumhi chamāya nisinne yadi pārivāsikabhikkhu āsane nisīditukāmo,
tika-vin08t:1752_2: pakatattassa bhikkhuno nisinnaṭṭhānato dvādasahatthaṃ upacāraṃ muñcitvāva nisīdituṃ
tika-vin08t:1752_3: vaṭṭati, na dvādasahatthabbhantareti. Etena dvīsupi chamāya nisinnesu dvādasahatthabbhantarepi
tika-vin08t:1752_4: vaṭṭati, dvādasahatthappadesato bahi nisīdanto āsanepi nisīdituṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:1752_5: Tenāha “na chamāya nisinneti pakatatte bhūmiyaṃ nisinne itarena antamaso tiṇasantharepi
tika-vin08t:1752_6: uccatare vālikatalepi vā na nisīditabbaṃ, dvādasahatthaṃ pana upacāraṃ muñcitvā nisīdituṃ
tika-vin08t:1752_7: vaṭṭatī”ti. Iti pakatatte chamāya nisinne pārivāsikena nisīditabbaṭṭhānadīpako ayaṃ
tika-vin08t:1752_8: pāṭho, na mañcapaññāpanaṭṭhānasayanaṭṭhānadīpako, taṃ pubbāparaparipuṇṇaṃ sakalaṃ
tika-vin08t:1752_9: pāṭhaṃ anoloketvā ekadesamattameva passitvā parikappavasena ayoniso adhippāyaṃ gaṇhanti.
tika-vin08t:1753_0: Dutiyapāṭhassa pana ayamadhippāyo – bahi upacārasīmāya paṭicchannaṭṭhāne vattaṃ samādiyitvā
tika-vin08t:1753_1: nisinne bhikkhusmiṃ tassa nisinnaṭṭhānato dvādasahatthaṃ upacāraṃ okkamitvā tassa
tika-vin08t:1753_2: ajānantasseva añño bhikkhu gacchati, tassa pārivāsikassa bhikkhuno ratticchedo hoti,
tika-vin08t:1753_3: vattabhedo pana natthi. Kasmā ratticchedo hoti? Upacāraṃ okkamitattā. Kasmā na vattabhedo?
tika-vin08t:1753_4: Ajānantattāti. Etena bahiupacārasīmāya upacāro dvādasahatthappamāṇo hoti ārocanakkhettabhūtoti
tika-vin08t:1753_5: dasseti. Tenāha “gumbena vā vatiyā vā paṭicchannaṭṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ, antoaruṇeyeva
tika-vin08t:1753_6: vuttanayena vattaṃ samādiyitvā ārocetabbaṃ. Sace añño koci bhikkhu kenacideva karaṇīyena
tika-vin08t:1753_7: taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchati, sace esa taṃ passati, saddaṃ vāssa suṇāti, ārocetabbaṃ. Anārocentassa
tika-vin08t:1753_8: ratticchedo ceva vattabhedo ca. Atha dvādasahatthaṃ upacāraṃ okkamitvā ajānantasseva
tika-vin08t:1753_9: gacchati, ratticchedo hoti eva, vattabhedo pana natthī”ti. Iti ayampi pāṭho ārocanakkhettadīpako
tika-vin08t:1754_0: Tatiyapāṭhassa pana ayamadhippāyo – kiṃ bahiupacārasīmāya vattasamādānaṭṭhānaṃ āgatabhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1754_1: diṭṭharūpānaṃ sutasaddānaṃyeva ārocetabbanti pucchāya sati adiṭṭhaassutānampi antodvādasahatthagatānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1754_2: ārocetabbanti vissajjetabbanti. Etena adiṭṭhaassutānaṃ pana antodvādasahatthagatānaṃyeva
tika-vin08t:1754_3: ārocetabbaṃ, na bahidvādasahatthagatānaṃ, diṭṭhasutānaṃ pana antodvādasahatthagatānampi
tika-vin08t:1754_5: panettha therassa adhippāyo – vattaṃ nikkhipitvā parivasantassa upacāragatānaṃ sabbesaṃ
tika-vin08t:1754_6: ārocanakiccaṃ natthi, diṭṭharūpānaṃ sutasaddānaṃ ārocetabbaṃ, adiṭṭhaassutānampi
tika-vin08t:1754_7: antodvādasahatthagatānaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Idaṃ vattaṃ nikkhipitvā parivasantassa lakkhaṇa”nti.
tika-vin08t:1754_8: Iti ayampi pāṭho ārocetabbalakkhaṇadīpako hoti, na mañcapaññāpanādidīpakoti. Catutthapāṭhassa
tika-vin08t:1755_0: Pañcamapāṭhassa pana ayamadhippāyo – atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvāti ettha etasmiṃ aṭṭhakathāvacane
tika-vin08t:1755_1: nikkhittavattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ attano nisinnaṭṭhānato dvādasahatthe upacāre aññesaṃ
tika-vin08t:1755_2: bhikkhūnaṃ atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā anikkhittavattānaṃ upacārasīmāya aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1755_3: āgatabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā sahavāsādikaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ādi-saddena vippavāsaanārocanaūnegaṇecaraṇāni
tika-vin08t:1755_4: saṅgaṇhāti. Ayañca yasmā gaṇassa ārocetvā bhikkhūnañca atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā vasi,
tika-vin08t:1755_5: tasmā nikkhittavattānaṃ bahiupacārasīmāya samādinnattā attano nisinnaṭṭhānato dvādasahatthe
tika-vin08t:1755_6: upacāre aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā anikkhittavattānaṃ antovihāre
tika-vin08t:1755_7: samādinnattā upacārasīmāya aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā sahavāsavippavāsaanārocanaūnegaṇecaraṇasaṅkhātāni
tika-vin08t:1755_8: vattacchedakāraṇāni veditabbānīti. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ayañca yasmā gaṇassa ārocetvā
tika-vin08t:1755_9: bhikkhūnañca atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvāva vasi, tenassa ūnegaṇecaraṇadoso vā vippavāso
tika-vin08t:1755_10: vā na hotī”ti. Iti ayañca pāṭho pakatattabhikkhūsu gatesupi vattaṃ ārocetvā bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1755_11: atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā vasitattā dosābhāvameva dīpeti, na mañcapaññāpanādīni. Iti
tika-vin08t:1755_12: imesaṃ pāṭhānaṃ ayoniso adhippāyaṃ gahetvā “sabbattha dvādasahatthameva pamāṇa”nti
tika-vin08t:1755_13: maññamānā vicāriṃsu, tesaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjamānā sissānusissādayopi tatheva karonti, tadetaṃ appamāṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1756_0: Kathaṃ? Yaṃ tattha pakatattasālāya majjhe thambhaṃ nimittaṃ katvā dvādasahatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1756_1: miniṃsu, tadappamāṇaṃ. Na hi thambhena vā sālāya vā sahavāso vā vippavāso vā vutto,
tika-vin08t:1756_2: atha kho pakatattabhikkhunāva. Vuttañhi samantapāsādikāyaṃ “tattha sahavāsoti yvāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1756_3: pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchannetiādinā nayena vutto ekato vāso. Vippavāsoti
tika-vin08t:1756_4: ekakasseva vāso”ti. Yañhi tato dvādasahatthamattaṭṭhāne bhikkhussa gīvāṭṭhapanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1756_5: vā kaṭiṭṭhapanaṃ vā vadanti, tadapi appamāṇaṃ. Bahiupacārasīmāya hi parivasantassa
tika-vin08t:1756_6: bhikkhussa sakalasarīraṃ pakatattabhikkhūnaṃ antodvādasahatthe upacāre ṭhapetabbaṃ
tika-vin08t:1757_0: Tesaṃ pana ayamadhippāyo siyā – dvādasahatthappadesato sakalasarīrassa antokaraṇe
tika-vin08t:1757_1: sati sahavāso bhaveyya, bahikaraṇe sati vippavāso, tena upaḍḍhaṃ anto upaḍḍhaṃ bahi
tika-vin08t:1757_2: hotūti, taṃ micchāñāṇavasena hoti. Na hi sahavāsadoso dvādasahatthena kathito, atha
tika-vin08t:1757_3: kho ekacchanne sayanena. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā pārivāsikakkhandhake “na, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:1757_4: pārivāsikena bhikkhunā pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchanne āvāse vatthabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1757_5: na ekacchanne anāvāse vatthabbaṃ, na ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vatthabba”nti.
tika-vin08t:1757_6: Aṭṭhakathāyampi vuttaṃ “ekacchanne āvāse”tiādīsu āvāso nāma vasanatthāya katasenāsanaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1757_7: Anāvāso nāma cetiyagharaṃ bodhigharaṃ sammuñjaniaṭṭako dāruaṭṭako pānīyamāḷo vaccakuṭi
tika-vin08t:1757_8: dvārakoṭṭhakoti evamādi. Tatiyapadena tadubhayampi gahitaṃ, ‘etesu yattha katthaci
tika-vin08t:1757_9: ekacchanne chadanato udakapatanaṭṭhānaparicchinne okāse ukkhittako vasituṃ na labhati,
tika-vin08t:1757_10: pārivāsiko pana antoāvāseyeva na labhatī’ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1757_11: pana ‘avisesena udakapātena vārita’nti vuttaṃ. Kurundiyaṃ ‘etesu ettakesu pañcavaṇṇachadanabaddhaṭṭhānesu
tika-vin08t:1757_12: pārivāsikassa ca ukkhittakassa ca pakatattena saddhiṃ udakapātena vārita’nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1757_13: tasmā nānūpacārepi ekacchanne na vaṭṭati. Sace panettha tadahupasampannepi pakatatte
tika-vin08t:1757_14: paṭhamaṃ pavisitvā nipanne saṭṭhivassopi pārivāsiko pacchā pavisitvā jānanto nipajjati,
tika-vin08t:1757_15: ratticchedo ceva vattabhedadukkaṭañca, ajānantassa ratticchedova, na vattabhedadukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1757_16: Sace pana tasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ nipanne pacchā pakatatto pavisitvā nipajjati, pārivāsiko
tika-vin08t:1757_17: ca jānāti, ratticchedo ceva vattabhedadukkaṭañca. No ce jānāti, ratticchedova, na
tika-vin08t:1757_18: vattabhedadukkaṭanti, tasmā sālāyapi vihārepi chadanato udakapatanaṭṭhānato muttamatteyeva
tika-vin08t:1758_0: Ekacce pana majjhimatthambhato dvādasahatthāyāmena daṇḍakena cakkaṃ bhamitvā samantato
tika-vin08t:1758_1: bāhire lekhaṃ karonti, evaṃ kate sā bāhiralekhā āvaṭṭato dvāsattatihatthamattā hoti,
tika-vin08t:1758_2: tato taṃ padesaṃ dvādasahatthena daṇḍakena minitvā bhājiyamānaṃ chabhāgameva hoti,
tika-vin08t:1758_3: tato tesaṃ chabhāgānaṃ sīmāya ekekasmiṃ mañce paññapiyamāne chaḷeva mañcaṭṭhānāni
tika-vin08t:1758_4: honti, tasmā ekasmiṃ vaṭṭamaṇḍale cha bhikkhūyeva apubbaṃ acarimaṃ vasituṃ labhanti,
tika-vin08t:1758_5: na tato uddhanti vadanti. Kasmā pana evaṃ karontīti? Pubbe vuttanayena “sabbattha
tika-vin08t:1758_6: dvādasahatthamattameva pamāṇa”nti gahitattā. Evaṃ kira nesamadhippāyo – pārivāsiko
tika-vin08t:1758_7: pakatattassa bhikkhuno dvādasahatthabbhantare sayamāno sahavāso siyā, bāhire sayamāno
tika-vin08t:1758_8: vippavāso, tathā aññamaññassapīti. Evaṃ karontānaṃ pana nesaṃ sakaadhippāyopi na
tika-vin08t:1759_0: Kathaṃ? Pārivāsiko bhikkhu pakatattabhikkhūnañca aññamaññassa ca dvādasahatthamatte
tika-vin08t:1759_1: padese hotūti nesamadhippāyo. Atha pana majjhimatthambhaṃ nimittaṃ katvā miniyamānā
tika-vin08t:1759_2: samantato bāhiralekhā thambhatoyeva dvādasahatthamattā hoti, na pakatattabhikkhūhi.
tika-vin08t:1759_3: Te hi thambhato bahi ekaratanadvitiratanādiṭṭhāne ṭhitā, bāhiratopi lekhāyeva thambhato
tika-vin08t:1759_4: dvādasahatthamattā hoti, na tassūpari nipannabhikkhu. So hi dviratanamattenapi tiratanamattenapi
tika-vin08t:1759_5: lekhāya antopi hoti bahipi. Aññamaññassapi chabhāgasīmāyeva aññamaññassa dvādasahatthamattā
tika-vin08t:1759_6: hoti, na tassūpari paññattamañco vā tattha nipannabhikkhu vā. Mañco hi ekaratanamattena
tika-vin08t:1759_7: vā dviratanamattena vā sīmaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhito, bhikkhūpi sayamānā na sīmāya upariyeva
tika-vin08t:1759_8: sayanti, vidatthimattena vā ratanamattena vā sīmaṃ atikkamitvā vā appatvā vā sayanti,
tika-vin08t:1759_9: tasmā te pārivāsikā bhikkhū pakatattabhikkhūnampi aññamaññassapi dvādasahatthamattaṭṭhāyino
tika-vin08t:1759_10: na honti, tato ūnāva honti, tasmā sakaadhippāyopi na sijjhati.
tika-vin08t:1760_0: Bhagavato pana adhippāyo – yadi appabhikkhukādiaṅgasampannattā vihārassa vattaṃ anikkhipitvā
tika-vin08t:1760_1: antovihāreyeva parivasati, evaṃ sati pakatattena bhikkhunā na ekacchanne āvāse vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1760_2: Yadi tādisaāvāse vā anāvāse vā chadanato udakapatanaṭṭhānassa anto sayeyya, sahavāso
tika-vin08t:1760_3: nāma, ratticchedo hotīti ayamattho yathāvutta-pāḷiyā ca aṭṭhakathāya ca pakāsetabbo.
tika-vin08t:1760_4: Na ekacchanne āvāse dvīhi vatthabbaṃ. Yadi vaseyya, vuḍḍhassa ratticchedoyeva, navakassa
tika-vin08t:1760_5: ratticchedo ceva vattabhedadukkaṭañca hoti. Samavassā ce, ajānantassa ratticchedoyeva,
tika-vin08t:1760_6: jānantassa ubhayampīti ayamattho “tayo kho, upāli, pārivāsikassa bhikkhuno ratticchedā
tika-vin08t:1760_7: sahavāso vippavāso anārocanā”ti ca “na, bhikkhave, pārivāsikena bhikkhunā pārivāsikena
tika-vin08t:1760_8: vuḍḍhatarena saddhiṃ na ekacchanne āvāse vatthabba”nti ca “vuḍḍhatarenāti ettha…pe…
tika-vin08t:1760_9: sace hi dve pārivāsikā ekato vaseyyuṃ, te aññamaññassa ajjhācāraṃ ñatvā agāravā vā
tika-vin08t:1760_10: vippaṭisārino vā hutvā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ vā āpattiṃ āpajjeyyuṃ vibbhameyyuṃ vā, tasmā
tika-vin08t:1760_11: nesaṃ sahaseyyā sabbappakārena paṭikkhittā”ti ca imehi pāḷiaṭṭhakathāpāṭhehi pakāsetabbo.
tika-vin08t:1760_12: Vippavāsepi pārivāsikena abhikkhuke āvāse na vatthabbaṃ, pakatattena vinā abhikkhuko
tika-vin08t:1760_13: āvāso na gantabbo, bahisīmāyaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānato dvādasahatthappamāṇassa
tika-vin08t:1761_0: Ayamattho “na, bhikkhave, pārivāsikena bhikkhunā sabhikkhukā āvāsā abhikkhuko āvāso
tika-vin08t:1761_1: gantabbo aññatra pakatattena aññatra antarāyā”tiādi ca “tayo kho, upāli…pe… anārocanā”ti
tika-vin08t:1761_2: ca “cattāro kho, upāli, mānattacārikassa bhikkhuno ratticchedā sahavāso, vippavāso,
tika-vin08t:1761_3: anārocanā, ūnegaṇecaraṇa”nti ca “vippavāsoti ekakasseva vāso”ti ca “ayañca yasmā
tika-vin08t:1761_4: gaṇassa ārocetvā bhikkhūnañca atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvāva vasi, tenassa ūnegaṇecaraṇadoso
tika-vin08t:1761_5: vā vippavāso vā na hotī”ti ca “atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvāti dvādasahatthe upacāre sallakkhetvā,
tika-vin08t:1761_6: anikkhittavattānaṃ upacārasīmāya āgatabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā sahavāsādikaṃ veditabba”nti
tika-vin08t:1761_7: ca āgatehi pāḷiyaṭṭhakathā-vajirabuddhiṭīkāpāṭhehi pakāsetabbo, tasmā vihāre parivasantassa
tika-vin08t:1761_8: upacārasīmāya abbhantare yattha katthaci vasantassa natthi vippavāso, bahiupacārasīmāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1761_9: parivasantassa bhikkhūnaṃ nisinnapariyantato dvādasahatthabbhantare vasantassa ca
tika-vin08t:1761_10: natthi vippavāsoti, tañca parivāsakāle “ekena bhikkhunā saddhi”nti vacanato ekassapi
tika-vin08t:1761_11: bhikkhuno, mānattacaraṇakāle “catūhi pañcahi vā bhikkhūhi saddhi”nti vacanato ca
tika-vin08t:1761_12: catunnaṃ pañcannampi bhikkhūnaṃ hatthapāsabhūte dvādasahatthabbhantarepi vasituṃ
tika-vin08t:1762_0: Vattaṃ samādiyitvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocitakālato pana paṭṭhāya kenaci karaṇīyena
tika-vin08t:1762_1: tesu bhikkhūsu gatesupi yathāvuttaaṭṭhakathāpāṭhanayena vippavāso na hoti. Tathā
tika-vin08t:1762_2: hi vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ “sopi kenaci kammena purearuṇe eva gacchatīti iminā ārocanāya
tika-vin08t:1762_3: katāya sabbesupi bhikkhūsu bahivihāraṃ gatesu ūnegaṇecaraṇadoso vā vippavāsadoso
tika-vin08t:1762_4: vā na hoti ārocitattā sahavāsassāti dasseti. Tenāha ‘ayañcā’tiādī”ti. Apare pana
tika-vin08t:1762_6: na kammārahabhikkhūhi. Yathā loke bandhanāgārādi daṇḍakārakehi eva kattabbaṃ, na
tika-vin08t:1762_7: daṇḍārahehi, evamidhāpī”ti vadanti, tampi aṭṭhakathādīsu na dissati. Na hi vatiparikkhepo
tika-vin08t:1762_8: daṇḍakammatthāya kārito, atha kho dassanūpacāravijahanatthameva. Tathā hi vuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:1762_9: sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “gumbena vā vatiyā vā paṭicchannaṭṭhāneti dassanūpacāravijahanattha”nti.
tika-vin08t:1762_10: Tathā vimativinodaniyampi “gumbena vātiādi dassanūpacāravijahanattha”nti. Ito paraṃ
tika-vin08t:1762_11: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva parivāsadānañca mānattadānañca veditabbaṃ. Yattha pana
tika-vin08t:1762_12: saṃsayitabbaṃ atthi, tattha saṃsayavinodanatthāya kathetabbaṃ kathayāma.
tika-vin08t:1763_0: Ekacce bhikkhū evaṃ vadanti – pārivāsiko bhikkhu vuḍḍhataropi samāno vatte samādinne
tika-vin08t:1763_1: navakaṭṭhāne ṭhito. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “yattha pana nisīdāpetvā parivisanti, tattha
tika-vin08t:1763_2: sāmaṇerānaṃ jeṭṭhakena, bhikkhūnaṃ saṅghanavakena hutvā nisīditabba”nti tasmā ārocitakālādīsu
tika-vin08t:1763_3: “ahaṃ bhante”icceva vattabbaṃ, na “ahaṃ āvuso”ti. Tatrevaṃ vicāraṇā kātabbā – pārivāsikādayo
tika-vin08t:1763_4: bhikkhū seyyāpariyantaāsanapariyantabhāgitāya navakaṭṭhāne ṭhitā, na ekantena navakabhūtattā.
tika-vin08t:1763_5: Tathā hi vuttaṃ bhagavatā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pārivāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pañca yathāvuḍḍhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1763_6: uposathaṃ pavāraṇaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ oṇojanaṃ bhatta”nti. Aṭṭhakathāyañca “pakatattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1763_7: bhikkhuṃ disvā āsanā vuṭṭhātabbaṃ, pakatatto bhikkhu āsanena nimantetabbo”ti etissā
tika-vin08t:1763_8: pāḷiyā saṃvaṇṇanāya “vuṭṭhātabbaṃ, nimantetabboti tadahupasampannampi disvā vuṭṭhātabbameva,
tika-vin08t:1763_9: vuṭṭhāya ca ‘ahaṃ iminā sukhanisinno vuṭṭhāpito’ti parammukhena na gantabbaṃ, ‘idaṃ
tika-vin08t:1763_10: ācariya āsanaṃ, ettha nisīdathā’ti evaṃ nimantetabboyevā”ti ettheva “ācariyā”ti ālapanaviseso
tika-vin08t:1763_11: vutto, na aññattha. Yadi vuḍḍhatarenapi “bhante”icceva vattabbo siyā, idhāpi “idaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1763_12: bhante, āsana”nti vattabbaṃ bhaveyya, na pana vuttaṃ, tasmā na tesaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1763_13: sārato paccetabbaṃ. Imasmiṃ pana vinayasaṅgahappakaraṇe “ārocentena sace navakataro
tika-vin08t:1763_14: hoti, ‘āvuso’ti vattabbaṃ. Sace vuḍḍhataro, ‘bhante’ti vattabba”nti vuttaṃ, idañca
tika-vin08t:1763_15: “ekena bhikkhunā saddhi”nti heṭṭhā vuttattā taṃ paṭiggāhakabhūtaṃ pakatattaṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin08t:1764_0: Bahavo pana bhikkhū pārivāsikaṃ bhikkhuṃ saṅghamajjhe nisīdāpetvā vattaṃ yācāpetvā
tika-vin08t:1764_1: kammavācāpariyosāne samādāpetvā ārocanamakāretvā saṅghamajjhato nikkhamāpetvā parisapariyante
tika-vin08t:1764_2: nisīdāpetvā tattha nisinnena ārocāpetvā vattaṃ nikkhipāpenti, evaṃ karontānañca nesaṃ
tika-vin08t:1764_3: ayamadhippāyo – ayaṃ bhikkhu vatte asamādinne vuḍḍhaṭṭhāniyopi hoti, tasmā yācanakāle
tika-vin08t:1764_4: ca kammavācāsavanakāle ca vattasamādānakāle ca saṅghamajjhe nisīdanāraho hoti, vatte
tika-vin08t:1764_5: pana samādinne navakaṭṭhāniyo, tasmā na saṅghamajjhe nisīdanāraho, āsanapariyantabhāgitāya
tika-vin08t:1764_6: parisapariyanteyeva nisīdanārahoti, tadetaṃ evaṃ vicāretabbaṃ – ayaṃ bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe
tika-vin08t:1764_7: nisīdamāno āsanaṃ gahetvā yathāvuḍḍhaṃ nisinno na hoti, atha kho kammārahabhāvena
tika-vin08t:1764_8: āsanaṃ aggahetvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā ukkuṭikameva nisinno hoti, kammāraho ca nāma
tika-vin08t:1764_9: saṅghamajjheyeva ṭhapetabbo hoti, no bahi, tasmā “saṅghamajjhe nisīdanāraho na hotī”ti
tika-vin08t:1764_10: na sakkā vattuṃ tasmiṃ kāle, nikkhamāpite ca vattārocanavattanikkhipanānaṃ aniṭṭhitattā
tika-vin08t:1764_11: aññamaññaṃ āhacca suṭṭhu nisinnaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharitumasakkuṇeyyattā, cīvarakaṇṇapādapiṭṭhiādīhi
tika-vin08t:1764_12: bādhitattā agāravakiriyā viya dissati, ārocanakiriyañca vattanikkhipanañca saṅghamajjheyeva
tika-vin08t:1764_13: kattabbaṃ pariyante nisīditvā karonto aṭṭhakathāvirodho hoti. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1764_14: “vattaṃ samādiyitvā tattheva saṅghassa ārocetabbaṃ…pe… ārocetvā sace nikkhipitukāmo,
tika-vin08t:1764_15: vuttanayeneva saṅghamajjhe nikkhipitabba”nti. Kasmā? Samādānaṭṭhāneyeva ārocāpetvā
tika-vin08t:1764_16: tattheva nikkhipāpetvā niṭṭhitasabbakiccameva nikkhamāpetvā attano āsane nisīdāpento
tika-vin08t:1765_0: Tathā sāyaṃ vattārocanakāle bahūsu pārivāsikesu vuḍḍhataraṃ paṭhamaṃ samādāpetvā
tika-vin08t:1765_1: ārocāpetvā anukkamena sabbapacchā navakataraṃ samādāpenti ārocāpenti, pāto nikkhipanakāle
tika-vin08t:1765_2: pana navakataraṃ paṭhamaṃ ārocāpetvā nikkhipāpenti, tato anukkamena vuḍḍhataraṃ sabbapacchā
tika-vin08t:1765_3: ārocāpetvā nikkhipāpenti. Tesaṃ ayamadhippāyo siyā – yadā dasa bhikkhū pakatattā
tika-vin08t:1765_4: dasa bhikkhū pārivāsikā honti, tadā vuḍḍhatarena paṭhamaṃ samādiyitvā ārocite tassa
tika-vin08t:1765_5: ārocanaṃ avasesā ekūnavīsati bhikkhū suṇanti, dutiyassa aṭṭhārasa, tatiyassa sattarasāti
tika-vin08t:1765_6: anukkamena hāyitvā sabbanavakassa ārocanaṃ dasa pakatattā suṇanti sesānaṃ apakatattabhāvato.
tika-vin08t:1765_7: Tato nikkhipanakāle sabbanavako pubbe attanā ārocitānaṃ dasannaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocetvā
tika-vin08t:1765_8: nikkhipati, tato paṭilomena dutiyo ekādasannaṃ, tatiyo dvādasannanti anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā
tika-vin08t:1765_9: sabbajeṭṭhako attanā pubbe ārocitānaṃ ekūnavīsatibhikkhūnaṃ ārocetvā nikkhipati,
tika-vin08t:1765_10: evaṃ yathānukkamena nikkhipanaṃ hoti. Sabbajeṭṭhake pana paṭhamaṃ nikkhitte sati
tika-vin08t:1765_11: pubbe attanā ārocitānaṃ navannaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tadā apakatattabhāvato ārocitānaṃ santike
tika-vin08t:1765_12: nikkhipanaṃ na hoti, tathā sesānaṃ. Tesaṃ pana ekaccānaṃ ūnaṃ hoti, ekaccānaṃ adhikaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1765_13: tasmā yathāvuttanayena sabbanavakato paṭṭhāya anukkamena nikkhipitabbanti.
tika-vin08t:1766_0: Evaṃvādīnaṃ pana tesamāyasmantānaṃ vāde pakatattāyeva bhikkhū ārocetabbā honti, no
tika-vin08t:1766_1: apakatattā. Pubbe ārocitānaṃyeva santike vattaṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ hoti, no anārocitānaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1766_2: Evaṃ pana pakatattāyeva bhikkhū ārocetabbā na honti, atha kho apakatattāpi “sace
tika-vin08t:1766_3: dve pārivāsikā gataṭṭhāne aññamaññaṃ passanti, ubhohi aññamaññassa ārocetabba”nti
tika-vin08t:1766_4: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā. Pubbe ārocitānampi anārocitānampi santike ārocetvā nikkhipitabbameva
tika-vin08t:1766_5: “sace so bhikkhu kenacideva karaṇīyena pakkanto hoti, yaṃ aññaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ passati,
tika-vin08t:1766_6: tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabba”nti vuttattā, tasmā tathā akarontepi sabbesaṃ ārocitattā
tika-vin08t:1766_7: natthi doso. Appekacce bhikkhū “pakatattassevāyaṃ ārocanā”ti maññamānā sāyaṃ vuḍḍhapaṭipāṭiyā
tika-vin08t:1766_8: vattaṃ samādiyitvā ārocetvā attano sayanaṃ pavisitvā dvārajagganasayanasodhanādīni
tika-vin08t:1766_9: karontā aññesaṃ ārocitaṃ na suṇanti. Appekacce pāto sayaṃ ārocetvā nikkhipitvā aññesaṃ
tika-vin08t:1766_10: ārocanaṃ vā nikkhipanaṃ vā anāgametvā bhikkhācārādīnaṃ atthāya gacchanti, evaṃ karontānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1766_11: tesaṃ ārocanaṃ ekaccānaṃ asutabhāvasambhavato sāsaṅko hoti pārivāsikānaṃ aññamaññārocanassa
tika-vin08t:1766_12: pakaraṇesu āgatattā. Na kevalaṃ sāratthadīpaniyaṃyeva, atha kho vajirabuddhiṭīkāyampi
tika-vin08t:1766_13: “sace dve pārivāsikā gataṭṭhāne aññamaññaṃ passanti, ubhohipi aññamaññassa ārocetabbaṃ
tika-vin08t:1766_14: avisesena ‘āgantukena ārocetabbaṃ, āgantukassa ārocetabba’nti vuttattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1767_0: Tathā appekacce pakatattā bhikkhū pārivāsikesu bhikkhūsu sāyaṃ vattasamādānatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1767_1: pakatattasālato nikkhamitvā attano attano sayanasamīpaṃ gatesu attano sayanapaññāpanapaakkhāraṭhapanaaññamaññaālāpasallāpakaraṇādivasena
tika-vin08t:1767_2: āḷolentā pārivāsikānaṃ vattārocanaṃ na suṇanti, na manasi karonti. Appekacce pāto
tika-vin08t:1767_4: niddāpasutā hutvā na suṇanti. Evaṃ karontānampi tesaṃ ekaccānaṃ assutasambhavato
tika-vin08t:1767_5: vattārocanaṃ sāsaṅkaṃ hotīti. Hotu sāsaṅkaṃ, suṇantānaṃ assutasambhavepi ārocakānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1767_6: sammāārocanena vattassa paripuṇṇattā ko dosoti ce? Ārocakānaṃ sammā ārocitattā vatte
tika-vin08t:1767_7: paripuṇṇepi vattabhedadukkaṭatova vimutto siyā, na ratticchedato. Vuttañhi samantapāsādikāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1767_8: “sace vāyamantopi sampāpuṇituṃ vā sāvetuṃ vā na sakkoti, ratticchedova hoti, na vattabhedadukkaṭa”nti.
tika-vin08t:1768_0: Athaññe bhikkhū vattaṃ samādiyitvā rattiṃ nipannā niddābhāvena manussasaddampi suṇanti,
tika-vin08t:1768_1: bheriādisaddampi suṇanti, sakaṭanāvādiyānasaddampi suṇanti, te tena saddena āsaṅkanti
tika-vin08t:1768_2: “bhikkhūnaṃ nu kho aya”nti, te tena kāraṇena ratticchedaṃ maññanti. Kasmā? “Ayañca
tika-vin08t:1768_3: nesaṃ chattasaddaṃ vā ukkāsitasaddaṃ vā khipitasaddaṃ vā sutvā āgantukabhāvaṃ jānāti,
tika-vin08t:1768_4: gantvā ārocetabbaṃ. Gatakāle jānantenapi anubandhitvā ārocetabbameva. Sampāpuṇituṃ
tika-vin08t:1768_5: asakkontassa ratticchedova hoti, na vattabhedadukkaṭa”nti vuttattāti. Te evaṃ saññāpetabbā
tika-vin08t:1768_6: – māyasmanto evaṃ maññittha, nāyaṃ pāṭho bahisīmaṭṭhavasena vutto, atha kho upacārasīmaṭṭhavasena
tika-vin08t:1768_7: vutto. Vuttañhi tattheva “yepi antovihāraṃ appavisitvā upacārasīmaṃ okkamitvā gacchantī”ti.
tika-vin08t:1768_8: Tatthapi āgantukabhāvassa jānitattā ratticchedo hoti, tasmā dūresaddasavanamattena
tika-vin08t:1768_9: ratticchedo natthi, “ayaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ saddo, ayaṃ bhikkhūhi vāditabherighaṇṭādisaddo,
tika-vin08t:1768_10: ayaṃ bhikkhūhi pājitasakaṭanāvādisaddo”ti nisinnaṭṭhānato jānantoyeva ratticchedakaro
tika-vin08t:1768_11: hoti. Tenāha “āyasmā karavīkatissatthero ‘samaṇo aya’nti vavatthānameva pamāṇa”nti.
tika-vin08t:1769_0: Divā dūre gacchantaṃ janakāyaṃ disvāpi “ime bhikkhū nu kho”ti parikappentā ratticchedaṃ
tika-vin08t:1769_1: maññanti, tampi akāraṇaṃ. Kasmā? “Bhikkhū”ti vavatthānassa abhāvā. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1769_2: “nadīādīsu nāvāya gacchantampi paratīre ṭhitampi ākāse gacchantampi pabbatathalaaraññādīsu
tika-vin08t:1769_3: dūre ṭhitampi bhikkhuṃ disvā sace ‘bhikkhū’ti vavatthānaṃ atthi, nāvādīhi vā gantvā
tika-vin08t:1769_4: mahāsaddaṃ katvā vā vegena anubandhitvā vā ārocetabba”nti. Iti bhikkhuṃ disvāpi “bhikkhū”ti
tika-vin08t:1769_5: vavatthānameva pamāṇaṃ. Abhikkhuṃ pana “bhikkhū”ti vavatthāne santepi vā asantepi
tika-vin08t:1769_6: vā kiṃ vattabbaṃ atthi, bahavo pana bhikkhū idaṃ rūpadassanaṃ saddasavanañca āsaṅkantā
tika-vin08t:1769_7: “pabhāte sati taṃ dvayaṃ bhaveyya, tasmā manussānaṃ gamanakālasaddakaraṇakālato pubbeyeva
tika-vin08t:1769_8: vattaṃ nikkhipitabba”nti maññamānā anuggateyeva aruṇe vattaṃ nikkhipanti, tadayuttaṃ ratticchedattāti.
tika-vin08t:1770_0: Atha pana vinayadharena “kittakā te āpattiyo, chādesi, kīvatīhaṃ paṭicchādesī”ti
tika-vin08t:1770_1: puṭṭho samāno “ahaṃ, bhante, āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāmi, rattipariyantaṃ na jānāmi,
tika-vin08t:1770_2: āpattipariyantaṃ nassarāmi, rattipariyantaṃ nassarāmi, āpattipariyante vematiko,
tika-vin08t:1770_3: rattipariyante vematiko”ti vutte “ayaṃ bhikkhu suddhantaparivāsāraho”ti ñatvā tassapi
tika-vin08t:1770_4: duvidhattā cūḷasuddhantamahāsuddhantavasena “tesu ayaṃ bhikkhu imassa araho”ti ñāpanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1770_5: upasampadato paṭṭhāya anulomakkamena vā ārocitadivasato paṭṭhāya paṭilomakkamena
tika-vin08t:1770_6: vā “kittakaṃ kālaṃ tvaṃ ārocanaāvikaraṇādivasena suddho”ti pucchitvā “āma bhante,
tika-vin08t:1770_7: ettakaṃ kālaṃ ahaṃ suddhomhī”ti vutte “ayaṃ bhikkhu ekaccaṃ rattipariyantaṃ jānāti,
tika-vin08t:1770_8: tasmā cūḷasuddhantāraho”ti ñatvā tassa suddhakālaṃ apanetvā asuddhakālavasena pariyantaṃ
tika-vin08t:1770_9: katvā cūḷasuddhantaparivāso dātabbo. Ayaṃ uddhampi ārohati, adhopi orohati. Yo pana
tika-vin08t:1770_10: anulomavasena vā paṭilomavasena vā pucchiyamāno “sakalampi rattipariyantaṃ ahaṃ na
tika-vin08t:1770_11: jānāmi nassarāmi, vematiko homī”ti vutte “ayaṃ bhikkhu sakalampi rattipariyantaṃ
tika-vin08t:1770_12: na jānāti, tasmā mahāsuddhantāraho”ti ñatvā tassa upasampadato paṭṭhāya yāva vattasamādānā
tika-vin08t:1770_13: ettakaṃ kālaṃ pariyantaṃ katvā mahāsuddhantaparivāso dātabbo. Uddhaṃārohanaadhoorohanabhāvo
tika-vin08t:1770_14: panesaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttoyeva. Ito parampi vidhānaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatanayeneva daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1771_0: Idāni pana bahavo bhikkhū “ayaṃ cūḷasuddhantāraho, ayaṃ mahāsuddhantāraho”ti avicinantā
tika-vin08t:1771_1: antokammavācāyaṃ “āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, āpattipariyantaṃ
tika-vin08t:1771_2: nassarati, rattipariyantaṃ nassarati, āpattipariyante vematiko, rattipariyante vematiko”ti
tika-vin08t:1771_3: avisesavacanameva manasi karontā “imāya kammavācāya dinnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin08t:1771_4: pañcāhamattaṃ vā dasāhamattaṃ vā parivasitvā apariyantarattipaṭicchāditāhi apariyantāhi
tika-vin08t:1771_5: āpattīhi mokkho hotī”ti maññantā pañcāhamattaṃ vā dasāhamattaṃ vā parivasitvā mānattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1771_6: yācanti, evaṃ karontā te bhikkhū sahassakkhattuṃ parivasantāpi āpattito na mucceyyuṃ.
tika-vin08t:1771_7: Kasmāti ce? Pāḷiyā ca aṭṭhakathāya ca virujjhanato. Vuttañhi pāḷiyaṃ “yāvatīhaṃ jānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1771_8: paṭicchādeti, tāvatīhaṃ tena bhikkhunā akāmā parivatthabbaṃ. Parivutthaparivāsena
tika-vin08t:1771_9: bhikkhunā uttari chārattaṃ bhikkhumānattāya paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Ciṇṇamānatto bhikkhu
tika-vin08t:1771_10: yattha siyā vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho, tattha so bhikkhu abbhetabbo”ti, tasmā paṭicchannadivasamattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1771_11: aparivasitvā mānattāraho nāma na hoti, amānattārahassa mānattadānaṃ na ruhati, aciṇṇamānatto
tika-vin08t:1771_12: abbhānāraho na hoti, anabbhānārahassa abbhānaṃ na ruhati, anabbhito bhikkhu āpattimutto
tika-vin08t:1771_13: pakatatto na hotīti ayamettha bhagavato adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:1772_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana cūḷasuddhante “taṃ gahetvā parivasantena yattakaṃ kālaṃ attano
tika-vin08t:1772_1: suddhiṃ jānāti, tattakaṃ apanetvā avasesaṃ māsaṃ vā dvimāsaṃ vā parivasitabba”nti,
tika-vin08t:1772_2: mahāsuddhante “taṃ gahetvā gahitadivasato yāva upasampadadivaso, tāva rattiyo gaṇetvā
tika-vin08t:1772_3: parivasitabba”nti vuttaṃ, tasmā paṭicchannarattippamāṇaṃ parivasantoyeva mānattāraho
tika-vin08t:1772_4: hoti, na pañcāhadasāharattippamāṇamattaṃ parivasantoti ayaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:1772_5: Teneva ca kāraṇena desanāārocanādīhi sabbakālaṃ āpattiṃ sodhetvā vasantānaṃ lajjīpesalānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1772_6: sikkhākāmānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ dātuṃ ayuttarūpo, desanāārocanādīhi āpattiṃ
tika-vin08t:1772_7: asodhetvā pamādavasena cirakālaṃ vasantānaṃ janapadavāsikādīnaṃ dātuṃ yuttarūpoti
tika-vin08t:1772_8: veditabbaṃ. Etthāpi avasesavinicchayo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-vin08t:1773_0: Atha pana vinayadharena “tvaṃ, āvuso, kataraāpattiṃ āpanno, kati rattiyo te chāditā”ti
tika-vin08t:1773_1: puṭṭho “ahaṃ, bhante, saṅghādisesaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā pakkhamattaṃ paṭicchāditā,
tika-vin08t:1773_2: tenāhaṃ saṅghaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yācitvā saṅghena dinne pakkhaparivāse parivasitvā
tika-vin08t:1773_3: anikkhittavattova hutvā antarā saṅghādisesāpattiṃ āpajjitvā pañcāhamattaṃ chāditā”ti
tika-vin08t:1773_4: vutte “ayaṃ bhikkhu samodhānaparivāsāraho, tīsu ca samodhānaparivāsesu odhānasamodhānāraho”ti
tika-vin08t:1773_5: ñatvā “tena hi bhikkhu tvaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanāraho”ti vatvā taṃ mūlāya paṭikassitvā
tika-vin08t:1773_6: parivutthadivase adivase katvā antarā paṭicchanne pañca divase mūlāpattiyā paṭicchannesu
tika-vin08t:1773_7: divasesu samodhānetvā odhānasamodhāno dātabbo. Ito parāni odhānasamodhāne vattabbavacanāni
tika-vin08t:1774_0: Atha pana vinayadharena puṭṭho “ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ,
tika-vin08t:1774_1: sambahulā āpattiyo ekāhappaṭicchannāyo…pe… sambahulā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo”ti
tika-vin08t:1774_2: vutte “ayaṃ bhikkhu agghasamodhānāraho”ti ñatvā tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo ciratarappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin08t:1774_3: tāsaṃ agghena samodhānaparivāso dātabbo. Tatrevaṃ vadanti – “yā āpattiyo ciratarappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin08t:1774_4: tāsaṃ agghena samodhānaparivāso dātabbo”ti vutto, evaṃ sante pakkhappaṭicchannamāsappaṭicchannādīsu
tika-vin08t:1774_5: kathanti? Tesupi “yā āpattiyo pakkhappaṭicchannāyo, yā āpattiyo māsappaṭicchannāyo”ti
tika-vin08t:1774_6: vattabboti. Yadi evaṃ pāḷivirodho āpajjati. Pāḷiyañhi dasāhappaṭicchannapariyosānā
tika-vin08t:1774_7: eva āpatti dassitā, na pakkhappaṭicchannamāsappaṭicchannādayoti? Saccaṃ, pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1774_8: tathādassanaṃ pana nayadassanamattaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “pañcadasa divasāni
tika-vin08t:1774_9: paṭicchannāya ‘pakkhappaṭicchanna’nti vatvā yojanā kātabbā…pe… evaṃ yāva saṭṭhisaṃvaccharaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1774_10: atirekasaṭṭhisaṃvaccharappaṭicchannanti vā tato vā bhiyyopi vatvā yojanā kātabbā”ti.
tika-vin08t:1774_11: Mahāpadumattherenapi vuttaṃ “ayaṃ samuccayakkhandhako nāma buddhānaṃ ṭhitakālasadiso,
tika-vin08t:1774_12: āpatti nāma paṭicchannā vā hotu appaṭicchannā vā samakaūnataraatirekappaṭicchannā
tika-vin08t:1774_13: vā, vinayadharassa kammavācaṃ yojetuṃ samatthabhāvoyevettha pamāṇa”nti, tasmā pakkhappaṭicchannādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1775_0: Hotu, evampi pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ pariyantaṃ katvā katāya kammavācāya tato uddhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1775_1: āpatti natthīti kathaṃ jāneyyāti? Idāni sikkhākāmā bhikkhū devasikampi desanārocanāvikaraṇāni
tika-vin08t:1775_2: karonti ekāhikadvīhikādivasenapi, kiccapasutā hutvā tathā asakkontāpi uposathadivasaṃ
tika-vin08t:1775_3: nātikkamanti, gilānādivasena tadatikkantāpi atikkantabhāvaṃ jānanti, tasmā tadatikkantabhāve
tika-vin08t:1775_5: tadatikkantabhāve pana asati pakkhappaṭicchannapariyantā hoti, tasmā pakkhapariyantakammavācākaraṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:1776_0: Evaṃ hotu, tathāpi yadetaṃ “sambahulā āpattiyo ekāhappaṭicchannāyo…pe… sambahulā
tika-vin08t:1776_1: āpattiyo pakkhappaṭicchannāyo”ti vuttaṃ, tattha imināyeva anukkamena mayā paṭicchāditā
tika-vin08t:1776_2: āpattiyo hontīti kathaṃ jāneyya, ajānane ca sati “yā ca khvāyaṃ, āvuso, āpatti ajānappaṭicchannā,
tika-vin08t:1776_3: adhammikaṃ tassā āpattiyā parivāsadānaṃ, adhammattā na ruhatī”ti idaṃ āpajjatīti?
tika-vin08t:1776_4: Nāpajjati. Tattha hi āpattiyā āpannabhāvaṃ ajānanto hutvā paṭicchādeti, tasmā “āpatti
tika-vin08t:1776_5: ca hoti āpattisaññī cā”ti vuttaāpattisaññitābhāvā appaṭicchannameva hoti, tasmā appaṭicchannāya
tika-vin08t:1776_6: āpattiyā parivāsadānaṃ adhammikaṃ hoti. Idha pana “ettakā rattiyo mayā chāditā”ti
tika-vin08t:1776_7: channakālameva na jānāti, tadajānabhāve satipi parivāsadānaṃ ruhati. Teneva ca kāraṇena
tika-vin08t:1776_8: suddhantaparivāse “āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, āpattipariyantaṃ
tika-vin08t:1776_9: nassarati, rattipariyantaṃ nassarati, āpattipariyante vematiko, rattipariyante vematiko”ti
tika-vin08t:1776_10: rattipariyantassa ajānanaasaraṇavematikabhāve satipi parivāsadānaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin08t:1776_11: chāditakālaṃ tathato ajānantopi “sambahulā āpattiyo ekāhappaṭicchannāyo…pe… sambahulā
tika-vin08t:1776_12: āpattiyo pakkhappaṭicchannāyo”ti ettha appaviṭṭhassa abhāvā sampajjatiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1777_0: Athāpi evaṃ vadeyyuṃ – “sambahulā āpattiyo ekāhappaṭicchannāyo…pe… sambahulā āpattiyo
tika-vin08t:1777_1: pakkhappaṭicchannāyo”ti vutte tesu divasesu āpattiyo atthi paṭicchannāyopi, atthi
tika-vin08t:1777_2: appaṭicchannāyopi, atthi cirappaṭicchannāyopi, atthi acirappaṭicchannāyopi, atthi
tika-vin08t:1777_3: ekāpi, atthi sambahulāpi, sabbā tā āpattiyo eteneva padena saṅgahitā siyunti? Saṅgahitā
tika-vin08t:1777_4: eva. Na hettha saṃsayo kātabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “aññasmiṃ pana āpattivuṭṭhāne
tika-vin08t:1777_5: idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ – yo appaṭicchannaṃ āpattiṃ ‘paṭicchannā’ti vinayakammaṃ karoti, tassa
tika-vin08t:1777_6: āpatti vuṭṭhāti. Yo paṭicchannaṃ ‘appaṭicchannā’ti vinayakammaṃ karoti, tassa na
tika-vin08t:1777_8: ‘acirappaṭicchannā’ti karontassa na vuṭṭhāti. Ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā ‘sambahulā’ti
tika-vin08t:1777_9: karontassapi vuṭṭhāti ekaṃ vinā sambahulānaṃ abhāvato. Sambahulā pana āpajjitvā ‘ekaṃ
tika-vin08t:1777_10: āpajji’nti karontassa na vuṭṭhātī”ti, tasmā etehi padehi sabbāsaṃ paṭicchannāpattīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1777_11: saṅgahitattā tāhi āpattīhi vuṭṭhānaṃ sambhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1778_0: Atha pana vinayadharena puṭṭho “ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ
tika-vin08t:1778_1: ekaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ, ekaṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ, ekaṃ duṭṭhullavācaṃ, ekaṃ attakāmaṃ, ekaṃ
tika-vin08t:1778_2: sañcarittaṃ, ekaṃ kuṭikāraṃ, ekaṃ vihārakāraṃ, ekaṃ duṭṭhadosaṃ, ekaṃ aññabhāgiyaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1778_3: ekaṃ saṅghabhedaṃ, ekaṃ bhedānuvattakaṃ, ekaṃ dubbacaṃ, ekaṃ kuladūsaka”nti vutte
tika-vin08t:1778_4: “ayaṃ bhikkhu missakasamodhānaparivāsāraho”ti ñatvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatanayena parivāso
tika-vin08t:1778_5: dātabbo. Etthāha – agghasamodhānamissakasamodhānānaṃ ko viseso, kiṃ nānākaraṇanti?
tika-vin08t:1778_6: Vuccate – agghasamodhānaparivāso acirappaṭicchannā āpattiyo cirappaṭicchannāyaṃ āpattiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1778_7: samodhānetvā tassā cirappaṭicchannāya āpattiyā agghavasena dīyati, missakasamodhānaparivāso
tika-vin08t:1778_8: nānāvatthukā āpattiyo samodhānetvā tāsaṃ missakavasena dīyati, ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-vin08t:1778_9: Atha vā agghasamodhāno sabhāgavatthūnaṃ āpattīnaṃ samodhānavasena hoti, itaro visabhāgavatthūnanti
tika-vin08t:1778_11: sambahulā āpattiyo āpannassa bahurattiṃ paṭicchāditāpattiyaṃ nikkhipitvā dātabbo,
tika-vin08t:1779_0: Atha siyā “evaṃ cirappaṭicchannāyo ca acirappaṭicchannāyo ca nānāvatthukāyo āpattiyo
tika-vin08t:1779_1: āpajjantassa ko parivāso dātabbo agghasamodhāno vā missakasamodhāno vā, atha tadubhayā
tika-vin08t:1779_2: vā”ti. Kiñcettha – yadi agghasamodhānaṃ dadeyya, cirappaṭicchannāhi ca acirappaṭicchannāhi
tika-vin08t:1779_3: ca sabhāgavatthukāhi āpattīhi vuṭṭhito bhaveyya, cirappaṭicchannāhi ca acirappaṭicchannāhi
tika-vin08t:1779_4: ca no visabhāgavatthukāhi. Yadi ca missakasamodhānaṃ dadeyya, samānakālappaṭicchannāhi
tika-vin08t:1779_5: visabhāgavatthūhi āpattīhi vuṭṭhito bhaveyya, no asamānakaālappaṭicchannāhi sabhāgavatthukāhi
tika-vin08t:1779_6: ca, atha tadubhayampi dadeyya, “ekasmiṃ kamme dve parivāsā dātabbā”ti neva pāḷiyaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1779_7: na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanti? Vuccate – idañhi sabbampi parivāsādikaṃ vinayakammaṃ vatthuvasena
tika-vin08t:1779_8: vā gottavasena vā nāmavasena vā āpattivasena vā kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin08t:1780_0: Tattha sukkavissaṭṭhīti vatthu ceva gottañca. Saṅghādisesoti nāmañceva āpatti ca.
tika-vin08t:1780_2: vatthu ceva gottañca gahitaṃ hoti, “saṅghādiseso”ti vacanenapi “āpattiyo”ti vacanenapi
tika-vin08t:1780_3: nāmañceva āpatti ca gahitā hoti, tasmā agghasamodhānavasena parivāse dinne “ahaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1780_4: bhante, sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji”ntiādivacaneneva vatthussa ca gottassa
tika-vin08t:1780_5: ca nāmassa ca āpattiyā ca gahitattā cirappaṭicchannāhi acirappaṭicchannāhi ca sabhāgavatthukāhi
tika-vin08t:1780_6: ca visabhāgavatthukāhi ca sabbāhi āpattīhi vuṭṭhātīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1780_8: āpajji’ntipi evaṃ pubbe vuttanayena vatthuvasenapi gottavasenapi nāmavasenapi āpattivasenapi
tika-vin08t:1780_9: yojetvā kammavācaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyevāti ayaṃ missakasamodhāno”ti, imasmiñca vinayasaṅgahappakaraṇe
tika-vin08t:1780_10: tatheva vatvā “tasmā na idha visuṃ kammavācaṃ yojetvā dassayissāma, pubbe sabbāpattisādhāraṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:1780_11: katvā yojetvā dassitāya eva kammavācāya nānāvatthukāhipi āpattīhi vuṭṭhānasambhavato
tika-vin08t:1781_0: Yadi evaṃ ācariyavajirabuddhittherena dvinnaṃ viseso na vattabbo, atha kasmā vuttoti?
tika-vin08t:1781_1: Tīsu samodhānaparivāsesu odhānasamodhāno mūlāyapaṭikassanāya odhūnitakāleyeva dātabbo,
tika-vin08t:1781_2: agghasamodhānamissakasamodhānaparivāsā pana visuṃyeva dātabbā. “Evaṃ dinne etesaṃ
tika-vin08t:1781_3: ko viseso”ti cintāyaṃ visesasambhavamattadassanatthaṃ vutto. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana parivāsādikammassa
tika-vin08t:1781_4: lakkhaṇaṃ dassetuṃ “vatthuvasena vā”tiādimāha, tasmā lakkhaṇavaseneva sabhāgavatthukāhipi
tika-vin08t:1781_5: āpattīhi vuṭṭhānaṃ sambhavati. Teneva ca kāraṇena sāratthadīpanināmikāyaṃ vinayaṭīkāyañca
tika-vin08t:1781_6: vimativinodanināmikāyaṃ vinayaṭīkāyañca na koci viseso vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t:1782_1: āpattīhi vuṭṭhānaṃ sambhaveyya. Tatthapi hi “ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā saṅghādisesā
tika-vin08t:1782_2: āpattiyo āpajjiṃ nānāvatthukāyo”tipi “ekā sukkavissaṭṭhi…pe… ekā kuladūsakā”tipi
tika-vin08t:1782_4: kittanasambhavato cirappaṭicchannāhipi acirappaṭicchannāhipi āpattīhi vuṭṭhānaṃ sambhaveyyāti?
tika-vin08t:1782_5: Na panevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vatthādikittanañhi sabbāpattīnaṃ gaṇhanatthaṃ hoti. Evaṃ gaṇhantepi
tika-vin08t:1782_6: paṭicchannakālassa akathitattā “ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ parivasitabba”nti na paññāyati,
tika-vin08t:1782_7: tasmiṃ apaññāyamāne tena pamāṇena parivāso na hoti, tasmiṃ asati āpattito vuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1782_8: na sambhavati, tasmā missakasamodhānakammavācāya cirappaṭicchannāhipi acirappaṭicchannāhipi
tika-vin08t:1785_0: Mānattakathāyampi mānattaṃ nāma appaṭicchannamānattaṃ paṭicchannamānattaṃ pakkhamānattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1785_1: samodhānamānattanti catubbidhaṃ hoti. Tattha yo bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā
tika-vin08t:1785_2: taṃ divasameva āroceti, ekarattimattampi na paṭicchādeti, tassa parivāsaṃ adatvāva
tika-vin08t:1785_3: dinnaṃ mānattaṃ appaṭicchannamānattaṃ nāma. Yo āpajjitvā dasahi ākārehi vinā taṃ
tika-vin08t:1785_4: divasaṃ nāroceti, ekarattādivasena paṭicchādeti, tattha yathāpaṭicchannadivasaṃ parivāsaṃ
tika-vin08t:1785_5: datvā parivutthaparivāsassa dinnaṃ mānattaṃ paṭicchannamānattaṃ nāma. Āpattiṃ āpajjitvā
tika-vin08t:1785_6: paṭicchannāya vā appaṭicchannāya vā bhikkhuniyā pakkhamattameva dinnaṃ mānattaṃ pakkhamānattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1785_7: nāma. Bhikkhu pana paṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivasitvā anikkhittavattakāleyeva puna
tika-vin08t:1785_8: āpajjitvā na paṭicchādeti, tassa mūlāya paṭikassitvā parivutthadivase adivase katvā
tika-vin08t:1785_9: appaṭicchāditattā samodhānaparivāsaṃ adatvā dinnaṃ mānattaṃ samodhānamānattaṃ nāma.
tika-vin08t:1785_10: Mānattārahakālepi mānattacaraṇakālepi abbhānārahakālepi eseva nayo. Tesu tīṇi mānattāni
tika-vin08t:1785_11: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena suviññeyyattā na vuttāni. Pakkhamānattaṃ pacchā āgamissati.
tika-vin08t:1786_0: Yāni pana parivāsamānattāni anavaṭṭhitattā puthujjanassa gihiādivasena parivattane
tika-vin08t:1786_1: sati puna dātabbādātabbabhāve saṅkitabbāni, tāni dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ anekehi pakārehi
tika-vin08t:1786_2: vitthārato vuttāni. Tesu bhikkhūnaṃ saṃsayavinodanatthāya ekadesaṃ dassetuṃ “sace
tika-vin08t:1786_3: kocī”tiādimāha. Tattha vibbhamatīti virūpo hutvā bhamati, hīnāyāvattati gihī hotīti
tika-vin08t:1786_4: attho. Sāmaṇero hotīti upasampannabhāvaṃ jahitvā sāmaṇerabhāvaṃ upagacchati. Tattha
tika-vin08t:1786_5: pārājikappattabhāvena vā “gihīti maṃ dhārethā”tiādinā sikkhāpaccakkhānena vā gihī
tika-vin08t:1786_6: hoti. Tesu paṭhamena puna upasampadāya abhabbattā puna parivāso na ruhatiyeva, dutiyena
tika-vin08t:1786_7: pana puna upasampadāya bhabbattā “so ce puna upasampajjatī”ti vuttaṃ. Itaro pana
tika-vin08t:1786_8: pārājikappattabhāvena sāmaṇero na hoti. Kasmā? Saraṇagamanādīnaṃ vinassanato. Vuttañhi
tika-vin08t:1786_10: vinassanato senāsanaggāho ca paṭippassambhati, saṅghalābhampi tena labhantīti veditabba”nti,
tika-vin08t:1786_11: gihī pana hutvā puna sāmaṇerabhāvamattaṃ laddhabbaṃ hoti. “Sāmaṇeroti maṃ dhārethā”tiādinā
tika-vin08t:1786_12: pana sikkhāpaccakkhāne kate siyā sāmaṇerabhāvo, tatopi puna upasampajjitukāmatāya
tika-vin08t:1786_13: sati siyā upasampannabhāvo. “Gihīti maṃ dhārethā”tiādinā sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ katvā
tika-vin08t:1786_14: gihibhāvaṃ upagatepi puna sāmaṇerapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā sāmaṇero hoti. Tato puna upasampajjituṃ
tika-vin08t:1786_15: laddhabbattā “puna upasampajjatī”ti vutto. Tesaṃ bhikkhubhāve parivāse aniṭṭhitepi
tika-vin08t:1786_16: gihisāmaṇerabhāvaṃ pattattā parivāso na ruhati upasampannānameva parivāsassa bhagavatā
tika-vin08t:1787_0: Evaṃ sante puna upasampajjantassa kiṃ parivāso puna dātabboti āha “so ce puna upasampajjatī”tiādi.
tika-vin08t:1787_1: Tassattho – so vibbhantako so vā sāmaṇero puna upasampannabhāvaṃ upagacchati, purimaṃ
tika-vin08t:1787_2: pubbe bhikkhubhūtakāle dinnaṃ parivāsadānaṃ eva idāni parivāsadānaṃ hoti. Yo parivāso
tika-vin08t:1787_3: pubbe bhikkhubhūtakāle dinno, so parivāso sudinno, dudinno na hoti. Yo yattako kālo
tika-vin08t:1787_4: parivuttho, so tattako kālo suparivutthoyeva hoti, na duparivuttho, tasmā avaseso
tika-vin08t:1787_5: kālo parivasitabboti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – pubbe bhikkhukāle pakkhappaṭicchannāya āpattiyā
tika-vin08t:1787_6: parivāsaṃ gahetvā dasadivasamattaṃ parivasitvā aniṭṭhiteyeva parivāse vibbhamitvā
tika-vin08t:1787_7: sāmaṇero vā hutvā puna upasampannena avasesapañcadivase parivasitvā parivāso niṭṭhāpetabboti.
tika-vin08t:1787_8: Mānattārahādīsupi eseva nayo. Ummattakādīsupi tasmiṃ kāle ajānantattā “parivāso na
tika-vin08t:1787_9: ruhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tiṇṇampi ukkhittakānaṃ kammanānāsaṃvāsakattā tehi sahasaṃvāsoyeva
tika-vin08t:1787_10: natthīti ukkhittakānaṃ parivāso na ruhatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1788_0: Sace puna osārīyatīti ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhanavasena samānasaṃvāsakabhāvaṃ
tika-vin08t:1788_1: pavesīyati. “Sace kassaci bhikkhuno itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhavatī”tiādīsu aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1788_2: vuttanayeneva attho suviññeyyo hoti. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “pakkhamānattaṃ pacchā āgamissatī”ti,
tika-vin08t:1788_3: tatrevaṃ jānitabbaṃ – pakkhamānattanti bhikkhuniyā dātabbamānattaṃ. Taṃ pana paṭicchannāyapi
tika-vin08t:1788_5: ajjhāpannāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṅghe pakkhamānattaṃ caritabba”nti. Taṃ pana bhikkhunīhi
tika-vin08t:1788_6: attano sīmaṃ sodhetvā vihārasīmāya vā vihārasīmaṃ sodhetuṃ asakkontīhi khaṇḍasīmāya
tika-vin08t:1788_7: vā sabbantimena paricchedena catuvaggagaṇaṃ sannipātāpetvā dātabbaṃ. Sace ekā āpatti
tika-vin08t:1788_8: hoti, ekissā vasena, sace dve vā tisso vā sambahulā vā ekavatthukā vā nānāvatthukā
tika-vin08t:1788_9: vā, tāsaṃ tāsaṃ vasena vatthugottanāmaāpattīsu yaṃ yaṃ icchati, taṃ taṃ ādāya yojanā kātabbā.
tika-vin08t:1789_0: Tatridaṃ ekāpattivasena mukhamattanidassanaṃ – tāya āpannāya bhikkhuniyā bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ
tika-vin08t:1789_1: upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1789_2: nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo “ahaṃ, ayye, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ
tika-vin08t:1789_3: gāmantaraṃ, sāhaṃ, ayya,e ekissā āpattiyā gāmantarāya pakkhamānattaṃ yācāmī”ti. Evaṃ
tika-vin08t:1789_4: tikkhattuṃ yācāpetvā byattāya bhikkhuniyā paṭibalāya saṅgho ñāpetabbo “suṇātu me,
tika-vin08t:1789_5: ayye, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji gāmantaraṃ, sā saṅghaṃ
tika-vin08t:1789_6: ekissā āpattiyā gāmantarāya pakkhamānattaṃ yācati. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho
tika-vin08t:1789_7: itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā ekissā āpattiyā gāmantarāya pakkhamānattaṃ dadeyya, esā
tika-vin08t:1789_8: ñatti. Suṇātu me, ayye, saṅgho…pe… dutiyampi. Tatiyampi etamatthaṃ vadāmi. Suṇātu
tika-vin08t:1789_9: me, ayye, saṅgho…pe… bhāseyya. Dinnaṃ saṅghena itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā ekissā āpattiyā
tika-vin08t:1789_10: gāmantarāya pakkhamānattaṃ, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti.
tika-vin08t:1790_0: Kammavācāpariyosāne vattaṃ samādiyitvā bhikkhumānattakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva saṅghassa
tika-vin08t:1790_1: ārocetvā nikkhittavattaṃ vasitukāmāya tatheva saṅghassa majjhe vā pakkantāsu bhikkhunīsu
tika-vin08t:1790_2: ekabhikkhuniyā vā dutiyikāya vā santike vuttanayeneva nikkhipitabbaṃ. Aññissā pana
tika-vin08t:1790_3: āgantukāya santike ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ, nikkhittakālato paṭṭhāya pakatattaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin08t:1791_0: Puna samādiyitvā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhapentiyā pana bhikkhunīnaṃyeva santike vasituṃ na labbhati.
tika-vin08t:1791_1: “Ubhatosaṅghe pakkhamānattaṃ caritabba”nti hi vuttaṃ, tasmā assā ācariyupajjhāyāhi
tika-vin08t:1791_2: vihāraṃ gantvā saṅgāhakapakkhe ṭhito eko mahāthero vā dhammakathiko vā bhikkhu vattabbo
tika-vin08t:1791_3: “ekissā bhikkhuniyā vinayakammaṃ kattabbamatthi, tatra no ayyā cattāro bhikkhū pesethā”ti.
tika-vin08t:1791_4: Saṅgahaṃ akātuṃ na labbhati, “pesessāmā”ti vattabbaṃ. Catūhi pakatattabhikkhunīhi
tika-vin08t:1791_5: mānattacāriniṃ bhikkhuniṃ gahetvā antoaruṇeyeva nikkhipitvā gāmūpacārato dve leḍḍupāte
tika-vin08t:1791_6: atikkamitvā maggā okkamma gumbavatiādīhi paṭicchanne ṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ, vihārūpacāratopi
tika-vin08t:1791_7: dve leḍḍupātā atikkamitabbā. Catūhi pakatattabhikkhūhipi tattha gantabbaṃ, gantvā
tika-vin08t:1791_8: pana bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ na ekaṭṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ, paṭikkamitvā avidūre ṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1791_9: Kurundimahāpaccarīsu pana “bhikkhunīhi byattaṃ ekaṃ vā dve vā upāsikāyo bhikkhūhipi
tika-vin08t:1791_10: ekaṃ vā dve vā upāsake attarakkhaṇatthāya gahetvā gantabba”nti vuttaṃ. Kurundiyaṃyeva
tika-vin08t:1791_11: ca “bhikkhunupassayassa ca vihārassa ca upacāraṃ muñcituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ, “gāmassā”ti na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1792_0: Evaṃ nisinnesu pana bhikkhunīsu ca bhikkhūsu ca tāya bhikkhuniyā “mānattaṃ samādiyāmi,
tika-vin08t:1792_1: vattaṃ samādiyāmī”ti vattaṃ samādiyitvā bhikkhunisaṅghassa tāva evaṃ ārocetabbaṃ
tika-vin08t:1792_2: “ahaṃ, ayye, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ gāmantaraṃ, sāhaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā gāmantarāya
tika-vin08t:1792_3: pakkhamānattaṃ yāciṃ, tassā me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā gāmantarāya pakkhamānattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1792_4: adāsi, sāhaṃ mānattaṃ carāmi, vediyāmahaṃ ayye, vediyatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretū”ti.
tika-vin08t:1793_0: Tato bhikkhusaṅghassa santikaṃ gantvā evaṃ ārocetabbaṃ “ahaṃ, ayyā, ekaṃ āpattiṃ
tika-vin08t:1793_1: āpajjiṃ…pe… vediyāmahaṃ ayyā, vediyatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretū”ti. Idhāpi yāya kāyaci
tika-vin08t:1793_2: bhāsāya ārocetuṃ vaṭṭati. Ārocetvā ca bhikkhunisaṅghasseva santike nisīditabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1793_3: ārocitakālato paṭṭhāya bhikkhūnaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace sāsaṅkā hoti, bhikkhuniyo
tika-vin08t:1793_4: tattheva ṭhānaṃ paccāsīsanti, ṭhātabbaṃ. Sace añño bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā taṃ ṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1793_5: eti, passantiyā ārocetabbaṃ. No ce āroceti, ratticchedo ceva vattabhedadukkaṭañca.
tika-vin08t:1793_6: Sace ajānantiyā eva upacāraṃ okkamitvā gacchati, ratticchedova hoti, na vattabhedadukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1793_7: Sace bhikkhuniyo upajjhāyādīnaṃ vattakaraṇatthaṃ pageva gantukāmā honti, rattivippavāsagaṇaohīyanagāmantarāpattirakkhaṇatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1793_8: ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ṭhapetvā gantabbaṃ, tāya aruṇe uṭṭhite tassā santike vattaṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1793_9: Etenupāyena akhaṇḍā pañcadasa rattiyo mānattaṃ caritabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1794_0: Anikkhittavattāya pana pārivāsikakkhandhake vuttanayeneva sammā vattitabbaṃ. Ayaṃ
tika-vin08t:1794_1: pana viseso – “āgantukassa ārocetabba”nti ettha yattakā purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1794_2: vā taṃ gāmaṃ bhikkhū vā bhikkhuniyo vā āgacchanti, sabbesaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Anārocentiyā
tika-vin08t:1794_3: ratticchedo ceva vattabhedadukkaṭañca. Sacepi rattiṃ koci bhikkhu taṃ gāmūpacāraṃ
tika-vin08t:1794_4: okkamitvā gacchati, ratticchedo hotiyeva, ajānanapaccayā pana vattabhedato muccati.
tika-vin08t:1794_6: taṃ pārivāsikavattādīnaṃ upacārasīmāya paricchinnattā yuttataraṃ dissati. Uposathe
tika-vin08t:1794_7: ārocetabbaṃ, pavāraṇāya ārocetabbaṃ, catunnaṃ bhikkhūnañca bhikkhunīnañca devasikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1794_8: ārocetabbaṃ. Sace bhikkhūnaṃ tasmiṃ gāme bhikkhācāro sampajjati, tattheva gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1794_9: No ce sampajjati, aññatra caritvāpi tatra āgantvā attānaṃ dassetvā gantabbaṃ, bahigāme
tika-vin08t:1794_10: vā saṅketaṭṭhānaṃ kātabbaṃ “asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne amhe passissatī”ti. Tāya saṅketaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1794_11: gantvā ārocetabbaṃ, saṅketaṭṭhāne adisvā vihāraṃ gantvā ārocetabbaṃ. Vihāre sabbabhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1794_12: ārocetabbaṃ. Sace sabbesaṃ sakkā na hoti ārocetuṃ, bahi upacārasīmāya ṭhatvā bhikkhuniyo
tika-vin08t:1794_13: pesetabbā, tāhi ānītānaṃ catunnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Sace vihāro dūro hoti sāsaṅko,
tika-vin08t:1794_14: upāsake ca upāsikāyo ca gahetvā gantabbaṃ. Sace pana ayaṃ ekā vasati, rattivippavāsaṃ
tika-vin08t:1794_15: āpajjati, tasmāssā ekā pakatattā bhikkhunī sammannitvā dātabbā ekacchanne vasanatthāya.
tika-vin08t:1795_0: Evaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ mānattaṃ caritvā vīsatigaṇe bhikkhunisaṅghe vuttanayeneva abbhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1795_1: kātabbaṃ. “Sace mānattaṃ caramānā antarāpattiṃ āpajjati, mūlāya paṭikassitvā tassā
tika-vin08t:1795_2: āpattiyā mānattaṃ dātabba”nti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ, idaṃ pakkhamānattaṃ nāma. Idaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:1795_4: vinayasaṅgahappakaraṇe ācariyena anuddhaṭaṃ. Ayaṃ panācariyassa adhippāyo siyā –
tika-vin08t:1795_5: idaṃ pakkhamānattaṃ bhikkhuniyoyeva sandhāya bhagavatā visuṃ paññattaṃ, bhikkhūhi
tika-vin08t:1795_6: asādhāraṇaṃ, imasmiñca kāle bhikkhunisaṅgho natthi, tasmā ganthassa lahubhāvatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1795_7: idampi aññampi īdisaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbanti. Amhehi pana bhikkhunisaṅghe avijjamānepi
tika-vin08t:1795_9: bhikkhuniyo bhagavato āṇaṃ patiṭṭhāpentiyo evarūpaṃ dukkaraṃ durabhisambhavaṃ vattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1795_10: samādayiṃsu, kimaṅgaṃ pana maya’nti manasi karontā bhagavato āṇaṃ patiṭṭhāpentā parivāsādivattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1795_11: samādiyissantī”ti mantvā ācariyena anuddhaṭampi imasmiṃ vinayālaṅkārappakaraṇe uddhaṭaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1795_13: sammā sikkhitabbaṃ. Ito parāni aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatanayeneva veditabbāni.
tika-vin08t:1797_0: 248. Pārivāsikavattakathāyaṃ navakataraṃ pārivāsikanti attanā navakataraṃ pārivāsikaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1797_1: Pārivāsikassa hi attanā navakataraṃ pārivāsikaṃ ṭhapetvā aññe mūlāyapaṭikassanāraha
tika-vin08t:1797_2: mānattāraha mānattacārika abbhānārahāpi pakatattaṭṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhanti. Tenāha “antamaso
tika-vin08t:1797_4: mānattārahamānattacārikaabbhānārahe saṅgaṇhāti. Te hi pārivāsikānaṃ, pārivāsikā ca
tika-vin08t:1797_5: tesaṃ pakatattaṭṭhāne eva tiṭṭhanti. Adhotapādaṭṭhapanakanti yattha ṭhatvā pāde dhovanti,
tika-vin08t:1797_6: tādisaṃ dāruphalakakhaṇḍādiṃ. Pādaghaṃsananti sakkharakathalādiṃ. Pāde ghaṃsanti
tika-vin08t:1797_7: etenāti pādaghaṃsanaṃ, sakkharakathalādi. Vuttañhi bhagavatā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:1797_8: tisso pādaghaṃsaniyo sakkharaṃ kathalaṃ samuddapheṇa”nti. Saddhivihārikānampi sādiyantassāti
tika-vin08t:1797_9: saddhivihārikānampi abhivādanādiṃ sādiyantassa. Vattaṃ karontīti ettakamattasseva
tika-vin08t:1797_10: vuttattā saddhivihārikādīhipi abhivādanādiṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. “Mā maṃ gāmappavesanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1797_11: āpucchathā”ti vutte anāpucchāpi gāmaṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:1798_0: Yo yo vuḍḍhoti pārivāsikesu bhikkhūsu yo yo vuḍḍho. Navakatarassa sāditunti pārivāsikanavakatarassa
tika-vin08t:1798_1: abhivādanādiṃ sādituṃ. “Pārisuddhiuposathe kariyamāne”ti idaṃ pavāraṇadivasesu saṅghe
tika-vin08t:1798_2: pavārente anupagatachinnavassādīhi kariyamānaṃ pārisuddhiuposathampi sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1798_3: Tatthevāti saṅghanavakaṭṭhāneyeva. Attano pāḷiyā pavāretabbanti attano vassaggena
tika-vin08t:1798_4: pattapāḷiyā pavāretabbaṃ, na pana sabbesu pavāritesūti attho.
tika-vin08t:1799_0: Oṇojanaṃ nāma vissajjanaṃ, taṃ pana pārivāsikena pāpitassa attanā sampaṭicchitasseva
tika-vin08t:1799_1: punadivasādiatthāya vissajjanaṃ kātabbaṃ. Asampaṭicchitvā ce vissajjeti, na labhatīti
tika-vin08t:1799_2: vuttaṃ. Yadi pana na gaṇhāti na vissajjetīti yadi purimadivase attano na gaṇhāti,
tika-vin08t:1800_0: Catussālabhattanti bhojanasālāya paṭipāṭiyā dīyamānaṃ bhattaṃ. Hatthapāse ṭhitenāti
tika-vin08t:1800_1: dāyakassa hatthapāse ṭhitena, paṭiggahaṇaruhanaṭṭhāneti adhippāyo. Mahāpeḷabhattepīti
tika-vin08t:1800_2: mahantesu bhattapacchiādibhājanesu ṭhapetvā dīyamānabhattesupi. Ito parampi pārivāsikavattaṃ
tika-vin08t:1800_3: pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Tattha pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatanayeneva attho suviññeyyo
tika-vin08t:1801_0: “Na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo”ti ettha dubbidhaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ dassetuṃ “añño”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t:1801_1: “Na bhikkhuniyo ovaditabbā”ti ettha laddhasammutikena āṇattopi garudhammehi aññehi
tika-vin08t:1801_2: vā ovadituṃ na labhatīti āha “paṭibalassa vā bhikkhussa bhāro kātabbo”ti. Āgatā bhikkhuniyo
tika-vin08t:1801_3: vattabbāti sambandho. Savacanīyanti sadosaṃ. Jeṭṭhakaṭṭhānaṃ na kātabbanti padhānaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1802_0: Rajehi hatā upahatā bhūmi etissāti rajohatabhūmi, rajokiṇṇabhūmīti attho. Paccayanti
tika-vin08t:1802_1: vassāvāsikalābhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ekapasse ṭhatvāti pāḷiṃ vihāya bhikkhūnaṃ pacchato
tika-vin08t:1802_2: ṭhatvā. Senāsanaṃ na labhatīti seyyapariyantabhāgitāya vassaggena gaṇhituṃ na labhati.
tika-vin08t:1802_3: Assāti bhaveyya. “Āgantukena ārocetabbaṃ, āgantukassa ārocetabba”nti avisesena vuttattā
tika-vin08t:1802_4: sace dve pārivāsikā gataṭṭhāne aññamaññaṃ passanti, ubhohipi aññamaññassa ārocetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1802_5: Yathā bahi disvā ārocitassa bhikkhuno vihāraṃ āgatena puna ārocanakiccaṃ natthi,
tika-vin08t:1802_6: evaṃ aññavihāraṃ gatenapi tattha pubbe ārocitassa puna ārocanakiccaṃ natthīti vadanti.
tika-vin08t:1802_7: Avisesenāti pārivāsikassa ca ukkhittakassa ca avisesena.
tika-vin08t:1803: Obaddhanti palibuddhaṃ. Sahavāsoti vuttappakāre channe bhikkhunā saddhiṃ sayanameva adhippetaṃ, na sesairiyāpathakappanaṃ. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin08t:1804_1: pana sukkavissaṭṭhādikā lokavajjāva. Tatthapi saṅghabhedādikā pāpiṭṭhatarā eva. Kammanti
tika-vin08t:1804_2: pārivāsikakammavācāti etena “kammabhūtā vācā kammavācā”ti kammavācāsaddassa atthopi
tika-vin08t:1804_3: siddhoti veditabbo. Savacanīyanti ettha sa-saddo “santi”atthaṃ vadati, attano vacanena
tika-vin08t:1804_4: attano pavattanakammanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo, “mā pakkamāhī”ti vā “ehi vinayadharānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1804_5: sammukhībhāva”nti vā evaṃ attano āṇāya pavattanakakammaṃ na kātabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:1804_6: Evañhi kenaci savacanīye kate anādarena atikkamituṃ na vaṭṭati, buddhassa saṅghassa
tika-vin08t:1804_7: āṇā atikkantā nāma hoti. Rajohatabhūmīti paṇṇasālāvisesanaṃ. Paccayanti vassāvāsikacīvaraṃ.
tika-vin08t:1804_8: Senāsanaṃ na labhatīti vassaggena na labhati. Apaṇṇakapaṭipadāti aviraddhapaṭipadā.
tika-vin08t:1804_9: Sace vāyamantopīti ettha avisayabhāvaṃ ñatvā avāyamantopi saṅgayhati. Avisesenāti
tika-vin08t:1804_11: channaṭṭhānesu. Obaddhanti uṭṭhānādibyāpārapaṭibaddhaṃ, pīḷitanti attho. Mañce vā
tika-vin08t:1804_12: pīṭhe vāti ettha vāsaddo samuccayattho. Tena taṭṭikācammakhaṇḍādīsu dīghāsanesupi
tika-vin08t:1804_13: nisīdituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dīpitaṃ hoti. Na vattabhedadukkaṭanti vuḍḍhatarassa jānantassapi
tika-vin08t:1804_14: vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ natthīti dasseti. Vattaṃ nikkhipāpetvāti idampi parivāsādimeva
tika-vin08t:1805_0: “Senāsanaṃ na labhati seyyapariyantabhāgitāya. Uddesādīni dātumpi na labhatīti vadanti.
tika-vin08t:1805_1: ‘Tadahupasampannepi pakatatte’ti vacanato anupasampannehi vasituṃ vaṭṭati. Samavassāti
tika-vin08t:1805_2: etena apacchā apurimaṃ nipajjane dvinnampi vattabhedāpattibhāvaṃ dīpeti. Attano attano
tika-vin08t:1805_3: navakataranti pārivāsikādinavakataraṃ. Paṭhamaṃ saṅghamajjhe parivāsaṃ gahetvā nikkhittavattena
tika-vin08t:1805_4: puna ekassapi santike samādiyituṃ nikkhipituñca vaṭṭati, mānatte pana nikkhipituṃ
tika-vin08t:1805_5: vaṭṭati. Ūnegaṇecaraṇadosattā na gahetunti eke. Paṭhamaṃ ādinnavattaṃ ekassa santike
tika-vin08t:1805_6: yathā nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati, tathā samādiyitumpi vaṭṭatīti porāṇagaṇṭhipade”ti vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ vuttanti.
tika-vin08t:1806_1: āgataṃ, samantapāsādikāyampi ettakāya pāḷiyā vaṇṇanaṃ vatvā “pārivāsikavattakathā
tika-vin08t:1806_2: niṭṭhitā”ti āha. Imasmiṃ vinayasaṅgahapakaraṇe pana “na chamāyaṃ caṅkamante caṅkame
tika-vin08t:1806_4: “na, bhikkhave, pārivāsikena bhikkhunā sāditabba”ntiādīni paṭhamaṃ paññattapadāni
tika-vin08t:1806_5: gahetvā tesaṃ padānaṃ saṃvaṇṇanaṃ katvā “idaṃ pārivāsikavatta”nti aññathā anukkamo
tika-vin08t:1806_6: vutto, so pāḷiyā ca aṭṭhakathāya ca na sameti. Ācariyassa pana ayamadhippāyo siyā
tika-vin08t:1806_8: na honti, atha kho kammakārakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kattabbākattabbakammadassanametaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin08t:1806_9: pārivāsikavatte na pavesetabbaṃ. “Na, bhikkhave, pārivāsikena bhikkhunā sāditabba”ntiādīni
tika-vin08t:1806_10: pana pārivāsikabhikkhūnaṃ sammāvattitabbavattāniyeva honti, tasmā imāniyeva pārivāsikavatte
tika-vin08t:1806_11: pavesetabbānīti. Amhehi pana pāḷiaṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu āgatānukkamena paṭhamaṃ paññattavattānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1806_12: atthaṃ paṭhamaṃ dassetvā pacchā paññattapadānaṃ attho pacchā vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t:1811_1: kathetuṃ “kammākammanti ettha panā”tiādimāha. Tattha samaggena saṅghena karīyate
tika-vin08t:1811_2: tanti kammaṃ, apalokanādicatubbidhavinayakammaṃ. Itarasmimpi eseva nayo. A-kāro vuddhiattho,
tika-vin08t:1811_3: na vuddhippattaṃ kammaṃ akammaṃ. Kammañca akammañca kammākammaṃ vajjāvajjaṃ viya,
tika-vin08t:1811_4: phalāphalaṃ viya ca. Tattha ca kammanti apalokanakammañattikammadvayaṃ. Akammanti
tika-vin08t:1811_5: ñattidutiyakammañatticatautthakammadvayaṃ. Atha vā kammanti catūsupi etesu lahukakammaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1811_6: Akammanti garukakammaṃ. Kammākammanti ettha pana vinicchayo evaṃ veditabboti yojanā.
tika-vin08t:1811_8: añño kammākammavinicchayakathāpakkho veditabboti vā mayā vuccateti vā attho.
tika-vin08t:1812_0: Cattāri kammānīti ettha cattārīti paricchedanidassanaṃ. Tena vinayakammāni nāma cattāri
tika-vin08t:1812_1: eva honti, na ito ūnādhikānīti dasseti. Kammānīti paricchinnakammanidassanaṃ. Apalokanakammantiādīni
tika-vin08t:1812_2: paricchinnakammānaṃ uddesakathanaṃ. Tattha apalokīyate āyācīyate apalokanaṃ, apapubbalokadhātu
tika-vin08t:1812_3: āyācanatthe, yupaccayo bhāvatthavācako. Apalokanavasena kattabbaṃ kammaṃ apalokanakammaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1812_4: sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghaṃ apaloketvā saṅghānumatiyā kattabbaṃ kammaṃ. Ñāpanā ñatti, saṅghassa
tika-vin08t:1812_5: jānāpanāti attho. Ñattiyā kattabbaṃ kammaṃ ñattikammaṃ, anussāvanaṃ akatvā suddhañattiyāyeva
tika-vin08t:1812_6: kattabbakammaṃ. Dvinnaṃ pūraṇī dutiyā, ñatti dutiyā etassa kammassāti ñattidutiyaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1812_7: ñattidutiyañca taṃ kammañcāti ñattidutiyakammaṃ, ekāya ñattiyā ekāya anussāvanāya
tika-vin08t:1812_8: kattabbakammaṃ. Catunnaṃ pūraṇī catutthī, ñatti catutthī etassa kammassāti ñatticatutthaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1812_9: ñatticatutthañca taṃ kammañcāti ñatticatutthakammaṃ, ekāya ñattiyā tīhi anussāvanāhi
tika-vin08t:1812_10: kattabbakammaṃ. Tena vakkhati “apalokanakammaṃ nāma sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghaṃ sodhetvā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t:1813_0: Evaṃ cattāri kammāni uddisitvā parivāre kammavagge āgatanayeneva tesaṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1813_1: vipattikāraṇāni pucchitvā vissajjetuṃ “imāni cattāri kammāni katihākārehi vipajjanti?
tika-vin08t:1813_2: Pañcahākārehi vipajjantī”tiādimāha. Tattha vatthutoti vinayakammassa kāraṇabhūtavatthuto.
tika-vin08t:1813_3: Ñattito anussāvanatoti dvepi kammavācāyameva. Sīmatoti kammakaraṇaṭṭhānabhūtabaddhasīmato.
tika-vin08t:1813_4: Parisatoti kammappattachandārahabhūtakārakasaṅghato. Tāniyeva hi pañca sabbesaṃ vinayakammānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1814_0: Tato taṃ kammavipattikāraṇabhūtaṃ vatthuṃ pāḷinayena vitthāretuṃ “sammukhākaraṇīyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1814_1: kammaṃ asammukhā karoti, vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakamma”ntyādimāha. Tattha sammukhākaraṇīyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1814_2: paṭipucchākaraṇīyaṃ paṭiññāyakaraṇīyanti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ atathākaraṇena, sativinayo
tika-vin08t:1814_3: amūḷhavinayo tassapāpiyasikā tajjanīyakammaṃ niyasakammaṃ pabbājanīyakammaṃ paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ
tika-vin08t:1814_4: ukkhepanīyakammaṃ parivāso mūlāyapaṭikassanā mānattaṃ abbhānaṃ upasampadanti imesaṃ
tika-vin08t:1814_5: terasakammānaṃ aññakammārahassa aññakammakaraṇena, uposatho pavāraṇāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1814_6: adivase karaṇena, paṇḍako theyyasaṃvāsako titthiyapakkantako tiracchānagato mātughātako
tika-vin08t:1814_7: pitughātako arahantaghātako lohituppādako saṅghabhedako bhikkhunidūsako ubhatobyañjanako
tika-vin08t:1814_8: ūnavīsativasso antimavatthuajjhāpannapubboti imesaṃ terasannaṃ puggalānaṃ upasampadākammakaraṇena
tika-vin08t:1814_9: iti imāni ekatiṃsa kammāni vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakammaṃ hoti. Ñattito pañca, anussāvanato
tika-vin08t:1814_10: pañcāti imāni dasa kāraṇāni antokammavācāyameva labhanti, sīmato ekādasa kāraṇāni
tika-vin08t:1815: Evaṃ kammavipattikāraṇāni dassetvā puna catuvaggasaṅghādīsu sannisinnānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ visesanāmaṃ dassetuṃ “catuvaggakaraṇe kamme”tiādimāha. Taṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin08t:1816: 250. Tato paraṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ ṭhānaṃ saṅkhepato dassetuṃ “apalokanakammaṃ kati ṭhānāni gacchatī”tiādimāha. Tampi suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin08t:1817_0: 251. Tato tāniyeva kammāni tesu ṭhānesu pavattāni vitthārato pakāsetukāmo “ayaṃ tāva
tika-vin08t:1817_1: pāḷinayo. Ayaṃ panettha ādito paṭṭhāya vinicchayakathā”tiādimāha. Tattha tassaṃ vinicchayakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1817_2: catūsu kammesu katamaṃ apalokanakammaṃ nāmāti pucchāyaṃ taṃ dassetumāha “apalokanakammaṃ
tika-vin08t:1817_4: saṅghaṃ sodhetvā. Na hi khaṇḍasīmāya sannipatite saṅghe sodhetabbakiccaṃ atthi, avippavāsasīmāsaṅkhātāya
tika-vin08t:1817_5: mahāsīmāya pana vitthārattā bahūnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānattā samaggabhāvatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1817_6: sodhetabbaṃ hoti. Chandārahānaṃ chandaṃ āharitvāti tissaṃ sīmāyaṃ catuvaggādigaṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:1817_7: pūretvā hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā ṭhitehi bhikkhūhi aññesaṃ hatthapāsaṃ anāgatānaṃ pakatattabhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1817_8: chandaṃ āharitvā. Vuttañhi “catuvaggakaraṇe kamme cattāro bhikkhū pakatattā kammappattā,
tika-vin08t:1817_9: avasesā pakatattā chandārahā”ti. Samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyāti chandassa āharitattā
tika-vin08t:1817_10: hatthapāsaṃ āgatāpi anāgatāpi sabbe bhikkhū samaggāyeva honti, tasmā samaggassa saṅghassa
tika-vin08t:1817_11: anumatiyā. Tikkhattuṃ sāvetvāti “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho”tiādinā kammavācaṃ abhaṇitvā
tika-vin08t:1817_12: “ruccati saṅghassa. Dutiyampi…pe… tatiyampi ruccati saṅghassā”ti tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā
tika-vin08t:1817_13: kattabbakammaṃ apalokanakammaṃ nāmāti yojanā. Vuttanayenevāti apalokanakamme vuttanayeneva.
tika-vin08t:1817_14: Iminā “sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghaṃ sodhetvā, chandārahānaṃ chandaṃ āharitvā”ti idaṃ dvayaṃ
tika-vin08t:1818_0: Tattha tesu catūsu kammesu kiṃ aññakammaṃ itarakammavasena kātabbanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha
tika-vin08t:1818_1: “tatra”iccādi. Evaṃ hotu, evaṃ sante avisesena sabbampi kammaṃ aññavasena kattabbanti
tika-vin08t:1818_2: āha “ñattidutiyakammaṃ panā”tiādi. Tattha pana-saddo visesatthajotako, ñattidutiyakamme
tika-vin08t:1818_3: pana viseso atthīti attho. Ito parāni suviññeyyāneva. Paṭikkhittameva aṭṭhakathāyanti
tika-vin08t:1818_4: ajjhāhārasambandho. Yadi evaṃ akkharaparihīnādīsu santesu kammakopo siyāti codanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1818_5: manasi katvā āha “sace panā”tiādi. Tattha akkharaparihīnanti “suṇātu me”tiādīsu su-kāra
tika-vin08t:1818_6: ṇā-kāra tu-kārādīnaṃ bhassanaṃ. Padaparihīnanti suṇātūtiādīnaṃ vibhatyantapadānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1819_0: Idāni punappunavacane payojanaṃ dassento “idaṃ akuppakamme daḷhikammaṃ hoti, kuppakamme
tika-vin08t:1819_1: kammaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhatī”ti āha. Tattha idanti idaṃ punappunaṃ vuttakammaṃ. Akuppakammeti
tika-vin08t:1819_2: akuppe ṭhānārahe purekatakamme. Daḷhikammaṃ hotīti thiratarakammaṃ hoti ekāya rajjuyā
tika-vin08t:1819_3: bandhitabbabhāre dutiyatatiyādirajjūhi bandhanaṃ viya. Kuppakammeti akkharaparihīnādivasena
tika-vin08t:1819_4: kuppe aṭṭhānārahe purekatakamme. Kammaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhatīti punappunaṃ vutte sati tesaṃ
tika-vin08t:1819_5: akkharaparihīnādīnaṃ sodhitattā parisuddhakammaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati. Akuppakamme kuppakammeti
tika-vin08t:1819_6: vā bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇatthe bhummavacanaṃ. Puretaraṃ katakammasmiṃ akuppakamme sati
tika-vin08t:1819_7: pacchā idaṃ punappunaṃ vuttakammaṃ daḷhikammaṃ hoti, purekatakammasmiṃ kuppakamme
tika-vin08t:1819_8: sati idaṃ punappunaṃ vuttakammaṃ akuppaṃ ṭhānārahaṃ parisuddhakammaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhatīti.
tika-vin08t:1819_9: Imaṃ pāṭhaṃ nissāya ācariyavarā ekapuggalampi anekakkhattuṃ upasampadakammaṃ karonti.
tika-vin08t:1819_10: Kasmā pana te bhikkhū lajjīpesalabahussutasikkhākāmabhūtānaṃ attano ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1819_11: santike sikkhaṃ gaṇhantīti? Na te attano ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ santikā laddhasikkhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1819_12: paccakkhāya aññaṃ gaṇhanti, atha kho tāya eva saddhiṃ diguṇatiguṇaṃ karonti. Evaṃ
tika-vin08t:1819_13: santepi purimasikkhāya asaddahantāyeva kareyyuṃ, no saddahantāti? No asaddahantā,
tika-vin08t:1819_14: saddahantāpi te bhikkhū punappunakaraṇe yuttitopi āgamatopi ādīnavaṃ apassantā ānisaṃsameva passantā karontīti.
tika-vin08t:1820_0: Kathaṃ yuttito ānisaṃsaṃ passanti? Yathā hi loke abhisittampi rājānaṃ punappunābhisiñcane
tika-vin08t:1820_1: ādīnavaṃ na passanti, atha kho abhisekānubhāvena rājiddhippattatādīhi kāraṇehi ānisaṃsameva
tika-vin08t:1820_2: passanti, yathā ca sāsane cetiyaṃ vā paṭimaṃ vā niṭṭhitasabbakiccaṃ “anekajātisaṃsāra”ntiādīhi
tika-vin08t:1820_3: bhagavato vacanehi abhisekamaṅgalaṃ karontāpi punappunakaraṇe ādīnavaṃ apassantā
tika-vin08t:1820_5: evameva kataupasampadakammaṃ bhikkhuṃ punadeva kammavācābhaṇane ādīnavaṃ apassantā
tika-vin08t:1820_6: pubbe katakammasmiṃ vatthuādīsu pañcasu aṅgesu ekasmimpi aṅge aparipuṇṇe sati kammakopasambhavato
tika-vin08t:1820_7: idāni katakammena paripuṇṇaaṅge sati kammasampattisambhavañca pubbeva kammasampattisambhavepi
tika-vin08t:1820_8: daḷhikammathiratarasambhavañca ānisaṃsaṃ passantā karonti. Kathaṃ āgamato ānisaṃsaṃ
tika-vin08t:1820_12: kāraṇena ayampi pacchimapāṭho ācariyena vutto. Tassattho heṭṭhā vuttova. Iti pubbe
tika-vin08t:1820_13: katakammassa kopasambhavepi idāni katakammena sampajjanasaṅkhātaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ āgamato
tika-vin08t:1821_0: Keci pana ācariyā imaṃ “punappunaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti pāṭhaṃ tasmiṃyeva paṭhamakammakaraṇakāle
tika-vin08t:1821_1: duruttasodhanatthaṃ vattabbataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na cirakāle”ti vadanti, tadetaṃ
tika-vin08t:1821_2: vacanaṃ neva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgataṃ, na ṭīkādīsu vinicchitaṃ, tesaṃ matimattameva,
tika-vin08t:1821_3: tasmā na gahetabbaṃ. Apica tasmiṃ khaṇe punappunaṃ vacanatopi aparabhāge vacanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1821_4: mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsaṃ. Tasmiñhi kāle punappunaṃ bhaṇane ñattidosaanussāvanadosāni
tika-vin08t:1821_5: pacchimabhaṇane suṭṭhu bhaṇanto sodhetuṃ sakkuṇeyya, na vatthuvipattisīmavipattiparisavipattidosāni.
tika-vin08t:1821_6: Tasmiñhi khaṇe tameva vatthu, sā eva sīmā, sā eva parisā, tasmā tāni punappunavacanena
tika-vin08t:1821_7: sodhetumasakkuṇeyyāni honti. Aparabhāge karonto pana pubbe aparipuṇṇavīsativassabhāvena
tika-vin08t:1821_8: vatthuvipattibhūtepi idāni paripuṇṇavīsativassattā vatthusampatti hoti, pubbe sīmasaṅkarādibhāvena
tika-vin08t:1821_9: sīmavipattisambhavepi idāni tadabhāvatthāya suṭṭhu sodhitattā sīmasampatti hoti,
tika-vin08t:1821_10: pubbe vaggakammādivasena parisavipattisambhavepi idāni tadabhāvatthāya suṭṭhu sodhitattā
tika-vin08t:1821_11: parisasampatti hoti, evaṃ pañca vipattiyo sodhetvā pañca sampattiyo sampādetvā kātuṃ
tika-vin08t:1821_12: sakkuṇeyyato paṭhamakāle punappunaṃ bhaṇanatopi aparabhāge bhaṇanaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti
tika-vin08t:1822_0: Yadi evaṃ upasampadasikkhāya daharo bhaveyyāti? Na bhaveyya. Kasmā? Porāṇasikkhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1822_1: appaccakkhitvā tāya eva patiṭṭhitattāti. Evaṃ santepi purekatakammassa sampajjanabhāvena
tika-vin08t:1822_2: tiṭṭhante sati tāya ṭhitattā adaharo siyā. Purimakammassa asampajjanabhāvena idāni
tika-vin08t:1822_3: katakammeyeva upasampadabhāvena tiṭṭhante sati kasmā daharo na bhaveyyāti? Evaṃ sante
tika-vin08t:1822_4: daharo bhaveyya. Evaṃ daharo samāno purimasikkhāya vassaṃ gaṇetvā yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanādīni
tika-vin08t:1822_5: sampaṭicchanto mahāsāvajjo bhaveyyāti? Evaṃ purimasikkhāya aṭṭhitabhāvaṃ pacchimasikkhāya
tika-vin08t:1822_6: eva laddhupasampadabhāvaṃ tathato jānanto evaṃ karonto sāvajjo hoti, evaṃ pana ajānanto
tika-vin08t:1822_7: “purimasikkhāyameva ṭhito”ti maññitvā evaṃ karonto anavajjoti veditabbo. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti
tika-vin08t:1822_8: ce? “Anāpatti ūnavīsativassaṃ paripuṇṇasaññīti ettha kiñcāpi upasampādentassa anāpatti,
tika-vin08t:1822_9: puggalo pana anupasampannova hoti. Sace pana so dasavassaccayena aññaṃ upasampādeti,
tika-vin08t:1822_10: taṃ ce muñcitvā gaṇo pūrati, sūpasampanno. Sopi ca yāva na jānāti, tāvassa neva saggantarāyo,
tika-vin08t:1822_11: na mokkhantarāyo. Ñatvā pana puna upasampajjitabba”nti samantapāsādikāyaṃ āgatattā
tika-vin08t:1822_12: viññāyati. Evaṃ vatthuvipannattā kammakopato anupasampannassa puggalassa upajjhāyo
tika-vin08t:1822_13: bhavituṃ yuttakāle puna upasampajjanena upasampannabhūtabhāvassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatattā
tika-vin08t:1822_15: pubbe anupasampannabhūtaṃ puggalampi aparabhāge vuḍḍhippattikālepi pañca vipattidosāni
tika-vin08t:1822_16: sodhetvā puna upasampadakammavācākaraṇena upasampādetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sopi puggalo pubbakammakāle
tika-vin08t:1822_17: anupasampanno hutvāpi aparakammakāle upasampanno hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t:1823_0: Ekacce pana bhikkhū porāṇasikkhaṃ paccakkhāya navasikkhameva gaṇhiṃsu, te pana bhikkhū
tika-vin08t:1823_1: navasikkhāvasena daharāva bhavanti, evaṃ karaṇañca ativiya guṇavisiṭṭhaṃ attano navakataraṃ
tika-vin08t:1823_2: bhikkhuṃ disvā tasmiṃ puggale payirupāsitukāmo taṃ puggalaṃ attanā vuḍḍhataraṃ kātukāmo
tika-vin08t:1823_3: attānaṃ daharaṃ kātukāmo hutvā dhammagāravena karonto yutto bhaveyya. Atha pana sikkhāsampannaṃ
tika-vin08t:1823_4: kattukāmo evaṃ kareyya, sikkhā nāma pañcaṅgasamannāgate sati sampajjati, sīlavisuddhiyeva
tika-vin08t:1823_5: kāraṇaṃ hoti, tasmā yadi purimasikkhā aṭṭhitā bhaveyya, paccakkhānakiccaṃ natthi,
tika-vin08t:1823_6: sayameva patitā hoti. Purimasikkhāya ṭhitāya sati vibbhamitukāmoyeva paccakkhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1823_7: kareyya, na bhikkhubhavitukāmo, so pana catupārisuddhisīlameva parisuddhaṃ kareyya,
tika-vin08t:1823_8: tasmā porāṇasikkhāya paccakkhānaṃ ayuttaṃ viya dissati. Tato porāṇasikkhaṃ paccakkhāya
tika-vin08t:1823_9: navasikkhāgahaṇato punappunaṃ karaṇaṃyeva yuttataraṃ dissati. Kasmā? Porāṇasikkhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1823_10: paccakkhāya navasikkhāgahaṇe purimakammaṃ asampajjitvā pacchimakammasampajjane sati
tika-vin08t:1823_11: kiñcāpi purimasikkhā natthi, yā paccakkhātabbā, tathāpi navasikkhāya sampajjitattā
tika-vin08t:1824_0: Yadi purimakammampi pacchimakammampi sampajjatiyeva, evaṃ sati purimasikkhāya paccakkhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1824_1: niratthakaṃ. Pacchimasikkhāya ṭhitopi daharabhāvaṃ pattattā ayuttarūpo. Yadi pana
tika-vin08t:1824_2: purimakammameva sampajjati, na pacchimakammaṃ, evaṃ sati pubbe ṭhitaporāṇasikkhāpi
tika-vin08t:1824_3: paccakkhānena patitā. Pacchimasikkhāpi pacchimakammassa pañcannaṃ vipattīnaṃ aññatarena
tika-vin08t:1824_4: yogato na sampajjati, tasmā purimasikkhāya ca patitattā pacchimasikkhāya ca aladdhattā
tika-vin08t:1824_5: ubhato bhaṭṭhattā ayuttova hoti. Porāṇasikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya navasikkhāgahaṇe pana
tika-vin08t:1824_6: sati purimakammaṃ sampannaṃ hutvā pacchimakammaṃ asampannaṃ hontampi purimasikkhāya
tika-vin08t:1824_7: patiṭṭhitoyeva, purimaṃ asampannaṃ hutvā pacchimaṃ sampannampi pacchimasikkhāya ṭhito
tika-vin08t:1824_9: purimasikkhāya ṭhitoyeva so bhikkhu hoti, tasmā purimasikkhaṃ paccakkhāya navasikkhāgahaṇato
tika-vin08t:1824_10: purimasikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya punappunaṃ navasikkhāgahaṇaṃ yuttataraṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1825_0: Imaṃ pana punappunaṃ karontānaṃ ācariyānaṃ vādaṃ amanasikarontā aññe ācariyā anekappakāraṃ
