tika-vin08t:1825_1: anicchitakathaṃ kathenti. Kathaṃ? Ekacce therā evaṃ vadanti “kiṃ ime bhikkhū evaṃ
tika-vin08t:1825_2: karontā pārājikappattaṃ bhikkhuṃ puna sikkhāya patiṭṭhāpessāmāti maññantī”ti. Te
tika-vin08t:1825_3: therā punappunaṃ kammavācaṃ bhaṇante bhikkhū disvā “ime bhikkhū iminā kāraṇena evaṃ
tika-vin08t:1825_4: karontī”ti cintetvā evamāhaṃsu. Ekacce pana therā “kasmā ime bhikkhū punappunaṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t:1825_5: yathā nāma asani ekavārameva patantī satte jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpeti, evameva bhagavato
tika-vin08t:1825_6: āṇābhūtā kammavācā ekavāraṃ bhaṇamānā kammaṃ sijjhāpeti, na anekavāra”nti, tepi “kammasijjhanatthāya
tika-vin08t:1825_7: punappunaṃ bhaṇantī”ti cintetvā evamāhaṃsu. Bahavo pana bhikkhū punappunaṃ karonte
tika-vin08t:1825_8: disvā evaṃ vadanti “ime bhikkhū ācariyupajjhāyehi dinnasikkhaṃ asaddahantā evaṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t:1825_9: ācariyupajjhāyaguṇāparādhakā ete samaṇā”ti. Te “pubbasikkhaṃ asaddahitvā punappunaṃ
tika-vin08t:1826_0: Apare pana therā “paṭhamaṃ upasampadakammavācābhaṇanakāleyeva punappunaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1826_1: na aparabhāge”ti, tattha kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Aññe evamāhaṃsu “ñattidutiyakammavācāyameva
tika-vin08t:1826_2: punappunaṃ vattabbanti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, na ñatticatutthakamme, atha ca panime
tika-vin08t:1826_3: bhikkhū ñatticatutthakammabhūtāya upasampadakammavācāya punappunaṃ karonti, etaṃ
tika-vin08t:1826_4: aṭṭhakathāya na sametī”ti, taṃ nītatthameva gahetvā vadiṃsu. Neyyatthato pana iminā
tika-vin08t:1826_5: nayena catūsupi kammesu punappunaṃ kātabbanti dasseti. Kammasaṅkarameva hi ñattidutiyakamme
tika-vin08t:1826_6: visesato vadati, punappunaṃ vattabbabhāvo pana sabbesūti daṭṭhabbo. Teneva hi ñatticatutthakammavācāya
tika-vin08t:1826_7: upasampannaṭṭhāneyeva pubbe anupasampannassa puggalassa pacchā upasampajjitabbabhāvo
tika-vin08t:1827_0: Paṭipucchākaraṇīyādīsupīti ettha ādisaddena paṭiṃññāya karaṇīyādayo saṅgaṇhāti. Tattha
tika-vin08t:1827_1: paṭipucchāya karaṇīyaṃ appaṭipucchā karotīti pucchitvā codetvā sāretvā kātabbaṃ apucchitvā
tika-vin08t:1827_2: acodetvā asāretvā karoti. Paṭiññāya karaṇīyaṃ appaṭiññāya karotīti paṭiññaṃ āropetvā
tika-vin08t:1827_3: yathādinnāya paṭiññāya kātabbaṃ apaṭiññāya paṭiññaṃ akarontassa vilapantassa balakkārena
tika-vin08t:1827_9: upāsake jātiādīhi dūsentassa. Ukkhepanīyakammārahassāti channabhikkhusadisassa āpattiṃ
tika-vin08t:1827_10: apassantassa āpattiṃ adesentassa ariṭṭhabhikkhusadisassa micchādiṭṭhiṃ avissajjentassa.
tika-vin08t:1828_0: Anuposathe uposathaṃ karotīti anuposathadivase uposathaṃ karoti. Uposathadivaso nāma
tika-vin08t:1828_1: ṭhapetvā kattikamāsaṃ avasesesu ekādasasu māsesu bhinnassa saṅghassa sāmaggidivaso
tika-vin08t:1828_2: ca yathāvuttā cātuddasapannarasā ca, etaṃ tippakārampi uposathadivasaṃ ṭhapetvā aññasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:1828_3: divase uposathaṃ karonto anuposathe uposathaṃ karoti nāma. Yatra hi pattacīvarādiatthāya
tika-vin08t:1828_4: appamattakena kāraṇena vivadantā uposathaṃ vā pavāraṇaṃ vā ṭhapenti, tattha tasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:1828_5: adhikaraṇe vinicchite “samaggā jātamhā”ti antarā sāmaggīuposathaṃ kātuṃ na labhanti,
tika-vin08t:1828_6: karontehi anuposathe uposatho kato nāma hoti.
tika-vin08t:1829_0: Appavāraṇāya pavāretīti appavāraṇadivase pavāreti. Pavāraṇadivaso nāma ekasmiṃ kattikamāse
tika-vin08t:1829_1: bhinnassa saṅghassa sāmaggidivaso ca paccukkaḍḍhitvā ṭhapitadivaso ca dve ca puṇṇamāsiyo,
tika-vin08t:1829_2: etaṃ catubbidhaṃ pavāraṇadivasaṃ ṭhapetvā aññasmiṃ divase pavārento appavāraṇāya
tika-vin08t:1829_3: pavāreti nāma. Idhāpi appamattakassa vivādassa vūpasame sāmaggīpavāraṇaṃ kātuṃ na
tika-vin08t:1829_4: labhanti. Karontehi appavāraṇāya pavāraṇā katā hotīti ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāpāṭho.
tika-vin08t:1830_0: “Ummattakassa bhikkhuno ummattakasammuti ummattakena yācitvā kate asammukhāpi dātuṃ
tika-vin08t:1830_1: vaṭṭati, tattha nisinnepi na kuppati niyamābhāvato. Asammukhā kate pana dosābhāvaṃ
tika-vin08t:1830_2: dassetuṃ ‘asammukhā kataṃ sukataṃ hotī’ti vuttaṃ. Dūtena upasampadā pana sammukhā
tika-vin08t:1830_3: kātuṃ na sakkā kammavācānānattasambhavato. Pattanikkujjanādayo hatthapāsato apanītamattepi
tika-vin08t:1830_4: kātuṃ vaṭṭanti. Saṅghasammukhatātiādīsu yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā, te āgatā honti,
tika-vin08t:1830_5: chandārahānaṃ chando āhato hoti, sammukhībhūtā na paṭikkosanti, ayaṃ saṅghasammukhatā.
tika-vin08t:1830_6: Yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusāsanena saṅgho kammaṃ karoti, ayaṃ dhammasammukhatā
tika-vin08t:1830_7: vinayasammukhatā. Tattha dhammoti bhūtaṃ vatthu. Vinayoti codanā ceva sāraṇā ca.
tika-vin08t:1830_8: Satthusāsanaṃ nāma ñattisampadā ceva anussāvanasampadā ca. Yassa saṅgho kammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin08t:1830_9: tassa sammukhābhāvo puggalasammukhatā. Kattikamāsassa pavāraṇamāsattā ‘ṭhapetvā kattikamāsa’nti
tika-vin08t:1830_10: vuttaṃ. Paccukkaḍḍhitvā ṭhapitadivaso cāti kāḷapakkhe cātuddasiṃ pannarasiṃ vā sandhāya
tika-vin08t:1830_11: vuttaṃ. Dve puṇṇamāsiyoti paṭhamapacchimavassūpagatānaṃ vasena vutta”nti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ āgataṃ.
tika-vin08t:1831_1: uposathaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti āha ‘ṭhapetvā kattikamāsa’nti. Sace pana tesaṃ nānāsīmāsu
tika-vin08t:1831_2: mahāpavāraṇāya visuṃ pavāritānaṃ kattikamāsabbhantare sāmaggī hoti, sāmaggīuposatho
tika-vin08t:1831_3: eva tehi kātabbo, na pavāraṇā ekasmiṃ vasse katapavāraṇānaṃ puna pavāraṇāya avihitattā.
tika-vin08t:1831_4: Sāmaggīdivaso hotīti anuposathadivase sāmaggīkaraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sace pana cātuddasiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1831_5: pannarasiyaṃ vā saṅgho sāmaggiṃ karoti, tadā sāmaggīuposathadivaso na hoti, cātuddasīpannarasīuposathova
tika-vin08t:1831_6: hoti. Upari pavāraṇāyapi eseva nayo. Paccukkaḍḍhitvā ṭhapitadivaso cāti bhaṇḍanakārakehi
tika-vin08t:1831_7: upaddutā vā kenacideva karaṇīyena pavāraṇasaṅgahaṃ vā katvā ṭhapito kāḷapakkhacātuddasīdivaso
tika-vin08t:1831_8: ca. Dve ca puṇṇamāsiyoti pubbakattikapuṇṇamā pacchimakattikapuṇṇamā cāti dve puṇṇamāsiyo.
tika-vin08t:1831_9: Etaṃ catubbidhanti puṇṇamāsidvayena saddhiṃ sāmaggīpavāraṇaṃ cātuddasīpavāraṇañca
tika-vin08t:1831_10: sampiṇḍetvā, idañca pakaticārittavasena vuttaṃ. Tathārūpapaccaye pana sati ubhinnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1831_11: puṇṇamāsīnaṃ purimā dve cātuddasiyo, kāḷapakkhacātuddasiyā anantarā pannarasīpīti
tika-vin08t:1831_12: imepi tayo divasā pavāraṇādivasā evāti imaṃ sattavidhampi pavāraṇādivasaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin08t:1831_13: aññasmiṃ divase pavāretuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vimativinodaniyaṃ āgataṃ.
tika-vin08t:1832_0: Evaṃ vatthuvipattivinicchayaṃ dassetvā idāni ñattivipattivinicchayaṃ anussāvanavipattivinicchayañca
tika-vin08t:1832_2: vā ñattiṃ ṭhapetī”ti etassa saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ anussāvanakammaṃ katvāti paṭhamaṃ anussāvanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1832_3: sāvetvā “esā ñattī”ti anussāvanānantarameva sakalaṃ ñattiṃ vatvā, pariyosāne “esā
tika-vin08t:1833_1: Dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedoti ettha dasadhā dasavidhena byañjanānaṃ pabhedoti
tika-vin08t:1833_3: byañjanasaṅkhātānaṃ akkharānaṃ janikā buddhi byañjanabuddhi, tāya byañjanabuddhiyā,
tika-vin08t:1833_4: akkharasamuṭṭhāpakacittabhedenevāti attho. Yaṃ vā saṃyogaparaṃ katvā vuccati, idampi
tika-vin08t:1834_0: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “ṭhānakaraṇāni sithilāni katvā uccāretabbamakkharaṃ sithilaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1834_1: tāniyeva dhanitāni asithilāni katvā uccāretabbamakkharaṃ dhanitaṃ. Dvimattakālaṃ
tika-vin08t:1834_2: dīghaṃ, ekamattakālaṃ rassaṃ. Dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedoti evaṃ sithilādivasena
tika-vin08t:1834_3: byañjanabuddhiyā akkharuppādakacittassa dasappakārena pabhedo. Sabbāni hi akkharāni
tika-vin08t:1834_4: cittasamuṭṭhānāni yathādhippetatthabyañjanato byañjanāni ca. Saṃyogo paro etasmāti
tika-vin08t:1834_5: saṃyogaparo. Na saṃyogaparo asaṃyogaparo ‘āyasmato buddharakkhitatherassa yassa na
tika-vin08t:1834_6: khamatī’ti ettha ta-kāra na-kārasahitāro asaṃyogaparo. Karaṇānīti kaṇṭhādīni” iti ettakaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1835_0: Puna vimativinodaniyaṃ “tattha āyasmatotiādīsu sarānantaritāni sa-kāra ma-kārādibyañjanāni
tika-vin08t:1835_1: ‘saṃyogo’ti vuccanti. Yo saṃyogo paro yassa a-kārādino, so saṃyogaparo nāma. Rassanti
tika-vin08t:1835_2: a-kārādibyañjanarahitaṃ padaṃ. Asaṃyogaparanti ‘yassa na khamatī’tiādīsu sa-kāra
tika-vin08t:1835_3: na-kārādibyañjanasahitaṃ padaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ta-kārassa tha-kāraṃ akatvā ‘suṇātu
tika-vin08t:1835_4: me’tiādiṃ avatvā vaggantare sithilameva katvā ‘suṇāṭu me’tiādiṃ vadantopi duruttaṃ
tika-vin08t:1835_5: karotiyeva ṭhapetvā anurūpaṃ ādesaṃ. Yañhi ‘saccikatthaparamatthenā’ti vattabbe ‘saccikaṭṭhaparamaṭṭhenā’ti
tika-vin08t:1835_6: ca ‘atthakathā’ti ca vattabbe ‘aṭṭhakathā’ti ca tattha tattha vuccati, tādisaṃ pāḷiaṭṭhakathādīsu
tika-vin08t:1835_7: diṭṭhapayogaṃ tadanurūpañca vattuṃ vaṭṭati, tato aññaṃ na vaṭṭati. Tenāha ‘anukkamāgataṃ
tika-vin08t:1835_10: vā ‘upasampadāpekkho’ti vattabbe ‘upasampadāpekho’ti vā evaṃ anurūpaṭṭhānesu eva
tika-vin08t:1835_11: dīgharassādirassadīghādivasena parivattetuṃ vaṭṭati, na pana ‘nāgo’ti vattabbe ‘nago’ti
tika-vin08t:1835_12: vā ‘saṅgho’ti vattabbe ‘sagho’ti vā ‘tisso’ti vattabbe ‘tiso’ti vā ‘yācatī’ti vattabbe
tika-vin08t:1835_13: ‘yācantī’ti vā evaṃ ananurūpaṭṭhānesu vattuṃ. Sambandhaṃ pana vavatthānañca sabbathāpi
tika-vin08t:1835_14: vaṭṭatīti gahetabba”nti āgataṃ. Sesāni aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva suṭṭhu sallakkhetabbāni.
tika-vin08t:1836: 253. Sīmavipattivinicchayo pana heṭṭhā sīmakathāyaṃ sabbena kathito, tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva gahetabbo.
tika-vin08t:1837_0: Parisavipattikathāya catuvaggakaraṇeti catuvaggena saṅghena kattabbe. Anissāritāti
tika-vin08t:1837_1: uposathaṭṭhapanādinā vā laddhinānāsaṃvāsakabhāvena vā na bahikatā. Aṭṭhakathāyañhi
tika-vin08t:1837_2: “apakatattassāti ukkhittakassa vā yassa vā uposathapavāraṇā ṭhapitā hontī”ti vuttattā
tika-vin08t:1837_3: ṭhapitauposathapavāraṇo bhikkhu apakatatto evāti gahetabbaṃ. Parisuddhasīlāti pārājikaṃ
tika-vin08t:1837_4: anāpannā adhippetā. Parivāsādikammesu pana garukaṭṭhāpi apakatattā evāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1837_5: Avasesā…pe… chandārahāva hontīti hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhite sandhāya vuttaṃ, avijahitvā
tika-vin08t:1837_6: ṭhitā pana chandārahā na honti, tepi catuvaggādito adhikā hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvāva
tika-vin08t:1837_7: chandārahā honti, tasmā saṅghato hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhiteneva chando vā pārisuddhi vā dātabbā.
tika-vin08t:1838_0: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “anukkhittā pārājikaṃ anāpannā ca pakatattāti āha ‘pakatattā
tika-vin08t:1838_1: anukkhittā’tiādi. Tattha anissāritāti purimapadasseva vevacanaṃ. Parisuddhasīlāti
tika-vin08t:1838_2: pārājikaṃ anāpannā. Na tesaṃ chando vā pārisuddhi vā etīti tīsu dvīsu vā nisinnesu
tika-vin08t:1838_3: ekassa vā dvinnaṃ vā chandapārisuddhi āhaṭāpi anāhaṭāva hotīti adhippāyo”ti āgato.
tika-vin08t:1838_4: Evaṃ pāḷiyañca aṭṭhakathāya ca catunnampi kammānaṃ sampatti ca vipatti ca āgatā,
tika-vin08t:1838_5: ṭīkācariyehi ca vinicchitā, tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva cattāri kammāni kattabbāni,
tika-vin08t:1847_0: Imasmiñhi kammavagge apalokanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ karaṇaṭṭhānaṃ ekādasavipattisīmavimuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:1847_1: baddhasīmabhūtaṃyeva vuttaṃ, “ekādasahi ākārehi sīmato kammāni vipajjantī”ti vacanato
tika-vin08t:1847_2: na abaddhaupacārasīmabhūtaṃ. Na hi tattha ekādasavipatti atthi. Aṭṭhakathāyampi “apalokanakammaṃ
tika-vin08t:1847_3: nāma sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghaṃ sodhetvā chandārahānaṃ chandaṃ āharitvā samaggassa saṅghassa
tika-vin08t:1847_4: anumatiyā tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā kattabbaṃ kamma”nti apalokanakammassāpi baddhasīmāyameva
tika-vin08t:1847_5: kattabbabhāvo vutto, na upacārasīmāyaṃ. Na hi tattha sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghasodhanañca chandārahānañca
tika-vin08t:1847_6: atthi, antosīmaṃ paviṭṭhapaviṭṭhānaṃ saṅghalābho dātabboyeva hoti, tasmā “ñattikammabhūtaṃ
tika-vin08t:1847_7: uposathapavāraṇākammaṃ abaddhasīmavihārepi kattabba”nti gaṇhantānaṃ ācariyānaṃ vādopi
tika-vin08t:1847_9: ācariyānaṃ vādopi pāḷivirodho aṭṭhakathāvirodho ca hotīti veditabbo. Yamettha vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1848_0: Idāni sabbe bhikkhū lekhakārehi paricayavasena sabbaganthānaṃ ādimhi likhitaṃ mahānamakkārapāṭhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1848_1: saraṇagamanassa, kammavācāya ca ārambhakāle mahatā ussāhena bhaṇanti, so pana pāṭho
tika-vin08t:1848_2: neva saraṇagamanapariyāpanno, na kammavācāpariyāpanno, nāpi kammavācāya pubbakaraṇapariyāpanno,
tika-vin08t:1848_3: tasmiṃ abhaṇitepi na saraṇagamanassa vā kammavācāya vā hāni atthi, na bhaṇite vaḍḍhi,
tika-vin08t:1848_4: tasmā pakaraṇācariyā saraṇagamanārambhepi kammavācārambhepi tassa mahānamakkārapāṭhassa
tika-vin08t:1848_5: vaṇṇanaṃ na vadanti, vadanto pana “bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa” iti padānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1848_7: itipadānaṃ attho viya vitthārena vattabbo siyā, evaṃ santepi bhagavato yathābhūtaguṇadīpanavasena
tika-vin08t:1848_8: pavattattā sabbepi ācariyā sabbesu ganthārambhesu tikkhattuṃ maṅgalatthaṃ bhaṇanti.
tika-vin08t:1848_9: Bhaṇantehi ca pana na-kāra mo-kārādīnaṃ ṭhānakaraṇādisampadaṃ ahāpentena sithiladhanitadīgharassādivisesaṃ
tika-vin08t:1848_10: manasi karontena samaṇasāruppena parimaṇḍalena padabyañjanena bhaṇitabbo hoti, na
tika-vin08t:1848_11: atiāyatakena gītasaddasadisena saddena. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “na, bhikkhave, āyatakena
tika-vin08t:1848_12: gītassarena dhammo gāyitabbo, yo gāyeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti.
tika-vin08t:1851_0: Saddappakaraṇācariyehi vuttaṃ saddalakkhaṇaṃ nissāya na-kārādīsu rassabhūte asare
tika-vin08t:1851_1: ekamattaṃ, na-byañjane aḍḍhamattaṃ sampiṇḍetvā diyaḍḍhamattakālaṃ pamāṇaṃ katvā uccārīyate.
tika-vin08t:1851_2: Mo-kārādīsu dīghabhūte o-kārādisare dvimattaṃ, ma-kārādibyañjane aḍḍhamattaṃ sampiṇḍetvā
tika-vin08t:1851_3: aḍḍhateyyamattākālaṃ pamāṇaṃ katvā uccārīyate, na tato uddhanti. Nanu “pluto timatto
tika-vin08t:1851_4: ñeyyo”ti vuttanti? Saccaṃ, sā pana dūrato avhāyanādīsuyeva labbhati, nāññattha. Vuttañhi kārikāyaṃ –
tika-vin08t:1853: Plutā timattikā vuttā, sabbete nettha gayhare”ti. –
tika-vin08t:1854: Kittakena pana kālena ekamattā viññeyyāti? Akkhinimisaummisamattakālenāti ācariyā. Eke pana ācariyā “aṅguliphoṭanakālappamāṇenā”ti vadanti. Vuttañhi ācariyadhammasenāpatittherena –
tika-vin08t:1857_0: Evaṃ saddasatthācariyehi vacanato suddharassasaraṭṭhāne ekamattāpamāṇaṃ, sabyañjanarassasaraṭṭhāne
tika-vin08t:1858_0: Idāni pana bhikkhū mahānamakkārabhaṇane balavaussāhaṃ katvā bhaṇantā rassaṭṭhānesu
tika-vin08t:1858_1: dvitimattākālaṃ dīghaṭṭhānesu catupañcamattākālaṃ saraṃ paṭhapetvā bhaṇanti, tadayuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:1858_2: viya dissati. Apare paṭhamavāre bhaṇitvā “sammāsambuddhassā”ti pariyosānapadaṃ patvāpi
tika-vin08t:1858_3: tattha aṭṭhapetvā puna “namo tassā”ti bhaṇitvā sa-kāre ṭhapetvā thokaṃ vissamitvā
tika-vin08t:1858_4: dutiyavāre “bhagavato”ti idaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva pariyosānaṃ bhaṇitvā ṭhapenti. Tatiyavāre
tika-vin08t:1858_5: pana ādito paṭṭhāya pariyosāne ṭhapenti. Evaṃ bhaṇantañca bahū pasaṃsanti, evaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:1858_6: kātabbanti neva pāḷiyaṃ, na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vijjati. Yathā ñatticatutthakamme kariyamāne
tika-vin08t:1858_7: tīṇi anussāvanāni saddato ca atthato ca abhinnāni aññamaññaṃ saṅkaravirahitāni katvā
tika-vin08t:1858_8: bhaṇitabbāni, evaṃ mahānamakkārapāṭhe tikkhattuṃ bhaññamāne tayo vārā saddato ca
tika-vin08t:1858_9: atthato ca abhinne katvā saṅkaravirahite katvā ādito ārabhitvā pariyosāne ṭhapetabbā hontīti.
tika-vin08t:1859_0: Tatrāyamekeevaṃ vadanti – yathā nāma javena gacchantassa ṭhātabbaṭṭhānaṃ patvāpi
tika-vin08t:1859_1: sahasā ṭhātuṃ na sakkoti, ekapādamattaṃ gantvā tiṭṭhati, evaṃ ādito bhaṇantassa balavaussāhattā
tika-vin08t:1859_2: pariyosāne pattepi ṭhapetuṃ na sakkoti, “namo tassā”ti dvipadamattaṃ bhaṇitvā sakkotīti.
tika-vin08t:1859_3: Evaṃ sante dutiyatatiyavāresu kasmā sakkotīti? Tadā pana dutiyavāre thokaṃ vissamitattā
tika-vin08t:1859_4: laddhassāso hutvā sakkotīti. Evaṃ te āyasmanto sayameva attānaṃ vighātaṃ pāpenti.
tika-vin08t:1859_5: Na hi “mahānamakkāraṃ bhaṇantena paṭhamavāre balavaussāhena bhaṇitabbo”ti bhagavatā
tika-vin08t:1859_6: paññatto, dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi vā ṭhapito atthi. Evaṃ sante yathā pātimokkhuddesakena
tika-vin08t:1859_7: pātimokkhaṃ uddisantena yattakā bhikkhū pātimokkhaṃ suṇanti, tesaṃ savanappamāṇena
tika-vin08t:1859_8: yāva pariyosānā uddisituṃ attano sarappamāṇaṃ gahetvā pātimokkho uddisitabbo, evaṃ
tika-vin08t:1859_9: kammavācaṃ bhaṇantenapi sīmamaṇḍale nisinnabhikkhūnaṃ savanappamāṇena yāva pariyosānā
tika-vin08t:1860_0: Apare pana ācariyā mo-kārādīsu o-kārantapadesu aññesaṃ padānaṃ atirekena sarena dvattikkhattuṃ
tika-vin08t:1860_1: anukaraṇasaddaṃ anubandhāpayamānā bhaṇanti, tesaṃ ācariyānaṃ tādisaṃ bhaṇanaṃ sutvā
tika-vin08t:1860_2: paricayappattā aññe bhikkhū vā gahaṭṭhā vā aññesaṃ ācariyānaṃ kammavācaṃ na garuṃ
tika-vin08t:1860_3: karonti, tāya kammavācāya upasampadā alabhitabbā viya maññanti, tādisaṃ pana bhaṇanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1860_4: tesaṃ ācariyānaṃ sissānusissā eva tathā bhaṇanti, na aññe ācariyā. Te pana porāṇācariyānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1860_5: sarasampannānaṃ anukaraṇasaddarahitampi sahitaṃ viya khāyamānaṃ suṇantānaṃ atimanorathaṃ
tika-vin08t:1860_6: saddaṃ sutvā diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjantā evaṃ karonti maññe. Na hi vinaye vā saddasatthesu
tika-vin08t:1860_7: vā tathā bhaṇitabbanti atthi, tasmā vicāretabbametanti.
tika-vin08t:1861_0: Bahū pana bhikkhū “sithilaṃ dhanitañca dīgharassa”ntiādinā vinaye kathitavinicchayañca
tika-vin08t:1861_1: “ettha pañcasu vaggesū”tiādinā saddasatthesu katavinicchayañca ajānantā piṭakattayakovidānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1861_2: vinayadharabahussutattherānaṃ santikā aladdhopadesā hutvā tattha tattha upasampadaṃ
tika-vin08t:1861_3: karontānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vacanameva gahetvā heyyopādeyyaṃ ajānantā pubbe paradesato
tika-vin08t:1861_4: āgatānaṃ puññavantānaṃ sarasampannānaṃ mahātherānaṃ anosarena bhaṇamānānaṃ saraṃ
tika-vin08t:1861_5: sutvā tesaṃ theravarānaṃ matiṃ apucchitvāva yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāsutaṃ likhitvā ṭhapentā
tika-vin08t:1861_6: anukkamena paṇḍitehi hasitabbaṃ ayuttaṃ kathaṃ dīpentā “imasmiṃ ṭhāne byagghiyā saddasadisaṃ
tika-vin08t:1861_7: saddaṃ karonti, imasmiṃ ṭhāne sakuṇiyā saddasadisaṃ saddaṃ karonti, imasmiṃ ṭhāne
tika-vin08t:1861_8: tambulakasaṭapātaṃ karonti, imasmiṃ ṭhāne dakkhiṇato namantā bhaṇanti, imasmiṃ ṭhāne
tika-vin08t:1861_9: vāmato namantā bhaṇanti, imasmiṃ ṭhāne vilāsaṃ kurumānā bhaṇantī”tiādīni vatvā tadeva
tika-vin08t:1861_10: saddahantā rukkhamūlaumaṅgaleṇādīsu nisīditvā tameva vacanaṃ anusikkhantā tadanurūpaṃ
tika-vin08t:1861_11: kammavācaṃ bhaṇantā “ahaṃ kammavācākusalo”ti vatvā bālajane saññāpetvā tesaṃ tesaṃ
tika-vin08t:1861_12: upasampadāpekkhānaṃ kammavācaṃ bhaṇanti, ime bhikkhū bhagavato āṇaṃ atikkāmenti,
tika-vin08t:1862_0: Athāparepi bhikkhū gāmakāvāsādīsu vasantā paṇḍitānaṃ santike apayirupāsamānā vatthusampattimpi
tika-vin08t:1862_2: bahavo sisse ṭhapetvā pabbajjañca upasampadañca karontā parisaṃ vaḍḍhāpenti, tepi
tika-vin08t:1862_3: bhagavato sāsanaṃ osakkāpenti, tasmā bhagavato āṇaṃ karontehi lajjīpesalehi bahussutehi
tika-vin08t:1862_4: sikkhākāmehi sappurisabhikkhūhi evarūpānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sahāyakehi upatthambhakehi
tika-vin08t:1865_0: Imaṃ silokaṃ upanissāya saraṇagamanepi “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti pāṭhaṃ “buddhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1865_1: saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti paṭhanti. Kammavācāyampi “paṭhamaṃ upajjhaṃ gāhāpetabbo”tiādipāṭhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1865_2: “paṭhamaṃ upajjhaṃ gāhāpetabbo”tiādinā paṭhanti. Ettha yuttitopi āgamatopi kāraṇaṃ cintetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1866_0: Tatrāyaṃ yutticintā – “ca-kārantaṃ sa-kārantaṃ, ta-kārantasamaṃ vade”ti ettha ca-kāro
tika-vin08t:1866_1: tālujo, ta-kāro dantajo, evamete akkharā ṭhānatopi asamānā. Ca-kāro jivhāmajjhakaraṇo,
tika-vin08t:1866_2: ta-kāro jivhaggakaraṇo, evaṃ karaṇatopi asamānā. Ca-kāro dutiyavaggapariyāpanno,
tika-vin08t:1866_3: ta-kāro catutthavaggapariyāpanno, evaṃ vaggatopi asamānā. Saṃyogakkharavasena na
tika-vin08t:1866_4: pubbakkharā sutiṃ labhantā saravisesaṃ pāpuṇanti, teneva ca-kārena saddasatthakārācariyā
tika-vin08t:1866_5: “saṃyoge pare rassatta”nti ca “saṃyogapubbā e-kāro-kārā rassāiva vattabbā”ti ca vadanti.
tika-vin08t:1866_6: Evaṃ sante kathaṃ asamānaṭṭhānikena asamānakaraṇena asamānavaggena saṃyogakkharena
tika-vin08t:1866_7: laddhasutikā akkharā tato aññena asamānaṭṭhānikena asamānakaraṇena asamānavaggena
tika-vin08t:1866_8: saṃyogakkharena laddhasamānasutikā bhaveyyuṃ. Na kevalañca ete akkharā asamānaṭṭhānikā
tika-vin08t:1866_9: asamānakaraṇā asamānavaggāva honti, atha kho anāsannaṭṭhānikā anāsannakaraṇā anāsannavaggā
tika-vin08t:1866_10: ca honti. Yathā ca vīṇaṃ vādentānaṃ dūre tantissarena tato dūre tantissaro asamāno
tika-vin08t:1866_11: hoti, evaṃ dūraṭṭhānikena akkharena dūrakaraṇena tato dūraṭṭhāniko dūrakaraṇo samānasutiko
tika-vin08t:1866_12: kathaṃ bhaveyya, vaggakkharānañca aññamaññaṃ asaṅkaravasena asamānasutivasena pavattanato
tika-vin08t:1866_13: “vaggantaṃ vā vagge”ti sutte niggahitassa vaggantakaraṇe sati aññavaggasmiṃ pare
tika-vin08t:1866_14: aññavaggantaṃ na pāpuṇāti, “vagge ghosāghosānaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā”ti suttena ca asadisadvebhāvakaraṇe
tika-vin08t:1867_0: Yadi ca ca-kārantakkharo ta-kārantakkharena samānasutiko siyā, evaṃ sati kiṃ ca-kārantakkharalekhanena
tika-vin08t:1867_1: sabbattha ta-kārantameva likheyya, tathā pana alikhitvā payogānurūpaṃ paṭhamakkharassa
tika-vin08t:1867_5: no itaresaṃ, tasmā payogānurūpaṃ ca-kāranta ja-kārantaṭṭhānesu sakavaggasutivaseneva
tika-vin08t:1867_6: vattabbaṃ, na aññavaggasutivasena. Sa-kārante pana sa-kārassa ta-kārena samānaṭṭhānikattā
tika-vin08t:1867_7: samānakaraṇattā ca vaggaavaggavasena bhinnepi avaggakkharānaṃ vaggakkharehi sādhāraṇattā
tika-vin08t:1867_8: ca avaggakkharānaṃ vaggakkharānaṃ viya visuṃ sutiyā abhāvato ca sa-kārantassa ta-kārantabhaṇanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1867_9: yuttaṃ siyā. Sa-kāropi hi dantajo, ta-kāropi, sa-kāropi jivhaggakaraṇo, ta-kāropi,
tika-vin08t:1867_10: tasmā samānaṭṭhānikānaṃ samānakaraṇānaṃ akkharānaṃ samānasutibhāvo yutto. Ña-kāranta
tika-vin08t:1867_11: la-kārantānaṃ na-kārantabhaṇanepi iminā nayena ña-kāranta na-kārantānaṃ asamānasutibhāvo
tika-vin08t:1867_12: la-kāranta na-kārantānaṃ samānasutibhāvo daṭṭhabboti. Ayamettha yutticintā.
tika-vin08t:1871_0: Ayaṃ siloko kuto pabhavo, kattha āgato, kena kāritoti? Tattha kuto pabhavoti bhagavantasmā
tika-vin08t:1871_1: vā dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi vā aṭṭhakathācariyehi vā pabhavo. Kattha āgatoti vinaye
tika-vin08t:1871_2: vā suttante vā abhidhamme vā pāḷiyaṃ vā aṭṭhakathāya vā ṭīkādīsu vā āgato. Kena kāritoti
tika-vin08t:1871_4: vā mukhamattadīpanikārakena vajirabuddhācariyena vā padarūpasiddhikārakena buddhapiyācariyena
tika-vin08t:1871_5: vā saddanītippakaraṇakārakena aggavaṃsācariyena vā tadaññasatthakārakehi mahātherehi
tika-vin08t:1871_6: vā kāritoti evaṃ āgamacintāyaṃ sati ayaṃ siloko bhagavantasmā pabhavo dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi
tika-vin08t:1871_7: vā aṭṭhakathācariyehi vāti na paññāyati. “Vinaye vā suttante vā abhidhamme vā pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1871_8: vā aṭṭhakathāya vā ṭīkāsu vā āgato”ti hi na sakkā vattuṃ. Kaccāyanācariyādīhi saddasatthakārakehi
tika-vin08t:1871_9: ācariyehi katotipi na dissati. Evaṃ sante appāṭihīrakataṃ idaṃ vacanaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin08t:1872_0: Evaṃ pana mayaṃ cintayimhā – rāmaññadese kira sakabhāsāyaṃ ca-kāranta ña-kārantā
tika-vin08t:1872_1: na santi, teneva rāmaññadesiyā bhikkhū “sacca”iti imaṃ pāṭhaṃ vadantā “satca”iti
tika-vin08t:1872_2: vadanti, “pañcaṅga”iti pāṭhaṃ vadantā “pancaṅga”iti vadanti, tasmā attano visaye
tika-vin08t:1872_3: avijjamānaṃ ca-kāranta ña-kārantaṃ yathāpāṭhaṃ vattumasakkontehi tehi bhikkhūhi sakabhāsānurūpato
tika-vin08t:1872_4: ayaṃ siloko kārito bhavissatīti. Evaṃ santepi marammabhāsāya ca-kāranta ña-kārantapadānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1872_5: sutivisesavasena visuṃ paññāyanato marammadesiyā bhikkhū taṃ silokaṃ anuvattitvā
tika-vin08t:1872_6: “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti vā “paṭhamaṃ upatjhaṃ gāhāpetabbo”ti vā “hetupatcayo
tika-vin08t:1872_7: ārammaṇapatcayo”ti vā vattuṃ na arahanti. Rāmaññadesiyāpi sakabhāsāya visuṃ avijjamānampi
tika-vin08t:1872_8: ca-kāranta ña-kārantapadaṃ sakabhāsākathanakāleyeva bhāsānurūpaṃ ta-kāranta na-kārantabhāvena
tika-vin08t:1872_9: kathetabbaṃ, māgadhabhāsākathanakāle pana māgadhabhāsāya ca-kāranta ña-kārantapadānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1872_10: visuṃ payogadassanato māgadhabhāsānurūpaṃ ca-kāranta ña-kārantapadānaṃ visuṃ sutivasena
tika-vin08t:1872_11: yathāpāṭhameva kathetabbānīti no mati. Ayamettha āgamacintā.
tika-vin08t:1877_0: 254. Evaṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ sampattivipattiṃ dassetvā idāni tesaṃ kammānaṃ ṭhānappabhedaṃ
tika-vin08t:1877_1: dassento “apalokanakammaṃ katamāni pañca ṭhānāni gacchatī”tiādimāha. Tattha vinicchayo
tika-vin08t:1877_3: sacepi sāmaṇero”tiādīsu buddhādīnaṃ avaṇṇabhāsanampi akappiyādiṃ kappiyādibhāvena
tika-vin08t:1877_4: dīpanampi diṭṭhivipattiyaṃyeva pavisati, teneva vakkhati “taṃ laddhiṃ vissajjāpetabbo”ti.
tika-vin08t:1877_5: Bhikkhūnampi eseva nayo. Micchādiṭṭhikoti buddhavacanādhippāyaṃ viparītato gaṇhanto,
tika-vin08t:1877_6: so eva “antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgato”ti vutto. Keci pana “sassatucchedānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1877_7: aññataradiṭṭhiyā samannāgato”ti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ. Sassatucchedagāhassa sāmaṇerānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1877_8: liṅganāsanāya kāraṇattena heṭṭhā aṭṭhakathāyameva vuttattā idha ca daṇḍakammanāsanāya
tika-vin08t:1877_9: eva adhippetattā. Kāyasambhogasāmaggīti sahaseyyapaṭiggahaṇādi. Soratoti subhe rato,
tika-vin08t:1877_10: suṭṭhu oratoti vā sorato. Nivātavuttīti nīcavutti.
tika-vin08t:1878_0: Tassāpi dātabboti vijjamānaṃ mukharādibhāvaṃ nissāya appaṭipucchitvāpi paṭiññaṃ aggahetvāpi
tika-vin08t:1878_1: āpattiṃ anāropetvāpi desitāyapi āpattiyā khuṃsanādito anoramantassa dātabbova. Oramantassa
tika-vin08t:1878_2: pana khamāpentassa na dātabbo. Brahmadaṇḍassa dānanti kharadaṇḍassa ukkaṭṭhadaṇḍassa
tika-vin08t:1878_3: dānaṃ. Tajjanīyādikamme hi kate ovādānusāsanippadānapaṭikkhepo natthi, dinnabrahmadaṇḍe
tika-vin08t:1878_4: pana tasmiṃ saddhiṃ tajjanīyakammādikatehi paṭikkhittampi kātuṃ na vaṭṭati “neva
tika-vin08t:1878_5: vattabbo”tiādinā ālāpasallāpamattassapi na-kārena paṭikkhitattā. Tañhi disvā bhikkhū
tika-vin08t:1878_6: gīvaṃ parivattetvā olokanamattampi na karonti, evaṃ vivajjetabbaṃ nimmadanakaraṇatthameva
tika-vin08t:1878_7: tassa daṇḍassa anuññātattā. Teneva channattheropi ukkhepanīyādikammakatopi abhāyitvā
tika-vin08t:1878_8: brahmadaṇḍe dinne “saṅghenāhaṃ sabbathā vivajjito”ti mucchito papati. Yo pana brahmadaṇḍakatena
tika-vin08t:1878_9: saddhiṃ ñatvā saṃsaṭṭho avivajjetvā viharati, tassa dukkaṭamevāti gahetabbaṃ. Aññathā
tika-vin08t:1878_10: brahmadaṇḍavidhānassa niratthakatāpasaṅgato. Tenāti brahmadaṇḍakatena. Yathā tajjanīyādikammakatehi,
tika-vin08t:1878_11: evameva tato adhikampi saṅghaṃ ārādhentena sammā vattitabbaṃ, tañca “sorato nivātavuttī”tiādinā
tika-vin08t:1878_12: sarūpato dassitameva. Tenāha “sammā vattitvā khamāpentassa brahmadaṇḍo paṭippassambhetabbo”ti.
tika-vin08t:1879_0: Yaṃ taṃ bhagavatā avandiyakammaṃ anuññātanti sambandho. “Tassa bhikkhuno daṇḍakammaṃ
tika-vin08t:1879_1: kātu”nti sāmaññato anuññātappakāraṃ dassetvā puna visesato anuññātappakāraṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin08t:1879_2: “atha kho”tiādi pāḷiuddhaṭāti veditabbaṃ. Imassa apalokanakammassa ṭhānaṃ hotīti
tika-vin08t:1879_3: apalokanakammasāmaññassa pavattiṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Visesabyatirekena avijjamānampi tadaññattha
tika-vin08t:1879_4: appavattiṃ dassetuṃ visesanissitaṃ viya voharīyati. “Kammaññeva lakkhaṇa”nti iminā
tika-vin08t:1879_6: “kammaññeva lakkhaṇamassāti kammalakkhaṇa”nti nibbacanaṃ dasseti, idañca vuttāvasesānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1879_8: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Teneva vakkhati “ayaṃ panettha pāḷimuttakopi kammalakkhaṇavinicchayo”tiādi.
tika-vin08t:1879_9: Yathā cettha, evaṃ upari ñattikammādīsupi kammalakkhaṇaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1879_11: kammañca hutvā aññañca nāmaṃ na labhati, kammameva hutvā upalakkhīyatīti kammalakkhaṇanti
tika-vin08t:1879_12: vuccatī”ti vuttaṃ. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “imassa apalokanakammassa ṭhānaṃ hotīti
tika-vin08t:1879_13: evampi apalokanakammaṃ pavattatīti attho. Kammaññeva lakkhaṇanti kammalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1879_14: Osāraṇanissāraṇabhaṇḍukammādayo viya kammañca hutvā aññañca nāmaṃ na labhati, kammameva
tika-vin08t:1879_15: hutvā upalakkhīyatīti kammalakkhaṇaṃ upanissayo viya. Hetupaccayādilakkhaṇavimutto
tika-vin08t:1879_16: hi sabbo paccayaviseso tattha saṅgayhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tassa karaṇanti avandiyakammassa
tika-vin08t:1879_17: karaṇavidhānaṃ. Na vanditabboti, iminā vandantiyā dukkaṭanti dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1879_18: Saṅghena kataṃ katikaṃ ñatvā maddanaṃ viya hi saṅghasammutiṃ anādarena atikkamantassa āpatti eva hoti.
tika-vin08t:1880_1: gahitattā bhikkhusaṅghassapi kammalakkhaṇaṃ labbhati eva. Salākadānaṭṭhānaṃ salākaggaṃ
tika-vin08t:1880_2: nāma, yāgubhattānaṃ bhājanaṭṭhānāni yāgaggabhattaggāni nāma. Etesupi hi ṭhānesu sabbo
tika-vin08t:1880_3: saṅgho uposathe viya sannipatito, kammañca vaggakammaṃ na hoti, “mayametaṃ na jānimhā”ti
tika-vin08t:1880_4: pacchā khīyantāpi na honti, khaṇḍasīmāya pana kate khīyanti. Saṅghikapaccayañhi acchinnacīvarādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1880_5: dātuṃ apalokentehi upacārasīmaṭṭhānaṃ sabbesaṃ anumatiṃ gahetvāva kātabbaṃ. Yo pana
tika-vin08t:1880_6: visabhāgapuggalo dhammikaṃ apalokanaṃ paṭibāhati, taṃ upāyena bahiupacārasīmagataṃ
tika-vin08t:1880_7: vā katvā khaṇḍasīmaṃ vā pavisitvā kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Yaṃ sandhāya “apalokanakammaṃ karotī”ti
tika-vin08t:1880_8: sāmaññato dasseti, taṃ apalokanakammaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ āha “acchinnacīvaraṃ”iccādi.
tika-vin08t:1880_9: Yadi apaloketvāva cīvaraṃ dātabbaṃ, kiṃ pana appamattakavissajjakasammutiyāti āha
tika-vin08t:1880_10: “appamattakavissajjakena panā”tiādi. Nāḷi vā upaḍḍhanāḷi vāti divase divase apaloketvā
tika-vin08t:1880_11: dātabbassa pamāṇadassanaṃ. Tena yāpanamattameva apaloketabbaṃ, na adhikanti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:1880_12: Ekadivasaṃyeva vātiādi dasavīsatidivasānaṃ ekasmiṃ divaseyeva dātabbaparicchedadassanaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1880_13: Tena “yāvajīva”nti vā “yāvarogā vuṭṭhahatī”ti vā evaṃ apaloketuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:1880_14: Iṇapalibodhanti iṇavatthuṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti sambandho. Tañca iṇāyikehi palibuddhassa
tika-vin08t:1880_15: lajjīpesalassa sāsanupakārakassa pamāṇayuttameva kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ niyametvā bhikkhūhi
tika-vin08t:1880_16: apaloketvā dātabbaṃ, na pana sahassaṃ vā satasahassaṃ vā mahāiṇaṃ. Tādisañhi bhikkhācariyavattena
tika-vin08t:1880_17: sabbehi bhikkhūhi tādisassa bhikkhuno pariyesitvā dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1881_0: “Chattaṃ vā vedikaṃ vāti ettha vedikāti cetiyassa upari caturassacayo vuccati. Chattanti
tika-vin08t:1881_1: tato uddhaṃ valayāni dassetvā kato aggacayo vuccatī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1881_2: Cetiyassa upanikkhepatoti cetiyassa paṭijagganatthāya vaḍḍhiyā payojetvā kappiyakārakehi
tika-vin08t:1881_3: ṭhapitavatthuto. Saṅghikenapīti na kevalañca tatruppādato paccayadāyakehi catupaccayatthāya
tika-vin08t:1881_4: saṅghassa dinnavatthunāpīti attho. Saṅghabhattaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti mahādānaṃ dadantehipi
tika-vin08t:1881_5: kariyamānaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ viya kāretuṃ na vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo. “Yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin08t:1881_6: ruccatī”ti vuttattā attano attano paribhogapahonakaṃ appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1882_0: Uposathadivaseti nidassanamattaṃ, yasmiṃ kismiñci divasepi kataṃ sukatameva hoti.
tika-vin08t:1882_1: Karontena “yaṃ imasmiṃ vihāre antosīmāya saṅghasantakaṃ…pe… yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin08t:1882_2: mayhaṃ ruccatī”ti evaṃ katikā kātabbā. Tathā dvīhi tīhipi “āyasmantānaṃ ruccatī”ti
tika-vin08t:1882_3: vacanameva hettha viseso. Tesampīti rukkhānaṃ. Sā eva katikāti visuṃ katikā na kātabbāti attho.
tika-vin08t:1883_0: Tesanti rukkhānaṃ, saṅgho sāmīti sambandho. Purimavihāreti purime yathāsukhaṃ paribhogatthāya
tika-vin08t:1883_1: katakatike vihāre. Pariveṇāni katvā jaggantīti yattha arakkhiyamāne phalāphalāni
tika-vin08t:1883_2: rukkhā ca vinassanti, tādisaṃ ṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tattha saṅghassa katikā na
tika-vin08t:1883_3: pavattatīti adhippāyo. Yehi pana rukkhabījāni ropetvā ādito paṭṭhāya paṭijaggitā,
tika-vin08t:1883_4: tepi dasamabhāgaṃ datvā ropakeheva paribhuñjitabbāni. Tehīti jaggitehi.
tika-vin08t:1884_0: Tatthāti tasmiṃ vihāre. Mūletiādikāle, pubbeti attho. Dīghā katikāti aparicchinnakālā
tika-vin08t:1884_1: yathāsukhaṃ paribhogatthāya katikā. Nikkukkuccenāti “abhājitamida”nti kukkuccaṃ akatvāti
tika-vin08t:1884_2: attho. Khīyanamattameva tanti tena khīyanena bahuṃ khādantānaṃ doso natthi attano
tika-vin08t:1884_3: paribhogappamāṇasseva gahitattā, khīyantepi attano pahonakaṃ gahetvā khāditabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:1885_0: Gaṇhathāti na vattabbāti tathā vutte teneva bhikkhunā dinnaṃ viya maññeyyuṃ. Taṃ
tika-vin08t:1885_1: nissāya micchājīvasambhavo hotīti vuttaṃ. Tenāha “anuvicaritvā”tiādi. Upaḍḍhabhāgoti
tika-vin08t:1885_2: ekassa bhikkhuno paṭivīsato upaḍḍhabhāgo, dentena ca “ettakaṃ dātuṃ saṅgho anuññāsī”ti
tika-vin08t:1885_3: evaṃ attānaṃ parimocetvā yathā te saṅghe eva pasīdanti, evaṃ vatvā dātabbaṃ. Apaccāsīsantenāti
tika-vin08t:1885_4: gilānagamikissarādīnaṃ anuññātapuggalānampi attano santakaṃ dentena apaccāsīsanteneva
tika-vin08t:1885_5: dātabbaṃ. Ananuññātapuggalānaṃ pana apaccāsīsantenapi dātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti. Saṅghikameva
tika-vin08t:1885_6: yathākatikāya dāpetabbaṃ. Attano santakampi paccayadāyakādayo sayameva vissāsena
tika-vin08t:1885_7: gaṇhanti, na vāretabbā, “laddhakappiya”nti tuṇhī bhavitabbaṃ. Pubbe vuttamevāti “kuddho
tika-vin08t:1885_8: hi so rukkhepi chindeyyā”tiādinā tuṇhībhāve kāraṇaṃ pubbe vuttameva, tehi kataanatthābhāvepi
tika-vin08t:1885_9: kāruññena tuṇhī bhavituṃ vaṭṭati, “gaṇhathā”tiādi pana vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:1886_0: Garubhaṇḍattā…pe… na dātabbanti jīvarukkhānaṃ ārāmaṭṭhāniyattā dārūnañca gehasambhārānupagatattā
tika-vin08t:1886_1: “sabbaṃ tvameva gaṇhāti dātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Akatāvāsaṃ vā katvāti pubbe avijjamānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1886_2: senāsanaṃ katvā. Jaggitakāleti phalavāre sampatte. Jagganakāleti jaggituṃ āraddhakāle.
tika-vin08t:1892_0: Evaṃ kammākammavinicchayakathaṃ kathetvā idāni pakiṇṇakavinicchayakathaṃ kathetuṃ
tika-vin08t:1892_1: “idāni pakiṇṇakakathā veditabbā”tiādimāha. Tattha pakārena kiṇṇāti pakiṇṇā, divāseyyāti
tika-vin08t:1892_2: kathā viya visuṃ visuṃ appavattitvā ekasmiṃyeva paricchede karaṇavasena pavattā gaṇabhojanakathādayo.
tika-vin08t:1923: Piṭṭhaṃ kasāva paṇṇañca, phalañca jatu loṇakaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1935_0: 1. Tattha gaṇitabbo saṅkhyātabboti gaṇo, yo koci samūho, idha pana catuvaggādigaṇo
tika-vin08t:1935_1: adhippeto. Bhuñjate bhojanaṃ, byavaharaṇabhāvasaṅkhātā bhojanakiriyā, gaṇassa bhojanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1935_2: gaṇabhojanaṃ, tasmiṃ. Gaṇabhojane pācittiyaṃ hotīti ettha janakahetumhi bhummavacanaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1935_3: Aññatra samayāti gilānādisattavidhaṃ samayaṃ ṭhapetvā. Imassa sikkhāpadassa viññattiṃ
tika-vin08t:1935_4: katvā bhuñjanavatthusmiṃ paññattattā viññattito gaṇabhojanaṃ vatthuvaseneva pākaṭanti
tika-vin08t:1935_5: taṃ avatvā “gaṇabhojanaṃ nāma yattha…pe… nimantitā bhuñjantī”ti nimantanavasenevassa
tika-vin08t:1935_6: padabhājane gaṇabhojanaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñci pana sikkhāpadaṃ vatthuanurūpampi siyāti “padabhājane
tika-vin08t:1935_7: vuttanayeneva gaṇabhojanaṃ hotī”ti kesañci āsaṅkā bhaveyyāti tannivattanatthaṃ “gaṇabhojanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1935_8: dvīhi ākārehi pasavatī”ti vuttaṃ. Ekato gaṇhantīti ettha aññamaññassa dvādasahatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1935_9: amuñcitvā ṭhitā ekato gaṇhanti nāmāti gahetabbaṃ. “Amhākaṃ catunnampi bhattaṃ dehī’ti
tika-vin08t:1935_10: vā viññāpeyyu”nti vacanato, heṭṭhā “tvaṃ ekassa bhikkhuno bhattaṃ dehi, tvaṃ dvinnanti
tika-vin08t:1935_11: evaṃ viññāpetvā”ti vacanato ca attano atthāya aññena viññattampi sādiyantassa gaṇabhojanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1935_12: hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ viññattito pasavatīti ettha viññattiyā sati gaṇantassa
tika-vin08t:1935_13: ekato hutvā gahaṇe iminā sikkhāpadena āpatti, visuṃ gahaṇe paṇītabhojanasūpodanaviññattīhi āpatti veditabbā.
tika-vin08t:1936_0: Pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvāti ettha “bhojanaṃ gaṇhathāti vuttepi gaṇabhojanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1936_2: bhante, bhuñjathā’ti vutte yasmā kukkuccāyantā na paṭiggaṇhiṃsu, tasmā ‘bhuñjathā’ti
tika-vin08t:1936_3: vuttepi gaṇabhojanaṃ hotiyevā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. “Pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1936_4: nāmaṃ gahetvā nimantetī”ti vuttattā pana “odanaṃ bhuñjathā”ti vā “bhattaṃ bhuñjathā”ti
tika-vin08t:1936_5: vā bhojananāmaṃ gahetvāva vutte gaṇabhojanaṃ hoti, na aññathā. “Idheva, bhante, bhuñjathā”ti
tika-vin08t:1936_6: etthāpi “odana”nti vā “bhatta”nti vā vatvāva te evaṃ nimantesunti gahetabbaṃ. Gaṇavasena
tika-vin08t:1936_7: vā nimantitattā te bhikkhū apakataññutāya kukkuccāyantā na paṭiggaṇhiṃsūti ayaṃ amhākaṃ
tika-vin08t:1936_8: khanti, vīmaṃsitvā yuttataraṃ gahetabbaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “yena kenaci vevacanenāti
tika-vin08t:1936_9: vuttattā ‘bhojanaṃ gaṇhathā’tiādisāmaññanāmenapi gaṇabhojanaṃ hoti. Yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1936_11: odanādināmaṃ gahetvā vuttattā eva katanti veditabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1937_0: Kurundīvacane vicāretīti pañcakhaṇḍādivasena saṃvidahati. Ghaṭṭetīti anuvātaṃ chinditvā
tika-vin08t:1937_1: hatthena, daṇḍakena vā ghaṭṭeti. Suttaṃ karotīti suttaṃ vaṭṭeti. Valetīti daṇḍake
tika-vin08t:1937_2: vā hatthe vā āvaṭṭeti. “Abhinavasseva cīvarassa karaṇaṃ idha cīvarakammaṃ nāma, purāṇacīvare
tika-vin08t:1937_3: sūcikammaṃ cīvarakammaṃ nāma na hotī”ti vadanti. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “āgantukapaṭṭanti
tika-vin08t:1937_4: acchinditvā anvādhiṃ āropetvā karaṇacīvaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ṭhapetīti ekaṃ antaṃ
tika-vin08t:1937_5: cīvare bandhanavasena ṭhapeti. Paccāgataṃ sibbatīti tasseva dutiyaantaṃ parivattitvā
tika-vin08t:1937_6: āhataṃ sibbati. Āgantukapaṭṭaṃ bandhatīti cīvarena laggaṃ karonto punappunaṃ tattha
tika-vin08t:1937_7: tattha suttena bandhati. Ghaṭṭetīti pamāṇena gahetvā daṇḍādīhi ghaṭṭeti. Suttaṃ karotīti
tika-vin08t:1937_8: suttaṃ tiguṇādibhāvena vaṭṭeti. Valetīti anekaguṇasuttaṃ hatthena vā cakkadaṇḍena
tika-vin08t:1937_9: vā vaṭṭeti ekattaṃ karoti. Parivattanaṃ karotīti parivattanadaṇḍayantakaṃ karoti.
tika-vin08t:1937_10: Yasmiṃ suttaguḷaṃ pavesetvā veḷunāḷikādīsu ṭhapetvā paribbhamāpetvā suttakoṭito paṭṭhāya
tika-vin08t:1937_11: ākaḍḍhantī”ti vuttaṃ. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ na “āgantukapaṭṭaṃ moghasuttena sibbitvā
tika-vin08t:1937_12: ṭhapenti. Tattha anuvāte yathā ekatalaṃ hoti, tathā hatthehi ghaṭṭeti. Valetīti āvaṭṭeti.
tika-vin08t:1937_13: Parivattananti suttaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ suttaparivattanaṃ karoti, paṭṭaṃ
tika-vin08t:1937_14: sibbantānaṃ sukhasibbanatthaṃ paṭṭaparivattanañca, navacīvarakārako idhādhippeto, na itaro”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1938_0: Animantitacatutthanti animantito catuttho yassa bhikkhucatukkassa, taṃ animantitacatutthaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1938_1: Evaṃ sesesupi. Tenāha “pañcannaṃ catukkāna”nti, “catutthe āgate na yāpentīti vacanato
tika-vin08t:1938_2: sace añño koci āgacchanto natthi, cattāroyeva ca tattha nisinnā yāpetuṃ na sakkonti,
tika-vin08t:1938_4: vuttaṃ. Sampavesetvāti nisīdāpetvā. Gaṇo bhijjatīti gaṇo āpattiṃ na āpajjatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:1938_5: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “sampavesetvāti tehi yojetvā. Gaṇo bhijjatīti nimantitasaṅgho
tika-vin08t:1939_0: “Yattha cattāro bhikkhū…pe… bhuñjantī”ti imāya pāḷiyā saṃsandanato “itaresaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:1939_1: gaṇapūrako hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Avisesenāti “gilāno vā cīvarakārako vā”ti avisesetvā sabbasādhāraṇavacanena.
tika-vin08t:1940_0: Adhivāsetvā gatesūti ettha akappiyanimantanādhivāsanakkhaṇe pubbapayoge dukkaṭampi
tika-vin08t:1940_1: natthi, viññattito pasavane pana viññattikkhaṇe itarasikkhāpadehi dukkaṭaṃ hotīti
tika-vin08t:1940_2: gahetabbaṃ. Bhutvā gatesūti ettha āgatesupi bhojanakicce niṭṭhite gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:1940_3: Tāni ca tehi ekato na gahitānīti yehi bhojanehi visaṅketo natthi, tāni bhojanāni
tika-vin08t:1940_4: tehi bhikkhūhi ekato na gahitāni ekena pacchā gahitattā. Mahāthereti bhikkhū sandhāya
tika-vin08t:1940_5: vuttaṃ. Nimantanaṃ sādiyathāti nimantanabhattaṃ paṭiggaṇhatha. Yānīti kummāsādīni
tika-vin08t:1940_6: tehi bhikkhūhi ekena pacchā gahitattā ekato na gahitāni. Bhattuddesakena paṇḍitena
tika-vin08t:1940_7: bhavitabbaṃ…pe… mocetabbāti etena bhattuddesakena akappiyanimantane sādite sabbesampi
tika-vin08t:1940_8: sāditaṃ hoti, ekato gaṇhantānaṃ gaṇabhojanāpatti ca hotīti dasseti. Dūtassa dvāre
tika-vin08t:1940_9: āgantvā puna “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vacanabhayena “gāmadvāre aṭṭhatvā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-vin08t:1940_10: tattha gantvāti antaravīthiādīsu tattha tattha ṭhitānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā. Bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1940_11: atthāya gharadvāre ṭhapetvā dīyamānepi eseva nayo. Nivattathāti vutte pana nivattituṃ
tika-vin08t:1940_12: vaṭṭatīti “nivattathā”ti vicchinditvā pacchā “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vuttattā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:1942_0: 2. Paramparabhojanakathāyaṃ pana parassa parassa bhojanaṃ paramparabhojanaṃ. Kiṃ
tika-vin08t:1942_1: taṃ? Paṭhamaṃ nimantitabhattaṃ ṭhapetvā aññassa bhojanakiriyā. Paramparabhojanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1942_2: gaṇabhojanaṃ viya viññattito ca nimantanato ca na pasavatīti āha “paramparabhojanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1942_3: panā”tiādi. Pana-saddo visesatthajotako. Vikappanāvaseneva taṃ bhattaṃ asantaṃ nāma
tika-vin08t:1942_4: hotīti anupaññattivasena vikappanaṃ aṭṭhapetvā yathāpaññattasikkhāpadameva ṭhapitaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1942_5: Parivāre pana vikappanāyaṃ anujānanampi anupaññattisadisanti katvā “catasso anupaññattiyo”ti
tika-vin08t:1942_6: vuttaṃ, mahāpaccariyādīsu vuttanayaṃ pacchā vadanto pāḷiyā saṃsandanato parammukhāvikappanameva
tika-vin08t:1942_7: patiṭṭhāpeti. Keci pana “tadā attano santike ṭhapetvā bhagavantaṃ aññassa abhāvato
tika-vin08t:1942_8: thero sammukhāvikappanaṃ nākāsi, bhagavatā ca visuṃ sammukhāvikappanā na vuttā, tathāpi
tika-vin08t:1942_9: sammukhāvikappanāpi vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi “yo bhikkhu pañcasu
tika-vin08t:1942_10: sahadhammikesu aññatarassa ‘mayhaṃ bhattapaccāsaṃ tuyhaṃ dammī’ti vā ‘vikappemī’ti
tika-vin08t:1942_11: vā evaṃ sammukhā vā ‘itthannāmassa dammī’ti vā ‘vikappemī’ti vā evaṃ parammukhā vā
tika-vin08t:1942_12: paṭhamanimantanaṃ avikappetvā pacchā nimantitakule laddhabhikkhato ekasitthampi ajjhoharati,
tika-vin08t:1943_0: Pañcahi bhojanehi nimantitassa yena yena paṭhamaṃ nimantito, tassa tassa bhojanato
tika-vin08t:1943_1: uppaṭipāṭiyā avikappetvā vā parassa parassa bhojanaṃ paramparabhojananti āha “sace
tika-vin08t:1943_2: pana mūlanimantanaṃ heṭṭhā hoti, pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ upari, taṃ uparito paṭṭhāya
tika-vin08t:1943_3: bhuñjantassa āpattī”ti. Hatthaṃ anto pavesetvā sabbaheṭṭhimaṃ gaṇhantassa majjhe
tika-vin08t:1943_4: ṭhitampi antohatthagataṃ hotīti āha “hatthaṃ pana…pe… yathā yathā vā bhuñjantassa
tika-vin08t:1943_5: anāpattī”ti. Khīrassa rasassa ca bhattena amissaṃ hutvā upari ṭhitattā “khīraṃ vā
tika-vin08t:1944_1: vacanaṃ viruddhaṃ viya dissati. Dvinnampi adhippāyo mahāpaccariyaṃ vibhāvito”ti mahāgaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1945_0: Sabbe nimantentīti akappiyanimantanavasena nimantenti. “Paramparabhojanaṃ nāma pañcannaṃ
tika-vin08t:1945_1: bhojanānaṃ aññatarena bhojanena nimantito, taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1945_2: aññataraṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjati, etaṃ paramparabhojanaṃ nāmā”ti vuttattā satipi bhikkhācariyāya
tika-vin08t:1945_3: paṭhamaṃ laddhabhāve “piṇḍāya caritvā laddhaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjati, āpattī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1946_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “khīraṃ vā rasaṃ vāti pañcabhojanāmissaṃ bhattato upari ṭhitaṃ
tika-vin08t:1946_1: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tañhi abhojanattā uppaṭipāṭiyā pivatopi anāpatti. Tenāha ‘bhuñjantenā’tiādī”ti
tika-vin08t:1946_2: vuttaṃ. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “ettha ‘mahāupāsako bhikkhū nimanteti…pe… pacchā
tika-vin08t:1946_3: laddhaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjantassa āpatti. Piṇḍāya caritvā laddhabhattaṃ bhuñjati, āpattī’ti
tika-vin08t:1946_4: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vacanato, ‘kālasseva piṇḍāya caritvā bhuñjimhā’ti pāḷito, khandhake
tika-vin08t:1946_5: ‘na ca, bhikkhave, aññatra nimantane aññassa bhojjayāgu paribhuñjitabbā, yo bhuñjeyya,
tika-vin08t:1946_6: yathādhammo kāretabbo’ti vacanato ca nimantetvā vā pavedetu animantetvā vā, paṭhamagahitanimantitassa
tika-vin08t:1946_7: bhikkhuno paṭhamanimantanabhojanato aññaṃ yaṃ kiñci parasantakaṃ bhojanaṃ paramparabhojanāpattiṃ
tika-vin08t:1946_8: karoti. Attano santakaṃ, saṅghagaṇato laddhaṃ vā agahaṭṭhasantakaṃ vaṭṭati, nimantanato
tika-vin08t:1946_9: paṭhamaṃ nibaddhattā pana niccabhattādiparasantakampi vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1948_0: 3. Anāpucchākathāyaṃ “pakativacanenāti ettha yaṃ dvādasahatthabbhantare ṭhitena sotuṃ
tika-vin08t:1948_1: sakkā bhaveyya, taṃ pakativacanaṃ nāma. Āpucchitabboti ‘ahaṃ itthannāmassa gharaṃ
tika-vin08t:1948_2: gacchāmī’ti vā ‘cārittakaṃ āpajjāmī’ti vā īdisena vacanena āpucchitabbo. Sesamettha
tika-vin08t:1948_3: uttānameva. Pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena nimantanasādiyanaṃ, santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā,
tika-vin08t:1948_4: bhattiyagharato aññagharappavesanaṃ, majjhanhikānatikkamo, samayassa vā āpadānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1948_5: vā abhāvoti imāni panettha pañca aṅgānī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ ettakameva vuttaṃ, vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1948_6: pana “pariyesitvā ārocanakiccaṃ natthīti vuttattā yo apariyesitabbo upasaṅkamituṃ
tika-vin08t:1948_7: yuttaṭṭhāne dissati, so sacepi pakativacanassa savanūpacāraṃ atikkamma ṭhito, upasaṅkamitvā
tika-vin08t:1948_8: āpucchitabbo. Tenāha ‘apica…pe… yaṃ passati, so āpucchitabbo’tiādi. Anāpattivāre
tika-vin08t:1948_9: cettha antarārāmādīnaññeva vuttattā vihārato gāmavīthiṃ anuññātakāraṇaṃ vinā atikkamantassāpi
tika-vin08t:1948_10: āpatti hoti, na pana gharūpacāraṃ atikkamantasseva. Yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ ‘aññassa gharūpacāraṃ
tika-vin08t:1948_11: okkamantassa…pe… paṭhamapādaṃ ummāraṃ atikkāmetī’tiādi vuttaṃ, taṃ gāme paviṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1948_12: sandhāya vuttaṃ, tathāpi aññassa gharūpacāraṃ anokkamitvā vīthimajjheneva gantvā
tika-vin08t:1948_13: icchiticchitagharadvārābhimukhe ṭhatvā manusse oloketvā gacchantassapi pācittiyameva.
tika-vin08t:1948_14: Tattha keci ‘vīthiyaṃ atikkamantassa gharūpacāragaṇanāya āpattiyo’ti vadanti. Aññe
tika-vin08t:1948_15: pana ‘yāni kulāni uddissa gato, tesaṃ gaṇanāyā’ti. Pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena
tika-vin08t:1948_16: nimantanasādiyanaṃ, santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchanā, bhattiyagharato aññagharūpasaṅkamanaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1948_17: majjhanhikānatikkamo, samayāpadānaṃ abhāvoti imānettha pañca aṅgānī”ti. Vikālagāmappavesanepi
tika-vin08t:1948_18: “aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāro adinnādāne vuttanayeneva veditabbo”ti iminā dutiyaleḍḍupāto
tika-vin08t:1948_19: idha upacāroti dasseti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchanā, anuññātakāraṇābhāvo,
tika-vin08t:1948_20: vikāle gāmappavesananti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin08t:1950: 4. Paṃsukūlakathāyaṃ abhinne sarīreti abbhuṇhe allasarīre. “Abbhuṇhe”ti imināpi vuttameva pariyāyabhedamantarena vibhāvetuṃ “allasarīre”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1951_0: Visabhāgasarīreti itthisarīre. Visabhāgasarīrattā accāsannena na bhavitabbanti āha
tika-vin08t:1951_1: “sīse vā”tiādi. Vaṭṭatīti visabhāgasarīrepi attanāva vuttavidhiṃ kātuṃ sāṭakañca
tika-vin08t:1951_2: gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Keci pana “kiñcāpi iminā sikkhāpadena anāpatti, itthirūpaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:1951_3: āmasantassa dukkaṭa”nti vadanti. “Yathākammaṃ gatoti tato petattabhāvato matabhāvaṃ
tika-vin08t:1951_4: dasseti. Abbhuṇheti āsannamaraṇatāya sarīrassa uṇhasamaṅgitaṃ dasseti, tenevāha ‘allasarīre’ti.
tika-vin08t:1951_5: Kuṇapasabhāvaṃ upagatampi bhinnameva allabhāvato bhinnattā. Visabhāgasarīreti itthisarīre.
tika-vin08t:1951_6: ‘Sīse vā’tiādi adhakkhake ubbhajāṇumaṇḍale padese cittavikārappattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1951_7: yattha katthaci anāmasantena kataṃ sukatameva. Matasarīrampi hi yena kenaci ākārena
tika-vin08t:1951_8: sañcicca phusantassa anāmāsadukkaṭamevāti vadanti, taṃ yuttameva. Na hi apārājikavatthukepi
tika-vin08t:1951_9: cittādiitthirūpe bhavantaṃ dukkaṭaṃ pārājikavatthubhūte matitthisarīre nivattatī”ti
tika-vin08t:1952_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne ācariyena avuttāpi paṃsukūlakathā paṃsukūlasāmaññena veditabbā. Sā
tika-vin08t:1952_1: hi cīvarakkhandhake evaṃ āgatā “tena kho pana samayena ye te bhikkhū gahapaticīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:1952_2: sādiyanti, te kukkuccāyantā paṃsukūlaṃ na sādiyanti ‘ekaṃyeva bhagavatā cīvaraṃ anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1952_3: na dve’ti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gahapaticīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:1952_4: sādiyantena paṃsukūlampi sādiyituṃ, tadubhayenapāhaṃ, bhikkhave, santuṭṭhiṃ vaṇṇemī”ti.
tika-vin08t:1952_5: Tattha “ekaṃyeva bhagavatā cīvaraṃ anuññātaṃ, na dveti te ‘kira itarītarena cīvarenā’ti
tika-vin08t:1952_6: etassa ‘gahapatikena vā paṃsukūlena vā’ti evaṃ atthaṃ sallakkhiṃsu. Tattha pana itarītarenapīti
tika-vin08t:1952_7: appagghenapi mahagghenapi yena kenacīti attho”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto, tasmā dhutaṅgaṃ
tika-vin08t:1952_9: hoti, paṃsukūladhutaṅgadharassa pana gahapaticīvaraṃ na vaṭṭati “gahapaticīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:1953_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū kosalesu janapadesu addhānamaggappaṭipannā
tika-vin08t:1953_1: honti. Ekacce bhikkhū susānaṃ okkamiṃsu paṃsukūlāya, ekacce bhikkhū nāgamesuṃ. Ye
tika-vin08t:1953_2: te bhikkhū susānaṃ okkamiṃsu paṃsukūlāya, te paṃsukūlāni labhiṃsu. Ye te bhikkhū
tika-vin08t:1953_3: nāgamesuṃ, te evamāhaṃsu “amhākampi, āvuso, bhāgaṃ dethā”ti. Te evamāhaṃsu “na mayaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1953_4: āvuso, tumhākaṃ bhāgaṃ dassāma, kissa tumhe nāgamitthā”ti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ
tika-vin08t:1953_5: – anujānāmi, bhikkhave, nāgamentānaṃ nākāmā bhāgaṃ dātunti. Tattha nāgamesunti yāva
tika-vin08t:1953_6: te susānato āgacchanti, tāva te na acchiṃsu, pakkamiṃsuyeva. Nākāmā bhāgaṃ dātunti
tika-vin08t:1953_7: na anicchāya dātuṃ. Yadi pana icchanti, dātabbo.
tika-vin08t:1954_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū kosalesu janapadesu addhānamaggappaṭipannā
tika-vin08t:1954_1: honti. Ekacce bhikkhū susānaṃ okkamiṃsu paṃsukūlāya, ekacce bhikkhū āgamesuṃ. Ye
tika-vin08t:1954_2: te bhikkhū susānaṃ okkamiṃsu paṃsukūlāya, te paṃsukūlāni labhiṃsu. Ye te bhikkhū
tika-vin08t:1954_3: āgamesuṃ, te evamāhaṃsu “amhākampi, āvusā,e bhāgaṃ dethā”ti. Te evamāhaṃsu “na mayaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1954_4: āvuso, tumhākaṃ bhāgaṃ dassāma, kissa tumhe na okkamitthā”ti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:1954_5: ārocesuṃ – anujānāmi, bhikkhave, āgamentānaṃ akāmā bhāgaṃ dātunti.
tika-vin08t:1955_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū kosalesu janapadesu addhānamaggappaṭipannā
tika-vin08t:1955_1: honti. Ekacce bhikkhū paṭhamaṃ susānaṃ okkamiṃsu paṃsukūlāya, ekacce bhikkhū pacchā
tika-vin08t:1955_2: okkamiṃsu. Ye te bhikkhū paṭhamaṃ susānaṃ okkamiṃsu paṃsukūlāya, te paṃsukūlāni labhiṃsu.
tika-vin08t:1955_3: Ye te bhikkhū pacchā okkamiṃsu, te na labhiṃsu. Te evamāhaṃsu “amhākampi, āvuso,
tika-vin08t:1955_4: bhāgaṃ dethā”ti. Te evamāhaṃsu “na mayaṃ, āvuso, tumhākaṃ bhāgaṃ dassāma, kissa tumhe
tika-vin08t:1955_5: pacchā okkamitthā”ti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pacchā
tika-vin08t:1956_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū kosalesu janapadesu addhānamaggappaṭipannā
tika-vin08t:1956_1: honti. Te sadisā susānaṃ okkamiṃsu paṃsukūlāya. Ekacce bhikkhū paṃsukūlāni labhiṃsu,
tika-vin08t:1956_2: ekacce bhikkhū na labhiṃsu. Ye te bhikkhū na labhiṃsu, te evamāhaṃsu “amhākampi,
tika-vin08t:1956_3: āvuso, bhāgaṃ dethā”ti. Te evamāhaṃsu “na mayaṃ, āvuso, tumhākaṃ bhāgaṃ dassāma,
tika-vin08t:1956_4: kissa tumhe na labhitthā”ti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:1957_0: Tattha āgamesunti upacāre acchiṃsu. Tenāha bhagavā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, āgamentānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1957_1: akāmā bhāgaṃ dātu”nti. Upacāreti susānassa āsannappadese. Yadi pana manussā “idhāgatā
tika-vin08t:1957_2: eva gaṇhantū”ti denti, saññāṇaṃ vā katvā gacchanti “sampattā gaṇhantū”ti. Sampattānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1957_3: sabbesampi pāpuṇāti. Sace chaḍḍetvā gatā, yena gahitaṃ, so eva sāmī. Sadisā susānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1957_4: okkamiṃsūti sabbe samaṃ okkamiṃsu, ekadisāya vā okkamiṃsūtipi attho.
tika-vin08t:1958_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū kosalesu janapadesu addhānamaggappaṭipannā
tika-vin08t:1958_1: honti. Te katikaṃ katvā susānaṃ okkamiṃsu paṃsukūlāya. Ekacce bhikkhū paṃsukūlāni
tika-vin08t:1958_2: labhiṃsu, ekacce bhikkhū na labhiṃsu. Ye te bhikkhū na labhiṃsu, te evamāhaṃsu “amhākampi,
tika-vin08t:1958_3: āvuso, bhāgaṃ dethā”ti. Te evamāhaṃsu “na mayaṃ, āvuso, tumhākaṃ bhāgaṃ dassāma,
tika-vin08t:1958_4: kissa tumhe na labhitthā”ti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:1958_5: katikaṃ katvā okkantānaṃ akāmā bhāgaṃ dātunti. Tattha te katikaṃ katvāti “laddhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1958_6: paṃsukūlaṃ sabbe bhājetvā gaṇhissāmā”ti bahimeva katikaṃ katvā. Chaḍḍetvā gatāti
tika-vin08t:1958_7: kiñci avatvāyeva chaḍḍetvā gatā. Etena “bhikkhū gaṇhantū”ti chaḍḍite eva akāmā bhāgadānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1958_8: vihitaṃ, kevalaṃ chaḍḍite pana katikāya asati ekato bahūsu paviṭṭhesu yena gahitaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1958_9: tena akāmā bhāgo na dātabboti dasseti. Samānā disā puratthimādibhedā etesanti sadisāti
tika-vin08t:1960_2: haritvā”ti. Saddhivihārikānaṃ tāva āgamanassa vā anāgamanassa vā ajānanatāya vuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:1960_3: “therehi neva tāva…pe… bhuñjitabba”nti. Paresampi atthāya labhantīti attano cīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:1960_4: dadamānā sayaṃ sākhābhaṅgena paṭicchādentīti tesaṃ atthāyapi bhañjituṃ labhanti.
tika-vin08t:1960_5: “Tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetvā āgantabba”nti vacanato īdisesu bhūtagāmapātabyatāpi
tika-vin08t:1960_6: anuññātāyeva hotīti āha “neva bhūtagāmapātabyatāya pācittiyaṃ hotī”ti. Na tesaṃ dhāraṇe
tika-vin08t:1960_7: dukkaṭanti tesaṃ titthiyadhajānaṃ dhāraṇepi dukkaṭaṃ natthi.
tika-vin08t:1961_0: Yāni ca nesaṃ vatthāni dentīti sambandho. Therānaṃ sayameva dinnattā vuttaṃ “acchinnacīvaraṭṭhāne
tika-vin08t:1961_1: ṭhitattā”ti. Yadi laddhiṃ gaṇhāti, titthiyapakkantako nāma hoti. Tasmā vuttaṃ “laddhiṃ
tika-vin08t:1961_2: aggahetvā”ti. “No ce hoti, saṅghassa vihāracīvaraṃ vā…pe… āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti iminā
tika-vin08t:1961_3: antarāmagge paviṭṭhavihārato nikkhamitvā aññattha attano abhirucitaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantassa
tika-vin08t:1961_4: dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, iminā ca “yaṃ āvāsaṃ paṭhamaṃ upagacchatī”ti vuttaṃ antarāmagge
tika-vin08t:1961_5: ṭhitavihārampi sace naggo hutvā gacchati, dukkaṭamevāti veditabbaṃ. Yadi evaṃ tattha
tika-vin08t:1961_6: kasmā na vuttanti ce? Anokāsattā. Tattha hi “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, acchinnacīvarassa
tika-vin08t:1961_7: vā…pe… cīvaraṃ viññāpetu”nti iminā sambandhena saṅghikampi cīvaraṃ nivāsetuṃ pārupituñca
tika-vin08t:1961_8: anujānanto “yaṃ āvāsaṃ paṭhamaṃ…pe… gahetvā pārupitu”nti āha, tasmā tattha anokāsattā dukkaṭaṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1962_0: Vihāracīvaranti senāsanacīvaraṃ. Cimilikāhīti paṭapilotikāhi. Tassa uparīti bhūmattharaṇassa
tika-vin08t:1962_1: upari. Videsagatenāti aññaṃ cīvaraṃ alabhitvā videsagatena. Ekasmiṃ…pe… ṭhapetabbanti
tika-vin08t:1962_2: ettha sesena gahetvā āgatattā ṭhapentena ca saṅghikaparibhogavaseneva ṭhapitattā
tika-vin08t:1962_3: aññasmiṃ senāsane niyamitampi aññattha ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Paribhogenevāti
tika-vin08t:1963_0: Paribhogajiṇṇanti yathā tena cīvarena sarīraṃ paṭicchādetuṃ na sakkā, evaṃ jiṇṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1963_2: atthaṃ vibhāveti “cetāpentassa parivattāpentassā”ti. Attano dhanena hi viññāpanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1963_3: nāma parivattanamevāti adhippāyo. Saṅghavasena pavāritānaṃ viññāpane vattaṃ dasseti
tika-vin08t:1963_4: “pamāṇameva vaṭṭatī”ti. Saṅghavasena hi pavārite sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇattā adhikaṃ viññāpetuṃ
tika-vin08t:1963_5: na vaṭṭati. Yaṃ yaṃ pavāretīti yaṃ yaṃ cīvarādiṃ dassāmīti pavāreti. Viññāpanakiccaṃ
tika-vin08t:1963_6: natthīti vinā viññattiyā dīyamānattā viññāpetvā kiṃ karissatīti adhippāyo. Aññassatthāyāti
tika-vin08t:1963_7: etthapi “ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti idaṃ anuvattatiyevāti āha “attano ñātakapavārite”tiādi.
tika-vin08t:1963_8: Vikappanupagacīvaratā, samayābhāvo, aññātakaviññatti, tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin08t:1964_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ dhammanimantanāti samaṇesu vattabbācāradhammamattavasena
tika-vin08t:1964_1: nimantanā, dātukāmatāya katanimantanā na hotīti attho. Teneva “viññāpessatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1965_0: “Tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetvā āgantabba”nti iminā bhūtagāmavikopanaṃ anuññātanti
tika-vin08t:1965_1: āha “nevabhūtagāmapātabyatāyā”tiādi. Paṭhamaṃ suddhacittena liṅgaṃ gahetvā pacchā
tika-vin08t:1965_2: laddhiṃ gaṇhantopi titthiyapakkantako evāti āha “nivāsetvāpi laddhi na gahetabbā”ti.
tika-vin08t:1966_0: Yaṃ āvāsaṃ paṭhamaṃ upagacchatīti etthapi vihāracīvarādiatthāya pavisantenapi tiṇādīhi
tika-vin08t:1966_1: paṭicchādetvāva gantabbaṃ, “na tveva naggena āgantabba”nti sāmaññato dukkaṭassa vuttattā.
tika-vin08t:1966_2: Cimilikāhīti paṭapilotikāhi. Paribhogenevāti aññaṃ cīvaraṃ alabhitvā paribhuñjanena.
tika-vin08t:1966_3: Paribhogajiṇṇanti yathā taṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjiyamānaṃ obhaggavibhaggatāya asāruppaṃ hoti, evaṃ jiṇṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1967_0: Aññassatthāyāti etthapi “ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti idaṃ anuvattatevāti āha “attano
tika-vin08t:1967_1: ñātakapavārite”tiādi. Idha pana aññassa acchinnanaṭṭhacīvarassa atthāya aññātakaappavārite
tika-vin08t:1967_2: viññāpentassa nissaggiyena anāpattīti attho gahetabbo, itarathā “ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti
tika-vin08t:1967_3: iminā viseso na bhaveyya, teneva anantarasikkhāpade vakkhati “aṭṭhakathāsu pana ñātakapavāritaṭṭhāne…pe…
tika-vin08t:1967_4: pamāṇameva vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ, taṃ pāḷiyā na sametī”ti ca “yasmā panidaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin08t:1967_5: aññassatthāya viññāpanavatthusmiṃyeva paññattaṃ, tasmā idha ‘aññassatthāyā’ti na
tika-vin08t:1967_6: vutta”nti ca. Vikappanupagacīvaratā, samayābhāvo, aññātakaviññatti, tāya ca paṭilābhoti
tika-vin08t:1968_0: “Tañce aññātako gahapati vā gahapatānī vā bahūhi cīvarehi abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyya,
tika-vin08t:1968_1: santaruttaraparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā tato cīvaraṃ sāditabbaṃ, tato ce uttari sādiyeyya,
tika-vin08t:1968_2: nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti imasmiṃ taduttarisikkhāpade abhihaṭṭhunti ettha abhīti
tika-vin08t:1968_3: upasaggo, haritunti attho, gaṇhitunti vuttaṃ hoti. Pavāreyyāti icchāpeyya, icchaṃ
tika-vin08t:1968_4: ruciṃ uppādeyya vadeyya nimanteyyāti attho. Abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavārentena pana yathā vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1968_5: Taṃ ākāraṃ dassetuṃ “yāvattakaṃ icchasi, tāvattakaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti evamassa padabhājanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1968_6: vuttaṃ. Atha vā yathā “nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khemato”ti ettha disvāti attho, evamidhapi
tika-vin08t:1968_7: abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyyāti abhiharitvā pavāreyyāti attho. Tattha kāyābhihāro vācābhihāroti
tika-vin08t:1968_8: duvidho abhihāro. Kāyena vā hi vatthādīni abhiharitvā pādamūle ṭhapetvā “yattakaṃ
tika-vin08t:1968_9: icchasi, tattakaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vadanto pavāreyya, vācāya vā “amhākaṃ dussakoṭṭhāgāraṃ
tika-vin08t:1968_10: paripuṇṇaṃ, yattakaṃ icchasi, tattakaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vadanto pavāreyya, tadubhayampi
tika-vin08t:1969_0: Santaruttaraparamanti saantaraṃ uttaraṃ paramaṃ assa cīvarassāti santaruttaraparamaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1969_1: nivāsanena saddhiṃ pārupanaṃ ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo assāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tato cīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:1969_2: sāditabbanti tato abhihaṭacīvarato ettakaṃ cīvaraṃ gahetabbaṃ, na ito paranti attho.
tika-vin08t:1969_3: Yasmā pana acchinnasabbacīvarena tecīvarikeneva bhikkhunā evaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ, aññena
tika-vin08t:1969_4: aññathāpi, tasmā taṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “sace tīṇi naṭṭhāni hontī”tiādinā nayenassa
tika-vin08t:1970_0: Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – yassa tīṇi naṭṭhāni, tena dve sāditabbāni, ekaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ
tika-vin08t:1970_1: pārupitvā aññaṃ sabhāgaṭṭhānato pariyesissati. Yassa dve naṭṭhāni, tena ekaṃ sāditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1970_2: Sace pakatiyāva santaruttarena carati, dve sāditabbāni, evaṃ ekaṃ sādiyanteneva samo
tika-vin08t:1970_3: bhavissati. Yassa tīsu ekaṃ naṭṭhaṃ, na sāditabbaṃ. Yassa pana dvīsu ekaṃ naṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1970_4: ekaṃ sāditabbaṃ. Yassa ekaṃyeva hoti, tañca naṭṭhaṃ, dve sāditabbāni. Bhikkhuniyā
tika-vin08t:1970_5: pana pañcasupi naṭṭhesu dve sāditabbāni, catūsu naṭṭhesu ekaṃ sāditabbaṃ, tīsu naṭṭhesu
tika-vin08t:1970_6: kiñci na sāditabbaṃ, ko pana vādo dvīsu vā ekasmiṃ vā. Yena kenaci hi santaruttaraparamatāya
tika-vin08t:1970_7: ṭhātabbaṃ, tato uttari na labbhatīti idamettha lakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1971_0: Sesakaṃ āharissāmīti dve cīvarāni katvā sesaṃ puna āharissāmīti attho. Na acchinnakāraṇāti
tika-vin08t:1971_1: bāhusaccādiguṇavasena denti. Ñātakānantiādīsu ñātakānaṃ dentānaṃ sādiyantassa, pavāritānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1971_2: dentānaṃ sādiyantassa, attano dhanena sādiyantassa anāpattīti attho. Aṭṭhakathāsu
tika-vin08t:1971_3: pana “ñātakapavāritaṭṭhāne pakatiyā bahumpi vaṭṭati, acchinnakāraṇā pamāṇameva vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin08t:1971_4: vuttaṃ, taṃ pāḷiyā na sameti. Yasmā panidaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ aññassatthāya viññāpanavatthusmiṃyeva
tika-vin08t:1971_5: paññattaṃ, tasmā idha “aññassatthāyā”ti na vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva. Samuṭṭhānādīsu
tika-vin08t:1971_6: idampi chasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammavacīkammaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1972_0: Sattame pāḷiyaṃ paggāhikasālanti dussavāṇijakānaṃ āpaṇaṃ, “paggāhitasāla”ntipi paṭhanti.
tika-vin08t:1972_1: Abhīti upasaggoti tassa visesatthābhāvaṃ dasseti. Tenāha “haritunti attho”ti. Varasaddassa
tika-vin08t:1972_2: icchāyaṃ vattamānattā āha “icchāpeyyā”ti. Daṭṭhu khematoti ettha gāthābandhavasena
tika-vin08t:1972_3: anunāsikalopo daṭṭhabbo. Saantaranti antaravāsakasahitaṃ. Uttaranti uttarāsaṅgaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1972_4: Assa cīvarassāti sāditabbacīvarassa. Acchinnasabbacīvarenāti acchinnāni sabbāni tīṇi
tika-vin08t:1972_5: cīvarāni assāti acchinnasabbacīvaro, tenāti attho. Yassa hi acchindanasamaye tīṇi
tika-vin08t:1972_6: cīvarāni sannihitāni honti, tāni sabbāni acchinnānīti so “acchinnasabbacīvaro”ti
tika-vin08t:1972_7: vuccati. Teneva “acchinnasabbacīvarena tecīvarikenā”ti vuttaṃ. Tecīvarikenāti hi
tika-vin08t:1972_8: acchindanasamaye ticīvarassa sannihitabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na pana vinaye tecīvarikābhāvaṃ,
tika-vin08t:1972_10: tena bhikkhunā tato cīvaraṃ sāditabba”nti vuttavidhinā paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Aññenāti
tika-vin08t:1972_11: acchinnaasabbacīvarena. Yassa tīsu cīvaresu ekaṃ vā dve vā cīvarāni acchinnāni honti,
tika-vin08t:1972_12: tenāti attho. Aññathāpīti “santaruttaraparama”nti vuttavidhānato aññathāpi. Yassa
tika-vin08t:1972_13: hi tīsu dve cīvarāni acchinnāni honti, ekaṃ sāditabbaṃ, ekasmiṃ acchinne na sāditabbanti
tika-vin08t:1972_14: na tassa santaruttaraparamasādiyanaṃ sambhavati. Ayameva ca attho padabhājanena vibhāvito.
tika-vin08t:1973_0: Keci pana “tecīvarikenāti vuttattā ticīvaraṃ parikkhāracoḷavasena adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjato
tika-vin08t:1973_1: tasmiṃ naṭṭhe bahūnipi gahetuṃ labhatī”ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Padabhājanassa
tika-vin08t:1973_2: hi adhippāyaṃ dassentena yasmā pana “acchinnasabbacīvarena…pe… taṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetu”nti
tika-vin08t:1973_3: vuttaṃ, padabhājane ca na tādiso attho upalabbhati, tasmā taṃ na gahetabbameva. Yampi
tika-vin08t:1973_4: mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “yassa adhiṭṭhitaticīvarassa tīṇi naṭṭhānī”ti, tatthapi
tika-vin08t:1973_5: adhiṭṭhitaggahaṇaṃ sarūpakathanamattanti gahetabbaṃ, na pana ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena
tika-vin08t:1973_6: adhiṭṭhitacīvarassevāti evamattho gahetabbo pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca tathā atthassāsambhavato.
tika-vin08t:1973_7: Na hi ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhitacīvarasseva idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattanti sakkā
tika-vin08t:1973_8: viññātuṃ. Purimasikkhāpadena hi acchinnacīvarassa aññātakaviññattiyā anuññātattā
tika-vin08t:1973_9: pamāṇaṃ ajānitvā viññāpanavatthusmiṃ pamāṇato sādiyanaṃ anujānantena bhagavatā idaṃ
tika-vin08t:1973_10: sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, tasmā parikkhāracoḷikassa bahumpi sādituṃ vaṭṭatīti ayamattho
tika-vin08t:1973_11: neva pāḷiyā sameti, na ca bhagavato adhippāyaṃ anulometi.
tika-vin08t:1974_0: Yassa tīṇi naṭṭhāni, tena dve sāditabbānīti ettha yassa ticīvarato adhikampi cīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:1974_1: aññattha ṭhitaṃ atthi, tadā tassa cīvarassa alabbhanīyabhāvato tenapi sādituṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:1974_2: veditabbaṃ. Pakatiyāva santaruttarena caratīti sāsaṅkasikkhāpadavasena vā avippavāsasammutivasena
tika-vin08t:1974_3: vā tatiyassa alābhena vā carati. “Dve naṭṭhānī”ti adhikārattā vuttaṃ “dve sāditabbānī”ti.
tika-vin08t:1974_4: Ekaṃ sādiyanteneva samo bhavissatīti tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ dvīsu naṭṭhesu ekaṃ sādiyantena
tika-vin08t:1974_5: samo bhavissati ubhinnampi santaruttaraparamatāya avaṭṭhānato. Yassa ekaṃyeva hotīti
tika-vin08t:1974_6: aññena kenaci kāraṇena vinaṭṭhasesacīvaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1975_0: “Sesakaṃ tumheva hotūti dentī”ti vuttattā “pamāṇayuttaṃ gaṇhissāma, sesakaṃ āharissāmā”ti
tika-vin08t:1975_1: vatvā gahetvā gamanasamayepi “sesakampi tumhākaṃyeva hotū”ti vadanti, laddhakappiyameva.
tika-vin08t:1975_2: Pavāritānanti acchinnakālato pubbeyeva pavāritānaṃ. Pāḷiyā na sametīti santaruttaraparamato
tika-vin08t:1975_3: uttari sādiyane anāpattidassanatthaṃ “anāpatti ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti vuttattā
tika-vin08t:1975_4: na sameti. Santaruttaraparamaṃ sādiyantassa hi āpattippasaṅgoyeva natthi, sati ca
tika-vin08t:1975_5: sikkhāpadena āpattippasaṅge anāpatti yuttā dassetunti adhippāyo. Keci pana “pamāṇameva
tika-vin08t:1976_0: Yasmā panidaṃ…pe… na vuttanti etthāyamadhippāyo – “aññassatthāyā”ti vuccamāne aññesaṃ
tika-vin08t:1976_1: atthāya pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvāpi gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatīti āpajjati, tañca aññassatthāya viññāpanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin08t:1976_2: paññattattā vatthunā saṃsandiyamānaṃ na sameti. Na hi yaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin08t:1976_3: paññattaṃ, tasmiṃyeva anāpattivacanaṃ yuttanti. Gaṇṭhipadesu pana tīsupi “imassa
tika-vin08t:1976_5: okāsoyeva natthi, tasmā na vutta”nti kathitaṃ. Idha “aññassatthāyā”ti avuttattā aññesaṃ
tika-vin08t:1976_6: atthāya ñātakapavāritesu adhikaṃ viññāpentassa āpattīti ce? Na, tattha purimasikkhāpadeneva
tika-vin08t:1976_7: anāpattisiddhito. Tatuttaritā, acchinnādikāraṇatā, aññātakaviññatti, tāya ca paṭilābhoti
tika-vin08t:1977_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “pāḷiyaṃ paggāhikasālanti dussāpaṇaṃ. Tañhi vāṇijakehi dussāni
tika-vin08t:1977_1: paggahetvā dassanaṭṭhānatāya ‘paggāhikasālā’ti vuccati. Assa cīvarassāti sāditabbacīvarassa.
tika-vin08t:1977_2: Tecīvarikenāti iminā acchinnaticīvarato aññassa vihārādīsu nihitassa cīvarassa abhāvaṃ
tika-vin08t:1977_3: dasseti. Yadi bhaveyya, viññāpetuṃ na vaṭṭeyya, tāvakālikaṃ nivāsetvā attano cīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:1977_4: gahetabbaṃ. Tāvakālikampi alabhantassa bhūtagāmavikopanaṃ katvā tiṇapaṇṇehi chadanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1977_5: viya viññāpanampi vaṭṭati eva. Aññenāti acchinnaasabbacīvarena. ‘Dve naṭṭhānī’ti
tika-vin08t:1977_6: adhikārato vuttaṃ ‘dve sāditabbānī’ti. Pāḷiyā na sametīti ‘anāpatti ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna’nti
tika-vin08t:1977_7: imāya pāḷiyā na sameti tatuttari viññāpanaāpattippasaṅge eva vuttattā. Aññassatthāyāti
tika-vin08t:1977_8: na vuttanti idaṃ aññassatthāya tatuttari viññāpane nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ hotīti
tika-vin08t:1977_9: imamatthaṃ dīpeti. Tañca pācittiyaṃ yesaṃ atthāya viññāpeti, tesaṃ vā siyā viññāpakasseva
tika-vin08t:1977_10: vā, na tāva tesaṃ, tehi aviññāpitattā, nāpi viññāpakassa, attānaṃ uddissa aviññattattā.
tika-vin08t:1977_11: Tasmā aññassatthāya viññāpentassapi nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ na dissati. Pāḷiyaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:1977_13: anāpattivāre na vuttanti vadanti, tañca yuttaṃ viya dissati, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1977_14: Tatuttaricīvaratā, acchinnādikāraṇatā, aññātakaviññatti, tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgānī”ti.
tika-vin08t:1978_1: pavattattā amhehi gahitaṃ, aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadassa samayesu acchinnacīvarakāle
tika-vin08t:1978_2: aññātakānaṃ viññāpetabbabhāvo bhagavatā vutto, tehi dinnacīvarassa mattaso gahitabhāvo
tika-vin08t:1980_0: Ito paraṃ acchindanasāmaññena cīvaraacchindanavinicchayaṃ vakkhāma – tattha yampi
tika-vin08t:1980_1: tyāhanti yampi te ahaṃ. So kira “mama pattacīvaraupāhanapaccattharaṇāni vahanto mayā
tika-vin08t:1980_2: saddhiṃ cārikaṃ pakkamissatī”ti adāsi. Tenevamāha “mayā saddhiṃ janapadacārikaṃ pakkamissatī”ti.
tika-vin08t:1980_3: Acchindīti balakkārena aggahesi, sakasaññāya gahitattā panassa pārājikaṃ natthi,
tika-vin08t:1981_0: Sayaṃ acchindati, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyanti ekaṃ cīvaraṃ ekābaddhāni ca bahūni acchindato
tika-vin08t:1981_1: ekā āpatti, ekato abaddhāni visuṃ visuṃ ṭhitāni bahūni acchindato, “saṅghāṭiṃ āhara,
tika-vin08t:1981_2: uttarāsaṅgaṃ āharā”ti evaṃ āharāpayato ca vatthugaṇanāya āpattiyo. “Mayā dinnāni
tika-vin08t:1981_3: sabbāni āharā”ti vadatopi ekavacaneneva sambahulā āpattiyo.
tika-vin08t:1982_0: Aññaṃ āṇāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassāti “cīvaraṃ gaṇhā”ti āṇāpeti, ekaṃ dukkaṭaṃ. Āṇatto
tika-vin08t:1982_1: bahūni gaṇhāti, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ. “Saṅghāṭiṃ gaṇha, uttarāsaṅgaṃ gaṇhā”ti vadato vācāya
tika-vin08t:1982_2: vācāya dukkaṭaṃ. “Mayā dinnāni sabbāni gaṇhā”ti vadato ekavācāya sambahulā āpattiyo.
tika-vin08t:1983_0: Aññaṃ parikkhāranti vikappanupagapacchimaṃ cīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā yaṃ kiñci antamaso sūcimpi.
tika-vin08t:1983_1: Veṭhetvā ṭhapitasūcīsupi vatthugaṇanāya dukkaṭāni. Sithilaveṭhitāsu evaṃ. Gāḷhaṃ
tika-vin08t:1983_2: katvā baddhāsu pana ekameva dukkaṭanti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Sūcighare pakkhittāsupi
tika-vin08t:1983_3: eseva nayo. Thavikāya pakkhipitvā sithilabaddhagāḷhabaddhesu tikaṭukādīsu bhesajjesupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin08t:1984_0: So vā detīti “bhante, tumhākaṃyeva idaṃ sāruppa”nti evaṃ vā deti. Atha vā pana “āvuso,
tika-vin08t:1984_1: mayaṃ tuyhaṃ ‘vattapaṭipattiṃ karissati, amhākaṃ santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhissati, dhammaṃ
tika-vin08t:1984_2: pariyāpuṇissatī’ti cīvaraṃ adamhā, sodāni tvaṃ na vattaṃ karosi, na upajjhaṃ gaṇhāsi,
tika-vin08t:1984_3: na dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāsī”ti evamādīhi vutto “bhante, cīvaratthāya maññe bhaṇatha,
tika-vin08t:1984_4: idaṃ vo cīvara”nti deti, evampi so vā deti. Disāpakkantaṃ vā pana daharaṃ “nivattetha
tika-vin08t:1984_5: na”nti bhaṇati, so na nivattati. “Cīvaraṃ gahetvā rundhathā”ti evaṃ ce nivattati,
tika-vin08t:1984_6: sādhu. Sace “pattacīvaratthāya maññe tumhe bhaṇatha, gaṇhatha na”nti deti, evampi
tika-vin08t:1984_7: soyeva deti. Vibbhantaṃ vā disvā “mayaṃ tuyhaṃ ‘vattaṃ karissatī’ti pattacīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:1984_8: adamhā, sodāni tvaṃ vibbhamitvā carasī”ti vadati, itaro “gaṇhatha tumhākaṃ pattacīvara”nti
tika-vin08t:1984_9: deti, evampi so vā deti. “Mama santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhantasseva te demi, aññattha gaṇhantassa
tika-vin08t:1984_10: na demi. Vattaṃ karontasseva demi, akarontassa na demi. Dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇantasseva
tika-vin08t:1984_11: demi, apariyāpuṇantassa na demi. Avibbhamantasseva demi, vibbhamantassa na demī”ti
tika-vin08t:1984_12: evaṃ pana dātuṃ na vaṭṭati, dadato dukkaṭaṃ, āharāpetuṃ pana vaṭṭati. Cajitvā dinnaṃ
tika-vin08t:1984_13: acchinditvā gaṇhanto bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo. Sesamettha uttānameva. Ayaṃ samantapāsādikato uddhaṭavinicchayo.
tika-vin08t:1985_0: Yampi tyāhanti ettha yanti kāraṇavacanaṃ, tasmā evamettha sambandho veditabbo – “mayā
tika-vin08t:1985_1: saddhiṃ janapadacārikaṃ pakkamissatīti yaṃ kāraṇaṃ nissāya ahaṃ te, āvuso, cīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:1985_2: adāsiṃ, taṃ na karosī”ti kupito anattamano acchindīti. Yanti vā cīvaraṃ parāmasati.
tika-vin08t:1985_3: Tattha “mayā saddhiṃ janapadacārikaṃ pakkamissatīti yampi te ahaṃ cīvaraṃ adāsiṃ,
tika-vin08t:1985_4: taṃ cīvaraṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti kupito anattamano acchindīti sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1986_0: Āṇatto bahūni gaṇhāti, ekaṃ pācittiyanti “cīvaraṃ gaṇhā”ti āṇattiyā ekacīvaravisayattā
tika-vin08t:1986_1: ekameva pācittiyaṃ. Vācāya vācāya dukkaṭanti ettha acchinnesu vatthugaṇanāya pācittiyāni.
tika-vin08t:1986_2: Ekavācāya sambahulā āpattiyoti idaṃ acchinnesu vatthugaṇanāya āpajjitabbaṃ pācittiyāpattiṃ
tika-vin08t:1986_3: sandhāya vuttaṃ, āṇattiyā āpajjitabbaṃ pana dukkaṭaṃ ekameva.
tika-vin08t:1987: Evanti iminā “vatthugaṇanāya dukkaṭānī”ti idaṃ parāmasati. Eseva nayoti sithilaṃ gāḷhañca pakkhittāsu āpattiyā bahuttaṃ ekattañca atidisati.
tika-vin08t:1988_0: Āvuso mayantiādīsu gaṇhitukāmatāya evaṃ vuttepi teneva dinnattā anāpatti. Amhākaṃ
tika-vin08t:1988_1: santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhissatīti idaṃ sāmaṇerassapi dānaṃ dīpeti, tasmā kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1988_2: “bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā”ti vuttaṃ, tathāpi anupasampannakāle datvāpi upasampannakāle
tika-vin08t:1988_4: hettha pamāṇaṃ. Detīti tuṭṭho vā kupito vā deti. Ruddhathāti nivāretha. Evaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:1988_5: dātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha evaṃ dinnaṃ na tāva “tassa santaka”nti anadhiṭṭhahitvāva
tika-vin08t:1988_6: paribhuñjitabbanti veditabbaṃ. Āharāpetuṃ pana vaṭṭatīti evaṃ dinnaṃ bhatisadisattā
tika-vin08t:1988_7: āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Cajitvā dinnanti vuttanayena adatvā anapekkhena hutvā tasseva
tika-vin08t:1988_8: dinnaṃ. Bhaṇḍagghena kāretabboti sakasaññāya vinā gaṇhanto bhaṇḍaṃ agghāpetvā āpattiyā
tika-vin08t:1988_9: kāretabbo. Vikappanupagapacchimacīvaratā, sāmaṃ dinnatā, sakasaññitā, upasampannatā,
tika-vin08t:1988_10: kodhavasena acchindanaṃ vā acchindāpanaṃ vāti imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Ayaṃ sāratthadīpanīpāṭho.
tika-vin08t:1989_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “yampi…pe… acchindīti ettha yaṃ te ahaṃ cīvaraṃ adāsiṃ, taṃ
tika-vin08t:1989_1: ‘mayā saddhiṃ pakkamissatī’ti saññāya adāsiṃ, na aññathāti kupito acchindīti evaṃ
tika-vin08t:1989_2: ajjhāharitvā yojetabbaṃ. Ekaṃ dukkaṭanti yadi āṇatto avassaṃ acchindati, āṇattikkhaṇe
tika-vin08t:1989_3: eva pācittiyaṃ. Yadi na acchindati, tadā eva dukkaṭanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ekavācāya sambahulāpattiyoti
tika-vin08t:1989_4: yadi āṇatto anantarāyena acchindati, āṇattikkhaṇeyeva vatthugaṇanāya pācittiyāpattiyo
tika-vin08t:1989_5: payogakaraṇakkhaṇeyeva āpattiyā āpajjitabbato, cīvaraṃ pana acchinneyeva nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:1989_6: hoti. Yadi so na acchindati, āṇattikkhaṇe ekameva dukkaṭanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evamaññatthapi
tika-vin08t:1989_7: īdisesu nayo ñātabbo. Upajjhaṃ gaṇhissatīti sāmaṇerassa dānaṃ dīpeti, tena ca sāmaṇerakāle
tika-vin08t:1989_8: datvā upasampannakāle acchindatopi pācittiyaṃ dīpeti. “Bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā”ti
tika-vin08t:1989_9: idaṃ ukkaṭṭhavasena vuttaṃ. Āharāpetuṃ pana vaṭṭatīti kamme akate bhatisadisattā
tika-vin08t:1989_10: vuttaṃ. Vikappanupagapacchimacīvaratā, sāmaṃ dinnatā, sakasaññitā, upasampannatā,
tika-vin08t:1989_11: kodhavasena acchindanaṃ vā acchindāpanaṃ vāti imānettha pañca aṅgānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1991_1: na kiñci vuttaṃ, vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “karohīti vattuṃ na vaṭṭatīti āṇattiyā eva
tika-vin08t:1991_2: paṭikkhittattā dvārapālaṃ ‘kiṃ na karosī’tiādinā pariyāyena vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Jātakapakaraṇanti
tika-vin08t:1991_3: jātakapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ itthipurisādi yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ adhippetaṃ. ‘Parehi kārāpetu’nti
tika-vin08t:1991_4: vuttattā buddharūpampi sayaṃ kātuṃ na labhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:1993_1: kiñci vuttaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ kataṃ pakataṃ, vi aniṭṭhitaṃ pakataṃ vippakataṃ, vippakataṃ
tika-vin08t:1993_2: bhojanaṃ yena so vippakatabhojano, paṭhamaṃ bhuñjitvā aniṭṭhitabhojanakicco bhikkhu.
tika-vin08t:1993_3: Vuttena bhikkhunā pavisitabbanti sambandho. Rittahatthampi uṭṭhāpetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:1993_4: ettha kāraṇamāha “vippakatabhojanoyeva hi so hotī”ti, yāgukhajjakādīsupi pītesu khāditesupi
tika-vin08t:1993_5: bhattassa abhuttattā aniṭṭhitabhojanakicco hoti. Pavārito hoti, tena vattabboti pavāritena
tika-vin08t:1993_6: āsanā vuṭṭhitena bhuñjituṃ alabhamānattā attano santike udake asante vattabboti attho.
tika-vin08t:1995_0: 8. Uddisantauddisāpanakathāyaṃ uddisantenāti uddesaṃ dentena, pāḷiṃ vācentenāti attho.
tika-vin08t:1995_1: Uddisāpentenāti uddesaṃ gaṇhantena, pāḷiṃ vācāpentenāti attho. Uccatarepīti pi-saddena
tika-vin08t:1995_2: samānāsanaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Nīcatarepīti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-vin08t:1997_0: 9. Tivassantarikakathāyaṃ tīṇi vassāni tivassaṃ, tīṇi vā vassāni tivassāni, tivassānaṃ
tika-vin08t:1997_1: antaraṃ tivassantaraṃ, tivassantare ṭhitoti tivassantaro, tena tivassantarena, antara-saddo
tika-vin08t:1997_3: tiṇṇaṃ vassānaṃ anto ṭhitenā”ti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sarūpameva dassento “tivassantaro
tika-vin08t:1997_4: nāmā”tiādimāha. Ime sabbeti sabbe tividhā ime samānāsanikā. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin08t:1999_0: 10. Dīghāsanakathāyaṃ saṃhārimaṃ vāti saṃharituṃ yuttaṃ kaṭasārakādi. Asaṃhārimaṃ
tika-vin08t:1999_1: vāti saṃharituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ pāsāṇādi āsanaṃ. Tenāha sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “dīghāsanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1999_2: nāma mañcapīṭhavinimuttaṃ yaṃ kiñci tiṇṇannaṃ ekato sukhaṃ nisīdituṃ pahotī”ti. Kasmā
tika-vin08t:1999_3: pana “tiṇṇannaṃ pahotī”ti vuttaṃ, nanu dvinnaṃ pahonakāsanampi dīghamevāti codanaṃ
tika-vin08t:1999_4: sandhāyāha “anujānāmi…pe… ettakaṃ pacchimaṃ dīghāsananti hi vutta”nti. Dvinnaṃ pahonake
tika-vin08t:1999_5: hi adīghāsane samānāsanikeheva saha nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati, tiṇṇannaṃ pahonakato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin08t:1999_6: gahite dīghāsane pana asamānāsanikehipi saha nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati. Yadi evaṃ paṇḍakādīhipi
tika-vin08t:1999_7: saha nisīdituṃ vaṭṭeyyāti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ṭhapetvā
tika-vin08t:2001_0: 11. Gilānupaṭṭhānakathāyaṃ palipannoti nimuggo, makkhitoti attho. Uccāretvāti ukkhipitvā.
tika-vin08t:2001_1: Samānācariyakoti ettha “sacepi ekassa ācariyassa eko antevāsiko hoti, eko saddhivihāriko,
tika-vin08t:2001_2: etepi aññamaññaṃ samānācariyakā evā”ti vadanti. Bhesajjaṃ yojetuṃ asamattho hotīti
tika-vin08t:2001_3: vejjena “idañcidañca bhesajjaṃ gahetvā iminā yojetvā dātabba”nti vutte tathā kātuṃ
tika-vin08t:2001_4: asamatthoti attho. Nīhātunti nīharituṃ, chaḍḍetunti attho. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:2001_5: “bhūmiyaṃ paribhaṇḍaṃ akāsīti gilānena nipannabhūmiyaṃ kiliṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ dhovitvā haritūpalittaṃ
tika-vin08t:2001_6: kāresīti attho. Bhesajjaṃ yojetuṃ asamatthoti parehi vuttavidhimpi kātuṃ asamattho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2003_0: 12. Maraṇavaṇṇakathāyaṃ maraṇatthikāva hutvāti imassa kāyassa bhedena saggapāpanādhippāyattā
tika-vin08t:2003_1: atthato maraṇatthikāva hutvā. Maraṇatthikabhāvaṃ ajānantāti “evaṃ adhippāyino maraṇatthikā
tika-vin08t:2003_2: nāma hontī”ti attano maraṇatthikabhāvaṃ ajānantā. Na hi te attano cittappavattiṃ
tika-vin08t:2003_3: na jānanti. Vohāravasenāti pubbabhāgavohāravasena, maraṇādhippāyassa sanniṭṭhāpakacetanākkhaṇe
tika-vin08t:2003_4: karuṇāya abhāvato kāruññena pāse baddhasūkaramocanaṃ viya na hotīti adhippāyo. “Yathāyunā”ti
tika-vin08t:2003_5: vuttamevatthaṃ yathānusandhināti pariyāyantarena vuttaṃ, yathānusandhinā yathāyuparicchedenāti
tika-vin08t:2003_6: vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā yathānusandhināti yathānuppabandhena, yāva tasmiṃ bhave santānassa
tika-vin08t:2003_7: anuppabandho avicchinnapavatti hoti, tāva ṭhatvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t:2004_1: karuṇāya abhāvato, kāruññena pāse baddhasūkaramocanaṃ viya na hotīti adhippāyo. ‘Yathāyunā’ti
tika-vin08t:2004_2: vuttamevatthaṃ yathānusandhināti pariyāyantarena vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2004_3: pana “maraṇatthikāva hutvāti imassa kāyassa bhedena saggapāpanādhippāyattā atthato
tika-vin08t:2004_4: maraṇatthikāva hutvā. “Evaṃadhippāyino maraṇatthikā nāma hontī”ti attano maraṇatthikabhāvaṃ
tika-vin08t:2004_5: ajānantā āpannā pārājikaṃ. Na hi te attano cittappavattiṃ na jānantīti vuccanti.
tika-vin08t:2004_6: Vohāravasenāti pubbabhāge vohāravasena, sanniṭṭhāne panetaṃ natthi, pāse baddhasūkaramocane
tika-vin08t:2004_7: viya na hoti. Yathānusandhināti antarā amaritvāti attho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2006_1: samādhi vipassanā ca. Ativiya pākaṭattā “hatthappatto viya dissatī”ti vuttaṃ. Upacchindatīti
tika-vin08t:2006_2: visesādhigamassa vikkhepo mā hotūti āhāraṃ upacchindati. Visesādhigamanti lokuttaradhammapaṭilābhaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2006_3: Byākaritvāti ārocetvā. Upacchindati, na vaṭṭatīti yasmā sabhāgānaṃ lajjībhikkhūnaṃyeva
tika-vin08t:2006_4: ariyā attanā adhigatavisesaṃ tādise kāraṇe sati ārocenti, te ca bhikkhū appatirūpāya
tika-vin08t:2006_5: anesanāya paccayaṃ na pariyesanti, tasmā tehi pariyesitapaccaye kukkuccaṃ uppādetvā
tika-vin08t:2006_6: āhāraṃ upacchindituṃ na vaṭṭatīti attho. Sabhāgānañhi byākatattā upacchindituṃ na
tika-vin08t:2006_7: labhati. Te hi kappiyakhettaṃ ārocenti. Teneva “sabhāgānañhi lajjībhikkhūnaṃ kathetuṃ
tika-vin08t:2006_8: vaṭṭatīti idaṃ ‘upacchindati, na vaṭṭatī’ti imassa kāraṇaṃ dassentena vutta”nti tīsupi
tika-vin08t:2006_9: gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Atha vā visesādhigamaṃ byākaritvāti idaṃ visesassa adhigatabhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:2006_10: vuttaṃ, adhigamantarāyaṃ āsaṅkanteneva ca āhārupacchedo kātabboti anuññātattā adhigatena
tika-vin08t:2006_11: na kātabboti dassetuṃ “visesādhigamaṃ byākaritvā āhāraṃ upacchindati, na vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin08t:2006_12: vuttaṃ. Kiṃ pana ariyā attanā adhigatavisesaṃ aññesaṃ ārocentīti imissā codanāya
tika-vin08t:2006_13: “sabhāgānañhi lajjībhikkhūnaṃ kathetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ, ayamettha yuttataroti amhākaṃ
tika-vin08t:2007_1: vipassanā ca. Visesādhigamanti lokuttaradhammapaṭilābhaṃ. Byākaritvāti ārocetvā,
tika-vin08t:2007_2: idañca visesassa adhigatabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Adhigatavisesā hi diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:2007_3: lajjībhikkhūnaṃ avassaṃ adhigamaṃ byākaronti, adhigatavisesena pana abyākaritvāpi
