tika-vin08t:2007_4: āhāraṃ upacchindituṃ na vaṭṭati, adhigamantarāyavinodanatthameva āhārupacchedassa
tika-vin08t:2007_5: anuññātattā tadadhigame so na kātabbova. Kiṃ panādhigamaṃ ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatīti āha
tika-vin08t:2007_7: vikkhepo mā hotū’ti upacchindati, visesādhigamaṃ byākaritvā tappabhavaṃ sakkāraṃ
tika-vin08t:2007_8: lajjāyanto āhāraṃ upacchindati sabhāgānaṃ byākatattā. Te hi kappiyakhettaṃ ārocentī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2009_0: 14. Appaccavekkhitvā nisinnakathāyaṃ appaṭivekkhitvāti anupaparikkhitvā. Uddhaṃ vā
tika-vin08t:2009_1: adho vā saṅkamantīti pacchā āgatānaṃ okāsadānatthaṃ nisinnapāḷiyā uddhaṃ vā adho
tika-vin08t:2009_2: vā gacchanti. Paṭivekkhaṇakiccaṃ natthīti pacchā āgatehi upaparikkhaṇakiccaṃ natthi.
tika-vin08t:2009_3: Heṭṭhā kismiñci vijjamāne sāṭakaṃ valiṃ gaṇhātīti āha “yasmiṃ vali na paññāyatī”ti.
tika-vin08t:2009_5: kismiñci vijjamāne sāṭakaṃ valiṃ gaṇhātīti āha ‘yasmiṃ vali na paññāyatī’ti. Paṭivekkhaṇañcetaṃ
tika-vin08t:2009_6: gihīnaṃ santake evāti daṭṭhabba”nti ettakameva vuttaṃ, vajirabuddhiṭīkāyampi “appaṭivekkhitvāti
tika-vin08t:2009_7: avicāretvā. Heṭṭhimabhāge hi kismiñci vijjamāne vali paññāyatī”ti ettakameva.
tika-vin08t:2011_1: pavaṭṭanatthoti āha “hasādhippāyena pāsāṇo na pavaṭṭetabbo”ti. Silāsaddassa pāsāṇavācakattā
tika-vin08t:2011_2: so eva na paṭivijjhitabboti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “na kevalañcā”tiādi. Yadi evaṃ sabbesampi
tika-vin08t:2011_3: atthāya na vaṭṭeyyāti āha “cetiyādīnaṃ atthāyā”tiādi. Dhovanadaṇḍakanti bhaṇḍadhovanadaṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2011_4: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “bhaṇḍakaṃ vā dhovantāti cīvaraṃ vā dhovantā. Dhovanadaṇḍakanti
tika-vin08t:2013_0: 16. Dāyālimpanakathāyaṃ alla…pe… pācittiyanti sukkhaṭṭhānepi aggiṃ pātetvā iminā
tika-vin08t:2013_1: adhippāyena ālimpentassa pācittiyameva. Dukkaṭanti sukkhaṭṭhāne vā sukkhaṃ “asukkha”nti
tika-vin08t:2013_2: avavatthapetvā vā aggiṃ pātentassa dukkaṭaṃ. Kīḷādhippāyepi eseva nayo, kīḷādhippāyo
tika-vin08t:2013_3: ca paṭapaṭāyamānasaddassādavaseneva veditabbo. Paṭipakkhabhūto aggi paṭaggi. Parittakaraṇanti
tika-vin08t:2013_4: ārakkhakaraṇaṃ. Sayaṃ vā uṭṭhitanti vāteritānaṃ veḷuādīnaṃ aññamaññasaṅghaṭṭanena
tika-vin08t:2013_6: dukkaṭanti sukkhatiṇādīsu aggikaraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Allesu pana kīḷādhippāyenapi
tika-vin08t:2013_7: karontassa pācittiyameva. Paṭipakkhabhūto, paṭimukhaṃ gacchanto vā aggi paṭaggi,
tika-vin08t:2013_8: tassa allatiṇādīsupi dānaṃ anuññātaṃ. Taṃ dentena dūratova āgacchantaṃ dāvaggiṃ disvā
tika-vin08t:2013_9: vihārassa samantato ekakkhaṇe akatvā ekadesato paṭṭhāya vihārassa samantato saṇikaṃ
tika-vin08t:2013_10: jhāpetvā yathā mahantopi aggi vihāraṃ pāpuṇituṃ na sakkoti, evaṃ vihārassa samantā
tika-vin08t:2013_11: abbhokāsaṃ katvā paṭaggi dātabbo. So ḍāvaggino paṭipathaṃ gantvā ekato hutvā tena
tika-vin08t:2013_14: rakkhaṇaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ ‘samantā bhūmitacchana’ntiādi vutta”nti ettakameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2015_0: 17. Micchādiṭṭhikulābhatakathāyaṃ natthi saddhā etesūti assaddhā, maccharino, tesu
tika-vin08t:2015_1: assaddhesu. Micchādiṭṭhiyā yuttāni kulāni micchādiṭṭhikulāni, majjhelopatatiyātappurisasamāso,
tika-vin08t:2015_3: Micchādiṭṭhikulesu labhitvāti sambandho. Asakkaccakārīnaṃ tesaṃ sakkaccakaraṇena,
tika-vin08t:2015_4: appaṇītadāyīnaṃ tesaṃ paṇītadānena bhavitabbamettha kāraṇenāti kāraṇaṃ upaparikkhitvāva
tika-vin08t:2015_5: bhuñjituṃ yuttanti āha “anupaparikkhitvā neva attanā bhuñjitabbaṃ, na paresaṃ dātabba”nti.
tika-vin08t:2015_6: Yena kāraṇena bhavitabbaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ “visamissampi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Na kevalaṃ
tika-vin08t:2015_8: Tato aññampi dasseti gandhahaliddādimakkhitotiādinā. Tatthapi kāraṇaṃ dassetumāha
tika-vin08t:2017_0: 18. Gopakadānakathāyaṃ paresaṃ santakaṃ gopeti rakkhatīti gopako, tassa dānaṃ gopakadānaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2017_1: uyyānapālakādīhi bhikkhūnaṃ dātabbadānaṃ. Tattha paṇṇaṃ āropetvāti “ettakeheva rukkhehi
tika-vin08t:2017_2: ettakameva gahetabba”nti paṇṇaṃ āropetvā, likhitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Nimittasaññaṃ katvāti
tika-vin08t:2017_3: saṅketaṃ katvā. Dārakāti tesaṃ puttanattādayo dārakā. Aññepi ye keci gopakā honti,
tika-vin08t:2017_4: te sabbepi vuttā. Sabbatthapi gihīnaṃ gopakadāne yattakaṃ gopakā denti, tattakaṃ
tika-vin08t:2017_5: gahetabbaṃ. Saṅghike pana yathāparicchedameva gahetabbanti dīpitattā “atthato eka”nti
tika-vin08t:2017_6: vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyampi “paṇṇaṃ āropetvāti ‘ettake rukkhe rakkhitvā tato ettakaṃ
tika-vin08t:2017_7: gahetabba’nti paṇṇaṃ āropetvā. Nimittasaññaṃ katvāti saṅketaṃ katvā. Dārakāti tesaṃ
tika-vin08t:2017_8: puttanattādayo ye keci gopenti, te sabbepi idha ‘dārakā’ti vuttā”ti, vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2017_9: pana “ārāmarakkhakāti vissatthavasena gahetabbaṃ. Adhippāyaṃ ñatvāti ettha yassa
tika-vin08t:2017_10: dānaṃ paṭiggaṇhantaṃ bhikkhuṃ, bhāgaṃ vā sāmikā na rakkhanti na daṇḍenti, tassa dānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2017_11: appaṭicchādetvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti idha sanniṭṭhānaṃ, tampi ‘na vaṭṭati saṅghike’ti vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2018_0: Yatthāti yasmiṃ āvāse. Aññesaṃ abhāvanti aññesaṃ āgantukabhikkhūnaṃ abhāvaṃ. Tatthāti
tika-vin08t:2018_1: tādise āvāse. Bhājetvā khādantīti āgantukānampi sampattānaṃ bhājetvā khādantīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:2018_2: Catūsu paccayesu sammā upanentīti ambaphalādīni vikkiṇitvā cīvarādīsu catūsu paccayesu
tika-vin08t:2018_3: sammā upanenti. Cīvaratthāya niyametvā dinnāti “imesaṃ rukkhānaṃ phalāni vikkiṇitvā
tika-vin08t:2018_4: cīvaresuyeva upanetabbāni, na bhājetvā khāditabbānī”ti evaṃ niyametvā dinnā. Tesupi
tika-vin08t:2018_5: āgantukā anissarāti paccayaparibhogatthāya niyametvā dinnattā bhājetvā khādituṃ anissarā.
tika-vin08t:2018_6: Na tesu…pe… ṭhātabbanti ettha āgantukehi heṭṭhā vuttanayena bhājetvā khāditabbanti
tika-vin08t:2018_7: adhippāyo. Tesaṃ katikāya ṭhātabbanti “bhājetvā na khāditabba”nti vā “ettakesu rukkhesu
tika-vin08t:2018_8: phalāni gaṇhissāmā”ti vā “ettakāni phalāni gaṇhissāmā”ti vā “ettakānaṃ divasānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2018_9: abbhantare gaṇhissāmā”ti vā “na kiñci gaṇhissāmā”ti vā evaṃ katāya āvāsikānaṃ katikāya
tika-vin08t:2018_10: āgantukehi ṭhātabbaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “anissarā”ti vacanena dīpitoyeva attho mahāpaccariyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2018_11: “catunnaṃ paccayāna”ntiādinā vitthāretvā dassito. Paribhogavasenevāti ettha eva-saddo
tika-vin08t:2018_12: aṭṭhānappayutto, paribhogavasena tameva bhājetvāti yojetabbaṃ. Ettha etasmiṃ vihāre, raṭṭhevā.
tika-vin08t:2019_0: Senāsanapaccayanti senāsanañca tadatthāya niyametvā ṭhapitañca. Lāmakakoṭiyāti lāmakaṃ
tika-vin08t:2019_1: ādiṃ katvā, lāmakasenāsanato paṭṭhāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Senāsanepi tiṇādīni lāmakakoṭiyāva
tika-vin08t:2019_3: pana katvā na upanetabbanti iminā kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu tāva idaṃ
tika-vin08t:2019_4: vuttaṃ “sabbāni senāsanāni na vissajjetabbānīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Lāmakakoṭiyā vissajjantehipi
tika-vin08t:2019_5: senāsanabhūmiyo na vissajjetabbāti ayamattho vutto hotīti no khanti. Vīmaṃsitvā yaṃ
tika-vin08t:2020_0: Dhammasantakena buddhapūjaṃ kātuṃ, buddhasantakena vā dhammapūjaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati na
tika-vin08t:2020_1: vaṭṭatīti? “Tathāgatassa kho etaṃ, vāseṭṭha, adhivacanaṃ dhammakāyo itipī”ti ca “yo
tika-vin08t:2020_2: kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ passatī”ti ca vacanato vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Keci
tika-vin08t:2020_3: pana “evaṃ sante ‘yo, bhikkhave, maṃ upaṭṭhaheyya, so gilānaṃ upaṭṭhaheyyā’ti vacanato
tika-vin08t:2020_4: buddhasantakena gilānassapi bhesajjaṃ kātuṃ yuttanti āpajjeyya, tasmā na vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin08t:2020_5: vadanti, taṃ akāraṇaṃ. Na hi “yo, bhikkhave, maṃ upaṭṭhaheyya, so gilānaṃ upaṭṭhaheyyā”ti
tika-vin08t:2020_6: iminā attano ca gilānassa ca ekasadisatā, tadupaṭṭhānassa vā samaphalatā vuttā. Ayañhettha
tika-vin08t:2020_7: attho – “yo maṃ ovādānusāsanīkaraṇena upaṭṭhaheyya, so gilānaṃ upaṭṭhaheyya, mama
tika-vin08t:2020_8: ovādakārakena gilāno upaṭṭhātabbo”ti. Bhagavato ca gilānassa ca upaṭṭhānaṃ ekasadisanti
tika-vin08t:2020_9: evaṃ panettha attho na gahetabbo, tasmā “yo vo, ānanda, mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca
tika-vin08t:2020_10: desito paññatto, so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti vacanato “ahañca kho panidāni ekakova
tika-vin08t:2020_11: ovadāmi anusāsāmi, mayi parinibbute imāni caturāsīti buddhasahassāni tumhe ovadissanti
tika-vin08t:2020_12: anusāsissantī”ti vuttattā ca bahussutaṃ bhikkhuṃ pasaṃsantena ca “yo bahussuto, na
tika-vin08t:2020_13: so tumhākaṃ sāvako nāma, buddho nāma esa cundā”ti vuttattā dhammagarukattā ca tathāgatassa
tika-vin08t:2020_14: pubbanayo eva pasatthataroti amhākaṃ khanti. Vimativinodaniyampi “yatthāti yasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:2020_15: āvāse. Aññesanti aññesaṃ āgantukānaṃ. Tesupi āgantukā anissarāti senāsane nirantaraṃ
tika-vin08t:2020_16: vasantānaṃ cīvaratthāya dāyakehi, bhikkhūhi vā niyametvā dinnattā bhājetvā khādituṃ
tika-vin08t:2020_17: anissarā. Āgantukehipi icchantehi tasmiṃ vihāre vassānādīsu pavisitvā cīvaratthāya
tika-vin08t:2020_18: gahetabbaṃ. Tesaṃ katikāya ṭhātabbanti sabbāni phalāphalāni abhājetvā ‘ettakesu rukkhesu
tika-vin08t:2020_19: phalāni bhājetvā paribhuñjissāma, aññesu phalāphalehi senāsanāni paṭijaggissāmā’ti
tika-vin08t:2020_21: upanemā’ti vā evaṃ sammā upanentānaṃ āvāsikānaṃ katikāya āgantukehi ṭhātabbaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2020_22: ‘anissarā’ti vacanena dīpito eva attho, mahāpaccariyaṃ ‘catunnaṃ paccayāna’ntiādinā
tika-vin08t:2020_23: vitthāretvā dassito. Paribhogavasenevāti ettha eva-saddo aṭṭhānappayutto, paribhogavasena
tika-vin08t:2020_24: tameva bhājetvāti yojetabbaṃ. Etthāti etasmiṃ vihāre, raṭṭhe vā. Senāsanapaccayanti
tika-vin08t:2020_25: senāsanañca tadatthāya niyametvā ṭhapitañca. ‘Ekaṃ vā dve vā varasenāsanāni ṭhapetvā’ti
tika-vin08t:2020_26: vuttamevatthaṃ puna byatirekamukhena dassetuṃ ‘mūlavatthucchedaṃ pana katvā na upanetabba’nti
tika-vin08t:2020_27: vuttaṃ, senāsanasaṅkhātavatthuno mūlacchedaṃ katvā sabbāni senāsanāni na vissajjetabbānīti
tika-vin08t:2020_28: attho. Keci panettha ‘ekaṃ vā dve vā varasenāsanāni ṭhapetvā lāmakato paṭṭhāya vissajjantehipi
tika-vin08t:2020_29: senāsanabhūmiyo na vissajjetabbāti ayamattho vutto’ti vadanti, tampi yuttameva imassapi
tika-vin08t:2020_30: atthassa avassaṃ vattabbato, itarathā keci saha vatthunāpi vissajjetabbaṃ maññeyyu”nti.
tika-vin08t:2021_0: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ “ettha etasmiṃ vihāre paracakkādibhayaṃ āgataṃ. Mūlavatthucchedanti
tika-vin08t:2021_1: ‘sabbasenāsanānaṃ ete issarā’ti vacanato itare anissarāti dīpitaṃ hoti. Ayameva bhikkhu
tika-vin08t:2021_2: issaroti yattha so icchati, tattha attañātahetuṃ labhatīti kira attho, api ca ‘daharo’ti
tika-vin08t:2021_3: vadanti. Savatthukanti saha bhūmiyāti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin08t:2023_1: ‘coro’ti vuttaṃ mama vacanaṃ sutvā keci daṇḍissanti, jīvitā voropessantīti evaṃ saññāya.
tika-vin08t:2023_2: Etena kevalaṃ bhayena vā parikkhāraggahaṇatthaṃ vā sahasā ‘coro’ti vutte daṇḍitepi
tika-vin08t:2023_3: na dosoti dasseti. Rājapurisānañhi ‘coro aya’nti uddissakathane eva gīvā. Bhikkhūnaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2023_4: pana ārāmikādīnaṃ vā sammukhā ‘asuko coro evamakāsī’ti kenaci vuttavacanaṃ nissāya
tika-vin08t:2023_5: ārāmikādīsu rājapurisānaṃ vatvā daṇḍāpentesupi bhikkhussa na gīvā rājapurisānaṃ avuttattā,
tika-vin08t:2023_6: yesañca vuttaṃ, tehi sayaṃ corassa adaṇḍitattāti gahetabbaṃ. ‘Tvaṃ etassa santakaṃ
tika-vin08t:2023_7: acchindā’ti āṇattopi hi sace aññena acchindāpeti, āṇāpakassa anāpatti visaṅketattā.
tika-vin08t:2023_8: Attano vacanakaranti idaṃ sāmīcivasena vuttaṃ. Vacanaṃ akarontānaṃ rājapurisānampi
tika-vin08t:2023_9: ‘iminā gahitaparikkhāraṃ āharāpehi, mā cassa daṇḍaṃ karohī’ti uddissa vadantassapi
tika-vin08t:2023_10: daṇḍe gahitepi na gīvā eva daṇḍaggahaṇassa paṭikkhittattā ‘asukabhaṇḍaṃ avaharā’ti
tika-vin08t:2023_11: āṇāpetvā vippaṭisāre uppanne puna paṭikkhipane viya. Dāsādīnaṃ sampaṭicchane viya
tika-vin08t:2023_12: tadatthāya aḍḍakaraṇe bhikkhūnampi dukkaṭanti āha ‘kappiyaaḍḍo nāma, na vaṭṭatī’ti.
tika-vin08t:2023_13: Kenaci pana bhikkhunā khettādiatthāya vohārikānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā aḍḍe katepi taṃ
tika-vin08t:2023_14: khettādisampaṭicchane viya sabbesaṃ akappiyaṃ na hoti pubbe eva saṅghasantakattā.
tika-vin08t:2023_15: Bhikkhusseva pana payogavasena āpattiyo honti. Dāsādīnampi pana atthāya rakkhaṃ yācituṃ
tika-vin08t:2023_16: vohārikena puṭṭhena saṅghassa uppannaṃ kappiyakkamaṃ vattuṃ ārāmikādīhi ca aḍḍaṃ
tika-vin08t:2023_17: kārāpetuṃ vaṭṭati eva. Vihāravatthādikappiyaaḍḍaṃ pana bhikkhunā sayampi kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin08t:2024_0: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ “gīvāti kevalaṃ gīvā eva hoti, na pārājikaṃ. Kārāpetvā dātabbāti
tika-vin08t:2024_1: ettha sace āvudhabhaṇḍaṃ hoti, tassa dhārā na kārāpetabbā, aññena pana ākārena saññāpetabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2026_1: vaḷañjanaṭṭhānaṃ, tirokuṭṭapākāratā, chaḍḍanaṃ vā chaḍḍāpanaṃ vāti imāni panettha
tika-vin08t:2026_2: pañca aṅgāni, navame haritūpari chaḍḍane sabbesanti bhikkhussa bhikkhuniyā ca. Idha
tika-vin08t:2026_3: khettapālakā ārāmādigopakā ca sāmikā evā”ti ettakameva sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2026_5: chaḍḍanādīti dve aṅgāni. Navame ‘matthakacchinnanāḷikerampī’ti vuttattā haritūpari
tika-vin08t:2026_6: chaḍḍanameva paṭikkhittaṃ. Tenāha ‘anikkhittabījesū’tiādi. Yattha ca chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t:2026_7: tattha harite vaccādiṃ kātumpi vaṭṭati eva. Sabbesanti bhikkhubhikkhunīna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2026_8: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “sāmike apaloketvāva chaḍḍetīti katthaci potthake natthi,
tika-vin08t:2026_9: katthaci atthi, atthibhāvova seyyo kiriyākiriyattā sikkhāpadassa. Idha khettapālakā
tika-vin08t:2026_10: ārāmādigopakā ca sāmikā eva. ‘Saṅghassa khette ārāme ca tattha kacavaraṃ na chaḍḍetabbanti
tika-vin08t:2026_11: katikā ce natthi, bhikkhussa chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭati saṅghapariyāpannattā, na bhikkhunīnaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2026_12: Tāsampi bhikkhunisaṅghasantake vuttanayena vaṭṭati, na tattha bhikkhussa. Evaṃ santepi
tika-vin08t:2027_1: sahasā uccāro vā passāvo vā nikkhamati, asañciccakato nāma, anāpatti. Na hariteti
tika-vin08t:2027_2: ettha yampi jīvarukkhassa mūlaṃ pathaviyaṃ dissamānaṃ gacchati, sākhā vā bhūmilaggā
tika-vin08t:2027_3: gacchati, sabbaṃ haritasaṅkhātameva, khandhe nisīditvā appaharitaṭṭhāne pātetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:2027_4: Appaharitaṭṭhānaṃ olokentasseva sahasā nikkhamati, gilānaṭṭhāne ṭhito hoti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:2027_5: Appaharite katoti appaharitaṃ alabhantena tiṇaṇḍupakaṃ vā palālaṇḍupakaṃ vā ṭhapetvā
tika-vin08t:2027_6: katopi pacchā haritaṃ ottharati, vaṭṭatiyeva. ‘Kheḷena cettha siṅghāṇikāpi saṅgahitā’ti
tika-vin08t:2027_7: mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Na udaketi etaṃ paribhogaudakameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vaccakuṭisamauddādiudakesu
tika-vin08t:2027_8: pana aparibhogesu anāpatti. Deve vassante samantato udakogho hoti, anudakaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2027_9: olokentasseva nikkhamati, vaṭṭati. Mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ etādise kāle anudakaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2027_10: alabhantena kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tassaṃ vaṇṇanāyaṃ vimativinodaniyañca “kheḷena
tika-vin08t:2027_11: cettha siṅghāṇikāpi saṅgahitāti ettha udakagaṇḍusakaṃ katvā ucchukacavarādiñca mukheneva
tika-vin08t:2027_12: harituṃ udakesu chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2028_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne paṇḍitehi vicāretabbaṃ atthi – “vaccakuṭisamuddādiudakesu pana aparibhogesu
tika-vin08t:2028_1: anāpattī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, evaṃ sante nadījātassarādīsu āpatti vā anāpatti
tika-vin08t:2028_2: vāti. Tattha samuddādīti ādi-saddena nadījātassarāpi saṅgahitāva, tasmā anāpattīti
tika-vin08t:2028_3: ce? Na cevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yadi hi samuddādīti ettha ādi-saddena nadījātassarāpi saṅgahitā,
tika-vin08t:2028_4: evaṃ sati ṭīkācariyā vadeyyuṃ, na pana vadanti, aṭṭhakathāyañca “vaccakuṭisamuddādiudakesū”ti
tika-vin08t:2028_5: ettakameva vadeyya, tathā pana avatvā “aparibhogesū”ti hetumantavisesanapadampi gahitaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2028_6: Tena ñāyati “ādisaddena aparibhogāni candanikādiudakāni eva gahitāni, na paribhogāni
tika-vin08t:2028_7: nadījātassarādiudakānī”ti. Tena ca vaccakuṭisamuddādiudakāni aparibhogattā anāpattikarāni
tika-vin08t:2028_8: honti, nadījātassarādiudakāni pana paribhogattā āpattikarānīti. Kathaṃ pana “aparibhogesū”ti
tika-vin08t:2028_9: imassa padassa hetumantapadabhāvo jānitabboti? Yuttito āgamato ca. Kathaṃ yuttito?
tika-vin08t:2028_11: Byabhicāre hi sambhave eva sati visesanaṃ sātthakaṃ siyā. Kathaṃ āgamato? Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-vin08t:2028_13: aparibhogāniyeva udakāni gahitāni, na paribhogāni. Vuttañhetaṃ vinayavinicchayaṭīkāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2028_15: teneva tesaṃ aparibhogattameva kāraṇamāhā”ti, tasmā manussānaṃ paribhogesu nadījātassarataḷākapokkharaṇiyādiudakesu
tika-vin08t:2028_16: uccārapassāvādikaraṇaṃ na vaṭṭatīti jānitabbametaṃ. “Deve vassante samantato udakogho
tika-vin08t:2028_17: hoti, anudakaṭṭhānaṃ olokentasseva nikkhamati, vaṭṭati. Mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ etādise
tika-vin08t:2028_18: kāle anudakaṭṭhānaṃ alabhantena kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti vutta”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatattā
tika-vin08t:2028_19: mahantesu nadījātassarādīsu nāvādīhi gatakāle tādise kāraṇe sati “tīraṃ upanehī”ti
tika-vin08t:2028_20: vatvā “upanetuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṭṭhāne udakepi kātuṃ vaṭṭati, anāpattī”ti aṭṭhakathānulomato
tika-vin08t:2030_0: 21. Nahāne rukkhādighaṃsananti ettha aṭṭhapadākārenāti aṭṭhapadaphalakākārena, jūtaphalakasadisanti
tika-vin08t:2030_3: kheḷamallakamūlasaṇṭhānena. Idañca vaṭṭādhārakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kaṇṭake uṭṭhāpetvā
tika-vin08t:2030_4: katavaṭṭakapālassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Puthupāṇikanti muṭṭhiṃ akatvā vikasitahatthatalehi
tika-vin08t:2030_5: piṭṭhiparikammaṃ vuccati. Etameva sandhāya hatthaparikamma”nti vuttaṃ. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2031_0: Evaṃ pāḷianusāreneva nahāne kattabbākattabbaṃ dassetvā idāni nahānatitthe nahāyantānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2031_1: bhikkhūnaṃ nahānavidhiṃ dassento “idaṃ panettha nahānavatta”ntiādimāha. Tattha passantānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2031_2: appasādāvahanato, gihipurisānaṃ kammaṃ viyāti garahitabbabhāvato ca vuttaṃ “yattha
tika-vin08t:2031_3: vā tattha vā…pe… na otaritabba”nti. Aññesu sammukhībhūtesu anudakasāṭakena nahāyituṃ
tika-vin08t:2031_4: dukkarattā “sabbadisā pana oloketvā vivittabhāvaṃ ñatvā”ti vuttaṃ. Evampi khāṇugumbalatādīhi
tika-vin08t:2031_5: paṭicchannāpi hutvā tiṭṭheyyunti āha “khāṇu…pe… ukkāsitvā”ti. Uddhaṃmukhena cīvarāpanayanaṃ
tika-vin08t:2031_6: harāyitabbaṃ siyāti vuttaṃ “avakujja…pe… apanetvā”ti. Tato kāyabandhanaṭṭhapanavattamāha
tika-vin08t:2031_7: “kāyabandhana”ntyādinā. Tato udakasāṭikāya sati taṃ nivāsetvā otaritabbaṃ siyā, tāya
tika-vin08t:2031_8: asatiyā kiṃ kātabbanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “sace”tiādi. Tattha pubbe “ṭhitakeneva
tika-vin08t:2031_9: na otaritabba”nti ahirikākārassa paṭisiddhattā idha hirimantākāraṃ dasseti udakante
tika-vin08t:2031_10: ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā nivāsanaṃ mocetvāti. Uṇṇaṭṭhāne, samaṭṭhāne vā pasārite sati
tika-vin08t:2031_11: vā tena aññattha gaccheyyāti āha “sace ninnaṭṭhāna”ntiādi.
tika-vin08t:2032_0: Otarantena kiṃ kātabbanti pucchaṃ sandhāya “otarantena saṇika”ntyādi. Tattha pubbe
tika-vin08t:2032_2: udakoghataraṅgavātādīhi paharanto calitakāyo siyā, atiuttāne nisīdanto appaṭicchannakāyo
tika-vin08t:2032_3: siyāti vuttaṃ “nābhippamāṇamattaṃ otaritvā”ti. Attano hatthavikārādīhi vīciṃ uṭṭhāpento,
tika-vin08t:2032_4: saddañca karonto uddhaṭacapalabhāvo siyāti vuttaṃ “vīciṃ anuṭṭhapentena saddaṃ akarontena
tika-vin08t:2032_5: nivattitvā”ti. Nivattitvā kiṃ kātabbanti āha āgatadisābhimukhena nimujjitabba”nti,
tika-vin08t:2032_6: abhimukhena hutvāti pāṭhaseso. Idāni tapphalaṃ dassento “eva”ntyādimāha. Tato ummujjantena
tika-vin08t:2032_7: kiṃ kātabbanti pucchāyamāha “ummujjantenapī”tiādi. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva. Cīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:2032_8: pārupitvāva ṭhātabbaṃ, kasmāti ce? Na tāva kāyato udakaṃ otarati, tasmā thokaṃ kālaṃ
tika-vin08t:2032_9: uttarāsaṅgaṃ cīvaraṃ ubhohi hatthehi ante gahetvā purato katvā ṭhātabbaṃ. Tato kāyassa
tika-vin08t:2032_10: sukkhabhāvaṃ ñatvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā yathāruci gantabbanti.
tika-vin08t:2034_2: ādi-saddena kuṇḍalādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Palambakasuttanti brāhmaṇānaṃ yaññopacitasuttādiākāraṃ
tika-vin08t:2034_3: vuccati. Valayanti hatthapādavalaya”nti vuttaṃ. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “kaṇṇato
tika-vin08t:2036_0: 23. Dīghakesakathāyaṃ sāratthadīpaniyaṃ na kiñci vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “dvaṅguleti
tika-vin08t:2036_1: upayogabahuvacanaṃ, dvaṅgulappamāṇaṃ atikkāmetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti attho. Ettha ca dumāsassa
tika-vin08t:2036_2: vā dvaṅgulassa vā atikkantabhāvaṃ ajānantassapi kesamassugaṇanāya acittakāpattiyo
tika-vin08t:2036_3: hontīti vadanti. Kocchenāti usīrahīrādīni bandhitvā samakaṃ chinditvā gahitakocchena.
tika-vin08t:2037_0: Upari pana pāḷiyaṃ “tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū massuṃ kappāpenti.
tika-vin08t:2037_1: Massuṃ vaḍḍhāpenti. Golomikaṃ kārāpenti. Caturassakaṃ kārāpenti. Parimukhaṃ kārāpenti.
tika-vin08t:2037_2: Aḍḍhadukaṃ kārāpenti. Dāṭhikaṃ ṭhapenti. Sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpenti. Manussā ujjhāyanti
tika-vin08t:2037_3: khīyanti vipācenti ‘seyyathāpi gihī kāmabhogino’ti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ
tika-vin08t:2037_4: – na, bhikkhave, massu kappāpetabbaṃ. Na massu vaḍḍhāpetabbaṃ. Na golomikaṃ kārāpetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2037_5: Na caturassakaṃ kārāpetabbaṃ. Na parimukhaṃ kārāpetabbaṃ. Na aḍḍhadukaṃ kārāpetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2037_6: Na dāṭhikā ṭhapetabbā. Na sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpetabbaṃ, yo saṃharāpeyya, āpatti
tika-vin08t:2037_7: dukkaṭassā”ti āgataṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyampi “massuṃ kappāpentīti kattariyā massuṃ chedāpenti.
tika-vin08t:2037_8: Massuṃ vaḍḍhāpentīti massuṃ dīghaṃ kārenti. Golomikanti hanukamhi dīghaṃ katvā ṭhapitaṃ
tika-vin08t:2037_9: eḷakamassu vuccati. Caturassakanti catukoṇaṃ. Parimukhanti udare lomasaṃharaṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2037_10: Aḍḍhadukanti udare lomarājiṭṭhapanaṃ. Āpatti dukkaṭassāti massukappāpanādīsu sabbattha
tika-vin08t:2038_0: Puna pāḷiyaṃ “tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū sakkharikāyapi madhusitthakenapi nāsikālomaṃ
tika-vin08t:2038_1: gāhāpenti, nāsikā dukkhā honti. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, saṇḍāsanti. Tena kho pana samayena
tika-vin08t:2038_2: chabbaggiyā bhikkhū palitaṃ gāhāpenti. Manussā ujjhāyanti khīyanti vipācenti ‘seyyathāpi
tika-vin08t:2038_3: gihī kāmabhogino’ti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – na, bhikkhave, palitaṃ gāhāpetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2038_4: yo gāhāpeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti āgataṃ. “Sakkharādīhi nāsikālomaggāhāpane āpatti
tika-vin08t:2038_5: natthi, anurakkhaṇatthaṃ pana saṇḍāso anuññāto”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. “Na, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:2038_6: palitaṃ gāhāpetabbanti ettha bhamukāya vā nalāṭe vā dāṭhikāya vā uggantvā bībhacchaṃ
tika-vin08t:2038_7: ṭhitaṃ, tādisaṃ lomaṃ palitaṃ vā apalitaṃ vā gāhāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2040_0: 24. Ādāsādikathāyaṃ ādāso nāma maṇḍanapakatikānaṃ manussānaṃ attano mukhacchāyādassanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:2040_1: kaṃsalohādīhi kato bhaṇḍaviseso. Udakapatto nāma udakaṭṭhapanako pātisarāvādiko bhājanaviseso.
tika-vin08t:2040_2: Kaṃsapattādīnīti ādāsabhāvena akatāni parisuddhabhāvena ālokakarāni vatthūni. Ādi-saddena
tika-vin08t:2040_3: suvaṇṇarajatajātiphalikādayo saṅgaṇhāti, kañjiyādīnīti ettha ādi-saddena dravajātikāni
tika-vin08t:2040_4: telamadhukhīrādīni. Ābādhapaccayāti attano mukhe uppannavaṇapaccayā. Tenāha “sañchavi
tika-vin08t:2040_5: nu kho me vaṇo”tiādi. Āyuṃ saṅkharotīti āyusaṅkhāro. Ko so? Attabhāvo, taṃ āyusaṅkhāraṃ,
tika-vin08t:2040_6: taṃ olokento kenākārena olokeyyāti pucchāyamāha “jiṇṇo nu khomhi noti eva”nti. Tassattho
tika-vin08t:2040_7: – mama attabhāvo jiṇṇo nu kho vā, no jiṇṇo nu kho vāti evaṃ iminā manasikārena kammaṭṭhānasīsena
tika-vin08t:2040_8: oloketuṃ vaṭṭati. “Sobhati nu kho me attabhāvo, no vā”ti evaṃ pavattena attasinehavasena
tika-vin08t:2041_0: Na mukhaṃ ālimpitabbanti vippasannachavivaṇṇakarehi mukhalepanehi na limpitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2041_1: Na ummadditabbanti nānāummaddanehi na ummadditabbaṃ. Na cuṇṇetabbanti mukhacuṇṇakena
tika-vin08t:2041_2: na makkhetabbaṃ. Na manosilikāya mukhaṃ lañjetabbanti manosilāya tilakādilañjanāni
tika-vin08t:2041_3: na kātabbāni. Na kevalaṃ manosilāyameva, haritālādīhipi tāni na vaṭṭantiyeva. Aṅgarāgādayo pākaṭāyeva.
tika-vin08t:2043_3: gītaṃ. Caturassena vattenāti paripuṇṇena uccāraṇavattena. Taraṅgavattādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ
tika-vin08t:2043_4: sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ dassetuṃ ‘sabbesaṃ…pe… lakkhaṇa’nti vuttaṃ. Yattakāhi mattāhi akkharaṃ
tika-vin08t:2043_5: paripuṇṇaṃ hoti, tatopi adhikamattāyuttaṃ katvā kathanaṃ vikārakathanaṃ nāma, tathā
tika-vin08t:2043_6: akatvā kathanameva lakkhaṇanti attho”ti vuttaṃ. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “sādhugītaṃ
tika-vin08t:2043_7: nāma parinibbutaṭṭhāne gītanti likhitaṃ. Dantagītaṃ gāyitukāmānaṃ vākkaraṇīyaṃ. Dantagītassa
tika-vin08t:2045_0: 26. Aṅgacchedādikathāyaṃ “attano aṅgajātaṃ chindantasseva thullaccayaṃ, tato aññaṃ
tika-vin08t:2045_1: chindantassa dukkaṭaṃ, ābādhapaccayā chindantassa anāpattī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2045_2: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “aṅgajātanti bījavirahitaṃ purisanimittaṃ. Bīje hi chinne
tika-vin08t:2045_3: opakkamikapaṇḍako nāma abhabbo hotīti vadanti. Eke pana ‘bījassapi chedanakkhaṇe
tika-vin08t:2045_4: dukkaṭāpatti eva, kamena purisindriyādike antarahite paṇḍako nāma abhabbo hoti, tadā
tika-vin08t:2045_5: liṅganāsanāya nāsetabbo’ti vadanti. Tādisaṃ vā dukkhaṃ uppādentassāti muṭṭhippahārādīhi
tika-vin08t:2047_1: kataādhārake, bahūhi daṇḍakehi kataādhārake vāti attho. Tīhi daṇḍehi kato pana na
tika-vin08t:2047_2: vaṭṭati. Bhūmiyaṃ pana nikkujjitvā ekameva ṭhapetabbanti ettha ‘dve ṭhapentena upari
tika-vin08t:2047_3: ṭhapitapattaṃ ekena passena bhūmiyaṃ phusāpetvā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti vadanti. Ālindakamiḍḍhikādīnanti
tika-vin08t:2047_4: pamukhamiḍḍhikādīnaṃ. Parivattetvā tattheva patiṭṭhātīti ettha ‘parivattetvā tatiyavāre
tika-vin08t:2047_5: tattheva miḍḍhiyā patiṭṭhātī’ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Paribhaṇḍanteti ettha paribhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin08t:2047_6: nāma gehassa bahikuṭṭapādassa thirabhāvatthaṃ katā tanukamiḍḍhikā vuccati. Tanukamiḍḍhikāyāti
tika-vin08t:2047_7: khuddakamiḍḍhikāya. Miḍḍhantepi ādhārake ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. ‘Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:2047_8: ādhāraka’nti hi vacanato miḍḍhādīsu yattha katthaci ādhārakaṃ ṭhapetvā tattha pattaṃ
tika-vin08t:2047_9: ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati ādhārake ṭhapanokāsassa aniyamitattāti vadanti. ‘Pattamāḷo nāma
tika-vin08t:2047_10: vaṭṭetvā pattānaṃ agamanatthaṃ vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā iṭṭhakādīhi parikkhipitvā
tika-vin08t:2047_11: kato’ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Ghaṭikanti upari yojitaṃ aggaḷaṃ. Tāvakālikaṃ paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin08t:2047_12: vaṭṭatīti sakideva gahetvā tena āmisaṃ paribhuñjitvā chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t:2047_13: Ghaṭikaṭāheti bhājanakapāle. Pāḷiyaṃ abhuṃ meti ettha bhavatīti bhū, vaḍḍhi. Na bhūti
tika-vin08t:2047_14: abhū, avaḍḍhi. Bhayavasena pana sā itthī ‘abhu’nti āha, vināso mayhanti attho. Chavasīsassa
tika-vin08t:2047_15: pattanti chavasīsamayaṃ pattaṃ. Pakativikārasambandhe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Abhedepi
tika-vin08t:2047_16: vā tadupacāravasenevāyaṃ vohāro ‘silāputtakassa sarīra’ntiādīsu viya. Cabbetvāti
tika-vin08t:2047_17: khāditvā. Ekaṃ udakagaṇḍusaṃ gahetvāti vāmahattheneva pattaṃ ukkhipitvā mukhena gaṇḍusaṃ
tika-vin08t:2047_18: gahetvā. Ucchiṭṭhahatthenāti sāmisena hatthena. Ettāvatāti ekagaṇḍusaṃ gahaṇamattena.
tika-vin08t:2047_19: Luñcitvāti tato maṃsaṃ uddharitvā. Etesu sabbesu paṇṇattiṃ jānātu vā, mā vā, āpattiyevā”ti
tika-vin08t:2048_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “gihivikaṭānīti gihisantakāni. Pāḷiyaṃ na acchupiyantīti na
tika-vin08t:2048_1: phussitāni honti. Rūpakākiṇṇāni itthirūpādiākiṇṇāni. Bhūmiādhāraketi dantādīhi kate
tika-vin08t:2048_2: valayādhārake. Etassa valayādhārakassa anucchavitāya ṭhapitā pattā na parivattantīti
tika-vin08t:2048_3: ‘tayo patte ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti vuttaṃ. Anuccatañhi sandhāya ayaṃ ‘bhūmiādhārako’ti
tika-vin08t:2048_4: vutto. Dāruādhārakadaṇḍādhārakesūti ekadārunā kataādhārake ca bahūhi daṇḍakehi kataādhārake
tika-vin08t:2048_5: ca, ete ca uccatarā honti pattehi saha patanasabhāvā, tena ‘susajjitesū’ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2048_6: Bhamakoṭisadisenāti yattha dhamakaraṇādiṃ pavesetvā likhanti, tassa bhamakassa koṭiyā
tika-vin08t:2048_7: sadiso. Tādisassa dāruādhārakassa avitthiṇṇatāya ṭhapitopi patto patatīti ‘anokāso’ti
tika-vin08t:2048_8: vutto. Ālindakamiḍḍhikādīnanti pamukhamiḍḍhikādīnaṃ, uccavatthukānanti attho. Bāhirapasseti
tika-vin08t:2048_9: pāsādādīnaṃ bahikuṭṭe. Tanukamiḍḍhikāyāti vedikāya. Sabbattha pana hatthappamāṇato
tika-vin08t:2048_10: abbhantare ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati, ādhārake pana tato bahipi vaṭṭati. Aññena pana bhaṇḍakenāti
tika-vin08t:2048_11: aññena bhārabhaṇḍena bhaṇḍakena. ‘Bandhitvā olambitu’nti ca vuttattā pattatthavikāya
tika-vin08t:2048_12: aṃsabaddhako yathā laggitaṭṭhānato na parigaḷati, tathā sabbathāpi bandhitvā ṭhapetuṃ
tika-vin08t:2048_13: vaṭṭati. Bandhitvāpi upari ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ‘upari nisīdantā ottharitvā bhindantī’ti
tika-vin08t:2048_14: vuttaṃ. Tattha ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatīti nisīdanasaṅkābhāvato vuttaṃ. Bandhitvā vāti bandhitvā
tika-vin08t:2048_15: ṭhapitachatte vā. Yo kocīti bhattapūropi tucchapattopi. Pariharitunti divase divase
tika-vin08t:2048_16: piṇḍāya caraṇatthāya ṭhapetuṃ. Pattaṃ alabhantena pana ekadivasaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā
tika-vin08t:2048_17: bhuñjitvā chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭati. Paṇṇapuṭādīsupi eseva nayo. Chavasīsassa pattoti chavasīsamayo
tika-vin08t:2048_18: patto, pakativikārasambandhe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Cabbetvāti niṭṭhubhitvā. ‘Paṭiggahaṃ
tika-vin08t:2048_19: katvā’ti vuttattā ucchiṭṭhahatthena udakaṃ gahetvā pattaṃ paripphositvā dhovanaghaṃsanavasena
tika-vin08t:2048_20: hatthaṃ dhovituṃ vaṭṭati. Ettakena hi pattaṃ paṭiggahaṃ katvā hattho dhovito nāma
tika-vin08t:2048_21: na hoti. Ekaṃ udakagaṇḍusaṃ gahetvāti pattaṃ aphusitvā tattha udakameva ucchiṭṭhahatthena
tika-vin08t:2048_22: ukkhipitvā gaṇḍusaṃ katvā, vāmahattheneva vā pattaṃ ukkhipitvā mukhena gaṇḍusaṃ gahetumpi
tika-vin08t:2048_23: vaṭṭati. Bahi udakena vikkhāletvāti dvīsu aṅgulīsu āmisamattaṃ vikkhāletvā bahi gahetumpi
tika-vin08t:2048_24: vaṭṭati. Paṭikhāditukāmoti ettha sayaṃ na khāditukāmopi aññesaṃ khādanārahaṃ ṭhapetuṃ
tika-vin08t:2048_25: labhati. Tattheva katvāti patteyeva yathāṭhapitaṭṭhānato anuddharitvā. Luñcitvāti
tika-vin08t:2049_1: tatthevāti ettha ‘parivattetvā tatiyavāre tattheva miḍḍhikāya patiṭṭhātī’ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2049_2: Paribhaṇḍaṃ nāma gehassa bahikuṭṭapādassa thirabhāvatthaṃ katā tanukamiḍḍhikā vuccati,
tika-vin08t:2049_3: ettha ‘parivattetvā patto bhijjatīti adhikaraṇabhedāsaṅkāraabhāve ṭhāne ṭhapetuṃ
tika-vin08t:2049_4: vaṭṭatī’ti likhitaṃ. Pattamāḷo vattetvā pattānaṃ apatanatthaṃ vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ
tika-vin08t:2049_5: vā iṭṭhakādīhi parikkhipitvā māḷakacchannena kato. ‘Pattamaṇḍalikā pattapacchikā
tika-vin08t:2049_6: kālapaṇṇādīhi katā’ti ca likhitaṃ. Miḍḍhante ādhārake ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati pattasandhāraṇatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:2049_7: vuttattā. Mañce ādhārakepi na vaṭṭati nisīdanapaccayā vāritattā. Āsannabhūmikattā
tika-vin08t:2049_8: olambetuṃ vaṭṭati. ‘Aṃsakūṭe laggetvāti vacanato aggahatthe laggetvā aṅke ṭhapetuṃ
tika-vin08t:2049_9: na vaṭṭatī’ti keci vadanti, na sundaraṃ. Na kevalaṃ yassa pattotiādi yadi hatthena
tika-vin08t:2049_10: gahitapatte bhedasaññā, pageva aññena sarīrāvayavenāti katvā vuttaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:2049_11: pacuravohāravasena vuttaṃ. Ghaṭikapālamayaṃ ghaṭikaṭāhaṃ. Chavasīsassa pattanti ‘silāputtakassa
tika-vin08t:2049_12: sarīraṃ, khīrassa dhārā’tiādivohāravasena vuttaṃ, mañce nisīdituṃ āgatoti attho.
tika-vin08t:2049_13: Pisācillikāti pisācadārakātipi vadanti. Dinnakameva paṭiggahitameva. Cabbetvāti khāditvā.
tika-vin08t:2049_14: Aṭṭhīni ca kaṇṭakāni ca aṭṭhikaṇṭakāni. Etesu sabbesu paṇṇattiṃ jānātu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin08t:2051_0: 29. Sabbapaṃsukūlādikathāyaṃ paṃsu viya kucchitabhāvena ulati pavattatīti paṃsukūlaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2051_1: sabbaṃ taṃ etassāti sabbapaṃsukūliko, pattacīvarādikaṃ sabbaṃ samaṇaparikkhāraṃ paṃsukūlaṃyeva
tika-vin08t:2051_2: katvā dhāraṇasīloti attho. Samaṇaparikkhāresu katamaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ katvā dhāretuṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:2051_3: pucchaṃ sandhāyāha “ettha pana cīvarañca mañcapīṭhañca paṃsukūlaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Tattha
tika-vin08t:2051_4: ca cīvaraṃ vinayavasena ca dhutaṅgasamādānavasena ca vaṭṭati, mañcapīṭhaṃ vinayavaseneva.
tika-vin08t:2051_5: Katamaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ na vaṭṭatīti āha “ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ pana dinnameva gahetabba”nti,
tika-vin08t:2051_6: na adinnaṃ, tasmā paṃsukūlaṃ na vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo. Ettha ca “ajjhoharaṇīya”nti
tika-vin08t:2053_1: tattakaṃ maggaṃ parissāvanaṃ aggahetvā gacchantopi aññena aparissāvanakena bhikkhunā
tika-vin08t:2053_2: yāciyamāno hutvā adentopi na vaṭṭati, āpattiyeva. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, parissāvana”nti
tika-vin08t:2053_3: anujānitvā “coḷakaṃ nappahoti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:2053_5: viññāyati. Pakatiparissāvanassa vidhānaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ na vuttaṃ, kaṭacchuparissāvanassa
tika-vin08t:2053_6: pana vidhānaṃ “kaṭacchuparissāvanaṃ nāma tīsu daṇḍakesu vinandhitvā kata”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2053_7: Kaṭacchuparissāvanaṃ vatvā puna “coḷakaṃ nappahoti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ
tika-vin08t:2053_8: – anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dhamakaraṇa”nti vuttattā kaṭacchuparissāvanatopi dhamakaraṇo
tika-vin08t:2053_9: khuddakataroti viññāyati. Dhamakaraṇassa vidhānaṃ heṭṭhā parikkhārakathāyaṃ vuttameva.
tika-vin08t:2053_10: “Bhikkhū navakammaṃ karonti, parissāvanaṃ na sammati. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ
tika-vin08t:2053_12: daṇḍaparissāvanaṃ mahantataranti viññāyati. “Daṇḍaparissāvanaṃ na sammati. Bhagavato
tika-vin08t:2053_13: etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ottharaka”nti vacanato daṇḍaparissāvanatopi
tika-vin08t:2053_14: ottharakaṃ mahantataranti viññāyati. Tesaṃ pana dvinnampi parissāvanānaṃ vidhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2055_0: 31. Naggakathāyaṃ na naggena naggo abhivādetabboti naggena navakatarena bhikkhunā
tika-vin08t:2055_1: naggo vuḍḍhataro bhikkhu na abhivādetabbo na vanditabbo. Kasmā? “Na, bhikkhave, naggena
tika-vin08t:2055_2: naggo abhivādetabbo, yo abhivādeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti bhagavatā vacanato na abhivādetabboti
tika-vin08t:2055_3: yojanā. Ettha pana vadi abhivādanathutīsūti dhātussa curādigaṇattā ṇe-paccayo hoti, na hetvatthattā.
tika-vin08t:2058: Vacanato kammatthe tabba-paccayoti daṭṭhabbo. Na naggena abhivādetabbanti ettha tu naggena bhikkhunā na abhivādetabbanti ettakameva yojanā. Nanu ca bho –
tika-vin08t:2061: Vacanato, imissā ca dhātuyā sakammattā kammaṃ ajjhāharitabbaṃ, kammānurūpañca liṅgaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ, atha kasmā ettakameva yojanā katāti? Kammavacanicchābhāvato. Vuttañhi –
tika-vin08t:2063: Bhāvepi taṃ yathā gehe, devadattena paccate”ti.
tika-vin08t:2064_0: Yathā ākhyātapaccayasaṅkhātā vibhattiyo sakammakadhātuto bhavantāpi kammavacanicchāya
tika-vin08t:2064_1: asati kammaṃ avatvā bhāvatthameva vadanti, evaṃ kiccapaccayāpi sakammakadhātuto bhavantāpi
tika-vin08t:2064_2: kammavacanicchāyābhāvato kammaṃ avatvā bhāvatthameva vadanti, tasmā kammañca anajjhāharitaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2064_3: kammānurūpañca liṅgaṃ na ṭhapitaṃ, bhāvatthānurūpameva ṭhapitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha
tika-vin08t:2064_4: hi “ayaṃ nāma puggalo abhivādetabbo”ti acintetvā sāmaññato kattārameva gahetvā ṭhapitoti veditabbo.
tika-vin08t:2065_0: Na naggena naggo abhivādāpetabboti ettha pana naggena vuḍḍhatarena bhikkhunā naggo
tika-vin08t:2065_1: navakataro bhikkhu na abhivādāpetabbo, na vandāpetabboti yojanā. Ettha hi sakāritassa
tika-vin08t:2065_2: kiccapaccayassa diṭṭhattā, dhātuyā ca sakammakattā navakataro bhikkhu dhātukattā
tika-vin08t:2065_3: hoti, vuḍḍhataro bhikkhu dhātukammaṃ, puna kāritasambandhe vuḍḍhataro bhikkhu kāritakattā
tika-vin08t:2068_0: Na naggena abhivādāpetabbanti ettha tu naggena vuḍḍhatarena bhikkhunā na abhivādāpetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2068_1: na vandāpetabbanti yojanā, etthāpi kammavacanicchāyābhāvato vuttanayena bhāveyeva
tika-vin08t:2068_2: kiccapaccayo hotīti daṭṭhabbo. Nanu vandāpake sati vandāpetabbo labbhatiyeva, atha
tika-vin08t:2068_4: vacanato vatticchābhāvato na vuttanti. Vuttañhetaṃ pubbācariyehi –
tika-vin08t:2070: Taṃ yathānudarā kaññā, samuddo kuṇḍikāti cā”ti.
tika-vin08t:2071: Itaresupi suviññeyyameva. Paṭicchādenti aṅgamaṅgāni etāhīti paṭicchādiyo.
tika-vin08t:2073_0: 32. Gandhapupphakathāyaṃ “gandhagandhaṃ pana gahetvā kavāṭe pañcaṅguliṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin08t:2073_1: vacanato gandhe dinne paṭiggahituṃ vaṭṭati, no limpitunti siddhaṃ. Idāni pana manussā
tika-vin08t:2073_2: bhikkhū bhojetvā hatthadhovanāvasāne hatthavāsatthāya gandhavilepanaṃ denti, taṃ
tika-vin08t:2073_3: bhikkhū paṭiggahetvā ekacce hatthameva limpenti, ekacce kāyampi mukhampi ālimpenti,
tika-vin08t:2073_4: “sugandho vatā”tiādīni vatvā haṭṭhapahaṭṭhākāraṃ karonti, taṃ vaṭṭati, na vaṭṭatīti?
tika-vin08t:2073_5: “Kavāṭe pañcaṅgulikaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vihāre kavāṭadhūpanamattasseva vuttattā kāyadhūpanassa
tika-vin08t:2073_7: ca na vaṭṭatīti dissati, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ. “Pupphaṃ gahetvā vihāre ekamantaṃ
tika-vin08t:2073_8: nikkhipitu”nti vacanato pupphe dinne gahetuṃ vaṭṭati, na piḷandhanādīni kātunti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2073_9: Idāni pana bhikkhūsu gandhapupphesu laddhesu “surabhigandhaṃ vatidaṃ puppha”ntiādīni
tika-vin08t:2073_10: vatvā pahaṭṭhākāraṃ katvā siṅghanti, taṃ vaṭṭati, na vaṭṭatīti? Tampi vihāreyeva
tika-vin08t:2073_11: ekamantaṃ ṭhapanassa vuttattā siṅghitabbādibhāvassa avuttattā, mālāgandhādipāṭhassa
tika-vin08t:2073_12: anulomato ca na vaṭṭatīti dissati, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ. “Ekamantaṃ nikkhipitu”nti
tika-vin08t:2073_13: vacanassa pana sāmatthiyato cetiyapaṭimāpūjanādīni ca kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t:2075_0: 33. Āsittakūpadhānakathāyaṃ manussānaṃ bharaṇasīlataṃ sandhāya “tambalohena vā rajatena
tika-vin08t:2075_1: vā”ti vuttaṃ, vikappanatthena pana vā-saddena hiraññena vā suvaṇṇena vātiādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin08t:2075_2: Paṭikkhittattā panāti bhagavatā pana āsittakūpadhānassa sāmaññavasena paṭikkhittattā.
tika-vin08t:2075_3: Na kevalaṃ ratanapeḷā eva na vaṭṭati, atha kho dārumayāpīti. Ettha pi-saddo sampiṇḍanattho,
tika-vin08t:2077_0: 34. Maḷorikakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, maḷorika”nti gilāno bhikkhu bhuñjamāno
tika-vin08t:2077_1: na sakkoti hatthena pattaṃ sandhāretuṃ, tasmā anuññātaṃ. Pubbe pattasaṅgopanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:2077_2: ādhārako anuññāto, idāni bhuñjanatthaṃ. Daṇḍādhārako vuccatīti daṇḍādhārako padhānato
tika-vin08t:2077_3: maḷorikoti vuccati. Yaṭṭhi…pe… pīṭhādīnipi ādhārakasāmaññena ettheva paviṭṭhānīti
tika-vin08t:2077_4: sambandho. Ādhārakaṃ nāma chiddaṃ viddhampi atthi, aviddhampi atthi, tesu katamaṃ
tika-vin08t:2079_0: 35. Ekabhājanādikathāyaṃ ekatobhuñjanaṃ nāma ekabhājanasmiṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva sahabhuñjanaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2079_1: na nānābhājane. Ekabhājanasmimpi na nānākkhaṇeti āha “sace panā”tiādi. Tasmiṃ apagate
tika-vin08t:2079_2: tassa apagatattā itarassa sesakaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Iminā ekakkhaṇe abhuñjanabhāvaṃ
tika-vin08t:2079_3: dasseti. Itarassapītiādīsu itarassapīti itarītarakathanaṃ, sesabhuñjakaitarato itarassāti
tika-vin08t:2079_4: attho. Tena paṭhamaṃ gahetvā gatabhikkhumevāha. Tasmiṃ khīṇe tassa khaṇattā paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin08t:2079_5: gahitavatthussa khīṇattā puna gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Iminā sahaabhuñjanabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin08t:2080_0: Na ekamañce nipajjitabbaṃ satipi nānāattharaṇe “na ekamañce tuvaṭṭitabbaṃ, yo tuvaṭṭeyya,
tika-vin08t:2080_1: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato. Na ekattharaṇe nipajjitabbaṃ satipi nānāmañce “na
tika-vin08t:2080_2: ekattharaṇā tuvaṭṭitabba”nti vacanato, pageva ubhinnaṃ ekatteti attho. Yadi evaṃ
tika-vin08t:2080_3: nānāmañcanānāattharaṇesu asantesu kathaṃ anāpatti siyāti cintāyamāha “vavatthānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2080_4: panā”tiādi. Ekattharaṇapāvuraṇehīti ettha pana ayaṃ ekattharaṇapāvuraṇasaddo na catthasamāso
tika-vin08t:2080_5: hoti, atha kho bāhiratthasamāsoti āha “ekaṃ attharaṇañceva pāvuraṇañca etesanti ekattharaṇapāvuraṇā”ti,
tika-vin08t:2080_7: ekaṃ pārupitvā nipajjantānametaṃ adhivacana”nti, evaṃ nipajjantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etaṃ
tika-vin08t:2080_8: ekattharaṇapāvuraṇapadaṃ adhivacanaṃ hotīti adhippāyo. Kesaṃ pana antanti āha “saṃhārimāna”ntiādi.
tika-vin08t:2082_0: 36. Celapaṭikakathāyaṃ celapaṭikanti celasantharaṃ. Kiṃ pana bhagavato sikkhāpadapaññāpane
tika-vin08t:2082_1: kāraṇanti? “Bodhirājakumāro kira ‘sace ahaṃ puttaṃ lacchāmi, akkamissati me bhagavā
tika-vin08t:2082_2: celapaṭika’nti iminā ajjhāsayena santhari, abhabbo cesa puttalābhāya, tasmā bhagavā
tika-vin08t:2082_3: na akkami. Yadi akkameyya, pacchā puttaṃ alabhanto ‘nāyaṃ sabbaññū’ti diṭṭhiṃ gaṇheyya,
tika-vin08t:2082_4: idaṃ tāva bhagavato anakkamane kāraṇaṃ. Yasmā pana bhikkhūpi ye ajānantā akkameyyuṃ,
tika-vin08t:2082_5: te gihīnaṃ paribhūtā bhaveyyuṃ, tasmā bhikkhū paribhavato mocetuṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapesi,
tika-vin08t:2083_0: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “bhagavā tuṇhī ahosīti ‘kissa nu kho atthāya rājakumārena
tika-vin08t:2083_1: ayaṃ mahāsakkāro kato’ti āvajjento puttapatthanāya katabhāvaṃ aññāsi. So hi rājaputto
tika-vin08t:2083_2: aputtako, sutañcānena ahosi ‘buddhānaṃ kira adhikāraṃ katvā manasā icchitaṃ labhantī’ti,
tika-vin08t:2083_3: so ‘sacāhaṃ puttaṃ labhissāmi, sammāsambuddho imaṃ celapaṭikaṃ akkamissati. No ce
tika-vin08t:2083_4: labhissāmi, na akkamissatī’ti patthanaṃ katvā santharāpesi. Atha bhagavā ‘nibbattissati
tika-vin08t:2083_5: nu kho etassa putto’ti āvajjetvā ‘na nibbattissatī’ti addasa. Pubbe kira so ekasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:2083_6: dīpe vasamāno bhariyāya samānacchando anekasakuṇapotake khādi. ‘Sacassa mātugāmo
tika-vin08t:2083_7: puññavā bhaveyya, puttaṃ labheyya, ubhohi pana samānacchandehi hutvā pāpakammaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin08t:2083_8: tenassa putto na nibbattissatīti aññāsi. Dusse pana akkante ‘buddhānaṃ adhikāraṃ
tika-vin08t:2083_9: katvā patthitaṃ labhantīti loke anussavo, mayā ca mahāadhikāro kato, na ca puttaṃ
tika-vin08t:2083_10: labhāmi, tucchaṃ idaṃ vacana’nti micchāgāhaṃ gaṇheyya. Titthiyāpi ‘natthi samaṇānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2083_11: akattabbaṃ nāma, celapaṭikampi maddantā āhiṇḍantī’ti ujjhāyeyyuṃ, etarahi ca akkamantesu
tika-vin08t:2083_12: bahū bhikkhū paracittaviduno, te bhabbattaṃ jānitvā akkamissanti. Abhabbataṃ jānitvā
tika-vin08t:2083_13: na akkamissanti. Anāgate pana upanissayo mando bhavissati, anāgataṃ na jānissanti.
tika-vin08t:2083_14: Tesu akkamantesu sace patthitaṃ samijjhissati, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce ijjhissati,
tika-vin08t:2083_15: ‘pubbe bhikkhusaṅghassa adhikāraṃ katvā icchiticchitaṃ labhanti, idāni na labhanti,
tika-vin08t:2083_16: teyeva maññe bhikkhū paṭipattipūrakā ahesuṃ, ime pana paṭipattiṃ pūretuṃ na sakkontī’ti
tika-vin08t:2083_17: manussā vippaṭisārino bhavissantīti imehi tīhi kāraṇehi bhagavā akkamituṃ anicchanto
tika-vin08t:2083_18: tuṇhī ahosi. Pacchimaṃ janataṃ tathāgato anukampatīti idaṃ pana thero vuttesu kāraṇesu
tika-vin08t:2084_0: Pāḷiyaṃ “yāciyamānena celapaṭikaṃ akkamitu”nti vacanato yāciyamānena eva akkamitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2084_1: no ayāciyamānenāti siddhaṃ, tatthapi “maṅgalatthāyā”ti vacanato maṅgalatthāya yāciyamānena
tika-vin08t:2084_2: akkamitabbaṃ, na sirisobhaggādiatthāya yāciyamānenāti ca, tatthapi “gihīna”nti vacanato
tika-vin08t:2084_3: gihīnaṃ eva celasantharaṃ akkamitabbaṃ, na pabbajitānanti ca. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yā kāci
tika-vin08t:2084_4: itthī apagatagabbhā vā hotu, garugabbhā vā”ti aniyamavācakena vā-saddena vacanato
tika-vin08t:2084_5: na kevalaṃ imā dveyeva gahetabbā, atha kho “patiṭṭhitagabbhā vā vijātiputtā vā”tiādinā
tika-vin08t:2084_6: yā kāci maṅgalikāyo itthiyopi purisāpi gahetabbā. “Evarūpesu ṭhānesū”ti vuttattā
tika-vin08t:2084_7: na kevalaṃ yathāvuttaṭṭhānesuyeva, atha kho taṃsadisesu yesu kesuci maṅgalaṭṭhānesu
tika-vin08t:2084_8: yesaṃ kesañci gihīnaṃ maṅgalatthāya yāciyamānānaṃ celasantharaṃ akkamituṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:2084_9: sijjhati, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dhotapādakaṃ akkamitu”nti
tika-vin08t:2084_10: sāmaññavasena vacanato, aṭṭhakathāyañca “taṃ akkamituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti avisesena vuttattā
tika-vin08t:2084_11: dhotapādakaṃ ayāciyamānenapi bhikkhunā akkamitabbanti siddhaṃ, “dhotehi pādehi akkamanatthāyā”ti
tika-vin08t:2084_12: pana vuttattā adhotehi akkamituṃ na vaṭṭatīti ca, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2086_1: na vaṭṭatī”ti āha. Katakaṃ nāma kīdisanti pucchāya sati vuttaṃ “katakaṃ nāma padumakaṇṇikākāra”ntiādi.
tika-vin08t:2086_2: Kasmā paṭikkhittanti vuttaṃ “bāhulikānuyogattā”ti. Tato kappiyapādaghaṃsaniyo dassetumāha
tika-vin08t:2088_0: 38. Bījanīkathāyaṃ paṭhamaṃ tāva akappiyabījaniṃ dassetuṃ “camarīvālehi katabījanī
tika-vin08t:2088_1: na vaṭṭatī”ti āha. Tato kappiyachabījaniyo dassetuṃ “makasabījanīādi vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
tika-vin08t:2088_2: Tattha kappiyachabījaniyo nāma makasabījanī, vākamayabījanī, usīramayabījanī, morapiñchamayabījanī,
tika-vin08t:2088_3: vidhūpanaṃ, tālavaṇṭañcāti. Tāsaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ “vidhūpananti bījanī vuccatī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t:2088_4: Usīramayaṃ morapiñchamayañca suviññeyyattā na vuttaṃ. “Bījaninti caturassabījaniṃ.
tika-vin08t:2088_5: Tālavaṇṭanti tālapattādīhi kataṃ maṇḍalikabījani”nti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2090_0: 39. Chattakathāyaṃ chattaṃ nāma tīṇi chattāni setacchattaṃ, kilañjacchattaṃ, paṇṇacchattanti.
tika-vin08t:2090_1: Tattha setacchattanti vatthapaliguṇṭhitaṃ paṇḍaracchattaṃ. Kilañjacchattanti vilīvacchattaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2090_2: Paṇṇacchattanti tālapaṇṇādīhi yehi kehici kataṃ. Maṇḍalabaddhaṃ salākabaddhanti idaṃ
tika-vin08t:2090_3: pana tiṇṇampi chattānaṃ pañjaradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tāni hi maṇḍalabaddhāni ceva
tika-vin08t:2090_4: honti salākabaddhāni ca. Yampi tatthajātakadaṇḍena kataṃ ekapaṇṇacchattaṃ hoti, tampi
tika-vin08t:2090_5: chattameva. “Vilīvacchattanti veṇuvilīvehi kataṃ chattaṃ. Tatthajātakadaṇḍakena katanti
tika-vin08t:2090_6: tālapaṇṇaṃ saha daṇḍakena chinditvā tameva chattadaṇḍaṃ karonti gopālakādayo viya,
tika-vin08t:2090_7: taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vutta”nti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “vilīvacchattanti
tika-vin08t:2090_8: veṇupesikāhi kataṃ. Maṇḍalabaddhānīti dīghasalākāsu tiriyaṃ valayākārena salākaṃ
tika-vin08t:2090_9: ṭhapetvā suttehi baddhāni dīghañca tiriyañca ujukameva salākāyo ṭhapetvā daḷhabaddhāni
tika-vin08t:2090_10: ceva tiriyaṃ ṭhapetvā dīghadaṇḍakeheva saṅkocārahaṃ katvā sutteheva tiriyaṃ baddhāni.
tika-vin08t:2090_11: Tatthajātakadaṇḍakena katanti saha daṇḍakena chinnatālapaṇṇādīhi kata”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2090_12: Idha pana chattadhārakapuggalavasena vuttaṃ, tasmā agilānassa bhikkhuno chattaṃ dhāretuṃ
tika-vin08t:2092_0: 40. Nakhakathāyaṃ dīghanakhadhāraṇapaccayā uppanne vatthusmiṃ “na, bhikkhave, dīghā
tika-vin08t:2092_1: nakhā dhāretabbā, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato dhārentassa āpatti.
tika-vin08t:2092_2: “Nakhenapi nakhaṃ chindanti, mukhenapi nakhaṃ chindanti, kuṭṭepi ghaṃsanti, aṅguliyo
tika-vin08t:2092_3: dukkhā honti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – anujānāmi, bhikkhave, nakhacchedana”nti
tika-vin08t:2092_4: vacanato nakhacchedanasatthakaṃ dhāretuṃ vaṭṭati. Heṭṭhā ca “nakhacchedanaṃ valitakaṃyeva
tika-vin08t:2092_5: karonti, tasmā taṃ vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. “Valitakanti nakhacchedanakāle
tika-vin08t:2092_6: daḷhaggahaṇatthaṃ valīhi yuttameva karonti, tasmā taṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2092_7: vuttaṃ. Maṃsappamāṇenāti aṅgulaggamaṃsappamāṇena. Vīsatimaṭṭhanti vīsatipi hatthapādanakhe
tika-vin08t:2094_0: Lomakathāyaṃ “sambādhelomaṃ saṃharāpenti. Manussā ujjhāyanti khīyanti vipācenti seyyathāpi
tika-vin08t:2094_1: gihī kāmabhogino”ti vatthusmiṃ uppanne “na, bhikkhave…pe… dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato
tika-vin08t:2094_2: saṃharāpentassa āpatti. Aññatarassa bhikkhuno sambādhe vaṇo hoti, bhesajjaṃ na tiṭṭhatīti
tika-vin08t:2094_3: imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ābādhapaccayā sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpetu”nti
tika-vin08t:2094_4: vacanato ābādhapaccayā bhesajjapatiṭṭhāpanatthāya sambādhe lomaṃ harāpentassa anāpatti.
tika-vin08t:2094_5: “Seyyathāpi pisācillikā”ti manussānaṃ ujjhāyanapaccayā “na, bhikkhave, dīghaṃ nāsikālomaṃ
tika-vin08t:2094_6: dhāretabbaṃ, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato dhāraṇapaccayā āpatti. “Anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t:2094_7: bhikkhave, saṇḍāsa”nti anurakkhaṇatthāya saṇḍāso anuññāto, tasmā nāsikālomaṃ saṇḍāsena
tika-vin08t:2094_8: harāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Palitanti paṇḍarakesaṃ. Gāhetuṃ na vaṭṭati “mā me jarābhāvo hotū”ti
tika-vin08t:2094_9: manasi katattā. Bībhacchaṃ hutvāti virūpaṃ hutvā. Palitaṃ vā apalitaṃ vāti paṇḍaraṃ
tika-vin08t:2094_10: vā apaṇḍaraṃ vā. Gāhāpetuṃ vaṭṭati appasādāvahattāti.
tika-vin08t:2096_1: Atha vā akāyabandhanenāti abandhitakāyabandhano hutvāti itthambhūtatthe karaṇavacanaṃ
tika-vin08t:2096_2: yathā “bhinnena sīsena paggharantena lohitena paṭivisake ujjhāpesī”ti. Tenāha “abandhitvā
tika-vin08t:2096_3: nikkhamantena yattha sarati, tattha bandhitabba”nti. Kāyabandhanaṃ nāma cha kāyabandhanāni
tika-vin08t:2096_4: kalābukaṃ, deḍḍubhakaṃ, murajaṃ, maddavīṇaṃ, paṭṭikaṃ, sūkarantakanti. Tattha kalābukaṃ
tika-vin08t:2096_5: nāma bahurajjukaṃ. Deḍḍubhakaṃ nāma udakasappasīsasadisaṃ. Murajaṃ nāma murajavaṭṭisaṇṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2096_6: veṭhetvā kataṃ. Maddavīṇaṃ nāma pāmaṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ. Īdisañhi ekampi na vaṭṭati, pageva
tika-vin08t:2096_7: bahūni. Tasmā paṭikkhittāni akappiyakāyabandhanāni nāma cattāri honti, paṭṭikaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2096_8: sūkarantakanti imāni dve kāyabandhanāni bhagavatā anuññātāni kappiyakāyabandhanāni
tika-vin08t:2096_9: nāma, tassa pakativītā vā macchakaṇṭakavāyimā vā paṭṭikā vaṭṭati, sesā kuñjaracchikādibhedā
tika-vin08t:2096_10: na vaṭṭati. Sūkarantakaṃ nāma kuñcikakosakasaṇṭhānaṃ hoti, ekarajjukaṃ, pana muddikakāyabandhanañca
tika-vin08t:2096_11: sūkarantakaṃ anulometi. Imehi pana dvīhi saddhiṃ aṭṭha kāyabandhanāni honti. “Anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t:2096_12: bhikkhave, murajaṃ maddavīṇa”nti idaṃ dasāsuyeva anuññātanti pāmaṅgadasā cettha catunnaṃ
tika-vin08t:2096_13: upari na vaṭṭati. Sobhakaṃ nāma veṭhetvā mukhavaṭṭisibbanaṃ. Guṇakaṃ nāma mudiṅgasaṇṭhānena
tika-vin08t:2096_14: sibbanaṃ. Evaṃ sibbitā hi anto thirā hontīti vuccati. Pavanantoti pāsanto vuccati.
tika-vin08t:2096_15: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “muddikakāyabandhanaṃ nāma caturassaṃ akatvā sajjitaṃ. Pāmaṅgadasā
tika-vin08t:2096_17: Pavanantoti pāsanto, ‘dasāmūla’nti ca likhitaṃ. Akāyabandhanena sañcicca vā asañcicca
tika-vin08t:2096_18: vā gāmappavesane āpatti. Saritaṭṭhānato bandhitvā pavisitabbaṃ, nivattitabbaṃ vāti likhita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2098_1: ettha hatthisoṇḍakaṃ nāma nābhimūlato hatthisoṇḍasaṇṭhānaṃ olambakaṃ katvā nivatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:2098_2: coḷikaitthīnaṃ nivāsanaṃ viya. Macchavāḷakaṃ nāma ekato dasantaṃ ekato pāsantaṃ olambitvā
tika-vin08t:2098_3: nivatthaṃ. Catukaṇṇakaṃ nāma uparito dve, heṭṭhato dveti evaṃ cattāro kaṇṇe dassetvā
tika-vin08t:2098_4: nivatthaṃ. Tālavaṇṭakaṃ nāma tālavaṇṭākārena sāṭakaṃ olambitvā nivāsanaṃ. Satavalikaṃ
tika-vin08t:2098_5: nāma dīghasāṭakaṃ anekakkhattuṃ obhujitvā ovaṭṭikaṃ karontena nivatthaṃ, vāmadakkhiṇapassesu
tika-vin08t:2098_6: vā nirantaraṃ valiyo dassetvā nivatthaṃ. Sace pana jāṇuto paṭṭhāya ekaṃ vā dve vā
tika-vin08t:2098_7: valiyo paññāyanti, vaṭṭati. Saṃvelliyaṃ nivāsentīti mallakammakārādayo viya kacchaṃ
tika-vin08t:2098_8: bandhitvā nivāsenti, evaṃ nivāsetuṃ gilānassapi maggappaṭipannassapi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:2098_9: Setapaṭapārutādivasena na gihipārutaṃ pārupitabbanti ettha yaṃ kiñci setapaṭapārutaṃ
tika-vin08t:2098_12: aññathā pārutaṃ sabbametaṃ gihipārutaṃ nāma, tasmā yathā setapaṭā aḍḍhapālakanigaṇṭhā
tika-vin08t:2098_13: pārupanti, yathā ca ekacce paribbājakā uraṃ vivaritvā dvīsu aṃsakūṭesu pāvuraṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:2098_14: ṭhapenti, yathā ca ekasāṭakā manussā nivatthasāṭakassa ekena antena piṭṭhiṃ pārupitvā
tika-vin08t:2098_15: ubho kaṇṇe ubhosu aṃsakūṭesu ṭhapenti, yathā ca surāsoṇḍādayo sāṭakena gīvaṃ parikkhipitvā
tika-vin08t:2098_16: ubho ante ure vā olambenti, piṭṭhiyaṃ vā khipenti, yathā ca antepurikāyo akkhitārakamattaṃ
tika-vin08t:2098_17: dassetvā oguṇṭhikaṃ pārupanti, yathā ca mahājeṭṭhā dīghasāṭakaṃ nivāsetvā tasseva
tika-vin08t:2098_18: ekena antena sakalasarīraṃ pārupanti, yathā ca kassakā khettakuṭiṃ pavisantā sāṭakaṃ
tika-vin08t:2098_19: paliveṭhetvā upakacchake pakkhipitvā tasseva ekena antena sarīraṃ pārupanti, yathā
tika-vin08t:2098_20: ca brāhmaṇā ubhinnaṃ upakacchakānaṃ antare sāṭakaṃ pavesetvā aṃsakūṭesu pārupanti,
tika-vin08t:2098_21: yathā ca pāḷikārako bhikkhu ekaṃsapārupanena pārutaṃ vāmabāhuṃ vivaritvā cīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:2098_22: aṃsakūṭe āropeti. Evaṃ apārupitvā sabbepi ete aññe ca evarūpe pārupanadose vajjetvā
tika-vin08t:2098_23: nibbikāraṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ pārupitabbaṃ. Tathā apārupitvā ārāme vā antaraghare vā anādarena
tika-vin08t:2100_0: 43. Kājakathāyaṃ muṇḍaveṭhīti yathā rañño kuhiñci gacchanto parikkhārabhaṇḍaggahaṇamanussāti
tika-vin08t:2100_1: adhippāyo. Ubhatokājanti ekasmiṃyeva kāje purato ca pacchato ca ubhosu bhāgesu laggetvā
tika-vin08t:2100_2: vahitabbabhāraṃ. Ekatokājanti ekato pacchatoyeva laggetvā vahitabbabhāraṃ. Antarākājanti
tika-vin08t:2100_3: majjhe laggetvā dvīhi vahitabbabhāraṃ. Sīsabhārādayo sīsādīhi vahitabbabhārādayo
tika-vin08t:2100_4: eva. Olambakanti hatthena olambitvā vahitabbabhāraṃ. Etesu ubhatokājameva na vaṭṭati, sesā vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin08t:2102_0: 44. Dantakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ dantakaṭṭhassa akhādane pañca dose, khādane pañcānisaṃse
tika-vin08t:2102_1: ca dassetvā bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ anuññātaṃ. Tattha pañca dosā nāma acakkhussaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2102_2: mukhaṃ duggandhaṃ, rasaharaṇiyo na visujjhanti, pittaṃ semhaṃ bhattaṃ pariyonandhati,
tika-vin08t:2102_3: bhattamassa nacchādetīti. Tattha acakkhussanti cakkhūnaṃ hitaṃ na hoti, parihāniṃ
tika-vin08t:2102_4: janeti. Nacchādetīti na ruccati. Pañcānisaṃsā vuttapaṭipakkhato veditabbā. Tato dīghadantakaṭṭhakhādane
tika-vin08t:2102_5: ca atimadāhakadantakaṭṭhakhādane ca dukkaṭaṃ paññapetvā aṭṭhaṅgulaparamaṃ caturaṅgulapacchimaṃ
tika-vin08t:2102_6: dantakaṭṭhaṃ anuññātaṃ. Tattha aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ paramaṃ etassa dantakaṭṭhassāti aṭṭhaṅgulaparamaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2102_7: Caturaṅgulaṃ pacchimaṃ pamāṇaṃ etassa dantakaṭṭhassāti caturaṅgulapacchimaṃ. Atimadāhakanti
tika-vin08t:2102_8: atikhuddakaṃ. Aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ mahādantakaṭṭhaṃ nāma, caturaṅgulaṃ khuddakadantakaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin08t:2102_9: nāma, pañcachasattaṅgulaṃ majjhimadantakaṭṭhaṃ nāma. Tena vuttaṃ “duvidhena udakena
tika-vin08t:2102_10: tividhena dantakaṭṭhenā”ti. “Aṭṭhaṅgulaparamanti manussānaṃ pamāṇaṅgulena aṭṭhaṅgulaparama”nti aṭṭhakathāya māha.
tika-vin08t:2103_0: Ettha ca pamāṇaṅgulenāti idaṃ pakatiaṅgulenāti gahetvā manussānaṃ pakatiaṅgulena
tika-vin08t:2103_1: aṭṭhaṅgulato adhikappamāṇaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ na vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Tattakameva ca katvā
tika-vin08t:2103_2: khādanti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “manussānaṃ pamāṇaṅgulena” icceva vuttaṃ, na “pakatiaṅgulenā”ti.
tika-vin08t:2103_3: Tasmā yaṃ vaḍḍhakihatthato aṅgulaṃ pamāṇaṃ katvā manussā gehādīni minanti, tena manussānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2103_4: pamāṇaṅgulabhūtena vaḍḍhakiaṅgulena aṭṭhaṅgulaparamanti attho gahetabbo. Vuttañhi
tika-vin08t:2103_6: “pamāṇaṅgulenāti vaḍḍhakiaṅgulena, keci pana ‘pakatiaṅgulenā’ti vadanti, taṃ caturaṅgulapacchimavacanena
tika-vin08t:2103_7: sameti. Na hi pakatiaṅgulena caturaṅgulappamāṇaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ kaṇṭhe avilaggaṃ khādituṃ sakkā”ti.
tika-vin08t:2105_0: 45. Rukkhārohanakathāyaṃ puriso pamāṇo yassa rukkhassāti poriso, uddhaṃ ukkhipitahatthena
tika-vin08t:2105_1: saddhiṃ manussakāyappamāṇo pañcahatthamattaucco rukkhapadeso, taṃ porisaṃ rukkhaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2105_2: avayave samudāyavohāro yathā “samuddo diṭṭho”ti, ābhuso padanti gacchanti pavattantīti
tika-vin08t:2105_3: āpadā, parissayā. Yāva attho atthi etasmiṃ rukkheti yāvadattho, rukkho, attha-saddo
tika-vin08t:2105_4: payojanavācako. Yāva tasmiṃ rukkhe bhikkhussa attho payojanaṃ atthi, tāva abhiruhitabboti
tika-vin08t:2107_0: 46. Chandāropanakathāyaṃ chandasoti sakkaṭabhāsāya. Na āropetabbanti vācanāmaggaṃ
tika-vin08t:2107_1: na āropetabbaṃ. Sakāya niruttiyāti māgadhabhāsāya. Tattha santehi katāti sakkaṭā,
tika-vin08t:2107_2: aṭṭhakavāmakādīhi samitapāpehi isīhi katāti attho. Atha vā sakkaritabbā pūjitabbāti
tika-vin08t:2107_3: sakkaṭā manussānaṃ hitasukhāvahanato, tadatthikehi manussehi pūjitabbāti attho. Bhāsīyateti
tika-vin08t:2107_4: bhāsā, sakkaṭā ca sā bhāsā cāti sakkaṭabhāsā. Vedattayagatā nirutti, sassa esāti
tika-vin08t:2107_5: sakā, bhagavato vacanantyattho. Magadhe jātā māgadhikā, ādikappakāle magadharaṭṭhe
tika-vin08t:2107_6: jātāti attho. Uccateti utti, nīharitvā utti nirutti, piṭakattayato nīharitvā kathīyatetyattho.
tika-vin08t:2114_0: 47. Lokāyatakathāyaṃ lokiyanti patiṭṭhahanti puññāpuññāni tabbipāko cāti loko, sattaloko.
tika-vin08t:2114_1: Ābhuso yatanti vīriyaṃ karonti etthāti āyataṃ, lokassa āyataṃ lokāyataṃ, sattānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2114_2: bhuso vīriyakaraṇaṭṭhānantyattho. Kiṃ taṃ? Titthiyasatthaṃ. Sabbaṃ ucchiṭṭhaṃ, kasmā?
tika-vin08t:2114_3: Sakuṇādīhi paribhuttapubbattā. Sabbaṃ anucchiṭṭhaṃ imassa avasesabhojanassa kenaci
tika-vin08t:2114_4: aparibhuttapubbattā. Seto kāko aṭṭhissa setattā, kāḷo bako pādassa kāḷattāti. Natthi
tika-vin08t:2114_5: attho etthāti niratthakaṃ, niratthakameva kāraṇaṃ niratthakakāraṇaṃ. Tena paṭisaṃyuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:2114_6: niratthakakāraṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ. Taranti etthāti titthaṃ, paṭṭanaṃ. Titthaṃ viyāti
tika-vin08t:2114_7: titthaṃ, laddhi, taṃ etesaṃ atthīti titthiyā, viparītadassanā. Sāsanti attano sāvake
tika-vin08t:2114_8: etthāti satthaṃ, titthiyānaṃ satthaṃ titthiyasatthaṃ. Na tiracchānavijjā pariyāpuṇitabbāti
tika-vin08t:2114_9: ettha tiracchānavijjā nāma yā kāci bāhirakā anatthasañhitā. Na pariyāpuṇitabbāti
tika-vin08t:2114_10: attanā na pariyāpuṇitabbā. Na vācetabbāti paresaṃ na vācetabbā. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin08t:2116_0: 48. Khipitakathāyaṃ khipīyitthāti khipito. Khipi abyattasaddeti dhātu. Bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇattā
tika-vin08t:2116_1: tasmiṃ khipiteti vibhatyantaṃ. “Yasmiṃ kismiñci puggale”ti lakkhaṇavantakattā ajjhāharitabbo.
tika-vin08t:2116_2: Jīvāti jīva pāṇadhāraṇeti dhātu, vibhattilopo. Yasmiṃ kismiñci puggale khipite bhikkhunā
tika-vin08t:2116_3: “jīvā”ti vacanaṃ na vattabbaṃ, bhikkhusmiṃ khipite gihinā “jīvatha bhante”ti vuccamāne
tika-vin08t:2116_4: sati “ciraṃ jīvā”ti bhikkhunā vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti yojanā. “Vuccamāne”ti ettha pana lakkhaṇassa
tika-vin08t:2116_6: ajjhāharitabbaṃ yathā kiṃ “gosu duyhamānāsu puriso āgato”ti. Apare pana ācariyā īdisesu
tika-vin08t:2116_7: ṭhānesu “santesū”ti padaṃ ajjhāharitvā idameva lakkhaṇapadaṃ, “gosu duyhamānāsū”ti
tika-vin08t:2116_8: padadvayaṃ pana “santesū”ti ettha pakativikativasena kattā evāti vadanti, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2118_0: 49. Lasuṇakathāyaṃ “lasuṇaṃ nāma māgadhaka”nti pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:2118_1: “māgadhakanti magadhesu jātaṃ. Magadharaṭṭhe jātalasuṇameva hi idha lasuṇanti adhippetaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2118_2: tampi bhaṇḍikalasuṇameva, na ekadvitimiñjakaṃ. Kurundiyaṃ pana ‘jātidesaṃ avatvā
tika-vin08t:2118_3: ‘māgadhakaṃ nāma bhaṇḍikalasuṇa’nti vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Sace dve tayo bhaṇḍike ekatoyeva
tika-vin08t:2118_4: saṅkharitvā ajjhoharati, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Bhinditvā ekekaṃ miñjaṃ khādantiyā pana
tika-vin08t:2118_5: payogagaṇanāya pācittiyāni, idaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vasena pācittiyaṃ, bhikkhussa pana dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2119_0: Palaṇḍukādīnaṃ vaṇṇena vā miñjāya vā nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ. Vaṇṇena tāva palaṇḍuko
tika-vin08t:2119_1: nāma paṇḍuvaṇṇo hoti. Bhañjanako lohitavaṇṇo, haritako haritavaṇṇo, miñjāya pana
tika-vin08t:2119_2: palaṇḍukassa ekā miñjā hoti, bhañjanakassa dve, haritakassa tisso, cāpalasuṇo amiñjako.
tika-vin08t:2119_3: Aṅkuramattameva hi tassa hoti. Mahāpaccariyādīsu pana “palaṇḍukassa tīṇi miñjāni,
tika-vin08t:2119_4: bhañjanakassa dve, haritakassa eka”nti vuttaṃ. Ete palaṇḍukādayo sabhāveneva vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin08t:2119_5: sūpasampākādīsu pana māgadhakampi vaṭṭati. Tañhi paccamānesu muggasūpādīsu vā macchamaṃsavikatiyā
tika-vin08t:2119_6: vā telādīsu vā badarasāḷavādīsu vā ambilapākādīsu vā uttaribhaṅge vā yattha katthaci
tika-vin08t:2119_7: antamaso yāgupattepi pakkhipituṃ vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ. “Sabhāvenevāti sūpasampākādiṃ
tika-vin08t:2119_8: vināva. Badarasāḷavaṃ nāma badaraphalāni sukkhāpetvā cuṇṇetvā kattabbā khādanīyavikatī”ti
tika-vin08t:2121_1: Senāsanaṃ mañcapīṭhādikāyeva. Tatheva vaḷañjetuṃ vaṭṭatīti aññehi āvāsikehi bhikkhūhi
tika-vin08t:2121_2: paribhuttanīhārena paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. ‘Nevāsikā pakatiyā anatthatāya bhūmiyā
tika-vin08t:2121_3: ṭhapenti ce, tesampi anāpattiyevā’ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. ‘Dvārampī’tiādinā vuttadvāravātapānādayo
tika-vin08t:2121_4: aparikammakatāpi na apassayitabbā. Lomesūti lomesu phusantesū”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2121_6: Senāsanaṃ vāti mañcapīṭhādi vā. Tatheva vaḷañjetuṃ vaṭṭatīti iminā nevāsikehi dhotapādādīhi
tika-vin08t:2121_7: vaḷañjanaṭṭhāne sañcicca adhotapādādīhi vaḷañjantasseva āpatti paññattāti dasseti,
tika-vin08t:2121_8: ‘dvārampī’tiādinā sāmaññato vuttattā dvāravātapānādayo aparikammakatāpi na apassayitabbā.
tika-vin08t:2121_9: Ajānitvā apassayantassapi idha lomagaṇanāya āpattī”ti vuttaṃ. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2121_10: “nevāsikā pakatiyā anatthatāya bhūmiyā ṭhapenti ce, tesampi anāpattiyevāti likhitaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2121_11: dvāravātapānādayo aparikammakatāpi na apassayitabbāti likhita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2123_1: avandiyā, tayo vandiyā ca vuttā, aṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu ca na kiñci vuttā, tasmā idha āgatanayeneva
tika-vin08t:2123_2: attho daṭṭhabbo. Parivārapāḷiyaṃ pana upālipañcake pañcapañcakavasena pañcavīsati
tika-vin08t:2123_3: avandiyā, pañca vandiyā ca vuttā. Kathaṃ? “Kati nu kho, bhante, avandiyāti? Pañcime,
tika-vin08t:2123_4: upāli, avandiyā. Katame pañca? Antaragharaṃ paviṭṭho avandiyo, racchagato avandiyo,
tika-vin08t:2123_5: otamasiko avandiyo, asamannāharanto avandiyo, sutto avandiyo. Ime kho, upāli, pañca
tika-vin08t:2123_6: avandiyā. Aparepi, upāli, pañca avandiyā. Katame pañca? Yāgupāne avandiyo, bhattagge
tika-vin08t:2123_7: avandiyo, ekāvatto avandiyo, aññavihito avandiyo, naggo avandiyo. Ime kho, upāli,
tika-vin08t:2123_8: pañca avandiyā. Aparepi, upāli, pañca avandiyā. Katame pañca? Khādanto avandiyo,
tika-vin08t:2123_9: bhuñjanto avandiyo, uccāraṃ karonto avandiyo, passāvaṃ karonto avandiyo, ukkhittako
tika-vin08t:2123_10: avandiyo. Ime kho, upāli, pañca avandiyā. Aparepi, upāli, pañca avandiyā. Katame
tika-vin08t:2123_11: pañca? Pureupasampannena pacchāupasampanno avandiyo, anupasampanno avandiyo, nānāsaṃvāsako
tika-vin08t:2123_12: vuḍḍhataro adhammavādī avandiyo, mātugāmo avandiyo, paṇḍako avandiyo. Ime kho, upāli,
tika-vin08t:2123_13: pañca avandiyā. Aparepi, upāli, pañca avandiyā. Katame pañca? Pārivāsiko avandiyo,
tika-vin08t:2123_14: mūlāyapaṭikassanāraho avandiyo, mānattāraho avandiyo, mānattacāriko avandiyo, abbhānāraho
tika-vin08t:2123_15: avandiyo. Ime kho, upāli, pañca avandiyā”ti.
tika-vin08t:2124_0: “Kati nu kho, bhante, vandiyāti? Pañcime, upāli, vandiyā. Katame pañca? Pacchāupasampannena
tika-vin08t:2124_1: pureupasampanno vandiyo, nānāsaṃvāsako vuḍḍhataro dhammavādī vandiyo, ācariyo vandiyo,
tika-vin08t:2124_2: upajjhāyo vandiyo, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya
tika-vin08t:2124_3: tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vandiyo. Ime kho, upāli, pañca vandiyā”ti.
tika-vin08t:2125_0: Aṭṭhakathāyañca “otamasitoti andhakāragato. Tañhi vandantassa mañcapādādīsupi nalāṭaṃ
tika-vin08t:2125_1: paṭihaññeyya. Asamannāharantoti kiccappasutattā vandanaṃ asamannāharanto. Suttoti
tika-vin08t:2125_2: niddaṃ okkanto. Ekāvattoti ekato āvatto sapattapakkhe ṭhito verī visabhāgapuggalo
tika-vin08t:2125_3: vuccati, ayaṃ avandiyo. Ayañhi vandiyamāno pādenapi pahareyya. Aññavihitoti aññaṃ
tika-vin08t:2125_4: cintayamāno. Khādantoti piṭṭhakhajjakādīni khādanto. Uccārañca passāvañca karonto
tika-vin08t:2125_5: anokāsagatattā avandiyo. Ukkhittakoti tividhenapi ukkhepanīyakammena ukkhittako avandiyo,
tika-vin08t:2125_6: tajjanīyādikammakatā pana cattāro vanditabbā, uposathapavāraṇāpi tehi saddhiṃ labbhanti.
tika-vin08t:2125_7: Ādito paṭṭhāya ca vuttesu avandiyesu naggañca ukkhittakañca vandantasseva hoti āpatti,
tika-vin08t:2125_8: itaresaṃ pana asāruppaṭṭhena ca antarā vuttakāraṇena ca vandanā paṭikkhittā. Ito
tika-vin08t:2125_9: paraṃ pacchāupasampannādayo dasapi āpattivatthubhāveneva avandiyā. Te vandantassa
tika-vin08t:2125_10: hi niyameneva āpatti. Iti imesu pañcasu pañcakesu terasa jane vandantassa anāpatti,
tika-vin08t:2125_11: dvādasannaṃ vandanāya āpatti. Ācariyo vandiyoti pabbajjācariyo upasampadācariyo nissayācariyo
tika-vin08t:2125_12: uddesācariyo ovādācariyoti ayaṃ pañcavidhopi ācariyo vandiyo”ti āgato.
tika-vin08t:2126_0: “Antarā vuttakāraṇenāti tañhi vandantassa mañcapādādīsu nalāṭaṃ paṭihaññeyyātiādinā
tika-vin08t:2126_2: nalāṭaṃ paṭihaññeyyāti andhakāre cammakhaṇḍaṃ paññapetvā vandituṃ onamantassa nalāṭaṃ
tika-vin08t:2126_3: vā akkhi vā mañcādīsu paṭihaññati. Etena vandatopi āpattiabhāvaṃ vatvā vandanāya
tika-vin08t:2126_4: sabbathā paṭikkhepābhāvañca dīpeti. Evaṃ sabbattha suttantarehi appaṭikkhittesu.
tika-vin08t:2126_5: Naggādīsu pana vandituṃ na vaṭṭatīti. Ekato āvattoti ekasmiṃ dosāgatipakkhe parivatto,
tika-vin08t:2126_6: paviṭṭhoti attho. Tenāha ‘sapattapakkhe ṭhito’ti. Vandiyamānoti onamitvā vandiyamāno.
tika-vin08t:2126_7: Vanditabbesu uddesācariyo nissayācariyo ca yasmā navakāpi honti, tasmā ‘te vuḍḍhā
tika-vin08t:2126_8: eva vandiyā’ti vanditabbā”ti āgataṃ. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ “ekāvattotipi paṭhanti,
tika-vin08t:2126_9: tassa kuddho kodhābhibhūtoti kira attho. Ekavatthotipi keci, uttarāsaṅgaṃ apanetvā
tika-vin08t:2126_10: ṭhitoti kira attho. Taṃ sabbaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ uddhaṭapāḷiyā virujjhati. Ekāvattoti
tika-vin08t:2126_11: hi uddhaṭaṃ, tasmā na gahetabbaṃ. Antarā vuttakāraṇenāti kiccappasutattā asamannāharanto
tika-vin08t:2127_1: vuttā dasa janā. Añjalisāmīcena cāti sāmīcikammena saddhiṃ añjali ca tesaṃ na kātabbo.
tika-vin08t:2127_2: Neva pānīyapucchanatālavaṇṭaggahaṇādi khandhakavattaṃ tesaṃ dassetabbaṃ, na añjali
tika-vin08t:2127_3: paggaṇhitabboti attho. Dasannaṃ dukkaṭanti tesaṃyeva dasannaṃ evaṃ karontassa dukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin08t:2127_4: hotī”ti āgataṃ, tasmā añjalikammamattampi nesaṃ na kattabbanti.
tika-vin08t:2128_0: “Navakatarena, bhante, bhikkhunā vuḍḍhatarassa bhikkhuno pāde vandantena kati dhamme
tika-vin08t:2128_1: ajjhattaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā pādā vanditabbāti? Navakatarenupāli, bhikkhunā vuḍḍhatarassa
tika-vin08t:2128_2: bhikkhuno pāde vandantena pañca dhamme ajjhattaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā pādā vanditabbā. Katame
tika-vin08t:2128_3: pañca? Navakatarenupāli, bhikkhunā vuḍḍhatarassa bhikkhuno pāde vandantena ekaṃsaṃ
tika-vin08t:2128_4: uttarāsaṅgaṃ katvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā ubhohi pāṇitalehi pādāni parisambāhantena pemañca
tika-vin08t:2128_5: gāravañca upaṭṭhāpetvā pādā vanditabbā. Navakatarenupāli, bhikkhunā vuḍḍhatarassa
tika-vin08t:2128_6: bhikkhuno pāde vandantena ime pañca dhamme ajjhattaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā pādā vanditabbā”ti
tika-vin08t:2128_7: imasmiṃ ṭhāne sammāsambuddhena āyasmato upālissa vandanānayova ācikkhito.
tika-vin08t:2129_0: Pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvāti ettha pañcasarūpañca kathitaṃ. Kathaṃ? Vuḍḍhatarassa
tika-vin08t:2129_1: pāde vandantena ubho aṃse vivaritvā vanditabbā, na ca ubho aṃse pārupitvā vanditabbā,
tika-vin08t:2129_2: atha kho ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vanditabbāti. Etena saṅghāṭi pana ekaṃsaṃ katāpi
tika-vin08t:2129_3: akatāpi natthi dosoti pakāsito hoti. “Dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ karapuṭasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin08t:2129_4: añjaliṃ paggahetvāva vanditabbā, na hatthatalapakāsanamattena vā na hatthamuṭṭhipakāsanādinā
tika-vin08t:2129_5: vā vanditabbā”ti ca “na ekena hatthena cīvarakaṇṇachupanādimattena vanditabbā, atha
tika-vin08t:2129_6: kho ubhohi pāṇitalehi pādāni parisambāhantena vanditabbā”ti ca “evaṃ vandantehi na
tika-vin08t:2129_7: duṭṭhacittañca anādarañca upaṭṭhāpetvā vanditabbā, atha kho pemañca gāravañca upaṭṭhāpetvā
tika-vin08t:2129_8: pādā vanditabbā”ti ca evaṃ vandanānayo ācikkhito hoti.
tika-vin08t:2130_0: Kathaṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitasarūpaṃ kathitaṃ? Idha ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvāti ekaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2130_1: añjaliṃ paggahetvāti ekaṃ, ubhohi pāṇitalehi pādāni parisambāhantenāti ekaṃ, pemañca
tika-vin08t:2130_2: upaṭṭhāpetvāti ekaṃ, gāravañca upaṭṭhāpetvāti ekaṃ, evaṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitasarūpaṃ kathitaṃ
tika-vin08t:2130_3: hoti. Tenāha “pañca dhamme ajjhattaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā pādā vanditabbā”ti. Evaṃ sakalalokassa
tika-vin08t:2130_4: hitasukhakārakena dhammassāminā kāyapaṇāmamanopaṇāmavasena mahato hitasukhassa pavattanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:2130_5: āyasmato upālittherassa ācikkhitena vandanānayena vandituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:2131_0: Idāni pana ācariyā abhinavaāgatānaṃ daharānañca sāmaṇerānañca vandanānayaṃ sikkhantā
tika-vin08t:2131_1: na imaṃ āhaccabhāsitaṃ pāḷiṃ gahetvā sikkhanti, atha kho paveṇīāgatanayaṃyeva gahetvā
tika-vin08t:2131_2: sikkhanti. Kathaṃ? Yadi ṭhatvā vandatha, dve pādatalāni samaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā
tika-vin08t:2131_3: dve hatthatalāni samaṃ phusāpetvā nalāṭe patiṭṭhāpetvā vanditabbābhimukhaṃ onamitvā
tika-vin08t:2131_4: vandathāti, ayaṃ nayo “evaṃ mahāsatto suvaṇṇakadali viya bārāṇasinagarābhimukhaṃ
tika-vin08t:2131_6: añjaliṃ paggayha sirasmiṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā”tiādiaṭṭhakathāvacanañca anulometi. Idha
tika-vin08t:2131_7: pana dve pādatalāni, dve hatthatalāni, nalāṭañcāti pañcasu patiṭṭhitānīti sarūpaṃ
tika-vin08t:2131_8: vadanti. Yadi nisīditvā vandatha, paṭhamaṃ dve pādatalāni bhūmiyaṃ samaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā
tika-vin08t:2131_9: dve jāṇumaṇḍalāni samaṃ ussāpetvā dve kapparāni dvinnaṃ jāṇūnaṃ upari samaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin08t:2131_10: dve hatthatalāni samaṃ phusitāni katvā añjalisaṅkhātaṃ karapuṭaṃ sirasaṅkhāte nalāṭe
tika-vin08t:2131_11: patiṭṭhāpetvā vandatha. Tato onamitvā dve jāṇumaṇḍalāni ca dve kapparāni ca bhūmiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2131_12: samaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā dve hatthatalāni pasāretvā samaṃ bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā sīsaṃ ubhinnaṃ
tika-vin08t:2131_13: hatthapiṭṭhīnaṃ upari katvā bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā vandathāti. Ettha tu dve pādatalāni
tika-vin08t:2131_14: ekaṃ katvā, tathā dve jāṇumaṇḍalāni ekaṃ, dve kapparāni ekaṃ, dve hatthatalāni ekaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2131_15: sīsaṃ ekaṃ katvā pañcapatiṭṭhitasarūpaṃ kathenti. Esa nayo pāḷiaṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu na diṭṭho.
tika-vin08t:2132_0: Samīpaṃ gantvā pādānaṃ vandanakāle pana ekacce paṭhamaṃ attano sīsaṃ hatthena parāmasitvā
tika-vin08t:2132_1: tena hatthadvayena therānaṃ jāṇumaṇḍalaṃ cīvarassa upariyeva sambāhanti. Ekacce paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin08t:2132_2: therānaṃ jāṇumaṇḍalaṃ sacīvaraṃyeva parāmasitvā teneva hatthadvayena attano sīsaṃ
tika-vin08t:2132_3: parāmasanti. Ekacce chupanamattameva karonti. Esapi nayo na kismiñci diṭṭho. Rāmaññadesiyā
tika-vin08t:2132_4: pana bhikkhū evaṃ samīpaṃ gantvā vandanakāle therānaṃ pādaggaṃ apassantāpi pariyesitvā
tika-vin08t:2132_5: cīvarato nīharitvā pādaggameva punappunaṃ hatthena sambāhitvā sīsena pavaṭṭetvā cumbitvā
tika-vin08t:2132_6: lehitvā cirappavāsāgatapiyamanāpaupajjhāyaṃ vā ācariyaṃ vā passantā viya katvā vandanti.
tika-vin08t:2132_7: Taṃ kiriyaṃ parivārapāḷiyaṃ “ubhohi pāṇitalehi pādāni parisambāhantena pemañca gāravañca
tika-vin08t:2132_8: upaṭṭhāpetvā pādā vanditabbā”ti āgatapāḷiyā saṃsandati viya dissati. Tepi na sabbe
tika-vin08t:2132_9: pāḷiṃ passanti, paveṇīvaseneva karonti, tasmā sabbesaṃ hitatthaṃ pāḷinayo amhehi
tika-vin08t:2132_10: uddhaṭo. Paveṇīāgatanayato hi pāḷinayo balavataro, tasmā bhagavato āṇaṃ garuṃ karontehi
tika-vin08t:2132_11: sappurisehi pāḷinayo samāsevitabboti amhākaṃ khanti, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2134_1: aṭṭhaṅgulapādakameva vaṭṭati. Pamāṇātikkantopi vaṭṭatīti samacaturassameva sandhāya
tika-vin08t:2134_2: vuttaṃ. Āyatacaturassā pana sattaṅgapañcaṅgāpi uccapādā na vaṭṭanti. Vetteheva caturassādiākārena
tika-vin08t:2134_3: kataṃ bhaddapīṭhanti āha “vettamayapīṭha”nti. Dārupaṭṭikāya uparīti aṭaniākārena
tika-vin08t:2134_4: ṭhitadārupaṭalassa heṭṭhā. Uddhaṃ pādaṃ katvā pavesanakālañhi sandhāya “uparī”ti
tika-vin08t:2134_5: vuttaṃ. Eḷakassa pacchimapādadvayaṃ viya vaṅkākārena ṭhitattā panetaṃ “eḷakapādapīṭha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2136_1: akappiyamañco pallaṅko’ti sārasamāse vuttaṃ. Dīghalomako mahākojavoti caturaṅgulādhikalomo
tika-vin08t:2136_2: kāḷakojavo. ‘Caturaṅgulādhikāni kira tassa lomānī’ti vacanato caturaṅgulato heṭṭhā
tika-vin08t:2136_3: vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Vānacitro uṇṇāmayattharaṇoti bhitticchedādivasena vicitro uṇṇāmayattharaṇo.
tika-vin08t:2136_5: tiṇṇaṃ tūlānaṃ aññatarapuṇṇā tūlikā. ‘Uddalomīti ubhatodasaṃ uṇṇāmayattharaṇaṃ. Ekantalomīti
tika-vin08t:2136_6: ekatodasaṃ uṇṇāmayattharaṇa’nti dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Sārasamāse pana ‘uddalomīti
tika-vin08t:2136_9: Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ panettha ‘ṭhapetvā tūlikaṃ sabbāneva gonakādīni ratanaparisibbitāni
tika-vin08t:2136_10: na vaṭṭantī’ti vuttaṃ. Tattha ‘ṭhapetvā tūlika’nti etena ratanaparisibbanarahitāpi
tika-vin08t:2136_11: tūlikā na vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. ‘Ratanaparisibbitāni na vaṭṭantī’ti iminā pana yāni ratanaparisibbitāni,
tika-vin08t:2136_12: tāni bhūmattharaṇavasena yathānurūpaṃ mañcādīsu ca upanetuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2136_13: Ettha ca vinayapariyāyaṃ patvā garuke ṭhātabbattā idha vuttanayenevettha vinicchayo
tika-vin08t:2136_14: veditabbo. Suttantikadesanāya pana gahaṭṭhānampi vasena vuttattā tesaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:2137_0: Ajinacammehīti ajinamigacammehi. Tāni kira cammāni sukhumatarāni, tasmā dupaṭṭatipaṭṭāni
tika-vin08t:2137_1: katvā sibbanti. Tena vuttaṃ ‘ajinappaveṇī’ti. Uttaraṃ uparibhāgaṃ chādetīti uttaracchado,
tika-vin08t:2137_2: vitānaṃ, tañca lohitavitānaṃ idhādhippetanti āha ‘uparibaddhena rattavitānenā’ti,
tika-vin08t:2137_3: ‘rattavitānesu ca kāsāvaṃ vaṭṭati, kusumbhādirattameva na vaṭṭatī’ti gaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin08t:2137_4: vuttaṃ. Mahāupadhānanti pamāṇātikkantaṃ upadhānaṃ. Ettha ca kiñcāpi dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2137_5: ‘alohitakāni dvepi vaṭṭantiyeva, tato uttari labhitvā aññesaṃ dātabbāni. Dātumasakkonto
tika-vin08t:2137_6: mañce tiriyaṃ attharitvā uparipaccattharaṇaṃ datvā nipajjitumpi labhatī’ti avisesena
tika-vin08t:2137_8: dvayameva vaṭṭati. Gilānassa bimbohanāni santharitvā upari ca paccattharaṇaṃ datvā
tika-vin08t:2137_9: nipajjitumpi vaṭṭatī’ti vuttattā gilānoyeva mañce tiriyaṃ attharitvā nipajjituṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:2137_10: veditabbaṃ. Abhinissāya nisīditunti apassāya nisīditu”nti ettako vinicchayo sāratthadīpaniyaṃ āgato.
tika-vin08t:2138_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ – pana vāḷarūpānīti āharimāni vāḷarūpāni. Caturaṅgulādhikānīti
tika-vin08t:2138_1: uddalomīekantalomīhi visesadassanaṃ. Caturaṅgulato hi ūnāni kira uddalomīādīsu pavisanti.
tika-vin08t:2138_2: Vānacitro uṇṇāmayattharaṇoti nānāvaṇṇehi uṇṇāmayasuttehi bhitticchedādivasena vāyitvā
tika-vin08t:2138_3: katacittattharaṇo. Ghanapupphakoti bahalarāgo. Pakatitūlikāti tūlapuṇṇā bhisi. Vikatikāti
tika-vin08t:2138_5: Ekantalomīti ekantadasaṃ uṇṇāmayattharaṇa”nti dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Koseyyakaṭṭissamayanti
tika-vin08t:2138_6: kosiyasuttānaṃ antarā suvaṇṇamayasuttāni pavesetvā vītaṃ, suvaṇṇasuttaṃ kira kaṭṭissaṃ
tika-vin08t:2138_7: kasaṭanti ca vuccati. Teneva “koseyyakasaṭamaya”nti ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttanti
tika-vin08t:2139_0: Ajinamigacammānaṃ atisukhumattā dupaṭṭatipaṭṭāni katvā sibbantīti vuttaṃ “ajinappaveṇī”ti.
tika-vin08t:2139_1: Rattavitānenāti sabbarattena vitānena. Yaṃ pana nānāvaṇṇaṃ vānacittaṃ vā lepacittaṃ
tika-vin08t:2139_2: vā, taṃ vaṭṭati. Ubhatolohitakūpadhānepi eseva nayo. Citraṃ vāti idaṃ pana sabbathā
tika-vin08t:2139_3: kappiyattā vuttaṃ, na pana ubhatoupadhānesu akappiyattā. Na hi lohitakasaddo citte
tika-vin08t:2139_4: vaṭṭati. Paṭaliggahaṇeneva cittakassapi attharaṇassa saṅgahetabbappasaṅgato. Kāsāvaṃ
tika-vin08t:2139_5: pana lohitaṅgavohāraṃ na gacchati, tasmā vitānepi ubhatoupadhānepi vaṭṭati. Sace
tika-vin08t:2139_7: vuttaṃ, na pana uccāsayanamahāsayanabhāvadassanatthaṃ tathā avuttattā, taṃ pana upadhānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2139_8: uposathikānaṃ gahaṭṭhānaṃ vaṭṭati. Uccāsayanamahāsayanameva hi tadā tesaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:2139_9: Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathādīsu kiñcāpi “ṭhapetvā tūlikaṃ sabbāneva gonakādīni ratanaparisibbitāni
tika-vin08t:2139_10: na vaṭṭantī”ti vuttaṃ, vinayaṭṭhakathā eva pana kappiyākappiyabhāve pamāṇanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2141_0: Pāsādaparibhogakathāyaṃ sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vajirabuddhiṭīkāyañca na kiñci vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2141_2: Puggalikaṃ pana suvaṇṇādivicitraṃ bhikkhussa sampaṭicchitumeva na vaṭṭati ‘na kenaci
tika-vin08t:2141_3: pariyāyena jātarūparajataṃ sāditabba’nti vuttattā. Tenevettha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘saṅghikavihāre
tika-vin08t:2141_4: vā puggalikavihāre vā’ti vuttaṃ. Gonakādiakappiyabhaṇḍavisaye eva vuttaṃ ekabhikkhussapi
tika-vin08t:2143_1: vadanti. Uṇṇāhi katapādukāti uṇṇālomamayakambalehi, uṇṇālomehi eva vā katapādukā.
tika-vin08t:2143_2: Kāḷasīhoti kāḷamukhavānarajāti. Sesamettha pāḷito ca aṭṭhakathāto ca suviññeyyamevā”ti
tika-vin08t:2143_4: tintakākapakkhavaṇṇātipi vadanti. Rajananti uparilittanīlādivaṇṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2143_5: Tenāha ‘coḷakena puñchitvā’ti. Tañhi tathā puñchite vigacchati. Yaṃ pana cammassa
tika-vin08t:2143_6: duggandhāpanayanatthaṃ kāḷarattādirajanehi rañjitattā kāḷarattādivaṇṇaṃ hoti, taṃ
tika-vin08t:2143_7: coḷādīhi apanetuṃ na sakkā cammagatikameva, tasmā taṃ vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Khallakanti
tika-vin08t:2143_8: sabbapaṇhipidhānacammaṃ aparigaḷanatthaṃ paṇhiyā uparibhāge apidhāya āropanabandhanamattaṃ
tika-vin08t:2143_9: vaṭṭati. Vicitrāti saṇṭhānato vicitrapaṭṭā adhippetā, na vaṇṇato sabbaso apanetabbesu
tika-vin08t:2143_10: khallakādīsu paviṭṭhattā. Biḷālasadisamukhattā mahāulūkā pakkhibiḷālāti vuccanti,
tika-vin08t:2143_11: tesaṃ cammaṃ nāma pakkhalomameva. Uṇṇāhi katapādukāti ettha uṇṇāmayakambalehi katapādukā
tika-vin08t:2143_12: saṅgayhanti. Kāḷasīhoti kāḷamukhavānarajāti. Cammaṃ na vaṭṭatīti nisīdanattharaṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:2143_13: kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, bhūmattharaṇādivasena paribhogo vaṭṭatevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2144_0: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “migamātukoti tassa nāmaṃ, vātamigoti ca tassa nāmaṃ. ‘Kāḷasīho
tika-vin08t:2144_1: kāḷamukho kapī’ti likhitaṃ. Cammaṃ na vaṭṭatīti yena pariyāyena cammaṃ vaṭṭissati,
tika-vin08t:2144_2: so parato āvibhavissati. ‘Attano puggalikavasena paccāhāro paṭikkhitto’ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2144_3: ‘Na, bhikkhave, kiñci cammaṃ dhāretabba’nti ettāvatā siddhe ‘na, bhikkhave, gocamma’nti
tika-vin08t:2144_4: idaṃ parato ‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sabbapaccantimesu janapadesu cammāni attharaṇānī’ti
tika-vin08t:2146_0: Yānakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, purisayuttaṃ hatthavaṭṭaka”nti ettha anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t:2146_1: bhikkhave, purisayuttaṃ, anujānāmi, bhikkhave, hatthavaṭṭakanti evaṃ paccekaṃ vākyaparisamāpanaṃ
tika-vin08t:2146_2: adhippetanti āha “purisayuttaṃ itthisārathi vā…pe… purisā vā, vaṭṭatiyevā”ti. “Pīṭhakasivikanti
tika-vin08t:2146_3: pīṭhakayānaṃ. Pāṭaṅkinti andolikāyetaṃ adhivacana”nti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ, “pīṭhakasivikanti
tika-vin08t:2146_4: phalakādinā kataṃ pīṭhakayānaṃ. Paṭapotalikaṃ andolikā. Sabbampi yānaṃ upāhanenapi
tika-vin08t:2148_1: uddhaṭānaṃ hatavatthakānaṃ, pilotikānanti vuttaṃ hoti. Pāpaṇiketi antarāpaṇato patitapilotikacīvare.
tika-vin08t:2148_2: Ussāho karaṇīyoti pariyesanā kātabbā. Paricchedo panettha natthi, paṭṭasatampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:2148_3: Sabbamidaṃ sādiyantassa bhikkhuno vasena vuttaṃ. Aggaḷaṃ tunnanti ettha uddharitvā
tika-vin08t:2148_4: allīyāpanakhaṇḍaṃ aggaḷaṃ, suttena saṃsibbitaṃ tunnaṃ, vaṭṭetvā karaṇaṃ ovaṭṭikaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2148_5: Kaṇḍupakaṃ vuccati muddikā. Daḷīkammanti anuddharitvāva upassayaṃ katvā allīyāpanakaṃ
tika-vin08t:2148_6: vatthakhaṇḍa”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgataṃ. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “acchupeyyanti patiṭṭhapeyyaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2148_8: apanetvā allīyāpanavatthakhaṇḍa”nti vuttaṃ. Diguṇaṃ saṅghāṭinti dupaṭṭaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ.
tika-vin08t:2148_9: Ekacciyanti ekapaṭṭaṃ aggapaṭṭaṃ. Aggaḷaṃ ajjhāpessanti jiṇṇaṭṭhāne pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ laggāpeyyaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2150_0: Chinnacīvarakathāyaṃ tīsu pana cīvaresu dve vā ekaṃ vā chinditvā kātabbanti ettha
tika-vin08t:2150_1: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, chinnakaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ chinnakaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ chinnakaṃ antaravāsaka”nti
tika-vin08t:2150_2: vacanato pañcakhaṇḍasattakhaṇḍādivasena chinditvāva kātabbaṃ, na acchinditvāti attho.
tika-vin08t:2150_3: Sace nappahoti, āgantukapaṭṭaṃ dātabbanti ettha yadi chinditvā kate tiṇṇampi cīvarānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2150_4: atthāya sāṭako nappahoti, dve cīvarāni chinnakāni kātabbāni, ekaṃ cīvaraṃ acchinnakaṃ
tika-vin08t:2150_5: kattabbaṃ. Dvīsu cīvaresu chinditvā katesu sāṭako nappahoti, dve cīvarāni acchinnakāni,
tika-vin08t:2150_6: ekaṃ cīvaraṃ chinnakaṃ kātabbaṃ. Ekasmimpi cīvare chinditvā kate sāṭako nappahoti,
tika-vin08t:2150_7: evaṃ sati acchinditvā āgantukapaṭṭaṃ dātabbanti attho. Tamatthaṃ pāḷiyā sādhetuṃ
tika-vin08t:2150_8: “vuttañheta”ntiādimāha. Tattha anvādhikampi āropetunti evaṃ appahonte sati āgantukapaṭṭampi
tika-vin08t:2152_1: ulūkapakkhikaṃ ajinakkhipa”nti imāni titthiyasamādānattā thullaccayavatthūnīti bhagavatā
tika-vin08t:2152_2: paṭikkhittāni. Tattha naggiyanti naggabhāvo acelakabhāvo. Kusacīranti kusena ganthetvā
tika-vin08t:2152_3: katacīvaraṃ. Vākacīranti tāpasānaṃ vakkalaṃ. Phalakacīranti phalakasaṇṭhānāni phalakāni
