tika-vin08t:2152_4: sibbitvā katacīvaraṃ. Kesakambalanti kesehi tante vāyitvā katakambalaṃ. Vālakambalanti
tika-vin08t:2152_5: cāmarīvālehi vāyitvā katakambalaṃ. Ulūkapakkhikanti ulūkasakuṇassa pakkhehi katanivāsanaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2152_6: Ajinakkhipanti salomaṃ sakhuraṃ ajinamigacammaṃ. Tāni titthiyaddhajabhūtāni acīvarabhāvena
tika-vin08t:2152_7: pākaṭānīti ācariyena idha na vuttāni. Potthako pana apākaṭoti taṃ vatvā sabbanīlakādīni
tika-vin08t:2152_8: dukkaṭavatthukāni vuttāni. “Tipaṭṭacīvarassa vā majjhe dātabbānī”ti vuttattā tipaṭṭacīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:2152_9: dhāretuṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ. Tipaṭṭādīnañca bahupaṭṭacīvarānaṃ antare īdisāni asāruppavaṇṇāni
tika-vin08t:2152_10: paṭapilotikāni kātabbānīti dasseti. Kañcukaṃ nāma sīsato paṭimuñcitvā kāyāruḷhavatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2152_11: Tenāha “phāletvā rajitvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Veṭhananti sīsaveṭhanaṃ. Tirīṭanti
tika-vin08t:2154_0: Cīvaravicāraṇakathāyaṃ “paṇḍito, bhikkhave, ānando, mahāpañño, bhikkhave, ānando.
tika-vin08t:2154_1: Yatra hi nāma mayā saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānissati, kusimpi nāma
tika-vin08t:2154_2: karissati, aḍḍhakusimpi nāma karissati, maṇḍalampi nāma karissati, aḍḍhamaṇḍalampi
tika-vin08t:2154_3: nāma karissati, vivaṭṭampi nāma karissati, anuvivaṭṭampi nāma karissati, gīveyyakampi
tika-vin08t:2154_4: nāma karissati, jaṅgheyyakampi nāma karissati, bāhantampi nāma karissati, chinnakaṃ
tika-vin08t:2154_5: bhavissati, satthalūkhaṃ samaṇasāruppaṃ paccatthikānañca anabhicchita”nti vacanato
tika-vin08t:2154_6: “passasi tvaṃ, ānanda, magadhakhettaṃ acchibaddhaṃ pāḷibaddhaṃ mariyādabaddhaṃ siṅghāṭakabaddha”nti
tika-vin08t:2154_7: bhagavato saṃkhittena vuttavacanaṃ sutvā āyasmā ānando bhagavato ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ
tika-vin08t:2154_8: sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cīvaraṃ saṃvidahi. Tathā idānipi evarūpaṃ cīvaraṃ saṃvidahitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2155_0: Tattha “acchibaddhanti caturassakedārabaddhaṃ. Pāḷibaddhanti āyāmato ca vitthārato
tika-vin08t:2155_1: ca dīghamariyādabaddhaṃ. Mariyādabaddhanti antarantarā rassamariyādabaddhaṃ. Siṅghāṭakabaddhanti
tika-vin08t:2155_2: mariyādāya mariyādaṃ vinivijjhitvā gataṭṭhāne siṅghāṭakabaddhaṃ, catukkasaṇṭhānanti
tika-vin08t:2155_3: attho. Yatra hi nāmāti yo nāma. Kusimpi nāmātiādīsu kusīti āyāmato ca vitthārato
tika-vin08t:2155_4: ca anuvātādīnaṃ dīghapaṭṭānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Aḍḍhakusīti antarantarārassapaṭṭānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2155_5: nāmaṃ. Maṇḍalanti pañcakhaṇḍikassa cīvarassa ekekasmiṃ khaṇḍe mahāmaṇḍalaṃ. Aḍḍhamaṇḍalanti
tika-vin08t:2155_6: khuddakamaṇḍalaṃ. Vivaṭṭanti maṇḍalañca aḍḍhamaṇḍalañca ekato katvā sibbitaṃ majjhimakhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2155_7: Anuvivaṭṭanti tassa ubhosu passesu dve khaṇḍāni. Gīveyyakanti gīvāveṭhanaṭṭhāne daḷhīkaraṇatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:2155_9: saṃsibbitaṃ paṭṭaṃ. Gīvāṭṭhāne ca jaṅghaṭṭhāne ca paṭṭānametaṃ nāmanti. Bāhantanti
tika-vin08t:2155_10: anuvivaṭṭānaṃ bahi ekekaṃ khaṇḍaṃ. Iti pañcakhaṇḍikacīvarenetaṃ vicāritanti. Atha
tika-vin08t:2155_11: vā anuvivaṭṭanti vivaṭṭassa ekapassato dvinnaṃ ekapassato dvinnanti catunnampi khaṇḍānametaṃ
tika-vin08t:2155_12: nāmaṃ. Bāhantanti suppamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ pārupantena saṃharitvā bāhāya upari ṭhapitā
tika-vin08t:2155_13: ubho antā bahimukhā tiṭṭhanti, tesaṃ etaṃ nāmaṃ. Ayameva hi nayo mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2157_0: Daṇḍakathinenacīvarasibbanakathāyaṃ – tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū tattha tattha
tika-vin08t:2157_1: khīlaṃ nikkhanitvā sambandhitvā cīvaraṃ sibbenti, cīvaraṃ vikaṇṇaṃ hoti. Bhagavato
tika-vin08t:2157_2: etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kathinaṃ kathinarajjuṃ, tattha tattha
tika-vin08t:2157_3: obandhitvā cīvaraṃ sibbetunti. Visame kathinaṃ pattharanti, kathinaṃ paribhijjati…pe…
tika-vin08t:2157_4: na, bhikkhave, visame kathinaṃ pattharitabbaṃ, yo patthareyya, āpatti dukkaṭassāti.
tika-vin08t:2158_0: Chamāya kathinaṃ pattharanti, kathinaṃ paṃsukitaṃ hoti. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tiṇasanthārakanti.
tika-vin08t:2158_1: Kathinassa anto jīrati. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, anuvātaṃ paribhaṇḍaṃ āropetunti. Kathinaṃ
tika-vin08t:2158_2: nappahoti. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, daṇḍakathinaṃ bidalakaṃ salākaṃ vinandhanarajjuṃ
tika-vin08t:2158_3: vinandhanasuttakaṃ vinandhitvā cīvaraṃ sibbetunti. Suttantarikāyo visamā honti. Anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t:2158_4: bhikkhave, kaḷimbhakanti. Suttā vaṅkā honti. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, moghasuttakanti.
tika-vin08t:2159_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū adhotehi pādehi kathinaṃ akkamanti, kathinaṃ dussati.
tika-vin08t:2159_1: Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – na, bhikkhave, adhotehi pādehi kathinaṃ akkamitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2160_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū allehi pādehi kathinaṃ akkamanti, kathinaṃ dussati.
tika-vin08t:2160_1: Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – na, bhikkhave, allehi pādehi kathinaṃ akkamitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2161_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū saupāhanā kathinaṃ akkamanti, kathinaṃ dussati. Bhagavato
tika-vin08t:2161_1: etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – na, bhikkhave, saupāhanena kathinaṃ akkamitabbaṃ. Yo akkameyya,
tika-vin08t:2162: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū cīvaraṃ sibbantā aṅguliyā paṭiggaṇhanti, aṅguliyo dukkhā honti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – anujānāmi, bhikkhave, paṭiggahanti.
tika-vin08t:2163_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uccāvace paṭiggahe dhārenti suvaṇṇamayaṃ
tika-vin08t:2163_1: rūpiyamayaṃ. Manussā ujjhāyanti khīyanti vipācenti “seyyathāpi gihī kāmabhogino”ti.
tika-vin08t:2163_2: Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – na, bhikkhave, uccāvacā paṭiggahā dhāretabbā, yo
tika-vin08t:2163_3: dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassāti. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, aṭṭhimayaṃ…pe… saṅkhanābhimayanti.
tika-vin08t:2164_0: Tena kho pana samayena sūciyopi satthakāpi paṭiggahāpi nassanti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:2164_1: ārocesuṃ – anujānāmi, bhikkhave, āvesanavitthakanti. Āvesanavitthake samākulā honti.
tika-vin08t:2164_2: Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – anujānāmi, bhikkhave, paṭiggahathavikanti. Aṃsabaddhako
tika-vin08t:2164_3: na hoti…pe… anujānāmi, bhikkhave, aṃsabaddhakaṃ bandhanasuttakanti.
tika-vin08t:2165_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū abbhokāse cīvaraṃ sibbantā sītenapi uṇhenapi kilamanti.
tika-vin08t:2165_1: Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kathinasālaṃ kathinamaṇḍapanti.
tika-vin08t:2165_2: Kathinasālā nīcavatthukā hoti, udakena ottharīyati. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ
tika-vin08t:2165_3: – anujānāmi, bhikkhave, uccavatthukaṃ kātunti. Cayo paripatati. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:2165_4: cinituṃ tayo caye iṭṭhakacayaṃ, silācayaṃ, dārucayanti. Ārohantā vihaññanti. Anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t:2165_5: bhikkhave, tayo sopāne iṭṭhakasopānaṃ, silāsopānaṃ, dārusopānanti. Ārohantā paripatanti.
tika-vin08t:2165_6: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ālambanabāhanti. Kathinasālāya tiṇacuṇṇaṃ paripatati. Anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t:2165_7: bhikkhave, ogumphetvā ullittāvalittaṃ kātuṃ setavaṇṇaṃ kāḷavaṇṇaṃ gerukaparikammaṃ
tika-vin08t:2166_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū cīvaraṃ sibbetvā tatheva kathinaṃ ujjhitvā pakkamanti,
tika-vin08t:2166_1: undūrehipi upacikāhipi khajjati. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:2166_2: kathinaṃ saṅgharitunti. Kathinaṃ paribhijjati. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, goghaṃsikāya
tika-vin08t:2166_3: kathinaṃ saṅgharitunti. Kathinaṃ viniveṭhiyati. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bandhanarajjunti.
tika-vin08t:2167_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū kuṭṭepi thambhepi kathinaṃ ussāpetvā pakkamanti, paripatitvā
tika-vin08t:2167_1: kathinaṃ bhijjati. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bhittikhīle
tika-vin08t:2167_2: vā nāgadante vā laggetunti. Ayaṃ khuddakavatthukhandhake āgato pāḷipāṭho.
tika-vin08t:2168_1: yāya dupaṭṭacīvaraṃ sibbantā kathine cīvaraṃ vibandhanti. Kathinaṃ nappahotīti dīghassa
tika-vin08t:2168_2: bhikkhuno pamāṇena kataṃ kathinaṃ ittarassa bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ patthariyamānaṃ nappahoti,
tika-vin08t:2168_3: antoyeva hoti, daṇḍake na pāpuṇātīti attho. Daṇḍakathinanti tassa majjhe ittarassa
tika-vin08t:2168_4: bhikkhuno pamāṇena aññaṃ nisseṇiṃ bandhituṃ anujānāmīti attho. Bidalakanti daṇḍakathinappamāṇena
tika-vin08t:2168_5: kaṭasārakassa pariyante paṭisaṃharitvā duguṇakaraṇaṃ. Salākanti dupaṭṭacīvarassa
tika-vin08t:2168_6: antare pavesanasalākaṃ. Vinandhanarajjunti mahānisseṇiyā saddhiṃ khuddakanisseṇiṃ
tika-vin08t:2168_7: vinandhituṃ rajjuṃ. Vinandhanasuttakanti khuddakanisseṇiyā cīvaraṃ vinandhituṃ suttakaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2168_8: Vinandhitvā cīvaraṃ sibbitunti tena suttakena tattha cīvaraṃ vinandhitvā sibbetuṃ.
tika-vin08t:2168_9: Visamā hontīti kāci khuddakā honti, kāci mahantā. Kaḷimbhakanti pamāṇasaññākaraṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:2168_10: yaṃ kiñci tālapaṇṇādiṃ. Moghasuttakanti vaḍḍhakīnaṃ dārūsu kāḷasuttena viya haliddisuttena
tika-vin08t:2168_11: saññākaraṇaṃ. Aṅguliyā paṭiggaṇhantīti sūcimukhaṃ aṅguliyā paṭicchanti. Paṭiggahanti
tika-vin08t:2168_12: aṅgulikosakaṃ. Āvesanavitthakaṃ nāma yaṃ kiñci pāticaṅkoṭakādi. Uccavatthukanti paṃsuṃ
tika-vin08t:2168_13: ākiritvā uccavatthukaṃ kātuṃ anujānāmīti attho. Ogumphetvā ullittāvalittaṃ kātunti
tika-vin08t:2168_14: chadanaṃ odhunitvā ghanadaṇḍakaṃ katvā anto ceva bahi ca mattikāya limpitunti attho.
tika-vin08t:2168_15: Goghaṃsikāyāti veḷuṃ vā rukkhadaṇḍakaṃ vā anto katvā tena saddhiṃ saṃharitunti attho.
tika-vin08t:2168_16: Bandhanarajjunti tathā saṃharitassa bandhanarajju”nti ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāpāṭho.
tika-vin08t:2169_0: “Anuvātaṃ paribhaṇḍanti kilañjādīsu karotīti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Bidalakanti duguṇakaraṇasaṅkhātassa
tika-vin08t:2169_1: kiriyāvisesassa adhivacanaṃ. Kassa duguṇakaraṇaṃ? Yena kilañjādinā mahantaṃ kathinaṃ
tika-vin08t:2169_2: atthataṃ, tassa. Tañhi daṇḍakathinappamāṇena pariyante saṃharitvā duguṇaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2169_3: Paṭiggahanti aṅgulikañcukaṃ. Pāti nāma paṭiggahasaṇṭhānena kato bhājanaviseso. Na
tika-vin08t:2169_4: sammatīti nappahoti. Nīcavatthukaṃ cinitunti bahikuṭṭassa samantato nīcavatthukaṃ
tika-vin08t:2170_0: “Nisseṇimpīti catūhi daṇḍehi cīvarappamāṇena āyatacaturassaṃ katvā baddhapaṭalampi.
tika-vin08t:2170_1: Ettha hi cīvarakoṭiyo samakaṃ bandhitvā cīvaraṃ yathāsukhaṃ sibbanti. Tattha attharitabbanti
tika-vin08t:2170_2: tassā nisseṇiyā upari cīvarassa upatthambhanatthāya attharitabbaṃ. Kathinasaṅkhātāya
tika-vin08t:2170_3: nisseṇiyā cīvarassa bandhanakarajju kathinarajjūti majjhimapadalopī samāsoti āha
tika-vin08t:2170_4: “yāyā”tiādi. Tattha yasmā dvinnaṃ paṭalānaṃ ekasmiṃ adhike jāte tattha valiyo honti,
tika-vin08t:2170_5: tasmā dupaṭṭacīvarassa paṭaladvayampi samakaṃ katvā bandhanakarajju kathinarajjūti
tika-vin08t:2170_6: veditabbaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ kathinassa anto jīratīti kathine baddhassa cīvarassa pariyanto
tika-vin08t:2171_0: “Bidalakaṃ nāma diguṇakaraṇasaṅkhātassa kiriyāvisesassa adhivacanaṃ. Kassa diguṇakaraṇaṃ?
tika-vin08t:2171_1: Yena kilañjādinā mahantaṃ kathinaṃ atthataṃ, tassa. Tañhi daṇḍakathinappamāṇena pariyante
tika-vin08t:2171_2: saṃharitvā diguṇaṃ kātabbaṃ, aññathā khuddakacīvarassa anuvātaparibhaṇḍādividhānakaraṇe
tika-vin08t:2171_3: hatthassa okāso na hoti. Salākāya sati dvinnaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ ñatvā sibbitāsibbitaṃ
tika-vin08t:2171_4: sukhaṃ paññāyati. Daṇḍakathine kate na bahūhi sahāyehi payojanaṃ. ‘Asaṃkuṭitvā cīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:2171_5: samaṃ hoti, koṇāpi samā hontī’ti likhitaṃ, ‘haliddisuttena saññākaraṇa’nti vuttattā
tika-vin08t:2171_6: ‘haliddisuttena cīvaraṃ sibbetumpi vaṭṭatī’ti siddhaṃ. Tattha hi keci akappiyasaññino.
tika-vin08t:2171_7: Paṭiggaho nāma aṅgulikoso. Pātīti paṭiggahasaṇṭhānaṃ. Paṭiggahathavikanti aṅgulikosathavika”nti
tika-vin08t:2173_0: Gahapaticīvarādikathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gahapaticīvaraṃ, yo icchati, paṃsukūliko
tika-vin08t:2173_1: hotu, yo icchati, gahapaticīvaraṃ sādiyatu, itarītarenapāhaṃ, bhikkhave, santuṭṭhiṃ
tika-vin08t:2173_2: vaṇṇemī”ti vacanato asamādinnadhutaṅgo yo bhikkhu paṃsukūlaṃ dhāretuṃ icchati, tena
tika-vin08t:2173_3: paṃsukūlikena bhavitabbaṃ. Yo pana gihīhi dinnaṃ gahapaticīvaraṃ sādiyituṃ icchati,
tika-vin08t:2173_4: tena gahapaticīvarasādiyakena bhavitabbaṃ. Samādinnadhutaṅgo pana bhikkhu “gahapaticīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:2173_5: paṭikkhipāmi, paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti adhiṭṭhahanato gahapaticīvaraṃ sādiyituṃ
tika-vin08t:2173_6: na vaṭṭati. Gahapaticīvaranti gahapatīhi dinnaṃ cīvaraṃ. Itarītarenapīti appagghenapi
tika-vin08t:2174_0: “Itarītarenāti itarena itarena. Itara-saddo pana aniyamavacano dvikkhattuṃ vuccamāno
tika-vin08t:2174_1: yaṃkiñci-saddehi samānattho hotīti vuttaṃ appagghenapi mahagghenapi yena kenacī”ti
tika-vin08t:2174_2: sāratthadīpaniyaṃ, “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pāvāraṃ, anujānāmi, bhikkhave, koseyyapāvāraṃ,
tika-vin08t:2174_3: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kojava”nti vacanato pāvārādīnipi sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha
tika-vin08t:2174_4: pāvāroti salomako kappāsādibhedo. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kojavanti ettha pakatikojavameva
tika-vin08t:2174_5: vaṭṭati, mahāpiṭṭhiyakojavaṃ na vaṭṭati. Kojavanti uṇṇāmayo pāvārasadiso. “Mahāpiṭṭhi
tika-vin08t:2174_10: bhikkhave, kambala”nti vacanato aḍḍhakāsiyādīni mahagghānipi kambalāni vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin08t:2174_11: Aḍḍhakāsiyanti ettha kāsīti sahassaṃ vuccati, taṃagghanako kāsiyo. Ayaṃ pana pañca
tika-vin08t:2176_0: Chacīvarakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, cha cīvarāni khomaṃ kappāsikaṃ koseyyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2176_1: kambalaṃ sāṇaṃ bhaṅga”nti vacanato khomādīni cha cīvarāni dukūlādīni cha anulomacīvarāni
tika-vin08t:2176_2: ca vaṭṭanti. Tattha “khomanti khomasuttehi vāyitaṃ khomapaṭṭacīvaraṃ. Kappāsikanti
tika-vin08t:2176_3: kappāsato nibbattasuttehi vāyitaṃ. Koseyyanti kosakārakapāṇakehi nibbattasuttehi
tika-vin08t:2176_4: vāyitaṃ. Kambalanti uṇṇāmayacīvaraṃ. Sāṇanti sāṇasuttehi katacīvaraṃ. Bhaṅganti khomasuttādīni
tika-vin08t:2176_5: sabbāni, ekaccāni vā missetvā katacīvaraṃ. Bhaṅgampi vākamayamevāti keci. Dukūlaṃ
tika-vin08t:2176_6: paṭṭuṇṇaṃ somārapaṭaṃ cīnapaṭaṃ iddhijaṃ devadinnanti imāni pana cha cīvarāni etesaṃyeva
tika-vin08t:2176_7: anulomānīti visuṃ na vuttāni. Dukūlañhi sāṇassa anulomaṃ vākamayattā. Paṭṭuṇṇadese
tika-vin08t:2176_8: sañjātavatthaṃ paṭṭuṇṇaṃ. ‘Paṭṭuṇṇakoseyyaviseso’ti hi abhidhānakose vuttaṃ. Somāradese
tika-vin08t:2176_9: cīnadese ca jātavatthāni somāracīnapaṭāni. Paṭṭuṇṇādīni tīṇi koseyyassa anulomāni
tika-vin08t:2176_10: pāṇakehi katasuttamayattā. Iddhijaṃ ehibhikkhūnaṃ puññiddhiyā nibbattacīvaraṃ, taṃ
tika-vin08t:2176_11: khomādīnaṃ aññataraṃ hotīti tesaṃ eva anulomaṃ. Devatāhi dinnaṃ cīvaraṃ devadinnaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2176_12: Kapparukkhe nibbattaṃ jāliniyā devakaññāya anuruddhattherassa dinnavatthasadisaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2176_13: tampi khomādīnaṃyeva anulomaṃ hoti tesu aññatarabhāvato”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2177_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “khomanti khomasuttehi vāyitaṃ khomapaṭacīvaraṃ, taṃ vākamayanti
tika-vin08t:2177_1: vadanti. Kappāsasuttehi vāyitaṃ kappāsikaṃ. Evaṃ sesānipi. Kambalanti eḷakādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:2177_2: lomamayasuttena vāyitaṃ paṭaṃ. Bhaṅganti khomasuttādīni sabbāni, ekaccāni vā missetvā
tika-vin08t:2177_3: vāyitaṃ cīvaraṃ, bhaṅgampi vākamayamevāti keci. Dukūlaṃ paṭṭuṇṇaṃ somārapaṭaṃ cīnapaṭaṃ
tika-vin08t:2177_4: iddhijaṃ devadinnanti imāni cha cīvarāni etesaññeva anulomānīti visuṃ na vuttāni.
tika-vin08t:2177_5: Dukūlañhi sāṇassa anulomaṃ vākamayattā. ‘Paṭṭuṇṇaṃ koseyyaviseso’ti abhidhānakose
tika-vin08t:2177_6: vuttaṃ. Somāradese cīnadese ca jātavatthāni somāracīnapaṭāni. Paṭṭuṇṇādīni tīṇi koseyyassa
tika-vin08t:2177_7: anulomāni pāṇakehi katasuttamayattā. Iddhijanti ehibhikkhūnaṃ puññiddhiyā nibbattacīvaraṃ,
tika-vin08t:2177_8: kapparukkhehi nibbattaṃ, devadinnañca khomādīnaṃ aññataraṃ hotīti tesaṃ sabbesaṃ
tika-vin08t:2179_0: Rajanādikathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, cha rajanāni mūlarajanaṃ khandharajanaṃ tacarajanaṃ
tika-vin08t:2179_1: pattarajanaṃ puppharajanaṃ phalarajana”nti vacanato imesu chasu rajanesu ekakena
tika-vin08t:2179_2: cīvaraṃ rajitabbaṃ, na chakaṇena vā paṇḍumattikāya vā rajitabbaṃ. Tāya rajitacīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:2179_3: dubbaṇṇaṃ hoti. Charajanānaṃ sarūpaṃ heṭṭhā parikkhārakathāyaṃ vuttameva. Tattha
tika-vin08t:2179_4: chakaṇenāti gomayena. Paṇḍumattikāyāti tambamattikāya. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, rajanaṃ
tika-vin08t:2179_5: pacituṃ cullaṃ rajanakumbhi”nti vacanato sītudakāya cīvaraṃ na rajitabbaṃ. Tāya hi
tika-vin08t:2179_6: rajitacīvaraṃ duggandhaṃ hoti. Tattha sītudakāti apakkarajanaṃ vuccati. “Anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t:2179_7: bhikkhave, uttarāḷumpaṃ bandhitu”nti vacanato uttarāḷumpaṃ bandhituṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha
tika-vin08t:2179_8: uttarāḷumpanti vaṭṭādhārakaṃ, rajanakumbhiyā majjhe ṭhapetvā taṃ ādhārakaṃ parikkhipitvā
tika-vin08t:2179_9: rajanaṃ pakkhipituṃ anujānāmīti attho. Evañhi kate rajanaṃ na uttarati. Tattha “rajanakumbhiyā
tika-vin08t:2179_10: majjhe ṭhapetvāti antorajanakumbhiyā majjhe ṭhapetvā. Evaṃ vaṭṭādhārake antorajanakumbhiyā
tika-vin08t:2179_11: pakkhitte majjhe udakaṃ tiṭṭhati, vaṭṭādhārakato bahi samantā antokumbhiyaṃ rajanacchalli.
tika-vin08t:2179_12: Pakkhipitunti rajanacchalliṃ pakkhipitu”nti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2179_13: pana “evañhi kateti vaṭṭādhārassa anto rajanodakaṃ, bahi challikañca katvā viyojane
tika-vin08t:2179_14: kate. Na uttaratīti kevalaṃ udakato pheṇuṭṭhānābhāvā na uttaratī”ti vuttaṃ. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2179_15: pana “gomaye āpatti natthi, virūpattā vāritaṃ. Kuṅkumapupphaṃ na vaṭṭatīti vadantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2180_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, udake vā nakhapiṭṭhikāya vā thevakaṃ dātu”nti vacanato tathā
tika-vin08t:2180_1: katvā rajanassa pakkāpakkabhāvo jānitabbo. Tattha udake vā nakhapiṭṭhikāya vāti sace
tika-vin08t:2180_2: paripakkaṃ hoti, udakapātiyā dinno thevo sahasā na visarati, nakhapiṭṭhiyampi avisaranto
tika-vin08t:2180_3: tiṭṭhati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, rajanuḷuṅkaṃ daṇḍakathālaka”nti vacanato rajanassa
tika-vin08t:2180_4: olokanakāle kumbhiyā rakkhaṇatthaṃ uḷuṅkadaṇḍakathālikāni icchitabbāni. Tattha rajanuḷuṅkanti
tika-vin08t:2180_5: rajanauḷuṅkaṃ. Daṇḍakathālakanti daṇḍameva daṇḍakaṃ. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, rajanakolambaṃ
tika-vin08t:2180_6: rajanaghaṭa”nti vacanato tānipi icchitabbāni. Tattha rajanakolambanti rajanakuṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2180_7: Tattha rajanakuṇḍanti pakkarajanaṭṭhapanakaṃ mahāghaṭaṃ. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, rajanadoṇika”nti
tika-vin08t:2180_8: vacanato pātiyampi patte cīvare maddante cīvarassa paribhijjanato cīvararakkhaṇatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:2180_9: rajanadoṇikā icchitabbā. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tiṇasantharaka”nti vacanato chamāya
tika-vin08t:2180_10: cīvare patthariyamāne cīvarassa paṃsukitattā tato rakkhaṇatthaṃ tiṇasantharaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2180_11: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, cīvaravaṃsaṃ cīvararajju”nti vacanato tiṇasanthārake upacikādīhi
tika-vin08t:2180_12: khajjamāne cīvaravaṃse vā cīvararajjuyā vā cīvaraṃ pattharitabbaṃ majjhena cīvare
tika-vin08t:2181_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kaṇṇe bandhitu”nti vacanato kaṇṇe bandhitabbaṃ cīvarassa kaṇṇe
tika-vin08t:2181_1: bandhiyamāne kaṇṇassa jiṇṇattā. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kaṇṇasuttaka”nti vacanato
tika-vin08t:2181_2: kaṇṇasuttakena bandhitabbaṃ evaṃ bandhante rajanassa ekato gaḷitattā. “Anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t:2181_3: bhikkhave, samparivattakaṃ samparivattakaṃ rajetuṃ, na ca acchinne theve pakkamitu”nti
tika-vin08t:2181_4: vacanato tathā rajitabbaṃ. Yāva rajanabindu gaḷitaṃ na chijjati, tāva na aññatra
tika-vin08t:2181_5: gantabbaṃ. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, udake osāretu”nti vacanato patthinnaṃ cīvaraṃ udake
tika-vin08t:2181_6: osāretabbaṃ. Tattha patthinnanti atirajitattā thaddhaṃ. Udake osāretunti udake pakkhipitvā
tika-vin08t:2181_7: ṭhapetuṃ. Rajane pana nikkhante taṃ udakaṃ chaḍḍetvā cīvaraṃ madditabbaṃ. “Anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t:2181_8: bhikkhave, pāṇinā ākoṭetu”nti vacanato pharusaṃ cīvaraṃ pāṇinā ākoṭetabbaṃ. “Na,
tika-vin08t:2181_9: bhikkhave, acchinnakāni cīvarāni dhāretabbāni, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin08t:2181_10: vacanato acchinnakāni cīvarāni dantakāsāvāni na dhāretabbāni. Tattha dantakāsāvānīti
tika-vin08t:2181_11: ekaṃ vā dve vā vāre rajitvā dantavaṇṇāni dhārenti.
tika-vin08t:2183_0: Atirekacīvarakathāyaṃ “na, bhikkhave, atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabbaṃ, yo dhāreyya, yathādhammo
tika-vin08t:2183_1: kāretabbo”ti vacanato niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ ubbhatasmiṃ kathine dasāhato paraṃ atirekacīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:2183_2: dhārentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t:2183_3: dhāretu”nti vacanato ubbhatepi kathine dasāhabbhantare dhārentassa atthatakathinānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2183_4: anubbhatepi kathine pañcamāsabbhantare tato parampi dasāhabbhantare anatthatakathinānampi
tika-vin08t:2183_5: dasāhabbhantare atirekacīvaraṃ anāpatti. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, atirekacīvaraṃ vikappetu”nti
tika-vin08t:2183_6: vacanato dasāhato paraṃ vikappetvā atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretuṃ vaṭṭati. Kittakaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:2183_7: cīvaraṃ vikappetabbanti? “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, āyāmena aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ sugataṅgulena
tika-vin08t:2183_8: caturaṅgulavitthataṃ pacchimaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetu”nti vacanato sabbantimena paricchedena
tika-vin08t:2183_9: sugataṅgulena aṭṭhaṅgulāyāmaṃ caturaṅgulavitthāraṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetuṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha
tika-vin08t:2183_10: sugataṅgulaṃ nāma majjhimapurisaṅgulasaṅkhātena vaḍḍhakīaṅgulena tivaṅgulaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t:2183_11: manussānaṃ pakatiaṅgulena aḍḍhapañcakaṅgulaṃ, tasmā dīghato vaḍḍhakīhatthena ekahatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:2183_12: pakatihatthena diyaḍḍhahatthaṃ vitthārato vaḍḍhakīhatthena vidatthippamāṇaṃ pakatihatthena
tika-vin08t:2183_13: chaḷaṅgulādhikavidatthippamāṇaṃ pacchimaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetuṃ vaṭṭati, tato ūnappamāṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:2183_14: na vaṭṭati, adhikappamāṇaṃ pana vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2185_2: udakasāṭika”nti vacanato imāni aṭṭha dānāni sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha nikkhittacīvarā
tika-vin08t:2185_3: hutvā kāyaṃ ovassantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ naggiyaṃ asuci jegucchaṃ paṭikūlaṃ hoti, tasmā
tika-vin08t:2185_4: vassikasāṭikā anuññātā. Āgantuko bhikkhu na vīthikusalo hoti, na gocarakusalo, kilanto
tika-vin08t:2185_5: piṇḍāya carati, tasmā āgantukabhattaṃ anuññātaṃ, gamiko bhikkhu attano bhattaṃ pariyesamāno
tika-vin08t:2185_6: satthā vā vihāyissati, yattha vā vāsaṃ gantukāmo bhavissati, tattha vikālena upagacchissati,
tika-vin08t:2185_7: kilanto addhānaṃ gamissati, tasmā gamikabhattaṃ. Gilānassa bhikkhuno sappāyāni bhojanāni
tika-vin08t:2185_8: alabhantassa ābādho vā abhivaḍḍhissati, kālakiriyā vā bhavissati, tasmā gilānabhattaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2185_9: Gilānupaṭṭhāko bhikkhu attano bhattaṃ pariyesamāno gilānassa ussūre bhattaṃ nīharissati,
tika-vin08t:2185_10: tasmā gilānupaṭṭhākabhattaṃ. Gilānassa bhikkhuno sappāyāni bhesajjāni alabhantassa
tika-vin08t:2185_11: ābādho vā abhivaḍḍhissati, kālakiriyā vā bhavissati, tasmā gilānabhesajjaṃ. Yasmā
tika-vin08t:2185_12: bhagavatā andhakavinde dasānisaṃse sampassamānena yāgu anuññātā, tasmā dhuvayāgu.
tika-vin08t:2185_13: Yasmā mātugāmassa naggiyaṃ asuci jegucchaṃ paṭikūlaṃ hoti, tasmā bhikkhunisaṅghassa
tika-vin08t:2187_1: nisīdana”nti vacanato kāyādīnaṃ asucimuccanādito gopanatthāya nisīdanaṃ dhāretuṃ
tika-vin08t:2187_2: vaṭṭati. Tassa vidhānaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yāvamahantaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:2187_3: ākaṅkhati, tāvamahantaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ kātu”nti vacanato atikhuddakena nisīdanena
tika-vin08t:2187_4: senāsanassa agopanattā mahantampi paccattharaṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:2187_5: yassa kaṇḍu vā pīḷakā vā assāvo vā thullakacchu vā ābādho, kaṇḍupaṭicchādi”nti vacanato
tika-vin08t:2187_6: īdisesu ābādhesu santesu cīvarādiguttatthāya kaṇḍupaṭicchādi vaṭṭati. Tattha pamāṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:2187_7: heṭṭhā vuttameva. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, mukhapuñchanacoḷa”nti vacanato mukhasodhanatthāya
tika-vin08t:2187_8: mukhapuñchanacoḷaṃ vaṭṭati. Tampi heṭṭhā vuttameva. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, parikkhāracoḷaka”nti
tika-vin08t:2187_9: vacanato ticīvare paripuṇṇe parissāvanathavikādīhi atthe sati parikkhāracoḷaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:2187_10: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetuṃ, vassikasāṭikaṃ vassānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2187_11: cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ tato paraṃ vikappetuṃ, nisīdanaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetuṃ,
tika-vin08t:2187_12: paccattharaṇaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetuṃ, kaṇḍupaṭicchādiṃ yāva ābādhā adhiṭṭhātuṃ
tika-vin08t:2187_13: tato paraṃ vikappetuṃ, mukhapuñchanacoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetuṃ, parikkhāracoḷaṃ
tika-vin08t:2187_14: adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetu”nti vacanato vuttanayena adhiṭṭhānañca vikappanā ca kātabbā.
tika-vin08t:2187_15: Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana heṭṭhā vuttova.
tika-vin08t:2189_0: 58. Adhammakammakathāyaṃ na, bhikkhave…pe… dukkaṭassāti idaṃ “tena kho pana samayena
tika-vin08t:2189_1: chabbaggiyā bhikkhū saṅghamajjhe adhammakammaṃ karonti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ
tika-vin08t:2189_2: – na, bhikkhave, adhammakammaṃ kātabbaṃ, yo kareyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti imaṃ uposathakkhandhake
tika-vin08t:2189_3: āgatapāṭhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Anujānāmi…pe… paṭikkositunti tatheva āgataṃ “bhagavato
tika-vin08t:2189_4: etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – anujānāmi, bhikkhave, adhammakamme kayiramāne paṭikkositu”nti
tika-vin08t:2189_5: imaṃ. Tattha karontiyevāti paññattampi sikkhāpadaṃ madditvā adhammakammaṃ karontiyevāti
tika-vin08t:2189_6: attho. “Anujānāmi…pe… paṭikkositu”nti evaṃ adhammakamme kayiramāne sati “pesalehi
tika-vin08t:2189_7: bhikkhūhi taṃ adhammakammaṃ akataṃ, kammaṃ dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ puna kātabba”nti evaṃ
tika-vin08t:2189_8: paṭikkositabbaṃ, na tuṇhībhāvena khamitabbanti attho. Iti vacanatoti idaṃ pana pubbapāṭhaṃ
tika-vin08t:2189_9: gahetvā iti vacanato. Adhammakammaṃ na kātabbanti aparapāṭhaṃ gahetvā iti vacanato
tika-vin08t:2189_10: kayiramānañca adhammakammaṃ bhikkhūhi nivāretabbanti dvidhā yojanā kātabbā.
tika-vin08t:2190_0: Nivārentehi cātiādi pana “tena kho pana samayena pesalā bhikkhū chabbaggiyehi bhikkhūhi
tika-vin08t:2190_1: adhammakamme kayiramāne paṭikkosanti, chabbaggiyā bhikkhū labhanti āghātaṃ, labhanti
tika-vin08t:2190_2: appaccayaṃ, vadhena tajjenti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:2190_3: diṭṭhimpi āvikātu”nti pāṭhañca “tesaṃyeva santike diṭṭhiṃ āvikaronti, chabbaggiyā
tika-vin08t:2190_4: bhikkhū labhanti āghātaṃ, labhanti appaccayaṃ, vadhena tajjenti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:2190_5: ārocesuṃ – anujānāmi, bhikkhave, catūhi pañcahi paṭikkosituṃ, dvīhi tīhi diṭṭhiṃ
tika-vin08t:2190_6: āvikātuṃ, ekena adhiṭṭhātuṃ na metaṃ khamatī”ti ime pāṭhe sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vacanatoti
tika-vin08t:2190_7: idaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ tīṇi sampadānāni gahetvā tīhi kiriyāpadehi visuṃ visuṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2190_8: Sabbañcetaṃ anupaddavatthāya vuttaṃ, na āpattisabbhāvatoti yojanā. Kathaṃ anupaddavasambhavoti?
tika-vin08t:2190_9: Niggahakammaṃ kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvato, aññassa upaddavassa ca nivāraṇato. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:2190_10: vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ “tesaṃ anupaddavatthāyāti saṅgho saṅghassa kammaṃ na karoti,
tika-vin08t:2190_11: aññopi upaddavo bahūnaṃ hoti, tasmā vutta”nti.
tika-vin08t:2192_0: 59. Okāsakatakathāyaṃ na, bhikkhave, anokāsakatotiādi “tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā
tika-vin08t:2192_1: bhikkhū anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ āpattiyā codenti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – na,
tika-vin08t:2192_2: bhikkhave, anokāsakato bhikkhu āpattiyā codetabbo, yo codeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
tika-vin08t:2192_3: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, okāsaṃ kārāpetvā āpattiyā codetuṃ, karotu āyasmā okāsaṃ, ahaṃ
tika-vin08t:2192_4: taṃ vattukāmo”ti idaṃ pāṭhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Adhippāyesu cāvanādhippāyoti, sāsanato
tika-vin08t:2192_5: cāvetukāmo. Akkosādhippāyoti paraṃ akkositukāmo paribhāsitukāmo. Kammādhippāyoti
tika-vin08t:2192_6: tajjanīyādikammaṃ kattukāmo. Vuṭṭhānādhippāyoti āpattito vuṭṭhāpetukāmo. Uposathappavāraṇaṭṭhapanādhippāyoti
tika-vin08t:2192_7: uposathaṃ, pavāraṇaṃ vā ṭhapetukāmo. Anuvijjanādhippāyoti upaparikkhitukāmo. Dhammakathādhippāyoti
tika-vin08t:2192_8: dhammaṃ desetukāmo. Iti paraṃ codentānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ adhippāyabhedo anekavidho hotīti
tika-vin08t:2192_10: okāsaṃ akārāpentassa dukkaṭaṃ. Kārāpetvāpi sammukhā codentassa yathānurūpaṃ saṅghādisesapācittiyadukkaṭāni,
tika-vin08t:2192_11: asammukhā pana dukkaṭamevāti ayamettha piṇḍattho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin08t:2193_0: “Ṭhapanakkhettaṃ pana jānitabba”nti vatvā taṃ dassento “suṇātu me”tiādimāha. Anuvijjakassa
tika-vin08t:2193_1: anuvijjanādhippāyena vadantassa okāsakammaṃ natthīti yojanā. Dhammakathikassa anodissa
tika-vin08t:2193_2: kammaṃ kathentassa okāsakammaṃ natthi. Sace pana odissa katheti, āpatti, tasmā taṃ
tika-vin08t:2195_0: 60. Saddhādeyyavinipātanakathāyaṃ “mātāpitaroti kho, bhikkhave, vadamāne kiṃ vadeyyāma.
tika-vin08t:2195_1: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, mātāpitūnaṃ dātuṃ, na ca, bhikkhave, saddhādeyyaṃ vinipātetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2195_2: yo vinipāteyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato dāyakehi saddhāya bhikkhussa dinnaṃ
tika-vin08t:2195_3: vinipātetvā gihīnaṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭati. “Na ca, bhikkhave, saddhādeyyanti ettha sesañātīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:2195_4: dento vinipātetiyeva. Mātāpitaro pana sace rajje ṭhitāpi patthayanti, dātabba”nti
tika-vin08t:2195_5: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā bhātubhaginīādīnaṃ ñātakānampi dātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Vuttañhi
tika-vin08t:2197: Labbhaṃ pitūnaṃ sesānaṃ, ñātīnampi na labbhatī”ti.
tika-vin08t:2198_1: vadato viññatti na hoti, ‘imaṃ gaṇhāhī’ti vadato saddhādeyyavinipātanaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin08t:2198_2: Aññātakaṃ ‘imaṃ dehī’ti vadato viññatti hoti, ‘imaṃ gaṇhāhī’ti vadato saddhādeyyavinipātanaṃ
tika-vin08t:2198_3: hoti. ‘Iminā imaṃ dehī’ti kayavikkayaṃ āpajjato nissaggiyaṃ hotī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2198_5: ‘mātaraṃ pana pitaraṃ vā’ti vutta”nti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2200_0: 61. Santaruttarakathāyaṃ antara-saddo majjhavācako. Vasati sīlenāti vāsako, “antare
tika-vin08t:2200_1: vāsako antaravāsako”ti vattabbe “rūpabhavo rūpa”ntiādīsu viya uttarapadalopīsamāsavasena
tika-vin08t:2200_2: “antaro”ti vutto. Uttarasaddo uparivācako, ābhuso sajjatīti āsaṅgo, “uttare āsaṅgo
tika-vin08t:2200_3: uttarāsaṅgo”ti vattabbe vuttanayena “uttaro”ti vutto, antaro ca uttaro ca antaruttarā,
tika-vin08t:2200_5: Atha vā saha antarena ca uttarena ca yo vattatīti santaruttaro, tipadabahubbīhisamāso.
tika-vin08t:2200_6: Saṅghāṭiṃ ṭhapetvā antaravāsakauttarāsaṅgamattadharo hutvā gāmo na pavisitabboti
tika-vin08t:2200_7: attho. “Paribbājakamadakkhi tidaṇḍakenā”tiādīsu viya itthambhūtalakkhaṇe cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2200_8: tasmā antaravāsakaṃ timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādentena parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ
tika-vin08t:2200_9: bandhitvā saṅghāṭiñca uttarāsaṅgañca diguṇaṃ katvā pārupitvā gāmo pavisitabbo.
tika-vin08t:2202_0: 62. Cīvaranikkhepakathāyaṃ saṃharīyateti saṅghāṭi, tassā saṅghāṭiyā, bhāvayoge kammatthe
tika-vin08t:2202_1: chaṭṭhī. Nikkhepāyāti ṭhapanāya, saṅghāṭiṃ aggahetvā vihāre ṭhapetvā gamanāya pañca
tika-vin08t:2202_2: kāraṇāni hontīti attho. Gilāno vā hotīti gahetvā gantuṃ asamattho gilāno vā hoti.
tika-vin08t:2202_3: Vassikasaṅketaṃ vā hotīti “vassikakālo aya”nti saṅketaṃ vā kataṃ hoti. Nadīpāragataṃ
tika-vin08t:2202_4: vā hotīti nadiyā pāraṃ gantvā bhuñjitabbaṃ hoti. Aggaḷaguttivihāro vā hotīti aggaḷaṃ
tika-vin08t:2202_5: datvāpi dātabbo suguttavihāro vā hoti. Atthatakathinaṃ vā hotīti tasmiṃ vihāre kathinaṃ
tika-vin08t:2202_6: atthataṃ vā hoti atthatakathinānaṃ asamādānacārasambhavato. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin08t:2202_7: Āraññikassa pana vihāro na sugutto hotīti appabhikkhukattā corādīnaṃ gamanaṭṭhānato
tika-vin08t:2204_0: 63. Satthakammavatthikammakathāyaṃ satthakammaṃ vā vatthikammaṃ vāti ettha yena kenaci
tika-vin08t:2204_1: satthādinā chindanādi satthakammaṃ nāma hoti. Yena kenaci cammādinā vatthipīḷanaṃ
tika-vin08t:2204_2: vatthikammaṃ nāma. “Sambādhe dahanakammaṃ paṭikkhepābhāvā vaṭṭatī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2204_3: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “vatthipīḷananti yathā vatthigatatelādi antosarīre ārohanti,
tika-vin08t:2205_0: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “sambādheti vaccamagge, bhikkhussa bhikkhuniyā ca passāvamaggepi
tika-vin08t:2205_1: anulomato dahanaṃ paṭikkhepābhāvā vaṭṭati. Satthavatthikammānulomato na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin08t:2205_2: ce? Na, paṭikkhittapaṭikkhepā, paṭikkhipitabbassa tapparamatādīpanato. Kiṃ vuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:2205_3: hoti? Pubbe paṭikkhittampi satthakammaṃ sampiṇḍetvā pacchā ‘na, bhikkhave…pe… thullaccayassā’ti
tika-vin08t:2205_4: dvikkhattuṃ satthakammassa parikkhepo kato. Tena sambādhassa sāmantā dvaṅgulaṃ paṭikkhipitabbaṃ
tika-vin08t:2205_5: nāma satthavatthikammato uddhaṃ natthīti dasseti. Kiñca bhiyyo – pubbe sambādheyeva
tika-vin08t:2205_6: satthakammaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ, pacchā sambādhassa sāmantā dvaṅgulampi paṭikkhittaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin08t:2205_7: tasseva paṭikkhepo, netarassāti siddhaṃ. Ettha ‘satthaṃ nāma satthahārakaṃ vāssa
tika-vin08t:2205_8: pariyeseyyā’tiādīsu viya yena chindati, taṃ sabbaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ ‘kaṇṭakena vā’tiādi.
tika-vin08t:2205_9: Khārudānaṃ panettha bhikkhunīvibhaṅge pasākhe pamukhe anuññātanti veditabbaṃ, eke
tika-vin08t:2205_10: pana ‘satthakammaṃ vā’ti pāṭhaṃ vikappetvā vatthikammaṃ karonti. Vatthīti kiṃ? Agghikā
tika-vin08t:2205_11: vuccati, tāya chindanaṃ vatthikammaṃ nāmāti ca atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti, te ‘satthahārakaṃ
tika-vin08t:2205_12: vāssa pariyeseyyā’ti imassa padabhājanīyaṃ dassetvā paṭikkhipitabbā. Aṇḍavuddhīti
tika-vin08t:2205_13: vātaṇḍakā, ādānavattīti anāhavattī”ti vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2207_0: 64. Nahāpitapubbakathāyaṃ nahāpito pubbeti nahāpitapubbo, pubbe nahāpito hutvā idāni
tika-vin08t:2207_1: bhikkhubhūtoti attho. Tena nahāpitapubbena bhikkhunā. Khurabhaṇḍanti khurādinahāpitabhaṇḍaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2207_3: akappiyaṃ samādapetabbaṃ, yo samādapeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Na ca, bhikkhave, nahāpitapubbena
tika-vin08t:2207_4: khurabhaṇḍaṃ pariharitabbaṃ, yo parihareyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti ca dvidhā paññatti,
tika-vin08t:2207_5: tasmā nahāpitapubbena vā anahāpitapubbena vā pabbajitena nāma akappiyasamādapanaṃ
tika-vin08t:2207_6: na kātabbaṃ. Nahāpitapubbena pana bhikkhunā khurena abhilakkhitaṃ khurabhaṇḍaṃ, khurabhaṇḍakhurakosanisitapāsāṇakhurathavikādayo
tika-vin08t:2207_7: na pariharitabbā eva. Sesaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2207_8: pana “na, bhikkhave, pabbajitena akappiye samādapetabbanti vuttattā anupasampannassapi
tika-vin08t:2207_9: na kevalaṃ dasasu eva sikkhāpadesu, atha kho yaṃ bhikkhussa na kappati, tasmimpīti
tika-vin08t:2209_0: 65. Dasabhāgakathāyaṃ saṅghikānīti saṅghasantakāni bījāni. Puggalikāyāti puggalassa
tika-vin08t:2209_1: santakāya bhūmiyā. Bhāgaṃ datvāti mūlabhāgasaṅkhātaṃ dasamabhāgaṃ bhūmisāmikānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2209_2: datvā. Paribhuñjitabbānīti tesaṃ bījānaṃ phalāni ropakehi paribhuñjitabbānīti attho.
tika-vin08t:2209_3: Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva. Idaṃ kira jambudīpe porāṇakacārittanti ādikappakāle paṭhamakappikā
tika-vin08t:2209_4: manussā bodhisattaṃ mahāsammataṃ nāma rājānaṃ katvā sabbepi attano attano taṇḍulaphalasālikhettato
tika-vin08t:2209_5: pavattataṇḍulaphalāni dasa koṭṭhāse katvā ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ bhūmisāmikabhūtassa mahāsammatarājino
tika-vin08t:2209_6: datvā paribhuñjiṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya jambudīpikānaṃ manussānaṃ cāritattā vuttaṃ. Teneva
tika-vin08t:2209_7: sāratthadīpanīnāmikāyampi vinayaṭīkāyaṃ “dasabhāgaṃ datvāti dasamabhāgaṃ datvā. Tenevāha
tika-vin08t:2209_8: ‘dasa koṭṭhāse katvā eko koṭṭhāso bhūmisāmikānaṃ dātabbo’ti” vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2211_1: meṇḍakaseṭṭhinā abhiyācito hutvā anuññātaṃ, idha pana paṭhamaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:2211_2: pañca gorase khīraṃ dadhiṃ takkaṃ navanītaṃ sappi”nti pañca gorasā anuññātā. Tato
tika-vin08t:2211_3: paraṃ seṭṭhino abhiyācanānurūpaṃ vatvā anujānituṃ “santi, bhikkhave, maggā kantārā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t:2211_4: Sesaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Tathā alabhantena aññātakaappavāritaṭṭhānato
tika-vin08t:2211_5: yācitvāpi gahetabbanti etena evarūpesu kālesu viññattipaccayā doso natthīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:2211_6: “Ekadivasena gamanīye magge ekabhattatthāya pariyesitabba”nti vuttattā pana tato
tika-vin08t:2211_7: upari yācanaṃ na vaṭṭatīti dassitaṃ. “Dīghe addhāne”tiādinā sace māsagamanīye magge
tika-vin08t:2211_8: sattāhagamanīyo eva kantāro hoti, tattha sattāhayāpanīyamattameva pātheyyaṃ pariyesitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2211_9: tato paraṃ piṇḍacārikādivasena subhikkhasulabhapiṇḍamaggattā na pariyesitabbanti.
tika-vin08t:2213_0: 67. Mahāpadesakathāyaṃ mahāpadesā nāma appaṭikkhittā dve, ananuññātā dveti cattāroti
tika-vin08t:2214_1: koseyyaviseso’ti hi abhidhānakose vuttaṃ. Cīnadese somāradese ca sañjātavatthāni
tika-vin08t:2214_2: cīnasomārapaṭāni. Paṭṭuṇṇādīni tīṇi koseyyassa anulomāni pāṇakehi katasuttamayattā.
tika-vin08t:2214_3: Iddhimayaṃ ehibhikkhūnaṃ puññiddhiyā nibbattacīvaraṃ, taṃ khomādīnaṃ aññataraṃ hotīti
tika-vin08t:2214_4: tesaṃyeva anulomaṃ. Devatāhi dinnacīvaraṃ devadattiyaṃ, taṃ kapparukkhe nibbattaṃ
tika-vin08t:2214_5: jāliniyā devakaññāya anuruddhattherassa dinnavatthasadisaṃ, tampi khomādīnaṃyeva
tika-vin08t:2214_6: anulomaṃ hoti tesu aññatarabhāvato. Dve paṭāni desanāmena vuttānīti tesaṃ sarūpadassanamattametaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2214_7: nāññanivattanapadaṃ paṭṭuṇṇapaṭṭassapi desanāmeneva vuttattā. Tumbāti tīṇi bhājanāni.
tika-vin08t:2214_8: Phalakatumbo lābuādi. Udakatumbo udakukkhipanakuṭako. Kilañjacchattanti veḷuvilīvehi
tika-vin08t:2215_0: “Yāvakālikapakkānanti pakke sandhāya vuttaṃ. Āmāni pana anupasampannehi sītudake
tika-vin08t:2215_1: madditvā parissāvetvā dinnapānaṃ pacchābhattampi kappati eva. Ayañca attho mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2215_2: sarūpato avuttoti āha ‘kurundiyaṃ panā’tiādi. Ucchuraso nikasaṭoti idaṃ pātabbatāsāmaññena
tika-vin08t:2215_3: yāmakālikakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ pana sattāhakālikamevāti gahetabbaṃ. Ime cattāro rasāti
tika-vin08t:2215_4: phalapattapupphaucchurasā cattāro”ti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. “Dve paṭā desanāmenevāti
tika-vin08t:2215_5: cīnapaṭasomārapaṭāni. Tīṇīti paṭṭuṇṇena saha tīṇi. Iddhimayaṃ ehibhikkhūnaṃ nibbattaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2217_0: Saṃsaṭṭhakathāyaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ kāle kappatītiādi sabbaṃ sambhinnarasaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin08t:2217_1: vuttaṃ. Sace hi challimpi apanetvā sakaleneva nāḷikeraphalena saddhiṃ pānakaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin08t:2217_2: hoti, nāḷikeraṃ apanetvā taṃ vikālepi kappati. Upari sappipiṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā sītalapāyāsaṃ
tika-vin08t:2217_3: denti, yaṃ pāyāsena asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ sappi, taṃ apanetvā sattāhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:2217_4: Baddhamadhuphāṇitādīsupi eseva nayo. Takkolajātiphalādīhi alaṅkaritvā piṇḍapātaṃ
tika-vin08t:2217_5: denti, tāni uddharitvā dhovitvā yāvajīvaṃ paribhuñjitabbāni, yāguyaṃ pakkhipitvā
tika-vin08t:2217_6: dinnasiṅgiverādīsupi, telādīsu pakkhipitvā dinnalaṭṭhimadhukādīsupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ
tika-vin08t:2217_7: yaṃ yaṃ asambhinnarasaṃ hoti, taṃ taṃ ekato paṭiggahitampi yathā suddhaṃ hoti, tathā
tika-vin08t:2217_8: dhovitvā vā tacchetvā vā tassa tassa kālassa vasena paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:2218_0: Sace pana sambhinnarasaṃ hoti saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, na vaṭṭati. Yāvakālikañhi attanā saddhiṃ
tika-vin08t:2218_1: sambhinnarasāni tīṇipi yāmakālikādīni attano sabhāvaṃ upaneti. Yāmakālikaṃ dvepi
tika-vin08t:2218_2: sattāhakālikādīni attano sabhāvaṃ upaneti. Sattāhakālikaṃ attanā saddhiṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin08t:2218_3: yāvajīvikaṃ attano sabhāvaññeva upaneti, tasmā tena tadahupaṭiggahitena saddhiṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin08t:2218_4: vā purepaṭiggahitaṃ vā yāvajīvikaṃ sattāhaṃ kappati, dvīhapaṭiggahitena chāhaṃ…pe…
tika-vin08t:2218_5: sattāhapaṭiggahitena tadaheva kappatīti veditabbaṃ. Tasmāyeva hi “sattāhakālikena,
tika-vin08t:2218_6: bhikkhave, yāvajīvikaṃ tadahupaṭiggahita”nti avatvā “paṭiggahitaṃ sattāhaṃ kappatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2219_1: āpattiyo veditabbā. Imesu ca pana catūsu kālikesu yāvakālikaṃ yāmakālikanti idameva
tika-vin08t:2219_2: dvayaṃ antovutthakañceva sannidhikārakañca hoti, sattāhakālikañca yāvajīvikañca akappiyakuṭiyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2219_3: nikkhipitumpi vaṭṭati, sannidhimpi na janetīti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthameva.
tika-vin08t:2221_0: Pañcabhesajjakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tāni pañca bhesajjāni kāle paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin08t:2221_1: kāle paribhuñjitu”nti vacanato sāradikena ābādhena phuṭṭhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāgupi pītā
tika-vin08t:2221_2: uggacchati, bhattampi bhuttaṃ uggacchati, te tena kisā honti lūkhā dubbaṇṇā uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā
tika-vin08t:2221_3: dhamanisanthatagattā. Tesaṃ yaṃ bhesajjañceva assa bhesajjasammatañca, lokassa āhāratthañca
tika-vin08t:2221_4: phareyya, na ca oḷāriko āhāro paññāyeyya. Tatrimāni pañca bhesajjāni. Seyyathidaṃ
tika-vin08t:2221_5: – sappi navanītaṃ telaṃ madhu phāṇitaṃ, tāni bhesajjāni kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin08t:2221_6: vaṭṭati. Tattha “sāradikena ābādhenāti saradakāle uppannena pittābādhena. Tasmiñhi
tika-vin08t:2221_7: kāle vassodakenapi tementi, kaddamampi maddanti, antarantarā ābādhopi kharo hoti,
tika-vin08t:2221_8: tena tesaṃ pittaṃ koṭṭhabbhantaragataṃ hoti. Āhāratthañca phareyyāti āhāratthaṃ sādheyyā”ti
tika-vin08t:2221_9: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ “pittaṃ koṭṭhabbhantaragataṃ hotīti bahisarīre
tika-vin08t:2221_10: byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ abaddhapittaṃ koṭṭhabbhantaragataṃ hoti, tena pittaṃ kupitaṃ hotīti
tika-vin08t:2222_1: kisā hontī’tiādinā virodhadassanato nidānānapekkhaṃ yathālābhavasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2222_2: Yathānidānaṃ kasmā na vuttanti ce? Tadaññāpekkhādhippāyato. Sabbabuddhakālepi hi
tika-vin08t:2222_3: sappiādīnaṃ sattāhakālikabhāvāpekkhoti. Tathā vacanena bhagavato adhippāyo. Teneva
tika-vin08t:2222_4: ‘āhāratthañca phareyya, na ca oḷāriko āhāro paññāyeyyā’ti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi kāle paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin08t:2222_5: kāle paribhuñjitunti ettha ca kālaparicchedo na kato, kutoyeva pana labbhā tadaññāpekkhādhippāyo
tika-vin08t:2222_6: bhagavatā mūlabhesajjādīni tāni paṭiggahetvā yāvajīvanti kālaparicchedo. Yaṃ pana
tika-vin08t:2222_7: ‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tāni bhesajjāni kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjitu’nti vacanaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2222_8: taṃ ‘sannidhiṃ katvā aparāparasmiṃ divase kāle eva paribhuñjituṃ anujānāmī’ti adhippāyato
tika-vin08t:2222_9: vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Aññathā atisayattā bhagavato ‘yaṃ bhesajjañceva assā’tiādivitakkuppādo
tika-vin08t:2222_10: na sambhavati. Paṇītabhojanānumatiyā pasiddhattā ābādhānurūpasappāyāpekkhāya vuttānīti
tika-vin08t:2222_11: ce? Tañca na, ‘bhiyyosomattāyā’ti kisādibhāvāpattidassanato. Yathā ucchurasaṃ upādāya
tika-vin08t:2222_12: phāṇitanti vuttaṃ, tathā navanītaṃ upādāya sappīti vattabbato navanītaṃ visuṃ na
tika-vin08t:2222_13: vattabbanti ce? Na visesadassanādhippāyato. Yathā phāṇitaggahaṇena siddhepi parato
tika-vin08t:2222_14: ucchuraso visuṃ anuññāto ucchusāmaññato guḷodakaṭṭhāne ṭhapanādhippāyato, tathā navanīte
tika-vin08t:2222_15: visesavidhidassanādhippāyato navanītaṃ visuṃ anuññātanti veditabbaṃ. Visesavidhi
tika-vin08t:2222_16: panassa bhesajjasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāvasena veditabbo. Vuttañhi tattha ‘pacitvā sappiṃ
tika-vin08t:2222_17: katvā paribhuñjitukāmena adhotampi pacituṃ vaṭṭatī’ti. Tattha sappi pakkāva hoti,
tika-vin08t:2224_0: Dutiyabhesajjakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tāni pañca bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin08t:2224_1: kālepi vikālepi paribhuñjitu”nti vacanato “tāni pañca bhesajjāni kāle paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin08t:2224_2: kāle paribhuñjantānaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yānipi tāni pākatikāni lūkhāni bhojanāni,
tika-vin08t:2224_3: tāni nacchādenti, pageva senesitāni. Te tena ceva sāradikena ābādhena phuṭṭhā iminā
tika-vin08t:2224_4: ca bhattācchādakena tadubhayena bhiyyosomattāya kisā hontī”ti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ
tika-vin08t:2224_5: kālepi vikālepīti anuññātattā vikālepi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha “nacchādentīti
tika-vin08t:2224_6: na jīranti, na vātarogaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ sakkonti. Senesitānīti siniddhāni. Bhattācchādakenāti
tika-vin08t:2224_7: bhattaṃ arocikenā”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, ṭīkāsu pana “nacchādentīti ruciṃ na uppādentī”ti
tika-vin08t:2224_8: ettakameva vuttaṃ, mahāvibhaṅge pana “yāni kho pana tāni gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭisāyanīyāni
tika-vin08t:2224_9: bhesajjāni. Seyyathidaṃ – sappi navanītaṃ telaṃ madhu phāṇitaṃ, tāni paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin08t:2224_10: sattāhaparamaṃ sannidhikārakaṃ paribhuñjitabbāni, taṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti
tika-vin08t:2224_11: vacanato imesaṃ pañcabhesajjānaṃ sattāhakālikabhāvo veditabbo, idha pana aṭṭhuppattivasena vuttoti.
tika-vin08t:2226_0: Vasābhesajjakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vasāni bhesajjāni acchavasaṃ macchavasaṃ
tika-vin08t:2226_1: susukāvasaṃ sūkaravasaṃ gadrabhavasaṃ kāle paṭiggahitaṃ kāle nippakkaṃ kāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin08t:2226_2: telaparibhogena paribhuñjituṃ. Vikāle ce, bhikkhave, paṭiggahitaṃ vikāle nippakkaṃ
tika-vin08t:2226_3: vikāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti tiṇṇaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ. Kāle ce, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:2226_4: paṭiggahitaṃ vikāle nippakkaṃ vikāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dvinnaṃ
tika-vin08t:2226_5: dukkaṭānaṃ. Kāle ce, bhikkhave, paṭiggahitaṃ kāle nippakkaṃ vikāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, tañce
tika-vin08t:2226_6: paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Kāle ce, bhikkhave, paṭiggahitaṃ kāle nippakkaṃ
tika-vin08t:2226_7: kāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, anāpattī”ti. Tattha “kāle paṭiggahitantiādīsu
tika-vin08t:2226_8: majjhanhike avītivatte paṭiggahetvā pacitvā parissāvetvā cāti attho. Telaparibhogena
tika-vin08t:2226_10: ṭīkāsu pana “susukāti samudde bhavā ekā macchajāti, kumbhilātipi vadanti. Saṃsaṭṭhanti
tika-vin08t:2226_11: parissāvitaṃ. Telaparibhogenāti sattāhakālikaparibhogaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2226_12: Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana heṭṭhā catukālikakathāyaṃ vuttoyeva.
tika-vin08t:2228_0: Mūlabhesajjakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, mūlāni bhesajjāni, haliddiṃ siṅgiveraṃ
tika-vin08t:2228_1: vacaṃ vacattaṃ ativisaṃ kaṭukarohiṇiṃ usīraṃ bhaddamuttakaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi
tika-vin08t:2228_2: atthi mūlāni bhesajjāni neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti, na bhojanīye bhojanīyatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:2228_3: pharanti, tāni paṭiggahetvā yāvajīvaṃ pariharituṃ, sati paccaye paribhuñjituṃ. Asati
tika-vin08t:2228_4: paccaye paribhuñjantassa āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti. Tattha vacattanti setavacaṃ. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
tika-vin08t:2230_0: Piṭṭhabhesajjakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, nisadaṃ nisadapotaka”nti vacanato pisitehi
tika-vin08t:2230_1: cuṇṇakatehi mūlabhesajjehi atthe sati nisadañca nisadapotakañca pariharituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:2230_2: Tattha nisadaṃ nisadapotakanti pisanasilā ca pisanapoto ca. Nisadanti pisanti cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:2230_3: karonti mūlabhesajjādayo etthāti nisadaṃ, pisanasilā. Nisadanti pisanti cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:2230_4: karonti mūlabhesajjādayo etenāti nisadaṃ, posetabboti poto, dārako. Khuddakappamāṇatāya
tika-vin08t:2230_5: poto viyāti poto, nisadañca taṃ poto cāti nisadapoto, taṃ nisadapotakaṃ. Nipubbasada
tika-vin08t:2232_0: Kasāvabhesajjakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kasāvāni bhesajjāni nimbakasāvaṃ kuṭajakasāvaṃ
tika-vin08t:2232_1: paṭolakasāvaṃ phaggavakasāvaṃ nattamālakasāvaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi kasāvāni
tika-vin08t:2232_2: bhesajjāni neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti, na bhojanīye bhojanīyatthaṃ pharanti,
tika-vin08t:2232_3: tāni paṭiggahetvā yāvajīvaṃ pariharituṃ, sati paccaye paribhuñjituṃ, asati paccaye
tika-vin08t:2232_4: paribhuñjantassa āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato tānipi kasāvabhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin08t:2232_5: yāvajīvaṃ pariharituṃ sati paccaye paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha phaggavanti latājāti.
tika-vin08t:2232_6: Nattamālanti karañjaṃ. “Kasāvehīti tacādīni udake tāpetvā gahitaūsarehī”ti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2234_0: Paṇṇabhesajjakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, paṇṇāni bhesajjāni nimbapaṇṇaṃ kuṭajapaṇṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:2234_1: paṭolapaṇṇaṃ nattamālapaṇṇaṃ phaggavapaṇṇaṃ sulasipaṇṇaṃ kappāsapaṇṇaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi
tika-vin08t:2234_2: atthi paṇṇāni bhesajjāni neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti, na bhojanīye bhojanīyatthaṃ
tika-vin08t:2234_3: pharanti, tāni paṭiggahetvā yāvajīvaṃ pariharituṃ, sati paccaye paribhuñjituṃ, asati
tika-vin08t:2234_4: paccaye paribhuñjantassa āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato khādanīyabhojanīyatthaṃ apharantāni
tika-vin08t:2234_5: tānipi paṇṇāni paṭiggahetvā yāvajīvaṃ pariharituṃ, sati paccaye paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:2234_6: Acchavasantiādīsu nissaggiyavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. Mūlabhesajjādivinicchayopi
tika-vin08t:2234_7: khuddakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttoyeva, tasmā idha yaṃ yaṃ pubbe avuttaṃ, taṃ tadeva vaṇṇayissāma.
tika-vin08t:2236_0: Phalabhesajjakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, phalāni bhesajjāni biḷaṅgaṃ pippaliṃ
tika-vin08t:2236_1: maricaṃ harītakaṃ vibhītakaṃ āmalakaṃ goṭṭhaphalaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi phalāni
tika-vin08t:2236_2: bhesajjāni neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti, na bhojanīye bhojanīyatthaṃ pharanti,
tika-vin08t:2236_3: tāni paṭiggahetvā yāvajīvaṃ pariharituṃ, sati paccaye paribhuñjituṃ, asati paccaye
tika-vin08t:2236_4: paribhuñjantassa āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato khādanīyabhojanīyatthaṃ apharantāni
tika-vin08t:2236_5: tāni phalāni paṭiggahetvā yāvajīvaṃ pariharituṃ, sati paccaye paribhuñjitumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:2238_0: Jatubhesajjakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, jatūni bhesajjāni hiṅguṃ hiṅgujatuṃ hiṅgusipāṭikaṃ
tika-vin08t:2238_1: takaṃ takapattiṃ takapaṇṇiṃ sajjulasaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi jatūni bhesajjāni
tika-vin08t:2238_2: neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti, na bhojanīye bhojanīyatthaṃ pharanti, tāni
tika-vin08t:2238_3: paṭiggahetvā yāvajīvaṃ pariharituṃ, sati paccaye paribhuñjituṃ, asati paccaye paribhuñjantassa
tika-vin08t:2238_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato tāni jatūni bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā yāvajīvaṃ pariharituṃ,
tika-vin08t:2238_5: sati paccaye paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha hiṅguhiṅgujatuhiṅgusipāṭikā hiṅgujātiyoyeva.
tika-vin08t:2239_1: Hiṅgusipāṭikā nāma tassa mūlasākhapākanipphannā. Takaṃ nāma tassa rukkhassa tacapākodakaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2239_2: Takapattīti tassa pattapākodakaṃ. Takapaṇṇīti tassa phalapākodakaṃ. Atha vā ‘takaṃ
tika-vin08t:2239_3: nāma lākhā. Takapattīti kittimalohasākhā. Takapaṇṇīti pakkalākhā’ti likhitaṃ. Sati
tika-vin08t:2239_4: paccayeti ettha satipaccayatā gilānāgilānavasena dvidhā veditabbā. Vikālabhojanasikkhāpadassa
tika-vin08t:2239_5: hi anāpattivāre yāmakālikādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi avisesena satipaccayatā vuttā. Imasmiṃ khandhake
tika-vin08t:2239_6: ‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānassa guḷaṃ agilānassa guḷodakaṃ. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:2239_7: gilānassa loṇasovīrakaṃ, agilānassa udakasambhinna’nti vuttaṃ, tasmā siddhaṃ ‘satipaccayatā
tika-vin08t:2239_8: gilānāgilānavasena duvidhā’ti, aññathā asati paccaye guḷodakādi āpajjati, tato ca
tika-vin08t:2239_9: pāḷivirodho. Āhāratthanti āhārapayojanaṃ, āhārakiccayāpananti atthoti ca. Telaparibhogenāti
tika-vin08t:2239_11: phalaṃ, madanaphalaṃ vāti ca likhita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2241_0: Loṇabhesajjakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, loṇāni bhesajjāni sāmuddikaṃ kāḷaloṇaṃ
tika-vin08t:2241_1: sindhavaṃ ubbhidaṃ bilaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi loṇāni bhesajjāni neva khādanīye
tika-vin08t:2241_2: khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti, na bhojanīye bhojanīyatthaṃ pharanti, tāni paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin08t:2241_3: yāvajīvaṃ pariharituṃ, sati paccaye paribhuñjituṃ, asati paccaye paribhuñjantassa
tika-vin08t:2241_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato tāni loṇāni paṭiggahetvā yāvajīvaṃ pariharituṃ, sati
tika-vin08t:2241_5: paccaye paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha sāmuddanti samuddatīre vālukaṃ viya santiṭṭhati.
tika-vin08t:2241_6: Kāḷaloṇanti pakatiloṇaṃ. Sindhavanti setavaṇṇaṃ pabbate uṭṭhahati. Ubbhidanti bhūmito
tika-vin08t:2241_7: aṅkuraṃ viya uṭṭhahati. Bilanti dabbasambhārehi saddhiṃ pacitaṃ, taṃ rattavaṇṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2241_8: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “ubbhidaṃ nāma ūsarapaṃsumaya”nti vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2241_9: pana “ubbhidanti ūsarapaṃsumayaṃ loṇaṃ. Bilanti loṇaviseso”ti vuttaṃ. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyampi tatheva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2243_0: Cuṇṇakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yassa kaṇḍu vā pīḷakā vā assāvo vā thullakacchu
tika-vin08t:2243_1: vā ābādho kāyo vā duggandho cuṇṇāni bhesajjāni, agilānassa chakaṇaṃ mattikaṃ rajananippakkaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2243_2: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, udukkhalaṃ musala”nti. “Kāyo vā duggandhoti kassaci assādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t:2243_3: viya kāyagandho hoti, tassapi sirīsakosumbādicuṇṇāni vā gandhacuṇṇāni vā sabbāni
tika-vin08t:2243_4: vaṭṭanti. Chakaṇanti gomayaṃ. Rajananippakkanti rajanakasaṭaṃ, pākatikacuṇṇampi koṭṭetvā
tika-vin08t:2243_5: udakena temetvā nhāyituṃ vaṭṭati, etampi rajananippakkasaṅkhameva gacchatī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2243_6: vuttaṃ. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “chakaṇanti gomayaṃ. Pākatikacuṇṇaṃ nāma apakkakasāvacuṇṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2243_7: Tena ṭhapetvā gandhacuṇṇaṃ sabbaṃ vaṭṭatīti vadantī”ti vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyampi
tika-vin08t:2243_8: “chakaṇanti gomayaṃ. Pākatikacuṇṇanti apakkakasāvacuṇṇaṃ, gandhacuṇṇaṃ pana na vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin08t:2243_9: vuttaṃ. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyampi “chakaṇanti gomayaṃ. Pākatikacuṇṇaṃ nāma apakkakasāvacuṇṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2243_10: Tena ṭhapetvā gandhacuṇṇaṃ sabbaṃ vaṭṭatīti vadantī”ti vuttaṃ. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:2243_11: cuṇṇacālini”nti vacanato gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cuṇṇehi bhesajjehi cālitehi atthe sati
tika-vin08t:2243_12: cuṇṇacālinī vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dussacālini”nti vacanato saṇhehi cuṇṇehi
tika-vin08t:2243_13: atthe sati dussacālinī vaṭṭati. “Cuṇṇacālininti udukkhale koṭṭitacuṇṇaparissāvani”nti
tika-vin08t:2245_1: vacanato yassa bhikkhuno āmakamaṃsaṃ khāditassa āmakalohitaṃ pivitassa so amanussābādho
tika-vin08t:2245_2: paṭippassambhati, tassa anāpatti. Tattha āmakamaṃsañca khādi, āmakalohitañca pivīti
tika-vin08t:2245_3: na taṃ bhikkhu khādi, na pivi, amanusso khāditvā ca pivitvā ca pakkanto. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-vin08t:2247_0: Añjanakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, añjanaṃ kāḷañjanaṃ rasañjanaṃ sotañjanaṃ gerukaṃ
tika-vin08t:2247_1: kapalla”nti vacanato bhikkhūnaṃ cakkhuroge sati añjanādīni vaṭṭanti. Tattha “añjananti
tika-vin08t:2247_2: sabbasaṅgāhikavacanametaṃ. Kāḷañjananti ekā añjanajāti. Rasañjananti nānāsambhārehi
tika-vin08t:2247_3: kataṃ. Sotañjananti nadīsotādīsu uppajjanakaañjanaṃ. Geruko nāma suvaṇṇageruko. Kapallanti
tika-vin08t:2247_5: suvaṇṇatutthādī”ti vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyampi tatheva vuttaṃ. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:2247_6: candanaṃ tagaraṃ kāḷānusāriyaṃ tālīsaṃ bhaddamuttaka”nti vacanato añjanūpapisanehi
tika-vin08t:2247_7: atthe sati imāni candanādīni vaṭṭanti. Tattha “candananti lohitacandanādikaṃ yaṃ
tika-vin08t:2247_8: kiñci candanaṃ. Tagarādīni pākaṭāni. Aññānipi nīluppalādīni vaṭṭantiyeva. Añjanūpapisanehīti
tika-vin08t:2247_9: añjanehi saddhiṃ ekato pisitabbehi. Na hi kiñci añjanūpapisanaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2247_10: ṭīkāyaṃ pana “añjanūpapisananti añjanatthāya upapisitabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci cuṇṇajātī”ti
tika-vin08t:2247_11: vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “pāḷiyaṃ añjanūpapisananti añjane upanetuṃ pisitabbabhesajja”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2248_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, añjani”nti vacanato añjanaṭhapanaṭṭhānaṃ vaṭṭati. “Na, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:2248_1: uccāvacā añjanī dhāretabbā, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:2248_2: aṭṭhimayaṃ dantamayaṃ visāṇamayaṃ naḷamayaṃ veḷumayaṃ kaṭṭhamayaṃ jatumayaṃ lohamayaṃ
tika-vin08t:2248_3: saṅkhanābhimaya”nti vacanato etāni kappiyāni. Tattha aṭṭhimayanti manussaṭṭhiṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin08t:2249_1: bhikkhave, suttakena bandhitvā añjaniyā bandhitu”nti vacanato apidhānaṃ suttakena
tika-vin08t:2249_2: bandhitvā añjaniyā bandhitabbaṃ. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, suttakena sibbetu”nti vacanato
tika-vin08t:2249_3: apatanatthāya añjanīsuttakena sibbetuṃ vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, añjanisalāka”nti
tika-vin08t:2249_4: vacanato añjanisalākampi vaṭṭati. “Na, bhikkhave, uccāvacā añjanisalākā dhāretabbā,
tika-vin08t:2249_5: yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, aṭṭhimayaṃ…pe… saṅkhanābhimaya”nti
tika-vin08t:2249_6: vacanato etāyeva añjanisalākā vaṭṭanti. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, salākaṭṭhāniya”nti
tika-vin08t:2249_7: vacanato añjanisalākaṭṭhāniyampi vaṭṭati. Tattha salākaṭṭhāniyanti yattha salākaṃ
tika-vin08t:2249_8: odahanti, taṃ susiradaṇḍakaṃ vā thavikaṃ vā anujānāmīti attho. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:2249_9: añjanitthavika”nti vacanato thavikampi vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, aṃsabaddhakaṃ
tika-vin08t:2249_10: bandhanasuttaka”nti vacanato añjanitthavikāya aṃse lagganatthāya aṃsabaddhakampi
tika-vin08t:2251_0: Natthukathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, muddhani telaka”nti vacanato sīsābhitāpassa
tika-vin08t:2251_1: bhikkhuno muddhani telaṃ vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, natthukamma”nti vacanato
tika-vin08t:2251_2: nakkhamanīye sati natthukammaṃ vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, natthukaraṇi”nti vacanato
tika-vin08t:2251_3: natthuyā agaḷanatthaṃ natthukaraṇī vaṭṭati. “Na, bhikkhave, uccāvacā natthukaraṇī
tika-vin08t:2251_4: dhāretabbā, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, aṭṭhimayaṃ…pe…
tika-vin08t:2251_5: saṅkhanābhimaya”nti vacanato etāyeva natthukaraṇiyo vaṭṭanti. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:2251_6: yamakanatthukaraṇi”nti vacanato natthu visamaṃ āsiñcayanti ce, yamakanatthukaraṇiṃ
tika-vin08t:2251_7: dhāretabbaṃ. Tattha yamakanatthukaraṇinti samaso tāhi dvīhi panāḷikāhi ekaṃ natthukaraṇiṃ.
tika-vin08t:2253_0: Dhūmanettakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dhūmaṃ pātu”nti vacanato yamakanatthukaraṇiyā
tika-vin08t:2253_1: nakkhamanīye sati dhūmaṃ pātuṃ vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dhūmanetta”nti vacanato
tika-vin08t:2253_2: tameva vaṭṭiṃ ālimbetvā pivanapaccayā kaṇṭhe dahantena dhūmanettadhūmo pivitabbo.
tika-vin08t:2253_3: “Na, bhikkhave, uccāvacāni dhūmanettāni dhāretabbāni, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
tika-vin08t:2253_4: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, aṭṭhimayaṃ…pe… saṅkhanābhimaya”nti vacanato etāni eva dhūmanettāni
tika-vin08t:2253_7: ekato ghaṃsiyamāne sati yamakatthavikaṃ vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, aṃsabaddhakaṃ
tika-vin08t:2255_0: Telapākakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, telapāka”nti vacanato vātābādhe sati telapāko
tika-vin08t:2255_1: vaṭṭati. Tattha anujānāmi, bhikkhave, telapākanti yaṃ kiñci bhesajjapakkhittaṃ sabbaṃ
tika-vin08t:2255_2: anuññātameva hoti. “Na, bhikkhave, atipakkhittamajjaṃ telaṃ pātabbaṃ, yo piveyya,
tika-vin08t:2255_3: yathādhammo kāretabbo. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yasmiṃ telapāke majjassa na vaṇṇo na
tika-vin08t:2255_4: gandho na raso paññāyati, evarūpaṃ majjapakkhittaṃ telaṃ pātu”nti vacanato yasmiṃ
tika-vin08t:2255_5: telapāke pakkhittassa majjassa vaṇṇo vā gandho vā raso vā na paññāyati, tādisaṃ telaṃ
tika-vin08t:2255_6: pivitabbaṃ. Tattha atipakkhittamajjānīti ativiya khittamajjāni, bahuṃ majjaṃ pakkhipitvā
tika-vin08t:2255_7: yojitānīti attho. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, abbhañjanaṃ adhiṭṭhātu”nti vacanato atipakkhittamajjattā
tika-vin08t:2255_8: apivitabbe tele sati abbhañjanaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tīṇi
tika-vin08t:2255_9: tumbāni lohatumbaṃ kaṭṭhatumbaṃ phalatumba”nti vacanato telapakkabhājanāni imāni
tika-vin08t:2257_0: Sedakammakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sedakamma”nti vacanato aṅgavāte sati sedakammaṃ
tika-vin08t:2257_1: kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha aṅgavātoti hatthapāde vāto. Nakkhamanīyo hoti, “anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t:2257_2: bhikkhave, sambhāraseda”nti vacanato sedakammena nakkhamanīye sati sambhārasedaṃ
tika-vin08t:2257_3: kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha sambhārasedanti nānāvidhapaṇṇasambhārasedaṃ. Nakkhamanīyo hoti,
tika-vin08t:2257_4: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, mahāseda”nti vacanato sambhārasedanakkhamanīye sati mahāsedaṃ
tika-vin08t:2257_5: kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha mahāsedanti mahantaṃ sedaṃ, porisappamāṇaṃ āvāṭaṃ aṅgārānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2257_6: pūretvā paṃsuvālikādīhi pidahitvā tattha nānāvidhāni vātaharaṇapaṇṇāni santharitvā
tika-vin08t:2257_7: telamakkhitena gattena tattha nipajjitvā samparivattantena sarīraṃ sedetuṃ anujānāmīti
tika-vin08t:2257_8: attho. Nakkhamanīyo hoti, “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bhaṅgodaka”nti vacanato mahāsedena
tika-vin08t:2257_9: nakkhamanīye sati bhaṅgodakaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha bhaṅgodakanti nānāpaṇṇabhaṅgakuthitaṃ
tika-vin08t:2257_10: udakaṃ, tehi paṇṇehi ca udakena ca siñcitvā siñcitvā sedetabbo. Nakkhamanīyo hoti,
tika-vin08t:2257_11: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, udakakoṭṭhaka”nti vacanato bhaṅgodakena nakkhamanīye sati
tika-vin08t:2257_12: udakakoṭṭhakaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha udakakoṭṭhakanti udakakoṭṭhe cāṭiṃ vā doṇiṃ
tika-vin08t:2257_13: vā uṇhodakassa pūretvā tattha pavisitvā sedakammakaraṇaṃ anujānāmīti attho.
tika-vin08t:2259_0: Lohitamocanakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, lohitaṃ mocetu”nti vacanato pabbavāte
tika-vin08t:2259_1: sati lohitaṃ mocetuṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha pabbavāto hotīti pabbe pabbe vāto vijjhati.
tika-vin08t:2259_2: Lohitaṃ mocetunti satthakena lohitaṃ mocetuṃ. Nakkhamanīyo hoti, anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:2261_0: Pādabbhañjanakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pādabbhañjana”nti vacanato pādesu phalitesu
tika-vin08t:2261_1: pādabbhañjanaṃ pacitabbaṃ. Nakkhamanīyo hoti, “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pajjaṃ abhisaṅkharitu”nti
tika-vin08t:2261_2: vacanato pādabbhañjanatelena nakkhamanīye sati pajjaṃ abhisaṅkharitabbaṃ. Tattha
tika-vin08t:2261_3: pajjaṃ abhisaṅkharitunti yena phalitapādā pākatikā honti, taṃ nāḷikerādīsu nānābhesajjāni
tika-vin08t:2261_4: pakkhipitvā pajjaṃ abhisaṅkharituṃ, pādānaṃ sappāyabhesajjaṃ pacitunti attho.
tika-vin08t:2263_0: Gaṇḍābādhakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, satthakamma”nti vacanato gaṇḍābādhe sati
tika-vin08t:2263_1: satthakammaṃ kātabbaṃ. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kasāvodaka”nti vacanato kasāvodakena
tika-vin08t:2263_2: atthe sati kasāvodakaṃ dātabbaṃ. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tilakakka”nti vacanato tilakakkena
tika-vin08t:2263_3: atthe sati tilakakkaṃ dātabbaṃ. Tilakakkena atthoti piṭṭhehi tilehi attho. “Anujānāmi
tika-vin08t:2263_4: bhikkhave kabaḷika”nti vacanato kabaḷikāya atthe sati kabaḷikā dātabbā. Tattha kabaḷikanti
tika-vin08t:2263_5: vaṇamukhe sattupiṇḍaṃ pakkhipituṃ. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vaṇabandhanacoḷa”nti vacanato
tika-vin08t:2263_6: vaṇabandhanacoḷena atthe sati vaṇabandhanacoḷaṃ dātabbaṃ. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:2263_7: sāsapakuṭṭena phositu”nti vacanato sace vaṇo kuṇḍavatī, sāsapakuṭṭena phositabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2264_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dhūmaṃ kātu”nti vacanato yadi vaṇo kilijjittha, dhūmaṃ kātuṃ
tika-vin08t:2264_1: vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, loṇasakkharikāya chinditu”nti vacanato yadi vaḍḍhamaṃsaṃ
tika-vin08t:2264_2: vuṭṭhāti, chinditabbaṃ. Tattha vaḍḍhamaṃsanti adhikamaṃsaṃ āṇī viya uṭṭhahati. Loṇasakkharikāya
tika-vin08t:2264_3: chinditunti khārena chindituṃ. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vaṇatela”nti vacanato yadi
tika-vin08t:2264_4: vaṇo na ruhati, vaṇaruhanatelaṃ pacitabbaṃ. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vikāsikaṃ sabbaṃ
tika-vin08t:2264_5: vaṇapaṭikamma”nti vacanato yadi telaṃ gaḷati, vikāsikaṃ dātabbaṃ, sabbaṃ vaṇapaṭikammaṃ
tika-vin08t:2264_6: kātabbaṃ. Tattha vikāsikanti telarundhanapilotikaṃ. Sabbaṃ vaṇapaṭikammanti yaṃ kiñci
tika-vin08t:2264_7: vaṇapaṭikammaṃ nāma atthi, sabbaṃ anujānāmīti attho. Mahāvikaṭakathā pubbe vuttāva.
tika-vin08t:2265: Sāmaṃ gahetvāti idaṃ na kevalaṃ sappadaṭṭhasseva, aññasmimpi daṭṭhavise sati sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ, aññesu pana kāraṇesu paṭiggahitameva vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:2267_0: Visapītakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gūthaṃ pāyetu”nti vacanato pītavisaṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin08t:2267_1: gūthaṃ pāyetuṃ vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yaṃ karonto paṭiggaṇhāti, sveva paṭiggaho
tika-vin08t:2267_2: kato, na puna paṭiggahetabbo”ti vacanato tadeva vaṭṭati. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana na puna
tika-vin08t:2267_3: paṭiggahetabboti sace bhūmippatto, paṭiggahāpetabbo, appattaṃ pana gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:2269_0: Gharadinnakābādhakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sītāloḷiṃ pāyetu”nti vacanato gharadinnakābādhassa
tika-vin08t:2269_1: bhikkhuno sītāloḷiṃ pāyetuṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha gharadinnakābādhoti vasīkaraṇapāṇakasamuṭṭhitarogo.
tika-vin08t:2269_2: Ṭīkāyaṃ pana “gharadinnakābādho nāma vasīkaraṇatthāya gharaṇiyā dinnabhesajjasamuṭṭhito
tika-vin08t:2269_3: ābādho. Tenāha ‘vasīkaraṇapāṇakasamuṭṭhitarogo’ti. Ghara-saddo cettha abhedena gharaṇiyā
tika-vin08t:2269_4: vattamāno adhippeto”ti vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyampi “gharadinnakābādho nāma gharaṇiyā
tika-vin08t:2269_5: dinnavasīkaraṇabhesajjasamuṭṭhito ābādho”ti vuttaṃ. Sītāloḷinti naṅgalena kasantassa
tika-vin08t:2269_6: phāle laggamattikaṃ udakena āloḷetvā pāyetuṃ anujānāmīti attho.
tika-vin08t:2271_0: Duṭṭhagahaṇikakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, āmisakhāraṃ pāyetu”nti vacanato duṭṭhagahaṇikassa
tika-vin08t:2271_1: bhikkhuno āmisakhāraṃ pāyetuṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha duṭṭhagahaṇikoti vipannagahaṇiko, kicchena
tika-vin08t:2271_2: uccāro nikkhamatīti attho. Āmisakhāranti sukkhodanaṃ jhāpetvā tāya chārikāya paggharitaṃ
tika-vin08t:2271_3: khārodakaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “tāya chārikāya paggharitaṃ khārodakanti parissāvane
tika-vin08t:2271_4: taṃ chārikaṃ pakkhipitvā udake abhisiñcite tato chārikato heṭṭhā paggharitaṃ khārodaka”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2273_1: paṇḍurogābādhassa bhikkhuno muttaharītakaṃ pāyetuṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha muttaharītakanti
tika-vin08t:2275: Chavidosābādhakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gandhālepaṃ kātu”nti vacanato chavidosābādhassa bhikkhuno gandhālepaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:2277_0: Abhisannakāyakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, virecanaṃ pātu”nti vacanato abhisannakāyassa
tika-vin08t:2277_1: bhikkhuno virecanaṃ pātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha abhisannakāyoti ussannadosakāyo. Acchakañjiyā
tika-vin08t:2277_2: attho hoti, “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, acchakañjiya”nti vacanato acchakañjiyaṃ pātuṃ
tika-vin08t:2277_3: vaṭṭati. Tattha acchakañjiyanti taṇḍulodakamaṇḍo. Akaṭayūsena attho hoti, “anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t:2277_4: bhikkhave, akaṭayūsa”nti vacanato akaṭayūsaṃ pātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha akaṭayūsanti asiniddho
tika-vin08t:2277_6: muggayūsenā”ti vuttaṃ. Kaṭākaṭena attho hoti, “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kaṭākaṭa”nti
tika-vin08t:2277_7: vacanato kaṭākaṭaṃ pāyetuṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha kaṭākaṭanti sova dhotasiniddho. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2277_8: vimativinodaniyañca “kaṭākaṭenāti mugge pacitvā acāletvāva parissāvitena muggayūsenā”ti
tika-vin08t:2277_9: vuttaṃ. Paṭicchādanīyena attho hoti, “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, paṭicchādanīya”nti vacanato
tika-vin08t:2277_10: paṭicchādanīyaṃ pātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha paṭicchādanīyenāti maṃsarasena.
tika-vin08t:2279_0: Loṇasovīrakakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānassa loṇasovīrakaṃ, agilānassa udakasambhinnaṃ
tika-vin08t:2279_1: pānaparibhogena paribhuñjitu”nti vacanato gilānena bhikkhunā loṇasovīrakaṃ pātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2279_2: agilānena udakasambhinnaṃ katvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ, tañca “pānaparibhogenā”ti vacanato vikālepi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:2280_0: Tattha loṇasovīrakaṃ nāma sabbarasābhisaṅkhataṃ ekaṃ bhesajjaṃ, taṃ kira karonto
tika-vin08t:2280_2: odanaṃ kadaliphalādīni sabbaphalāni vettaketakakhajjūrikaḷīrādayo sabbakaḷīre macchamaṃsakhaṇḍāni
tika-vin08t:2280_3: anekāni ca madhuphāṇitasindhavaloṇatikaṭukādīni bhesajjāni pakkhipitvā kumbhimukhaṃ
tika-vin08t:2280_4: limpitvā ekaṃ dve tīṇi saṃvaccharāni ṭhapenti, taṃ paripaccitvā jamburasavaṇṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t:2280_6: tādisaṃ natthi, taṃ panetaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pacchābhattampi vaṭṭati, gilānānaṃ pākatikameva.
tika-vin08t:2281_0: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “pānaparibhogenāti vuttattā loṇasovīrakaṃ yāmakālika”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2281_1: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “pānaparibhogena vaṭṭatīti sambandho. Evaṃ pana vuttattā loṇasovīrakaṃ
tika-vin08t:2281_2: yāmakālikanti keci vadanti, keci pana ‘gilānānaṃ pākatikameva, agilānānaṃ pana udakasambhinna’nti
tika-vin08t:2281_3: vuttattā guḷaṃ viya sattāhakālika”nti vuttaṃ. Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “avisesena
tika-vin08t:2281_4: satipaccayatā vuttā. Imasmiṃ khandhake ‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānassa guḷaṃ, agilānassa
tika-vin08t:2281_5: guḷodakaṃ, gilānassa loṇasovīrakaṃ, agilānassa udakasambhinna’nti vuttaṃ, tasmā siddhaṃ
tika-vin08t:2283_0: Antovutthādikathāyaṃ “tena kho pana samayena bhagavato udaravātābādho hoti, atha
tika-vin08t:2283_1: kho āyasmā ānando ‘pubbepi bhagavato udaravātābādho tekaṭulayāguyā phāsu hotī’ti
tika-vin08t:2283_2: sāmaṃ tilampi taṇḍulampi muggampi viññāpetvā anto vāsetvā anto sāmaṃ pacitvā bhagavato
tika-vin08t:2283_3: upanāmesi ‘pivatu bhagavā tekaṭulayāgu’nti. Jānantāpi tathāgatā pucchanti, jānantāpi
tika-vin08t:2283_4: na pucchanti, kālaṃ viditvā pucchanti, kālaṃ viditvā na pucchanti, atthasañhitaṃ
tika-vin08t:2283_5: tathāgatā pucchanti, no anatthasañhitaṃ, anatthasañhite setughāto tathāgatānaṃ. Dvīhi
tika-vin08t:2283_6: ākārehi buddhā bhagavanto bhikkhū paṭipucchanti ‘dhammaṃ vā desessāma, sāvakānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2284_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi ‘kutāyaṃ, ānanda, yāgū’ti. Atha kho
tika-vin08t:2284_1: āyasmā ānando bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi. Vigarahi buddho bhagavā ananucchavikaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2284_2: ānanda, ananulomikaṃ appatirūpaṃ assamaṇakaṃ akappiyaṃ akaraṇīyaṃ, kathañhi nāma
tika-vin08t:2284_3: tvaṃ, ānanda, evarūpāya bāhullāya cetessasi, yadapi, ānanda, anto vutthaṃ, tadapi
tika-vin08t:2284_4: akappiyaṃ. Yadapi anto pakkaṃ, tadapi akappiyaṃ. Yadapi sāmaṃ pakkaṃ, tadapi akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2284_5: Netaṃ, ānanda, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya…pe… vigarahitvā dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū
tika-vin08t:2284_6: āmantesi – na, bhikkhave, anto vutthaṃ anto pakkaṃ sāmaṃ pakkaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2284_7: yo paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anto ce, bhikkhave, vutthaṃ anto pakkaṃ sāmaṃ
tika-vin08t:2284_8: pakkaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti tiṇṇaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ. Anto ce, bhikkhave, vutthaṃ
tika-vin08t:2284_9: anto pakkaṃ aññehi pakkaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ. Anto ce,
tika-vin08t:2284_10: bhikkhave, vutthaṃ bahi pakkaṃ sāmaṃ pakkaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dvinnaṃ
tika-vin08t:2284_11: dukkaṭānaṃ. Bahi ce, bhikkhave, vutthaṃ anto pakkaṃ sāmaṃ pakkaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya,
tika-vin08t:2284_12: āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ. Anto ce, bhikkhave, vutthaṃ bahi pakkaṃ aññehi pakkaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2284_13: tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Bahi ce, bhikkhave, vutthaṃ anto pakkaṃ aññehi
tika-vin08t:2284_14: pakkaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Bahi ce, bhikkhave, vutthaṃ bahi
tika-vin08t:2284_15: pakkaṃ sāmaṃ pakkaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Bahi ce, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:2284_16: vutthaṃ bahi pakkaṃ aññehi pakkaṃ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, anāpattī”ti vacanato sahaseyyappahonake
tika-vin08t:2284_17: ṭhāne vutthatā, tattha pakkatā, upasampannena sāmaṃ pakkatāti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ aṅgānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2284_18: sambhave sati tisso āpattiyo, dvinnaṃ sambhave dve āpattiyo, ekassa aṅgassa sambhave
tika-vin08t:2285_0: Anto vutthanti akappiyakuṭiyaṃ vutthaṃ. Sāmaṃ pakkanti ettha yaṃ kiñci āmisaṃ bhikkhuno
tika-vin08t:2285_1: pacituṃ na vaṭṭati. Sacepissa uṇhayāguyā sulasipaṇṇāni vā siṅgiveraṃ vā loṇaṃ vā
tika-vin08t:2285_2: pakkhipanti, tampi cāletuṃ na vaṭṭati. “Yāguṃ nibbāpemī”ti pana cāletuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:2285_3: Uttaṇḍubhattaṃ labhitvāpi pidahituṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace pana manussā pidahitvāva denti,
tika-vin08t:2285_4: vaṭṭati. “Bhattaṃ vā mā nibbāyatū”ti pidahituṃ vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, puna
tika-vin08t:2285_5: pākaṃ pacitu”nti vacanato pubbe anupasampannehi pakkaṃ puna pacituṃ vaṭṭati. Vuttañhi
tika-vin08t:2285_6: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “khīratakkādīsu pana sakiṃ kuthitesu aggiṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati punapākassa
tika-vin08t:2285_7: anuññātattā”ti. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, anto vāsetu”nti vacanato dubbhikkhasamaye
tika-vin08t:2285_8: taṇḍulādīni anto vāsetuṃ vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, anto pacitu”nti vacanato
tika-vin08t:2285_9: dubbhikkhasamaye anto pacituṃ vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sāmaṃ pacitu”nti vacanato
tika-vin08t:2285_10: dubbhikkhasamaye sāmampi pacituṃ vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, anto vutthaṃ anto
tika-vin08t:2285_11: pakkaṃ sāmaṃ pakka”nti vacanato dubbhikkhasamaye tīṇipi vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin08t:2287_1: kappiyakārako ca na hoti, sāmaṃ gahetvā haritvā kappiyakārake passitvā bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipitvā
tika-vin08t:2287_2: paṭiggahāpetvā paribhuñjituṃ, anujānāmi, bhikkhave, uggahitaṃ paṭiggahitu”nti vacanato
tika-vin08t:2287_3: tathā katvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, āpatti na hotīti.
tika-vin08t:2289_0: Tato nīhaṭakathāyaṃ “paṭiggaṇhatha, bhikkhave, paribhuñjatha. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t:2289_1: tato nīhaṭaṃ bhuttāvinā pavāritena anatirittaṃ paribhuñjitu”nti vacanato yasmiṃ dāne
tika-vin08t:2289_2: nimantitā hutvā bhikkhū bhuñjanti, tato dānato nīhaṭaṃ bhojanaṃ pavāritena bhikkhunā
tika-vin08t:2289_3: bhuñjitabbaṃ, na pavāritasikkhāpadena āpatti hoti. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tato nīhaṭanti
tika-vin08t:2291_1: bhikkhave, purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ bhuttāvinā pavāritena anatirittaṃ paribhuñjitu”nti
tika-vin08t:2291_2: vacanato purebhattaṃ paṭiggahetvā nikkhipitaṃ pavāritena bhikkhunā atirittaṃ akatvā
tika-vin08t:2291_3: bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, pavāritasikkhāpadena āpatti na hoti.
tika-vin08t:2293_0: Vanaṭṭhapokkharaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tena kho pana samayena āyasmato sāriputtassa kāyaḍāhābādho
tika-vin08t:2293_1: hoti. Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā
tika-vin08t:2293_2: āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca ‘pubbe te, āvuso sāriputta, kāyaḍāhābādho kena phāsu
tika-vin08t:2293_3: hotī’ti. Bhisehi ca me, āvuso, muḷālikāhi cāti…pe… atha kho āyasmato sāriputtassa
tika-vin08t:2293_4: bhise ca muḷālikāyo ca paribhuttassa kāyaḍāhābādho paṭippassambhi…pe… paṭiggaṇhatha,
tika-vin08t:2293_5: bhikkhave, paribhuñjatha. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vanaṭṭhaṃ pokkharaṭṭhaṃ bhuttāvinā
tika-vin08t:2293_6: pavāritena anatirittaṃ paribhuñjitu”nti vacanato vanaṭṭhaṃ pokkharaṭṭhaṃ pavāritena
tika-vin08t:2293_7: bhikkhunā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, pavāritasikkhāpadena āpatti na hoti. Tattha vanaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin08t:2293_8: pokkharaṭṭhanti vane ceva paduminigacche ca jātaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2295_0: Akatakappakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, abījaṃ nibbaṭṭabījaṃ akatakappaṃ phalaṃ
tika-vin08t:2295_1: paribhuñjitu”nti vacanato abījañca nibbaṭṭabījañca phalaṃ aggisatthanakhehi samaṇakappaṃ
tika-vin08t:2295_2: akatvāpi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha abījanti taruṇaphalaṃ, yassa bījaṃ aṅkuraṃ
tika-vin08t:2295_3: na janeti. Nibbaṭṭabījanti bījaṃ nibbaṭṭetvā apanetvā paribhuñjitabbakaṃ ambapanasādi,
tika-vin08t:2295_4: tāni phalāni kappiyakārake asati kappaṃ akatvāpi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t:2297_0: Yāgukathāyaṃ “dasayime, brāhmaṇa, ānisaṃsā yāguyā. Katame dasa, yāguṃ dento āyuṃ
tika-vin08t:2297_1: deti, vaṇṇaṃ deti, sukhaṃ deti, balaṃ deti, paṭibhānaṃ deti, yāgupītā khudaṃ paṭihanati,
tika-vin08t:2297_2: pipāsaṃ vineti, vātaṃ anulometi, vatthiṃ sodheti, āmāvasesaṃ pāceti. Ime kho, brāhmaṇa,
tika-vin08t:2310_0: Atha kho bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ imāhi gāthāhi anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi. Atha
tika-vin08t:2310_1: kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi
tika-vin08t:2310_2: – anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yāguñca madhugoḷakañcā”ti vacanato yāguñca madhugoḷakañca
tika-vin08t:2310_4: dātu”nti iminā sambandho. Sace pana “patthayatā icchatā”ti pāṭho atthi, soyeva gahetabbo.
tika-vin08t:2310_5: “Na, bhikkhave, aññatra nimantitena aññassa bhojjayāgu paribhuñjitabbā, yo paribhuñjeyya,
tika-vin08t:2310_6: yathādhammo kāretabbo”ti vacanato tathā bhuñjantassa paramparabhojanasikkhāpadena
tika-vin08t:2310_7: āpatti hoti. Bhojjayāgūti yā pavāraṇaṃ janeti. Yathādhammo kāretabboti paramparabhojanena kāretabbo.
tika-vin08t:2312_0: Guḷakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānassa guḷaṃ, agilānassa guḷodaka”nti vacanato
tika-vin08t:2312_1: gilāno bhikkhu guḷapiṇḍaṃ vikālepi khādituṃ vaṭṭati. Agilāno pana udakasambhinnaṃ
tika-vin08t:2312_2: katvā guḷodakaparibhogena paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. “Gilānassa guḷanti tathārūpena byādhinā
tika-vin08t:2312_3: gilānassa pacchābhattaṃ guḷaṃ anujānāmīti attho”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. “Tathārūpena
tika-vin08t:2312_4: byādhinā”ti vuttattā yathārūpena byādhinā gilānassa guḷo paribhuñjitabbo hoti, tathārūpena
tika-vin08t:2312_5: eva byādhinā gilānassāti vuttaṃ viya dissati, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t:2313_0: Ettakāsu kathāsu yā yā saṃvaṇṇetabbappakaraṇe na dissati, sā sā amhehi pesalānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2313_1: bhikkhūnaṃ kosallatthaṃ pāḷito ca aṭṭhakathāto ca gahetvā ṭīkācariyānaṃ vacanehi
tika-vin08t:2313_2: alaṅkaritvā ṭhapitā, tasmā nikkaṅkhā hutvā paṇḍitā upadhārentu.
tika-vin08t:2315_0: 67. Yaṃ bhikkhavetiādi mahāpadesakathā nāma. Tattha mahante atthe upadissati etehīti
tika-vin08t:2315_1: mahāpadesā, mahantā vā atthā padissanti paññāyanti etthāti mahāpadesā, mahantānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2315_2: vā atthānaṃ padeso pavattidesoti mahāpadesā. Ke te? Imeyeva cattāro pāṭhā, atthā
tika-vin08t:2315_3: vā. Tena vuttaṃ “ime cattāro mahāpadese”tiādi. Tattha dhammasaṅgāhakattherāti mahākassapādayo.
tika-vin08t:2315_4: Suttaṃ gahetvāti “ṭhapetvā dhaññaphalarasa”ntiādikaṃ suttaṃ gahetvā upadhārento. Satta dhaññānīti –
tika-vin08t:2316: “Sāli vīhi ca kudrūso, godhumo varako yavo;
tika-vin08t:2317: Kaṅgūti satta dhaññāni, nīvārādī tu tabbhidā”ti –.
tika-vin08t:2318: Vuttāni satta dhaññāni. Sabbaṃ aparaṇṇanti muggamāsādayo. Aṭṭha pānānīti ambapānaṃ jambupānaṃ cocapānaṃ mocapānaṃ sālukapānaṃ muddikapānaṃ madhukapānaṃ phārusakapānañca.
tika-vin08t:2319_0: Iminā nayenāti suttānulomanayena. Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “suttānulomaṃ nāma cattāro
tika-vin08t:2319_1: mahāpadesā”ti. Pāḷiñca aṭṭhakathañca anapekkhitvāti pāḷiyaṃ nītatthato āgatameva
tika-vin08t:2319_2: aggahetvā. Aññānipīti tato aññānipi. Etena mahāpadesā nāma na kevalaṃ yathāvuttā
tika-vin08t:2319_3: eva, atha kho anekāni nānappakārāni vinayadharassa ñāṇānubhāvappakāsitānīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t:2321_2: Ke te? Pañcānisaṃsā. Vinayapariyattiyeva mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ katvā labhitabbaānisaṃsā,
tika-vin08t:2321_3: na aññapariyattiṃ vā paṭipattiādayo vā mūlaṃ katvāti attho. Atha vā pariyāpuṇanaṃ
tika-vin08t:2321_4: pariyatti, vinayassa pariyatti vinayapariyatti, sā mūlaṃ etesanti vinayapariyattimūlakā,
tika-vin08t:2321_6: sarūpaṃ pucchitvā “attano”tiādinā vissajjetvā taṃ vacanaṃ pāḷiyā samatthetuṃ “vuttañheta”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin08t:2322_0: Evaṃ pañcānisaṃsānaṃ sarūpaṃ dassetvā idāni teyeva vitthārato dassetuṃ “kathamassā”tiādinā
tika-vin08t:2322_1: pucchitvā “idhekacco”tiādinā vissajjeti. Tattha attano sīlakkhandhasuguttabhāvo nāma
tika-vin08t:2322_2: āpattianāpajjanabhāveneva hoti, no aññathāti āpattiāpajjanakāraṇaṃ dassetvā tadabhāvena
tika-vin08t:2322_3: anāpajjanaṃ dassetuṃ “āpattiṃ āpajjanto chahākārehi āpajjatī”tiādimāha. Tattha –
tika-vin08t:2327_0: Vuttena alajjīlakkhaṇena na lajjati na hirīyatīti alajjī, tassa bhāvo alajjitā. Natthi
tika-vin08t:2327_1: ñāṇaṃ etassāti aññāṇaṃ, tassa bhāvo aññāṇatā. Kukatassa bhāvo kukkuccaṃ, tena pakato
tika-vin08t:2327_2: kukkuccapakato, tassa bhāvo kukkuccapakatatā. Kappatīti kappiyaṃ, na kappiyaṃ akappiyaṃ,
tika-vin08t:2327_3: tasmiṃ akappiye, kappiyaṃ iti saññā yassa so kappiyasaññī, tassa bhāvo kappiyasaññitā.
tika-vin08t:2327_4: Itaraṃ tappaṭipakkhato kātabbaṃ, imesu pañcasu padesu yakāralopo, tasmā “alajjitāya
tika-vin08t:2327_5: āpattiṃ āpajjatī”tiādinā yojetabbāni. Hetvatthe cetaṃ nissakkavacanaṃ. Saratīti sati,
tika-vin08t:2327_6: samussanaṃ sammoso. Satiyā sammoso satisammoso, tasmā satisammosā. Hetvatthe cetaṃ
tika-vin08t:2327_7: karaṇavacanaṃ. Idāni tāni kāraṇāni vitthārato dassetuṃ “katha”ntyādimāha. Taṃ nayānuyogena viññeyyameva.
tika-vin08t:2328_0: Ariṭṭho iti bhikkhu ariṭṭhabhikkhu, kaṇṭako iti sāmaṇero kaṇṭakasāmaṇero, vesāliyā
tika-vin08t:2328_1: jātā vesālikā, vajjīnaṃ puttā vajjiputtā, vesālikā ca te vajjiputtā cāti vesālikavajjiputtā,
tika-vin08t:2328_2: ariṭṭhabhikkhu ca kaṇṭakasāmaṇero ca vesālikavajjiputtā ca ariṭṭhabhikkhukaṇṭakasāmaṇeravesālikavajjiputtakā.
tika-vin08t:2328_3: Parūpahāro ca aññāṇañca kaṅkhāvitaraṇañca parūpahāraaññāṇakaṅkhāvitaraṇā. Ke te?
tika-vin08t:2328_4: Vādā. Te ādi yesaṃ teti parūpahāraaññāṇakaṅkhāvitaraṇādayo. Vadanti etehīti vādā,
tika-vin08t:2328_5: parūpahāraaññāṇakaṅkhāvitaraṇādayo vādā etesanti parū…pe… vādā. Ke te? Micchāvādino.
tika-vin08t:2328_6: Ariṭṭha…pe… puttā ca parūpahāra…pe… vādā ca mahāsaṅghikādayo ca sāsanapaccatthikā
tika-vin08t:2328_7: nāmāti samuccayadvandavasena yojanā kātabbā. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin08t:2334: Nigamagāthāsu paṭhamagāthāyaṃ saddhammaṭṭhitikāmena sāsanujjotakārinā parakkamabāhunā narindena ajjhesito so ahaṃ vinayasaṅgahaṃ akāsinti yojanā.
tika-vin08t:2335_0: Dutiyatatiyagāthāyaṃ teneva parakkamabāhunarindeneva kārite ramme ramaṇīye pāsādasatamaṇḍite
tika-vin08t:2335_1: pāsādānaṃ satena paṭimaṇḍite nānādumagaṇākiṇṇe bhāvanābhiratālaye bhāvanāya abhiratānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2335_2: bhikkhūnaṃ ālayabhūte sītalūdakasampanne jetavane jetavananāmake vihāre vasaṃ vasanto
tika-vin08t:2335_3: hutvā, atha vā vasaṃ vasanto sohaṃ so ahaṃ yogīnaṃ hitaṃ hitabhūtaṃ sāraṃ sāravantaṃ
tika-vin08t:2336_0: Sesagāthāsu iminā ganthakaraṇena yaṃ puññaṃ mayhaṃ siddhaṃ, aññaṃ ito ganthakaraṇato
tika-vin08t:2336_1: aññabhūtaṃ yaṃ puññaṃ mayā pasutaṃ hoti, etena puññakammena dutiye attasambhave tāvatiṃse
tika-vin08t:2336_2: pamodento sīlācāraguṇe rato pañcakāmesu alaggo devaputto hutvā paṭhamaṃ paṭhamabhūtaṃ
tika-vin08t:2336_3: phalaṃ sotāpattiphalaṃ patvāna antime attabhāvamhi lokaggapuggalaṃ nāthaṃ nāthabhūtaṃ
tika-vin08t:2336_4: sabbasattahite rataṃ metteyyaṃ metteyyanāmakaṃ munipuṅgavaṃ muniseṭṭhaṃ disvāna tassa
tika-vin08t:2336_5: dhīrassa saddhammadesanaṃ sutvā aggaṃ phalaṃ arahattaphalaṃ adhigantvā labhitvā jinasāsanaṃ
tika-vin08t:2337_0: Etissāya pana yojanāya sati ācariyavarassa vacanaṃ na sampaṭicchanti paṇḍitā. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin08t:2337_1: Ettha hi ito dutiyabhave tāvatiṃsabhavane devaputto hutvā sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā antimabhave
tika-vin08t:2337_2: metteyyassa bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā arahattaphalaṃ labheyyanti ācariyassa patthanā,
tika-vin08t:2337_3: sā ayuttarūpā hoti. Sotāpannassa hi sattabhavato uddhaṃ paṭisandhi natthi, tāvatiṃsānañca
tika-vin08t:2337_4: devānaṃ bhavasatenapi bhavasahassenapi bhavasatasahassenapi metteyyassa bhagavato
tika-vin08t:2337_5: uppajjanakālo appattabbo hoti. Athāpi vadeyya “antarā brahmaloke nibbattitvā metteyyassa
tika-vin08t:2337_6: bhagavato kāle manusso bhaveyyā”ti, evampi na yujjati. Na hi brahmalokagatānaṃ ariyānaṃ
tika-vin08t:2337_7: puna kāmabhavūpapatti atthi. Vuttañhi abhidhamme yamakappakaraṇe “rūpadhātuyā cutassa
tika-vin08t:2337_8: kāmadhātuṃ upapajjantassa satteva anusayā anusentī”ti. Athāpi vadeyya “brahmalokeyeva
tika-vin08t:2337_9: ṭhatvā aggaphalaṃ labheyyā”ti, tathā ca ācariyassa vacane na dissati, “sobheyyaṃ
tika-vin08t:2337_10: jinasāsana”nti vuttattā bhikkhubhūtattameva dissati. Na hi bhikkhubhūto sāsanaṃ sobhāpetuṃ
tika-vin08t:2340_0: Bhikkhubhūtameva vuttaṃ. Athāpi vadeyya “antarā dīghāyuko bhummadevo hutvā tadā manusso
tika-vin08t:2340_1: bhaveyyā”ti, evampi ekassa buddhassa sāvakabhūto ariyapuggalo puna aññassa buddhassa
tika-vin08t:2340_2: sāvako na bhaveyyāti, ācariyo pana sabbapariyattidharo anekaganthakārako anekesaṃ
tika-vin08t:2340_3: ganthakārakānaṃ therānaṃ ācariyapācariyabhūto, tena na kevalaṃ idheva imā gāthāyo
tika-vin08t:2340_4: ṭhapitā, atha kho sāratthadīpanīnāmikāya vinayaṭīkāya avasāne ca ṭhapitā, tasmā bhavitabbamettha
tika-vin08t:2341_0: Atha vā iminā…pe… devaputto hutvā paṭhamaṃ tāva phalaṃ yathāvuttaṃ tāvatiṃse pamodanasīlācāraguṇe
tika-vin08t:2341_1: rataṃ pañcakāmesu alaggabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ patvāna antime attabhāvamhi…pe…
tika-vin08t:2341_2: sobheyyanti yojanā. Atha vā iminā…pe… pañcakāmesu alaggo hutvā antime attabhāvamhi…pe…
tika-vin08t:2341_3: saddhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā tato paraṃ aggaphalaṃ
tika-vin08t:2341_4: arahattaphalaṃ adhigantvā jinasāsanaṃ sobheyyanti yojanā. Yathā amhākaṃ bhagavato
tika-vin08t:2341_6: patvā pacchā arahattaphalaṃ adhigantvā jinasāsanaṃ sobhesi, evanti attho. Ito aññānipi
tika-vin08t:2341_7: nayāni yathā therassa vacanānukūlāni, tāni paṇḍitehi cintetabbāni.
tika-vin08t:2357: Tassa kāle brahāraññe, tiriyo nāma pabbato;
